CHAPTER.VERS: A kipat cil-in Pasian in vantung le leitung a piangsak hi.
Leitung in limlemel nei loin a awngthawlpi ahi hi. Tuipi tung tengah khua mial bikbek a, tua tui tungah Pasian’ Kha in na a sem hi.
Pasian in, “Khuavak om hen,” ci hi; tua ciangin khuavak om pah hi.
Pasian in tua khuavak hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi. Pasian in khuamial panin khuavak khen khia hi.
Pasian in khuavak pen “Sun” ci a, khuamial pen “Zan” ci hi. Nitak hong bei-in, zingsang hong tunga, ni khat ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Tuite’ laizangah van kuumpi om henla, tua van kuumpi in tui le tui kikhensak hen,” ci hi.
Pasian in van kuumpi bawl a, van kuumpi tunga om tuite le van kuumpi nuai-a om tuite a khen hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in van kuumpi pen “Vantung” ci hi. Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, ni nih ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Vantungte nuai-a om tuite mun khatah kikhawm henla, lei keu kidawk hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in lei keu pen “Leitung” ci a, a kikaikhawm tuite pen “Tuipi” ci hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Pasian in, “Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangsak henla, tang a nei kungnote, a gah sungah tang a om singgah kungte, amau’ nam ciatin leitungah piangsak hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.

Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piang khiasak a, kungnote in amau’ nam ciatin tang piangsakin, singkung in a sungah tang a om gahte piangsakin, amau’ nam ciatciatin piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, ni thum ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Sun le zan a khen dingin vantungah khuavakte om hen; tuate pen pawi hun le khuahun, ni le kumte khen nading hi henla,
leitung khua a vaksak dingin vantungah khuavak hi uh hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in khuavak lian nih bawl a, khuavak lian zaw pen sun a uk ding, khuavak neu zaw pen zan a uk dingin bawl a, amah in aksite zong a bawl hi.
Leitungah khua a vaksak ding, sun le zan a uk ding, khuamial panin khuavak a khen khia dingin Pasian in vantungah tuate a koih hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, ni li ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Tuite in a nungta ganhing honpite piangsak henla, vantung kantanin leitungah vasate leeng tahen,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in tuipi ganhing golpite le amau nam ciatin tuipi sungah tampi a pha, nuntakna a nei a gamtang thei ganhing namkim le kha a nei vasa khempeuh amau nam ciatin a piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, “Ci pha-in tampi pha-in, tuipi sung dim unla, leitungah vasate tampi pha un,” ci hi.
Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, a ni nga ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Nuntakna a nei ganhingte amau nam ciatin leitung in piangsak hen: Innsa, gamsa le a bokvak ganhingte amau nam ciatin piang tahen,” a ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Innsa, gamsa le a bokvak ganhing khempeuh amau nam ciatin Pasian in a piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung le leitunga, a bokvakte tungah ukna neisak ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian’ lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in numei le pasal a piangsak hi.
Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, “Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate tungah ukna nei ta un,” a ci hi.
Pasian in, “En un, leitung maitang khempeuh ah a om, tang a piangsak kungno khempeuh le a gah sungah tang a om singkung khempeuh note tungah kong pia khinta hi. Tuate an-in na nei ding uh hi.
Leitung ganhing khempeuhte tung, huihlak vasate tung, leitungah a bokvakte tung, nuntakna hu a neite tungah an dingin kung hing khempeuh kong pia khinta hi,” a ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in a bawlsa khempeuh en a, hoihsa mahmah hi. Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, a ni guk ni ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin vantung, leitung le a sunga omte kiman khin hi.
Ni sagih ma-in Pasian in a nasepte zo khinta a, ama hihsa nasep khempeuh panin ni sagih ni-in a tawlnga hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ni sagih ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh piansak nasepna ama nasep khempeuh panin tua ni-in Pasian a tawlnga hi. Eden Huanah Mi
Hihte pen, a kipiansak lai-a vantung le leitung tangthu ahi hi. Topa Pasian in leitung le vantungte a bawl hi.
Topa Pasian in leitungah guah zusak nai lo a, leitang a kho ding mi om lo ahih manin gam sung kungnote lei sungah om nai lo a, lo sung ankungte po khia lo hi.
Tua ciangin leitung panin meii lum kaaito-in, lei maitang khempeuh a buah hunin
Topa Pasian in leilak pan a leivui tawh mihing bawl a, a nak sungah nuntakna hu sang suk hi. Tua mi pen leitung nuntakna a nei mihing hong suak pah hi.
Topa Pasian in nisuahna lamah Eden huan khat bawl hi. Tua lai munah ama bawlsa mipa koih hi.
A deihhuai, nek dinga a hoih singkung nam khempeuh, huan laizangah nuntakna singkung le a pha le a sia theihna singkung, lei sung panin Topa Pasian in posak hi.
Huan sung a kawtsak dingin Eden nawkin gun khat hong luang a, tua mun panin gun hong kikhenin li hong pha hi.
A masa pen gun a min Pishon hi a, kham a omna, Havilah gambup kimkotah a luang pen ahi hi.
Tua gam a khamte hoih hi. Tua munah bedolak singnai le onik suang om hi.
A nihna gun min Gihon hi a, Kush gam kimkotah a luang pen ahi hi.
Assiria gam nisuahna lamah a luang a thumna gun min Hiddekel ahi hi. A lina gun pen Eufratis gun ahi hi.
Topa Pasian in mipa la-in, Eden huan kho-in a kem dingin a koih hi.
Topa Pasian in mipa thu pia a, “Na ut utin huan sung singkung gah khempeuh na ne thei ding hi.
Ahih hangin a pha le a sia theihna singkung gah pen na ne kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua na nek ni-in na si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “Mipa amah guak a om ding hoih lo hi. Ama ading a kituak a huh ding ka bawlsak ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in gam sung ganhing khempeuh le huihlak vasa khempeuh lei tawh bawl a, mipa in tuate bang a ci hiam ci-in a theih nadingin mipa kiangah tuate a paipih hi. Nuntakna a nei khempeuhte pen mipa’ cih bangbang a min hi pahpah hi.
Mipa in ganhing nam khempeuh, huihlak vasa khempeuh le gam sung ganhing khempeuh min a vawh hi. Ahih hangin mipa a’ dinga a kilawm, amah a huh ding khat zong om lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in mipa ihmut suaksak mahmah a, ama ihmut kalin a nakguhte khat la-in tua mun pen satak tawh a dimsak hi.
Topa Pasian in mipa’ tung panin a lak khiat nakguh pen numei khatin bawl a, mipa kiangah tua nu a paipih hi.
Tua ciangin mipa in, “Tu petpetin hih pen keima guhte le keima sate ahi hi. Amah pen mipa sung panin a kila khia ahih manin ‘Numei’ kici ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm a, amau tegel pum khat a bang uh hi.
Mipa le a zi a guaktangin om uh a, maizum lo uh hi.

Mi’ Thuman lohna Tu-in gulpi pen, Topa Pasian’ bawlsa gamlak ganhing dangte sangin ngiansiam zaw hi. Amah in numei kiangah, “Pasian in, ‘Huan sung singgah khat peuhpeuh ne lo ding,’ hong ci ahi hiam?” ci hi.
Numei in gulpi kiangah, “Huan sung singgahte ka ne thei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in, ‘Huan laizang a om singgah na ne kei ding uh hi, zong na lawng kei ding uh hi. Tua bang hih le-uhcin na si ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin gulpi in numei kiangah, “Na si kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua singgah na nek ciangun na mitte uh hong vak dinga, a pha le a sia thei-in, Pasian tawh na kibat ding lamtak uh Pasian in thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin singkung a hoihna, mi a pilsak dingin tua a gah a deihhuaina a muh ciangin, a singgah loin a ne hi. Amah in singgah kimkhat a pasal pia a, a pasal in zong a ne hi.
A nek khit phetun amau tegel in khua phawk uh a, a guaktangin a omlam uh kithei uh hi. Amaute in theitehte khui tuahin puansilh dingin a bawl uh hi.
A nitak ciangin huan sungah Topa Pasian a hong paina ging amaute in za uh a, Topa Pasian’ muh loh dingin mipa le a zi, huan sung singte lakah a bu uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa Pasian in mipa samin ama kiangah, “Koi lai-ah om na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Nangma ginna huan sungah ka za a, ka lau hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka guaktangin om ka hih manin ka bucip hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Na guaktang a na omna kua in hong gen ahi hiam? Na nek loh dinga kong thupiak singgah ne kha na hi hiam?” ci hi.
Mipa in, “Kei tawh a om dinga nong piak numei in singgah hong pia a, ke’n ka ne hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in numei kiangah, “Bangci a hici gamtat na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Numei in, “Gulpi in kei hong khem a, ka ne hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in gulpi kiangah, “Nang, hih bangin gamta khin na hih manin, ganhing khempeuhte le] gamlak ganhing khempeuhte sangin samsiatna na ngah zaw hi. Na gilpi-in lam na pai dinga, na nuntak sung tawntungin leivui na ne ding hi.
Nang le numei kikal na suanlekhakte le ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim dinga, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin numei kiangah, “Naupaiina-ah na gimna nakpitakin ka khangsak dinga, na a sapipi-in nau na nei ding hi. Ahi zongin na pasal mah na deih dinga, amah in nang tungah hong uk ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mipa kiangah, “Nang in na zi’ thu mangin, ‘Nang in na ne kei ding hi,’ ci-in nang kong thupiak singgah ne na hih ciangin, nangma hangin leitang in samsiatna ngah hi. Na nuntak tawntung gimpi-in na semin na annek ding na zong ding hi.
Ling le kiakte, nang adingin hong po khiasak dinga, nang in gamlak kungte na ne ding hi.

Lei-ah na ciahkik matengin khua-ul kai-in na na sep ciang bekin an na ne ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lei sung panin nang hong kipiangsak a, nang, leivui na hih manin, leivui mah na suakkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Mipa in a zi’ min pen Eve, ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen mihing khempeuh’ nu ahi hi.
Topa Pasian in mipa le a zi adingin savun puan bawl a, amaute silhsak hi.
Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “En un, mipa pen eite khat tawh kibang a, a pha le a sia thei hi. Amah in nuntakna singgah ne-in a hin tawntung khak loh nadingin i vaihawm ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in, amah a kipiansakna leitang a kho dingin Eden Huan panin mipa a sawl khia hi.
Amah in mipa hawl khia hi. Kherub-te le mun khempeuh a nga thei meikuang namsau pen nuntakna singkung lampi a cing dingin Eden Huan nisuahna lamah a koih hi.
Kain le Abel Tu-in mipa in ama zi Eve luppih a, amah gai-in Kain nei a, “Topa’ huhna tawh mi khat ka ngah khin hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggampa Abel nei leuleu hi. Tu-in Abel, tuu kempa hi a, Kain, lo khopa ahi hi.
Tua hun sungin Kain in lei pan a piang gah piakna Topa’ tungah paipih a,
Abel in a tuuhon tacilte le a sa limcite paipih hi. Topa in Abel le ama piakna thusim a,
ahih hangin Kain le ama piakna thusim lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kain heh mahmah a, a mai sia hi.
Topa in Kain tungah, “Bang hangin nang heh a, bang hangin na mai sia ahi hiam?

Limtakin hih lecin, nang hong kisang lo ding ahi hiam? Limtakin na hih kei leh nang hong hih nuamin mawhna in hong buk a, nang hong uk nuam hi. Ahih hangin nang in tua mawhna na zawh ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Kain in a sanggampa Abel kiangah, “Gamlakah vak ni,” ci hi. Amaute gamlakah a om ciangin Kain in a sanggampa Abel a that hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Kain tungah, “Na sanggampa Abel koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ka thei kei hi. Kei, ka sanggam a kempa ka hi hiam?” ci hi.
Topa in, “Bang hangin hici gamtat na hi hiam? Na sanggampa’ sisan, leilak panin kei tungah hong kiko hi.
Na sanggampa’ sisan a hup dingin a kam a ka leitang tungah tu-in nang hong kisamsiat hi.
Lo na khawh ciangin nang adingin an hong piangsak nawn lo ding hi. Nang pen a galtai, leitunga a vakvai na hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kain in Topa’ tungah, “Keimah gim hong kipiakna, ka thuak zawh ding hi lo hi.

En in, tuni-in nangmah in leitung panin kei nong hawl khia a, nang kiang panin kei nong not khia hi. Kei pen a galtai, leitungah a vakvai ka hi dinga, kei hong mu peuhmah in hong that ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Tua bang hi lo ding hi. Khatpeuh in Kain a thah leh tua pa tungah a zah sagihin kithuk ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah a tuakpeuh in a thahkhak loh nadingin Topa in Kain’ tungah ciaptehna khat a koih hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ omna panin Kain pai khia-in Eden nisuahna lam Nod gam sungah a teeng hi. Kain’ Suanlekhakte
Kain in a zi luppih a, amah gai-in Enok a nei hi. Kain in khuapi khat sat a, tua khuapi min dingin ama tapa’ min tamin Enok a phuak hi.
Enok sung panin Irad suak a, Irad pen Mehujael’ pa ahi hi. Mehujael pen Methushael’ pa hi a, Methushael pen Lamek’ pa ahi hi.
Lamek in zi nih nei hi. A khat’ min Adah hi a, adang khat’ min Zillah ahi hi.
Adah in tapa Jabal nei hi. Amah pen puanbukte sungah teengin ganhing a neite’ pianna pupi ahi hi.
A sanggampa’ min Jubal hi a, laiza lasakna le tamngai tumte’ pianna pupi ahi hi.
Zillah in Tubalkain nei a, sumngo le sik nazat khempeuh a bawlte’ pianna pupi ahi hi. Tubalkain’ sanggamnu pen Naamah ahi hi.
Lamek in a zite kiangah, “Adah le Zillah aw, ka aw ngai un. Lamek’ zite aw, ka thugen ngai un. Kei hong liamsak manin mi khat, kei hong sat manin khanglai mi khat ka that khin hi.
Kain a kithah manin a zah sagihin kithukkik ahihleh, Lamek a kithah manin a zah sawmsagih le sagihin kithukkik taktak ding hi,” a ci hi. Seth’ Suanlekhakte

Adam in a zi luppih leuleu hi. Amah in tapa khat nei a, a min Seth ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Kain in Abel that ahih manin Abel’ tangin Pasian in kei adingin naupang khat hong sehsak hi,” amah in ci hi.
Seth in zong tapa khat nei a, ama min Enosh ci hi. Tua hun a kipanin mite in Topa bia-in a min lawh ding kipan ta uh hi.
Hih pen Adam’ suanlekhakte’ laibu ahi hi. Pasian in mi a piansakin, amah in Pasian tawh a kisunin a bawl hi.
Amah in numei le pasal a piangsak hi. Amaute a kipiansakin amah in amaute, “Mi,” ci a, amaute thupha a pia hi.
Adam kum za le kum sawmthum a phak khit ciangin, amah a sun tapa khat nei a, Seth ci-in a min a phuak hi.
Seth a suah khit ciangin Adam kum zagiat sung nungta lai hi. Amah in tanu le tapa dang zong a nei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Adam’ nuntak hun sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawmthum hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Seth kum za le kum nga a phak ciangin Enosh kici tapa khat a nei hi.
Enosh a suah khit ciangin Seth kum zagiat le kum sawmthum nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Seth’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawm le kum nih hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Enosh kum sawmkua a phak ciangin, amah in Kenan kici tapa khat nei hi.
Kenan a suah khit ciangin Enosh kum zagiat le kum sawm le kum nga nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Enosh’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum nga hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Kenan kum sawmsagih a phak ciangin, Mahalalel kici tapa khat nei hi.
Mahalalel’ suah khit ciangin Kenan kum zagiat le kum sawmli nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kenan’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawm hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Mahalalel kum sawmguk le nga a phak ciangin Jared kici tapa khat nei hi.
Jared’ suah khit ciangin Mahalalel kum zagiat le kum sawmthum nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Mahalalel’ khan sungteng pen kum zagiat le kum sawmkua le kum nga hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Jared kum za le kum sawmguk le kum nih a phak ciangin Enok kici tapa khat nei hi.
Enok’ suah khit ciangin Jared kum zagiat nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jared’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawmguk le kum nih hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Enok kum sawmguk le nga a phak ciangin, Methuselah kici tapa khat nei hi.
Methuselah’ suah khit ciangin kum zathum sung Enok le Pasian kikhawl a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Enok’ khan sungteng pen kum zathum le kum sawmguk le kum nga ahi hi.
Enok pen Pasian tawh kikhawl hi. Enok kimu nawn lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in amah la hi.
Methuselah kum za le kum sawmgiat le kum sagih a phak ciangin Lamek kici tapa khat nei hi.
Lamek’ suah khit ciangin Methuselah kum zasagih le kum sawmgiat le kum nih nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Methuselah’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawmguk le kum kua hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Lamek kum za le kum sawmgiat le kum nih a phak ciangin tapa khat nei a,
ama min Noah phuakin, “Topa in a samsiatsa leitang panin hih pa in i nasepna le i gimnate-ah eite hong khah khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Noah’ suah khit ciangin Lamek kum zanga le kum sawmkua le kum nga nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Lamek’ khan sungteng pen kum zasagih le kum sawmsagih le kum sagih hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Noah kum zanga a phak khit ciangin Shem, Ham le Jafeth, tapa thum a nei hi.
Mihing A Gitlohna Leitungah mite tam dingin hong kipanin, amau’ sung panin tanute hong suah ciangin,
vana om mite in leitung mite’ tanute hoihsa uh ahih manin a deih bangun amaute zi-in a la uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in, “Mihingte sungah ka Kha om paisuak nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte a mawh hi khinta a, kum za le kum sawmnih sung kisik nading hun kipia lai bek ding hi,” a ci hi.

Vana om mite in leitung mihing tanute luppihin, amaute in ta a neih hun laitak hitaleh tua khit hitaleh, amau’ suanlekhak Nefilim a kici mite leitungah om hi. Hih mite pen tang lai-a mi thahat, mi minthangte ahi uh hi.
Leitungah mihing a gitlohna a liatna le mihing lungsim ngaihsutna peuhmah a sia ahih ngitngetna thu Topa in mu hi.
Leitungah mihing a bawl pen Topa khial kisa a, tua thu in ama lungsim dahsak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in, “Ka piansaksa mihing, ganhing, a bokvak ganhingte le huihlak vasate, leitung panin ka phiat khia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute ka bawl ka khial hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Noah in Topa’ maipha mu hi. Noah in Teembaw Bawl
Noah’ tangthu hih bang ahi hi. Noah a thuman mi khat hi a, ama khangah paubaang lo hi. Noah pen Pasian tawh kikhawl hi.
Noah in tapa thum, Shem, Ham le Jafeth a nei hi.
Tu-in Pasian’ muhna-ah leitung sia a, leitungah ngongtatna kidim hi.
Pasian in leitung en a, a kisiat gawp mu hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah mi khempeuh a sia-in a gamta lo kuamah om lo hi.
Pasian in Noah’ kiangah, “Mi khempeuh beisak ding ka khentat zo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ hangin leitungah ngongtatna kidim hi. En in, leitung tawh amaute ka susia khawm ding hi.
Nang adingin noah-taaksing tawh teembaw khat bawl in. Teembaw sungah a deite bawl inla, a sung le a pua kultal tui tawh zut in.
Na bawl nading dan hih bang ahi hi: Teembaw a sauna pi zali le sawmnga, a zaina pi sawmsagih le nga, a sanna pi sawmli le nga hi ding hi.
Teembaw adingin kongkhak khat bawl inla, tua tung pi khat le alang ciangah zawh bawl in. A pangah teembaw kongkhak bulh in. A dawl nuainung, a dawl nihna le a dawl thumnate bawl in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, en in, leitungah a om nuntak husanna a nei khempeuh a susia dingin leitungah tuiciin ka tungsak ding hi. Leitunga a om khempeuh si ding hi.
Ahih hangin nang tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi. Teembaw sungah nang na hong pai ding hi. Nang, na tapate, na zi le na tapate’ zite tawh na paikhawm ding uh hi.
Nuntakna a nei khempeuh nang tawh a nungta dingin nam khatah nih ciat teembaw sungah na paipih ding hi. Tuate pen a nu le a pa hi ding hi.
Vasate amau’ nam ciatin, ganhingte amau’ nam ciatin, leilakah a bokvak ganhingte peuhmah amau’ nam ciatin, a suakta dingin nam khatah nih ciat nang kiangah hong pai ding uh hi.
A kine an nam khempeuh zong la inla khol in. Tuate pen nang le amaute adingin an ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Noah zong tua bangmahin gamta a, Pasian’ thupiak khempeuh a hih hi.
Tuiciin Tua ciangin Topa in Noah kiangah, “Nang le na innkuanpih mi khempeuh teembaw sungah pai un. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih khang mite sung panin nang bek a thuman na hihna ka hong thei hi.
Ganhing siangtho nupa kop sagih, ganhing a siang lo nupa kop khat,
huihlak vasate zong nupa kop sagih, leitungah amau’ nam a manthan loh nadingin la in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ni sagih sungin sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung leitungah guah ka zusak ding hi. Ka bawlsa nuntakna a nei peuhmah leitung panin ka phiat khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Noah in zong Topa’ thupiak khempeuh a hih hi.
Leitungah tuiciin a tun lai-in Noah kum zaguk pha hi.
Tuiciin a pelh dingin Noah, a tapate, a zi le a tapate’ zite teembaw sungah pai uh hi.
Ganhing siangthote, a siang lo ganhingte, vasate, leitunga a bokvak peuhmah,
a nupa kopin Pasian in Noah a thupiaksa bangin teembaw sungah Noah tawh pai uh hi.
A ni sagih ni-in leitungah tuiciin tung hi.
Noah’ nuntak kum zaguk kum, a kha nihna, tua kha ni sawm le sagih ni-in vana om a thuk mahmah tuikhukte puakkhamin, vantung tawlette kihong hi.
Sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung leitungah guah zu hi.
Tua ni teekteekin Noah le a tapate Shem, Ham, Jafeth le Noah’ zi le a tapate’ zi thumte, amau tawh teembaw sungah a tum uh hi.
Amaute le gamsa peuhmah amau’ nam ciat, innsa khempeuh amau’ nam ciat, leitungah a bokvak peuhmah amau’ nam ciat le vasa peuhmah amau’ nam ciat, vasa namkim amau’ nam ciatin a tum uh hi.
Nuntak husanna a nei khempeuh a nupa kop ciatin Noah tawh teembaw sungah a pai uh hi.
Pasian in Noah tungah a thupiakna bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh teembaw sungah a lut khit ciangin Topa in Noah kong a khaknelh hi.
Leitungah tuiciin ni sawmli sung omden hi. Tui tam semsem a, teembaw laamto-in, leitung’ tungah khangin sangto lai hi.
Tui khangto-in leitungah tam mahmah hi. Tui tungah teembaw laam hi.
Leitungah tui khangkhang ahih manin mual sangte khempeuh tuumcip hi.
Mual liante tungah tui omto lai a, tuate tungah pi sawmnih le nih thuk-in tuumcip hi.
Leitungah a nungta khempeuh, vasate, innsate, gamsate, a honhonin leitungah a hon om ganhing khempeuh le mi khempeuh a si uh hi.
Leitungah a om, nuntakna hu a nei peuhmah a si uh hi.

Mihing, ganhing, a bokvakte le huihlak vasate, leitunga om nuntakna a nei peuhmah amah in phiat khia hi. Leitung panin amaute kiphiat khia hi. Noah le amah tawh teembaw sunga a om teng bek a suakta uh hi.
Ni za le ni sawmnga sung leitungah tui om hi.
Tuiciin Beina Ahih hangin Pasian in Noah le amah tawh teembaw sungah a om gamsate le innsate a phawk hi. Pasian in leitungah huih nungsak a, tui a kiam hi.
Tui thukte le vantung tawlette kikhak a, vantung pan a guahte kikhawlsak hi.
Leitung panin tuite kiamkiam hi. Ni za le ni sawmnga a phak ciangin tuite kiam khinta hi.
Kha sagihna, tua kha ni sawm le sagih ni-in Ararat mualtungah teembaw kinga hi.
A kha sawmna ciang dong tuite kiamkiam lai hi. Kha sawmna, tua kha ni khat ni-in mual dawnte kidawk hi.
Ni sawmli a cin ni ciangin Noah in ama bawlsa teembaw tawlet hong a,
va-ak khat khah hi. Leitung panin tuite a keu mateng leeng kawikawi hi.
Tua ciangin, leitungah tuite a kiam khin nai hiam cih a theih nadingin amah in vakhu khat khah hi.
Ahih hangin, leitung khempeuh ah tuite om lai-in, a khawl nading mu lo ahih manin teembaw-ah hong ciahkik hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut zanin a vakhu man a, teembaw sungah paipih hi.
Amah in ni sagih sung ngakin, teembaw panin a vakhu khah leuleu hi.
Nitak ciangin ama kiangah a vakhu hong ciahkik a, oliv teh a tuk khiat thak khat a mukah petin hong tunpih hi. Tua ahih ciangin leitung panin tuite kiam khinta hi, ci-in Noah in a thei hi.
Tua ciangin ni sagih sung ngak leuleu-in a vakhu khah hi. Tua vakhu pen ama kiangah hong ciahkik nawn lo hi.
Noah a khan kum zaguk le a kum khatna, a kha masa, tua kha ni masa ni-in leitung panin tuite keu hi. Noah in teembaw khuhna la khia a, khuadak hi. Lei maitang na keu ta hi.
A kha nihna, tua kha ni sawmnih le sagih ni-in leitung keu hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Noah kiangah,
“Nang le na zi, na tapate le na tapate’ zite, teembaw sung panin pai khia un.
Nang tawh a omkhawm nuntakna a nei khempeuh - vasate, ganhingte le leitunga a bokvak peuhmah - leitungah tampi suakin, pungin leitungah a tam theih nadingin pai khiatpih in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Noah pai khia a, a tapate le ama zi le a tapate’ zite mah tawh pai khia khawm hi.
Ganhing khempeuh, a bokvak khempeuh, vasa khempeuh, leitunga a gamtang khempeuh a innkuan kuanin teembaw panin a pai khia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Noah in Topa ading biakna tau khat lam a, a siangtho ganhing khempeuh le a siangtho vasa khempeuh lak pan khat ciat la-in, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna a pia hi.

Topa in a namtui gimnam a zak ciangin, a lungsim sungah, “Mihing’ gamtatna hangin leitang ka samsiakik ngei nawn kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihing’ lungsim ngaihsutna pen a tangval lai panin a gilo hi mawk hi. Tu-a ka hih bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh zong ka susia ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Leitung a omlai tengin, lo pawi hun le anlak hun, a vot le a sa, khuakhal le phalbi, sun le zan bei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Noah tawh Pasian’ Thuciamna Pasian in Noah le a tapate thupha pia a, amaute tungah, “Pung unla, tampi pha-in, leitung dim un.
Note pen leitung ganhing khempeuh, huihlak vasa khempeuh, leilakah a bokvak khempeuh le tuipi ngasa khempeuh in hong kihta-in hong zahtak ding uh hi. Note’ khut sungah tuate hong kipia hi.
A nungta a gamtang peuhmah, note adingin an hi ding hi. Kung hing khempeuh ka hong piak bangin na khempeuh zong note kong pia hi.
A nuntakna ahi a sisan pen a sa tawh na ne khawm kei bek ding uh hi.
Mi khatpeuh in hong thah leh ama tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. A hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that dinga, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah gim ka pia ding hi.
Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.
“Note, pungin khang unla, leitungah tampi tak piang khia-in, tampi pha-in khang un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Noah le amah tawh a om a tapate kiangah,
“En un, note le note’ khit a na suanlekhakte uh le,
note tawh a om nuntakna a nei peuhmah, vasate, innsate, note tawh a om leitung gamsa peuhmah, teembaw sung panin a pai khia zahzah peuhmah tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak hi.
Nuntakna a nei khempeuh, tuiciin tawh susiakik ngei nawn loin, leitung a susia dingin tuiciin ka tunsakkik ngei nawn loh nadingin note tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Hih pen, kei le note le note tawh a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh kikalah mailam khang tawntung ah thuciamna lim ahi hi.
Meii sungah ka sakhituihup ka kaisak a, tua pen kei le leitung kikalah thuciamna lim hi ding hi.
Vantungah meii kong kaisak ciangin meii sungah sakhituihup a kimuh leh,
kei le note le nuntakna a nei khempeuh tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding hi. Tuite pen, nuntakna a nei khempeuh a susia ding tuiciin suakkik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Meii sungah sakhituihup a om ciangin keimah in ka en dinga, kei le leitungah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh tawh tawntung thuciamna ka phawk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian in Noah kiangah, “Hih pen, kei le leitungah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh tawh ka kipsaksa thuciamna lim ahi hi,” a ci hi. Noah’ Zukhamna
Teembaw sung panin a pai khia Noah’ tapate, Shem, Ham le Jafeth ahi hi. Ham pen Kanaan’ pa ahi hi.
Hih Noah’ tapa thumte panin leitung buppi mi tawh hong kidim hi.
Noah pen lo kho masa pa hi a, amah in leenggui lo khat a bawl hi.
Amah in leenggahzu ne-in kham a, a puanbuk sungah bangmah silh loin a lum hi.
Kanaan’ pa Ham in a pa guaktangin a omna mu a, a pualama om a sanggam nihte kiangah a gen hi.

Tua ciangin Shem le Jafeth in puan khat la-in amau tegel’ liangko tuakah baang uh a, a nung leh lamun pai-in a pa uh’ guaktang omna a khuh uh hi. Amaute in maingat lo uh ahih manin a pa uh guaktang omna mu lo uh hi.
Noah a zukhamna panin a pilvan ciangin ama tungah a tapa Ham’ gamtatna thei a,
amah in, “Kanaan in samsiatna ngah ta henla, a sanggamte’ sila hi tahen.
Topa ka Pasian in Shem thupha pia henla, Kanaan, ama sila hisak hen.
Pasian in Jafeth pungsak henla, Shem’ puanbukte sungah amah tengsak hen. Kanaan ama sila hisak hen,” a ci hi.
Tuiciin a tun khit ciangin Noah kum zathum le kum sawmnga nungta hi.
Noah’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawmnga hi a, tua ciangin amah a si hi.
Hihte pen Noah’ tapa Shem, Ham le Jafeth-te’ suanlekhakte ahi hi. Tuiciin tun khit ciangin amau sung panin tapate hong piang hi.
Jafeth’ tapate: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan le Tiras ahi hi.
Gomer’ tapate: Ashkenaz, Rifath le Togarmah ahi hi.
Javan’ tapate: Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim le Dodanim ahi hi.
Hihte pen tuipi gei-a teeng mite’ pulepa ahi uh hi. Amaute’ leitangah amau’ kampau ciat zangin, a beh, a minamin a om uh hi.
Ham’ tapate: Kush, Egypt, Put le Kanaan ahi hi.
Kush’ tapate: Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah le Sabteka ahi hi. Raamah’ tapate: Sheba le Dedan ahi hi.
Kush in Nimrod kici tapa khat nei a, amah pen leitungah a vanglian masa mi ahi hi.
Amah pen Topa’ mai-ah a minthang sabengpa zong ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin, “Topa in Nimrod bangin a minthang sabengpa hong suaksak tahen,” kici hi.
Ama kumpi gam kipatna Babel, Erek le Akkad hi a, tuate khempeuh Shinar gam sungah om hi.
Tua gam panin Assiria gam sungah amah pai-in Nineveh, Rehoboth-Ir, Kalah le
Nineveh le Kalah kikal-a om Resen khuapite a sat hi. Tua Kalah khuapi pen khuapi lian ahi hi.
Egypt pen Lud mite, Anam mite, Lehab mite, Naftuh mite,
Pathru mite, Kasluh mite (Filistia mite’ pianna) le Kaftor mite’ pianna pupi ahi hi.
Kanaan pen ama sung pan a suak masa Sidon, Heth,
le Jebus mite, Amor mite, Girgash mite,
Hiv mite, Arki mite, Sin mite,
Arvad mite, Zemari mite le Hamath mite’ pianna pupi ahi hi. Tua khit ciangin Kanaan mite kizelthang hi.
Kanaan mite’ gam pen Sidon panin kipanin Gerar lam manawhin Gaza ciang dong ban a, Sodom lam panin Gomorrah, Admah le Lasha gei-a Zeboiim ciang dong ban hi.
Hihte pen a innkuan, a kampau, a leitang, a minamin Ham’ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
Eber mi khempeuh’ pianna pupi, Jafeth’ u, Shem’ sung panin zong tate hong piang hi.
Shem’ tapate: Elam, Asshur, Arpakshad, Lud le Aram ahi hi.
Aram’ tapate: Uz, Hul, Gether le Mash ahi hi.
Arpakshad in Shelah kici tapa khat nei a, Shelah in Eber kici tapa khat mah nei hi.
Eber’ sung panin tapa nih suak a, khat’ min pen Peleg ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama hunin leitung kikhen hi. A sanggampa’ min pen Joktan ahi hi.
Joktan pen Almodad, Shelef, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
Obal, Abimael, Sheba,
Ofir, Havilah le Jobab’ pianna pa ahi hi. Hihte khempeuh Joktan’ tapate ahi hi.
Amau’ tenna gam pen Mesha panin kipanin Sefar lamah nisuahna gam mual tung dong ban hi.
Hihte pen a innkuan, a kampau, a leitang, a minamin Shem’ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
Hihte pen Noah’ tapate innkuan, a khangsimna tawh kizui-in amau’ minam ahi hi. Tuiciin tun khit ciangin hihte tung panin leitungah minamte kizelthang hi.
Tua laitakin leitung buppi in kampau khat le kammal tawmno bek nei hi.
Amaute, nisuahna lamah lal uh a, Shinar gam sungah zanglei mun khat mu-in tua lai-ah a teeng uh hi.
Amaute khatlekhat kiangah, “Hong pai un, leiseek seekin limtakin hal ni,” kici uh hi. Amaute in suang dingin leiseek nei uh a, a buan dingin kultal tui nei uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hong pai un, leitung buppi-ah eite i kithehthang gawp loh nadingin ei adingin khuapi khat bawlin, a dawn in vantung a ban ding tausang khat lamin, eite’ minthan nading khat bawl ni,” ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihingte’ lamsa khuapi le tausangpi a en dingin Topa hong paisuk hi.

Topa in, “En un, amaute minam khat hi uh a, amaute khempeuh in kampau khat nei uh hi. Hih pen amau’ sep ding a kipatna bek ahi hi. Tu-in sep dinga amau’ vaihawmte amau adingin hi thei nawn lo ding hi.
Hong pai un, amaute khatlekhat’ thugen a kitheih loh nadingun eite paisukin amau’ kampau va kitukalhsak ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in tua lai panin leitung khempeuh ah amaute thehthang a, a khuapi bawl uh a tawp uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a min Babel kici hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in tua munah leitung khempeuh’ kampau kitukalhsak hi. Tua lai mun panin Topa in leitung khempeuh ah amaute a thehthang hi.
Hihte pen Shem’ suanlekhakte ahi hi. Shem kum zakhat a phak, tuiciin tun khit kum nih ciangin, amah in Arpakshad kici tapa khat nei hi.
Arpakshad a suah khit ciangin Shem kum zakhat nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Arpakshad kum sawmthum le kum nga a phak khit ciangin, amah in Shelah kici tapa khat nei hi.
Shelah a suah khit ciangin Arpakshad kum zali le kum sawmthum nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Shelah kum sawmthum a phak khit ciangin Eber kici tapa khat nei hi.
Eber’ suah khit ciangin Shelah kum zali le kum sawmthum nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Eber kum sawmthum le kum li a phak khit ciangin amah in Peleg kici tapa khat nei hi.
Peleg a suah khit ciangin Eber kum zali le kum sawmthum nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Peleg kum sawmthum a phak khit ciangin amah in Reu kici tapa khat nei hi.
Reu a suah khit ciangin Peleg kum zanih le kum kua nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Reu kum sawmthum le nih a phak khit ciangin amah in Serug kici tapa khat nei hi.
Serug a suah khit ciangin Reu kum zanih le kum sagih nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Serug kum sawmthum a phak khit ciangin amah in Nahor kici tapa khat nei hi.
Nahor a suah khit ciangin Serug kum zanih nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Nahor kum sawmnih le kua a phak khit ciangin amah in Terah kici tapa khat nei hi.
Terah a suah khit ciangin Nahor kum za le kum sawm le kum kua nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang neilai hi.
Terah kum sawmsagih a phak khit ciangin amah in Abram, Nahor le Haran a nei hi.
Tu-in Terah’ suanlekhakte hih bang ahi hi. Terah pen Abram, Nahor le Haran’ pa hi a, Haran pen Lot’ pa ahi hi.
Ama pa Terah a sih ma-in ama suahna gam ahi, Khaldea gam Ur khua-ah Haran si hi.
Abram le Nahor in zi nei uh hi. Abram’ zi min Sarai hi a, Nahor’ zi min Milkah hi a, Milkah pen Iskah’ pa Haran’ tanu ahi hi.
Tu-in Sarai ciing a, ta nei lo hi.

Terah in ama tapa Abram le Haran’ tapa, ama tupa ahi Lot le a tapa Abram’ zi ahi a monu Sarai samin, Kanaan gam sungah a pai dingin Khaldea gam Ur khua panin amaute a pai khia khawm uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute Haran a tun uh ciangin tua munah a teeng uh hi.
Terah’ khansung kum zanih le kum nga hi a, Haran-ah Terah a si hi.
Pasian in Abram a Sapna Topa in Abram kiangah, “Na gam, na beh le na pa’ inn panin nang kong lah ding gamah pai in.
Minam lian in kong bawl dinga, thupha hong pia-in, na min liansak ding ka hih manin midangte’ adingin thupha na hi ding hi.
Nang thupha hong piate thupha ka pia dinga, nang hong samsiate ka samsia ding hi. Nang’ thupha ngah bangin thupha a ngah nadingun leitung midang khempeuh in hong ngen ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ gensa bangin Abram pai a, Lot in zong a zui hi. Haran panin a pai khiatin Abram kum sawmsagih le nga a pha hi.
Abram in ama zi Sarai, a sanggampa’ tapa Lot, amau’ kaihkhopsa neihsa khempeuh le Haran-a amau’ neih sila khempeuh samin, Kanaan gamah a pai dingin amaute ding khia uh a, tua gam a tung uh hi.
Abram in tua gam sung nawkin Shekhem mun, Moreh tawsaw phung dong a tung hi. Tua hunin tua lai-ah Kanaan mite teeng lai hi.
Tua ciangin Abram’ tungah Topa kilang a, “Na suanlekhakte tungah hih leitang ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in ama tunga kilang Topa adingin biakna tau khat a bawl hi.

Tua ciangin Bethel panin nisuahna lam mualah amah kin kikin a puanbuk lam a, nitumna lamah Bethel, nisuahna lamah Ai om hi. Tua lai munah zong amah in Topa adingin biakna tau khat bawl a, Topa’ tungah thu a ngen hi.
Abram in a khualzin zom lai a, Negeb gam lam manawhin a pai lai hi.
Kanaan gam sungah kialpi tung hi. Tua kialpi nasia ahih manin tawlkhat sung a om dingin Egypt-ah Abram a paisuk hi.
Egypt gam a tum ding ciangin amah in a zi Sarai’ kiangah, “Nang pen nupi melhoih khat na hihna ka thei hi.
Egypt mite in nang hong muh ciangin amaute in, ‘Hih nu ama zi hi,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kei hong that ding uh a, ahi zongin amaute in nang hong nungtasak ding uh hi.
Nang pen ka sanggamnu ci lehang, nangma hangin kei adingin thu hong hoih zaw dinga, nangma hangin ka suakta thei kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Egypt gam sungah Abram a tun ciangin Egypt mite in tua nupi a mel hoihsa mahmah uh hi.
Faro’ uliante in amah a muh uh ciangin Faro’ kiangah amah phat uh hi. Faro’ inn sungah tua nupi kila hi.
Tua nu’ hangin amah in Abram limbawl mahmah hi. Amah in tuu, bawngtal, latal, pasal nasem, numei nasem, lanu le kalaoh-te a pia hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Abram’ zi Sarai’ huhau-in Faro le a innkuanpihte gimna lianpi thuaksak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro in Abram samin, “Bang hangin hih bangin kei hong bawl na hi hiam? Amah na zi ahihna bang hangin kei kiangah hong gen lo na hi hiam?
Ka zi dingin amah ka lak theih nadingin, ‘Amah ka sanggamnu hi,’ bang hangin hong ci na hi hiam? Tu-in hih lai-ah na zi om hi. Amah la inla pai un,” a ci hi.
Faro in amah tawh kisai-in a mite tungah thu a pia hi. Amaute in a zi le ama neih khempeuh tawh lampi-ah a kha khia uh hi.
Abram le Lot Kikhen Tua ahih ciangin Egypt panin Abram, a zi, ama neih khempeuh le Lot tawh zong Negeb gam lamah a paito hi.
Abram in ganhing, ngun le kham hau mahmah hi.
Amah Negeb gam pan kipanin Bethel ciang dong, a kipat cil-in a puanbuk omnasa mun Bethel le Ai kikal,
a masa-a biakna tau khat a bawlnasa munah khualzinin a paisuak hi. Tua lai munah Abram in Topa’ tungah thu a ngen hi.
Abram tawh a paikhawm Lot in zong tuuhon, ganhon le puanbukte nei hi.
Tua ahih manin mun khatah a teeng khawm dingin leitang in amau tegel vak zo lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gan neihsate tam mahmah ahih manin amau tegel teeng khawm thei lo uh a,
Abram’ gancingte le Lot’ gancingte kitawng thei zel hi. Tua hun laitakin Kanaan mite le Perez mite tua gamah teeng lai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abram in Lot’ kiangah, “Nang le kei’ kikal, nang’ gancingte le kei’ gancingte’ kikalah kitotna omsak kei ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh eite beh khat ihi hi.

Na mai-ah gam buppi om hi lo ahi hiam? Kei’ kiang panin nangmah pai khia tawm in. Nang in veilam na lak leh, kei taklamah ka pai ding hi. Tua ahih kei leh zong, nang in taklam na lak leh, kei veilamah ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.

Lot zong khuadak a, Jordan gun kuam mun khempeuh in limtakin tui ngahin Topa’ huan hitaleh, Zoar lama Egypt gam tawh hitaleh kibang hi, ci-in mu hi. Hih pen Topa in Sodom le Gomorrah a suksiat hun ma ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Lot in ama adingin Jordan gun kuam khempeuh teel a, nisuahna lamah a pai hi. Tua ahih manin amaute kikhen tuak uh hi.
Kuam sunga khuapite’ lakah Lot teengin, a puanbukte Sodom ciang dongah khinin a om laitakin Kanaan gam sungah Abram teeng hi.
Tua laitakin Sodom mite migi lo hi a, Topa’ tungah nakpitakin a khialte ahi hi.
Ama kiang panin Lot a pai khiat khit ciangin Topa in Abram’ kiangah, “Khuadak to inla, nangma omna panin leilu lam, leitaw lam, nisuahna lam le nitumna lam en in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh na muh gam khempeuh nang le na suanlekhakte kong pia paisuak ding hi.
Na suanlekhakte, leitung leivui zahin tampi ka phasak ding hi. Mi khatpeuh in leitung leivui a sim theih leh na suanlekhakte zong kisim thei ding hi.
Ding inla, gamdung gamvai kantanin pai in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang’ tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Abram in a puanbuk khinin, Hebron gam sung, Mamre tawsawte gei-ah hong pai-in a teeng hi. Tua lai munah Topa adingin biakna tau khat a bawl hi.
Shinar kumpipa Amrafel, Ellasar kumpipa Ariok, Elam kumpipa Khedorlaomer le Goiim kumpipa Tidal-te’ hun lai-in,
hih kumpite in Sodom kumpipa Bera, Gomorrah kumpipa Birsha, Admah kumpipa Shinab, Zeboiim kumpipa Shemeber le Bela (Zoar) kumpipa, kumpi ngate va sim uh hi.
Hih kumpi ngate in kipawlna bawlin Siddim Kuam (Ci Tuipi)-ah a galkapte uh gawm uh hi.
Amaute, kum sawm le kum nih sung Khedorlaomer’ khutnuai-ah om uh a, ahih hangin a kum sawm le kum thumna ciangin amaute in lehdo uh hi.
A kum sawm le kum lina ciangin Khedorlaomer le amah tawh a kipawl kumpite hong pai-in sehnel gamgi Elparan ciang dongah Ashteroth Karnaim gam a Refaim, Ham gam a Zuzim, Shavehkiriathaim gam a Emim,
le amau’ gam Seir Mual tunga Hori mite hong zo uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kiheikikin Enmishpat (Kadesh) ah hong pai uh a, Amalek mite’ gam khempeuh le Hazazontamar gam a teeng Amor mite zong zo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Sodom kumpipa, Gomorrah kumpipa, Admah kumpipa, Zeboiim kumpipa le Bela (Zoar) kumpipa kuan khia uh a, amaute kipawlin Siddim Kuam ah
Ela kumpipa Khedorlaomer, Goiim kumpipa Tidal, Shinar kumpipa Amrafel le Ellasar kumpipa Ariok tawh kido uh a, kumpi li kigawm le kumpi nga kigawm kido uh hi.
Siddim Kuam pen kultal khukte tawh kidim a, Sodom le Gomorrah kumpite a tai uh ciangin pawlkhat tua khukte sungah kia uh a, a omlai teng mualtungah tai uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin galte in Sodom le Gomorrah-te’ na khempeuh le a an khempeuh uh la-in a ciah uh hi.
Amaute in Sodom a, a teeng Lot (Abram’ sanggampa’ tapa) le a na khempeuh zong la-in a pai khia uh hi.

Tua ciangin a suakta mi khat hong pai-in, Hebru mi Abram’ kiangah hong gen hi. Amah pen Eshkol le Aner’ sanggampa ahi hi. Amor mi hi a, Mamre tawsawte gei-ah teeng hi. Hih mite pen Abram’ kipawlpihte ahi hi.
Ama behpa salin a kimatna Abram in a zak ciangin, ama inn sunga a suak, a kihilhsa ama mi zathum le sawm le giatte makaihin Dan ciang dong a delhin a pai uh hi.
Amah in zan hunin ama pawlte, amah le a nasemte, amaute a do dingin khenin amaute zo a, Damaskas leilu lam Hobah ciang dong a delh uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Lot le ama na khempeuh, numeite le a galmatte tawh a ciahpihkik hi. Melkhizedek in Abram Thupha Pia
Abram in Khedorlaomer kumpipa le a pawlte a zawhna panin a ciahkik ciangin amah a dawn dingin Sodom kumpipa Shaveh Kuam (Kumpipa’ Kuam)-ah na pai hi.
Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an le leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sang Pen Pasian’ siampi zong ahi hi.
Amah in thupha pia a, “Vantung le leitung a bawl, Sang Pen Pasian in Abram thupha pia hen!
Na galte na khut sungah a hong pia Sang Pen Pasian in thupha ngah hen,” a ci hi. Abram in na khempeuh sawm-ah-khat ama tungah a pia hi.
Sodom kumpipa in Abram’ kiangah, “A mite hong pia inla, ahih hangin a nate nang adingin la in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Abram in Sodom kumpipa kiangah, “Vantung le leitung a bawl Sang Pen Topa Pasian tungah ka kiciam khinzo hi.
Nangmah in, ‘Abram ka hausak hi,’ ci kha ding na hih manin mimkhau ahi a, khedap khau ahi a, nangma a’ ahi na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ka la kei ding hi.
Tangvalte’ neksate le kei tawh hong kuan mite’ tanh dingte lobuang bangmah ka la kei ding hi. Aner, Eshkol le Mamre-te amau’ tanh ding pia in,” a ci hi.

Abram’ tungah Tapa Khat Kikham Hih thute khit ciangin mang sungah Topa’ thu Abram’ tungah hong tunga, “Abram aw, lau kei in. Keimah in lauhuaina panin nang ka hong hu dinga, na thaman lian mahmah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Abram in, “Topa Pasian aw, bang hong pia ding na hi hiam? Ta nei loin ka omlai hi. Ka inn a luah ding pa pen Damaskas mi Eliezer ahi hi.
Ta nong pia kei a, ka inn sunga a suak sila in keima gamh a luah ding hi ta hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama tungah Topa’ thu hong tunga, “Hih mipa pen nangma gamhluah pa hi lo ding hi. Nangma tapa mahmah na gamhluah pa hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a pualamah paipih a, “Vantung lam enin aksite sim in; na sim thei hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Na suanlekhakte, tua mah bang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in Topa um a, tua a upna hangin Pasian in mihoihin a sang hi,” ci-in Topa in a ciamteh hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiangah, “Hih leitang na neih nadingin nangma tungah a hong pia dingin Khaldea gam Ur khua panin a hong pai khiatpih pa pen keimah na Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Topa Pasian aw, keimah in tua leitang ka neih nading bangci theih ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Kum thum a pha bawngla khat, kum thum a pha keelnu khat, kum thum a pha tuutal khat, vakhu khat le kawl vakhu khanglai khat hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Amah in Pasian kiangah hihte khempeuh paipih a, tuate phel nih ciat suahin, phel khat pen a phel dang khat tungah a koih ciat hi. Ahih hangin vasate phelnih suah lo hi.
Sa sial ne vasate tua sate tungah hong tuk suk ciangin Abram in tuate a hawl khia hi.
Ni a tum ciangin Abram a ihmut nak suah mahmah a, khua mial bikbek a, lau mahmah hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Abram kiangah, “Na suan na khakte amau’ leitang ahi lo gam dangah salin om ding uh a, tua lai-ah amaute kum zali sung nakpi takin gimna thuak ding ahihna thu a kitel theihna thei in.
Ahi zongin na a sepsak uh minamte’ tungah thukhenna ka tungsak dinga, tua khit ciangin neihsa tampi tawh amaute pai khia ding uh hi.
Nang na hih leh, nuamtakin na pu na pate kiang na zuan dinga, khan kicingin hong kivui ding hi.
Khang lina ciangin hih lai munah amaute hong paikik ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Amor mite’ mawhna kicing nai lo hi,” a ci hi.
Ni tumin khua a mial khit ciangin, en in, hih sate kikalah mei beel khu le a kuang meivak a pai hi.
Tua ni-in Topa in Abram tawh thuciamna khat bawl a, “Na suanlekhakte tungah hih leitang, Egypt gun panin a lian gunpi ahi Eufratis gun ciang dong,
Ken mite, Kenaz mite, Kadmon mite,
Hit mite, Perez mite, Refaim mite,
Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Girgash mite le Jebus mite’ leitang kong pia hi,” a ci hi.
Hagar le Ishmael Tua hunin Abram’ zi Sarai in ta nei nai lo hi. Amah in Hagar min nei Egypt mi sila numei khat nei hi.

Sarai in Abram’ kiangah, “Tu-in en in, Topa in ka ta neih ding hong khaktan hi. Ka sila numei’ kiangah lum in. Ama sung panin keimah in ta a nei ding ka hi kha ding hi,” a ci hi. Abram in Sarai’ thu mang hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, Kanaan leitangah Abram kum sawm a teen khit ciangin Abram’ zi Sarai in Egypt mi a sila numei Hagar la-in a pasal Abram’ tungah zi-in a pia hi.
Amah in Hagar luppih a, Hagar gai hi. Amah a gai lam a kitheih ciangin kiphasakin a tonu simmawhbawl hi.

Tua ciangin Sarai in Abram’ kiangah, “Keima tungah a man lo a hong kibawlna nangma tungah hong tung tahen! Nangma kawi dingin ka sila numei kong pia a, amah a gai khitna a kitheih ciangin kei hong simmawhbawl hi. Topa in nang le kei’ kikalah thu hong khen tahen,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Abram in Sarai’ kiangah, “En in, na sila numei, nangma khut sungah om hi. Na ut bangin ama tungah bawl in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Sarai in amah gawtbawl a, Hagar zong a tai khia hi.
Topa’ vantungmi in Shur paina lampi-a cik ahi, sehnel gam a ciktui gei khatah amah a mu hi.
Amah in, “Sarai’ sila numei Hagar aw, koi pan hong pai a, koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ka tonu Sarai’ kiang panin a tai khia ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Na tonu’ kiangah ciahkik inla, ama tungah ki-ap in,” a ci hi.
Topa’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Na suanlekhakte nakpitakin tamsak ding ka hih manin amaute kisim zo lo ding hi,” zong ci lai hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “En in, nau na paii a, tapa khat na nei ding hi. Ama min Ishmael na phuak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in nangma thuakna hong mu khin hi.
Amah pen la a zual nai lo bang dinga, amah in mi khempeuh langpangin mi khempeuh in amah langpang ding hi. Ama behte khempeuh a langpangin om ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ama tungah thu a gen Topa pen, “Nang, a mu thei Pasian khat na hi hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Keimah in Pasian mu khin taktakin, amah ka muh khit ciangin hing lai hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua tuikhuk pen Beerlahairoi kici a, Kadesh le Bered kikalah om hi.
Hagar in Abram tawh tapa khat nei hi. Abram in Hagar’ sung panin a suak ama tapa’ min dingin Ishmael a phuak hi.
Hagar in Abram tawh a neih Ishmael a suah ciangin Abram kum sawmgiat le kum guk a pha ta hi.
Vun-atna, Thuciamna Lim Abram kum sawmkua le kum kua a phak ciangin ama tungah Topa kilang a, “Kei, Vanglian Pasian ka hi hi. Hoihtakin gamta inla, paubaang kei in.
Nang tawh thuciamna ka bawl dinga, nang tampi tak kong phasak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abram kunsuk hi. Pasian in ama kiangah,
“En in, nang tungah hih thuciamna kong bawl hi: Nang pen minam honpite’ pa na hi ding hi.
Na min Abram hi nawn lo dinga, Abraham hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh minam honpite’ pa-in nang kong bawl khin hi.
Keimah in suanlekhak tampi kong neisak ding hi. Nang sung panin minamte ka piangsak dinga, nang sung panin kumpite hong piang khia ding hi.
“Nang le nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte tungah Pasian hihna ding tawntung thuciam nadingin kei le nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte’ tungah amau’ khang tawntungin ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi.
Nangma tung le nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte tungah tawlkhat na omna Kanaan leitang khempeuh na neih tawntung dingun kong pia dinga, kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian in Abraham’ kiangah, “Nang le nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte in zong ka thuciamna na zuih ding uh nong thukim ding uh ahi hi.
Hih pen nang le nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte’ zuih ding keima thuciamna ahi hi: Note’ lak panin pasal peuhmah a vun ki-at ding hi.
Note’ vun dawn ki-at dinga, tua pen kei le note’ kikalah thuciamna lim khat hi ding hi.

Note’ lak panin ni giat a pha pasal peuhmah a vun ki-at ding hi. Note’ khang tawntungin pasal peuhmah, note’ inn sunga suak hitaleh, note’ ta ahi lo, gamdang mi khatpeuh kiang panin na sum uh tawh na lei uh hitaleh
na inn sunga suak hitaleh, na sum tawh a kileipa hitaleh a vun ki-at tuak ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tawntung thuciamna ahi keima thuciamna pen nomau’ satak sungah om ding hi.
A vun dawn a ki-at lo pasal peuhmah a mipihte kiang panin kihawl khia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in keima thuciamna palsat hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Abraham’ kiangah, “Na zi Sarai ahihleh, ama min Sarai na ci nawn kei dinga, ama min Sarah hi ding hi.
Amah thupha ka pia dinga, amah tawh tapa khat kong pia ding hi. Amah thupha ka pia dinga, amah, minamte’ nu hi ding hi. Mihingte’ kumpite ama sung pan hong piang khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abraham mai kun sukin nui a, a mahmah tungah, “Kum za a pha pasal khat in ta nei ding ahi hiam? Kum sawmkua a pha Sarah in ta nei ding ahi hiam?” kici hi.
Abraham in Pasian’ kiangah, “Ishmael hong nungtasak peuh lecin,” a ci hi.

Pasian in, “Hi lo hi. Na zi Sarah in nang adingin tapa khat nei dinga, ama min Isaac na phuak ding hi. Ama khit cianga a suanlekhakte adingin tawntung thuciam nadingin ka thuciamna amah tawh ka kipsak ding hi.
Ishmael ading na ngetna ahihleh ka za khin hi. En in, amah thupha pia-in ka pungsak dinga, tampi tak ka phasak ding hi. Amah pen ulian sawm le nihte’ pa hi dinga, minam lian khatin ka bawl ding hi.
Ahih hangin, kumkik tuhun ciangin Sarah’ sung panin nang a’ dinga hong suak ding Isaac tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah tawh a kiho a man khit ciangin Abraham’ kiang panin Pasian pai khia to hi.

Tua ciangin Abraham in a tapa Ishmael le ama sum tawh a lei hitaleh ama inn sunga suak hitaleh a sila, ama inn sunga om mite’ lak panin pasal khempeuh samin, Pasian in ama tunga a gensa bangin tua ni mahmahin amaute’ vun dawn a atsak hi.
Ama vun dawn a ki-atin Abraham kum sawmkua le kum kua pha ta hi.
Ama vun dawn a ki-atin a tapa Ishmael kum sawm le kum thum a pha hi.
Tua ni mahmahin Abraham le a tapa Ishmael a vun uh ki-at hi.
Ama inn sunga pasal khempeuh, inn sunga suak hitaleh gamdang mite’ tung panin sum tawh a kilei mite hitaleh, amah tawh a vun uh ki-at khawm hi.
Mamre tawsaw gei-a Abraham a omna-ah Topa hong kilang hi. Abraham a puanbuk kong gei-ah sun nisat laitakin tu-in a om laitakin
a khuadak toh leh, ama mai-ah mi thum na ding hi. Amah in amaute a muh ciangin amaute a dawn dingin puanbuk kong panin va tai a, leilakah kunsukin,
“Ka tote aw, nong hehpihna-un na nasem pa hong kheng kei un.

Na nasem pa’ kiang hong tung khin na hih khit buangun na thahatkik nadingun an tawmkhat ka va lak kikal sungin tui tawmkhat lasakin na khe uh sil unla, sing nuai-ah khawl un; tua khit ciangin paisuak un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in, “Na cih bangin hong hih in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin puanbuk sunga Sarah kiangah Abraham pai mengmeng a, “Annel hoihte lawh thum hong bawl mengmeng inla, meek manin mohin hong bawl in,” a ci hi.
Abraham zong bawnghon lakah tai-in bawngno a dawng a hoih khat la a, manlang taka a na bawlpah a nasem pa tungah a pia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, bawngnawi-thaukhal, bawngnawi le a minsa bawngsa la-in amau’ mai-ah a lui hi. Amaute in a nek laitakun sing nuai-ah amau’ kiangah amah a ding hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Na zi Sarah koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Puanbuk sungah om hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute khat in, “Tuzawh kha kua khit ciangin kong paikik taktak dinga, na zi Sarah in tapa khat nei ding hi,” a ci hi. Sarah in ama nung puanbuk kongah na ngai hi.
Tu-in Abraham le Sarah teek ta uh a, a kum uh ham hi. Sarah a numei ngeina teng tawpta hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Sarah a mahmah nui-in, “Kei ka teek khit, ka topa zong a teek khitin tua bang hi thei nawn ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa in Abraham’ tungah, “Bang hangin Sarah nui-in, ‘Tu-in kei teek ka hih ciangin ta nei takpi ding ka hi hiam?’ ci ahi hiam?
Na khat peuhpeuh Topa adingin haksa lua ahi hiam? A kisehsa tuzawh kha kua ciangin nang kiangah kong paikik dinga, Sarah in tapa khat nei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Sarah in nialin, “Ka nui kei hi,” ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah lau hi. Amah in, “Hi lo hi, na nui mah hi,” a ci hi. Abraham in Sodom khua ading Thumsak
Tua ciangin tua mun panin mite pai khia a, amaute in Sodom lam en uh hi. Amau’ pai nading lampi-ah a kha dingin Abraham in amaute va zui hi.

Topa in a lungsimah, “Abraham a lian a thahat minam suakin, leitung minam khempeuh in ama thupha ngah bangin thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding hi, ci-in thei ahih manin, tu-a ka hih ding thu Abraham’ tungah im ding ka hi hiam?

Im kei ning. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Abraham’ tunga a ciamsa thu a tunsak theih nadingin ama khit a a tate le a innkuanpihte in thuman le thutangin nasepna tawh Topa’ thupiakte a zuih theih nadingun a hilh dingin amah ka teel khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Sodom le Gomorrah a kimawhsakna lianin, amaute’ khialhna nasia mahmah kici ahih manin,
kei tunga hong kigen bangin amaute gamta takpi uh hiam, ci-in a thei dingin ka paisuk ding hi. Tua bang ahih kei leh zong ke’n ka va thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua panin mite kihei-in Sodom lamah pai uh a, ahi zongin Topa’ mai-ah Abraham ding lai hi.
Tua ciangin Abraham in hong naihin, “Thuman mite, migilote tawh susia khawm takpi ding na hi hiam?
Tua khuapi sungah thuman mi sawmnga bang om leh, tua sunga om thuman mi sawmngate’ hangin khah loin tua khua susia teitei ding na hi hiam?

Thuman mite, migilote tawh a kibat nadingin migilote tawh thuman mite thahkhop ding, hi thei ding ahi hiam? Tua pen hi thei lo ding hi. Leitung khempeuh Thukhen pa a manin gamta lo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa in, “Sodom khuapi sungah thuman mi sawmnga ka muh leh, amaute’ hangin tua khua buppi ka khah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Abraham in thu gen leuleu a, “En in, leivui le vut bang ahi lel keimah in Topa’ tungah thu kong gen ngamna hong maisak in.
Thuman mi sawmnga sung panin nga om kei leh? Tua nga a om loh manin khuapi buppi na susia veve ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Tua sungah sawmli le nga ka muh nakleh ka susia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ama kiangah thu gen kikin, “Tua sungah sawmli bang kimu leh,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Sawmlite’ hangin ka hih kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa heh kei in, thu kong gen lai ding hi. Tua lai-ah sawmthum bang kimu leh,” ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Sawmthum ka muh leh ka hih kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “En in, Topa tungah thu kong gen ngam lailaina hong maisak in. Tua lai-ah sawmnih bang kimu leh,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Sawmnihte’ hangin ka susia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa heh kei in, hih khatvei bek thu hong gensak lai in. Tua lai-ah sawm bang kimu leh,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Sawmte’ hangin ka susia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Abraham’ tungah a thugen ding a man khit ciangin ama pai nadingah Topa pai a, Abraham zong ama inn-ah a ciahkik hi.
Sodom le Gomorrah a Siatna vantungmi nihte Sodom ah nitakin hong tunga, Sodom khua kulhkongpi-ah Lot na tu hi. Lot in amaute a muh ciangin, amaute a dawn dingin dinga, leilakah a mai ngatin kun a,

“Ka tote aw, kong thum hi. Na nasem pa’ inn lamah hong kihei-in hong giak unla, na khete uh sil un. Tua ciangin zingsangin tho baihin na pai nading lam uhah pai pan un,” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Hi lo hi; khua lakah ka giak ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in amaute nakpitakin kun ahih manin ama lamah kihei uh a, ama inn-ah a lut uh hi. Amah in amaute adingin an bawl a, silngo sawh loh anlum emsak a, amaute in a ne uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute’ lup ma-in Sodom khua mite, a moi a hamin mi khempeuh in a inn umcih uh hi.
Amaute in Lot sam uh a, “Tu nitak a nang kiangah hong tung mite koi-ah om ahi hiam? Amau’ taw ka luk theih nadingun ko kiangah amaute hong pai khiatpih in,” a ci uh hi.
Lot, kongkhak pua-ah mite kiangah pai-in kong lehkhak a,
“Ka sanggamte aw, tua banga na gitloh gamtat loh nading uh kong thum hi.

En un, ta nungak nih ka nei hi. No kiangah amaute hong pai khiatpihsak unla, na ut bangun amaute tungah gamta un. Hih mite’ tungah bangmah gamta kei bek un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute, keima inn sung hong tungkhin uh ahih manin ka hut ding kisam hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in, “Tai khia in. Kote kiangah hong peem pak a, tu-in nang thukhen hong kineih ding na hi hiam? Tu-in amaute sangin nang kong siatbawl zaw ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in nakpitakin Lot’ lam hong neh uh a, kongkhak a phukham zah dongin hong neh uh hi.
Ahih hangin mi nihte in amau’ khut hong zanin inn sung amau’ kiangah Lot paipihin kong khak uh hi.
Inn kongkhak ah a om mi a lian a neute, amaute in a mit uh tawsak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin kongkhak a zawtzawt hangun mu zo lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi nihte in Lot kiangah, “Hih lai-ah tanau dang na nei hiam? Makte, tapate, ahih kei leh khua sunga nang’ mi peuhpeuh hih mun panin pai khiatpih in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite a kimawhsakna thu Topa’ tungah tung khin a, a susia dingin Topa in hong sawl khin ahih ciangin hih khua a susia ta ding ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Lot pai khia-in a tanute a teenpih dingte kiangah, “Manlangin hih khua panin pai khia un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih khuapi a susia ding hi ta hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah pen a mak dingte tungah a ciamnui bang lel hi.
Zingsang khuavak ciangin vantung mite in, “Khuapi gimpiakna sungah kaangtum kha ding na hih uh ciangin kinawh inla, hih lai-a om na zi le na tanute la in,” ci-in Lot sawl hamtang uh hi.

Ahih hangin amah lungka-in omlai veve hi. Ahi zongin Topa in ama tungah hehpihna nei ahih manin, mite in amah le a zi le a tanu nihte a khut uh tawh manin, amaute in amah pai khiatpihin khua pualamah koih uh hi.
Amaute in a pai khiatpih khit uh ciangin, “Na nuntak nadingun tai un. Nunghei kei unla, kuam sungah zong khawl kei un. Note hong kaangtum kha ding ahih manin mualtungah taito un,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin Lot in amaute tungah, “Hi lo hi, ka tote aw;

en un, note’ muhna-ah na nasem pa in maipha mu zo a, ka nuntakna nong hutna uhah migitna lianpi kei tungah nong lak khin uh hi. Ahih hangin mual tung gamla ahih manin ka tun ma-in siatna in kei hong pha-in ka si ding hi.
En un, gal-a om khuapi, tai nadingin nai a, khuapi neu khat ahi hi. Tua lai-ah hong taisak un - khuapi neu khat hi lo ahi hiam? tua hileh ka suakta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in ama kiangah, “En in, na gensa khuapi ka lumlet loh nading, hih maipha zong nang kong pia hi.
Kinawh inla, tua lai-ah tai in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah nang na tun mateng ke’n bangmah ka hih thei kei hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua khuapi min Zoar kici hi.
Zoar-ah Lot a tun ciangin tua lai-ah ni suak khinta hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in vantung panin Sodom le Gomorrah khuate tungah kaat le meikuang zusak hi.
Amah in tua khuapite, kuamte khempeuh, khuapite sunga mi teengte khempeuh le leitunga a po khempeuh a susia hi.
Ahih hangin a nunga om Lot’ zi nunghei a, amah ci khuam a suak hi.
Topa’ mai-a a dinnasa munah zingsang tungin Abraham va pai hi.
Sodom le Gomorrah le kuamte khempeuh lam nga sukin khuadak a, leitang khu pen, meiphualpi khu bangin a kah to a mu hi.

Pasian in kuam sunga khuapite a suksiat lai-in, amah in Abraham phawk a, amah in Lot’ tenna khuapite a suksiat ciangin tua bang a suksiatna sung panin Lot sawl khia ahih manin a suakta ahi hi. Moab mite le Ammon mite’ Pianna
Tu-in Zoar panin Lot pai khia to-in a tanu nihte tawh mualtungah a teeng hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Zoar-ah a ten ding lau hi. Tua ahih ciangin a tanu nihte tawh suanghawm sung khatah a teeng uh hi.
A u pen in a nau tungah, “I pa lah teek ta a, leitung ngeina bangin eite hong luppih ding pasal khat zong om lo hi.
Hong pai in; i pa leenggahzu khamsak ni; i pa tawh suanlekhak i kizopsak theih nadingin amah tawh lumkhawm ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nitakin a pa uh leenggahzu khamsak uh hi. A unu pai-in a pa tawh lum hi. A tanu a luplam hitaleh a thawhlam hitaleh amah in phawk lo hi.

A zing ciangin a u in a nau tungah, “En in, zan zanin i pa tawh ka lum hi. Tu nitakin zong amah leenggahzu khamsak leuleu ni. Tua ciangin nang pai inla, i pa tawh suanlekhak i kizopsak theih nadingin amah tawh lumkhawm in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nitakin zong a pa uh leenggahzu khamsak uh hi. A nau pai-in amah tawh lum hi. A tanu a luplam hitaleh a thawhlam hitaleh amah in phawk lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Lot’ tanu tegel in a pa uh tawh naupaii uh hi.
A u in tapa khat nei-in a min Moab phuak a, amah pen tuhuna Moab mite’ pianna pupi ahi hi.
A nau in zong tapa khat nei-in a min Benammi phuak a, amah pen tu donga Ammon mite’ pianna pupi ahi hi.
Mamre panin Negeb gamah Abraham paisuk a, Kadesh le Shur kikal Gerar-ah tawlkhat sung a teeng hi.
Abraham in a zi Sarah pen, “Ka sanggamnu hi,” ci hi. Gerar kumpipa Abimelek in mi sawlin Sarah samsak hi.
Ahih hangin zanin mang sungah Abimelek kiangah Pasian pai a, ama kiangah, “En in, na laksa numei’ hangin nang a si ding na hi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah, mi khat’ zi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Abimelek in amah zuan nai lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, nang in midik pa that ding na hi hiam?

A mahmah in kei kiangah, ‘Amah, ka sanggamnu ahi hi,’ hong ci hi lo ahi hiam? A numei mahmah in zong, ‘Amah, ka sanggampa ahi hi,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin lungsim kisuang hetloin a gamta ka hi a, khial ka kisa kei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in a mang sungin ama kiangah, “Hi hi, lungsim kisuanna om loin hih bangin na gamtatna thu ka thei a, kei tungah na khialh loh nadingin a hong kempa kei mahmah ka hi hi. Tua ahih ciangin nang, amah kong lawngsak kei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in mipa’ zi piakik in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah, kamsang khat hi a, amah in nang adingin thu hong ngetsak dinga, nang na nungta ding hi. Ahih hangin nang in tua numei na piakkik kei leh nang le na mi khempeuh na sih taktak ding uh thei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Abimelek tho baih a, a nasemte samin hih thute khempeuh amaute kiangah a gen hi. Amaute nak lau mahmah uh hi.

Tua ciangin Abimelek in Abraham samin ama kiangah, “Bang hangin ko tungah hong hici gamtat na hi hiam? Kei le ka kumpi gam sungah khialhna lianpi khat nong tut nadingin nang’ tungah bang khialhna nei ka hi uh hiam? Hih dinga kilawm lo nate kei’ tungah nong hih hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abimelek in Abraham’ kiangah, “Hih banga na gamtat nadingin bang ngaihsun na hi hiam?” ci lai hi.
Abraham in, “Hih lai munah Pasian zahtakna om hetlo hi. Ka zi’ hangin amaute in kei hong that ding hi, ci-in ngaihsun kha ka hih manin hih bangin a gamta ka hi hi.
Tua tham loin a taktakin amah ka sanggamnu mah ahi hi. Pa kikhat, nu tuam ka hi uh a, amah ka teenpih ahi hi.
Pasian in ka pa’ inn panin hong pai khiatsak ciangin ama kiangah, ‘Hih pen kei’ tunga nong hih ding na migitna ahi hi: I paina peuhpeuhah kei pen ka sanggampa hi, hong ci in,’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abimelek in tuu le bawngtalte, sila numei le sila pasalte la-in Abraham pia a, ama tungah a zi Sarah a piakik hi.
Abimelek in, “En in, ka leitang, na mai-ah om hi. Nangmah in hoih na sakna munah teeng in,” a ci hi.

Sarah’ kiangah, “En in, na sanggampa tungah ngun tang tulkhat ka pia khin hi. Nang tawh a om mi khempeuh’ mai-ah nangma dikna a kilatna ahi hi. Mi khempeuh’ mai-ah nang a manin hong kibawl hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abraham in Pasian’ tungah thu ngen a, Pasian in Abimelek a damsak hi. Amaute in ta a neih theih nadingin a zi le a sila numeite zong a damsak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Abraham’ zi Sarah’ hangin Abimelek’ innkuan’ naubu khempeuh khakcipsak khin hi.
Isaac’ Suahna A gensa bangin Topa in Sarah’ tungah thupha pia a, a gensa bangin Sarah’ tungah Topa in hih hi.
Sarah gai a, ama tunga Pasian in a gensa hunin a teek zawhin Abraham tawh tapa khat nei hi.
Abraham in Sarah tawh a neih ama tapa’ min dingin Isaac a phuak hi.
Pasian in ama tunga a thu piaksa bangin amah in ni giat a phak ciangin a tapa Isaac a vun a at hi.
A tapa Isaac a suah ciangin Abraham kum za pha hi.
Sarah in, “Pasian in kei adingin nuamin nuihzak nading hong bawlsak khin hi. A za peuhmah in nuamin hong nuihpih ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Sarah in nau nawi pia ding ci-in kua in Abraham’ tungah gen ngei ding ahi hiam? Ahi zongin a teek khitin amah tawh tapa khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Hagar le Ishmael Kisawlkhia
Naupang khang a, nawi tawh hong kikhen ta hi. Isaac nawi tawh a kikhen ni ciangin Abraham in pawi lianpi khat bawl hi.
Ahih hangin, Abraham tawh a neih Egypt mi Hagar’ tapa in ama tapa Isaac a ciamnuih bawlna Sarah in a mu hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Abraham’ kiangah, “Hih sila numei a tapa tawh lawn khia in; bang hang hiam cih leh sila numei’ tapa in ka tapa Isaac tawh gamh luahkhawm thei lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ama tapa’ hangin Abraham’ tungah thu nuam hetlo hi.

Ahih hangin Pasian in Abraham’ tungah, “Tangvalpa le na sila numei’ hangin lungkim loin om kei in. Sarah in nang’ tunga hong gen peuhmah ama hong gen bangin gamta in. Bang hang hiam cih leh Isaac tawh na suanlekhakte’ min kilo ding hi.
Sila numei’ tapa zong nangma ta mah ahih manin, minam khatin ka bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Abraham tho baihin an le tuithawl la-in Hagar pia a, ama liangko tungah naupang tawh suanin a sawl khia hi. Amah pai khia a, Beersheba gam sungah a vak kawikawi hi.
Thawl sunga tui a bei ciangin amah in sawlbawk nuai khatah naupang lawn hi.

Tua ciangin amah pai-in a hoihkhop khat a gamla, thallot khat tan bangah a ta nungngatin a tusuk hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Naupang’ sih hong musak kei in,” a ci hi. Amah nungngatin a tut laitakin naupang nakpi-in a kap hi.

Pasian in naupang’ kahna aw a za hi. Pasian’ vantungmi in vantung panin Hagar sam a, ama kiangah, “Hagar aw, bang in hong lungkhamsak ahi hiam? Lau kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh naupang a omna munah a kahna awging Pasian in za hi.
Dingin naupang la inla, na khut tawh kip takin len in. Bang hang hiam cih leh minam lian khatin amah ka bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama mit haksak a, amah in tuikhuk khat a mu hi. Amah pai-in tui tawh tuithawl dimin naupang a dawnsak hi.
Pasian in tua naupang ompih a, amah khangto hi. Amah gamlakah teeng a, thallot siampa khat hong suak hi.
Paran gam sungah amah teeng hi. A nu in Egypt gam panin ama ading zi khat a la hi. Abraham le Abimelek Thuciamna
Tua hun laitakin Abimelek le a galkap mangpa Fikol in Abraham’ kiangah, “Na sepna khempeuh ah Pasian in nang hong ompih hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kei hitaleh ka tate hitaleh ka suanlekhakte hitaleh tungah a man lopi-in hong bawl loin, nang tungah thuman tak tawh kong gamtat bangin keima tung le tawlkhat na omna leitang tungah nong gamtat nadingin Pasian tawh kei tungah hong kiciam in,” a ci hi.
Abraham in, “Ka kiciam ding hi,” a ci hi.
Abimelek’ nasemte in a suhsa tuikhuk tawh kisai thu Abraham in a lungkim lohna Abimelek’ kiangah a gen ciangin,
Abimelek in, “Kua in hih hiam ka thei kei hi. Nang nong gen kei a, keimah in tuni dong ka za nai kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Abraham in tuu le bawngtalte la-in Abimelek pia a, tua mi nihte in thuciamna khat a bawl uh hi.
Abraham in a tuuhon sung panin tuununo sagih tuam koih hi.
Abimelek in Abraham’ kiangah, “Hih na koihtuam tuununo sagihte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Keimah in hih tuikhuk ka tawhna thu-ah nang in keima adingin teci na hih theih nadingin nangmah in ka khut sung panin hih tuununo sagihte na la ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua mun Beersheba kici hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau tegel tua munah thu kiciam uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Beersheba-ah thuciamna khat a bawl uh hi. Tua khit ciangin Abimelek le a galkap mangpa Fikol, Filistia mite’ leitangah ciahkik uh hi.
Abraham in Beersheba-ah makeng kung khat suan a, tua lai munah Tawntung Pasian, Topa a bia hi.
Filistia mite’ leitangah Abraham, sauveipi sung peemta-in a om hi.
Isaac A Pia Khia dingin Abraham Kisawl Hih thute khit ciangin Pasian in Abraham ze-et a, ama kiangah, “Abraham,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Na it, na tapa neihsun Isaac, la inla Moriah gamah pai in. Tua lai mun a nang kiangah kong gen ding mual khat tungah meihal biakpiakna-in amah hong pia in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Abraham tho baih a, a la tutphah vawhin, ama nasem tangval nih le a tapa Isaac a paipih hi. Amah in meihal biakpiak nadingin sing ek a, ama tunga Pasian’ gensa munah a pai hi.
A ni thum ni ciangin Abraham khuadak to-in a gamla-ah tua mun a mu hi.
Tua ciangin Abraham in a nasemte kiangah, “Hih lai-ah la tawh na om un. Kei le tangvalpa hua lamah pai-in Pasian ka va bia ding uh a, note kiangah ka hong paikik ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Abraham in meihal biak nading sing la-in a tapa Isaac’ tungah suan a, amah in a khut sungah mei le temta a tawi hi. Tua bangin amau tegel paikhawm uh hi.
Isaac in a pa Abraham’ kiangah, “Pa aw,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing, ka ta,” a ci hi. Amah in, “En in, mei le sing om hi. Ahih hangin meihal biakpiak nading tuuno koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Abraham in, “Pasian in meihal biakpiak nadingin ama ading tuuno hong pia ding hi, ka ta aw,” a ci hi. Tua bangin amau tegel paikhawm uh hi.
Ama kiangah Pasian’ gensa mun a tun uh ciangin, Abraham in tua lai-ah biakna tau khat bawlin, a ngeina ding bangin sing koihin, a tapa Isaac henin biakna tau tunga sing tungah a koih hi.
Tua ciangin Abraham in a tapa a that dingin tem la hi.
Ahih hangin Topa’ vantungmi in vantung panin, “Abraham, Abraham!” ci-in a sam hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Tangvalpa su kei in. Ama tungah bangmah hih kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in Pasian na zahtakna tu-in ka thei a, na tapa khat neihsun keima adingin na humcip lohna ka mu hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abraham khuadak kawikawi a, khaumang lakah a ki-a a awk tuutal khat a nungah na om hi. Abraham pai-in tua tuutal kai a, ama tapa’ tangin meihal biakna-in a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Abraham in tua mun pen, “Topa in hong sik hi,” ci-in min phuak a, tuni dongin Topa’ mual tungah hong kisik hi, a kici hi.
Topa’ vantungmi in vantung panin Abraham a nih veina sam a,
“Kei mahmah ka kiciam hi, Topa in ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in hih thu na bawl khin a, na tapa neihsun na humcip kei hi.
Nang thupha kong pia taktak dinga, na suanlekhakte vana aksite le tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin tampi ka phasak ding hi. Na suanlekhakte in amau’ galte’ khuapite luah ding uh a,
na suanlekhakte thupha ka piak bangin, leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in ka thu na mang hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nasemte’ kiangah Abraham ciahkik a, Beersheba-ah paikhawm uh hi. Abraham Beersheba-ah a teeng hi. Nahor’ Suanlekhakte
Hih thute’ khit ciangin Abraham’ kiangah, “En in, Milkah in zong na sanggampa Nahor tawh tate nei hi:
Uz a u pen hi. A sanggamte pen Buz, Aram’ pa Kemuel,
Khesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaf le Bethuel ahi hi,” kici hi.
Bethuel pen Rebekah’ pa ahi hi. Milkah in Abraham’ sanggam Nahor tawh tapa giat nei hi.
Tua tham loin Reumah min nei a zineu in ta Tebah, Gaham, Tahash le Maakah a nei hi.
Abraham in Sarah A Vui nading Han Khat Lei Sarah kum za le kum sawmnih le kum sagih nungta a,
Kanaan mite’ gam sung Kiriatharba (Hebron)-ah a si hi. Abraham dahin kap a, a vui nading vaihawm hi.
Abraham in a misi nusia-in Hit mite kiangah va pai a,
“Kei pen note lakah khualmi hi-in peemta ka hi hi. Ka zi ka vui theih nadingin note’ lakah vui nading mun leitang hong pia un,” a ci hi.
Hit mite in Abraham dawngin,

“Topa aw, kote’ thu hong ngai in. Nang pen kote’ lakah a vanglian ulian khat na hi hi. Kote’ han na deih pen munah na zi vui in. Kote kuamah in nang adingin a han it lo dinga, na zi vui ding hong khaktan lo ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Abraham dingin tua gammi ahi Hit mite’ lamah a kun hi.
Amah in amaute’ kiangah, “Hih gamah ka zi ka vui ding nong deih uhleh, ka thu hong ngai un. Zohar’ tapa Efron in

ama neih Makpelah leihawm kei tungah hong piak theih nadingin hong thumsak un. Tua pen ama lo nawlah om hi. Vui nading munin ka neih nadingin a man ding cing takin piakna tawh note’ muhna-ah kei tungah amah hong piasak un,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin Hit mite’ lakah Efron zong a om ahi hi. Khuapi kulhkongpi-ah a hong pai Hit mite khempeuh’ zakna-ah Hit mi Efron in Abraham dawng a,
“Hi lo hi, ka topa aw, hong ngai in. Nang’ tungah lo kong pia hi. Tua sunga leihawm zong nang’ tungah kong pia hi. Ka mipihte’ muhna-ah nang’ tungah kong pia hi. Na misi vui in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua gam mite’ mai-ah Abraham a kun hi.

Tua gam mite’ zakna-ah amah in Efron’ kiangah, “Lungsim takpi tawh na cih ahihleh hong ngai in. Lo man ding kong pia ding hi. Tua lai-ah ka misi ka vui theih nadingin kei’ tung panin a man hong sang in,” a ci hi.
Efron in Abraham dawngin,
“Ka topa aw, ka thu hong ngai in. Leitang bek khat in ngun shekel zali man hi. Nang le kei’ kikalah bang thudang omnawn ahi hiam? Na misi vui in,” a ci hi.
Efron’ cih bangin Abraham thukim hi. Abraham in Efron adingin, Hit mite’ zakna-ah a min lawh zah, tua hun laitak a sumbukte’ lakah a kizang a gikzah tawh kizui-in ngun shekel zali a teh khia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Makpelah a Efron’ lo, Mamre nisuahna lamah a om, a sunga om leihawm le a lo le tua mun khempeuh ah a om lo sunga singte pen
khuapi kulhkongpi-ah a kikhawm mite khempeuh’ mai, Hit mite’ omna-ah Abraham’ neih dingin kipia hi.
Hih bangin a kihih khit ciangin, Kanaan gam sunga om Mamre (Hebron) nisuahna lamah a om Makpelah lo sunga leihawm sungah Abraham in a zi Sarah a vui hi.
Lo le a sunga om leihawmte si vui nading munin a neih dingin Abraham’ tungah Hit mite in a pia uh hi.
Isaac ading Zi Kila Tu-in Abraham teekin a kum tam mahmah ta hi. Topa in na khempeuh ah Abraham thupha pia hi.
Abraham in ama neih khempeuh a uk, a inn sungah a upa pen a nasem pa kiangah, “Ka phei nuai-ah na khut hong koih in.

Nangmah in amau’ lakah ka tenna Kanaan mite’ tanute lak panin ka tapa’ zi ding la loin, keima gam le ka behte kiangah va pai-in ka tapa Isaac’ zi ding na lak nadingin vantung le leitung Pasian ahi Topa tawh nang kong kiciamsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Nasempa in ama kiangah, “A numei in hih gamah kei hong zui nuam kei kha leh nangma nong pai khiatna gamah na tapa ka paipihkik ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Abraham in ama kiangah, “Tua lai-ah ka tapa na paipihkik loh ding thei in.

Ka pa’ inn le ka suahna leitang panin kei hong la-in, kei kiangah thu hong genin kei tungah hong kiciam a, ‘Na suanlekhakte’ tungah hih leitang ka pia ding hi,’ a hong ci vantung Pasian, Topa in nangma mai-ah a vantungmi sawl dinga, tua lai mun panin nangmah in ka tapa ading zi khat na la ding hi.
Ahih hangin a numei in nang hong zuih nop kei leh keima thuciamna panin nang na suakta ding hi. Bangbang hileh tua lai-ah ka tapa na paipihkik kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a nasem pa in a topa Abraham’ phei nuai-ah a khut koih a, hih thu tawh kisai-in ama tungah a kiciam hi.
Tua ciangin a nasem pa in a topa’ kalaohte sawm la-in pai khia a, a topa’ tung panin letsong hoih nono a namkim la hi. Amah dingin Mesopotamia gam Nahor’ khuapi-ah a pai hi.
Numeite’ nitak tuitawi hun laitakin khuapi pualam tuikhuk gei-ah amah in a kalaohte boksak hi.
Amah in, “Ka topa Abraham’ Pasian, Topa aw, tuni-in ka maa hong vangsak in. Nang tungah thu kong ngen hi, ka topa Abraham’ tungah itna kip hong lak in.
En in, tuikhuk gei-ah kei ka dinga, khuapi nungakte tuitawi dingin hong pai uh hi.

Keimah in, ‘Tui ka dawn theih nadingin na beel hong nga suk in,’ ka cih ciangin, ‘Dawn in; na kalaohte zong tui ka pia ding hi,’ hong ci nu pen na nasem pa Isaac adingin na sehsa numei hisak in. Nangmah in ka topa tungah itna kip na lahna hih thu tawh ka thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin a thunget a khit ma-in, Abraham’ sanggampa Nahor in a zi Milkah tawh a neih a tapa Bethuel’ tanu Rebekah a liangko tungah a tuibeel pua-in hong pai khia hi.
Tua nu pen kuamah tawh a lumkhawm nai lo, nungak, a ngaihbaang mahmah khat ahi hi. Amah tuikhukah paisukin a beel dim a, hong paito hi.
Tua ciangin amah a dawntuah dingin nasem pa tai a, “Dawn ding tui tawmkhat na beel sung panin hong pia dih in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Dawn in, ka topa,” a ci hi. Tua nu in a khut tungah a beel niamsuksakin amah a dawnsak hi.
Amah in tua mipa tui a dawnsak khit ciangin, “Na kalaohte in a kham matengun a dawn ding zong tui kong tawisak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in a tuikuang sungah a tui bungsuk pak a, tuitawi dingin tuikhukah tai-in a kalaohte khempeuh adingin tui a tawi hi.
Topa in ama khualzinna mavangsak ding hiam, vangsak lo ding hiam, cih a theih nadingin mipa in daptakin tua nu na en hi.
Kalaohte in tui a dawn khit ciangin mipa in shekel lang a gik kham nakbah khat le shekel sawm a gik kham tau nih tua nu adingin la-in pia a,
“Kua’ tanu na hi hiam, hong gen in. Na pa’ inn-ah kote’ giah nading a awng ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua nu in ama kiangah, “Nahor le a zi Milkah’ tapa Bethuel’ tanu ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Buhkung le gan-an a kicing ka nei uh a, giah nading mun zong ka nei uh hi,” ci thuah lai hi.
Mipa a lu kunin Topa bia a,
“Ka topa’ tungah a itna kip le a thumanna a pelh lo, ka topa Abraham’ Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah tahen. Kei ka hih leh, ka topa’ behte’ inn zuatna lampi-ah Topa in hong paipih hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nungaknu a inn-ah tai-in hih thute khempeuh a innkuanpihte tungah a gen hi.
Rebekah in Laban min nei sanggam pasal khat nei hi. Laban zong tuikhuka mipa kiangah a tai hi.

Amah in nakbah le a sanggamnu’ khut tunga taute a muh ciang le, “Mipa in hih bangin kei tungah hong gen,” ci-in a sanggamnu Rebekah’ kam gen a zak ciangin, mipa kiangah a pai ahi hi. Tuikhuka kalaohte kiangah amah na ding hi.
Amah in, “Hong pai in, Topa’ thupha piakpa aw; bang hangin a pua-ah ding na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh inn-ah na om nading mun ka bawl khin a, kalaohte ading mun zong om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin inn sungah mipa hong pai hi. Laban in kalaoh vante suah a, kalaohte adingin buhkung le gan-an pia a, amah le a kikholhpih mite’ khe sil nadingin tui zong a pia hi.
Tua ciangin nek dingin a mai-ah an kilui hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Ka thu ka gen khit matengin an ka ne kei ding hi,” a cih ciangin amah in, “Gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in, “Kei pen Abraham’ nasem ka hi hi.
Topa in ka topa nakpitakin thupha pia a, amah a lian mahmah suak khin hi. Amah in ama tungah tuuhon, bawnghon, ngun le kham, nasem pasal le nasem numei, kalaoh le late tampi pia hi.
Ka topa’ zi Sarah in a teek khitin ka topa tawh tapa khat nei hi. Amah in a neihsa khempeuh ama tungah pia hi.
Ka topa in kei hong kiciamsak a, ‘Nangmah in amau’ gamah ka tenna Kanaan numeite lak panin ka tapa’ zi ding la kei inla,
ka pa’ innkuan mi le ka behte kiangah pai-in ka tapa ading zi khat na la ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Keimah in ka topa kiangah, ‘A numei in kei hong zui nuam kei kha leh,’ ka ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in kei tungah, ‘A thu ka man Topa in nang tawh a vantungmi hong sawlin na maa hong vangsak ding hi. Nang in ka behte le ka pa’ inn panin ka tapa ading zi khat na la ding hi.
