Ahih hangin tuipi sung, gun sunga om phe le lip a nei lo, tui sunga a hontat ganhingte le tui sunga a nungta ganhingte pen note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Tuate pen note adingin a kihhuai hi ding hi. Note in tuate’ sa na ne kei ding uh a, a sisate zong na kih ding uh hi.
Tui sunga a omte sung panin phe le lip a nei lo peuhmah note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
“Vasate lak panin note in na kih ding uh, a kine lo ding, a kihhuaite: Muvanlai, mupi, luimu,
mumeika, musan nam khempeuh,
va-ak nam khempeuh,
vasa-kalaoh, pengpelep, vatawt, musi nam khempeuh,
keising, tuimu, gun vakang,
gam vatawt, tui vatawt, musane,
gun vapi, gun vazonei nam khempeuh, huihtun le bak ahi hi.
“Khe li tawh a pai, kha a nei ganhing khempeuhte, note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Ahi zongin khe li tawh a pai, kha a nei ganhingte khempeuh lak panin leitungah a tuan nadingun a khepek uh tawh kizom ngaltak tawn a neite na ne thei ding uh hi.
Tuate lak panin na nek theih dingte uh: Kauphe kitom nam khempeuh, kauphe zol nam khempeuh, khuangbai nam khempeuh le kauphe kisau nam khempeuh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin khe li nei-in kha a nei ganhing dangte khempeuh note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
“Hihte tawh note a nin na suak ding uh hi. A sisa a lawng peuhmahte a nitak mateng a nin hi dinga,
a sisa themkhat a pua peuhmah in a puan sawpin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A khecin a ka ahih hangin eknel a hai lo ganhing peuhmah note adingin a nin ahi hi. Tuate a lawng peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
Khe li tawh a pai ganhingte khempeuh lak panin amau’ khebom tawh a paite khempeuh note adingin a nin ahi hi. Tuate a sisa a lawngkha peuhmahte a nitak dong a nin hi dinga,
a sisa a puapa in a puan sawpin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. Tuate note adingin a nin ahi hi.
“Leitungah a vak kawikawi, a pai thei ganhingte lak panin note adingin a ninte: Savokphual, zusa, innhikpi nam khempeuh,
tawlbawkpi, tang, tangteuh le sehnel gam thankik ahi hi.
A hontat ganhing khempeuhte lak panin hihte pen note adingin a nin ahi hi. Tuate a sisa a lawng peuhmah a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.

Tuate a sisa khat peuhpeuh a tukna nate, sing nazat, puan, savun, ippi le na khat peuhpeuhin a kizang beel khat peuhpeuh hitaleh a nin hi ding hi. Tuate pen tui sungah kidiah dinga, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. Tua khit ciangin a siang hi ding hi.
Tuate khat peuhpeuh leibeel khat peuhpeuh sungah a kiat leh, tua sunga om khempeuh a nin hi dinga, note in tua beel na sukham ding uh hi.
Tua leibeel sungah a om a kine thei ding an tungah tua bang tui a tuk leh a nin hi ding hi. Tua bang beel sunga om dawn theih ding peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
Tua bang a sisa themkhat a tukna peuhmah a nin hi ding hi. Meibung hitaleh beelpei hitaleh kisuzan ding hi. Tuate a nin hi a, note adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Ahi zongin tuinak le tuibeem ahihleh a siang hi dinga, ahih hangin a sisate a lawng peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
A kivawh ding khaici tungah tua a sisate themkhat a tuk leh, tua khaici a siang hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin khaici tui kidiah a, tua a sisate themkhat tua khaici tungah a tuk leh, note adingin tua khaici a nin ahi hi.
“Note’ nek theih ding ganhing khat peuhpeuh a sih leh a sisa a lawng pa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi dinga,
a sisa a ne pa in ama puante sawpin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. A sisa a puapa in zong ama puante sawpin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
“Leitungah a hontat ganhing peuhmah a kihhuai hi a, tuate kine lo ding hi.
A awmtal peuhmah le khe li-a a pai peuhmah, ahih kei leh khe tampi a nei, leitungah a pai a hontat ganhing khempeuh, note in na ne kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen a kihhuai ahi hi.
A hontat ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh nomau mah a kihhuai-in na kibawltawm kei ding uh a, tuate tawh nomau na kininsak tawm kei ding uh hi. Na kinitsak tawm uhleh a nin na suak ding uh hi.

Kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi. Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla, kei siangtho ka hih manin note zong siangtho un. Leitungah a bokvak a hontat ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh note na kininsak tawm kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ Pasian ahi dingin Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpih pa pen keimah Topa ka hi hi. Tua ahih ciangin kei siangtho ka hih manin note na siangtho ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Hih pen a nin le a siang, a nungta ganhing nek theih ding le nek theih loh ding khen nadingin ganhing le vasa, tui sunga a pai a nungta ganhing khempeuh le leitungah a hontat ganhing khempeuh tawh kisai-in ngeina ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Nupi khat gai-in ta pasal a neih leh ni sagih sung tua nu a nin hi dinga, a nin neih huna mah bangin amah a nin hi ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in a naungek vun dawn ki-at ding hi.

Tua ciangin nupi in ama si luanna hangin a sian nadingin ni sawmthum le ni thum sung omlai ding hi. Amah in kisiansuahna ni a cin mateng a siangtho na khat peuhpeuh lawng loin, biakbuk sungah zong tum lo ding hi.
“Ahih hangin amah in ta numei a neih leh, ama nin neih huna mah bangin nipikal nih sung a nin hi ding hi. Ama si luanna hangin a sian nadingin ni sawmguk le ni guk sung omlai ding hi.

“Amah a kisiansuahna hun a cin ciangin tapa ading hitaleh tanu ading hitaleh, amah in kikhopna bukkong a siampipa kiangah meihal biak nadingin kum khat a pha tuuno khat le khialhna hanga biak nadingin kawl vakhuno khat ahi a, vakhu khat ahi zongin pia dinga,

siampipa in Topa’ mai-ah pia-in, ama ading kilemna bawlsak ding hi. Tua ciangin ama si luanna panin tua nu a siang hi ding hi. Hih pen ta pasal hitaleh ta numei hitaleh a nei nu adingin ngeina ahi hi.

“Tua nu in tuuno a piak zawh kei leh vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhuno nih ahi zongin paipih dinga, khat pen meihal biak nading, adang khat pen khialhna hanga biak nading ahi hi. Siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, tua nu a siang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses le Aaron kiangah,

“Mi khat in ama pumpi vun tungah a bawk ahi a, meima ahi a, a mel tuampian ahi zongin a neih a, tua pen ama pumpi vun tungah phaknatna a suah leh, tua pa pen siampipa kiang ahi a, ama tapa siampi khat peuhpeuh kiangah ahi zongin kipaipih ding hi.

Siampipa in ama pumpi vun tunga natna mun vel ding hi. A natna munah a om a multe kangin ama vun sangin a natna thuktum zaw-in a kimuh leh, tua pen phaknatna hi a, siampipa in a vel khit ciangin amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin ama pumpi vun sungah a natna mun kang napi-in, a vun sangin a thuk lo zaw bangin omin, tua sungah a multe kang loin a om leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung cina pa khumcip ding hi.
Siampipa in a ni sagih ni-in amah vel dinga, a natna noptuamin, a natna in a vun sung lawh lo hi ci-in a muh leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung mah khumcip lai ding hi.

Siampipa in a ni sagih ni-in amah velkik dinga, a natna mun mualin, a vun sung a lawh kei leh, siang hi, ci-in siampipa in gen ding hi. Tua pen meima mawkmawk hi lel a, amah in a puante sawpin a siang hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah a sian nadingin siampipa kiangah a kilah khit ciangin a meima in a vun sung a lawh leh siampipa mai-ah kilakkik ding hi.
Siampipa in vel dinga, a meima in a vun sung a lawh leh phaknatna hi a, siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Mi khat in meima a neih ciangin siampipa kiangah kipaipih ding hi.
Siampipa in vel dinga, a vun sungah a bawk kang omin, tua in a multe kangsakin a bawk sungah ma thak a om leh,
tua pen ama pumpi vun sungah a om luisa phaknatna hi a, siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Amah a nin ahih manin khumcip lo ding hi.
Siampipa’ muh theihna ciangah tua natna in a vun phukhamin, tua natna a veipa’ vun khempeuh a lutang panin a khe dongin a lawh khit leh,
siampipa in vel dinga, a natna in a pumpi khempeuh a lawh khit leh siampipa in tua natna tawh kisai-in amah siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi. A pumpi-in kang khin ahih manin amah a siang ahi hi.
Ahih hangin ama tungah ma thak a kilat ciangin amah a nin hi ding hi.
Siampipa in a ma thak velin, amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ma thak pen phaknatna ahih manin a nin ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a ma thak pen kikheel kikin a kang a suah leh, siampipa kiangah pai dinga,
siampipa in amah velin a natna pen a kang a suah leh, siampipa in natna a veipa siang hi, ci-in gen dinga, amah a siang hi ding hi.
“Mi khatpeuh’ pumpi vun sungah a damsa meimatum khat om a,
a meimatum munah a bawk kang ahi a, a san kang mun ahi zongin a om leh, siampipa kiangah kilak ding hi.
Siampipa in vel dinga, tua pen a vun sangin thuk zaw-in a multe a kang a suah leh, siampipa in amah nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Tua pen phaknatna hi a, meimatum sung tawnin hong phu khia ahi hi.
Ahih hangin siampipa in velin, tua tunga a multe kang loin a vun sangin a thuk zawk kei a, mualin a om leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung khumcip ding hi.
Tua in a vun sung a lawh leh phaknatna hi a, siampipa in amah nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin a natna mun pen mun khat bekah omin a kilawh kei leh meimatum pawn hi a, siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Tua ahih kei leh, pumpi in a vun tungah mei kaangma khat nei-in tua mei kaangma a thak mun pen a san kang ahi a, a kang ahi zongin hong suah leh,

siampipa in vel ding hi. Tua mun a om a multe kangin a vun sangin a natna a thuk zawk leh, tua pen phaknatna ahi hi. Tua pen mei kaangma tawnin hong phu khia hi a, phaknatna ahih manin siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin siampipa in velin, tua mun a multe kang loin a vun sangin a thuk zawk kei a, mualin a om leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung khumcip ding hi.
Siampipa in a ni sagih ni-in amah vel ding hi. Tua in a vun sung a lawh leh phaknatna hi a, siampipa in amah nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin a natna mun pen mun khat bekah omin a vun sung lawh loin mualin a om leh, tua pen mei kaangma pan a bawk hi a, mei kaangma pawn ahih manin siampipa in amah siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin a lutang tung ahih kei leh a kha-ah meima khatpeuh a neih ciangin,

siampipa in tua natna vel ding hi. Tua natna pen a vun sangin thuk zaw-in a kimuh a, a sunga a multe eng-in a mal a neu leh, siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Tua pen cithak ahi, lu-phak ahih kei leh kha-phak natna ahi hi.
Siampipa in cithak natna velin, a vun sangin thuk zaw lo bangin kimu-in tua sungah mul vom a om kei leh, siampipa in ni sagih sung cithak natna tawh tua pa khumcip dinga,
a ni sagih ni-in siampipa in a natna vel ding hi. A cithak kilawh loin, a sungah mul eng om loin, a cithak pen a vun sangin thuk zaw loin a kimuh leh,
amah le amah a mul kikiat dinga, ahih hangin a cithak san kiat lo ding hi. Siampipa in adang ni sagih sung mah cithak natna tawh tua pa khum ding hi.

A ni sagih ni-in siampipa in a cithak vel dinga, a cithak in a vun sung lawh loin, a vun sangin a thuk lo zaw-in a kimuh leh, siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi. Amah in ama puante sawp dinga, a siang hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah a kisiansak khit ciangin a cithak in a vun sung a lawh leh,
siampipa in vel dinga, a cithak in a vun sung a lawh takpi leh, siampipa in mul eng a zon ding kisam lo hi; amah a nin ahi hi.
Ahih hangin ama mitah, cithak noptuam zo hi, ci-in mu a, a sungah mul vom po-in a cithak a dam leh, amah a siang hi a, siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
“Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin, a pumpi vun tungah a mel tuampian a kang mun a neih leh,
siampipa in vel dinga, a pumpi vun tunga om a tuampian munte pen a kang milmial ahihleh, tua pen vun a phukham meima hi a, amah a siang hi ding hi.
“Mi khat a sam pulh a, a lu a tol hangin amah a siang ahi hi.
Mi khat a taltang le a paang panin a sam le a mul a pulh leh, amah a talkolh hi lel a, amah a siang ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a lutol tung hitaleh a talkolh tung hitaleh a san kang meima a om leh, tua pen a lutol tung ahih kei leh a talkolh tunga a suak khia phaknatna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in amah vel dinga, a bawk natna pen a lutol tung hitaleh a talkolh tung hitaleh a pumpi vun tunga phak om tawh kibangin a san kang ahihleh,
amah pen miphak hi a, a nin ahih manin siampipa in amah a nin hi, ci-in a gen kul hi; a lutang tungah ama natna a om ahi hi.
“Tua natna a nei mi phakpa in puankekte silhin a sam phiahsak dinga, amah in a muk humin, ‘Nin, nin!,’ ci-in kiko ding hi.
Amah in a natna a neih laiteng a nin hi ding hi. Amah a nin ahih manin giahphual pualam mun khatah amah guak teeng ding hi.
“Samul puan hitaleh saihadial puan hitaleh, puan khat peuhpeuh tungah phaknatna a om ciang,
tua saihadial puan, samul puante, a tung le a pheite’ tung hitaleh, savun le savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om ciangin,

tua natna pen a hing melin ahi a, a san melin ahi zongin puan tungah a kilat ciang, puan a tunga phei tung hitaleh savun le savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om ciangin, tua pen phaknatna hi a, siampipa kiangah kilak ding hi.
Siampipa in a natna vel dinga, tua natna a banna na pen ni sagih sung koihcip ding hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a ni sagih ni-in a natna velkik ding hi. A natna pen puan tungah kizelin, puan a tunga phei-ah hitaleh, savun le savun a kizatna na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om leh, tua natna pen a lauhuai phaknatna hi a, a nin ahi hi.

Amah in a puan hal ding hi. Tua natna pen puan a tunga phei-ah hitaleh, samul puan saihadial puan hitaleh savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om leh hal ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen a lauhuai phaknatna ahih manin mei sungah kihal ding hi.
“Siampipa in velin, a natna pen puan tung, a tunga phei-ah hitaleh, savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a kizelh kei leh,
siampipa in tua natna a banna pen amaute in a sawp ding uh thu pia dinga, amah in adang ni sagih sung mah tua na koihcip ding hi.

Siampipa in tua natna a banna pen a kisawp khit ciangin vel ding hi. Tua natna a banna mun a mel a kikheel kei leh, a natna a kizelh loh hangin tua pen a nin mah ahi hi. Tua natna pen a sunglamah ahi a, a pualamah ahi zongin a baan leh mei sungah tua puan na hal ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin siampipa in vel a, a kisawp khit ciangin a meima a mualh leh, amah in a puan tung pan hitaleh savun tung pan hitaleh a puan a tunga phei tung pan hitaleh natna a banna mun bal khia ding hi.
Tua ciangin a puan tung hitaleh puan a tunga phei tungah hitaleh savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a kilatkik leh, tua natna a kizel ahih manin natna a banna pen mei tawh na hal ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin a puan hitaleh puan a tunga phei hitaleh savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh a kisawp khit ciangin tua natna a pai khiatna na pen, a nih veina kisawp kikin a siang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

Hih pen samul puan hitaleh saihadial puan hitaleh puan a tung hitaleh a phei hitaleh, savun tawh a kibawl na khat peuhpeuh tungah a om phaknatna tawh kisai-in siang hiam, nin hiam, ci-in khen nading ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Hih pen amah a kisiansak ni-in mi phakpa’ zuih ding ngeina hi ding hi. Siampipa kiangah amah kipaipih dinga,
giahphual pualamah siampipa pai khia-in vel ding hi. Tua ciangin a phaknatna pen a phakpa’ tung pan a dam leh,
a kisiangsak ding mipa adingin a hing vasa siang nih le taamtak sing le a ausan puan le puknah a la dingin siampipa in amaute sawl ding hi.
Amaute in leibeel khat sunga kikoih tuiluang tungah a vasa khat a gawh ding uh siampipa in thu pia ding hi.
Amah in a hing lai vasa pen taamtak sing le a ausan puan le puknah tawh la khawmin, tuate le a hing lai vasa pen tuiluang tunga kithat vasa’ si sungah diah ding hi.
Amah in phaknatna panin a kisiangsak ding pa’ tungah sagihvei theh dinga, tua ciangin amah siang hi, ci-in gen dinga, a hing vasa pen gamlakah khah ding hi.

A kisiangsak ding mipa in a puante sawpin, a mul khempeuh metkhia-in, tui sungah a mahmah kisilin, amah a siang hi ding hi. Tua khit ciangin amah giahphual ah hong ciah dinga, ahih hangin ama puanbuk pualamah ni sagih sung om ding hi.
A ni sagih ni-in amah in a sam, a khamul le a mitkhu mul le a pum tungah a om a mul khempeuh met khia ding hi. Tua ciangin amah in a puante sawpin, tui sungah a pumpi silin, amah a siang hi ding hi.
“A ni giat ni-in amah in a sitbaang lo tuuno a pa nih le a sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a nu khat le an tawh biakna ahi sathau tawh annel lawh thum le sathau biingta khat la ding hi.
Amah a siangsak ding siampipa in a kisiangsak ding mipa le hih nate, kikhopna bukkong a Topa’ mai-ah paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in tuuno a pa khat la-in sathau biingta khat tawh mawhna hanga biakna-in pia-in, vei-a biakna-in Topa’ mai-ah tuate vei ding hi.

Amaute in khialhna hanga biakna le meihal biakna, siangtho mun sunga a gawhna mun uhah amah in tuuno go ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna hanga biakna pen khialhna hanga biakna mah bangin siampipa a’ hi a, tua pen a siangtho pen ahi hi.
Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat la-in, tua si pen a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bilteep, a taklam khutpi le a taklam khepi nuh ding hi.
Tua ciangin sathau biingta panin kimkhat la-in a mahmah’ veilam khut sungah sungin,
a veilam khutsunga om sathau sungah a taklam khutme diahin, a khutme tawh a sathau kimkhatte Topa’ mai-ah sagihvei theh ding hi.
Ama khut sungah a omlai sathau kimkhatte pen siampipa in a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bilteep, a taklam khutpi le a taklam khepi nuhin, mawhna hanga biakna si tungah koih ding hi.
Siampipa in a khutsunga sathau omlai teng a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ lu nilh ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in ama adingin Topa’ mai-ah kilemna bawlsak ding hi.
“A nitna panin a kisiangthosak ding mipa ading kilemna bawl nadingin siampipa in a khialhna hanga biakna pia ding hi. Tua khit ciangin amah in meihal biakna go dinga,
meihal biakna le an tawh biaknate, biakna tau tungah pia ding hi. Tua bangin siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah a siang hi ding hi.

“Ahih hangin amah zawngin tuazah a piak zawh kei leh, ama ading kilemna bawl nadingin a kivei ding, mawhna hanga biakna-in tuuno a pa khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh khat le sathau biingta khat pia dinga,
vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhuno nih ahi zongin, a piak zawh bangbang pia ding hi. Khat pen khialhna hanga biak nading hi a, a khat pen meihal biak nading ahi hi.
A ni giat ni-in amah in Topa’ mai, kikhopna bukkong, siampipa kiangah ama kisianthosak nadingin tuate paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna tuuno le a sathau biingta khat la-in, vei-a biakna-in Topa’ mai-ah tuate vei ding hi.
Amah in mawhna hanga biakna tuuno go ding hi. Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat la-in, a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bilteep, a taklam khutpi le a taklam khepi nuh ding hi.
Siampipa in a mahmah’ veilam khut sungah a sathau kimkhat sung dinga,
a veilam khutsunga a om sathau tawmkhat a taklam khutme tawh Topa’ mai-ah sagihvei theh ding hi.
Siampipa in ama khutsunga a om sathau tawmkhat a kisiangthosak ding mipa’ taklam bilteep, taklam khutpi le a taklam khepite, mawhna hanga biakna si a kikoihna munah va nuh ding hi.
Siampipa in a khutsunga a omlai sathau teng a kisiangthosak ding mipa ading Topa’ mai-ah kilemna bawl nadingin a lu nilhsak ding hi.
Amah in vakhu hitaleh kawl vakhuno hitaleh, a piak zawh bangbang pia-in,
khat pen khialhna hanga biak nading, a khat pen meihal biak nadingin an-a biakna tawh pia khawm ding hi. Siampipa in a kisiangthosak pa adingin Topa’ mai-ah kilemna bawlsak ding hi.
Hih pen phaknatna a vei, a kisianthosak nadingin biakna a pia zo lopa adingin ngeina ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses le Aaron kiangah,
“Note adingin kong piak Kanaan gamah na om ciangun note’ leitang a inn khat sungah phaknatna kong tunsak ciangin,
inn nei pa pai-in siampipa kiangah, ‘Ka inn sungah natna nam khat a om ding tawh kibang,’ ci ding hi.

Tua ciangin, inn sunga om na khempeuh a nin hi, a kicih khak loh nadingin a natna a vel dingin siampipa a pai ma-in amaute in tua inn a na hawmsak nading uh thu pia dinga, tua khit ciangin inn vel dingin siampipa pai ding hi.
Amah in a natna vel ding hi. A natna pen tua inn kawm tungah omin, a hing mel ahih kei leh a san mel na pua-in, tua natna kawm maitang sangin a thuk zawk tuak leh,
inn sung panin innkongah siampipa pai khia dinga, ni sagih sung inn khakcip ding hi.
A ni sagih ni-in siampipa hong paikikin en ding hi. Tua inn kawm tungah a natna a kizelh leh,
natna a banna suang la khia-in khuapi pualam a nin mun khatah a paipih nadingun siampipa in thu pia ding hi.
Amah in a inn sung kimkot kiatsakin, amaute in a kiatkhiat, a kizutna themte, khuapi pualam a nin mun khatah bua ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in suang dang la-in, tua suangte’ omna munah koihin, amah in zutna dang la-in tua inn zut ding hi.
“Amah in a suangte la khia-in a inn kiatin a zut khit ciangin tua inn sungah natna hong suahkik leh,
siampipa pai-in en ding hi. Inn sungah a natna a kizelh leh, tua pen inn sunga om a lauhuai phaknatna hi a, tua inn a nin ahi hi.
Amah in tua inn, a sing a suang le inn a kizutnate khempeuh phel dinga, khuapi pualam a nin mun khatah tuate pua khia ding hi.
Tua tham loin tua inn a kikhakcip sungteng a sungah a lut mipa a nitak dong a nin hi ding hi.
Tua inn sungah a lum mipa le an a ne mipa in ama puante sawp ding hi.
“Ahih hangin siampipa hong pai-in a vel a, a inn a kizut khit ciangin inn sungah natna a kizelh kei leh, tua ciangin a natna dam ahih manin siampipa in tua inn siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi.
Tua inn siangthosak nadingin amah in vasa neu nih, taamtak sing le a ausan khau le puknah tawh la khawmin,
beel sunga kikoih tui luang tungah a vasa khat go dinga,
taamtak sing le puknah le a ausan khau pen a vasa hing tawh la khawmin, tua pen a kigo vasa’ si le tuiluang sungah diahin, tua inn sagihvei theh ding hi.
Tua bangin amah in vasa si tawh, tuiluang tawh, a hing vasa tawh, taamtak sing le puknah le a ausan khau tawh a inn siangsak dinga,
vasa hing pen khuapi pualam gamlakah khah khia ding hi. Tua bangin amah in tua inn adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, tua inn a siang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih pen phaknatna khat peuhpeuh tawh kisai-in ngeina ahi hi: Cithak tawh kisai,
puan tung hitaleh inn sung hitaleh ah a om phaknatna tawh kisai,
a bawk hitaleh meima hitaleh a tuampian’ khat peuhpeuh tawh kisai-in,
bang hunin nin a, bang hunin siang hiam, ci-in lah nading ahi hi. Hih pen phaknatna tawh kisai ngeina ahi hi.
Topa in Moses le Aaron kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Pasal khatpeuh, a natui a pai khiat ciangin tua a pai khia a natui pen a nin ahi hi.
Amah a ninsak a natui pai khia tawh kisai-in ngeina hih bang ahi hi: A natui a paipai a, a khawl zongin, ama sungah nitna mah hi veve hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa’ lupna le a tutna peuhmah a nin hi ding hi.
Ama lupna a lawng peuhmah in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa’ tutnasa na khat peuhpeuh tungah a tu mi peuhmah in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa’ pumpi a lawng mi peuhmah in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa in a siang mipa’ tungah cil a siat leh, tua pa in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa a tutna tutphah khat peuhpeuh zong a nin hi ding hi.
Ama nuai-ah a om na khat peuhpeuh a lawng mipa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. Tua bang na a pua mipa in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa in tui sungah a khut sil lopi-in a lawn mi peuhmah in ama puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A natui a pai khia mipa in a lawn lei tawh kibawl umlebeelte kisukham dinga, sing tawh kibawl kuanglekeute ahihleh tui sungah kisawp ding hi.
“A natui a pai khia mipa a natui a kan ciangin a kisiansak nadingin amah in ni sagih sung ngak dinga, tua ciangin a puante sawpin, tuiluang sungah a pumpi sil dinga, a siang hi ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in amah in vakhu nih ahih kei leh kawl vakhuno nih la-in, Topa’ mai kikhopna bukkongah pai-in, siampipa tungah tuate pia ding hi.
Siampipa in tuate, khat khialhna hanga biak nading le adang khat meihal biak nadingin pia dinga, a natui a pai khia mipa adingin siampipa in Topa’ mai-ah kilemna bawlsak ding hi.
“Mi khat in a natui a teh leh, amah in a pumpi khempeuh tui sungah sil dinga, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
A tungah a natui a tukna puan le savun peuhmah tui tawh kisawp dinga, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Pasal le numei a lupkhawm khit ciangin, amau tegel tui sungah kisil ding uh a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding uh hi.
“Numei khat in nin a neih ciangin, ni sagih sung a ninin om dinga, amah a lawng mi peuhmah a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Amah a nit hun sungin a lupna le a tutna peuhpeuh a nin hi ding hi.
Ama lupna a lawng peuhmah in a puan sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Ama tutna a lawng peuhmah in ama puante sawp dinga, tui sungah a mahmah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Ama tutna ahi lupna hitaleh na khat peuhpeuh hitaleh, mi khat in a lawn ciangin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Pasal khat peuhmah tua nu tawh lumin, tua nu’ nitna ama tungah a om leh, ni sagih sung tua pa a nin hi dinga, tua pa’ lupna peuhmah zong a nin hi ding hi.

“Numei khat in ama nit hun hi lo napi-in ni tampi sung a si a suak ahi a, ama nit hun sung khengin nin nei-in ahi zongin a om leh, a ninneih sung khempeuh, ama nit hun sung mah bangin a nin hi ding hi.
Ama ninneih hun sung tengin a tutna khempeuh zong a nit sungin ama lupna tawh kibang dinga, amah a nin ahih mah bangin a tutna khempeuh zong a nin hi ding hi.
Hih nate a lawng peuhmah a nin hi dinga, a puante sawpin, a mahmah tui sungah kisil dinga, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin tua nu a nin a bei zawh ni sagih khit ciangin a siang hi ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in tua nu in vakhu nih ahih kei leh kawl vakhuno nih la-in, kikhopna bukkong, siampipa kiangah tuate paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in khialhna hanga biak nadingin khat pia-in, meihal biak nadingin adang khat pia ding hi. Siampipa in ama nitna hangin Topa’ mai-ah ama ading kilemna bawlsak ding hi.
“Amau’ laizang a om ka biakbuk ninsakkha le-uh amaute in sihlawh ding uh ahih ciangin, tua bangin note in Israel mite amau’ nitna panin siangsakin na kem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hih pen a natui a pai khia mipa ahih kei leh a natui tehin, tua tawh mi nin a suak pa adingin ngeina hi a,
nin a nei nu ading zong ahi hi. Hihte pen pasal a natui a pai khia mi, ninnei numei le, a nin neih sungin numei tawh a lumkhawm mipa adingin ngeina ahi hi.
Aaron’ tapa nihte in ngeina lopi-in Topa’ mai-ah mei tawh va pai-in a sihlawh khit uh ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah thu a gen hi.

Topa in Moses kiangah, “Thuciamna singkuang tunga om hehpihna tokhom mai, dalna puan sunglam a siangtho munah a hun lopi-in hong pai nawn loh nadingin na sanggampa Aaron kiangah gen in. A hun lopi-in hong pai leh amah si ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua mun pen hehpihna tokhom tunga meii sungah kei ka kilatna mun ahi hi.
Ahih hangin siangtho munah Aaron hong pai dingzia in: Khialhna hanga biak nadingin bawngtalno khat le meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat hong paipih ding hi.

“Amah in a siangtho saihadial puantungsilh silhin, saihadial pheituam teengin, saihadial kawnggak tawh kigakin, saihadial dialpi khim ding hi. Hihte pen a siangtho puan ahi hi. Amah in tui sungah a pumpi sil dinga, tua ciangin tua puante silh ding hi.
“Amah in Israel mihonte tung panin khialhna hanga biak nadingin keeltal nih le meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat la ding hi.
Aaron in a mahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal pia-in, amah le a innkuanpihte adingin kilemna bawl ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in keeltal nih la-in, Topa’ mai kikhopna bukkongah tuate koih ding hi.
Aaron in tua keel nihte tungah ai saanin, khat pen Topa ading, adang khat pen Azazel ading ahi hi.
Aaron in Topa ading ai a pha keel paipihin, khialhna hanga biakna-in pia ding hi.
Ahih hangin Azazel adingin ai a pha keel pen gamlakah Azazel’ kiangah a kipuak theih nadingin kilemna bawl nadingin a hingin Topa’ mai-ah kipaipih ding hi.
“Aaron in a mahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal pia-in, amah le a innkuanpihte adingin kilemna bawl dinga, a mahmah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in a bawngtal go ding hi.
Amah in Topa’ biakna tau panin mei-am a dim paknamtui beel khat le a kisunen paknamtui khut nih dim la ding hi. Amah in dalna puan sungah paipihin
thuciamna singkuang tungah a om hehpihna tokhom pen paknamtui khu in a tuam theih nadingin Topa’ mai-ah a om mei tungah a paknamtui koih ding hi. Tua hi kei leh amah si ding hi.
Amah in bawngtal si tawmkhat la-in, a khutme tawh hehpihna tokhom a mailam tungah thehin, hehpihna tokhom mai-ah a khutme tawh a si sagihvei theh ding hi.

“Tua ciangin amah in mite ading ahi khialhna hanga biakna keel go-in, dalna puan sungah a si paipih dinga, bawngtal si a theh mah bangin a si thehin, hehpihna tokhom tung le hehpihna tokhom mai-ah theh ding hi.

Amah in tua bangin Israel mite’ nitna hang, amau’ thu palsatna hang le amau’ khialhna khempeuh hangin siangtho mun adingin kilemna bawl ding hi. Amah in amau’ nitna sungah amau tawh a omkhawm kikhopna buk adingin tua mah bangin a bawl ding hi.
Siangtho munah kilemna bawl dingin amah tumin ama ading, a innkuanpihte ading le Israel mihonte khempeuh adingin kilemna a bawl khit hong pai khiat matengin kikhopna buk sungah kuamah om lo ding hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ mai-ah a om biakna tau-ah amah va pai-in, biakna tau siansuahna bawl dinga, bawngtal si le keel si tawmkhat la-in, biakna tau kimkota a kite nuh ding hi.
Amah in a khutme tawh a si tawmkhat biakna tau tungah sagihvei thehin, siangsakin, Israel mite’ nitsakna panin biakna tau siangthosak ding hi.
“Amah in siangtho mun, kikhopna buk le biakna tau siansuahna a bawl khit ciangin, keel hing pen paipih ding hi.

Aaron in keel hing lu tungah a khut tegel nga-in, Israel mite’ mawhna, amau’ thu palsatna le amau’ khialhnate khempeuh, keel tungah pulak ding hi. Amah in keel lu tungah tuate suanin, a pai khiatpih dingin a kithawisa mipa tawh sehnel gamah sawl khia ding hi.
Keel in amau’ mawhnate khempeuh pua-in gam daihna-ah a pai dingin a keel khah ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kikhopna bukah Aaron hong pai-in, siangtho munah a tum hunin a silh saihadial puante suahin, tua lai-ah a puante nusia ding hi.
Amah in a siangtho mun khatah, a pumpi tui sungah silin, a puante silh dinga, hong pai khia-in, ama meihal biakna le mite’ meihal biakna pia-in, ama ading le mite adingin kilemna bawl ding hi.
Amah in biakna tau tungah khialhna hanga biakna sathau hal ding hi.
Azazel’ kiangah keel a paisak pa in a puante sawpin, a pumpi tui sungah sil dinga, tua khit ciangin giahphual ah hong ciah thei ding hi.
Siangtho munah kilemna bawl nadingin hong kipaipih si a kilakna, khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal le keel pen giahphual pualamah kipuakhia dinga, a vun, a sa le a ekte, mei tawh kihal ding hi.
Tuate a hal pa in ama puante sawpin, tui sungah a pumpi sil dinga, tua khit ciangin giahphual ah hong ciah thei ding hi.
“Hih pen, a kha sagihna, a ni sawm ni-in note adingin a tawntungin thukham hi dinga, tualsung mi hitaleh note lakah a hong peem khualmi hitaleh an tangin, na na sem kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih ni-in note siansak nadingin note-a’ ding kilemna kibawl dinga, na khialhna khempeuh panun Topa’ mai-ah na siang ding uh hi.
Tua pen note adingin a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath hi a, an na tang ding uh hi. Tua pen a tawntung a thukham ahi hi.
A pa’ tanga siampi dingin sathau a kinilh a ki-ap siampipa in kilemna bawlin, a siangtho saihadial puante silh ding hi.
Amah in biakbuk siansuahna bawlin, kikhopna buk le biakna tau siansuah dinga, siampite le mihonte khempeuh adingin kilemna a bawl ding hi.

Hih pen Israel mite adingin amau’ khialhnate khempeuh hangin kum khatin khatvei kilemna a kibawlsak theih nadingin note adingin a om tawntung ngeina kip khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Topa in amah a thupiak bangin Moses a gamta hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron, ama tapate le Israel mite khempeuh tungah hih bangin gen in. Hih pen Topa’ thupiaksa thu ahi hi.
Israel mi khatpeuh in bawngtal ahi a, tuuno ahi a, keel ahi zongin giahphual sung ahi a, giahphual pua-ah ahi zongin go a,

Topa’ biakbuk mai, Topa’ tungah letsongin piak dingin kikhopna bukkongah a gawh kei leh, tua mipa thu palsat hi ding hi. Amah in sisan luangsak ahih manin ama mite’ lak panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi.

Hih pen, gamlakah Israel mite in a gawh uh amau’ biakpiaknate hong paipih theih nading, kikhopna buk kongkhak-a siampipa’ kiang, Topa’ tungah amaute in tuate hong paipih theih nading le thunuama biakpiakna-in Topa tungah sa hong gawh theih nading uh deihna ahi hi.
Siampipa in kikhopna buk kong-a Topa’ biakna tau tungah a si thehin, Topa’ tungah a gim namtui dingin a thau hal ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a biak uh keeldawite adingin amau’ biakpiaknate go nawn lo ding uh hi. Hih pen amau’ khang tawntungin amaute’ tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
“Nangmah in amaute tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: Israel mite sung pan hitaleh, amaute lakah a peem khualmite sung panin hitaleh meihal biakna ahi a, biakpiakna ahi zongin a pia mipa in
Topa’ tungah piak dingin kikhopna bukkongah a paipih kei leh, ama mipihte kiang panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi.
“Israel mite sung pan hitaleh amau’ lakah a peem khualmite sung pan hitaleh mi khat in si khat peuhpeuh a nek leh, si a ne mipa ka maisiat dinga, ama mite lak panin amah ka khen khia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh pumpi nuntakna pen si sungah om hi. Note ading kilemna bawl nadingin note adingin biakna tau tungah tua si ka piazo hi. Si pen nuntakna ahih manin kilemna a piangsak na ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah in Israel mite tungah hih bangin ka ci khin hi: Note lakah kuamah in si ne lo dinga, note lakah a hong peem khualmi khatpeuh in zong si ne lo ding hi.

“Israel mite khatpeuh hitaleh, amaute lakah a peem khualmi khatpeuh in zong hitaleh, sabetna-ah, a kine thei ding gamsa khatpeuh hitaleh vasa hitaleh a man pa in a si bua khia-in leivui tawh vuk ding hi.

Ganhing khempeuh’ nuntakna pen a si ahih manin Israel mite tungah hih bangin ka ci khinzo hi: Ganhing khat peuhpeuh si na ne kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ganhing khempeuh’ nuntakna pen a si ahi hi. Si a ne mi peuhmah a mipihte kiang panin kihawl khia ding hi.

“A mawk sih hitaleh gamsate in a bal gawp hitaleh a ne mi peuhmah, tualsung mi hitaleh peemta hitaleh tua mi in a puante sawp dinga, a mahmah tui sungah kisilin, a nitak mateng a nin hi dinga, tua khit ciangin amah siang ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tuate sawp loin ahi zongin, kisil loin ahi zongin a om leh, amah in ama mawhna pua ding hi,” a ci hi.
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Kei pen

Note na tenna uh Egypt gamah amaute a gamtat bangin note na gamta kei ding uh a, note kong paipihna Kanaan gamah zong amaute a gamtat bangin note na gamta kei ding uh hi. Note in amau’ gamtatnate na zui kei ding uh hi.
Note in keima biakna ngeina kipte semin ka thukhamte lenin tuate na zui ding uh hi. Kei pen
Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukhamte le ka biakna ngeina kipte na zui ding uh hi. Tuate a zui mi peuhpeuh nungta ding hi. Kei pen
“Note kuamah in na kinaipih na behte uh mawhpih dingin na naih kei ding uh hi. Kei pen
Na nu mawhpihna tawh na pa’ tungah maizumna na tun kei ding hi. Amah pen na nu ahih manin na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Nangmah in na pa’ zi dangte zong na mawhpih kei ding hi. Tua pen na pa’ mindai nading ahi hi.
Nangmah in na sanggamnu, na pa’ tanu, ahih kei leh na nu’ tanu, inn-a suak hitaleh gam a suak hitaleh na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Nangmah in na tapa’ tanu ahih kei leh na tanu’ tanu na mawhpih kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ mindaina pen nangma mindaina mah ahi hi.
Na pa’ zi’ tanu, na pa’ tanu pen na sanggamnu ahih manin na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Na ni na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua nu pen na pa’ sanggam numei ahi hi.
Na nu’ sanggamnu na mawhpih kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen na nu tawh a kinai beh numei ahi hi.
Na pa’ sanggampa’ tungah mindaina na tun kei ding hi; tua pen ama zi na naih kei ding hi, cihnopna ahi hi; tua nu pen nangma innlak nu ahi hi.
Na monu na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua nu pen na tapa’ zi ahi hi; amah na mawhpih kei ding hi.
Na sanggampa’ zi na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua pen na sanggampa’ mindai nading ahi hi.

Na luppih numei khat’ tanu na mawhpih kei dinga, tua numei’ tapa’ tanu hitaleh tua numei’ tanu’ tanu hitaleh, luppih dingin na la kei ding hi. Amaute pen nangmah tawh a kinai beh numeite ahi uh hi. Tua bang gamtatna pen a siahuai ahi hi.
Nangmah in a sanggamnu a hingsuan dingin numei khat zi-in na la kei dinga, a sanggamnu a hing laipi-in amah na luppih kei ding hi.
“Nangmah in numei khat nin a neih laitak, a nit hun sungin luppih dingin na naih kei ding hi.
Na veengpa’ zi tawh na lumkhawm kei dinga, tua nu tawh na kininsak kei ding hi.
Nangmah in Molek tungah meihal biakna-a piak dingin na tate khat peuhpeuh na pia kei dinga, tua bangin na Pasian’ min na daisak kei ding hi; keimah pen
Numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal khat tawh na lumkhawm kei ding hi; tua pen a kihhuai ahi hi.
Ganhing khatpeuh tawh mawhin tua tawh na kininsak kei dinga, numei khatpeuh in zong ganhing khatpeuh tawh a mawh dingin kipia lo ding hi; tua pen ngeina hi lo hi.
“Hih nate khatpeuh tawh note kininsak kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh note’ mai-a ka paihkhiat minamte in hihte khempeuh tawh amaute kininsak uh hi.
Leitung a nin suak ahih manin keimah in a leitang gimna pia-in, leitang in ama tunga a teeng mite a lua khia hi.
Ahih hangin, tualsung mi hitaleh note lakah hong peem khualmi hitaleh, note in keima thukhamte le keima biakna ngeina kipte na zui ding uh a, hih a kihhuai nate khat beek na hih kei ding uh hi;
(bang hang hiam cih leh note’ ma-a a om gam mite in hih a kihhuaite khempeuh gamta uh ahih manin leitang a nin a suak hi;)
tua bang hikeileh leitang in note’ ma-a a om minamte a luakkhiat bangin note in amah na nitsak uh ciangin amah in note hong lua khia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih a kihhuaite khatpeuh a hihte peuhmah, amau’ mite lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin note’ ma-a a kizang hih a kihhuai ngeinate khat peuhpeuh na gamtat ngei loh nading uh le tuate tawh nomau na kinitsak loh nadingun kong thuhilhte zui un; kei pen
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mihonte khempeuh kiangah hih bangin gen in: Note na siangtho ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa note’ Pasian keimah ka siangtho hi.
Note a kuamah peuh in na nu le na pa uh zahtakin, note in ka Sabbath-te na tang ding uh hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Milimte lamah kihei kei unla, note in a kisungtawm pasian-te nomau adingin bawl kei un; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note in Topa’ tungah thunuama biakpiakna na piak uh ciangin, note hong kisan theih nadingin na pia ding uh hi.
Tua pen na piak ni mah uh ahih kei leh a zing ciangin kine dinga, a ni thum ni ciang dongin a omlai peuhmah mei tawh kihal ding hi.
A ni thum ni-in a kinek peuhmah leh, tua pen a kihhuai hi a, kisang lo ding hi.
Tua a ne mi peuhmah in ama mawhna pua ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Topa’ na a siangtho ninsak ahih manin ama mite sung panin kihawl khia ding hi.
“Na leitang tung panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lo uhah a nawl dongin an na la kei ding uh a, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sang zong na khawm kei ding uh hi.

Note in na leenggui lo uh hawkmai loin, leenggah a kiate zong na leenggui lo panun na tawm kei ding uh hi. Note in mizawngte le peemtate adingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note na guta kei ding uh hi. A man loin na gamta kei ding uh a, khatlekhat tungah zuau na kigen kei ding uh hi.
Note in a man lopi-in keima min tawh na kiciam kei ding uh a, tua bangin na Pasian uh’ min na daisak kei ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
“Note in na veengte uh na nengniam kei ding uh a, a na na sut kei ding uh hi. A kicial nasem pa’ thaman pen a zingsang dong zan tawntung na kemcip kei ding uh hi.
Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte’ mai-ah a puk theih nading na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
“Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tang loin na khen kei ding uh hi. Mizawngte lang gen loin, a liante’ thu zui loin, thumanna tawh na veengte uh thu na khen ding uh hi.
Note in na mipihte lak uhah mi gensia-in vaksuk vakto loin, na veengpa uh a sih nadingin na langpang kei ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.

“Note in na lungsim sung uhah na sanggampa uh na mudah kei ding uh a, na veengte uh tawh thu na kituah lohna uh kikum khawmin na siangsak ding uh hi; tua hikeileh ama hangin khialhna na pua ding uh hi.
Note in nomau’ mipihte tungah phu la loin, amau na lungsim neih kei ding uh a, nomau na ki-it uh bangin na veengte uh na it ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.

“Note in ka thukhamte na zui ding uh hi. Note in na ganhingte uh a namdang tawh ta na neisak kei ding uh hi. Note in na lo uhah khaici nam nih na pawikhawm kei ding uh a, khau nam nih a kigan puan zong na silh kei ding uh hi.

“Sila ahi numei, midang khat in zuthawl a piaksa, kitankhia nai loin amah suahtakna a kipia nai lo nu, pasal dang khat in a lupkhoppih leh, thukanna kinei ding hi. Amaute kithat lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu sila hi lai hi.
Ahih hangin tua pa in a mahmah adingin mawhna hanga biak nadingin tuutal khat, kikhopna bukkong, Topa’ kiangah hong paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in, tua pa a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin mawhna hanga biakna tuutal tawh Topa’ mai-ah ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, a gamtatnasa a khialhna kimaisak ding hi.
“Note, Kanaan gamah tungin nek dingin kung nam khempeuh na suan uh ciangin, note in amau’ gahte kum thum sung na ne kei ding uh hi.
A kum lina ciangin amau’ gah khempeuh siangtho-in, Topa’ tungah phatna biakna hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin a kum ngana ciangin tuate pen note adingin hong gah semsem nadingin tuate’ gah na ne thei ding uh hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note in sa khat peuhpeuh a sunga si tawh na nekhawm kei ding uh hi. Mailam thugen kholhna, ahih kei leh aisan na sem kei ding uh hi.
Note in na baa samte uh met loin na khamul mongte uh zong na tan kei ding uh hi.
Note in mi site’ hangin dahna limin na ci tung uh liamsak loin note’ tungah ciaptehna khat peuhpeuh zong na sun kei ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
“Na tanu uh biakinn sungah paktat dinga piakna tawh siasak kei un. Tua bang hileh pasian dangte biakna sungah na tung ding uh a, gam sung khempeuh, mawhna tawh a kidim suak kha ding hi.
Note in ka Sabbath ni tangin keimah hong kibiakna mun na zahtak ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
“Vankahte le aisanna lamah kihei kei un. Amaute tawh a kininsak dingin amaute zong kei un; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note, sam kangte’ mai-ah na kun ding uh a, puteekte’ maitang zahtakin, na Pasian uh na kihta ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
“Na gam sung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi.

Note lakah a hong peem khualmite tualsung mi mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, nomau mah bangin amaute na it ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note pen Egypt gam sungah khualmi na hi ngei uh hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Note in thukhenna, a sau tehna, a tam tehnate-ah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi.
Note in tawi khaina man, tawisuang man, seu man, bung man, na zang ding uh hi. Kei pen Egypt gam panin a hong pai khiatpih Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
Note in ka thukhamte khempeuh le ka biakna ngeina kipte khempeuh zui-in tuate na sem ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen in: Israel mite khat peuhpeuh hitaleh Israel sunga a peem khualmite hitaleh, a tate khat peuhpeuh Molek pasian tungah a pia mipa kithat dinga, mihonte in suang tawh denglum ding uh hi.
Kei mahmah in tua mipa ka maisiat dinga, ama mite lak panin ka hawl khia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a tate Molek tungah pia-in, ka biakbuk ninsakin, ka min siangtho daisak hi.
Amah in Molek tungah a tate khat a piak ciangin mihonte in tua pa kimuhmawh bawlin amah a thah kei uhleh,
keimah in tua mipa le ama innkuanpihte maisiatin, amah le Molek biakna-ah amah a zuite khempeuh amau’ mite lak panin ka hawl khia ding hi.
“Mi khat vankahna le aisan lamah kihei-in tuate thu a dot leh, keimah in tua mipa ka maisiat dinga, ama mite lak panin amah ka hawl khia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla siangtho un; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
Ka thukhamte zui unla, tuate sem un; note a hong siangthosak Topa pen keimah ka hi hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. Amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna a mahmah ngawh ding ahi hi.
“Pasal khatpeuh a veengpa’ zi tawh a mawh leh, tua a khial pa le a khialnu kithat khawm ding hi.
A pa’ zi tawh a lumkhawm mipa in a pa a mindaisak a suak hi. Amau tegel kithat ding hi. Amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
Pasal khat a monu tawh a lupkhop leh, amau tegel kithat ding hi; amaute in si kinailua mi tawh khialhna a bawl uh ahi hi. Amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
Pasal khat in numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal dang khat tawh a lupkhop leh, amau tegel kihhuaina a gamta khin uh ahih manin amaute kithat dinga, amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
Pasal khat in zi nei-in, a zi’ nu tawh zong a lakthuah leh, tua pen a kilawm lo ahi hi. Note lakah tua bang kilawm lohna a om loh nadingin tua pa le a nutate, mei tawh kihallum ding hi.
Pasal khatpeuh ganhing khat tawh a mawh leh amah le a ganhing kithat ding hi.
Numei khat in ganhing khat naihin tua tawh a mawh leh, note in a numei le a ganhing na that ding uh hi; amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.

“Pasal khat in ama sanggamnu, ahih kei leh a nu’ tanu tenpihin a lupkhawm uhleh, tua pen a zumhuai hi a, amau’ mipihte’ omna panin amaute kihawl khia ding hi. Ama sanggamnu tawh mawh ahih manin tua pa in ama mawhna pua ding hi.
Pasal khat, nin a nei numei khat tawh lumkhawmin a mawh uhleh, amau tegel in siantho nading ngeina palsat uh ahih manin amau’ mipihte lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.
“Note pen na nu’ sanggamnu ahih kei leh na pa’ sanggamnu tawh na mawh kei ding uh hi. Tua pen a nai behte tawh mawhna ahih manin amaute in amau’ mawhna pua ding uh hi.
Pasal khat, a pa’ sanggampa’ zi tawh a lupkhop leh, amah in a pa’ sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi. Amaute in amau’ khialhna thuak ding uh a, ta nei loin si ding uh hi.
Pasal khat in a sanggampa’ zi a lak leh, tua pen nitna hi a, amah in a sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi. Amaute in ta nei lo ding uh hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukham khempeuh le ka biakna ngeina kipte khempeuh zui-in, tuate na sem ding uh hi. Tua pen note na ten nadingun kong paipih nading leitang in note hong luakkhiat loh nading ahi hi.
Note’ mai-ah keimah in ka paihkhiat minamte’ ngeinate na zui kei ding uh hi. Amaute in hih nate khempeuh hih uh ahih manin amaute ka kih hi.

Ahih hangin keimah in note kiangah, ‘Note in amau’ leitang na luah ding uh hi. Bawngnawi le khuaizu a luanna leitang, na neih dingun note tungah kong pia ding hi,’ kong ci khinzo hi. Kei pen mite’ kiang panin note a hong khen khia Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note in ganhing a siang le a nin, vasa a siang le a nin khentelna na bawl ding uh hi. Note in nin hi, ci-in na seh dingun keimah in ka tuam koihsa ganhing hitaleh vasa hitaleh leitunga a pai thei khat peuhpeuh tawh hitaleh, note na kininsak kei ding uh hi.
Note pen keima adingin na siangtho ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa ahi keimah ka siangtho a, note pen keima-a’ na hih theih nadingun mite kiang panin note kong tuamkoih zo hi.
“Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin van a kah a, ai a saan leh kithat dinga, suang tawh amaute kidenglum ding hi. Amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Aaron’ tapa siampite tungah thu gen inla, amaute lak panin kuamah in ama beh nai pen ahi a nu, a pa, a tapa, a tanu, a sanggampa,

ahih kei leh nungak ahi a sanggamnu (tua nu in pasal nei nai lo ahih manin amah tawh a kinai ahi hi; tua nu hangin amah kininsak thei ding hi) longal ama mite lakah misite’ hangin kininsak lo ding hi.
Amah in pasal neisa numei khatpeuh hangin ama mite lakah va kininsakin, tua bangin kidaisak lo ding hi.
“Amaute in a lu uh mettol loin, amau’ khamul nawlhui zong kiat loin, a ci tung uh liamsak lo ding uh hi.

Amaute pen amau’ Pasian adingin siangtho ding uh a, amau’ Pasian’ min daisak lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau’ Pasian’ anlum ahi, Topa’ tungah meihal biakna pia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute siangtho ding uh hi.
Amaute in numei paktat ahih kei leh a kininsaksa numei teenpih lo ding uh a, a pasal in a maksa numei zong teenpih lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh siampipa pen ama Pasian adingin siangtho hi.
Amah in note’ Pasian’ anlum pia ahih manin note in amah na ap ding uh a, amah pen note adingin siangtho ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa ahi keimah, note hong siangthosakpa, ka siangtho hi.
Siampipa khat peuhpeuh’ tanu in paktatna tawh amah le amah a kidaisak leh, ama pa a daisak ahi hi. Tua nu mei tawh kihallum ding hi.
“Ama sanggamte lakah siampi lianpen, a lu tungah nilh sathau a kisunna pa, a puante silh dingin a ki-ap khin siampipa in a samte phiahsak loin, a puante zong balkek lo ding hi.
Amah in a nu le a pa nangawn ahi zongin misi khat peuhpeuh kiangah pai loin, a mahmah zong kininsak lo ding hi.
Biakbuk panin zong pai khia loin, ama Pasian’ biakbuk zong daisak lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama Pasian-a’ ahi ki-apna nilh sathau ama tungah om hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
Amah in a zi dingin nungak la ding hi.
Meigong numei, a kimasa numei, a kininsaksa numei, numei paktat, hih bangte pawl teenpih lo dinga, amah in ama mite lak panin nungak khat zi-in la ding hi.
Tua pen ama mite lakah a tate a daisak loh nading ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah a siangthosakpa pen keimah Topa ka hi hi, ci in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses tungah,
“Aaron kiangah hih bangin gen in: Na suanlekhakte sung panin poina a nei mi in a khang khangin ama Pasian’ anlum pia dingin hong neh thei lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh poina a nei, mittaw, khelbai, maihem le khutlekhe saulua,
khut liam, khe liam,
elkul le mi cingtaak lo, mit hoih lo le cithak a vei, meima nei le ciltang kitam mi in hong naih lo ding hi.

Siampi Aaron’ suanlekhakte sung panin poina a nei mi khatpeuh in Topa ading meihal biakna a pia dingin a nai-ah hong pai lo ding hi. Amah in poina nei ahih manin, ama Pasian’ anlum pia dingin a nai-ah hong pai lo ding hi.
Amah in ama Pasian’ anlum, a siangtho pen le a siangtho ante ne thei ding hi.

Ahih hangin amah in poina nei ahih manin, ka biakbuk a daisak loh nadingin dalna puan gei ahi a, biakna tau nai-ah ahi zongin hong pai lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a siangthosakpa pen keimah Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Aaron le a tapate le Israel mi khempeuh tungah hih thute a gen hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron le a tapate in keima min siangtho a daisak loh nadingun amaute in keima tungah a hong ap uh ahi, Israel mite’ piak a siangthote panin a kikep nadingun gen in; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.

Amaute kiangah, ‘Na suanlekhakte uh sung panin a khangkhangin khatpeuh in a nit laitakin Israel mite in Topa’ tungah a ap a siangtho nate a naih leh keima omna panin tua pa kihawl khia ding hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.

“‘Aaron’ gui sung panin meima nei le a natui a pai khia mi peuhmah in amah a siangtho mateng a siangtho an ne thei lo ding hi. Misi lawnna hitaleh a natui a teh pa lawnna hitaleh a nin na khat peuhpeuh a lawng pa,
amah a nit theih nadingin a bokvak ganhing khat hitaleh nitna a ngah theih nading mi khat hitaleh a lawng pa, ama nitna pen bangbang hitaleh,
tua bang na a lawng mipa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi dinga, amah in tui sungah a pumpi a sil kei leh a siangtho an ne lo ding hi.
Ni a tum ciangin amah siang dinga, tua khit ciangin amah in a siangtho an ne thei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bangte pen ama nek ding mah ahi hi.
A mawk sihte hitaleh gamsate in a bal gawpte hitaleh amah in tuate nekna tawh amah kininsak lo ding hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi, ci hi,’ ci in.
“Tua ahih ciangin amaute in ka thuhilhna zui ding uh hi. Tua hikeileh amaute in tua thu a daisak uh ciangin khialhna thuakin sihpih ding uh hi. Amaute a siangthosakpa pen keimah Topa ka hi hi.
“A pualam mi in a siangtho an ne lo ding hi. Siampipa’ inn-ah a om peemta ahi a, a kicial nasemte in ahi zongin a siangtho an ne lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin siampipa khat in ama adingin sum tawh sila khat a lei leh, tua a sila in ne thei ding hi. Ama inn sungah a suak mite in ama an ne thei ding uh hi.
Siampipa’ tanu khat a pualam mi khat tawh a kiteen leh tua nu in a siangtho biakna an ne thei lo ding hi.

Ahih hangin siampipa’ tanu pen meigong ahi a, a kima ahi zongin, ta nei loin a nungak lai mah bangin a pa’ inn-ah a ciahkik leh, tua nu in a pa’ an ne thei ding hi. Ahi zongin a pualam mi kuamah in tua an ne thei lo ding hi.
“Mi khat in theih lohna hangin a siangtho an khat peuhpeuh a nekkhak leh, tua a na manzah seh nga-ah seh khat behlapin, siampipa tungah a siangtho an man pia ding hi.
Amaute in Topa’ tungah a piak ahi, Israel-te’ an a siangtho pen siampite in ninsak lo ding uh a,
tua bangin amau’ an a siangthote nekna tawh mawhna le khialhna amaute puasak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen amaute a siangthosak Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Aaron le a tapate le Israel mi khempeuh tungah hih bangin gen in: Israel mite sung panin ahi zongin Israel mite sungah a peem mite lak pan ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in biakna a piak ciangin, thuciamna a tunsakna hitaleh meihal biakna-in Topa’ tungah a kipia utthu-a biakna hitaleh,
hong kisan theih nadingin bawngtal hitaleh tuu hitaleh keel hitaleh, a sitbaang lo a pa khat na pia ding uh hi.
Note in a sitbaang khat peuhpeuh na pia kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hong kisang zo lo ding hi.

Mi khatpeuh in bawnghon panin ahi a, tuulekeel hon panin ahi zongin thuciamna tunsak nading hitaleh utthu-a biakna-in hitaleh Topa’ tungah thunuama biakna a piak ciangin, a kisan theih nadingin a ganhing a cidam hi dinga, sitbaanna a om lo hi ding hi.

Ganhing a mittaw, a gamtang thei lo, a hem, meima nai a nei, cithak ahih kei leh meima a neite pen, note in Topa’ tungah pia loin, Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna-in biakna tau tungah tuate na zang kei ding uh hi.

Bawngtal hitaleh tuuno hitaleh a na khat peuhpeuh a saulua ahih kei leh a tomluate pen note in utthu-a biakna-in na pia thei ding uh hi. Ahih hangin thuciamna tunsakna a piak dingin tua bangte kisang zo lo hi.
A ciltangte a sanim, a kisuzan, a kitam, ahih kei leh a ki-atkhia ganhing khat peuhpeuh, note in Topa’ tungah pia loin, na gam sung uhah biakna-in na zang kei ding uh hi.
“Gamdang mite khat peuhpeuh tung panin a kingah ganhingte zong na Pasian uh’ an dingin note in na pia kei ding uh hi. Amaute sitbaang a, hem ahih manin tuate hong kisang zo lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Bawng ahih kei leh tuu ahih kei leh keel khat a suah ciangin a pi tawh ni sagih sung omkhawm ding hi. A ni giat ni a kipanin tua ganno pen Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna-in kisang thei ding hi.
A pi pen bawng hitaleh tuu hitaleh, note in a pi le a no ni khat sungin na gokhawm kei ding uh hi.
Note in Topa’ tungah lungdam koh biakna na piak uh ciangin, note hong kisan theih nadingin na pia ding uh hi.
A tua ni mahin kine dinga, note in zingsang dong siit na nei kei ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thupiaknate zui-in tuate na sem ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
Note in keima min siangtho na daisak kei ding uh a, Israel mite lakah kei hong kisiangthosak ding hi. Kei pen note a hong siangthosak Topa,
note’ Pasian ahi dingin Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpih pa ka hi hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in a siangtho biak kikhopnate hi, ci-in na gen ding uh keimah Topa’ pawi a kisehte hih bang ahi hi.

Ni guk sungin nasep kizo dinga, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath, a siangtho kikhopna ahi hi. Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua pen note’ tenna khempeuh ah Topa adingin Sabbath ahi hi.
“Hihte pen amaute adingin a kiseh hunin note in na gen ding uh ahi Topa’ pawi a kisehte, a siangtho biak kikhopnate ahi hi.
“A kha masa, a ni sawm le li nitak pen Topa’ Paisan Pawi ahi hi.
Tua kha mah, a ni sawm le nga ni pen Topa’ tungah silngo sawh loh anlum pawi ahi hi. Ni sagih sung note in silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi.
A ni masa ni-in note in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note in Topa’ tungah meihal biakna ni sagih sung na pia ding uh hi. A ni sagih ni pen a siangtho kikhopna ni hi dinga, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note tungah ka hong piak leitangah note tungin an na lak uh ciangin, note in an na lakna uhah anpal lom khat, siampipa kiangah na paipih ding uh hi.
Note hong kisan theih nadingin amah in Topa’ mai-ah anlom vei dinga, Sabbath ni a zing ciangin siampipa in tua anlom vei ding hi.
Note in anlom na vei ni-un, Topa’ tungah meihal biakna-in a sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat na pia ding uh hi.

Tua tawh a kipia khawm ding an tawh biakna pen sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh nih hi dinga, a gim namtui dingin Topa’ tungah meihal biakna-in kipia ding hi. Tua tawh a kipia khawm ding leenggahzu tawh biakna pen leenggahzu thawl khat hi ding hi.

Note in na Pasian uh biakna na paipih ma, hih ni matengin anlum hitaleh a ki-em an hitaleh a sial hitaleh na ne kei ding uh hi; tua pen note’ khang tawntungin na tenna khempeuh uhah ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi.
“Note in Sabbath khit a zing ciang, vei-a biakna anlom na paipih ni uh a kipan nipikal sagih bit dong a ni na simto ding uh hi.
A Sabbath sagihna khit a zing ciang dong ni sawmnga dong na simto ding uh a, tua ciangin note in Topa’ tungah an thak tawh biakna na paipih ding uh hi.
Note in na tenna uh panin vei dingin an lawh nih a kibawl anlum nih nong paipih ding uh hi. Tuate pen annel a kibawl, silngo sawhin a ki-em, Topa’ tungah anpalin a kipia hi ding hi.

Note in anlum tawh, a sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno sagih le bawngtalno khat le tuutal nih na pia ding uh hi. Tuate, Topa’ tungah a gim namtui mei tawh kihal biak nadingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate tawh Topa’ tungah meihal biakna hi ding hi.
Note in khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat le thunuama biakpiakna-in kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nih na pia ding uh hi.
Siampipa in Topa’ mai-ah vei-a biakna-in anpal-anlum le tuuno nih tawh tuate vei dinga, tuate pen siampipa adingin Topa’ mai-ah a siangtho hi ding hi.

Note in tua ni mahin thu zaksakna na bawl ding uh a, a siangtho kikhop khat na nei ding uh hi. Note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi; tua pen note’ tenna khempeuh ah na khang tawntungun ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi.

“Note in na leitang panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lonawl dongun la loin, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sangte zong na khawm kei ding uh a, mizawngte le khualmi adingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: A kha sagihna, a ni masa ni-in note in a thupi tawlngakna ni khat, peengkul aw tawh a kitaangko phawksakna, a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi.
Note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh a, Topa’ tungah meihal biakna na paipih ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Hih a kha sagihna ni sawm ni pen kilemna ni ahi hi. Tua pen note adingin a siangtho kikhop hun hi dinga, note in an tangin, Topa’ tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi.
Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen Topa note’ Pasian’ mai-ah note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin kilemna bawl ni ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua ni-in bang khat peuhpeuh a nekha mi peuhmah ama mite kiang panin kihawl khia ding hi.
Tua ni-in na khat peuhpeuh a sem mi peuhmah keimah in ama mite lak panin ka that ding hi.
Note in na na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua pen na khang tawntungun na tenna khempeuh uhah ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi.
Tua pen note adingin a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath ni hi dinga, an na tang ding uh hi. Tua kha ni kua nitak a kipan, a nitak panin a nitakkik dong note in na Sabbath uh na tang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Hih kha sagihna a ni sawm le nga ni a kipan ni sagih sung pen Topa ading buk pawi ahi hi.
A ni masa ni pen a siangtho kikhopna ni hi dinga, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.

Ni sagih sung note in Topa’ tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh a, a ni giat ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat nei-in, Topa’ tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi. Tua pen a thupi kikhopna khat hi a, note in thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.

“Hihte pen Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, meihal biakna le an tawh biaknate, biakpiakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate, amau’ ni ciatin piak dingin a siangtho kikhopna hunin na gen ding uh, Topa’ pawi a kisehte ahi hi.
Note in Topa’ tungah na piak uh Topa’ Sabbath-te, note’ letsongte, thuciamna hangin na biaknate khempeuh uh le utthu-a na biaknate khempeuh uh banah piak ding ahi hi.

“Note in leitang a piangte na kaihkhop khit uh, kha sagihna, a ni sawm le nga ni a kipan ni sagih sung Topa’ pawi na bawl ding uh hi. A ni masa ni pen a thupi tawlngakna khat hi a, a ni giat ni zong a thupi tawlngakna khat mah hi ding hi.
Note in a ni masa ni-in singkung hoih gahte, nisuh hiangte, a teh tam singhiangpite le lui a gialhekte la-in, Topa na Pasian uh pahtawina, ni sagih sung pawi na bawl ding uh hi.
Note in tua pen kum simin ni sagih sung pawi-in na nei ding uh a, note’ khang tawntungin ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi. Note in kha sagihna sungah na bawl ding uh hi.
No Israel mi khempeuh ni sagih sung buk sungah na teeng ding uh hi.
Tua pen keimah in Egypt gam panin amaute ka pai khiatpih lai-in Israel mite, buk sungah ka tensakna thu note’ suanlekhakte in a theih nading uh ahi hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-a bangin Moses in Israel mite tungah Topa’ pawi a kisehte a gen hi.
“Meivak khat a tawntungin a kivaksuak theih nadingin meivak adingin oliv gah a kisuzante panin sathau siangtho nang kiangah hong paipih nading uh Israel mite thu pia in.

Kikhopna buk sung, thuciamna singkuang dalna puan pualamah, Aaron in nitak a kipanin zingsang dongin Topa’ mai-ah a tawntungin tua meivak a ngeina bangin koih dinga, tua pen na khang tawntungun ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi.
Amah in kham citak meivakkhuam tungah meivakte a ngeina bangin Topa’ mai-ah omsak tawntung ding hi.
“Nangmah in annel la inla, tua panin moh sawm le nih bawlin em in; moh khat ciangin annel lawh nih hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kham citak sabuai tungah tuate gual nihin na koih dinga, gual khatah guk om ding hi.
Phawkna-in Topa’ tungah mei tawh biakna-in piak dingin anlum tawh a paikhawm theih nadingin nangmah in a gual nihte-ah paknamtui siangtho na koih ding hi.
Sabbath ni simin Aaron in a tawntung thuciamna-in Israel mite tang dingin Topa’ mai-ah a ngeina bangin koih tawntung ding hi.

Tua pen Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna sung panin amah in a tawntung a a ngah ding, a siangtho pen ama kaih ahih manin, Aaron le a suante-a’ ding hi a, amaute in a siangtho mun khatah ne ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Israel numei khat’ tapa, a pa Egypt mi ahi khat, Israel mite lakah a pai hi. Israel numei’ tapa le Israel mi khat giahphual ah kitawng uh a,
Israel numei’ tapa in Min Siangtho gensia-in samsia hi. Amaute in Moses kiangah amah paipih uh hi. Ama nu’ min pen Shelomith hi a, Dan minam, Dibri’ tanu ahi hi.
Topa’ deihna amaute tungah a kigen mateng amaute in tua mipa khumcip uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“A samsia mipa pen giahphual pualamah paipih in. Ama samsiat a za mi khempeuh ama lu tungah amau’ khut ngasak inla, mihonte khempeuh amah denglumsak in.
Tua ciangin Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Ama Pasian a samsia mi peuhmah in ama khialhna thuak ding hi.
Topa’ min a gensia mipa kithat ding hi. Mihonte khempeuh in amah denglum ding uh hi. Peemta hitaleh tualsung mi hitaleh, Min Siangtho a gensiate kithat ding hi.
“Mi a that pa kithat ding hi.
Ganhing a that pa in a ganhing mahin loh ding hi. A thu-in ci lehang nuntakna le nuntakna a kithuk ding ahi hi.
“Mi khat in a veengte khat a poisak leh, ama hih bangin ama tung mahah kithukkik dinga,
guh kitan tang ding guh kitan, mittang tang ding mittang, ha tang ding ha kihih dinga, amah in mi khat a poisak bangin amah kipoisak ding hi.
Ganhing a that pa in loh dinga, mi a that pa kithat ding hi.
Note in peemta le tualsung mi adingin ngeina a kibang khat na nei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Israel mite tungah hih thu a gen hi. Amaute in a samsia mipa giahphual pualamah paipih uh a, suang tawh a denglum uh hi. Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite in a hih uh hi.
Topa in Sinai Mual tungah Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note kong piak leitangah na tun uh ciangin, Topa pahtawina-in leitang tawlngak hun na omsak ding uh hi.
Kum guk sung note in na lo uh na pawi ding uh a, kum guk sung na leenggui lo uh hahin a gahte na kaikhawm ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin a kum sagihna-ah leitang ading a thupi tawlngakna sabbath, Topa pahtawina sabbath om ding hi. Note in na lo uh na pawi kei ding uh a, na leenggui lo uh na hah kei ding uh hi.
A li pote note in na kaikhawm kei ding uh a, a kipuah lo leenggui gahte na khawm kei ding uh hi. Leitang adingin a thupi tawlngakna hi ding hi.
Lo na khawh loh uh hangin leitang tawlngak kumin a piang tawmte in note ading, na sila numei le na sila pasalte ading, a kicial nasemte le note tawh a teeng a peem mite ading an hong sik ding hi.
A piang khempeuhte pen na bawngte uh le na leitang uhah a om ganhingte’ an ding ahi hi.
“Kum nipi sagih hun pen note adingin kum sawmli le kua ahih theih nadingin note in kum nipi sagih, kum sagih mun sagihvei na simto ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin note in kha sagihna a ni sawm ni-in nakpi-in peengkul na tum ding uh a, kilemna ni-in note in na gam sung khempeuh uhah peengkul aw na ging khiasak ding uh hi.

Note in a kum sawmngana siangthosakin, gam sunga a teeng mi khempeuh tungah suahtakna thu na zasak ding uh hi. Note in nomau’ neihsa ciat ngahkikin, sila-in a kizuak mite nomau’ innkuanpihte ciat kiangah na ciahkik uh ciangin note adingin jubilee hi ding hi.
Tua a kum sawmngana pen note adingin jubilee hi ding hi. Tua kum sungin note in lo pawi loin, a li pote zong la loin, a kihah lo leengguite panin zong leenggah na khawm kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen jubilee ahi hi. Tua pen note-a’ dingin siangtho dinga, note in lo panin a piang tawmte na ne ding uh hi.
“Hih jubilee kum sungin note khempeuh in nomau’ neihsa ciat na ngahkik ding uh hi.
Note in na veengte’ tungah na zuak uh ahi zongin na veengte’ kiang panin na lei uh ahi zongin note khatlekhat na kikhem kei ding uh hi.
Jubilee khit ciangin a jubilee kik dong a kum phazah tawh kituakin note in na veengte uh kiang panin lei-in, a an piang ding kum zah tawh kituakin amau in note tungah hong zuak ding uh hi.
A kum a tam lai leh a man na tamsak ding uh a, a kum a tawm leh a man na tawmsak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh no tungah hong zuak pen a tuk tung ding zah ahi hi.
Note khatlekhat kikhem loin na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukhamte le ka biakna ngeina kipte zui-in tuate na sem ding uh hi. Tua hileh note lungmuang takin gam sungah na teeng ding uh hi.
Leitang in an hong piangsak dinga, note in na khamtakun ne-in, lungmuang takin na teeng ding uh hi.
“Note in, ‘Lo lah pawi loin, an lah la kei lehang, a kum sagihna-ah bang ne ding ihi hiam?’ na cih uhleh
keimah in a kum gukna-ah note tungah thupha kong pia dinga, kum thum sung khom ding an hong piang ding hi.
A kum giatna-ah lo na pawi ding uh ciangin, note in anlui na ne lai ding uh hi. Anthak hong tun a kum kuana mateng note in a lui na ne ding uh hi.
“Leitang pen keima-a’ ahih manin neihsuak dingin leitang kizuak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note pen kei tawh a omkhawm khualmi le peemtate na hi uh hi.
“Note in na neih uh leitang khempeuh na kitanhkiksak thei ding uh hi.
Na sanggampa zawngin a neihsa leitang khenkhat a zuak leh, amah tawh a kinai a behpa hong pai-in a sanggampa’ zuaksa tanh ding hi.
Mi khat in tua na a tatsak ding mi a neih kei a, a mahmah hong haukikin a tanh zo dingin a pian leh,
amah in tua na a zuak zawh a kumte sim dinga, a zuakna mipa tungah a piak lai ding a kisam zah pia dinga, amah in a neihsa ngahkik ding hi.

Ahih hangin amah in ama adingin ngahkik zawh nading lampi a neih kei leh, tua ama zuak leitang pen jubilee kum mateng a leipa’ khut sungah om ding hi. Jubilee kum ciangin tua leitang kipiakhia dinga, amah in a neihsa ngahkik ding hi.
“Mi khat in khuapikulh sungah tenna inn khat a zuak leh, a kizuak khit kum khat bit sungin amah in tanhkik thei dinga, kum khat bit sungin amah in tatkik theih nading thu nei ding hi.
Tua pen kum khat bit sungin a kitatkik kei leh, khuapikulh sunga om tua inn pen a leipa in khang tawntungin a neih dingin kibawlsak dinga, jubilee kum ciangin zong kipiakhiakik tuan nawn lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin a kimkotah kulh a nei lo khua neu-a innte pen gam sung lote tawh a kibangin kingaihsun ding hi. Tuate kitanhkik thei dinga, jubilee kum ciangin tuate kipiakhia ding hi.
Ahi zongin Levi mite’ khuapite, amau’ neihsa khuapite-a innte ahihleh, Levi mite in khatvei peuh ciangin tanh thei ding uh hi.

Levi mi khatpeuh in ama tatkik theih ding hinapi a tatkik zawh kei leh, amau’ neihsa khuapi sunga tua inn pen jubilee kum ciangin kipiakik ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Levi mite’ khuapi sunga innte pen Israel mite’ lakah amau’ neihsa ahi hi.
Ahih hangin amau’ khuapi taang gamte kizuak thei lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen amau’ neih tawntung na ahi hi.
“Na sanggampa uh zawngin, note bangin amah a kivak zawh kei leh, note in amah na vak ding uh hi. Khualmi le peemta bangin amah pen note tawh hong om ding hi.
Na sanggampa uh no kiangah hong ten theih nadingin ama tung panin a meet a khang la kei unla, na Pasian uh zahtak un.
Note in ama tungah a meetin sum leitawi pia loin, ama tungah a meetin na an uh zong na pia kei ding uh hi.
Kei pen note’ Pasian ahi ding le, note tungah Kanaan leitang a hong pia dingin Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpih Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Na gei-a om na sanggampa zawngin, nangma tungah a mahmah hong kizuak leh, sila bangin na na semsak kei ding hi.
Amah pen a kicial nasem le peemta bangin nang kiangah om ding hi. Amah in jubilee kum mateng nangma na hong sem dinga,
tua ciangin nang kiang panin amah le ama kiangah a om a tate pai khia dinga, ama innkuan zuan kikin, a pate’ neihsa ngahkik ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Egypt gam panin ka pai khiatpih keima nasemte hi a, amaute sila-in kizuak lo ding hi.
Note in hih gawpgawpna tawh amah na uk kei ding uh a, na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi.
Note in na neih theih ding uh sila numei le sila pasalte hih bang ahi hi: Na kimkot uha om minam dangte lak panin sila numei le sila pasal na lei thei ding uh hi.
Note in na gam sung uhah a suak, note lakah a hong peem khualmite le note tawh a om amau’ innkuante lak panin zong na lei thei ding uh a, amaute pen nomau a’ hi thei ding uh hi.

Note in amaute pen note’ khit ciangin na tapate uh tungah amau’ neih tawntung dingin a luah dingin na pia thei ding uh hi. Note in sila-in amaute na nei thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggam uh Israel mite khatlekhat hih gawpgawpna tawh na ki-uk kei ding uh hi.

“Note lakah a teeng khualmi ahih kei leh peemta khat hong hau a, ama kiang a om na sanggampa uh zawngin, no tawh a om khualmipa tung ahi a, peemta mipa tungah ahi zongin, tua ahih kei leh khualmipa’ innkuan khat peuhpeuh tungah amah a kizuak leh,
amah a kizuak khit ciangin amah kitanhkik thei dinga, ama sanggamte khat peuhpeuh in amah tanh thei ding hi.

Ama innlak pa ahih kei leh a innlak sanggampa in tanh thei ding hi. Ama innkuan sunga a kinaipih a beh khatpeuh in amah tanh thei ding hi. Tua ahih kei leh zong amah a hauh leh a mahmah kitanhkik thei ding hi.

Midang tungah a mahmah a kizuak a kipan jubilee kum dong amah a leipa tawh tuat dinga, ama suahtak nading sum pen a kum phazah tawh kituak hi ding hi. A topa tawh a omkhawm hun sungteng pen a kicial nasem khat thaman zahin seh ding hi.
Kum tampi in a sap lai leh, amah in tuate tawh a kituakin ama thaman ding a kipiakna sung panin ama kitatkhiat nadingin piakik ding hi.
Ahih hangin jubilee kum ding kum tawmkhat bek in a sap leh amah in a topa tawh tuatna khat nei ding hi. Ama sepsak ding kum a omlai tawh kituakin ama kitatkhiat nadingin sum piakik ding hi.
Amah pen a topa tungah a kum kumin a kicial nasem pa tawh kibang ding hi. A topa in note’ muhna-ah hih gawpgawpna tawh amah uk lo ding hi.
Hih bang danin amah a kitatkhiat kei leh, jubilee kum ciangin amah le amah tawh a om a tate kikhahkhia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite pen kei adingin nasemte ahi uh hi. Amaute pen Egypt gam panin keimah in ka pai khiatpih keima nasemte ahi uh hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

“Note in nomau adingin a mai-ah na kun dingun milim bawl loin, a kiseek milim hitaleh biakna song hitaleh na dingsak kei ding uh a, na gam sung uhah suang milim na phut kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
Note in ka sabbath-te tangin keimah hong kibiakna mun na zahtak ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
“Note in ka thukham zui-in, ka thupiaknate mangin tuate na sep uhleh,
keimah in note tungah guahtui a hunin kong pia dinga, leitang in an hong piangsakin, lo-a kungte in amau’ gah gah ding uh hi.
Na cil uh ante leenggah lawh hun dong kimang dinga, leenggah minte zong lopawi hun dong kimang ding hi. Note in na khamtakun an na ne ding uh a, lungnuam takin na gam sung uhah na teeng ding uh hi.

“Keimah in gam sungah nopsakna hong pia-in, note lungnuam takin na lum ding uh a, bangmah in note hong lausak lo ding hi. Keimah in gam sung panin ganhing gilote ka hawl khia dinga, galkidona in na gam uh hong nawk lo ding hi.
Note in na galte uh na delh ding uh a, note’ mai-ah namsau in amaute puksak ding hi.
Note nga in zakhat zo-in, note zakhat in tul sawm na zo ding uh hi. Note’ mai-ah namsau in na galte uh puksak ding hi.
Keimah in note ka hong pi ngaihsut dinga, note hong pungsakin, tampi kong phasak dinga, note tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi.
Note in sauveipi a kikhol anluite ne-in, a thak koih nadingin a lui na hahsiang masa ding uh hi.
Keimah in note lakah omna ka bawl dinga, keimah in note kong kih kei ding hi.
Keimah, note’ lakah omin note’ Pasian ka hi dinga, note, keima mite na hi ding uh hi.
Note pen amau’ sila na hih loh nadingun Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpih Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi. Keimah in note’ gimna hakkolte kuaitanin note a dingtangin kong paisak hi.
“Ahih hangin note in ka thu ngai loin, hih thupiaknate khempeuh na hih kei uh a,
ka thukhamte nialin, ka biakna ngeina kipte kih a, ka thupiaknate khempeuh sem loin, ka thuciamna na palsat uhleh,

keimah in note tungah hih bangin kong hih ding hi: Note’ tungah hong tung dingin keimah in thakhatthu a dipkuatna, zawngkhalna le mite siasakin nuntakna a kiamsak ding cisa natna kong tungsak ding hi. Note’ lopawi zong a mawkna hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na galte un tuate ne ding hi.
Keimah in note kong maisiat dinga, na galte uh mai-ah lelhna na thuak ding uh hi. Note hong mudah mite in note hong uk dinga, kuamah in note hong delh lo napi-in na tai ding uh hi.
“Tua bang hinapi-in note in ka thu nong ngaih kei veve uhleh, keimah in na khialhna hangun a zah sagih vei-in note kong thuhilhkik dinga,
keimah in na kiphatsakpih uh note’ vangliatna susia-in, van panin guah hong zusak loin, na leitang uh sik ka bangsak ding hi.
Na leitang un an piangsak loin, na gam sung uha kungte in amau’ gah gah lo ding ahih manin note’ thatang a mawkna-in a bei hi ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kei hong demin, keima thu na ngaih kei lai uhleh, keimah in note’ khialhna a zah sagih vei-in note’ tungah gimna kong tungsak ding hi.
Keimah in note’ lakah gamsate hong khahin, amaute in na tate uh hong neksak ding uh a, na ganhingte uh susia-in, note mi tawmno khat hong suah dinga, note’ lampite zong gamkhing hong suak ding hi.
“Hih banga hihna tawh note hong kihei tuan loin, kei na hong demlai uhleh,
kei zong note hong gawtin, kei mahmah in na khialhnate uh hangin a zah sagih vei-in kong sat ding hi.

Keimah in, thuciamna omsa bangin phulakna na a sem ding namsau khat note’ tungah kong tungsak ding hi. Na khuapi sung uhah note na kikaihkhop uhleh zong keimah in note’ lakah natna kong tungsak dinga, na galte uh khut sungah note hong kipia ding hi.

Keimah in note’ nuntakna an ka suksiat ciangin, an kicing lo ahih manin nupi sawm in meibung khat sungah na anlum uh emkhawm dinga, na anlum uh a tawitehin hong pia khiakik ding hi. Note in na ne ding uh a, na kham zo kei ding uh hi.
“Tua bang hinapi-in note in keima thu ngai loin, kei na hong demlai uhleh,
note ka hong heh ngawh bawl dinga, note’ khialhna hangin a zah sagih vei-in kong thuhilh ding hi.
Note na gil uh kial lua ding ahih manin na tapate uh le na tanute uh’ sa na ne ding uh hi.
Keimah in mual dawna na biaknate uh susia-in, na paknamtui biakna taute uh phukin, note’ milim’ siluang hawmte tungah na luanghawmte uh ka pai dinga, keimah in note kong kih ding hi.
Keimah in na khuapite uh siasakin, na biakna munte uh gamkhing ka suaksak dinga, nomau’ hong biakna a gim namtuite ka diik kei ding hi.
Keimah in leitang ka siasak dinga, tua tungah a teeng na galte un lamdangsa ding uh hi.
Keimah in minam dangte lakah note kong thehthang dinga, keimah in namsau a paai panin dokin note kong delh ding hi. Na leitang uh gamkhing suak dinga, na khuapite uh a sia hi ding hi.
Tua ciangin na galte uh leitangah na om tanvei uh, gamkhingin a om sungteng, leitang in tawlngak hun a ngah hi ding hi. Leitang tawlnga-in, a sabbath-te a tang hi ding hi.
Ama tungah na ten laitakun na ngahsak loh uh tawlngakna ahi a sabbath-te, gamkhingin a om sungteng a tawlnga hi ding hi.

“Note’ sung panin galte’ leitangah a omlai mite tungah lungsim gimna ka tungsak ding hi. Nahthel ging in amaute taisak dinga, namsau mai-ah mi khat a tai bangin amaute tai ding uh a, kuamah in a delh lohpi-in amaute puk ding uh hi.
Kuamah in delh lo napi-in namsau mai pan a tai khia bangin khatlekhat na kiphupai ding uh a, na galte uh nan zawh nading vangliatna na nei kei ding uh hi.
Minam dangte lakah note na sia ding uh a, na galte uh’ leitang in note hong valhtum ding hi.
Note’ sung panin galte’ leitangah a omlaite amau’ mawhna hangin kiam ding uh a, amau’ pute pate a mawhna uh hangin a kiam bangun amau zong a kiam ding uh hi.

“Ahih hangin kei tungah khemna tawh hong gamtatnasa uh le kei hong demna uh hangin amaute gawt bawlin, amau’ galte’ leitangah amaute ka paipihna hangin, amau’ mawhna le a pu a pate uh mawhna pulakin a lungsim uh niamkhiatin, amaute in a mawhna a kipuahphat uhleh,
keimah in Jakob tawh ka thuciamna, Isaac tawh ka thuciamna le Abraham tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk dinga, leitang zong ka phawk ding hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in leitang nusia-in, amaute om loin gamkhingin a om sungteng leitang in a sabbath-te na ngah ding hi. Amaute in ka biakna ngeina kipte nialin, ka thukhamte mudah uh ahih manin, a mawhna uh a kipuahphat ding uh kisam hi.

Bangbang ahi zongin, a galte uh gam sungah amaute a om sungteng uh keimah in amaute nil khia loin, amaute a susia mai mang zah ding le amaute tawh ka thuciamna a pelhzah dingin amaute ka mudah kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen Topa amau’ Pasian ka hi hi.

Ahih hangin keimah in amaute ka ngaihsutna-in amau’ Pasian ka hih theih nadingin, minam dangte’ muhna-ah Egypt gam panin ka pai khiatpih amau’ pulepate tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
