Hihte pen Moses tungtawnin Sinai Mual tungah Topa in amah le Israel mite kikalah a bawl thukhamte le biakna ngeina kipte le thute ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Mi khat in a tuam vilvelin kiciamna a bawl ciangin, tua a kiciam mite pen nangmah in Topa-a’ in na seh dinga, a nuai-a kiseh bangin kitanh-in suaktakik thei ding hi.
Pasal kum sawmnih panin kum sawmguk a phate a man na sehna pen, biakinn shekel zangin pasal khat ciangin ngun shekel sawmnga hi ding hi.
Numei ahihleh shekel sawmthum hi ding hi.
Kum nga pan kum sawmnih ciang a phate, pasal ahihleh shekel sawmnih hi dinga, numei ahihleh shekel sawm hi ding hi.
Kha khat pan kum nga ciang a phate pen pasal ahihleh ngun shekel nga hi dinga, numei ahihleh ngun shekel thum hi ding hi.
Kum sawmguk pan a tungsiahte pen pasal ahihleh shekel sawm le nga hi dinga, numei ahihleh shekel sawm hi ding hi.

“Mi khatpeuh zawnglua-in nangma sehzah a piak zawh kei leh, siampipa kiangah a mi hong kipaipih dinga, siampipa in ama man seh ding hi. A kiciam mipa a siamna tawh kizui-in siampipa in ama man seh ding hi.
“Mite in Topa’ tungah biakna-in a piakte pen ganhing ahihleh, mi khatpeuh in Topa’ tungah a piak tua bang ganhingte khempeuh a siangtho ahi hi.

Amah in na khat peuhpeuh, a hoihte a hoih lo tawh ahi zongin, a hoih lote a hoih tawh ahi zongin, laih lo, khek lo ding hi. Amah in ganhing khat ganhing adang khat tawh a khek leh, tua ganhing le a khekna ganhing a siangtho hi khawm ding hi.
Tua pen Topa’ tungah a kipia thei lo ganhing nin khat ahihleh, mipa in siampipa mai-ah a ganhing paipih dinga,
siampipa in hoih hi, ci-in ahi zongin sia hi, ci-in ahi zongin a man zah seh ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tua ganhing a tatkik nop leh, a kisehna banah nga-ah khat behlap ding hi.
“Mi khatpeuh in a siangtho dingin Topa’ tungah a inn a ap ciangin, siampipa in a hoihna le a hoih lohna tawh kizui-in a man seh dinga, siampipa’ sehna bangin kip ding hi.
A ap pa in ama inn a tatkik nop leh, a kisehna banah nga-ah khat sum tawh behlap dinga, tua inn ama a’ hikik ding hi.

“Mi khat in a luah ama leitang phelkhat Topa’ tungah a ap leh, nangma sehna pen khaici vawh zah ding tawh kizui ding hi. Mangbuhham beem khat dim a pawina leitang pen ngun shekel sawmnga-in kiseh ding hi.
Amah in jubilee kum a kipanin a lo a ap leh, nangma sehna zahzah bit ding hi.
Ahih hangin jubilee kum khit ciangin amah in a lo a ap leh, siampipa in jubilee kumkik dong a omlai kumte tawh kizui-in a manzah sum seh dinga, nangma sehna zah panin kikhiam ding hi.
Lo a ap pa in a tatkik nop leh, a kisehna banah nga-ah khat sum tawh behlap dinga, tua lo ama a’ hisuak ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in a lo a tanh nuam lo ahi a, amah in midang khat tungah a zuak ahi zongin ahihleh, tua pen amah in tanhkik thei nawn lo ding hi.
A lo pen, jubilee huna piak khiat ciangin, a ki-apsa lo mah bangin Topa’ tungah a siangtho hi dinga, siampipa in tua lo tang ding hi.
“Amah in luahna tawh a neih ahi lo, a leisa lo pen Topa’ tungah a ap leh,
siampipa in jubilee kum ciang dong ding tua man seh dinga, tua ni-in a mipa in a kiseh zah, Topa’ tungah a siangtho-in pia ding hi.
Jubilee kum ciangin a lo pen a kileinapa, gamhluahna tawh tua leitang a nei mipa tungah tungkik ding hi.
“A kisehna peuhmah biakinn shekel kizang ding hi; gerah sawmnih ciangin shekel khat hi ding hi.
“Ahih hangin tacil pen Topa a’ hi khinzo ahih mah bangin, kuamah in ganhing tacilte ap thei lo ding hi; bawng hitaleh tuu hitaleh Topa-a’ ahi hi.
Ganhing nin ahihleh, nangma sehna bangin amah in leikikin, tua banah seh nga-ah khat behlap ding hi. Tua hi lo a, a kitat kei leh, a kisehna bangin kizuak ding hi.

“Ahih hangin mi khat in a neih, Topa’ tungah a ap, a ki-apsa nate, mi hitaleh ganhing hitaleh, a luah ama lo hitaleh, kizuak lo ding, kitanh lo ding hi. A ki-ap na peuhmah Topa’ tungah a siangtho pen ahi hi.
Mite lak nangawn panin a kisusia mang dingin a ki-apsa mi peuhmah, kitanh lo dinga, kithat ding hi.
“Leitang panin a piang khempeuh khaici hitaleh singgah hitaleh sawm-ah-khat Topa a’ hi a, Topa adingin siangtho hi.
Mi khatpeuh in sawm-ah-khat a piak na khat peuhpeuh a tat nop leh, amah in tua banah nga-ah khat behlap ding hi.
Bawnghon leh tuulekeel hon sawm-ah-khat khempeuh le a cing pa’ ciangkhut nuai-a a pai ganhing khempeuh sawm-ah-khat peuhmah Topa adingin a siangtho hi ding hi.
Mi khat in pha hiam sia hiam ci-in kantel lo dinga, khek lo ding hi. A khek leh, tua leh a khekna pen a siangtho hi khawm ding hi. Tua pen kitanh lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte pen Sinai Mual tungah Topa in Israel mite adingin Moses tungah a piak thute ahi hi.
Amaute, Egypt gam panin a pai khiat zawh uh a kum nihna, a kha nihna a ni masa ni-in, Sinai sehnel gam kikhopna puanbuk sungah Topa in Moses hopihin hih bangin ci hi:
“Nang le Aaron in Israel mihonte khempeuh a innkuankuan, a behbehin, pasal peuhmah a milipin a phazah sim un.
Israel sungah kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a pha, galdo dingin a kuan thei ding mi khempeuh a honhonin na sim ding uh hi.
A minam simin a beh sungah a lutang ahi mi khat ciat in hong huh ding uh hi.
No hong huh dingte’ min: Reuben sung panin Shedeur’ tapa Elizur;
Simeon sung panin Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel;
Judah sung panin Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon;
Issakhar sung panin Zuar’ tapa Nethanel;
Zebulun sung panin Helon’ tapa Eliab;
Josef tapate, Efraim sung panin Ammihud’ tapa Elishama le Manasseh sung panin Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel;
Benjamin sung panin Gideoni’ tapa Abidan;
Dan sung panin Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer;
Asher sung panin Okran’ tapa Pagiel;
Gad sung panin Deuel’ tapa Eliasaf;
Naftali sung panin Enan’ tapa Ahira ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte pen mihon sung panin a kiteel, amau’ phung sung panin a makaite, Israel behte’ lutangte ahi uh hi.

Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Moses le Aaron in a min kilosa hih mite khawmin, a kha nihna a ni masa ni-in amaute in kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a pha peuhmah a milipin a innkuankuan, a behbehin amau le amau a kiciamteh mihon buppite khawm uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Sinai sehnel gamah amaute a phazah a sim hi.

Kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a pha pasal peuhmah, a milipin, a innkuankuan, a behbehin, galdo dingin a kuan thei khempeuh, Israel’ tacil Reuben suanlekhakte a kipanin a mi phazah a sim uh a nuai-a bang ahi hi: Reuben minam tul sawmli le tulguk le zanga a pha hi. Simeon minam tul sawmnga le tulkua le zathum a pha hi. Gad minam tul sawmli le tulnga le zaguk le sawmnga a pha hi. Judah minam tul sawmsagih le tulli le zaguk a pha hi. Issakhar minam tul sawmnga le tulli le zali a pha hi. Zebulun minam tul sawmnga le tulsagih le zali a pha hi. Efraim minam tul sawmli le zanga a pha hi. Manasseh minam tul sawmthum le tulnih le zanih a pha hi. Benjamin minam tul sawmthum le tulnga le zali a pha hi. Dan minam tul sawmguk le tulnih le zasagih a pha hi. Asher minam tul sawmli le tulkhat le zanga a pha hi. Naftali minam tul sawmnga le tulthum le zali a pha hi Tua ahih ciangin Israel mi a vekpi, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah, a beh behin, Israel sung pan galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah: A vekpi-in tul zaguk le tulthum le zanga le sawmnga a pha hi Biakbuk lamah Levi mite Kiseh
Ahih hangin Levi mite in amau’ nam min mah a tuamin pua uh ahih manin adangte tawh kisimkhawm lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Levi minamte na sim kei dinga, Israel mite lakah amaute na simkhawm kei ding hi.

Ahih hangin Levi mite pen thuciamna biakbuk le a sung nazat khempeuh le tua tawh a kisai na khempeuh a uk dingin seh in. Amaute pen biakbuk le a nazat khempeuh a pua dingte hi a, amaute in a biakbuk semin, a kimkotah phual sat ding uh hi.
Biakbuk a kikhin ding ciangin Levi mite in phel ding uh a, biakbuk a kilam ding ciangin Levi mite mah in lam ding uh hi. Midang khat peuhpeuh in tua nasep a sep leh tua mi kithat ding hi.
Israel mite in a milipun amau’ giahphual ciat le a dialkhai gei ciat uhah a pawlpawlin a puanbuk uh lam ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mihonte tungah hehna a om loh nadingin thuciamna biakbuk kiimah Levi mite bek in phual sat ding uh a, Levi mite bek in thuciamna biakbuk kem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Israel mite gamta uh a, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin amaute in a sem uh hi.
Giahphualte le Minam Makaite Topa in Moses le Aaron kiangah hih bangin gen hi:
Israel mite in amau’ dialkhai gei ciatah a beh dialkhaite tawh phual sat ding uh a, amaute in a pang simah kikhopna buk mai ngatin phual sat ding uh hi.

Nisuahna lampangah phual a sat dingte pen Judah’ giahphual dialkhai a neite hi dinga, a makaite le a mi phazah a nuai-a bang ahi hi: Judah mite a makai pa pen Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmsagih le tulli le zaguk a pha hi. Issakhar mite a makai pa pen Zuar’ tapa Nethanel hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmnga le tulli le zali a pha hi. Zebulun mite a makai pa pen Helon’ tapa Eliab hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmnga le tulsagih le zali a pha hi Judah’ phualah a pawlpawlin a omte a vekpi-in tul za le tul sawmgiat le tulguk le zali a pha hi. A kipaikhiat ciangin amau masa ding uh hi.

A leitaw lampangah a pawlpawlin Reuben’ giahphual dialkhai a neite hi dinga, a makaite le a mi phazah a nuai-a bang ahi hi. Reuben mite a makai pa pen Shedeur’ tapa Elizur hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmli le tulguk le zanga a pha hi. Simeon mite a makai pa pen Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmnga le tulkua le zathum a pha hi. Gad mite a makai pa pen Reuel’ tapa Eliasaf hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmli le tulnga le zaguk le sawmnga a pha hi. Reuben’ giahphual ah a pawlpawlin a omte a vekpi-in tul za le tul sawmnga le tulkhat le zali le sawmnga a pha hi. Amaute a nihna-ah pai khia ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin kikhopna buk pen, giahphualte’ laizangah a om Levi mite’ phual tawh kikhin khawm dinga, a phual sat hun mah bangun amau’ san ciatah a dialkhai uh tawh pai khia ding uh hi.

A nitumna lampangah a pawlpawlin Efraim giahphual dialkhai a neite hi dinga, a makaite le a mi phazah a nuai-a bang ahi hi. Efraim mite a makai pa pen Ammihud’ tapa Elishama hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmli le zanga a pha hi. Manasseh mite a makai pa pen Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmthum le tulnih le zanih a pha hi. Benjamin mite a makai pa pen Gideoni’ tapa Abidan hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmthum le tulnga le zali a pha hi Efraim giahphual ah a pawlpawlin a omte a vekpi-in tul za le tulgiat le zakhat a pha hi. Amaute a thumna-ah pai khia ding uh hi.

A leilu lampangah a pawlpawlin Dan giahphual dialkhai a neite hi dinga, a makaite le a mi phazah a nuai-a bang ahi hi. Dan mite a makai pa pen Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmguk le tulnih le zasagih a pha hi. Asher mite a makai pa pen Okran’ tapa Pagiel hi a, ama pawl tul sawmli le tulkhat le zanga a pha hi. Naftali mite a makai pa pen Enan’ tapa Ahira hi a, ama pawl mi tul sawmnga le tulthum le zali a pha hi. Dan’ giahphual a om mi a vekpi-in tul za le tul sawmnga le tulsagih le zaguk a pha hi. Amaute a dialkhai tawh kizui-in a pai nunung ding uh ahi hi.
Hihte pen Israel mite a beh zui-a kisim hi a, a pawlpawlin giahphual ah a om mi a vekpi-in tul zaguk le tulthum le zanga le sawmnga a pha hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite lakah Levi mite kisimkhawm lo hi.
Tua bangin Israel mite gamta uh hi. Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin a beh tawh kizui-in a innkuankuanin amau’ dialkhaite’ gei-ah giahphual sat uh a, tua bangmahin pai khia uh hi.
Hihte pen Sinai Mual tungah Topa in Moses tawh a thugen hun lai-a Aaron le Moses’ huna mite ahi hi.
Aaron’ tapate’ minte in: A ta upa Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar hi a,
sathau a kinilh siampi, siampi za-ah na a sem dingin a kikipsak, Aaron’ tapate’ minte ahi hi.

Ahih hangin Sinai sehnel gam Topa’ mai-ah mei siangtho lo a zat uh ciangin Topa’ mai-ah Nadab le Abihu si hi. Amaute in ta nei lo uh ahih ciangin Eleazar le Ithamar in a pa uh Aaron’ nuntak sungteng bek siampi na a sem uh ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Levi minamte va paipih inla, amaute in siampi Aaron’ na a sep theih nadingun a mai-ah va koih in.
Amaute in biakbuk-ah a sep uh ciangin amah le mihonpi adingin kikhopna buk mai-ah na sem ding uh hi.
Amaute in kikhopna buk sung nazat khempeuh vaan ding uh a, biakbuk-ah a sep uh ciangin Israel mite adingin na sem ding uh hi.
Nangmah in Aaron le a tapate’ tungah Levi mite na pia dinga, amaute pen Israel mite lak panin keima tungah a kipiate hi ding uh hi.
Nangmah in Aaron le a tapate na seh dinga, amaute in a siampi nasep uh don ding uh hi. Ahih hangin midang khatpeuh in siampi nasep a sep leh, tua mi kithat ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“En in, Israel mite lakah tacil khempeuh tang dingin Levi mite ka la khin hi. Levi mite pen keima a’ hi ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh tacil khempeuh keima-a’ ahi hi. Egypt gam sungah tacil khempeuh ka thah ni-in, Israel sungah tacil khempeuh, mihing tacil le ganhing tacil khempeuh, keima adingin ka ap a, amaute pen keima a’ hi ding hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Sinai sehnel gam Moses kiangah,
“Levi mite, a behbeh, a innkuankuanin, pasal kha khat a pha panin a tungsiah peuhmah na sim ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses thu a kipiak bangin amah in Topa’ thupiakna tawh kizui-in amaute a sim hi.
Levi’ tapate’ min in: Gershon, Kohath le Merari ahi hi.
Gershon’ tapate’ min in: Libni le Shimei ahi hi.
Kohath’ tapate’ min in: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel ahi hi.
Merari’ tapate’ min in: Mahli le Mushi ahi hi. Hih mite pen Levi mite beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Gershon-te beh pen Libni mite le Shimei mite hi a, hihte pen Gershon-te beh ahi uh hi.
Amaute, kha khat pan a tungsiah a pha pasal peuhmah tulsagih le zanga ahi hi.
Gershon-te beh in nitumna lam biakbuk nungah giahphual sat ding uh a,
tua Gershon mite sung pan a beh ukpi pen Lael’ tapa Eliasaf hi ding hi.
Gershon-te beh in kikhopna buk sungah a et dingte pen a biakbuk, puanbuk a tuamna tawh, kikhopna buk kongkhak puankhai,
buktual a puan kikhaite, biakbuk kiima om buktual a kongkhak puankhai le biakna tau le a khaute le hihte tawh a kizom nasep khempeuh ahi hi.
Kohath-te beh pen Amram mite, Izhar mite, Hebron mite le Uzziel mite hi a, hihte pen Kohath-te beh ahi hi.
Pasal khempeuh kha khat pan a tungsiah, biakbuk nasep a sem peuhmah tulgiat le zaguk ahi hi.
Kohath-te beh in biakbuk leitaw lampangah giahphual sat ding uh a,
Kohath mite sung pan a beh ukpi pen Uzziel’ tapa Elizafan hi ding hi.
Amau’ et dingte pen thuciamna singkuang, a sabuai, a meivakkhuam, a biakna taute, siampite in nasepna-in a zat uh biakbuk nazatte’ kidalna puan le hihte tawh a kizom nasep khempeuh ahi hi.
Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar pen Levi mi makaite tungah a ukpi hi dinga, biakbuk a en mite’ nasepna vil ding hi.
Merari-te beh pen Mahli mite le Mushi mite hi a, hihte pen Merari-te beh ahi hi.
Amaute kha khat panin a tungsiah pasal peuhmah tulguk le zanih ahi hi.
Merari-te beh sung pan a beh ukpi pen Abihail’ tapa Zuriel hi dinga, amaute pen biakbuk leilu lampangah giahphual a sat dingte ahi uh hi.
Merari-te beh’ et dinga a kisehte pen biakbuk khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite, khuam bullente, a nengneng teng le hihte tawh a kizom nasep khempeuh ahi hi.
Buktual kimkota khuampite le a bullente tawh, khetphimte le a khaute zong ahi hi.

Nisuahna lampang biakbuk mai, kikhopna buk mai-ah giahphual a sat ding mite pen Israel mite adingin bang khat peuhpeuh sep nadingin biakbuk sungah thu a nei Moses le Aaron le a tapate hi a, midang khatpeuh in biakbuk sungah na a sep leh kithat ding hi.
Moses le Aaron in Topa’ thupiakna tawh a innkuankuanun a sim Levi mi pasal kha khat panin a tungsiah peuhmah tul sawmnih le tulnih a pha hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Israel mite sung pan pasal tacil khempeuh sim inla, kha khat panin a tungsiah peuhmah a min la in.
Israel mite lak panin tacil khempeuh tang dingin Levi mite nong laksak dinga, Israel mite’ ganhing tacil khempeuh tang dingin Levi mite’ ganhing nong laksak ding hi - kei pen Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Topa’ thupiak bangin Israel mite lakah tacil khempeuh a sim hi.
Kha khat panin a tungsiah tacil pasal a kisim peuhmah tul sawmnih le tulnih le zanih le sawmsagih le thum ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite lakah tacil khempeuh le a ganhingte uh tang dingin Levi mite le a ganhingte uh la in. Levi mite keima a’ hi ding hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
Levi mi pasal khempeuh sangin Israel mi tacil khempeuh zanih le sawmsagih le thumin tam zaw ahih manin,
tuate tat nadingin shekel khatah gerah sawmnih a pha, biakinn shekel zangin mi khat ciangin shekel nga pai la inla,
tua a tam zaw teng a kitatna uh sumte Aaron le a tapate tungah pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Levi mite banah a vallai mite tung panin kitatkhiatna sum la a,
biakinn shekel zangin Israel mi tacilte tung panin sum shekel tulkhat le zathum le sawmguk le nga a la hi.
Tua ciangin, Topa in Moses a thupiak mah bangin Topa’ thu tawh kizui-in kitatkhiatna sumte Aaron le a tapate tungah Moses in a pia hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Levi mite lak panin Kohath mite amau’ innkuankuan le a behbehin,
kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha mi khempeuh sim in.
Kikhopna buk sungah Kohath mite in a siangtho pen nate tawh kisai nasepte sem ding uh hi.
“Giahphual a kisuan ding ciangin Aaron le a tapate tumin kidalna puan la khia ding uh a, tua puan tawh thuciamna singkuang tun ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in savun tawh tuam ding uh a, tua tungah puan a dum tawh khuhin, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.

“Ompihna Anlum sabuai tungah amaute in puan a dum phah ding uh a, tua tungah a kuangdaite, paknamtui pakante, kuang-ukte le tuibuahna thawl gongbakte koih ding uh a, a kikoih tawntung anlum zong a tungah om ding hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a ausan puan tawh tuate khuh ding uh a, savun tawh khuh thuahin, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.
“Mei vakna meikhuam pen, a meivakte, a taitehte, a kuangte le sathau piakna nazatte khempeuh tawh puan a dum khatin tun ding uh hi.
Amaute in a nazat khempeuh savun-in tunin a puak nading tal tungah koih ding uh hi.
“Puan a dum khat tawh kham biakna tau khuh ding uh a, savun tawh tua mah tuam thuahin, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.
Amaute in biakbuk sungah a kizang nazat khempeuh la-in puan dum khat tawh tunin, savun tawh tuate tun thuah ding uh a, a puak nading tal tungah koih ding uh hi.
Amaute in a biakna tau panin a vutte luak khia ding uh a, a tungah puan a dupsan khat phah ding uh hi.

Tua lai-ah nasep nadinga a kizang, biakna tau nazat khempeuh, a vutluahna peek, a tu-ka, a kawbia le a kuang, biakna tau nazat khempeuh, a tungah koihin, tua tungah savun tawh tuam ding uh a, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.

Aaron le a tapate in biakbuk le biakbuk nazat khempeuh a tun khit uh giahphual a kisuan ciangin, tuate a pua dingin Kohath mite hong pai ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute in a siangtho nate lawngkha lo ding uh hi; lawng le-uh si ding uh hi. Hihte pen Kohath mite’ puak ding kikhopna buk nate ahi hi.
“Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar in meivak tui, a namtui paknamtui, a kikoih tawntung an tawh biakna, nilh sathau le biakbuk le a sunga om khempeuh le a nazat khempeuh uk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses le Aaron kiangah,
“Levi mite lakah Kohath minamte a sih loh nadingin hih un.
A siangtho pen nate nai-ah amaute a pai ciangun si loin a hin nadingun hih un. Aaron le a tapate pai-in a nasep ding uh le a van puak ding ciat uhah amaute seh ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin a siangtho nate tomkhano sung bek nangawn a en dingin amaute tum lo ding uh hi; tum le-uh si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Gershon mite zong, amau’ innkuankuan le a behbehin sim in.
Kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha mi khempeuh na sim ding hi.
Nasep le van puak ciangin Gershon-te beh’ nasep dingte:
Biakbuk dalna puante, kikhopna buk a tuamna tawh, a tungzang a om a khuhna tuuvun, kikhopna buk kongkhak-a puankhai,

buktual a puan kikhaite, biakbuk le biakna tau kimkotah a om buktual kongpi puankhaite, a khaute le amau’ nasep nadinga nazat khempeuh pua ding uh a, amaute in tuate tawh a kizom nasep kisam khempeuh sem ding uh hi.
Gershon beh pasalte’ nasep ding, a puak ding le a hih dingte khempeuh uh Aaron le a tapate’ thupiakna bang hi dinga, a puak ding khempeuh uh amaute na ap ding uh hi.
Hih pen kikhopna buk sungah Gershon beh pasalte’ nasep hi a, amau’ nasepna pen siampi Aaron’ tapa Ithamar’ ukna nuai hi ding hi.
“Merari mite zong amau’ innkuankuan le a behbehin,
kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha mi khempeuh na sim ding hi.
Kikhopna buk sungah amau’ sep dingte in: Biakbuk khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite, khuam bullente tawh,
a kimkota om buktual a khuampite a bullente tawh, khetphimte, a khaute, a nazatte khempeuh le a nengnengte hi a, amaute’ puak dingin a kiseh nate a minin na lo ding hi.
Hih pen siampi Aaron’ tapa Ithamar’ khutnuai-ah Merari mite in kikhopna buk sungah a sep ding teng uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Topa’ thupiakna bangin Moses le Aaron le mihonte’ makaite in Levi mite sung panin beh thumte - Kohath-te beh, Gershon-te beh le Merari-te beh sunga om pasal mi phazah sim uh hi. Kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha a behbehin a nuai-a bang ahi hi: Kohath mi pasal a behtangun tulnih le zasagih le sawmnga a pha hi. Gershon mi pasal a behtangun tulnih le zaguk le sawmthum a pha hi. Merari mi pasal a behtangun tulthum le zanih ahi hi. Moses le Aaron le Israel makaite in a sim, Levi mi a kisim peuhmah, van puak nasep le kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha, a vekpi-in tulgiat le zanga le sawmgiat a pha hi.
Moses’ tungtawnin Topa’ thupiakna bangin a sep ding a puak ding ciat uh kiseh a, Topa’ thupiak bangin Moses in amaute a sim hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Amaute in miphakte, ninneite le misi tawh kisukha-in a ninte khempeuh giahphual pua-ah a omsak nadingun Israel mite thu pia in.
A laizangah keima omna ahi amau’ giahphual a nitsak loh nadingun hih bangin a nin numei le pasal pai khiasakin, giahphual pua-ah na omsak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin Israel mite in hih uh a, giahphual pua-ah amaute hawl khia uh hi. Topa in Moses tungah a gen bangin Israel mite in hih uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Topa’ tungah mite a khialh theihna ahi khialhna khat peuhpeuh, numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin gamta-in a mawh leh,
a gamtatnasa a khialhna pulak ding hi. Amah in a tatkhialhna-ah a kicingin dinkik dinga, tua tungah nga-ah khat behlapin, a khialhna mi tungah pia ding hi.

Ahih hangin a khialhna mi in tua khialhna hanga ditkikna a sang ding tanau a neih kei leh, a khial mi adingin kilemna a bawlsakna ahi kilemna tuutal banah, khialhna hanga tua ditkikna pen siampipa adingin Topa’ tungah tung ding hi.
Amaute in siampipa tungah a paipih uh biakna peuhmah, Israel mite’ na a siangthote khempeuh, ama a’ hi ding hi.
Mi khempeuh’ na a siangthote zong ama a’ hi dinga, mi khatpeuh in siampipa tungah a piak peuhmah ama a’ hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen in: Mi khatpeuh’ zi vakvai-in a pasal a palhngulh a,
pasal khat in tua nu luppihin, a pasal in tua thu a theih kei a, tua nu kininsak napi-in kuamah in phawk loin, a khialh laitakin tua nu kiman lo ahih manin a langah a pang ding teci a om loh hangin,
a pasal in upmawhna lungsim nei-in, a kininsak tawm a zi a upmawh leh; tua ahih kei leh zong, a numei kininsak lo napi-in, a pasal in upmawhna lungsim nei-in, a zi a upmawh leh;

tua pa in siampipa kiangah a zi paipihin, tuanu adingin a kisam biakna, mangbuhham lawh khat paipih ding hi. A tungah sathau sung loin, paknamtui zong koih lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen upmawhna hanga an tawh biakna, mawhna phawkkik nadinga an tawh biakna ahi hi.
“Siampipa in tua nu va paipihin, Topa’ mai-ah koih ding hi.
Siampipa in leibeel khatin tui siangtho la dinga, biakbuk sual tunga om leivui tawmkhat la-in tua tui sungah khah ding hi.

Siampipa in Topa’ mai-ah tua numei koih dinga, numei’ sam phelin, upmawhna hanga an tawh biakna ahi phawkkikna an tawh biakna tua numei tawisak ding hi. Siampipa in ama khut sungah tuisia tawi ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in amah kiciamsakin, ‘Na pasal’ ukna nuai-ah na om sungin, kuamah in nang hong luppih loin, nitna lamah a kihel lo na hih leh, hih tuisia panin suakta in.
Ahih hangin na pasal’ ukna nuai-ah om napi-in nangmah vakvai a, nang le nang kininsakin, na pasal ahi lo midang khat in nang hong luppih leh,
(siampipa in tua numei kiciamsak dinga, tua nu kiangah) Topa in na pheipi teemsakin na pumpi a pawmsak ciangin, na mite lakah hamsia le kiciamna-a zat dingin Topa in nang hong bawlin,
hih tuisia in na gil sung zui henla, na pumpi pawmsakin na pheipi teemsak hen,’ ci ding hi. Tua ciangin numei in, ‘Amen, Amen,’ ci ding hi.
“Tua ciangin siampipa in laibu khat sungah hih hamsiate gelhin tuisia sungah sil khia ding hi.
Tua numei a nasak velval thei ding tuisia a dawnsak
siampipa in numei’ khut sung panin upmawhna hanga an tawh biakna la khia dinga, Topa’ mai-ah tua an vei-in biakna tau-ah paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in phawk nadingin an tawh biakna khut dim khat la-in biakna tau tungah hal dinga, tua khit ciangin a tui pen a numei dawnsak ding hi.

Amah in a tui a dawnsak khit ciangin, tua nu a mahmah kininsakin a pasal tungah thuman loin gamta ahihleh, tua tuisia pen ama sungah tumin nasak velval dinga, a pumpi pawmin a pheipi teem dinga, tua numei pen mite lakah hamsiatna-in kizang ding hi.
Ahih hangin a mahmah a kininsak hi loin a siang ahihleh, tua nu suakta-in ta nei thei ding hi.
“Zi khat, a pasal’ ukna nuai-ah om napi-in vakvai-in a mahmah a kinitsak ciang,

ahih kei leh pasal khat in upmawhna lungsim nei-in a zi a upmawh ciangin, upmawhna thute-ah zat ding ngeina tu-a bang ahi hi. Siampipa in Topa’ mai-ah numei koih dinga, hih ngeina khempeuh numei’ tungah zang ding hi.
Hih thu-ah pasal in mawhsakna thuak lo dinga, ahih hangin numei a mawh leh ama mawhna thuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin, Topa adingin a mahmah a kituam koih nadingin Nazir kiciamna ahi, a tuam mahmah kiciamna a bawl ciangin,
leenggahzu le khamtheihzu ne lo ding hi. Leenggahzu le khamtheihzu pan a kibawl tuithuk dawn lo dinga, leenggahtui khat peuhpeuh dawn loin, leenggah a hing hitaleh a keu hitaleh ne lo ding hi.
Amah a kituam koih hun sungteng leenggui panin a piang bangmah ne lo dinga, a tang ahi a, a hawng nangawn ahi zongin ne lo ding hi.
“Tuam om dingin a kiciam hun sungteng ama lu tungah mulkiatna kitah lo ding hi. Topa adingin a tuam om hun a cin mateng amah a siangtho hi dinga, a sam a sau-in hawi ding hi.
Topa adingin a tuam om hun sungteng mi siluang kiangah pai lo ding hi.
A nu, a pa, a sanggamnu, a sanggampa ahi zongin a sih leh tuate khat peuhpeuh hangin amah kininsak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian adingin a tuam omna ama lu tungah om hi.
A tuam om hun sungteng Topa adingin a siangtho ahi hi.
“Mi khatpeuh ama gei-ah thakhatin si-in, amah in a ki-ap ama sam a nitsak leh, ni sagih sung ngakin tua ciangin kisiansuahin a sam met ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in amah in siampipa kiang kikhopna bukkongah vakhu nih ahih kei leh kawl vakhuno nih paipih dinga,

siampipa in khialhna hanga biak nadingin khat pia-in, meihal biak nadingin a khat pia dinga, ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh misi luang hangin amah khial hi. Amah in tua ni mahin a lutang apphakik dinga,

a tuam om ding hun sungteng Topa adingin amah tuam omin, mawhna hanga biak nadingin kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat paipih ding hi. Ahih hangin ama tuam omna kininsak khin ahih manin a masa hun pen a mawkna hi ding hi.
“A tuam om hun a cin ciangin zuih ding Nazir ngeinate: Kikhopna buk kongah amah kipaipih dinga,

amah in Topa’ tungah letsong ahi meihal biak nadingin kum khat a pha a sitbaang lo tuuno a pa khat, khialhna hanga biak nadingin kum khat a pha a sitbaang lo tuuno a nu khat le thunuama biak nadingin a sitbaang lo tuutal khat,
le silngo sawh loh anlum lawh khat, sathau tawh a kibawl annel mohte le silngo sawh loh, sathau tawh a kizut mohphengte le an tawh biaknate le leenggahzu tawh biaknate paipih ding hi.
“Siampipa in Topa’ mai-ah tuate paipihin a khialhna hanga biakna le a meihal biakna pia dinga,
a tuutal pen Topa’ tungah thunuama biakna-in silngo sawh loh anlum lawh tawh piakhawm dinga, an tawh a biakna le leenggahzu tawh biakna zong siampipa in pia ding hi.
Tua Nazir mipa in a ki-ap a sam, kikhopna bukkongah met dinga, a ki-ap ama lutang panin a samte la-in thunuama biakpiakna nuai-ah a om mei sungah hal ding hi.

“Siampipa in a kihuansa tuutal liang le lawh sung panin silngo sawh loh moh khat le silngo sawh loh mohpheng khat la-in, a ki-ap hun sunga a sam a met khit ciangin tua Nazir mipa’ khutah tuate koih dinga,

Topa’ mai-ah vei-a biak nadingin siampipa in tuate vei ding hi. Tuate pen a kivei a sa-iik le a kipia a phei tawh siampipa adingin a siangtho ama tanh ahi hi. Tua khit ciangin Nazir mipa in leenggahzu ne thei ding hi.

“Hih pen kiciamna a la Nazir mipa adingin ngeina ahi hi. Ama piak zawh zahzah a piak banah, Topa’ tungah ama piakna pen Nazir hihna tawh a kiciamna bang hi dinga, ama kiciamna mah bangin amah in Nazir hihna tawh tuam om nading ngeina zui-in a gamta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron le a tapate tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in hih bangin Israel mite thupha na pia ding uh hi. Amaute tungah hih bangin na ci ding uh hi:
Topa in note thupha hong pia-in hong kem tahen.
Topa in note tungah a maitang hong taangsakin note hong ompih tahen.
Topa in note tungah a maipha hong pia henla, note tungah nopsakna hong pia tahen,’ ci-in thupha pia uh hen.
“Amaute in tua bangin Israel mite tungah keima min lo ding uh a, keimah in amaute thupha ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in biakbuk dingsakin, tua biakbuk le a nazatte khempeuh sathau nuhin ap a, biakna tau le a nazatte khempeuh sathau nuhin a ap a man ni-in,
Israel makaite, a beh ukpite, minam makaite ahi a kisim mite a ukte in,
buk a nei leeng guk le bawngtal sawm le nih Topa’ mai-ah paipih uh a, leeng khatah makai nih, mi khatah bawngtal khat ciatin sehin a biakna uh pia uh hi. Amaute in biakbuk mai-ah tuate pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Kikhopna buk nasepna-ah zat dingin amau’ tung panin tuate sang inla, a nasep ciat uh tawh kizui-in Levi mite pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in leengte le bawngtalte saangin Levi mite a pia hi.
Amau’ nasep tawh kizui-in Gershon mite tungah leeng nih le bawngtal li pia hi.
Siampi Aaron’ tapa Ithamar’ ukna nuai-ah na a sem Merari mite tungah amau’ nasep tawh kizui-in leeng li le bawngtal giat pia hi.
Ahih hangin Kohath mite tungah bangmah pia lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh liangko-ah a puak ding uh a siangtho nate kep ding amaute tavuan kipia hi.
Biakna tau sathau a kinuh ni-in a ap nadingin makaite in a biakna uh biakna tau mai-ah pia uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Biakna tau ap nadingin makai khat in ni khat ciat a biakna uh pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A ni masa ni-a biakna a piapa pen Judah minam, Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat,
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon’ piak ahi hi.
A ni nih ni-in Issakhar mite a makai, Zuar’ tapa Nethanel in biakna pia hi.

A biak nadingin amah in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Zuar’ tapa Nethanel’ piak ahi hi.
A ni thum ni-in Zebulun mite a makai, Helon’ tapa Eliab ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Helon’ tapa Eliab’ piak ahi hi.
A ni li ni-in Reuben mite a makai, Shedeur’ tapa Elizur ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Shedeur’ tapa Elizur’ piak ahi hi.
A ni nga ni-in Simeon mite a makai, Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel’ piak ahi hi.
A ni guk ni-in Gad mite a makai, Deuel’ tapa Eliasaf ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Deuel’ tapa Eliasaf’ piak ahi hi.
A ni sagih ni-in Efraim mite a makai, Ammihud’ tapa Elishama ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Ammihud’ tapa Elishama’ piak ahi hi.
A ni giat ni-in Manasseh mite a makai, Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel’ piak ahi hi.
A ni kua ni-in Benjamin mite a makai, Gideoni’ tapa Abidan ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Gideoni’ tapa Abidan’ piak ahi hi.
A ni sawm ni-in Dan mite a makai, Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer’ piak ahi hi.
A ni sawm le khat ni-in Asher mite a makai, Okran’ tapa Pagiel ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Okran’ tapa Pagiel’ piak ahi hi.
A ni sawm le nih ni-in Naftali mite a makai, Enan’ tapa Ahira ahi hi.
Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat,
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
le thunuama biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Enan’ tapa Ahira’ piak ahi hi.
Biakna tau sathau a kinuh ni-in a piakte: Ngun kuangdai sawm le nih, ngun kuang sawm le nih,
ngun kuangdai khat ciangin shekel za le sawmthum gikin ngun kuang khat ciangin shekel sawmsagih gik a, ngun kuangte khempeuh pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel tulnih le zali gik hi.
Paknamtui tawh a kidim kham pakan sawm le nihte, biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in khat ciangin shekel sawm gik a, kham pakan khempeuh pen shekel za le sawmnih gik hi.
Meihal biak nadingin ganhing khempeuh pen bawngtal sawm le nih, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le nih, an-a biaknate tawh; le khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa sawm le nih,

le thunuama biakpiakna-in ganhing khempeuh bawngtal sawmnih le li, tuutal sawmguk, keel a pa sawmguk, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawmguk ahi hi. Hihte pen biakna tau sathau a kinuh khit ciangin apna biakna ahi hi.

Topa tawh a kiho dingin kikhopna buk sungah Moses a pai ciangin, kherub nihte’ kikal, thuciamna singkuang tungah a om hehpihna tokhom tung san teng panin amah a hopih awging khat om a, tua awging in Moses a hopih hi.
Tu-in Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron tungah hih bangin gen in. Meivakte na koih ciangin, meivak sagihte in meivak khuam mai teng a taan dingin koih in, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Aaron in tua bangmahin hih a, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin, meivak khuam mai teng a taan dingin meivakte a koih hi.
Meivakkhuam a kibawlna zia in: Kham a kiseek hi a, a bul pan a kipan a paakte dongin a kiseek ahi hi. Topa in Moses tungah a lahsa lim tawh kizui-in amah in meivakkhuam a bawl hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite lak panin Levi mi teng la khia inla, amaute siangsak in.

Amaute siansak nadingin hih bangin na hih ding hi: Siansuahna tui amaute tungah theh inla, a pumpi khempeuh uh mulkiatna tawh amau kiatsak inla, a puante uh sawpin amau mah na kisiang tawmsak ding hi.
Tua ciangin bawngtalno khat le sathau le annel a kibawl an tawh biakna amaute na lasak dinga, nangmah in khialhna hanga biak nadingin bawngtalno adang khat na la ding hi.
Kikhopna buk mai-ah Levi mite paipihin, Israel mihon buppi na khawm ding hi.
Topa’ mai-ah Levi mite na paipih ciangin, Israel mite in Levi mite tungah a khut uh nga ding uh a,
amaute in Topa’ na a sep theih nadingun Aaron in Israel mite sung panin Levi mite Topa’ mai-ah vei-a biakna-in a pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin Levi mite in bawngtalte’ lu tungah a khut uh nga ding uh hi. Levi mite ading kilemna bawlsak nadingin khialhna hanga biakna-in khat, meihal biakna-in a khat, Topa’ tungah na pia ding hi.
“Aaron le a tapate’ mai-ah Levi mite na koih dinga, Topa’ tungah amaute vei-a biakna-in na pia ding hi.
Tua bangin Israel mite lak panin Levi mite na khen khia dinga, Levi mite keima a’ hi ding uh hi.
Amaute siangthosakin vei-a biakna-in na piak khit ciangin kikhopna bukah na a sem dingin Levi mite pai ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite’ lak panin kei’ tungah amaute hong kipia khin hi. Israel mite’ tacil khempeuh tang dingin keima adingin amaute ka la khin hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite’ lakah tacil khempeuh mihing hitaleh ganhing hitaleh keima-a’ ahi hi.
Egypt gam sungah tacil khempeuh ka thah ni-in keima adingin amaute ka tuam koih a,
Israel mite’ lak panin tacil khempeuh tang dingin Levi mite ka la khin hi.

Kikhopna bukah Israel mite adingin na a sem ding le, biakbuk mai-ah Israel mite a paikhak ciangin Israel mite’ lakah gimna a tun loh nadingin Israel mite adingin kilemna a bawl dingin Israel mite’ lak panin Aaron le a tapate’ tungah letsongin Levi mite ka pia khin hi,” a ci hi.

Tua bangin Moses le Aaron le Israel mihonpite khempeuh in Levi mite’ tungah a hih uh hi. Topa in Levi mite tawh kisai-in Moses’ tungah a thupiak khempeuh tawh kizui-in Israel mite in amaute tungah a hih uh hi.

Israel mite, khialhna panin amaute kisiangthosak tawm uh a, a puante uh sawp uh hi. Aaron in vei-a biakna-in Topa’ mai-ah amaute pia a, amaute siansak nadingin Aaron in amau ading kilemna a bawlsak hi.
Tua khit ciangin Aaron le a tapate’ omna kikhopna buk sungah na a sem dingin Levi mite a pai uh hi. Topa in Levi mite tawh kisai-in Moses a thupiak bangin amaute in Levi mite’ tungah a hih uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Hih pen Levi mite tawh a kisai thu ahi hi. Kum sawmnih le kum nga pan a tungsiah a phate, kikhopna buk nasepna sungah na a sem dingin hong pai ding uh hi.
Kum sawmnga a phak uh a kipan nasepna panin amau kihem khia-in na sem nawn lo ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin kikhopna buk sungah a sanggamte uh huh dinga, amaute in a na taktak sem lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin Levi mite’ nasep ding na seh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute Egypt gam panin a pai khiat zawh uh a kum nihna a kha masa sungin Sinai sehnel gamah Topa in Moses kiangah,
“A kiseh hunin Paisan Pawi, Israel mite khamsak in.
A kiseh hun, tu kha ni sawm le li ni nitakin a thukhamte le a ngeina kip omte bangin na kham ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Paisan Pawi a kham nadingun Moses in Israel mite tungah a gen hi.
Amaute in a kha masa, a ni sawm le li ni nitakin Sinai sehnel gamah Paisan Pawi kham uh a, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite a gamta uh hi.
Misi luang a lawnna uh hangin a nin mi pawlkhat om uh a, tua ni-in amaute in Paisan Pawi kham thei lo uh ahih manin Moses le Aaron’ mai-ah pai uh hi.
Tua mite in, “Misi luang lawnna hangin ka nin uh hi. Ahi ta zongin bang hangin a kiseh hunin Israel midangte tawh Topa biakna hong kipiasak khawm lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Moses in amaute kiangah, “Note’ thu tawh kisai, Topa’ thupiak ka zak dong na ngak dih un,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note’ lakah mi khatpeuh ahi a, na suanlekhakte uh khatpeuh in ahi zongin misi luang lawnna hangin a nin ahi a, khualzinin gamlapi-ah a om ahi zongin, Topa adingin Paisan Pawi kham veve ding hi.
A kha nihna a ni sawm le li ni nitakin amaute in kham ding uh a, amaute in silngo sawh loh anlum le a kha meh tawh ne ding uh hi.
Amaute in a zingsang dong bangmah siit lo ding uh a, a guh khat zong sutan lo ding uh hi. Paisan Pawi ngeinate tawh kizui-in amaute in a kham ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin a siang mi khat khualzin lo napi-in Paisan Pawi a kham kei leh, amah in a kiseh hunin Topa biakna pia lo ahih manin a mite lak panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi. Tua mi in ama khialhna mah thuak ding hi.

“Note’ lakah khualmi khat hong peemin, Topa adingin Paisan Pawi a kham le Paisan Pawi thukhamte le a ngeina kipte bangin hih ding hi. Peemta le tualsung mite adingin ngeina a kibang na neikhawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Biakbuk a kidinsak ni-in meii in thuciamna biakbuk tuam a, nitak a kipan a zingsang dong meikuang tawh kibangin biakbuk tung sanah a om hi.
Tua bangin omden hi. Sunin meii in tuam a, zanin mei tawh a kibang khat in tuam hi.
Puanbuk tung san panin meii a kilaktoh khit ciangin Israel mite ding khia uh a, meii a kiphuhna munah Israel mite in giahphual a sat uh hi.
Topa in thu a piak ciangin Israel mite ding khia uh a, Topa in thu a piak ciangin amaute in giahphual a sat uh hi. Biakbuk tung sanah meii a khawl laiteng, amaute zong giahphual ah om uh hi.
Biakbuk tungah ni tampi sung meii a om khinta zongin Israel mite in Topa’ thupiakna zui-in ding khia tuan lo uh hi.
Biakbuk tungah ni tawmno sung bek meii om thei zel hi. Tua bang ciangin zong Topa’ thupiak bangin giahphual ah amaute tawmno sung mah omin, Topa’ thupiakna bangin amaute a ding khia uh hi.

Khat veivei nitak a kipan zingsang dong tua meii om hi. Zingsangin meii a kilaktoh ciangin amaute ding khia uh a, tua ahih kei leh, sun khat le zan khat a omlai le zong, meii a kilaktoh hunhunin amaute ding khia uh hi.

Ni nih ahi a, kha khat ahi a, a hun sau zaw ahi zongin biakbuk tung sanah meii a khawl laiteng giahphual ah Israel mite omin ding khia lo uh a, ahih hangin a kilaktoh peuh ciangin amaute ding khia uh hi.
Topa’ thupiakna tawh amaute in giahphual sat uh a, Topa’ thupiakna mah tawh amaute ding khia uh hi. Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin amaute in Topa’ thu a mang uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Ngun peengkul nih bawl in. Tuate na bawl ciangin na seek dinga, mihonte khop nading le giahphual nusiat nadingin na zang ding hi.
A nihin a kitum ciangin kikhopna bukkong nangma kiangah mihon khempeuh hong kikhawm ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin khat bek a kitum leh Israel minamte’ lutang ahi makaite nangma kiangah hong kikhawm ding uh hi.
Dinkhiat nading zaksakna na tum ciangin nisuahna lampang a giahphual-ate ding khia masa ding uh hi.
A nih veina na tum ciangin leitaw lampang a giahphual-ate ding khia ding hi. Amaute a dinkhiat ding peuhmah ciangun zaksakna kitum ding hi.
Mihonte a kikaihkhop ding ciangin na tum dinga, ahih hangin a gindan na kibangsak kei ding hi.
Aaron’ tapa siampite in peengkulte tum ding uh hi. Peengkul zatna pen na khang tawntungun note adingin a kip den ngeina khat hi ding hi.

Na gam sung uhah, no hong nengniam na galte uh tawh na kido ding uh ciangin, Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah note hong kiphawk nadingin peengkulte tawh pataukohna aw na gingsak ding uh a, na langte panun note hong kihon ding hi.

Na lungdam hun uh, a kiseh na pawi hunte uh le kha kipat hunte-in, note in na meihal biaknate uh le thunuama na biakpiaknate uhah zong peengkulte na tum ding uh hi. Tuate pen na Pasian uh mai-ah phawkna-in kimang ding hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
A kum nihna, a kha nihna, a ni sawmnih ni-in thuciamna biakbuk tung san panin meii kila khia to a,
Sinai sehnel gam panin Israel mite phual khat pan phual khatah ding khia uh a, Paran gamlakah meii a khawl hi.
Moses’ tungtawnin Topa’ thupiakna tawh khualzin cilna kipan uh hi.
Judah mite’ giahphual dialkhai a neite a pawlpawlin ding khia masa uh hi. Tua mihonte, Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon in uk hi.
Issakhar minam honte, Zuar’ tapa Nethanel in uk hi.
Zebulun minam honte, Helon’ tapa Eliab in uk hi.
Biakbuk a kiphel khit ciangin, biakbuk a pua Gershon mite le Merari mite ding khia uh hi.
A zomah Reuben’ giahphual dialkhai a neite a pawlpawlin ding khia uh hi. Tua mihonte, Shedeur’ tapa Elizur in uk hi.
Simeon minam honpite, Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel in uk hi.
Gad minam honpite, Deuel’ tapa Eliasaf in uk hi.
Tua ciangin a siangtho nate pua-in Kohath mite ding khia uh a, amaute a tun ma-in biakbuk na kidingsak khin hi.
A zomah Efraim mite’ giahphual dialkhai a neite a pawlpawlin ding khia uh hi. Tua mihonte, Ammihud’ tapa Elishama in uk hi.
Manasseh minam honte, Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel in uk hi.
Benjamin minam honte, Gideoni tapa Abidan in uk hi.
Tua ciangin adang khempeuh’ nungdalin Dan mite’ giahphual dialkhai a neite a pawlpawlin ding khia uh hi. Tua mihonte, Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer in uk hi.
Asher minam honte, Okran’ tapa Pagiel in uk hi.
Naftali minam honte, Enan’ tapa Ahira in uk hi.
Hih pen Israel mite a dinkhiat uh ciangin amau’ mihonte tawh kizui-in a paina zia uh ahi hi.

Moses in ama zi’ sanggampa ahi, Midian mi Reuel’ tapa Hobab kiangah, “Topa in, ‘Note’ tungah kong pia ding hi,’ a cihna mun zuanin a ding khia ding ka hi uh hi. Ko hong zui in; nang kong limbawl ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Israel-te hong limbawl ding hong ciam hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Kong zui kei ding hi. Ka leitang le ka behte kiangah ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in, “Kote hong nusia kei in, kong thum hi; nangmah in gamlakah giahphual sat nading zia thei na hih manin, kote adingin lamhilh nong hi ding hi.
Kote hong zui lecin, Topa in kote hong limbawl ding bangbangin nang zong kong limbawl ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ mual panin amaute ding khia-in ni thum lam a pai uh hi. A tawlngak nading mun uh a zonsak dingin Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang, amau’ mai ni thum lam na pai khol hi.
Giahphual panin a dinkhiat peuhmah uh ciangin sunin amaute’ tungah Topa’ meii a om hi.
Singkuang a dinkhiat peuhmah ciangin Moses in, “Topa aw, dingin na galte kithehthangsak inla, nang hong mudahte na mai-ah taisak in,” a ci hi.
A khawl ciangin, “Topa aw, Israel tul sawm tampite’ kiangah hong ciahkik in,” a ci hi.
Mihonte in amau’ tuahsiatna hangin Topa’ zakin a phun uh hi. Topa in tua thu a zak ciangin heh mahmah a, amaute’ lakah Topa’ mei kuangin, giahphual nawl kimkhat kaangtum hi.
Tua ciangin Moses’ zak dingin mite kiko uh hi. Moses in Topa’ tungah thu ngen a, mei a mit hi.
Tua ahih manin tua mun pen Taberah kici hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ lakah Topa’ mei a kuang hi.
Tu-in amaute’ lakah a om gamdang mite in anlim a lunggulh mahmah uh hi. Israel mite zong kapkik uh a, “Sa nek ding nei hi leeng maw!
Egypt-ah man pia loin i nek ngasate, tangmaite, dawnpawlte, lo-uih neute, lo-uih sante le lo-uih kangte i phawkphawk hi.
Ahih hangin tu-in i tha bei ta a, hih manna sim loh bangmah dang om peuhmah lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Manna pen nannan tang tawh kibang a, a mel pen bedolak singnai tawh kibang hi.
Mite pai kawikawi-in khawm uh a, an gawina tawh gawi-in, tua ahih kei leh sum sungah su-in, beelin huan uh a, mohin a bawl uh hi. A limna pen sathau tawh a kibawl moh ki-em tawh kibang hi.
Zanin giahphual tungah daitui a kiat ciangin manna tawh kia khawm hi.
Mite a innkuankuanun a milipin a puanbuk kongah a kahna uh Moses in a za hi. Topa nak hehlua mahmah ahih manin Moses lungkim lo hi.
Moses in Topa’ kiangah, “Bang hangin na nasem pa hong hici bawlsiat na hi hiam? Bang hangin na maipha hong musak loin, hih mi khempeuhte’ tavuan kei’ tungah hong suan na hi hiam?

Keimah in hih mite khempeuh paii ka hi hiam? Nangmah in kei’ kiangah, ‘Nau cingnu in nawine naungek a puak bangin, nangmah in amau’ pate piak dingin ka ciam leitangah amaute ang puakin paipih in,’ nong cihtheih nadingin kei’ sunga piang ahi uh hiam?
Hih mite khempeuh piak ding koi-ah sa ngah ding ka hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh ka mai-ah amaute kapin, ‘Ka nek ding uh sa hong pia in,’ hong ci uh hi.
Kei guak in hih mite khempeuh ka si zo kei a, kei adingin tavuan lianlua hi.
Hih bangin kei hong bawl ding na hih leh, ka gentheihna ka kimuh loh nadingin nong hehpih zawh leh, thakhatin hong that zaw in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Mite’ upa le ulian hi ci-in na theih, Israel upate’ sung panin mi sawmsagih hong khopsakin, kikhopna bukah amaute paipih inla, tua lai-ah nang tawh dingkhawmsak in.

Keimah hong paisukin tua munah nang tawh i kiho dinga, keimah in nang’ sunga om kha pawlkhat la-in amaute’ sungah ka guang ding hi. Nang guak in na puak loh nadingin amaute in mite’ tavuan hong puakpih ding uh hi.

Mite tungah, ‘Zing cianga dingin note ki-ap pha un, sa na ne ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ zakin na kap uh a, “Sa nek ding kua in hong pia ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt gamah nuam i sa hi,” na ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin note’ tungah Topa in sa hong pia dinga, note in sa na ne ding uh hi.
Note in ni khat sung, ahih kei leh ni nih sung, ahih kei leh ni nga sung, ahih kei leh ni sawm sung, ahih kei leh ni sawmnih sung bek ne loin,

na ikkhiat dong uh le na kih dongun kha khat sung tawntung sa na ne ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ lakah a om Topa nialin a mai-ah na kap uh a, “Bang hangin Egypt panin pai khia ihi hiam?” na ci uh hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in, “Kei tawh a kisim khawm mi tul zaguk tak om hi. Nangmah in, ‘Kha khat sung tawntung a nek dingun amaute sa pia ning!’ na ci hi.
Amaute’ khamzah dingin tuuhonte le bawnghonte amau adingin kigo zo ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh tuipi ngasate khempeuh amau’ khamzah ding kiman zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Topa’ hih theih ding zah kiciangtan sa na hi hiam? Ka thugen a manin hong tun leh hong tun loh tu-in na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses pai khia-in mite’ tungah Topa’ thugente a gensawn hi. Amah in mite a makai mi sawmsagih kaikhawmin, Puanbuk kimkotah amaute omsak hi.

Tua ciangin meii sungah Topa hong paisukin amah hopih a, ama sunga om kha pawlkhat la-in upa sawmsagihte’ sungah a guang hi. Amaute’ sungah tua kha a om ciangin, amaute in kamsangte bangin thu genin a kiko uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in tua khit zawh hih nawn lo uh hi.

Giahphual ah mi nih om uh a, khat Eldad kici-in, a khat Medad kici a, amaute’ sungah tua kha a lut hi. Amaute pen a kiciamtehte lakah a kihelte hi uh a, ahih hangin Puanbukah pai loin, giahphual ah kamsangte bangin thu genin a kiko uh hi.
Tangval khat va tai-in Moses kiangah, “Eldad le Medad-te in giahphual ah thu a gen uh hi,” va ci hi.
Ama teel mite lakah khat ahi, Moses’ nasem, Nun’ tapa Joshua in, “Ka topa Moses aw, amaute kham in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in ama kiangah, “Keima tangin hong hazatsak na hi hiam? Topa’ mi khempeuh kamsang hi henla, Topa in amau’ sungah ama Kha guan leh ka cih laitak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses le Israel upate giahphual ah a ciahkik uh hi.

Topa’ kiang panin huih nungin, tuipi panin vamimte hong puak a, giahphual kiang hih lampang ni khat paina ciang, hua lampang ni khat paina ciang mah giahphual kimkotah kiasak a, lei maitang tungah pi thum bang a sah hi.

Tua sun tawntung le a zan tawntung le a zing ciang tawntung mite dingin vamimte a khawm uh hi. Tawm a khawm pen mipa in beem sawm dim khawm a, amaute in amau adingin giahphual kimkotah tuate a pho uh hi.
Sa a kigaih ma, amau’ ha kawmah sa a baang laipi mahin, mite’ tungah Topa hong heh mahmah a, Topa in gimna lianpi khat tawh mite a vat gawp hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen Kibrothhattaavah kici hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in sa a lunggulh mite tua lai munah a vui uh hi.
Kibrothhattaavah panin Hazeroth munah mite pai uh a, Hazeroth-ah amaute a taam uh hi.
Moses in Kush numei khat teenpih ahih manin, ama teenpih Kush numei’ hangin Miriam le Aaron in amah gensia-in,
“Topa in Moses’ tung bek tawnin thu gen ahi hiam? Eite’ tung zong tawnin hong gen hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Topa in tua thu a za hi.
Moses a lungnem mahmah hi a, leitunga om mi khempeuh sangin a lungnem zaw ahi hi.
Topa in thakhatthu-in Moses le Aaron le Miriam kiangah, “Kikhopna bukah no mihing thumte hong pai un,” a ci hi. Amau thumte a pai uh hi.
Meii khuam sungah Topa hong kumsukin, kikhopna bukkongah dinga, Aaron le Miriam a sam hi. Amau tegel mailam nehin hong pai uh hi.
Topa in, “Ka thu za un: Note’ lakah kamsang a om leh Topa keimah in ama tungah maangmuhna tawh ka kilak a, amah tawh mang sungah ka kiho hi.
Ka nasem pa Moses tawh tua bang hi lo hi; ka inn sung thu khempeuh amah ki-ap hi.

Amah tawh kam le kam kiho-in, a kitel lo kampaute tawh hi loin, a kitel takin thu ka gen uh a, amah in Topa’ mel a mu hi. Tua bang ahih ciangin bang hangin ka nasem Moses gensiat ding lau lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute tungah Topa heh mahmah a, a hehsapi-in a pai khia hi.
Puanbuk tung san panin meiipi a kilakkhiat ciangin Miriam phak a, vuk bangin a pak hi. Miriam’ lamah Aaron kihei a, tua numei a na phak hi.
Aaron in Moses kiangah, “Ka topa aw, kote hai gamtatin ka khialhna hangun gim hong pia kei in.
A nu’ sung panin a suahkhiat ciangin a pum phel langkhat a bei misi bangin Miriam hisak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Topa’ tungah, “Amah damsak in, Pasian aw, kong thum hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in Moses kiangah, “Tua numei’ maitang, a pa in cil phih leh tua numei ni sagih sung maizum ding hi lo ahi hiam? Giahphual pualamah ni sagih sung kikhumcipsak in; tua khit ciangin amah hong kipaipihkik thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin giahphual pualamah ni sagih sung Miriam kikhumcip hi. Miriam a kipaipihkik mateng khualzin a zom dingin mite ding khia lo uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Hazeroth panin mite ding khia uh a, Paran gamlakah giahphual a sat uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah ka piak Kanaan leitang a vaan dingin mi sawl inla, amaute lakah makai ahi, nam khat sung panin mi khat ciat sawl in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Topa’ thupiakna tawh Paran gamlak panin Israel mite’ lutang ahi mi khempeuh a sawl hi.

A sawl mite’ min hih bang ahi hi: Reuben minam panin Zakkur’ tapa Shammua; Simeon minam panin Hori’ tapa Shafat; Judah minam panin Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb; Issakhar minam panin Josef’ tapa Igal; Efraim minam panin Nun’ tapa Hoshea; Benjamin minam panin Rafu’ tapa Palti; Zebulun minam panin Sodi’ tapa Gaddiel; Josef minam (Manasseh minam) panin Susi’ tapa Gaddi; Dan minam panin Gemalli’ tapa Ammiel; Asher minam panin Mikhael’ tapa Shethur; Naftali minam panin Vofsi’ tapa Nahbi; Gad minam panin Makhi’ tapa Geuel ahi hi.
Hihte pen gam vaan dingin Moses in a sawl mite’ min ahi hi. Moses in Nun’ tapa Hoshea pen Joshua ci-in a min kheelsak hi.
Moses in Kanaan gam a vaan dingin amaute sawlin amaute kiangah, “Negeb gam galkhat ah paito-in, mual tung gamah paito unla,
leitang bangci hiam, tua leitangah a teeng mite thahat hiam, amaute tawm hiam, tam hiam,
amau’ tenna gam pen nuntak olna gam hiam, haksatna gam hiam, amau’ tenna khuapite pen giahphual hiam, munmuanhuai hiam,

a leitang a lei hoih hiam, lei sia hiam, sing om hiam, om lo hiam, va thei un. Na siam tawpun va hih unla, tua leitang a gah pawlkhat hong ciahpih un,” a ci hi. Tua hun pen leenggah a palte a min hun ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute paito-in Zin gamlak panin Hamath khua lutna gei, Rehob mun dong gam a vaan uh hi.

Amaute Negeb lamah paito uh a, Hebron tung uh hi. Anak’ suanlekhakte ahi Ahiman mite, Sheshai mite le Talmai mite, tua lai-ah na om uh hi. (Hebron pen Egypt gam a Zoan a kisat ma kum sagih lai-in kisat hi.)
Amaute Eshkol kuam tung uh a, tua lai panin leenggah bawk khat bek a hiang tawh loin, mi nih in zawl khatin a zawng uh hi. Amaute in mang kawlsing le thei zong tawmkhat a pua uh hi.
Tua lai panin Israel mite in leenggah bawk a lawhna hangin tua mun pen Eshkol Kuam kici hi.
Ni sawmli a cin ciangin gam vaanna panin amaute hong ciahkik uh hi.
Paran gamlak Kadesh mun a Moses le Aaron le Israel mihonte khempeuh kiangah amaute hong tung uh hi. Amaute le mihon khempeuh tungah thu puakkik uh a, tua leitang a gahte amaute a lak uh hi.
Amaute in Moses kiangah, “Kote nong sawlna leitangah ka va tung uh hi. Tua lai-ah bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin luang a, hih pen tua gam a gah ahi hi.
Ahi zongin tua gam a teeng mite thahat uh a, a khuapite uh kulh tawh ki-umin lian mahmah hi. Tua banah Anak’ suanlekhakte tua lai-ah ka mu uh hi.
Amalek mite Negeb gamah teeng uh hi. Hit mite, Jebus mite le Amor mite, mual tung gamah teeng uh hi. Kanaan mite tuipi gei le Jordan dungah teeng uh hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Ahih hangin Kaleb in Moses’ mai-ah mite gamdaisakin, “Thakhatin paito-in va luah ni; bang hang hiam cih leh eite pen a zo thei mahmah ding ihi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah tawh a paito mite in, “Tua mite a sim dingin i pai ngam kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh eite sangin amaute hat zaw uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute a tam zaw in amau’ vaansa gam thu Israel mite tungah a sia lamin hong puak uh a, “Kote, a vaan dingin ka va paina uh gam pen a tunga teeng mite a puksisak thei ding gam hoih lo ahi hi.
Tua lai-ah Nefilim mite (Nefilim pan a hong piang Anak mite) ka mu uh hi. Kote pen kauphe bang lelin ka kingaihsun uh a, amau’ muhna-ah zong tua bangmah ka hi takpi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihon khempeuh nakpitakin kiko uh a, tua zan sung kap uh hi.
Israel mite khempeuh in Moses le Aaron phunsan uh a, mihon buppi in amaute tungah, “Egypt gamah a si khin hi zaw hoh le-ung! Tua ahih kei leh zong hih gamlakah a si khin hi zaw hoh le-ung!

Namsau tawh a si dingin bang hangin Topa in hih gamah kote hong paipih ahi hiam? Ka zite uh le ka tate uh galte’ mat suak ding uh hi. Egypt-ah ciahkik ding ko adingin hoih zaw ding hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amaute khatlekhat kiangah, “Makai khat teelin Egypt-ah ciahkik ni,” kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mihon kikhawmte khempeuh’ mai-ah Moses le Aaron boksuk uh hi.
Gam vaante’ lakah a kihel Nun’ tapa Joshua le Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb-te in a puan uh balkekin,
Israel mihonte khempeuh tungah, “A vaan dingin kote ka va painasa uh leitang a hoih mahmah ahi hi.
Eite’ tungah Topa a lungkim leh, bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna hih leitangah eite hong paipihin eite tungah tua leitang hong pia ding hi.

Topa phunsan kei hamtang un. Amaute pen zial mang pak ding ihih manin tua gam mite kihta kei un. Amau’ kiang panin amau’ kidalna kila khia khin a, eite tawh Topa hong om hi; amaute kihta kei un,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin mihonte khempeuh in, amaute suang tawh deng un, a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh’ muhin kikhopna buk tungah Topa’ minthanna vang hong kilang hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Hih mite in bang tanvei kei hong simmawh ding ahi uh hiam? Amaute’ lakah ka hihsa limte om napi-in, amaute in bang tanvei hong um lo lailai ding ahi uh hiam?
Pulnatna tawh amaute vat gawpin ka lawn khiakik dinga, amaute sangin a lian zaw a thahat zaw minamin nang kong bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in Topa’ kiangah, “Tua bang hileh Egypt mite in hih thu za ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ lak panin na thahatna tawh hih mite na pai khiatpih hi.

Amaute in hih gam a teeng mite tungah gen ding uh hi. Topa aw, hih mite’ lakah nang na omna thu hih mite in za khinzo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa aw, maitang kituahin nang hong kimu a, amaute’ tungah nangma meii a ding hi. Amaute’ mai-ah sunin meii khuam sungah, zanin mei khuam sungah nang na pai hi.
Tu-in hih mite mihing khat thah bangin that lecin, nangma minthang vangliatna a zasa minamte in,
‘Amaute’ tungah piak dinga a kiciam leitangah Topa in hih mite paipih zo lo ahih manin, amah in gamlakah amaute that hi,’ ci ding uh hi.

Tu-in, nang tungah hong thum ing. Nangmah in thu ciamin, ‘Topa heh hak a, a itna kip lianin, mawhna le thu palsatna maisak a, ahih hangin a mawhte siangsak ngei loin, pate’ mawhna tate tungah, khang thum khang lina dongin thuk hi,’ na cih mah bangin Topa’ vangliatna liansak in.
A lian nangma itna kip tawh a kizui le Egypt panin tuhun dong hih mite na maisaksa tawh kizui-in hih mite’ mawhna maisak in, kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Nangma gen bangin ka maisak hi.
Ahih hangin a taktakin, ka nuntak laiteng, Topa’ minthanna tawh leitung kidim ding ahih mah bangin,
Egypt le gamlakah ka hihsa ka vangliatna le ka limte mu khin napi-in sawmvei kei hong ze-etin keima aw a ngai lo mite,
amau’ pate tungah piak dinga ka kiciam leitang a mu kuamah om lo ding uh hi. Kei hong simmawh mi kuamah in tua leitang mu lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin ka nasem Kaleb ahihleh, amah in lungsim tuam nei-in limtakin kei hong zui ahih manin, amah in a zuat leitangah ka tunpih dinga, ama suanlekhakte in tua leitang luah ding uh hi.
Tu-in tua kuam sungah Amalek mite le Kanaan mite teng uh ahih manin, San Tuipi paina lampi tawnin zing ciangin gamlakah pai un,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses le Aaron kiangah,
“Hih a gi lo mihonte in bang tanvei kei hong phunsan ding uh ahi hiam? Israel mite in kei hong phunsanna ka za khin hi.
Amaute tungah hih bangin gen in: Topa in, ‘Kei a nungta ka hih mah bangin ka zakna-ah na gente uh no tungah ka hong hih ding hi.
Na luanghawmte uh hih gamlakah lum ding hi. Note khempeuh, kum sawmnih pan a tungsiah, kei hong phunsante,
Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb le Nun’ tapa Joshua sim loh, note tengsak dingin ka kiciamna leitangah khat beek na tung kei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin galte in man ding na cih uh na tate uh, keimah in ka tumpih dinga, note in na thusim loh uh leitang amaute in mu ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note na hih uhleh, na luanghawmte uh hih gamlakah lum ding hi.
Na luanghawmte uh a nunung pen gamlakah a kisial mateng, gamlakah kum sawmli sung na tate uh tuucing hi ding uh a, note’ ginat lohna thuak ding uh hi.
Na gam vaan sung uh ni phazah tawh kizui-in, ni sawmli, ni khat ciangin kum khat, note in na mawhna uh kum sawmli sung na thuak ding uh a, keima lungkim lohna na thei ding uh hi,’ ci hi.

Topa ahi keimah in thu ka gen hi. Keimah langpangin a kikaikhawm hih a gilo mihonte khempeuh tungah hih thu ka hih taktak ding hi. Hih gamlakah amaute bei mang ding uh a, amaute si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in gam vaan dingin a sawl mite hong ciahkikin a gam thu a sialamin gen uh ahih manin mihonte Topa a phunsansak,
a gam thu a sialamin a gen tua mite, Topa’ mai-ah gimna in sisak hi.
Ahih hangin gam vaan dingin a pai mite lak panin Nun’ tapa Joshua le Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb-te hing lai uh hi.
Moses in Israel mite khempeuh tungah hih thute gen a, nakpitakin mite thum uh hi.
Amaute zingsangin tho baih uh a, gamlak mual dawnah paito-in, “Thei un, hih lai-ah i om hi. Topa’ ciamnasa munah i paito ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh i khial khin hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in, “Bang hangin tu-in Topa’ thupiakna palsat na hi uh hiam, tangtung lo ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Na galte uh mai-ah note hong kisatpuk kha ding ahih manin kuanto kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ lakah Topa om lo hi.
Amalek mite le Kanaan mite na mai uhah om ahih ciangin namsau tawh note na puk ding uh hi. Topa zuihna panin nungkik na hih uh ciangin note tawh Topa hong om lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang hitaleh Moses hitaleh giahphual panin ding khia lo napi-in gamlak mual dawnah kuantoh ding amaute in ngaihsun veve uh hi.
Tua ciangin mual tung gamah a teeng Amalek mite le Kanaan mite hong paisuk uh a, amaute zo-in Hormah ciang dong nangawnah amaute a delh uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note kong piak leitangah a teeng dingin na tun uh ciangin

bawnghon pan hitaleh tuuhon pan hitaleh thuciamna tunsak nadingin Topa’ tungah meihal biakna ahi a, biakpiakna ahi zongin na piak ciang uh hitaleh, Topa’ tungah a gim namtui bawl nadingin utthu-a biakna hitaleh, a kiseh pawi hunte-ah biakpiakna hitaleh na piak uh ciangin,
biakna a paipih mipa in annel lawh khat sathau biing khat tawh a kibawl an tawh biakna Topa’ tungah pia ding hi.
Tuuno khat tawh piak khawm dingin meihal biakna ahih kei leh biakpiakna tawh, tuibuah dingin leenggahzu thawl khat na bawl ding uh hi.
Tua ahih kei leh tuutal khat tawh piakkhawm dingin annel lawh nih sathau biing nih tawh a kibawl an tawh biak nading na bawl ding uh hi.
Topa’ tungah a gim namtui-in tuibuah dingin leenggahzu thawl khat na pia ding uh hi.
Meihal biak nading ahi a, thuciamna tunsakna-in biakpiak nading ahi a, Topa’ tungah thunuama biak nading ahi zongin bawngtal na bawl uh ciangin,
mi khat in a bawngtal tawh annel lawh thum sathau biing thum tawh a kibawl an tawh biakna pia dinga,
Topa’ tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna-in tuibuah dingin leenggahzu thawl nih na pia ding uh hi.
“Bawngtal ahi a, tuutal ahi zongin, tuuno a pa ahi a, keelno a pa tawh ahi zongin piak khawm dingin tua bangin kihih ding hi.
Na piak uh ganhing khempeuh a malzah tawh kizui-in tua bangin na bawlkim ding uh hi.
Topa’ tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna a piakna uhah tualsung mi khempeuh in hih nate tu-a bangin hih ding uh hi.

Note kiangah khualmi khat hong peem ahi a, na khang tawntungun note lakah mi khatpeuh hong om ahi zongin, amah in Topa’ tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna a piak nop leh, note’ hih mah bangin hih ding hi.
Mihonpi adingin ngeina khat om dinga, note le note’ lakah hong peem mi adingin tawntung ngeina khat na khang tawntungun om ding hi. Topa’ mai-ah note le peemta mite na kibang ding uh hi.
Note le note’ lakah hong peem mi adingin a kibang thukhat, ngeina kip khat om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note kong paipihna gamah tungin
tua gam a piang ante na nek uh ciangin Topa’ tungah biakna na pia ding uh hi.
Na anlak uh a masa pen sung panin biakna-in moh khat na pia ding uh a, an cilna pan a biakna-in na piak bangun na bawl ding uh hi.
Na khang tawntungun na anlak uh a masa pen Topa’ tungah biakna-in na pia ding uh hi.
“Ahih hangin note khialin, Topa in Moses tungah a gensa hih thupiaknate khempeuh,
Topa in a thupiak a kipanin na khang tawntungun, Moses tungtawnin Topa in note hong thupiakte khempeuh na zuih kei uhleh,

theih lohna hangin mihonte’ phawk lohin a kikhial ahihleh, mihonte khempeuh in Topa’ tungah a gim namtui, meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, ngeina kip om bangin an tawh biakna le a tuibuah tawh le khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat pia ding hi.

Siampipa in Israel mihonte khempeuh adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amaute kimaisak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen tatkhialhna hi a, amaute in tua amau’ tatkhialhna hangin Topa’ tungah mei tawh kihal amau’ biakna le khialhna hanga amau’ biakna uh Topa’ mai-ah paipih khin uh hi.
Tua tatkhialhna in amaute khempeuh huamkha ahih manin Israel mihonte khempeuh le amau’ lakah a peem khualmi zong kimaisak ding hi.
“Theih lohna hangin mi khat a khialh leh, khialhna hanga biak nadingin kum khat a pha keelnu khat pia ding hi.
Mi khat, theih lohna hangin a khialh ciangin, amah a siankik theih nadingin siampipa in tua a khial mipa adingin Topa’ mai-ah kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.
Theih lohna hangin na khat peuhpeuh a hih kha, Israel mite’ lakah a om tualsung mipa le amaute’ lakah a peem khualmipa adingin ngeina a kibang khat na nei ding uh hi.
“Ahih hangin tualsung mi hitaleh peemta hitaleh, na khat peuhpeuh a hih teitei mipa in Topa a simmawh hi a, tua mipa kithat ding hi.
Amah in Topa’ thu simmawhin, a thupiakna siasak ahih manin, tua mipa kithat dinga, ama mawhna amah in thuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Israel mite gamlakah a om sungun, Sabbath ni-in sing a tom mi khat mu uh hi.
Sing a tom laitak a mu mite in Aaron, Moses le mihonte khempeuh kiangah amah paipih uh hi.
Amah bang kicih ding ci-in teltakin kigen lo ahih manin amaute in khumcip uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Tua mipa kithat ding hi. Mihonte khempeuh in giahphual pua-ah suang tawh amah deng ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Mihonte khempeuh in giahphual pua-ah amah paipih uh a, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin suang tawh amah a denglum uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah gen inla, a khang tawntungun a puan mongte uhah a teep bawlin, a puan mongteep tungah khau dum khat a khih dingun sawl in.

Tua pen, note in utluatna tawh na zuih theihzel uh ahi nomau’ lungsim le nomau’ mittang’ deihna zuikha loin, note in na et ding uh puanmongteep le Topa’ thupiakte khempeuh phawkin na sep nading uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thupiakte khempeuh phawkin na sem ding uh a, na Pasian uh tungah na siangtho ding uh hi.
Kei pen, note’ Pasian ahi dingin Egypt panin note a hong pai khiatpih Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Levi mite sung pan Levi’ tapa Kohath, Kohath’ tapa Izhar, Izhar’ tapa Korah; le Reuben mite sung pan Reuben’ tapa Eliab, Eliab’ tapa Dathan; le Abiram; le Peleth’ tapa On;
hih mite in pawl kai uh hi. Israel mite sung panin mi’ theihkim, mihon sung panin a kiteel, mihonte a makai mi zanih le sawmnga tawh Moses’ mai-ah ding uh hi.

Moses le Aaron langpangin amaute kikaikhawmin amaute kiangah, “Khengval lua uh teh! Mihon khempeuhte a milipin siangtho uh a, amaute’ lakah Topa om hi. Bang hangin Topa’ mihonpite tungah nomau kiliansak tawm na hi uh hiam” a ci uh hi.
Moses in tua thu a zak ciangin boksukin
Korah le a pawlte khempeuh kiangah, “Zing ciangin Topa in a siangtho ahi mi, ama a’ ahi mi hong lakin, ama kiangah paisak dinga, amah in a teel ding mipa ama kiangah paisak ding hi.
Hih bangin gamta un: Korah le a pawlte khempeuh in paknamtui beel la un.
Zing ciangin Topa’ mai-ah tua beelte sungah mei koihin, mei tungah paknamtui koih unla, tua ciangin Topa’ teel mi pen a siangtho hong hi ding hi. Levi’ tapate aw, khengvallua uh teh!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Korah kiangah, “No Levi mite aw, tu-in za un.
Israel mite’ Pasian in ama kiangah hong paipih ding, Topa’ biakbuk sungah nasep sem ding, mihonte’ na a sem dingin amau’ mai-ah a ding dingin Israel mihonte’ kiang panin hong khenkhiatna,
le nang le na sanggamte ahi Levi’ mite, ama kiangah hong paipihna hawmthawh lai na hi hiam? Siampi nasepna zong deih lai na hi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin nang le na pawlte khempeuh hih lai-ah na kikaihkhopna uh pen Topa langpanna ahi hi. Note in na phunsan uh Aaron pen bang mi hi mawk ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in mi sawlin Eliab’ tapa Dathan le Abiram samsak hi. Amaute in, “Kong pai kei ding uh hi.
Kote’ tungah nangmah ulianin kibawl tawmin, gamlakah kote hong that dingin bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gam panin nong pai khiatpihna thu hawmthawh lai na hi hiam?

Tua tham loin nangmah in bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gamah kote hong paipih loin, lote le leenggui lote zong nong luahsak kei hi. Hih mite’ mit khel khia ding na hi hiam? Kong pai kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Moses heh mahmah ahih manin Topa’ kiangah, “Amau’ biakna thupi ngaihsut kei in. Amaute tungah bangmah ka gamta khial kei a, a la uh khat beek nangawn ka laksak kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Korah kiangah, “Nang le na pawlte, nang le amaute, Aaron tawh zing ciangin Topa’ mai-ah hong om un.

Note in na milipun na paknamtui beel ciat uh la-in, a sungah paknamtui koih unla, Topa’ mai-ah na paknamtui beel ciat uh, paknamtui beel zanih le sawmnga paipih un. Aaron le nangmah in zong na paknamtui beel tuak uh paipih un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a milipun a paknamtui beel ciat uh la uh a, tuate sungah mei koihin a tungah paknamtui koih uh a, kikhopna buk kongah Moses le Aaron tawh ding khawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Korah in amaute’ langkhat, kikhopna bukkongah mihonte khempeuh khawm hi. Topa’ minthanna mihon khempeuhte tungah hong kilang hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses le Aaron kiangah,
“Amaute tomno sungin ka beisak theih nadingin hih mihonte lak panin kihem un,” a ci hi.
Amaute boksuk uh a, “Pasian, mi khempeuhte’ tungah nuntakna a pia Pasian aw, mi khat’ khialhna hangin mihon khempeuhte’ tungah nang heh ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Mihonte tungah hih bangin gen in: Korah, Dathan le Abiram-te’ omna kiim panin pai khia un, ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses dingin Dathan le Abiram kiangah pai a, Israel upate in zong amah a zui uh hi.

Amah in mihonte kiangah, “Amaute’ khialhna khempeuh tawh note hong kiphiatkhia kha ding ahih manin, hih migilote’ puanbuk panin pai khia unla, amau’ na khat beek lawng kha kei un, hong thum ing,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Korah, Dathan le Abiram-te’ omna kiim panin amaute a pai khia uh hi. Dathan le Abiram, a zite uh le a tapate uh le a taneute uh tawh hong pusuakin a puanbuk kong uhah dingkhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in, “Hih na khempeuh a sem dingin Topa in kei hong sawl hi. Hih nasep pen keima utthu ahih lohna, hih thu tawh na thei ding uh hi.
Mi khempeuh a sih ngei bang danin hih mite si a, tua ahih kei leh mi khempeuh in a tuah ngeite a tuah leh, Topa in kei hong sawl loh ahi hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in a thak khat hong piangsakin, leitang in a kam ka-in amaute’ neih khempeuh tawh hih mite valhtumin, a hingtangin Leinuai-ah a tumsuk uhleh, hih mite in Topa a simmawh ahihna thu na thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thute a gen khit phetin amau’ nuai-ah lei kiphelkham hi.
Leitang a kam ka-in, Korah tawh a kipawl mi khempeuh le a innkuanpihte uh le a neihsa khempeuh uh valhtum hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute le a neihsa khempeuh uh a hingtangun Leinuai-ah tumsuk uh hi. Leitang in amaute khupnelhin mihonpite’ lak panin amaute bei uh hi.
Amaute’ kikona hangin a kiim uha om Israel mite khempeuh tai uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Leitang in hong valhtum kha in teh!” ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ kiang panin mei hong pai khia a, paknamtui a pia mi zanih le sawmngate kaangtum hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar in meikuang sung panin paknamtui beelte a lakkhiat ding gen inla, tua ciangin a gamlapi-ah mei thehthang in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua nate,

amau’ nuntakna a beina dongin a khial hih mite’ paknamtui beelte a siangtho hi. Tua ahih ciangin biakna tau sitna kuangdai dingin seek un; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Topa’ mai-ah tuate pia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua nate siangtho hi. Israel mite tungah tua bangin hih nate pen lim khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin siampi Eleazar in mei tawh a kaangtum mite’ piak paknamtui sumngo beelte la-in biakna tau sitna-in a seek hi.

Topa in Moses tungtawnin Eleazar tungah a gen bangin Korah le a pawlte tawh a kibang kha lo dingin, siampi ahi lo, Aaron’ suanlekhakte ahi lo mi peuhmah, Topa’ mai-ah paknamtui hal dingin a pai loh nading, Israel mite tungah phawksakna khat ahi hi.
Ahih hangin a zing ciangin Israel mihon khempeuh in Moses le Aaron phunsan uh a, “Topa’ mite na that uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Moses le Aaron langpangin mihonte a kikhop uh ciangin, kikhopna buk lamah amaute a khuadak uh ciangin, meii in na tuam a, Topa’ minthanna vang kilang hi.
Kikhopna buk mai lamah Moses le Aaron pai a,
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Tomno sungin amaute ka siatsak theih nadingin hih mihonte’ lak panin pai khia un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amau tegel zong boksuk uh hi.

Moses in Aaron kiangah, “Na paknamtui beel la-in, biakna tau pan a mei a sungah koih inla, a tungah paknamtui koihin, mihonte’ lakah paipih mengmeng inla, amaute adingin kilemna bawlsak in. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ kiang panin hehna hong pai khia khin a, gimna kipan khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses’ gen bangin Aaron in paknamtui beel la-in mihonte lakah a tai hi. Mite lakah gimna kipan khin takpi a, amah in paknamtui koihin mite adingin kilemna a bawlsak hi.
A si le a hingte’ kikalah amah dinga, gimna a veng hi.
Tu-in Korah’ tungtangah a site sim loh, hih gimna tawh a si mi tul sawm le tulli le zasagih ahi hi.
Gimna a ven ciangin kikhopna bukkong Moses kiangah Aaron a ciahkik hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Israel mite tungah thu gen inla, amaute tung panin, beh khat ciangin ciangkhut khat, a beh tawh kizui-in a makaite khempeuh tung panin ciangkhut sawm le nih la in. A ciangkhut tungah amau’ min ciat gelh inla,
Levi ciangkhut tungah Aaron’ min gelh in. Bang hang hiam cih leh beh lutang khatah ciangkhut khat hi ding hi.
Tua ciangin kikhopna buk sung, thuciamna mai, nang tawh i kituahna munah tuate na koih ding hi.
