Topa in amau’ tungah a piak dingin a pu a pate tungah a ciamsa bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna leitang a muhsak loh nading thu amaute tungah Topa kiciam hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in vun a at mite pen, amaute’ tangin amah in a piansak amau’ tate ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lampi-ah amaute a vun ki-at nai lo ahih manin vun at nai loh ahi uh hi.
Minam bup vun ki-atna a man khit ciangin giahphual amau’ mun ciatah a dam mateng a om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Tuni-in note’ tung panin Egypt gamah sal suakin na minsiatna uh ka zial khia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen tuni dongin Gilgal kici hi.
Israel mite Gilgal-a giahphual ah a om sungun tua kha a ni sawm le li ni nitakin Jerikho zanglei-ah Paisan Pawi a bawl uh hi.
Paisan Pawi khit a zing ciang ni teekteekin amaute in tua gam a piang silngo sawh loh moh le ankan a ne uh hi.
Tua gam a piang a nek ni uh a zing ciangin manna a bei ta hi. Israel mite in manna nei nawn lo uh a, ahih hangin tua kumin Kanaan leitang a piangte a ne uh hi.

Jerikho khua kiangah Joshua a tun ciangin a khuadaktoh leh, a khut sungah namsau dawhsa tawh mi khat a mai-ah na ding hi. Ama kiangah Joshua pai-in, “Ko’ pawl na hi hiam, ahih kei leh ka langte’ pawl na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Hilo hi; Topa’ galkapte a ukpa-in tu-in kong pai hi,” a ci hi. Joshua zong bok sukin bia-in ama kiangah, “Ka topa in a nasem pa bang hong sawl nuam ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ galkapte a ukpa in Joshua kiangah, “Na khe panin na khedapte suah in. Bang hang hiam cih leh na dinna mun a siangtho leitang ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua bangmahin Joshua a gamta hi.
Tu-in Israel mite’ hangin Jerikho kulhkongpi kikhakcip a, kuamah pusuak thei lo, sungtum thei lo hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Thei in, na khut sungah a kumpipa le a mi thahatte tawh Jerikho khua kong pia khin hi.
Khuapi kimkotah galkap mi khempeuh khatvei na pai ding uh hi. Tua bangin ni guk sung na pai ding uh hi.
Siampi sagih in Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah tuutal ki peengkul sagih tawi ding uh hi. A ni sagih ni-in khuapi kimkotah sagihvei na pai ding uh a, siampite in peengkul tum ding uh hi.

Amaute in tuutal ki sauveipi a ginsak khit uh ciangin, peengkul aw na zak phetun nakpitakin mi khempeuh awng ding uh hi. Khuapikulh cimmai dinga, mi khempeuh amau mai ciatah tangtakin khuapi sungah paisuak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Nun tapa Joshua in siampite samin amaute kiangah, “Thuciamna Singkuang la unla, tua Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah siampi sagihte tuutal ki peengkul sagih tawisak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mite kiangah, “Mai nawtin pai un. Khuapi kimkotah pai unla, Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah hiam tawi mite paisak un,” a ci hi.
Joshua in mite a thupiak bangin Topa’ mai-ah a pai tuutal ki peengkul a tawi siampi sagihte mai nawtin pai-in peengkul tum uh a, Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang in amaute zui hi.
Tua ciangin peengkul a tum siampite’ mai-ah hiam tawi mite pai uh a, peengkulte a kitum suak hun laitakin Thuciamna Singkuang nungah a nungdalte a pai uh hi.

Ahih hangin Joshua in mite thu pia-in, “Awng un, ci-a kong sawl hun matengin note awng loin, na aw uh zong na kizasak kei ding uh a, na kam panun aw khat beek ging khia lo ding hi. Awng un, kong cih ciangin na awng bek ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang khuapi kimkotah khatvei paisak a, amaute hong ciahkikin giahphual ah a zan giak uh hi.
Tua ciangin zingsangin Joshua tho baih a, siampite in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a la uh hi.

Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah a pai tuutal ki peengkul sagih a tawi siampi sagihte paisuakin peengkulte tumsuak uh hi. Amaute’ mai-ah hiam tawite pai-in, peengkulte a kitum suak hun laitakin Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang nungah a nungdalte a pai uh hi.
A ni nih ni-in khuapi kimkotah khatvei pai uh a, giahphual ah ciahkik uh hi. Tua bangin ni guk sung a hih uh hi.
A ni sagih ni-in khuavak tungin tho baih uh a, tua bangmahin khuapi kimkotah sagihvei a pai uh hi. Tua ni bekin khuapi kimkotah amaute sagihvei pai uh hi.
A sagih veina-ah, siampite in peengkul a tum ciangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Awng un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in khuapi note hong piazo hi.

Khuapi le a sunga omte khempeuh pen Topa’ tungah biakna-in kisusia ding hi. Amah in i sawl kamtaite na seel ahih manin numei paktat Rahab le ama inn sungah amah tawh a omkhawmte khempeuh bek hing ding hi.

Ahih hangin suksiat dingin a kiseh nate panin nomau mah na kikem ding uh hi. Tua hikeileh tuate na suksiat ding uh ciangin a kisusia ding nate khat peuhpeuh iplahin la kha-in Israel-te’ giahphual sungah siat nading na khat suaksakin haksatna na tun kha ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin ngun le kham, sumngo le sik tawh kibawl nazatte Topa adingin a siangtho ahi hi. Topa’ sumkoihna-ah tuate tung ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite awng a, peengkulte kitum hi. Mite in peengkul aw a zak phetun nakpitakin awng uh a, kulhpi cimmai-in, mi khempeuh amau mai ciatah tangtakin khuapi sungah pai uh a, khuapi a la uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi sunga om khempeuh numei le pasal, a moi a ham, bawngtalte, tuute le late khempeuh namsau tawh that mang khin uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in tua gam thu a va kansim mi nihte kiangah, “Numei paktat nu’ inn-ah va pai unla, tua lai panin a numei le amah tawh a kizom khempeuh, ama tungah na ciamsa bangun hong pai khiatpih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin thu kansim tangvalte va tum uh a, Rahab, a nu, a pa, a sanggamte le amah tawh a kizom khempeuh a pai khiatpih uh hi. Amaute in tua nu’ tanau teng khempeuh paipih uh a, Israel-te’ giahphual pualamah a koih uh hi.
Amaute in khuapi le a sunga om khempeuh mei tawh hal uh a, ngun le kham, sumngo le sik tawh a kibawl nazatte bek Topa’ inn-a sumkoihna-ah a koih uh hi.

Ahih hangin numei paktat Rahab le tua nu tawh a kizomte khempeuh Joshua in a hingkhawi hi. Jerikho khua thu a kansim dingin Joshua in a sawl kamtaite tua nu in na seel ahih manin tuni dongin Israel mite lakah a suanlekhakte a teeng uh hi.

Tua hun laitakin Joshua in amaute tungah thuciamna khat koih a, “Mi khat kipanin hih Jerikho khuapi a lamkik pa in Topa’ mai-ah samsiatna thuak tahen. A tacil luang khaamin tua khuapi bulpi phut dinga, a tapa neu pen luang khaamin a kulhkongpite phut ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Topa in Joshua ompih a, gam khempeuh ah ama min a thang hi.

Ahih hangin a ki-ap nate tawh kisai-in Israel mite zuautat uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah minam Zerah tapa Zabdi, a tapa Karmi, a tapa Akhan in a ki-ap nate pawlkhat la ahih manin Israel mite tungah Topa heh mahmah hi.
Joshua in Jerikho panin Bethel nisuahna lam Bethaven gei-a om Ai khua-ah mi sawlin amaute kiangah, “Paito unla a gam va en un,” a ci hi. Tua mite paito-in Ai khua va ensim uh hi.

Amaute Joshua kiangah hong ciahkikin ama kiangah, “Mi khempeuh kuantosak kei inla, mi tulnih ahi a, tulthum ahi zongin kuantosakin Ai khua simsak in. Amaute mi tawmno khat ahih manin tua lai-ah mi khempeuh gimtosak kei in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite lak panin tulthum bang tua lai-ah a kuanto uh hi. Ai mite’ mai-ah amaute tai uh a,
Ai mite in amau’ kulhkongpi mai panin Shebarim ciang dong delh uh a, tuahsukna munah amaute sawmthum le guk khawng a that uh hi. Hih thu hangin Israel mite’ hanna bei-in, lau mahmah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in dahna limin ama puante balkekin nitak mateng Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah, amah le Israel upate boksuk uh a, amaute in a lu tung uhah leivui a koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in, “Ala, Topa Pasian, kote a hong susia ding Amor mite’ khut sungah a hong pia dingin bang hangin hih mite Jordan galkhat ah hong paipih peuhmah na hi hiam? Jordan galkhat ah ten ding a lungkim hi hoh ta le-ung!
Topa aw, Israel-te a galte uh mai-ah a nungkik uh ciangin bang gen thei ding ka hi hiam!

Bang hang hiam cih leh Kanaan mite le hih gam a teeng mi khempeuh in hih thu za ding uh a, kote hong umcihin leitung panin kote hong phiat khia mang ding uh hi. Tua ciangin a lian mahmah nangma min bang cih ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Tho in, bang hangin tua bangin lei-ah bok na hi hiam?
Israel mite khial a, amaute in ka thupiak thuciamna palsat khin uh hi. Amaute in a ki-ap nate pawlkhat la uh a, amaute in gu-in zuauthu gen uh a, amau’ van lakah tua nate koih uh hi.

Tua thu hangin Israel mite in a galte uh nang zo lo uh hi. Amaute pen suksiat ding mi na suak khin uh ahih manin a galte uh mai-ah nungkik uh hi. Note’ lak panin a ki-ap nate na suksiat kei uhleh note tawh kong omkhawm nawn kei ding hi.

Tho in, mite siansuah inla, ‘Zing cianga dingin note kisiansuah tawm un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian Topa in, “Israel mite aw, note’ lakah a ki-ap nate om hi. Note’ lak panin a ki-ap nate na lakkhiat matengun na galte uh na nang zo kei ding uh hi,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin na minam namun note hong kipaipih ding hi. Topa in a lak minam sung panin a behbehin hong pai ding hi. Topa in a lak a beh sung panin a innkuankuanin hong pai ding hi. Topa in a lak a innkuan sung panin a mimi-in hong pai ding hi.

Tua ciangin a ki-ap nate tawh a kilakhawm mipa le a neih khempeuh, mei-in kihal ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Topa’ thuciamna palsat hi. Israel sungah a zumhuai-in a gamta ahi hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Joshua tho baihin, a namnamin Israel-te hong paipih a, Judah minam kila hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Judah behte hong paipih a, Zerah-te beh kila hi. Amah in Zerah-te beh a mimi-in hong paipih a, Zabdi kila hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama innkuanpihte a mimi-in hong paipih a, Judah minam Zerah’ tapa Zabdi, a tapa Karmi, a tapa Akhan kila hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Akhan kiangah, “Ka tapa aw, Israel Topa Pasian minthangsak inla, amah phat in. Tu-in na gamtatnasate kei tungah hong gen inla, bangmah hong im kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Akhan in Joshua dawngin, “A taktakin, Israel Topa Pasian tungah ka khial khin a, hih bangin ka gamta kha hi.

Shinar panin vankia lakah puanhoih khat le ngun shekel zanih a gik le shekel sawmnga a gik kham tawn khat ka muh ciangin, tuate iplahin ka lakha hi. Tu-in tuate ka puanbuk sung leilakah a ngunte a nuai-ah omin kiseel hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in sawltakte sawl a, amaute a puanbukah va tai uh a, a puanbuk sungah a ngun nuainungin na kiseel takpi hi.
Amaute in puanbuk panin tuate la khia-in Joshua le Israel mite khempeuh kiangah hong paipih uh a, tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ mai-ah a koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua le amah tawh a om Israel-te khempeuh in Zerah’ tapa Akhan le a ngun, a puan, a kham tawn, a tanute, a tapate, a bawngtalte, a late, a tuute, a puanbuk le a neih khempeuh la uh a, amaute in Akhor Kuam ciangah tuate a paipih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in, “Bang hangin kote tungah gimna hong tun na hi hiam? Tuni-in Topa in nang tungah gimna hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Israel-te khempeuh in suang tawh Akhan a denglum uh hi. Amaute in a innkuanpih dangte le a neihsate uh zong suang tawh denglumin a hal uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in tuni donga a om suang honpi ama tungah a ciang uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ hehluatna a dai hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu dongin tua mun pen Akhor Kuam, kici hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Lau kei inla lungkia kei in. Galkap khempeuh nang kiangah la inla, kithawi-in Ai-ah paito in. Nangma khut sungah Ai kumpipa le a mite, a khuapi le a leitang kong piak khitna thei in.

Jerikho le a kumpipa tungah na bawl bangin Ai le a kumpipa tungah na bawl dinga, a van kinusiate le a ganhingte bek note adingin na la ding uh hi. A khuapi nungah a khuapi a sim dingin na buksim ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua le galkap khempeuh Ai-ah a paito dingin kipan uh hi. Joshua in a tha kicing mi thahat tul sawmthum teel a, zanin tua mite a sawl khia hi.
Amah in amaute thu pia a, “En un, tua khuapi a sim dingin a nungah na buksim ding uh a, khuapi panin gamlapi-ah na pai kei ding uh hi. Ahih hangin a kigingsa-in na om ding uh a,
tua ciangin keimah le kei tawh a om mite khempeuh in khuapi kong naih ding uh hi. A masa bangin kote a do dingin hong kuankhiat uh ciangin amaute’ mai-ah kote ka na tai khem ding uh hi.

Khuapi panin amaute hong pai khiat khit uh matengin kote hong delh ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ‘A masa-a bangin eite’ mai-ah amaute tai uh hi,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute kiang panin ko ka tai ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin na buksimna panun note na kipan ding uh a, khuapi na la ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un note’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi.
Khuapi na lak khit uh ciangin Topa’ hong sawlna bangin hihin, mei tawh khuapi na hal ding uh hi. Note thu kong piak khitna thei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in amaute a sawl khia hi. A buksimna ding uh munah amaute pai-in, Ai nitumna lam, Bethel le Ai kikalah pang uh a, ahih hangin tua zanin giahphual a mite lakah Joshua omlai hi.
Zingsangin Joshua tho baihin mite sam a, mite’ mai-ah Israel upate tawh Ai-ah a paito uh hi.
Amah tawh a om galkap khempeuh paito uh a, khuapi mai naihin Ai leilu lampangah phual sat uh a, Ai le amaute’ kikalah luihawm khat om hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mi tulnga bang paipihin, khuapi nitumna lam Bethel le Ai kikalah a buksim dingin a koih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin galkapte, khuapi leilu lamah a phualpi le khuapi nitumna lamah a nungdalte a koih uh hi. Ahih hangin tua zanin Joshua kuam sungah a om hi.

Ai kumpipa in hih thu a theih ciangin amah le tua khuapi mi khempeuh, Israel-te a do dingin manlangin kithawi-in Arabah lam paisukna-ah zing tungin a kuan khia uh hi. Ahih hangin khuapi nungah amah a buksim a omlam thei lo hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ mai-ah Joshua le Israel-te khempeuh kilelsak khem uh a, gamlak lamah a tai uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin khuapi sunga om mi khempeuhte amau a delh dingin kikaikhawm uh a, Joshua a delh uh ciangin amaute khuapi panin a kihem khia ahi hi.
Ai khua sung pan Israel-te a delh lo pasal khat beek om lo uh a, khuapi kong honsa-in nusia-in Israel-te a delh uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Na khutsunga om teipi Ai lamah zan in. Bang hang hiam cih leh na khut sungah tua khua kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Joshua in a khutsunga om teipi khuapi lamah a zan hi.
Tua ciangin a buksimte diang khia pah uh a, amah in a khut a zan khit phetin amaute tai-in khuapi sungah lut uh a, a khuapi la-in manlangin a hal uh hi.

Ai mite in a nung etkik uh ciangin, khuapi meikhu vanah a kahto a mu uh hi. A nung a mai koimahah tai thei lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh gamlak lamah tai-in a kilelsak khemte in amau a delhte’ lamah hong kihei-in lehdelhkik uh hi.
A buksimte in khuapi a lak khitna le khuapi meikhu a kahtohna Joshua le Israel khempeuh in a muh uh ciangin amaute kiheikikin Ai mite vat gawp uh hi.

Tua ciangin Ai khua mite a do dingin khuapi panin Israel dangte hong kuan khia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te’ kikalah amaute om uh a, pawlkhat hih lamah pawlkhat hua lamah om uh ahih manin a suakta khat zong a om lo dongin Israel-te in amaute a vatmai uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in Ai kumpipa hingmatin Joshua kiangah a paipih uh hi.

Amaute in a delhna gamlakah Ai khuami khempeuh thatin, amaute khempeuh a bei dongin namsau tawh a thah uh a man khit uh ciangin, Israel-te khempeuh Ai-ah paikikin Ai khuami a omlaite namsau tawh a vat gawp uh hi.
Tua ni-in a si, Ai mi khempeuh numei le pasal a vekpi-in tul sawm le tulnih ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ai khuami khempeuh a suksiat mang khit matengin amah in a teipi a zanna a khut dokkik lo hi.
Amah in Joshua a thupiak, Topa’ thugenna bangin Israel-te in ganhing le khuapi sunga van kinusiate bek a la uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in Ai hal a, tuni donga a om mah bangin nin khol napi khatin piangsak den hi.

Tua ciangin amah in nitak mateng sing khat tungah Ai kumpipa a khai hi. Ni a tum ciangin Joshua in thu pia a, amaute in sing tung panin a luang la sukin, khuapi kulhkongpi lutna-ah paai uh a, a tungah suangtum lompi ciang uh a, tuni dongin tua suangcian omlai hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in, Moses Thukham Laibu sungah, “A kiseek lo suangte tawh a kibawl biakna tau, kuamah in a tungah siknazat a lik loh,” ci-in a kigelh mah bangin, Topa’ nasem Moses in Israel mite a thupiakna bangin, Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian adingin Ebal Mual tungah biakna tau khat a bawl hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tua tungah Topa adingin meihal biaknate pia-in, thunuama biaknate a go uh hi.
Tua lai mun, Israel mite’ omna-ah, Moses in a gelhsa a thukhamte tua suangte tungah a gelh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in thupha a ngah theih nadingun Topa’ nasem Moses in a thupiaksa bangin Israel mite khempeuh peemta hitaleh tualsuak hitaleh, a upate le a uliante le a thukhente uh tawh, Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a pua Levi siampite’ mai, Thuciamna Singkuang langkhat, Gerizim Mual mai lamah mi alang, Ebal Mual mai lamah mi alang a ding uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in thukham laibu sunga a kigelh bangbangin thukham kammal khempeuh, thupha le samsiatnate a sim hi.
Moses in a thupiak kammalte khempeuh Israel mihonpite, numeite le amaute lakah a teeng peemtate mai-ah Joshua in a sim loh khat zong om lo hi.

Jordan galkhat a om mual tung gam le lei niamna gam Lebanon lam Tuipi Lian dung khempeuh ah a om kumpite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin
Joshua le Israel mite a do dingin lungsim kikhatin kikhawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin Gibeon khua-a teeng mite in Jerikho le Ai tungah Joshua’ hihnasa thu a zak uh ciangin
amaute in khembawl ding vaihawm uh a, lam-an bawlin, a late uh tungah a paatsa ip le a paatsa leenggahzu um, a kikeek leh a kiphopte suanin,
a khe uhah a paatsa, a kiphop khedapte bulhin, a paatsa puante tawh a pai uh hi. A ante khempeuh uh zong keu-in ap hi.
Amaute Gilgal-a giahphual a Joshua kiangah hong pai-in amah le Israel mite tungah, “A gamlapi panin kong pai uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin kote tawh thuciamna khat hong bawl un,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mite in tua Hiv mite kiangah, “Kote’ mai-ah a teeng mite na hi khathei ding uh hi. Tua hileh note tawh thuciamna hong bangci bawltheih ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in Joshua kiangah, “Kote, nangma nasem ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Joshua in amaute kiangah, “Kuate na hi uh hiam? Koi lai panin hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Topa na Pasian uh min hangin a gamla mahmah gam panin na nasemte kong pai uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama thu le Egypt gam sungah a hihte khempeuh,
le Jordan galkhat ah a om Amor kumpi nihte ahi, Ashtaroth ah a teeng Heshbon kumpi Sihon le Bashan kumpi Og tungah a hihte khempeuh a kigenna ka za khin uh hi.

Ka upate uh le ka gam sung uha a teeng mite khempeuh in kote kiangah, ‘Na khualzin nading uh lam-an bawl unla, amaute a dawntuah dingin pai-in amaute kiangah, “Kote, na nasem ka hi uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin kote tawh thuciamna hong bawl un,” va ci un,’ hong ci uh hi.
Hih lai-ah ka anlum uh om hi. No kiangah a hong pai dingin kong dinkhiat ni uh, khualzin lam-an dingin ka inn panun ka guan laitakun lum lai hi. Ahih hangin tu-in en un, keu-in ap hi.
Hih leenggahzu umte ka thun laitakun a thak ahi hi. Tu-in en un, puak gawp ta hi. Hih ka puante uh le ka khedapte uh khual gamlapi zinna-in paat gawpta hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite in amau’ an puakte sangkha uh a, Topa’ tung panin lamlahna dong lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in amaute tawh kilemna bawlin, amaute a hinsak nading thuciamna a bawl uh hi. Tua ciangin mihonte’ makaite amau’ tungah a kiciam uh hi.
Amaute tawh thuciamna a bawl khit uh ni thum a cin ciangin, amaute pen a veengte ahihna le amaute’ nai-ah a teengte ahihna thu a za uh hi.
Israel mite ding khia uh a, a ni thum ni-in amaute’ khuapite a ban uh hi. Amau’ khuapite pen Gibeon, Khefirah, Beeroth le Kiriathjearim na hi hi.
Ahih hangin, Topa, Israel Pasian min tawh mihonte’ makaite kiciam zo uh ahih manin Israel mite in amaute that lo uh hi. Tua ciangin makaite tungah mihon khempeuh phun uh hi.
Ahih hangin makaite khempeuh in mihon khempeuh tungah, “Topa, Israel Pasian min tawh amaute tungah i kiciam zo a, tu-in amaute i su thei kei ding hi.
Amaute tungah i kiciam thuciamna hangin eite tungah hehna hong tung kha ding ahih manin hih bangin gamta-in amaute i hingsak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin makaite in mihonte kiangah, “Amaute hingsak un,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin makaite’ gen mah bangin mihon khempeuh adingin amaute pen singsuite le tui tawite a suak uh hi.
Joshua in amaute samin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin kote’ nai hih lai-ah a teeng hinapi-in, ‘Note’ kiang panin gamla mahmah ung,’ cihna tawh kote hong khem na hi uh hiam?
Tu-in note hong kisamsia a, note pawlkhat a tawntungin sila, ka Pasian uh inn-a dingin sing suite le tui tawite na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Amaute in Joshua dawngin, “Gam khempeuh nang tungah a hong piak nading Topa na Pasian in a nasem pa Moses a thupiakna le na mai panin gam sunga a teeng mi khempeuh suksiat taktak nading thu na nasemte kiangah hong kigen hi. Tua ahih ciangin note’ hangin nakpitakin ka lunghimawh uh a, hih bangin ka gamtakha uh hi.
Tu-in, en in, nangma khut sungah kote ka om uh hi. Hoih na sak bang leh kote tungah bawl dingin nangma muhna-ah man na sak bangin hong bawl in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute tungah tua bangin bawl a, Israel mite’ khut sung panin amaute hon khia a, amaute thatsak lo hi.
Ahih hangin Joshua in mihonte le Topa’ biakna tau-a dingin singtomte le tuitawite a suaksak hi. Topa in amah biak nadingin a teelna munah tuni dongin tua nasepte mah amaute in sem uh hi.

Joshua in Ai a lakna zia le Jerikho le a kumpipa tungah a bawl bangin Ai le a kumpipa tungah a bawlna le Gibeon khua sunga teeng mite in Israel-te tawh kilemna a bawlna le amaute lakah a omna thu Jerusalem kumpipa Adonizedek in a zak ciangin
nakpitakin a lau hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Gibeon pen kumpi khuate khat mah bangin khua lian khat hi a, Ai khua sangin zong lian zaw-in a mite khempeuh zong mi thahat ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Adonizedek in Hebron kumpipa Hoham kiang, Jarmuth kumpipa Piram kiang, Lakhish kumpipa Jafia kiang le Eglon kumpipa Debir kiangah kamtai sawlin,
“Kei kiangah hong pai un. Hong huh unla, Gibeon vat gawp ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh Joshua le Israel mite tawh kilemna na bawl khin uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Amor kumpi ngate, Jerusalem kumpi, Hebron kumpi, Jarmuth kumpi, Lakhish kumpi le Eglon kumpi, a galkapte khempeuh uh tawh paito-in Gibeon langkhat ah phual satin a do uh hi.

Tua ciangin Gibeon mite in Gilgal-a giahphual a Joshua kiangah kamtai sawlin, “Na nasemte hong nusia kei in. Manlang takin ko kiangah hong paito-in, kote hong hon inla, hong huh in. Bang hang hiam cih leh mual tung gam a teeng Amor kumpite khempeuh kote langpangin kikhawm uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gilgal panin amah le galhang mite khempeuh le a thahat mi khempeuh tawh Joshua a kuanto hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Amaute na khut sungah hong pia khin ka hih manin amaute kihta kei in. Amaute khat beek in nang hong nang zo lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gilgal panin zan tawntung paito-in Joshua in thakhatthu-in amaute sim gawp hi.
Topa in Israel-te’ mai-ah amaute amkhamsakin, amaute in Gibeon-ah amaute tampi tak that uh a, Bethhoron paitohna lampi-ah amaute delhin, Azekah le Makkedah ciang dong amaute a vat gawp uh hi.

Israel-te’ mai-ah amaute a tai laitak, Bethhoron paitohna-ah amaute a paisuk laitakun, Topa in vantung panin gialpi lianpite Azekah khua ciang dong, amaute’ tungah lawnsuk a, amaute a si uh hi. Israel mite in namsau tawh a thah sangin tua gialpi hangin a si mi tam zaw hi.
Tua ciangin, Topa in Israel mite tungah Amor mite a piak ni-in Joshua in Topa tungah thu gen a, amah in Israel mite’ muhna-ah, “Ni aw, Gibeon-ah, Kha aw, Aijalon Kuam-ah khawlcip in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin hih minamte in a galte uh a zawh khit mateng ni ding cipin kha a khawl hi. Hih thute, Jashar’ Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Vankim lai-ah ni khawlin ni khat bup bang tumsuk lo hi.
Tua hun ma hitaleh tua hun khit hitaleh Topa in mi khat thu a ngaih tua ni bang nidang om lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Israel mite adingin a dosak hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, amah tawh a om Israel-te khempeuh tawh Gilgal-a giahphual ah a ciahkik hi.
Hih kumpi ngate tai-in Makkedah leihawm sungah bu uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua kiangah, “Kumpi ngate Makkedah leihawm sungah a bu kimu khin hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in, “Suangtum lianpite a leihawm gong liknelh unla, a cing dingin a gei-ah mi koih un.

Ahih hangin note tua lai-ah om kei un. Na galte uh delhin a nungdalte bawh unla, a khuapi sung uhah amaute lutsak kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un note’ khut sungah amaute hong piazo hi,” a ci hi.
Joshua le Israel mite in amaute a beisiang dongin tampi tak a thah khit uh ciang le a suakta lai mite amau’ khuapi muanhuai sungah a tum khit uh ciangin,
Makkedah giahphual Joshua kiangah mi khempeuh cidamin a ciahkik uh hi. Israel mite khatpeuh a paupih ngam kuamah om lo hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in, “Leihawm gong hong unla, leihawm panin tua kumpi ngate kei kiangah hong pai khiatpih un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in tua bangmahin hih uh a, leihawm panin tua kumpi ngate, Jerusalem kumpi, Hebron kumpi, Jarmuth kumpi, Lakhish kumpi le Eglon kumpite, ama kiangah a paipih uh hi.

Amaute in Joshua kiangah tua kumpi ngate a pai khiatpih uh ciangin, Joshua in Israel mi khempeuh samin, amah tawh a kuankhawm galkapmaangte kiangah, “A nai-ah hong pai unla, hih kumpite’ ngawngah na khe uh nga un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute a nai-ah hong pai-in, a khe uh amaute’ ngawng tungah a nga uh hi.
Joshua in amaute kiangah, “Lau kei unla, lungkia kei un. Thakhauh unla, hang un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ do na gal khempeuhte uh tungah Topa in hih bangin bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Joshua in amaute satin sisak a, singkung nga tungah amaute a khai hi. Amaute in nitak dong sing tungah a khai uh hi.

Ahih hangin ni a tum hun ciangin Joshua in thu pia a, amaute in sing tung panin la khia sukin, amaute a buknasa leihawm sungah lawnsuk uh a, suangtum lianpite leihawm gongah a koih uh hi. Tu dongin tua suangtumte omlai hi.

Tua ni-in Joshua in Makkedah khua la a, namsau tawh tua khua le a kumpipa vat gawp hi. A sunga om mi khempeuh susia mangin, bangmah siit lo a, Jerikho kumpipa tungah a bawl bangin Makkedah kumpipa tungah a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, amah tawh a om Israel-te khempeuh tawh Makkedah panin Libnah-ah paisuak uh a, Libnah khua a sim uh hi.

Topa in tua khua le a kumpipa zong Israel mite’ khut sungah a pia hi. Amah in namsau tawh tua khua le a sunga om mi khempeuh a vat gawp hi. Tua khua sungah bangmah siit lo a, Jerikho kumpipa tungah a bawl bangin a kumpipa tungah a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, amah tawh a om Israel-te khempeuh tawh Libnah panin Lakhish-ah paisuak uh a, tua khua umcihin a sim uh hi.
Topa in Israel mite’ khut sungah Lakhish pia a, amah in a ni nih ni-in la-in, Libnah a bawl bangin tua khua le a sunga om mi khempeuh namsau tawh a vat gawp hi.
Tua ciangin Lakhish a huh dingin Gezer kumpipa Horam hong kuanto hi. Ahi zongin khat zong a om nawn lo dongin Joshua in amah le a mite a vat gawp hi.
Tua ciangin Lakhish panin Eglon-ah, amah tawh a om Israel-te khempeuh tawh Joshua paisuakin tua khua umcihin a sim uh hi.
Tua ni mahin tua khua la uh a, namsau tawh a vat gawp uh hi. Lakhish a hih mah bangin tua khua sunga om mi khempeuh tua ni-in amah in a susia mang hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, Israel-te khempeuh tawh Eglon panin Hebron-ah a paito hi. Amaute in tua khua simin,
la-in, namsau tawh tua khua le a kumpi le a kiima om khempeuh a vat gawp hi. Eglon tungah a bawl bangin amah in kuamah siit lo a, tua khua le a sunga om khempeuh a susia mang hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua, Israel-te khempeuh tawh Debir lamah kiheikikin tua khua a sim hi.

Amah in a kumpipa le a kiimnai-a khuapite khempeuh tawh tua Debir khua a la hi. Amaute in namsau tawh vat gawp uh a, a sunga om mi khempeuh a susia mang uh hi. Amah in kuamah siit lo a, Hebron le Libnah le a kumpipa tungah a bawlsa bangin Debir le a kumpipa tungah a bawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in gam khempeuh, mual tung gam le Negeb gam le lei niamna mun le mual pang suk le a khuapite khempeuh a zo hi. Amah in kuamah siit lo a, Israel-te’ Topa Pasian’ thupiaksa bangin mi khempeuh a susia mang hi.
Joshua in amaute Kadeshbarnea panin Gaza ciang dong le Goshen gam khempeuh Gibeon ciang dong a zo gawp hi.
Israel-te’ Topa Pasian in Israel-te adingin dosak ahih manin Joshua in hih kumpite khempeuh le amau’ leitang hun khat sungin a la khin hi.
Tua ciangin amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh tawh Gilgal-a a giahphual ah Joshua a ciahkik hi.
Hazor kumpipa Jabin in Israel-te’ gualzawhna thu a zak ciangin amah in Madon kumpipa Jobab le Shimron kumpipa, Akshaf kumpipa,
saklam mual tung le Khinneroth leitaw lama om Arabah gam sung le Jordan gunkuam le nitumna lamah Nafathdor gam sunga om kumpite,
nisuahna le nitumna lama om Kanaan mite, Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite le mual tung gam a om Jebus mite le Mizpah gam Hermon nuai-a Hiv mite tungah thu a puak hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tampi a pha a galkap honpite tawh, a tam mahmah sakolte le leengte tawh, tuipi gei-a om sehnel bangin tampi tak hong kuan khia uh hi.
Hih kumpite khempeuh in amau’ galkapte gawmin Israel mite tawh a kido dingin hong pai-in Merom lui-ah giahphual a sat khawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah, “Zing ciang tubang hunin amaute khempeuh a kithatsa-in Israel mite tungah pia ding ka hih manin amaute kihta kei un. A sakolte uh a zagui na sattat ding uh a, a leengte uh mei tawh na hal ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua zong a galkapte khempeuh tawh thakhat thu-in Merom lui gei amaute kiangah pai-in va sim uh hi.

Topa in Israel-te’ khut sungah amaute pia a, amaute in vat gawpin a Lian Sidon le Misothmaim ciang dong le nisuahna lamah Mizpeh kuam ciang dong delh uh a, amaute kuamah a om nawn lo dongin a vat gawp uh hi.
Topa’ sawl bangin Joshua in amaute hih a, amau’ sakolte uh a zagui sattat sakin mei tawh a leengte uh a halsak hi.
Tua hun laitakin Joshua kiheikikin Hazor la a, namsau tawh a kumpipa a that hi. (Tua hun laitakin Hazor khua pen tua kumpipa gam khempeuh sungah a thahat pen ahi hi.)
Amaute in tua sunga om mi khempeuh namsau tawh that khin mang uh hi. Khat zong hingkhawi lo uh a, a khuapi uh zong a haltum uh hi.
Topa’ nasem Moses in a thupiaksa bangin Joshua in tua kumpite’ khuapite le a kumpi khempeuh la-in namsau tawh amaute vatin that mang khin hi.
Ahih hangin Hazor khua longal mual tunga om khuapite khat zong Israel mite in hal lo uh a, Joshua in tua khua bek a hal hi.
Israel mite in tua khuapite sunga van kinusiate le ganhingte amau’ galzawh van dingin a la uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute a thah khit matengun namsau tawh vat gawp uh a, khat beek hingkhawi lo uh hi.
Topa in ama nasem Moses a thupiak bangin Moses in zong Joshua thu pia a, Joshua zong tua bangmahin gamta a, Topa in Moses a thupiaknate khempeuh a hih loh om lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in gam khempeuh, mual tung gam le Negeb gam le Goshen gam khempeuh le lei niamna gam le Arabah le Israel-te’ mual tung gam le a lei niamna gamte,
Seir lamah a kikhungto Halak Mual panin Hermon Mual nuai Lebanon kuama om Baalgad ciang dong a la hi. Amah in amau’ kumpite khempeuh la-in amaute vat gawpin a that hi.
Hih kumpite khempeuh le Joshua sauveipi sung a kido hi.
Gibeon khua-a teeng Hiv mite longal, Israel mite tawh kilemna a bawl khuapi khat zong om lo hi. Amaute in tua khua dangte khempeuh simin a lak uh ahi hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Moses a thupiakna bangin amaute a kisuksiat mang nading le hehpihna ngah loin a kibeisak theih nadingin Israel-te a do nadingin a lungsim uh a khauhsak pa pen Topa ahi hi.

Tua hun laitakin Joshua hong pai-in mual tung gam, Hebron, Debir, Anab le Judah mual tung gam khempeuh le Israel mual tung gam khempeuh panin Anak mite notkhiasiang a, Joshua in a khuapite uh tawh amaute susia mang khawm hi.
Israel mite’ leitangah Anak mite khat zong om nawn lo a, Gaza, Gath le Ashdod sung bekah pawlkhat omlai hi.

Topa in Moses tungah a gensa bangin Joshua in leitang khempeuh a la hi. Tua ciangin Joshua in amau minam tawh kizui-in a ngah ding bangin Israel mite tungah gamh-in a pia hi. Tua hun a kipan galdona panin tua gam a tawlnga hi.
Tu-in nisuahna lam Jordan galkhat, Arnon kuam panin Arabah khempeuh, Hermon Mual ciang dong Israel mite in a leitang uh laksakin a zawh kumpi nihte:

Heshbon-ah a teeng Amor kumpi, Arnon kuam gei-a om Aroer pan le Gilead kuam laizang panin phel lang ahi Ammon mite’ gamgi Jabbok gun ciang dong le Arabah panin nisuahna lamah Khinneroth Tuipi le Bethjeshimoth lamah Pisgah mual pang bul leitaw lama om Ci Tuipi ahi Arabah tuipi ciang dong a uk Sihon;

le Bashan kumpi, aim panin a suaktate lakah khat, Ashtaroth le Edrei-ah teengin, Hermon Mual le Salekah le Bashan gam khempeuh, Geshur mite le Maakath mite gamgi ciang le Gilead langkhat panin Heshbon kumpipa Sihon’ gamgi ciang dong a uk Og ahi hi.
Topa’ nasem Moses le Israel mite in amau tegel a zo uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ nasem Moses in Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte tungah a neih dingun amau’ leitang a pia hi.

Hihte pen, Joshua le Israel mite in a zawh Jordan nitumna lampang, Lebanon kuam sung Baalgad panin Seir lamah a kikhungto Halak Mual kikal-a om kumpite ahi hi. (Joshua in mual tung gam, lei niamna gam, Arabah gam, mual pang suk, sehnel gam le Negeb gam sunga om Hit mite, Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite’ leitangte Israel minamte’ tungah amau’ ngah ding tawh kizui-in a neih dingun a pia hi.)
A zawh uh kumpite: Jerikho kumpi, khat; Bethel gei-a om Ai kumpi, khat;
Jerusalem kumpi, khat; Hebron kumpi, khat;
Jarmuth kumpi, khat; Lakhish kumpi, khat;
Eglon kumpi, khat; Gezer kumpi, khat;
Debir kumpi, khat; Geder kumpi, khat;
Hormah kumpi, khat; Arad kumpi, khat;
Libnah kumpi, khat; Adullam kumpi, khat;
Makkedah kumpi, khat; Bethel kumpi, khat;
Tappuah kumpi, khat; Hefer kumpi, khat;
Afek kumpi, khat; Lasharon kumpi, khat;
Madon kumpi, khat; Hazor kumpi, khat;
Shimronmeron kumpi, khat; Akshaf kumpi, khat;
Taanak kumpi, khat; Megiddo kumpi, khat;
Kadesh kumpi, khat; Karmel gam sunga Jokneam kumpi, khat;
Nafathdor sunga Dor kumpi, khat; Galilee sunga Goiim kumpi, khat;
Tirzah kumpi, khat; a vekpi-in kumpi sawmthum le khat ahi hi.
Tu-in Joshua teekin a kum tampi pha hi. Topa in ama kiangah, “Nang teekin na kum tampi pha a, ahi zongin leitang lak ding tampi tak omlai hi.
A omlai leitang: Filistia gam sung khempeuh le Geshur gam khempeuh
(Kanaan mite’ gam ci-a a kiciamteh, leilu lam Ekron gamgi lam, Egypt nisuahna lama om Shihor pan Filistia gam Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Gath le Ekron gamte a uk mi nga om hi) le Avvim gam,
leitaw lamah, Kanaan mite leitang khempeuh le Sidon mite gam ahi Mearah gam Amor mite gamgi ahi Afek ciang,
le Gebal mite’ leitang le Lebanon gam khempeuh, nisuahna lamah, Hermon Mual nuai-a Baalgad panin Hamath tumna ciang,

Lebanon le Misothmaim kikalah a teeng Sidon mite khempeuh ahi hi. Kei mahmah in Israel mite’ mai panin amaute ka hawl khia dinga, nang kong thupiaksa bangin Israel mite tungah a luah dingun leitang hawm in.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in minam kua le Manasseh minam alangte tungah luah dingin hih leitang hawm in,” a ci hi.
Reuben mite le Gad mite in Manasseh minam alang dang khatte tawh Topa’ nasem Moses in amaute a piaksa ahih manin nisuahna lam Jordan galkhat ah gamh ngah khin uh hi.
Arnon kuam mong a om Aroer pan le kuam laizang a om khuapi le Dibon ciang dong Medeba mualzang khempeuh;
le Ammon mite’ gamgi ciang dong Heshbon-ah a uk Amor kumpi Sihon’ khuapi khempeuh;
Gilead le Geshur mite le Maakath mite’ gam le Hermon Mual khempeuh le Salekah dong Bashan gam khempeuh;
Ashtaroth le Edrei-ah a uk Bashan gam sunga Og kumpi gam khempeuh (aim-a a suak tate lakah amah bek om hi); Moses in hihte zo-in a hawl khia hi.
Ahi zongin Israel mite in Geshur mite ahi a, Maakath mite ahi zongin hawl khia lo uh a, tuni dongin Geshur mite le Maakath mite Israel-te lakah a teeng uh hi.
Levi minamte tung bekah Moses in gamh pia lo hi. Topa in Moses kiangah a gensa mah bangin Israel-te’ Topa Pasian’ tungah a kipia mei tawh kihal biaknate pen amau’ gamh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Reuben minamte tungah amau’ beh tawh kizui-in gamh pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amau’ gamh pen Arnon kuam gei-a a om Aroer pan le kuam laizang a om khuapi le Medeba kiang a mualzang khempeuh,
Heshbon tawh le mualzang tunga om a khuapite khempeuh; Dibon, Bamothbaal, Bethbaalmeon,
Jahaz, Kedemoth, Mefaath,
Kiriathaim, Sibmah le tua kuam mual tunga om Zereth-shahar,
Bethpeor, Pisgah pang suk le Bethjeshimoth hi a,
mualzang khuapite khempeuh le Heshbon-ah a uk, Moses in Midian makaite Evi, Reke, Zur, Hur le Reba, tua gam a teeng Sihon’ uliante tawh a zawh khop ahi Amor kumpi gam khempeuh a huam ahi hi.
Beor’ tapa, aisan pa Balaam zong, Israel mite in adang a thahte lakah namsau tawh thatkhawm uh hi.
Reuben mite’ gampi pen Jordan ahi hi. Hihte pen amau’ beh tawh kizui-in a khuapite le a khuaneute tawh Reuben mite’ gamhluah ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Gad minamte tungah zong amau’ beh tawh kizui-in gamh pia hi.
Amau’ gam pen Jazer le Gilead khuapite khempeuh le Rabbah nisuahna lamah a om Aroer ciang dong Ammon mite’ leitang kimkhat,
le Heshbon panin Ramathmizpeh le Betonim ciang le Mahanaim panin Debir gam ciang dong,

le Bethharam kuam sungah Bethnimrah, Sukkoth le Zafon, Jordan galkhat nisuahna lam, Khinnereth Tuipi a niamna lam mong ciang, Jordan gamgi-in a nei, Heshbon kumpipa Sihon’ kumpi gam a omlai teng ahi hi.
Hihte pen amau’ beh tawh kizui-in a khuapite le a khuaneute tawh Gad mite’ gamhluah ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Manasseh minam alangte tungah amau’ beh tawh kizui-in gamh a pia hi.
Amau’ gam pen Mahanaim pan kipanin Bashan gam sung khempeuh, Bashan kumpipa Og’ kumpi gam sung khempeuh le Bashan gam sunga om Jair khuapi sawmgukte,
le Gilead alang, Ashtaroth le Edrei, Bashan gam a Og’ kumpi gam khempeuh ahi hi. Hihte amau’ innkuan tawh kizui-in Makhir mi alangte adingin Manasseh’ tapa Makhir mite tungah kipia hi.
Hihte pen Jerikho nisuahna lam Jordan galkhat, Moab zanglei-ah Moses in a hawm gamhte ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Levi minamte tungah Moses in gamh pia lo hi. Israel-te’ Topa Pasian in amaute kiangah a gensa mah bangin amah pen amau’ gamh ahi hi.
Hihte pen, siampi Eleazar, Nun tapa Joshua le Israel minam sung pan beh lutangte in amaute tungah a piak, Kanaan gam sungah Israel mite’ ngah gamhte ahi hi.
Minam kua le alangte adingin Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin amau’ gamhte aisanna tawh kipia hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Moses in Jordan galkhat ah minam nih le alangte tungah gamh pia khinzo hi. Ahih hangin amaute lakah Levi mite tungah bangmah pia lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Josef mite minam nihin kikhen a, Manasseh le Efraim minamte ahi uh hi. Tua gam sungah Levi-te tungah tanh kipia lo a, ahih hangin amau’ ten nading khuapite le a ganhingte uh adingin lonona gamte kipia bek hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite gamta uh a, amaute in leitang a hawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin Judah minamte Gilgal-a Joshua kiangah pai uh a, amaute sung panin Kenaz mi Jefunneh tapa Kaleb in ama kiangah, “Topa in Kadeshbarnea-ah Pasian mi Moses tungah nang le kei’ thu tawh kisai a gente na thei hi.
A gam sung thukansim dingin Topa’ nasem Moses in Kadeshbarnea panin kei hong sawl lai-in kum sawmli ka pha a, ka lungsim a om bangin ama kiangah thu ka tunkik hi.
Ahih hangin kei tawh hong paito khawm ka sanggamte in mite lungkiasak uh a, ahi zongin keimah in lungsim tak tawh Topa ka Pasian ka zui hi.
Tua ni-in Moses kiciamin, ‘Nangmah in Topa ka Pasian, lungsim tak tawh zui na hih manin na khe in a totsa leitang pen nang le na tate adingin gamh hi tawntung ding hi,’ hong ci hi.

Tu-in, a cihsa bangin Topa in, Israel mite sehnel gamah a pai sung, Topa in hih thu Moses tungah a gen a kipan hih kum sawmli le nga sung kei hong nungtasak a, tu-in kei kum sawmgiat le kum nga ka pha hi.
Moses in hong sawl hun lai mah bangin tuni-in kei ka tha hat lai a, galdo nading le kuankhiatna le ciahkik nadingin ka thatang pen tua hun lai-a ka thatang mah bang lai hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in tua ni-a Topa’ gen hih mual tung gam kei hong pia in. Anak mite a muanhuai mahmah khuapi sungah a omna thu tua hun lai-in kong gen uh hi. Topa in kei hong ompih dinga, Topa’ cih mah bangin amaute ka hawl khia zo kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in amah thupha pia a, Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb tungah gamh-in Hebron a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Topa, Israel-te’ Pasian, lungsimtak tawh zui ahih manin tuni dongin Hebron pen Kenaz mi Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb’ gamh a suak hi.
Hih Hebron min a nidangin Kiriatharba kici hi; Arba pen Anak mite lakah mi lianpen khat ahi hi. Tua ciangin galdona panin tua gam a tawlnga hi.
Amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Judah mite’ ngah pen leitaw lamah Edom gamgi ciang hi a, leitaw lam a gamla penna munah Zin gam ciang ban hi.
Leitaw lam a gamgi pen Ci Tuipi mong, leitaw lam a sun tuidawk pan kipan hi.
Leitaw lam Akrabbim kahtohna-ah pai khia-in, Zin dong ban a, Kadeshbarnea leitaw lamah Hezron dung tawnin Addar ciang dong paito-in Karka lamah kihei a,
Azmon ciang dong pai-in Egypt lui-ah suak khia a, tuipi-ah a mong bei hi. Hih pen amau’ leitaw lam gamgi hi ding hi.
Tua ciangin nisuahna lam gamgi pen Jordan tunna ciang dong Ci Tuipi ahi hi. Leilu lampang gamgi pen Jordan tunna tuipi dawk panin kipan hi.
Bethhoglah lamah a gamgi paito a, Betharabah leilu lampangah paisuak hi. Tua ciangin Reuben tapa Bohan’ Suangpi dongah a gamgi paito-in,

Akhor Kuam panin Debir-ah paito a, leilu lam manawhin, tua kuam leitaw lampangah a om, Adummim kahtohna galkhat ah a om Gilgal lamah kihei hi. Tua ciangin Enshemesh luidung ah gamgi pai-in Enrogel-ah tawp hi.
Tua ciangin Jebus (Jerusalem a cihna) liangko leitaw lam Hinnom’ tapa’ kuamah gamgi paito-in, aim kuam leilu lam mong, nitumna lam Hinnom Kuam galkhat ah a kikhung mual dawnah gamgi paito hi.
Tua ciangin mual dawn panin Neftoah lui-ah gamgi kikhung a, tua panin Efron Mual khuapite-ah pai a, tua ciangin Baalah (Kiriathjearim a cihna) lamah gamgi kawi kual hi.
Tua ciangin Baalah nitumna lam Seir Mual-ah gamgi kual a, tua panin paisuakin Jearim Mual (Khesalon a cihna) liangko leilu lamah pai-in, Bethshemesh-ah paisuk a, Timnah kiangah paisuak hi.
Ekron leilu lam mual liangko-ah a gamgi pai khia a, tua ciangin Shikkeron-ah gamgi kawi kualin, Baalah Mual-ah paisuak a, Jabneel-ah lengkhia-in tuipi-ah a gamgi tawp hi.
Tua ciangin nitumna gamgi pen Tuipi Lian dung teng ahi hi. Hih pen amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Judah mite’ kiimah a gamgi ahi hi.
Topa in Joshua tungah a thupiak bangin Jefunneh tapa Kaleb tungah amah in Judah mite lakah tanh khat Kiriatharba, Hebron a cihna, (Arba pen Anak’ pa hi) pia hi.
Tua lai panin Kaleb in Anak’ tapa thumte Sheshai, Ahiman le Talmai, Anak’ suanlekhakte a hawl khia hi.
Tua lai panin Debir sunga a teeng mite a sim dingin amah kuanto hi. Debir pen a nidangin Kiriathsefer kici hi.
Kaleb in, “Kiriathsefer vat gawpin a la zo mi tungah ka tanu Aksah a zi dingin ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kaleb’ sanggampa Kenaz’ tapa Othniel in la a, amah in a zi dingin a tanu Aksah a pia hi.
Tua nu ama kiangah a pai ding ciangin ama pa’ tung panin lo khat a nget ding hah gen hi. A la tung panin tua nu a kum ciangin Kaleb in tua nu kiangah, “Bang ut na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Letsong khat hong pia in. Negeb gamah kei hong koih na hih buangin cik tuikhukte zong hong pia in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Kaleb in tua nu tungah ciktui tungnungte le ciktui nuainungte a pia hi.
Hihte pen amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Judah minamte’ gamhluah ahi hi.
Leitaw lam mongciik, Edom gamgi lamah Judah minamte’ neih khuapite: Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kinah, Dimonah, Adadah,
Kadesh, Hazor, Ithnan,
Zif, Telem, Bealoth,
Hazorhadattah, Keriothhezron (Hazor a cihna),
Amam, Shema, Moladah,
Hazargaddah, Heshmon, Bethpelet,
Hazarshual, Beersheba, Biziothiah,
Baalah, Iim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Khesil, Hormah,
Ziklag, Madmannah, Sansannah,
Lebaoth, Shilhim, Ain le Rimmon: a vekpi-in khuapi sawmnih le kua, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin lei niamna lamah Eshtaol, Zorah, Ashnah,
Zanoah, Engannim, Tappuah, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adullam, Sokoh, Azekah,
Shaaraim, Adithaim, Gederah le Gederothaim: khuapi sawm le li, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Tua banah Zenan, Hadashah, Migdalgad,
Dilean, Mizpeh, Joktheel,
Lakhish, Bozkath, Eglon,
Kabbon, Lahmam, Khitlish,
Gederoth, Bethdagon, Naamah le Makkedah: khuapi sawm le guk, a khuaneute tawh zong ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Libnah, Ether, Ashan,
Iftah, Ashnah, Nezib,
Keilah, Akzib le Mareshah: khuapi kua, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Ekron a khuapite le a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Ekron panin tuipi dong, Ashdod lampang a omte khempeuh a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Ashdod, a khuapite le a khuaneute tawh ahi hi. Gaza, a khuapite le a khuaneute tawh ahi hi. Egypt lui le tuipi lian a gei ciang dong tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin mual tung gamah Shamir, Jattir, Sokoh,
Dannah, Kiriathsannah (Debir a cihna),
Anab, Eshtemoh, Anim,
Goshen, Holon le Giloh: khuapi sawm le khat, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Arab, Dumah, Eshan,
Janim, Bethtappuah, Afekah,
Humtah, Kiriatharba (Hebron a cihna) le Zior: khuapi kua, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Maon, Karmel, Zif, Juttah,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoah,
Kain, Gibeah le Timnah: khuapi sawm, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Halhul, Bethzur, Gedor,
Maarath, Bethanoth le Eltekon: khuapi guk, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Kiriathbaal (Kiriathjearim a cihna) le Rabbah: khuapi nih, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Sehnel gamah Betharabah, Middin, Sekakah,
Nibshan, Ci Khuapi le Engedi: khuapi guk, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Judah mite in Jerusalem-a a teeng Jebus mite hawl khia zo lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin Jebus mite pen Judah mite tawh Jerusalem-ah a teeng khawm uh hi.
Josef’ suanlekhakte’ tanh gamgi pen Jerikho luite’ nisuahna lam, Jerikho kiang Jordan panin sehnel gamah pai a, Jerikho panin mual tung gamte tawnin Bethel-ah paito hi.
Tua ciangin Bethel panin Luz-ah pai-in, Arkhi mite gam Ataroth nawk hi.
Tua ciangin nitumna lam Jaflet mite’ gam lam Bethhoron a niam lam gam ciang dongah paisuk hi. Tua ciangin Gezer-ah pai-in tuipi-ah tawp hi.
Josef’ suan Manasseh le Efraim mite in amau’ gamhluah dingin hih gamte ngah uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Efraim mite’ gam pen a nuai-a bang ahi hi: Nisuahna lamah amau’ gamgi pen Atarothaddar pan Bethhoron tungnung ciang ahi hi.
Tua panin tuipi ciangah a gamgi pai a, leilu lamah Mikmethath ahi hi. Tua ciangin nisuahna lam a gamgi Taanathshiloh lamah kual pai-in, nisuahna lam galah pai-in Janoah a tung hi.
Janoah panin Ataroth le Naarah ah paisuk a, Jerikho banin Jordan-ah tawp hi.
Tappuah panin nitumna lam Kanah lui-ah gamgi pai-in tuipi-ah tawp hi. Hih pen amau’ behbehin Efraim minamte’ gamhluah hi a,
Manasseh mite’ gamhluah sung panin Efraim mite adingin a kikhen khia khuapite, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin amaute in Gezer sunga teeng Kanaan mite hawl khia lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin Kanaan mite pen Efraim mite lakah teeng a, ahih hangin aana nasep a sem dingin sal a suak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Josef’ tacil ahih manin Manasseh minam tungah tanh kipia hi. Manasseh minam sung panin tacil, Gilead’ pa Makhir tungah Gilead gam le Bashan gam kipia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah galhang mi ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Manasseh minam a omlaite Abiezer, Halek, Asriel, Shekhem, Hefer le Shemida-te tungah a behbehin piakna kinei hi. Hihte pen Josef’ tapa Manasseh’ ta pasal suanlekhakte a behbeh ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Manasseh’ tapa Makhir, a tapa Hefer, a tapa Zelofehad in tapa nei loin tanu bek nei a, a tanute’ min in: Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah le Tirzah ahi hi.

Amaute, siampi Eleazar le Nun tapa Joshua le makaite mai-ah pai uh a, “Ka sanggamte uh tawh gamh hong piak nadingin Topa in Moses thu pia hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thupiakna bangin amau pate’ sanggamte tawh amah in gamh a pia khawm hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jordan galkhat ah Gilead le Bashan-te sim loh Manasseh tungah tanh sawm kia hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Manasseh’ tanute in a tapate tawh gamh ngahkhawm uh hi. A omlai Manasseh mite tungah Gilead leitang kipia hi.
Manasseh-te’ gam in Asher panin Shekhem nisuahna lamah a om Mikmethath dong ban a, tua ciangin Entappuah mite’ leitaw lamah a gamgi pai hi.
Tappuah leitang pen Manasseh a’ ahi hi. Ahih hangin Manasseh gamgi a om Tappuah khuapi pen Efraim tapate a’ ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Kanah lui-ah a gamgi paisuk hi. Manasseh khuapite lak panin lui leitaw lama om hih lai-a khuapite pen Efraim a’ ahi hi. Tua ciangin lui leilu lampangah Manasseh gamgi paisuakin tuipi-ah tawp hi.
Tua gam leitaw lam teng Efraim a’ hi-in, a leilu lam teng Manasseh a’ hi a, tuipi pen a gamgi hi a, leilu lamah Asher banin nisuahna lamah Issakhar a ban hi.

Issakhar le Asher gam sungah zong Manasseh in gam ngah a, tuate pen Bethshean le a khuaneute, Ibleam le a khuaneute, Dor-a teengte le a khuaneute, Endor a teengte le a khuaneute, Taanak a teengte le a khuaneute le Megiddo a teengte le a khuaneute hi a, a thumna pen Nafath ahi hi.
Ahi zongin Manasseh’ tapate in hih khuapite luah zo lo uh ahih manin tua gamah Kanaan mite teng teitei uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mite tampi pha-in a hat uh ciangin amaute in Kanaan mite nasemin koih uh a, hawl khia mang khin lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Josef minam in Joshua kiangah thu genin, “Topa in kote thu hong pia khin a, kote mi tampi hi napi-in bang hangin ngah khat le tanh khat bek gamh-in hong pia na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in amaute kiangah, “Note mi tampi pha a, Efraim mual tung gam pen note adingin neulua ahih ciangin Perez le aim gam tulakah pai unla, nomau adingin gam sattawm un,” a ci hi.

Josef minam in, “Kote adingin mual tung gam kicing zo lo hi. Ahi zongin zang gam a teeng Kanaan mite khempeuh, Bethshean le a khuaneute, Jezreel Kuam sunga om mite pen sik leeng neite hi zel uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Josef’ suan Efraim le Manasseh mite tungah, “Note mi tampi pha-in vanglian na hih manun tanh khat kia na nei kei ding uh hi.

Mual tung gam pen note a’ hi dinga, tulak ahih hangin note in hah siangin a gamgi mong dong na luah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in sik leeng nei-in, amaute a thahat hangin Kanaan mite na hawl khia zo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mihon buppi Shiloh-ah kikhawmin tua lai-ah kikhopna buk lam uh a, amaute’ mai-ah gam zawhsa-in om hi.
Israel mite lakah gamh a kipia nai lo minam sagih omlai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in Israel mite kiangah, “Topa, na pu na pate uh Pasian in note hong piaksa leitangah pai-in na luah ding uh bang tanvei zekai lai ding na hi uh hiam?

Minam khat panin mi thum ciat hong pia unla, amaute va kuan khia-in vaksuk vakto-in, amaute’ luah dinga ngaihsutna tawh a leitang omziate hong gelhin, tua ciangin kei kiangah hong ciah dingun amaute ka sawl ding hi.
Amaute in seh sagihin khenin, leitaw lam ama gam mahah Judah omsuakin, Josef’ innkuante leilu lam amau’ gamah om ding hi.
Note in leitang khen sagihin hong ciamteh unla, na ciaptehna uh hih mun kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh hi. Tua ciangin keimah in Topa i Pasian’ mai-ah note ading ai ka san ding hi.

Levi mite in note lakah tanh nei lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ siampi nasepna pen amau’ luah ahi hi. Gad, Reuben le Manasseh minam alangte in Topa’ nasem Moses in amaute tungah a piak ahi Jordan Nisuahna lam galkhat ah amau’ gamh ngah khinzo uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite a kuan uh hi. Leitang a ciaptehna a gelh nadingun Joshua in a pai mite thu pia a, “Vaksuk vakto-in leitang ciaptehna hong gelh unla, kei kiangah hong paikik un. Tua ciangin Shiloh mun Topa’ mai-ah note adingin ai ka san ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mite kuanin gam sungah paisuk paito-in khen sagih suahin tua gam a khuakhua-in a ciaptehna uh laibu khat sungah khum uh a, Shiloh giahphual a Joshua kiangah amaute hong pai uh hi.
Joshua in amaute adingin Topa’ mai Shiloh-ah ai sansak hi. Tua ciangin Joshua in amau’ tanh ding ciat Israel-te tungah leitang a pia hi.
A behbeh tawh kizui-in Benjamin minamte ading aisan hun hong tunga, amau’ tungah a kipia gam pen Judah minam le Josef minamte kikalah hong kia hi.
Leilu lamah amau’ gamgi pen Jordan panin kipan a, Jerikho leilu lam liangko-ah paito-in, tua panin mual tung gam nawkin nitumna lamah pai a, Bethaven sehnel gamah a tawp hi.
Tua lai panin gamgi in Luz lam manawhin leitaw lam nawtin Luz (Bethel a kici) liangko-ah pai a, Bethhoron Nuainung leitaw lama om mual tunga Atarothaddar khua-ah paisuk hi.

Tua ciangin mun dang manawhin gamgi pai a, Bethhoron galkhat, leitaw lama om mual panin nitumna lampang leitaw lamah kihei a, Judah minamte a’ ahi Kiriathbaal (Kiriathjearim a cihna)-ah a tawp hi. Hih in a nitumna lampang piangsak hi.
Tua ciangin Kiriathjearim mong panin leitaw lampang kipan a, Efron lam, Neftoah Luite-ah gamgi pai hi.
Tua ciangin aim kuam leilu lam mong a om, Hinnom’ tapa’ kuam a kimuhna mual a gamgi-ah pai hi. Tua ciangin Jebus mite’ gam liangko leitaw lam, Hinnom Kuam-ah paisukin, Enrogel-ah paisuk suak hi.
Tua ciangin leilu lam manawhin kawi-in, Enshemesh-ah paisuak a, tua lai panin Adummim kahtohna galkhat, Geliloth-ah pai a, Reuben’ tapa Bohan’ Suangpi-ah paisuk hi.
Tua ciangin Betharabah gam liangko leilu lamah paisuakin Arabah-ah paisuk hi.
Tua ciangin Bethhoglah gam liangko leilu lamah gamgi paisuak a, Jordan mong leitaw lam, Ci Tuipi dawk leilu lamah a tawp hi. Hih pen leitaw lam gamgi hi a,
Jordan in nisuahna lampang a gamgi piangsak hi. Hih pen a beh zui-in a kimkotah a gamgi a gamgi-in Benjamin minam’ luah ahi hi.
Tu-in amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Benjamin minamte’ khuapite in Jerikho, Bethhoglah, Emekkeziz,
Betharabah, Zemaraim, Bethel,
Avvim, Parah, Ofrah,
Khefarammoni, Ofni, Geba - khuapi sawm le nih, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,
Mizpeh, Khefirah, Mozah,
Rekem, Irpeel, Taralah,
Zela, Haelef, Jebus (Jerusalem a cihna), Gibeah le Kiriathjearim - khuapi sawm le li, a khuaneute tawh zong ahi hi. Hihte pen a beh tawh kizui-in Benjamin minamte’ luah ahi hi.
A beh zui-in Simeon minam ading aisan nihna hong tung hi. Amau’ gamh in Judah minamte’ gamh ngahsa pawkhat huam hi.
Amau’ ngah ding gamhte pen Beersheba, Sheba, Moladah,
Hazarshual, Bala, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Hormah,
Ziklag, Bethmarkaboth, Hazarsusah,
Bethlebaoth le Sharuhen - khuapi sawm le thum, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Ain, Rimmon, Ether le Ashan - khuapi li a khuaneute tawh zong ahi hi.
Negeb gam Ramah-a om Baalathbeer ciang dong hih khuapite’ kiima om khuaneute khempeuh zong a huam ahi hi. Hihte pen a beh tawh kizui-in Simeon minamte’ luah ahi hi.

Simeon minamte’ luah in Judah minamte’ gam sung khenkhat hong huam hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah minamte’ ngah pen amau adingin lianlua a, amau’ luah sung panin Simeon minam in gamh ngahsawn uh hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Zebulun minam adingin aisan thumna hong tung hi. Amau’ luah gam in Sarid ciang dong ban hi.
Tua ciangin nitumna lamah a gamgi paito-in Mareal ah paisuak a, Dabbesheth va su a, tua ciangin Jokneam nisuahna lama om lui a ban hi.
Sarid panin nisuahna lam manawhin pai-in Khislothtabor gamgi-ah tung hi.
Tua panin Daberath-ah pai-in Jafia ciang ban a, tua lai panin nisuahna lam Gathhefer, Ethkazin lamah paisuak a, tua ciangin Rimmon-ah pai lai-in Neah lamah a kawi hi.
Tua ciangin leilu lam pan, Hannathon lamah gamgi kihei a, Iftahel kuamah a tawp hi.
Tua ciangin Kattath, Nahalal, Shimron, Idalah le Bethlehem khuate zong huam a, khuapi sawm le nih, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Hihte pen a beh tawh kizui-in Zebulun minamte’ luah hi a, hih khuapite a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Issakhar minamte adingin aisan lina hong tung hi.
A gam in Jezreel, Khesulloth, Shunem,
Hafaraim, Shion, Anaharath,
Rabbith, Kishion, Ebez,
Remeth, Engannim, Enhaddah le Bethpazzez a huam hi.
A gamgi in Tabor, Shahazumah le Bethshemesh zong ban a, Jordan-ah a tawp hi. Khuapi sawm le guk, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Hihte pen a beh tawh kizui-in Issakhar minamte’ luah hi a, a khuapite a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Asher minamte adingin aisan ngana hong tung hi.
A gam in Helkath, Hali, Beten, Akshaf,
Allammelek, Amad le Mishal huam hi. Nitumna lamah Karmel le Shihorlibnath ban a,
tua ciangin nisuahna lamah kihei-in Bethdagon-ah pai a, leilu lam Bethemek le Neiel lamah Zebulun le Iftahel kuam ban hi. Tua ciangin leilu lam Kabul,
Ebron, Rehob, Hammon, Kanah le a Lian Sidon ciang dong paito lai hi.
Tua ciangin Ramah-ah a gamgi kihei a, kulh a nei Taia khuapi a tung hi. Tua ciangin Hosah-ah gamgi kihei a, tuipi-ah a tawp hi. Mahalab, Akzib,
Ummah, Afek le Rehob khuapite huam a - khuapi sawmnih le nih, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Hihte pen a beh tawh kizui-in Asher minamte’ luah hi a, hih khuapite a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Naftali minamte adingin aisan gukna hong tung hi.
A gamgi pen Helef, Zaanannim-a om tawsaw le Adaminekeb le Jabneel panin Lakkum ciang dong pai-in Jordan-ah a tawp hi.
Tua ciangin nitumna lam Aznothtabor-ah a gamgi kihei a, tua lai panin Hukkok-ah pai-in, leitaw lamah Zebulun ban a, nitumna lamah Asher banin, nisuahna lam panin Jordan-ah Judah a ban hi.
Kulh a nei khuapite pen Ziddim, Zer, Hammath, Rakkath, Khinnereth,
Adamah, Ramah, Hazor,
Kedesh, Edrei, Enhazor,
Iron, Migdalel, Horem, Bethanath le Bethshemesh - khuapi sawm le kua, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Hihte pen a beh tawh kizui-in Naftali minamte’ luah hi a, a khuapite a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Dan minamte adingin aisan sagihna hong tung hi.
A luah gamte in Zorah, Eshtaol, Irshemesh,
Shaalbim, Aijalon, Ithlah,
Elon, Timnah, Ekron,
Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath,
Jehud, Beneberak, Gathrimmon,
le Joppa galkhat a om Mejarkon le Rakkon a gamte tawh a huam hi.

Dan mite in amau’ gam a taan ciangun Dan mite kuanto-in Leshem sim uh a, amaute in a mite manin namsau tawh a thah khit uh ciangin tua gam luahin a sungah teeng uh a, amau’ pupi’ min tamin Leshem pen Dan ci-in min a phuak uh hi.
Hihte pen a beh tawh kizui-in Dan minamte’ luah hi a, hih a khuapite a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
Israel mite in gamh-in tua leitangte a hawm khit uh ciangin amaute lakah Nun tapa Joshua tungah gamh a pia uh hi.
Topa’ thupiakna tawh ama nget khuapi, Efraim mual tung gam a om Timnathserah a pia uh hi. Amah in tua khuapi lamkikin a sungah a teeng hi.

Hihte pen siampi Eleazar le Nun tapa Joshua le Israel minam beh lutangte in kikhopna bukkong, Topa’ mai Shiloh-ah aisanna tawh a hawm khiat uh gamh ahi hi. Tua bangin amaute in leitang hawmna a zo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah,

“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: ‘Sawm lohpi-in ahi a, theih lohna hangin ahi zongin mi khat a that khapa a tai theih nadingin Moses tungtawnin nang tungah kong gen bukna khuapite teel in. Phula pa kiang panin note adingin tua khuate pen bukna hi ding hi.

Hih khuapite khat peuhpeuhah amah tai-in khuapi kongpi tumna-ah ding dinga, tua khuapi upate kiangah a thu gentel ding hi. Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi sungah amah paipihin amah mun khat pia dinga, amaute tawh amah omkhawm ding hi.

Tua ciangin phulapa in amah a delh leh, tua pa tungah mi that pa pia lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in theih lohna hangin a veengpa thatin, a beisa hun sungah ama tungah galneihna bangmah nei lo hi.

Thukhenna thuak dingin mihonte mai-ah a din mateng le tua hun laitak a siampi lianpen pa a sih hun mateng, tua khuapi sungah amah om ding hi. Tua khit ciangin mi that khapa ama khua ama inn, a hong taikhiatna khua-ah paikik thei ding hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Naftali mual tung gam sunga om Galilee gam sung panin Kedesh khua, Efraim mual tung gam sungah Shekhem khua le Judah mual tung gam sungah Kiriatharba (Hebron a cihna) khuate a tuamkoih uh hi.

Jerikho nisuahna Jordan galkhat ah Reuben minam sung panin mualzang sehnel gam a om Bezer khua, Gad minam sung panin Gilead gam sunga om Ramoth khua le Manasseh minam sung panin Bashan gam sunga om Golan khuate a seh uh hi.

Hihte pen Israel mi khempeuh le amaute lakah a peem khualmi adingin sawm lopi-in mi khat a that khapa pen mihonte mai-ah a din ma-in phulapa khutah a sih loh nadingin a tai theih nadinga a kiseh khuapite ahi hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Eleazar le Nun tapa Joshua le Israel minam beh lutangte kiangah Levi beh lutangte hong pai uh hi.
Amaute in Kanaan gam sung Shiloh munah, “Ten nadingin khuapi le ka ganhingte uh adingin a lononate tawh kote hong kipiak ding Moses tungtawnin Topa in thu piazo hi,” ci-in amaute kiangah a gen uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thupiakna tawh Israel mite in amau’ luah sung panin Levi mite tungah a nuai-a khuapite le lonona gamte a pia uh hi.
Kohath behte adingin aisan hong tung hi. Tua ahih ciangin siampi Aaron’ suanlekhak ahi Levi mite in Judah, Simeon le Benjamin minamte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawm le thum ngah uh hi.
Tua ciangin a omlai Kohath mite in Efraim minam, Dan minam le Manasseh minam alangte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawm ngah uh hi.
Gershon mite in Issakhar minam, Asher minam, Naftali minam le Bashan gam sunga om Manasseh minam alangte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawm le thum ngah uh hi.
Merari mite in a beh uh tawh kizui-in Reuben minam, Gad minam le Zebulun minamte tung panin khuapi sawm le nih ngah uh hi.
Topa in Moses tungtawnin a thupiak bangin hih khuapite le a lonona gamte Israel mite in aisanna tawh Levi mite tungah a pia uh hi.
Judah minam le Simeon minam sung panin amaute in a nuai-a min kigen khuapite pia uh a,
Levi mite ahi Kohath beh sung panin Aaron’ suanlekhakte tungah tung hi; amaute tungah a ai kia masa ahih man hi.
Amaute in Judah mual tung gam Kiriatharba, Arba pen Anak’ pa (Hebron a cihna), a kiima lonona gam tawh amau tungah pia uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua khuapi’ lote le a khuaneute pen Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb tungah a neih dingin kipia khin hi.
Amaute in siampi Aaron’ suanlekhakte tungah mi thatte’ bukna khuapi Hebron a lonona gamte tawh, Libnah a lonona gamte tawh,
Jattir a lonona gamte tawh, Eshtemoa a lonona gamte tawh,
Holon a lonona gamte tawh, Debir a lonona gamte tawh,
Ain a lonona gamte tawh, Juttah a lonona gamte tawh le Bethshemesh a lonona gamte tawh, hih minam nihte sung panin khuapi kua a pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Benjamin minam panin Gibeon a lonona gamte tawh, Geba a lonona gamte tawh,
Anathoth a lonona gamte tawh le Almon a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi li a pia uh hi.
Siampi Aaron’ suanlekhakte’ khuapite a vekpi-in khuapi sawmthum le thum, a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Levi mite sung panin Kohath beh ahi a omlai Kohath mite tungah a kipia khuapite pen Efraim minamte a’ sung pan ahi hi.
Efraim mual tung gam a om khuapite sung panin mi thatte ading Shekhem a lonona gamte tawh, Gezer a lonona gamte tawh,
Kibzaim a lonona gamte tawh le Bethhoron a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi li amaute tungah kipia hi.
Tua ciangin Dan minam sung panin Eltekeh a lonona gamte tawh, Gibbethon a lonona gamte tawh,
Aijalon a lonona gamte tawh le Gathrimmon a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi li kipia hi.
Tua ciangin Manasseh minam alangte sung panin Taanak a lonona gamte tawh le Gathrimmon a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi nih kipia hi.
Kohath mi a omlai behte’ khuapite a vekpi-in a lonona gamte tawh khuapi sawm ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Levi beh sunga om Gershon mite tungah Manasseh minam alangte a’ sung panin Bashan gam sunga om khuapite sung panin mi thatte adingin bukna khuapi Golan a lonona gamte tawh le Beeshterah a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi nih kipia hi.
Tua ciangin Issakhar minam sung panin Kishion a lonona gamte tawh, Daberath a lonona gamte tawh,
Jarmuth a lonona gamte tawh le Engannim a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi li kipia hi.
Tua ciangin Asher minam sung panin Mishal a lonona gamte tawh, Abdon a lonona gamte tawh,
Helkath a lonona gamte tawh le Rehob a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi li kipia hi.

Tua ciangin Naftali minam sung panin Galilee gam sunga om khuapite sung panin mi thatte adingin bukna khuapi Kedesh a lonona gamte tawh, Hammothdor a lonona gamte tawh le Kartan a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi thum kipia hi.
Gershon mite beh tuamtuamte’ khuapite a vekpi-in a lonona gamte tawh khuapi sawm le thum ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Levi mi a omlai Merari behte tungah, Zebulun minam sung panin Jokneam a lonona gamte tawh, Kartan a lonona gamte tawh,
Dimnah a lonona gamte tawh le Nahalal a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi li kipia hi.
Tua ciangin Reuben minam sung panin Bezer a lonona gamte tawh, Jahaz a lonona gamte tawh,
Kedemoth a lonona gamte tawh le Mefaath a lonona gamte tawh, khuapi li kipia hi.
Tua ciangin Gad minam sung panin Gilead gam sunga om khuapite sung panin mi thatte ading bukna khuapi Ramoth a lonona gamte tawh, Mahanaim a lonona gamte tawh,
Heshbon a lonona gamte tawh le Jazer a lonona gamte tawh, a vekpi-in khuapi li kipia hi.
Levi beh a omlai ahi Merari beh tuamtuamte ading khuapi a kipia a vekpi-in sawm le nih ahi hi.
Israel mite’ neihsa lakah Levi mite’ khuapi a vekpi-in a lonona gamte tawh khuapi sawm le giat ahi hi.
Hih khuapite in a kiim ciatah lonona gam nei ciat a, hih khuapi khempeuh tua bang ahi hi.
Tua bangin Topa in amau’ pulepate tungah piak dingin a kiciam leitang khempeuh Israel tungah pia a, amaute in a ngah khit uh ciangin tua lai-ah a teeng uh hi.

Tua ciangin a pu a pate uh tungah a ciamsa bangin Topa in amaute tungah na khempeuh ah tawlngakna a pia hi. Topa in a galte khempeuh uh amau khut sungah pia ahih manin a galte uh khat beek in zong amaute nang zo lo hi.
Topa in Israel mite tungah a ciamsa thuhoih khempeuh khat zong a mawkna om lo a, a vekpi-in tangtung kim hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte samin
amaute kiangah, “Topa’ nasem Moses in note hong thupiak khempeuh zui-in, keimah in note kong thupiakna khempeuh ah ka thu na hong mang khin uh hi.
Tuni dong hih hun saupi sung na sanggamte uh na nusia kei uh a, Topa na Pasian uh hong sawlna limtakin zuih ding na ngaihsun uh hi.

Tu-in Topa na Pasian un amaute tungah a ciamsa bangin na sanggamte uh tawlngakna pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ nasem Moses in note hong piak Jordan galkhat, note’ neihsa a omna leitang na inn uhah note ciah un.

Topa’ nasem Moses in note hong piak thupiakna le thukham ahi, Topa na Pasian uh it ding, ama lampi khempeuh zuih ding, ama thupiakte zuih ding, amah belh ding le na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep ding uh limtakin ngaihsun un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in amaute thupha pia-in ciahsak a, amaute zong a inn ciat uhah a ciah uh hi.

Tu-in Manasseh minam alangte tungah Moses in Jordan nisuahna lam Bashan gam sungah neihsa pia khin hi. Ahi zongin Joshua in alangte tungah Jordan nitumna lam a sanggamte kiang uhah neihsa a pia hi. Joshua in amaute a inn uhah sawlin thupha a piak ciangin
amaute tungah, “Na inn uhah hauhna lianpi, ganhing tampi tak, ngun, kham, sumngo, sik le puan tampi tawh ciahkik un. Na galte uh van na suhte uh na sanggamte uh tawh hawm un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte, Moses tungtawnin Topa’ thupiakna tawh a neih uh amau’ leitang ahi Gilead gamah a pai dingin Kanaan gam sunga om Shiloh munah Israel mite tawh kikhenin a inn uhah a ciah uh hi.
Kanaan gam sunga om Jordan gam kiim teng a tun uh ciangin Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte in tua lai Jordan gun kiangah a lian mahmah biakna tau khat a lam uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in, “En un, Israel mite’ lampang, Jordan kiim gam, Kanaan gam nawlah Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte in biakna tau khat lam uh hi,” a kicihna za uh hi.
Israel mite in tua thu a zak uh ciangin amaute a do dingin Israel mihon buppi khempeuh Shiloh-ah kikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Gilead gam a om Reuben mite, Gad mite, le Manasseh minam alangte kiangah siampi Eleazar tapa Finehas,
le amah tawh ukpi sawm, Israel minam innkuan panin khat ciat, Israel behte lakah innkuan lutang ahite a sawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gilead gam sunga om Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte kiangah va pai-in amaute kiangah,
“Topa’ mihon buppi in, ‘Topa lehdona-ah tuni-in note adingin biakna tau khat lamna tawh Topa zuihna panin tuni-in kihei-in Israel Pasian’ tungah na gamtatnasa uh ahi hih khemna pen bang ahi hiam?

Topa’ mihonte tungah gimna khat a hong tungsak ahi, eite i kisiansuah nai beek lohna ahi, Peor-a i khialhna hawmthawhin, tuni-in Topa zuihna panin kihei khia ding na hi uh hiam? Note in tuni-in Topa lehdo le-uhcin zing ciangin Israel mihon buppi tungah amah heh ding hi.

Ahih hangin tu-in note’ lak na leitang uh nin ahihleh Topa’ biakbuk a dinna mun Topa’ leitangah hong pai unla, kote’ lakah luah hong nei un. Topa lehdo kei unla, Topa i Pasian’ biakna tau sim loh note ading biakna tau na lamna uh tawh kote a lehdo hong suaksak kei un.
Zerah’ tapa Akhan, a ki-ap nate-ah a khialh manin Israel mihon khempeuh tungah hehna hong tung hi lo ahi hiam? Ama mawhna hangin amah bek si lo hi,’ ci uh hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte in Israel beh lutangte dawngin,

“A Vanglian Pa, Pasian, Topa! A Vanglian Pa, Pasian, Topa! Amah in thei hi. Israel mahmah in zong thei tahen! Lehdona ahi a, Topa’ tungah thuman lohna ahi zongin ahih a, Topa zuihna panin a pial dingin biakna tau lam ka hih uhleh, tuni-in kote hong zah kei hen. Tua ahih kei leh zong, tua tungah meihal biakna ahi a, an tawh biakna ahi a, thunuama biakna ahi zongin piak nadingin a lam ka hih uhleh Topa mahmah in hong thuk tahen.
Tua bang hi hetlo hi. Hong tung ding hunte-ah na tate un ko’ tate tungah, ‘Israel Pasian, Topa tawh no bang kisai na hi uh hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh no Reuben mite le Gad mite le ko’ kikalah Topa in gamgi-in Jordan bawl khinzo hi. Topa’ sungah no tanh bangmah om lo hi,’ a cihkhak ding uh launa tawh ka bawl uh ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka tate un Topa a biak ding uh na tate un khaktan kha ding uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kote in, ‘Meihal biakna ahi a, biakpiakna ding ahi zongin hi loin, ama omna-ah ka meihal biaknate uh le ka biakpiaknate uh le thunuama ka piaknate uh tawh Topa’ na ka sepna uh kote le note’ kikal le ko’ khit ciangin i suanlekhakte kikalah teci dingin bawl ni. Tua bang hikeileh hong tung ding hunte-ah na tate un ko’ tate tungah, “Topa’ sungah no’ tanh bangmah om lo hi,” ci kha ding uh hi,’ ka ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hong tung ding hunte-ah kote tung ahi a, kote’ suanlekhakte’ tungah ahi zongin hih bangin hong kicih leh, ‘Meihal biak nading ahi a, biakpiak nading ahi zongin hi loin note le kote kikalah teci dingin ka pu ka pate un a bawl Topa’ biakna tau lim en un,’ i ci ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun uh hi.

Ama biakbuk mai-a om Topa ka Pasian uh biakna tau longal, meihal biakna ahi a, an tawh biakna ahi a, biakpiak nading lamna tawh ahi zongin kote in Topa lehdo-in Topa zuihna panin a pial ka hi het kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Siampi Finehas le amah tawh a om mihon ukpi, Israel beh lutangte in Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh mite’ thugenna a zak uh ciangin tua thugennate in amaute lungkimsak mahmah hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh mite tungah, “Topa tungah note zuautat nai lo na hih manun eite’ lakah Topa om hi, ci-in tuni-in i thei hi. Tu-in note in Topa’ gimpiak nading panin Israel mite na hon khia uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Eleazar’ tapa Finehas le ukpite, Gilead gam a om Reuben mite le Gad mite kiang panin Israel mite’ omna Kanaan gamah ciahkik uh a, amaute tungah thu puakkik uh hi.
Tua thu in Israel mite lungkimsak hi. Israel mite in Pasian phat uh a, Reuben mite le Gad mite a tenna leitang susia-in amaute galin do ding gen nawn lo uh hi.
Reuben mite le Gad mite in a biakna tau uh min dingin “Teci” a phuak uh hi. “Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa pen Pasian ahihna thu eite’ kikalah teci ahi hi,” amaute in ci uh hi.
Topa in amau’ kiima om gal khempeuh panin Israel mite tungah lungmuanna a piak khit a sawtpi ciangin Joshua teekin a kum tampi pha ta hi.
Joshua in Israel khempeuh, a upate le a lutangte, a thukhente le a uliante uh samin amaute kiangah, “Tu-in kei teekin ka kum tampi pha ta hi.
Note’ hangin Topa na Pasian un hih minam dangte khempeuh tungah a bawlnate na mu khin uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note adingin hong dosak pa pen Topa na Pasian uh ahi hi.
En un, Jordan panin nitumna lama Tuipi Lian dong, a omlai minamte pen ka zawhsa minamte tawh na minamte uh gamh dingin note tungah kong pia khin hi.
Topa na Pasian un note’ mai-ah amaute lehnawt dinga, note’ muhna panin hawl khia ding hi. Topa na Pasian un note’ tungah hong ciam bangin amau’ gam na luah ding uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note lakah a omlai hih minamte tawh kihel loin, amau’ pasian-te’ thu zong gen loin, tuate tawh zong kiciam loin, amau’ na sem loin, amaute’ mai-ah zong note kun loin, ahih hangin tuni-a na gamtat bangun Topa na Pasian uh na belh theih nadingun Moses’ thukham laibu sunga kigelhte khempeuh zui-in semin, themkhat zong pial loin na om nadingun khauhtakin om un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in note’ mai-ah a lian a thahat minamte hawl khia a, note na hih uhleh tuni dongin mi khat beek in hong nang zo nai lo hi.
Note tungah hong ciamsa bangin note adingin hong dosak pa pen Topa na Pasian uh ahih manin note khat in mi tulkhat na taikeeksak zo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa na Pasian uh na it ding uh hoihtakin ngaihsun un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note nungkikin note lakah a omlai minamte tawh kipawlin amaute tawh kiteengin, note in amau’ numeite teenpihin amaute in note’ numeite a teenpih leh,

Topa na Pasian un note’ mai-ah hih minamte hawl khia nawn lo ding hi, ci-in teltakin thei un. Topa na Pasian un note hong piak hih leitang hoih panin na sih khit matengun amaute pen note adingin thangzak le tehlop, na nung uh a hong sat ciangduai, ahih kei leh na mit sung uh a hong sun ling tawh kibang ding uh hi.

“Tu-in leitung mi khempeuh ngeina bangin kei a pai ding ka hi ta a, note khempeuh in na lungsim uh le na nuntakna uhah, Topa na Pasian un note tawh kisai na hoih hong ciam khempeuh khat zong maimawk lo ahihna na thei uh hi. A vekpi-in note adingin hong tangtung a, khat zong maimawk lo hi.

Ahih hangin, amah in note hong thupiak ahi Topa na Pasian uh thuciamna palsatin, note in pasian dangte’ na semin tuate na biak uhleh, Topa na Pasian un note tawh kisai-in a ciam na hoih khempeuh a tun mah bangin Topa na Pasian un note hong piaksa hih leitang hoih panin amah in note hong suksiat khit matengin note tungah siatna khempeuh hong tungsak ding hi. Note tungah Topa hong sinso dinga, note tungah a hong piak leitang hoih panin note manlang takin na bei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Israel minam khempeuh Shekhem-ah kaikhawmin a upate, a makaite, a thukhente le Israel uliante a sam hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ mai-ah amau ciat kipia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in mi khempeuh tungah, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin thu gen a, ‘Tanglai-in Eufratis gun galkhat ah na pu na pate uh teng ngei a, tuate lakah Abraham le Nahor’ pa Terah pen khat bek ahi hi. Na pu na pate un pasian dangte bia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gun gal panin na pu uh Abraham la-in Kanaan gam khempeuh ah ka paipih a, a suanlekhakte tampi ka phasak hi. Ama tungah Isaac ka pia a,
Isaac tungah Jakob le Esau ka pia hi. A neih dingin Seir mual tung gam Esau ka pia a, ahih hangin Jakob le a tate Egypt-ah a paisuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses le Aaron ka sawl a, a gam sunga ka sepnate tawh Egypt ka gimsak khit ciangin note kong pai khiatpih hi.
Egypt panin na pu na pate uh ka pai khiatpih a, tuipi a tung uh hi. Egypt mite in leeng le sakol tung tuangte tawh na pu na pate uh San Tuipi-ah delh uh hi.

Kei tungah amaute hong kiko uh ciangin amaute le Egypt mite kikalah khuamial ka koih a, Egypt mite tungah tuipi luangsakin amaute ka tuumsak hi. Egypt tungah ka bawlna na thei uh a, sehnel gam sungah sauveipi na om uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jordan galkhat ah a teeng Amor mite’ leitangah note kong paipih hi. Amaute in note hong do-in, note’ khut sungah amaute kong pia a, note in amau’ leitang na luah uh a, note’ mai-ah amaute ka susia hi.
Tua ciangin Moab kumpipa, Zippor’ tapa Balak hong khangin Israel mite hong do hi. Amah in mi sawlin note hong samsia dingin Beor’ tapa Balaam a samsak hi.
Ahih hangin Balaam’ thu ka ngai kei hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in note thupha hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin Balak’ khut sung panin note kong hon khia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jordan galkhat ah pai-in Jerikho na tung uh a, Jerikho mite in note hong do uh hi. Amor mite, Perez mite, Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Girgash mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite in zong note hong do uh a, ahi zongin note’ khut sungah amaute kong pia hi.
Amor kumpi nihte note mai-ah a hawl khia tunpite keimah in note mai-ah ka sawl hi. Tua pen note’ namsau ahi a, note’ thal tawh ahi zongin na dona hang uh hi lo hi.
Note in na sep loh uh leitang, na sat loh uh khuapite, note tungah kong pia a, tuate sungah na teeng uh hi. Na suan loh uh leenggui lo pan a gah leh oliv huan pan a gah na ne uh hi,’ ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa zahtak unla, lungsim tak le thumanna tawh ama na sem un. Na pu na pate un Gun gal le Egypt gam sungah a biak uh pasian-te koih khia unla, Topa’ na sem un.

Topa’ na na sepnop kei uhleh, Gun galkhat a a na na sepsak uh na pu na pate uh pasian ahi a, note’ tenna gam Amor mite’ pasian ahi zongin, a na na sepsak ding peuhpeuh uh tuni-in teel un. Ahih hangin kei le ka innkuanpihte in ahihleh Topa’ na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mite in dawngin, “Adang pasian-te’ na a sem dingin Topa nusiat ding ka ngaihsun ngei kei ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh salsuahna Egypt gam panin eite le i pu i pate a hong pai khiatpih, eite’ muhna-ah tua lim liante a bawl, i paina lampi khempeuh le i nawk mite khempeuh lakah hong kem pa pen Topa i Pasian ahi hi.
Topa in eite’ mai-ah tua gam a teeng Amor mite khempeuh hawl khia hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pen eite’ Pasian ahih manin kote in zong Topa’ na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Topa’ na na sem zo kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen a siangtho Pasian hi a, a aam Pasian zong ahi hi. Note’ thupalsatna ahi a, na khialhna uh ahi zongin hong maisak lo ding hi.
Topa nusia-in gamdang pasian-te’ na na sep uhleh, note tungah a hoih hong bawl khit ciangin amah hong kihei-in note’ tungah siatna hong bawlin note hong beisak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mite in Joshua kiangah, “Hilo hi; Topa’ na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Ama na a sem dingin Topa na teel khitna uhah note adingin note mah teci na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kote, teci ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Tua ahihleh note’ lakah a om gamdang pasian-te koih khia unla, Israel Pasian, Topa’ lamah na lungsim uh nga un,” a ci hi.
Mite in Joshua kiangah, “Topa i Pasian’ na ka sem ding uh a, ama thu ka mang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in Shekhem-ah tua ni-in mite tawh thuciamna bawl a, amaute adingin thukham le biakna ngeina kipte a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Pasian’ thukham laibu sungah hih kammalte a gelh hi. Amah in suangtum lianpi khat la-in Topa biakna mun tawsaw nuai-ah a phut hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in mi khempeuh kiangah, “En un, hih suangtum pen eite’ langkhat ah teci hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in eite tungah hong thugen khempeuh hih suangtum in za khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin note, na Pasian uh tungah a man loin na gamtat loh nadingun hih suangtum pen note’ langkhat ah teci hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in a milipin amau’ gamh ciatah, mite a ciahsak hi.
Hih thute khit ciangin Topa’ nasem, Nun’ tapa Joshua si a, a khan kum za le kum sawmkhat a pha hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Gaash mual leilu lam, Efraim mual tung gam a om Timnathserah mun a ama gamhluah leitangah a vui uh hi.
Joshua’ khang sung le Joshua sangin sau a nungta zaw upate khempeuh khang sungin Israel mite in Topa’ na sem a, Israel mite adingin Topa in a sep na khempeuh a thei uh hi.

Israel mite in Egypt panin a puak uh Josef’ guhte pen Shekhem’ pa Hamor’ tapate tung panin Jakob in dangka zakhat tawh a lei Shekhem leitangah kivui a, tua leitang pen Josef’ suanlekhakte’ luah a suak hi.
