Tua ciangin Aaron’ tapa Eleazar a si hi. Amaute in Efraim mual tung gam sunga a om, ama tapa Finehas tungah a kipia Gibeah khua-ah a vui uh hi.
Joshua a sih khit ciangin Israel mite in Topa tungah thu dong uh a, “Kanaan mite a sim dingin kua kuanto masa ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Topa in, “Judah minamte kuanto masa ding uh hi. En un, amau’ khut sungah tua leitang ka piazo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Judah minamte in a sanggam uh Simeon minamte kiangah, “Kanaan mite i zawh theih nadingin ko tungah hong kipia gamah kote hong zui un. Tua mah bangin no hong kipia gamah kote in zong kong zui ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Simeon minamte in a zui uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah minamte kuanto uh a, Topa in amaute’ khut sungah Kanaan mite le Perez mite a pia hi. Amaute in Bezek-ah tua mite tul sawm bang a zo uh hi.
Amaute in Bezek-ah Adonibezek tuakin amah tawh kido uh a, Kanaan mite le Perez mite a zo uh hi.
Adonibezek tai hi. Ahih hangin amaute in delhin man uh a, a khutpite le a khepite attan uh hi.

Tua ciangin Adonibezek in, “A khutpi le a khepi a ki-attan kumpi sawmsagihte in ka sabuai nuai-ah an nengkia tawm ngei uh hi. Ka gamtatnasa bangin Pasian in kei hong thuk hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Jerusalem-ah amah paipih uh a, tua munah amah a si hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite in Jerusalem simin la uh a, a mite thatin a khuapi hal uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Judah mite, mual tung gam, Negeb gam le lei niamna-a teng Kanaan mite a sim dingin paisuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Hebron (Hebron pen a nidangin Kiriatharba)-ah a teeng Kanaan mite a sim dingin Judah mite kuansuk uh a, amaute in Sheshai le Ahiman le Talmai a zo uh hi.
Tua lai panin Debir mite a sim dingin amaute a pai uh hi. Debir min pen nidangin Kiriathsefer ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Kaleb in, “Kiriathsefer simin a la zo pa tungah a zi dingin ka tanu Aksah ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kaleb’ naupa Kenaz’ tapa Othniel in la a, amah in a zi dingin a tanu Aksah a pia pah hi.
Tua nu tawh a kiteen ciangin a pa kiang panin lo khat a nget nading a zi hahsawl hi. A zi zong a la tung panin kum a, Kaleb in ama kiangah, “Bang ut na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Letsong khat hong pia in. Negeb lei keu gamah hong koih na hih ciangin tuikhukte zong hong pia in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Kaleb in ama tungah tuikhuk tungnungte le tuikhuk nuainungte a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Moses’ sungpate nam ahi Ken’ suanlekhakte, Judah mite tawh nisuh khuapi panin Negeb gam Arad gei-a om Judah gamah paito uh a, tua lai munah tungin tua mite tawh a teeng khawm uh hi.
Judah mite zong Simeon mite tawh paikhawmin Zefathah a teeng Kanaan mite va zo-in susia mang uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua khuapi min Hormah kici hi.
Judah mite in zong Gaza le a gam, Ashkelon le a gam le Ekron le a gamte a la uh hi.
Topa in Judah mite huh ahih manin amaute in mual tung gam teng luah uh a, ahih hangin zang gam a teeng mite hawl khia zo lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in sik leeng nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in a gensa bangin Kaleb tungah Hebron kipia a, tua sung panin amah in Anak’ tapa thumte fa hawl khia hi.
Ahih hangin Benjamin mite in Jerusalem-ah a teeng Jebus mite hawl khia lo uh ahih manin tuni dongin Jebus mite pen Jerusalem-ah Benjamin mite tawh a teeng khawm uh hi.
Josef minamte zong Bethel a sim dingin kuanto uh a, Topa in amaute a huh hi.
Amaute in thu kansim dingin Bethel-ah mi sawl uh hi. (Tua khuapi min pen a nidangin Luz ahi hi.)
Thu kansimte in khuapi panin hong pai khia mi khat mu-in ama kiangah, “Khuapi sung lutna lampi hong hilh in, kong thum uh hi, nang tungah kong diktat ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in khuapi sung lutna lampi amaute a lak hi. Amaute in namsau tawh tua khuapi mite vat uh a, ahih hangin tua mipa le a innkuante suaktasak uh hi.
A nung ciangin Hit mite gamah tua mipa pai-in khuapi khat sat a, a min pen Luz ci-in a phuak hi. Tu dongin tua khua min pen Luz mah ahi hi.

Manasseh mite in Bethshean le a khuaneute-a teeng mite, Taanak le a khuaneute-a teeng mite, Dor le a khuaneute-a teeng mite, Ibleam le a khuaneute-a teeng mite ahi a, Megiddo le a khuaneute-a teeng mite ahi zongin hawl khia lo uh ahih manin Kanaan gammite tua leitangah teeng lai uh hi.
Ahi zongin Israel-te a thahat uh ciangin amaute in aana tawh na a sem dingin Kanaan mite koih uh a, hawl khia siang lo uh hi.
Efraim mite in zong Gezer-ah a teeng Kanaan mite hawl khia lo uh ahih manin Gezer-ah amaute’ lakah Kanaan mite a teeng uh hi.
Zebulun minamte in Kitron-a teeng mite ahi a, Nahalol a teeng mite ahi zongin hawl khia lo a, Kanaan mite amaute lakah teengin aana tawh nasemte a suak uh hi.
Asher minamte in Akko a teeng mite, Sidon a teeng mite, Ahlab a teengte, Akzib a teengte, Helbah a teengte le Afik a teengte ahi a, Rehob-a teengte ahi zongin hawl khia lo uh hi.
Tua gam a teeng Kanaan mite lakah Asher mite teeng uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in hawl khia lo uh hi.

Naftali minamte in Bethshemesh-a teengte ahi a, Bethanath-a teengte ahi zongin hawl khia loin, tua gam a teeng Kanaan mite lakah a teeng uh hi. Ahi zongin Bethshemesh le Bethanath-a teeng mite pen amaute adingin aana tawh na a sem mite a suak uh hi.
Amor mite in mual tung gamah Dan mite notkik uh a, zang gamah paisuksak lo uh hi.
Amor mite pen Harheres, Aijalon le Shaalbim-ah teeng uh a, ahih hangin Josef minamte in amaute gawt semsem a, amaute pen aana tawh nasemte a suak uh hi.
Amor mite’ gamgi pen Akrabbim kahtohna, Sela leilu lam pan kipan hi.

Tu-in Gilgal panin Bokhim-ah Topa’ vantungmi paito hi. Amah in Israel mite kiangah, “Egypt panin note kong paipihto a, na pu na pate uh tungah piak dinga ka ciam leitangah note kong paipih hi. Keimah in, ‘Note tawh ka thuciam ka siasak ngei kei dinga,

hih gam a teeng mite tawh thuciamna na bawl kei ding uh hi. Amau’ biakna taute na susia ding uh hi,’ ka hong ci hi. Ahih hangin note in ka thupiakna na mang kei uh hi. Bang hangin lehgamtat na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in keimah in note’ mai-ah amaute ka hawl khia kei ding hi. Amaute pen note’ lang suak ding uh a, a pasian-te uh note adingin thang antah hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa’ vantungmi in Israel mi khempeuh tungah hih thute a gen ciangin mite a kap uh hi.
Tua ahih manin tua mun pen Bokhim, ci-in min phuak uh a, tua lai munah Topa’ tungah biakna a pia uh hi.
Joshua in mite ciahsak a, Israel mite zong leitang luah dingin amau’ gamh ciatah pai uh hi.
Mite in Joshua’ nuntak sung le, Israel-te adingin Topa’ sepsa na lian khempeuh a mu, Joshua sanga sau a nungta zawte khempeuh nuntak sungin Topa’ na sem uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ nasem ahi, Nun’ tapa Joshua, a khan kum za le kum sawmkhat a phak laitakin a si hi.
Amaute in Gaash Mual leilu lam, Efraim mual tung gam sung, Timnathheres-a ama luahna huam sungah a vui uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua khangmite khempeuh zong si khin uh a, amaute’ khit ciangin Topa hitaleh, Israel-te adingin a septe hitaleh a thei lo khangthak hong piang uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite, Topa’ muhna-ah a sia gamta-in Baal-te’ na sem uh hi.
Egypt panin amaute a pai khiatpih a pu a pate uh Pasian ahi Topa amaute in nusia uh hi. Amau’ kiima om mite’ pasian dangte’ nung zui-in, tuate’ mai-ah kun uh a, amaute in Topa hehsak uh hi.
Amaute in Topa nusia uh a, Baal-te le Ashtaroth pasian-te bia uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te tungah Topa sinso a, amaute’ na a sut, mi’ na a sut thei mite’ tungah amaute a pia hi. A kiima om a galte uh tungah amaute pia a, amaute in a galte uh nang zo nawn lo uh hi.

Galsim dingin amaute a kuankhiat sialun, Topa in a hilhkholhsa le Topa in amaute tungah a kiciamsa bangin amaute’ langkhat ah a sia lamin Topa pang hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in lungkhamna tuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin, amaute’ na a sut gawp mite’ vangliatna panin amaute a hon khia thukhente Topa in khangsak hi.

Ahi zongin amaute in a thukhente uh thu ngai lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in pasian dangte bia-in tuate’ mai-ah kun uh hi. Topa’ thupiakna a mang amau’ pute pate’ tot lampi panin amaute pial pah uh a, amaute in Topa’ thu mang lo uh hi.

Topa in amaute adingin thukhente a khansak sialin Topa in thukhente huh a, thukhente’ nuntak sung tawntung a galte uh khut sung panin amaute hon hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a gimsak a nengniamte’ hangin amau’ tauna in Topa’ hehpih nading piangsak hi.

Ahih hangin thukhente a sih peuhpeuh ciangin amaute kiheikikin a pu a pate uh sangin a sia zaw-in gamta zel uh hi. Adang pasian-te’ nung zui uh a, amaute’ na semin a mai uhah kun uh hi. Amaute’ gamtatnate uh ahi a, a lungkhauhnate uh ahi zongin khia lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te tungah Topa heh mahmah a, amah in, “Hih mite in amau’ pulepate’ tungah ka thupiak ka thuciamna khialin keima thu ngai lo uh ahih manin,
Joshua a sih lai-in a nusiat minamte khat zong tu a kipanin amaute’ mai-ah ka hawl khia kei ding hi.
Amau’ pute pate in Topa’ lampi a zuih bangin zuih ding a don uh hiam, a don kei uh hiam, cih a kitheih nadingin hih mite tawh Israel mite ka ze-et ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in tua minamte thakhatin hawl khia loin koihcing a, Joshua’ khut sungah amaute pia lo hi.
Tu-in Israel-te sung panin Kanaan gam sungah galdona a theikha nai lo Israel-te ze-et nadingin Topa in minam pawlkhat a siit hi.
Tua khang Israel mite in galdona a theih nading, nidangin galdona a thei ngei lo tua bang mite a hilh theih nading bek ahi hi.
Tua a siit minamte: Filistia ulian ngate, Kanaan mi khempeuh, Sidon mite le Baalhermon Mual panin Hamath lutna ciang dong Lebanon Mual tungah a teeng Hiv mite ahi hi.
Moses tungtawnin a pu a pate uh a thupiak, Topa’ thupiaknate Israel-te in a mang uh hiam, cih a kitheih nadingin amaute pen Israel-te a kize-etna ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite’ lakah Israel mite teeng uh hi.
Amaute in a zi dingun a tanute uh la uh a, amau’ tanute a tapate uh tungah a pia uh hi. Amaute in a pasian-te uh a bia uh hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah Israel-te a sia gamta-in, Topa amau’ Pasian mangngilh uh a, Baal-te le Asherah milimte a bia uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te tungah Topa sinso a, amah in Mesopotamia kumpipa Kushanrishathaim tungah amaute a pia hi. Israel mite in Kushanrishathaim’ na kum giat sung a sem uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa’ tungah Israel mite kiko uh a, Topa in Kaleb’ naupa Kenaz’ tapa Othniel, amaute a hon khia dingin a khangsak hi.
Topa’ Kha ama tungah tunga, amah, Israel mite’ thukhen a suak hi. Galsim dingin kuan khia a, Topa in ama khut sungah Mesopotamia kumpipa Kushanrishathaim a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a gam in kum sawmli sung tawlngakna hun nei hi. Tua ciangin Kenaz’ tapa Othniel a si hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ muhna-ah Israel-te a sia gamtakik uh ahih ciangin Topa in Israel-te’ langkhat ah Moab kumpipa Eglon thahatsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ muhna-ah amaute a sia gamta uh hi.
Eglon in Ammon mite le Amalek mite ama kiangah khawm a, va kuanin Israel-te va zo hi. Amaute in nisuh khuapi a luah uh hi.
Israel mite in Moab kumpi Eglon’ na kum sawm le kum giat sung a sem uh hi.

Ahih hangin Topa’ tungah Israel mite a kiko uh ciangin, Topa in Benjamin mi, Gera’ tapa a veikhoi Ehud, amaute’ honpa dingin a khangsak hi. Israel mite in ama tungtawnin Moab kumpipa Eglon tungah siah a puak uh hi.
Ehud in ama adingin langnih a hiam, pi khat le alang a sau namsau khat bawl a, a puannuai a taklam phei tungah tua namsau a khih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Moab kumpipa Eglon tungah a siah sung hi. Eglon pen a thau mahmah mi khat ahi hi.
Ehud in a siahsun’ a man khit ciangin siah a puak mite ciahsak hi.

Ahih hangin Gilgal kiang suang milimte omna panin amah kilehkikin, “Kumpipa aw, nang tungah gen ding thusim khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Gam dai un,” ci-in thu a pia hi. Amah a cing mi khempeuh ama omna panin pai khia uh hi.

Innkhum zang inndei a votna sungah amah guak tu-in a om laitakin ama kiangah Ehud hong pai hi. Ehud in, “Pasian’ kiang panin nang tungah gen ding thu khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a tutna panin amah dingto hi.
Tua ciangin Ehud in a veilam khut tawh a taklam phei panin a namsau la-in, tua pa’ gil sungah a siatsuk hi.
A namsau banah a bul zong tum a, a thau in a namsau tuamcip hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a gil panin amah in a namsau dok lo a, a ek lawt khia hi.
Tua ciangin inndei pua-ah Ehud pai khia-in, innkhumzang inndei kongkhakte amah khaknelhin tuate a kalh hi.
Amah a pai khiat khit ciangin nasemte hong pai hi. Innkhumzang inndei kongkhakte a kikalh a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Inn vot sunga inndei-ah awnghawh hi in teh,” ci-in ngaihsun uh hi.
A cih nading uh a theih loh zah dong uh ngak uh hi. Ahih hangin innkhumzang inndei kongkhak amah in a hon loh veve ciangin, amaute in a tawhtang la-in hong uh a, sual tungah a topa uh na si hi.
Amau’ zia kikalin Ehud tai-in suang milimte kheng a, Seirah-ah a tai hi.
Amah a tun ciangin Efraim mual tung gamah peengkul a gingsak hi. Mual tung gam panin Israel mite amah tawh paisuk uh a, amau’ lutangin Ehud a nei uh hi.

Amah in amaute kiangah, “Ka nung hong zui un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in na gal uh Moab mite na khut sung uhah hong piazo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama nungah amaute paisuk uh a, Moab mite kiang panin Jordan ngahmunte la-in, mi khat zong galkahsak lo uh hi.
Tua hunin amaute in a thahat a siam Moab mite khempeuh, mi tul sawm bang that uh a, mi khat zong suakta lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Moab gam pen Israel-te’ khutnuai a suak hi. Tua gam in kum sawmgiat sung tawlngakna a nei hi.
Ama khit ciangin Anath’ tapa Shamgar hi a, ciangkhut zum tawh Filistia mite zaguk a that pa ahi hi. Amah in zong Israel-te hon khia hi.
Ehud a sih khit ciangin Topa’ muhna-ah Israel mite a sia gamtakik uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Hazor-ah a uk, Kanaan kumpipa Jabin’ khut sungah amaute a pia hi. Ama galkapte a ukpa pen, Harosheth-ha-goiim ah a teeng Sisera ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite huhna a ngen dingin Topa’ tungah a kiko uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in sikleeng zakua nei a, Israel mite kum sawmnih sung nakpitakin gim a pia hi.
Tua hun lai-in Lappidoth’ zi kamsang numei Deborah in Israel-te thu khen hi.
Tua nu, Efraim mual tung gam sung Ramah le Bethel kikal nisuhkung nuai-ah tu zel a, thu a khensak dingin ama kiangah Israel mite hong pai uh hi.

Amah in mi sawlin Naftali gam Kedesh panin Abinoam’ tapa Barak samsakin ama kiangah, “Topa, Israel-te’ Pasian in nang thu hong pia-in, ‘Pai in, Tabor Mual-ah na mite khawm inla, Naftali minam le Zebulun minam panin mi tul sawm bang la in hong ci hi lo ahi hiam?
Keimah in Jabin’ galkapmaang Sisera, Kishon gun-ah nang hong dawntuah dingin a leengte le a galkapte tawh ka kai khia dinga, na khut sungah amah kong pia ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Barak in ama kiangah, “Kei na hong zuih ding le, ka kuan ding hi. Ahih hangin kei tawh nong kuan kei ding le, ka kuan kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Nang tawh kong kuan taktak ding hi. Ahi zongin gualzawhna pen nangma min than nading hi lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in numei khat’ khut sungah Sisera pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Deborah dingin Barak tawh Kedesh-ah pai hi.
Barak in Kedesh-ah Zebulun minam le Naftali minamte a sam hi. Ama kiangah mihing tul sawm bang kuanto uh a, amah tawh Deborah kuanto khawm hi.
Tu-in Moses’ zi’ sanggampa Hobab’ suanlekhak Ken mite sung panin Ken mi Heber pai khia a, Kedesh kiang a Zaanannim-a tawsaw ciang pekah a puanbuk a lam hi.
Abinoam’ tapa Barak, Tabor Mual-ah paito khin, ci-in Sisera kiangah a kigen ciangin,
Sisera in a leeng khempeuh, sikleeng zakua le ama kiang a om mi khempeuh, Harosheth-ha-goiim panin Kishon gun-ah a sam khia hi.

Tua ciangin Deborah in Barak kiangah, “Pai in! Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in na khut sungah Sisera hong piak ni ahi hi. Na mai-ah Topa pai hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mihing tulsawm bang in zui-in Tabor Mual panin Barak a paisuk hi.
Topa in Barak’ mai-ah Sisera le a leengte khempeuh a taisak hi. Tua ciangin Sisera a leeng tung pan tuakin a khe-in a tai hi.
Barak in Harosheth-ha-goiim ciang dong a leengte le a galkapte delh a, Sisera’ galkapte khempeuh namsau tawh kithatin bei mang uh a, mi khat zong suakta lo hi.
Ahih hangin Sisera, Ken mi Heber’ zi Jael’ puanbukah a khe-in a tai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Hazor kumpipa Jabin le Ken mi Heber’ innkuante kilem uh hi.

Sisera a dawn dingin Jael hong pusuakin ama kiangah, “Hong kihei in, ka topa aw, kei lamah hong kihei in; lau kei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama puanbukah Sisera hong pai a, tua nu in sualphah puan khat tawh amah na khuh hi.

Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Hong thum ing, dawn ding tui hong pia in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka dangtak hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in bawngnawi koihna savun thawl hongin dawnsakin amah a khuhkik hi.
Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Puanbuk kongah ding inla, mi khatpeuh hong pai-in na kiangah, ‘Hih lai-ah mi khatpeuh a om hiam?’ hong cih leh, ‘Om kei,’ na ci in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Heber’ zi Jael in puanbuk khetphim khat la a, a khutah sek khat tawi-in ama kiangah damtakin pai a, a gimluatna hangin ihmucipin a om laitakin a khetphim in lei a bat dongin a paangah a khensuk hi. Tua ciangin Sisera a si hi.

En in, Barak in Sisera hong delh ciangin amah a dawn dingin Jael hong pusuakin ama kiangah, “Hong pai in, na mi zon kong lak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua nu’ puanbuk sungah amah hong pai hi. Tua lai-ah Sisera a paangah puanbuk khetphim tawh a si-in na om hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Israel mite’ mai-ah Pasian in Kanaan kumpi Jabin nuaisiah hi.
Israel mite in Kanaan kumpipa Jabin a suksiat matengin Kanaan kumpipa Jabin tungah thuak hak semsem uh hi.
Tua ciangin Deborah le Abinoam’ tapa Barak in tua ni-in la sa uh a,
“Makaite in Israel-te makai uh a, mite amau mahmah utna tawh kipia uh hi. Topa phat un.
Ngai un, kumpite aw, na bil uh ngat un, uliante aw. Topa tungah la ka sa dinga, Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa’ tungah la ngaih ka sa ding hi.
Topa aw, Seir panin na pai khiat ciang, Edom gam panin na pai khiat ciang, leitung liing a, vantung panin guah zu hi. Hi hi, meiite in tui hong khia a,
Topa’ mai-ah mualte kiliing hi, Israel Pasian, Topa’ mai Sinai galkhat ah.
“Anath’ tapa Shamgar’ hun lai, Jael’ hun lai-in, a hon hona khualzinte om nawn lo a, khualzinte lam gei-ah pial uh hi.
Israel sunga lokhote khawlcip uh a, bangmah sem thei lo uh hi. Nang, Deborah, nong khan mateng, Israel sungah nu banga nong khan mateng.
A thak pasian-te a kiteel ciangin, kulhkongpi sungah gal om pah hi. Lum ahi a, tei ahi zongin, Israel tul sawmlite lakah kimu ahi hiam?
Mite lak panin utna tawh amau a kipia tawm Israel a ukte’ lamah ka lungsim pai hi. Topa phat un.
“A thu gen un, no la puang tungah a tuangte, sualphah puanhoih tungah a tute le lampi-ah a paite aw.
Tui phuala lasakna a tumte’ ginna in Topa’ gualzawhna gen a, Israel sunga lo khote in zong a gualzawhna mah genkik uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ mite kulhkongpite-ah paisuk uh hi.
“Khanglo in, khanglo in, Deborah! Khanglo in, khanglo in, la khat sa in! Tho in, Barak, na galmatte pai khiatpih in, Abinoam’ tapa aw.
Tua ciangin ulianpa’ mi a omlaite paisuk uh a, ama ading a dosak dingin Topa’ mite paisuk uh hi.
Efraim panin amaute ding khia-in tua kuamah pai uh a, nang, Benjamin, na behte tawh hong zui uh hi. Makhir panin a ukte hong paisukin, Zebulun panin ulianpa’ ciangkhut a tawite hong paisuk uh hi.
Issakhar uliante Deborah tawh hong pai a, Barak tungah Issakhar thuman hi. Kuam sung ama khe phungah amaute kituah uh hi. Reuben behte lakah nakpi taka lungsim ngaihsutna a om hi.
Bang hangin tuukhawkte lakah tuuhonte adingin tamngai kitum a ngai dingin ၐzekai na hi hiam? Reuben behte lakah nakpi taka lungsim ngaihsutna a om hi.
Jordan galkhat ah Gilead om hi. Dan minamte bang hangin teembaw tawh om ahi hiam? Asher minamte, tuipi gei-ah tu lai a, leilak a tunna gei-ah a teeng uh hi.
Zebulun mite a sih dongun gal sungah a kipia ngam mi hi a, Naftali minamte zong, gamlak a sangna munah tua bangmah ahi hi.
“Kumpite hong pai-in do uh hi. Tua ciangin Kanaan kumpite in Megiddo tuite’ gei, Taanak-ah do uh a, amaute in a kinusia ngunte ngah lo uh hi.
Vantung panin aksite in do uh a, amau paina ciat panin Sisera do uh hi.
Kishon guntui khang in amaute tai a, a leeng vanvan tuikhang, Kishon tuikhang in tai hi. Thakhauh takin mai nawtsuak ding!
Tua ciangin sakol khe, a kop taina, a sakol hangte’ koptaina a ging hi.
“Topa’ vantungmi in, ‘Meroz khua samsia in, a sunga teeng mite nasia takin samsia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa a huh dingin a thahatpa dona-ah Topa a huh dingin hong kuan lo uh hi,’ a ci hi.
“Numeite lakah thupha ngah pha pen Jael, Ken mi Heber’ zi, puanbukah a teeng numei lak pan thupha ngah pha pen ahi hi.
Sisera in tui ngen a, Jael in bawngnawi pia hi. Ulian hai sungah tua nu in bawngnawi thaukhal paipih hi.
Amah in puanbuk khetphim a khutin zam a, a taklam khutin nasemte’ khetbuk a zam hi. Sisera khatvei sat a, a lutang satkhamin, amah in phelkhamin a paang a sun hi.
Amah tuk hi, amah puk hi. Tua nu’ khe kiangah amah taang loin om hi. Ama khe phungah amah tuk hi, amah puk hi. A tukna munah, amah a si-in puk hi.

“Tawlet panin Sisera’ nu khuadak a, a kikalh simsiam kawm panin Sisera’ nu khuadak hi: ‘Bang hangin a leeng hong ciah ding hih tanvei sawt ahi hiam? A leeng khegingte bang hangin hici zekai ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.
A numeite a pil pennu in amah a dawng hiam, dawng lo hi. Amah le amah kidawng a,

‘Amaute in vankinusiate mu-in hawm hi lo ahi hiam? Mi khat ciangin nungak khat ahih kei leh nih pai; a kinusia puan kinimte Sisera ading, a kinusia puan kinim a kizemte, a kinim a kizem puan nihte ka ngawng ading maw?’ a ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin na gal khempeuh si khin uh hi, Topa! Ahih hangin na lawmte pen a vangliatna tawh a suak ni bang tahen,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin tua gam in kum sawmli sung tawlngakna hun a nei hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah Israel-te a sia gamta uh a, Topa in Midian-te’ khut sungah amaute kum sagih sung a pia hi.
Israel-te tungah Midian-te gualzo uh hi. Midian-te’ kiang panin a buk nadingun leihawmte le munmuanhuaite a bawl uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te in khai a tuh peuhmah uh ciangin Midian-te le Amalek mite le Nisuahna lam mite hong pai-in amaute sim uh hi.

Amaute a sim nadingun giahphual satin Gaza kiim ciangciang dong lei pan a piangte susia uh a, Israel mite a nuntak nading bangmah nusia loin, tuu ahi a, bawngtal ahi a, la ahi zongin siit nei lo uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a ganhingte le a puanbukte uh tawh kauphe honpi bangin tamin hong pai uh a, amaute le a kalaohte uh kisim zo lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute hong tun ciangin gam teng beisak uh hi.
Midian-te’ hangin Israel-te kiniamkoih mahmah a, Israel mite in Topa’ tungah huhna ngenin kiko uh hi.
Midian-te’ hangin Israel mite Topa’ tungah a kiko uh ciangin,
Topa in Israel mite kiangah kamsang khat a sawl hi. Amah in amaute kiangah, “Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Salsuahna Egypt panin note kong pai khiatpih hi.
Egypt mite le note hong nengniam mi khempeuh khut sung panin note kong hon khia a, note’ mai-ah amaute hawl khia-in, amau’ leitang note kong pia hi.

Tua ciangin note kiangah, ‘Kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi. Na tenna uh Amor mite’ pasian-te zahtakna na pia kei ding uh hi,’ kong ci hi. Ahih hangin note in ka thu na ngai kei uh hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ofrah khua-ah Topa’ vantungmi hong pai a, Abiezer mi Joash neihsa tawsaw nuai-ah hong tu hi. Tua laitakin Joash’ tapa Gideon in Midian mite’ muh loh dingin leenggah sukna-ah mangbuh cil simin na om hi.
Topa’ vantungmi ama tungah kilangin ama kiangah, “Topa in nang hong ompih hi, a thahat a vanglian mipa aw,” a ci hi.

Gideon in ama kiangah, “Kong thum hi, sia aw, Topa in kote hong ompih ahihleh, bang hangin hih thu khempeuh ko tungah hong tung ahi hiam? Ka pate un kote tungah hong genin, ‘Topa in Egypt panin eite hong paipih hi lo ahi hiam?’ a cih uh a lamdang ama sepnate khempeuh koi-ah om ta ahi hiam? Ahih hangin tu-in Topa in kote hong paaikhia-in Midian-te’ khut sungah hong pia khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama lamah Topa kihei-in, “Hih nangma thahatna tawh pai inla, Midian-te’ khut sung panin Israel-te hon khia in. Nangmah hong sawl khin hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Gideon in ama kiangah, “Kong thum hi, Topa aw, Israel-te bangci hotkhiat zawh ding ka hi hiam? En in, Manasseh minam sungah keima behte a hat lo pen hi a, ka innkuan sung panin kei a neu pen ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in ama kiangah, “Nang kong ompih dinga, nangmah in mihing khat bang lelin Midian-te na vat gawp ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Tu-in nong hehpih zawh leh, kei tawh a kiho mi pa pen nang na hihna lim khat hong lak in.
Kong thum hi, letsong puakin nang kiangah hong pai-in nangma mai-ah kong koih mateng hih lai panin na pai khia kei in,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Nong tunkik mateng ka na om ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Gideon a inn-ah pai-in keelno khat le annel seu khat silngo sawh loh moh a bawl hi. A sa ciang sung khatah koihin a satui beel sung khatah koih a, tawsaw nuai ama kiangah tuate hong paipihin a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Sa le silngo sawh loh moh la-in, hih suang tungah koih inla, a tungah satui sung in,” a ci hi. Tua bangmahin amah in a hih hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in a khut sung a om ciangkhut dawn dawksakin, sa le silngo sawh loh mohte a su hi. A suang panin mei piang khia-in, sa le silngo sawh loh moh a kaangtum hi. Tua ciangin ama muhna panin Topa’ vantungmi a mang hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in amah pen Topa’ vantungmi ahih lam a thei hi. Gideon in, “Ala, Topa Pasian! Topa’ vantungmi mai kituahin ka mukha khin hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Nopna na tungah hong om tahen; lau kei in, na si kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in Topa adingin biakna tau khat tua lai-ah lamin tua pen, “Topa in nopna ahi hi”, ci-in min a phuak hi. Tua pen, Abiezer mite’ neihsa Ofrah khua-ah tuni dongin a dinglai hi.
Tua zanin Topa in ama kiangah, “Na pa’ bawng sung pan kum sagih a pha a bawngtal nih la inla, na pa’ neih Baal biakna tau phelin, a gei-a om Asherah milim phuk in.

Tua ciangin hih lai munmuanhuai dawnah Topa na Pasian adingin biakna tau khat lamin, a suangte a ngeina ding bangin koih in. Tua ciangin a bawngtal nih la-in, na phuk Asherah milim sing tawh meihal biakna-in pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gideon in a nasemte mi sawm paipihin, Topa in ama tungah a gen bangin a hih hi. Ahih hangin sunin a hih ding a innkuanpihte le a khuamite kihta lua ahih manin zanin a hih hi.
Tua khua mite zingsang tungin a thawh uh ciangin, Baal biakna tau kiphelkhia-in a gei-a om Asherah milim kiphuk a, a kilam thak biakna tau tungah bawngtal a nihna a kipia a mu uh hi.
Amaute khatlekhat kiangah, “Hih na kua in hih ahi hiam?” kici uh hi. Amaute in a thu kanin a dot uh ciangin, “Joash’ tapa Gideon in hih hi,” kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua khuamite in Joash kiangah, “Na tapa in Baal biakna tau phel khia-in a gei-a om Asherah milim phuk ahih manin ka thah theih nadingun amah hong pai khiatpih in,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Joash in ama langkhat ah a pang mite khempeuh tungah, “Baal panpih dinga, ama tupna hutpih ding na hi uh hiam? Amah a panpih peuhmah zingsang ciangin kithat ding hi. Amah pasian ahihleh a mahmah kihu tawm tahen. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama biakna tau a kiphelsak ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Gideon, “Keima langkhat ah Baal pangsak un,” a cihnopna ahi Jerubbaal min kiphuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Gideon in a biakna tau a phel hi.
Tua ciangin Midian mite, Amalek mite le Nisuahna lam mite khempeuh hong paikhawm uh a, amaute in Jordan kantanin Jezreel Kuam-ah giahphual a sat uh hi.
Ahih hangin Gideon’ tungah Topa’ kha hong tung hi. Amah in peengkul gingsak a, amah a zui dingin Abiezer mite kisamkhia hi.

Amah in Manasseh gam khempeuh ah kamtaite sawl a, amaute zong amah a zui dingin kisam hi. Amah in Asher, Zebulun le Naftali minamte kiangah kamtaite sawl a, amah a pawm dingin amaute zong paito uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in Pasian kiangah, “Na gensa bangin keima tha tawh Israel-te na hotkhiat ding leh,

en in, ancilna sual tungah tuumul lom khat ka koih hi. Tuumul tung bekah daitui omin leilak dang khempeuh a keu leh, na gensa bangin keima tha tawh Israel-te na hon khia ding hi, cih ka thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangmahin a piang hi. A zing ciangin tho baihin a tuumulte a tui suk a, tuumul panin tui hai khat dim a suk khia hi.

Tua ciangin Gideon in Pasian kiangah, “Kei tungah hong heh kei in, tu-a khatvei bek hong pausak lai in, kong thum hi; tuumul tawh hih khatvei bek hong sinsak lai in, kong thum hi. Tuumul tung bek keusak inla, mun dang leitung khempeuh ah daitui omsak in,” a ci hi.
Tua bangmahin Pasian in tua zanin a hih hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuumul tung bek keu a, mun dang leitung khempeuh ah daitui a om hi.

Tua ciangin Jerubbaal (Gideon a cihna) le amah tawh a om mi khempeuh zingsangin tho baihin Harod tuikhuk gei-ah giahphual a sat uh hi. Midian-te’ giahphual pen amau’ kiang pan leilu lam, Moreh mual kiang, kuam sungah om hi.

Topa in Gideon kiangah, “Amau’ khut sungah Midian mite piak nadingin nang tawh a omkhawm mite kei adingin tamlua hi. Tua bangin tamlua leh kei tungah Israel-te kisialin, ‘Komau’ hatna hangin ka gualzo uh hi,’ ci kha ding uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in mite’ zakin taangko inla, ‘Lau-in a liing mi peuhmah a inn-ah ciah un,’ ci in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Gideon in amaute ze-et hi; tul sawmnih le tulnih ciahkikin, tul sawm bang bek omlai hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Gideon kiangah, “Mite tamlua lai ahih manin tui gei-ah amaute paipih in. Nang adingin tua munah amaute kong sinsak ding hi. Nang kiangah, ‘Hih mipa nang tawh hong kuan ding hi,’ ka cih pa nang tawh hong kuan ding hi. Nang kiangah, ‘Hih mipa nang tawh hong kuan lo ding hi,’ ka cih peuhpeuh pa kuan lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in tui phualah mite paipih suk hi. Topa in Gideon kiangah, “Ui in a liah bangin a lei tawh tui a liak mi peuhmah na tuamkoih ding hi. Tua mah bangin tui dawn dingin a khukdin suk peuhmah zong na tuamkoih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tui a liak, a khut uh a kam ah a tuah mi zathum ahi hi. Ahih hangin a dangte khempeuh tui dawn dingin khukdin suk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Gideon kiangah, “Tui a liak mi za thumte tawh nangmah hong hon khia-in, na khut sungah Midian mite kong pia ding hi. A dangte khempeuh amau’ inn ciatah ciahsak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Israel midang khempeuh ciahsak a, a beelte le a peengkulte khempeuh uh a kem mihing za thumte a khawlsak hi. Midian-te’ giahphual pen amau’ khanglam kuam sungah om hi.
Tua zan mahin Topa in ama kiangah, “Tho in, giahphual simin pai in; bang hang hiam cih leh na khut sungah kong piazo hi.
Ahih hangin na simsuk ngam kei leh, na nasem pa Purah tawh a giahphual nai uhah paisuk in.

Tua ciangin amaute’ thugen na za dinga, giahphual simin a kuansuk dingin na tha hong khauh ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nasem pa Purah tawh giahphual a om galkapte in a pualamah a galpanna munah a paisuk uh hi.
Midian mite, Amalek mite le Nisuahna lam mite khempeuh kauphe bangin tamin kuam dungah om uh hi. A kalaohte uh sim zawh hi lo a, a tamna pen tuipi gei-a sehnel omzah bang ahi hi.

Gideon a tun ciangin, mi khat in a lawmpa kiangah mang khat na gen hi. Amah in, “Ngai in, mang khat ka man hi. Midian-te giahphual sungah mangbuhham tawh a kibawl moh khat hong tuksukin puanbuk hong ban a, puanbuk deng kha-in puanbuk puk a, puanbuk kilumletin leilakah kiphah hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a lawmpa in dawngin, “Hih pen, Israel mi Joash’ tapa Gideon’ namsau lo adang hi lo hi. Pasian in ama khut sungah Midian le mihon khempeuh pia khin hi,” a ci hi.

Gideon in a mang le a khiatna a kigenna a zak ciangin Pasian bia-in a khukdin hi. Israel-te’ giahphual ah ciahkikin, “Tho un, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in na khut sung uhah Midian honte hong piazo hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in mihing za thumte pawl thumin khenin, amaute khempeuh tungah peengkul le beel sungah meilah a om beel hawmte a pia hi.
Amaute kiangah, “Keimah hong en unla, a giahphual nawl ka tun ciangin kei’ hih bangin hih un.
Kei le ka ompih khempeuh in peengkul ka tum uh ciangin, giahphual pang khempeuh ah zong peengkulte tum unla, ‘Topa-a’ ding le Gideon ading,’ ci-in awng un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, amaute in galvil a laih khit phet, zankim laitakin, Gideon le amah tawh a om mi za khatte giahphual nawlah hong pai uh a, amaute in peengkul tumin a khut sung uha om beelte a sukham uh hi.

A pawl thumun peengkul tumin beelte sukham uh a, a veilam khutun meilah tawi-in, a taklam khutun a tum ding uh peengkul tawi uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute kiko-in, “Topa ading le Gideon ading namsau khat!” a ci uh hi.
Amaute a vekpi-in giahphual kiimah ding uh a, a galte khempeuh uh kiko-in tai khia uh hi.

Amaute in peengkul za thumte a tum uh ciangin, Topa in a galte khempeuh a namsau uh tawh amau le amau kisat gawpsak hi. Tua ciangin a galte uh Zererah gei Bethshittah ciang le Tabbath kiang Abelmeholah gamgi dong tai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Naftali, Asher le Manasseh minamte khempeuh sung panin mite kisamkhia a, amaute in Midian-te a delh uh hi.

Tua ciangin Gideon in Efraim mual tung gam khempeuh ah kamtaite sawl a, “Midian mite’ langkhat ah hong kuansukin Bethbarah ciang dong luite hong la unla, Jordan zong hong la un,” cisak hi. Tua ahih ciangin Efraim mite khempeuh kisamkhia a, amaute in Bethbarah ciang dong luite la-in, Jordan zong a la uh hi.

Amaute in Midian ulian nihte Oreb le Zeeb a man uh hi. Amaute in Midian-te a delh kawmun Oreb Suangpi-ah Oreb that uh a, Zeeb Leenggahsukna ah Zeeb that uh hi. Amaute in Jordan galkhat Gideon kiangah Oreb le Zeeb lutangte hong paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Efraim mite in Gideon kiangah, “Midian-te a do dingin na kuancil lai-in kote nong sap loh, kote hong bangci ngaihsut na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in nakpitakin amah mawhsak uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note tawh teh dingin kote bang hi lel ka hi uh hiam? No Efraim minamte’ sep a themno khat pen ko minam bup khempeuhte’ sep sangin thupi zaw hi lo ahi hiam?

Pasian in note’ khut sungah Midian uliante Oreb le Zeeb hong piazo hi. Note tawh teh dingin kote in bang hih zo ka hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amah hih bangin kam a pau ciangin ama tunga amau’ hehna a bei hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon le amah tawh a om mi za thumte, Jordan tungin galkah uh a, a gimpi mahin amaute delh lai uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in Sukkoth mite kiangah, “Kong thum hi, kei hong zuite tungah anlum pawlkhat pia un; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute gim uh a, Midian kumpi Zebah le Zalmunna a delh ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Sukkoth uliante in, “Na galkapte tungah anlum ka piak dingun Zebah le Zalmunna na khut sungah omkhin ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in, “Tua ahihleh pha hi. Topa in Zebah le Zalmunna ka khut sungah hong piak khit ciangin gamlak lingte le lingkungte tawh na sa uh ka kuikek ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai panin Penuel-ah paito a, amaute tungah zong tua mah bangin a gen hi. Penuel mite in Sukkoth mite’ dawn mah bangin amah na dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Penuel mite kiangah, “Lungnuamin kong paikik ciangin hih tausang ka supai ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tu-in Zebah le Zalmunna-te, Nisuahna lam mi galkap khempeuh sung pan a omlai teng, mihing tul sawm le tulnga bang bek a pha lai a galkapte uh tawh Karkor-ah om uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh namsau a tawi mi tul za le tul sawmnih si khin hi.
Tua ciangin Nobah le Jogbehah nisuahna lam mihonte’ tot lampi zui-in Gideon paito-in a galte va bingphawn’ hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a galte uh galvil om lo hi.
Tua ciangin Zebah le Zalmunna tai uh hi. Amah in amaute delhin Midian kumpi nihte Zebah le Zalmunna manin amau’ galkap khempeuh kithehthangsak hi.
Tua ciangin Joash’ tapa Gideon a galsimna panin Heres kahtohna lam tawnin ciahkik hi.
Amah in Sukkoth mi tangval khat manin thu dong hi. Tua pa in ama adingin uliante le upate mihing sawmsagih le sagih a min gelhsak hi.

Tua ciangin Sukkoth mite kiangah amah tungin, “Kei tungah hong kisialin, ‘A gim na mite tungah anlum ka piak dingun Zebah le Zalmunna na khut sungah omkhin ahi hiam?’ na cih uh Zebah le Zalmunna en un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a khuapi upate sam a, gamlak lingte le lingkungte zong la-in, tuate tawh Sukkoth mite a thuhilh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Penuel tausang supai-in tua khua mite a that hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Zebah le Zalmunna kiangah, “Tabor-ah na thah uh mite koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Amaute, nangmah bang uh hi; amaute in kumpipa’ tapate suun uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Amaute, ka sanggam ka laigui zoppihte ahi uh hi. Topa a nuntak mah bangin, amaute suaktasak hi le-uhcin note kong that kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a ta upa pen Jether kiangah, “Ding in, amaute that in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin tangvalpa in a namsau dok ngam lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah tangval lai ahih manin a lungsim hang nai lo hi.

Tua ciangin Zebah le Zalmunna in, “Nang mahmah ding inla, kote hong hih in; bang hang hiam cih leh pasal nasep a sem dingin pasal mah kisam hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Gideon dingin Zebah le Zalmunna that a, amau’ kalaohte’ ngawng a a om khade lim tawh a kibang kizepnate a la hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Gideon kiangah, “Nang le na tapa le na tupa dongin zong kote hong uk un; bang hang hiam cih leh Midian-te’ khut sung panin kote nong hon khia hi,” a ci uh hi.
Gideon in amaute kiangah, “Note kong uk kei dinga, ka tapa in zong note hong uk lo ding hi. Topa in note hong uk ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Gideon in amaute kiangah, “Note tung panin kong ngetnop khat om hi. Note in van kinusia na top uh lak panin bilbahte hong pia un,” a ci hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute, Ishmael mite ahih manin kham bilbah nei uh hi.)
Amaute in dawngin, “Lungkim takin kong pia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in puan phah uh a, mi khempeuh in van kinusia a top uh lak panin bilbahte tua puan tungah a lawn uh hi.

Ama nget kham bilbahte a gihna pen kham shekel tulkhat le zasagih ahi hi. Midian kumpite in a zat khade lim tawh a kibang kizepnate, khainiangte, puan dupsante le a kalaohte uh ngawng kimkotah a om ngawng-awhte a kisim lo ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in tuate mi limin bawlin ama khuapi Ofrah khua-ah a koih hi. Israel-te khempeuh in tua lai munah tua milim bia uh a, Gideon le a innkuanpihte adingin thangzak khat a suak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite’ mai-ah Midian-te guallel uh a, amaute kihisak zo nawn lo uh hi. Gideon’ hun sungin tua gam in kum sawmli sung lungnopna a nei hi.
Joash’ tapa Gideon pai-in ama aituam inn-ah a teeng hi.
Tu-in Gideon in tapa sawmsagih, ama a’ mahmah nei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in zi tampi nei hi.
Shekhem-ah a om a zineu in zong tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Abimelek a phuak hi.
Tua ciangin Joash’ tapa Gideon teeksih a, Abiezer mite’ neihsa Ofrah khua-a om a pa Joash’ hanah kivui hi.
Gideon a sih khit phetin Israel mite kiheikikin Baal-te bia uh a, a pasian dingun Baalberith a bawl uh hi.
Israel mite in, mun khempeuh panin amau’ galte’ khut sung pan a hon khia Topa a Pasian uh phawk lo uh hi.
Jerubbaal note in Israel-te tungah a bawl thuhoihte khempeuh hangin amaute in Jerubbaal innkuante tungah lungdamna bangmah lak lo uh hi.
Tu-in Jerubbaal’ tapa Abimelek, Shekhem a a nu’ tanaute kiangah pai-in amaute khempeuh kiangah,

“Shekhem khuami khempeuh huau-in gen un, ‘Jerubbaal’ tapa sawmsagihte a vekpi in note hong uk ding le khat in note hong uk ding, note adingin koi hoih zaw ahi hiam?’ a ci hi. Kei pen note’ guh note’ sa ka hihna zong phawk un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a nu’ tanaute in ama tangin Shekhem mite khempeuh tungah hih thute gen uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute’ lungsim Abimelek zuih ding lamah hoi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Amah i naihuai ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Baaberith inn panin ngun pek sawmsagih Abimelek pia uh a, amah in ama nung a zui, bangmah-a a kimang lo le thu ngaihsun thei lo mite cialna hi.
Tua ciangin Ofrah-a a pa’ inn-ah amah pai-in, Jerubbaal’ tapa a sanggam mi sawmsagihte suang khat tungah a that hi. Ahih hangin amah bu ahih manin Jerubbaal’ tapa neu pen Jotham a suakta hi.
Tua ciangin Shekhem khuamite khempeuh le Bethmillo khuamite khempeuh hong paikhawm uh a, amaute in Shekhem khua-a tawsaw songpi kiangah Abimelek kumpi a suaksak uh hi.
Jotham kiangah tua thu a kigen ciangin amah pai-in Gerizim Mual dawnah dinga, nakpi-in kiko-in amaute kiangah, “No Shekhem mite aw, Pasian in note’ thu hong ngaih theih nadingin ka thu hong ngai un.
Khatvei, singkungte amau’ tungah kumpi-in sathau a nilh dingin kuan khia uh a, amaute in oliv kung kiangah, ‘Kote hong uk in,’ a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin oliv kung in amaute kiangah, ‘Keimah in pasian-te le mite a kipahtawina ahi ka thaunate nusia-in singkungte a uk dingin hong pai ding ka hi hiam?’ ci hi.
Tua ciangin singkungte in theikung kiangah, ‘Hong pai inla, kote hong uk in,’ ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin theikung in amaute kiangah, ‘Keimah in ka khumna le ka gah hoihte nusia-in singkungte a uk dingin hong pai ding ka hi hiam?’ ci hi.
Tua ciangin singkungte in leenggui kiangah, ‘Hong pai inla, kote hong uk in,’ ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin leenggui in amaute kiangah, ‘Keimah in pasian-te le mite a lungnuamsak ka leenggahzu nusia-in singkungte a uk dingin hong pai ding ka hi hiam?’ ci hi.
Tua ciangin singkung khempeuh in thangling kung kiangah, ‘Hong pai inla, kote hong uk in,’ ci uh hi.

Thangling kung in singkungte kiangah, ‘Note tungah kumpi-in lungsim tak tawh sathau hong nilh na hih uhleh, hong pai unla, ka liimah hong bu un. Ahi zongin ka liim nuai-ah nong buk kei uhleh, thangling kung lak panin meikuang hong pai khia henla, Lebanon taamtak kungte kaangtum hen,’ ci hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Abimelek kumpi-in na bawl uh ciangin lungsimtak le thumantak mah tawh a gamta na hi uh hiam? Jerubbaal le a innkuan tungah thuman takin gamta-in ama sepna tawh a kituakin amah a bawl mah na hi uh hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa in note ading hong dosakin a lauhuaina sungah a nuntakna pia a, Midian-te’ khut sung panin note hong hon khia hi.

Ahi zongin tuni-in ka pa’ innkuan langkhat ah note pangin a tapate mi sawmsagih suang khat tungah na that uh a, ka pa in a nasem numei tawh a neih a tapa Abimelek pen note’ naihuai ahihna hangin Shekhem khuamite tungah kumpi-in na bawl uh hi.
Note in tuni-in Jerubbaal le a innkuanpihte tungah lungsimtak le thumantak tawh a gamta takpi mah na hih uhleh, Abimelek tungah note lungdam unla, note tungah zong amah lungdam tahen.

Ahih hangin tua bang ahih takpi kei leh, Abimelek sung panin meikuang hong pai khia henla, Shekhem le Bethmillo khuamite kaangtum hen. Shekhem khuamite sung pan le Bethmillo khuamite sung panin meikuang hong pai henla, Abimelek kaangtum hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggampa Abimelek a kihtakna hangin Jotham tai khia-in Beer-ah pai-in tua lai-ah a teeng hi.
Abimelek in Israel-te tungah kum thum sung uk hi.
Pasian in Abimelek le Shekhem mite kikalah kigalneihna omsak a, Shekhem mite in Abimelek lehdo uh hi.

Tua pen, Jerubbaal tapa sawmsagihte a kithahna thu tawh kisai-in, amaute a that a sanggampa uh Abimelek le a sanggamte thah nadingin a hanthawn Shekhem mite tungah thukkikna hong tuntheih nadingin a kibawl mahmah ahi hi.
Tua hi a, Shekhem mite in Abimelek a pangsim dingin mual dawnah mi koih uh a, amaute in tua lam a tawn mi khempeuhte’ na na sut uh hi; hih thu Abimelek kiangah kigen hi.
Tua ciangin Ebed’ tapa Gaal a tanaute tawh Shekhem-ah hong kikhin uh hi. Shekhem mite in amah muang uh hi.
Amaute lo ah kuanin a leenggui uh panin leenggah khawmin cil uh a, pawi khamin amaute’ pasian’ inn-ah pai uh a, an ne tui dawnin omin Abimelek zahko uh hi.

Tua ciangin Ebed’ tapa Gaal in, “Abimelek, kua hi a, ama na i sepsak dingin ei Shekhem mite kua ihi hiam? Jerubbaal’ tapa le ama ulian Zebul in Shekhem mite’ pulepa Hamor’ na sem uh hi lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin ama na sem ding ihi hiam?
Hih mite keima khutnuai hileh! Abimelek ka khin khia ding hi. Abimelek kiangah, ‘Na galkap behlap inla hong kuan khia in,’ ka ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khuapi a uk Zebul in Ebed tapa Gaal’ kammalte a zak ciangin heh mahmah hi.
Amah in Arumah khua-a om Abimelek kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “En in, Ebed tapa Gaal le a tanaute Shekhem-ah hong pai-in nang langpangin tua khuapi sosuah hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na ompih mite tawh zanin pai unla, gamlakah pangsim un.
Tua ciangin zingsang ni a suah phetin tho baih unla, khuapi sim gawp un. A ompih mite tawh nang a do dingin hong kuankhiat ciangun ahi thei bangin amaute tungah na bawl ding uh hi,” cisak hi.
Tua ciangin Abimelek le amah tawh a om mite khempeuh zanin tho-in pawl li kisuahin Shekhem a sim dingin pangsim uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ebed tapa Gaal pai khia-in khuapi kulhkongpi lutna-ah dinga, Abimelek le amah tawh a om mite zong a pansimna panun dingto uh hi.
Gaal in tua mite a muh ciangin amah in Zebul kiangah, “En in, mual dawn panin mite hong paisuk!” a ci hi. Zebul in ama kiangah, “Mual liimte mi bangin a mu na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Gaal pau kikin, “En in, a gam laizang panin mite hong paisuk a, Aisante’ Tawsaw lam panin pawlkhat hong pai hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zebul in ama kiangah, “Tu-in na kamhanna koi-ah om ahi hiam? ‘Ama na i sep dingin Abimelek kua ahi hiam?’ a ci pa hi lo na hi hiam? Hih mite, na simmawhte hi lo ahi hiam? Tu-in pai khia inla amaute tawh kido in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Shekhem mite’ mai-ah Gaal kuan khia-in Abimelek tawh kido hi.
Abimelek in Gaal delh a, ama mai-ah Gaal a tai hi. Kulhkongpi lutna ciang dong nangawnah mi tampi liamin tuk hi.
Tua ciangin Arumah ah Abimelek a teeng hi. Zebul in Gaal le a tanaute hawl khia a, amaute Shekhem-ah teeng thei nawn lo uh hi.
A zing ciangin gamlakah Shekhem mite pai khia uh hi. Hih thu Abimelek kiangah kigen hi.
Amah in a mite la-in pawl thum suahin gamlakah pangsim uh hi. Tua ciangin amah khuadakin khuapi panin mite a kuan khia mu a, amaute do-in kipan a, amaute that hi.
Abimelek le amah tawh a om a pawlte in thakhatin mainawt uh a, ama pawldang nihte in gamlak a om mite delhin a thah sungin khuapikulh lutna-ah amaute na ding uh hi.
Abimelek in sun tawntung tua khuapi sim a, tua khuapi la-in a sunga om mite that a, tua khuapi phiatin ci a vawh hi.
Shekhem Tausang mite khempeuh in tua thu a zak uh ciangin Elberith’ inn munmuanhuai-ah lut uh hi.
Shekhem Tausang mite khempeuh kikaikhawm uh hi, ci-in Abimelek kiangah kigen hi.

Tua ciangin amah tawh a om mi khempeuh tawh Zalmon Mual-ah Abimelek kuanto hi. Abimelek in a khutin hei khat la-in selkeu lom khat sat a, tuate la to-in a liangko tungah koih hi. Tua ciangin amah tawh a om mite kiangah, “Kei’ hih nong muhsa bangun kei’ hih bangbangin manlangin hih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh in amau ading ciat selkeu tomin Abimelek zui-in munmuanhuai sim nadingin koih uh a, amaute in mei tawh munmuanhuai halin Shekhem Tausang mite, numei le pasal mi tulkhat bang a si hi.
Tua ciangin Thebez-ah Abimelek pai a, Thebez langpangin giahphual sat a, tua khua a la hi.
Ahih hangin tua khuapi sungah tausang muanhuai om a, tua khua numei le pasal, tua khuami khempeuh tua tausangah tai-in kikhaknelh uh a, tausang khumah amaute om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abimelek zong tausangah pai-in sim a, mei tawh a hal dingin tausang kongkhak a naih hi.
Numei khat in an gawina suangpek tungnung, Abimelek’ lu tungah lawnin a lu guh dengkham hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama hiam a tawisak tangvalpa nawh sapin ama kiangah, “Na namsau dok inla kei hong that in. Tua hikeileh mite in, ‘Numei khat in amah that hi,’ hong ci kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi. A tangvalpa in amah sunletin amah a si ta hi.
Israel mite in Abimelek a sihna a muh uh ciangin amau’ inn ciatah a ciah uh hi.
Ama sanggam sawmsagihte thatin a pa tungah a khialhna hangin tua bangin Pasian in Abimelek’ khialhna a thuk ahi hi.
Pasian in Shekhem mite khempeuh’ gitlohna hangin Jerubbaal’ tapa Jotham’ samsiatna bangin amau’ tungah gimna a tungsak hi.
Abimelek khit ciangin Israel-te a hon khia dingin Issakhar minam Dodo’ tapa Puah, Puah’ tapa Tola hong khang a, Efraim mual tung gam Shamir-ah a teeng hi.
Amah in Israel-te kum sawmnih le kum thum sung thu khen hi. Tua ciangin amah si a, Shamir-ah kivui hi.
Ama khit ciangin Israel-te kum sawmnih le kum nih sung thu a khen Gilead mi Jair hong khang hi.
Amah in la sawmthum tungah a tuang tapa sawmthum a nei hi. Amaute in Gilead gam sunga om tu dongin Havvothjair a kici khuapi sawmthum nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jair si-in Kamon-ah kivui hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ muhna-ah Israel mite a sia gamtakik uh a, Syria mite’ pasian-te, Sidon mite’ pasian-te, Moab mite’ pasian-te, Ammon mite’ pasian-te, Filistia mite’ pasian-te le Baal-te le Ashtaroth bia uh a, amaute in Topa nusia-in ama na sem lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel-te tungah Topa sinso a, amah in Filistia mite tung le Ammon mite tungah amaute pia a,
amaute in Israel mite tua kum su gawpin nengniam uh hi. Amaute in Jordan galkhat Gilead gam sunga om Amor mite’ leitangah a om Israel mite khempeuh kum sawm le kum giat sung nengniam uh hi.
Judah, Benjamin le Efraim minamte a sim dingin Ammon mite Jordan hong galkah uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te nakpitakin lungkham uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa tungah Israel-te kiko uh a, “Nang tungah kong khial khin uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kote in ka Pasian uh nusia-in Baal-te ka bia uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Topa in Israel mite kiangah, “Egypt-te le Amor mite, Ammon mite le Filistia mite kiang panin hong hon khia hi lo ka hi hiam?
Sidon mite, Amalek mite le Maon mite in note hong nengniam uh hi. Kei tungah note nong kiko uh a, keimah in amaute’ khut sung panin note kong hon khia hi.
Tua hinapi-in note in kei hong nusia-in pasian dangte na bia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin note kong hon khia nawn kei ding hi.
Pai unla note’ teel pasian-te tungah kiko un. Na lungkham hunun amaute kihonkhiasak un,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Israel mite in Topa tungah, “Ka khial khin uh hi. Hoih na sak bangin ko tungah hong hih in. Tuni-in hong hon khia in, kong thum uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in amau’ lak panin gamdang pasian-te koihkhia-in Topa a bia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te’ gentheihna ah amah a dah hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon mite galhiam tawi dingin kisam uh a, Gilead-ah giahphual sat uh hi. Israel mite zong kikaikhawmin Gilead gam sung Mizpah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mihonte le makaite khatlekhat in, “Ammon mite do dinga a kipan ngam kua om ihi hiam? A kipan ngam mipa, Gilead gam a teeng mite khempeuh tungah lutang hi ding hi,” a kici uh hi.
Tu-in Gilead khuami Jefthah, a thahat galhang khat hi a, ahih hangin amah pen zawlta ahi hi. Jefthah’ pa Gilead hi a,

Gilead’ zi in zong amah tawh tapa dang nei hi. A tapate a khan ciangun amaute in Jefthah notkhia-in ama kiangah, “Ka pa uh inn sungah gamh na luah kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen numei dang tawh zawlta na hi lel hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggamte kiang panin Jefthah tai-in Tob gam sungah teeng a, bangmah a man lo mite in Jefthah pawmin amah tawh mite su gawpin pai kawikawi uh hi.
Tawlkhat khit ciangin Ammon mite in Israel-te sim uh hi.
Ammon mite in Israel-te a sim ciangin Tob gam panin Jefthah a la dingin Gilead upate va pai uh hi.
Amaute in Jefthah kiangah, “Ammon mite i do theih nadingin hong pai inla kote’ makai hong hi in,” va ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Jefthah in Gilead upate kiangah, “Note in kei hong mudahin ka pa’ inn pan hong hawl khia hi lo na hi uh hiam? Bang hangin thuhaksa na tuah uh ciangin kei kiangah hong pai na hi uh hiam?” na ci hi.

Tua ciangin Gilead upate in Jefthah kiangah, “Kote tawh nang hong pai-in Ammon mite do-in Gilead gam sunga teeng mi khempeuh tungah lutang nong hih theih nadingin nang’ lamah hong kihei ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jefthah in Gilead upate kiangah, “Note in Ammon mite a do dingin inn-ah kei nong ciahpih uh a, kei tungah Topa in amaute hong piak leh kei pen note’ lutang ka hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Gilead upate in Jefthah kiangah, “Topa pen eite’ kikalah teci hi ding hi. Na cih bangin ka gamta ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gilead upate tawh Jefthah pai a, mite in amau’ tungah lutang le makai-in amah koih uh hi. Jefthah in hih thute khempeuh Mizpah khua sung Topa’ mai-ah a gen ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Jefthah in Ammon mite’ kumpipa kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Ka gam a sim dingin kei kiangah nong pai nadingin kei’ tungah bang thu om ahi hiam?” cisak hi.

Ammon mite’ kumpipa in Jefthah’ kamtaite dawng a, “Egypt panin Israel-te hong pai lai-in Arnon panin Jabbok le Jordan ciang ka gam hong laksak hang ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in thudamin hong piakik in,” a ci hi.
Jefthah in Ammon mite’ kumpipa kiangah kamtaite sawlkikin
ama kiangah, “Jefthah in hih bangin ci hi: Israel-te in Moab leitang hitaleh Ammon mite’ leitang hitaleh la lo hi.
Egypt panin Israel-te hong paitoh lai-in gamlak tawnin San Tuipi-ah hong pai-in Kadesh hong tung uh hi.

Israel-te in Edom kumpipa kiangah kamtaite sawl a, ‘Kong thum uh hi; na gam sung hong nawksak in,’ cisak uh hi. Ahih hangin Edom kumpipa in a thu ngai lo hi. Tua ciangin Moab kumpipa kiangah zong sawl uh a, ahih hangin amah thukim lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kadesh-ah Israel-te om phot uh hi.

Tua ciangin sehnel gam tawnin amaute khualzin uh a, Edom gam le Moab gam kimkotin pai-in Moab gam nisuahna lampangah tung uh a, Arnon gun galkhat ah phual sat uh hi. Ahih hangin Moab gam sungah amaute lut lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Arnon gun pen Moab gamgi ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Israel-te in Heshbon khua-ah a om Amor mite’ kumpi Sihon kiangah kamtaite sawl uh hi. Israel-te in ama kiangah, ‘Kong thum uh hi; ka gam uh a zuan dingin na gam hong nawksak in,’ ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Sihon in ama gam a nawk dingin Israel-te muang lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Sihon in a mite khempeuh kaikhawmin Jahaz-ah giahphual sat a, Israel-te na sim hi.
Topa, Israel-te’ Pasian in Sihon le a mite khempeuh Israel-te’ khut sungah pia a, amaute in zo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua gam sunga teeng Amor mite’ leitang khempeuh Israel-te in luah uh hi.
Amaute in Arnon gun panin Jabbok lui ciang le sehnel gam panin Jordan gun ciang, Amor mite’ gam khempeuh a luah uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa, Israel-te’ Pasian in ama mi Israel-te’ mai panin Amor mite paai khia hi. Tu-in nangmah in luahkik ding sawm na hi hiam?
Na pasian Khemosh in na neih dinga hong piakte kem peuh in. Kote ahihleh Topa ka Pasian un kote’ mai-ah a suan khiatte ka tang ding uh hi.
Tu-in nang pen Moab kumpipa, Zippor’ tapa Balak sangin gina zaw na hi hiam? Amah in Israel-te to ngei a, amaute do ngei ahi hiam?
Heshbon le a khuaneute, Aroer le a khuaneute le Arnon gun panga om khuapite khempeuh sungah Israel-te a ten kum zathum hun sung tengin bang hangin lakik lo na hi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin nang tungah ka khial kei a, kei nong simna-ah kei tungah nang nong khial hi. Topa, Thukhen pa in Israel mite le Ammon mite kikalah tuni-in thu khen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Ammon kumpipa in ama kiangah thu a puak Jefthah’ thu a don kei hi.
Tua ciangin Jefthah’ tungah Topa’ kha hong tunga, amah in Gilead le Manasseh nawkin Gilead gam Mizpah-ah paisuak a, Gilead gam Mizpah panin Ammon mite kiangah paisuak lai hi.
Jefthah in Topa tungah thuciamna bawlin, “Ka khut sungah Ammon mite nong piak leh
Ammon mite kiang panin gualzo-in ka ciah ciangin keimah a dawn dingin ka inn sung pan a hong pai peuhpeuh Topa a’ hi dinga, meihal biak nadingin kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute a sim dingin Ammon mite kiangah Jefthah galkah a, Topa in ama khut sungah amaute a pia hi.
Amah in Aroer panin Minnith kiimnai ciang dong khuapi sawmnih le Abelkeramim ciang dong mi tampi tak thatin a vat gawp hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite mai-ah Ammon mite guallel uh hi.

Tua ciangin Mizpah-a ama inn-ah Jefthah hong ciah hi. Amah a dawn dingin a tanu khuangneute tawh a laamsa-in hong pai khia hi. Tua nu pen ama ta khat neihsun hi a, amah sim loh tapa ahi a, tanu ahi zongin adang nei lo hi.

Amah in a tanu a muh ciangin a puan balkekin, “Ala, ka tanu! Kei nong niamkoih mahmah hi. Kei adingin lungkhamna lianpi nong suak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa tungah thu ka ciam khin a, ka thuciamna ka dokkik thei kei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a tanu in ama kiangah, “Ka pa aw, Topa tungah thu ciam khin na hih leh, na thuciamna tawh kizui-in kei’ tungah hong bawl in. Tu-in Topa in na gal Ammon mite tungah nang ading hong thuksak khin hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a pa kiangah, “Kong ngetnop thu khat om hi. Kei pai-in mualtungah vak kawikawi-in kei le ka lawmte in nungak-in ka sih nading hangin ka thum theih nadingun kha nih sung kei guak hong omsak in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Pai ta in,” a ci hi. Amah in kha nih sung a tanu pai khiasak hi. Tua ciangin amah le a lawmte pai khia-in nungakin a sih nading hangin mualte tungah kapin a thum uh hi.

Kha nih a cin ciangin a pa kiangah amah ciahkik a, amah in ama bawlsa a thuciamna bangin a tanu tungah hih hi. Tua nu pen pasal tawh a lumkhawm nai lo, nungakin khansih hi. Tua ciangin Israel-te sungah ngeina khat suak a,
Israel numeite kum khatin ni li sung kum simin Gilead mi Jefthah’ tanu hangin a thum dingin pai khia uh hi.

Efraim mite galhiam tawi dingin kisam uh a, amaute Zafon gun kantanin galkah uh a, Jefthah kiangah, “Bang hangin Ammon mite a sim dingin galkahin, nang tawh a kuankhawm dingin kote hong zawn lo na hi hiam? Na inn tawh nang kong halnelh ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jefthah in amaute kiangah, “Kei le ka mite in Ammon mite tawh buaina lianpi khat ka nei ngei uh hi. Note kong sap hangin amau’ khut sung panin kei nong hon khia kei uh hi.

Note in kei nong hotkhiat loh ding uh ka theih ciangin kei mahmah hanciam tawmin Ammon mite a sim dingin ka galkah a, Topa in kei’ khut sungah amaute hong pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin tuni-in kei a hong sim dingin hong kuan na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jefthah in Gilead mite khempeuh khawmin Efraim mite tawh kido uh hi. Gilead mite in Efraim mite vat gawp uh hi. (Efraim mite in, “No Gilead mite pen Efraim-te le Manasseh-te sung panin Efraim mite a taisante na hi uh hi,” ci ngei uh hi.)

Gilead mite in Efraim mite tung panin Jordan ngahmunte la uh hi. Efraim galtaite khat peuhpeuh in, “Hong galkahsak in,” a cih ciangin Gilead mite in ama kiangah, “Efraim mi na hi hiam?” ci uh hi. Amah in, “Hi kei ing,” a cih ciangin

amaute in ama kiangah, “Tua ahihleh Shibboleth ci in,” ci uh a, tua ciangin amah in, “Sibboleth,” ci hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a manin ci thei lo hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah manin Jordan ngahmunte-ah that uh hi. Tua tungin Efraim mi tul sawmli le tulnih tuk hi.
Jefthah in Israel mite kum guk sung thu khen hi. Tua ciangin Gilead mi Jefthah si a, Gilead gam ama khuapi sungah kivui hi.
Ama nungah Bethlehem khuami Ibzan in Israel-te thu khen hi.
Amah in tapa sawmthum nei hi. Ama beh pualam mite tungah tanu sawmthum mo kha a, a pualam panin a tapate adingin tanu sawmthum la hi. Amah in Israel-te kum sagih sung thu khen hi.
Tua ciangin Ibzan si a, Bethlehem-ah kivui hi.
Ama nungah Zebulun mi Elon in Israel-te kum sawm sung thu khen hi.
Tua ciangin Zebulun mi Elon si a, Zebulun gam Aijalon-ah kivui hi.
Ama nungah Pirathon mi Hillel’ tapa Abdon in Israel-te thu khen hi.
Amah in la sawmsagihte tungah a tuang tapa sawmli le tupa sawmthum nei hi. Amah in Israel-te kum giat sung thu khen hi.
Tua ciangin Pirathon mi Hillel’ tapa Abdon si a, Amalek mite’ mual tung gam Efraim leitang tung, Pirathon-ah kivui hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah Israel mite a sia gamtakik uh a, Topa in Filistia mite’ khut sungah kum sawmli sung amaute a pia hi.
Dan minam sung panin Zorah khuami Manoah min nei mi khat om hi. Ama zi tasel ahih manin ta nei lo hi.
Topa’ vantungmi tua numei kiangah kilangin ama kiangah, “En in, na tasel a, ta na nei kei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kidawm inla, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne loin, a nin bangmah ne kei in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh nang gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi. Ama lu tungah mulkiatna kitah lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh naupang pen a suah a kipanin Pasian’ tungah Nazir mi hi dinga, amah in Filistia mite’ khut sung panin Israel-te hotkhiat ding kipan ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin tua nu pai-in a pasal’ kiangah gen a, “Pasian’ mi khat ka kiangah hong pai a, ama mel pen Pasian’ vantungmi mel tawh kibangin dipkuathuai mahmah hi. Koi panin hong pai cih amah ka dong kei a, amah in ama min hong gen lo hi.

Ahih hangin amah in kei kiangah, ‘En in, nang gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne kei inla, a nin bangmah ne kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh naupang pen a suah a kipan a sih dong Pasian’ tungah Nazir mi hi ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Manoah in Topa kunh a, “Topa aw, kong thum hi; na hong sawl Pasian’ mipa ko’ kiangah hong paisakkik inla, a hong suak ding naupang ka bawl nading uh hong hilhsak in,” a ci hi.
Pasian in Manoah’ aw ngai-in lo lai-ah tua nu a tut laitakin Pasian’ vantungmi ama kiangah hong pai hi. Ahih hangin a pasal Manoah amah tawh om lo hi.
Tua ciangin tua nu nawhsa-in tai-in a pasal kiangah, “En in, zanhal a kei kiangah hong pai mipa ka kiangah hong kilangkik hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Manoah dingin a zi zui a, mipa kiangah pai-in, “Hihnu kiangah thugenpa nang na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Manoah in, “Na thugente a manin hong tun ciangin naupang’ nuntak zia ding bang hi a, amah in bang hih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in Manoah’ kiangah, “Numei’ kiangah ka gente khempeuh na kidawm hen.
Amah in leenggui pan a piang peuhmah ne thei lo dinga, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne thei loin, a nin na khat peuhpeuh ne thei lo ding hi; amah ka thupiak khempeuh tang hen,” a ci hi.
Manoah in Topa’ vantungmi kiangah, “Kong thum hi; tawlkhat khawl inla, nang adingin keelno khat hong bawlsak nung,” a ci hi.

Topa’ vantungmi in Manoah kiangah, “Nong khawlsak zongin na an ka ne kei ding hi. Ahih hangin meihal biak nading a baihsa-in na bawl leh Topa tungah pia in,” a ci hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh Manoah in amah Topa’ vantungmi ahih lam thei lo hi.)
Manoah in Topa’ vantungmi kiangah, “Na thugente a manin hong tun ciangin nang kong pahtawi theih nadingun, na min bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Hih thu a lamdang hi, ci-in thei napi-in bang hangin ka min hong dong na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Manoah in an-a biakna tawh a keelno la-in nalamdang a bawl Topa adingin suang tungah a pia hi.
Biakna tau panin vantung lamah meikuang a paitoh ciangin, Manoah le a zi in a et laitakun biakna tau meikuang sungah Topa’ vantungmi kahto hi. Tua ciangin amaute leilakah a bok uh hi.
Manoah le a zi’ tungah Topa’ vantungmi kilang nawn lo hi. Tua ciangin Manoah in amah Topa’ vantungmi ahih lam thei hi.
Manoah in a zi kiangah, “Pasian mu khin ihih manin i si taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a zi in ama kiangah, “Topa in eite thah hong sawm hileh, i meihal biakna le an tawh i biakna hong sang lo dinga, hih nate khempeuh hong lak loin, hih bang nate zong eite’ tungah hong pulak lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua numei in tapa khat nei-in a min Samson a phuak hi. Naupang khangto a, Topa in thupha a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ kha in Zorah le Eshtaol kikal Mahanehdan ah Samson hanthot ding a kipan hi.
Khatvei Timnah-ah Samson va paisuk a, Timnah-ah Filistia nungak khat mu hi.
Tua ciangin amah ciahto-in a nu le a pa kiangah, “Filistia nungak khat Timnah-ah ka mu hi. Ka zi dingin va la un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a nu le a pa in ama kiangah, “Nang pai-in dawibia Filistia mite kiang panin zi na lak nadingin na tanaute’ lak ahi a, i mipih khempeuh lakah ahi zongin numei khat beek om lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

A nu le a pa in hih thu pen Topa’ kiang pan ahih lam thei lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Filistia mite tungah paulap ding a zong ahi hi. Tua hun laitakin Filistia mite in Israel-te uk uh hi.
Tua ciangin a nu le a pa tawh Timnah-ah Samson paisuk a, Timnah leenggui lote-ah amah tung hi. Tua lai-ah humpinelkai khanglai khat in amah hawksan hi.

Tua ciangin ama tungah Topa’ kha khauhtakin hong tunga, mi khat in keelno khat a bal gawp bangin amah in a khut guak tawh humpinelkai a balzan hi. Ahih hangin tua bangin ahihna thu a nu tung ahi a, a pa tungah ahi zongin gen lo hi.
Tua ciangin amah paisukin a numei tawh kiho hi. Tua nu in Samson lungkimsak mahmah hi.
Tawlkhat khit ciangin tua nu a la dingin paikik hi. Humpinelkai luanghawm a en dingin amah lampialin a va et leh humpinelkai luanghawm sungah khuai hon khat le khuaizu na om hi.

Amah in a khut tawh tuate sawkin paisuak a, a pai kawmin a ne hi. Amah a nu le a pa kiangah tungin tuate pawlkhat pia a, amaute in a ne uh hi. Ahih hangin humpinelkai luanghawm sung panin tua khuaizu a lakna thu gen lo hi.
Tua ciangin numei kiangah a pa paisuk a, Samson in zong tua lai-ah pawi khat a kham hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tangvalte’ hih ngei ahi hi.
Mite in amah a muh uh ciangin amah a uap dingin tangval sawmthum hong paipih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samson in amaute kiangah, “Note’ mai-ah thuhaksa khat hong gen ning. Hih pawi ni sagih sungin a thu mu khia-in bang hiam cih nong gen theih uhleh saihadial puan silh sawmthum le pawipuan silh sawmthum note kong pia ding hi.

Ahih hangin bang hiam cih nong gen theih kei uhleh saihadial puan silh sawmthum le pawipuan silh sawmthum kei nong pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Na thuhaksa hong gen in, za dih ni,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “A ne pa sung panin nek ding pawlkhat hong piang a, a thahatpa sung panin a khum pawlkhat hong piang hi,” a ci hi. Ni thum sungin tua thuhaksa bang hiam cih gen thei lo uh hi.

A ni li ni-in amaute in Samson’ zi kiangah, “A thuhaksa bang hiam cih hong gen nadingin na pasal zol in. Tua hi kei leh nang le na pa, na inn uh tawh kong hal ding uh hi. Kote a hong zawngsak dingin hih lai-ah hong sam na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samson’ zi ama mai-ah kapin, “Kei nong mudah hi, kei nong it kei hi. Ka gam mite tungah thuhaksa na gen a, bang hiam cih kei’ tungah nong gen kei hi,” a ci hi. Amah in numei kiangah, “En in, ka nu kiang hitaleh ka pa kiang hitaleh ah ka gen kei hi. Nang kiangah hong gen tuan ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

A pawi ni sagih hun sungteng ama mai-ah tua nu kap niloh hi. A ni sagih ni-in Samson in a lawmnu kiangah gen ta hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in nakpitakin kunh niloh hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in a gam mite kiangah tua thuhaksa gen hi.

Tua khuapi mite in a ni sagih ni, ni a tum ma-in ama kiangah gen uh a, “Khuaizu sangin bang khum zaw a, humpinelkai sangin bang hat zaw ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Ka bawngla tawh lo khokhawm lo hi le-uhcin, ka thuhaksa na thei kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samson’ tungah Topa’ kha khauhtakin hong tunga, Ashkelon ah amah paisukin tua khuamite sawmthum that a, amaute’ nate la-in a thuhaksa a genthei mite tungah a pawipuante a pia hi. A hehsa-in a pa’ inn-ah amaute ciahsan hi.
Tua ahih manin Samson’ zi pen a moliah pa’ zi dingin na kipia hi.
Tawlkhat khit, mangbuh lak hunin a zi kiangah a hawh dingin keelno khat tawh Samson a pai hi. Amah in, “Inndei sung ka zi kiangah ka lum ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a sungpa in amah lutsak lo hi.

A sungpa in, “Amah mudah taktak hi ni teh, ci-in ngaihsun ka hih manin na lawmpa’ zi dingin ka pia hi. A naunu amah sangin hoih zaw hi lo ahi hiam? A u tangin amah na teenpih nadingin kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
Samson in, “Tutungin amau tungah siatna ka bawlna-ah Filistia mite tawh kisai-in ka mawh kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samson pai-in ngia zathum manin meilah zong a la hi. Amah in a ngia meite khatlekhat kimatsakin a meite kikalah meilah khat ciat hencip hi.
A meilahte a kuansak khit ciangin Filistia mite’ ankung dinglaite lakah ngiate paisak a, anphualte le ankung dinglaite le oliv lote kaangtum hi.

Tua ciangin Filistia mite in, “Kua in hih ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in, “Timnah mite’ makpa Samson in hih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a sungpa in a zi laksakin a lawmpa tungah piaksak hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Filistia mite hong paito-in tua nu le a pa mei tawh a hallum uh hi.
Samson in amaute kiangah, “Hih pen, note’ hih ahihleh, ka kiciam hi. Note kong thuk dinga, tua khit ciangin ka khawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute dawm loin tampi that a, tua ciangin paisukin Etam suanghawm sungah a om hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mite paito-in Judah gamah giahphual sat uh a, Lehi sim uh hi.
Judah mite in, “Bang hangin kote simin hong paito na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in, “Samson a hen ding le ko tungah amah in hong hih bangin ama tungah a hih dingin kong paito uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Judah mite mihing tulthum Etam suanghawmah paisukin Samson kiangah, “Filistia mite, eite a hong ukte ahih lam thei lo na hi hiam? Kote’ tungah nang’ hong bawl bang ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Samson in amaute kiangah, “Amaute in kei tungah hong bawl bangin amaute tungah ka bawl hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Samson kiangah, “Filistia mite’ khut sungah nang kong piak theih nadingun nangmah a hen dingin kong paisuk uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Samson in amaute kiangah, “Note mahmah in nong thah loh nading uh kei tungah hong kiciam un,” a ci hi.

Amaute in Samson kiangah, “Kong that kei ding uh hi. Nang hong henin amaute’ khut sungah kong pia bek ding uh a, nang kong that het kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khauhual thak nih tawh amah hen uh a, tua suanghawm sung panin amah pai khiatpihto uh hi.

Lehi-ah Samson a tun ciangin amah a dawn dingin Filistia mite hong pai-in awng uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tungah Topa’ kha khauhtakin hong tunga, a khut tunga om khauhualte pen mei in a kat anthul khau tawh kibang a, amah a kikhihnate a khut panin tolh khia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in la khaguh thak khat mu a, a khut zanin tua khaguh la-in tua tawh mihing tulkhat a that hi.
Tua ciangin Samson in, “La khaguh khat tawh a lom lomin, la khaguh khat tawh mihing tulkhat ka that hi,” a ci hi.
Tua a thugen a man khit ciangin a la khaguh paai khia hi; tua mun pen Ramathlehi kici hi.
Tua ciangin amah dangtak mahmah ahih manin Topa samin, “Na nasem pa’ tha tawh hih bang suahtakna lian nong piazo hi. Tu-in dangtakin kei si-in dawibia mite’ khut sungah puk ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in Lehi a om komdep khat hong a, tua sung panin tui hong phul hi. Amah in tua tui a dawn ciangin a tha hong dimkikin thakhauhkik hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun min Enhakkore kici a, tuhun dongin Lehi-ah tua tuikhuk omlai hi.
Amah in Filistia mite’ uk hun sung Israel-te kum sawmnih sung thu a khen hi.
Ni khat, Gaza khua-ah Samson pai a, tua lai-ah numei paktat khat mu-in tua nu kiangah a giak dingin a pai hi.

Gaza mite kiangah, “Samson hong pai,” ci-in kigen a, amaute in tua khua umcihin khuapi kulhkongpi-ah zan tawntung amah pangsim uh hi. Amaute zan tawntung daitakin om uh a, “Zingsang khuavak mateng ngak ni; tua ciangin amah that ni,” ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin zankim ciang dong Samson lum a, zankim ciangin tho-in khuapi kulhkongpi kongkhakte le a khuam nihte lenin a zawlte le a na khempeuh botto a, a liangko tungah tuate pua-in Hebron mai-ah a om mual dawnah tuate a tunpih hi.
Tua khit ciangin Samson in Sorek kuamah Delilah a kici numei khat ngai hi.

Tua ciangin Filistia mi uliante tua nu kiangah hong pai-in, “Amah hong zol inla, ama hatna koi-ah om hiam cihna le amah i nuaisiah zawh nadingin amah i hen theih nading, amah i zawh theih nading zia hong thei in. Na theih zawh leh ngun pek tul le zakhat ciat nang kong pia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Delilah in Samson kiangah, “Na hatna lian koi-ah om a, mi khatpeuh in nang hong zawh theih nadingin hong bangci kihen ding cihna thu, nong hehpihna-in hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Samson in tua nu kiangah, “Amaute in a keu nai lo thalkhau thak sagih tawh hong hen leh ka tha nem dinga, midang mah ka bang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mi uliante in tua nu kiangah a keu nai lo thalkhau sagih hong paipih uh a, tua nu in tua khaute tawh amah a hen hi.

Tua laitakin tua nu in inndei sungah mi busak hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in ama kiangah, “Filistia mite in nang hong hih, Samson!” a ci hi. Ahih hangin, patkhaute in mei a sukkhak ciangin a kitah bangin amah in thalkhaute botsat ziau hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama thahatna thusim kithei zo lo hi.
Tua ciangin Delilah in Samson kiangah, “En in, kei nong simmawh a, zuauthu nong gen hi. Nang hong bangci kihen theih ding cih nong hehpihna-in hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Amaute in a kizang nai lo khauhual thakte tawh kei hong hen leh ka tha nem dinga, midang mah ka bang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Delilah in khauhual thakte la-in tuate tawh amah hen a, “Filistia mite in nang hong hih, Samson!” a ci hi. A busim mite inndei sung nungah om uh hi. Ahih hangin Samson in mimkhau bangin khauhualte botsat ziau hi.

Tua ciangin Delilah in Samson kiangah, “Tu dong kei nong simmawh a, zuauthu nong gen hi. Nang hong bangci kihen theih ding cih hong gen in,” a ci hi. Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Ka lu tunga ka sam lom sagihte mimkhau tawh gan khawmin ciampek tawh khen bikbek lecin ka tha nem dinga, midang mah ka bang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah a ihmut laitakin a lu tunga a sam lom sagihte la-in siamin a gan hi. Amah in ciampek tawh khen bikbek a, “Filistia mite in nang hong hih, Samson!” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a ihmutna pan amah khanglo-in a ciampek, a siambu le a siam a kai khia hi.

Tua ciangin numei in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin na lungsim kei tawh a om lopi, ‘Nang kong it hi,’ ci thei na hi hiam? Hih thumvei dong kei nong simmawh a, na thahatna a omna mun nong gen kei hi,” a ci hi.
Nisimin nakpitakin a kutkut ciangin, sihna dong dingin Samson lunggim hi.

Amah in tua nu kiangah a lungsim khempeuh gen a, “Ka lu tungah mulkiatna kitah ngei lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka suah tunga kipan Pasian’ tungah a kipia Nazir mi ka hi hi. Ka sam kimet leh ka hatna in kei hong nusia dinga, ka tha nem dinga, midang mah ka bang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ama tungah a lungsim khempeuh gen khin hi, ci-in Delilah in a theih ciangin amah in mi sawlin Filistia mi uliante sam a, “Tu-a khatvei hong pai un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a lungsim khempeuh kei kiangah hong gen khinzo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Filistia uliante tua nu kiangah hong pai-in sum zong hong pua uh hi.
Tua nu in a phei tungah Samson ihmusak hi. Amah in mi khat samin a lu tunga a sam lom sagihte metsak hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in amah gimsak ding kipan a, ama thahatna in amah nusia ta hi.

Tua nu in, “Filistia mite in nang hong hih, Samson!” a ci hi. A ihmutna panin amah khanglo-in, “Nidanga mah bangin pai khia-in keimah kisingin suakta ning,” a ci hi. Topa in amah a nusiat khit lam amah in thei lo hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mite in amah manin a mitte khel khia uh a, Gaza-ah paipihin amah sumngo kol a bulh uh hi. Amah in thong sung an gawina-ah an a gawi hi.
Ahih hangin a kimet khit ciangin a lu tunga a samte khangkik dingin hong kipan hi.

Tu-in Filistia uliante a pasian uh Dagon tungah biakna lianpi khat a pia ding le a gualnuam dingin kikhawm uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “I pasian in i khut sungah i galpa Samson hong piazo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Mite in amah a muh ciangun a pasian uh phat uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “I pasian in eite’ khut sungah i gam a susiapa, eite tampi hong that pa hong piazo hi,” a ci uh hi.

A lungsim uh a nop ciangin amaute in, “Eite adingin a kimawl theih nadingin Samson sam un,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in thong panin Samson sam khia-in amau’ mai-ah mawlpih uh hi. Khuampite kikalah amah kidingsak hi.
Samson in ama khut a len tangvalpa kiangah, “Ka kingak theih nadingin innpite a do khuampite hong lawngsak in,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin a innpi pen numei le pasal tawh kidim hi. Samson a kimawlsak laitakin a en Filistia ulian khempeuh le innkhum zangah numei le pasal mi tulthum bang om uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samson in Topa samin, “Topa Pasian aw, kei hong phawk in, kong thum hi. Tu-a ka mittang nihte’ tang dingin Filistia mite ka thuhkik theih nadingin hong thahatsak in, tu-a bek kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
Samson in innpi a do khuampi nihte manin, a khut taklamin khat, a khut veilamin khat lenin ama gihna tawh a khuamte a luai hi.

Samson in, “Filistia mite tawh hong sisak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a thaneih khempeuh tawh a awng hi. Tua ciangin uliante le inn sunga om mi khempeuh tungah a innpi kicimsuk hi. Tua ahih ciangin a nuntak lai-a a thah sangin a sihna-a a thah a si mi tam zaw hi.

Tua ciangin a sanggam pasalte le a innkuanpihte khempeuh hong paisukin a luanghawm la uh a, ciahpihto-in Zorah le Eshtaol kikal-a om a pa Manoah’ hanah a vui uh hi. Amah in Israel-te kum sawmnih sung thu a khen hi.
Efraim mual tung gammi Mikah a kici min nei mi khat om hi.

Amah in a nu kiangah, “Ngun pek tul le zakhat hong kiguksak lai-in a gu pa na samsiatna thu ka za hi. A ngunte pen keima guk hi a, tu-in hih lai-ah tuate om hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nu in, “Ka tapa aw, Topa in thupha hong pia tahen,” a ci hi.

Amah in ngun pek tul le za khatte a nu kiangah piakik hi. A nu in, “A kiseek milim khat le a kisung milim khat bawl nadingin ka tapa adingin Topa’ tungah a ngunte ka apsa ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang tungah kong piakik ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in a nu kiangah a sum a piakkik ciangin a nu in zong ngun pek zanih la-in, a kiseek milim khat le a kisung milim khat-a a bawlsak ngunseek pa kiangah pia a, tuate pen Mikah’ inn sungah om hi.
Tua mipa Mikah in biakna phual khat nei a, amah in siampi puan khat le inn sung pasian-te bawlin siampi a suak dingin a tapate khat a koih hi.
Tua hun lai-in Israel sungah kumpi om lo a, mi khempeuh amau’ hoihsak bang ciatin gamta uh hi.
Tua hun laitakin Judah gam Bethlehem khua sungah Levi mi tangval khat om hi.
Tua mipa a muhna mun peuhpeuhah a teeng dingin Judah gam Bethlehem khua panin pai khia hi. Tua bangin khualzinin a pai laitakin Efraim mual tung gam sunga Mikah’ inn-ah va tung hi.
Mikah in ama kiangah, “Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Judah gam sung Bethlehem khua-a om Levi mi ka hi a, mun ka muhna peuhah a peem ding ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Mikah in ama kiangah, “Kei tawh hong omin kei adingin pa le siampi hong hi in; kum khatin ngun pek sawm, puan silh khat le annek kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Levi mipa zong Mikah tawh a teeng khawm dingin lungkim hi. Tangvalpa pen ama tungah a tapate khat tawh kibang hi.
Mikah in Levi mipa koihin, tangvalpa ama siampi suakin Mikah’ inn-ah a om hi.
Tua ciangin Mikah in, “Topa in kei hong daupaisak ding hi, ci-in tu-in ka thei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh siampi-in Levi mite khat ka neita hi,” a ci hi.

Tua hun lai-in Israel-te sungah kumpi om lo hi. Tua hun lai-in Dan minamte in a ten nading uh leitang zong uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua hun dong mateng Israel minamte sung panin amau ading gamhluah bangmah kia lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Dan mite in gam ensimin a va zong dingin amau’ minam bup khempeuh lak panin mi siam nga Zorah le Eshtaol panin a sawl uh hi. Amaute in tua mite kiangah, “Pai unla gam va zong un,” a ci uh hi. Amaute Efraim mual tung gam, Mikah’ inn-ah hong tung uh a, tua lai-ah a taam uh hi.

Amaute Mikah’ inn-ah a om uh ciangin Levi mi tangval’ aw khat khen thei uh hi. Amaute kihei-in ama kiangah, “Kua in hih lai-ah nang hong paipih ahi hiam? Hih lai munah bang hih na hi hiam? Hih lai-ah na nasep bang ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tua bang tua bangin Mikah in kei hong bawl hi. Amah in kei hong cialin kei pen ama siampi ka suak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Kote’ kuankhiat khualzinna a tangtung ding hiam cih ka theih nadingun Pasian hong dotsak in, kong thum uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in amaute kiangah, “Lung nuamin pai un. Note’ khualzinna thu-ah Topa in hong panpih hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mi ngate pai khia-in Laish tung uh a, tua lai-a om mite, Sidon mite’ om bang danin daitakin omin bangmah a upmawh lohna, leitungah bangmah kisam loin a hauhna le amaute Sidon-te’ kiang panin gamla omin kuamah tawh kizopna a neih lohna, lungmuang taka a tenna uh a mu uh hi.
