Amaute Zorah le Eshtaol-a a sanggamte uh kiangah hong tunkik uh ciangin, a sanggamte un amaute kiangah, “Bang thu gen ding nong nei uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Amaute in, “Ding un, amaute a sim dingin paito ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh a leitang ka mu khin uh a, a lei hoih mahmah hi. Bangmah hih loin ommawk ding na hi uh hiam? Pai ding zekai kei un; lutin leitang va luah ni.
Na pai uh ciangin bangmah a ummawh lo mite kiang na tung ding uh hi. Leitang zai mahmah hi. Pasian in na khut sung uhah leitungah bangmah a kisap lohna mun hong pia khinzo takpi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Dan minamte galhiam a tawi mihing zaguk Zorah le Eshtaol panin kuan khia uh a,
amaute paito-in Judah gam sung Kiriathjearim-ah giahphual sat uh hi. Hih thu hangin tuhun dongin tua mun pen Mahanehdan kici hi. Tua pen Kiriathjearim nitumna lamah om hi.
Amaute tua lai mun panin Efraim mual tung gamah paisuakin Mikah’ inn-ah a tung uh hi.

Tua ciangin Laish gam a ensim dingin a pai mi ngate in a sanggamte uh kiangah, “Hih innte khat sungah siampi puan khat, inn sung pasian-te, a kiseek milim khat le a kisung milim khat a omlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na hih ding uh ngaihsun un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kihei-in Mikah’ inn-a Levi tangvalpa’ omna-ah tung uh a, ama omzia dong uh hi.
Tua hun sung tengin galhiam a tawi Dan mi za gukte kulhkongpi lutna-ah ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin, galhiam a tawi mi zagukte tawh kulhkongpi lutna-ah siampipa a dinkhop laitakin gam ensim dingin a kuan khia mi ngate tumin a kiseek milim, a siampi puan, a inn sung pasian-te le a kisung milim la uh hi.
Hih mite Mikah’ inn sungah tumin a kiseek milim, a siampi puan, a inn sung pasian-te le a kisung milim a lak uh ciangin siampipa in amaute kiangah, “Bang hih na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Amaute in ama kiangah, “Pau kei in; na khutin na kam hum inla, kote tawh hong pai-in kote adingin pa le siampi hong hi in. Nang adingin mi khat’ inn sungah siampi hih ding hoih zaw ahi hiam, tua ahih kei leh Israel-te’ sungah minam le beh siampi hih ding hoih zaw ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa a lungkim hi. Amah in a siampi puan, a inn sung pasian-te le a kiseek milim la-in mite’ lakah a pai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute’ mai-ah a taneute le a ganhingte le a vante uh omsakin, amaute pai khia uh hi.
Amaute Mikah’ inn panin a gamla khopkhat a tun uh ciangin Mikah’ innveeng a om mite kikaikhawm uh a, Dan mite delhin a pha uh hi.
Amaute in Dan mite a otsan uh ciangin Dan mite hong kihei-in Mikah kiangah, “Hih bang mihon tawh nong delh nading bang thu om ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Amah in, “Note in keima bawlsa ka pasian-te le ka siampipa la-in na pai khia uh hi. Keimah in bang nei nawn ka hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin, ‘Bang thu ahi hiam?’ bang hangin hong ci thei na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Dan mite in ama kiangah, “Kote’ lakah na aw hong kizasak kei in; tua hikeileh ka lawmte uh hehin nang hong hih ding uh a, na innkuanpihte tawh na si kha ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Dan mite pai uh hi. Mikah in ama adingin amaute thahat lua hi, ci-in a muh ciangin amah kihei-in a inn-ah a ciahkik hi.
Dan mite in Mikah’ bawlsate le a siampipa paipihin, gamdai-in a om, bangmah a ummawh lo mite’ omna Laish tung uh a, namsau tawh amaute vatin mei tawh a khuapi a hal uh hi.

Amaute pen Sidon panin gamla uh ahih manin a hon khia ding om lo a, amaute in kuamah tawh kizopna nei lo uh hi. Tua mun pen Bethrehob-te’ neihsa kuam sungah om hi. Amaute in khuapi lamkikin a sungah teeng uh hi.
Amaute in tua khuapi min pen Israel’ suan amau’ pianna Dan tamin Dan a phuak uh hi. Ahih hangin a masa-in tua khuapi min pen Laish ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Dan mite in a kiseek milim amau adingin phut uh a, Moses’ tupa, Gershom’ tapa Jonathan le ama tapate pen tua gam a kilak hun dong Dan minamte adingin siampi ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Shiloh-ah Pasian’ biakbuk a om sungteng Mikah’ bawlsa a kiseek milim tua lai-ah a om hi.
Israel-te sungah kumpi a om loh hun laitakin, Levi mite khat Efraim mual tung gam mongah peemin, Judah gam Bethlehem panin zineu khat a la hi.
A zineu ama tungah heh a, ama kiang panin pai khia-in Judah gam Bethlehem khua-a a pa’ inn-ah ciah a, tua lai-ah kha li sung khawng a om hi.

Tua ciangin a pasal ding khia-in kam nem tawh a hopih ding le a ciahpihkik dingin tua nu’ nungah a pai hi. Amah in a nasem pa le a la nih tonpih hi. A sungpa’ inn-ah tunga, a sungpa in amah a muh ciangin lungdamna tawh a dawn dingin hong pai hi.
Tua ciangin a sungpa in amah taamsak a, amah tawh ni thum sung a om hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in an ne, tui dawnin giakkhawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin a ni li ni zingsangin amaute tho baih uh a, pai dingin kithawi uh hi. Ahih hangin a sungpa in a makpa kiangah, “An tawmkhat ne-in na tha khauhsak in. Tua khit ciangin na pai thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua mi nihte tukhawmin an ne-in tui dawn uh hi. A sungpa in a makpa kiangah, “Tuzan taam ding lungkim hoh inla, na lung nuamsak in,” a ci hi.
A pai dingin mipa a din ciangin a sungpa in a taamkik dong mateng kho hi.
Tua ciangin a ni nga ni-in a ding dingin zingsangin amah tho baih hi. A sungpa in, “An ne phot inla, ni a dialh mateng khawl lai in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in an ne uh hi.

Mipa le a zineu le a nasem pa a pai khia dingin a din uh ciangin a sungpa in, “En in, tu-in nitak nai-in ni niamta hi; tuzan taam un. En in, ni tum dektak hi. Hih lai-ah giak inla, na lung nuamsak in. Zing ciang zingsangin tho baihin inn-ah na ciah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin mipa tua zan taam nawn lo hi. Amah dingin pai khia a, Jebus (Jerusalem a cihna) galkhat tung hi. Amah pen tuanna a kivawh la nih le a zineu tawh ahi hi.
Amaute Jebus kiang nai a tun uh ciangin ni niam khin a, a nasem pa in a topa kiangah, “Hih Jebus mite’ khuapi-ah zan taam ni,” a ci hi.
A topa in, “Israel mite ahi lo, gamdang mite’ khuapi sungah i taam kei ding hi. Gibeah-ah i paisuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a nasem pa kiangah, “Hong pai in, hih munte khat peuhpeuh va naihin, Gibeah ahih kei leh Ramah-ah zan taam ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khengin paisuak uh a, Benjamin-te’ gam ahi Gibeah khua gei-ah ni tum a,
Gibeah-ah pai-in a giak dingin tua khua a zuan uh hi. Amah pai-in khuapisung kongzing laizangah tu hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a zan taam dingin kuamah in a inn-ah amaute sang lo hi.
Tua laitakin puteek khat lo-a a nasepna panin nitak ciangin hong ciah hi. Tua pa pen Efraim mual tung gam pan hi a, amah Gibeah khua-ah a peem hi a, tua khuamite pen Benjamin mite ahi hi.
Amah khuadak a, khualzin pa, khuapi kongzingah a mu hi. Tua ciangin puteekpa in, “Koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam? Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Keima hong pai khiatna Judah gam Bethlehem khua panin Efraim mual tung gam mongah a pai dingin hong nawk ka hi uh hi. Judah gam Bethlehem-ah ka pai hi. Tu-in ka inn-a a ciah ka hi hi. Kuamah in a inn-ah hong tungsak nuam lo hi.
Ka late uh adingin buhtu le gan-an, kei le na nasem nu le na nasemte tawh a om tangvalpa adingin anlum le leenggahzu ka nei uh a, a kisam bangmah om lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin puteekpa in, “Lunghimawh kei in. Na kisapna khempeuh ka en ding hi. Kongzingah giak kei hamtang in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in a inn-ah ciahpihin late gan-an a pia hi. Amaute in a khe uh silin an a ne uh hi.

Amaute in a lung uh nuamsakin a om laitakun, tua khuapi mi, mi ginalote in tua inn kimkotah pangin a kongkhak tum gawp uh hi. Amaute in inn nei puteekpa kiangah, “Ama taw ka luk theih nadingun na inn-ah a hong tung mipa hong pai khiatpih in,” a ci uh hi.
Inn nei pa, amaute kiangah pusuakin amaute tungah, “Hilo hi, ka sanggamte aw; tua bangin gitloh gamtat kei un.

En un, hih lai-ah ka ta nungak le ka zin pa’ zineu om hi. Amaute hong pai khiatpih ning. Amaute buanin hoih na sak bangun amaute tungah hih un. Ahih hangin hih mipa tungah tua bang a sia gamta kei un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin mite in ama thu ngai lo uh hi. Tua ciangin Levi mipa in a zineu manin amaute kiangah koih khia hi. Amaute in tua nu buan uh a, zingsang mateng zan tawntung tua nu hih uh hi. Zingsang khuavak dingin a kipat ciangin amaute in tua nu ciahsak uh hi.
Zingsang khua hong vak ciangin a numei hong ciahin, ama topa a omna mipa’ kongkhak ah pukin khuavak dong om hi.
Zingsang ciangin a topa tho a, a khualzin zom dingin inn kongkhak hongin a pai khiat ciangin, inn kongkhak ah a zineu lumin sangkil tungah a khutte a kinga a mu hi.
Amah in a zineu kiangah, “Tho in, pai ta ni,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in dawng nawn lo hi. Tua ciangin amah in domto-in a la tungah tua nu koih a, a inn-ah a ciahpih hi.
A inn-ah a tun ciangin amah in tem khat la a, a zineu lenin a phei a liangin seh sawm le nih suahin sem a, Israel-te’ gam sung khempeuh ah a hawm hi.
A mu mite khempeuh in, “Egypt gam panin Israel mite a pai khiata kipan tuni dongin hih bang thu piang ngei lo a, zong kimu ngei lo hi. Hih thu ngaihsun un; kikum unla, gen un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh, Gilead gam zong a kihel, Dan panin Beersheba dong hong kuan khia uh a, Topa’ kiang Mizpah-ah mihing khat bangin mihon hong kikhawm lian uh hi.
Israel minam khempeuh sung pan makai khempeuh, namsau tawi khe galkap mihing tul zali, Pasian’ mite’ kikhopna-ah amau mahmah kipia uh hi.
(Tu-in Israel mite Mizpah-ah a paina thu Benjamin mite in za uh hi.) Israel mite in, “Hih bang tatsiatna hong pianna thu hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin a kithat numei’ pasal, Levi mipa in dawngin, “Benjamin-te’ gam Gibeah-ah kei le ka zineu a taam dingin ka tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gibeah mite kei’ langah hong pang uh a, zanin kote’ omna inn hong umcih uh hi. Amaute in kei hong that nuam uh a, ka zineu buan gawpin tu-in amah si hi.
Tua ciangin ka zineu la-in ka semnen a, Israel-te’ luah gam sung khempeuh ah ka hong hawm hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Israel-te’ lakah kihhuaina le lanluat khialhna gamta uh hi.
En un, no Israel mihingte khempeuh aw, na ngaihsutna uh gen unla, hih lai-ah kikum un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh mihing khat bangin ding lianin, “Eite khempeuh khat zong i puanbukah pai loin, eite khat zong i inn-ah i ciah kei ding hi.
Tu-in Gibeah tungah eite’ hih ding thu in: Tua khua a sim dingin aisanna tawh i pai dinga,

amaute in Israel-te sungah lanluatna tawh a khialhna uh hangin Benjamin-te’ gam Gibeah a thuk theih nadingun mite ading annek tuidawn a pua dingin Israel minamte khempeuh sung panin mi zakhat sung pan mihing sawm, tulkhat sung pan zakhat, tul sawm sung pan tulkhat i la ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin khuapi a sim dingin Israel mite khempeuh kikhawm uh a, kipawlin mi khat a bang uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel minamte in Benjamin minam khempeuh kiangah mi sawl uh a, “Note’ lakah a piang thu pen bangzah tatsiatna ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kote in amaute thatin Israel-te’ sung panin siatna ka phiatkhiat theih nadingun Gibeah khua sunga om a mi ginalote hong pia khia un,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Benjamin-te in a sanggam uh Israel mite’ thu ngai lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite do-in a kuan khia dingin Benjamin gam sung khuapite panin Gibeah khuapi-ah hong kituah uh hi.
Benjamin mite in tua ni-in amau’ khuapite panin, Gibeah-ah a teeng a kiteng khia mihing zasagih banah, namsau a tawi mihing tul sawmnih le tulguk a khawm uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh lakah mi a kiteng khia a veikhoi zasagih om a, amaute khempeuh pen suang tawh samzang kapin a khial lote ahi uh hi.
Israel mite in Benjamin-te sim loh, namsau a tawi mihing tul zali khawm uh a, hih mite khempeuh galsiam mi ahi uh hi.
Israel mite dingin Bethel-ah paito uh a, “Benjamin mite a sim dingin kua pai masa ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in Pasian a dong uh hi. Topa in, “Judah minamte paito masa ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite zingsangin tho-in Gibeah khua a sim dingin giahphual a sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin Benjamin mite a sim dingin Israel mite kuan khia uh hi. Israel mite in Benjamin mite a sim dingin Gibeah-ah a gualin va naih uh hi.
Benjamin mite Gibeah pan hong kuan khia-in tua ni-in Israel mite tul sawmnih le tulnih lei-ah a tuksak uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mite kihanthawnin a ni masa ni-a a panna mun mah uhah gal pangkik uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite paito-in nitak dong Topa’ mai-ah a kap uh hi. Amaute in Topa’ kiangah thu dongin, “Ka sanggam uh Benjamin mite a sim dingin gal phualah ka naihkik ding uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Topa in, “Amaute a sim dingin kuanto un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite a ni nih ni-in Benjamin mite a sim dingin hong nai uh hi.
Amaute a sim dingin a ni nih ni-in Gibeah panin Benjamin-te hong kuan khia uh a, Israel mite tul sawm le tulgiat lei-ah tuksak uh hi. Hih a site khempeuh namsau a tawi mite ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh, galkap vekpi paito-in Bethel-ah tungin a kap uh hi. Tua lai mun Topa’ mai-ah amaute tu-in nitak dong tua ni an tang uh a, Topa’ mai-ah meihal biakna le thunuama biakna a pia uh hi.
Israel mite in Topa thu dong uh a (bang hang hiam cih leh tua hunin Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang tua lai-ah om a,

Aaron’ tapa Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in tua lai-ah tua hunin na sem hi), “Ka sanggam uh Benjamin mite a sim dingin kuankik lai ding ka hi uh hiam, tua ahih kei leh khawl ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Topa in, “Paito un; bang hang hiam cih leh zing ciangin amaute na khut sung uhah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te in Gibeah kiimah a pangsim dingin mi koih uh hi.
Israel mite a ni thum ni-in Benjamin mite a sim dingin kuanto uh a, a hun dangte-a mah bangin Gibeah langkhat ah pang uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute a do dingin Benjamin mite hong kuan khia uh a, khuapi panin amaute kipaikhiasak hi. A hun dangte-a mah bangin amaute in Bethel lamah a paito pen le Gibeah lamah a pai lam lianpi le gamlakah Israel mite sawmthum bang that uh hi.

Tua ciangin Benjamin mite in, “A masa-a mah bangin i mai-ah amaute tai uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Israel mite in, “Eite tai-in, khuapi panin lam lianpi-ah amaute pai khiasak ni,” a kici uh ahi hi.
Israel mite khempeuh amau’ omna mun panin dingin Baaltamar-ah a gualin pang uh hi. A pangsim Israel mite Gibeah nitumna lam amau omna panin hong ding khia uh hi.
Gibeah khua a sim dingin Israel-te khempeuh sung pan a kiteng khia mi tul sawm hong kuan uh a, a galdo uh haksa mahmah hi. Ahih hangin Benjamin mite in amau adingin siatna a naina thu thei lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel-te mai-ah Topa in Benjamin-te a zo hi. Israel mite in tua ni-in Benjamin mite tul sawmnih le tulnga le zakhat that uh a, hih a site khempeuh namsau a tawi mite ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Benjamin mite in a guallelhna uh kimu uh hi. Israel mite in Benjamin mite awn uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Gibeah khua a sim dingin a koih uh a pangsimte muang uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pangsim mite manlangin hong pai-in Gibeah khua sungah lut uh a, a pangsim mite in namsau tawh khuapi mi khempeuh vat gawp uh hi.
Israel mite le a pangsim mite a kiciamna lim in, amaute in khuapi sung panin meikhu lianpi a suahsak toh uh ciangin

Israel mite galsim dingin hong tum ding uh hi. Tu-in Benjamin mite in Israel mite sawmthum bang vat gawpin thah ding kipan uh hi. Amaute in, “A masa-a mah bangin eite’ mai-ah amaute kivattuk gawp taktak hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amau’ kiciamna lim meikhu khuapi sung panin suakto dingin a kipat ciangin Benjamin mite nunghei uh a, a khuapi bup a khu-in vantungah a kahto a mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite hong kilehhei uh a, Benjamin mite lungkia uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ siat nading a naina thei uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te’ mai panin amaute kilehkikin gamlak lam manawh uh hi. Ahih hangin gal in amaute pha a, khuapi sung panin hong pai khia mite in amaute le a pawlte uh kikalsung tengah amaute sumai uh hi.
Amaute in Nohah panin nisuahna lamah Gibeah gal ciang dong Benjamin mite delhin tuancilin vat gawp uh hi.
Benjamin mite sung pan galhang mihing tul sawm le tulgiat tuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin a dangte kihei-in sehnel gam lam Rimmon Suangpi-ah tai uh hi. Amaute mihing tulnga lam lianpi dungah si uh a, Gidom ciang dong nakpitakin amaute kidelhin tulnih kithat hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Benjamin-te a si khempeuh, namsau a tawi galhang mihing tul sawmnih le tulnga ahi hi.
Ahih hangin mihing zaguk kihei-in gamlak lam Rimmon Suangpi-ah tai uh a, Rimmon Suangpi-ah kha li sung om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Benjamin mite a sim dingin Israel mite kithawikik uh a, namsau tawh a mi a sa-in a muh khempeuh uh vat gawp uh hi. A muh uh khuate khempeuh mei tawh a hal uh hi.
Tu-in Israel mite Mizpah-ah kiciam uh a, “Benjamin mite tungah kuamah in i tanu mo-in i kha kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Bethel-ah Israel mite hong pai-in Pasian’ mai-ah nitak dong tu uh a, amaute nakpitakin a kap uh hi.
Amaute in, “Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa aw, tuni-in Israel-te sungah minam khat a pelhem nading, hih thu bang hangin Israel-te tungah hong tung ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
A zing ciangin mite tho baihin tua lai-ah biakna tau khat lam uh a, meihal biakna le thunuama biakna a pia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in, “Topa ading kikhopna-ah Israel minamte khempeuh sung panin kua teng hong pai lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Topa kiangah a pai lo mite tawh kisai-in Mizpah-ah kiciamna lianpi khat bawl uh a, “Kithat ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Israel mite in a sanggam uh Benjamin mite khasiat uh a, “Tuni-in Israel-te’ sung panin minam khat bei hi.
Eite in i tanute amaute tungah zi dingin pia lo ding hi hang, ci-in Topa tawh kiciam khin ihih ciangin a nungta lai amaute’ zi ding bang cih ding ihi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Topa kiang Mizpah-ah Israel minamte hong pai lo a om hiam?” a ci uh hi. En in, Jabeshgilead panin tua giahphual kikhopna-ah kuamah pai lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh mite a kikhop ciangin, tua lai-ah Jabeshgilead a teengte khat zong om lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mihonte in a galhangte uh mihing tul sawm le tulnih tua lai-ah sawl uh a, “Pai unla Jabeshgilead-a teengte namsau tawh va vat gawp unla, nupite le naupang neute zong hih un.
Hih bangin na hih ding uh hi: Pasal khempeuh le pasal tawh a lumkhawmsa numei khempeuh na sumai ding uh hi,” ci-in thu pia uh hi.
Amaute in Jabeshgilead-a teeng mite lakah pasal tawh a lumkhawm nai lo nungakno zali mu uh a, Kanaan gam a om Shiloh giahphual ah tuate hong paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihon buppite in Rimmon Suangpi-a om Benjamin mite kiangah thu puak a, amaute kiangah kilemna thu gen uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin Benjamin-te hong ciah uh a, amaute in Jabeshgilead numei a hing a a koihte uh pia uh a, ahi zongin amau adingin kicing zo lo hi.
Israel minamte sungah Topa in kitapkhapna omsak ahih manin mite in Benjamin-te khasiat uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihonte’ upate in, “Benjamin-te’ sung panin numeite kithat khin ahih manin a omlai mite’ zi ding bang cih ding ihi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in, “Israel-te sung panin minam khat a bei loh nadingin Benjamin a suakta laite adingin gamhluah a om ding kisam hi.
Ahi zongin amau’ zi dingin i tanute i pia thei kei hi,” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite kiciam khinin, “Benjamin-te tungah zi a pia mipa in samsiatna ngah tahen,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in, “En un, Bethel leilu lam, Bethel panin Shekhem lamah a paito lam lianpi nisuahna lam, Lebonah leitaw lamah a om Shiloh-ah Topa ading kumsim pawi khamna om hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Benjamin mite thu pia-in, “Pai-in leenggui lote-ah bukin
vil un. Laamna-ah Shiloh nungakte a laam dingin hong pai uhleh, leenggui lote panin note in delhin mi khempeuh in na zi ding ciat uh Shiloh nungakte man unla, Benjamin gamah ciahpih un.

Amau’ pate ahi a, a sanggampate uh ahi zongin a lungkim lohna uh kote’ kiangah a gen dingin hong pai uh ciangin kote in amaute kiangah, ‘Kote tungah hehpihna tawh amaute hong pia un; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh zi ding galsimna sungah ka ngahsak zo kei uh a, note zong a mawh na suah loh nadingun note in amaute tungah utna tawh na piaktawm uh ahi kei hi,’ ka ci ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Benjamin mite zong tua bangmahin gamta uh a, amau mi a phazah tawh kituakin a laamte lak panin a zi dingun a la uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute pai-in a gamhluahna uhah ciahkik uh a, khuapite lamkikin a sungah a teeng uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin Israel midangte tua lai panin pai khia uh a, mi khempeuh amau’ minam le a innkuanpih ciat, amau’ gamhluahna ciatah a ciah uh hi.
Tua hun lai-in Israel-te sungah kumpi om lo a, amau’ hoihsak bang ciatin mi khempeuh a gamta uh hi.
Thukhente in a uk hun lai-in tua gam sungah kialpi tunga, Judah gam sunga Bethlehem khuami khat, a zi le a tapa nihte tawh Moab gamah a peem dingin a pai uh hi.
Tua mipa’ min Elimelek hi a, a zi’ min Naomi hi-in, a tapa nihte min Mahlon le Khilion ahi hi. Amaute pen Judah gam Bethlehem-a Efrathah mite ahi uh hi. Amaute Moab gamah pai-in tua lai-ah om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Naomi’ pasal Elimelek si a, a tapa nihte bek tawh tua nu a om hi.
Hih a tapa nihte in Moab mite zi-in la uh hi. A khat min Orpah hi a, adang khat min Ruth ahi hi. Tua lai-ah amaute kum sawm bang teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Mahlon le Khilion si a, tua nupi a tapa nihte le a pasal in sihsan hi.
Tua ciangin tua nu a mo tegel tawh Moab gam panin a ciahkik dingin kithawi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a mite kemin an a piakna thu Moab gam sung panin amah in za hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ama omna mun panin a mo tegel tawh tua nu ding khia a, Judah gamah a ciahkik dingin pai uh hi.
Ahih hangin Naomi in a mo nihte kiangah, “Pai un, na inn tuak uhah ciahkik unla, na nute uh tawh om un. A sisate hitaleh kei hitaleh nong limbawl uh mah bangin Topa in note hong limbawl tahen.
Topa in na pasalkik uh inn tuakah hong nuamsasak tahen!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute namin, amaute a kap uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Hilo hi, na mipihte kiangah nang tawh kong ciahkhawm ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Naomi in, “Kilehkik un, ka tanute aw, bang hangin hong zui ding na hi uh hiam? Note’ pasal hong hi thei dingin tapa nei nawn ding ka hi hiam?

Kilehkik un, ka tanute aw, na pai nading uhah pai un; bang hang hiam cih leh pasal nei dingin ka teek luata hi. Pasal nei dingin kilamen ing ci mah lengzong, tunitak mahmahin pasal nei-in tapate nei phial ta mah lengzong,
amaute a khan khit dong ngak zo ding na hi uh hiam? Hilo hi, ka tanute aw, Topa in kei hong bawlsia ahih manin note sangin nakpitakin kei ka lunggim zaw hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a kapkik uh hi. Orpah in a teeknu namin ciah a, ahih hangin Ruth in a teeknu beel hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “En in, na sanggamnu a mipihte le a pasian-te kiangah ciahkik khin hi. Na sanggamnu’ nungah nang zong ciah in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Ruth in, “Nang kong nusiat nading ahi a, nang zuihna panin ka ciahkik nading ahi zongin hong cici nawn kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na paina-ah ka pai dinga, na giahna-ah ka giak ding hi. Na mite keima mite hi dinga, na Pasian keima Pasian hi ding hi.
Na sihna-ah si-in ka kivui ding hi. Sihna cih lohbuang thudang hangin kong nusiat taak leh Topa in kei hong dawm kei tahen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Naomi in amah a zuih ding a lungsim a khentatna a muh ciangin bangmah ci nawn lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Bethlehem a tun mateng uh a nihun paisuak uh hi. Bethlehem a tun uh ciangin amaute’ hangin a khuazang un luum lialua-in nupite in, “Hihnu Naomi mah ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Naomi hong ci nawn kei un; Mara hong ci un; bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglianpa in nakpitakin kei hong gimsak hi.
A dimin ka pai khia a, Topa in a hawmin hong ciahpihkik hi. Topa in kei hong gimsakin, Vanglianpa in kei tungah gimna hong tungsak ahih ciangin bang hangin Naomi hong ci lai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-a bangin Moab gam panin Naomi, Moab mi a monu Ruth tawh hong ciahkik hi. Mangbuhham lak kipat laitakin Bethlehem khua hong tung uh hi.
Tu-in Naomi in a pasal’ tanaute, Elimelek innkuansung mi, Boaz min nei a hau migina khat nei hi.

Tua ciangin Moab mi Ruth in Naomi kiangah, “Lo ah hong kuansak inla, maipha ka muhna peuhpeuh pa’ nungah anvuite lakah a sang hong tawmsak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Pai in, ka tanu aw,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah kuan khia-in pai a, anlate’ nung lo sungah ansangte a tawm hi. Elimelek-te innkuan Boaz’ lo ah va kuankha hi.
Boaz zong Bethlehem panin hong kuanin amah in anlate kiangah, “Topa in note hong ompih tahen!” a ci hi. Amaute in dawngin, “Topa in nang thupha hong pia tahen,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Boaz in anlate a uk a nasem pa kiangah, “Hih ka muh ngei loh numei kua’ ta ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin anlate a uk nasem pa in dawngin, “Moab gam panin Naomi tawh a hong ciahkik Moab numei ahi hi.

Tua numei in, ‘Kong thum hi; ansang hong tawmsakin anlate’ nungah anlomte lakah a kiate hong khawmsak in,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah hong pai-in tawlkhat zong khawl loin zingsang tung a kipan tu dong semsuak hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Boaz in Ruth kiangah, “Tu-in ngai in ka ta aw; midangte’ lo ah ansang tawm dingin pai kei inla, hih lo zong nusia kei in. Hih lai-ah kuamah in bangmah hong cih lo ding ahih manin ka nasem numeite’ nai-ah om cinten in.
Amaute’ anlakna lo mitsuan inla, amaute’ nungah zui in. Nang hong bawlsiat loh nading uh tangvalte thu ka pia khin hi. Na dang a tak ciangin pai inla tangvalte’ tui tawisa dawn in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah a mai-in lei-ah puk a, leilakah kunin ama kiangah, “Kei gamdang mi khat hinapi, hih banga kei nong phawk nadingin bang hangin na mai-ah maipha ngah thei ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Boaz in tua nu dawngin, “Na pasal a sih khit a kipan na teeknu adingin na sepnate khempeuh le na nu le na pa le na pianna gam nusia-in cikmahin na theih ngei loh mite kiangah na paina thu a kicing takin kei kiangah hong kigen zo hi.
Topa in na gamtatnasate a pha tawh hong thuk a, a liimnuai beel dinga na paina Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa in thaman a cingin hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ruth in, “Ka topa aw, kei tungah nong dik mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen na nasem numeite hi lo napi-in na nasem nu’ tungah migitna kam nong pau hi,” a ci hi.

Annek hun ciangin Boaz in tua nu kiangah, “Hih lai-ah hong pai in; anlum ne inla, leenggahzu sungah na an diah in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin anlate gei-ah amah tu a, tua pa in ankante tua nu a pia hi. Amah in a kham mateng ne a, a khamval zong pawlkhat omlai hi.
Tua nu ansang tawm dingin a din ciangin Boaz in a tangvalte hilh a, “Anlomte lak nangawnah tawmsak unla, amah ko sia kei un.
Anlom hente lak panin zong ama adingin pawlkhat dok khia-in ama top dingin nusia unla, amah tai kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in nitak dong lo sungah ansang tawm hi. A topsa teng sat khia a, mangbuhham seu khat bang pha hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tuate pua-in khuapi sungah a ciah hi. A an top teng a teeknu lakin, a ankhamvalte zong la-in a pia hi.

Tua ciangin a teeknu in ama kiangah, “Tuni-in koi-ah tawm na hi hiam? Koi-ah sem na hi hiam? Nang hong phawk mipa in thupha ngah tahen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a teeknu kiangah a naseppihte gen a, “Tuni-a ka sepna mipa pen Boaz ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Naomi in a monu kiangah, “A dikna in a site hitaleh a hingte hitaleh a mangngilh lo Topa in amah thupha pia tahen,” a ci hi. Naomi in ama kiangah, “Tua mipa pen i behte, i tanau nai pen khat ahi hi,” zong ci lai hi.
Tua ciangin Moab numei Ruth in, “Tu-a banah amah in kei kiangah, ‘Ka an khempeuh a lak khit matengun ka nasemte’ kiang nai-ah om in,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Naomi in a monu Ruth kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, ama numeite tawh na kuankhop theih hoih mahmah hi; tua hikeileh lo dangah nang hong kibawlsia kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Boaz’ numeite’ nai-ah amah omin mangbuhham lak khit dong ansang tawm a, a teeknu tawh a omkhawm hi.
Tua ciangin a teeknu Naomi in ama kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, inn khat na suantheih nadingin na pasal ding kong vaihawmsak ding kilawm hi lo ahi hiam?
A numeite tawh na nasepna Boaz pen i tanau hi lo ahi hiam? Thei in, amah in tu nitakin ancilna-ah mangbuhham haih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kisilin sathau kinuh inla, na puan hoih pente silhin ancilna-ah paisuk in. Ahih hangin a nek a dawn a man mateng ama kiangah na pailam kitheisak kei in.
Ahih hangin amah a lup ciangin a lupna mun encik in; tua ciangin pai inla a khe lam puan leemin lum in; tua ciangin na gamtat nading amah in hong gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Na gen khempeuh ka hih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ancilna-ah amah paisukin a teeknu in ama kiangah a gensa bang teekteekin a gamta hi.
Boaz in a nek a dawn khit ciangin a lung nuam a, anphual nawlah lum dingin a pai hi. Tua ciangin damtakin numei hong pai-in a khe lam puan leem sakin a lumsuk hi.
Zankim ciangin mipa a kihei ciangin a khe-ah numei khat na lum hi.
Amah in, “Kua na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua nu in dawngin, “Keimah na nasem nu Ruth ka hi hi; tanaute na hih ciangin na nasem nu na puan hong zawn in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa in thupha hong pia tahen, ka tanu aw; a hau hitaleh a zawng hitaleh tangvalte’ nung na zuih lohna-ah a masa sangin a lian zaw a tawpkhak hih ngeina man na gamta hi.
Tu-in ka tanu aw, lau kei in; na nget khempeuh nang adingin kong hihsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka khuapih mite khempeuh in numei gina na hihlam hong thei uh hi.
Kei pen tanau nai ka hi mah hi; ahih hangin kei sangin a nai zaw tanau khat omlai hi.

Tuzan om in; zingsang ciangin amah in nang tungah tanaute’ hih ding hong hih leh pha hi; amah hihsak in. Ahih hangin nang tungah tanaute’ sep ding a sepnop kei leh, tua ciangin, Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin nang tungah tanau nasep kong sem ding hi. Zingsang dong lum in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsang dong a khe kiangah lum a, ahih hangin mi mel khatlekhat a kitheih ma-in amah a tho hi. Tua ciangin mipa in, “Ancilna-ah numei a paina kitheisak kei in,” a ci hi.
Mipa in, “Na puanza hong paipih inla hong dawh in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a numei in dawh a, amah in mangbuhham lawh guk teh khia-in tua nu guan a, tua ciangin khuapi sungah tua nu a ciah hi.
A teeknu kiangah a tun ciangin amah in, “Ka tanu aw, bang na ci hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a thu khempeuh genin,
“Hih mangbuhham lawh guk hong guan hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, ‘Na teeknu kiangah khut hawmguakin na ciah kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in dawngin, “Ka tanu aw, a thu hong bangci suahkhiat cih na theih mateng ngak in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah mawk om lo dinga, tuni-in a thu siangsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mihon kikhopna kulhkongpi-ah Boaz paito-in tua munah tusuk hi. Tua laitakin a tanaute, Boaz’ gen pa hong pai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Boaz in, “Hong pai dih in, lawm aw; hih lai-ah tu dih in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah hong kihei-in tusuk hi.
Tua ciangin amah in khua upate mihing sawm samin, “Hih lai-ah tu dih un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute tusuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a tanaupa kiangah, “Moab gam panin a hong ciahkik Naomi in i tanaute Elimelek’ leitang zuak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih thu nang kiangah kong gen ding ngaihsunin, ‘Hih lai-ah a tu mite’ muhna le keima mi upate’ muhna-ah lei in,’ kong ci hi. Na tat ding leh tanh in; ahih hangin na tat kei ding leh, a thu ka theih nadingin kei kiangah hong gen in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang sim loh a tanh ding kuamah om lo ahih manin nang kiangah kong pai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Boaz in, “Naomi’ tung panin a lo na lei ni a kipanin, a site’ gamh a site’ beh sungah a kiptheih nadingin a sipa’ zi Moab numei Ruth zong a lei na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a tanaupa in, “Keima gamhluah siasak kha ding ka hih manin keima adingin ka tanh thei kei ding hi. Keimah in tanh thei lo ka hih ciangin keima tattheihna thu nangmah in tang in,” a ci hi.

Nidang lai-in Israel-te sungah tatna le kikhekna thu-ah ngeina hih bang ahi hi: Thu vaihawm khat peuhpeuh a kipsak nadingin mipa khat in a khedap suah khia-in a lawmpa pia hi; hih banga hihna pen Israel-te’ sungah kipsakna ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a tanaupa in Boaz kiangah, “Nang adingin lei in,” a cih ciangin amah in a khedap suah khia hi.
Tua ciangin Boaz in upate le mi khempeuh kiangah, “Tuni-in note pen Naomi’ tung panin Elimelek le Khilion le Mahlon’ neihsa khempeuh ka lei khitna thu teci na hi uh hi.

A site’ min ama sanggamte le a pianna a khua sung panin a maiman loh nadingin ama gamhluahna-ah a site’ min a kizop theih nadingin a si khin Mahlon’ zi, Moab numei Ruth zong ka zi dingin ka lei khin hi; note pen tuni-in teci na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kulhkongpi-a om mite khempeuh le upate in, “Kote, teci ka hi uh hi. Topa in Israel-te’ pianna Rachel le Leah bangin na innkuan sunga hong pai numei bawl tahen. Efrathah-ah na dau pai henla, Bethlehem-ah na min thang tahen.
Topa in hih a khangno lai numei tawh nang hong piak na tate’ hangin Judah in Tamar tawh a neih a tapa Perez innkuan tawh kibangin na innkuan piang tahen,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Boaz in Ruth la-in ama zi a suak hi. Amah in a zi luppih a, Topa in tua nu gaisakin amah in tapa khat nei hi.
Tua ciangin nupite in Naomi kiangah, “Tanau nei loin tuni-in nang a hong omsak lo Topa in thupha ngah henla, Israel-te’ sungah ama min thang tahen!

Amah pen nang adingin na nuntakna a hong piakik le na khanghamna-ah hong vak pa hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, tapa sagih sangin a thupi zaw, nangmah hong it na monu’ neih tapa ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Naomi in naungek la-in a ang-ah tawi a, amah a cingnu a suak hi.
A veeng nupite in a min phuak uh a, “Naomi’ sung pan tapa khat suak,” a ci uh hi. Amaute in a min Obed phuak uh hi. Amah pen Jessi’ pa hi a, Jessi pen David’ pa ahi hi.
Tu-in Perez’ suanlekhakte hih bang ahi hi: Perez pen Hezron’ pa,
Hezron pen Ram’ pa, Ram pen Amminadab’ pa,
Amminadab pen Nahshon’ pa, Nahshon pen Salmon’ pa,
Salmon pen Boaz’ pa, Boaz pen Obed’ pa,
Obed pen Jessi’ pa, Jessi pen David’ pa ahi hi.
Efraim mi Zuf’ tapa Tohu, a tapa Elihu, a tapa Jehoram, a tapa Elkanah a kici min nei mi khat Efraim mual tung gam Ramathaimzofim-ah om hi.
Amah in zi nih nei hi. Khat’ min Hannah hi a, a khat’ min Peninnah ahi hi. Peninnah in ta nei a, ahih hangin Hannah in nei lo hi.
Elkanah a kumkumin a khuapi panin, Eli’ tapa nihte Hofni le Finehas in Topa’ siampi a sepna mun Shiloh-ah Vanglian Topa a bia ding le ama tungah biakna a pia dingin a pai zel hi.
Elkanah in biakna a piak ciangin a zi Peninnah le a tanu le a tapate khempeuh tungah tanh pia hi.
Amah in Hannah a it hangin Topa in amah ta neisak lo ahih manin Hannah tungah tanh khat bek a pia hi.
Topa in amah ta neisak lo ahih manin amah a el a zi-pih in amah nakpitakin phin zel, hehsak zel hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a kumkumin tua bangin hi den uh hi. Topa’ inn-ah a paitoh simin Peninnah in Hannah phin zel hi. Tua ahih ciangin Hannah kapin an ne lo hi.

Tua ciangin ama pasal Elkanah in, “Hannah aw, bang hangin kap na hi hiam? Bang hangin an ne lo na hi hiam? Bang hangin na lungsim dah ahi hiam? Kei pen tapa sawm sangin nang adingin hoih zaw hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in Shiloh-ah an a nek khit uh ciangin khatvei Hannah ding khia-in biakinn-ah thungen dingin a pai hi. Tua hun laitakin Topa’ biakinn kongkhak khuam pangah siampi Eli na tu hi.
Tua nu nakpitakin lungkhamin Topa’ tungah thu ngenin nakpitakin a kap hi.

Amah in thuciamna khat bawlin, “Vanglian Topa aw, nangmah in na nasem nu’ gimna nong et takpi a, keimah hong phawkin na nasem nu hong mangngilh loin na nasem nu tungah tapa khat nong piak leh, Topa’ tungah a khan tawntungin amah kong pia dinga, ama lu-ah mulkiatna kitah lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa’ mai-ah thungenin a om laitakin Eli in tua nu’ kam na en hi.
Hannah a lungsimah pau hi. A mukte bek liingin a awging kiza lo ahih ciangin Eli in tua numei zukhamin ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Eli in ama kiangah, “Bang tanvei zu kham ding na hi hiam? Na leenggahzu nek khawl in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Hannah in dawngin, “Hilo hi, ka topa aw; kei pen nakpitakin a lungkham numei ka hi hi. Leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ka ne kei a, Topa’ mai-ah ka lungsim a sung khia ka hi hi.
Lungkhamna le gimna tawh a pau ka hih manin numei ginalo bangin na nasem nu hong ngaihsun kei in, a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Eli in dawngin, “Nuam takin pai in. Israel-te’ Pasian in ama tungah na ngetsa thu hong pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin numei in, “Nangma mitah na nasem nu maipha hong musak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua numei pai-in an ne a, dahmai pua nawn lo hi.
Amaute zingsangin tho baihin biakinn-ah Topa a biak khit uh ciangin amaute’ khua Ramah-a a inn uhah a ciahkik uh hi. Tua ciangin Elkanah in a zi Hannah luppih a, Topa in tua nu’ thungetna a pia hi.
A hun ciangin Hannah gai-in tapa khat nei a, a min Samuel a phuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Topa’ tung panin amah ka nget ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elkanah le a innkuante khempeuh Topa’ tungah kumsim biakna le a thuciamna a pia dingin paitokik uh hi.

Ahih hangin Hannah paito lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a pasal kiangah, “Naungek nawi tawh a kikhen phetin Topa’ omna mai-ah kilakin tua lai-ah a om tawntung dingin ka paipih ding hi,” a ci hi.

A pasal Elkanah in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in hoih na sak pen bangin gamta inla, amah nawi tawh a kikhen dong ngak in. Topa in a kammal hong kipsak tahen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin nupi omin nawi tawh a kikhen mateng a ta a khoi hi.
Numei in amah nawi tawh a kikhensak khit ciangin kum thum a pha bawngtal khat, annel seu khat le leenggahzu savun thawl khat tawh amah la-in, Shiloh-a Topa’ inn-ah amah a paipih hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a bawngtal go-in Eli kiangah a naupang a paipih uh hi.
Tua nu in, “Aw ka topa! Nangmah, a nungta na hih mah bangin ka topa aw, keimah in Topa’ tungah thu ngenin nangma omna hih lai munah a ding nu ka hi hi.
Hih naupang ka ngen hi. Topa in ama tungah keima ngetna hong pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ tungah amah ka kawm hi. A nuntak laiteng Topa’ tungah amah a kikawm ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tua lai-ah Topa a bia uh hi.
Hannah’ La Hannah in zong thu ngenin, “Topa’ tungah ka lungdam a, Topa’ hangin ka kipak hi. Nong huhna hangin ka galte ka nuihsan hi.
“Topa bangin a siangtho kuamah dang om lo a, amah sim loh kuamah dang om lo a, i Pasian tawh a kibang hong hu dang om lo hi.
Tua bangin kiphatsakna tawh pau nawn kei inla, na kamsung pan kihihsakna ging khiasak kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa pen a thei Pasian hi a, amah in gamtatnate a tawi khai hi.
A thahatte’ thalte kitan a, ahih hangin a thaneemte in thahatna ngah uh hi.
A gilvahte in an thalawh uh a, ahih hangin a gilkialte kial nawn lo uh hi. Tasel mi in ta sagih nei a, ahih hangin ta tampi a nei nu a lungzuang hi.
Topa in thatin hingsakkik a, amah in Leinuai-ah paipih sukin thotosak hi.
Topa in zawngsakin hausak a, amah in niamkhiat sukin, zong sangtosak hi.

Amah in leivui panin mizawngte phongto a, amah in a cimawhte a lungkhamna panun a phongto hi. Uliante tawh tukhawmsak a, minphatna ngahsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung khuampite Topa a’ hi a, tuate tungah amah in leitung pumpi a koih hi.
“Amah in a thuman mite’ kalsuanna limtakin cing a, ahih hangin migilote khuamialna sungah kikhiasuk ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thatang hatna tawh mi gualzo lo ding hi.

Topa’ langte tamkham dinga, amah in amaute do-in vantungah van gingsak ding hi. Topa in leimong dongah thu khen ding hi. Amah in ama kumpipa tungah thahatna pia dinga, a sathau nilh pa’ vangliatna sangsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ramah-a a inn-ah Elkanah a ciah hi. Ahi zongin naupang in siampi Eli’ omna-ah Topa’ na a sem hi. Eli’ Innkuan Siat nading Genkholhna
Eli’ tapate pen bangmah a man lo mite ahi uh hi. Amaute in Topa zahtakna nei lo uh hi.
Mite’ tungah siampite’ gamtat zia ding ngeinate don lo uh hi. Mi khatpeuh in biakna a piak ciangin a sa a huan laitakin siampipa’ nasem pa sikkeu-ka-thum nei khat a khutah tawi-in hong pai a,

amah in a sikkeu tawh sikbeel daii ahi a, beel-uk ahi a, beelpi ahi a, beel sungah ahi zongin sunsuk hi. Sikkeuka in a kaihkhiattoh khempeuh siampipa in tang ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin Shiloh-ah a pai Israel-te khempeuh tungah amaute in tua bangin hih uh hi.

Tua tham loin a thau a kihal ma-in siampipa’ nasem pa hong pai-in biakna a pia mipa kiangah, “Siampipa ading han ding sa hong pia in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in nang tung panin sa minsa hong sang loin a sial bek hong sang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mipa in ama kiangah, “A thau hong hal masasak inla, tua khit ciangin na deih zahzah la in,” a cih leh, amah in, “Hilo hi; tu mahmahin nong pia ding uh hi. Tua hikeileh thatanghat thu-in kong laksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ muhna-ah tangvalte’ khialhna lian mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Topa’ tungah biakpiaknate thupi seh lo uh hi.
Samuel pen saihadial siampi puan silhin Topa’ mai-ah na a sem naupang khat ahi hi.
Samuel’ nu a pasal tawh kumsim biakna pia dingin a paitoh ciangin ama adingin puantual neu khat bawlin kum simin ama kiangah a puak hi.

Tua ciangin Eli in Elkanah le a zi thupha pia-in, “Amah in Topa’ tungah a apkik a ta’ tang dingin Topa in hih numei tawh nang ta dang hong neisak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a inn uhah amaute a ciah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Hannah thupha pia a, tua nu gai-in tanu nih le tapa thum a nei hi. Naupang Samuel ahihleh Topa’ omna-ah a khang hi.
Tu-in Eli teek mahmah a, Israel-te khempeuh tungah a tapate’ gamtatnate le kikhopna buk lutna-ah na a sem numeite tawh a lupkhopna thute khempeuh zong a za hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin tua bangin gamta na hi uh hiam? Mi khempeuh tung panin na gamtat siatnate uh ka za hi.
Hilo hi, ka tapate aw; Topa’ mite in a genthangna thu ka zakte hoih lo hi.

Mi khat midang khat tungah a khialh le ama adingin thukhente in palai sem ding hi. Ahih hangin mi khat Topa’ tungah khial leh ama adingin kua in va thumsak ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amaute in a pa’ thu ngai lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen amaute a thah nadingin Topa’ deihna ahi hi.
Tu-in naupang Samuel a pumpi khangin Topa le mite’ maipha a ngah toto hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mi khat Eli’ kiangah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Egypt gam sung Faro’ khutnuai-ah na pupi Aaron le a innkuante a om laitakin Aaron’ tungah keimah ka kilang hi.

Israel minamte khempeuh sung panin amah ka siampi ahi ding, ka biakna tau-ah a pai ding, paknamtui a hal ding, keima mai-ah siampi puan a silh dingin ka teel hi. Israel mite’ tung panin mei tawh kihal keimah hong kibiaknate khempeuh na pupi innkuan tungah ka pia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin keimah hong kibiaknate le ka thupiak ahi keimah hong kipiakte thusim loin, keima mi Israel-te’ piak a limci pen teng tawh note kithausakin, kei sangin na tapate pahtawi zaw na hi hiam?’ ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa in thu hong genin: ‘Nangma innkuan le na behte keima mai-ah sungtumin pusuak tawntung ding hi, ci-in thu ka ciamsa hi,’ ci hi. Ahih hangin tu-in Topa in thu genin: ‘Tua bang hi nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei hong pahtawite ka pahtawi dinga, kei hong simmawhte ka simmawh ding hi.
En in, nangma innkuan sung le na beh sunga tangval hat khempeuh ka suksiat hun hong tung dinga, na innkuan sungah puteekte a om nawn loh hun hong tung ding hi.
Tua ciangin Israel-te tungah ka piak daupainate khempeuh na lungkham hunin enna mit tawh na en dinga, na innkuan sungah puteek om ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Ka biakna tau panin ka suksiat loh na suante khat pen mitlawt dongin a kap ding le a lunggim dingin kikoih ding hi. Tua ciangin na inn sung panin a khang khempeuh, mite’ namsau tawh si ding uh hi.
Na tapa nihte, Hofni le Finehas tungah hong tung ding hih thu pen nang adingin lim hi ding hi. Amau tegel a ni kikhatin si ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin ka lungsim sung le ka ngaihsutna bangin a sem ding a citak siampi khat keima adingin ka khangsak ding hi. Amah, suanlekhak nei-in ka bawl dinga, ka sathau nilh pa’ mai-ah amah sungtumin pusuak tawntung ding hi.

Na suanlekhak a suakta mite khempeuh ngun peek khat ahi a, anlum lum khat ngen ding ahi zongin ama kiangah pai-in, “An tawm ka neih theih nadingin siampipa’ omna mun khat peuhpeuhah kei hong koih in, ci-in kong thum hi,” ci ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tu-in Eli’ khutnuai-ah naupang Samuel in Topa’ na sem hi. Tua hun lai-in Topa in thu genmun lo a, maangmu ommun lo hi.
Tua hunin a mit a maang dingin a kipan khin Eli in khua mu thei lo a, ama omna tuamah lum hi.
Pasian’ meivak mit nai lo a, Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang a omna mun Topa’ mun siangtho sungah Samuel lum hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Samuel! Samuel!” ci-in sam ahih manin amah in, “Hih lai-ah om ing!” ci-in
Eli kiangah tai a, “Hih lai-ah om ing, nong sam hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Kong sam kei hi; lumkik in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in a lum hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in sam kikin, “Samuel!” a ci hi. Samuel tho-in Eli kiangah pai-in, “Hih lai-ah om ing, nong sam hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Kong sam kei hi, ka tapa aw; lumkik in,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin Samuel in Topa thei nai lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amah hopih ngei nai lo hi.
Topa in Samuel a thum veina samkik hi. Amah tho-in Eli kiangah pai-in, “Hih lai-ah om ing, nong sam hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in naupang a sapna thu Eli in a thei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Eli in Samuel kiangah, “Pai-in lum in; amah in nang hong sap leh nangmah in, ‘Hong gen in, Topa aw, na nasem pa in za hi,’ na ci ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Samuel pai-in ama omna-ah lumsuk hi.
Topa hong pai-in hong dinga, a hun dangte-a mah bangin, “Samuel! Samuel!” ci-in a sam hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Hong gen in, na nasem pa in za hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Samuel kiangah, “En in, a za mite khempeuh’ bil nihte a vut ding na khat Israel-te’ sungah a sem ding ka hi hi.
Tua ni ciangin ama innkuan tawh kisai ka gensa khempeuh a patna pan a tawpna dong Eli tungah ka tungsak ding hi.
A tapate in Pasian mindaisak a, amah in a tate kham lo ahih manin, ama theih a mawhna hangin ama innkuan gimna a pia tawntung ding ka hihna ama kiangah ka gen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Eli innkuante’ mawhna pen biakna ahi a, piakna in ahi zongin a maisak zawh ngei loh nading thu Eli’ innkuante tungah ka kiciam hi,” a ci hi.
Samuel zong zingsang dong lum hi. Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ inn kongkhakte hong hi. A maangmuhna Eli’ kiangah a gen ding Samuel lau hi.
Ahih hangin Eli in Samuel samin, “Ka tapa Samuel aw,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hih lai-ah om ing,” a ci hi.
Eli in, “Amah in nang kiangah hong gen bang ahi hiam? Kei kiangah hong im kei in. Amah in nang tungah hong gente khempeuh kei kiangah ip nong neih leh, Pasian in nang hong dawm kei tahen,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in ama kiangah a vekpi-in genin bangmah im lo hi. Tua ciangin Eli in, “Amah pen Topa ahi hi. Amah in hoih a sak bangin hih tahen,” a ci hi.
Samuel khang a, Topa in amah ompihin, Samuel’ thugente khat zong lei-ah kiasak lo hi.
Tua ciangin Dan le Beersheba kikal-a om Israel-te khempeuh in Topa’ kamsangin Samuel a kikipsakna thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Shiloh-ah Topa kilangkik zelzel hi. Shiloh-ah Topa mahmah Samuel tungah kilangin thu gen a, Samuel in mite tungah gensawn hi. Tua ciangin Israel-te khempeuh in Samuel’ thu a zui uh hi.
Tu-in Filistia mite a sim dingin Israel-te kuan khia uh hi. Amaute in Ebenezer-ah phual sat uh a, Filistia mite in Afek-ah phual sat uh hi.
Israel-te a do dingin Filistia mite kipan uh a, gal a kido uh ciangin Filistia mite in Israel-te zo-in galphual sungah mi tulli bang that uh hi.

Mihonte giahphual ah hong ciah ciangin Israel upate in, “Bang hangin Topa in tuni-in Filistia mite’ mai-ah eite hong taisak ahi hiam? Eite’ lakah amah hong pai-in a thahat i galte’ khut sung panin amah in eite hong hotkhiat theih nadingin Shiloh panin Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang paipih ni,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite in Shiloh-ah mi paisak uh a, kherub-te tungah a tu Vanglian Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang tua lai panin hong pua uh hi. Eli’ tapa nihte, Hofni le Finehas, Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang tawh tua lai-ah om uh hi.
Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang giahphual sung hong tun ciangin Israel-te khempeuh nakpitakin awng uh a, lei a thawn hi.

Filistia mite in otna gamlumna a zak uh ciangin amaute in, “Hebru mite’ giahphual ah nakpi a hih bang otna bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang giahphual a tun khitna a theih uh ciangin

Filistia mite lau uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Giahphualah a pasian-te uh tung zo hi,” a ci uh hi. Amaute in, “Gimna ngah hi ta hang! Bang hang hiam cih leh nidangin hih bang piang ngei lo hi.
Gimna ngah hi ta hang! Kua in hih a thahat pasian-te’ khut sung panin eite hong hon khia zo ding ahi hiam? Hihte pen gimna a tuamtuamte tawh gamlakah Egypt-te a vat gawp pasian-te ahi hi.
Filistia mite aw, hang unla, pasal bangin gamta un. Tua hikeileh amaute, note’ sila hong hih mah bangin Hebru mite’ sila na suak ding uh hi. Pasal lungsim nei-in do un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Filistia mite in do uh a, Israel-te kizo-in mi khempeuh a inn ciatah tai uh a, mi tampi tak kithat hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te khe galkap mi tul sawmthum puk hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang zong kiman a, Eli’ tapa nihte, Hofni le Finehas zong kithat hi.
Giahphual panin Benjamin mi khat hong tai-in a puan kikeeksa le a lu tungah leivui khu-in Shiloh hong tung hi.

Amah a tun ciangin, lampi gei-ah a vilin ama tutna-ah Eli na tu hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang hangin a lungsim liing hi. Mipa khuapi sung hong tungin a thuteng a gen ciangin khuapi mi khempeuh lau-in kiko uh hi.
Eli in kikona awging a zak ciangin amah in, “Hih gamlumna bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mipa manlangin hong pai-in Eli kiangah a gen hi.
Tu-in Eli kum sawmkua le kum giat pha a, a mitte maangin khua mu thei lo hi.
Mipa in Eli kiangah, “Keimah, galphual panin hong ciah ka hi a, tuni-in giahphual panin kong tai hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka tapa aw, bangci ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

A thu hong puak pa in dawngin, “Filistia mite’ mai-ah Israel-te tai uh a, mi tampi tak zong kithat hi; na tapa nihte, Hofni le Finehas zong si uh a, Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang kiman khin hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang a gen ciangin kulhkongpi gei-a a tutna mun panin Eli thalpukin a ngawng kitanin a si hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah puteek hi-in gik hi. Amah in Israel-te kum sawmli sung thu khen hi.

Tu-in a monu, Finehas’ zi, naupaii-in a suak dektak ahi hi. Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang a kimatna le a pasal a sihna thu a zak ciangin amah kunin nausuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a nat hun tung ta hi.
Amah si dektak a, ahi zongin amah a don numeite in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in, tapa khat na nei hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in dawng lo a, zong don lo hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Israel-te’ sung panin minthanna pai khia khinta!” ci-in a naungek min Ikhabod a phuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang a kimatna hang le a teekpa le a pasal’ hang ahi hi.
Amah in, “Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang kiman khin ahih manin Israel-te’ sung panin minthanna pai khia khinta hi,” a ci hi.
Filistia mite in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang a mat uh ciangin Ebenezer panin Ashdod-ah pua uh hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-te in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang la-in Dagon inn sungah paipihin Dagon kiangah koih uh hi.
Ashdod mite a zing ciang zingsang tungin a thawh uh ciangin, Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai leilakah Dagon na maipuk hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Dagon phongto-in ama omna munah koihkik uh hi.

Ahih hangin a zing ciang zingsang tungin amaute a thawh uh ciangin Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai leilakah Dagon na maipuk leuleu a, Dagon lutang le a khut tegel kitan khia-in sangkil gei-ah om a, Dagon a pumpi bek omlai hi.
Tuni dongin Dagon siampite le Dagon inn-ah a tumte khempeuh in hih thu hangin Ashdod a Dagon sangkil tung sik lo uh hi.
Topa in Ashdod khua mite nakpitakin gawt a, amah in uilut tawh Ashdod khua le a gam sung lausakin gimsak hi.

Ashdod mite in hih bang thute a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Israel-te’ Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang eite kiang panin a pai khiat loh phamawh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in eite le i pasian Dagon hong gawt hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in mi sawlin Filistia uliante khempeuh khawm uh a, “Israel-te’ Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang bang cih ding ihi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in dawngin, “Israel-te’ Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang Gath-ah koihsak ni,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Israel-te’ Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang tua lai-ah paipih uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in tua Gath khua-ah a tunpih khit uh ciangin Topa in tua khuapi langpanin apkhapna lianpi piangsak a, amah in khuapi mite a moi a hamin gimsakin amaute in uilut vei uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang Ekron-ah puak uh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang Ekron a tun ciangin Ekron mite kiko uh a, “Kote le ka mite uh a that dingin amaute in Israel-te’ Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang ko kiangah hong paipih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in mi sawlin Filistia uliante khempeuh khawmin, “Kote le ka mite uh hong thah loh nadingin Israel-te’ Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang pua khia unla, ama omna munah ciahkiksak un,” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a khuapi sung khempeuh ah si dektak a apkhapna om hi. Pasian in tua lai-ah amaute nak gawt mahmah hi.
A si lo sunte in uilut vei uh a, khuapi sunga kahna awging vantung dongah kizato hi.
Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang Filistia gam sungah kha sagih sung om hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-te in siampite le aisante sam uh a, “Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang bang cih ding ihi hiam? Ama omna munah bang tawh kha ding ihi hiam, hong gen un,” a ci uh hi.

Amaute in, “Israel-te’ Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang na puakkhiat uhleh, a hawm guakin puak kei un. Bangbang hitaleh mawhna hanga biakna pia un. Tua ciangin note na dam ding uh a, note hong gawtna thu na thei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Amah i piak ding mawhna hanga biakna bang ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in dawngin, “Filistia uliante a phazah tawh kizui-in kham uilut nga le kham simbeng nga hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note khempeuh le na uliante uh tungah a kibang gimna hong tung hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note in na gam sung uh hong su gawp na uilut uh limte le na simbeng limte uh bawlin, Israel-te’ Pasian’ tungah zahtakna na lak ding uh hi. Note le na pasian-te uh le na gam uh hong gawtna amah in hong zangsak kha ding hi.

Egypt-te le Faro in a lungsim uh a khauhsak bangin bang hangin na lungsim uh khauhsak ding na hi uh hiam? Amah in amaute a mawlpih khit ciangin amaute in Israel mite paisakin, tua ciangin Israel mite kihem khia uh hi lo ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in leeng thak khat bawlin a tungah kol a kibaang ngei nai lo bawngpi a no nawi a pia lai nih la unla, a bawngpite leeng-ah vawh un; ahih hangin amaute kiang panin a note la-in inn-ah ciahpih un.

Tua ciangin Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang la-in leeng tungah koih unla, mawhna hanga biakna-in na piak uh kham milimte a singkuang khat sungah guangin a gei-ah koih un. Tua ciangin sawl khia unla, a lampi-ah paisak un.

A bawngte in Bethshemesh khua zuanin a paitoh leh siatna lianpi hong bawl pa pen amah hi ding hi. Ahih hangin a paitoh kei leh eite hong susia pa amah hi lo a, eite tungah a piang mawkmawk hi, ci-in i thei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Mite in tua bangmahin hih uh a, a no nawi a pia lai bawngpi nih la-in leeng-ah bulh uh hi.
Amaute in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang le kham simbeng le amau’ uilut limte a omna singkuang leeng tungah a koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin bawngpite lamlian dung zui-in Bethshemesh lamah tang takin pai uh a, a paikawmun ham uh hi; taklam ah hitaleh veilam ah hitaleh kihei lo uh a, Filistia uliante in Bethshemesh gamgi ciang dong a nung a zui uh hi.
Tu-in Bethshemesh uliante in kuam sungah a mangbuh uh a lak laitak ahi hi. Amaute khuadakin Thuciamna Singkuang a muh uh ciangin, a muhna uh hangin amaute lungdam uh hi.

Bethshemesh khuami Joshua’ lo ah a leeng hong tungin tua munah khawl hi. Tua lai-ah suangtum lianpi khat om hi. Amaute in a leeng singte ekkhamin a bawngpite Topa’ tungah meihal biakna-in a pia uh hi.

Levi mite in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang le a gei-a om kham milim a omna singkuang la-in suangtumpi tungah a koih uh hi. Bethshemesh mite in tua ni-in Topa’ tungah meihal biaknate le biakpiaknate a pia uh hi.
Filistia ulian ngate in tua bang teng a muh khit uh ciangin tua ni mahin Ekron-ah a ciahkik uh hi.
Filistia-te in mawhna hanga biakna-in Topa’ tungah a piak uh kham uilutte in: Ashdod ading khat, Gaza ading khat, Ashkelon ading khat, Gad ading khat le Ekron ading khat ahi hi.

Ulian ngate’ uk Filistia mite khuakulh tawh a ki-um khuapite le a ki-um lo khuaneute adingin a khua phazah tawh kizui-in kham simbengte zong ahi hi. Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a koihna gei uha suangtumpi pen Bethshemesh khuami Joshua’ lo ah tuni dongin teci ahi hi.
Amaute in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang en uh ahih manin amah in Bethshemesh mite pawlkhat that hi. Amah in amaute sawmsagih that a, mite lakah Topa in mi tampi that ahih manin mite thuum uh hi.
Tua ciangin Bethshemesh mite in, “Hih a siangtho Pasian, Topa’ mai-ah kua om zo ding ahi hiam? Eite’ kiang panin kua kiangah amah paisak ding ihi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Kiriathjearim-ah a teeng mite kiangah kamtaite sawl uh a, “Filistia-te in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang hong puakkik khin uh hi. Hong paisuk unla, no kiangah puato un,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Kiriathjearim mite hong pai-in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang puato uh a, mualtungah a om Abinadab’ inn-ah paipih uh hi. Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a en dingin amaute in ama tapa Eleazar a ap uh hi.
Kiriathjearim-ah Thuciamna Singkuang a om a kipan, hun saupi, kum sawmnih bang pha a, Israel mite khempeuh in Topa ngai-in thuum uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite khempeuh kiangah, “Na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa’ lamah a kiheikik na hih uhleh note’ lak panin gamdang pasian-te le Ashtaroth nusian milim koihkhia-in Topa’ lamah na lungsim uh ngat unla, amah bek bia un. Tua hileh amah in Filistia-te’ khut sung panin note hong hon khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te in Baal-te le Ashtaroth koihkhia-in Topa bek a bia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Israel-te khempeuh Mizpah-ah khawm un. Note adingin Topa’ tungah thu ka ngen ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute Mizpah-ah kikhawm uh a, tui tawi-in Topa’ mai-ah sung khia uh a, tua ni-in an tangin tua lai munah, “Topa’ tungah i khial khinzo hi,” a ci uh hi. Samuel in Israel mite Mizpah-ah thu khen hi.
Israel mite Mizpah-ah a kikhopna thu Filistia-te in a zak uh ciangin Israel-te a sim dingin Filistia uliante kuanto uh hi. Israel mite in tua thu a zak uh ciangin amaute in Filistia-te kihta uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Samuel kiangah, “Filistia-te’ khut sung panin amah in eite hong hotkhiat theih nadingin Topa i Pasian’ tungah eite adingin thunget na khawl kei in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in nawi a ne lai tuuno khat la-in Topa’ tungah a bupin meihal biakna-in a pia hi. Israel-te adingin Topa’ tungah Samuel kiko a, Topa in amah na dawng hi.

Samuel in meihal biakna a piak laitakin Filistia-te in Israel-te a sim dingin hong nai uh hi. Ahih hangin Topa in aw lianpi tawh tua ni-in Filistia-te thawn gawpin amaute buaisak gawp a, Israel-te’ mai-ah amaute kinotkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Mizpah panin Israel-te pai khia-in Filistia-te delh uh a, Bethkar nuai ciang dong amaute a vat gawp uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in suangtum khat la-in Mizpah le Jeshanah kikalah phut a, a min Ebenezer a phuak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Hih pen Topa in eite hong huhna teci ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Filistia-te kizo a, Israel-te’ gam sungah tumkik nawn lo uh hi. Samuel’ hunsung khempeuh Topa in Filistia-te langpang hi.

Israel-te’ tung panin Filistia-te in a laksa khuapite, Ekron panin Gath ciang kikal sungteng, Israel-te tungah kipiakik a, Israel-te in Filistia-te’ khut sung panin a gam uh lakik uh hi. Israel-te le Amor mite kikalah zong kilemna om hi.
Samuel in a nuntak sung tawntung Israel-te thu khen hi.
A kumkumin Bethel, Gilgal le Mizpah-ah kot pai a, amah in hih munte khempeuh ah Israel-te thu khen hi.

Tua ciangin Ramah-ah amah ciahkik zel hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah ama inn om a, tua lai-ah zong Israel-te tungah thukhen na mah a sem hi. Amah in tua lai-ah Topa ading biakna tau khat a lam hi.
Samuel a teek ciangin amah in Israel-te’ tungah thukhenin a tapate a koih hi.
A ta upa’ min Joel hi a, a nihna’ min Abijah ahi hi. Amaute pen Beersheba-ah thukhente ahi uh hi.
Ahih hangin a tapate amah bangin gamta lo uh a, sum ngah ding lam bek kin uh ahih manin sumgolh la-in thuman hei khia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel upate kikhawmin Ramah-a Samuel kiangah pai-in
ama kiangah, “En in, nang na teek ta a, na tapate in nangma khekhap hong zui lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin minam dangte khempeuh mah bangin kote hong uk dingin kote adingin kumpi khat seh in,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in, “Kote hong uk dingin kumpi khat hong pia in,” a cih uh ciangin hih thu in Samuel lungkim losak hi. Samuel in Topa’ kiangah thu ngen hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Samuel kiangah, “Amaute in nang kiangah hong gen thu khempeuh ngai in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in nang hong nial hi lo a, amaute tungah kumpi hihna panin kei hong nial ahi uh hi.

Egypt panin amaute ka pai khiatpih a kipan tuni dongin amaute in kei hong nusia-in pasian dangte’ na semin, kei’ tungah hong bawlnate khempeuh mah bangin amaute in nang tungah zong hong bawl ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in amaute’ thu ngai in. Amaute limtakin hilhkholin, amaute’ tungah a uk ding kumpipa’ hih zia ding lak bek in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in ama tung panin kumpi khat a ngen mite kiangah Topa’ thugen khempeuh a gen hi.
Amah in, “Note hong uk ding kumpipa’ hih zia dingte in: Amah in na tapate uh la-in a leengte-ah na semin a sakol nasem ding le a leengte mai-ah a tai dingin seh ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama adingin a tul-a uk le a sawmnga a ukte le pawlkhatte a lo kho-in a an a la ding le a galsung nazatte le a leeng nate a bawl dingin seh ding hi.
Amah in na tanute uh paknamtui bawl ding, anhuan ding le an em dingin la ding hi.
Amah in na lote uh, na leenggui lote uh le na oliv lote uh sung panin a limci pen teng la-in ama nasemte tungah pia ding hi.
Amah in na an le na leenggahte uh sawm-ah-khat la-in ama uliante le ama nasemte tungah pia ding hi.
Amah in na nasem numeite uh, na nasem pasalte uh, na bawngte, uh le na late uh a gina pen teng la-in ama na a sem dingin koih ding hi.
Amah in na tuuhonte uh sawm-ah-khat la dinga, note pen ama sila na hi ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin note adingin na teelsa uh na kumpipa uh hangin note na kiko ding uh a, ahih hangin tua ni ciangin Topa in note hong dawng lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin mite in Samuel’ thu ngai nuam lo uh hi. Amaute in, “Hilo! Kote’ tungah kumpi khat ka nei ding uh hi.
Kote zong minam dangte khempeuh mah bangin, ka kumpipa uh’n kote hong ukin kote’ mai-ah pai-in ka galte uh hong dosak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Samuel in mite’ thugen khempeuh a zak khit ciangin Topa’ kiangah tua thute a genkik hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Samuel kiangah, “Amaute’ thu ngai inla, amaute-a’ dingin kumpi khat koih in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite kiangah, “Mi khempeuh na khuapi ciat uhah ciah un,” a ci hi.
Benjamin-te sung panin Afiah’ tapa Bekorath, a tapa Zeror, a tapa Abiel, a tapa Kish min nei, Benjamin-te mihau khat a om hi.
Amah in tangval a melhoih, a min Saul ahi tapa khat nei hi. Israel mite lakah amah sangin a melhoih zaw, a thacing zaw khat zong om lo a, midang khempeuh ama liangko ciang bek pha uh hi.
Tua laitakin Saul’ pa Kish’ late a mang hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kish in a tapa Saul kiangah, “Nasemte khat sam inla, late va zong in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Efraim mual tung gam teng le Shalisha gam teng nawkin zong uh a, ahih hangin mu lo uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Shaalim gam teng zong uh a, ahih hangin tua gamah na om tuan lo hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Benjamin gam teng zong uh a, ahih hangin mu sam lo uh hi.
Zuf gam a tun uh ciangin Saul in amah tawh a om a nasem pa kiangah, “Hong pai in, ciahkik ni. Tua hikeileh ka pa in late ngaihsun nawn loin eite hong lunghimawh zaw kha ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a nasem pa in, “En in, hih khuapi sungah Pasian’ mi khat om a, a kizahtak mi khat ahi hi. Ama gen khempeuh a manin tung hi. Tua lai-ah pai ni. Eite’ khualzin khiatna thu amah in hong gen thei kha ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a nasem pa kiangah, “Ahih hangin pai lehang, tua mipa bang puak ding ihi hiam? I van sunga i anlum beita a, Pasian’ mipa kiangah i puak ding letsong om lo hi. Bang nei nawn ihi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nasem pa in Saul dawngkikin, “Hih lai-ah ngun sumnen tang khat ka nei hi. I vai hong gen nadingin Pasian’ mipa kiangah ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

(Tua ma lai-in Israel-te sungah mi khat in Pasian kiangah thudong dingin a pai ciangin amah in, “Hong pai in, thumu pa kiangah va pai ni,” ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuhuna kamsang i cihte tua ma-in thumu pa kici hi.)
Tua ciangin Saul in a nasem pa kiangah, “Tua ahihleh hoih hi, va pai ni,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian’ mipa a omna khuapi-ah amaute a pai uh hi.
Amaute khuapi omna mual tungah a paitoh laitakun khuapi panin tui tawi dingin hong pai khia nungaknote tawh kituak uh ahih manin amaute kiangah, “Thumu pa hih lai-ah a om hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in, “Amah om hi; note’ mai diakah pai hi. Kinawh un; khuapi sungah tu mahmahin hong pai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite in tuni-in mual tunga biakna-ah biakna pia uh hi.

Khuapi sung na lut phetun mual tunga biakna-ah an ne dingin a pai ma-in amah na mu ding uh hi. Amah in biakpiakna thupha pia ding ahih manin ama pai mateng mite in an ne lo ding uh hi. Thupha a piak khit ciangin a kisam mite in ne thei pan uh hi. Tu-in paito un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah na tuakpah ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin khuapi-ah amaute paito uh hi. Khuapi sungah amaute a lut laitakun mual tunga biakna lamah Samuel a pai dingin amau’ lamah hong pai khia a mu uh hi.
Tu-in Saul hong pai ni a zan ni-in Samuel tungah Topa in thu na gen khin hi:

“Zing ciang tubang hunin Benjamin gam sung panin nang kiangah mi khat kong sawl dinga, nangmah in ka mi Israel-te tungah ulian dingin amah sathau na nilh ding hi. Amah in Filistia mite’ khut sung panin ka mite hon khia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ kikona kei kiang hong tung khin ahih manin ka mite’ gimna ka mu khinzo hi,” a ci hi.
Samuel in Saul a muh ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Nang kiangah kong gen mipa hih lai-ah hong paita hi. Amah pen ka mite’ tungah a uk ding pa ahi hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in kulhkongpi-ah Samuel va naihin, “Hong gen in; thumu pa’ inn koilai ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Samuel in Saul dawngin, “Keimah, thumu pa ka hi hi; mual tunga biakna-ah keima mai-ah na paito in; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in tuni-in kei tawh an na ne dinga, zingsang ciangin nang hong ciahsakin na lungsim a om khempeuh nang kiangah kong gen ding hi.

Tuma ni thum lai-in a mang na late ahihleh, kimu khinta ahih manin tuate na lungsimah ngaihsun nawn kei in. Israel-te’ deihdeihte kua’ tungah om ahi hiam? Nang le na pa’ innkuante khempeuh tungah a om hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Saul in dawngin, “Kei pen Israel minamte sung panin a tawm pen Benjamin-te hi lo ka hi hiam? Keima innkuan, Benjamin minam innkuan khempeuh sung panin a niam pen hi lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin hih bangin kei tungah hong pau na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul le a nasem pa samin inndei sungah paipih a, mihing sawmthum bang a pha a kisam mite lak tutna bul lamah a tusak hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in anhuan pa kiangah, “Nang kiangah kong piak, ‘Na tuam koih in,’ kong cih pawl hong paipih in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin anhuan pa in a khe le a kawngsa la-in Saul’ mai-ah a lui hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Thei in, a kisit pen nang’ mai-ah hong kilui hi. Ne in; bang hang hiam cih leh leenglate tawh na nektheih nadingin a kiseh hun a cin mateng nang adingin hong kisitsak ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Saul in Samuel tawh an ne khawm hi.
Amaute mual tunga biakna panin khuapi sungah a paisuk uh ciangin innkhumzangah Saul adingin lupna khat na kiphah a, a ihmu dingin amah lumsuk hi.
Khua a vak ciangin Samuel in innkhumzanga Saul samin, “Na paina dingah kong sawl theih nadingin tho in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul tho-in, amah le Samuel, khuapi kongzingah a pai uh hi.

Amaute khuapi nawlah a paikawmun Samuel in Saul kiangah, “I mai-ah na nasem pa a paisuak nading gen inla, amah a paisuak khit ciangin nang’ tungah Pasian’ thute kong theihsak theih nadingin tawlkhat hih lai-ah khawl in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in sathau thawl khat la a, ama lu tungah buakin amah nam a, “Topa in ama mi Israel-te tungah ulian dingin nang sathau hong nilh khin hi lo ahi hiam? Nangmah in Topa’ mite ukin a kiima om amau’ galte’ khut sung panin amaute na hon khia ding hi. Topa in ama luahte tungah ulian dingin nang sathau hong nilh khitna lim hih bang hi ding hi:

Tuni-in kei kiang panin na pai khiat ciangin Benjamin-te’ gam Rachel’ han kiang Zelzah-ah mihing nih na tuak dinga, amaute in nang kiangah, ‘Pai a na zon late kimu khin a, tu-in na pa in late ngaihsun nawn loin nangmah hong lunghimawh a, “Ka tapa bang cih ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin tua lai panin pai lai-in Tabor tawsaw lak na tung ding hi. Tua lai panin Bethel-a Pasian kiangah a paito, keelno thum a pua mi khat, anlum thum a pua adang khat le leenggahzu savun thawl khat a pua mi khat, mi thum in nang hong dawn ding uh hi.
Amaute in nang hong hopihin nangmah in amau’ tung panin na san ding anlum nih nang tungah hong pia ding uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin Filistia khuacingte a omna Gibeath-elohim na tung ding hi. Tua khuapi sung na tun ciangin amaute mai-ah, harp lasakna, khuangneu, tamngai le laiza lasakna tawh laamin awng kawmin mual tunga biakna panin hong paisuk kamsang honkhat na tuak ding hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ kha in khauhtakin nang hong uk dinga, amaute tawh laamin awng khawmin mi tuamdang khatin na kikheel ding hi.
Hih limte nang tungah hong tun ciangin na tuah peuhpeuh na hih ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang tawh Pasian hong om hi.

Tua ciangin keima mai Gilgal-ah na paisuk ding hi. Meihal biaknate le thunuama biaknate a pia dingin nang kiangah kei zong kong pai ding hi. Nang kiangah kei hong pai-in na hih ding teng kong lah mateng, ni sagih sung na ngak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Samuel nusia dingin a nunghei ciangin Pasian in ama tungah pianzia thak khat a pia hi. Tua ni-in Samuel’ gen limte khempeuh a piang hi.
Gibeah-ah amaute a tun uh ciangin, kamsang honkhat in amah na dawn hi. Pasian’ kha in khauhtakin amah hong man takpi a, amah zong amaute’ lakah laamin a awng hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangte tawh a gamtat khawmna, amah a theisa mi khempeuhte in a muh uh ciangin khatlekhat in, “Kish’ tapa’ tungah bang tung ahi hiam? Saul zong kamsang suak ahi hiam?” kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua lai-a mite khat in dongin, “Hih kamsang dangte kua’ tate ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin, “Saul nangawn kamsang suak hi,” cihna paunak a kipatna hong suak hi.
Tua bangin laamin a otna a man ciangin mual tunga biakna tau omna-ah a pai hi.

Saul’ pano in amah le a nasem pa a muh ciangin, “Koi-ah pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Late a zong dingin ka pai uh hi. Late kimu zo lo ding ci-in ka theih uh ciangin Samuel kiangah ka pai uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ pano in, “Kong thum hi; Samuel in nang kiangah hong gen teng kei tungah hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in a pano kiangah, “Late a kimuh khitna ko kiangah teltakin hong kigen hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Samuel in a gen kumpi suah nading thu tawh kisai ama tungah bangmah gen lo hi.
Tu-in Samuel in Mizpah-a Topa’ kiangah mite khawm hi.

Amah in Israel mite kiangah, “Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Egypt panin Israel-te ka pai khiatpih a, Egypt-te’ khut sung le note hong nengniam kumpi gamte khempeuh’ khut sung panin note kong hon khia hi,’ ci hi.

Ahih hangin note in na tuahsiatnate uh le na lungkhamnate uh panin note a hong hon khia na Pasian uh tuni-in na nial uh a, note in, ‘Kote’ tungah kumpi khat koih in,’ na ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na minam nam uh le a tul tulin Topa’ mai-ah kilak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel minamte khempeuh a nai-ah hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Benjamin minam kila hi.

Amah in Benjamin minamte a behbehin hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Matri innkuan kila hi. A tawpna-ah amah in Matri innkuan a mi malin hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Kish’ tapa Saul kila hi. Ahih hangin amaute in amah a zon uh ciangin amah kimu zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Topa kiangah dongkik uh a, “Tua mipa hih lai-ah hong pai hiam?” ci uh a, Topa in, “En un, a mahmah van kawm lakah bu hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tai-in tua lai mun panin amah hong paipih uh hi. Mite’ lakah amah a din ciangin mi khempeuh ama liangko ciang bek pha uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in mi khempeuh tungah, “Topa in a teelsa mipa na mu uh hiam? Mi khempeuh lakah amah tawh a kibang khat zong om lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh awngin, “Kumpipa khansau hen!” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in kumpipa’ thuneihna le a nasepte mite kiangah gen a, amah in tuate laibu khat sungah gelhin Topa’ mai-ah a koih hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in mi khempeuh amau’ inn ciatah a ciahsak hi.
Saul zong Gibeah-a ama inn-ah ciah a, Pasian in amau’ lungsim a lawnsak mi thahatte zong amah tawh a pai uh hi.

Ahih hangin bangmah a man lo mi pawlkhat in, “Hih mipa in eite hong bangci hotkhiat zawh ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in amah simmawhin ama kiangah letsong puak lo uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in tua mite bangmah cih lo hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon mi Nahash a galkapte tawh paito-in Jabeshgilead umcih hi. Jabesh mite in Nahash kiangah, “Kote tawh kilemna hong bawl in; nangma na kong sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Ammon mi Nahash in amaute kiangah, “Hih thu khat tawh note tawh kilemna ka bawl ding hi. Keimah in note’ taklam mittang khempeuh khel khia-in Israel-te khempeuh tungah mindaina kong omsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Jabesh upate in ama kiangah, “Israel-te’ gam sung khempeuh ah kamtaite ka sawltheih nadingun ni sagih sung a hun hong sot in. Tua ciangin kote hong hon khia ding kuamah a om kei le nang tungah kote kong kipia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Saul’ khua Gibeah-ah kamtaite a tun uh ciangin amaute in mite kiangah a thu gen uh a, tua ciangin mi khempeuh a gingin kap khia uh hi.

Tu-in Saul a bawngtalte’ nung zui-in lo panin hong ciah hi. Saul in, “Amaute a kah nadingin bang in mite nasak ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Jabesh mite’ thute ama kiangah a gen uh hi.
Saul in hih thute a zak ciangin Pasian’ kha in khauhtakin amah hanthawn a, nakpitakin a sin hong so hi.

Amah in bawng leengkai kap khat la a, tuate go-in semnen a, kamtaite sawlin Israel gam khempeuh ah khak a, “Saul le Samuel nung zui-in a kuan khia lo peuhmah a bawngtalte’ tungah hih bangin kihih ding hi,” ci-in a gen hi. Tua ciangin mite tungah Topa kihtakna hong tunga, mihing khat bangin amaute hong kuan khia uh hi.
Amah in Bezek-ah amaute a kaihkhop ciangin Israel mite tul zathum pha a, Judah mite tul sawmthum pha hi.

Amaute in a hong pai kamtaite kiangah, “Jabeshgilead mite tungah hih bangin gen un: ‘Zing ciang, sun hun ma-in note hong kihon khia ding hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi. Kamtaite hong tungin Jabesh mite kiangah a gen uh ciangin amaute lungdam uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jabesh mite in Nahash kiangah, “Zing ciangin nang tungah kote kong kipia ding uh a, nangmah in hoih na sak bangbangin kote’ tungah nong hih ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

A zing ciangin Saul in mite pawl thumin a khen hi. Tua ciangin amaute’ giahphual laizangah zingsang tungin hong pai uh a, sun nisat dong Ammon-te a satlum uh hi. A suakta mite kithehthang uh a, amaute mi nih nangawn a omkhopna om nawn lo hi.
Tua ciangin mite in Saul kiangah, “‘Saul in eite hong uk ding hiam?’ a cite kua ahi hiam? Amaute i thah theih nadingin a mite hong paipih in,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Saul in, “Tuni-in mi khat zong kithat lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuni pen Topa in Israel-te hong hotkhiat ni ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in mite kiangah, “Hong pai un; Gilgal-ah pai-in kumpi dingin Saul kipsak phakik ni,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh Gilgal-ah pai uh a, tua lai mun Topa’ mai Gilgal-ah Saul kumpi-in a koih uh hi. Amaute in tua lai Topa’ mai-ah thunuama biakna pia uh a, Saul le Israel mite khempeuh tua lai-ah nakpitakin lungdam khawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel-te khempeuh tungah, “En un, note in keima kiangah nong gen uh thu khempeuh ka hong mang a, note tungah kumpi khat ka koih khin hi.
Tu-in note’ makai pa pen kumpipa ahi hi. Keimah teekin ka sam kang ta a, ahi zongin note tawh ka tapate om hi. Ka neulai a kipan tuni dong note’ makai ka hi hi.

Hih lai-ah ka om hi; ka mawhna a om leh Topa’ mai le a sathau nilh pa’ mai-ah ka mawhna hong pulak un. Kua’ bawngtal ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua’ la ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua khem ka hi hiam? Kua nengniam ka hi hiam? Ahih kei leh keima mit a tawsak dingin kua’ tung panin sumgolh la ngei ka hi hiam? Ka mawhna nong lah theih uhleh kong dinkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Nangmah in kote nong khem kei a, zong nong nengniam kei a, mi khat peuhpeuh tung panin zong bangmah na la kei hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Note in kei tungah bangmah na muh lohna thu uh Topa pen note’ langkhat ah teci hi a, ama sathau nilh pa zong tuni-in teci ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hi mah hi; Topa, i teci ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in mite kiangah, “Moses le Aaron teelin Egypt gam panin na pu na pate uh a pai khiatpih Topa, teci ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tuni-in note le na pu na pate uh adingin Topa in hotkhiatna a sepna thu khempeuh Topa’ mai note’ tungah hong genin kong mawhsak theih nadingin ding lai dih un.

Egypt-ah Jakob pai-in Egypt-te in amaute a netniam uh ciangin Topa’ tungah na pu na pate uh kiko uh a, Egypt panin na pu na pate uh pai khiatpihin hih lai munah amaute a tengsak ahi Moses le Aaron, Topa in a puak hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in Topa a Pasian uh mangngilh uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Hazor kumpipa Jabin’ galkap mangpa Sisera’ tung le Filistia-te tung le Moab kumpipa tungah amaute zuak a, hih mite in amaute sim uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa tungah amaute kiko uh a, ‘Kote ka khial khin uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa nusia-in Baal-te le Ashtaroth na ka sem uh hi. Ahih hangin tu-in ka galte uh khut sung panin kote hong hon khia in; nangma na kong sem ding uh hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Jerubbaal, Barak, Jefthah le Samuel hong sawl a, na kiim khempeuh uha na galte uh khut sung panin note hong hon khia a, note lungmuang takin na om uh hi.
Tua ciangin note a sim dingin Ammon kumpipa Nahash hong kuanna na muh uh ciangin, Topa na Pasian uh na kumpi uh hi napi-in note in kei kiangah, ‘Kumpi khat in kote hong uk ding hi,’ na ci uh hi.
“Tu-in note’ teelsa, note’ nget kumpipa en un; Topa in note’ tungah kumpi khat koih khinta hi.
Note in Topa zahtakin ama na sem a, ama aw ngai-in Topa’ thupiakna na langpan kei uh a, note a hong uk kumpipa le na Pasian uh na zuih uhleh thu hong nuam ding hi.
Ahih hangin note in Topa’ aw ngai loin Topa’ thupiakna na langpan uhleh Topa in note le na kumpipa uh hong langpan ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in taang loin ding unla, note’ muhna-ah Topa in a hih ding hih na lian en un.

Tuhun pen mangbuh lak laitak hi lo ahi hiam? Amah in vanging le guah hong puaktheih nadingin Topa’ tungah thu ka ngen ding hi. Note adingin kumpi khat na ngetna uh hangin Topa’ muhna-ah na gamtatnasa na gitlohna uh a liatna thu thei-in na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in Topa’ tungah thu ngen a, Topa in tua ni-in van gingsakin guah zusak hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in Topa le Samuel nakpitakin a zahtak uh hi.

Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in Samuel kiangah, “Kote ka sih loh nadingun na nasemte adingin Topa’ tungah thu ngen in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka khialhnasate uh banah kote adingin kumpi khat ngenin ka khialhnate uh banah hih siatna ka behlap lailai uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
