Tua ciangin Samuel in mite kiangah, “Lau kei un; hih siatnate khempeuh na gamta khin uh hi. Ahi zongin Topa zuihna panin pial kei unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa’ na sem un.
Meetna hong pia thei lo, hong hon thei lo, a mawkna milimte biakna lamah pial kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen a mawkna ahi hi.
Topa in ama min a khualna-in ama mite paai khia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama mi-in note hong bawl nadingin Topa lungkim khin hi.
Tua tham loin kei zong, note adingin Topa’ tungah thunget lohna tawh ka na khial het kei dinga, keimah in a hoih a man lampite note kong hilh ding hi.
Topa zahtak unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh citakin ama na sem un; bang hang hiam cih leh note adingin amah in na lian hong bawlsaksate ngaihsun un.
Ahih hangin note na gamtat siat lai uhleh, note le na kumpipa uh, na nihun hong kiphiatkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Saul in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmthum pha a, kum sawmli le kum nih sung Israel-te a uk hi.

Saul in Israel-te mihing tulthum teel hi. Tul nihte Mikmash le Bethel mual tung gamah Saul tawh om a, tul khatte Benjamin gam sung Gibeah-ah a tapa Jonathan tawh om uh a, midang a omlaite amau’ inn a puanbuk ciat uhah amah in ciahsak hi.
Jonathan in Geba-ah a om Filistia-te’ khuacingte zo a, Filistia-te in tua thu za uh hi. Tua ciangin Saul in gam khempeuh ah peengkul tum a, “Hebru mi khempeuh zasak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Filistia khuacingte a zawhna le Filistia-te adingin Israel-te a huathuai ahihna zong Israel-te khempeuh in za uh hi. Gilgal-ah Saul a pawm dingin mite kisamkhia hi.

Tua ciangin Israel-te tawh a kido dingin Filistia-te kikhawmin, leeng tul sawmthum, sakol galkap tulguk le a galkapte tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin tampi pha uh hi. Amaute hong paito-in Bethaven nisuahna lam Mikmash-ah phual sat uh hi.
A galte in Israel mite neh mahmah ahih manin amaute haksatna sungah a omlam uh a kitheih uh ciangin suanghawm sung, leihawm sung, suang kawmlak, han lak le tuikhukte sungah bu uh a,
a dangte in Jordan ngahmun kantanin Gad le Gilead gamah galkah uh hi. Saul ahihleh Gilgal-ah omlai a, amah tawh a om mi khempeuh zong lau-in liing uh hi.
Amah in Samuel’ seh hun, ni sagih sung a ngak hi. Ahih hangin Gilgal-ah Samuel hong pai lo a, ama kiang panin mite kithehthang hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in, “Meihal biakna le thunuama biakna hih lai kei kiangah hong paipih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in meihal biakna a pia hi.
Meihal biakna a piak a man khit phetin Samuel hong tunga, amah a dawn ding le a hopih dingin Saul pai khia hi.
Samuel in, “Bang hih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Saul in, “Kei kiang panin mite kithehthangin, a ni kiseh sungin nang lah hong tung lo a, Mikmash-ah Filistia-te a kikhopna ka muh ciangin

keimah in, ‘Tu-in Filistia-te keimah hong hih dingin Gilgal-ah hong paisuk ding uh a, keimah in Topa’ maipha ka ngen nai kei hi,’ ka ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kei mahmah kisawl tawmin meihal biakna ka pia hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Na hai gamtat hi; Topa na Pasian’ hong thupiakna na zui kei hi; bang hang hiam cih le Topa in Israel-te tungah kumpi dingin nang le na suanlekhakte a kipsaksuak ding ahi hi.

Ahih hangin tu-in na ukna kizomsuak lo dinga, Topa in ama lungsim bangin mi khat zong khin hi. Topa in nang hong thupiak zui lo na hih manin ama mite tungah ulian dingin Topa in amah seh khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel dingin Gilgal panin Benjamin-te’ gam sung Gibeah-ah paito hi. Tua ciangin Saul in amah tawh a om mite mihing zaguk bang kaikhawm hi.
Saul, a tapa Jonathan le amau tawh a om mite Benjamin-te’ gam sung Gibeah-ah om uh hi. Ahih hangin Filistia-te in Mikmash-ah phual sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-te’ giahphual panin galsimte pawl thumin hong kuan khia uh hi. Pawlkhatte Shual gam Ofrah lamah kihei-in,
pawlkhatte Bethhoron lamah kihei a, pawlkhatte gamlak lam Zeboiim kuam a kimuh sukna gamgi lamah kihei uh hi.
Tua laitakin Israel gam sung khempeuh ah sikseek khat zong om lo hi. Tua ahih manin Filistia-te in, “Hebru mite in amau adingin namsau ahi a, teipi ahi zongin hong seeksak kha ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Israel-te pen a lokhawhna tu, a hei, ahih kei leh a phiaukawi a seek hiam dingin Filistia-te kiangah paisuk zel uh hi.
Lokhawhna tu le tuzum seek hiam thaman hamu bang hi a, hei seek hiam thaman le ciangkhutah sik phuh thaman mat khat bang ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin galdo-in Saul le Jonathan tawh a om mite khat peuhpeuh khut sungah namsau ahi a, teipi ahi zongin om lo a, ahi zongin Saul le a tapa Jonathan in nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mite in Mikmash paina ciangka a cing dingin mi sawl uh hi.

Ni khat ni-in Saul’ tapa Jonathan in ama galhiam a pua tangvalpa kiangah, “Hong pai in; gal khat-a Filistia khuacingte kiangah pai ni,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in a pa kiangah a pai ding thu gen lo hi.
Saul pen Migron-a om mang kawlsing nuai-a Gibeah nawlah om hi. Amah tawh a om mite zaguk bang pha a,
Shiloh-ah Topa’ siampi Eli’ tapa Finehas, a tapa Ikhabod, a sanggampa Ahitub’ tapa Ahijah in siampi puan silh hi. Mite in Jonathan a pai khiat khit lam thei lo uh hi.

Filistia khuacingte’ omna-ah pai ding Jonathan in a ngimna ciangka a pang khatah suangdawk khat omin, a pang langkhat ah zong suangdawk khat mah om hi. A khat min Bozez hi a, a langkhat min Seneh ahi hi.
Suangdawk khat pen Mikmash mai leilu lamah dawkin a khat pen Geba mai leitaw lamah dawk hi.

Tua ciangin Jonathan in ama galhiam a pua tangvalpa kiangah, “Hong pai in; dawibia mi hih khuacingte kiangah va pai ni. Topa in eite adingin hong hihsak kha ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hotkhiat nadingin a tam a tawm in Topa nawngkaisak lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a galhiam puapa in ama kiangah, “Na lungsim in a sawm khempeuh hih in. Nang tawh ka om a, nang lungsim mah bangin kei’ lungsim zong ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in, “En in, hua mite kiangah galkahin amaute kiangah i va kilak ding hi.
Amaute in, ‘Note kiangah kong pai mateng uh hong ngak un,’ hong cih leh i omna munah taang loin i om dinga, amaute kiangah i paito kei ding hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in, ‘Ko’ kiangah hong paito un,’ hong cih leh eite i paito ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in eite’ khut sungah amaute hong pia khin hi. Hih pen eite adingin lim hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Filistia khuacingte kiangah amau tegel va kilak uh hi. Filistia-te in, “En un, a bukna uh leivang panin Hebru mite hong pusuakkhia uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Khuacing mite in Jonathan le a galhiam puapa na hopih uh a, “Ko kiangah hong paito un; na khat kong lak ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jonathan in a galhiam puapa kiangah, “Ka nung hong zuito in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Israel-te’ khut sungah amaute hong pia khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan a khut le a khe tawh kahto-in a galhiam puapa a nungah pai hi. Jonathan in amaute vattuk a, a galhiam puapa in ama nungah amaute that hi.
Jonathan le a galhiam puapa in a mi thah masak tungin lo ekah khat dung zui-in lo kaihna kuak dung tawn lang tan sungah mihing sawmnih bang si hi.
Tua ciangin giahphual sung, gam sung le mite lakah apkhapna om hi. Khuacingte le galsimte nangawn liing uh hi. Zin liing a, buaina lianpi mahmah khat hong suak hi.
Benjamin-te’ gam sunga Gibeah-a Saul’ galvilte in a et uh ciangin hih lam hua lamah mihonte a kikhin muaimuai a mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in amah tawh a omkhawm mite kiangah, “Mi sim unla, eite kiang panin kua pai khia hiam thei un,” a ci hi. Amaute in mi a sim khit uh ciangin, Jonathan le a galhiam puapa na om lo hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Ahijah kiangah, “Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang hih lai-ah hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua hun laitakin Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang Israel mite tawh pai hi.

Saul in siampipa a hopih laitakin Filistia-te’ giahphual a buaina hong lian semsem hi. Tua ciangin Saul in siampipa kiangah, “Tua Thuciamna Singkuang lenin Topa thu dot ding hun om nawn lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul le amah tawh a om mi khempeuh kikhawmin galphualah pai uh hi. A galte khempeuh’ namsau in amau’ lawmte mah hih ciat a, kitawhnawina lianpi khat na om hi.
Tu-in tua hun ma-in Filistia-te tawh omkhawm khinin giahphual ah amaute tawh a pai khinsa Hebru mite nangawn Saul le Jonathan tawh a omkhawm Israel-te tawh a kipawl dingin kihei uh hi.
Tua mah bangin, Filistia-te a taina thu Efraim mual tung gamah a bu Israel mite khempeuh in a zak uh ciangin amaute in zong galphualah nakpitakin a nungdelh uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Israel-te tua ni-in hon khia a, galkidona in Bethaven a kheng hi.

Israel mite tua ni-in lungkham uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Saul in mite tungah kiciamna khat koih a, “Tu nitak mateng le ka galte ka thukzawh matengin an a ne pa in samsiatna ngah tahen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite khat beek in an ciam lo uh hi.
Mi khempeuh tulak a tun uh ciangin mun citengah khuaizu na om hi.
Mite tulak a lut uh ciangin, a khuaizu taak a, ahih hangin kuamah in ciam ngam vet lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite in tua kiciamna kihta uh hi.
Ahih hangin a pa in kiciamna tawh mite a thuhilhna Jonathan in za lo ahih ciangin amah in a khutsunga om a ciangkhut dawn dawk sakin khuaizu sungah diahin a ne hi. Tua ciangin a tha hatkik hi.
Tua ciangin mite khat in, “Na pa in kiciamna khat tawh nakpitakin mite thuhilh a, ‘Tuni-in an a ne mipa in samsiatna ngah tahen,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Mite gim mahmah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in, “Ka pa in gam sung nawngkaisak hi; hih khuaizu tawmno khat ka ciapna hangin ka tha a hatkikna mu un.
Mite in tuni-in a ut utun amau’ muhsa galte’ an kinusiate ne leh bangzah takin hoih zaw ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh tu-in Filistia-te i thah tam zo nai lo hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in tua ni-in Mikmash panin Aijalon ciang dong Filistia-te sattuk uh hi. Tua ciangin mite gim mahmah uh hi.
Van kinusiate tungah mite va leengin, tuu le bawngtal le bawngnote a tuahtuahna munah go uh a, mite in tuate a si tawh a ne uh hi.

Tua ciangin Saul kiangah thu kiko a, “A si tawh sa nekna hangin Topa’ tungah mite khial uh hi,” kici hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Na zuau gamtat khin uh hi; suangtum lian khat hih lai kei kiangah hong khuk dih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in, “Mite lakah note pai-in amaute kiangah, ‘Mi khempeuh in a bawngtal ahi a, a tuu ahi zongin hih lai-ah hong paipihin go unla, a sa ne un; a si tawh nekna hangin Topa’ tungah khial kei un,’ ci un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh in tua zanin a bawngtalte uh hong paipihin tua munah go uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Topa ading biakna tau khat lam hi. Tua pen Topa adingin a lam masak biakna tau ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in, “Filistia-te kiangah zanin paisukin zingsang khuavak dong amaute va su gawp ni; amaute mi khat zong siit kei ni,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hoih na sak peuhpeuh hih in,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin siampipa in, “Hih lai-ah Pasian kiang nai ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Pasian kiangah thu dong a, “Filistia-te kiangah ka paisuk ding hiam? Israel-te’ khut sungah amaute nong pia ding hiam?” a ci hi. Ahih hangin tua ni-in amah in dawng lo hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Mi a makaite khempeuh aw, hih lai-ah hong pai un; hih mawhna tuni-in hong pianna thei unla mu un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te a hon khia Topa a nuntak mah bangin, ka tapa Jonathan’ tungah tua mawhna a om leh zong, amah a si taktak ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin mite lak panin amah a dawng ngam mi khat zong om lo hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Israel-te khempeuh tungah, “Note langkhat ah na om ding uh a, kei le ka tapa Jonathan a langkhat ah ka om ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mite in Saul kiangah, “Hoih na sak bangin hih in,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Saul in, “Israel-te’ Pasian Topa aw, bang hangin tuni-in na nasem pa hong dawng lo na hi hiam? Hih mawhna kei tung ahi a, ka tapa Jonathan’ tungah ahi zongin a om leh, Israel-te’ Pasian Topa aw, Urim hong pia in; ahih hangin hih mawhna na mi Israel-te tungah om ahihleh Thummim hong pia in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jonathan le Saul kila a, a midangte suakta hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Kei le ka tapa Jonathan kikalah ai san un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jonathan kila hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in Jonathan kiangah, “Na gamtatnasa hong gen in,” a ci hi. Jonathan in ama kiangah gen a, “Ka khutsunga om ciangkhut dawn tawh khuaizu tawmkhat ka ciam hi. Hih lai-ah ka om hi; kei a si dingin ka kiging hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Nang na sih taktak kei taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei tahen, Jonathan aw,” ci-in a kiciam hi.

Tua ciangin mite in Saul kiangah, “Israel-te sungah hih gualzawhna lian a piangsak Jonathan si ding ahi hiam? Hi dek peuhmah lo ding! Topa a nuntak mah bangin, a lu tunga samzang khat zong leilakah kia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Pasian tawh tuni-in tua thu piangsak hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite in Jonathan hon khia uh a, amah si lo hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-te a delhna panin Saul khawl a, Filistia-te zong amau’ munah a ciah uh hi.
Saul, Israel-te tungah kumpi a suah khit ciangin mun khempeuha ama galte khempeuh, Moab-te, Ammon-te, Edom-te, Zobah kumpite le Filistia-te a do hi. A galsimna peuhpeuhah amah gualzo tawntung hi.
Amah in hangtakin hihin Amalek-te vat gawp a, amaute a su gawp mite’ khut sung panin Israel-te a hon khia hi.
Tu-in Saul’ tapate pen Jonathan, Ishvi le Malkhishua hi a, a tanu nihte: a u zaw min Merab hi a, a nau zaw’ min Mikhal hi a,
Saul’ zi min Ahinoam hi a, Ahimaaz’ tanu ahi hi. A galkap mangpa’ min Abner hi a, Saul’ pano Ner’ tapa ahi hi.
Saul’ pa Kish le Abner’ pa Ner pen Abiel’ tapate ahi uh hi.

Saul’ nuntak sung khempeuh Filistia-te tawh nakpi taka kidona om hi. Saul in, mi thahat khat peuhpeuh ahi a, mi hang khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a muh ciangin, tua mipa ama galkap dingin pawlbawl pahpah hi.
Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Topa in ama mi Israel-te tungah kumpi dingin nang sathau a nilh dingin kei hong sawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa’ thugen ngai in.
Vanglian Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Amaute Egypt panin hong pai khiat lai-in amaute in lampi-ah Israel-te a nialna uh hangin Amalek mite gim ka pia ding hi.
Tu-in pai-in Amalek mite vat gawp unla, amaute’ neih khempeuh susia mang khin un. Amaute siit loin, numei le pasal, naupang le nawine laite, bawngtal le tuu, kalaoh le la, that un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in Israel mite sam a, Telaim-ah khe galkap mi tul zanih le Judah mi tul sawm kaikhawm hi.
Tua ciangin Amalek khuapi-ah Saul hong pai-in kuam sungah pangsim hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in Ken mite kiangah, “Pai un; kihem khia un. Amalek mite lak panin pai khiasuk un. Tua hikeileh amaute tawh note kong susiakhawm kha ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt panin Israel-te hong pai khiat lai-in amaute khempeuh tungah migitna na lak uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Amalek mite lak panin Ken mite kihem khia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Havilah panin Egypt nisuahna lama om Shur ciang dong Amalek-te zo hi.
Amah in Amalek-te’ kumpipa Agag a hingin man a, mi khempeuh namsau tawh that mang hi.

Ahih hangin Saul le mite in Agag le a hoih pen tuute, bawngtalte, gannote, tuunote le a hoih khempeuh khawi uh a, tuate that mang khin lo uh hi. A kisimmawh bangmah a man lo khempeuh amaute in that mang uh hi.
Topa’ thu Samuel tungah hong tung hi:
“Kumpi-in Saul ka koih ka kisik hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen keimah zuihna panin kiheikik a, ka thupiaknate sem lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel heh hi; zan tawntung Topa’ tungah kiko hi.

Tua ciangin Saul a dawn dingin zingsangin Samuel tho baih hi. Samuel kiangah, “Karmel-ah Saul hong pai hi. Amah in ama adingin phawkna mual khat phutin, kihei-in paisuak a, Gilgal-ah paisuk hi,” kici hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel hong pai a, Saul in ama kiangah, “Topa’ thupha na tungah hong tung hen. Topa’ thupiakna ka sem khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Tua ahihleh ka bil-a tuu hamna le ka zak bawngtalte’ hamna bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Saul in, “Amaute in Amalek-te kiang panin tuate hong paipih uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian tungah biakna piak nadingin a limci pen tuute le bawngtalte mite in siit uh a, a dangte ka that mang khin uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Khawl in! Topa in tuzanin kei kiangah hong gen thu nang kiangah kong gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in Samuel kiangah, “Hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Nang na kineu ngaihsut hun a om hangin, tu-in nang pen Israel minamte’ lutang hi lo na hi hiam? Topa in Israel-te tungah kumpi-in nang sathau hong nilh hi.
Topa in nasem dingin nang hong sawl a, ‘Pai in; mawhnei Amalek mite va susia mang inla, amaute a bei mateng va sim gawp in,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin Topa’ thu mang lo na hi hiam? Bang hangin vankinusiate bawhin Topa’ muhna-ah a sia gamta na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Samuel kiangah, “Keimah in Topa’ thu ka mang a, Topa in hong sawl nasepna-ah pai khinin, Amalek kumpipa Agag kong ciahpih khin a, Amalek mite ka susia mang khin hi.
Ahih hangin mite in a kinusiate, tuute le bawngtalte, suksiat dinga a ki-ap na hoih pente Gilgal-ah Topa na Pasian piak dingin la uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Topa in meihal biaknate le biakpiaknate Topa’ thu man ding zahin deih ahi hiam? En in, biakpiakna sangin thu man ding hoih zaw a, tuutal thaute sangin thu ngaih ding hoih zaw hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh lehdona pen aisan mawhna bangmah hi a, lungkhauhna pen mawhna le milim biakna mah a bang ahi hi. Nangmah in Topa’ thu nial khin na hih manin, amah in zong kumpi hihna pan nang hong nolh khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Samuel kiangah, “Ka khial khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in mite kihta-in amau’ thu mang kha ka hih manin Topa’ thupiakna le nangma thute ka palsat khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kong thum hi; ka khialhna hong maisak inla, Topa ka biaktheih nadingin kei hong lehzuihkik in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Nang tawh kong kilehkik kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in Topa’ thu na nial khin a, Israel-te’ tungah kumpi hihna panin Topa in nang hong nolh khin hi,” a ci hi.
A pai khia dingin Samuel a kihei laitakin Saul in a puantualpi mongin len a, a puan kikeek hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in ama kiangah, “Topa in Israel-te’ kumpi gam nang’ tung panin tuni-in bal khia-in nang sangin a hoih zaw na veengpa tungah pia khin hi.
Israel-te’ minthang Pasian in zong zuaugen lo dinga, zong kisik lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a kisik dingin amah mi hi lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka khial khin hi; ahi zongin tu-in keima mi upate mai le Israel-te’ mai-ah kei hong pahtawi inla, Topa na Pasian ka biaktheih nadingin kei hong zuikik in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul’ nung zui-in Samuel kilehkik a, Saul in Topa a bia hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Amalek-te’ kumpi Agag hih lai ka kiangah hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Agag launa linna tawh ama kiangah hong pai hi. Agag in, “Sih ding lungkhamna hong tung taktak ta hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Na namsau in nute ta bei-in a bawl mah bangin na nu zong ta bei hi ta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Topa’ mai Gilgal-ah Agag a semnen hi.
Tua ciangin Ramah-ah Samuel pai a, Gibeah-a a inn-ah Saul zong a ciahto hi.
Samuel in ama sih ni dong Saul mukik lo a, ahih hangin Saul’ hangin Samuel a dah hi. Israel-te tungah kumpi-in Saul a koih manin Topa kisik hi.

Topa in Samuel kiangah, “Israel-te tungah kumpi hihna panin amah ka nolh khitna mu napi-in Saul’ hangin bang tanvei dah ding na hi hiam? Na sathau biingah sathau thun inla, pai in; Bethlehem mi Jessi kiangah kong sawl ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama tapate lak panin keima-a’ ding kumpi khat ka la khin hi,” a ci hi.

Samuel in, “Bangci pai theih ding ka hi hiam? Saul in za le amah in kei hong that ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Bawngla khat paipih inla, ‘Topa’ tungah biakna pia dingin kong pai hi,’ ci in.
Biakpiakna-ah Jessi sam in. Na hih ding teng na tungah kong lak dinga, nang tungah a min kong gen pa sathau nong nilhsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa’ thupiak bangin Samuel gamta-in Bethlehem-ah a pai hi. Tua khuapi upate a liingsa-in amah a dawn dingin hong pai uh a, “Thuhoih a hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Thuhoih hi; Topa’ tungah biakna a pia dingin kong pai hi. Note ki-ap unla, biakpiakna-ah kei tawh hong pai un,” a ci hi. Amah in Jessi le a tapate apin, biakpiakna-ah amaute a sam hi.
Amaute hong tun ciangin amah in Jessi’ tapa Eliab enin, “Topa’ sathau nilh pa ama mai-ah om taktak hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in Samuel kiangah, “A tungtham hitaleh a tun sanna hitaleh en kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ka nolh hi. Topa in mihingte’ muh bangin mu lo hi. Mihingte in a pualam a kilangte en a, ahih hangin Topa in a lungsim en hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jessi in a tapa Abinadab samin Samuel mai-ah a paisak hi. Amah in, “Topa in hih pa zong teel lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jessi in Shammah paisak hi. Amah in, “Topa in hih pa zong teel lo hi,” a ci leuleu hi.
Jessi in a tapate a sagihna dongin Samuel mai-ah paisak hi. Samuel in Jessi kiangah, “Topa in hih mite teel lo hi,” a ci leuleu hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Jessi kiangah, “Na tapate khempeuh hih lai-ah a omkim mah ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Jessi in, “A nautum pen omlai a, ahih hangin amah tuu cingin om hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Jessi kiangah, “Hih lai-ah amah hong tun mateng eite in bangmah dang i hih thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in David samsakin amah hong tumpih hi. Amah in cidam mel pua-in, a mitte hoih a, a mel hoih hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Ding in; amah sathau nilh in; hih pa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in a sathau biing sunga sathau la-in a sanggamte laizangah amah sathau a nilh hi. Tua ni a kipanin Topa’ kha in khauhtakin David hong uk hi. Tua ciangin Samuel dingin Ramah-ah a ciah hi.
Tu-in Saul’ tung panin Topa’ kha pai khia a, Topa in kha gilo sawlin tua kha gilo in amah gimsak hi.
Saul’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Tu-in en in, Pasian’ hong sawl kha gilo in nang hong gimsak hi.

Tu-in na mai-a om nasemte in laiza lasakna a tumsiam mi khat a zon nadingin ka topa un na nasemte thu pia in. Pasian’ hong sawl kha gilo na tungah hong tun ciangin amah in tua hong tum dinga, tua ciangin na ci hong dam ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in a nasemte kiangah, “Limtakin a tum thei khat kei adingin hong zong unla, ka kiangah amah hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
Tangvalte khat in dawngin, “En un, Bethlehem mi Jessi’ tapa, a tumsiam, a thahat, a galhang mi, thugen a siam, a om nuam mi khat ka mu a, Topa in amah a ompih mi khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in Jessi kiangah kamtaite sawl a, “Na tapa David, tuute tawh a om pa, kei’ kiangah hong sawl in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jessi in anlum, leenggahzu savun thawl khat le keelno khat a pua ding la khat la-in, Saul kiangah tuate a tapa David puaksak hi.
Saul kiangah David hong tunga, ama nasepna-ah a lut hi. Saul in amah nakpitakin it a, amah pen a galhiam puapa a suak hi.
Saul in Jessi kiangah mi sawlin, “Keima nasepna-ah David hong omsak in. Amah ka pahtak mahmah mi khat ahi hi,” cisak hi.
Pasian’ sawl kha gilo Saul’ tungah a om peuhmah ciangin David in a laiza la-in a khut tawh tum ahih ciangin Saul thaksuakin a ci dam a, ama kiang panin kha gilo kihem khia hi.
Tu-in Filistia-te in galsim dingin a galkapte uh khawmin Judah gam Sokoh-ah amaute kituah uh a, Sokoh le Azekah kikal Efesdammim-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul le Israel mite kikhawmin Elah kuamah giahphual sat uh a, Filistia-te a do dingin kithawi uh hi.
Filistia-te a gal mualtungah ding uh a, Israel-te a galkhat mualtungah dingin, amaute’ kikalah kuam khat om hi.
Filistia-te’ giahphual panin Gath khuami Goliath a kici a makai, a tun pi kua val a sang mi khat hong pai khia hi.
Amah in a lu tungah sumngo sik lukhu khu-in, sik puan tawh amah kithawi a, a puan gihna sumngo shekel tulnga ahi hi.
Amah in a khete tungah sumngo ngaltuam bulh a, a liangko-ah sumngo teipi khawh kikhai hi.
A teibul siam lawngpi cia bang pha a, a teipak sik shekel zaguk gik a, ama mai-ah a lum puapa a pai hi.

Amah dingin Israel uliante otsanin, “Galdo dingin bang hangin hong kuan khia ngam na hi uh hiam? Kei, Filistia mi hi-in, note, Saul’ nasemte hi lo na hi uh hiam? Note adingin mi khat teel unla, tua mipa kei kiangah hong paisuksak un.
Amah in kei hong do-in hong thah zawh leh kote na nasemte ka hi ding uh a, ahih hangin keimah in amah zo-in ka thah leh note, komau’ nasem na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua Filistia mipa in, “Tuni-in Israel uliante kong to hi. I kido theih nadingin mi khat hong pia un,” cithuah lai hi.
Saul le Israel-te khempeuh in Filistia mipa’ kammalte a zak uh ciangin amaute lungkia-in nakpitakin a lau uh hi.
David pen Judah gam Bethlehem khua-a om Efrathah mi, tapa giat a nei Jessi min a nei pa’ tapa ahi hi. Saul’ hun lai-in tua mipa teek zo-in kum tampi pha ta hi.
Jessi’ tapa a u pen thumte in galdona-ah Saul zui khin uh hi. Gal sungah a pai a tapa thumte’ min pen, a ta upa Eliab, ama zomah Abinadab le a thumna Shammah ahi hi.
David, a nautum pen hi a, a upa pen thumte in Saul zui a,
ahih hangin Bethlehem-a a pa’ tuute a vak dingin Saul’ kiang panin David ciah zelzel hi.
Ni sawmli sung zing le nitakin Filistia-pa hong pai-in hong ding zelzel hi.
Tua ciangin Jessi in a tapa kiangah, “Hih ankan seu khat le hih anlum sawm na ute puak dingin guang inla, na ute kiang giahphual ah manlangin va puak inla,
a tul a ukpa kiangah zong hih sathaukhal sawmte puak in. Na ute’ omdan va mu inla, amau’ omzia a kitheihna lim pawlkhat hong ciahpih in,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin Filistia-te tawh kido-in Saul le amaute le Israel mite khempeuh, Elah kuamah om uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jessi in a thupiak bangin zingsangin David tho baihin, a kem ding midang khat tawh a tuute nusia a, a ante pua-in a pai hi. Mihonte giahphual ah pai-in galdo kikona a ot laitakun amah giahphual va tung hi.
Israel-te le Filistia-te, galkap le galkap a kido dingin kinaih uh hi.
David in van cing pa’ khut sungah a nate nusia-in galkapte kiangah va tai a, pai-in a ute va hopih hi.
Amaute tawh a kiho laitakin, Gath khuami Filistia-te a makaipi Goliath min nei pa, Filistia uliante lak panin hong pai khia-in a masa-a mah bangin kam hong pau hi. David in ama kampau a za hi.
Israel mite khempeuh in tua mipa a muh uh ciangin ama kiang panin tai khia uh a, lau mahmah uh hi.

Israel mite khatlekhat kiho-in, “Hih hong pai khia mipa na mu ngei uh hiam? Israel-te a to dingin hong paito takpi hi. Amah a that mipa tungah kumpipa in sum tampi pia-in, ama tanu zong pia dinga, a pa’ innkuante, Israel sungah aana nasep le siah khempeuh kipengsak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

David in ama kiang a ding mite kiangah, “Hih Filistia-pa thatin Israel-te’ tung panin hih mindaina a beisak pa adingin bang kihih ding ahi hiam? A nungta Pasian’ galkapte a to dingin hih dawibia Filistia-pa kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Mite in a kibang mahin dawng uh a, “Amah a that mipa tungah tua bang tua bangin kihih ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

David in mite kiangah thu a gen laitakin ama u a upen Eliab in a za hi. David tungah Eliab heh mahmah ahih manin, “Bang hangin hong paisuk na hi hiam? Tua tuu tawmkhatte gamlakah kua tawh nusia na hi hiam? Na kihaimuanna le na lungsim gitlohna ka thei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh galkidona a en dingin nong paisuk hi,” a ci hi.
David in, “Bang hih ka hi hiam? Kam bek hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiang panin midang khat kiangah kihei-in a kibang mahin thu dong a, mite in a masa-a mah bangin amah dawngkik uh hi.
David’ kampaute a kizak ciangin amaute in Saul kiangah gen uh a, Saul in amah samsak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Saul kiangah, “Ama hangin kuamah lungkiasak kei in. Na nasem pa pai-in hih Filistia-pa tawh ka va kido ding hi,” a ci hi.
Saul in David kiangah, “Hih Filistia-pa tawh a kido dingin ama langkhat ah na kuan zo kei ding hi. Nang pen tangval na hi pan a, amah pen a tangval a kipan galkap mi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin David in Saul kiangah, “Na nasem pa in a pa’ tuute a kem zel hi. Humpinelkai ahi a, vom ahi zongin hong pai-in tuute lak panin tuuno a mat ciangin,
a nungah delhin vat gawpin a kamsung panin tuuno ka hon khia hi. Kei hong hih dingin amah hong ding leh keimah in a ngawngin manin vat gawpin ka that hi.
Na nasem pa in humpinelkai le vomte that khin ngei hi. Amah in a nungta Pasian’ galkapte ninsak ahih manin dawibia hih Filistia-pa pen tuate khat tawh kibang lel ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in, “Humpinelkai khecin le vom khecin panin kei a hong hon khia Topa in hih Filistia-pa’ khut sung panin zong kei hong hon khia ding hi,” ci thuah lai hi. Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, “Pai in; Topa in nang hong ompih tahen!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in a galvante David pia a, amah in a lu tungah sumngo lukhu khusakin, sik puan silhsak hi.

Tua ciangin David in a galdalnate tungah a namsau khih a, amah kingeinaseh lo ahih manin lam pai dingin a kithawi leh pai thei lo hi. Tua ciangin David in Saul kiangah, “Hihte tawh lam ka pai thei kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka kingeinaseh kei hi,” a ci hi. David in tuate suah khia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a khutah a ciangkhut tawi-in, lui panin suangmai tang nga tengin a tuucin thungip sungah tuate koih hi. A khut sungah a suanglotna tawi a, Filistia-pa’ nai-ah a pai hi.
Tua ciangin a mai-ah a lum puapa tawh Filistia-pa hong pai-in David hong naih hi.
Filistia-pa khuadakin David a muh ciangin amah in simmawh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah a tangval pan, a cidam tuak, a melhoih khat hi lel hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-pa in David kiangah, “Ui hong sa a, ciangkang tawh sat hong sawm na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Filistia-pa in a pasian-te’ min tawh David samsia hi.
Filistia-pa in David kiangah, “Ka kiangah hong pai in. Huih lak vasate le gamlak gamsate tungah na sa ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in Filistia-pa kiangah, “Namsau, teipi le teikhawh tawh kei kiangah nang nong kuan hi. Ahih hangin kei pen Israel galkapte’ Pasian, a Vanglian Topa, nangmah in na to mipa’ min tawh nang kiangah kong kuan hi.

Tuni-in Topa in ka khut sungah nang hong pia dinga, keimah in nang hong sattukin na lu ka tan khia ding hi. Tua ciangin tuni-in huihlak vasate le leitung ganhingte tungah Filistia mi a site’ luanghawmte ka pia ding hi. Israel sungah Pasian khat a omlam leitung mi khempeuh in a theih nading,

le Topa in namsau le teipi tawh a hotkhiat lohna thu hih lai-a a om khempeuh in a theih nading ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh galdona pen Topa a’ hi a, amah in kote’ khut sungah note hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
David tawh a kituah dingin Filistia-pa dingin hong pai a, hong nai ciangin David zong Filistia-pa tawh a kituah dingin gal mai-ah a delh hi.
Tua ciangin David in a khutin a thungip sawkin suangtang khat la a, a kap leh Filistia-pa’ taltang a kha hi. A taltangah a suangtang tum a, leilakah amah maipuk hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in suanglotna khat le suangtang khat tawh Filistia-pa zo-in a that hi. David’ khut sungah namsau om lo hi.

Tua ciangin David tai-in ama tungah dinga, Filistia-pa’ namsau mah a paai panin dok a, amah thatin tua tawh a lu a tan khia hi. Filistia-te in a makai pa uh a sihna a theih uh ciangin a taikeek uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel-te le Judah-te awngin ding uh a, Gath le Ekron kulhkongpi ciang dong Filistia-te delh uh ahih manin Shaarim panin Gath le Ekron ciang dong Filistia mi a liamte puk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-te a delhna panun Israel-te hong ciahkik uh a, amaute in a giahphual uh luhsak uh hi.
David in Filistia-pa’ lutang la-in Jerusalem-ah paipih a, ahih hangin a galvan teng ama puanbukah a koih hi.
Filistia-pa do-in David a kuankhiatna Saul in a muh ciangin galkap mangpa Abner kiangah, “Abner aw, hih tangvalpa kua’ tapa ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Abner in, “Kumpipa aw, ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Tangvalpa kua’ tapa ahi hiam, kan in,” a ci hi.
Filistia-pa a thahna panin David hong ciah ciangin Abner in amah samin a khutsunga Filistia-pa’ lutang tawh Saul’ mai-ah a paipih hi.
Saul in ama kiangah, “Tangvalpa aw, kua’ tapa na hi hiam?” a ci hi. David in dawngin, “Bethlehem khuami na nasem pa Jessi’ tapa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
David le Saul a kiho khit a kipanin Saul’ tapa Jonathan in ama pumpi zahin David a it hi.
Saul in tua ni a kipanin ama kiangah David omsak a, a pa’ inn-ah ciahsak lo hi.
Jonathan in ama pumpi zahin David it ahih manin amah tawh thuciamna khat a bawl hi.
Jonathan in ama silh lai a puantualpi suahin David pia a, a galkidalna le a namsau nangawn le a thal le a kawnggak zong a pia hi.
Saul in a sawlna mun khempeuh ah David in a maa tun hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul in galkapte a uk dingin amah a koih hi. Mi khempeuh le Saul’ nasemte in zong hih thu hoih a sa uh hi.

Filistia-pa a thahna panin David ciahin, amaute in inn lam a zuat uh ciangin Israel khuapi khempeuh sung panin kumpi Saul a dawn dingin khuangtung le lasaknate tawi-in numeite a laam kawmin hong kuan khia uh hi.
Amaute gualnuamin numeite khatlekhat in, “Saul in a tulin that, David in a tul sawmin that,” kici uh hi.

Saul heh mahmah a, hih thugenna in amah lungkim losak hi. Amah in, “Amaute in David tungah a tul sawmin pia-in, kei tungah a tulin hong pia bek uh hi. Kumpi min puak cih sim loh bang dang nei nawn ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ni a kipan Saul in David encik hi.
A zing ciangin Pasian’ sawl kha gilo in Saul hong bawh a, nisimin David in a hih ngei bangin laiza lasakna a tum laitakin ama inn sung tengah Saul hang gawp hi. Saul in a khut sungah a teipi tawi hi.
Saul in a teipi-in David nih vei a khawh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, “Kawm tawh David ka khawhcip ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi. Ahih hangin David in a nih vei mahin na pelh thei hi.
Saul in David kihta hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amah ompih a, ahih hangin Saul kiang panin amah kihem khia khinta hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul in a omna panin David la khia-in mihing tulkhat a ukin koih a, mite a makai-in amah kuan khia-in hong ciah hi.
David in a sepna khempeuh ah a maa tun hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amah ompih hi.
Amah in matut zawhna lianpi a neihlam Saul in a muh ciangin amah lamdang sa-in om hi.
Ahih hangin Israel-te khempeuh le Judah-te khempeuh in David it uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute makaihin amah kuan khia-in hong ciah hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, “Hih lai-ah ka tanu u zaw Merab om hi. Nang tungah zi dingin kong pia ding hi. Kei adingin hang peuh inla, Topa’ gal do in,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Saul in, “Keima khut sungah amah si loin Filistia-te’ khut sungah si hen,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
David in Saul kiangah, “Kei pen kumpipa’ makpa ka hih nadingin kei, bang hi a, Israel-te tungah ka tanaute, ka pa’ innkuante bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin David’ tungah Saul’ tanu Merab a kipiak ding laitakin Meholah mi Adriel tungah a zi dingin kipia hi.
Tu-in Saul’ tanu Mikhal in David ngai hi. Saul kiangah hih thu a kigen ciangin Saul a lungdam hi.

Saul in, “Ama adingin ka tanu pen thangzak ahih theih nading le Filistia-te’ khut sungah a sih theih nadingin ama tungah ka tanu pia ning,” ci-in ngaihsun hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul in David kiangah a nih veina genin, “Nang pen tu-in ka makpa na hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

Saul in a nasemte thu pia a, “David kiangah thu tuam genpih unla, ‘En in, nang tungah kumpipa lungkim a, ama nasemte khempeuh in nang hong it hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kumpipa’ makpa suak in,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Saul’ nasemte in David kiangah hih thute gen uh hi. David in, “Kei pen mizawng hi-in a zahtakhuai lo ka hihna mu napi-in kumpipa’ makpa suah ding a thuneu sa na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Tua bang tua bangin David in gen hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in, “David kiangah hih bangin na gen ding uh hi: ‘Kumpipa in a galte a thukkik theih nadingin Filistia-te’ zangvun teep zakhat cih sim loh kumpipa in moman deih lo hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi. Tu-in Saul in Filistia-te’ khut tawh David sihsak ding ngaihsun hi.
Saul’ nasemte in David kiangah hih thute a gen uh ciangin kumpipa’ makpa ahih ding David a lungkim hi. A hun a bei ma-in,

David dingin ama mite tawh pai a, Filistia mi zanih that hi. Tua ciangin amah kumpipa’ makpa a suah theih nadingin kumpipa tungah a cingin a kipia amaute’ zangvun teepte David in hong paipih hi. Saul in a tanu Mikhal ama zi dingin a pia hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in David a ompihna le Israel-te khempeuh in amah a itna thu Saul in a muh ciangin
David a kihta semsem hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul pen David’ gal hi tawntung hi.

Tua ciangin Filistia mi uliante galsim dingin hong kuan khia uh a, amaute hong kuankhiat simin Saul’ nasem dangte khempeuh sangin David in a maa tun zaw hi. Tua ahih manin mite in David thupi muh semsem hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in David thah ding a ngaihsutna thu a tapa Jonathan le a nuai-a ulian khempeuh kiangah a gen hi. Ahih hangin Saul’ tapa Jonathan in David diksa mahmah hi.
Jonathan in David kiangah, “Ka pa Saul in nang thah hong sawm hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsang ciangin kidawm inla, mun simtham khatah omin bu in.
Kei pai khia-in nangma bukna phual nai-ah ka pa kiangah ka ding dinga, nangma thu ka pa kiangah ka gen ding hi. Ama tung panin phawk ka neih leh nang kiangah kong gen ding hi,” a ci hi.

Jonathan in a pa Saul kiangah David’ thu a hoihin genin ama kiangah, “Kumpipa, a nasem pa David tungah khial kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang tungah amah hong khial lo a, ama nasepnate nang adingin nasep hoih ahi hi.

Amah in a nuntakna pia ngamin Filistia-pa that a, Topa in Israel-te khempeuh adingin gualzawhna lianpi piangsak hi. Nangmah in hih thu na mu a, na lung a dam hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin thu om lopi-in David thahna tawh a mawhbaang lo mipa tungah khial ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Saul in Jonathan’ thu mang hi. Saul kiciam a, “Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin amah kithat lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in David samin, Jonathan in hih thute khempeuh ama tungah lak hi. Jonathan in Saul kiangah David paipih a, a nidanga mah bangin ama sepna ngei-ah a sem hi.
Tua ciangin gal hong omkik hi. David kuan khia-in Filistia-te tawh kido a, amaute tampi tak that a, ama mai-ah amaute a tai uh hi.
Tua ciangin a khut sungah a teipi tawi-in a inn sungah a tut laitakin Topa’ sawl kha gilo Saul’ tungah hong tung hi. David in a laiza lasakna tum hi.
Saul in a teipi-in kawm tawh David khawhcip dingin khawh a, ahih hangin amah in na pelh a, kawm tungah a teipi kiphut hi. Tua ciangin David tai-in a suakta hi.

A zingsang ciangin amah a thah theih nadingin tua zanin Saul in amah a vil dingin David’ inn-ah mi sawl hi. Ahih hangin David’ zi Mikhal in ama kiangah, “Tuzanin na nuntakna na suahtak kei leh, zing ciangin nang hong kithat ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Mikhal in tawlet-ah David khiasuk hi. Amah tai khia-in suakta hi.
Mikhal in milim khat la-in lupna tungah koih a, keelmul lukham khat a lu-ah koihin puan silhsak hi.
Saul in David a man dingin mi a paisak ciangin amah in, “Amah a ci na hi,” na ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in David a en dingin mi sawl a, “Amah ka thah theih nadingin a lupna tawh kei kiangah amah hong puato un,” a ci hi.
A mi sawlte hong tun ciangin, keelmul lukham a lu sanah omin lupna tungah a milim na om hi.

Saul in Mikhal kiangah, “Bang hangin tua bangin kei hong khem a, amah a suahtak nadingin ka galpa khah na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Mikhal in Saul dawngin, “Amah in kei kiangah, ‘Hong paisak in; bang hangin nang hong that ding ka hi hiam?’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in David tai-in suakta a, Ramah-ah Samuel kiangah pai-in, ama tungah Saul’ hihna teng a gen hi. Tua ciangin amah le Samuel pai-in Naioth-ah om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul kiangah, “En in, Ramah khua sung Naioth veengah David om hi,” kici hi.

Tua ciangin David a man dingin Saul in mi sawl hi. Amaute in kamsang honte laamin awngin omin, amaute a makai-in Samuel a ding a muh uh ciangin, Saul’ sawltakte tungah Pasian’ kha hong tunga, amaute zong laamin a awng uh hi.
Hih thu Saul kiangah a kigen ciangin, amah in midang sawl leuleu a, amaute zong laamin awng leuleu uh hi. Tua ciangin Saul in mi a thum veina sawl a, amaute zong tua bangmah hi veve uh hi.

Tua ciangin a mahmah Ramah-ah pai a, Seku-a om tuikhuk lianpi tung hi. Amah in, “Samuel le David koi-ah om ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Mi khat in, “En in, Ramah khua sung Naioth veengah om uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai panin Ramah khua sung Naioth veengah amah pai hi. Ama tungah zong Pasian’ kha hong tunga, Ramah khua sung Naioth veeng a tun mateng a paikawmin laamin awng hi.
Amah in zong a puante suah khia-in Samuel’ mai-ah laamin awng a, tua sun tawntung le tua zan tawntung a guaktangin a om hi. Tua hun a kipanin, “Saul zong kamsang suak khin ahi hiam?” kici hi.

Tua ciangin Ramah khua sung Naioth veeng panin David tai-in, Jonathan kiangah hong tungin ama mai-ah, “Bang hih ka hi hiam? Ka mawhna bang ahi hiam? Amah in kei thah dingin hong zon nadingin na pa’ mai-ah ka khialhna bang om ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in David kiangah, “Tua bang hi het lo ding! Na si kei ding hi. En in, ka pa in kei kiangah gen loin a lian hitaleh a neu hitaleh bangmah hih lo hi; bang hangin ka pa in kei tungah hih thu hong im ding ahi hiam? Tua bang hi lo hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin David in dawngin, “Nangma nong pahtaklam na pa in teltakin thei hi. Tua ahih manin amah in, ‘Amah dah kha ding ahih manin hih thu Jonathan theisak kei ning,’ ci-in ngaihsun hi. Ahih hangin a taktakin, Topa nungta-in nang na nuntak mah bangin kei ka sih nading themkhat bek in sam hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in David kiangah, “Na gen peuhpeuh nang adingin kong hihsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

David in Jonathan kiangah, “En in, zing ciang pen Khadet ni hi a, kumpipa tawh sabuai-ah pel loin ka tut ding ahi hi. Ahih hangin a ni thum ni nitak dongin lo sungah ka buk theih nadingin kei hong paisak in.

Na pa in kei hong kan leh, ‘David in ama khuapi Bethlehem-ah a va taipak dingin kei kiangah limtakin hong kingen hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau innkuan khempeuh adingin kumsim biakpiakna tua lai-ah om hi,’ na ci ding hi.
Amah in, ‘Pha hi!’ a cih leh na nasem pa adingin a hoih hi ding hi; ahih hangin amah a heh leh amah in siatna a ngaihsutna thei in.

Tua ahih ciangin thuman itna tawh na nasem pa hong bawl in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang tawh a siangtho thuciamna-ah na nasem pa na tunpih hi. Ahih hangin kei sungah mawhna a om leh, nang mahmah in kei hong that in; bang hangin na pa kiangah kei hong paipih ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in, “Nang tungah tua bang hi het kei hen! Ka pa in nang tungah siatna tung ding a ngaihsutna thei leng nang kiangah hong gen lo ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Jonathan kiangah, “Na pa in nang hong ngawh dawn leh kua in kei kiangah hong gen ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jonathan in David kiangah, “Hong pai in, lo sungah pai ni,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amau tegel lo sungah a pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jonathan in David kiangah, “Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa, teci hi tahen! Zing ciang tubang hun ahi a, a ni thum ni-in ahi zongin, ka pa’ ngaihsutna tawng ka kankhiat khit ciangin, nangma tungah a lungsim a hoih leh, nang kiangah mi hong sawlin hong pulak lo ding ka hi hiam?

Ahih hangin nang tungah siatna bawl nadingin ka pa a lungkimsak leh, a muanhuaina-ah nang na pai theih nadingin nang kiangah a thu kong pulak kei a, nang kong sawlkhiat kei taak leh Topa in keimah Jonathan hong dawm kei tahen. Topa in ka pa a ompih mah bangin nang zong hong ompih tahen.
Kei ka nuntak lai leh ka sih loh nadingin Topa’ thuman itna kei tungah hong lak in.
Keima innkuan panin na thumanna dokkik ngei kei in. Leitung maitang panin David’ galte khempeuh Topa in a phiatkhiat ciangin,
David’ innkuan panin Jonathan’ min phiat khia kei in. Topa in David’ galte tungah phu la tahen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in amah a itna David tungah kiciamphakik hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama pumpi a it zahin amah in David a it hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in ama kiangah, “Zing ciang pen Khadet ni ahi hi. Na tutna awng ding ahih manin nang hong kiphawk ding hi.
A ni thum ni-in nakpitakin nang hong kiphawk kan zaw lai ding hi. A thu a kikup ciangin na bukna-ah pai inla, suangcian hua lampangah om in.
Tua ciangin muitum bangin tua lampangah thaltang thum ka lawn ding hi.

Naupang khat sawlin ama kiangah, ‘Pai in; thaltangte va zong in,’ ka ci ding hi. Naupang’ kiangah, ‘En in, nangma kiang hih lamah thaltangte om hi, tawm in,’ ka cih leh nang a hong pai ding na hi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin nang adingin lungmuanhuai-in launa om lo hi.
Ahih hangin tangvalpa kiangah, ‘En in, thaltangte nangma khen ah om hi,’ ka cih leh, nang pai khia in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in nang hong sawl khia hi.
Nang le kei in i gen thu tawh kisai-in ahihleh, nang le kei kikalah Topa om tawntung hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lo sungah David bu hi. Khadet ni hong tun ciangin an ne dingin kumpipa tu hi.
A nidanga bangin kawm gei-a a tutna tung, ama tutna-ah kumpipa tu hi. A kigalsai-in Jonathan tu-in, Saul’ pangah Abner tu a, ahih hangin David’ mun a awng hi.
Ahi zongin Saul in tua ni-in bangmah gen lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Ama tungah thu khatpeuh piang hi ding hi; amah siang lo hi; siang lo taktak hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a ni nih ni, Khadet ni khit a zing ciangin David’ mun awng lai hi. Tua ciangin Saul in a tapa Jonathan kiangah, “Bang hangin Jessi’ tapa zanni hitaleh tuni hitaleh an nekna-ah hong pai lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jonathan in Saul dawngin, “Bethlehem-ah a pai dingin limtakin kei tungah David hong kingen hi.

Amah in, ‘Kei hong ciahsak in; ka innkuante un khua sungah biakpiakna bawl uh a, ka sanggampa in tua lai-ah ka om ding thu hong pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nong hehpihna-in hong paisakin ka sanggamte hong musak in,’ hong ci hi. Hih thu hangin kumpipa’ sabuai-ah amah hong pai lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jonathan tungah Saul heh mahmahin ama kiangah, “A kiheikhial, a lehdo numei’ tapa aw, nangma maizum nading le na nu’ mindai nadingin Jessi’ tapa na pawlpihna thu a thei lo hong sa na hi hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah Jessi’ tapa a nuntak laiteng nang na hi a, na kumpi za ahi zongin kip lo ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin mi sawl inla, kei kiangah amah hong paipih in. Amah a si taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in a pa Saul dawngin, “Bang hangin amah kithat ding ahi hiam? Amah in bang hih ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Saul in amah a khawhkha dingin ama lamah a teipi lawn hi. Tua ahih ciangin a pa in David thah ding a ngaihsutna Jonathan in theitel hi.
Tua ciangin heh mahmahna tawh sabuai panin Jonathan ding khia a, tua pawi a ni nih ni-in an ne lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pa in David minsiasak ahih manin ama hangin a dah hi.
A zing ciangin David tawh a kiciamna lo ah Jonathan pai-in, amah tawh naupangno khat pai hi.
Amah in a naupang kiangah, “Tai inla ka thaltang lotte va tawm in,” a ci hi. Naupang a tai laitakin ama khen ah a thaltang khat lawn hi.
Jonathan’ thaltang lot a tukna munah naupang a tun ciangin Jonathan in a naupang samin, “Nang’ khen hua lamah thaltang om hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in naupang samin, “Manlang in; hong kinawh in; tua lai-ah om kei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jonathan’ naupang pa in a thaltangte khawmin a topa kiangah a paipih hi.
Ahih hangin naupang in bangmah thei lo a, Jonathan le David bek in a thu thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan in a hiamte a naupang pa kiangah pia-in ama kiangah, “Pai inla, khuapi sungah ciahpih in,” a ci hi.

Naupang a pai khiat khit phetin suangcian pang panin David dingin lei-ah maipuk a, thumvei kun hi. Jonathan sangin David nakpitakin dah zaw a, amau khatlekhat kinamin, khitui luangin khatlekhat kikah uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jonathan in David kiangah, “Ei tegel Topa’ min tawh kiciamin, ‘Kei le nang kikal le keima suanlekhakte le nangma suanlekhakte kikalah a tawntungin Topa om ding hi,’ i cih mah bangin nuamtakin pai in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah dingin pai khia a, Jonathan zong khuapi sungah a ciah hi.

Tua ciangin Nob khua-a siampipa Ahimelek kiangah David pai hi. Ahimelek a liingsa-in David a dawn dingin hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin nang guak hong hi a, kuamah hong tonpih lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

David in siampi Ahimelek kiangah, “Kumpipa in na khat hong sawlin kei kiangah, ‘Nang kong sawlna le nang kong hilh thute khat zong kuamah theisak kei in,’ hong ci hi. Tua mun tua munah tangvalte tawh kiciamna khat ka bawl zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang bang nei na hi hiam? Anlum lum nga ahih kei leh hih lai-a a om peuhpeuh hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Siampipa in David dawngin, “Tutakin anlum mawkmawk ka nei kei hi; ahih hangin anlum siangtho om hi; tangvalte numei panin a kikep nak-uhleh la in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in siampipa dawngin, “A taktakin ci lehang, hih bangin ka pai khiat uh ciangin numeite kiang panin kote ka kikem tawntung uh hi. Khualzin mawkmawk ciang nangawnin zong tangvalte siangtho hi. Tuni-in amaute bangzahin siangtho zaw kan ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin siampipa in anlum siangtho amah pia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh anlum dang om lo a, a kilakkhiat ni-in anlum a lum lai tawh a kilaih pah ding, Topa’ mai panin a kila khia Ompihna Anlum bek om hi.
Tua laitakin Topa’ mai-ah biakna vai-in a om, Saul’ nasemte mi khat tua lai-ah na omkha hi. Ama min Doeg hi a, Saul’ gancing makai pa hi a, Edom mi ahi hi.

Tua ciangin David in Ahimelek kiangah, “Teipi ahi a, namsau ahi zongin hih lai-ah nei lo na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa’ nasep pen nawhtat ding kul ahih manin ka namsau ahi a, ka hiamte ahi zongin ka la man kei hi,” a ci hi.

Siampipa in, “Elah kuamah na thah Filistia mi Goliath’ namsau, puan tawh kitunin hih lai-ah siampi puan nungah om hi. Tua na deih leh la in. Bang hang hiam cih leh adang om lo a, tua bek hih lai-ah om hi,” a ci hi. David in, “Tua sanga hoih zaw adang om lo hi; kei hong pia in,” a ci hi.
David dingin tua ni-in Saul kiang panin tai a, Gath kumpipa Akhish kiangah pai hi.

Akhish’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Hih David, a gam kumpipa hi lo ahi hiam? Amaute khatlekhat in ama thu la-in sa-in laam uh a, ‘Saul in a tulin that, David in a tul sawmin that,’ ci hi lo ahi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
David in hih thute a lungsimah ciamteh a, Gath kumpipa Akhish kihta mahmah hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute’ mai-ah a gamtat kheelin, amaute’ muhna-ah a hai-in kibawl a, kulhkongkhakte tung kui gawpin, a khamul tungah a cilphuan kaisuksak hi.
Tua ciangin Akhish in a nasemte kiangah, “En un, hih mipa a hai ahih lam na mu uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin kei kiangah amah hong paipih na hi uh hiam?
Ka omna-ah mihai-a gamta dingin hih mipa nong paipih nadingun mihai kisam thuah lai ka hi hiam? Hih mipa ka inn sungah hong pai ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
David tua lai panin kihem khia-in Adullam leihawmah tai hi. A sanggamte le a pa’ innkuante khempeuh in a zak uh ciangin ama kiang tua lai munah paisuk uh hi.

Tua ciangin a lungkham mi khempeuh, leiba a nei mi khempeuh le a lungkim lo mite khempeuh ama kiangah hong kikhawm uh hi. Amah pen amaute tungah a ukpa a suak hi. Tua lai-ah amah tawh mihing zali bang a om hi.

Tua lai mun panin Moab gam Mizpah-ah David a pai hi. Amah in Moab kumpipa kiangah, “Pasian in kei adingin hong sepsak ding ka theih matengin ka nu le ka pa na kiangah hong omsak in, ci-in kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in Moab kumpipa kiangah amaute nusia a, munmuanhuaina sungah David a om sungteng amah tawh omkhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa Gad in David kiangah, “Munmuanhuai sungah om nawn kei in; kihem inla, Judah gamah pai in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David kihem khia-in Hereth tulakah a pai hi.
Tu-in David le amah tawh a om mite a kimuhna thu Saul in za hi. A khut sungah a teipi tawi-in, a nasemte khempeuh a kimkotah dingin Gibeah khua a sangna mun makeng kung nuai-ah Saul a tu hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a kimkotah a ding a nasemte kiangah, “Tu-in za un, no Benjamin-te aw; Jessi’ tapa in note khempeuh’ lote le leenggui lote hong pia-in, note khempeuh a tul a uk, a za a ukin hong koih dingin um a,

note khempeuh in kei hong sawmsim na hi uh hiam? Tuni-a bangin hong pangsim dingin ka tapa in Jessi’ tapa tawh thukimna a bawl ciangin kuamah in kei kiangah hong pulak loin, ka tapa in keimah a do dingin ka nasem pa a hanthotna-ah note kuamah dah loin, kei kiangah zong nong pulak kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ nasemte’ kiangah a ding, Edom mi Doeg in dawngin, “Ahitub’ tapa Amalek’ kiang, Nob khua-ah Jessi’ tapa a pai ka mu a,
amah in ama adingin Topa’ tungah thu dotsakin, anletui pia a, Filistia mi Goliath’ namsau ama tungah pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Ahitub’ tapa siampi Ahimelek le a pa’ innkuante ahi Nob-a om siampi khempeuh a sam dingin mi sawl a, kumpipa kiangah amaute khempeuh hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Ahitub’ tapa aw, tu-in za in,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Hih lai-ah om ing, topa aw,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in ama kiangah, “Tuni-a bangin hong pangsimin kei a do dingin hong kipat theih nadingin bang hangin nang le Jessi’ tapa in kei hong sawmsim a, ama tungah an le namsau pia-in, ama adingin Pasian kiangah thu dotsak na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ahimelek in kumpipa dawngin, “Na nasemte khempeuh lak panin kumpipa’ makpa ahi nangmah hong cingte a ukpa David bangin kua thumanin, na inn sungah kua kipahtawi ahi hiam?

Ama adingin Pasian’ kiangah thu ka dotsak a masa pen tuni ahi hiam? Hilo hi. Kumpipa in a nasem pa ahi a, ka pa’ innkuante khempeuh ahi zongin ngawh kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na nasem pa in a tam hitaleh a tawm hitaleh hih thu khempeuh bangmah thei lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Ahimelek aw, nang le na pa’ innkuante na si taktak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in ama kiimah a ding a cingte kiangah, “Kihei unla Topa’ siampite that un; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute zong David tawh pangkhawm uh a, amaute in ama tailam thei napi-in kei kiangah hong pulak lo uh hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin kumpipa’ nasemte in Topa’ siampite tunga tu dingin a khut uh taangkhiasak lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Doeg kiangah, “Kihei inla, siampite hih in,” a ci hi. Edom mi Doeg kihei-in siampite hih a, tua ni-in saihadial siampi puan a silh mihing sawmgiat le nga a that hi.
Amah in siampite’ khuapi Nob khua sunga om nuntakna a nei khempeuh numei le pasal, naupang le nawine, bawngtalte, late le tuute, namsau tawh a that khin hi.
Ahih hangin Ahitub’ tapa Ahimelek’ tapate lakah Abiathar a kici khat suakta-in David kiangah a tai hi.
Saul in Topa’ siampite a thah khitna thu Abiathar in David kiangah a gen hi.
David in Abiathar kiangah, “Tua ni-in Doeg tua lai-ah om ahih ciangin Saul’ kiangah gen taktak ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Na pa’ innkuanpih mite khempeuh’ sihna ka piangsakkha hi.
Kei tawh hong om in; lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh kei a that dingin a hong zongte in nang zong thah dingin a hong zong ahi hi; kei kiangah om lecin lungmuanna sunga om na hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in amaute in David kiangah, “En in, Filistia-te in Keilah khua sim uh a, a ancilnate uh luh uh hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Topa thu dongin, “Pai-in Filistia-te ka sim ding hiam?” a ci hi. Topa in David kiangah, “Pai-in Filistia-te sim inla, Keilah khuamite hon khia in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin David’ mite in ama kiangah, “En in, Judah gam hih munah eite i lau hi. Filistia galkapte simin Keilah-ah pai lehang bangzahin lau zaw ding ihi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in Topa thu dongkik hi. Topa in amah dawngin, “Ding in; Keilah-ah paisuk in; bang hang hiam cih leh na khut sungah Filistia-te kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David le a mite Keilah-ah paisuk uh a, Filistia-te tawh kido-in amau’ ganhingte ciahpihin amaute tampi tak a that uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in Keilah-a teeng mite a hon khia hi.
David kiang Keilah-ah Ahimelek’ tapa Abiathar a tai lai-in amah in siampi puan khat kengin paisuk hi.

Keilah-ah David a tun khitna thu tu-in Saul kiangah kigen hi. Saul in, “Pasian in ka khut sungah amah hong pia khin hi; bang hang hiam cih le kulhkongpi le a kalhna zawl a nei khua sungah lutna tawh a mahmah kikhaknelh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in galsim ding, Keilah khua-ah a paisuk ding, David le a mite a umcih dingin mi khempeuh a sam hi.
Saul in ama tungah a sia a sawmna David in thei hi. Amah in a siampi Abiathar kiangah, “Hih lai-ah siampi puan hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa aw, keima hangin khuapi susia dingin Saul in Keilah-ah pai hong sawmna thu na nasem pa in za khin taktak hi.

Keilah mite in ama tungah kei hong ap ding hiam? Na nasem pa’ zak bangin Saul hong paisuk ding hiam? Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa aw, kong thum hi, na nasem pa tungah hong gen in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Amah hong paisuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Keilah mite in kei le ka mite Saul’ tungah hong ap ding uh hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Amaute in note hong ap ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mi zaguk bang a pha, David le a mite dingin Keilah panin kihem khia uh a, amaute a pai theihna peuhpeuh uhah pai uh hi. Keilah panin David a suahtakna thu Saul kiangah a kigen ciangin amah in a vai a khawl phot hi.
Zif gamlak mual tung gam sung, gamlak munmuanhuaina-ah David om hi. Saul in nisimin amah zong a, ahih hangin Pasian in ama tungah David pia lo hi.
Amah a that dingin Saul kuan khia khin ahih manin David a lau hi. Zif gamlak Horesh munah David om hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ tapa Jonathan dingin David kiang Horesh-ah pai a, Pasian in hong huh ding hi, ci-in amah a hanthawn hi.

Amah in David kiangah, “Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa Saul in nang hong sukha lo ding hi. Nang pen Israel-te tungah kumpi na hi dinga, kei pen nangma zom ka hi ding hi; ka pa Saul in zong hih thu thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amau tegel in Topa’ mai-ah thuciamna bawl uh hi. Horesh-ah David om lai-in, Jonathan a inn-ah a ciah hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ kiang Gibeah-ah Zif mite paito uh a, “Jeshimon leitaw lam, Hakhilah mual tung, Horesh a munmuanhuai sung kote’ lakah David om hi lo ahi hiam?
Tu-in hong paisuk in, kumpipa aw; amah na matnopna thu thei ka hih manun hong paisuk in. Kote’ hih ding ahihleh kumpipa tungah amah kong ap ding uh ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in, “Topa in note thupha hong pia tahen. Bang hang hiam cih leh note in kei tungah hehpihna nong nei uh hi.
Pai-in va kiciansak lai un. Ama bukna mun thei-in va mu unla, tua lai-ah kua in mu hiam, hong thei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ngiansiam mahmah hi, ci-in kei tungah hong kigen hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah a bukna, a kiselsimna mun khempeuh hong ciamteh unla, thu a kiteltak tawh kei kiangah hong paikik un. Tua ciangin note tawh kei kong kuan ding hi. Gam sungah amah a omlai nakleh Judah gam sung khempeuh zon ding ahi zongin a tul lak panin amah ka zong khia teitei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute ding uh a, Zif-ah a pai dingin Saul’ mai-ah a na ma pai uh hi. Tu-in David le a mite Jeshimon leitaw lam Arabah gam sung Maon gamlakah om uh hi.

Saul le a mite amah a zong dingin kuan uh hi. Hih thu David kiangah kigen hi. Tua ahih ciangin Maon gamlak a om suangpi-ah amah paisuk hi. Saul in tua thu a zak ciangin amah in Maon gamlakah David delh hi.
A mual pang khatah Saul pai a, David le a mite a mual pang langkhat ah pai uh hi. Saul le a mite in David le a mite a man dingin hong um uh ahih manin Saul a pelh dingin David a nawhtai laitakin,
Saul kiangah kamtai khat hong tunga, “Hong kinawh inla hong ciah in; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistia-te in gam sung hong sim hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David a delhna panin Saul kilehkik a, Filistia-te a do-in a pai hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen Kikhenna Mual kici hi.
Tua lai panin David paito-in Engedi munmuanhuai-ah a om hi.
Filistia-te a delhna panin Saul a ciah ciangin ama kiangah, “En in, Engedi gamlakah David om hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Israel-te khempeuh sung pan a kiteel mihing tulthum la-in Sathak Suangpi mai-ah David le a mite a zong dingin a pai hi.
Lam gei-a tuukhawk omna-ah a pai hi. Tua gei-ah leihawm khat om a, awng hawh dingin tua sungah Saul a pai hi. Tu-in David le a mite tua leihawm tawngnung sungah na tu uh hi.

Tua ciangin David’ mite in ama kiangah, “Topa in nang kiangah, ‘En in, na khut sungah na galpa kong pia dinga, hoih na sak bangin ama tungah na hih ding hi,’ hong cih pen tuni hita hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin David dingin Saul’ puantualpi mong atkhiatsak sim hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in Saul’ puanmong a atkhiat manin David a lungsim nuam thei nawn lo hi.

Amah in a mite kiangah, “Amah pen Topa’ sathau nilh pa hi, ci-in a thei gegupi-in ama tungah ka khut ka ngak ding, Topa’ sathau nilh pa ahi ka topa tungah hih bang ka hih ding Topa in hong kham hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in hih thute tawh a mite zol a, amaute Saul hihsak lo hi. Tua ciangin Saul ding khia-in leihawm nusia a, a pai nading lampi-ah a paisuak hi.
Tua khit ciangin David zong leihawm sung panin pai khia-in Saul nung sap a, “Ka to kumpipa!” a ci hi. Saul in a nung a et ciangin David in lei-ah a mai kunin zahtakna a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin David in Saul kiangah, “Bang hangin, ‘En in, David in na siat nading zong hi,’ a ci mite’ thu um na hi hiam?

En in, Topa in tuni-in leihawm sung, ka khut sungah nang hong piakna nang mahmah in tuni-in na thei khin hi. Mi pawlkhat in nang a that dingin kei hong sawl a, ahih hangin nang kong hih kei hi. Keimah in, ‘Ka topa tungah ka khut ka nga kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen Topa’ sathau nilh pa ahi hi,’ ka ci hi.

En in, ka pa aw, ka khutsunga na puantualpi mong en in. Kei tungah khialhna ahi a, kumpi dona ahi zongin a om lohna, na puantualpi mong at khia napi-in nang kong thah lohna thu tawh thei-in na mu ding hi. Kei thah dingin nong zon hangin nang tungah ka khial kei hi.
Topa in kei le nang kikalah thu hong khen tahen. Topa in kei tangin nang tungah hong thuk tahen. Ahih hangin keima khut tawh nang kong hih kei ding hi.
Tang-ate’ paunak in, ‘A gilote’ sung panin gitlohna hong piang,’ a cih mah bang ahi hi. Ahih hangin keima khut tawh nang kong hih kei ding hi.
Israel kumpipa kua do-a hong kuan khia ahi hiam? Kua delh na hi hiam? Uisi maw! Uili maw!
Tua ahih ciangin Topa thukhen hong hi-in, kei le nang kikalah thukhenna hong pia henla, hih thu thei-in ka thu-ah hong pang henla, na khut sung panin kei hong hon khia tahen,” a ci hi.
David in hih thute Saul kiangah a gen a man khit ciangin Saul in, “Ka tapa David, tu-a ka zak nang’ aw ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Saul a kap hi.
Amah in David kiangah, “Nang pen kei sangin na thuman zaw hi. Keimah in nang tungah a sia kong bawl laitakin nang in kei tungah a pha nong bawl hi.
Topa in na khut sungah kei hong koih laitakin nang in kei nong thah lohna-ah kei nong limbawlna tu-in na hong laktel hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khatpeuh in a galpa mu leh amah in a suakta-in a galpa pai khiasak ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin tuni-in kei tungah nong bawlna hangin Topa in a hoih tawh nang thaman hong pia tahen.
Tu-in en in, kumpi na hih taktak ding ka thei hi. Israel kumpi gam nangma khut sungah a kip ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keima nunga ka suanlekhakte beisak loin, ka pa’ innkuan panin ka min na phiat loh nadingin Topa’ min tawh kei tungah hong kiciam in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ deih bangin David a kiciam hi. Tua ciangin Saul a inn-ah a ciah hi. Ahih hangin David le a mite munmuanhuai-ah paito uh hi.
Tu-in Samuel si a, Israel-te khempeuh kikhawmin ama hangin kap uh a, amaute in Ramah-a a inn-ah amah a vui uh hi. Tua ciangin Paran gamlakah David paisuk hi.
Karmel mualah nasep a nei mi khat Maon khua-ah a om hi. Tua pa hau mahmah a, amah in tuu tulthum le keel tulkhat nei hi. Amah in Karmel-ah a tuumul a met hi.
Tua mipa’ min Nabal hi a, a zi’ min Abigail ahi hi. Tua numei, tei le melhoih a thuah khat hi a, ahih hangin a pasal pen a ki-uk zo lo mi le a gamtatsia khat hi a, amah Kaleb mi ahi hi.
Nabal in a tuumul a metna thu David in gamlakah a za hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in a tangvalte sawm sawl hi. David in a tangvalte kiangah, “Karmel-ah paito-in Nabal kiangah pai unla, keima min tawh amah va hopih un.
Hih bangin amah na hopih ding uh hi: ‘Nang tungah nopna om tahen, na innkuan tungah nopna om tahen, na neih khempeuh tungah zong nopna om tahen.
Gan mul mette na neihna ka za hi. Na tuucingte kote tawh omin amaute tungah siatna ka bawl kei uh a, Karmel-ah a om sungteng uh amaute in bangmah mansuah lo uh hi.

Na tangvalte uh dong lecin amaute in nang kiangah hong gen thei ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka tangvalte maipha na musak in; bang hang hiam cih leh pawi ni-in kong pai uh hi. Na neih sung pan nong piak theih peuhpeuh na nasemte le na tapa David tungah pia in,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Tangvalte hong tun ciangin amaute in hih thu khempeuh David’ minin Nabal kiangah gen uh a, tua ciangin amaute in ngak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Nabal in David’ nasemte dawngin, “David kua ahi hiam? Jessi’ tapa kua ahi hiam? Tulai-in a tote kiang panin a tai khia nasem tampi om hi.
Ka anlum le ka tui le ka gan mul meette adingin ka gawh ka sate la-in koilai panin hong pai cih ka theih loh mite tungah pia ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David’ tangvalte ciahkikin hih thu khempeuh ama kiangah a gen uh hi.

David in a mite kiangah, “Mi khempeuh in na namsau uh kuah ciat un!” a ci hi. Amaute khempeuh in a namsau uh kuah uh a, David in zong a namsau a kuah hi. Mihing zali bang David’ nungah paito uh a, mihing za nihte van ngakin om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Nabal’ nasem tangvalte khat in Nabal’ zi Abigail kiangah thu genin, “En in, ka topa uh a hopih dingin gamlak panin David in kamtaite hong paisak a, amah in amaute na tai hi.
Ahi zongin kote tungah tua mite hoih mahmahin kote in siatna ka thuak kei uh a, amaute tawh ka pai laiteng uh gamlakah ka om sungun bangmah ka mansuah kei uh hi.
Tuute kemin amaute tawh ka omsung khempeuh uh sun le zanin amaute in kote hong hu uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih thu thei inla, na hih ding ngaihsun in. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka topa le a innkuan khempeuh tungah siatna tunsak ding kingaihsun a, amah a khansia ahih manin kuamah in hopih thei lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abigail kinawhin, anlum lum zanih, leenggahzu savun thawl nih, a han minsa tuu nga, ankan lawh nga, leenggahkeu bawk zakhat le theimoh zanih la-in late tungah tuate a guang hi.
Tua nu in a tangvalte kiangah, “Keima mai-ah na paisuak un; note’ nungah kei kong pai ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in a pasal Nabal hilh lo hi.
Amah la tungah tuangin mual liahah a paisuk laitakin, en in, David le a mite ama lamah hong paisuk uh hi; amah in amaute na dawn hi.
Tu-in David in, “Ama neihsa khempeuh khat zong a mangthang lo dingin hih mipa’ neih khempeuh gamlakah a mawkna-in ka cing a, amah in hih thuhoihte a sia tawh kei tungah hong thuk hi.
Zing ciangin ama neihsa khempeuh lakah pasal khat zong ka siit taak leh Pasian in keimah David hong dawm kei tahen,” na ci khin hi.
Abigail in David a muh ciangin kinawh a, a la tung panin tuakin David’ mai-ah puk a, leilakah a kun hi.
Ama khe phungah pukin, “Kei tung bekah, ka topa aw, mawhna om tahen. Na kiangah na nasem nu thu hong gensak inla, na nasem nu’ thugente hong ngai in, ci-in kong thum hi.

Ka topa in hih a khansia mipa Nabal ngaihsun kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh ama min mah bangin amah zong a tuaci mah ahi hi. Nabal ama min hi a, haina in amah vukcip hi. Ahih hangin na nasem nu keimah in nangma hong sawl na tangvalte ka mukha kei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, ka topa aw, Topa nungta-in, nang zong na nuntak mah bangin, mi na thah loh nading le nangma khut tawh thukkikna na hih loh nadingin Topa in nang hong kho ahih manin, tu-in na galte le nangma tungah siat nading a zongte khempeuh Nabal bang tahen.
Tu-in na nasem nu keimah in nangmah ka hong puak hih letsong nangma nung hong zui tangvalte hong piasak in.

Na nasem nu’ khialhna hong maisak in, ci-in kong thum hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in Topa’ galte do na hih manin Topa in na suanlekhakte kipsak paisuak dinga, na nuntak laiteng nang sungah siatna kimu lo ding hi.
Nangmah delhin hong that dingin mite hong kipat leh, nang pen Topa na Pasian’ kepna sung a hing mite lakah na om dinga, amah in suanglotna tawh lotkhiat bangin na galte lawn khia ding hi.
Topa in nangmah tawh kisai thu a hoih a gente khempeuh tawh kizui-in hong hihin, Israel-te tungah ulianin nang hong koih khit ciangin,

thu om lopi-in mi thahna ahi a, nang mahmah in phulakna hangin ahi zongin, dah nading thu ahi a, lungsim nat nading thu ahi zongin na nei kei ding hi. Topa in limtakin nang hong bawl ciangin na nasem nu hong phawk in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Abigail kiangah, “Tuni-in keimah a dawn dingin nang a hong sawl Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah tahen!
Tuni-in mi thahna le keima khut tawh phulak nading panin keimah hong kem nangma ngaihsutna in thupha ngah tahen!

Bang hang hiam cih leh nang kong gimsak nading panin hong kho Israel Pasian, Topa a nungta taktak ahih mah bangin, nang hong kinawhin keimah a dawn dingin hong pai lo hi lecin, zing ciangin Nabal sung pan pasal khat zong hing nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in ama tung panin amah a puakte a sang hi. Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Lung nuamin na inn-ah ciahto ta in. Na thu ka ngai a, nong thumna kong pia khin hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Nabal kiangah Abigail hong tungkik hi. Kumpipa’ pawi tawh kibangin amah in a inn sungah pawi na kham hi. Nabal lungnuam mahmah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in zu kham mahmah hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsang khuavak mateng ama kiangah bangmah gen peuhmah lo hi.
Zingsang ciang, Nabal’ zukhamna a ven ciangin a zi in ama kiangah hih thute gen a, thakhatin a lungtang si-in amah suangtum bang hi.
Tua khit ni sawm bang ciangin Topa in Nabal vat a, amah a si ta hi.

Nabal a sihna thu David in a zak ciangin amah in, “Nabal khut tung panin ka ngah zahkona hong thuksakin, siatna panin a nasem pa a lenkik Topa in thupha ngah tahen. Topa in Nabal’ gamtat siatna ama lu tung mahah tungkiksak hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin David in mi sawlin ama zi dingin Abigail helsak hi.
David’ nasemte Karmel-a Abigail’ kiang a tun ciangin amaute in tua nu kiangah, “David in ama zi dingin a la dingin kote nang kiangah hong sawl hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah dingin lei-ah maikun a, “En un, na nasem nu uh ka topa’ nasemte’ khe a silsak ding nasem ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abigail kinawhin dingin la tungah tuang a, ama nasem numei nga in amah a kem hi. David’ kamtaite’ nung zui-in pai a, tua ciangin ama zi a suak hi.
David in Jezreel khuami Ahinoam zong la a, amau tegel ama zi a suak uh hi.
Saul in ama tanu Mikhal, David’ zi pen, Gallim khuami Laish’ tapa Palti tungah na pia khin hi.
Tua ciangin Saul kiang Gibeah-ah Zif mite hong pai uh a, “Jeshimon nisuahna lam Hakhilah mualtungah David bu hi lo ahi hiam?” va ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul kithawi-in David a zong dingin Israel mi a kiteel mihing tulthum tawh Zif gamlakah a paisuk hi.
Tua ciangin Saul in Jeshimon nisuahna lam lampi gei-ah a om Hakhilah mualtungah giahphual sat hi. Ahih hangin gamlakah David omlai hi. Amah a delhin gamlakah Saul a hong paina thu a theih ciangin
David in thukan simte sawl a, Saul hong pai taktak ahihna thu a thei hi.

Tua ciangin David dingin Saul in giahphual a satna munah a pai hi. David in Saul’ galkap mangpa, Ner’ tapa Abner tawh a lupna mun mu hi. Giahphual laizangah Saul lum a, ama kimkotah a galkapte in phual sat uh hi.

Tua ciangin David in Hit mi Ahimelek le a nu uh Zeruiah ahi Joab’ sanggampa Abishai kiangah, “Saul’ giahphual ah kei tawh kua hong paisuk ding na hi uh hiam” a ci hi. Abishai in, “Kei nang tawh kong paisuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David le Abishai zanin galkapte kiangah pai uh hi. Giahphual sungah Saul na ihmu a, a lukhung leilakah a teipi na kiphut a, Abner le galkapte ama kimkotah na lum uh hi.

Tua ciangin Abishai in David kiangah, “Pasian in na galpa tuni-in na khut sungah hong pia ahih ciangin tu-in teipi-in lei tawh khatvei bek hong khawhcipsak in, nihvei khawh ding kisam lo hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin David in Abishai kiangah, “Ama tungah siatna bawl kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ sathau nilh pa a su peuhpeuh mawhna pan peng ding sa na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
David in, “Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin Topa in amah vat taktak ding hi; tua ahih kei leh zong a sih hun hong tung ding hi; tua ahih kei leh gal kikapna sungah amah paisukin si ding hi.
Topa’ sathau nilh pa tungah ka khut ka ngak ding Topa in kei hong kham hi; ahih hangin tu-in a lukhungah a om a teipi le a tuithawl la-in pai khia ni,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin David in Saul’ lukhung a a om a teipi le a tuithawl a la hi. Tua ciangin amaute pai khia uh hi. Kuamah in mu lo hi; zong thei lo hi; kuamah khanglo lo hi. Amaute khempeuh ihmu uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amaute ihmut suak mahmah sak hi.
Tua ciangin David a pang khatah pai-in, amaute kikal saupi a kihalin mual dawn a gamla-ah a ding hi.
David in galkapte le Ner’ tapa Abner samin, “Abner aw, hong dawng lo ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Abner in dawngin, “Kumpipa a sam kua na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

David in Abner kiangah, “Pasal hi lo na hi hiam? Israel-te sungah nang tawh a kibang kua om ahi hiam? Tua ahihleh bang hangin na to kumpipa vil lo na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh na to kumpipa a that dingin mi khat hong pai hi.

Hih banga na gamtatna hoih lo hi. Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin a si dingin na kilawm hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ sathau nilh pa, na topa na vil kei hi. Tu-in a lukhung a om kumpipa’ teipi le a tuithawl koi-ah om ahi hiam, thei in,” a ci hi.
Saul in David’ aw khen thei a, “Ka tapa David, tu-a a ging nangma’ aw ahi hiam?” a ci hi. David in, “Ka topa, kumpipa aw, keima’ aw ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Bang hangin ka topa in a nasem pa delh ahi hiam? Bang gamta khial ka hi hiam? Ka tungah bang mawhna om ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka to kumpipa in a nasem pa’ thu za in. Keimah a do dingin nang hong toksuah pa pen Topa ahihleh amah in biakna hong sang tahen; ahih hangin mihing ahihleh amaute in Topa’ mai-ah samsiatna ngah tahen. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, ‘Pai in; pasian dangte’ na sem in,’ ci-in Topa’ gamh ka ngah loh nadingin tuni-in kei hong hawl khia uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa’ omna panin gamdang leitangah kei hong sisak kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh mualtungah vaka a beng pa bangin uili bang lel keimah a that dingin Israel kumpipa nong kuan khia hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in, “Ka gamta khial hi; hong ciahkik in, ka tapa David aw; bang hang hiam cih leh tuni-in kei hong suaktasak na hih manin na tungah siatna kong bawl nawn kei ding hi. Ka hai gamtatkha a, nakpitakin ka khial khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in dawngin, “Hih lai-ah na teipi om hi, kumpipa! Tangvalte khat hong paisak inla hong lasak in.

Topa in mi khempeuh a thumanna le a thutakna hangin thaman pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in tuni-in ka khut sungah nang hong pia a, keimah in Topa’ sathau nilh pa a hih dingin ka khutte ka taangkhiasak kei hi.
En in, tuni-in nangmah kong suahtaksak mah bangin Topa in zong kei hong suaktasak henla, haksatna khempeuh panin kei hong hon khia tahen,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, “Thupha ngah ta in, ka tapa David! Nangmah in na tampi na sem dinga, tuate na zo ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David ama lampi-ah pai-in, Saul zong ama omna munah a ciah hi.

David in a lungsim sungah, “Saul’ khut tawh ni khat ni ciangin ka si theikha ding hi. Kei adingin Filistia-te’ gamah tai ding sangin a hoih zaw dang om lo hi. Tua hileh Saul in Israel gamgi huam sungah kei hong zon niloh lungkia ta dinga, ama khut sung panin ka suakta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David kithawi a, amah tawh a om mihing za gukte tawh Gath kumpipa, Maok’ tapa Akhish kiangah a pai hi.

Tua ciangin David, a innkuanpihte le a mite a innkuanpih ciat tawh, David zong a zi nihte, Jezreel khuami Ahinoam le Nabal’ zi meigongnu, Karmel khuami Abigail tawh, Gath-a Akhish kiangah va teeng hi.
Gath-ah David tai hi, ci-in Saul kiangah a kigen ciangin amah in David zong nawn lo hi.

Tua ciangin David in Akhish kiangah, “Nong hehpih zawh leh, ka ten theih nadingin gam sung khuate khatah kei ading mun hong pia in; bang hangin na nasem pa nang tawh kumpi khua sungah teeng khawm ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Akhish in tua ni-in ama tungah Ziklag khua a pia hi. Tua ahih manin tuni dongin tua khua pen Judah kumpite a’ ahi hi.
Filistia gam sungah David a ten hunsung pen kum khat le kha li sung ahi hi.
Tu-in David le a mite paito-in Geshur mite, Girzi mite le Amalek mite va sim hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite pen Egypt lam Shur ciang dongah tanglai a kipanin a teeng mite ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in tua gam vat gawp a, numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin hingkhawi loin, ahih hangin tuute, bawngtalte, late, kalaohte le puante la-in Akhish kiangah hong ciahkik hi.
Akhish in, “Tuni-in kua va sim na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin David in, “Judah mite’ Negeb gam,” ahih kei leh, “Jerahmeel mite’ Negeb gam,” ahih kei leh, “Ken mite’ Negeb gam,” a ci hi.

David in, “Amaute in kote’ thu genin, ‘David in tua bangin hih hi,’ ci ding uh ahih ciangin,” ci-in ngaihsun ahih manin Gath-ah thu a puak thei ding numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin hingkhawi lo hi. Filistia-te’ gam sungah a ten sungteng tua bang gamtatna pen ama ngeina ahi hi.
Akhish in David muangin, “Ama mipih Israel-te in a muhdah theih nadingin a mahmah kibawl khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah ka nasem hi tawntung ding hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
Tua hunin Filistia-te in Israel-te a sim dingin a galkapte khawm uh hi. Akhish in David kiangah, “Nang le na mite, kei tawh galkapte lakah a kuankhawm ding na hihlam thei in,” a ci hi.

David in Akhish kiangah, “Hoih mahmah hi; na nasem pa in bang hih thei hiam, cih na thei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Akhish in David kiangah, “Hoih mahmah hi; khan tawntungin keimah a hong cing dingin nang kong koih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Samuel si khin a, Israel-te khempeuh ama hangin kapin, ama khuapi Ramah-ah vui uh hi. Saul in vankahte le aisante a gam sung panin beisak hi.
Filistia-te kikhawm uh a, hong pai-in Shunem-ah giahphual sat uh hi. Saul in Israel-te khempeuh khawm a, amaute in Gilboa-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Saul in Filistia galkapte a muh ciangin lau a, a lungsim nakpi takin liing hi.
Saul in Topa tungah thu a dot ciangin, Topa in mang tawh hitaleh, Urim tawh hitaleh, kamsangte tawh hitaleh dawng lo hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a nasemte kiangah, “Ama kiangah pai-in ama tung pan thu ka dot theih nadingin vankahthei numei khat kei adingin hong zonsak un,” a ci hi. A nasemte in ama kiangah, “En in, Endor-ah vankahthei khat om hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Saul in a mel seelin puan dang silh a, amah le mi nih pai hi. Amaute zanin tua numei kiangah va pai uh hi. Amah in, “Kei adingin a sisate’ kha kiang pan thu hong dotsak inla, nang kiang a a min kong gen peuhpeuh kei adingin hong saptohsak in,” a ci hi.

Numei in ama kiangah, “Saul’ hihsa thu, gam sung panin vankahte le aisante a suksiatna na thei taktak hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin keima sih nading a piangsak dingin kei adingin thangzak hong koih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin ama tungah Topa’ min tawh Saul kiciam a, “Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin hih thu hangin nang tungah gimna hong tung het lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin numei in, “Kua hong sapsak ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Samuel hong sapsak in,” a ci hi.
Numei in Samuel a muh ciangin a gingin kikokhia hi. Numei in Saul kiangah, “Bang hangin kei hong khem na hi hiam? Nang, Saul na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in; kua mu na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Numei in Saul kiangah, “Leisung panin pasian khat hong pai khiato ka mu hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Ama mel bangci ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua nu in, “Puteek khat hong paito a, amah in puantualpi silh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Saul in tua pen Samuel hi, ci-in thei a, lei-ah a maikunin zahtakna a bawl hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Bang hangin keimah saptohna tawh hong nawngkaisak na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Saul in dawngin, “Nakpi takin ka lungkham hi; Filistia-te in kei hong sim a, kei kiang panin Pasian kiheikhia-in kamsangte tawh ahi a, mang tawh ahi zongin hong dawng nawn lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka gamtat nading zia a hong gen dingin nang kong sam hi,” a ci hi.
