Tua zawh a sawt loin Ahithofel in Absalom kiangah, “Mi tul sawm le tulnih hong teelsak in; keimah kuan khia-in tuzanin David ka delh ding hi.
Amah gimin lungkia-in a om laitakin amah ka hih dinga, amah ka amkhamsak ding hi. Tua hileh amah tawh a om mi khempeuh tai ding uh hi. Keimah in kumpipa bek ka satpuk dinga,
mothak in a pasal kiang a zuatkik mah bangin mi khempeuh nang kiangah kong ciahpihkik ding hi. Nangmah in mi khat bek’ nuntakna na zong hi; midang khempeuh nuamtakin om ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua thugenna in Absalom le Israel upate khempeuh lungkimsak hi.
Tua ciangin Absalom in, “Arkhi mi Hushai zong sam un; ama thugen ngai phot ni,” a ci hi.
Absalom kiangah Hushai hong pai ciangin Absalom in ama kiangah, “Tua bangin Ahithofel in thu gen hi; ama genna bangin i hih ding hiam? Tua ahih kei leh nang gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hushai in Absalom kiangah, “Tutungin Ahithofel’ thugen hoih lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua banah Hushai in, “Na pa le a mite mi thahat hi a, gamlakah a note a kilaksak vompi bangin amaute a hehna na thei hi. Tua banah na pa galdona lamsang a siam hi a, mite tawh zanin amah om khawm lo ding hi.

Tu nangawnin amah dum khat sungah ahi a, mundang khatah ahi zongin bu khin ding hi. Kisim cilna-ah mi pawlkhat si leh tua thu a za mi peuhpeuh in, ‘Absalom a zui mite lakah a si om khin hi,’ ci ding hi.

Tua ciangin a lungtang humpinelkai lungtang a bang galhang mipa nangawn launa tawh lungkia gawp ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te khempeuh in na pa mi thahat ahihna le amah tawh a om mite mi hang ahihna thei uh hi.
Ahih hangin keima ngaihsutna hih bang ahi hi: Dan panin Beersheba ciang dong, tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin a tam Israel mi khempeuh nang kiangah khawmin galsim dingin nang mahmah na kuan ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah i muhna mun khat peuhpeuhah theih kholh lohin i hih gawp ding hi. Amah le amah tawh a om mi khempeuh khat zong kisiit lo ding hi.

Amah khuapi khat sungah a nungkik le, Israel-te khempeuh in tua khuapi sungah khauhual paipihin tua lai munah suangtang khat nangawn a kimu nawn lo dingin kuam sungah tua khua i kai khia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Absalom le Israel mite khempeuh in, “Arkhi mi Hushai’ thugen pen Ahithofel’ thugen sangin hoih zaw hi,” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Absalom’ tungah siatna a tunsak theih nadingin Ahithofel’ thugen hoih in a lelh ding Topa in a sehsa ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Hushai in siampi Zadok le Abiathar kiangah, “Tua bang tua bangin Ahithofel in Absalom le Israel upate kiangah gen a, tua bang tua bangin keimah in thu ka gen hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in manlang takin mi sawl inla, David kiangah, ‘Tuzan gamlak tui ngahmunte-ah giak kei inla, bangbang hitaleh galkah in; tua hikeileh kumpipa le amah tawh a om mi khempeuh hong kivalhtum kha ding hi,’ ci-in gensak in,” a ci hi.

Tu-in Jonathan le Ahimaaz in Enrogel-ah ngak uh hi. Nasem numei khat pai-in amaute kiangah gen a, amaute pai-in Kumpi David kiangah gen zel uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute khuapi sungah a lut lam uh a kimu lo ding ahi hi.

Ahih hangin tangval khat in amaute mu-in Absalom kiangah gen hi. Tua ahih ciangin amau tegel manlang takin pai khia uh a, a huang sungah tuikhuk a nei Bahurim-a mi khat’ inn-ah tung uh a, tuikhuk sungah amaute tuaksuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin a numei in khuhna khat la-in tuikhuk gong tungah phah a, tua tungah an zalh a, bangmah kithei lo hi.

Absalom’ nasemte tua nu’ inn-ah hong tun ciangin amaute in, “Ahimaaz le Jonathan koi lai-ah om ahi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. A numei in amaute kiangah, “Amaute lui galkhat ah pai khinzo uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in zong a muh zawh loh uh ciangin Jerusalem-ah a ciahkik uh hi.

Amaute a pai khiat khit ciangin tuikhuk panin mite hong pai khia uh a, pai-in Kumpi David kiangah a thu gen uh hi. Amaute in David kiangah, “Ding in; tui galkhat ah manlang takin pai in; bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang tua bangin nangma langkhat ah Ahithofel in thu gen hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin David le amah tawh a om mi khempeuh ding uh hi. Amaute in Jordan kantan uh a, khuavak ciangin Jordan a kantan nai lo khat beek om nawn lo uh hi.

Ahithofel in ama thugen a kizuih loh a muh ciangin a la tutphah vawhin ama khuapi a inn-ah nuak ciah hi. Tua ciangin amah in a innkuan vai hawmsak a, a man ciangin a mahmah gui-awk hi. Amah si a, a pa’ hanah kivui hi.
Tua ciangin Mahanaim ah David tung hi. Absalom in Israel mite khempeuh tawh Jordan kantan hi.

Tu-in Absalom in Joab tangin galkapte a uk dingin Amasa koih khin hi. Amasa pen Nahash’ tanu Abigail a teenpih, Ishmael mi ahi Ithra min nei mi khat’ tapa hi a, ama nu Abigail le Joab’ nu Zeruiah a unau ahi hi.
Israel-te le Absalom in Gilead gamah giahphual sat uh hi.
Mahanaim ah David a tun ciangin Ammon mite’ gam Rabbah khua panin Nahash’ tapa Shobi le Lodebar panin Ammiel’ tapa Makhir le Rogelim panin Gilead mi Barzillai in
lupnate, kuangte le leibeelte, mangbuh, mangbuhham, an, an kan, bepi le besan,

khuaizu le bawngnawi-thaukhal le tuu le sathaukhalte, David le amah tawh a om mite’ nek dingin hong puak uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Mite gamlakah gilkialin, gimin dangtak uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in amah tawh a om mite khawmin a tultul a ukte le a zaza a ukte-in koih hi.

David in galkapte khen thum suah a, khenkhat Joab’ ukna nuai-ah, khenkhat Joab’ sanggampa Zeruiah’ tapa Abishai’ ukna nuai-ah, khenkhat Gath mi Ittai’ nuai-ah koihin galdo dingin a kuansak hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in mite kiangah, “Note tawh kei zong kong kuan khia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin mite in, “Nang nong kuan khia kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kote tai le-ung amaute in kote phamawh hong sa lo ding hi. Kote kimkhat si le ung amaute in kote phamawh hong sa lo ding hi. Ahih hangin nang pen kote tul sawm zahin na manpha hi. Tua ahih ciangin khuapi panin kote kiangah huhna hong puak lecin hoih zaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, “Note in hoih na sak pen bangun ka gamta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin galkap khempeuh a zaza le a tultulin a pai khiat laitakun kulhkongpi pangah kumpipa ding hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Joab le Abishai le Ittai thu pia-in, “Keimah nong khualna-un tangvalpa Absalom hong dawm mahmah un,” a ci hi. Kumpipa in Absalom’ thu galkapmaangte tungah a vaikhakna mi khempeuh in za uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te a do dingin gamlakah galkapte kuan khia uh a, Efraim tulakah kido uh hi.
David’ nasemte in tua lai-ah Israel mite zo uh a, tua ni-a mi kithat tam a, mi tul sawmnih ahi hi.
Tua gam maitang tung khempeuh ah galkikapna omkim hi. Tua ni-in namsau’ thah sangin thudang hangin tulakah a si mi tam zaw hi.

David’ nasemte in Absalom tuakkha uh hi. Absalom a la tungah tuang a, tawsaw lianpi hiang pha nuai khatah a la tai-in, a lutang tawsaw hiang lakah awk a, ama nuai panin a la taisuakin, vanlelei kikalah amah a kikhai-in kinusia hi.
Tua ciangin mi khat in mu-in Joab kiangah gen a, “En in, tawsaw hiang kawm lakah Absalom a kikhai ka mu hi,” a ci hi.

Joab in ama kiangah a gen mipa kiangah, “Bang! Nang amah mu maw! Bang hangin leilakah amah satkhiasuk lo na hi hiam? Nang tungah ngun peek sawm le kawnggak khat hong pia ngel ding hi ve ing,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a mipa in Joab kiangah, “Ngun peek tulkhat ka khut sungah hong koih ta lecin zong kumpipa’ tapa a hih dingin ka khutmeno khat zong ka zan khia kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kote’ zakin kumpipa in nang le Abishai le Ittai thu hong pia-in, ‘Keimah nong khualna-un tangvalpa Absalom hong dawm un,’ hong ci hi.
Thudang khatah, amah langpangin zuautat leng (Kumpipa tungah a ki-im bangmah om lo hi), nang mahmah kikang koihin nong hu kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Joab in, “Hih bangin nang tawh hun ka beisak kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in thaltang thum la-in tawsaw hiang kawmah Absalom a hing lai-in a lungtang sungah tuate a siat hi.
Tua ciangin Joab’ galhiam tawite tangval sawm in Absalom umcih a, amah satin that uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in peengkul tum a, Israel-te a delhna panun galkapte hong ciahkik uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Joab in amaute kho hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Absalom la-in tulaka dum lianpi khat sungah amah paai uh a, ama tungah suangcian a lian mahmah khat ciang uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel-te khempeuh amau’ inn ciatah tai uh hi.

Absalom in ama nuntak lai-in khuampi khat la-in ama adingin phutin Kumpipa’ Kuamah om hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Keima min hong zom ding tapa ka nei kei hi,” a ci hi. Tua khuampi ama min tamin phuak a, tuni dongin Absalom’ Mual, kici hi.
Tua ciangin Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz in, “Kei hong taisak inla, Topa in ama galte’ vangliatna panin amah a hotkhiat lungdamna thu kumpipa kiangah hong puaksak in,” a ci hi.

Joab in ama kiangah, “Nang in tuni-in lungdamna thu na puak kei ding hi. A nidang ciangin lungdamna thu na puak thei dinga, ahih hangin tuni-in lungdamna thu na puak kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa’ tapa si hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in Kush mipa kiangah, “Pai inla na muhsa teng kumpipa kiangah va gen in,” a ci hi. Kush mipa zong Joab’ mai-ah kunin, tua ciangin a tai hi.

Tua ciangin Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz in Joab kiangah, “Bangbang piang taleh kei zong Kush mipa’ nungah hong taisak in,” a cikik hi. Joab in, “Lungdamna thu puakna hangin thaman ngah lo ding cih thei napi-in, ka tapa aw, bang hangin tai ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Bangbang piang taleh ka tai ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Joab in ama kiangah, “Tai in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ahimaaz zanglei lam tawnin tai a, Kush mipa makhelh hi.
Tua laitakin kulhkongpi pua nung le a sung nung kikalah David na tu hi. Galvil pa kulhkongpi khumzangah paito a, a khuadak ciangin amah guakin a hong tai mi khat a mu hi.
Galvil pa in kumpipa kiangah a gen hi. Kumpipa in, “Amah guak ahihleh thuhoih ahi hi,” a ci hi. Amah hong nawhtai-in hong nai hi.

Tua ciangin galvil pa in midang khat a hong tai mu leuleu hi. Galvil pa in kulhkongpi-ah ko a, “En un, midang khat zong hong tai leuleu!” a ci hi. Kumpipa in, “Amah in zong lungdamna thu hong paipih hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin galvil pa in, “A masa pa’ taizia pen Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz’ tai tawh kibang hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Amah mihoih hi a, lungdamna thuhoih tawh hong pai hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah Ahimaaz hong kiko-in, “Na khempeuh hoih hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa mai-ah lei maingatin amah kun a, “Ka to kumpipa’ langkhat ah a khut a liik mite nangma khut sungah a hong pia Topa na Pasian in thupha ngah tahen,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Tangvalpa Absalom a hoihhoih hiam?” a ci hi. Ahimaaz in dawngin, “Joab in na nasem pa hong sawl laitakin buaina lianpi khat ka mu a, ahih hangin bang hiam cih ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Kihei khia inla, hih lai-ah ding in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kiheikhia-in taang loin a ding hi.

Tua ciangin Kush mipa hong tung hi. Kush mipa in, “Ka to kumpipa adingin lungdam nading thu om hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma langah a ding mi khempeuh’ vangliatna panin tuni-in Topa in nang hong hon khia hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in Kush mipa kiangah, “Tangvalpa Absalom a hoihhoih hiam?” a ci hi. Kush mipa in dawngin, “Ka to kumpipa’ galte le siat nadingin nangma langkhat ah a ding khempeuh, tua tangvalpa bang tahen,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa’ lungsim nakpitakin sukha a, kulhkongpi tunga inndei sungah paito-in a kap hi. A paikawmin amah in, “Aw ka tapa Absalom, ka tapa, ka tapa Absalom! Nangma tangin kei si zaw taleng. Aw Absalom, ka tapa, ka tapa!” a ci hi.
Joab kiangah, “En in, Absalom’ hangin kumpipa kapin thum hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-a gualzawhna mi khempeuh adingin thumna hong suak mawk hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua ni-in mite in, “Kumpipa a tapa’ hangin dah hi,” ci-in za uh hi.
Tua ciangin galsung pan a tai uh ciangin a maizum mite a geel bangin tua ni-in khuapi sungah mite simlut uh hi.
Kumpipa in a mai khuh a, nakpitakin kapkhia-in, “Aw ka tapa Absalom! Aw Absalom! Ka tapa, ka tapa!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa’ inn sungah Joab hong pai-in, “Tuni-in nangma nuntakna, na tanute le na tapate’ nuntakna, na zite le na zineute’ nuntakna a hong hon khia na nasemte khempeuh na maizumsak hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in nang hong mudahte itin, nang hong itte na mudah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ukte le nasemte nang adingin bangmah ahih lohna tuni-in na kitelsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Absalom hingin, kote khempeuh tuni-in si le ung na nuam ding ka thei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ding in, pai khia inla na nasemte tungah kamneem pau in; bang hang hiam cih leh na pai kei leh tuzan ciangin mi khat zong nang kiangah hong om nawn lo ding hi, ci-in Topa’ min tawh ka kiciam ngam hi. Hih thu pen na tangval a kipan tu ciang dong na tungah hong tungsa siatna khempeuh sangin nang adingin sia zaw ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa dingin kulhkongpi gei-ah a tu hi. Tua ciangin mite kiangah, “En un, kulhkongpi-ah kumpipa tu hi,” ci-in kigen a, tua ciangin kumpipa mai-ah mi khempeuh hong pai uh hi. Tu-in Israel mite amau’ inn ciatah na tai khin uh hi.

Israel minam khempeuh sungah mi khempeuh thu kiseel uh a, “Kumpipa in i galte’ khut sung panin hong khahkhia-in Filistia-te’ khut sung panin hong hon khia hi. Tu-in Absalom’ hangin i gam sung panin amah tai khia hi.
Ahih hangin eite’ tungah sathau i nilh Absalom, gal sungah si khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in bang hangin kumpipa lakkik ding bangmah gen lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi David in hih thu, siampi Zadok le Abiathar kiangah puakin, “Judah upate kiangah hih bangin gen un: ‘Israel-te khempeuh’ thu kumpipa kiangah tung khin hi. Bang hangin note in kumpipa a inn-ah a ciahpih nunung pen hi ding na hi uh hiam?
Note pen ka behnai na hi uh a, note pen keima si keima sa na hi uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin kumpipa a ciahpih nunung pen hi ding na hi uh hiam?’ ci un.

Tua ciangin Amasa kiangah, ‘Nang pen keima si keima sa hi lo na hi hiam? Tua kipan Joab’ munah nang pen ka galkapte a ukpa na hih kei taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei tahen, ci hi,’ ci-in gen un,” a ci hi.
David’ thugen in Judah mite khempeuh’ lungsim thakhatin zo pah hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in kumpipa kiangah thu puakin, “Nang le na nasemte khempeuh hong ciahkik un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jordan-ah kumpipa hong paikik hi. Kumpipa a dawn ding le Jordan galah kumpipa a paipih dingin Gilgal-ah Judah mite hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Bahurim panin Benjamin mi Gera’ tapa Shimei, Kumpi David a dawn dingin Judah mite tawh manlangin paisuk hi.
Benjamin sung panin mi tulkhat amah tawh om hi. Tua ciangin Saul’ inn sung nasem Ziba, a tapa sawm le nga le a nasem sawmnihte tawh kumpipa’ mai Jordan-ah taisuk a,
kumpipa’ innkuante a galkahpih ding le ama deih bangin na a sem dingin amaute in ngahmun ngap uh hi. Jordan a galkah ding ciangin Gera’ tapa Shimei kumpipa’ mai-ah boksukin
kumpipa kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa in Jerusalem na nusiat ni-in na nasem pa’ gamtat khialhna ka topa in hong mawhsak kei inla, hong ciamteh kei in; kumpipa in ngaihsutin nei kei in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ka khialh khitna na nasem pa in ka thei hi. Tua ahih ciangin, en in, ka to kumpipa a dawn dingin a hong paisuk dingin Josef minam khempeuh sung panin a masa penin tuni-in kong tung hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nu Zeruiah ahi Abishai hong pau khia a, “Amah in Topa’ sathau nilh pa samsia ahih manin hih thu hangin Shimei thah ding hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin David in, “Note pen tuni-in kei’ lang bangin na om nadingun no Zeruiah’ tapate tawh kei bang kisai ihi hiam? Tuni-in Israel sungah mi khatpeuh kithat ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh tuni-in Israel-te’ tungah kumpi ka hihna thei hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Shimei kiangah, “Nang na si kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Kumpipa in ama tungah kiciamna a bawl hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa a dawn dingin Saul’ tupa Mefibosheth hong paisuk hi. Kumpipa a pai khiat ni a kipan lungnuamin hong tunkik ni dong, amah in a khete zem lo, a khamul puah lo, a puante zong sawp lo hi.
Jerusalem panin kumpipa a dawn dingin hong pai ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Mefibosheth aw, bang hangin kei hong zui lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in dawngin, “Ka topa! Aw Kumpipa, ka nasem pa in kei hong khem hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na nasem pa in ama kiangah, ‘Kei a tungah tuangin kumpipa ka zuih theih nadingin kei adingin la khat tutphah vawh in,’ ka ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na nasem pa a khe bai hi.
Amah in ka to kumpipa kiangah na nasem pa hong gensia hi. Ahih hangin ka to kumpipa pen Pasian’ vantungmi tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih ciangin hoih na sak bangin hong hih in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ka to kumpipa’ mai-ah ka pa’ innkuante khempeuh a si zah dong dingin a sia ahi hi. Ahih hangin nangmah in na sabuai-ah a ne mite lakah na nasem pa na hong koih hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa tungah ka koh ding thudang bang neithuah nawn ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin nangma thu gen lailai na hi hiam? Ka lungsim ka khentat zo hi; nang le Ziba in leitang na hawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mefibosheth in kumpipa kiangah, “Aw, ka to kumpipa lungnuamin inn hong tung khin na hih nungsang, a vekin amah lasak in,” a ci hi.
Rogelim panin Gilead mi Barzillai zong hong paisuk hi. Jordan galkhat ah amah a kha dingin kumpipa tawh Jordan ciang dong amah paisuak hi.
Barzillai pen kum sawmgiat a pha, a khangham mahmah mi khat ahi hi. Mahanaim ah kumpipa a om laitakin amah in an pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah mihau mahmah khat ahi hi.
Kumpipa in Barzillai kiangah, “Kei hong zui inla, Jerusalem-ah kei tawh hong om in, nang kong vak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Barzillai in kumpipa kiangah, “Kei, kumpipa tawh Jerusalem-ah a paito dingin ka nuntak ding kum bangzah hun nei nawn ka hi hiam?

Tuni-in kei kum sawmgiat ka pha ta a, a nuam le a nuam lo khentel thei nawn ka hi hiam? Na nasem pa in a nek ahi a, a dawn ahi zongin a limna phawk thei nawn ka hi hiam? Lasa numeite le lasa pasalte’ aw za thei nawn ka hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin ka to kumpipa tungah na nasem pa vangik kibehlap hong hi ding ka hi hiam?
Na nasem pa in Jordan galkhat ah tomkha sung kumpipa hong zui ding hi. Kei pen tua bang hamphatna lianpi a ngah dingin zong ka kilawm kei hi.

Keima khuapi sung mah, ka nu le ka pa’ han nai-ah ka sih theih nadingin na nasem pa hong ciahsakkik in, ci-in kong thum hi. Ahih hangin hih lai-ah ka tapa na nasem pa Khimham om hi; ka to kumpipa tawh amah galkahsak in; hoih na sak bangbangin ama ading hihsak in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in dawngin, “Khimham in kei hong zui dinga, nangmah in hoih na sak bangbangin ama ading ka hihsak ding hi; kei tung panin na deih khempeuh nangma adingin kong hihsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh Jordan galah pai uh a, kumpipa zong a pai hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in Barzillai namin thupha pia a, ama inn-ah amah a ciah hi.
Gilgal-ah kumpipa paisuak a, amah tawh Khimham paisuak hi. Judah mi khempeuh le Israel mi a kimkhatte in zong ama paina dingah kumpipa a kha uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh hong pai-in kumpipa kiangah, “Bang hangin ka sanggam uh Judah mite in nang hong gukhia-in, kumpipa le a innkuante le David’ mite amah tawh, Jordan galah paipih ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Judah mite khempeuh in Israel mite dawngin, “Kumpipa pen kote tawh beh kinai ahihna hang ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin hih thu-ah heh na hi uh hiam? Kumpipa’ sum bei-in an ne peuhmah ka hi uh hiam? Tua ahih kei leh amah in letsong khat peuhpeuh kote hong pia ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in Judah mite dawngin, “Kumpipa sungah tanh sawm ka nei uh a, David’ sungah note khempeuh sangin tam ka nei zaw uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin note in kote hong simmawh na hi uh hiam? Kote pen i kumpipa ciahpihkik ding a gen masate hi lo ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Israel mite’ kammal sangin Judah mite’ kammal kihtakhuai zaw hi.

Tu-in tua lai-ah Benjamin mi, Bikhri’ tapa Sheba min nei, mi ginalo khat hong omkha hi. Amah in peengkul tumin, “David’ sungah tanh i nei kei a, Jessi’ tapa’ sungah gamh i nei kei hi; na inn ciat uhah ciah un, Israel-te aw,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mi khempeuh David’ kiang pan nungkik uh a, Bikhri’ tapa Sheba zui uh hi. Ahih hangin Judah mite in Jordan panin Jerusalem ciang dong a kumpipa uh kiptakin zui uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem-a a inn-ah David tung hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in inn kem dingin a nusiat a zineu sawmte la-in a kivil inn khat sungah amaute koihin amaute a vak hi. Ahih hangin amaute luppih lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute a khang laipi-in meigong numei suak uh a, a sih dong uh amaute kikhumcip hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Amasa kiangah, “Ni thum sungin Judah mite kei kiangah khawm inla, nang mahmah zong hih lai-ah hong om in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah-te a sam dingin Amasa pai a, ahi zongin ama tungah a kiciam a kisehsa khengin amah zekai hi.

Tua ciangin David in Abishai kiangah, “Tu-in Bikhri’ tapa Sheba in Absalom sangin eite tungah siatna tam zaw hong bawl ding hi. Na topa’ nasemte la inla, amah delh in. Tua hikeileh amah in ama adingin khuapi muanhuaite ngahin eite tungah buaina hong piangsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abishai’ nungah Joab le Khereth mite le Peleth mite le mi thahat khempeuh pai uh hi. Bikhri’ tapa Sheba a delh dingin Jerusalem panin amaute kuan khia uh hi.

Gibeon gam sunga suangtumpi-ah amaute a tun uh ciangin amaute a dawn dingin Amasa hong pai hi. Tu-in Joab in galkap puan silhin, tua tungah, a kawng tungah a kigak a paai sunga namsau tawh a kithuah kawnggak khat om a, a mailam manawhin a pai laitakin a namsau seel hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in Amasa kiangah, “Ka sanggampa aw, bang cici na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Joab in amah a hopih kawmin a taklam khut tawh a khamul-in Amasa man hi.

Ahih hangin Amasa in Joab’ khutsunga om namsau mu lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Joab in a namsau tawh a pumpi sat a, nihvei sat kul loin a gilpi leilakah bua khia hi; tua ciangin Amasa a si hi. Tua ciangin Joab le a sanggampa Abishai in Bikhri’ tapa Sheba delh uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab’ mite khat Amasa’ kiangah dingin, “Joab a gum peuhmah le David-a’ ahi mi peuhmah in Joab zui un,” a ci hi.

Lam lianpi a ama sisan sungah Amasa kidiahin a om hi. Tua lai-ah a pai mi peuhmah in amah a muh ciangin a khawl uh hi. Mi khempeuh a khawlna tua mipa in a muh ciangin amah in lam lianpi panin gamlakah Amasa pua khia-in ama tungah puan khat a khuh hi.
Lam lianpi panin amah a kilakkhiat khit ciangin Bikhri’ tapa Sheba a delh dingin Joab nungah mi khempeuh paisuak hi.
Tua ciangin Israel minamte khempeuh nawkin Abelbethmaakah khua-ah Sheba pai hi. Bikhri mi khempeuh kikhawm uh a, amah zui-in khuapi sungah tum uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joab tawh a om mi khempeuh hong pai-in Abelbethmaakah khua-ah amah umcih uh hi. Amaute in khuapi simna-in suang cianpi khat bawl uh a, kulhpi langkhat ah ding uh hi. Tua ciangin kulhpi a puk theih nadingin amaute in kulhpi nuai to uh hi.
Tua ciangin numei pil khat in khuapi panin samin, “Za un! Joab kiangah gen un: ‘Nang tungah thu kong gen theih nadingin hih lai-ah hong pai in,’ ci un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin tua nu’ mai-ah Joab hong pai hi. Tua numei in, “Nang, Joab na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Ka hi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua numei in ama kiangah, “Na nasem nu’ thugente ngai in,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Ka ngai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Tanglai-in amaute in, ‘Abel-ah thu dongsak un,’ ci thei uh a, tua bangin amaute in thu siangsak uh hi.

Kei pen Israel sungah tua bangin kilemna a deih a thuman mi khat ka hi hi. Nang in Israel sungah nu tawh a kibang khuapi khat suksiat ding na hanciam hi. Bang hangin Topa’ gamhluah valhtum ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Joab in dawngin, “Keimah in ka valhtum ding ahi a, ka suksiat ding ahi zongin keima ngaihsut hi dek lo hi.

Tua thu man lo hi. Ahih hangin Efraim mual tung gammi Bikhri’ tapa Sheba a kici mipa in Kumpi David lehdo hi; amah bek hong pia in. Tua hileh khuapi panin ka nungkik ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua numei in Joab kiangah, “En in, kulh sung panin nang kiangah ama lutang hong kilawnsuk ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin ama pilna zangin mi khempeuh kiangah tua numei a pai hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Bikhri’ tapa Sheba’ lu tankhia-in Joab kiangah lawn khia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in peengkul tum a, khuapi panin amaute kikhenin a milipin a inn ciat uhah a ciah uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa kiang Jerusalem-ah Joab a ciah hi.
Tua laitakin Joab pen Israel galkap khempeuh a uk ahi hi. Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah pen Khereth mite le Peleth mite a uk ahi hi.
Adoram pen aana tawh na a kisemsakte a uk ahi hi. Ahilud’ tapa Jehoshafat pen thu ciamteh pa ahi hi.
Sheva pen lai-at pa ahi hi. Zadok le Abiathar siampite ahi uh hi.
Jair mi Ira zong David’ siampi ahi hi.

Tu-in kum khat khit kum khat, David’ hun sungin kum thum sung kialpi tung hi. Tua ciangin David in Topa’ kiangah thu dong hi. Topa in, “Amah in Gibeon mite that ahih manin Saul le a innkuan tungah mi thahna hanga mawhna om hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in Gibeon mite sam hi. Tu-in Gibeon mite pen Israel-te’ sung hi loin Amor mi a omlaite ahi uh hi. Amaute a hingkhawi ding Israel mite kiciam khin napi-in, Israel le Judah mite ading a deih luatna-in Saul in amaute thah dingin hanciam hi.
Tua ciangin David in Gibeon mite kiangah, “Note adingin bang hong hihsak ding ka hi hiam? Note in Topa’ mite thupha na piak theih nadingun bangci bangin kilemna hong bawl ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Gibeon mite in ama kiangah, “Kote le Saul ahi a, a innkuan tawh kikalah ahi zongin kitotna a om pen ngun le kham in maisak zo lo ding hi. Israel-te sungah mi khatpeuh ka thah hangun zong lungkim zawh nading om lo hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Note ading kong hihsak ding bang hi, ci na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in kumpipa kiangah, “Israel gam sungah kote in mun ka neih loh nadingun kote hong netumin suksiat ding Saul in vaihawm hi.
Topa’ mual tung, Topa’ mai Gibeon-ah amaute ka khai theih nadingun ama tapa sagihte hong pia in,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Amaute kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in amah le Saul’ tapa Jonathan’ kikalah a om, Topa tawh kiciamna hangin Jonathan’ tapa, Saul’ tupa Mefibosheth a siit hi.
Ahi zongin Aiah’ tanu Rizpah’ tapa nih, Saul tawh a neih Armoni le Mefibosheth; le Saul’ tanu Merab in Meholah mi Barzillai’ tapa Adriel tawh a neih a tapa ngate a la hi.
Amah in Gibeon mite tungah amaute pia a, amaute in Topa’ mai mualtungah amaute khai uh a, amau sagihte sikhawm uh hi. Mangbuhham lak kipat hun, anlak kipat cil lamin amaute kithat hi.

Tua ciangin Aiah’ tanu Rizpah in a puanhampi la-in, anlak a kipan van panin amau’ luanghawmte tungah guah a zuk dongin ama lup nadingin suangpi tungah a phah hi. Sunin huihlak vasate in ahi a, zanin gamsate in ahi zongin amau’ luanghawmte a sukkhak loh nadingun a cing hi.
Saul’ zineu, Aiah’ tanu Rizpah’ gamtatna thu David kiangah a kigen ciangin,

David pai-in Gilboa mualtungah Filistia-te in Saul a thah lai hunin Filistia-te in amaute a khaina mun Bethshan khua sung kongzing lampi laizang panin a luanghawm a guksak Jabeshgilead mite’ tung panin Saul’ guhte le a tapa Jonathan’ guhte a lakik hi.
Amah in tua lai panin Saul’ guhte le a tapa Jonathan’ guhte paipihto hi. Amaute in a kikhai mi sagihte’ guh zong kaikhawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Zela khua sung Benjamin’ leitang, a pa Kish’ han sungah Saul le a tapa Jonathan’ guhte phum uh a, amaute in kumpipa’ thupiak khempeuh hih uh hi. Tua khit ciangin tua gam ading thumnate Pasian in a ngai hi.
Filistia-te, Israel-te tawh kidokik uh a, David a nasemte tawh paisuk khawmin Filistia-te a sim uh hi. Tua galkidona-ah David gim mahmah hi.
Mithagolte’ suante khat, a teipi sumngo shekel zathum a gik, namsau thak khat a kuah Ishbibenob in David thah ding ngaihsun hi.

Ahih hangin amah a huh dingin Zeruiah’ tapa Abishai hong pai a, Filistia-pa simin amah a that hi. Tua ciangin David’ mite in amah kunh-in, “Galsim dingin ko tawh nong kuan khia nawn kei ding hi. Hong kuan lecin Israel mite’ muan le suanpa kong taan kha ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Filistia-te tawh Gob-ah galkidona omkik a, Hushah mi Sibbekai in mithagolte’ suante khat ahi Saf a that hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-te tawh galkidona om leuleu a, Bethlehem mi Jaareoregim’ tapa Elhanan in a teipi siamgante’ siamlawngpi cia a pha, Gath mi Goliath a that hi.

Tua ciangin, a khut langtuakah khutme guk le a khe langtuakah kheme guk, a vekpi-in sawmnih le li a nei, mi thalian khat a omna Gath-ah gal om leuleu hi. Amah zong mithagolte’ sung panin a piang ahi hi.
Amah in Israel-te a phin ciangin, David’ sanggampa Shimei’ tapa Jonathan in amah that hi.
Hih mi lite pen Gath-a mithagolte’ sung pan a piang ahi uh hi. David le a nasemte in amaute a that uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in ama galte khempeuh’ khut sung le Saul’ khut sung panin amah a hotkhiat hunin David in hih la kammalte Topa’ tungah a gen hi.
Amah in, “Topa, kei hong hupa, ka kulhpi, kei hong hon khia pa,
ka Pasian, ka kihutna, ka bukna pa, lum bangin kei a hong dal, ka munmuanhuai le ka belh, keimah hong hon khia pa hi a, ngong hihna panin hong hon hi.
A phat taak Topa ka sam a, ka galte kiang panin kei hong kihon hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna tuihualte in kei hong tum a, siatna tuikhangte in kei hong nawk hi.
Leinuai khaute in kei hong kancip a, sihna thangte in kei hong dawntuah hi.
Ka lungkhamna-ah Topa ka sam a, ka Pasian ka sam hi. A biakinn panin amah in ka aw hong za a, ka kikona awging ama bil a tung hi.
“Tua ciangin ama hehna hangin leitung kisingin, nakpitakin kilok gawp a, vantung bulpite kiliing gawp hi.
A nakvang sung panin meikhu pusuak a, a kamsung panin a kaangtum mei pusuak a, ama tung panin mei-am san kuang khia hi.
Amah in vantungte niamsakin hong paisuk a, ama khenuai-ah khuamial sahpi om hi.
Kherub khat tungah amah tuangin hong leng a, huih khate tungah amah kimu hi.
Amah in ama kimkotah khuamial bawl a, a tung kikhuh nadingin meii sahpi a zang hi.
Ama mai-a a taang sung panin mei-amte kuang khia hi.
“Vantung panin Topa hong awngsuk a, Sang Pen pa in a aw hong gingsak hi.
Amah in thaltangte lawnin thehthang gawp a, khuaphialep phiasakin amaute a taisak hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ mawhsakna awging lianpi hangin tuipi tawte kidawk a, lei bulpite a guakin om hi.
“Amah in a sangna mun panin hong banin kei hong la a, tui thukpi panin kei hong kai khia hi.
A hat ka galte panin kei hong hon khia a, kei hong mudahte panin hong suaktasak hi. Keima adingin ka galte hatlua uh hi.
Ka kamsiat ni-in kei hong sim gawp uh a, ahih hangin Topa in kei hong huh hi.
Amah in mun tanzau khatah kei hong pai khiatpih a, kei tungah lungkim ahih manin kei hong hon khia hi.
“Ka thumanna tawh kizui-in Topa in thaman hong pia a, ka sianthona tawh kizui-in hong dinkik hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ thu ka zui a, ka Pasian ka langpang kei hi.
Ama biakna ngeina kipte hoihtakin ka zui a, ama thukhamte panin kei ka pial kei hi.
Ama mai-ah kawk ka baang kei a, kisuanna dangte panin hoihtakin ka kikem hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in ka thumanna, ama muhna-ah ka sianthona tawh kizui-in kei hong dinkik khin hi.
“Thuman mi tungah nangmah na thuman a, a kawkbaang lo mi tungah a kawkbaang loin na gamta hi.
A siangtho mi tungah a siangtho-in na gamta a, a thukawi mi tungah thupeelin na gamta hi.
Nangmah in mi niamte na hon khia a, ahih hangin a kiphasakte na niamkhiat hi.
Topa aw, nang pen keima meivak na hi hi. Ka Pasian in ka khuamial vaksak hi.
Nangma hangin galkap hon khat ka su gawp zo a, ka Pasian’ hangin khuakulh khat ka kan zo hi.
“Hih Pasian a thu kicing a, Topa’ kamciamna a manna kilang hi. Amah a beelte khempeuh adingin kidalna lum ahi hi.
Topa longal Pasian kua hiam? I Pasian sim loh, hong hu kua hiam?
Hih Pasian, a muanhuai keima belh hi a, ka lampi khempeuh lungmuanhuaisak hi.
Amah in sakhipite’ khe bangin ka khe kipsak a, mun sangna-ah keimah hong koih hi.
Amah in galsimzia kei hong hilh a, sumngo thal khauh pente ka keek zo hi.
“Nangmah in kei hong dalin na hong hon khia a, nangma hong huhna in kei hong liansak hi.
Ka kalsuan nading mun tanzau keima nuai-ah nong pia a, ka khe taal lo hi.
Ka galte delhin ka susia a, amaute a beitum mateng kei ka kileh kei hi.
Amaute ka beisak a, amaute ka sunlet hi; amaute thokik nawn lo uh a, ka khenuai-ah amaute puk uh hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in galdo nadingin tha nong guan a, keimah hong dote ka nuai-ah na nengniam hi.
Nangmah in ka galte, kei hong mudahte, na nungkiksak a, keimah in amaute ka susia gawp hi.
Amaute khuadak uh a, ahih hangin a hon khia ding kuamah om lo hi. Topa’ tungah hong ko uh a, ahih hangin amah in amaute dawng lo hi.
“Leivui bangin amaute ka satvui a, kongzing buante bangin amaute tuankhamin ka sikcipsuk hi.
Mite tawh kidona panin nangmah in nong hon khia a, minamte’ lutangin kei nong bawl a, ka theih ngei loh mite in keima na hong sem uh hi.
Keimah mai-etin gamdang mite ka kiangah hong pai uh hi. Amaute in ka thu a zak phetun, ka thu hong mang uh hi.
Gamdang mite lungkia uh a, a phualkip panun liingin hong pai khia uh hi.
“Topa hing hi; kei hong hupa in thupha ngah henla, ka Pasian, kei hong hon khia pa,
hong thuksakin, keima nuai-ah mite a koihsuk Pasian,
ka galte kiang panin kei hong pai khiatpih pa vanglian tahen. Nangmah in ka langte tungah kei nong liansak a, mi ngongtatte kiang panin kei nong hon khia hi.
“Topa aw, hih thu hangin minam khempeuh lakah nang kong phat dinga, na min phatna la ka sa ding hi.
Zawhna lianpi ama kumpipa tungah pia a, a sathau nilh pa David le a suanlekhakte tungah a tawntungin itna kip a lak hi,” a ci hi.
Jessi’ tapa David, milianpi a suak mipa, Jakob’ Pasian’ sathau nilh pa, Israel laphuak siampa David’ kam nunungte hih bang ahi hi:
“Topa’ kha in kei tungtawnin thu hong gen a,ka kam sungah ama thugente om hi.
Israel Pasian kampau khin a, Israel a hupa in kei kiangah hong ci khin hi: Mi khat in mite tungah thutang takin ukin Pasian zahtakna tawh limtakin a uk ciangin
amah pen amaute tungah zingsang khuavak bangin taang ziazua a, meii kaai loh ni zingsang a ni taang khia, leilak panin lopate a selsak guahtui tawh kibang hi.

Hi hi, ka innkuan zong Pasian tawh tua bangmah hi lo ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in tawntung thuciamna kei tawh hong bawl a, na khempeuh a hoih a kipin hih hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah hong huhin, ka deihna khempeuh tangtungsak ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Ahih hangin mi gilote ahihleh a kilawn khia lingkungte tawh kibang hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh khut guak tawh amaute kilawng ngam lo a,
amaute a lawng ding mipa pen sik le teipi bul tawh kithawi a, amaute mei tawh kihaltum siang hi,” a ci hi.
David’ neih mi thahatte’ minte: Tahkhemon mi Joshebbasshebeth hi a, amah pen mi thumte a ukpa ahi hi. Amah in a teipi tawh mihing zagiat do-in hun khat sungin that mang khin hi.
Tua ciangin mi thahat thumte lakah amah a zom pa pen Ahoah mi Dodo’ tapa Eleazar ahi hi. Galsim dingin a kikaikhawm Filistia-te to a, Israel mite a nungkik hunin David tawh amah om hi.

Amah dingin a khut a hikcip mateng Filistia-te sattuk a, a namsau a khut sungah omcip hi. Topa in tua ni-in gualzawhna lianpi piangsak a, a kithat mite’ na a tawm ding bekin ama nungah mite hong paikik uh hi.
Ama zomah Harar mi Agee’ tapa Shammah ahi hi. Besan a dimna mun Lehi-ah Filistia-te kikaikhawm uh a, Filistia-te’ kiang panin mite tai uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tua munah panmun la-in hu a, Filistia-te that a, Topa in gualzawhna lianpi a piangsak hi.
Ukpa sawmthumte lak panin mi thumte paisukin, Refaim kuamah Filistia mihonte in giahphual satin a om laitakin, Adullam leihawm a David kiangah anlak hun pawlin tung uh hi.
Tua hunin munmuanhuai sungah David om a, Filistia khuacingte Bethlehem-ah om uh hi.
David in lunggulhna tawh, “Kulhkongpi gei-a om Bethlehem tuikhuk panin mi khat in tuidawn ding kei hong pia leh!” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mi thahat thumte in Filistia-te’ giahphual phulin kulhkongpi gei-a om Bethlehem tuikhuk panin tui tawi khia uh a, a tui la-in David kiangah paipih uh hi. Ahih hangin David in a tui dawn lo hi. Amah in Topa adingin a tui sung a,
“Topa aw, hih tui ka dawn het kei ding hi. Amau’ nuntakna khamin a pai mite’ sisan a dawn tawh ka kibang hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in dawn lo hi. Mi thahat thumte’ hanzia tu-a bang ahi hi.
Tu-in Zeruiah’ tapa, Joab’ sanggampa Abishai, mihing sawmthumte a ukpa ahi hi. Amah in a teipi tawh mihing za thumte do-in amaute that a, mihing sawmthumte’ banah minphatna ngahbeh hi.
Mihing sawmthumte sung pan amah a minthang pen hi a, amaute a ukpa a suak hi. Ahih hangin amah in mihing thumte ban nai lo hi.

Jehoiada’ tapa, Kabzeel khuami Benaiah pen gal a hang, na lianpite a sempa hi a, amah in Moab galhang mi nih a vat hi. Amah zong paisukin vuk a kiat ni khatin leihawm sunga om humpinelkai khat a that hi.

Amah in a melhoih Egypt mi khat a that hi. Egypt mipa in a khut sungah teipi tawi hi. Ahih hangin Benaiah ciangkhut khat tawh ama kiangah paisuk a, Egypt-pa’ khut sung panin a teipi sutkhia-in ama teipi mah tawh amah a that hi.
Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in hihte hihin, a thahat mi thumte’ minphatna zah phial a ngah hi.
Mihing sawmthumte’ lakah amah minthang a, ahih hangin amah in mihing thumte ban nai lo hi. David in amah a cingte a ukin a koih hi.
Joab’ sanggampa Asahel zong sawmthumte’ lakah khat ahi hi. Bethlehem mi Dodo’ tapa Elhanan,
Harod khuami Shammah, Harod khuami Elika,
Palti mi Helez, Tekoa khuami Ikkesh’ tapa Ira,
Anathoth khuami Abiezer, Hushah mi Mebunnai,
Ahoah mi Zalmon, Netofah khuami Maharai,
Netofah khuami Baanah’ tapa Heleb, Benjamin mite’ gam sunga om Gibeah khuami Ribai’ tapa Ittai,
Pirathon khuami Benaiah, Gaash gei-a kuam pan Hiddai,
Betharabah khuami Abialbon, Bahurim khuami Azmaveth,
Shaalbon khuami Eliahba, Jashen’ tapate, Jonathan,
Harar mi Shammah, Harar mi Sharar’ tapa Ahiam,
Maakah khuami Ahasbai’ tapa Elifelet, Gilo khuami Ahithofel’ tapa Eliam,
Karmel khuami Hezro, Arbi mi Paarai,
Zobah khuami Nathan’ tapa Igal, Gad mi Bani,
Ammon mi Zelek, Zeruiah’ tapa galhiam a tawi Beeroth khuami Naharai,
Ithri mi Ira, Ithri mi Gareb,
Hit mi Uriah, a vekpi-in sawmthum le sagih ahi uh hi.
Khatvei, Israel-te tungah Topa hong hehkik a, amah in mite’ gim nadingin David hanthawnin, “Pai in; Israel le Judah mi a phazah sim in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in Joab le amah tawh a om galkap ukte kiangah, “Mite a phazah ka theih nadingin Dan panin Beersheba ciang dong Israel minamte khempeuh lakah pai unla mi phazah va sim un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Joab in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa’ muhin Topa na Pasian in mite tu-a a omzah za khatin a tamna behlap tahen. Ahih hangin bang hangin ka to kumpipa in hih thu deih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa’ kamgente in Joab le galkap ukte zo zaw hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite a phazah a sim dingin kumpipa’ omna panin Joab le galkap ukte a pai khia uh hi.
Amaute in Jordan kantanin kuam laizang a om khuapi Aroer panin kipanin Gad lam manawh uh a, Jazer-ah paisuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute Gilead tung uh a, tua panin Hit mite’ gam Kadesh tung uh hi. Tua lai panin Dan tungin, Dan panin kual pai-in Sidon tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin Taia munmuanhuai le Hiv mite le Kanaan mite’ khuapite khempeuh tung uh hi. Tua panin Judah-te’ Negeb lam Beersheba-ah pai uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gam khempeuh ah amaute a pai khit uh, kha kua le ni sawmnih a cin khit ciangin Jerusalem-ah hong tungkik uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in kumpipa kiangah mite a phazah a gawm a pia hi: Israel sungah namsau a tawi galhang mi tul zagiat om a, Judah mi tul zanga om hi.

Ahih hangin mi a sim khit ciangin David’ lungsim in a mahmah gimsak hi. Tua ciangin David in Topa’ tungah, “Ka gamtatnasa sungah nakpitakin ka khial hi. Ahih hangin, tu-in, Topa aw, nang tungah kong thum hi; na nasem pa’ mawhna hong maisak in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka hai gamtatkha khin hi,” a ci hi.
Zingsangin David a thawh ciangin David’ thumu pa ahi kamsang Gad tungah Topa’ thu hong tunga,
“Pai inla, David kiangah hih bangin gen in. ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nangma tungah thu thum kong pia hi; nang tungah kong hih theih nadingin tuate khat teel in,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin David kiangah Gad hong pai-in ama tungah gen a, “Na gam sungah kum thum sung kialpi hong tung ding hiam? Ahih kei leh na galte in nang hong delh laitakin amaute’ mai-ah kha thum sung tai ding na hi hiam? Ahih kei leh na gam sungah ni thum sung pulnatna hong tung ding ahi hiam? Tu-in ngaihsun in; kei hong sawl pa’ kiangah bang dawnna puakkik ding ka hi hiam khentat in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Gad kiangah, “Nakpi takin ka lung a kham hi. Ama hehpihna lian ahih manin Topa’ khut sungah tung ni; bangbang ahi zongin mihing khut sungah hong tungsak kei hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in zingsang a kipan a kiseh hun dongin Israel-te tungah natna tungsak hi. Dan panin Beersheba dongin mihing tul sawmsagih a si hi.

Vantungmi in Jerusalem khua a susia dingin kithawi-in a khut a zan ciangin tua tatsiatna panin Topa kisik a, mite lakah suksiatna na a sem vantungmi kiangah, “Pha zo hi; tu-in khawl ta in,” a ci hi. Topa’ vantungmi pen Jebus mi Araunah’ ancilna gei-ah a om hi.

Tua ciangin mite a vat vantungmi a muh ciangin David in Topa’ tungah thu gen a, “En in, ka mawh hi; a khial pa pen kei ka hi hi. Hih mite in bang khialhna nei ahi uh hiam? Kong thum hi; kei le ka innkuante bek gim hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua ni-in David kiangah Gad pai-in ama kiangah, “Paito in; Jebus mi Araunah’ ancilna-ah Topa ading biakna tau khat phut in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thupiak bangin Gad’ cihna zui-in David paito hi.
Araunah a khuadaksuk ciangin kumpipa le a nasemte ama lamah a hong paito a mu hi. Araunah pai khia-in a mai lei ngatin kumpipa zahtakna a bawl hi.

Tua ciangin Araunah in, “Bang hangin ka to kumpipa a nasem pa kiangah hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. “Mite’ tung panin gimna a ven theih nadingin Topa ading biakna tau lam nading na ancilna mun a lei ding,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Araunah in David kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa in hoih na sak bangin la inla biakna pia in; meihal biak nadingin bawngtalte le a sing dingin ancilna peekte le bawngtal kolte hih lai-ah om hi.
Kumpipa aw, keimah Araunah in hihte khempeuh kumpipa tungah kong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua banah Araunah in kumpipa kiangah, “Topa, na Pasian in nang hong sang tahen,” cithuah lai hi.

Ahih hangin kumpipa in Araunah kiangah, “Hilo hi; nangma tung panin hihte a man tawh kituakin kong lei ding hi. Topa ka Pasian’ tungah kei’ sum bei loin meihal biaknate ka pia kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in ngun shekel sawmnga tawh ancilna mun le bawngtalte a lei hi.

Tua ciangin David in Topa ading biakna tau khat tua lai-ah lam a, meihal biaknate le thunuama biaknate a pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua gam adingin thumna Topa in ngai a, Israel-te’ tung panin gimna a veng hi.
Tu-in Kumpi David teekin kum tam ta hi. Amaute in amah puan a silhsak uh hangin a khua lum thei lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a nasemte in ama kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa adingin nungakno khat kizong henla, amah in kumpipa enin amah a kemnu hita hen. Ka to kumpipa a khua a lum theih nadingin na ang sungah tua nu lum hen,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Israel gam sung khempeuh ah nungak melhoih khat zong uh a, Shunem mi Abishag mu-in, kumpipa kiangah amah paipih uh hi.
Tua nungak melhoih mahmah a, kumpipa a kemnu suakin ama na a sem hi. A lupkhawm uh hangin kumpipa in amah hih zo lo hi.

Tu-in David in Haggith tawh a neih a tapa Adonijah a mahmah kiliansak tawmin, “Keimah, kumpi ka hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah in ama adingin leengte le sakol tung tuangte le ama mai-ah a tai ding mihing sawmnga vaihawm hi.
A pa David in, “Bang hangin tua bang tua bangin gamta na hi hiam?” ci-a dotna tawh khatvei beek amah tai ngei lo hi. Amah pen a melhoih mahmah mi khat zong ahi hi. Amah pen Absalom zom a suak ahi hi.
Amah in Zeruiah’ tapa Joab le siampi Abiathar tawh vaihawm hi. Amaute in Adonijah zui-in amah panpih uh hi.
Ahih hangin siampi Zadok le Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah le David’ mi a thahatte in Adonijah panpih lo uh hi.
Adonijah in Enrogel gei-a om Gulpi’ Suangpi kiangah tuute, bawngtalte le ganno thaute biakna-in pia-in, amah in kumpipa’ tapate ahi a sanggamte khempeuh le Judah gam kumpi uliante khempeuh sam a,
ahih hangin kamsangpa Nathan ahi a, Benaiah ahi a, mi thahatte ahi a, a sanggampa Solomon ahi zongin sam lo hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in Solomon’ nu Bathsheba kiangah, “Haggith’ tapa Adonijah kumpi suak khinin, David in tua thu a theih lohna thu za nai lo na hi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in hong pai in. Nangma nuntakna le na tapa Solomon’ nuntakna na suahtaksak theih nadingin nang tungah ngaihsutna kong pia ding hi.

Thakhatin Kumpi David kiangah pai-in ama tungah, ‘Ka to kumpipa in na nasem nu’ tungah hong kiciamin, “Na tapa Solomon pen keima nungah mangin, keima kumpi tokhom tungah tu ding hi,” ci hi lo na hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin Adonijah kumpi suak ahi hiam?’ ci in.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah thu na gen laitakin kei zong nangma nungah hong pai-in nangma thugen teng kong panpih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Bathsheba a inndei sung kumpipa kiangah va pai hi (tu-in kumpipa teek mahmah a, Shunem mi Abishag in kumpipa’ na sem hi.)
Bathsheba kunin kumpipa tungah zahtakna bawl a, kumpipa in, “Bang deih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua nu in ama kiangah, “Ka topa aw, na nasem nu tungah Topa na Pasian’ min tawh kiciamin, ‘Na tapa Solomon pen keima nungah mangin, keima kumpi tokhom tungah tu ding hi,’ na ci hi.
Tu-in en in, ka to kumpipa in na theih loh hangin, Adonijah kumpi ahi hi.
Amah in biakna-in bawngtalte, ganno thaute le tuute, tampi tak pia khin a, kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh, siampi Abiathar le galkapte a ukpa Joab sam a, ahih hangin amah in na nasem pa Solomon sam lo hi.
Ka to kumpipa aw, tu-in nangma nungah ka to kumpipa’ tokhom tungah kua tu ding, ci-a amaute kiangah na gen ding ngakin Israel-te khempeuh in nang hong en uh hi.
Tua bang hikeileh ka to kumpipa na bei ciangin kei le ka tapa Solomon a khialin a hong kiseh hun hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa tawh tua nu kiho-in a om laitakin kamsangpa Nathan hong tum hi.
Kumpipa kiangah, “Hih lai-ah kamsangpa Nathan om hi,” ci-in a kigen hi. Kumpipa mai-ah amah hong pai ciangin a mai leilam ngatin kumpipa’ mai-ah a kun hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in, “Ka to kumpipa aw, ‘Keima nungah Adonijah mangin ka kumpi tokhom tungah tu ding hi,’ ci na hi hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh tuni-in amah paisuk khinin, bawngtalte, ganno thaute le tuute, tampi tak biakna-in pia a, kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh, galkapte a ukpa Joab le siampi Abiathar sam hi. Amaute in ama ading pawi bawl uh a, ‘Kumpi Adonijah a khansau hen!’ ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin na nasem pa keimah le siampi Zadok le Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah le na nasem pa Solomon, amah in hong sam lo hi.
Ka to kumpipa in hih thu thukimpihin, nangma khit ciangin ka to kumpipa’ tokhom tungah kua tu ding cih thu na nasem kote’ kiangah hong im na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi David in dawngin, “Bathsheba ka kiangah hong samkik in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa omna-ah tua nu hong pai-in, kumpipa’ mai-ah a ding hi.
Kumpipa kiciamin, “Haksatna khempeuh panin kei a hong hon khia Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin,

nangma tungah Topa, Israel Pasian’ min tawh hong kiciamin, ‘Keima nungah ka tapa Solomon mang dinga, keima tangin ka kumpi tokhom tungah tu ding hi,’ ka cihsa mah bangin, tuni-in zong ka cikik hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Bathsheba in leilam maingatin kunin kumpipa tungah zahtakna bawl a, “Ka to kumpi David nungta tawntung tahen!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi David in siampi Zadok, kamsang Nathan le Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah samsak hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ mai-ah amaute hong pai uh hi.
Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, “Na topa’ nasemte paipih unla, ka tapa Solomon keima la-sakol tungah tuangsakin Gihon-ah paipihsuk un.
Israel-te’ tungah kumpi-in tua lai munah siampi Zadok le kamsang Nathan sathau nilhsak un. Tua ciangin peengkul tum unla, ‘Kumpi Solomon khansau hen!’ ci un.

Tua ciangin ama nungah note nong pai ding uh a, amah hong pai-in ka kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keima tangin amah kumpi hi ding hi. Israel le Judah a ukpa dingin amah ka seh khinzo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in dawngin, “Hi tahen! Topa, ka to kumpipa’ Pasian in tua bangin kipsak tahen.
Topa in ka to kumpipa a ompih mah bangin Solomon zong ompih henla, ka to Kumpi David’ tokhom sangin ama tokhom liansak zaw hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Zadok, kamsang Nathan, Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah le Khereth mite le Peleth mite paisukin Kumpi David’ la-sakol tungah Solomon tuangsak uh a, Gihon-ah amah paipih uh hi.
Tua lai-ah siampi Zadok in puanbuk panin sathau biing la-in Solomon a nilh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in peengkul tum uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, “Kumpi Solomon khansau hen!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh ama nungah pai-in tamngaikop tum uh a, nakpitakin lungdam uh a, amau’ gamlumna in lei a thawnkham hi.

Adonijah le amah tawh a om leenglate khempeuh in a pawi bawl a man khit uh ciangin hih thu za uh hi. Joab in peengkul aw a zak ciangin amah in, “Khuapi sungah hih gamlumna bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah a kampau laitakin, siampi Abiathar’ tapa Jonathan hong pai hi. Tua ciangin Adonijah in, “Hong tum in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang migina na hi a, thuhoih nong puak hi,” a ci hi.
Jonathan in Adonijah dawngin, “Hilo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh i to kumpi David in kumpi-in Solomon bawl khin hi.
Kumpipa in amah tawh siampi Zadok, kamsang Nathan le Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah le Khereth mite le Peleth mite sawl khin hi. Amaute in kumpipa’ la-sakol tungah amah tuangsak khin uh hi.
Siampi Zadok le kamsang Nathan in Gihon-ah kumpi-in amah sathau nilh khin uh hi. Tua lai panin amaute lungdamin ciahkhin uh ahih manin khuapi sung gamlum hi. Nangma zak pen hih gamlumna ahi hi.
Tu-in Solomon in kumpi tokhom luah khinta hi.

Tua tham loin kumpipa’ nasemte i to Kumpi David tungah lungdamna a ko dingin pai uh a, ‘Na Pasian in nangma min sangin Solomon’ min a thang zaw-in bawl henla, nangma tokhom sangin ama tokhom a lian zaw-in bawl tahen,’ ci uh hi. A lupna tung panin kumpipa mahmah zong kun hi.
Kumpipa in zong, ‘Keima mit-a ka muhin keima suanlekhakte khat ka kumpi tokhom tungah a tu dingin tuni-in a pia Topa, Israel Pasian in thupha ngah tahen,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Adonijah’ leenglate khempeuh liing uh a, dingin amau’ mun ciatah a ciah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Adonijah in Solomon kihta hi. Amah pai-in biakna tau kite pom hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon kiangah, “Adonijah in Kumpi Solomon hong kihta hi. Amah in biakna tau kite lenin, ‘Amah in a nasem pa namsau tawh a thah loh nading kei tungah Kumpi Solomon hong kiciam masa hen,’ ci hi,” kici hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in, “Amah in a kilawm mi ahihna a lahtel theih leh ama samzang khat zong leilakah kia lo dinga, ahi zongin ama sungah gitlohna a kimuh leh amah si ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Solomon in mi sawl a, amaute in zong biakna tau panin amah pai khiatpih uh hi. Amah hong pai-in Kumpi Solomon’ tungah zahtakna bawl hi. Tua ciangin Solomon in ama kiangah, “Na inn-ah ciah in,” a ci hi.
David’ sih ding hun a nai ciangin amah in a tapa Solomon thuhilhin,
“Leitung mi khempeuh ngeina bangin a pai ding ka hi ta hi. Thakhauhin pasal na hihna kilangsak in.

Amah in kei tungah a hong gen, ‘Na tapate in a lungsim khempeuh uhleh a nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh keima mai-ah thuman takin gamtat ding limtakin a ngaihsut nak-uhleh Israel kumpi tokhom tungah khat beek in nang hong tamasak lo ding hi,’ ci-a a thugenna Topa in a kipsak theih nadingin, Moses thukham sungah a kigelh bangin Topa na Pasian’ thuhilhna zui-in, ama lampite hoihtakin tawn inla, ama thukhamte, a thupiakte, a biakna ngeina kipte hoihtakin zui in. Tua hileh na heksuk na hektohna khempeuh ah na dau hong pai ding hi.

“Tham loin, Zeruiah’ tapa Joab in kei hong bawlna, gal sunga a si mite’ phu a lakna-in gal kilem hun sungin a thah, Israel galkap ukte ahi mi nih, Ner’ tapa Abner le Jether’ tapa masa tungah a bawlna le, amah in mawhna nei lo mite thatin, tua ama gamtatna hangin ka thuaknate zong na thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nangma pilna bangin gamta inla, lungnuam takin sih ngeina tawh amah na sihsak loh ding thei in.

Ahih hangin Gilead mi Barzillai’ tapate tungah thuman takin gamta inla, na sabuai a an nete bangin amaute omsak in; bang hang hiam cih leh na sanggampa Absalom’ kiang panin ka tai lai-in amaute in tua bang thumanna tawh kei hong bawl uh hi.

Mahanaim ah ka pai lai-in a nasia samsiatna tawh kei a hong samsia, Bahurim panin a hong pai Benjamin mi Gera’ tapa Shimei zong nang tawh om hi. Ahih hangin Jordan-ah keimah a dawn dingin hong pai ciangin ama tungah Topa tawh kiciamin, ‘Namsau tawh nang kong that kei ding hi,’ ka ci hi.

Ahi ta zongin tu-in amah a mawhbaang loin ngaihsun kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang mipil na hi hi. Ama tungah na bawl dinga a kilawm na thei ngawn ding hi. Amah thatin a lutang hanah na paipihsuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David si a, David khuapi sungah kivui hi.
Israel-te tungah David in kum sawmli sung uk hi. Amah in Hebron-ah kum sagih sung ukin, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmthum le kum thum sung uk hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a pa David’ tokhom tungah Solomon tu a, ama kumpi gam kiptakin kiphut hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon’ nu Bathsheba kiangah David in Haggith tawh a neih a tapa Adonijah hong pai hi. Tua nu in, “Thunuama hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Thunuam hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Adonijah in, “Nang tungah gen ding khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Gen in,” a ci hi.

Adonijah in, “Kumpi gam pen keima-a’ hi-in, Israel-te khempeuh in keima uk ding a lamet mahmahna uh na thei hi. Ahi zongin kumpi gam kihei-in ka sanggampa-a’ suak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu pen Topa’ kiang pan ahi hi.
Tu-in nangma tung panin kong nget ding khat om hi; kei hong nial kei in,” a ci hi. Tua nu in ama kiangah, “Gen in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Kumpi Solomon kiangah nong ngetsak ding kong thum hi. Amah in nang’ thu hong nial lo ding hi. Shunem mi Abishag ka zi dingin kei tungah hong piak ding ka ut hi,” a ci hi.
Bathsheba in, “Hoih mahmah hi; kumpipa kiangah kong gensak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Adonijah tangin ama tungah thu a gen dingin Kumpi Solomon kiangah Bathsheba va pai hi. Tua ciangin tua nu a dawn dingin kumpipa dingin tua nu mai-ah a kun hi. Tua ciangin ama tokhom tungah tu-in kumpipa’ nu adingin tutna khat lasak hi. Tua nu ama taklamah a tu hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Nangma tungah na neuno khat nget ding ka nei hi; kei hong nial kei in,” a ci hi. Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Hong ngen in, nu aw; kong nial kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Shunem mi Abishag ama zi dingin na sanggampa Adonijah tungah kipia hen,” a ci hi.

Kumpi Solomon in a nu dawngin, “Bang hangin Adonijah adingin Shunem mi Abishag hong ngen na hi hiam? Kumpi gam zong ama adingin ngetsak lai vet in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah ka u hi a, ama lamah siampi Abiathar le Zeruiah’ tapa Joab pang hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon zong Topa tawh kiciamin, “Hih thu in Adonijah’ nuntakna a lei kei taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei tahen!

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, kei hong kipsakin ka pa David’ tokhom tungah hong koih a, ama ciamsa bangin kei tung le ka suanlekhakte tungah kumpi gam hong pia Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin, tuni-in Adonijah kithat ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Solomon in Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah sawl hi. Amah in tua pa satpuk sukin, tua ciangin amah a si hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Abiathar’ kiangah kumpipa in, “Nangma mun le nangma gam a omna Anathoth ah ciah in; bang hang hiam cih leh na sih ding a kilawm ahi hi. Ahih hangin nangmah in ka pa David’ mai-ah Topa Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang na puakna le ka pa’ gimna-ah na gimkhopna hangin tutungin nang kong that kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in Topa’ siampi hihna panin Abiathar hawl khia-in, Eli innkuan tawh kisai thu Topa in Shiloh-ah a genna thu tua bangin a tungsak hi.
Hih thu Joab kiang a tun ciangin Topa’ puanbukah Joab tai-in biakna tau kite a len hi. (Joab in Absalom pawlpih loin Adonijah a na pawlpihna hang ahi hi.)
Kumpi Solomon kiangah, “Topa’ puanbukah Joab tai hi,” ci-in a kigen ciangin Solomon in Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah sawlin, “Pai in; amah satpuk in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ puanbukah Benaiah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Kumpipa in thu hong pia a, ‘Hong pai khia in,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Hilo hi, hih lai-ah kei ka si zaw ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Benaiah in kumpipa kiangah thu puakin, “Tua bangin Joab in thu gen a, tua bangin amah in kei hong dawng hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in amah dawngkikin, “Ama cihsa bangin hih in; amah satlum inla phum in. Joab in thu om lopi-in mi a thahna hangin mawhna pen keima tung le ka suanlekhakte’ tung panin tua bangin na siangsak ding hi.

Topa in ama mawhna ama lu tung mahah tungsakkik ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa David’ theih loh kalin amah in Israel galkapte a uk Ner’ tapa Abner le Judah galkapte a uk Jether’ tapa Amasa, amah sangin thuman zaw-in a hoih zaw ahi mihing nih do-in namsau tawh a that hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mi thahna hangin gimna pen Joab’ lu tung le ama suanlekhakte’ lu tungah a tawntungin hong tungkik ding hi. Ahih hangin David’ tung, ama suanlekhakte’ tung, ama innkuan tung le ama kumpi tokhom tungah Topa’ kiang panin a tawntung nopna om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah paito-in amah satpuk sukin that a, gamlak ama inn sungah amah kiphum hi.
Kumpipa in Joab tangin galkapte’ tungah Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah koih a, kumpipa in Abiathar’ tangin siampi Zadok a koih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in mi sawlin Shimei samsakin ama kiangah, “Jerusalem-ah inn khat lamin tua lai-ah teeng inla, tua lai mun panin mun khat peuhpeuhah pai khia kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nang pai khia-in Kidron lui na kantan ni-in na sih ding teltakin thei in; na sih leh nangma khialhna hang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Shimei in kumpipa kiangah, “Na thugen hoih hi; ka to kumpipa’ gen bangin na nasem pa gamta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem-ah sauveipi sung Shimei om hi.
Ahih hangin kum thum a cin ciangin Gath kumpipa Maakah’ tapa Akhish kiangah Shimei’ silate nih va tai uh hi. Shimei’ kiangah, “En in, na silate Gath-ah om hi,” ci-in a kigen ciangin
Shimei dingin la khat a van vawhin a silate a zong dingin Gath-a Akhish kiangah pai a, Gath panin a silate a ciahpih hi.
Jerusalem panin Gath-ah Shimei pai-in a ciahkikna thu Solomon kiangah a kigen ciangin

kumpipa in mi sawlin Shimei samsakin ama kiangah, “Topa tawh hong kiciam sakin, thupi takin nang hong thuhilhin, ‘Nang, munkhat peuhpeuhah na pai khiat ni-in na sih ding teltakin thei in,’ hong ci hi lo ka hi hiam? Tua ciangin nangmah in, ‘Na thugen hoih hi; ka mang hi,’ na ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin Topa’ tungah na kiciamna le nang hong thuhilhin kong thupiakna zui lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua banah kumpipa in Shimei kiangah, “Ka pa David tungah siatna na bawlte khempeuh na lungsimah na thei hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in nangma siatna nangma lutung mahah hong tunkik ding hi.
Ahih hangin Kumpi Solomon thupha kipia-in, a tawntungin Topa’ mai-ah a tokhom kikipsak ding hi,” zong a ci lai hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah thu pia hi. Amah pai khia-in Shimei satpuk sukin, tua ciangin amah a si hi. Tua ahih ciangin Solomon’ khut sungah kumpi gam kikipsak hi.

Solomon in Egypt kumpipa Faro tawh numei-a kizopna bawl hi. Amah in Faro’ tanu la a, ama inn le Topa’ biakinn le Jerusalem kimkot a kulhpi a lam a zawh mateng David khuapi sungah tua nu paipihin omsak hi.
Ahi zongin Topa adingin biakinn kilam nai lo ahih manin mite in mual tunga biaknate-ah biakna pia uh hi.
Solomon in Topa itin, a pa David’ thukhamte zui hi. Ahi zongin amah in mual tunga biaknate-ah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal hi.

Tua ciangin biakna a pia dingin Gibeon-ah kumpipa pai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mual tunga biakna mun a lian pen ahi hi. Solomon in tua biakna tau tungah meihal biakna tam veipi tak a piaknasa mun ahi hi.
Gibeon-ah zanin mang sungah Solomon’ tungah Topa kilang hi. Pasian in, “Nang kong piak ding hong ngen in,” a ci hi.

Solomon in, “Na nasem ka pa David’ tungah a lian itna kip na lak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh cihtakna, thumanna tawh nangma mai-ah gamta-in, nangma tungah lungsim thutang hi. Nangmah in ama adingin hih a lian itna kip koihsakin, tuni-in ama tokhom tungah a tu ding tapa khat na pia hi.
Tu-in, Topa ka Pasian aw, kei pen naupangno khat hinapi-in ka pa David’ munah kumpi-in na nasem pa nong koih hi. Bangci gamtatin bangci nasep ding cih ka theih khat zong om lo hi.
A lian, a phazah a kisim zo lo, a tamna a kiseh thei lo, nangmah in na teelsa na mite lakah na nasem pa om hi.

Tua ahih ciangin keimah in a sia le a pha ka theih theih nadingin na mite uk nading thu theihtelna lungsim na nasem pa hong pia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih a lian a tam na mite kua in uk zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Solomon’ thungetna in Topa lungkimsak hi.

Pasian in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in hih thu hong ngenin, nangma adingin khansauna ahi a, hauhna ahi a, na galte thahzawh nading ahi zongin hong ngen loin, a man thu na theih nadingin nang adingin thu theihtelna hong ngen na hih manin,

en in, nangma hong ngetna bangin kong pia ding hi. En in, nangma hun ma-in nang tawh a kibang a om loh nading le nangma khitah zong nang tawh a kibang hong khan loh nadingin pilna le theihna lungsim kong pia ding hi.
Nangma hunsung tawntung kumpi dang nang tawh a kiteh theih loh nadingin nangma hong nget loh hauhna le pahtawina zong nang kong pia ding hi.
Na pa David in a tot bangin nangmah in ka lampite tawnin, ka thukhamte le ka thupiaknate na zuih nakleh na khan ka sausak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon khanglo a, hih pen a mang na hi hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah amah pai a, Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah amah dingin meihal biaknate le thunuama biaknate pia-in, a nasemte khempeuh adingin pawi khat a kham hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah numei paktat nih hong pai-in a mai-ah ding uh hi.
A numei khat in, “Aw, ka topa aw, hih numei le kei, inn khat sungah ka omkhawm uh hi; amah zong inn-ah a om sungin keimah in ta khat ka nei hi.
Ka ta neih khit nithum ni ciangin hih numei in zong ta hong nei hi. Ko gel bek a om ka hi uh a, kote tawh inn sungah kuamah dang om lo hi.
Amah in delhphahkha ahih manin zanin hih numei’ tapa a si hi.
Tua ciangin zankim laitakin amah tho-in, na nasem nu ka ihmut laitakin ka kiang panin ka tapa la-in ama ang-ah koih a, ama tapa si kei’ ang-ah hong koih hi.
Zingsangin ka ta nawi a pia dingin ka thawh ciangin, a sisa na hi hi. Ahih hangin limtakin ka et ciangin, amah pen keima sung pan a suak ta na hi lo hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a numei dang khat in, “Hilo hi; a hing naupang keima a’ hi a, a si naupang nangma a’ ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a masa nu in, “Hilo hi; a si naupang nangma a’ hi a, a hing naupang keima-a’ ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua bangin kumpipa’ mai-ah amau tegel in thu gen tuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Khat in, ‘A nungta pen keima tapa hi a, nangma tapa si hi,’ ci hi. Tua ciangin adang khat in, ‘Hilo hi; nangma tapa si a, keima tapa a hing pen ahi hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Namsau khat hong la un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ mai-ah namsau khat hong kipaipih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “A nungta naupang khen nih suah unla, khat tungah alang pia-in, adang khat tungah alang pia un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a tapa a nungta numei in a lungsimah a tapa khasiat ahih manin kumpipa kiangah, “Aw ka topa aw, a nungta naupang amah pia zaw in; bangbang hitaleh amah that kei in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a khat in, “Hih pen kei ka hi a, amah in ahi zongin tang thei lo ding hi; hong hawmsak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in dawngin, “A masa numei tungah naupang hing pia un; bangbang hitaleh that kei un; amah pen a nu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh in kumpipa’ piak thukhenna za uh hi. Thutang a sem dingin ama tungah Pasian in pilna pia hi, ci-in phawk uh ahih manin amaute in kumpipa lamdangsa-in a om uh hi.
Kumpi Solomon pen Israel mi khempeuh tungah kumpi hi a,
ama nuai-ah panmunte le a semte hih bang ahi hi: Siampi nasep: Zadok’ tapa Azariah ahi hi.
Lai-at nasep: Shisha’ tapa Eliho le Ahijah ahi uh hi. Thu ciamteh nasep: Ahilud’ tapa Jehoshafat ahi hi.
Galkapte a uk nasep: Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah ahi hi. Siampite nasep: Zadok le Abiathar ahi uh hi.
Uliante tungah a uk nasep: Nathan’ tapa Azariah ahi hi. Kumpi thu lamlak nasep: Nathan’ tapa Zabud ahi hi.
Kumpi inn uk nasep: Ahishar ahi hi. Aana tawh nasemte a uk nasep: Abda’ tapa Adoniram ahi hi.

Solomon in Israel khempeuh tungah ulian sawm le nih nei-in tuate in kumpipa le a innkuan adingin annek tuidawn vaihawmsak uh hi. Mi khat in kum khatin kha khat sung annek tuidawn vaihawmsak ciat uh hi.
Tua a vaihawm uliante: Benhur: Efraim mual tung gam sungah;
Bendeker: Makaz khua, Shaalbim, Bethshemesh khua le Elonbethhanan khua sungah;
Benhesed: Arubboth khua sungah (Soko le Hefer gam khempeuh ama a’ hi);
Benabinadab: Nafathdor gam sung khempeuh ah (amah in Solomon’ tanu Tafath zi-in nei hi);
Ahilud’ tapa Baana: Taanak khua, Megiddo khua le Jezreel khua nuai Zarethan khua panga om Bethshean gam khempeuh le Bethshean khua panin Jokmeam khua le Abelmeholah dongah;
Bengeber: Ramoth-gilead gam sungah (amah in Gilead sunga om Manasseh’ tapa Jair’ khuaneute le Bashan sungah a om Argob gam sung, kulhpite le sumngo zawlte a nei khuapi lian sawmguk nei hi);
Iddo’ tapa Ahinadab: Mahanaim khua sungah;
Ahimaaz: Naftali gam sungah (amah in Solomon’ tanu Basemath zi-in la hi);
Hushai’ tapa Baana: Asher gam le Bealoth khua sungah;
Paruah’ tapa Jehoshafat: Issakhar gam sungah;
Ela’ tapa Shimei: Benjamin gam sungah;
Uri’ tapa Gebal: Amor mite’ kumpi Sihon le Bashan kumpi Og gam ahi Gilead gam sungah ahi hi. Tua ciangin hih sawm le nihte banah Judah gam sung khempeuh a uk ulian khat omlai hi.
Judah mi le Israel mi tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin tam uh a, amaute in anne tuidawnin lungdam uh hi.
Solomon in Eufratis panin Filistia gam le Egypt gamgi ciang dong kumpi gam khempeuh uk hi. Amaute in siah hong puak uh a, a nuntak sung tawntung uh Solomon’ na sem uh hi.
Solomon ading ni khatin annek tuidawn, annel lawh sawmthum le an lawh sawmguk,
bawngtal a thau sawm le lonona a kivak bawng sawmnih; tuu zakhat; sakhitalte le Syria sakhite, sanangte le a thau vasate a kisim lo hi lai hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Eufratis nitumna lam gam sung khempeuh Tifsah panin Gaza ciang dong, Eufratis nitumna lampang kumpi khempeuh uk a, ama kiim mun khempeuh ah galdaihna om hi.
Solomon’ hun sung khempeuh Judah le Israel lungmuang takin omin, Dan panin Beersheba ciang dong nangawn mi khempeuh a leenggui le a theikung nuai uhah lungnuamin om uh hi.
Solomon in a leengte adingin buk a nei ciat sakol tulsawmli le sakol tung tuang mi tulsawm le tulnih zong nei hi.
Tua uliante in Kumpi Solomon le Kumpi Solomon’ sabuai-ah a hong pai mite khempeuh adingin amau ciat sik kha sunga dingin annek tuidawn vaihawm uh a, amaute in bangmah kisamsak lo uh hi.
Amau’ nasep ciat tawh kizui-in a kisapna munah sakolte le sakol zaptelte adingin mangbuhham le buhtu zong paipih uh hi.
Pasian in Solomon’ tungah tehzawh lohin a thuk mahmah pilna le theihna le genzawh loh lungsim zaina pia a,
Solomon’ pilna in nisuahna lam mi khempeuh le Egypt pilna khempeuh khumlet hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh midang khempeuh sangin amah pil zaw a, Ezrah mi Ethan le Mahol’ tapa Heman, Kalkol le Darda sangin pil zaw lai a, a kiima minam khempeuh lakah ama minthanna kizel hi.
Amah in paunak tulthum zong gen khia a, ama laphuah dawng tul le dawng nga ahi hi.
Amah in Lebanon-a om taamtak a kipan phungmai a po puknahte dongin singkung thu a gen hi. Amah in khe li nei ganhingte, vasate, a bokvak ganhingte le ngasate’ thu a gen hi.
Mi khempeuh le leitung kumpi khempeuh sung panin Solomon’ pilna thu a ngai dingin ama pilna thu a za ngeisate hong pai uh hi.
Amaute in ama pa’ munah kumpi-in amah sathau a nilhna thu a zak ciangin Taia kumpi Hiram in a nasemte Solomon kiangah sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hiram in David it tawntung hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Hiram kiangah kam khak a,
“Topa in ama khenuai-ah amaute a koihsak matengin amah a umcih a galte tawh kidona hangin ka pa David in Topa ama Pasian’ min dingin biakinn a lam theih lohna thu na thei hi.
Ahih hangin tu-in Topa ka Pasian in na khempeuh ah tawlngakna kei tungah hong pia hi. Hong langpang ahi a, thusia ahi zongin om lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in ka pa David kiangah, ‘Nangma tangin na kumpi tokhom tungah ka koih ding na tapa in ka min dingin biakinn lam ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin Topa ka Pasian’ min dingin biakinn khat lam ka sawm hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Lebanon taamtak singte kei adingin a kiphukna ding thu pia in; ka nasemte in nangma nasemte seppih ding uh a, nangma seh bangin na nasemte’ thaman ding nang tungah kong pia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Sidon mite bangin singsuih a siam kote lakah khat zong a om lohna na thei hi,” a ci hi.
Hiram in Solomon’ kam a zak ciangin nakpitakin lungdam a, “Hih a lian a tam mite a uk dingin David’ tungah a pil tapa a pia Topa in tuni-in thupha ngah tahen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hiram in Solomon kiangah mi sawlin, “Kei kiangah nong thu-khak ka za hi. Taamtak sing le taaksan sing tawh kisai na deih khempeuh a hih dingin ka kiging hi.

Ka nasemte in Lebanon panin tuipi-ah tuate hong puaksuk ding uh hi. Nangma cihna munah a pai dingin tuipi a tawn dingin keimah in tuate phongin ka bawl dinga, tua lai munah keimah in a singte phelsakin nangmah in na ngah ding hi. Nangmah in ka mite ading anpiakna tawh ka deihnate nong kicingsak ding hi,” cisak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Hiram in ama deih taamtak le taaksan singte Solomon pia a,
Solomon in Hiram tungah a mite’ an dingin mangbuh beem tulsawmnih le oliv thau bungpi tulsawmnih dim a pia hi. Solomon in Hiram’ tungah a kum kumin hihte a pia hi.
Ama tungah a ciam bangin Topa in Solomon tungah pilna pia hi. Solomon le Hiram kilem uh a, amau tegel in thuciamna khat a bawl uh hi.
Kumpi Solomon in Israel sung panin aana tawh na a sem mite la hi. A lak mite mihing tulsawmthum pha hi.
Amah in Lebanon-ah tua mite kha khatin tulsawm a kikhelin puak hi. Amaute Lebanon-ah kha khat omin inn-ah kha nih om ding uh hi. Adoniram in hih a kila mite uk hi.
Solomon in vanpua mi tulsawmsagih le mual tung gamah suangseek mi tul sawmgiat zong nei a,
na a sem mite a uk, Solomon’ nuai-ah ulian tulthum le zathum, nasep ukte a kihel lo ahi hi.
Suangseeksa tawh biakinn bulpi a phuh theih nadingin kumpipa’ thupiakna tawh amaute in a lian, a manpha suangtumte to khia uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin biakinn lam nadingin Solomon’ mi innlamte le Hiram’ mi innlamte le Gebal mite in sing phuk le singlesuang nasep a sem uh hi.
Egypt gam panin Israel mite a pai khiat zawh kum zali le kum sawmgiatna, Israel-te tungah Solomon’ uk a kum lina, a kha nihna ahi Ziv kha-in amah in Topa’ biakinn lam ding kipan hi.
Kumpi Solomon in Topa adingin a lam biakinn, a sung pi sawmkua sau-in, pi sawmthum zai a, pi sawm le nga sang hi.
Biakinn mai-ah a innliim pen biakinn zaina zahin pi sawmthum sau a, inn mai lamah pi sawm le nga sang hi.
Tua ciangin amah in biakinn adingin a pualam a kihui tawlette a bawl hi.
Amah in biakinn pang tuak le a nunglam biakinn kawm kimkotin a kawm tungah zong innlam a, a kimkot a pangah inndei bawl hi.

A dawl nuainung pen pi sagih le alang zai-in, a laita pi kua zai a, a thumna pi sawm le alang zai hi. Kawm sungah innkam a lut loh nadingin amah in inn pualam pang kimkota dingin a nanna singbekte a bawl hi.

Biakinn a kilam ciangin a kitawhna mun panin a kibawlsa suangte tawh kilam hi. Tua ahih manin a kilam laitakin hei ahi a, sek ahi a, sik nazat khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a gingte biakinn huang sungah kiza lo hi.
A dawl nuainung lut nading pen biakinn leitaw lampangah om hi. A dawl laita-ah kahlei zui-in kipai-in a dawl laita panin a thumna-ah kipai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in biakinn lamin a zo hi. Amah in innkamte khungin taamtak peekte tawh inndap a bawl hi.
Amah in a inn buppi tungah a lambehte zomin, dawlkhat ciangin pi sagih le alang sang ciat a, taamtak singte-in a biakinn tawh kizom hi.
Tu-in Topa’ thu Solomon’ tungah hong tunga,

“Nangmah in na lam hih biakinn tawh kisai-in, ka thukhamte zui-in ka ngeina kipte mang a, ka thupiaknate khempeuh kemin tuate na zuih leh, na pa David tungah ka gen thu nang’ tungah kong kipsak ding hi.
Tua ciangin na lam biakinn sung Israel mite lakah ka teeng dinga, keima mi Israel-te ka nusia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in biakinn lamin a zo hi.
Amah in taamtak peekte tawh biakinn sung kawm dap hi. Sual panin inndap innsunte dongin amah in sing tawh a sunglam tuam hi. Tua ciangin amah in taaksan peekte tawh a sual tuam hi.
Amah in sual panin innsun dong inn nunglam pi sawmthum taamtak peekte tawh lam a, amah in siangtho pen mun, biakinn sung nung dingin a inn sungah a bawl hi.
Biakinn sung nung mai-a inn sung, pi sawmguk sau hi.
Inn sunga om taamtak singte tungah umgah le pakpalh lim kigelh hi. A vekpi-in taamtak a kidap hi a, suang kimu lo hi.
Amah in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang koih nadingin a sungtawng pen ah biakinn sung nung a bawl hi.
Biakinn sung nung, pi sawmthum sau-in, pi sawmthum mah zai a, pi sawmthum mah sang a, amah in kham citak tawh a zut hi. Amah in taamtak sing biakna tau khat zong a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in kham citak tawh inn sung zut a, biakinn sung nung mai kantanin kham khainiang khung a, kham tawh a zut hi.
Amah in a inn buppi a zawh dongin kham tawh a zut hi. Biakinn sung nung a biakna tau buppi zong amah in kham tawh a zut hi.
Amah in biakinn sung nungah oliv sing tawh kherub nih bawl a, pi sawm le nga tuak a sang hi.
Kherub kha langkhat, pi sagih le alang sau-in, kherub kha lang dang khat, pi sagih le alang mah sau a, a kha langkhat mong panin a mong langkhat dong pi sawm le nga ahi hi.
Kherub adang khat zong pi sawm le nga mah sau a, Kherub tegel a sauna le a pianlim kibang hi.
Kherub khat a sauna pi sawm le nga hi a, a kherub dang khat zong tua zah mah ahi hi.

Amah in biakinn sung tawngnung pen ah kherub-te a koih hi. Kherub-te’ khate kizal a, khat’ kha in kawm banin, adang kherub’ kha in a kawm langkhat ban hi. Amau’ kha langkhat tegel inn laizangah kituah hi.
Amah in kham tawh tua kherub-te a zut hi.
Amah in a sung nung le a pua nung inndeite, a kimkotin inn kawm khempeuh tungah kherub-te le nisuh kungte le pakpalhte a bawl hi.
A sung nung le a pua nung inndei sung innsualte amah in kham tawh a zut hi.
Biakinn sung nung lut nadingin amah in oliv sing kongkhak peekte a bawl hi; a baang tung zawl le kongkhak khuamte in kiu nga piangsak hi.
Amah in kherub-te, nisuh kungte le pakpalh lim kibawlte tawh oliv sing kongkhak peek nihte a tuam hi; amah in tuate kham tawh zut a, kherub-te le nisuh kungte tungah kham a theh hi.
Tua bangmahin amah in kiu li nei-in biakinn sung lutna oliv sing kongkhak khuamte,
le taaksan sing kongkhak peek nihte a bawl hi. Kongkhak a peek nihte kikhepin, adang kongkhak a peek nihte zong kikhep hi.
Tuate tungah amah in kherub-te le nisuh kungte le pakpalhte bawl a, tua a bawlte tungah a tukimin kham tawh a zut hi.
Amah in a kiseek suang gual thum le taamtak sing gual khat tawh a tual sung nung a bawl hi.
A kum lina, Ziv kha-in Topa’ biakinn a bulpi kipan hi.
A kum sawm le kum khatna, a kha giatna ahi Bul kha-in a na khempeuh le a kigen khempeuh bangin a kizo hi. Amah in tua a lamna-in kum sagih sung hun a bei hi.
Solomon in ama inn ding zong kum sawm le kum thum sung lamin a inn buppi a zo hi.

Amah in Lebanon Tulak Inn a kici khat a lam hi. A sauna pi zalesawmnga hi a, a zaina pi sawmsagih le nga hi-in, a sanna pi sawmli le nga hi a, taamtak khuampi gual thum tungah taamtak innkam kikhungin tua tungah a kilam ahi hi.
Gual khatah sawm le nga a om khuampi sawmli le nga tunga kilam inndei tung san teng taamtak sing tawh kituam hi.
A pang kawm tegel tungah tawlet gual thum tuak om a, a tawlet gual thumte khatlekhat kitang hi.
A kongkhakte le a tawlet khempeuhte a pang kikim kiu li nei vive hi a, a gual thumin tawlet khatlekhat kitang dimdiam hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Khuampi Innpi a kici khat lam hi. A sauna pi sawmsagih le nga hi a, a zaina pi sawmli le nga ahi hi. A mai lamah khuampite a nei innliim om a, tua khuampite tungah a tungkhuhna khat om hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a thukhen nading mun Thukhenna Innpi ahi Kumpi Tokhom Innpi a kici khat lam a, a sual panin a innsun ciang dong taamtak sing kizang hi.
Kumpi Tokhom Innpi nung lamah ama ten nading inn zong tua mah bangin a kilam ahi hi. Solomon in zi-a a lak Faro’ tanu adingin hih innpi tawh a kibang inn dang khat zong a lam hi.

Hihte khempeuh, a bulpi nangawn a kipan a khum dong le Topa’ biakinn tual a kipan tual lianpi dongin, limtakin tehin, a kitan, a nung le a mai suangatna tawh a ki-at a manpha suangte tawh a kibawl ahi hi.
A bulpi pen a manpha suang, suang lian, pawlkhat pi sawm le nih, pawlkhat pi sawm le nga a pha suangte ahi hi.
Tuate’ tung ate pen limtakin tehin a kitan a manpha suang le taamtak sing ahi hi.
Tual lianpi in a kimkotah a kiseek suang gual thum simin taamtak sing gual khat nei hi. Tua mah bangin Topa’ biakinn tual sung nung le innliim in zong a nei hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon in mi sawlin Taia khua-a om Huram samsak hi.

Amah pen Naftali minam meigongnu’ tapa hi a, ama pa pen Taia khuami sumngo seek na a sempa ahi hi. Amah in sumngo tawh na khat peuhpeuh hih nadingin pilna, theihna, siamna a nei ahi hi. Kumpi Solomon kiangah amah hong pai-in ama na khempeuh a sem hi.

Amah in sumngo khuampi nih sung hi. Khuampi khat a sauna pi sawmnih le sagih hi a, a khuam pum kimkot pi sawm le giat pha hi. A sung hawm a, a sahna zung li ahi hi. A khuam nihna zong tua mah tawh kibang hi.
Khuampite tungah a bulh dingin amah in a kisung sumngo khuamluzepna nih zong a bawl hi. Khuamluzepna khat a sauna pi sagih le alang hi a, adang khat khuamluzepna a sauna tua zah mah ahi hi.

Tua ciangin amah in khuampite lu dawna khuamluzepna adingin khainiang a kihuiheek tawh a kibawl ngen banga kikalh simsiam nih a bawl hi. Ngen khat pen khuamluzepna khat ading hi a, a ngen dang khat pen khuamluzepna adang khat ading ahi hi.

Tua mah bangin amah in mang kawlsing gahte a bawl hi. Khuampi lu dawna om khuamluzepna tuam nadingin ngen tawh kibangin a bawl tung kimkotah gual nih bawl a, a khuamluzepna dang khat zong tua mah bangin a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin innlim a om khuampi dawnah a om khuamluzepnate pi guk pha a, tuate tungah unok pak a kibawlte om hi.

A khuamluzepnate pen a khuampi nihte tung le ngen tawh kibanga kibawl gei-a a om a bem a dawk tungah om hi. A kimkotah gual nihin mang kawlsing gah zanih om a, a khuamluzepna dang khatah zong tua bangmah ahi hi.
Amah in biakinn innlimah khuampite a phut hi. Leitaw lamah a khuam khat phutin a min Jakhin phuak a, leilu lamah a khuam dang khat phutin a min Boaz a phuak hi.
A khuampite dawnah unok pak a kibawl om hi. Tua bangin khuampite a bawl a man khin hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kisung tuikuangpi a bawl hi. Tua tuikuang a bem hi a, a gei khat pan a gei khat pi sawm le nga pha-in, pi sagih le alang thuk a, a kimkot pi sawmli le nga a pha hi.
A geivial nuai pi sawmli le nga sung, tuikuangpi kimkotin um gahte kibawl hi. Tua um gahte gual nihin om a, a tuikuangpi a kisunin kisung khawm pah hi.

Bawngtal sawm le nihte tungah tua tuikuangpi kinga a, thum leilu lam nga a, thum nitumna lam nga-in, thum leitaw lam nga a, thum nisuahna lam a nga hi. Tuate tungah a tuikuangpi kikoih a, a nunglam uh a sunglamah om hi.
A tuikuang sahna khutpeekmai cia ahi hi. A geivial pen unok pak tawh a kibang hai geivial bangin kibawl hi. Tua sungah tui tambong tulli bang ta thei hi.
Amah in sumngo kibawl tuikuang a kingakna sawm zong a bawl hi. Tua a bawlte pi guk sau, pi guk zai, pi li le alang sang hi.
Tua a kingaknate hih bangin kibawl hi: Tuate in a khawkte nei-in, tua a khawkte a kungah kibulh a,
tua ciangin a kungah a kibulh a khawkte tungah humpinelkaite, bawngtalte le kherub-te om hi. Tua kungte tung, humpinelkaite le bawngtalte’ tung le nuai-ah a sawi-in a kikalh limliam om hi.
