Tua tham loin tua ngaknate in sumngo tawh a kibawl leengpeite le leengpei zawlte nei ciat a, a kiu lite-ah tuikuangpi nannate om hi. Tua nannate a kisung hi a, a pang ciatah pakkual om hi.
A gong pen a kingakna pan pi khat le alang sangto hi. A gong pen kingakna a kibawl bangin bem a, pi nih le letmat thum thuk hi. A gongah lim kigelhte om hi. A khawkte in sikli nei a, bem lo hi.
A leengpei lite pen a khawkte’ nuai-ah om hi. Leengpei zawlte a kingakna tawh sakhat mah hi a, leengpei a sanna pi nih le letmat thum ahi hi.
A peite pen sakol leengpei bangin kibawl hi; a pei zawl, a peikual, a peikalhna le a kalhna bulte khempeuh a kisung ahi hi.
A kingaknate’ kiu ciatah a nanna li om ciat a, tua a nannate a ngakna tawh sakhat ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a ngakna dawnah letmat kua a sang vial bem khat om hi. A ngakna dawnah a kipsaknate le a khawkte pen a ngakna tawh sakhat ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a kipsaknate le a khawkte tungah a mun awng zah ciat tawh kizui-in amah in kherub-te, humpinelkaite le nisuh kungte gelhin a kimkotah pakkual a bawl hi.
Tu-a bangin amah in a kingakna sawm bawl hi. A vekpi-in a kibangin kisungin, a liatna le a pianlim a kibang ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amah in sumngo tuikuang sawm bawl hi. Tuikuang khatah tui tambong sawmgiat bang ta-in, tuikuang vangsung pi guk ciat pha a, a kingakna sawmte adingin tuikuang khat ciat om hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tua a kingaknate, biakinn leitaw lamah nga, leilu lamah nga a koih hi. Tua ciangin biakinn khang nisuahna lam kiu-ah tuikuangpi a koih hi.
Huram in beelte, kawbiate le kuangte zong a bawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin Huram in Kumpi Solomon adingin Topa’ biakinn a ding nasep khempeuh a zo hi.
Khuampi nihte, khuampite dawnah a om khuamluzepna kuak nihte le khuampite dawnah a om khuamluzepna kuak nihte tuam nading ngen tawh a kibanga kibawl nihte;
khuampite tungah a om khuamluzepna nihte a tuam dingin ngen tawh a kibanga kibawl khat adingin mang kawlsing gah gual nih ahi, ngen tawh a kibanga kibawl nih adingin mang kawlsing gah za lite;
a kingakna sawmte le a kingaknate tungah a om tuikuang sawmte;
tuikuangpi khat le tuikuangpi nuai-ah a om bawngtal sawm le nihte ahi hi.
Tu-in beelte, kawbiate le kuangte, Huram in Kumpi Solomon adingin a bawl, Topa’ biakinn sungah a om nazatte khempeuh a tee sumngo tawh a kibawl ahi hi.
Jordan zanglei, Sukkoth le Zarethan kikal beel lei-ah kumpipa in tua nate sungsak hi.
Tamlua ahih manin Solomon in hih nate khempeuh tawiteh zo lo hi; sumngo gik zah kithei lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ biakinn sunga om nazat khempeuh Solomon in bawl hi. Kham biakna tau, Ompihna Anlum adingin kham sabuai,
biakinn sung nung mai, leitaw lampangah nga omin, leilu lampangah nga a om kham citak meivakkhuamte; kham tawh a kibawl paakte, meivakte le taitehte;
paknamtui adingin haite, taitehte, kuangte, pakante le kham citak vutluahna; le siangtho pen mun biakinn sung tawngnung kongkhakte le biakinn sung kongkhakte adingin kham bilte ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Solomon in Topa’ biakinn a hih nasep khempeuh kizo hi. Tua ciangin Solomon in a pa David’ apsa nate, ngun, kham le nazatte paipihin Topa’ biakinn sung vankoihna-ah tuate a koih hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon in Zion a kici David khuapi panin Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang la-in Biakinn sungah a paipih dingin Jerusalem khua sung ama kiangah Israel upate le minam lutang, Israel beh makaite a khawm hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh a kha sagihna Ethanim kha sunga pawi hunin Kumpi Solomon kiangah kikhawm uh hi.
Israel upate khempeuh hong pai uh a, siampite in Thuciamna Singkuang la-in Biakinn-ah paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in kikhopna buk le puanbuk sunga om a siangtho nazatte khempeuh a paipih uh hi. Siampite le Levi mite in tuate paipihto uh hi.
Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah a kikhawm Kumpi Solomon le Israel mihonte khempeuh in biakna-in tuu le bawngtalte tampi tak pia uh ahih manin tuate a phazah kisim zo lo hi.
Tua ciangin siampite in a kherub-te’ kha nuai, siangtho pen mun sung, biakinn sung nung lama ama munah Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang paipih uh hi.
Kherub-te in Thuciamna Singkuang omna mun tungah a kha uh zak ahih manin Thuciamna Singkuang le a zawlte tungah kherub-te in khuhna piangsak uh hi.
A zawlte sau mahmah ahih manin biakinn sung nung mai siangtho mun panin a zawl mongte kimu a, ahih hangin a pualam panin kimu thei lo hi. Tuni dongin tua san takah tuate om hi.
Tua Thuciamna Singkuang sungah, Egypt gam panin a pai khiat lai-un Topa in Israel mite tawh thuciamna a bawlna Horeb-ah Moses in suangpek nih a koih sim loh bangmah dang om lo hi.
Siangtho mun panin siampite a pai khiat ciangin meii in Topa’ biakinn tuam a,
meii hangin siampite nasem dingin om thei lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ minthanna vang in Topa’ biakinn a tuam hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in, “Topa in vantungah ni koih khin a, ahih hangin khuamial sahpi sungah amah a ten ding gen khin hi.
Keimah in nangma adingin a kipahtawi mun khat, na ten tawntung nading biakinn khat ka lam khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel a kikhawmte a din laitakin kumpipa in en kawikawi-in Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh thupha a pia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “‘Egypt panin ka mi Israel-te ka pai khiatpih a kipanin keima min a om theih nadingin biakinn khat lamna ding Israel minam khempeuh sungah khuapi khat zong ka teel kei hi. Ahih hangin ka mi Israel-te tungah a uk dingin David ka teel hi,’ ci-in ka pa David tungah a kam tawh a ciamsa a tungsak Israel Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah tahen.
Israel Pasian, Topa’ min dingin biakinn khat lam ding ka pa David’ lungsim sungah om ngei hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in ka pa David kiangah, ‘Keima min dingin biakinn khat lam ding na lungsim sungah a omna thu a hoih mahmah ahi hi.
Ahi zongin nangmah in a biakinn na lam kei dinga, nangma sung pan hong suak ding na tapa in ka min dingin biakinn a lam ding hi,’ a ci hi.

Tu-in ama bawlsa thuciamna Topa in tungsak khin hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa David’ munah keimah khangin, Topa’ ciamsa bangin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah ka tu a, Israel Pasian, Topa’ min dingin a biakinn ka lam khin hi.
Amah in Egypt leitang panin amaute a pai khiatpih lai-in amah in i pu i pate tawh a bawl Topa’ thuciamna a omna Thuciamna Singkuang adingin tua lai-ah mun khat ka bawlsak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh a omna Topa’ mai-ah Solomon dinga, vantung lamah a khutte zak hi.

Amah in, “Israel Pasian, Topa aw, tunga om vantung ahi a, nuai-a om leitungah ahi zongin, nangma mai-ah a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh a gamta na nasemte tungah thuciamna lenin itna kip a lak, nang tawh a kibang pasian om lo hi.
Na nasem ka pa David tungah na gensa thu na kipsak hi. Nangmah in na kam tawh na gen a, tuni-in na tungsak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel Pasian, Topa aw, ama tungah, ‘Keima mai-ah nang na gamtat mah bangin na tapate in keima mai-ah gamtat ding a kidop nak-uhleh, Israel kumpi tokhom tungah a tu dingin keima mai-ah mi khat zong na tasam kei ding hi,’ ci-in na nasem ka pa David tungah na ciamsa thu lenkip in.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel Pasian aw, na nasem ka pa David tungah na gensa thu kipsak in.

“Ahih hangin leitungah Pasian teeng taktak ding ahi hiam? Vantung le vantung a sang pen in nang hong huam zo lo hi. Tua ahih manin keima lamsa hih biakinn in bangzahin nang hong huam zo lo zaw kan ding ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin na nasem pa’ thungetna le a hong thumna hong don inla, Topa ka Pasian aw, tuni-in nangma mai-ah na nasem pa in a hong ngetna, a kikona le a thungetna hong ngai in.
‘Tua lai-ah ka min om ding hi,’ na cihna mun hih biakinn lamah sun le zanin na mit hak inla, na nasem pa in hih mun lamah a thungetna hong za in.
Amaute in hih mun lamah hong nget uh ciangin na mi Israel-te’ hong thumna zong ngai in. Na tenna mun vantung panin hong za inla, ka mawhna uh hong maisak in.
“Mi khat a veengpa tungah khialin, amah a kiciamsak a, amah hong pai-in hih biakinn sung nangma biakna tau mai-ah a kiciam leh,

nangmah in vantung panin za-in gamta inla, na nasemte thu khen inla, a mawh pa thuak sakin ama lu tung mahah ama gamtatna tungsak inla, a dikpa a dikna langsakin ama dikna tawh kizui-in thaman pia in.

“Nangma tungah hong khialhna hangin galte mai-ah na mi Israel-te a guallelh ciangin, amaute nang lamah hong kiheikikin nangma min hong phawk a, hih biakinn sungah thu ngenin nang tungah hong thum uhleh,
vantung panin za-in na mi Israel-te’ khialhna maisak inla, a pu a pate uh tungah na piak leitangah amaute paipihkik in.
“Nangma tungah hong khialhna hangin vantung kikhakcipin guah a zuk loh ciangin, amaute in hih mun lamah thu ngenin na min hong phawk a, amaute na gimsak ciangin amau’ khialhna panin a kihei uhleh,
vantung panin za-in na mi Israel, na nasemte’ khialhna maisak inla, amaute’ zuih ding lampi hoih hilh inla, na mite tungah gamh-in na piaksa leitang tungah guah zusak in.

“Gam sungah kialpi tungin, pulnatna ahi a, ankung natna ahi a, ankung zawngkhalna ahi a, kauphe ahi a, lung ahi zongin a om a, amau’ khuapi khat peuhpeuh a galte un umcihin, bangbang gimna, bangbang natna hitaleh,
mi khatpeuh ahi a, na mi Israel-te khempeuh in ahi zongin amau’ lungsim natna thei-in hih biakinn lamah a khutte hong zanin bangbang thungetna hitaleh bangbang thumna hitaleh hong bawl uhleh,

na tenna vantung panin za-in maisak in. Tua ciangin amau’ gamtatna khempeuh tawh kizui-in a lungsim uh na theih bangin amaute tungah pia ciat in (bang hang hiam cih leh nang, nang bek in mihing khempeuh lungsim na thei hi).
Tua hileh ka pu ka pate uh tungah na piak leitang tungah a nuntak hun sung khempeuh uh amaute in nang hong zahtak ding uh hi.
“Tua mah bangin na mi Israel a hi lo gamdang mi khat nangma min hangin a gamlapi panin hong pai-in
(bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a lian nangma minthanna le nangma mite adingin na sepsak na liante’ thu za ding uh hi), hih biakinn lamah thu hong nget ciangin,

na tenna vantung panin za inla, tua gamdang mipa in nang tungah hong ngetna khempeuh tawh kizui-in hih in. Nangma mi Israel-te mah bangin leitung mi khempeuh in na min thei-in nang hong zahtak nading le hih ka lamsa biakinn pen nangma min tawh a kilo ahihna a theih nading uh ahi hi.
“A galte uh a do dingin na mite kuan khia-in, bangbang lamah amaute sawl hita lecin, nangmah in na teelsa khuapi lam, Topa’ tung le nangma min dingin ka lamsa biakinn lamah thu hong nget uh ciangin,
amau’ hong thungetna le hong thumna vantung panin za-in amau’ vai huh in.

“Amaute nang tungah hong khialin - bang hang hiam cih leh mi a khial lo kuamah om lo hi - amaute tungah nang heh a, galte tungah amaute pia-in, amaute kimanin a galte’ gam a gamla ahi a, a nai-ah ahi zongin kipuakhia a,

ahi zongin amaute a kipuak khiatna leitangah amaute in a lungsim uhah thu ngaihsunin kisikkik a, ‘Kote khialin lampialin ka gitloh tat uh hi,’ ci-in amaute a mante’ leitang panin nang tungah hong thum uh a,

amaute manin a pua khia a galte uh leitangah a ngaihsutna khempeuh uh le a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amaute kisikkikin, nangmah in na teelsa khuapi, amau’ pute pate’ tungah na piaksa amau’ leitang le nangma min dingin ka lam biakinn lam nga-in nangma tungah thu hong nget uhleh
vantung na tenna mun panin amau’ hong thungetna le hong thumna za-in, amau’ vai huh in.

Nang tungah hong khial na mite le nang tunga hong gamtatna uh amau’ thupalsatnate khempeuh maisakin, a galte un amaute tungah hehpihna a neih theih nadingun amaute manin a pua khia mite’ muhna-ah amaute hehpih in.
(Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Egypt panin na pai khiatpih, sik meiphual sung panin na pai khiatpih nangma mi le nangma luah ahi uh hi.)
Na nasem pa’ hong thumna le na mi Israel-te’ hong thumna-ah maipha tawh hong en tawntung inla, nang hong sap peuhmah uh ciangin amaute na bil na ngat in.
Egypt panin ka pate uh na pai khiatpih lai-in na nasem pa Moses tungtawnin na gen bangin nangma luah ahi dingin leitung mi khempeuh lak panin amaute na teng khia hi, Topa Pasian aw,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Solomon in hih thungetna le thumnate khempeuh Topa’ tungah a bawl khit ciangin, vantung lamah a khutte a zan sa-in a khukdinna mun Topa’ biakna tau mai panin amah dingto hi.
Tua ciangin amah dingin awging pha tawh Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh thupha pia-in,

“Ama hong ciamsa khempeuh tawh kizui-in ama mi Israel-te tungah tawlngakna a pia Topa in thupha ngah tahen! A nasem pa Moses tungtawnin a gensa ama thuciam hoihte khempeuh kam khat zong maimawk lo hi.
I pu i pate a ompih mah bangin Topa i Pasian in eite hong ompih henla, eite hong nusia kei henla, hong taisan kei hen.
Amah in i pu i pate a thupiaksa ahi ama lampi khempeuh a zui ding le ama thupiaknate, a thukhamte le a ngeina kipte a zui dingin ama lamah i lungsim hong awnsak hen.
Topa’ mai-ah ka thumna kammalte sun le zanin Topa i Pasian in hong za henla, nisimin a kisam bangin a nasem pa’ vai le ama mi Israel-te’ vai hong huh tahen.
Tua hileh mi khempeuh in Topa pen Pasian hi, ci-in thei ding uh a, kuamah dang a om lohna phawk ding uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa i Pasian’ tungah na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh thuman unla, tuni-a bangin ama thukhamte zui-in a thupiaknate mang un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa le amah tawh a om Israel mi khempeuh in Topa’ mai-ah biakna a pia uh hi.
Solomon in thunuama biakna-in Topa’ tungah bawngtal tul sawmnih le tulnih le tuu tul zakhat le tul sawmnih a pia hi. Tua bangin kumpipa le Israel mi khempeuh in Topa’ biakinn a ap uh hi.

Tua ni mahin kumpipa in Topa’ biakinn mai-a om inntual laizang ap hi; bang hang hiam cih leh meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le thunuama biakna a thaute a ta zo dingin Topa’ mai-a sumngo biakna tau neulua ahih manin tua lai-ah meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le thunuama biakna thaute a pia hi.
Tua hi a, tua hun lai-in Solomon le amah tawh a om Israel mi khempeuh in Topa i Pasian’ mai-ah ni sagih sung, Hamath khua lutna panin Egypt lui dong kikhopna lianpi khat bawlin pawi khat kham uh hi.

A ni giat ni-in amah in mite ciahsak hi. Amaute in kumpipa thupha pia uh a, Topa in a nasem pa David le ama mi Israel-te tungah hoihna a lahnate khempeuh hangin lungdamna le lungsim kipahna tawh a inn ciat uhah a ciah uh hi.
Solomon in Topa’ biakinn le kumpi inn le a lamnop khempeuh a lam a man khit ciangin,
Gibeon-a ama tungah a kilahsa bangin Solomon tungah Topa a nihveina kilang hi.

Topa in ama kiangah, “Keima mai-ah na hihsa na thungetna le na thumnate ka za khin hi. Na lamsa hih biakinn ka ap khin hi. A tawntungin tua biakinn sungah kei hong kibia dinga, a tawntungin tua biakinn ka hu ding hi.
Nang na hihleh, na pa David a gamtat bangin lungsim thupina le thumanna tawh ka mai-ah gamta-in, nang kong thupiak khempeuh bangin sem a, ka thukhamte le ka ngeina kipte na zuih leh,
na pa David tungah, ‘Israel kumpi tokhom tungah mi khat zong na tasam kei ding hi,’ ci-in ka ciamsa bangin Israel-te tungah na kumpi tokhom ka kipsak paisuak ding hi.

Ahih hangin nang na hi a, na tate ahi zongin, keimah zuihna panin pialin, note mai-ah ka koih ka thupiaknate le ka thukhamte na zuih kei uh a, pasian dangte’ na a sem ding le a bia dingin na pai uhleh,

amaute ka piaksa leitang panin Israel mite ka la khia ding hi. Tua ciangin ka min dingin ka apsa biakinn pen ka muhna panin ka lawn khia dinga, Israel-te pen mi khempeuh lakah paunak le thugentehna suak ding hi.

Tua ciangin hih biakinn pen ninbulomtang suak dinga, a nawkkha mi khempeuh in lamdangsa-in, eh! ci ding uh hi. Amaute in, ‘Bang hangin Topa in hih leitang le hih biakinn hih bangin hih ahi hiam?’ ci ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, ‘Egypt panin a pu a pate uh a pai khiatpih Topa a Pasian uh amaute in nusia-in pasian dangte len uh a, tuate bia-in a na a sepna hang uh ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in hih siatna khempeuh amaute tungah tungsak hi,’ ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Solomon in inn nihte, Topa’ biakinn le kumpi inn a lam kum sawmnih a beina,
Taia kumpi Hiram in Solomon’ deih zahzah taamtak sing le taaksan sing le kham a piak khit ciangin, Kumpi Solomon in Galilee gam sunga om khuapi sawmnih, Hiram tungah a pia hi.
Ahih hangin Solomon in amah a piaksa khuapite a en dingin Taia panin Hiram hong pai ciangin, tua khuapite tawh amah lungkim zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in, “Ka sanggam aw, kei nong piak hih khuapite a bangci khuapi ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin tuate Kabul gam kici hi.
Hiram in kumpipa kiangah a piak kham talen zakhat le talen sawmnih a pha hi.
Topa’ biakinn, ama inn, Jerusalem kulh le Hazor, Megiddo le Gezer khuate a lam dingin Kumpi Solomon in aana tawh na a semte a la hi.
(Egypt kumpi Faro paito a, Gezer la-in mei tawh hal a, a khuapi sunga teeng Kanaan mite thatin Solomon’ zi, a tanu’ tungah mokenin a khuapi a piak ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin Solomon in Gezer khua lamkik hi). Tua banah Bethhoron nuainung
le Baalath le Judah gam sung gamlakah Tamar,

le Solomon in a neih vankoihna khuapi khempeuh le a leengte-a’ ding khuapite le a sakol tung tuangte ading khuapite le Jerusalem sung, Lebanon sung le ama ukna gam sung khempeuh ah zong Solomon in a lamnop khempeuh a lamkik hi.
Israel mi a hi lo Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite sung panin a omlai mi khempeuh,
Israel mite in a suksiat khit siang zawh loh, tua gamah amau’ nunga a omlai a suanlekhakte uh, Solomon in aana tawh na a sem salin bawl ahih ciangin tuni dongin tua bangmahin amaute om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Solomon in Israel mite salin bawl lo hi. Amaute pen galkapte, ama nuai-ah a uliante, a galkapmaangte, a leeng ukte le a sakol tung tuangte ahi uh hi.
Solomon’ innlam nasep a uk ulianpite mi zanga le sawmnga ahi hi.
Faro tanu adingin Solomon in a lamsak ama inn-ah a om dingin David khuapi panin amah a pai khiat khit ciangin Solomon in Millo a lam hi.
Solomon in Topa adingin a lam biakna tau tungah meihal biakna le thunuama biakna kum khatin thumvei pia-in Topa’ mai-ah paknamtui a hal hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a biakinn a zo hi.
Kumpi Solomon in Edom gam sung San Tuipi gei dunga om Eloth nai-a Eziongeber-ah teembaw honkhat a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Hiram in tua teembaw honte tawh tuipi tung nasep a thei tuipi mi a nasemte, Solomon’ nasemte tawh sawl khia hi.
Tua ciangin amaute Ofir-ah pai-in tua lai panin kham talen zali le sawmnih hong pua uh a, amaute in Kumpi Solomon kiangah tuate tunpih uh hi.
Tu-in Sheba kumpinu in Topa’ min tawh kisai-in Solomon’ minthanna a zak ciangin thudotna haksate tawh amah a ze-et dingin hong pai hi.
Amah nungzui honpi, a namtui nate a pua kalaohte, kham tampi le suangmanpha tampi tawh Jerusalem-ah hong pai a, Solomon’ kiangah a tun ciangin amah in a lungsim a om khempeuh Solomon tungah a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in ama dotna khempeuh dawng hi. Kumpipa in ama tungah a gentel theih loh, haksa lua a sak bangmah om lo hi.
Sheba kumpinu in Solomon’ pilna, ama lamsa a inn,
a sabuai-ah a an, a uliante’ omzia le a nasemte’ etna, a puante uh, a an piate le Topa’ biakinn-ah a piak meihal biaknate khempeuh a muh khit ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka gam sung panin nangma thu le na pilna ka zak a kigen thute man mahmah hi.
Kei hong pai-in keima mit in a muh mateng a kigente ka um kei hi. Ahi zongin alang zong kei tungah hong kigen lo na hi a, na pilna le na daupaina in ka zak thute vuknelh hi.
Na zite a hampha mahmah hi a, na mai-ah ding tawntungin na pilna a za hih na nasemte zong hampha mahmah uh hi.

Nang tungah lungdamin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah nang a hong koih Topa na Pasian in thupha ngah tahen! Topa in Israel it tawntung ahih manin nangmah in thutang le thuman na sepkhiat theih nadingin amah in kumpi-in nang hong bawl hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa tungah kham talen za le sawmnih le a namtui nate tampi tak le suangmanphate a pia hi. Sheba kumpinu in Kumpi Solomon tungah a piak hih banga a tam a namtui nate hong pai ngei nawn lo hi.
Tua tham loin Ofir panin kham hong pua Hiram’ teembaw honte in Ofir panin cingsing le suangmanpha tampi tak hong pua uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in cingsingte Topa’ biakinn le kumpipa’ innkhuamte, lasate adingin laiza lasakna le harp lasakna-in bawl hi. Tuni dongin tua bang cingsing hoihte hong tungkik ngei lo, kimu ngei nawn lo hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon in citna tawh ama tungah a piak banah ama deih a nget khempeuh zong Sheba kumpinu tungah a pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah le a nasemte a gam uhah a ciahkik uh hi.
Tu-in sumbawlte le sumbukte, Arabia kumpi khempeuh le gam sung a ukte tung panin a ngahte banah kum khatin Solomon tungah a tung kham a gihna pen talen zaguk le sawmguk le guk ahi hi.
Kumpi Solomon in a kiseek kham tawh kibawl lum lianpi zanih bawl a, lum khatah kham shekel zaguk bei hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kiseek kham tawh kibawl lum zathum bawl a, lum khat ciangin kham mina thum bei hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in Lebanon Tulak Inn a kici sungah tuate koih hi.
Kumpipa in saiha kumpi tokhom a lian khat zong bawl a, kham hoih pente tawh tua tokhom zut hi.
Kumpi tokhom in kahlei cial guk nei-in, kumpi tokhom nungah bawngno lutang khat om a, a tutna pang tuakah ban ngakna omin ban ngaknate pangah humpinelkai nih dinga,
kahlei cial gukte’ mong ciatah khat ciat a om humpinelkai sawm le nih ding hi. Kumpi gam sung khat peuhpeuhah tua tawh a kibang kibawl ngei lo hi.
Kumpi Solomon’ tuidawnna haite khempeuh kham hi a, Lebanon Tulak Inn sunga om haite khempeuh kham citak hi a, khat zong ngun hi lo hi. Solomon’ hun lai-in ngun bangmahin kingaihsun lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa in Hiram’ teembaw honte tawh Tarshish teembaw honkhat tuipi-ah a pai nei hi. Tarshish teembaw honte kum thumin khatvei hong pai-in kham, ngun, saiha, zawngmaw le utongte hong puak zel hi.
Tua bangin Kumpi Solomon in hauhna le pilna tawh leitung kumpi khempeuh khumkhelh hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama lungsim sunga a koih ama pilna a ngai dingin leitung mi buppi in Solomon’ omna zong uh hi.
Amaute khempeuh in letsong, ngun le kham tawh kibawl nate, puante, myrrh paknamtui, a namtui nate, sakolte le la-sakolte, a kumkumin tampi tak hong puak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon in leengte le sakol tung tuangte khawm hi. Amah in leeng tul le zali le tuanna sakol tulsawm le tulnih nei a, amah in tuate, leeng khuapite le Jerusalem-ah zattawm dingin a koih hi.
Kumpipa in Jerusalem-ah suang bangin ngun olsak a, amah in Shefelah theithek sing bangin taamtak sing tamsak hi.
Solomon’ sakol lakte Egypt le Kue pan hi a, kumpipa’ sumbawlte in Kue-ah a man pia-in tuate ngah uh hi.
Egypt panin leeng khat ciangin ngun shekel zaguk, sakol khat ciangin za le sawmnga-in kingah hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ sumbawlte in Hit kumpite le Syria kumpite khempeuh tungah zuak khia uh hi.
Tu-in Kumpi Solomon in gamdang numei tampi ngai hi. Faro’ tanu le Moab mi, Ammon mi, Edom mi, Sidon mi le Hit numeite,

Topa in Israel mite tungah, “Amaute tawh na kiteeng kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau’ pasian’ lamah na lungsim uh hong hei khia taktak ding uh hi,” a cih minamte’ lak pan lawm ngai a, Solomon in hih mite ngai-in pom hi.
Amah in kumpite’ tanu vive zi zasagih le zineu zathum nei hi. A zite in ama lungsim hei khia uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Solomon a teek ciangin a zite in pasian dangte’ lamah ama lungsim hei khia uh a, ama pa David’ lungsim bangin ama lungsim Topa’ tungah thuman bup taktak zo lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Sidon mite’ nusian Ashtoreth le Ammon mite a’ ahi a kihhuai Milkom, Solomon in bia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ muhna-ah Solomon a sia gamta a, a pa David bangin Topa zui bup lo hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Jerusalem nisuahna lam mualtungah Moab mite a’ ahi a kihhuai Khemosh le Ammon mite a’ ahi a kihhuai Molek adingin mual tunga biakna khat a lam hi.
Tua mah bangin amah in paknamtui halin a pasian-te uh tungah biakna a pia a gamdang zite khempeuh adingin hihsak hi.

Ama tungah nihvei kilak khinin, amah in pasian dangte’ nung a zuih loh nading ama tungah thu a pia khin Topa, Israel Pasian panin a lungsim kihei khia ahih manin Solomon tungah Topa heh hi. Ahih hangin amah in Topa’ thupiaksa zui tuan lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Solomon kiangah, “Hih pen nangma ngaihsutna hi-in, nang kong piaksa ka thuciamna le ka thukhamte zui lo na hih ciangin, keimah in nangma tung panin na kumpi gam balkekin na nasem pa tungah ka pia taktak ding hi.
Ahi zongin na pa David’ hangin nangma hun sungin ka hih kei dinga, na tapa’ khut sung panin ka bal khia ding hi.
Ahi zongin kumpi gam khempeuh ka bal khia kei ding hi. Ka nasem pa David hang le ka teelsa Jerusalem hangin na tapa’ tungah minam khat ka pia lai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Solomon a langpang ding Edom mi Hadad khangsak hi. Amah pen Edom kumpi innkuan sung mi khat ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Edom-ah David a omlai, a site a vui dingin galkap a ukpa Joab a paitoh lai-in Edom sunga pasal khempeuh amah in that hi.
(Bang hang hiam cih leh Joab in Edom sunga pasal khempeuh a suksiat khit matengin amah le Israel-te khempeuh tua lai-ah kha guk sung om uh hi).
Ahih hangin Hadad naupangno ahih lai-in, a pa’ nasem Edom mite pawlkhat tawh Egypt-ah a tai hi.
Amaute Midian panin ding khia-in Paran tung uh a, Paran panin mi zawnin tonpih a, ama tungah inn khat pia-in, annek ding pia-in, leitang a pia Egypt kumpipa Faro kiang Egypt gam tung uh hi.
Hadad in Faro’ mai-ah maipha lianpi mu a, amah in ama zi Tahpenes’ sanggamnu tawh kiteengsak hi.
Tua ciangin Tahpenes sanggamnu in amah tawh tapa Genubath nei a, Tahpenes in Faro’ inn-ah a naupang khoi hi. Faro’ inn sungah Faro’ tapate tawh Genubath om hi.
Ahih hangin Hadad in David le galkap a ukpa Joab a sihna thu Egypt panin a zak ciangin Faro’ kiangah, “Keima gamah ka ciah theih nadingin hong pai khiasak in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Faro in ama kiangah, “Nangma gamah ciah ding na hanciam nadingin kei tawh na omna-ah bang kitangsapna nei na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Ahi zongin amah in Faro’ kiangah, “Hong paisak hoh in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama topa ahi Zobah kumpi Hadadezer kiang panin a tai Eliada tapa Rezon zong Solomon a langpang dingin a khangsak hi.
Amah in ama kiimah mi khawmin mite’ na a sut pawl a makai a suak hi. Amaute Damaskas-ah pai-in tua lai munah teeng uh a, Damaskas-ah amah kumpi-in bawl uh hi.
Hadad mah bangin Solomon’ hun sung khempeuh Israel-te a langpangin amah omin siatna a bawl hi. Amah in Israel mite mudah a, Syria gamah a uk hi.
Solomon’ nasem, Zeredah khua sunga om Efraim mi, Nebat’ tapa, a nu’ min Zeruah hi-in meigong ahi, Jeroboam in zong kumpipa lehdo hi.
Amah in kumpipa a lehdona thu hih bang ahi hi: Solomon in Millo lamin a pa David’ khuapi a vangte a hu hi.
Jeroboam pen nasep siam mahmah khat hi a, Solomon in hih a khangno mipa a kizen mi hi, ci-in a theih ciangin Josef minam aana tawh na a semte tungah a ukin a bawl hi.
Tua hun sungin Jerusalem panin Jeroboam a pai khiat ciangin Shiloh khuami kamsang Ahijah in lampi-ah amah na dawn hi. Ahijah in puan thak khat na silhtawm a, amau nih tegel bek gamlakah om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ahijah in ama tungah a silh a puan thak lenin seh sawm le nih suahin a balkek hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Jeroboam kiangah, “Nang adingin bek sawm la in; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘En in, Solomon’ khut panin kumpi gam a bal khia ding ka hi a, nangma tungah minam sawm kong pia ding hi.
(Ahih hangin ka nasem David le Israel minam khempeuh sung panin ka teelsa khuapi Jerusalem hangin amah in minam khat nei ding hi).

Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in kei hong nusia a, Sidon mite’ nusian Ashtoreth, Moab pasian Khemosh le Ammon mite’ pasian Milkom bia-in, a pa David bangin keima muhna-ah a manin gamta loin, ka thukhamte le ka ngeina kipte zui loin ka thu hong nial hi.
Ahi zongin ama khut sung panin kumpi gambup ka la khia kei ding hi. Ka thupiaknate le ka thukhamte a zui, ka teel ka nasem David’ hangin a nuntak sung tawntung ukpa-in amah ka bawl ding hi.
Ahih hangin ama tapa’ khut sung panin kumpi gam la-in nangma tungah minam sawm kong pia ding hi.
Ahi zongin ka min koih nadingin ka teelsa khuapi Jerusalem-ah ka nasem pa David in keima mai-ah suanlekhak a neih tawntung theih nadingin a tapa tungah minam khat ka pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in nang hong la-in na deih khempeuh tungah na uk dinga, nang pen Israel tungah kumpi na hi ding hi.

Ka nasem pa David bangin ka thukhamte zuihna tawh nang kong thupiak khempeuh ngai-in, ka thu hong zui-in, ka muhna-ah a manin na gamtat leh nang tawh hong omkhawmin, David adingin ka hih bangin nangma tungah Israel mite kong pia dinga, na suanlekhakte in zong uk paisuak ding hi.
Hih thu hangin David’ suanlekhakte ka gimsak dinga, ahih hangin a tawntung ding hi lo hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in Jeroboam thah dingin zong hi. Ahih hangin Jeroboam dingin Egypt kumpipa Shishak kiangah tai a, Solomon’ sih mateng Egypt-ah a om hi.
Tu-in Solomon’ sep a omlaite le a hih khempeuh le a pilna, Solomon’ Nasepna Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Jerusalem panin Israel-te khempeuh tungah Solomon in a uk hun kum sawmli sung ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon si a, a pa David khuapi sungah kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Rehoboam in uk hi.
Shekhem-ah Rehoboam pai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah kumpi a suaksak Israel mi khempeuh Shekhem-ah hong pai uh hi.
Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam in tua thu a zak ciangin (bang hang hiam cih leh kumpi Solomon kiang panin a taina Egypt-ah amah omlai hi), Egypt panin hong ciahkik hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in mi sawlin amah sam uh hi. Tua ciangin Jeroboam le a kikhawm khempeuhte hong pai-in Rehoboam kiangah,

“Na pa in kote hong gimbawlin vangikpi hong suan hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na pa’ nasep haksate le kote tungah a giklua thuhaksate zangsak in. Tua hileh kote in nangma na kong sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Ni thum sung va kihem unla, tua ciangin kei kiangah hong paikik un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite pai khia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in a pa Solomon a nuntak lai-in ama mai-ah a ding ngei khangham mite thu dongin, “Hih mite ka dawn nading ngaihsutna hong bangci piak ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in tuni-in hih mite’ deihna bang zui inla, amaute na dawn ciangin kamhoih pau lecin, amaute pen a tawntungin nangma nasemte hi ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin khanghamte in ama tungah ngaihsutna a piakte nusia-in, amah tawh a khangkhawm ama mai-ah a ding khangnote thu dong hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “‘Na pa in kote tungah hong suat vangik zangsak in,’ kei tungah hong ci hih mite i dawn nading ngaihsutna hong bangci piak ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah tawh a khangkhawm khangnote in ama kiangah, “Nang kiangah, ‘Na pa in vangikpi hong puasak ahih manin kote adingin hong zangsak in,’ hong ci hih mite kiangah hih bangin na gen ding hi. Amaute kiangah, ‘Ka khutmeno pen ka pa’ kawng sangin gol zaw hi.

Tu-in ka pa in note tungah vangik hong suat banah kong behlap lai ding hi. Ka pa in ciang tawh note hong thuhilh hi. Ahih hangin keimah in ciang lingnei tawh note kong thuhilh ding hi,’ na ci ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in, “Ni thum ni-in ka kiangah hong paikik un,” a cih mah bangin Jeroboam le mi khempeuh a ni thum ni-in Rehoboam kiangah hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in mite ngawhdawn a, khangham mite in ama tungah ngaihsutna a piakte nusia-in,

khangnote’ ngaihsut piakna tawh kizui-in amaute kiangah thu gen a, “Ka pa in note’ tungah vangik hong suat banah keimah in kong behlap lai ding hi. Ka pa in ciang bek tawh note hong thuhilh hi. Ahih hangin keimah in ciang lingnei tawh note kong thuhilh ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua bangin kumpipa in mite’ deihna zui lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Shiloh khuami Ahijah’ tungtawnin Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ tungah a gensa thu a tunsak nadingin Topa in a piansak thu kiheina ahi hi.

Kumpipa in amau’ thu a ngaih lohna Israel-te khempeuh in a muh uh ciangin mite in kumpipa dawng uh a, “David sungah kote in bang ngah nei ka hi uh hiam? Jessi tapa sungah gamhluah ka nei kei uh hi. Israel-te aw, na inn ciat uhah ciah un. Rehoboam in ama ading vaihawmtawm tahen,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te a inn ciat uhah kihem uh hi.
Ahih hangin Rehoboam in Judah khuapite sungah a teeng Israel mite a uk hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in aana tawh nasemte a uk Adoram, Israel-te tawh a kimu dingin sawl a, ahi zongin amaute in amah suang tawh na denglum uh hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah a tai dingin Kumpi Rehoboam a sakol leeng-ah a tuang dingin nawhtai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin leilulam Israel-te in David’ suante’ ukna lehdo uh hi.

Jeroboam hong ciahkik khitna thu Israel-te khempeuh in a zak uh ciangin amaute in mi sawlin kikhopna-ah amah samsak uh a, Israel-te khempeuh tungah kumpi-in amah a bawl uh hi. David’ suante a zui kuamah dang om lo a, Judah minam bek in a zui uh hi.
Jerusalem-ah Rehoboam a tun ciangin, a kumpi gam a ngahkik nadingin Israel mite a sim dingin Judah minam khempeuh le Benjamin minam, a kiteel galhang mi tul zakhat le tul sawmgiat a khawm hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mi Shemaiah’ tungah Pasian’ thu hong tung hi:
“Judah kumpipa, Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam tung le Judah le Benjamin minam khempeuh tung le a omlai midang khempeuh tungah gen in.

‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Note na kuanto kei ding uh a, na beh uh ahi Israel-te na do kei ding uh hi. Mi khempeuh a inn ciat uhah ciah hen. Hih thu pen keima vaihawm ahi hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Topa’ thu ngai uh a, Topa’ thugen bangin inn-ah a ciahkik uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jeroboam in Efraim mual tung gam sungah Shekhem khua phutin tua lai-ah tawlkhat sung a teeng hi. Tua ciangin amah pai khia-in Penuel a puah hi.
Tua ciangin Jeroboam in a lungsim sungah, “Tu-in kumpi gam pen David’ suante’ tungah kiheikik khathei ding hi.

Jerusalem-a Topa’ biakinn-ah biakna pia dingin hih mite paito leh, hih mite’ lungsim Judah kumpi Rehoboam, a topa uh lamah kiheikik kha dinga, amaute in kei hong thatin Judah kumpi Rehoboam kiangah ciahkik ding uh hi,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in thu kikupna khat bawl a, tua ciangin kham bawngno nih bawl hi. Tua ciangin amah in mite kiangah, “Jerusalem-ah sauvei khop na pai khinta uh hi. Israel mite aw, Egypt leitang panin note hong pai khiatpih na pasian-te uh en un,” a ci hi.
Amah in Bethel-ah khat koihin, Dan-ah adang khat a koih hi.
Hih na pen khialhna khat a suak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite Bethel-a bia ding le Dan-a bia dingin a gamla pekah va pai uh hi.
Amah in mual dawnte-ah zong biak nading inn lamin mite khempeuh lak panin Levi mi ahi lo mite siampi-in a seh hi.

Tua ciangin Jeroboam in Judah a om pawi tawh a kibangin a kha giatna a ni sawm le nga ni-in pawi khat bawl a, biakna tau tungah biaknate a pia hi. Tua mah bangin amah in Bethel-ah bawlin ama bawlsa bawngno milimte tungah biakna a pia hi. Tua ciangin amah in ama bawlsa mual tunga biakna siampite Bethel-ah a koih hi.
A kha giatna a ni sawm le nga ni, ama deih kha sungin Bethel-a ama bawlsa biakna tau-ah amah paito hi. Amah in Israel mite adingin pawi khat kipsak a, paknamtui hal dingin biakna tau-ah a paito hi.
Tua laitakin Topa’ sawlna tawh Judah panin Pasian’ mi khat Bethel-ah hong pai hi. Paknamtui hal dingin biakna tau gei-ah Jeroboam na ding hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ sawlna bangin biakna tau langpangin mipa kiko a, “Biakna tau, biakna tau aw, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘En in, Josiah min nei tapa khat David’ suan sung pan hong piang ding hi. Amah in nangma tungah paknamtui a hal mual tunga biakna a pia siampite nangma tungah biakna-in pia dinga, nangma tungah mihingte’ guhte kihal ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua ni mahin amah in lim khat pia a, “Hih pen Topa in thu a gen khitna lim ahi hi: ‘En in, biakna tau kitam khamin a tunga om vutte kithehthang ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Bethel-a biakna tau langpangin Pasian’ mipa’ thugenna kumpipa in a zak ciangin biakna tau panin Jeroboam in a khut zan a, “Amah lencip un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah langpangin a zan khiat a khut keucip ahih manin a khut tonsakkik thei nawn lo hi.
Topa’ sawlna bangin Pasian’ mipa in lim khat a piakna tawh kizui-in biakna tau zong kiphelkhamin biakna tau panin a vutte kithehthang hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Pasian’ mipa kiangah, “Tu-in Topa na Pasian’ maipha kunh inla, ka khut a ngei a bat nadingin thu hong ngetsak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa in Topa’ tungah kunh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ khut a ngei bangkik a, a nidanga mah hong bang hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Pasian’ mipa kiangah, “Inn-ah hong zui inla, tawlnga in. Keimah in nangma tungah thaman kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa in kumpipa kiangah, “Na inn phel langkhat hong pia ding na hi zongin kong zui kei ding hi. Keimah in hih lai munah an ahi a, tui ahi zongin ka ne ka dawn kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kei tungah thu hong pia khinzo a, ‘An ahi a, tui ahi zongin ne lo dawn loin, na paina lampi tawnin na ciahkik kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah lampi dangah pai a, Bethel-ah hong paina lampi tawnin ciahkik lo hi.

Tua hun laitakin kamsang khangham khat Bethel-ah a teeng hi. Ama tapate hong pai-in tua ni-in Pasian’ mipa in Bethel-ah a hih thu teng ama kiangah a gen uh hi. Kumpipa kiangah a gen thute zong, amaute in a pa uh kiangah a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pa un amaute kiangah, “Koi lamah amah pai ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a tapate in Judah panin hong pai Pasian’ mipa a paina lam a hilh uh hi.
Amah in a tapate kiangah, “Kei adingin la van hong vawhsak un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in ama adingin la van vawhsakin a tungah amah a tuang hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa nungah amah pai a, tawsaw khat nuai-ah tu-in amah mu hi. Tua ciangin amah in Pasian’ mipa kiangah, “Nang pen Judah panin a hong pai Pasian’ mipa na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei tawh inn-ah hong ciahin an ne in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Nang tawh kong ciahkik kei dinga, nang kong zui thei kei ding hi. Hih munah nang tawh an ahi a, tui ahi zongin ka ne ka dawn kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kei tungah, ‘An ahi a, tui ahi zongin tua lai-ah ne lo dawn loin, na paina lampi tawnin na ciahkik kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei zong nangmah bangin kamsang khat ka hi a, Topa’ sawlna bangin vantungmi khat in kei tungah thu hong gen a, ‘Amah in anletui ne-in a dawn theih nadingin na inn-ah amah paipihkik in,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in Pasian’ mipa tungah zuaugenin a phuahtawm ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah zui-in hong ciahkik a, ama inn-ah an ne-in tui a dawn hi.
Amaute sabuai-ah a tut laitakun amah a ciahpihkik kamsang teekpa tungah Topa’ thu hong tung hi.
Judah panin hong pai Pasian’ mipa tungah amah kiko a, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Nangmah in ama thu mang loin, Topa na Pasian in hong thupiaksa thupiakna zui loin,
nang hong paikikin, amah in, “An ne kei inla, tui dawn kei in,” hong cihna munah an ne-in tui na dawn hi. Tua ahih manin na pate’ hanah na luanghawm kivui lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in an ne-in tui a dawn khit ciangin, amah in a ciahpihkik kamsangpa adingin la van vawhsak hi.
Amah a pai khiat ciangin humpinelkai khat in lampi-ah na dawntuahin amah that hi. Ama luanghawm lampi-ah kipaai a, a gei-ah a la dinga, a humpinelkai zong a luanghawm gei-ah a ding hi.
Tua laitakin mite in va nawkkha uh a, lampi-ah a luanghawm kipaai-in a luanghawm gei-ah humpinelkai a ding mu uh hi. Amaute hong pai-in kamsang khangham pa a tenna khuapi sungah a gen uh hi.

Lampi panin amah a ciahpihkik kamsangpa in tua thu a zak ciangin amah in, “Topa’ thu a mang lo Pasian’ mipa ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in ama tungah a gensa thu tawh kizui-in amah balnenin a that humpinelkai tungah Topa in amah pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a tapate kiangah, “Kei adingin la van hong vawhsak un,” a ci hi. Amaute in vawhsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah pai a, lampi-ah a luanghawm kipaai-in la leh humpinelkai a luanghawm gei-ah a ding a mu hi. Humpinelkai in a luanghawm ne lo a, a la zong balnen lo hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa in Pasian’ mipa’ luanghawm la-in la tungah koih a, kah ding le vui dingin khuapi sungah a ciahpih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama hanah a luanghawm a vui hi. Tua ciangin ama hangin amaute kap uh a, “Ala, ka sanggampa!” a ci uh hi.
Amah a vui khit ciangin a tapate kiangah, “Kei ka sih ciangin Pasian’ mipa a kivuina hanah kei hong vui un. Ama guh gei-ah kei’ guhte koih un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Bethel-a biakna tau le Samaria khuapite sunga om mual tunga biaknate khempeuh langpangin Topa’ sawlna bangin a thugenna hong tung taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Hih thu khit ciangin zong ama gamtat sia panin Jeroboam kihei tuan lo a, mite khempeuh sung panin mual tunga biaknate-a sem ding siampite bawlkik hi. Amah in a sem nuam peuhpeuh mual tunga biakna siampi dingin a ap hi.
Hih pen lei maitang panin khenkhia-in a susia zah dongin Jeroboam’ innkuan tungah khialhna lianpi a suak hi.
Tua hun laitakin Jeroboam’ tapa Abijah a ci na hi.
Jeroboam in a zi kiangah, “Ding inla, na mel kiseelin Jeroboam’ zi na hihlam kitheisak kei inla, Shiloh-ah va pai in. Hih mite tungah kumpi ka hih nading thu a gen kamsangpa Ahijah tua lai-ah om hi.
Anlum sawm, moh pawlkhat, khuaizu thawl khat keng inla ama kiangah va pai in. Naupang tungah a piang ding thu amah in nang kiangah hong gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jeroboam’ zi tua bangmahin gamta hi. Amah kithawi-in Shiloh-ah pai a, Ahijah’ inn va tung hi. A khanghamna hangin a mitte maang ahih manin Ahijah in khua mu thei lo hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Ahijah kiangah, “En in, a tapa tawh kisai nangma kiangah thu a dong dingin Jeroboam’ zi hong pai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a tapa a ci na hi. Tua bang tua bangin tua nu tungah na gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah hong pai ciangin numei dang khatin kineih hi.
Ahih hangin Ahijah in amah kongkhak hong tun a kheging a zak ciangin, “Hong tum in Jeroboam’ zi aw, bang hangin midang khat kineih na hi hiam? Nang adingin thugik khat kei tungah hong kipia hi.
Pai inla Jeroboam kiangah hih bangin gen in, ‘Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Mite lak panin nang hong liansakin ka mi Israel-te tungah makai-in kong bawl a,

David’ suante’ tung panin kumpi gam bal khia-in nangma tungah kong pia hi. Ahi zongin nang pen ka thupiaknate zui-in, a lungsim khempeuh tawh kei hong zui-in ka muhna-ah a man nate bek a sem ka nasem pa David na bang kei a,
nangmah in na mai-a om mite khempeuh sangin siatna bawl zaw-in, pai-in pasian dangte le a kisung milimte nang adingin bawlin ka heh nadingin nong phin a, na nung lamah kei nong paai hi.

Tua ahih ciangin en in, mi khat in a bei matengin ek a haltum mah bangin Jeroboam innkuan tungah siatna tungsakin, sal le sal ahi lo mi a kibangin pasal khempeuh Jeroboam innkuan panin ka susia dinga, Israel sungah Jeroboam innkuan ka beisiangsak ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jeroboam’ mi, khuapi sunga a si mi peuhpeuh uite in ne dinga, gamlakah a si mi peuhpeuh huihlak vasate in ne ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in gen khin hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in a gen hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin ding inla na inn-ah ciah in. Na khua na tun ciangin na tapa si ding hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh ama hangin kapin vui ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, Topa’ tungah a lungkimhuai na khat Jeroboam’ innkuan sung panin ama tungah kimu ahih manin Jeroboam sung panin amah bek mah hanah kivui ding hi.
Tua tham loin tuni-in Jeroboam innkuan a beisak ding, Israel-te’ tungah kumpi khat Topa in ama adingin khangsak ding hi. Tua hun a kipan

tui sunga pumpeeng a kilin mah bangin Topa in Israel mite vatin amau pute pate tungah a piak hih gam hoih panin Israel zunglot dinga, Eufratis gun galkhat ah amaute thehthang ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Asherah milimte bawlin Topa a heh nadingin phin uh hi.
Tua ciangin ama khialhna le Israel-te a khialhsakna ahi Jeroboam’ khialhna hangin amah in Israel nusia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jeroboam’ zi dingin kihem khia a, Tirzah-ah a ciah hi. Amah inn tungin sangkil a kan laitakin naupang a si hi.
Tua ciangin a nasem kamsang Ahijah tungtawnin Topa’ thugenna tawh kizui-in Israel mi khempeuh in amah vui-in ama hangin a kap uh hi.
Tu-in Jeroboam’ gamtatna a omlaite, a galsimna le a gam uknate, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Jeroboam’ uk hun sung kum sawmnih le nih ahi hi. Tua ciangin amah si a, ama tangin a tapa Nadab in a uk hi.

Tu-in Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam in Judah-ah uk hi. Gam uk dingin a kipatin Rehoboam kum sawmli le khat pha a, a min koih nadingin Topa in Israel minam khempeuh sung panin a teelkhiat khuapi Jerusalem-ah amah in kum sawm le kum sagih sung uk hi. Ama nu a min Naamah hi a, Ammon mi ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite, Topa’ muhna-ah a sia gamta uh a, a pu a pate khempeuh uh hih sangin a tam zaw-in amau’ khialhnate uh tawh ama hazat nading piangsak uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau adingin mual tunga biaknate, biakna songte le mual sang tung khempeuh le singniim nuai khempeuh ah Asherah milimte bawl uh a,
biakna phualte-ah numei-pasal paktat pawlte zong om uh hi. Topa in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawl khiat minam dangte’ gamtatna a kihhuai khempeuh bangin amaute gamta uh hi.
Kumpi Rehoboam’ kum ngana kumin Jerusalem a sim dingin Egypt kumpi Shishak hong kuanto hi.
Amah in Topa’ biakinn-a van manphate le kumpipa’ inn-a van manphate la khia hi. Amah in na khempeuh la khia hi. Amah in Solomon’ bawlsa kham lumte khempeuh zong la hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in tuate’ tangin sumngo lumte bawl a, kumpipa’ inn kongkhak a cing inncing uliante’ khut sungah tuate a ap hi.
Topa’ biakinn-ah kumpipa a pai simin inncingte in tuate pua-in, tua ciangin inncinna inndei sungah tuate koihkik zel uh hi.
Tu-in Rehoboam’ gamtatna a omlaite le a sep khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Rehoboam le Jeroboam’ kikalah galkidona om tawntung hi.
Tua ciangin Rehoboam si a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Ama nu a min Naamah hi a, Ammon mi ahi hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Abijam in a uk hi.
Tu-in Nebat’ tapa Kumpi Jeroboam’ kum sawm le kum giatna kumin Abijam in Judah tungah uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in Jerusalem-ah kum thum sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Maakah hi a, Absalom’ tanu ahi hi.
Ama mai-a a pa’ khialhna khempeuh amah in zui hi. A pusawn David a thuman bangin Topa a Pasian’ tungah a lungsim thuman bup lo hi.
Ahi zongin David’ hangin Topa a Pasian in Jerusalem-ah amah tapa khat pia a, ama khitah a tapa koihin Jerusalem kipsak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Hit mi Uriah thu-ah cih sim loh ama nuntak sung tawntung Topa’ mitah David a manin gamta-in a thupiakte khat peuhpeuh panin amah pial lo hi.
Tu-in Abijam’ nuntak sung tawntung amah le Jeroboam’ kikalah kidona om hi.
Abijam’ gamtatna a omlaite le a sep khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Tua ciangin Abijam le Jeroboam kikalah galkidona om hi.
Tua ciangin Abijam si a, amaute in David khuapi sungah amah vui uh hi. Ama tangin a tapa Asa in uk hi.
Israel kumpi Jeroboam’ kum sawmnihna kumin Asa in Judah tungah uk ding kipan a,
amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmli le khat sung uk hi. Ama pi’ min Maakah hi a, Absalom’ tanu ahi hi.
Ama pupi David a gamtat bangin Topa’ muhna-ah Asa a manin gamta hi.
Amah in gam sung panin pasal paktat pawlte koihkhia-in a pate’ bawlsa milim khempeuh khin khia hi.
Amah in Asherah milim dingin a kibawl a kihhuai milim khat nei ahih manin kumpinu’ nu hihna panin a pi Maakah zong khin khia hi. Tua hi a, Asa in tua nu’ milim phukin Kidron lui-ah a hal hi.
Ahih hangin mual tunga biaknate kila khia lo hi. Ahi zongin ama hun sung khempeuh Asa’ lungsim Topa’ tungah thuman bup hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a pa’ apsa letsongte le ama apsa letsongte, ngun, kham le nazatte Topa’ biakinn sungah a paipih hi.
Amau’ hun sung tawntung Asa le Israel kumpi Baasha kikalah galkidona om hi.
Judah a sim dingin Israel kumpi Baasha kuanto a, Judah kumpi Asa kiang pan kuamah pai khia thei lo, kuamah a tum theih loh nadingin Ramah khua a lam hi.

Tua ciangin Asa in Topa’ biakinn sung vankoihna le kumpipa inn vankoihna sungah a omlai ngun le kham khempeuh la-in ama nasemte’ khut sungah tuate a pia hi. Tua ciangin kumpi Asa in Damaskas-ah a teeng, Syria kumpi, Hezion’ tapa Tabrimmon, a tapa Benhadad kiangah tuate puak a,

“Ka pa le na pa mah bangin kei le nang kikalah kipawlna khat omsak ni. Ngun le kham letsong nangma tungah kong puak hi. Keima kiang panin amah a nungkik theih nadingin Israel kumpi Baasha tawh na kipawlna va sutat in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Benhadad in Kumpi Asa’ thu mang a, Israel khuapite a sim dingin a galkap a ukte sawlin, Ijon, Dan, Abelbethmaakah le Khinneroth khempeuh, Naftali gam khempeuh tawh a zo hi.
Baasha in tua thu a zak ciangin Ramah a lam khawlin Tirzah-ah om hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi Asa in Judah gam khempeuh ah thu genzakna khat bawl a, kuamah peng loin a milipin Baasha in khua lamna-a a zat Ramah suangte le a singte a pua khia dingin a sawl hi. Tua ciangin kumpi Asa in tuate tawh Benjamin mite’ khua Geba le Mizpah khua a lam hi.

Tu-in Asa’ gamtatna a omlaite khempeuh, ama thahatna khempeuh, ama sep khempeuh le ama lam khuapite, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Ahih hangin a teek ciangin a khete-ah natna khat a nei hi.
Tua ciangin Asa si a, a pupi David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jehoshafat in a uk hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum nihna kumin Jeroboam’ tapa Nadab in Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in Israel tungah kum nih sung uk hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta a, a pa’ khekhap mah tawnin, Israel a khialhsakna ama khialhna mah a zui hi.
Issakhar minam Ahijah’ tapa Baasha in Nadab sawmsim hi. Baasha in Filistia-te’ khua Gibbethon-ah amah sattuk hi. Nadab le Israel khempeuh in Gibbethon umcihin a om laitakun a thah ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah kumpi Asa’ kum thumna kumin Baasha in Nadab that a, Nadab tangin amah in a uk hi.

Amah kumpi ahih phetin Jeroboam’ innkuan khempeuh that hi. Topa in Shiloh khuami a nasem pa Ahijah tungtawnin a gensa bangin a vekpi-in a suksiat khit dongin mi khat zong Jeroboam’ innkuan-ah nusia lo hi.
Tua pen ama khialhna le Israel a khialhsakna ahi Jeroboam’ khialhnate hang le Israel Pasian, Topa a hehsakna hang ahi hi.
Tu-in Nadab’ gamtatna a omlaite le a sep khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Amau’ hun sung khempeuh Asa le Israel kumpi Baasha kikalah galkidona a om hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum thumna kumin Ahijah’ tapa Baasha in Israel khempeuh tungah Tirzah panin uk ding kipan a, kum sawmnih le li sung a uk hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta a, Jeroboam’ khekhap mah tawnin, Israel a khialhsakna ama khialhna mah a zui hi.
Tua ciangin Baasha langpangin Hanani tapa Jehu tungtawnin Topa’ thu hong tunga,

“Keimah in leivui lak panin nang hong sangto sakin ka mi Israel-te tungah makai-in nang hong bawl napi-in, nangmah in Jeroboam’ khekhap mah tawnin ka mi Israel-te na khialsak a, amaute’ khialhna tawh kei hong hehsak na hih manin
en in, keimah in Baasha le a innkuan ka phiatsiang dinga, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ innkuan bangin na innkuan ka bawl ding hi.
Baasha’ mi, khuapi sunga a si peuhpeuh uite in ne dinga, ama mi gamlakah a si peuhpeuh huihlak vasate in ne ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Baasha’ gamtatna a omlaite, a septe le a thahatna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Baasha si a, Tirzah-ah kivui hi. Ama tangin a tapa Elah in uk hi.

Tua tham loin Jeroboam innkuan bangin ama nasepna tawh hehsakin Topa’ muhna-ah a sia a gamtatna khempeuh hang le amah in Jeroboam le a innkuan a suksiatna hangin Hanani’ tapa kamsang Jehu’ tungtawnin Baasha le a innkuan langpangin Topa’ thu hong tung hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmnih le gukna kumin Baasha’ tapa Elah in Tirzah panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, kum nih sung uk hi.
Ahih hangin ama leengte alang a ukpa ama nasem Zimri in amah sawmsim hi. Tirzah-a kumpi inn sung a ukpa Arza’ inn-ah zukhamin Tirzah-ah a om laitak,
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmnih le sagihna kumin Zimri hong pai-in Elah sattukin that a, ama tangin a uk hi.
Amah in uk dinga a kipat, kumpi tokhom tungah a tut khit phetin amah in Baasha’ innkuan khempeuh that hi. Ama behte pasal khat beek ahi a, a lawmte ahi zongin khat zong siit lo hi.

Baasha’ khialhnate le a khialhsa uh ahi a tapa Elah’ khialhnate le amaute in Israel khialsakin, a milimte uh tawh Israel Pasian, Topa a hehsakna uh hangin, Baasha langpangin kamsang Jehu tungtawnin Topa’ thugenna bangin Baasha’ innkuan khempeuh tua bangin Zimri in susia hi.
Tu-in Elah’ gamtatna a omlaite le a sep khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmnih le sagihna kumin Zimri in Tirzah-ah ni sagih sung uk hi. Tua laitakin Filistia-te’ khua Gibbethon simin Israel galkapte in giahphual sat uh a,

giahphual sat a om galkapte in, “Zimri in sawmsimin kumpipa that khin hi,” a kicihna a za uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te khempeuh in tua ni-in giahphual ah galkap a ukpa Omri kumpi-in a bawl uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Omri le amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh Gibbethon panin paito-in amaute in Tirzah umcih uh hi.

Ama hihsa a khialhna, Topa’ muhna-ah a siat gamtatna, Jeroboam’ khekhap a totna le a hihsa a khialhna, Israel a khialhsakna hangin, a khuapi kila khinta hi, ci-in Zimri in a muh ciangin kumpipa’ inn muanhuai sungah amah pai a, kumpipa’ inn tawh amah mei-in kihalnelhin a si hi.
Tu-in Zimri’ gamtatna a omlaite le ama hihsa a sawmsimna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite pawl nihin kikhen uh hi. Mi pawlkhat in kumpi-in a bawl dingin Ginath’ tapa Tibni zui uh a, a pawlkhat in Omri zui uh hi.
Ahih hangin Omri a zui mite in Ginath’ tapa Tibni a zuite zo uh ahih ciangin Tibni si a, Omri kumpi a suak hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmthum le khatna kumin Omri in Israel-te tungah uk ding kipan a, kum sawm le kum nih sung a uk hi. Amah in kum guk sung Tirzah-ah uk hi.
Amah in Shemer’ tung panin ngun talen nihin Samaria mual lei hi. Amah in kulh tawh a mual um a, tua mual a nei pa Shemer’ min tamin a lamsa khuapi min Samaria a phuak hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah Omri a sia gamta a, ama mai-a om mi khempeuh sangin a sia tam zaw gamta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ gamtat khempeuh le Israel a khialhsakna khialhnate, a milimte uh tawh Israel Pasian, Topa a hehsakna uh a zui hi.
Tu-in Omri’ gamtatna a omlaite le a thahatna a lahna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Omri si a, Samaria-ah kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Ahab in a uk hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmthum le giatna kumin Omri’ tapa Ahab in Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in Samaria panin Israel-te tungah kum sawmnih le nih sung a uk hi.
Omri’ tapa Ahab, ama mai-a mite khempeuh sangin Topa’ muhna-ah a sia tam zaw gamta hi.
Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate zuih ding ama adingin a thuzang tawh a kibat mah bangin, amah in Sidon mite’ kumpi Ethbaal’ tanu Jezebel zi-in la a, pai-in Baal na semin a bia hi.
Amah in Samaria-a a lam Baal inn sungah Baal adingin biakna tau khat dingsak hi.
Tua ciangin Ahab in Asherah milim khat bawl hi. Ahab in ama mai-a om Israel kumpite khempeuh sangin Israel Pasian, Topa hehsak nading tam hih zaw hi.

Ama hun sungin Bethel mi Hiel in Jerikho a puah hi. Topa in Nun tapa Joshua’ tungtawnin a gen bangin amah in a tacil Abiram’ luang khamin a bulpi phut a, a tapa neu pen Segub’ luang khamin a kongpite a phut hi.

Tu-in Gilead gam sung Tishbe khua panin Tishbe mi Elijah in Ahab kiangah, “A mai-ah ka dinna Israel Pasian, Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin keima thu tawh loin daitui ahi a, guah ahi zongin hong tung ding kumte sungah om lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiangah Topa’ thu hong tunga,
“Hih lai panin kihemin nisuahna lamah kihei inla, Jordan nisuahna lam Kherith lui-ah bu in.
Nangmah in lui panin tui na dawn ding hi. Tua lai-ah nangmah a hong vak dingin va-akte thu ka piazo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in Topa’ thugen bangin gamta a, Jordan nisuahna lam Kherith lui gei-ah a om hi.
Tua ciangin va-akte in ama kiangah zing le nitakin anlum le sa puak a, amah in lui panin tui a dawn hi.
Tua gam sungah guah zu lo ahih manin tawlkhat khit ciangin a lui a kang hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah kiangah Topa’ thu hong tunga,
“Ding inla, Sidon mite’ khua Zaath-ah pai-in tua lai-ah om in. Tua lai-ah nangmah a hong vak dingin meigongnu khat thu ka piazo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin Zaath-ah a pai hi. Khuapi kulhkongpi a tun ciangin, meigongnu khat in sing na tom hi. Amah in tua nu samin, “Ka dawn theih nadingin beel khat sungah tui tawm hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Tua nu in paipih dingin a kisak laitakin, amah in tua nu samin, “Anlum neu khat hong tawi kawm in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa na Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin emsa bangmah ka nei kei a, beel sungah annel khutdim khat le um sungah sathau tawmno khat bek om hi. Tu-in keimah le ka tapa adingin tuate bawlin kote in ka nek theih nadingun singkang nih khawng a tom ka hi a, tua ciangin a si ta ding ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in ama kiangah, “Lunghimawh kei in; pai inla na gensa bangin an hong bawl in. Kei adingin mohneu khat hong bawlsak masa-in kei kiangah hong paipih inla, tua khit ciangin nang le na tapa ading bawl in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Topa in leitungah guah a zuksak ni matengin beel sunga annel bei lo dinga, um sunga sathau zong kiam ngei lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah pai-in Elijah’ gensa bangin hih hi. Tua nu le amah le tua nu’ innkuan in ni tampi sung ne uh hi.
Elijah’ tungtawnin Topa’ thugen bangin beel sunga annel bei lo a, um sunga sathau zong kiam ngei lo hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin inn sung nupi ahi numei’ tapa a ci na hi. A natna nasia mahmah ahih manin gim semsemin a si hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Elijah kiangah, “Pasian’ mipa aw, kei’ langkhat ah bang thu nei na hi hiam? Ka khialhna a pholak ding ka tapa’ sihna a piangsak dingin kei kiangah nong pai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tua nu kiangah, “Na tapa hong pia in,” a ci hi. Amah in tua nu’ ang panin amah la-in ama giahna innkhumzangah puato-in ama lupna tungah a sial hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ tungah kiko-in, “Topa ka Pasian aw, ama tapa thahna tawh ka peemna meigongnu’ tung nangawnah gimna hong tungsak na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin naupang tungah amah thumvei kikhuangin Topa’ tungah kiko a, “Topa ka Pasian aw, hih naupang hingkiksak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Elijah’ aw ngai hi; naupang hong nakkikin a hingkik hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in naupang la-in innkhumzang panin inn sungah paipihsuk a, a nu kiangah a pia hi. Tua ciangin Elijah in, “En in, na tapa nungta hi,” a ci hi.
Numei in Elijah kiangah, “Nang, Pasian’ mi na hihna le Topa in nang tungtawnin thu a gen takpi ahihna tu-in ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Ni tampi khit a kum thumna kumin Elijah’ tungah Topa’ thu hong tunga, “Pai in, Ahab kiangah nangmah kilak in. Tua ciangin keimah in leitungah guah ka zusak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Ahab kiangah amah a kilaktawm dingin Elijah a pai hi. Tu-in Samaria-ah kialpi nasia hi.
Tua ciangin Ahab in kumpi inn sung a ukpa Obadiah sam hi. (Obadiah in nakpitakin Topa zahtak hi;
Jezebel in Topa’ kamsangte a hon thah lai-in Obadiah in kamsang zakhat la-in sawmnga sawmnga-in leihawm sungah seel a, amaute anletui tawh a vak hi.)

Tua ciangin Ahab in Obadiah kiangah, “Gam sung ciktui omna khempeuh le kuam omna khempeuh ah va pai in. Lopa mu-in sakolte le la-sakolte i hinsuah zo kha dinga, ganhingte pawlkhat i sum kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a et dingun leitang hawm uh hi. Ahab mahmah mun khat lamah pai-in Obadiah mahmah a mun dang khat lamah a pai hi.
Obadiah lamkalah a om laitakin, Elijah in amah na dawntuah hi. Obadiah in amah thei-in a mai lei ngatin puk a, “Ka to Elijah, nang na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Keimah ka hi hi. Pai-in na topa kiangah, ‘Elijah hih lai-ah om hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Hong thah dingin Ahab’ khut sungah na nasem pa nong piak nadingin bang thu-ah khial ka hi hiam?

Topa na Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin nangmah a zong dingin ka topa in a sawl lohna minam ahi a, kumpi gam ahi zongin om lo hi. Amaute in, ‘Hih lai-ah amah om lo hi,’ a cih uh ciangin, amaute in nang hong muh lohna thu amah in kumpi gam ahi a, minam ahi zongin kiciamsak hi.
Tu-in nangmah in, ‘Pai-in na topa kiangah, “Hih lai-ah Elijah om hi,” ci in,’ nong ci hi.

Nang kiang panin kei ka pai khiat phetin ka theih lohna munah Topa’ kha in nang hong pua ding hi. Kei va pai-in Ahab kiangah genin amah in nang hong muh loh ciangin, ka khangno lai a kipanin keimah na nasem pa in Topa a zahtak hinapi-in, amah in kei hong that ding hi.
Jezebel in Topa’ kamsangte a thah lai-in Topa’ kamsangte mi zakhat, sawmnga sawmnga-in leihawm sungah seelin, amaute anletui tawh ka vakna thu ka topa tungah hong kigen nai lo ahi hiam?
Tu-in nangmah in, ‘Pai-in na topa kiangah, “Hih lai-ah Elijah om hi,” ci in,’ nong ci hi. Tua hileh amah in kei hong that ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in, “A mai-ah ka dinna Vanglian Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin, tuni-in ama kiangah kei mahmah ka kilak taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Ahab tawh a kimu dingin Obadiah pai-in ama kiangah a gen hi. Tua ciangin Elijah tawh a kimu dingin Ahab hong pai hi.
Ahab in Elijah a muh ciangin, “Israel mite a lungkhamsak pa, nang na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in dawngin, “Keimah in Israel mite ka lungkhamsak kei hi. Nang in Topa’ thupiaknate nusia-in Baal-te zui na hih manin nang le na pa’ innkuan in na lungkhamsak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in mi sawl inla, Karmel Mual kei kiangah Israel-te khempeuh le Jezebel’ sabuai-ah an a ne Baal kamsang zali le sawmnga le Asherah kamsang za lite hong khawm in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Ahab in Israel mite khempeuh kiangah mi sawlin, Karmel Mual-ah Israel mite le kamsangte khawmsak hi.

Tua ciangin mi khempeuh’ nai-ah Elijah hong pai-in, “Ngaihsutna kibang lo thu nih kikalah bang tanvei khensat loin om niloh ding na hi uh hiam? Topa pen Pasian ahihleh amah zui un; tua hi loin Baal pen Pasian ahihleh amah zui un,” a ci hi. Ahi zongin mite in kam khat beek dawng lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in mite kiangah, “Kei, kei bekbek, Topa’ kamsang sung panin ka omlai a, ahih hangin Baal kamsangte mihing zali le sawmnga om hi.

Kote tungah bawngtal nih hong pia un. Amau adingin bawngtal khat amaute teelsak unla, semnen sakin sing tungah koihsak unla, ahih hangin a tungah mei koihsak kei un. Tua ciangin keimah in a bawngtal khat bawlin sing tungah koihin, a tungah mei ka koih kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin note in na pasian tung uhah thu ngen unla, keimah in zong Topa’ tungah thu ka ngen ding hi. Tua ciangin thungetna mei tawh hong pia pasian pen Pasian taktak ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, “Hih na thugen hoih hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in Baal kamsangte kiangah, “Note tam na hih manun note adingin bawngtal khat teel unla bawl masa un. Tua ciangin na pasian uh tungah thu ngen unla, ahih hangin a tungah mei koih kei un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in amaute tungah a kipia bawngtal la-in bawl uh a, zingsang a kipan sun dong Baal tungah thu ngenin, “Baal aw, kote hong dawng in,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin awging om lo a, kuamah in dawng lo hi. Tua ciangin amau’ bawlsa biakna tau-ah amaute diang uh hi.

Sun ciangin Elijah in amaute zahpihin, “Amah pen pasian ahih ciangin a gingin kiko un. Amah in thu a lungngaih laitak, ahih kei leh mun dangah pai khia, ahih kei leh khualzin, ahih kei leh amah ihmu-in phot ding kisam hi khathei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a gingin kiko-in, amau’ ngeina bangin namsaute le sikzumte tawh, amaute tungah si a luan dongin ki-atin kisun uh hi.
Sunkim khit ciangin biakpiak hun dong mateng amaute awngsuak uh a, ahih hangin awging om lo hi. Kuamah in dawng lo a, kuamah in don lo hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in mi khempeuh kiangah, “Ka kiang nai-ah hong pai un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh ama kiang nai-ah hong pai uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ biakna tau a kisupaisa khat puahkik hi.
“Israel, nangma min hi ding hi,” ci-in Topa’ thu a tunna Jakob’ tapa minam sawm le nihte tawh kizui-in Elijah in suangtum sawm le nih la hi.
Tua ciangin tua suangte tawh Topa’ minin biakna tau khat lam hi. Amah in khaici lawh nih a ta zo dingin a lian hawklam khat biakna tau kimkotah bawl hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a ngeina bangin a sing koih a, a bawngtal semnenin a sing tungah koih hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Beel li sungah tui dim unla, meihal biakna tau tung le a sing tungah sung un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “A nihveina hih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a nihveina hih uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “A thumveina hih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a thumveina hih leuleu uh hi.
Tua ciangin biakna tau kimkotah tui luang a, a hawklam zong tui tawh kidim hi.

Biakpiak hun ciangin kamsang Elijah a nai-ah hong pai-in, “Abraham, Isaac le Israel Pasian, Topa aw, nang pen Israel sungah Pasian na hihna le kei pen nangma nasem ka hihna le hih nate khempeuh nangma thu tawh ka hihna thu tuni-in kitheisak in.
Topa aw, nangmah Pasian na hihna le amaute’ lungsim na heikikna thu hih mite in a theih nadingin hong dawng in, Topa aw, hong dawng in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ meikuang hong kia a, a meihal biakna, a sing, a suangte le a leivui kangtumin, hawklam sunga om tui nangawn kangcip hi.
Mi khempeuh in tua thu a muh uh ciangin a mai uh leilam ngatin puk uh hi. Amaute in, “Topa pen Pasian ahi hi; Topa pen Pasian ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in amaute kiangah, “Baal kamsangte man un; amaute khat zong suaktasak kei un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in man uh hi. Elijah in Kishon lui-ah amaute paipih sukin tua lai-ah amaute a that hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in Ahab kiangah, “Paito inla, an ne-in tui dawn in; bang hang hiam cih leh guahpi huging om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin anne tuidawn dingin Ahab paito hi. Karmel Mual dawnah Elijah paito a, a mahmah leilakah kun sukin a khukte kikalah a maitang a phum hi.
Tua ciangin a nasem pa kiangah, “Tu-in paito in; tuipi lam va en in,” a ci hi. Amah paito-in khuadak a, “Bangmah om lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Sagih vei paikik in,” a ci hi.

A sagihveina ciangin amah in, “Khuttum cia bang meii tawmno khat tuipi panin hong kaito hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Paito-in Ahab kiangah, ‘Guah in hong khak kha ding ahih manin na leeng kithawi inla paisuk in,’ va ci in,” a ci hi.
Tomno sungin meiite le huih tawh van hong vom a, guah tampi a zu hi. Ahab a leeng tungah tuangin Jezreel-ah a pai hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah tungah Topa’ vangliatna hong tung hi. Amah in a kawng gakin Jezreel khua lutna dongah Ahab’ mai-ah na tai hi.
Ahab in Jezebel kiangah Elijah’ hih khempeuh le namsau tawh kamsangte khempeuh a thah khitna thu a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Jezebel in Elijah kiangah kamtai khat sawlin, “Zing ciang tubang hunin amaute na thah bangin nangmah kong thah kei taak le pasian-te in kei hong dawm kei tahen,” cisak hi.
Tua ciangin amah lau a, kithawi-in a suahtak nadingin pai khia a, Judah-te’ khua Beersheba tungin tua lai-ah a nasem pa nusia hi.

Ahih hangin a mahmah gamlakah ni khat lam pailai-in poding kung nuai khatah a tu hi. Tua ciangin amah in a sih nading thu ngenin, “Pha zo hi; tu-in Topa aw, ka nuntakna hong la ta in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka pate sangin kei ka hoih zaw kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin poding kung khat nuai-ah amah lumsukin a ihmu hi. Tua laitakin vantungmi khat in amah lawngin ama kiangah, “Tho inla an ne in,” a ci hi.
Amah khuadak a, ama lutang gei suang sa tungah a ki-em moh khat le tui hai khat na om hi. Amah in tuate ne-in dawnin lumkik hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi a nihveina hong paikikin amah lawng a, “Tho inla an ne in; tua hikeileh nang adingin khualzinna haksa lua ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah tho a, an ne-in tui dawn a, tua an thahatna tawh Pasian’ mual Horeb ciang dong sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung a pai hi.
Tua ciangin leihawm khatah amah tungin tua lai-ah giak hi. Topa in Elijah hopih a, “Elijah, hih lai-ah bang hih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Vanglian Pasian, Topa adingin ka huaiham mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite in na thuciamna nusia-in, na biakna taute lawn khia uh a, namsau tawh na kamsangte that hi; kei, kei bekbek ka omlai hi. Amaute in kei nangawn thah dingin hong zong lai uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Paikhia inla, mual tung, Topa’ mai-ah ding in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in hong nawk a, a lian a khauh huihpi in mualte semkhamin Topa’ mai-ah suangtumte sukham a, ahih hangin huihpi sungah Topa om lo hi. Huihpi nun a daih khit ciangin zin liing a, ahih hangin zinliing sungah Topa om lo hi.
Zinliing khit ciangin meikuang om a, ahih hangin meikuang sungah zong Topa om lo hi. Meikuang khit ciangin aw nem neu khat a ging hi.
Elijah in a zak ciangin a puan tawh a mai tuamin pai khia a, leihawm lutna-ah ding hi. Ama kiangah aw khat hong ging a, “Elijah, hih lai-ah bang hih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Vanglian Pasian, Topa adingin ka huaiham mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite in na thuciamna nusia-in, na biakna taute lawn khia uh a, namsau tawh na kamsangte that uh hi; kei, kei bekbek ka omlai hi. Amaute in kei nangawn thah dingin hong zong lai uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Pai in, Damaskas gamlak na lampi-ah ciahkik in. Na tun ciangin Syria gam kumpi dingin Hazael sathau na nilh ding hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpi dingin Nimshi’ tapa Jehu sathau na nilh ding hi. Tua ciangin nangma munah kamsang dingin Abelmeholah khuami Shafat’ tapa Elisha sathau na nilh ding hi.
Jehu in Hazael’ namsau panin a suakta peuhpeuh that ding hi. Elisha in Jehu’ namsau panin a suakta peuhpeuh that ding hi.
Ahi zongin Baal mai-ah a kun nai lo, amah a nam nai lo mihing tul sagih Israel sungah ka siit ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tua lai panin amah pai khia a, ama neihsa a bawngtal kap sawm le nih tawh lo a kho Shafat’ tapa Elisha mu a, amah a sawm le nihna tawh a kho ahi hi. Elijah in ama gei nawkin ama tungah a puan lawn hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a bawngtalte nusia-in Elijah’ nungah tai a, “Ka nu le ka pa kam vaikhakin hong namsak phot in; tua ciangin nang kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah in Elisha kiangah, “Paikik in; nang hong khaktan ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah a zuihna panin ciahkik a, a bawngtal kolte la-in a bawngtalte go a, a sate bawngtal kolte tawh huanin mite tungah pia a, amaute in a ne uh hi. Tua ciangin amah kithawi-in Elijah’ nung zui a, ama na a sem hi.
Syria kumpipa Benhadad in ama galkap khempeuh khawm hi. Amah a huh ding kumpi sawmthum le nih le sakolte le leengte om hi. Amah paito-in Samaria umcihin sim gawp hi.
Amah in Israel kumpi Ahab khuapi sungah kamtaite sawlin ama kiangah, “Benhadad in hih bangin ci hi:
‘Na ngun le na kham keima a’ hi a, na zi hoih pente le na tate zong keima-a’ mah ahi hi,’ ci hi,” cisak hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in dawngin, “Na gen mah bangin, ka topa, kumpipa aw, kei le ka neih khempeuh nangma a’ ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Kamtaite hong paikikin, “Benhadad in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Nang kiangah mi hong sawlin, “Kei tungah na ngun le na kham, na zite le na tate hong pia in,” kong cisak hi.
Ahi zongin zing ciang tubang hunin nangma kiangah ka nasemte kong sawl dinga, amaute in nangma inn le na nasemte’ inn sung thawi-in, amau’ deih peuhpeuh hong la ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” cisak hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in gam sung upa khempeuh samin, “Tu-in ciamteh un, hih mipa in buaina a zonna thei un; bang hang hiam cih leh ka zite le ka ngun le ka kham a la dingin mi hong sawl a, ama thu ka nial kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin upa khempeuh le mi khempeuh in ama kiangah, “Don kei inla, zong thukim kei in,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in Benhadad’ kamtaite kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa kiangah hih bangin gen un: ‘Na nasem pa’ tung panin nong kalh masak kong pia ding hi; ahih hangin a nihna kong piazo kei hi, ci hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kamtaite kihem khia-in ama tungah thu tunkik uh hi.
Benhadad in ama kiangah mi sawlin, “Samaria leitang pen kei hong zui khempeuh’ khutkuak a dimzawh taak leh, pasian-te in kei hong dawm kei tahen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in dawngin, “Ama kiangah gen un: ‘Gal a zawh khit ciangin galhiam a suah khia pa bangin galsim dingin galhiam a kuah lai pa kiphasak kei hen,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Bukte sungah kumpite tawh zu ne-in Benhadad a om laitakin hih thu a zak ciangin amah in a mite kiangah, “Panmun la un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi a sim gawp dingin panmun a la uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpi Ahab kiang nai-ah kamsang khat hong pai-in, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Hih mihon tampi khempeuh na mu hiam? En in, tuni-in nangma khut sungah kong pia ding hi. Tua ciangin keimah, Topa ka hihna na thei ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ahab in, “Kua tawh hi ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Gamte a ukte’ nasemte tawh, ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Kua in galsim pan ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Nangmah in na pan ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in gamte a ukte’ nasemte khawm a, amaute zanih le sawmthum le nih ahi hi. Amaute’ khit ciangin amah in Israel mi khempeuh, tulsagih a khawm hi.
Tua ciangin Benhadad, bukte sungah amah a huh kumpi sawmthum le nihte tawh zukhamin a om laitak sun hunin amaute kuan khia uh hi.
Gam a ukte’ nasemte kuan khia masa uh hi. Tua ciangin Benhadad in thukante sawl khia a, amaute in ama kiangah, “Samaria panin mi hong kuan khia uh hi,” ci-in zasak uh hi.
Amah in, “Kilemna a bawl dingin hong pai ahihleh a hingin amaute man un. Tua ahih kei a, a hong sim dingin amaute a hong pai ahih le zong amaute a hing mahin man un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gamte a ukte’ nasemte le amaute a zui galkapte, khuapi panin kuan khia uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in amau’ kisikpih ciat that uh hi. Syria-te tai-in Israel mite in amaute delh uh a, ahih hangin Syria kumpipa Benhadad sakol tung tuangte tawh sakol khatin tai hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa pai khia-in sakolte le leengte man a, Syria-te tampi tak a that hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa kiang nai-ah kamsangpa hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Hong pai in, nangmah kithakhauhsak inla, na hih ding thu limtakin ngaihsun in; bang hang hiam cih leh khuakhal ciangin Syria kumpipa nangmah simin hong kuantokik ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Syria kumpipa’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Amaute’ pasian-te pen mual tung pasian-te hi a, tua ahih ciangin eite sangin amaute hat zaw uh hi. Ahih hangin zanglei-ah amaute do lehang amaute sangin eite i hat zaw taktak ding hi.
Hih bangin hih in: Kumpite ama panmun ciat panin khin khia inla, amaute’ munah galkapmaangte koih in.

Tua ciangin na taansa galkap tawh a kibang galkap, sakol tangin sakol, leeng tangin leeng khawm in. Tua ciangin zanglei-ah amaute i do dinga, amaute sangin eite i hat zaw taktak ding hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amau’ thu ngai-in a hih hi.
Khuakhal ciangin Benhadad in Syria-te khawmin Israel mite a sim dingin Afek-ah a kuanto hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite kikhawmin, lam-an kiguan a, amaute a do dingin a kuan uh hi. Israel mite in amaute’ mai-ah keelhon neu nih bangin giahphual sat uh a, Syria-te ahihleh gam sung khempeuh dim uh hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mi khat a nai-ah hong pai-in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Syria-te in, “Topa pen mual tung pasian hi a, amah pen kuamsung pasian hi lo hi,” ci uh ahih manin hih a lian mihonpi khempeuh nangma khut sungah kong pia dinga, keimah, Topa ka hihna na thei ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute a kimaituahin ni sagih sung giahphual satin om uh hi. A ni sagih ni-in gal kido uh hi. Israel mite in Syria-te ni khat sungin khe galkap tul zakhat vatlum uh hi.
Tua ciangin a omlaite Afek khuapi-ah tai uh a, ahi zongin tuate mi tul sawmnih le tulsagih pen khuapi kulh in cipnelh hi. Benhadad zong tai a, khuapi sunga inndei sung nung khatah a lut hi.

Tua ciangin a nasemte in ama kiangah, “Israel kumpite pen hehpihna a nei kumpite hi, ci-in i za hi. Puanhampi i kawngah teengin i lu tungah khauhual vialin Israel kumpipa kiangah pai ni; amah in na nuntakna hong suaktasak kha ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a kawng uhah puanhampi teengin a lu uhah khauhual vialin Israel kumpipa kiangah pai uh a, “Na nasem pa Benhadad in, ‘Kong thum hi, kei hong nungtasak in,’ ci hi,” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Amah nungta lai ahi hiam? Amah ka sanggam bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tu-in mite in a lim en cikin ama tung panin a theih uh ciangin, “Hi hi, amah nungta lai hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Pai unla amah hong paipih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin ama kiangah Benhadad hong pai khia hi. Ahab in leeng tung ama kiangah Benhadad kahtosak hi.

Tua ciangin Benhadad in ama kiangah, “Ka pa in na pa’ tung panin a lak khuapite kong piakik ding hi. Ka pa in Samaria-ah a bawl mah bangin Damaskas-ah nang adingin sumbuk na bawl thei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ahab in, “Hih na thugente’ hangin nang kong suaktasak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in thuciamna khat amah tawh bawlin a ciahsak hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ thupiakna tawh kamsangte’ tapate khat in a lawmte khat kiangah, “Hong sat in, kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a mipa in amah sat nuam lo hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a lawmpa kiangah, “Nangmah in Topa’ thu mang lo na hih manin, kei kiang panin na pai khiat khit phetin humpinelkai khat in nang hong that ding hi,” a ci hi. Ama kiang panin amah a kihepkhiat khit phetin humpinelkai khat in amah dawntuahin petlum pah hi.
Tua ciangin amah in midang khat mu a, “Hong sat in, kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mipa in amah nakpitakin satin amah liamsak hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa kihem khia-in lam gei-ah kumpipa ngak a, a mit tung puan tawh tuamin a mel a seel hi.

Kumpipa in a nawk laitakin kumpipa tungah amah kiko-in, “Na nasem pa gal sungah kuan hi. Galkap khat in kei kiangah gal matsa mi khat hong paipih a, ‘Hih mipa kem in; amah na taisuah leh ama nuntakna tangin nangma nuntakna hi dinga, ahih kei leh ngun talen khat na liau ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Na nasem pa hih lai hua lai-ah manlahin ka om kalin amah na mang hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Nangma thukhenna bang hi tahen; nang mahmah in na khentawm hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a mit panin a tuamna thakhatin phelvat hi. Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in amah pen kamsangte khat ahih lam thei hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Thah dinga ka seh mipa khah na hih ciangin ama nuntakna tangin nangma nuntakna, ama mite’ tangin nangma mite pai ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa a inn-ah a lungkim lo, maikhingin pai a, Samaria a tung hi.
Tua laitakin Jezreel khuami Naboth in Samaria kumpi Ahab’ kumpi inn gei-ah leenggui lo khat nei hi.

Hih thu teng khit ciangin Ahab in Naboth kiangah, “Ka inn tawh kinai ahih manin anteh huan dingin ka neih theih nadingin na leenggui lo hong pia in; keimah in tua tang dingin leenggui lo hoih zaw khat kong pia ding hi; ahih kei leh zong nang adingin a hoih zawk ding leh a man ding sum kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Naboth in Ahab kiangah, “Ka pu ka pate’ gamh nang tungah kong piak ding Topa in hong kham hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jezreel khuami Naboth in ama tungah a thugenna hangin hehna le maikhinna tawh Ahab a inn-ah ciah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Ka pu ka pate’ gamh nang tungah kong pia kei ding hi,” ci hi. Amah a lupna tungah lumin a mai hei a, an ne lo hi.
Ahih hangin a zi Jezebel ama kiangah hong pai-in, “An a ne lo zah dingin bang hangin na lungsim tua zahin heh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Keimah in Jezreel khuami Naboth kiangah thu genin, ‘Sum tawh lei dingin na leenggui lo hong pia in; ahih kei leh zong, na lungkim leh tua tang dingin leenggui lo dang khat kong pia ding hi,’ ka ci hi. Amah in hong dawngin, ‘Nang tungah ka leenggui lo kong pia kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a zi Jezebel in, “Tu laitakin Israel mite a ukpa hi lo na hi hiam? Tho-in an ne inla, na lungsim nuamsak in. Keimah in Jezreel khuami Naboth’ leenggui lo nangma tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Ahab’ minin laikhakte gelhin ama min gelhna tawh tua laite tungah gelh a, ama khuapi sungah Naboth tawh a teeng upate le uliante tungah tua laite a khak hi.
Amah in a laite sungah, “An tan ding thu zasak unla, mite’ lak a sangna munah Naboth koih un.
