Ama mai-ah mi ginalo nih koihin ama langkhat ah mawhna zong sakin, ‘Nang in Pasian le kumpipa na samsia hi,’ cisak un. Tua ciangin amah la khia unla denglum un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama khuapi mi, ama khuapi sungah a teeng upate le uliante in amaute tungah Jezebel’ thupuak bangin hih uh hi. Amaute tungah a khak laite sungah a kigelh mah bangin,
amaute in an tan ding thu zasak uh a, mite’ lak a sangna munah Naboth koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin mi ginalo nihte hong pai-in ama mai-ah tu uh hi. Tua ciangin mi ginalo nihte in mite’ omin Naboth’ mawhna zong uh a, “Naboth in Pasian le kumpipa samsia hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khuapi pualamah amah paipih uh a, suang tawh amah denglum uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Jezebel kiangah thu puakin, “Suang tawh Naboth kideng khinzo a, amah sita hi,” a ci uh hi.

Jezebel in Naboth suang tawh kidengin a sihna thu a zak phetin Ahab kiangah, “Tho in; sum tawh lei dingin nangma tungah hong piak nop loh, Jezreel khuami Naboth’ leenggui lo tang in; bang hang hiam cih le Naboth nungta nawn lo hi; sita hi,” a ci hi.
Naboth a sihna thu Ahab in a zakphetin, a luah dingin Jezreel khuami Naboth’ leenggui lo ah a paisuk dingin a tho hi.
Tua ciangin Tishbe khuami Elijah tungah Topa’ thu hong tunga,
“Tho inla, Samaria-ah a om Israel kumpi Ahab a dawntuah dingin paisuk in. Naboth’ leenggui lo a la dingin tua lai-ah amah om hi.

Nangmah in ama kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “That khinin zong luahkhin na hi hiam?” ci hi,’ na ci ding hi. Tua ciangin ama kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Uite in Naboth’ sisan a liahna munah uite in nangma sisan liak ding uh hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Ahab in Elijah a muh ciangin, “Ka galpa aw, kei hong mu na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Topa’ muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin nangmah kipiatawm na hih manin nang kong mu hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nangma tungah siatna kong tungsak ding hi. Nang kong phiat khia siang dinga, Israel sungah nangma mi sal le sal ahi lo mi pasal khempeuh ka beisak ding hi.
Kei nong hehsakna hang le Israel na khialhsakna hangin Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ innkuan le Ahijah’ tapa Baasha’ innkuan bangin nangma innkuan ka bawl ding hi.
Jezebel’ thu zong Topa in genin, ‘Uite in Jezreel khua sungah Jezebel ne ding uh hi,’ ci hi.
Khuapi sungah Ahab’ innkuan a si peuhpeuh uite in ne ding uh hi; gamlakah a si nangma innkuan peuhpeuh huihlak vasate in ne ding uh hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
Ama zi Jezebel in a hanthot Ahab bangin Topa’ muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin a mahmah a kipiatawm mi kuamah dang om lo hi.
Topa in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawl khiat Amor mite mah bangin milimte zui-in a kihhuai mahmahin a gamta hi.
Ahab in hih thute a zak ciangin a puante balkek a, a pum tungah puanhampi silhin, an tangin puanhampi tungah lum a, maikhingin a vak kawikawi hi.
Tu-in Tishbe khuami Elijah tungah Topa’ thu hong tunga,

“Keima mai-ah bangzahin Ahab a kiniamkhiatna na mu hiam? Keima mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat ahih manin ama hun sungin siatna ka tungsak kei ding hi. Ahih hangin a tapa’ hun sungin ama innkuan tungah siatna ka tungsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kum thum sung Syria le Israel gal kido loin om uh hi.
Ahih hangin a kum thumna kumin Israel kumpi Ahab kiangah Judah kumpi Jehoshafat va paisuk hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, “Ramoth-gilead eima a’ hi a, eite pau loin omin Syria kumpipa’ khut sung panin i lakkhiat lohna thu na thei uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Ramoth-gilead-ah galsim dingin kei nong zui ding hiam?” a ci hi. Jehoshafat in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Kei a kipan ka mite le ka sakolte nangma a’ ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Topa thu dong masa in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in kamsangte mihing zali bang khawmin amaute tungah, “Ramoth-gilead a sim dingin ka kuan ding hiam, ahih kei le ka thuak ding hiam,” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Kuanto in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jehoshafat in, “Thu i dot theih ding Topa’ kamsang adang khat beek om nawn lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Topa thu i dot theih nading, Imlah’ tapa Mikaiah a kici mi khat omlai hi. Ahih hangin amah in kei’ thu a hoih gen ngei loin a sia gen den ahih manin amah ka mudah hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in, “Kumpipa in tua bangin ci kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in ulian khat samin, “Manlangin Imlah’ tapa Mikaiah hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Samaria kulhpi lutna ancilna-ah Israel kumpipa le Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat a kumpi tokhom tung uhah tu-in kumpi puan tawh kizemin om uh a, kamsang khempeuh in amau’ mai-ah thu gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Khenaanah’ tapa Zedekiah in ama adingin sik kite bawl a, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Amaute na zawh matengin hihte tawh Syria mite na nawt ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Kamsang khempeuh in zong tua bangmahin genin, “Ramoth-gilead-ah kuanto inla gualzo in; Topa in kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah a sam dingin a pai kamtai pa in ama kiangah, “Thu kikhatin kamsangte’ thugen pen kumpipa adingin a hoihlam ahi hi. Amaute bangin nang zong gen inla, a hoih lamin gen in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Mikaiah in, “Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin, Topa in kei tungah hong gen thu ka gen ding hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa kiangah amah a tun ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Mikaiah aw, Ramoth-gilead-ah galsim dingin i kuan ding hiam, ahih kei le i thuak ding hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Kuanto inla va gualzo ve. Topa in kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi ven,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Topa’ min tawh thudang gen loin thuman bek kei tungah nong gen nading bangzah vei hong thuhilh ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Tuucing a nei lo tuute bangin mualte tungah Israel mi khempeuh a kithehthang ka mu hi. Topa in, ‘Hihte in makai nei lo hi; amaute lungnuam takin a inn ciat uhah ciah hen,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Amah in kei’ thu a hoih gen loin a sia gen ding hi, nang kiangah hong ci khin hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thu ngai in: Topa a kumpi tokhom tungah tu-in, ama taklam le a veilamah vantung mihonpi a ding ka mu hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, ‘Amah kuanto-in Ramoth-gilead-ah a va sih nadingin kua in Ahab va zol ding hiam?’ ci hi. Khat in thu khat genin adang khat in thudang khat gen hi.
Tua ciangin kha khat hong madawkin Topa’ mai-ah dinga, ‘Keimah in amah ka va zol ding hi,’ ci hi.

Topa in ama kiangah, ‘Bang lam tawh zol ding na hi hiam?’ a ci hi. Amah in, ‘Keimah pai khia-in, ama kamsangte khempeuh sungah a zuau kha ka va hi ding hi,’ ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Nangmah in amah a va zol ding na hi a, nangmah in na zo ding hi; pai khia inla tua bangin va hih in,’ ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in en in, Topa in hih na kamsangte khempeuh’ sungah zuaugen kha khat koih khin hi. Topa in nang tawh kisai-in a sia gen khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Khenaanah’ tapa Zedekiah a nai-ah hong pai-in Mikaiah a paang bengin, “Nang’ tungah thu a gen dingin Topa’ kha in cikin kei hong nusia-in nang kiang hong tung ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “En in, nangmah a bu dingin inndei nungah na pai ni ciangin na thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in, “Mikaiah man unla, khuapisung a ukpa Amon le kumpipa’ tapa Joash kiangah paipihkik un.
Tua ciangin, ‘Kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi: “Hih mipa thong sungah koih unla, lungnuamin kei kong ciahkik matengin anletui tawmno cik bek tawh vak un,” ci hi,’ va ci un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Lungnuam takin nong ciahkik leh Topa in kei’ tungtawnin thu hong gen lo ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “A kuamah peuh in hih ka thugen za un,” cithuah lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa le Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat, Ramoth-gilead-ah kuanto uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Kei ka mel seelin gal sungah kong kuan dinga, ahih hangin nangmah in na kumpi puante nong silh ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa in a mel seelin gal sungah kuan hi.
Tu-in Syria kumpipa in ama leeng a uk mi sawmthum le nihte thu pia-in, “A neu ahi a, a lian tawh ahi zongin kido loin, Israel kumpipa bek tawh na kido ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Leeng a ukte in Jehoshafat a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Israel kumpipa hi taktak hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah a do dingin amaute kihei uh hi; tua ciangin Jehoshafat awng khia hi.
Israel kumpipa ahih lohna leeng a ukte in a theih uh ciangin amah a delhna panun amaute nungkik uh hi.

Ahih hangin mi khat in a thal mawk lot a, a galhiam awmdal thep kikalah lutin Israel kumpipa kha hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a leeng hawlpa kiangah, “Kei liam ka hih manin hong kihei inla, gal sung panin hong pua khia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ni-in galkidona lian a, nitak a a sih dong Syria-te’ lam maingatin a leeng sungah Israel kumpipa kingamin a om hi. A liamma panin a si luangte leeng taw lamah luang khia hi.
Nitum pawlin galkapte lakah kikona khat hong om a, “Mi khempeuh ama khuapi-ah, mi khempeuh ama gamah!” kici hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa si a, Samaria-ah kipaipih a, amaute in Samaria-ah kumpipa vui uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Samaria bual gei-ah a leeng sil uh a, Topa in a gensa thu tawh kizui-in uite in a sisan liak tumin numei paktatte tua sungah kisil uh hi.
Tu-in Ahab’ gamtatna a omlaite, a hih khempeuh, ama lamsa saiha inn le ama lam khuapi khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua bangin Ahab si a, ama tangin a tapa Ahaziah in uk hi.
Israel kumpi Ahab’ kum lina kumin Asa’ tapa Jehoshafat in Judah gamah uk ding kipan hi.
Gam uk dingin a kipatin Jehoshafat kum sawmthum le nga pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnih le nga sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Azubah hi a, Shilhi’ tanu ahi hi.

Amah in a pa Asa’ khekhap tawn a, tua lampi panin pial loin, Topa’ muhna-ah a manin gamta hi. Ahi zongin mual tunga biaknate kila khia lo a, mite in tuate tungah biakna pia lai-in paknamtui hal uh hi.
Jehoshafat in Israel kumpipa tawh zong kilemna a bawl hi.
Tu-in Jehoshafat’ gamtatna a omlaite, amah in a lah a thahatna le amah in a galdona, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
A pa Asa’ hun lai-in a omlai pasal paktat pawlte amah in gam sung panin beisak hi.
Edom-ah kumpi om lo a, Judah kumpipa’ khutnuai-a a huhpa khat in uk hi.
Jehoshafat in kham zongin Ofir-ah a pai dingin Tarshish teembawte bawl hi. Ahih hangin Eziongeber-ah teembawte sia ahih manin amaute pai lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ahab’ tapa Ahaziah in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Teembawte sungah nangma nasemte tawh keima nasemte paikhawmsak in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Jehoshafat ut lo hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat si a, David khuapi Jerusalem-ah a pate tawh kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jehoram in a uk hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat’ kum sawm le kum sagihna kumin Ahab’ tapa Ahaziah in Samaria panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in Israel tungah kum nih sung uk hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta a, ama nu le ama pa le Israel a khialsak Jeroboam’ khekhap mah tawn hi.
Amah in Baal na semin bia a, a pa mah bangin a hihna khempeuh ah Israel Pasian, Topa hehsak hi.
Ahab a sih khit ciangin Moab gam in Israel lehdo hi.

Samaria-a a inndei tungnung innliim panin Ahaziah kia-in a liam hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in kamtaite sawlin amaute kiangah, “Pai un, hih natna panin ka damkik zo ding hiam cih thu Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah va dong un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Topa’ vantungmi in Tishbe mi Elijah kiangah, “Ding in, Samaria kumpipa’ kamtaite a dawn dingin paito-in amaute kiangah, ‘Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah thu a dong dingin na pai nadingun Israel sungah Pasian om nawn lo ahi hiam?’ ci in.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Nang pen tu-a na liamna panin na damkik zo nawn kei dinga, na si taktak ding hi, ci hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Elijah zong pai-in a gen hi.
Kamtaite zong kumpipa kiangah hong ciahkik uh a, amah in amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin hong ciahkik na hi uh hiam?” na ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Kote a dawn dingin mi khat hong pai-in kote kiangah, ‘Note hong sawl kumpipa kiangah paikik unla, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah thu a dong dingin mi na sawl nadingin Israel sungah Pasian om nawn lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin tu-a na liamna panin na damkik zo nawn kei dinga, na si taktak ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note a dawn dingin hong pai-in hih thute a gen pa a bangci mi ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in amah dawngin, “Amah in samulpuan khat silh a, a kawngah savun kawnggak gak hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Amah pen Tishbe mi Elijah ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah mihing sawmnga a ukpa a mihing sawmnga tawh a sawl hi. Mual dawn khatah a tu Elijah kiangah amah paito-in ama kiangah, “Pasian’ mipa aw, kumpipa in, ‘Hong paisuk hen,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Elijah in mihing sawmnga a ukpa dawngin, “Kei pen Pasian’ mi khat ka hih leh, vantung panin meikuang hong paisuk henla, nang le na mihing sawmngate hong kaangtum hen,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amah le a mihing sawmngate a kaangtum hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah mihing sawmnga a uk adang khat a mihing sawmnga mah tawh sawlkik hi. Tua ciangin amah paito-in ama kiangah, “Pasian’ mipa aw, kumpipa’ thupiakna hih bang ahi hi: ‘Manlang takin hong paisuk in,’ cihna ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Elijah in amaute dawngin, “Kei pen Pasian’ mi khat ka hih leh, vantung panin meikuang hong paisuk henla, nang le na mihing sawmngate hong kaangtum hen,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin vantung panin Pasian’ meikuang hong paisukin amah le a mihing sawmngate a kaangtum leuleu hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in mihing sawmnga a uk a thumna pa a mihing sawmnga mah tawh sawl leuleu hi. Tua ciangin mihing sawmnga a uk a thumna pa paito a, Elijah’ mai-ah hong pai-in khukdinin hong puk a, amah kunh-in, “Pasian’ mipa aw, nangma tungah kong thum hi, keima nuntakna le nangma nasem hih mihing sawmngate’ nuntakna pammaih sa-in hong hehpih in.
En in, vantung panin meikuang hong paisuk a, mihing sawmnga a uk a masa nihte a mi sawmnga tuak uh tawh kaangtum hi. Ahih hangin ka nuntakna pammaih sa-in hong hehpih in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in Elijah kiangah, “Amah tawh paisuk in; amah kihta kei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin kumpipa kiangah amah tawh paisuk a,

tua ciangin ama kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Nangmah in Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah thu a dong dingin kamtaite na sawl khin hi. Thudot nading Israel sungah Pasian om nawn lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin tu-a na liamna panin nang na damkik zo nawn kei dinga, na si taktak ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Elijah’ gensa Topa’ kammal tawh kizui-in amah si hi. Ahaziah in tapa nei lo ahih manin Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat’ tapa Jehoram’ kum nihna kumin, a sanggampa Joram ama tangin kumpi a suak hi.
Ahaziah’ gamtatna a sepsa a omlaite, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Topa in pingpei-in vantungah Elijah a lak ding lai-in Elijah le Elisha-te Gilgal panin inn zuanin lamkal a om ahi uh hi.

Elijah in Elisha kiangah, “Hih lai-ah khawl in, kong thum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Bethel ciang dong kei hong sawl hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Elisha in, “Topa nungta a, nang mahmah na nuntak mah bangin, nang kong nusia ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute Bethel dongah paisuak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Bethel-ah a om kamsang honkhat Elisha kiangah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Topa in tuni-in nangma kiang panin na topa a lakkhiat ding na thei hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Hi hi, ka thei hi; bangmah gen nawn kei un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in Elisha kiangah, “Elisha aw, hih lai-ah khawl in, kong thum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Jerikho-ah kei hong sawl hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Topa nungta a, nang mahmah na nuntak mah bangin, nang kong nusia ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jerikho-ah amaute tung uh hi.

Jerikho-ah a om kamsang honkhat in Elisha hong naihin ama kiangah, “Topa in tuni-in nangma kiang panin na topa a lakkhiat ding na thei hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Hi hi, ka thei hi; bangmah gen nawn kei un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in ama kiangah, “Hih lai-ah khawl in, kong thum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Jordan-ah kei hong sawl hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Topa nungta a, nang mahmah na nuntak mah bangin, nang kong nusia ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute a nihun pai lai uh hi.
Kamsang mihing sawmnga in zong zui uh a, amau tegel Jordan gei-ah a din laitakun a kiang panun a gamla simah kamsangte a ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in a puantualpi suahin zial a, tua tawh a tui sat hi. Lei keu tungah amau tegel a pai theih matengun a pang khat le a pang langkhat ah a tui kikhen hi.

Amaute a galkah khit uh ciangin Elijah in Elisha kiangah, “Nang kiang panin kei hong kilak khiat ma-in nang adingin kong hihsak ding na deih hong gen in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in, “Kong thum hi, kha thu-ah na vangliatna a zah nih hong luahsak in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “A haksa na khat nong ngen hi. Ahi zongin nangma kiang panin kei hong kilak laitakin kei nong muh leh nang adingin tua thu hong piang ding hi. Ahih hangin kei nong muh kei leh tua bangin hong piang lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a pai kawmkawm a kiho laitakun, mei leeng khat le mei sakolte in amaute nih a khen hi. Tua ciangin vantungah Elijah pingpei-in paito hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in tua mu-in amah kiko a, “Ka pa, ka pa! Israel mite a hupipa! Nang pai ta maw!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in Elijah mu nawn lo hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in a dah manin a puan balkekin phel nih a suak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Elijah tung panin a kia khia puan tawm a, kilehin Jordan gun pangah a ding hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama tung panin a kia khia Elijah’ puan la-in tui sat a, “Elijah’ Pasian, Topa koi-ah om na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in tui a sat khit ciangin a pang khat le a pang langkhat ah a tui kikhen hi. Tua ciangin Elisha pai-in a galkah hi.

Tu-in Jerikho-ah a om kamsangte in amah a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Elijah’ vangliatna Elisha’ tungah om hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah a dawn dingin amaute hong pai uh a, ama mai leilakah amaute a kun uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Tu-in en in, a thahat na nasem mihing sawmnga ka om uh hi; kong thum uh hi, kote hong paisak inla na topa hong zongsak in. Topa’ kha in amah manin mual tung ahih kei leh guam sungah amah khia hi kha ding hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Na zong kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in amah a maizum dongin a cih teitei uh ciangin amah in, “Pai un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute mihing sawmnga a pai uh hi. Amaute in ni thum sung amah zong uh a, ahih hangin amah mu zo lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah Jerikho-ah a khawl sungin ama kiangah amaute hong paikik uh a, amah in amaute kiangah, “Note kiangah, ‘Pai kei un,’ hong ci hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tu-in khuapi mite in Elisha kiangah, “En in, topa in na muh bangin, hih khuapi omzia nuam hi. Ahih hangin a tui sia a, hih gamah kipung thei lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Hai thak khat hong paipih unla, a sungah ci koih un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in ama kiangah paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin tuinakah amah pai-in a sungah ci lawnin, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Hih tui a hoihin ka bawl khin hi. Tu-a kipanin sihna ahi a, tatolhna ahi zongin piangsak nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Elisha’ kampauna tawh kizui-in tuni dongin a tui hoih hi.
Amah tua lai panin Bethel-ah paito hi. Lampi-ah a paitoh laitakin khuapi panin naupangneu pawlkhat hong pai khia-in amah zahko uh a, “Paito in, nang lukolh pa” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah a kiimah khuadak a, amah in amaute a muh ciangin Topa’ min tawh amaute a samsia hi. Tua ciangin gamlak panin vompi nih hong pai-in naupang sawm le nih balnen hi.
Tua lai panin amah Karmel Mual-ah paisuak a, tua ciangin Samaria-ah a ciahkik hi.
Judah kumpi Jehoshafat’ kum sawm le kum giatna kumin Samaria sung Israel tungah Ahab’ tapa Joram kumpi suak a, amah in kum sawm le kum nih sung uk hi.
Ama nu le ama pa zahin a siat loh hangin Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi. Amah in a pa’ bawlsa Baal biakna song koih khia tei a,
ahi zongin amah in Israel a khialsak Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhna mah pom lai hi; tua panin amah kihem khia lo hi.
Moab kumpipa Mesha pen tuu khawi pa ahi hi. Amah in Israel kumpipa tungah kum simin tuuno tul zakhat le tuutal tul zakhat’ mul a piak ding ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Ahab a sih khit ciangin Moab kumpipa in Israel kumpipa lehdo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua laitakin Samaria panin kumpi Joram kuan khia-in Israel mi khempeuh khawm hi.

Tua ciangin amah pai-in Judah kumpi Jehoshafat kiangah thu zasak a, “Moab kumpipa in kei hong lehdo hi; Moab gam a sim dingin kei tawh nong kuan ding hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Kong kuan ding hi; keimah a kipan ka mite le ka sakolte nangma a’ ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Koi lam tawnin kuan ding ihi hiam?” a ci hi. Joram in dawngin, “Edom gam lam tawnin i kuan ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah kumpipa le Edom kumpipa tawh Israel kumpipa a kuan hi. Amaute ni sagih sung a kual pai khit uh ciangin galkapte hitaleh amaute a zui ganhingte ading hitaleh tui om lo hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in, “Ala! Moab kumpipa’ khut sungah a hong piak dingin Topa in ei kumpi thumte hong sam hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in, “Ama tungtawnin Topa’ tungah thu i dot theih nadingin hih lai-ah Topa’ kamsang om lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa’ nasemte khat in dawngin, “Elijah a huhpa om a, Shafat’ tapa Elisha ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in, “Amah pen Topa’ kamsang man taktak ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa le Jehoshafat le Edom kumpipa ama kiangah paisuk uh hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Nang tawh bang kisai ka hi hiam? Na nu’ kamsangte le na pa’ kamsangte’ kiangah pai in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Israel kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Hilo hi; Moab’ khut sungah hong piak dingin ko kumpi thumte a hong sampa pen Topa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elisha in, “Ama na ka sep Vanglian Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin, Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat thupi ngaihsutna nei lo hi leng nang hong en loin, zong kong mu kei ding hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in lasakna a tumsiam khat hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Lasakna a tumsiam pa in a tum ciangin Topa’ vangliatna ama tungah hong tung hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Hih a keu lui taw pen tuilite tawh a kidimin ka bawl ding hi,’ ci hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Huih ahi a, guah ahi zongin na mu kei dinga, ahih hangin nangmah in na dawn ding, na gan hon le na ganpite in a dawn dingin lui taw pen tui tawh kidim ding hi,’ ci hi.
Hih pen Topa’ muhna-ah a thuneu khat ahi hi. Amah in Moab mite zong nangma khut sungah hong pia dinga,

nangmah in kulhpi a nei khuapi khempeuh le khuapi deihhuai khempeuh zo-in, singkung hoih khempeuh phukin, tuinak khempeuh na khakcip dinga, leitang hoih khempeuh suangtum tawh na kidimsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
A zingsang ciangin biakpiak hunin, gam sungteng tui tawh a kidim matengin Edom panin tui hong luang hi.
Amaute a sim dingin kumpite a kuantohna thu Moab mite khempeuh in a zak uh ciangin, a moi pen panin a ham pen dongin galhiam a tawi thei khempeuh kisamkhia uh a, gamgi-ah kikhawm uh hi.
A zing ciang zingsang tungin amaute tho-in, tui tungah ni a taan ciangin, Moab mite in amau’ galkhat ah a om tuite pen sisan bangin a sanin mu uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in, “Hua pen sisan ahi hi; kumpite khatlekhat kido-in, khatlekhat kithat hi taktak ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, Moab-te aw, vankinusiate va la ni!” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Israel-te’ giahphual ah amaute a tun uh ciangin, amaute’ mai-ah a taikhiat matengin Israel mite hong kipanin Moab mite a do uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute mainawtin pai-in a paikawmun Moab mite that uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in khuapite lawnthal uh a, a suang in a khuhcip dongin leitang tung khempeuh ah mi khempeuh in suang lawn uh hi. Amaute in tuinak khempeuh khakcip uh a, singkung hoih khempeuh phuk uh hi. Kirhareseth-ah a suangtumte bek a om dongin suanglotna a tawite in umcihin vat gawp uh hi.
Moab kumpipa in a lelhlam a kitheih ciangin, Edom kumpipa’ san tak a phu khia dingin namsau tawi mihing zasagih a la hi. Ahih hangin amaute in phu khia zo lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama tangin a uk ding a ta upa pen la-in kulh tungah meihal biakna-in a pia hi. Israel mite in tua bangin a gamtatna a muh uh ciangin a lungsim uh sukha mahmah a, amau’ kiang panin nungkikin a gamah a ciahkik uh hi.

Tu-in kamsang honte sung pan mi khat’ zi Elisha’ tungah kiko-in, “Na nasem ka pasal si hi. Na nasem pa in Topa a zahtakna na thei hi. Ahih hangin ka tapate nih sila dingin a la dingin a leibatna pa hong pai hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in tua numei kiangah, “Nang adingin bang hong hihsak thei ding ka hi hiam? Inn sungah bang nei na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Na nasem nu in sathau biing khat cih sim loh inn sungah bangmah dang nei lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “A pua-ah pai khia inla, beel hawm a tawm lua lo, na veengte khempeuh’ beel va kawm in.
Tua ciangin sungtumin, nang le na tapate kong kikhaknelh unla, hih beelte khempeuh sungah sung in. Beel khat a dim simin tuamkoih pahpah in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ama kiang panin tua numei pai khia-in amah le a tapate kong kikhaknelh uh hi. Amah in a sun’ laitakin a tapate in ama kiangah a beelte paipih uh hi.
Beelte a dim ciangin amah in a tapa khat kiangah, “Beel dang khat hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a tapa in, “Beel adang om nawn lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin sathau a luan a khawl hi.
Tua nu hong pai-in Pasian’ mipa kiangah a thu teng gen a, tua ciangin amah in, “Pai in; a sathau zuakin na leibate loh in. Nang le na tapate, a omlaite tawh na nungta ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Ni khat Shunem-ah Elisha paisuak a, tua lai-ah a hau numei khat teengin tua nu in an ne dingin amah a sam hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua lam a nawk peuhpeuh ciangin an ne dingin tua lai-ah baang zel hi.
Tua ciangin tua numei in a pasal kiangah, “Tu-in en in, hih lai mun hong nawk tawntungpa pen Pasian’ mi siangtho hi, ci-in ka thei hi.

Eite kiangah amah hong pai peuhpeuh ciangin a tuntheih nadingin innkhumzangah kawm a nei inndeineu khat bawlin tua sungah ama adingin lupna khat, sabuai khat, tutphah khat le meivak khat koihsak ni,” a ci hi.
Nikhat amah tua lai-ah hong pai-in inndei sungah lutin
tua lai-ah tawlnga hi. Tua ciangin amah in a nasem pa Gehazi kiangah, “Hih Shunem mi sam in,” a ci hi. Amah in tua numei a sap ciangin ama mai-ah tua nu hong ding hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in ama kiangah, “Tu-in tua nu kiangah hih bangin gen in: Thei in, kote adingin hih haksatna khempeuh na thuak hi. Nang adingin bang hong kihihsak ding deih na hi hiam? Kumpipa kiang ahih kei leh galkap a ukpa kiangah nang tangin thu khat peuhpeuh hong kigensak ding na deih a om hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Kei pen ka mipihte lakah teeng ka hih manin bangmah ka kisam kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Tua bang ahihleh tuanu adingin bang kihihsak thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Gehazi in dawngin, “Thu khat bek om hi. Tua nu in tapa nei lo a, a pasal teekta hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Tua nu sam in,” a ci hi. Amah in tua nu a sap ciangin kongkalai-ah a hong ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “A hun hong tun ciangin tapa khat na tawi ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in, “Hilo hi, ka topa, Pasian’ mipa aw; na nasem nu tungah zuau kei in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin tua nu in nau paii a, Elisha in ama tungah a gensa bangin a hun a tunkik ciangin amah in tapa khat a nei hi.
Naupang a gol ciangin ni khat a pa kiang anlate lakah a pai hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a pa kiangah, “Aw, ka lutang, ka lutang!” a ci hi. A pa in a nasem pa kiangah, “A nu kiangah va pua in,” a ci hi.
Amah in domin a nu kiangah a paipih ciangin a ang sungah sun dong naupang tawi a, tua ciangin a si hi.
Tua ciangin tua nu paito-in Pasian’ mipa lupna tungah amah koih a, amah kong khaknelhin a pai khia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a pasal samin, “Manlang takin Pasian’ mipa kiangah pai-in kong ciahkik theih nadingin nasemte khat le late khat hong puak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Bang hangin tuni-in ama kiangah pai ding na hi hiam? Khadet ni ahi a, Sabbath ni ahi zongin hi lo hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hong hoih na ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah inla van vawhin a nasem pa kiangah, “Gan nawh in; kong gen kei nakleh kei adingin a pai khiamsak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah ding khia a, Karmel Mual a, Pasian’ mipa kiangah a pai hi. Pasian’ mipa in amah hong pai a muh ciangin a nasem pa Gehazi kiangah, “En in, galah Shunem nu hong pai hi.
Amah a dawn dingin thakhatin va tai inla ama kiangah, ‘Na dam hiam? Na pasal a dam hiam? Naupang a dam hiam?’ va ci in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in, “Hoih hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa kiang mualtungah tua nu a tun ciangin tua nu in ama khe len hi. Tua ciangin amah a sawn khia dingin Gehazi hong pai hi. Ahih hangin Pasian’ mipa in, “Amah tuaci omsak in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah nakpitakin lungkham hi. Topa in kei tungah a thu hong im a, kei kiangah hong gen lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua nu in, “Ka topa’ tung pan tapa hong ngen ka hi hiam? Kei hong khem kei in, hong ci hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in Gehazi kiangah, “Na kawng gak inla na khutah ka ciangkhut tawi-in pai in. Mi khatpeuh in nang hong hopih leh zong dawng kei in. Tua ciangin naupang’ mai tungah ka ciangkhut va nga in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin naupang’ nu in, “Topa nungta a, nang mahmah na nuntak mah bangin, nang kong nusia kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin tua nu a zui hi.

Gehazi na mapai suakin naupang’ maitang tungah a ciangkhut nga a, ahih hangin awging ahi a, nuntakna lim ahi zongin om lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah a dawn dingin hong kilehkikin ama kiangah, “Naupang khanglo nai lo hi,” a ci hi.
Inn sungah Elisha hong tun ciangin amah in a lupna tungah a si-in a lum naupang a mu hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah bek lutin kong a kikhaknelh hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ tungah thu ngen hi.

Tua ciangin amah paito-in naupang’ tungah bok a, ama kam le naupang’ kam tuahin, a naupang’ mit tungah ama mitte omsak a, a naupang’ khutte tungah ama khutte omsak hi. Tua ciangin ama tungah kikhuang a, naupang a ci hong lum hi.
Tua ciangin amah dingtokikin inn sungah khatvei vak kawikawi a, tua ciangin paito-in ama tungah kikhuang leuleu hi. Naupang sagihvei hong hetchiai-in a mit a hak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Gehazi samin, “Shunem numei sam in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua nu a sam hi. Tua nu ama kiangah hong pai ciangin amah in, “Na tapa la in,” a ci hi.
Tua nu hong pai-in ama khe-ah pukin leilakah a kun hi. Tua ciangin a tapa la-in a pai khia hi.

Tua gam sungah kialpi a tun laitakin Gilgal-ah Elisha hong paikik hi. Kamsangte ama mai-ah tu-in thu a ngaih laitakin amah in a nasemte kiangah, “Beelpi suang unla kamsangte ading meh huan un,” a ci hi.
Amaute khat meh zong dingin gamlakah pai a, vatak-um gui khat mu-in tua tung panin a ang dimin umgah lo a, tuate bang hiam cih thei lopi-in hong pai-in meh beel sungah atnen hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in mite’ nek dingin hong thuk khia uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in meh a nek laitakun amaute kiko-in, “Pasian’ mipa aw, an sungah gu om!” a ci uh hi. Amaute in ne thei lo uh hi.

Amah in, “Tua ahihleh a an tawm hong la un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in beel sungah tua an lawn a, “Amaute in a nek theih nadingin mite adingin thuk khia un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin bangmah ci nawn lo hi.

Mi khat Baalshalishah panin hong pai-in Pasian’ mipa kiangah anpal anlum, mangbuhham lum sawmnih le anvui a thak a van sungah hong pua hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in a nasem pa kiangah, “Amaute in a nek theih nadingun kamsangte tungah pia in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a nasem pa in, “Mihing za khatte’ mai-ah keimah in hih bangci lui theih ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Ahi zongin amah in, “Amaute in a nek theih nadingun mite tungah tuate pia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in, ‘Amaute in ne-in khamval ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” a cikik hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute mai-ah tua an a lui hi. Tua ciangin amaute in ne uh a, Topa’ gensa bangin pawlkhat a vallai hi.

Syria kumpipa’ galkap a uk Naaman pen kumpipa’ maipha a ngah ulianpi khat ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama hangin Syria mite gualzawhna pia hi. Amah a thahat a vanglian khat hi a, ahih hangin amah a phak ahi hi.
Syria mite in a galsimna khat uhah Israel gam panin numeino khat ciahpih uh a, tua nu in Naaman’ zi na’ a sem hi.
Amah in a tonu kiangah, “Samaria-ah a om kamsangpa tawh ka topa kimu thei leh! Amah in a phakna damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Naaman in hih thu a zak ciangin sungtumin a topa kiangah, “Tua bang tua bangin Israel gam numeino in thu gen hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Syria kumpipa in, “Tu-in pai in. Israel kumpipa kiangah lai khat ka khak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in ngun talen sawm, kham shekel tulguk le pawipuan sawm a keng hi.
Amah in Israel kumpipa tungah laikhak keng a, tua sungah, “Hih laikhak na ngah ciangin, ama phakna na damsak theih nadingin ka nasem pa Naaman nangma kiangah kong sawlna thu thei in,” a ci hi.

Israel kumpipa in a laikhak a sim ciangin amah in a puante balkekin, “Mi khat a phaknatna damsak dingin hih mipa in kei tungah hih thu hong puak nadingin a that ding le a nungtasak dingin kei, Pasian ka hi hiam? Ngaihsun dih un. Kei tawh kitotna ding a zonna thei un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Israel kumpipa in a puante a balkekna thu Pasian’ mipa Elisha in a zak ciangin amah in kumpipa kiangah mi sawlin, “Bang hangin na puante balkek na hi hiam? Israel sungah kamsang khat a omna thu amah in a theih nadingin tu-in kei kiangah amah hong paisak in,” cisak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a sakolte le a leengte tawh Naaman hong pai-in Elisha’ kongah a khawl hi.
Tua ciangin Elisha in ama kiangah kamtai khat sawlin, “Pai inla, Jordan gun sungah sagihvei va kisil in. Tua ciangin nangma cilesa a ngei hong bangkikin, nang na siang ding hi,” cisak hi.

Ahih hangin Naaman hehin pai khia a, “En un, amah kei kiangah hong pai khia-in, ka gei-ah hong dingin, a Pasian a Topa’ min loin, a natna mun tungah a khut vanin, kei miphak pa hong damsak taktak ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.

Israel tuite khempeuh sangin Damaskas gam a om Abana le Farpar gun tuite hoih zaw hi lo ahi hiam? Tuate’ sungah kisilin siang thei lo ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kihei-in pai khia hi.

Ahih hangin a nasemte a nai-ah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Ka topa aw, kamsangpa in na lian khat a sem dingin hong sawl hileh sem ding hi lo na hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin amah in nang kiangah, ‘Kisil inla siang in,’ hong cih ciangin na hih ding bangzah ta-in kilawm zaw hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian mipa’ kamgen bangin amah paisukin Jordan gun sungah sagihvei kidiah hi. Tua ciangin a cilesa naupangno cilesa bangin a ngei bangkikin amah a siang hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa kiangah amah le a pawlte khempeuh kilehkikin ama mai-ah ding uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “En in, leitung mundang khempeuh ah Pasian om loin, Israel sung bekah om hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na nasem pa tung panin letsong khat hong sang in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “A na ka sep Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin, bangmah kong sang kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a lakna ding kunh teitei a, ahih hangin amah in nial veve hi.

Tua ciangin Naaman in, “Tua ahihleh kong thum hi, na nasem pa tungah la-sakol nih puakkhop leitang hong pia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tu a kipanin na nasem pa in meihal biakna ahi a, biakpiakna ahi zongin pasian dangte khat peuhpeuh tungah pia loin Topa’ tung bekah pia ding hi.

Ahi zongin hih thu-ah Topa in na nasem pa a mawhna hong maisak hen: Rimmon biakinn sungah a bia dingin ka topa a pai ciangin zui ding ka hih manin Rimmon biakinn sungah kei ka kunna thu-ah Topa in a nasem pa hong maisak hen,” a ci hi.
Amah in ama kiangah, “Nuamtakin pai in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin ama kiang panin Naaman tawmkhat a pai khit ciangin,

Pasian’ mipa Elisha’ nasem Gehazi in, “Ama hong puak nate sang loin ka topa in Syria mi hih Naaman ciahsak mawk hi. Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin, amah nungdelhin ama tung panin na khat peuhpeuh ka ngah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gehazi in Naaman nungdelh hi. Tua ciangin ama nungah mi khat hong taina Naaman in a muh ciangin amah a dawn dingin a leeng panin kum a, “Thu a hoihkim hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “A vekpi-in hoih hi. Ka topa in, ‘Kamsangte nih Efraim mual tung gam panin kei kiangah tu mahmahin hong tung hi. Kong thum hi, amaute tungah ngun talen khat le pawipuan nih pia in,’ a ci dingin hong sawl hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Naaman in, “Talen nih hong sang nuam hoh in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a san ding kunh a, ngun talen nih ip nihin henin pawipuan nih tawh, a nasem nihte tungah a guan hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Gehazi’ mai-ah tuate pua uh hi.
Tua ciangin mualtungah amah a tun ciangin amah in amaute tung panin tuate la-in inn sungah koih hi. Tua ciangin a mite sawl khia a, amaute kihem uh hi.
Amah sungtumin a topa’ mai-ah dinga, tua ciangin Elisha in ama kiangah, “Gehazi aw, koi-ah pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Na nasem pa koimah pai lo hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Elisha in ama kiangah, “Nangmah a dawn dingin a leeng tung panin mipa a kihei laitakin nang tawh ka kha omkhawm hi lo ahi hiam? Sum le puante, oliv huante le leenggui lote, tuute le bawngtalte, nasem numeite le nasem pasalte san ding hun ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin nangma tung le na suanlekhakte tungah Naaman’ phakna hong belh tawntung tahen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama omna panin vuk bangin kangin a phakin a pai khia hi.
Ni khat, kamsangte khat in Elisha kiangah, “Thei in, nangma khutnuai-a om kote’ tenna mun kote adingin neulua hi.
Kote Jordan-ah hong paisakin kote in singluang khat ciat la-in ka tenna ding uh mun khat ko hong bawlsak in,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Pai un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute khat in, “Na nasemte tawh kuan kawm ding hong ut in,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Kong kuan ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute tawh amah a kuan hi. Jordan a tun uh ciangin amaute in singphuk uh hi.
Ahih hangin khat in singluang a tan laitakin a heitang leengin tui sungah kia hi. Amah kiko-in, “Ala, ka topa! A kikawm hi ve’n,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa in, “Koi lai-ah kia ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in a kiatna mun ama kiangah a lah ciangin amah in ciangkang khat khiakin tua munah lawn a, a heitang laamtosak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “La to in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut zanin a heitang a la hi.
Khatvei Syria kumpipa le Israel mite kido a, Syria kumpipa le a nasemte thu kikumin, “Tua mun tua munte i panmun ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mipa in Israel kumpipa tungah thu puak a, “Syria-te in hong buksim uh ahih manin hih mun na nawk loh nadingin kingaihsun in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Pasian’ mipa genna mun kiimah a om mite kiangah mi sawlin hilh kholsak hi. Tua ahih manin tua bangin amaute suakta zelzel uh hi.
Tua ciangin hih thu hangin Syria kumpipa nakpitakin patau hi. Amah in a nasemte samin amaute kiangah, “Eite sung panin Israel kumpipa lamah a pangsim mipa hong gen lo ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nasemte khat in, “Kuamah om lo hi, ka topa, kumpipa aw; ahih hangin Israel sungah kamsang Elisha in na lupna inndei sunga na thugente Israel kumpipa tungah gen hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Keimah in mi sawlin amah ka mattheih nadingin pai inla, amah a omna mun va thei in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin ama kiangah, “En in, amah Dothan-ah om hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in sakolte le leengte le galkap hon lianpi khat tua lai-ah a sawl hi. Amaute zanin hong pai-in a khuapi umcih uh hi.

Pasian’ mipa’ nasem pa zingsangin tho baihin a pai khiat ciangin, en in, khuapi kimkotah sakolte le leengte tawh galkap honpi na om hi. Tua ciangin nasem pa in, “Ala, ka topa! Bangcih ding ihi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Kihta kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tawh a omte sangin eite tawh a omte tam zaw hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in thu ngenin, “Topa aw, kong thum hi; amah in a muh theih nadingin ama mitte honsak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in tangvalpa’ mitte honsak a, tua ciangin amah in mu hi. En in, Elisha’ kimkot mual tung khempeuh sakolte le meileengte tawh kidim hi.

Amah a sim dingin Syria-te hong paisuk ciangin Elisha in Topa kiangah thu ngenin, “Hih mite mittawtna tawh vat gawp in, kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Elisha’ thungetna bangin amah in mittawtna tawh amaute vat gawp hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in amaute kiangah, “Hih pen a lampi hi lo a, hih zong a khuapi hi lo hi; hong zui un; na zon uh mipa kiangah note kong paipih ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in Samaria-ah amaute a paipih hi.

Amaute Samaria-ah a lut phetin Elisha in, “Topa aw, amaute in a muh theih nadingun hih mite’ mitte honsak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in amau’ mitte honsak a, tua ciangin amaute in khua mu uh hi. Samaria khua sungah a om ahihna uh thei uh hi.
Israel kumpipa in amaute a muh ciangin amah in Elisha kiangah, “Ka pa aw, amaute ka that ding hiam? Amaute ka that ding hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in dawngin, “Amaute na that kei ding hi. Na namsau le na thal tawh loin galmatin na laksate that ding na hi hiam? Amaute in an ne-in tui a dawn khit ciangin a topa uh kiangah a ciahkik theih nadingun amaute’ mai-ah anletui lui in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute adingin pawi lianpi khat bawl hi. Amaute in an ne-in tui a dawn khit uh ciangin amaute sawl khia a, tua ciangin a topa uh kiangah amaute a ciah uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel gam a sim dingin Syria-te hong pai nawn lo uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Syria kumpipa Benhadad in a galkap buppi khawmin paito a, Samaria a umcih hi.
Amaute in a umcih hun sungteng, la lutang khat ngun shekel sawmgiat, gam lo-uih bul hai khat ngun shekel nga-in a kizuak dongin Samaria-ah kialpi lianpi a tung hi.
Israel kumpipa kulhzangah a pai laitakin numei khat ama tungah kiko-in, “Hong huh in, ka topa, Aw Kumpipa!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa in nang hong huh ding ahih kei leh koi lai panin nang hong huh ding ka hi hiam? An ahi a, leenggahzu ahi zongin nei ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in tua nu dongin, “Na lungkhamna bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Hih numei in kei kiangah, ‘Tuni-in amah i nek theih nadingin na tapa hong pia in; zing ciangin keima tapa i ne ding hi,’ hong ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kote in ka tapa’ sa huanin ka ne uh hi. A zing ciangin keimah in ama kiangah, ‘Amah i nek theih nadingin na tapa hong pia in,’ ka ci hi. Ahih hangin tua nu in a tapa na seel hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in tua numei’ thugente a zak ciangin ama puante balkek hi. Kulhzangah kumpipa pai kawikawi a, mite khuadakin amah a et uh ciangin amah in a sung lamah puanhampi a silh mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Tuni-in Shafat’ tapa Elisha’ lutang a kitankhiat kei taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei tahen,” a ci hi.

Elisha a inn sungah tu a, upate amah tawh tukhawm uh hi. Tu-in kumpipa in ama omna panin mi khat sawl khia hi. Ahih hangin kamtai pa a tun ma-in Elisha in upate kiangah, “Hih mi that pa in ka lutang a tan khia dingin hong sawlna na mu uh hiam? En un, kamtai pa hong tun ciangin kong khak unla, ama langkhat ah khauhtakin kongkhak lencip un. Ama nungah a topa’ kheging hong kiza hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute tawh amah a kiho laitakin ama kiangah kumpipa hong paisukin, “Hih lungkhamna Topa’ piansak hi lo ahi hiam! Bang hangin Topa in bang khat peuhpeuh a sep ding ngaklai ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Elisha in, “Topa’ thu za in. Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Zing ciang tubang hunin Samaria kulhkongpi-ah annel lawh khat shekel khatin kizuak dinga, mangbuhham lawh nih shekel khatin kizuak ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a ban tungah kumpipa a kingapna galkap ukpa in Pasian’ mipa kiangah, “Topa mahmah in vantung tawlette hong hong taleh zong, hih bang thu hi thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Nangma mit mahmah tawh hih thu na mu dinga, ahih hangin nang in na nekha kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin kulhkongpi lutna-ah a phak mi li om hi. Amaute khatlekhat in, “I sih dongin bang hangin hih lai-ah tu ding ihi hiam?

Eite, ‘Khuapi sungah lut ni,’ ci lehang, khuapi sungah kialpi om a, tua lai-ah i si ding hi. Hih lai-ah tu lehang lah eite i si veve ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in hong pai un. Syria-te’ giahphual ah va pai ni. Amaute in eite hong hingkhawi leh eite i nungta dinga, ahih hangin amaute in eite hong that leh zong a si veve ding mah ihi lel hi,” kici uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute Syria-te’ phualah a pai dingin phalvak tungin tho uh hi. Ahih hangin Syria-te’ phual a nawl a tun uh ciangin tua lai-ah kuamah na om nawn lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in leengte le galkap hon lianpite’ huging Syria galkapte zasak ahih ciangin amaute khatlekhat in, “En un, Israel kumpipa in eite a hong hih dingin Hit kumpite le Egypt kumpite cial hi,” kici uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute phalvak tungin tai-in a puanbukte, a sakolte le a late uh nusia uh a, a phual uh a tuaci bangmahin nusia-in a suahtak nadingun tai uh hi.

Giahphual nawlah hih miphakte hong tun uh ciangin puanbuk khat sungah amaute lutin an ne-in tui dawn uh a, amaute in ngun le kham le puante pua khia-in tuate a seel uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute hong paikikin puanbuk dang khatah lut uh a, tua panin vante pua khia-in seel leuleu uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute khatlekhat in, “A manin i gamta kei hi. Tuni pen thuthak a hoih i theih ni ahi hi. Eite pau loin zingsang khuavak dong ngak lehang gimna i thuak ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in hong pai un. Eite pai-in kumpipa innkuante kiangah va gen ni,” kici uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute hong pai-in kulhkongpi cingte samin amaute kiangah, “Syria-te’ phualah ka va tung uh a, tua lai-ah kuamah kimu lo, bangmah kiza lo, bangmah om lo; ahih hangin sakolte kikhihin, late kikhihin, puanbukte a om bangbangin om hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin kulhkongpi cingte in thu zasak uh a, kumpipa innkuante kiangah hih thute kigen hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa zanin tho-in a nasemte kiangah, “Syria-te in eite’ langkhat ah a vaihawmna kong gen ding hi. Eite i kialna amaute in hong thei uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute gamlakah a bu dingin a phual panin pai khia uh a, ‘Khuapi sung panin amaute a pai khiat uh ciangin amaute a hingin manin khuapi sungah i lut ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsun uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a nasemte khat in, “Mi pawlkhat sakol a omlaite sung panin nga paipihsak ni. Hih lai-ah a om eite pen a sisa Israel mihon buppi tawh a kibang lel ihihna i thei hi. Amaute sawlin en dih ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in sakol tung tuang mi nih sam a, kumpipa in Syria galkapte’ nungah amaute sawl a, “Pai-in va thei un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute Jordan ciang dong va pai uh hi. Syria-te in nawhsa-in a paihkhiat uh puante le nate tawh lamdung khempeuh pak zeizai hi. Tua ciangin kamtaite hong kikin kumpipa kiangah a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin mite pai khia uh a, Syria-te’ phual luh uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ gensa bangin annel lawh khat shekel khatin kizuakin, mangbuhham lawh nih shekel khatin kizuak hi.

A khut tungah a kingapna pa, a ukpa pen kulhkongpi a ukin kumpipa in seh hi. Mite in kulhkongpi-ah amah nawkpai-in a tung sikin pai uh a, ama kiangah kumpipa a paisuk laitakin Pasian’ mipa gensa bangin amah na si hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ mipa in kumpipa kiangah, “Zing ciang tubang hunin Samaria kulhkongpi-ah mangbuhham lawh nih ciangin shekel khatin kizuak dinga, annel lawh khat ciangin shekel khatin kizuak ding hi,” a cih ciangin

galkap ukpa in Pasian’ mipa dawngin, “Topa mahmah in vantung tawlette hong hong hitaleh zong, hih bang thu hi thei ding ahi hiam?” ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Nangma mit mahmah tawh hih thu na mu dinga, ahih hangin nang in na nekha kei ding hi,” ci hi.
Mite in kulhkongpi-ah ama tung sikin pai uh hi. Amah si ahih manin ama tungtawnin tua bangin a kipai ahi hi.

Tu-in Elisha in a tapa a hinkiksak numei kiangah, “Ding in; na innkuan tawh kihem khia inla, na hih theihna peuhpeuhah peem in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kialpi khat tungsak dinga, gam sungah tua kialpi kum sagih sung hong tung ding hi,” ci khinzo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua numei dingin Pasian’ mipa thugen bangin gamta hi. Tua nu a innkuan tawh pai-in Filistia-te gamah kum sagih sung a peem hi.
Kum sagih a cin khit, Filistia-te gam panin tua numei hong ciahkik ciangin, kumpipa kiangah a inn le a leitang a ngen dingin a pai hi.
Tua laitakin Pasian’ mipa’ nasem Gehazi tawh kumpipa kiho a, “Elisha’ sepsa na lian khempeuh hong gen in,” a ci hi.

Elisha in a sisa mi a hinsakna thu kumpipa kiangah a gen laitakin, a tapa a hinkiksak numei in kumpipa kiangah a inn le a leitang hong ngen hi. Tua ciangin Gehazi in, “Ka topa, Kumpipa aw, hih lai-ah a numei om a, Elisha in a hinkiksak a tapa zong hih lai-ah om hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in numei kiangah a dot ciangin tua nu in ama kiangah a gen hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in a uliante khat sawlin, “Leitang a nusiat ni a kipan tuhun dong lo panin a piang khempeuh tawh ama a’ ahi khempeuh piakik in,” a ci hi.
Syria kumpipa Benhadad cina-in a om laitakin Damaskas-ah Elisha hong pai hi. Ama kiangah, “Hih lai-ah Pasian’ mipa hong pai hi,” ci-in a kigen ciangin

kumpipa in ama nuai-a ulian Hazael kiangah, “Letsong khat kengin Pasian’ mipa a dawn dingin va pai in. Ama tungtawnin Topa thu va dong inla, ‘Hih natna panin ka damkik zo ding hiam, ci hi,’ va ci in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah a dawn dingin Hazael pai a, Damaskas a na hoih namkim kalaoh puak sawmli, letsong a keng hi. Amah hong tungin ama mai-ah a din ciangin amah in, “Syria kumpipa na tapa Benhadad in nang kiangah kei hong sawlin, ‘Hih natna panin ka damkik zo ding hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elisha in ama kiangah, “Pai in; ama kiangah gen in, ‘Na damkik taktak ding hi,’ va ci in. Ahi zongin amah a sih taktakna ding thu Topa in kei kiangah hong lak khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah a maizum dongin a etna mun mah en denin Hazael sal gega hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa a kap hi.

Tua ciangin Hazael in, “Bang hangin ka topa kap na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite tungah nangmah in na bawl ding siatna ka thei hi. Nangmah in amau’ munmuanhuaite mei tawh na hal dinga, namsau tawh amau’ tangvalte thatin, amau’ naupang neute lei na denkhapna dinga, naupaii amau’ numeite na phelkham ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Hazael in, “Ui bang ahi lel na nasem pa in hih na lian a hih dingin bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Elisha in dawngin, “Syria tungah nang kumpi na hih ding thu Topa in kei tungah hong lak khinzo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha kiang panin amah kihem khia a, ama kiangah, “Elisha in nang kiangah bang hong ci ahi hiam?” a na ci Benhadad kiangah va tung hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Amah in kei kiangah nang na damkik taktakna ding thu hong gen hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in a zing ciangin delhphah puan khat la-in tui sungah tua puan diah a, tua puan kawt tawh kumpipa’ maitang tuamcipin a sisak hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin Hazael kumpi a suak hi.
Israel kumpi, Ahab’ tapa Joram’ kum ngana kumin, Judah kumpi, Jehoshafat’ tapa Jehoram in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah kumpi a suah hunin ama pian kum sawmthum le nih pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum giat sung a uk hi.
Ahab’ tanu ama zi ahih manin Ahab’ innkuante’ gamtatnasa, Israel kumpite’ lampi mah amah in tawn hi. Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Ahi zongin amah in ama tung le a suante tungah ukna a piak ding thu ciam khin ahih manin a nasem David’ hangin Topa in Judah gam susia nuam lo hi.
Ama hun sungin Judah gam ukna panin Edom mite lengkhia-in amau ading kumpi khat koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Judah kumpi Jehoram zong a leengte khempeuh tawh Zair-ah a kuan hi. Tua lai-ah Edom mite in amaute na umcih uh a, ahi zongin zanin amaute kipanin amah le a leeng ukte in Edom mite vat gawpin inn-ah a tai uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin Judah gam ukna panin Edom mite leeng khia hi. Tua ciangin tua hun mahin Libnah leeng khia leuleu hi.
Jehoram’ gamtatna a omlaite le ama sep khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoram si a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Ahaziah in uk hi.
Israel kumpi, Ahab’ tapa Joram’ kum sawm le kum nihna kumin, Judah kumpi, Jehoram’ tapa Ahaziah in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin Ahaziah kum sawmnih le nih pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum khat sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Athaliah hi a, Israel kumpi Omri’ tanu ahi hi.
Amah zong Ahab’ innkuante’ makpa ahih manin Ahab’ innkuante’ gamtatsa bangin Topa’ muhna-ah a sia gamta a, Ahab’ innkuante’ lampi mah a tawn hi.
Syria kumpipa Hazael tawh gal kido dingin Ahab’ tapa Joram tawh kipawlin Ahaziah a kuan hi. Syria mite in a galkidona mun Ramoth-gilead-ah Israel kumpi Joram liamsak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Syria kumpipa Hazael a sim laitakin Syria mite in amah a liamsakna mate Jezreel khua-ah a kidamsak dingin kumpi Joram ciahkik hi. Jezreel-ah Ahab’ tapa Joram a cina-in om ahih manin a veh dingin Judah kumpi Jehoram’ tapa Ahaziah va paisuk hi.
Tua ciangin kamsang Elisha in kamsangte’ sung pan khat samin ama kiangah, “Kithawi inla, hih sathau biing tawi-in Ramoth-gilead-ah va pai in.
Na tun ciangin Nimshi’ tapa Jehoshafat, a tapa Jehu tua lai-ah va zong in. Tua ciangin pai-in a lawmte lak panin a pai khiat ding sawl inla, inndei sung nung khat sungah amah paipih in.

Tua ciangin sathau biing la-in ama lu tungah sung inla, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Israel tungah kumpi-in sathau kong nilh hi, ci hi,’ va ci in. Tua ciangin kongkhak hong inla tai in; zekai kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kamsang tangvalpa Ramoth-gilead-ah pai hi.

Amah a tun ciangin, galkap a ukte in thu kikupna na nei uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “A ukpa aw, nang tungah thugen ding khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in, “Kote lakah kua’ tungah nei na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Nangma tung hi, a ukpa aw,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin inn khat sungah a paikhawm uh hi. Tua ciangin tangvalpa in ama lu tungah a sathau sungin ama kiangah, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Israel mite tung, Topa’ mite tungah kumpi-in nang sathau kong nilh hi.
Kamsang ka nasemte a thahna le Topa’ nasemte khempeuh a thahna hangin Jezebel’ tungah phu ka lak theih nadingin na topa Ahab’ innkuan na satpuk ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ahab innkuan sia ding hi. Israel sungah keimah in Ahab innkuan panin sal hitaleh sal ahi lo hitaleh pasal khempeuh ka beisak ding hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam innkuan le Ahijah’ tapa Baasha’ innkuan bangin Ahab’ innkuan ka bawl ding hi.
Tua ciangin uite in Jezreel khua sungah Jezebel ne-in, kuamah in amah vui lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in kongkhak hongin a tai khia hi.

A topa’ nasemte kiangah Jehu hong pusuah ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Thu khempeuh a hoih hiam? Bang hangin hih mihai pa nang kiangah hong pai ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “A mipa le a thugen na thei uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tua thu ka thei kei uh hi. Tu-in ko kiangah hong gen in,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Tua bang tua bangin amah in kei kiangah thu hong genin, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Israel tungah kumpi-in nang sathau kong nilh hi,” ci hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nawhsa-in mi khempeuh in a puan uh la-in ama din nadingin kahlei tungah phah uh a, tua ciangin amaute in peengkul tumin, “Jehu, kumpi hi,” ci-in a taangko uh hi.
Tua ciangin Nimshi’ tapa Jehoshafat, a tapa Jehu in Joram sawmsim hi. (Tu-in Syria kumpi Hazael langpangin Ramoth-gilead-ah Israel khempeuh tawh khuacingin Joram om hi.

Ahih hangin Syria kumpi Hazael tawh a kido lai-in Syria-te in amah a liamsakna mate Jezreel khua-ah a kidamsak dingin Kumpi Joram ciahkik khinta hi.) Tua ahih ciangin Jehu in a ulianpihte kiangah, “Kei hong pawlpih nuam peuhmah in, mi khatpeuh Jezreel-ah pai-in thu a va ko dingin hih khuapi panin kuamah a pai khiatkhak loh nading thei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu a leeng tungah kahin Jezreel-ah pai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah Joram lum hi. A tun ciangin Joram’ kiangah a hawh dingin Judah kumpipa Ahaziah na tung khin hi.

Tua laitakin Jezreel tausang tungah galvil pa dinga, amah hong pai laitakin Jehu’ pawlte amah in mu khia a, “Mi honkhat ka mu hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Joram in, “Sakol tung tuang mi khat la-in amaute a dawn dingin sawl inla, ‘Thuhoih ahi hiam?’ cisak in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sakol tung tuangin amah a dawn dingin mi khat pai a, “Kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Thuhoih ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in, “Thuhoih tawh bang hih ding na hi hiam? Kihem inla ka nungah hong pai in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin galvil pa in thu zasakin, “Kamtai pa in amaute kiang ban a, ahih hangin amah hong kilehkik lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in sakol tung tuang a nihna sawlin amaute kiangah tua pa paisak a, “Kumpipa in hih bangin hong ci khin hi: ‘Thuhoih ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in dawngin, “Thuhoih tawh bang hih ding na hi hiam? Kihem inla ka nungah hong pai in,” a ci hi.

Galvil pa in thu zasakkikin, “Amah in amaute va ban a, ahih hangin amah zong hong kilehkik lo hi. A leeng hawlzia pen Nimshi’ tapa Jehu’ hawl tawh kibang hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in nakpitakin nawhhawl hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Joram in, “Kithawi un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a leeng kithawisak uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa Joram le Judah kumpipa Ahaziah, a sakol leeng tuak uhah tuangin ding khia uh a, Jehu a dawntuah dingin pai uh a, Jezreel mi Naboth’ lo ah amah tawh kituak uh hi.
Joram in Jehu a muh ciangin, “Jehu aw, thuhoih ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Na nu Jezebel’ paktatnate le aisannate tua zahin a tam laiteng bang thuhoih om thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joram in a sakol kamkaih lehhei-in tai a, Ahaziah kiangah, “Ahaziah aw, gal om!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu in a tha neih khempeuh tawh a thal keekin Joram’ liangko kikal kap a, a thaltang in a lungtang pailetin a leeng sungah amah a puksuk hi.

Jehu in amah a huhpa Bidkar kiangah, “Amah tawmto inla, Jezreel mi Naboth’ neihsa lo lai-ah amah paai in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang le kei, a pa Ahab’ nungah mai kimin i tuan laitakin amah langpangin Topa in hih thu a genna phawk in:

‘Za ni-in Naboth le a tapate a kithahna ka muh taktak mah bangin leitang tung hih munah nang kong thuk ding hi,’ Topa in ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa’ thugen bangin amah tawmin tua mun leitang tungah amah paai in,” a ci hi.

Judah kumpipa Ahaziah in hih thu a muh ciangin Bethhaggan lamah a tai hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in amah delhin, “Amah zong kap un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Ibleam gei, Gur kahtohna san a leeng sungah amah kap uh hi. Ahih hangin amah Megiddo khuapi ciang dong tai zo lai a, tua khua-ah a si hi.
A nasemte in leeng khat tawh Jerusalem-ah amah pua uh a, David khuapi sung ama hanah a vui uh hi.
Ahab’ tapa Joram’ kum sawm le kum khatna kumin Ahaziah in Judah tungah uk ding a kipan ahi hi.
Jezreel khua-ah Jehu hong tun ciangin Jezebel in a thu na za hi. Amah in a mitte zutin a lutang zem a, tawlet-ah khuadak hi.
Kulhkongpi-ah Jehu hong lut laitakin Jezebel in, “Nang Zimri! A topa a that pa aw, bang hih a hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tawlet lamah Jehu khuadak to-in, “Kei’ lamah kua om na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Inn sung mangte nih khawng thum khawng in amah hong ensuk hi.
Jehu in, “Amah hong lawnsuk un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Jezebel lawnsuk uh hi. A sisan pawlkhat kulh tung le sakolte tungah kitheh a, tua ciangin amaute in amah tuancil uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute sungtumin an ne-in tui a dawn uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Tu-in a kisamsia hih numei tawm unla, phum un. Bangbang ahi ta zongin amah kumpipa’ tanu hibuang hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah a phum dingin amaute a pai uh ciangin a lu guh le a khete le a khutpeek sim loh bangmah dang mu nawn lo uh hi.
Amaute hong paikikin Jehu kiangah a gen uh ciangin amah in, “Hih pen a nasem pa, Tishbe mi Elijah tungtawnin Topa’ gensa ahi hi: ‘Jezreel khua sungah uite in Jezebel’ sa ne ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jezebel’ luanghawm pen Jezreel khua sung lei maitang tungah eklei tawh kibang ding hi. Tua ahih manin kuamah in, “Hih pen Jezebel hi,” cih thei lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Ahab’ suanlekhak mihing sawmsagih Samaria-ah teeng uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jehu in laikhakte gelh a, khuapi ukte, upate le Ahab’ suanlekhak a kemte tung Samaria-ah tua laite khakin,
“Tu-in hih lai na ngah phetun, na topa uh suante note tawh omin, leengte le sakolte, kulh a nei khuapite zong le hiamte na neihna uh thei un.
Na topa uh suante sung pan a hoih pen le a kilawm pen teelin a pa’ kumpi tokhom tungah tusak unla, na topa uh innkuan adingin do un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute nakpitakin lau uh a, “En un, kumpi nihte in amah nang zo lo uh ahih ciangin eite in bangci nan zawh ding ihi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpi inn a ukte le khuapi a ukte in upate le a kemte tawh kigawmin Jehu kiangah mi sawl uh a, “Kote nangma nasemte ka hi uh a, nong sawl khempeuh ka hih ding uh hi. Khat zong kumpi-in ka bawl kei ding uh hi; hoih na sak bangbangin hong hih in,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jehu in amaute kiangah laikhak nihna gelhin, “Note kei lamah omin, keima thu a mang dingin a kiging na hih uhleh, na topa uh Ahab’ suanlekhakte’ lutangte hong la unla, zing ciang tubang hunin kei kiang Jezreel-ah hong puak un,” a ci hi. Tu-in kumpipa’ suanlekhak mihing sawmsagihte pen amaute a khoi khuapi makaite tawh omkhawm uh hi.
Amaute kiangah a laikhak a tun ciangin amaute in kumpipa’ suanlekhak tua mihing sawmsagihte that uh a, a lutangte seeng sungah guangin Jehu kiang Jezreel-ah a puak uh hi.
Kamtai pa hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Amaute in kumpipa’ suanlekhakte’ lutangte hong paipih uh hi,” ci-in a gen ciangin amah in, “Zingsang mateng kulhkongpi lutna-ah khawl nihin koih un,” a ci hi.
Zingsangin amah a pai khiat ciangin tua mite khempeuh kiangah, “Note na paubaang kei uh hi. Kumpi Joram sawmsimin a that pa keimah ka hi hi. Ahih hangin hihte khempeuh a sattuk kua ahi hiam?

Ahab’ innkuan tawh kizomin Topa in a gen thu, Topa’ kammal khat zong lei-ah kia lo ding hi, ci-in thei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a nasem pa Elijah kiangah a gensa thu Topa in sem khinzo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jehu in kuamah a siit nawn loh dongin Jezreel khua sungah Ahab’ innkuan a omlaite, a behte le a lawm mel theihte le a siampite khempeuh a that hi.
Tua ciangin amah ding khia-in Samaria-ah a pai hi. Lamkal, Tuucingte’ Buk a tun laitakin,

Jehu in Judah kumpi Ahaziah’ behte tuak a, amah in, “Kuate na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in dawngin, “Ahaziah’ behte ka hi uh a, Jezreel khua-a om kumpinu’ tapate le kumpi ta dangte kiangah a hawh dingin hong paisuk ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Amah in a mite kiangah, “Hingmat un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tua mite hingmat uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute thatin tua lai-a om dum sungah amaute mi sawmli le nih a sisa-in lawnsuk uh a, amah in amaute khat zong hingkhawi lo hi.

Tua lai panin amah a kihepkhiat ciangin amah a dawn dingin a hong pai Rekhab’ tapa Jehonadab tawh kituak hi. Jehu in tua pa hopihin ama kiangah, “Keima lungsim nang tungah a thuman bangin nang’ lungsim kei’ tungah a thuman hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehonadab in dawngin, “Man hi,” a ci hi. Jehu in, “A man le na khut hong khak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut a khak hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in leeng sungah amah kaito hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei hong zui inla, Topa ading ka deihluatna hong thei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jehu in a leeng sungah amah tuangsak hi.
Samaria-ah a tun ciangin Topa in Elijah’ tungah a gen bangin Jehu in amaute a siak khiat dongin Samaria sunga Ahab mi a omlaite khempeuh a that khin hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu in mi khempeuh khawmin amaute kiangah, “Ahab in Baal na tawmkhat sem a, ahi zongin Jehu in tampi sem zaw ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Baal kamsangte khempeuh le a siampite khempeuh kei kiangah hong sam un. Baal tungah biakpiakna lianpi nei ding ka hih manin kuamah pelhemsak kei un. A pelhem peuhmah nungta lo ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Baal a biate a suksiat theih nadingin Jehu in ngian tawh a hih ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu in thu pia-in, “Baal adingin a thupi kikhopna khat bawl un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua thu zasak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jehu in Israel sung khempeuh ah thu zasak hi. Baal a bia khempeuh hong pai uh a, hong pai lo mi khat zong om lo hi. Tua ciangin Baal biakinn sungah amaute lut uh a, Baal biakinn mong khat pan mong khat dong a dim uh hi.
Amah in puan koihna a ukpa kiangah, “Baal a biate khempeuh adingin puante hong la in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute-a’ dingin a puante hong pai khiatpih hi.

Tua ciangin Rekhab’ tapa Jehonadab tawh Baal biakinn sungah Jehu a tum hi. Tua ciangin amah in Baal a biate kiangah, “Hih lai-ah Baal a biate bek omin note’ lakah Topa’ nasemte a om loh nading thei unla, zong un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin biakpiaknate le meihal biaknate a pia dingin amah a tum hi. Tu-in Jehu in a pualamah mi sawmgiat koih a, “Na khut sung uhah kong piakte khat peuhpeuh a khahsuah pa in ama nuntakna tawh loh ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin meihal biakna a bawl a man khit phetin Jehu in a cingte le uliante kiangah, “Sungtum unla, amaute that un; mi khat zong suaktasak kei un,” a ci hi. Amaute in namsau tawh a thah khit uh ciangin a cingte le uliante in amaute lawn khia uh a, tua ciangin Baal biakinn sung nung dei-ah tumin,
Baal biakinn sunga om biakna song pai khiatpihin a hal uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Baal biakna song susia-in, Baal biakinn susia uh a, tuni dongin ekbuk a suaksak uh hi.
Tua bangin Jehu in Israel sung panin Baal siak khia hi.
Ahih hangin Bethel le Dan-ah a om kham bawngnote ahi, Israel-te a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin Jehu kihei khia lo hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Jehu kiangah, “Nangmah in keima muhna-ah a man thu limtakin na sepna hang le ka lungsimah a om bangin Ahab’ innkuan tungah na bawlna hangin, na suante khang lina dongin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah tu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Jehu in a lungsim khempeuh tawh Israel Pasian, Topa’ thukham limtakin zuih ding ngaihsun lo hi. Israel-te a khialhsakna ahi Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin amah kihei lo hi.
Tua hun lai-in Topa in Israel gam pawlkhat khenkhiat ding kipan hi. Hazael in Israel gam sung khempeuh ah amaute zo hi.
Jordan panin nisuahna lam, Gilead gam khempeuh, Gad mite, Reuben mite le Manasseh mite, Arnon kuam gei-a om Aroer panin Gilead le Bashan gam khempeuh a zo gawp hi.
Tu-in Jehu’ gamtatna a omlaite, a sep khempeuh le ama thahatnate khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu si a, amaute in Samaria-ah amah a vui uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tapa Jehoahaz in ama tangin a uk hi.
Jehu in Samaria panin Israel tungah kum sawmnih le giat sung a uk hi.
Ahaziah’ nu Athaliah in a tapa a sihna a theih ciangin amah kipanin kumpi innkuan khempeuh thatsak hi.

Ahih hangin Ahaziah’ sanggamnu, Kumpi Joram’ tanu Jehosheba in Ahaziah’ tapa Joash la-in, thah dingin a kikoih kumpipa’ tapate lak panin amah gu khia a, biakinn sung lupna inndei sungah amah le a cingnu a koih hi. Tua bangin tua nu in Athaliah kiang panin amah seel a, tua ahih manin amah kithat kha lo hi.
Athaliah in Israel gam sungah a uk sungteng a cingnu tawh amah kum guk sung omin Topa’ biakinn sungah a bu hi.

Ahih hangin a kum sagihna kumin siampi Jehoiada in mi sawlin Kar mite le kumpi inncing a ukte kiangah paisak a, Topa’ biakinn sung ama kiangah samsak hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute tungah a ngaihsutna genin Topa’ biakinn sungah kiciamna khat bawl uh a, amah in amaute kiangah kumpipa’ tapa a lak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute thu pia a, “Note hih bangin na gamta ding uh hi: Sabbath ni-in nasep pengin kumpipa inn a cing no seh thum ah sehkhatte in
(adang seh thum ah sehkhatte Sur kulhkongpi-ah omin adang seh thum ah sehkhatte a cingte’ nung kulhkongpi-ah om hi) kumpi inn na cing ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Sabbath ni-in na semin Topa’ biakinn a cing no a khennihte in

na khut sung uhah na hiam ciat uh tawh kumpi Joash na cing ding uh hi. Note kiang nai-ah a hong pai peuhpeuh kithat ding hi. Kumpipa a pai khiat ciang le a sungtum ciangin amah na cing ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

A ukte in siampi Jehoiada’ thupiak khempeuh bangin hih uh a, Sabbath ni-in nasep a sem dingte tawh Sabbath ni-in ama mi nasep a peng dingte hong paipih ciat uh a, siampi Jehoiada kiangah hong tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in a ukte tungah Topa’ biakinn sungah a om David-a’ ahi teipite le lumte a pia hi.
Tua ciangin biakinn leitaw lampang, biakna tau le biakinn kimkotah mi khempeuh a khut uhah a hiam ciat uh tawh a cingin a ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa’ tapa pai khiatpihin, ama lu tungah kumpi lukhu khusak a, kumpi hihna tecipanna lai amah a pia hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah kumpi hi, ci-in taangko-in amah sathau a nilh uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a khut uh bengin, “Kumpipa khansau hen!” a ci uh hi.
Athaliah in a cingte le mite’ gamlumna a zak ciangin mite’ kiang Topa’ biakinn sungah a pai hi.

Amah a khuadak ciangin a ngeina ding bangin biakna song gei-ah kumpi thak pa dingin, kumpipa gei-ah a ukte le peengkul tumte om a, tua gammi khempeuh in lungdamin peengkul na tum uh hi. Tua ciangin Athaliah in a puante balkekin kiko a, “Sawmsimna! Sawmsimna!” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada in galkap a ukte thu pia-in, “A pua-ah tua nu pai khiatpih un. Amah a panpih peuhmah namsau tawh that un,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh siampipa in, “Topa’ biakinn sungah amah that kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nu man uh a, Kumpipa’ inn lutna Sakol Kongpi a tun ciangin tua lai-ah amah kithat hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoiada in amaute Topa’ mi ahihna ding uh Topa le kumpipa le mite kikalah thuciamna khat bawl a, kumpipa le mite kikalah zong a bawl hi.

Tua ciangin tua gammi khempeuh Baal biakinn-ah pai-in a biakinn a phelkek uh hi. A biakna taute le a milimte amaute in sukham uh a, amaute in biakna taute mai-ah Baal siampi Mattan a that uh hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in Topa’ biakinn-ah galvilte a koih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a ukte, a cingte le tua gammi khempeuh kaikhawm hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ biakinn panin kumpipa paipihsuk uh a, a Cingte’ Kongpi tawnin kumpipa’ inn-ah a pai uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpite’ kumpi tokhom tungah amah hong tu hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua gammi khempeuh a lungdam uh hi. Kumpipa’ inn-ah namsau tawh Athaliah a kithah khit ciangin khuapi sung a gamdai hi.
Joash in uk ding a kipat ciangin ama khan kum sagih pha pan hi.
Jehu’ kum sagihna kumin Joash in uk ding kipan a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmli sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Zibiah hi a, Beersheba khuami ahi hi.
Siampi Jehoiada in amah thuhilh ahih manin Joash in ama uk hun sung tawntung Topa’ muhna-ah a man gamta hi.
Ahi zongin mual tunga biaknate kila khia lo hi. Mite in tuate tungah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal lai uh hi.
Joash in siampite kiangah, “Pasian’ biakinn sungah a kipaipih a siangtho nate’ man sum khempeuh, a milipin piak dingin a kiseh sum le amau’ utthu tawh Pasian’ biakinn-ah a kipaipih sumte,
nomau’ nasepna mite ciat panin no siampite in khawm un. Tua ciangin biakinn puahphatna ding a kisapna a kimuhna khempeuh puahsak un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Kumpi Joash’ uk kum sawmnih le thumna kum dongin siampite in biakinn puah kipan nai lo uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Joash in siampi Jehoiada le siampi dangte samin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin biakinn puah lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na nasepna uh mite kiang panin na sumlakte uh kem nawn kei unla, a sumte biakinn puah nadingin ap un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite tung pan sum kaihkhop tavuan la nawn loin, biakinn puah ding zong tavuan a lak nawn loh nading uh siampite a thukim uh hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada in singkuang khat la-in a siin vutvang a, Topa’ biakinn sung tum ciangin taklam pang khuam gei-ah a koih hi. Tua ciangin kongkhak a cing siampite in Topa’ biakinn sungah a kipaipih sum khempeuh tua sungah a koih uh hi.
Singkuang sungah sum tam om hi, ci-in a theih peuhpeuh uh ciangin kumpipa’ lai-at pa le siampi lianpen pa hong paito-in Topa’ biakinn sungah a om sumte amaute in simin ip-in tun uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ biakinn a en nasemte’ khut sungah a tawi teh khiat uh sumte pia uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ biakinn a sem khutsiamte le innlamte tung,
le leilesuang innlam siamte le suangseekte tungah Topa’ biakinn puah nadingin sing leina ding le suang tawhna ding le biakinn puahna khat peuhpeuh a zat dingin pia khia uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa’ biakinn adingin ngun kuangte, taitehte, haite, peengkulte, ahih kei leh kham ahi a, ngun nazat khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin, Topa’ biakinn-ah a kipaipih sumte panin kibawl lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ biakinn a puah nasemte tungah tua sumte kipia hi.
Amaute in thuman takin na sem uh ahih manin nasemte tungah piak dingin a khut sung uhah sum a apnate uh tung panin amaute in sazian ngen lo uh hi.
Mawhna hanga piak sum le khialhna hanga piak sumte Topa’ biakinn sungah kipaipih lo hi; tuate pen siampite-a’ ahi hi.
Tua hun laitakin Syria kumpipa Hazael kuanto-in Gath simin a la hi. Ahih hangin Hazael in Jerusalem simin a paito dingin a mai a ngat ciangin,

Judah kumpi Joash in Judah kumpite ahi ama hun ma-a sem Jehoshafat, Jehoram le Ahaziah-te’ apsa thuciam piakna letsongte khempeuh le ama thuciam piakna letsongte le Topa’ biakinn le kumpipa’ sumkoihnate-ah a om kham khempeuh la-in Syria kumpipa Hazael kiangah a puak hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem panin Hazael a pai khia hi.
Tu-in Joash’ gamtatna a omlaite le a hih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Ama nasemte kipanin sawmsimna khat vaihawm uh a, Silla paisukna lampi, Millo inn sungah Joash a that uh hi.

Amah a satpukte pen ama nasemte, Shimeath’ tapa Jozakar le Shomer’ tapa Jehozabad ahi hi; tua hi a, amah si ta hi. Tua ciangin amaute in David khuapi sungah a pate tawh amah vui uh a, ama tangin a tapa Amaziah in a uk hi.
Judah kumpi, Ahaziah’ tapa Joash’ kum sawmnih le thumna kumin, Jehu’ tapa Jehoahaz in Samaria panin Israel uk ding kipan a, amah in kum sawm le kum sagih sung uk hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta a, Israel-te a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate zui hi. Tuate panin amah kihem khia lo hi.
Tua ciangin Israel-te tungah Topa heh a, amah in Syria kumpipa Hazael’ khut sung le Hazael’ tapa Benhadad’ khut sungah amaute pia tawntung hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoahaz in Topa’ tungah thum a, Topa in a thu ngai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Syria kumpipa in amaute a nenniamna mu hi.
(Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Israel tungah honpa khat pia hi. Tua ahih manin Syria-te’ khut sung panin amaute suakta uh hi. Tua ciangin a nidanga bangin Israel-te a inn uhah teeng uh hi.
Ahi zongin Israel a khialhsakna, Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin amaute kihem khia lo uh a, amaute in tuate zui uh hi. Asherah milim zong Samaria mahah omlai hi.)

Bang hang hiam cih leh Jehoahaz adingin galkap sakol tung tuang sawmnga le leeng sawm le khe galkap tul sawm bang bek omlai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Syria kumpipa in amaute susia-in leivui bangin amaute a bawl hi.
Tu-in Jehoahaz’ gamtatna a omlaite, ama hih khempeuh le ama vangliatna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoahaz si a, amaute in Samaria-ah amah vui uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jehoash in a uk hi.
Judah kumpipa Joash’ kum sawmthum le sagihna kumin Jehoahaz’ tapa Jehoash in Samaria panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in kum sawm le kum guk sung a uk hi.
Amah zong Topa’ muhna-ah a sia gamta hi. Israel-te a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate khempeuh panin amah kihem khia lo a, tua bangmahin amah gamta hi.
Tu-in Jehoash’ gamtatna a omlaite, ama hih khempeuh le Judah kumpipa Amaziah a dona a thahatnate, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoash si a, ama kumpi tokhom tungah Jeroboam Nihna pa a tu hi. Tua ciangin Israel kumpi dangte tawh Samaria-ah Jehoash kivui khawm hi.
Tu-in a sih nading natna tawh Elisha a nat ciangin, Israel kumpipa Jehoash ama kiangah paisukin ama mai-ah kap a, “Ka pa, ka pa! Israel mite a hupipa!” ci-in a kiko hi.
Tua ciangin Elisha in ama kiangah, “Thal khat le thaltangte hong la in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in thal khat le thaltangte a la hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Na thal keek in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a keek hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in kumpipa khut tungah ama khutte nga hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Nisuahna lam tawlet hong in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in hong hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in, “Na thal lawn in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in lawn hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa’ gualzawhna thaltang, Syria tungah gualzawhna thaltang! Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute na beisak dongin Afek-ah Syria-te na do ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Thaltangte la in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a la hi. Tua ciangin amah in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Tuate tawh leilak sat in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in thumvei satin a khawl hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa ama tungah hehin, “Ngavei ahi a, gukvei ahi zongin na sat ding kilawm hi. Tua hileh na beisak dongin Syria na satpuk ding hi. Ahih hangin tu-in thumvei bek Syria na satpuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elisha si a, amaute in amah a vui uh hi. Tu-in Moab mihonte in sik-hiau sungin tua gam simzel uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in misi khat a vui laitakun, amaute a sim dingin a hong pai mihon khat mu uh a, amau zong a misi uh Elisha’ han sungah lawn uh hi. A misi in Elisha’ guhte a sukkhak phetin hingkik a, tua ciangin ama khe-in a ding hi.
Tu-in Syria kumpipa Hazael in Jehoahaz’ hun sung khempeuh Israel mite nengniam hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in amaute hehpihin amaute khasiat a, Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tawh a thuciamna hangin amaute lamah amah kihei a, amaute nusia lo hi. Tu dongin zong ama mite mangngilh lo hi.
Syria kumpipa Hazael a sih ciangin ama tangin a tapa Benhadad kumpi a suak hi.

Tua ciangin a pa Jehoahaz’ tung panin gal sungah Hazael in a laksa khuapite Hazael’ tapa Benhadad tung panin Jehoahaz’ tapa Jehoash in lakik hi. Jehoash in amah thumvei zo-in Israel khuapite a ngahkik hi.
Israel kumpi, Jehoahaz’ tapa Jehoash’ kum nihna kumin, Judah kumpi, Joash’ tapa Amaziah in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nga pha a, Jerusalem-ah amah in kum sawmnih le kua sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Jehoaddin hi a, Jerusalem khuami ahi hi.
Topa’ mitah amah a manin gamta a, ahi zongin a pu David bang zo lo hi. A pa Joash’ hihsa na khempeuh hih hi.
Mual tunga biaknate koih khia lo hi. Mite in tuate tungah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal lai uh hi.
Kumpi aana kiptakin ama khut sungah a om phetin ama pa ahi kumpipa a that a nasemte amah in that hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in a thupiaksa, Moses thukham laibu sungah, “Tate’ hangin pate kithat lo dinga, pate’ hangin tate zong kithat lo ding hi; ahih hangin mi khempeuh amau’ khialhna hangin si ding hi,” ci-in a kigelh bangin amah in mi thatte’ tate that lo hi.
Amah in Edom mite tul sawm Ci Kuam-ah thatin Sela khua simin la a, a min dingin Joktheel phuak a, tuni dongin tua min kipsuak hi.
Tua ciangin Amaziah in Israel kumpi, Jehu’ tapa Jehoahaz, a tapa Jehoash kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Hong pai in, khatlekhat mai kituahin kisu ni,” ci-in a to hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa Jehoash in Judah kumpi Amaziah kiangah thu puak a, “Lebanon-a om thangling kung khat in Lebanon-a om taamtak khat kiangah mi sawlin, ‘Ka tapa’ zi dingin na tanu hong pia in,’ ci hi. Tua ciangin Lebanon gamsa khat in hong nawkin tua thangling tuancil hi.

Nangmah in Edom na vat gawp khin a, na lungsim in nang hong liansak hi. Na minthanna tawh lungkim inla, inn-ah om in; bang hangin nang tukin, Judah tawh nang na tuk nadingin buaina piangsak se ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
