Ahih hangin Amaziah in a thu ngai lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa Jehoash paito a, Judah-te’ gam Bethshemesh-ah amah le Judah kumpipa Amaziah khatlekhat kimaituahin gal kido uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel in Judah zo a, mi khempeuh a inn ciat uhah tai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa Jehoash in Bethshemesh-ah Ahaziah’ tapa Joash, a tapa Amaziah ahi Judah kumpipa man hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah amah hong pai a, Efraim Kongpi panin Kiu Kongpi dong Jerusalem kulh pi zaguk sung susia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in kham le ngun khempeuh le Topa’ biakinn sung le kumpi inn vankoihna sungah a om umlebeel khempeuh la-in, mite zong man a, tua ciangin Samaria-ah a ciahkik hi.
Tu-in Jehoash in a hih a gamtatna a omlaite, a vangliatna le Judah Kumpipa Amaziah tawh a kidona, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoash si a, Israel kumpite tawh Samaria-ah kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jeroboam Nihna in a uk hi.
Israel kumpipa, Jehoahaz’ tapa Jehoash a sih khit ciangin Judah kumpipa, Joash’ tapa Amaziah kum sawm le kum nga sung nungta lai hi.
Tu-in Amaziah’ nasepna a omlaite, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Jerusalem-ah amah sawmsim uh a, amah zong Lakhish-ah tai hi. Ahih hangin amaute in ama nung zui-in Lakhish-ah mi sawl uh a, tua lai-ah amah that uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in sakolte tungah amah hong pua uh hi. David khuapisung Jerusalem-ah a pate tawh amah kivui hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite khempeuh in kum sawm le kum guk a pha Uzziah la-in a pa Amaziah’ tangin kumpi-in a koih uh hi.
A pa a sih khit ciangin amah in Elath khua zo kikin lampha a, Judah mite adingin ngahkik hi.
Judah kumpipa, Joash’ tapa Amaziah’ kum sawm le kum ngana kumin, Israel kumpipa, Jehoash’ tapa Jeroboam in Samaria-ah uk ding kipan a, amah in kum sawmli le khat sung uk hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi. Israel a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate khempeuh panin amah kihem khia lo hi.
Amah in Gathhefer pan a kamsangpa, Amittai’ tapa, a nasem Jonah’ tungtawnin Israel Pasian, Topa’ thugen bangin, Hamath lutna panin Arabah Tuipi dong Israel gam a ngahkik hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te’ thuakna nasia mahmah hi, ci-in Topa in mu hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh sal ahi a, sal ahi lo ahi zongin a peng kuamah om lo a, Israel a huh ding kuamah om lo hi.
Ahih hangin Israel min a phiatkhiat ding Topa in gen nai lo ahih manin Jehoash’ tapa Jeroboam’ khut tawh amah in amaute hon khia hi.

Tu-in Jeroboam’ gamtatna a omlaite, a hihte khempeuh, a vangliatna, a galsimna le Judah in a na neih ngei Damaskas le Hamath khuapite Israel adingin a ngahkikna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Jeroboam si-in a pate tawh kivui a, ama tangin a tapa Zekhariah in a uk hi.
Israel kumpi Jeroboam Nihna’ kum sawmnih le sagihna kumin Judah kumpipa, Amaziah’ tapa Uzziah in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm le kum guk pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnga le nih sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Jekoliah hi a, Jerusalem khuami ahi hi.
A pa Amaziah’ sepna khempeuh tawh kizui-in Topa’ mitah a man gamta hi.
Ahi zongin mual tunga biaknate kila khia lo hi. Mite in tuate tungah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal lai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in phaknatna tawh kumpipa vat ahih manin a sih ni dongin amah a phak hi a, inn tuam sungah amah teeng hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ tapa Jotham pen a innkuan tungah a uk hi a, tua gam mite a uk hi.
Tu-in Uzziah’ gamtatna a omlaite le a hih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Uzziah si a, amaute in David khuapi sungah a pate tawh amah vui uh a, tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jotham in a uk hi.
Judah kumpi Uzziah’ kum sawm le kum giatna kumin Jeroboam Nihna’ tapa Zekhariah in Samaria panin Israel tungah kha guk sung uk hi.
A pate’ hihsa bangin Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi. Israel a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin amah kihem khia lo hi.
Jabesh’ tapa Shallum in amah sawmsim a, Ibleam-ah amah satpukin that a, tua ciangin ama tangin a uk hi.
Tu-in Zekhariah’ sepna a omlaite, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
(Hih pen Topa’ thuciamna, Jehu tungah a piak, “Na suante khang lina dongin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah tu ding hi,” a cih ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua bangin a piang ahi hi.)
Judah kumpi Uzziah’ kum sawm le kum kuana kumin Jabesh’ tapa Shallum in uk ding kipan a, amah in Samaria-ah kha khat sung uk hi.
Tua ciangin Tirzah panin Gadi’ tapa Menahem hong paito-in Samaria hong tunga, tua ciangin amah in Samaria-ah Jabesh’ tapa Shallum satpukin that a, ama tangin a uk hi.
Tu-in Shallum’ sepna a omlaite le amah in a hihsa a sawmsimna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.

Tua hun laitakin Menahem in Tappuah le a sunga teeng khempeuh le Tirzah pan a kipan a gam sungteng a luh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ama adingin a kongpite uh hong lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in luhin, a sunga om numei naupaii khempeuh a phelkham hi.
Judah kumpi Uzziah’ kum sawmthum le kuana kumin Gadi’ tapa Menahem in Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in Samaria panin kum sawm sung uk hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi. Israel khempeuh a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate khempeuh panin a nuntak sung tawntung amah kihem khia lo hi.
Assiria kumpi Tiglathpileser tua gam a sim dingin kuanto hi. Tua ciangin ama kumpi aana a kipna ding a huh ding a deihna-in Menahem in Tiglathpileser tungah ngun talen tulkhat a pia hi.

Menahem in Assiria kumpipa tungah a piak dingin mihau khempeuh, a mi kim khut tung panin ngun shekel sawmnga, Israel-te tung panin sum a dok hi. Tua ahih ciangin Assiria kumpipa kiheikik a, tua gam sungah om lo hi.
Tu-in Menahem’ sepna a omlaite le a hih khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Menahem si a, ama tangin a tapa Pekahiah in a uk hi.
Judah kumpi Azariah’ kum sawmngana kumin Menahem’ tapa Pekahiah in Samaria panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in kum nih sung uk hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi. Israel a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin amah kihei khia lo hi.
Tua ciangin ama nuai-ah a ukpa, Remaliah’ tapa Pekah in Gilead mi sawmnga tawh amah sawmsim a, kumpipa’ inn sungtawng, Samaria-ah amah that hi. Amah a thah khit ciangin ama tangin a uk hi.
Tu-in Pekahiah’ nasepna a omlaite le a hih khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Judah kumpi Uzziah’ kum sawmnga le nihna kumin Remaliah’ tapa Pekah in Samaria panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, kum sawmnih sung uk hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi. Israel a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin amah kihem khia lo hi.

Israel kumpi Pekah’ hun laitakin Assiria kumpi Tiglathpileser hong pai-in Ijon, Abelbethmaakah, Janoah, Kedesh, Hazor, Gilead le Galilee le Naftali gam khempeuh la a, amah in galmatin mite Assiria-ah a ciahpih hi.
Tua ciangin Uzziah’ tapa Jotham’ kum sawmnihna kumin Elah’ tapa Hoshea in Remaliah’ tapa Pekah sawmsimin amah satpukin that a, tua ciangin ama tangin a uk hi.
Tu-in Pekah’ gamtatna a omlaite le a hih khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Israel kumpi Remaliah’ tapa Pekah’ kum nihna kumin Judah kumpi Uzziah’ tapa Jotham in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawm le kum guk sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Jerusha hi a, Zadok’ tanu ahi hi.
A pa Uzziah’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin Topa’ mitah amah a manin gamta hi.
Ahi zongin mual tunga biaknate kikoih khia lo hi. Mite in tuate’ tungah biaknate pia-in paknamtui hal lai uh hi. Amah in Topa’ biakinn kulhkongpi tungnung bawl hi.
Tu-in Jotham’ nasepna a omlaite le a hih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua hunin Topa in Judah a sim dingin Syria kumpipa Rezin le Remaliah’ tapa Pekah sawl ding kipan hi.
Jotham si a, a pu David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Ama tangin a tapa Ahaz in uk hi.
Remaliah’ tapa Pekah’ kum sawm le kum sagihna kumin Judah kumpi Jotham’ tapa Ahaz in uk ding kipan hi.
Ahaz in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawm le kum guk sung uk hi. A pu David’ gamtatnasa bangin a Pasian, Topa’ mitah amah a manin gamta lo a,
Israel kumpi dangte’ khekhap mah zui hi. Topa in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawl khiat minamte’ zat a kihhuai a gamtatte mah uh bangin biakna-in ama tapa nangawn a hal hi.
Amah in mual tunga biaknate tung le mual dawnte tung le singniim nuai khempeuh ah biakna pia-in paknamtui a hal hi.
Tua ciangin Syria kumpi Rezin le Israel kumpi, Remaliah’ tapa Pekah, Jerusalem a sim dingin hong kuanto uh a, amaute in Ahaz umcih uh hi. Ahih hangin amah zo zo lo uh hi.
Tua hun laitakin Edom kumpipa in Edom gam dingin Elath la kikin Elath panin Judah gam mite hawl khia hi. Tua ciangin tuni dongin amaute a tenna ahi Elath-ah Edom mite hong pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Ahaz in Assiria kumpi Tiglathpileser kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Kei pen na nasem pa le na tapa ka hi hi. Hong kuanto inla, keimah a hong sim Syria kumpipa le Israel kumpipa kiang panin kei hong hon khia in,” a ci hi.
Ahaz in zong Topa’ biakinn sung le kumpipa’ vankoihna-a ngun le khamte la a, Assiria kumpipa tungah letsongin a puak hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in ama thu ngai hi. Assiria kumpipa zong Damaskas a sim dingin hong kuanto-in tua khua la a, a mite galmatin Kir-ah pua a, amah in Rezin a that hi.

Assiria kumpi Tiglathpileser tawh a kimu dingin Kumpi Ahaz zong Damaskas-ah a pai ciangin, amah in Damaskas-ah a om biakna tau mu hi. Tua ciangin Kumpi Ahaz in biakna tau a omdan, a neng a tawngin a lahkimna lim khat siampi Urijah kiangah puak hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Urijah in biakna tau bawl hi. Damaskas panin Kumpi Ahaz hong tun ma-in Kumpi Ahaz in Damaskas panin a khakna tawh kizui-in siampi Urijah in na bawl hi.
Damaskas panin kumpipa hong tun ciangin kumpipa in tua biakna tau a en hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in biakna tau hong naihin paito a,
a meihal biakna le an tawh a biakna halin, leenggahzu tawh a biakna sung a, thunuama a biakna sisan biakna tau tungah a theh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama biakna tau thak le Topa’ biakinn kikalah a om sumngo biakna tau la khia-in ama biakna tau leilu lampangah a koih hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Ahaz in siampi Urijah thu pia-in, “Gam sung mi khempeuh’ meihal biakna, an tawh a biakna le leenggahzu tawh a biakna uh tawh biakna tau lian tungah zingsang meihal biakna, nitakin an tawh biakna, kumpipa’ meihal biakna le an tawh a biaknate halkhawm in. Tua tungah meihal biakna sisan khempeuh le biakpiakna sisan khempeuh theh in. Ahih hangin sumngo biakna tau pen kei adingin thudotna ding hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpi Ahaz’ thupiak bangin siampi Urijah in hih thu khempeuh a hih hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Ahaz in a kingakna kungte tankhia-in tuate panin a kuang la khia a, a nuai-a om sumngo bawngtalte tung panin tui kuangpi la khia sukin suang vial tungah a nga hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa a mai-et nadingin amah in Sabbath ni-in zat dingin a sungah a kikoih tutna khuhna le kumpipa’ lutna a pua nung, Topa’ biakinn panin a la khia hi.
Ahaz in a hih a gamtatna a omlaite, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Ahaz si a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Hezekiah in a uk hi.
Judah kumpi Ahaz’ kum sawm le kum nihna kumin Elah’ tapa Hoshea in Samaria panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in kum kua sung uk hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta a, ahi zongin ama ma-a Israel kumpi dangte bang hi lo hi.
Assiria kumpi Shalmaneser amah a simin kuanto hi. Tua ciangin Hoshea ama khutnuai mi suak a, ama tungah siah a puak hi.

Ahih hangin Assiria kumpipa in Hoshea a zuautatna mu hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Egypt kumpipa So kiangah kamtaite sawlsim a, a kumkumin ahih ngeisa bangin Assiria kumpipa tungah siah pia nawn lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Assiria kumpipa in amah man a, thong sungah koihin a hencip hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in gam sung khempeuh simin Samaria ciang dong tunga, amah in kum thum sung umcih hi.
Hoshea’ kum kuana kumin Assiria kumpipa in Samaria la a, amah in Assiria-ah Israel mite ciahpihin Halah gam sung, Gozan gam a om Habor gun gei le Media khuapite sungah amaute a koih hi.
Hih thu a pianna pen Egypt kumpi Faro’ khutnuai Egypt gam panin amaute a pai khiatpih a Pasian uh Topa’ tungah Israel mite khial a, pasian dangte kihta-in
Israel mite’ mai-ah Topa in a hawl khiat minamte’ ngeina le Israel kumpite in a piansaktawm ngeinate a zuihna hang uh ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in Topa a Pasian uh langpangin a man lo na vaihawm uh hi. Amaute in amau adingin galvilna bukno a kipan kulh a nei khuapi dongin khuapi khempeuh ah mual tunga biakna bawl uh hi.
Amaute in amau adingin mual sang tung khempeuh le singniim nuai khempeuh ah biakna songte le Asherah milimte a phut uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute’ mai-ah Topa in a puakkhiat minamte’ hih bangin amaute in mual tunga biakna mun khempeuh tungah paknamtui a hal uh hi. Amaute in a hoih lo nate hihin Topa hehsak uh a,
Topa in amaute tungah, “Note in na hih kei ding uh hi,” a cih milimte’ na sem uh hi.

Ahi zongin Topa in kamsangte khempeuh le thumute khempeuh tungtawnin Israel le Judah mite hilh khol a, “Na pu na pate uh ka thupiak thukhamte khempeuh le kamsangte ahi ka nasemte’ tungtawnin note kiangah thu kong puak bangin na gamtat siate panun kihei-in ka thupiaknate le ka thukhamte zui un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in a thu ngai lo uh a, Topa a Pasian uh a um lo a pu a pate uh mah bangin lungsim khauh uh hi.

Amaute in ama thukhamte le a pu a pate uh tawh a bawl a thuciamna le amaute tungah a piak hilh kholhnate simmawh uh hi. Amaute in a mawkna milimte zui-in a mawkna suak uh a, amaute tawh kibangin gamta kei un ci-in Topa in a thupiak tawh kisai-in, amaute in amau’ kiima om minamte zui uh hi.

Amaute in Topa a Pasian uh thupiakte khempeuh nusia-in amau adingin a kisung bawngno lim nih bawl uh hi. Amaute in Asherah milim khat bawl uh a, vantung a om nate khempeuh bia-in Baal milim na sem uh hi.
Amaute in biakna-in a tanute uh le a tapate uh halin vankahna le aisanna zang uh a, Topa’ muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin kipia tawmin amah hehsak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite tungah Topa heh a, ama muhna panin amaute hem khia hi. Kuamah dang om nawn loin Judah gammi bek omlai hi.
Judah mite in zong Topa a Pasian uh thupiaknate zui loin Israel mite in a phuahtawm ngeinate zuihpih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Israel suanlekhakte khempeuh nialin amaute gimsak a, ama muhna panin amaute a paihkhiat dongin amaute a siasak migilote’ khut sungah amaute a pia hi.

Amah in David suante tung panin Israel gam a balkhiat khit ciangin Israel mite in Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam kumpi-in koih uh hi. Tua ciangin Jeroboam in Topa zuihna panin Israel hawl khia-in khialhna lianpi amaute bawlsak hi.

Israel mite in Jeroboam’ khialhna khempeuh hih uh hi. Kamsangte ahi a nasemte khempeuh tungtawnin a gensa bangin Topa in ama muhna panin Israel a hepkhiat zah dongin tuate panin amaute kihem khia lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amau’ gam panin Assiria-ah tuni dongin Israel-te salin a om uh hi.

Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in Babylon, Kuthah, Avva, Hamath le Sefarvaim panin mite paipih a, Israel mite’ tangin Samaria khuapite-ah amaute a koih hi. Amaute in Samaria gam luahin a khuapite-ah teeng uh hi.
Tua lai-ah a ten cilun amaute in Topa kihta lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in amaute kimkhat a that humpinelkaite amaute lakah a khah hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Assiria kumpipa kiangah, “Nangmah in pua khia-in Samaria khuapite sungah na koih minamte in tua gamte’ pasian’ thukham thei lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute lakah humpinelkai khah hi. Amaute in tua gam pasian’ thukham thei lo uh ahih manin tua humpinelkaite in amaute that uh hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in thu pia a, “Na puak khiatna uh mun siampite khat tua lai-ah puak un. Amah pai-in tua lai-ah teengin a gam sung pasian’ thukhamte amaute hilhsak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samaria panin a puakkhiat uh siampite khat hong pai-in Bethel-ah teeng a, amaute in Topa bangci kihtak ding cih thu amaute kiangah a hilh hi.
Ahih hangin minam khempeuh in amau’ pasian ciat bawl uh a, minam khempeuh in amau’ tenna khuapi sung, Samariate’ bawlsa mual tunga biakna munte-ah tuate koih uh hi.
Babylon mite in Sukkothbenoth pasian lim, Kuth mite in Nergal pasian lim, Hamath mite in Ashima milim,
le Avva mite in Nibhaz le Tartak milimte bawl uh hi. Sefarvaim mite in Sefarvaim pasian-te ahi Adrammelek le Anammelek biakna-in a tate uh mei tawh a hal uh hi.
Amaute in Topa zong kihta uh a, mual tunga biakna siampi dingin amau sung panin mi namkim seh uh a, tuate in mual tunga biaknate tungah amau adingin piaksak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Topa bia uh a, ahih hangin amaute a kipuak khiatna minamte’ ngeina bangin amau’ pasian-te’ na zong semkhawm uh hi.

Tuni dongin amaute in a nidanga ngeina bangin gamta uh hi. Amaute in Topa bia lo uh hi. Israel min a phuah Jakob’ suante’ Topa in a thupiak thukhamte ahi a, ngeina kipte ahi a, zuih ding ngeinate ahi a, a thupiakna ahi zongin amaute in zui lo uh hi.
Topa in Israel-te tawh thuciamna khat bawlin amaute thu pia a, “Note in pasian dangte kihta loin, amaute mai-ah note kun loin, amau’ na zong sem loin, amaute tungah biakna zong na pia kei ding uh hi.
Egypt gam panin vangliatna le thahatna tawh a hong pai khiatpih Topa na kihta ding uh hi. Ama mai-ah note na kun ding uh a, ama tungah biakna na pia ding uh hi.
Note adingin a gelh thukhamte, ngeina kipte, zuih ding ngeinate le thupiaknate zuih ding na kingaihsun tawntung ding uh hi. Note in pasian dangte na kihta kei ding uh a,
note tawh ka bawlsa thuciamna na mangngilh kei ding uh hi. Note in pasian dangte na kihta kei ding uh a,
ahih hangin Topa na Pasian uh na kihta ding uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in na galte khempeuh uh khut sung panin note hong hon khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin mite in tua thu ngai lo uh a, a nidang ngeina bangun gamta veve uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih minamte in Topa bia uh a, a kiseek amau’ milimte’ na zong semkawm uh hi. A tate uh le a tate uh’ tate zong tua bangmahin gamta uh hi. A pu a pate uh gamtat bangin a suan a khakte uh tuni dongin gamta uh hi.
Israel kumpi, Elah’ tapa Hoshea’ kum thumna kumin Judah kumpi, Ahaz’ tapa Hezekiah in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnih le kua sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Abi hi a, Zekhariah’ tanu ahi hi.
A pu David’ hihna khempeuh tawh kizui-in Topa’ mitah a man gamta hi.

Amah in mual tunga biaknate hem khia-in biakna songte sutan a, Asherah milim phukpai hi. Tua ciangin amah in Moses’ bawlsa sumngo gulpi satnen hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua ni dongin Israel mite in tua tungah paknamtui hal uh hi; tua pen Nehushtan kici hi.
Amah in Israel Pasian, Topa muang hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama nunga Judah kumpite khempeuh lak hitaleh ama mai-ate lak hitaleh ah amah tawh a kibang kuamah dang om lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Topa kiptakin len hi. Amah zuihna panin kihem khia lo a, Topa in Moses tungah a gen thupiaknate a zui hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in amah ompih a, a sepna khempeuh ah maavang hi. Amah in Assiria kumpipa lehdo-in ama na sem lo hi.
Amah in galvilna bukno a kipan kulh a nei khuapi dongin, Gaza le a gam sung ciang dong Filistia-te a vat gawp hi.
Israel kumpi, Elah’ tapa Hoshea’ kum sagihna kum ahi, Kumpi Hezekiah’ kum lina kumin Assiria kumpi Shalmaneser, Samaria a simin hong kuanto-in umcih a,
kum thum a beina-ah tua khua la zo hi. Israel kumpi Hoshea’ kum kuana kum ahi, Hezekiah’ kum gukna kumin Samaria kila hi.
Assiria kumpipa in Israel mite Assiria-ah la a, Halah gam sung, Gozan gam a om Habor gun gei le Media khuapite sungah a koih hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Topa a Pasian uh thu mang lo uh a, ama thuciamna, Topa’ nasem Moses’ thupiak khempeuh nangawn palsat uh hi. Amaute in thu ngai loin, thu zong mang lo uh hi.
Kumpi Hezekiah’ kum sawm le kum lina kumin Assiria kumpi Sennakherib, Judah khuapi kulh a neite khempeuh a sim dingin hong kuanto-in tuate a la hi.

Tua ciangin Judah kumpi Hezekiah in Assiria kumpipa kiang Lakhish-ah mi sawlin, “Ka gamta khial hi; kei kiang panin nungkik in; kei tungah nong nget peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in Judah kumpi Hezekiah tung panin ngun talen zathum le kham talen sawmthum a kal hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Topa’ biakinn sung le kumpipa’ inn vankoihnate-ah a om ngun khempeuh ama tungah a pia hi.
Tua hunin Hezekiah in Topa’ biakinn kongkhakte tung pan le a mahmah in kongkhak mungte a zutna khamte hawk khia-in Assiria kumpipa tungah a pia hi.

Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in Lakhish panin Kumpi Hezekiah kiang Jerusalem-ah galkap hon lianpi khat tawh a galkapmaang lianpen pa, a inn sung mang lianpen pa le a ulian khat a sawl hi. Amaute paito-in Jerusalem tung uh hi. Amaute a tun uh ciangin amaute hong pai-in Puansawppa’ nasepna phual zuatna lampi-a om bual tungnung tuilakna gei-ah hong ding uh hi.
Amaute in kumpipa a sap uh ciangin, amaute kiangah inn sung ukpa ahi, Hilkiah’ tapa Eliakim, lai-at Shebnah le thuciamteh pa ahi, Asaf’ tapa Joah hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin a ulianpa in amaute kiangah, “Hezekiah kiangah hih bangin gen un. ‘Assiria kumpipa, kumpi lianpa in hih bangin ci hi: Hih banga na kimuanna uh bang suang na hi uh hiam?
Note in kampau lel pen galsim nadingin thu lamlahna le thahatna-in na ngaihsun uh hi. Note in kei nong lehdo nadingun bang suang na hi uh hiam?
En un, a tungah a kingam mipa’ khut a sun ding pumpeeng kung kitam a banglel Egypt tu-in na suang uh hi. Amah a suangte khempeuh tungah Egypt kumpipa Faro pen tua banglel ahi hi.

“‘Ahih hangin note in kei kiangah, “Kote in Topa ka Pasian uh ka suang uh hi,” na cih uhleh, Hezekiah in mual tunga biaknate le biakna taute hep khiatsakin Jerusalem tungah, “Jerusalem khua sung hih biakna tau mai-ah na bia ding uh hi,” a cih pa hi lo ahi hiam?
Tu-in hong pai un; Assiria kumpi ka topa tawh kikhapna khat bawl un; no lam panin a tunga tuang ding na ngah nak-uhleh note tungah sakol tulnih kong pia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note in leengte le sakol tung tuangte tawh kisai-in Egypt a suang kimlai in bangci-in ka topa’ nasemte lakah a neu pen galkap ukpa khat lehnawh zo ding na hi uh hiam?
Tua tham loin, Topa tawh a kikop lopi-in hih mun simin a susia dingin a hong paito ka hi hiam? Topa in kei kiangah, “Hih gam a sim dingin paito inla susia in,” hong ci hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Hilkiah’ tapa Eliakim, Shebnah le Joah in a ulianpa kiangah, “Kong thum uh hi; kote in Aram pau thei ka hih manun na nasemte tungah Aram pau-in thu hong gen in; kulh tunga om mite’ zakin Jew pau-in kote’ tungah hong gen kei in,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin a ulianpa in amaute kiangah, “Ka topa in hih thute na topa uh le note tung bekah a gen dingin hong sawlin, amau’ ek mah ne-in, amau’ zun mah dawnin note tawh a siakhawm ding kulh tunga tu mite kiangah a gen lo dingin hong sawl ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a ulianpa dingin Jew pau-in a gingin kiko a, “Assiria kumpi, kumpi lianpa’ thu za un!
Kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Hezekiah’ khemsa-in om kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in keima khut sung panin note hong hon khia zo lo ding hi.
Topa in eite hong hon khia taktak dinga, Assiria kumpipa’ khut sungah hih khuapi kipia lo ding hi, ci-a Hezekiah’ hong genna tawh Topa suang kei un,’ ci hi.

Hezekiah’ thu ngai kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Assiria kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Kei tawh kilemna hong bawl unla, kei kiangah hong pai un. Tua hileh kei hong pai-in nomau’ leitang tawh a kibatna mun, an le leenggahzu a omna, oliv kungte le khuaizu a omna gamah, note si loin na nuntak nadingun kong koih dong matengin note khempeuh in nomau’ leenggah ciat ne-in, mi khempeuh in a theigah ciat uh ne ding uh a, note khempeuh in na tuinak ciat uh panin tui na tawi ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in note kiangah, “Topa in eite hong hon khia ding hi,” ci-in note hong lamlah khialhna-ah Hezekiah’ thu ngai kei un.
Assiria kumpipa’ khut sung panin minam dangte’ pasian khatpeuh in a gam hon khia zo ngei ahi hiam?
Hamath le Arpad’ pasian-te koi-ah om ahi uh hiam? Sefarvaim, Hena le Ivvah pasian-te koi-ah om ahi uh hiam? Keima khut sung panin amaute in Samaria a hon khia zo uh hiam?
Topa in ka khut sung panin Jerusalem a hotkhiat nadingin, gam sungah pasian-te khempeuh lakah kua in keima khut sung panin a gam uh hon khia zo ngei ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin mite dai-in kam khat beek dawngkik lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa’ thupiakna pen, “Amah dawng kei un,” cihna ahi hi.

Tua ciangin inn sung a uk, Hilkiah’ tapa Eliakim, lai-at pa Shebnah le thuciamteh pa, Asaf’ tapa Joah-te a puan uh balkeksa-in Hezekiah kiangah hong pai uh a, a ulianpa’ kammalte ama kiangah a gen uh hi.
Kumpi Hezekiah in hih thu a zak ciangin a dahna hangin a puante balkekin puanhampi silh a, Topa’ biakinn sungah a pai hi.
Tua ciangin amah in biakinn sung a ukpa Eliakim, lai-at pa Shebnah le siampi khangham zawdeuhte puanhampi silhsakin Amoz’ tapa kamsang Isaiah kiangah a sawl hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Hezekiah in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Tuni pen lungkham ni, hong kitai ni, mindai ni ahi hi. Naungekte a suah hun tunga, amaute hinkhiatna ding thatang om lo hi.

Ama topa ahi Assiria kumpipa in a nungta Pasian a zahko dingin a sawl a ulianpa’ kammalte khempeuh Topa na Pasian in za-in, Topa na Pasian in a zaksa thute nialkhin kha ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin a omlai mite adingin thu ngen in,’ ci hi,” a ci uh hi.
Kumpi Hezekiah’ nasemte Isaiah kiang hong tun uh ciangin
“Isaiah in amaute kiangah, “Na topa uh kiangah hih bangin gen un. Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Assiria kumpipa’ nasemte in kei hong simmawhna, na zaksa uh thute hangin lau kei un.
En un, keimah in ama tungah thu khat ka piangsak dinga, amah in kamdawn khat za-in a gamah ciahkik ding hi. Ama gam mahah namsau tawh amah a tukna ding ka piangsak ding hi,” ci hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Assiria kumpipa in Lakhish nusia khinin Libnah khua tawh a kidona thu, a ulianpa in za ahih manin, kumpipa kiangah thu a dong dingin a pai hi.
Ethiopia kumpi Tirhakah amah a sim dingin a hong kuankhiat khitna thu kumpipa in a zak ciangin, amah in Hezekiah kiangah kamtaite sawl kikin,
“Judah kumpi Hezekiah kiangah hih bangin gen un: ‘Assiria kumpipa’ khut sungah Jerusalem kipia lo ding hi, ci-a a hong ciamna tawh na suan na Pasian’ khemsa-in om kei in.
En in, Assiria kumpite in gam khempeuh a hihnasa, a suksiat mangna thu na za khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin nang hong hon khia zo ding ahi hiam?
Ka pu ka pate in a suksiat minam Gozan, Haran, Rezef le Telassar gam sunga Eden mite, tua minamte’ pasian-te in amaute hon khia zo ahi hiam?
Hamath kumpipa, Arpad kumpipa, Sefarvaim khuapi kumpipa, Hena kumpipa, ahih kei leh Ivvah kumpipa koi-ah om ahi uh hiam, ci hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Hezekiah in kamtaite tung panin a lai sangin a sim hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn-ah Hezekiah paito a, Topa’ mai-ah a lai a zal hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Topa’ mai-ah thu ngenin, “Topa, Israel Pasian, kherub tungah a tupa aw, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh lakah nangmah, nangmah bek Pasian na hi a, nangmah in vantung le leitung na bawl hi.
Topa aw, na bil hong ngat inla hong za in. Topa aw, na mitte hak inla hong mu in. Tua ciangin a nungta Pasian a zahko nadingin a hong khak Sennakherib’ thute za in.
A taktakin, Topa aw, Assiria kumpite in minam dangte le a gam uh siasak uh a,
a pasian-te uh meikhuk sungah lotsak uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pasian hi loin, mihingte’ khut tawh a kibawl sing le suang ahi hi. Tua ahih manin tuate kisusia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, Topa kote’ Pasian aw, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh in nang, nang bek Pasian na hihna a theih nadingun ama khut sung panin kote hong hon khia in, kong thum hi, Topa aw,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Amoz’ tapa Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah thu puak a, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib tawh kisai kei tungah nong thungetna ka za zo hi,’ ci hi.
Amah tawh kisai-in Topa’ gensa thu hih bang ahi hi: Zion khuapi in nang hong simmawh a, nang hong nuihsan hi. Jerusalem khuapi in na nungah a lu hong peisan hi.
Kua zahko-in, a simmawh na hi hiam? Kua langpangin na aw sang sakin kihihsakna tawh gamta na hi hiam? Israel-te’ a Siangtho pa, a simmawh na hi hi.

Na kamtaite tawh Topa na zahko a, nangmah in, ‘Ka leeng tampite tawh mual sang pen munah ka pai khin a, Lebanon gam tawng pek dong ka tung khin hi. A taamtak sang pente ka phuk mang khin a, a taaksan hoih pente zong ka phuk mang khin hi. A gam tawngnung pen dongah keimah ka lut a, a tulak thuk pen dongah zong ka lut khin hi.
Tuikhukte ka to a, gamdang tuite ka dawn hi. Ka khenuai tawh Egypt lui khempeuh ka keusak hi,’ na ci hi.
Sawt pek lai-in ka ngaihsutsa ahih lam za nai lo na hi hiam? Tanglai pek panin ka geelkholhsa hi a, tu-a ka tunsak ding thute kulh a nei khuapite ninbulomtangin na heina ding,
a sunga teengte a hatna teng kilakhia-in, lungkia-in cih nading thei loin, gamlak singnote le lo ngeekte bangin, innkhumzanga lopate bangin a om laitak, a khan khit ma-in a sih ding ka geelsa ahi hi.
Ahih hangin keimah in na tutsukna le na pusuahna le na sungtumna, kei tungah na hehna ka thei khin hi.

Kei tungah na hehna hang le na kiphatsakna ka bilah hong tun khitna hangin na nakah nakpheh hong bulhin, na kam ah kamkaih kong bulh dinga, nong kuankhiatna lam mahah kong lehheikik ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah, “Nang adingin lim hih bang hong hi ding hi: Tu kumin ama thu-in a pote na ne dinga, a kum nihna ciangin tua bangmahin a sel khiate na ne ding hi. A kum thumna ciangin khai tuhin atin, leenggui suanin a gah na ne ding hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam sungah a suakta a omlaite in singkung bangin a thuk lamah zung kha kikin a tung lamah gah hong gahto ding hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh a omlaite Jerusalem panin hong pai khia dinga, a suakta khat Zion Mual panin hong pai khia ding hi. Topa’ deih luatna in hih thu hong tungsak ding hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Assiria kumpipa tawh kisai-in hih bangin gen hi: ‘Hih khuapi sungah amah hong pai lo dinga, thaltang khat zong lawn lo ding hi. Khuapi mai-ah lum tawh zong hong pai loin, khuapi simna-in phung zong ciang lo ding hi.
Amah hong paina lampi mah tawnin amah kilehkik dinga, hih khuapi sungah amah hong pai lo ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keima min ka khualna le ka nasem pa David tungah ka ciamsa thu hangin hih khuapi ka hu ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua zanin Topa’ vantungmi pai khia a, Assiria-te giahphual ah galkap tul zakhat le tul sawmgiat le tulnga a that hi. Zingsang tungin mite a thawh ciangin, hihte khempeuh si luanghawm na hi hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib kihem khia a, inn-ah ciahin Nineveh-ah a teeng hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama pasian Nisrok’ biakinn sungah bia-in a om laitakin, ama tapate Adrammelek le Sharezer in namsau tawh amah thatin Ararat gamah a tai uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Esarhaddon in a uk hi.

Tua hun laitakin Hezekiah cina-in si dektak hi. Tua ciangin Amoz’ tapa kamsang Isaiah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Na innkuan vai ding hawm in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang na si ding hi; na damkik zo kei ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in a mai kawm lam ngatin Topa tungah thu ngen a,

“Nangma mai-ah thuman tak le ka lungsim khempeuh tawh ka gamtatna le nangma muhna-ah a hoih ka sepna thu tu-in hong phawk in, kong thum hi, Topa aw,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Hezekiah nakpitakin a kap hi.
Tua ciangin inntual laita panin Isaiah a pai khiat ma-in ama tungah Topa’ thu hong tung hi.

“Kilehkik inla keima mite’ makai Hezekiah kiangah hih bangin gen in: Na thungetna ka za khin a, na khituite ka mu khin hi. En in, nang kong damsak dinga, ni thum ni-in Topa’ biakinn-ah na paito ding hi.

Na nuntakna kum sawm le kum nga sung kong behlap ding hi. Assiria kumpipa khut sung panin nangmah le hih khuapi ka hon khia dinga, keima hang le ka nasem pa David hangin hih khuapi ka hu ding hi, ci hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in, “Theimoh khat hong la un. Amah a damkik theih nadingin tuate la unla, a uilut nuh un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Isaiah kiangah, “Topa in kei hong damsakna ding le a ni thum ni-in Topa’ biakinn-ah ka paitohna ding a lim bang hi ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Isaiah in, “Topa in a ciamsa thu hong hih nadingin Topa’ tung panin nangma tungah a lim hih bang hi ding hi: A liim kal sawm maipai ding hiam, ahih kei leh kal sawm nungkik ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in dawngin, “Liim kal sawm a mai nawt ding a baih khat ahi hi; liim kal sawm nungkiksak zaw in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa tungah kamsangpa Isaiah kiko hi. Tua ciangin amah in Ahaz’ ni-nai tungah a ni tumsa a liim kal sawm lehkaihkik hi.
Tua hun laitakin Babylon kumpipa, Baladan’ tapa Merodak-baladan in Hezekiah kiangah laikhakte le letsong khat tawh kamtaite a sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hezekiah a ci na hi, ci-in amah in za hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in amaute na zindo a, amah in amaute kiangah a vankoihna inn khempeuh, ngun, kham, a namtui nate, sathau manpha, a galvan le a vankoihna innte-ah a om khempeuh a lak hi. Ama inn sung hitaleh ama gam sung khempeuh pan hitaleh Hezekiah in amaute a lah loh om lo hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Hezekiah kiangah kamsang Isaiah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Hih mite in bang gen ahi hiam? Koi lai panin nang kiangah hong pai ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Hezekiah in, “Amaute, Babylon gam, a gamlapi panin hong pai uh hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Amaute in na inn sungah bang mu ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Hezekiah in dawngin, “Amaute in ka innsunga om khempeuh mu uh hi; ka vankoihna inn sungte panin amaute ka lah loh bangmah om lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah, “Topa’ thu za in:
En in, na innsunga om khempeuh le na pu na pate in tuni donga a kholte Babylon-ah a kipuak ni ding hong tung ding hi; bangmah kisiit lo ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Nangma sung pan a suak na tapate pawlkhat kila khia dinga, amaute pen Babylon kumpipa inn sungah inn sung mangte hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Isaiah kiangah, “Na gensa ahi Topa’ thugen a hoih hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Keima hun sungin kilemna le lungmuanna a om nakleh bang phamawh ding ahi hiam?” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Hezekiah’ sepna a omlaite, a vangliatna le tuili le tuilakna bawlin khuapi sungah tui a tutna, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah si a, ama tangin a tapa Manasseh in a uk hi.
Manasseh in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm le kum nih pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnga le nga sung a uk hi. Ama nu’ min Hefzibah ahi hi.
Topa in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawl khiat minamte’ gamtatna a kihhuaite mah bangin Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a pa Hezekiah’ suksiatsa mual tunga biaknate lamkik hi. Tua ciangin amah in Baal adingin biakna taute phut a, Israel kumpi Ahab’ bawl bangin Asherah milim khat bawl a, vantung a om nate khempeuh bia-in tuate’ na a sem hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Jerusalem-ah ka min ka koih ding hi,” a cihna Topa’ biakinn sungah amah in biakna taute lam hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ biakinn tual nihte tungah vantung a om nate khempeuh adingin biakna taute a lam hi.
Tua ciangin amah in biakna-in a tapa hal a, aisanna le mailam thugen kholhnate semin, vankah theite le aisante tawh na semkhawm hi. Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia tampi gamta a, amah hehsak hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in David le a tapa Solomon tungah, “Israel minam khempeuh sung panin ka teelkhiat hih biakinn sung le Jerusalem-ah ka min ka koih tawntung ding hi. Amaute ka thupiaksa khempeuh tawh kizui le ka nasem pa Moses in amaute a piak thukham khempeuh tawh kizui-in gamtat ding a kingaihsut nak-uhleh, a pu a pate uh tungah ka piak gam sungah Israel mite mi vakvai ka hisak nawn kei ding hi,” a cihna biakinn sungah amah in ama bawlsa a kiseek Asherah milim a koih hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in thu ngai lo uh a, Topa in Israel-te’ mai-ah a suksiat minamte’ gamtatna sangin a siahuai zaw a gamtat nadingun Manasseh in amaute a zol hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kamsangte ahi a nasemte’ tungtawnin gen a,
“Judah kumpipa Manasseh in hih a kihhuai nate sem a, ama ma-a Amor mite’ gamtatna sangin a sia zaw-in na semin a milimte tawh Judah mite zong khialsak khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel Pasian Topa in hih bangin ci hi: En un, a za mite khempeuh’ bilte a vut ding siatna Jerusalem le Judah tungah ka tungsak ding hi.
Keimah in Samaria le Ahab le ama suante gim ka piak bangin Jerusalem tungah gimna ka tungsak ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khat in pakan a nul bangin keimah in Jerusalem nulin ka lumlet ding hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in ka mi a omlaite paaikhia-in amau’ galte tungah ka pia dinga, amaute pen a galte’ mat ding mi le vankiate suak ding uh hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh a pu a pate uh Egypt panin hong pai khiat a kipan tuni dongin keima muhna-ah a sia gamta-in kei hong hehsak uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua tham loin Topa’ muhna-ah amaute a sia a gamtat nadingun amah in Judah mite a khialhsak banah, Jerusalem mong khat pan mong khat sisan tawh a kidimsak dongin Manasseh in mawhna baang lo mi tampi a that hi.
Manasseh’ sepna a omlaite, a hih khempeuh le ama hihsa a khialhna, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Manasseh si a, Uzza’ huansung, ama inn huan sungah kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Amon in a uk hi.
Amon in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nih pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum nih sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Meshullemeth hi a, Jotbah khuami Haruz’ tanu ahi hi.
A pa Manasseh’ gamtat bangin Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Amah in a pa’ khekhap khempeuh tawn a, a pa in a na a sepsak milimte’ na mah semin tuate a bia hi.
Amah in a pu a pate’ Pasian, Topa nusia a, Topa’ lampi tawn lo hi.
Tua ciangin Amon’ nasemte in amah sawmsim uh a, ama inn sungah kumpipa a that uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua gammite in Kumpi Amon a sawmsimte khempeuh that leuleu uh a, tua ciangin tua gammite in ama tangin a tapa Josiah kumpi-in a koih uh hi.
Tu-in Amon’ hihsa a gamtatna a omlaite pen Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Uzza’ huansung ama hanah amah kivui a, ama tangin a tapa Josiah in a uk hi.
Josiah in uk ding a kipatin kum giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmthum le khat sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Jedidah hi a, Bozkath khuami Adaiah’ tanu ahi hi.
Topa’ mitah amah a manin gamta-in, a pu David’ khekhap khempeuh zui cinten a, themkhat zong pial lo hi.
Kumpi Josiah’ kum sawm le kum giatna kumin, kumpipa in a lai-at pa Meshullam’ tapa Azaliah, a tapa Shafan, Topa’ biakinn-ah sawl a,
“Kongcingte in mite tung panin a kaihkhop uh ahi Topa’ biakinn sungah hong kipaipih sum phazah a theih nadingin siampi lianpen pa Hilkiah kiangah paito in.
Tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn nasemte tungah a sum piasak in. Topa’ biakinn-ah a om inn a puah nasemte tungah amaute tua sum piasak in.
Tua sumte pen khutsiamte, innlamte le leilesuang innlam siamte tungah piak ding le biakinn puah nadingin sing leina ding le suang tawhna ding zong ahi hi.
Ahih hangin thuman takin amaute gamta uh ahih manin amaute’ khut sungah a kipia sumte hangin amaute tung panin sazian kingen lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin siampi lianpen pa Hilkiah in lai-at pa Shafan kiangah, “Topa’ biakinn sungah thukham laibu ka mu hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Hilkiah in Shafan kiangah a laibu pia a, amah in a sim hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah lai-at pa Shafan hong pai-in thu zasak a, “Nasemte in biakinn sungah a om sumte la khia-in Topa’ biakinn nasemte tungah pia khinzo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin lai-at pa Shafan in kumpipa kiangah, “Siampi Hilkiah in laibu khat kei hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Shafan in kumpipa mai-ah tua laibu a sim hi.
Kumpipa in thukham laibu sunga thute a zak ciangin a dahna hangin a puante a balkek hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in siampi Hilkiah, Shafan’ tapa Ahikam, Mikaiah’ tapa Akbor, lai-at pa Shafan le kumpipa’ nasem Asaiah thu pia a,

“Pai unla, a kimu hih laibu sunga thute tawh kisai-in keima ading, mite ading le Judah mi khempeuh adingin Topa’ tungah thu va dong un; bang hang hiam cih leh hih laibu sunga thu, eite tawh kisai-in a kigelh khempeuh bangin gamtat ding i pu i pate in na mang lo uh ahih manin eite tungah Topa’ hehna lian hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin siampi Hilkiah, Ahikam, Akbor, Shafan le Asaiah te zong Harhas tapa Tikvah, a tapa Shallum, biakinn puan a kem pa’ zi kamsangnu Huldah kiangah a pai uh hi (tua laitakin Jerusalem khua sung a Veeng Nihna-ah tua nu teeng hi); tua ciangin tua nu tawh amaute kiho uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Kei kiangah note hong sawl mipa kiangah gen un.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: En un, hih lai mun le a tungah a teengte tungah Judah kumpipa in laibu sunga a sim siatna thute khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in kei hong nusia-in pasian dangte tungah paknamtui hal uh a, amau khut tawh a bawl milimte tawh kei hong hehsak uh ahih manin hih mun tungah ka hehna so dinga, ka hehna dai lo ding hi.

Ahih hangin Topa’ tungah thu a dong dingin note a hong sawl Judah kumpipa tungah ahihleh note in hih bangin na gen ding uh hi. Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nangmah in na zaksa thute tawh kisai-in,

amaute gamkhing le samsiat a ngahte a suah nadingin hih mun le a tungah a teeng mite tungah ka kampauna na zak ciangin na lungsim kisikin Topa’ mai-ah nang mahmah kiniamkhiatin, na puante balkekin ka mai-ah na kahna thu, keimah in zong ka za hi, Topa in ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, nangmah in nuamtakin na han na zuan dinga, hih mun tungah ka tunsak ding siatna khempeuh na mit in mu lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kumpipa kiangah tua thu a puakkik uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Judah le Jerusalem upate khempeuh samsak a, ama kiangah hong kikhawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn-ah kumpipa paito a, amah tawh Judah mi khempeuh, Jerusalem-a teengte khempeuh, siampite, kamsangte le mi khempeuh a neu a lian tawh pai uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute’ zakin Topa’ biakinn sungah a kimu thuciamna laibu sunga thute khempeuh a sim hi.

Tua ciangin khuampi gei-ah kumpipa dingin hih laibu sunga a kigelh thuciamna kammalte khempeuh a sepna ding, Topa’ thu mangin a thupiaknate le a thukhamte, a lungsim le a ngaihsutna khempeuh tawh a zuihna ding, Topa’ mai-ah thuciamna khat a bawl hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh zong tua thuciamna-ah a kihel uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in siampi lianpen pa Hilkiah le a nihna siampi le kongcingte in Topa’ biakinn sung panin Baal le Asherah nusian milim adingin a kibawl nazatte khempeuh le vantung a om nate khempeuh biak nadingin a kibawlte hong pai khiatpih nading uh thu a pia hi. Amah in Jerusalem pualam Kidron leikang halna munah tuate halin a vute Bethel khua-ah a pua hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Judah khuapite le Jerusalem kiima om mual tunga biaknate tungah paknamtui hal dingin Judah kumpite in a kipsaksa milim biate’ siampite a hawl khia hi. Baal tung, ni tung, kha tung, aksi honpite tung le vantung a om nate khempeuh tungah paknamtui a halte zong a hawl khia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ biakinn panin Jerusalem pualam, Kidron lui-ah Asherah nusian milim pai khiatpihin hal a, tua ciangin amah in satvui-in mi nautangte’ han tungah a vuite lawn hi.
Tua ciangin amah in numeite in Asherah milim adingin a kizang puante a gatna mun Topa’ biakinn sunga om a paktat pawlte’ innte a phel khia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Judah khuapite panin siampite khempeuh pai khiatpih a, Geba panin Beersheba ciang dong, siampite in paknamtui a halna mual tunga biaknate a susia hi. Tua ciangin amah in khuapi kulhkongpi veilam, khuapi ukpa Joshua’ kongpi lutna-ah a om dawibiakna munte a phel khia hi.
Tua lai-a sem siampite ahihleh Jerusalem-a Topa’ biakna tau-ah hong paito thei lo uh a, ahi zongin amau’ sanggamte’ lakah silngo sawh loh anlum ne thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin kuamah in Molek pasian tungah a tanu ahi a, a tapa ahi zongin biakna-in a hal theih nawn loh nadingin Hinnom Kuam sunga om Tofeth kici milim biakna mun a susia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a kiimnai-a om, inn sung ulian Nathanmelek’ inn gei, Topa’ biakinn sung lutna munah, Judah kumpite in ni tungah a ap uh a sakolte hem khia hi. Tua ciangin amah in ni’ sakol leengte mei tawh a hal hi.

Tua ciangin Judah kumpite in a bawlsa, Ahaz’ inndei tungnung khumzanga a om biakna taute le Topa’ biakinn tual nihte sungah Manasseh in a bawlsa biakna taute, amah in phelin satnen a, tua a vuite Kidron lui-ah a paai hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon in Sidon mite’ kihhuaina Ashtoreth pasian ading le Moab-te’ kihhuaina Khemosh pasian ading le Ammon mite’ kihhuaina Milkom pasian adingin a lam, Jerusalem nisuahna lam, Oliv Mual leitaw lama om mual tunga biaknate kumpipa in a susia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a biakna songte satkhamin, Asherah milimte phuk a, mihing guh tawh a dim tua munte a vuk hi.

Tua tham loin Israel-te a khialsak Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam in Bethel-ah a phuhsa mual tunga biakna, tua biakna mun a biakna tau tawh, amah in phelin a suangte sukham a, tuate a satvui hi. Amah in Asherah milim zong a hal hi.

Tua ciangin Josiah kihei-in khuadak a, mual tunga om hante a mu hi. Amah in mi sawlin hante sung panin a guhte lasak a, hih thute a gen khol Pasian’ mipa in a gen Topa’ thugen tawh kizui-in biakna tau tungah tuate halin a susia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Hua galkhat a ka muh phawkna mual bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin khuapisung mite in ama kiangah, “Judah panin hong pai-in Bethel-a biakna tau tungah na bawl hih thute a gen khol Pasian’ mipa’ han ahi hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Amah tuaci omsak un; kuamah in ama guhte khin kei un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Samaria panin hong pai khia kamsangte’ guhte le ama guhte tuaci omsak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpite in a bawlsa, Topa a hehsakna uh, Samaria khuapite sunga om mual tunga biakna munte khempeuh zong Josiah in a la khia hi. Bethel-a a hihsa khempeuh mah bangin tuate tungah a hih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tua lai-a a om, mual tunga biakna siampite khempeuh, biakna taute tungah that a, tuate tungah mihing guh a hal hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah amah a ciahkik hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in mi khempeuh thu pia a, “Hih thuciamna laibu sungah a kigelh mah bangin Topa na Pasian uh pahtawina-in Paisan Pawi bawl un,” a ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te thu a khen thukhente’ hun a kipan hitaleh, Israel kumpite ahih kei leh Judah kumpite’ hun sung khempeuh tua bang Paisan Pawi kibawl ngei lo hi.
Ahih hangin Kumpi Josiah’ uk kum sawm le kum giatna kumin Jerusalem-ah Topa adingin Paisan Pawi kibawl hi.

Tua tham loin Topa’ biakinn sungah siampi Hilkiah in a muh laibu sungah a kigelh thukham kammalte amah in a kipsak theih nadingin Judah gam sung le Jerusalem-a om vankahte, aisante, inn sung pasian-te, milimte le a kihhuai nate khempeuh Josiah in a hem khia hi.

Ama hun ma-in, amah tawh a kibang, Moses thukham tawh kizui-in a lungsim khempeuh, a nuntakna khempeuh le a thahatna khempeuh tawh Topa’ lamah a kihei kumpi om lo a, ama nungah zong amah tawh a kibang khat zong hong khang nawn lo hi.
Manasseh in amah a phinnate khempeuh hangin Judah tungah ama hehna, a lauhuai hih hehna lian panin Topa kihei nai lo hi.
Topa in, “Israel ka khiinkhiat bangin ka muhna panin Judah zong ka khin khia dinga, keimah in ka teelsa khuapi Jerusalem le ka min om ding hi, ka cihna biakinn ka paai khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Josiah’ gamtatna a omlaite le a hih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.

Ama hun sungin Assiria kumpipa a huh dingin Eufratis gun-ah Egypt kumpipa Faro Neko kuanto hi. Amah a khaktan dingin Kumpi Josiah zong a kuan hi. Faro Neko in Josiah a muh ciangin Megiddo ah a that hi.

Tua ciangin ama nasemte in Megiddo panin a sisa-in leeng khat sungah amah pua-in Jerusalem-ah ciahpih uh a, a hanah amah a vui uh hi. Tua ciangin tua gam mite in Josiah’ tapa Jehoahaz la-in sathau nilh uh a, a pa’ tangin kumpi-in a koih uh hi.
Jehoahaz in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le thum pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kha thum sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Hamutal hi a, Libnah khua mi Jeremiah’ tanu ahi hi.
A pu a pate’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Jerusalem a uk theih loh nadingin Faro Neko in Hamath gam sung Riblah khua-ah amah kol bulh a, Judah mite tung panin ngun talen zakhat le kham talen khat siah a kai hi.

Tua ciangin Faro Neko in a pa Josiah’ tangin Josiah’ tapa Eliakim kumpi-in koih a, ama min Jehoiakim ci-in a kheelsak hi. Ahih hangin amah in Jehoahaz pai khiatpih hi; amah Egypt tung a, tua lai-ah a si hi.

Tua ciangin Jehoiakim in a ngun le a kham Faro’ tungah pia a, ahih hangin Faro’ thupiakna bangin tua sum a piak dingin a gam sung mite tung pan amah in siah a dong hi. Faro Neko tungah a piak dingin, amah in mi khempeuh tung panin a neihsa uh tawh kizui-in a gam sung mite’ ngun le kham a dok hi.
Jehoiakim in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawm le kum khat sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Zebidah hi a, Rumah khuami Pedaiah’ tanu ahi hi.
A pu a pate’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Ama hun sungin Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar hong kuanto a, Jehoiakim kum thum sung ama nasem a suak hi. Tua ciangin Jehoiakim in amah lehdo hi.
Tua ciangin ama nasem kamsangte tungtawnin a gen Topa’ thugenna bangin Judah a susia dingin ama langkhat ah Topa in Khaldea mihonte, Syria mihonte, Moab mihonte le Ammon mihonte a sawl hi.

Ama gamtatnasate khempeuh tawh kizui-in Manasseh’ khialhna hangin ama muhna panin amaute a khiinkhiatna ding le a diakdiakin, amah in khialhna nei lo mite a thahna hangin Topa’ thupiakna tawh Judah tungah hih thu a hong tung taktak ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a mawh lo mite’ sisan tawh Jerusalem kidimsak a, Topa in ama mawhna maisak lo hi.
Tu-in Jehoiakim’ sepna a omlaite le a hih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoiakim si a, ama tangin a tapa Jehoiakhin in a uk hi.
Tua ciangin Babylon kumpipa in Egypt lui panin Eufratis gun dong Egypt kumpipa’ neih khempeuh laksak khin ahih manin Egypt kumpipa a gam panin hong kuan khiakik zo nawn lo hi.
Jehoiakhin kumpi a suahin kum sawm le kum giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kha thum sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Nehushta hi a, Jerusalem khuami Elnathan’ tanu ahi hi.
A pa’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Tua hun laitakin Jerusalem-ah Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar hong kuanto a, tua khuapi a umcih hi.
Ama nasemte in a umcih laitakin Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar tua khuapi-ah hong tung hi.

Tua ciangin Judah kumpipa Jehoiakhin in Babylon kumpipa tungah amah a kipan, ama nu, a nasemte, a uliante le a kumpi inn-a zaneite a kipia hi. Topa in a genkholhsa bangin Babylon kumpipa in ama uk a kum giatna kumin thongkia-in amah la a, Topa’ biakinn-a van manpha khempeuh pua khia-in, Kumpi Solomon in a bawlsa, Topa’ biakinn sunga kham nazat khempeuh a satnen hi.

Amah in Jerusalem mi khempeuh, a ulian khempeuh le a thahat a vanglian khempeuh, galmatin tul sawm le khutsiamte le sikseekte khempeuh a ciahpih hi. Tua gam a a zawng pente sim loh kuamah dang om nawn lo hi.
Amah in Babylon-ah Jehoiakhin a ciahpih hi. Kumpipa’ nu, kumpipa’ zite, ama nuai-ah a zaneite le tua gam sung ukpite, Jerusalem panin Babylon-ah galmatin a la hi.
Babylon kumpipa in a thahat, galdo dingin a hoih mi thahat khempeuh a vekpi-in tulsagih le khutsiamte le sikseekte tulkhat, galmatin Babylon-ah a paipih hi.
Tua ciangin Babylon kumpipa in Jehoiakhin’ tangin ama pa’ sanggampa Mattaniah kumpi-in koih a, ama min Zedekiah-in a kheelsak hi.
Zedekiah kumpi a suahin kum sawmnih le khat pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawm le kum khat sung a uk hi. Ama nu’ min Hamutal hi a, Libnah khuami Jeremiah’ tanu ahi hi.
Jehoiakim’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ hehna hangin ama kiang panin amaute a paihkhiatna zah dong dingin Jerusalem le Judah tungah thu hong om hi.

Tua ciangin Zedekiah in Babylon kumpipa lehdo hi. Tua ahih manin ama uk a kum kuana, tua kum a kha sawmna, tua kha a ni sawm ni-in Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar a galkap khempeuh tawh Jerusalem a sim dingin hong kuanin tua khua a umcih uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a kimkotah umcih nading panmun a bawl uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Zedekiah’ kum sawm le kum khatna kum dong tua khuapi ki-umcih hi.
A kha lina a ni kua ni-in tua khuapi sungah kialpi nasia mahmah ahih manin tua gam mite ading an om lo hi.

Tua ciangin khuapikulh sulet uh hi. Khaldea mite khuapi kiimah a ompi mahin, kumpipa’ huan kiang lam kulhpi nih kikal kulhkongpi lampi zui-in kumpipa le a galhang mi khempeuh zanin a tai uh hi. Arabah lam manawhin amaute pai uh hi.
Ahih hangin Khaldea mite’ galkapte in kumpipa delh uh a, Jerikho zanglei-ah amah pha uh hi; tua ciangin a galkap khempeuh ama kiang panin kithehthang hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in kumpipa man uh a, ama tungah thukhenna a pia, Riblah-a Babylon kumpipa kiangah amah paipih uh hi.
Amaute in Zedekiah’ muhna-ah a tapate thatin, Zedekiah’ mitte khel khia uh a, amah kol bulhin Babylon-ah a paipih uh hi.
A kha ngana, tua kha a ni sagih ni-in, Babylon Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar’ kum sawm le kum kuana kumin, Babylon kumpipa’ nasem, amah a cingte a ukpa Nebuzaradan Jerusalem-ah hong pai hi.
Amah in Topa’ biakinn a kipan kumpipa’ inn le Jerusalem khua sunga om inn khempeuh hal a, inn lian khempeuh amah in haltum hi.
Tua ciangin a cingte a ukpa tawh a om Khaldea mi galkapte khempeuh in Jerusalem kimkota kulhpi susia uh hi.
Tua ciangin a cingte a ukpa Nebuzaradan in khuapi sungah a kinusia a omlai mite le Babylon kumpipa a taisan mite, mihonpi a omlai teng khempeuh salin paipih khawm hi.
Ahih hangin a cingte a ukpa in leenggui lote a en ding le lo kho dingin tua gammi a zawng pente pawlkhat nusia lai hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn sungah a om sumngo khuampite, Topa’ biakinn sungah a om tuikuang kingaknate le sumngo tuikuangpi, Khaldea mite in satnen uh a, Babylon-ah a sumngo pua uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in beelte, kawbiate, taitehte, paknamtui adingin pakante le biakinn sung nasepna a kizang sumngo nazatte khempeuh,
vutluahna le haite la khia uh hi. A cingte a ukpa in kham ahite kham mahin la-in, ngun ahite a ngun mahin a la hi.
Solomon in Topa’ biakinn a dinga a bawl khuampi nihte, tuikuangpi khat le a kingaknate, sumngo tawh kibawl hih nazatte khempeuh ahihleh tawi teh zawh ding hi lo hi.

Khuampi khat a sanna pi sawmnih le sagih hi a, tua tungah sumngo khuamluzepna khat om hi; khuamluzepna a sanna pi li le alang ahi hi. Sumngo tawh a kibawl ngen banga kikalh simsiam le mang kawlsingte khuamluzepna kimkotah om hi. A khuampi nihna zong tua mah bangin, ngen banga kikalh simsiam tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a cingte a ukpa in siampi lianpa Seraiah, siampi nihna Zefaniah le kong a cing mi thumte a la hi.

Tua ciangin khuapi panin galkapte a uk ngei ulian khat le khuapi sungah a om kumpipa’ thukuppihte mi nga a la hi. Tua ciangin gam sung mite a khawm galkapte a ukpa’ lai-at pa a la hi. Tua ciangin khuapi sungah a om tua gam sung mi sawmguk a la hi.
Tua ciangin a cingte a ukpa Nebuzaradan in amaute la-in Riblah-a Babylon kumpipa kiangah amaute a paipih hi.
Tua ciangin Babylon kumpipa in amaute vat a, Hamath gam sung Riblah-ah amaute a that hi. Tua ahih ciangin amau’ gam panin salin Judah mite kila khia hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam sungah a omlai, Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in a nusiatte tungah a uk dingin Shafan’ tapa Ahikam, a tapa Gedaliah amah in a seh hi.

Tu-in gam sunga om galkap a ukte le a mite in Babylon kumpipa in a uk dingin Gedaliah a sehna thu a zak uh ciangin amaute a mite uh tawh Mizpah-a Gedaliah kiangah hong pai uh hi. Tuate pen Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael, Kareah’ tapa Johanan, Netofah mi Tanhumeth’ tapa Seraiah le Maakath mi Jaazaniah ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute le a mite uh tungah Gedaliah kiciamin, “Khaldea mi uliante’ hangin lau kei un; gam sungah teengin, Babylon kumpipa’ na sem un. Tua hileh note adingin thu hong nuam ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a kha sagihna sungin kumpi innkuan sung panin Elishama’ tapa Nethaniah, a tapa Ishmael mihing sawm tawh hong kuanin Gedaliah le Mizpah-ah amah tawh a om Judah mi le Khaldea mite simin a that hi.
Tua ciangin a lian a neu-in mi khempeuh le galkap a ukte kithawi-in Egypt-ah pai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Khaldea mite kihta uh hi.

Judah kumpi Jehoiakhin thong sungah a om zawh kum sawmthum le kum sagihna kum, kha sawm le nihna, tua kha ni sawmnih le sagih ni, Babylon kumpipa Evilmerodak in uk ding a kipat kumin, hehpihna tawh thong panin Judah kumpi Jehoiakhin a khah hi.
Amah in migitna kam tawh amah hopih a, Babylon sunga amah tawh a om kumpi a mat dangte khempeuh sangin a sang zaw-in amah a pahtawi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jehoiakhin in a thong puante suah khia hi. Tua ciangin a nuntak sung nisimin kumpipa’ sabuai-ah a manmanin an a ne hi.
Tua ciangin ama ngahthuap dingin, amah a nuntaksung tawntung nisimin tanh khat, a manmanin ngahthuapna ama tungah kumpipa in a pia hi.
Adam’ ta Seth, Seth’ ta Enosh,
Enosh’ ta Kenan, Kenan’ ta Mahalalel, Mahalalel’ ta Jared,
Jared’ ta Enok, Enok’ ta Methuselah, Methuselah’ ta Lamek,
Lamek’ ta Noah ahi hi. Noah in tapa thum nei a, tuate pen Shem, Ham le Jafeth ahi uh hi.
Jafeth’ tapate: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek le Tiras hi a, amau’ min ciat pua-in minam tuamtuam a piang hi.
Gomer’ suante: Ashkenaz mite, Rifath mite le Togarmah mite ahi uh hi.
Javan’ suante: Elishah mite, Tarshish mite, Kittim mite le Rodanim mite ahi uh hi.
Ham’ tapate: Kush, Egypt, Put le Kanaan hi a, amau’ min ciat pua-in minam a piang hi.
Kush’ suante: Seba mite, Havilah mite, Sabta mite, Raamah mite le Sabteka mite ahi uh hi. Raamah’ suante: Sheba mite le Dedan mite ahi uh hi.
Kush in Nimrod kici tapa khat nei a, leitungah amah a vanglian masa pen ahi hi.
Egypt pen Lud mite, Anam mite, Lehab mite, Naftuh mite,
Pathrus mite, Kasluh mite (Filistia mite’ hong pianna) le Kaftor mite’ pianna pupi ahi hi.
Kanaan pen a tacil Sidon le Heth,
le Jebus mite, Amor mite, Girgash mite,
Hiv mite, Arka mite, Sin mite,
Arvad mite, Zemari mite le Hamath mite’ pianna pa ahi hi.
Shem’ tapate: Elam, Asshur, Arpakshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether le Meshek hi a, amau’ min ciat pua-in minam a piang hi.
Arpakshad pen Shelah’ pa hi a, Shelah pen Eber’ pa ahi hi.
Eber’ sung pan a piang tapa nihte: A khat pa’ min Peleg ahi hi (bang hang hiam cih leh ama hunin gam kikhen hi). A sanggampa’ min Joktan ahi hi.
Joktan pen Almodad mite, Shelef mite, Hazarmaveth mite, Jerah mite,
Hadoram mite, Uzal mite, Diklah mite,
Ebal mite, Abimael mite, Sheba mite,
Ofir mite, Havilah mite le Jobab mite’ pianna pa ahi hi. Hihte khempeuh, Joktan’ suante ahi uh hi.
Shem, Arpakshad, Shelah,
Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nahor le Terah hi a,
tua ciangin Abraham a kici Abram ahi suk uh hi.
Abraham’ tapate: Isaac le Ishmael ahi uh hi.
Amau’ khangsimna hih bang ahi hi: Ishmael’ tacil Nebaioth ahi hi. Tua ciangin Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Nafish le Kedemah ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Ishmael’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Abraham’ zineu Keturah’ tapate: Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak le Shuah ahi uh hi. Jokshan’ tapate: Sheba le Dedan ahi uh hi.
Midian’ tapate: Efah, Efer, Hanok, Abida le Eldaah ahi uh hi. Hihte khempeuh pen Keturah’ suanlekhakte ahi uh hi.
Abraham pen Isaac’ pa ahi hi. Isaac’ tapate Esau le Israel ahi uh hi.
Esau’ tapate: Elifaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam le Korah ahi uh hi.
Elifaz’ tapate: Teman, Omar, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna le Amalek ahi uh hi.
Reuel’ tapate: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah le Mizzah ahi uh hi.
Seir’ tapate: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer le Dishan ahi uh hi.
Lotan’ tapate Hori le Homam hi uh a, Lotan’ sanggamnu pen Timna ahi hi.
Shobal’ tapate: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shefi le Onam ahi uh hi. Zibeon’ tapate: Aiah le Anah ahi uh hi.
Anah’ tapa Dishon ahi hi. Dishon’ tapate: Hamran, Eshban, Ithran le Kheran ahi uh hi.
Ezer’ tapate: Bilhan, Zaavan le Jaakan ahi uh hi. Dishan’ tapate: Uz le Aran ahi uh hi.
Israel-te tungah kumpi khat peuhpeuh in a uk ma-in Edom gam sungah a uk kumpite: Beor’ tapa Bela hi a, ama khuapi min Dinhabah ahi hi.
Bela a sih ciangin ama tangin Bozrah khuami Zerah’ tapa Jobab in uk hi.
Jobab a sih ciangin ama tangin Teman mite’ gammi Husham in uk hi.
Husham a sih ciangin Moab gam sungah Midian mite a zopa, Bedad’ tapa Hadad in ama tangin uk a, ama khuapi min Avith ahi hi.
Hadad a sih ciangin ama tangin Masrekah khuami Samlah in uk hi.
Samlah a sih ciangin ama tangin Eufratis gun gei-a om Rehoboth khuami Shaul in uk hi.
Shaul a sih ciangin ama tangin Akbor’ tapa Baalhanan in uk hi.
Baalhanan a sih ciangin ama tangin Hadad in uk hi. Ama khuapi min Pai hi a, ama zi’ min Mehetabel hi a, Mezahab’ tunu hi a, Matred’ tanu ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Hadad si hi. Edom ukpite: Ukpi Timna, Aliah, Jetheth,
Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel le Iram hi uh a, hihte pen Edom ukpite ahi uh hi.
Israel’ tapate: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakhar, Zebulun,
Dan, Josef, Benjamin, Naftali, Gad le Asher ahi uh hi.
Judah’ tapate: Er, Onan le Shelah ahi uh hi. Hih thumte pen Kanaan mi Bathshua tawh a neih ahi hi. Judah’ tacil Er pen Topa’ muhna-ah gamtat hoih lo ahih manin Topa in amah that hi.
A tapa’ zi Tamar in zong amah tawh Perez le Zerah nei hi. Judah in a vekpi-in tapa nga nei hi.
Perez’ tapate: Hezron le Hamul ahi uh hi.
Zerah’ tapate: Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Kalkol le Dara, a vekpi-in nga pha uh hi.
Karmi’ tapa: A ki-ap nate-ah a khial, Israel mite a nawngkaisak Akhan ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Ethan’ tapa Azariah ahi hi.
Ama sung panin a suak Hezron’ tapate: Jerahmeel, Ram le Khelubai ahi uh hi.
Ram pen Amminadab’ pa hi a, Amminadab pen Judah’ tapate’ sung pan ulian Nahshon’ pa ahi hi.
Nahshon pen Salma’ pa, Salma pen Boaz’ pa,
Boaz pen Obed’ pa, Obed pen Jessi’ pa ahi hi.
Jessi in a tacil Eliab, a nihna Abinadab, a thumna Shimea,
a lina Nethanel, a ngana Raddai,
a gukna Ozem, a sagihna David a nei hi.
Amau’ sanggam numeite Zeruiah le Abigail ahi uh hi. Zeruiah’ tapate: Abishai, Joab le Asahel, thum pha uh hi.
Abigail in Amasa nei a, Amasa’ pa pen Ishmael mi Jether ahi hi.
Hezron’ tapa Kaleb in a zi Azubah le Jerioth tawh ta nei hi. Ama tate: Jesher, Shobab le Ardon ahi uh hi.
Azubah a sih ciangin Kaleb in Efrath tenpihin, tua nu in amah tawh Hur nei hi.
Hur pen Uri’ pa hi a, Uri pen Bezalel’ pa ahi hi.
Ama khan kum sawmguk a phak ciangin Hezron in a teenpih, Gilead’ pa Makhir’ tanu luppih hi. Tua nu in amah tawh Segub nei hi.
Segub pen Jair’ pa hi a, Gilead gam sungah khuapi sawmnih le thum nei hi.
Ahih hangin Geshur le Aram in amaute tung panin Havvothjair khua le Kenath le a khuaneute, khua sawmguk la hi. Hihte khempeuh pen Gilead’ pa Makhir’ suanlekhakte ahi uh hi.
Hezron a sih khit ciangin Kaleb in a pa Hezron’ zi Efrath luppih a, tua nu in amah tawh Tekoa khuapi a sat Ashhur a nei hi.
Hezron’ tacil Jerahmeel’ tapate: A tacil Ram, Bunah, Oren le Ahijah ahi uh hi.
Jerahmeel in zi dang khat zong nei a, a min Atarah ahi hi. Amah pen Onam’ nu ahi hi.
Jerahmeel’ tacil Ram’ tapate: Maaz, Jamin le Eker ahi uh hi.
Onam’ tapate: Shammai le Jada ahi uh hi. Shammai’ tapate: Nadab le Abishur ahi uh hi.
Abishur’ zi’ min Abihail hi a, tua nu in amah tawh Ahban le Molid nei hi.
Nadab’ tapate: Seled le Appaim ahi uh hi. Seled in ta nei loin si hi.
Appaim’ tapa Ishi ahi hi. Ishi’ tapa Sheshan ahi hi. Sheshan’ tapa Ahlai ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Shammai’ sanggampa Jada’ tapate: Jether le Jonathan ahi uh hi. Jether in ta nei loin si hi.
Jonathan’ tapate: Peleth le Zaza ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Jerahmeel’ suanlekhakte ahi uh hi.
Sheshan in tapa nei loin tanu bek nei hi. Ahih hangin Sheshan in Jarha min nei Egypt sila khat nei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Sheshan in a sila Jarha tungah a zi dingin a tanu pia a, tua nu in Attai nei hi.
Attai pen Nathan’ pa hi a, Nathan pen Zabad’ pa ahi hi.
Zabad pen Eflal’ pa hi a, Eflal pen Obed’ pa ahi hi.
Obed pen Jehu’ pa hi a, Jehu pen Azariah’ pa ahi hi.
Azariah pen Helez’ pa hi a, Helez pen Eleasah’ pa ahi hi.
Eleasah pen Sismai’ pa hi a, Sismai pen Shallum’ pa ahi hi.
Shallum pen Jekamiah’ pa hi a, Jekamiah pen Elishama’ pa ahi hi.
Jerahmeel’ sanggampa Kaleb’ tapa: Zif’ pa ahi a tacil Mareshah ahi hi. Mareshah’ tapa Hebron ahi hi.
Hebron’ tapate: Korah, Tappuah, Rekem le Shema ahi uh hi.
Shema pen Raham’ pa hi a, Raham pen Jorkeam’ pa ahi hi. Rekem pen Shema’ sanggam hi a, Shammai’ pa ahi hi.
Shammai’ tapa Maon hi a, Maon pen Bethzur’ pa ahi hi.
Kaleb’ zineu Efah in Haran, Moza le Gazez nei a, Haran in Gazez kici tapa khat nei hi.
Jahdai’ tapate: Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Efah le Shaaf ahi uh hi.
Kaleb’ zineu Maakah in Sheber le Tirhanah nei hi.
Tua ciangin tapa nih nei leuleu a, Madmannah khuapi a sat Shaaf le Makbenah khuapi le Gibea khuapi a sat Sheva ahi uh hi. Kaleb in tanu khat zong nei a, a min Aksah ahi hi.
Hih a nuai-ate zong Kaleb’ suanlekhakte ahi uh hi. Kaleb’ zi Efrath’ tacil Hur’ tapate: Kiriathjearim khuapi a sat Shobal,
Bethlehem khuapi a sat Shalma le Bethgader khuapi a sat Ha ahi uh hi.
Kiriathjearim khuapi a sat Shobal in tapa nei hi: Haroeh mite le Menuhoth gam a mi alangte’ pianna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Kiriathjearim khua sungah a teengte: Ithri mite, Puth mite, Shumath mite le Mishrai mite ahi uh hi. Hihte sung panin Zorah mite le Eshtaol mite hong piang hi.
Bethlehem khuapi a sat Salma’ suante: Netofah mite, Atrothbethjoab mite le Zorah mi ahi Manahath minam nih sung pan alang ahi hi.
Jabez ah a teeng lai thei minamte: Tirath mite, Shimeath mite le Sukath mite ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Rekhab minamte tawh a kiteeng Ken mite ahi uh hi.
David sung panin Hebron-ah a piang tapate: Jezreel mi Ahinoam tawh a neih a tacil Ammon, Karmel numei Abigail tawh a neih a nihna Daniel,
Geshur kumpipa Talmai’ tanu, a nu Maakah ahi a thumna Absalom, a nu Haggith ahi a lina Adonijah,
Abital tawh a neih a ngana Shefatiah, a zi Eglah tawh a neih a gukna Ithream hi a,
amah in kum sagih le kha guk sung a ukna Hebron-ah ama sung panin guk suak hi. Tua ciangin amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmthum le thum sung uk hi.
Ama sung panin Jerusalem-ah a suakte: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan le Solomon hi a, Ammiel’ tanu Bathsheba tawh a neih li pha hi.
Tua ciangin Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
Nogah, Nefeg, Jafia,
Elishama, Eliada le Elifelet, kua pha uh hi.
Hihte pen a zineute’ tapate sim loin, David’ tapate ahi hi. Tamar a kici tanu khat zong amah in neilai hi.
Solomon’ suanlekhakte: Rehoboam, a tapa Abijah, a tapa Asa, a tapa Jehoshafat,
a tapa Joram, a tapa Ahaziah, a tapa Joash,
a tapa Amaziah, a tapa Azariah, a tapa Jotham,
a tapa Ahaz, a tapa Hezekiah, a tapa Manasseh,
a tapa Amon, a tapa Josiah ahi uh hi.
Josiah’ tapate: A tacil Johanan, a nihna Jehoiakim, a thumna Zedekiah, a lina Shallum ahi uh hi.
Jehoiakim’ suanlekhakte: A tapa Jehoiakhin le Zedekiah ahi uh hi.
Babylon-ah sal a suak Jehoiakhin’ tapate: A tapa Shealtiel,
Makhiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama le Nedabiah ahi uh hi.
Pedaiah’ tapate: Zerubbabel le Shimei ahi uh hi. Zerubbabel’ tapate: Meshullam le Hananiah hi a, Shelomith kici tanu khat zong nei hi.
Tua ciangin tapa dang Hashubah, Ohel, Berekhiah, Hasadiah le Jushabhesed, nga neilai hi.
Hananiah’ tapate: Pelatiah le Jeshaiah hi a, Jeshaiah’ ta aiah, a tapa Arnan, a tapa Obadiah, a tapa Shekaniah ahi uh hi.
Shekaniah in tapa khat le tupa nga nei a, a tapa Shemaiah ahi hi. Shemaiah tapate: Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah le Shafat ahi uh hi.
Neariah’ tapate: Elioenai, Hizkiah le Azrikam, thum pha uh hi.
Elioenai’ tapate: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah le Anani, sagih pha uh hi.
Judah’ tapate: Perez, Hezron, Karmi, Hur le Shobal ahi uh hi.
Shobal’ tapa Reaiah pen Jahath’ pa hi a, Jahath pen Ahumai le Lahad’ pa ahi hi. Hihte pen Zorah khua-ah a teeng minamte’ pu le pate ahi uh hi.

Hur pen a pa Kaleb’ zi Efrath’ ta upa pen hi a, ama suanlekhakte in Bethlehem khuapi sat uh hi. Hur’ tapa thumte: Etam, Penuel le Ezer ahi uh hi. Etam in tapa thum nei a, tuate pen Jezreel, Ishma le Idbash ahi uh hi. Tanu khat zong nei a, a min Hazzeleponi ahi hi. Penuel pen Gedor khuapi a satpa hi a, Ezer pen Hushah khuapi a satpa ahi hi.
Tekoa khuapi a sat Ashhur in zi nih, Helah le Naarah nei hi.
Naarah in amah tawh Ahuzzam, Hefer, Temeni le Haahashtari nei hi. Hihte pen Naarah’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Helah tawh a tapate: Zereth, Izhar le Ethnan ahi uh hi.
Koz pen Anub le Zobebah’ pa hi a, Harum’ tapa Aharhel’ suante’ pupi ahi hi.
Jabez a kici mi khat a sanggamte sangin pahtawihuai zaw hi. A nu in, “Gimpi-in amah nei ka hih manin,” ci-in a min Jabez a phuak hi.

Jabez in Israel Pasian tungah thu ngen a, “Kei thupha hong pia-in ka gamgi hong keeksak in. Kei hong ompih inla, siatna khatpeuh in kei hong gimsak loh nadingin hong kem in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in ama ngetna pia hi.
Shuhah’ sanggampa Khelub pen Mehir’ pa hi a, Mehir pen Eshton’ pa ahi hi.
Eshton in Bethrafa, Paseah le Tehinnah, tapa thum nei a, Tehinnah pen Irnahash khuapi a satpa ahi hi. Hih mite’ suanlekhakte, Rekah munah teeng uh hi.
Kenaz’ tapate: Othniel le Seraiah ahi uh hi. Othniel’ tapate: Hathath le Meonothai ahi uh hi.
Meonothai pen Ofrah’ pa ahi hi. Seraiah pen Joab’ pa hi a, Joab pen Geharashim khuapi a satpa ahi hi. Tua khua-a teeng mite khutsiamte vive ahih manin tua min a kiphuak ahi hi.
Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb’ tapate: Iru, Elah le Naam ahi uh hi. Elah’ tapa Kenaz ahi hi.
Jehallelel’ tapate: Zif, Zifah, Tiria le Asarel ahi uh hi.

Ezrah’ tapa lite: Jether, Mered, Efer le Jalon ahi uh hi. Mered in Faro’ tanu Bithiah teenpih a, tanu Miriam le tapa Shammai le Ishbah nei hi. Ishbah pen Eshtemoa khuapi a satpa ahi hi. Mered in Judah minam numei khat zong teenpih a, tua tawh tapa thum nei hi. Tuate in: Gedor khuapi a satpa Jered, Soko khuapi a satpa Heber le Zanoah khuapi a satpa Jekuthiel ahi hi.
Hodiah in Naham’ sanggamnu teenpih a, amau’ suante pen Keilah khua-ah a teeng Garm mite le Eshtemoa khua-ah a teeng Maakath minamte ahi uh hi.
Shimon’ tapate: Amnon, Rinnah, Benhanan le Tilon ahi uh hi. Ishi’ tapate: Zoheth le Ben-zoheth ahi uh hi.
Judah’ tapa khat ahi Shelah’ tapate: Lekah khuapi a sat Er le Mareshah khuapi a sat Laadah hi a, Bethashbea khua-ah saihadial puan a gan minamte ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Jokim le Kozeba khuapi sungah a teeng mite hi a, tua ciangin Joash le Saraf zong ahi uh hi. Amau tegel in Moab numeite tenpihin Bethlehem khua-ah teeng uh hi. (Hih pen tuanthu lui pekpek thu ahi hi.)
Hihte pen beelseekte hi a, Netaim khua le Gederah khua-ah a teengte ahi uh hi. Ama na a sem dingin kumpipa tawh tua khuate-ah teeng khawm uh hi.
Simeon’ tapate: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah le Shaul ahi uh hi.
Shaul’ tapa Shallum, a tapa Mibsam, a tapa Mishma ahi uh hi.
Mishma’ suante: A tapa Hammuel, a tapa Zakkur, a tapa Shimei ahi uh hi.
Shimei in tapa sawm le guk le tanu guk nei hi. Ahih hangin a sanggamte in ta tampi nei lo uh a, Judah minamte a pun’ bangin Simeon minamte pung lo uh hi.
Amaute Beersheba, Moladah, Hazarshual,
Bihah, Ezem, Tolad,
Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,
Beth Markaboth, Hazarsusim, Bethbiri le Shaaraim-ah teeng uh hi. Hihte pen David’ uk hun mateng amaute’ khuapite ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ khuate Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tokhen le Ashan, khuapi nga,
Baal ciang dong hih khuapite kiima om a khuaneute khempeuh tawh ahi hi. Hihte pen amau’ tenna hi a, amaute in khangsimna ciaptehna nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Meshobab, Jamlek, Amaziah’ tapa Joshah,
Joel, Asiel’ tapa Seraiah, a tapa Joshibiah, a tapa Jehu,
Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,
Shemaiah’ tapa Shimri, a tapa Jedaiah, a tapa Allon, a tapa Shifi’ tapa Ziza hi uh a,
a minin a kilo hih mite pen amau’ beh ciatah ulian hi uh a, amau’ beh ciat nakpitakin a khang hi.
A tuuhonte uh adingin lonona a zong dingin kuam nisuahna lampang, Gedor lutna lamah khualzin uh a,
lei hoih, lonona le gam zai-in, gam dai-in, a nopna mun mu uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah a teeng masate pen Ham mite ahi uh hi.

A minin a kiciamteh hih mite, Judah kumpi Hezekiah’ hun sungin hong pai uh a, tua lai-ah a om Meunim mite le amau’ puanbukte susia-in tuni dongin amaute beisak uh a, amau’ tuuhonte adingin tua lai-ah lonona om ahih manin amau’ munah amaute a teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute pawlkhat, Simeon mi zanga, Seir Mual-ah pai uh a, amaute in Ishi’ tapate Pelatiah, Neariah, aiah le Uzziel makai-in a nei uh hi.
Amaute in Amalek mi a suakta a omlaite susia uh a, tuni dongin tua munah amaute teeng uh hi.

Israel’ tate sung panin Reuben a tacil ahi hi. (Amah in a pa’ zineute khat luppih ahih manin tacil hi napi-in ama innluahza pen Josef’ tungah kipia hi. Tua ahih ciangin innluahza tawh kizui-in khangsimna-ah amah kiciamteh lo hi.
A sanggamte lakah Judah a thahat suakin ama sung panin ulian khat a om hangin innluahza pen Josef a’ ahi hi.)
Israel’ tacil Reuben’ tapate: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron le Karmi ahi uh hi.
Joel’ suante: A tapa Shemaiah, a tapa Gog, a tapa Shimei,
a tapa Mikah, a tapa Reaiah, a tapa Baal,
le a tapa Beerah hi a, Assiria kumpipa Tiglathpileser in amau’ minam makai Beerah manin salin a puakkhiat pa ahi hi. Amah pen Reuben mite a ukpipa ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ khangsimna a kiciamteh ciangin a innkuankuanin ama behte: Ukpi Jeiel, Zekhariah,
le Joel mite beh sung panin Shema’ tapa Azaz, a tapa Bela ahi hi. Aroer le tua panin Nebo le Baalmeon ciang dongah a teeng uh hi.
Gilead gam sungah amau’ bawngte khangin tampi pha ahih manin Eufratis gun hih lampang sehnel gam lutna ciang dong nisuahna lamah zong a teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ hun lai-in amaute in Hagri mite simin zo uh a, Gilead nisuahna lam gam khempeuh a amau’ puanbukte luahin tuate sungah a teeng uh hi.
Bashan gam Salekah dongah Reuben-te’ galkhat ah a teeng Gad minamte:
Ukpi Joel hi-in, a zom Shafam hi a, Janai le Shafat, Bashan-ah beh makai ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ beh makai dangte: Mikhael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jakan, Zia le Eber, sagih pha uh hi.
Hihte pen Buz’ tapa Jahdo, a tapa Jeshishai, a tapa Mikhael, a tapa Gilead, a tapa Jaroah, a tapa Huri’ tapa Abihail’ suante ahi uh hi.
Guni’ tapa Abdiel’ tapa Ahi pen amau’ behte sungah ukpi ahi hi.
Amaute Gilead gam sung, Bashan gam le a khuapite sung le Sharon gam sung lonona a kiteen theihna ciang dongah a teeng uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh Judah kumpi Jotham’ hun sung le Israel kumpi Jeroboam’ hun sungin khangsimna-ah kiciamteh hi.
Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam a langte in mi thahat, lum le namsau kuahin thal a tawi, gal a siam, nasem dingin a baihsa-in a om mi tul sawmli le tulli le zasagih le sawmguk nei hi.
Amaute in Hagri mite, Jetur mite, Nafish mite le Nodab mite zo uh hi.

Amaute a sim nadingin huhna a ngah uh ciangin Hagri mite le amau tawh a kipawl khempeuhte amaute’ khut sungah kipia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gal kidona sungah amaute in Pasian’ tungah ko uh a, amaute in Pasian muang uh ahih manin amah in amaute’ thumna a pia hi.
Amaute in amau’ ganhingte matsak uh hi. A kalaoh uh tul sawmnga, tuu tul zanih le tul sawmnga, la tulnih le mi tul zakhat hingmat uh hi.
Tua gal pen Pasian’ gal ahih manin mi tampi tak kithatin puk hi. Tua ciangin amaute sal a suah hun dong uh tua munah teeng uh hi.
Manasseh minam a langte pen Bashan panin Baalhermon, Senir le Hermon Mual tungah teengin tam pha mahmah uh hi.
Amau’ beh lutangte: Efer, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah le Jahdiel hi a, a thahat galhangte, mi minthangte, a beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in a pate uh Pasian’ thu palsat uh a, Pasian in amaute’ mai-ah a suksiat tua gam mite’ pasian-te bia uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel Pasian in Assiria kumpipa Pul (Tiglathpileser zong a kici) Assiria kumpipa hansuah a, amah in Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte pua khia-in, Halah, Habor, Hara khuate le Gozan gun dungah paipihin tuni dongin tua gamte-ah om uh hi.
Levi’ tapate: Gershom, Kohath le Merari ahi uh hi.
Kohath’ tapate: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel ahi uh hi.
Amram’ tate: Aaron, Moses le tanu Miriam ahi uh hi. Aaron’ tapate: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar ahi uh hi.
Eleazar’ suanlekhakte: A tapa Finehas, a tapa Abishua,
a tapa Bukki, a tapa Uzzi,
a tapa Zerahiah, a tapa Meraioth,
a tapa Amariah, a tapa Ahitub,
a tapa Zadok, a tapa Ahimaaz,
a tapa Azariah, a tapa Johanan,
le a tapa Azariah, (Solomon in Jerusalem-ah a lam inn sungah siampi a sempa) ahi hi.
Azariah’ tapa Amariah, a tapa Ahitub,
a tapa Zadok, a tapa Shalum,
a tapa Hikiah, a tapa Azariah,
a tapa Seraiah, a tapa Jehozadak ahi hi.
Topa in Nebukhadnezzar’ khut tawh Judah le Jerusalem salin a mat ciangin Jehozadak zong salin a pai hi.
Levi’ tapate: Gershom, Kohath le Merari ahi uh hi.
Gershom’ tapate: Libni le Shimei ahi uh hi.
Kohath’ tapate: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel ahi uh hi.
Merari’ tapate: Mahli le Mushi ahi uh hi. Hihte amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Levi minamte ahi uh hi.
Gershom’ suante: A tapa Libni, a tapa Jahath, a tapa Zimmah,
a tapa Joah, a tapa Iddo, a tapa Zerah, a tapa Jeatherai ahi hi.
Kohath’ suante: A tapa Amminadab, a tapa Korah, a tapa Assir,
a tapa Ekanah, a tapa Ebiasaf, a tapa Assir,
a tapa Tahath, a tapa Uriel, a tapa Uzziah le a tapa Shaul ahi hi.
Elkanah’ tapate: Amasai le Ahimoth ahi hi.
Ahimoth’ suante: A tapa Elkanah, a tapa Zofai, a tapa Nahath,
a tapa Eliab, a tapa Jeroham, a tapa Ekanah, a tapa Samuel ahi uh hi.
Samuel’ tapate: A tacil Joel, a nihna Abijah ahi uh hi.
Merari’ suante: Mahli, a tapa Libni, a tapa Shimei, a tapa Uzza,
a tapa Shimea, a tapa Haggiah le a tapa Asaiah ahi uh hi.
Topa’ biakbuk sungah Thuciamna Singkuang a tawlngak khit ciangin tua sungah la sak nasep a ukin David in a koih hih mite ahi hi.
Solomon in Jerusalem-ah Topa’ Biakinn a lam ciang dong amaute in kikhopna puanbuk ahi biakbuk mai-ah la sak na sem uh a, amaute in a nasep uh a hunhun a banbanin sem uh hi.

Hih nasep a semte’ khangsimna a nuai-a bang ahi hi. Kohath mite beh sung panin: Heman la makai pa hi a, Joel’ tapa ahi hi. Heman’ khangsimna pen a pupi Israel lam manawhin kileh simto hi. Heman a pa Joel, a pa Samuel,
a pa Ekanah, a pa Jehoram, a pa Eliel, a pa Toah,
a pa Zuf, a pa Ekanah, a pa Mahath, a pa Amasai,
a pa Ekanah, a pa Joel, a pa Azariah, a pa Zefaniah,
a pa Tahath, a pa Assir, a pa Ebiasaf, a pa Korah,
a pa Izhar, a pa Kohath, a pa Levi, a pa Israel ahi hi.
Asaf pen lasa pawl nihna a makai pa hi a, ama khangsimna a pupi Levi lam manawhin kileh simto hi. Tuate in: Asaf, a pa Berekhiah, a pa Shimea,
a pa Mikhael, a pa Baaseiah, a pa Makhijah,
a pa Ethni, a pa Zerah, a pa Adaiah,
a pa Ethan, a pa Zimmah, a pa Shimei,
a pa Jahath, a pa Gershom, a pa Levi ahi uh hi.
Merari-te beh sung panin Ethan pen lasa pawl thumna a ukpa hi a, ama khang simna a pupi Levi lam manawhin kileh simto hi. Tuate in: Ethan, a pa Kishi, a pa Abdi, a pa Malluk,
a pa Hashabiah, a pa Amaziah, a pa Hikiah,
a pa Amzi, a pa Bani, a pa Shemer,
a pa Mahli, a pa Mushi, a pa Levi hi a,
Levi mi a sanggamte uh Pasian’ biakbuk nasep dang khempeuh a sem dingin a kisehte ahi hi.

Aaron le a tapate in Pasian’ nasem Moses’ thupiaksate khempeuh bangin siangtho pen mun nasepnate khempeuh le Israel mite adingin kilemna a bawl dingin meihal biakna tau tung le paknamtui biakna tau tungah piakna a bawl uh hi.
Aaron’ suanlekhakte: Aaron a tapa Eleazar, a tapa Finehas, a tapa Abishua,
a tapa Bukki, a tapa Uzzi, a tapa Zerahiah,
a tapa Meraioth, a tapa Amariah, a tapa Ahitub,
a tapa Zadok, a tapa Ahimaaz ahi hi.
Amau’ gamgi huam sungah amau’ tenna tawh kizui-in amau’ omna munte: Kohath-te beh sung pan Aaron suante tungah a kipia, amau adingin a tanh uh om a,
Judah gam sungah Hebron le a kiim lononate amaute tungah pia uh a,
ahih hangin a lote le a khuaneute Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb tungah a pia uh hi.
Aaron suante tungah amaute in a piak khuapite: Bukna khuapi Hebron, Jattir le Libnah khuapite, Eshtemoa a lonona gamte tawh,
Hilen a lonona gamte tawh, Debir a lonona gamte tawh,
Ashan a lonona gamte tawh le Bethshemesh a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
