Tua ciangin Benjamin minamte’ gam sung panin Geba a lonona gamte tawh, Alemeth a lonona gamte tawh le Anathoth a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi. Amau’ beh khempeuh’ khuapite sawm le thum ahi hi.
Kohath mi a omlaite tungah aisanna tawh Manasseh minam alangte’ gam sung panin khuapi sawm kipia hi.
Gershom-te beh tungah a innkuan-a kizui-in Issakhar-te’ gam, Asher-te’ gam, Naftali-te’ gam le Bashan-a om Manasseh-te’ gam sung panin khuapi sawm le thum kipia hi.
Merari-te beh tungah a innkuan-a kizui-in Reuben-te’ gam, Gad-te’ gam le Zebulun-te’ gam sung panin khuapi sawm le nih kipia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite in hih bangin Levi mite tungah khuapite a lononate tawh a pia uh hi.
Amaute in Judah-te’ gam, Simeon-te’ gam le Benjamin-te’ gam sung panin zong a minin a kilo hih khuapite amaute tungah a pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kohath-te beh pawlkhat in Efraim minamte’ gam sung panin amau’ gam khuapite mah ngah uh hi.
Amaute tungah a kipia bukna khuapite: Efraim mual tung gam sungah a om Shekhem a lonona gamte tawh, Gezer a lonona gamte tawh,
Jokmeam a lonona gamte tawh, Bethhoron a lonona gamte tawh,
Aijalon a lonona gamte tawh, Gathrimmon a lonona gamte tawh,
le Manasseh minam alangte’ gam sung panin Aner a lonona gamte tawh le Bileam a lonona gamte tawh hi a, hihte pen Kohath-te beh a omlaite ading ahi hi.
Manasseh minam alangte’ gam sung panin Gershom-te beh tungah a kipiate: Bashan gam sunga Golan a lonona gamte tawh le Ashtaroth a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Issakhar-te’ gam sung panin: Kedesh a lonona gamte tawh, Daberath a lonona gamte tawh,
Ramoth a lonona gamte tawh le Anem a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Asher-te’ gam sung panin: Mashal a lonona gamte tawh, Abdon a lonona gamte tawh,
Hukok a lonona gamte tawh le Rehob a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Naftali-te’ gam sung panin: Galilee gam sungah a om Kedesh a lonona gamte tawh, Hammon a lonona gamte tawh le Kiriathaim a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Merari-te beh a omlaite tungah Zebulun-te’ gam sung panin a kipiate: Rimmono a lonona gamte tawh, Tabor a lonona gamte tawh,
le Reuben-te’ gam sung panin Jordan nisuahna lam, Jerikho kiang Jordan galkhat sung pan: Pawn a om Bezer a lonona gamte tawh, Jahzah a lonona gamte tawh,
Kedemoth a lonona gamte tawh le Mefaath a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Gad-te’ sung panin: Gilead gam a om Ramoth a lonona gamte tawh, Mahanaim a lonona gamte tawh,
Heshbon a lonona gamte tawh le Jazer a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Issakhar’ tapate: Tola, Puah, Jashub le Shimron, li pha uh hi.

Tola’ tapate: Uzzi, aiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam le Shemuel-te hi a, amau’ beh sung panin innkuan lutangte hi a, Tola-te beh pen amau’ khangin a galhangte ahi uh hi. David’ hun laitakin mihing tul sawmnih le tulnih le zaguk pha uh hi.
Uzzi in tapa Izrahiah nei hi. Izrahiah le a tapate Mikhael, Obadiah, Joel le Isshiah, mi nga hi a, a vekpi-in ukpite ahi uh hi.

Amaute’ banah a pate uh a innkuan kuanin khangsimna-ah a kiciamtehna tawh kizui-in galsim dingin galkap honte mi tul sawmthum le tulguk om hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in zi tampi nei-in ta tampi nei uh hi.
Issakhar minam sungah a om, khangsimna-ah a kiciamteh, a galhang a thahat amau beh mi a vekpi-in tul sawmgiat le tulsagih ahi hi.
Benjamin’ tapate: Bela, Bekher le Jediael, thum pha uh hi.

Bela’ tapate: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth le Iri, nga pha uh a, amau’ beh sungah innkuan lutang, a thahat galhangte ahi uh hi. Amau’ khang simna a kiciamtehna-ah tul sawmnih le tulnih le sawmthum le li pha uh hi.
Bekher’ tapate: Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth le Alemeth ahi uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh Bekher’ tapate ahi uh hi. Amau’ khang tawh kizui-in a khang simna a kiciamtehna-ah, amau’ beh sungah innkuan lutang, a thahat a galhang mihing tul sawmnih le zanih ahi hi.
Jediael’ tapa pen Bilhan ahi hi. Bilhan’ tapate: Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Khenaanah, Zethan, Tarshish le Ahishar ahi uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh amau’ beh sungah innkuan lutang hi uh a, a thahat, a galhang, Jediael’ suante gal simna-ah nasem dingin a baihsa-in a om mihing tul sawm le tulsagih le zanih pha uh hi.
Tua ciangin Shuppim le Huppim zong hih minamte sung mah hi a, Dan in Hushim kici tapa khat a nei hi.
Naftali’ tapate: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer le Shallum hi a, Bilhah sung pan a piangte ahi uh hi.
Manasseh’ tapate: A zineu Aram numei tawh a neih Asriel le Makhir ahi hi. Makhir pen Gilead’ pa ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Makhir in Huppim le Shuppim ading zi a la hi. Ama sanggamnu’ min Maakah ahi hi. Makhir’ tapa a nihna’ min Zelofehad hi a, Zelofehad in tanu bek a nei hi.
Tua ciangin Makhir’ zi Maakah in tapa nih nei a, a min Peresh le Sheresh ahi hi. Peresh’ tapate Ulam le Rakem ahi hi.
Ulam’ tapa Bedan ahi hi. Hihte pen Manasseh’ tapa Makhir’ tapa Gilead’ suante ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Gilead’ sanggamnu Hammolekheth in Ishhod, Abiezer le Mahlah nei hi.
Shemida’ tapate Ahian, Shekhem, Likhi le Aniam ahi uh hi.
Efraim’ suante: A tapa Shuthelah, a tapa Bered, a tapa Tahath, a tapa Eleadah, a tapa Tahath,
a tapa Zabad, a tapa Shuthelah ahi hi. Efraim in tapa dang nih nei a, tuate Ezer le Elead ahi uh hi. Gath khua mite’ bawng a sut dingin a kuan lai-in Gath mite in amau tegel na that uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pa uh Efraim ni tampi sung kap a, amah a hehnem dingin a sanggamte hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Efraim in a zi luppih a, amah gai-in tapa khat nei hi. Ama inn sungah siatna tung ahih manin amah in a min Beriah a phuak hi.
Ama tanu Sheerah hi a, Bethhoron nuainung le a tungnung le Uzzensheerah khua a lam nu ahi hi.
Tua ciangin ah kici tapa khat nei a, ama suante: Resef, a tapa Telah, a tapa Tahan,
a tapa Ladan, a tapa Ammihud, a tapa Elishama,
a tapa Nun, a tapa Joshua ahi hi.
Amau’ neihsa gam le a tenna uh Bethel le a khuapite le nisuahna lamah Naaran le nitumna lamah Gezer le a khuapite, Shekhem le a khuapite le Azzah le a khuapite ahi hi.
Manasseh’ suante in Bethshean le a khuapite, Taanak le a khuapite, Megiddo le a khuapite, Dor le a khuapite a uk uh hi. Hihte sungah Israel’ tapa Josef’ suante a teeng uh hi.
Asher’ tapate: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah le a sanggamnu uh Serah ahi hi.
Beriah’ tapate: Heber le Malkhiel hi a, Malkhiel pen Birzaith khuapi a satpa ahi hi.
Heber pen Jaflet, Shomer, Hotham le a sanggamnu uh Shua-te’ pa ahi hi.
Jaflet’ tapate: Pasak, Bimhal le Ashvath ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Jaflet’ tapate ahi uh hi.
A sanggampa Shomer’ tapate: Rohgah, Jehubbah le Aram ahi uh hi.
A sanggampa Hotham’ tapate: Zofah, Imna, Shelesh le Amal ahi uh hi.
Zofah’ suante: Suah, Harnefer, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran le Beera ahi uh hi.
Jether’ suante: Jefunneh, Pispa le Ara ahi uh hi.
Ulla’ suante: Arah, Hanniel le Rizia ahi uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh Asher’ beh lutangte, a kipakta, a thahat galhangte, ulian a ukte ahi uh hi. Gal sungah nasem dingin khangsimna-ah a kiciamteh amaute a phazah mihing tul sawmnih le tulguk ahi hi.
Benjamin pen a tacil Bela, a nihna Ashbel, a thumna Aharah,
a lina Nohah le a ngana Rafa-te’ pa ahi hi.
Bela’ tapate: Addar, Gera, Abihud,
Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shefufan le Huram ahi uh hi.
Ehud’ tapate (amaute pen Geba-a teeng beh lutangte hi uh a, amaute Manahath-ah galmatin kipua hi):
Naaman, Ahijah le Uzza le Ahihud’ pa Heglam a kici Gera ahi uh hi.
Shaharaim in a zite Hushim le Baara a mak khit ciangin Moab gam sungah tapate nei hi.
Amah in a zikik Hodesh tawh a neih a tapate: Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malkam,
Jeuz, Sakhia le Mirmah ahi uh hi. Hihte pen amau beh sungah innkuan lutangte ahi uh hi.
Amah in Hushim tawh zong a neih a tapate: Ahitub le Elpaal ahi uh hi.
Elpaal’ tapate: Eber, Misham le Ono le Lod a khuapite tawh a sat Shemed,
le Beriah le Shema (Gath a teengte a taisak Aijalon a teeng beh lutangte),
le Ahio, Shashak le Jeremoth ahi uh hi.
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Mikhael, Ishpah le Joha-te pen Beriah’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ishmerai, Izliah le Jobab-te pen Elpaal’ suante ahi uh hi.
Jakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah le Shimrath-te pen Shimei’ suante ahi uh hi.
Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah,
Ifdeiah le Penuel-te pen Shashak’ suante ahi uh hi.
Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
Jaareshiah, Elijah le Zikri-te pen Jehoram’ suante ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen amau khang tawh kizui-in beh lutangte, a ukpite ahi uh hi. Hihte khempeuh Jerusalem-ah a teeng uh hi.
Gibeon khuapi a satpa Jeiel pen Gibeon-ah teeng a, ama zi’ min Maakah ahi hi.
Ama tapa upa pen Abdon, tua ciangin Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zekher,
le Mikloth (amah pen Shimeah’ pa) ahi hi. Tu-in amau’ suanlekhakte zong Jerusalem-a amau’ behte’ galkhat ah amau’ behte mah tawh teeng uh hi.
Ner pen Kish’ pa, Kish pen Saul’ pa ahi hi. Saul pen Jonathan, Malkhishua, Abinadab le Eshbaal’ pa ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Jonathan’ tapa pen Meribbaal hi a, Meribbaal pen Mikah’ pa ahi hi.
Mikah’ tapate: Pithon, Melek, Tarea le Ahaz ahi uh hi.
Ahaz pen Jehoaddah’ pa ahi hi. Jehoaddah pen Alemeth, Azmaveth, le Zimri’ pa hi a, Zimri pen Moza’ pa ahi hi.
Moza pen Binea’ pa ahi hi. Binea’ tapa Rafah, a tapa Eleasah, a tapa Azel ahi hi.
Azel in tapa guk nei a, tuate’ minte: Azrikam, Bokheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah le Hanan ahi uh hi. Hihte khempeuh Azel’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Azel’ sanggampa Eshek’ tapate: A tacil Ulam, a nihna Jeush le a thumna Elifelet ahi hi.
Ulam’ tapate a thahat galhangte, thal tawite, tapa tampi le tupa tampi a neite hi a, mi za le sawmnga pha uh hi. Hihte khempeuh Benjamin minamte ahi uh hi.
Israel mi khempeuh khangsimna-ah kiciamteh a, Israel Kumpite’ Laibu sungah tuate kigelh hi. Amau thuman lohna hangin gimpiakna-in Babylon-ah salin Judah mite kipaipih hi.
Tu-in amau’ neihsa amau’ khuapite sungah a tengkik masate pen Israel nautangte, siampite, Levi mite le biakinn nasemte ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah, Benjamin, Efraim le Manasseh mi pawlkhat Jerusalem-ah teeng uh a, tua a teengte:
Judah tapa Perez’ tapate sung panin Bani’ tapa Imri, a tapa Omri, a tapa Ammihud, a tapa Uthai a makai ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Judah tapa Shelah mite sung panin: Innkuan lutang Asaiah a makai ahi hi.
Judah tapa Zerah mite sung panin: Jeuel a makai ahi hi. Judah minam sung panin innkuan zaguk le sawmkua ahi hi.
Benjamin mite sung panin: Hassenuah’ tapa Hodaviah, a tapa Meshullam, a tapa Sallu ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoram’ tapa Ibneiah, Makri’ ta Uri, a tapa Elah le Ibnijah’ ta Reuel, a tapa Shefatiah, a tapa Meshullam ahi hi.
Benjamin minamte sung panin innkuan zakua le sawmnga le guk ahi hi. Hih min kilote khempeuh pen amau’ beh ciatah beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Siampite’ sung panin: Jedaiah, Jehoiarib, Jakhin,
le Ahitub’ tapa Meraioth, a tapa Zadok, a tapa Meshullam, a tapa Hilkiah’ tapa Azariah, (Pasian’ biakinn sung a ukpipa)
le Malkhijah’ tapa Pashhur, a tapa Jehoram’ tapa Adaiah le Immer’ tapa Meshilemith, a tapa Meshullam, a tapa Jahzerah, a tapa Adiel’ tapa Maasai ahi hi.
Hihte banah amau’ behte, a beh lutangte, Pasian’ biakinn-ah nasep nadingin a siam mahmah mihing tulkhat le zasagih le sawmguk ahi hi.
Levi mite sung panin: Merari’ tapate sung pan Hashabiah, a tapa Azrikam, a tapa Hasshub’ tapa Shemaiah,
le Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal le Asaf’ tapa Zikri, a tapa Mika’ tapa Mattaniah,
le Jeduthun’ tapa Galal, a tapa Shemaiah’ tapa Obadiah le Netofah khuaneute sungah a teeng, Elkanah’ tapa Asa’ tapa Berekhiah ahi hi.
Kulhkongpi cingte: Shallum, Akkub, Talmon le Ahiman hi a, Shallum pen amau’ makai pa ahi hi.
Tu dongin Kumpipa’ Kulhkongpi nisuahna lampangah a omte ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Levi mite’ omna kongcingte ahi ngei uh hi.

A pu a pate uh, biakbuk lutna mun a cing, Topa’ phual a ukte ahih uh mah bangin Korah’ tapa Ebiasaf, a tapa Kore’ tapa Shallum le a behte ahi Korah mite pen nasepna a uk, puanbuk kong a cingte ahi uh hi.
Eleazar’ tapa Finehas pen a beisa hun sungah amaute a ukpa hi a, Topa in amah ompih hi.
Meshelemiah’ tapa Zekhariah pen kikhopna puanbuk lutna-ah kongcing pa ahi hi.
Kongcingin a kiteel hih mite khempeuh zanih le sawm le nih ahi hi. Amaute pen a khuaneute uha khangsimna-ah kiciamteh uh hi. David le thumu pa Samuel in amau’ panmun-ah amaute phut hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute le a suan a khakte uh Topa’ biakinn kulhkongpite a uk, a cingte ahi uh hi.
Kongpi cingte pen a pang li, nisuahna, nitumna, leilu le leitaw lamah om uh hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ khuaneute sungah a om a behte uh hih mite tawh a om dingin a hunhunin ni sagih simin a hong pai ding uh a kisam ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Levi mi kongpi a cing ukpi lite pen biakinn sungte le Pasian’ biakinn van manpha koihnate a uk ahi uh hi.
Pasian’ biakinn kiimah amaute giak uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tungah vilna nasep le zingsang simin kong a hon ding uh nasep kiguan hi.
Amaute pawlkhat in biakinn sunga kizang umlebeelte uk uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nazatte hong kitumpih ciang hitaleh a kilakkhiat ciang hitaleh a malzah a sim ding uh kisam hi.
Amau sung pan adang pawlkhatte pen tutphah sabuaite le a kituam koih umlebeel, annelte, leenggahzute, sathaute, paknamtuite le a namtui nate zong a en dingin kiseh hi.
Siampite’ ta a dangte in a namtui nate hel dingin bawl uh a,
tua ciangin Levi mite lak pan Korah mi Shallum’ tacil Mattithiah in biakna ding moh pheengte bawl ding uk hi.
Kohath mi amau’ behte pawlkhat in zong Sabbath simin koih ding Ompihna Anlum uk uh hi.
Tu-in hihte pen lasate, Levi mi beh lutangte, nasep dangte panin pengin biakinn deite sungah a teengte ahi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in sun le zanin na sem uh hi.
Hihte pen Jerusalem-ah a teeng amau’ khang tawh kizui-in makaite, Levi mi beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Gibeon-ah tua khuapi a satpa Jeiel teeng a, ama zi’ min Maakah hi-in,
a tapa upa pen Abdon, tua ciangin Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zekhariah le Mikloth ahi uh hi.
Mikloth pen Shimeah’ pa ahi hi. Amau’ suanlekhakte zong Jerusalem-a a behte uh galkhat ah a behte uh tawh teeng uh hi.
Ner pen Kish’ pa, Kish pen Saul’ pa ahi hi. Saul pen Jonathan, Makhishua, Abinadab le Eshbaal’ pa ahi hi.
Jonathan’ tapa Meribbaal hi a, Meribbaal pen Mikah’ pa ahi hi.
Mikah’ tapate: Pithon, Melek, Tahrea le Ahaz ahi uh hi.
Ahaz pen Jarah’ pa hi a, Jarah pen Alemeth, Azmaveth le Zimri’ pa ahi hi. Zimri pen Moza’ pa ahi hi.
Moza pen Binea’ pa ahi hi. A tapa aiah, a tapa Eleasah, a tapa Azel ahi hi.
Azel in tapa guk nei a, tuate’ min: Azrikam, Bokheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah le Hanan ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Azel’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Filistia mite in Israel mite sim uh hi. Filistia mite mai-ah Israel mite tai uh a, Gilboa Mual tungah tuk zeizai uh hi.
Filistia mite in Saul le a tapate pha uh hi. Filistia mite in Saul’ tapate Jonathan le Abinadab le Malkhishua that uh hi.
Gal kidona in Saul neh mahmah a, thal tawite in amah pha-in liamsak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a galvan puapa kiangah, “Na namsau dok inla tua tawh kei hong sun let in. Tua hikeileh hih dawibia mite hong pai-in kei hong khelbawl kha ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a galvan puapa in hih ngam lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah lau mahmah hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul in ama namsau la-in tua tungah puk hi.
A galvan puapa in Saul a sihna a muh ciangin amah zong a namsau tungah kipuksuk sakin a si hi.
Tua bangin Saul a si hi. Amah le a tapa thumte le a innkuan khempeuh a sikhawm uh hi.

Kuam sungah a om Israel mite khempeuh in galkapte tai khinin, Saul le a tapate a sihna a theih uh ciangin amaute in a khuapite uh nusia-in a tai uh hi. Tua ciangin Filistia mite hong pai-in tua khuate sungah a teeng uh hi.
A zing ciang, a kithatte’ nate a hawk khia dingin Filistia mite hong pai uh ciangin Saul le a tapate Gilboa Mual tungah a sihna mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama nate hawk khia-in a lutang le a galhiam la uh a, a milimte uh le mite kiangah hih thuthak a ko dingin Filistia gam sung khempeuh ah kamtaite a sawl uh hi.
Amaute in amau’ pasian’ biakinn sungah ama galhiam koihin Dagon biakinn sungah ama lutang a suang uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jabeshgilead mi khempeuh in Saul’ tungah Filistia mite’ hihsa thu khempeuh a zak uh ciangin
a thahat mi khempeuh kithawi-in Saul le a tapate’ luanghawmte la khia-in Jabesh-ah a paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Jabesh-a tawsaw nuai-ah amaute’ guhte vui uh a, ni sagih sung an a tang uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul a thuman lohna hangin a si hi. Amah in Topa’ thupiakna a zuih lohna le vankah khat thu dongin a lamlah ding a zonna,
le Topa’ tung panin lamlahna a zon lohna-ah Topa’ tungah a thuman lo ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in amah that a, Jessi’ tapa David tungah kumpi gam a hei hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh David kiang Hebron-ah hong kikhawm uh a, “En in, kote nangma guh le nangma sa ka hi uh hi.

A hun beisa, Saul kumpi ahih sung nangawnin Israel a kuankhiatpih le a ciahpih pa nangmah na hi hi. Topa na Pasian in nangma kiangah, ‘Nang pen ka mi Israel-te a cing pa na hi dinga, ka mi Israel-te tungah ulian na hi ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel upate khempeuh kumpipa kiang Hebron-ah hong pai uh hi. Tua ciangin David in Topa’ mai Hebron-ah amaute tawh thuciamna khat bawl a, Samuel’ tungtawnin Topa’ thugen bangin amaute in Israel kumpi-in David sathau a nilh uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jebus mite a tenna, Jebus a kici Jerusalem-ah David le Israel mi khempeuh hong pai uh hi.
Jebus-ah a teeng mite in David kiangah, “Hih lai-ah nang nong pai kei ding hi,” na ci uh hi. Ahi zongin David in David khuapi a kici Zion munmuanhuai a la hi.
David in, “Jebus mite a va sim masa peuhpeuh pen ukpi le ukpa hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Zeruiah’ tapa Joab kuanto masa ahih ciangin amah, ukpi a suak hi.
Tua ciangin munmuanhuaina sungah David teeng hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua khua pen David khuapi kici hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Millo panin a kualin khuapi lam hi. Joab in khuapi sung a omlai mun teng puahkik hi.
Vanglian Topa in amah ompih ahih manin David a lian semsem hi.
Tu-in hihte pen Israel tawh kisai-in Topa’ thugen bangin amah kumpi-in a bawl dingin Israel khempeuh tawh ama kumpi gam sungah amah nakpitakin a huh David’ mi a thahat a ukpite ahi hi.
David’ mi a thahatte a kiciamtehna: Hakmoni mi Jashobeam pen mi thumte a ukpi ahi hi. Amah in a teipi tawh mihing zathum do a, hun khat sungin that khin hi.
Tua ciangin a thahat mihing thumte lak panin amah a zom pa pen Ahoh-te beh Dodo’ tapa Eleazar ahi hi.
Filistia mite galsim dingin a kikaihkhop laitakun Pasdammim-ah David tawh a om hi. Tua lai-ah mangbuhham a dimna leitang khat om a, Filistia mite’ kiang panin mite tai hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tua leitang laizangah panmun la-in hu a, Filistia mite that hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in gualzawhna lianpi a pia hi.
aim kuamah Filistia mite’ galkapte in giahphual a sat laitakun Adullam leihawm David kiang suangpi-ah ukpi sawmthumte sung panin mihing thum paisuk uh hi.
Tua hunin munmuanhuai sungah David om a, Filistia khuacingte Bethlehem-ah om uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Kulhkongpi gei-a Bethlehem tuikhuk panin mi khat in tuidawn ding kei hong pia leh!” ci-in lunggulhna tawh a pau hi.

Tua ciangin a thahat mihing thumte in Filistia mite’ giahphual phulin kongpi gei-a om Bethlehem tuikhuk panin tui tawi uh a, a tui la-in David kiangah paipih uh hi. Ahih hangin David in tua tui dawn lo hi. Amah in Topa adingin sung a,

“Ka Pasian’ mai-ah hih bangin ka gamta het kei ding hi. Hih mihingte’ nuntakna sisan tui dawn ding ka hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a nuntakna uh khamin kei kiangah hong paipih uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a tui dawn lo hi. A thahat mi thumte in hih bangin na a sem uh ahi hi.
Tu-in Joab’ sanggampa Abishai pen sawmthumte lakah a ukpi ahi hi. Amah in a teipi tawh mihing zathum do-in amaute that a, mihing sawmthumte’ banah min khat ngah thuah hi.
Amah pen mihing sawmthumte sung panin a minthang pen hi a, amaute a ukpa a suak hi; ahih hangin amah in mihing thumte ban nai lo hi.

Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah pen Kabzeel khuami gal a hang, na lianpite a sempa ahi hi. Amah in Moab galhang mi nih vatlum hi. Amah zong paisukin vuk a kiat ni khatin leihawm sunga om humpinelkai khat that hi.

Amah in Egypt mi khat, a thagol, pi sagih le alang a sang mi khat a that hi. Egypt-pa in a khut sungah siamgante’ siamlawngpi cia a pha teipi khat nei hi. Ahih hangin ciangkhut khat tawh ama kiangah Benaiah paisuk a, Egypt-pa’ khut sung panin a teipi sutkhia-in ama teipi mah tawh amah a that hi.
Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in hih nate sem a, a thahat mi sawmthumte’ banah min khat ngah thuah hi.
Mihing sawmthumte lakah amah minthang a, ahih hangin amah in mi thumte ban nai lo hi. Tua ciangin David in amah a cingte a ukin a koih hi.
Galkap lak panin a thahat mite pen Joab’ sanggampa Asahel, Bethlehem khuami Dodo’ tapa Elhanan,
Harod khuami Shammoth, Pelon khuami Helez,
Tekoa khuami Ikkesh’ tapa Ira, Anathoth khuami Abiezer,
Hushah khuami Sibbekai, Ahoh-te beh Ilai,
Netofah khuami Maharai, Netofah khuami Baanah’ tapa Heled,
Benjamin mite sung panin Gibeah khuami Ribai’ tapa Ithai, Pirathon khuami Benaiah,
Gaash mualkuam mi Hurai, Betharabah khuami Abiel,
Bahurim khuami Azmaveth, Shaalbon khuami Eliahba,
Gizon khuami Hashem, Harar khuami Shagee’ tapa Jonathan,
Harar khuami Sakhar’ tapa Ahiam, Ur’ tapa Elifal,
Mekherath khuami Hefer, Pelon khuami Ahijah,
Karmel khuami Hezro, Ezbai’ tapa Naarai,
Nathan’ sanggampa Joel, Hagri’ tapa Mibhar,
Ammon mi Zelek, Zeruiah’ tapa Joab’ galhiam puapa Beeroth khuami Naharai,
Ithri mi Ira le Gareb,
Hit mi Uriah, Ahlai’ tapa Zabad,
Reuben mite’ makai khat ahi, Reuben mi Shiza’ tapa Adina le amah tawh mihing sawmthum,
Maakah’ tapa Hanan, Mithni mi Joshafat,
Ashterath khuami Uzzia, Aroer khuami Hotham’ tapate Shama le Jeiel,
Tiz khuami Shimri’ tapate Jediael le Joha,
Mahavah khuami Eliel, Elnaam’ tapate Jeribai le Joshaviah, Moab mi Ithmah,
Zobah khuami Eliel, Obed le Jaasiel ahi uh hi.
Tu-in Kish’ tapa Saul’ hangin a ut utin David a tat theih loh laitakin Ziklag-a ama kiangah mite hong pai-in amah pawlpih uh hi. Gal sungah amah a huh a thahatte lakah amaute a kihelte ahi uh hi.
Amaute pen thal tawite hi uh a, taklam khut tawh ahi a, veilam khut tawh ahi zongin thaltang le suangte lawn thei uh hi. Amaute pen Saul’ behte Benjamin mi ahi uh hi.
Ahiezer a ukpi hi a, tua ciangin Joash ahi hi. Amau tegel pen Gibeah khuami Shemaah’ tapate ahi uh hi. Amau gel nuai-ah galkapte: Azmaveth’ tapate Jeziel le Pelet; Anathoth khuami Berakah le Jehu;
Gibeon khuami Ishmaiah, mihing sawmthumte lakah a thahatpa le sawmthumte a makai pa; Gederah khuami Jeremiah, Jahaziel, Johanan le Jozabad;
Harif mi Eluzai, Jerimoth, Bealiah, Shemariah le Shefatiah;
Korah mi Elkanah, Isshiah, Azarel, Joezer le Jashobeam;
Gedor khuami Jeroham’ tapate Joelah le Zebadiah ahi uh hi.

Gad minam sung panin gamlak a munmuanhuai a David kiangah a thahat a siam galhangte, lum le tei zat a siam, a maitang uh humpinelkai maitang bangin, mual tunga om sakhi bangin a manlang mi hong paite:
A ukpi Ezer, a nihna Obadiah, a thumna Eliab,
a lina Mishmannah, a ngana Jeremiah,
a gukna Attai, a sagihna Eliel,
a giatna Johanan, a kuana Elzabad,
a sawmna Jeremiah, a sawm le khatna Makbannai ahi uh hi.
Hih Gad mite pen galkap uliante hi a, a neu zawte in zakhat val, a gol zawte in tulkhat val uk uh hi.
Hihte pen Jordan a piau khempeuh a dimlet laitak kha masa sungin Jordan kantanin kuam sunga om mite nisuahna lam le nitumna lamah a taisak mite ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Benjamin mi le Judah mi pawlkhat David kiang munmuanhuai-ah hong pai uh hi.

Amaute a dawntuah dingin David pai khia-in amaute kiangah, “Kei kiangah kilawmtatna tawh keimah a huh dingin hong pai na hih uhleh note tawh ka lungsim kihual khawm ding hi. Ahih hangin keimah in bangmah khialhna nei lo napi-in ka langte tungah kei a hong lehhek dingin a hong pai na hih uhleh, i pu i pate’ Pasian in thei henla, note hong tai tahen,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mihing sawmthum a ukpipa Amasai’ tungah Pasian’ kha hong tungin amah in, “David aw, kote, nangma a’ hi ung! Jessi’ tapa aw, nangma pawl hi ung! Nangma tungah nopna hong om henla, nang hong huhte tungah zong nopna hong om tahen! Bang hang hiam cih leh na Pasian in nang hong huh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin David in amaute sang a, ama galkap uliante-in a bawl hi.

Saul a do dingin Filistia mite tawh David a kuan laitakin Manasseh mi pawlkhat tai-in David a beel hi. (Ahi zongin David in Filistia mite huh thei lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistia mi a ukte in thu kikupna khat nei uh a, “Eite’ makaite’ siat nadingin a topa Saul kiangah David tai ding hi,” ci-in amah sawl khia uh hi.)
Ziklag-ah amah a pai laitakin Manasseh sung panin tai-in amah a beelte: Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Mikhael, Jozabad, Elihu le Zillethai hi a, Manasseh sungah mi a tulin a ukte ahi uh hi.
Amaute in mi’ na a sut thei mite panin David huh uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a thahat a vanglian mi hi a, galkap sungah a ukte ahi uh hi.
Pasian’ galkap hon bangin galkap hon tampi a phak dongin a ni ni-in David a huh dingin mi hong paipai hi.
Hihte pen Topa’ thugen bangin Saul kumpipa’ gam David tungah a hei dingin Hebron-a ama kiangah a pai galkap a khen phazah ahi uh hi:
Judah mi: Lum le tei a pua galkap tulguk le zagiat ahi hi.
Simeon mi: Galdo dingin a thahat a vanglian mihing tulsagih le zakhat ahi hi.
Levi mi: Tul li le zaguk ahi hi.
Aaron’ suante sung pan ulian Jehoiada le amah tawh mi tulthum le zasagih ahi hi.
A thahat a vanglian a khangno Zadok le ama beh sung panin galkap a ukte mi sawmnih le nih ahi hi.
Benjamin mi: Tua hun ciang dong mi a tam zaw Saul tawh a kipawl, Saul’ behte ahi Benjamin mite sung panin mihing tulthum ahi hi.
Efraim mi: Amaute sung panin a thahat, a vanglian, amau’ beh sungah a minthang mi tul sawmnih le zagiat ahi hi.
Manasseh minam alangte: Amau sung panin hong pai-in David kumpi-in a bawl dingin a min a kilo mihing tul sawm le tulgiat ahi hi.
Issakhar mi: Amaute sung panin Israel in bang a sep dingin kilawm cih a thei, hun paizia a thei ukpi zanih le amau’ ukna nuai-ah a om amau’ behte khempeuh ahi uh hi.
Zebulun mite: Amaute sung panin David a huh dingin lungsim a kikhat, hun khempeuh ah gal a kap thei, galdo nadingin galhiam khempeuh a nei mihing tul sawmnga ahi hi.
Naftali mi: Amaute sung panin galkap a ukte tulkhat le amau tawh a om lum le tei a tawi mihing tul sawmthum le tulsagih ahi hi.
Dan mi: Amaute sung panin galdo dingin a kithawi mihing tul sawmnih le tulgiat le zaguk ahi hi.
Asher mi: Amaute sung panin galdo dingin a baihsa-in a om hun khempeuh ah gal a kap thei mihing tul sawmli ahi hi.
Jordan gal khata om Reuben mite le Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte sung panin galhiam nam khempeuh tawh a kithawi mihing tul zakhat le tul sawmnih ahi hi.

Galkap mi ahi, galsim dingin a kithawi hih mite khempeuh, Israel tungah David kumpi-in koih ding ngaihsutna takpi tawh Hebron-ah hong pai uh hi. Tua mah bangin Israel a omlaite khempeuh zong David kumpi-in a bawl ding uh a ngaihsutna uh kikhat hi.
A sanggamte un amaute adingin na vaihawm khol uh ahih manin amaute tua lai-ah David tawh ni thum sung an ne tui dawnin omkhawm uh hi.

Israel gam sungah lungdamna om ahih manin a veengte uh Issakhar le Zebulun le Naftali ciang dong panin zong hong pai-in late le kalaohte le la-sakolte le bawngtalte tawh an hong pua-in, an tampi tak, theimohte, leenggahkeu bawkte le leenggahzu le sathau, bawngtalte le tuute, lungdam lahna-in hong puak uh hi.
David in a tul-a ukte le a za-a ukte le a makai khempeuh tawh thu kikupna khat nei hi.

Tua ciangin David in Israel a kikhawm khempeuhte kiangah, “Note in kilawm na sak uh a, Topa i Pasian’ deihna ahihleh, eite’ kiangah hong pai theih nadingun Israel gam sungah a omlai i sanggamte le lonona gam a nei khuapi sunga om siampite le Levi mite a sam dingin mi sawl ni.
Tua ciangin Thuciamna Singkuang eite kiangah lakik ni; bang hang hiam cih leh Saul’ hun lai-in i don kei hi,” a ci hi.
Mi khempeuh in tua thu hoihsa uh ahih manin tua bangin hih ding a kikhawm mi khempeuh a thukim uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kiriathjearim panin Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang a ciahpih dingin David in Egypt gam Shihor lui panin Hamath lutna ciang dong Israel mi khempeuh a khawm hi.
Tua ciangin David le Israel mi khempeuh, kherub-te’ tungah a tu Topa’ min tawh a kilo Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang a paipihto dingin Kiriathjearim a kici Baalah-ah a paito uh hi.
Amaute in Abinadab’ inn panin leeng thak khat tungah Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang pua uh a, Uzza le Ahio in a leeng a hawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin David le Israel mi khempeuh in Pasian’ mai-ah la le laiza lasakna, harp lasakna, khuangneute, daltuahte le peengkulte tawh a tha neih zahun gualnopna a bawl uh hi.
Amaute Khidon’ ancilna phual a tun uh ciangin bawngtalte muktu ahih manin Uzza in Thuciamna Singkuang a len dingin a khut va zan kha hi.
Tua ciangin Uzza tungah Topa heh hi. Amah in a khut tawh Thuciamna Singkuang sukha ahih manin Topa in amah vat hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ mai tua lai-ah amah si hi.
Uzza tungah Topa hehin gim pia ahih manin David zong a heh suak hi. Tua mun pen tuni dongin Perezuzzah kici hi.
Tua ni-in David in Pasian kihta hi. Amah in, “Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang kei kiang inn-ah bangci ciahpih theih ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Thuciamna Singkuang David khuapi a inn-ah ciahpih lo-a, Gath mi Obededom’ inn-ah va koih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang Obededom’ innkuan tawh kha thum sung om hi. Topa in Obededom’ innkuan le a neih khempeuh thupha a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Taia kumpipa Hiram in David kiangah kamtaite, taamtak singte, ama adingin inn khat a lamsak dingin leilesuang innlam a siamte le khutsiamte zong a puak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Israel-te tungah kumpi-in
David in Jerusalem-ah zi nei thuahin tapate le tanute a nei hi.
Jerusalem-ah a neih a tate’ min: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
Nogah, Nefeg, Jafia,
Elishama, Beeliada le Elifelet ahi uh hi.

Israel mi khempeuh tungah kumpi-in David sathau a kinilhna thu Filistia mite in a zak uh ciangin David a zong dingin Filistia mi khempeuh kuanto uh hi. David in zong tua thu za ahih manin amaute a do dingin a kuan khia hi.
Tu-in Filistia mite hong pai-in aim kuamsung a luh uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in Pasian kiangah thu dong a, “Filistia mite a do dingin ka kuanto ding hiam? Keima khut sungah amaute nong pia ding hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin

Tua ciangin Baalperazim-ah David paito a, amah in tua lai-ah amaute a zo hi. Tua ciangin David in, “Tuikhang in a phulkhap bangin Pasian in keima khut tawh ka galte phukham hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun a min Baalperazim kici hi.
Filistia mite in tua lai-ah a pasian-te uh nusia uh a, David’ thupiakna tawh tuate kihal hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mite hong kuanin kuam sung hong luhkik lai uh hi.
David in Pasian kiangah thu a dotkik ciangin Pasian in ama kiangah, “Amaute’ nungah na kuanto kei ding hi. Kual pai inla lungli kungte’ galkhat lam panin amaute hih in.
Lungli kungte dawnah kalsuan huging na zak ciangin galsim dingin pai in; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistia galkapte a vat dingin nangma mai-ah Pasian kuan khin hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian in amah a thupiak bangin David gamta a, amaute in Gibeon panin Gezer ciang dong Filistia galkapte vat gawp uh hi.
Tua ciangin David’ minthanna in gam khempeuh zel a,
David in ama adingin David khuapi sungah innte a lam hi. Amah in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang adingin mun khat bawlin puanbuk khat lamsak hi.

Tua ciangin David in, “Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a pua ding le ama na a sem tawntung dingin Topa in amaute teel ahih manin Levi mite sim loh kuamah in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang pua thei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a bawlsa, ama omna ding munah Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a paipihto dingin David in Jerusalem-ah Israel mi khempeuh a khawm hi.
David in Aaron’ suante le Levi mi a khopte:
Kohath-te beh sung panin a ukpi Uriel, a behte za le sawmnih tawh ahi hi.
Merari-te beh sung panin a ukpi Asaiah, a behte zanih le sawmnih tawh ahi hi.
Gershom-te beh sung panin a ukpi Joel, a behte za le sawmthum tawh ahi hi.
Elizafan-te beh sung panin a ukpi Shemaiah, a behte zanih tawh ahi hi.
Hebron-te beh sung panin a ukpi Eliel, a behte sawmgiat tawh ahi hi.
Uzziel-te beh sung panin a ukpi Amminadab, a behte za le sawm le nih tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin David in siampite Zadok le Abiathar le Levi mite Uriel, Asaiah, Joel, Shemaiah, Eliel le Amminadab samin

amaute kiangah, “Note pen Levi mite beh lutangte na hi uh hi. Ama adingin ka bawlsakna munah Israel Pasian, Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang na paipihtoh theih nadingun note le na Levi mipihte uh nomau mah kisiansuah tawm un.
A masa lai-in note na om kei uh a, a kisehsa bang danin kem lo ihih manin eite tungah Topa i Pasian hong hehin gim hong pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel Pasian, Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a paipihto dingin siampite le Levi mite amau mah kisiansuah tawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ kamgenna tawh kizui-in Moses’ thupiak bangin Levi mite in a liangko uhah a zawlte tawh Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a pua uh hi.
Lungdamna aw ginsak nadingin lasakna nate, harp lasakna le laiza lasaknate le a daltuahte nakpitakin tumin la a sa dingin Levi ukpite in a mipihte uh a sehna ding David in thu a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Levi mite in Joel’ tapa Heman seh uh hi. Tua ciangin a beh sung panin Berekhiah’ tapa Asaf, Merari minam sung panin a behte uh Kushaiah’ tapa Ethan;

tua ciangin amaute tawh a pawl nihna-in a behte uh Zekhariah, Jaaziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattithiah, Elifelehu le Mikneiah le kongcingte Obededom le Jeiel seh uh hi.
Lasate Heman, Asaf le Ethan-te in sumngo daltuahte a tum ding uh ahi hi.
Zekhariah, Aziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maaseiah le Benaiah-te in a paisuak aw-in harp lasaknate a tum ding uh ahi hi.
Mattithiah, Elifelehu, Mikneiah, Obededom, Jeiel le Azaziah-te in laiza lasaknate a un aw-in a makai ding uh ahi hi.
Levi mite sungah la makai Khenaniah inla uk ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thei hi.
Berekhiah le Elkanah-te pen Thuciamna Singkuang adingin kongcingte hi ding uh hi.

Siampite Shebaniah, Joshafat, Nethanel, Amasai, Zekhariah, Benaiah le Eliezer-te in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah peengkulte tum ding uh hi. Obededom le Jehiah-te zong Thuciamna Singkuang adingin kongcingte hi ding uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David le Israel upate le a tul-a a ukte, Obededom’ inn panin lungdamna tawh Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a paipihto dingin a pai uh hi.
Pasian in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a pua Levi mite huh ahih manin amaute in bawngtal sagih le tuutal sagih biakna-in a pia uh hi.

David in saihadial puantualpi silh a, tua mah bangin Thuciamna Singkuang a pua Levi mite khempeuh le lasate le lasate a uk Khenaniah-te in zong a silh uh hi. Tua ciangin David in siampi puan khat silh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel mi khempeuh in sakite le peengkulte le daltuahte’ awging tawh kizui-in awng kawmin Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang paipihto uh a, harp lasaknate le laiza lasaknate tawh nakpitakin la a sa uh hi.

David khuapi-ah Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang hong tun laitakin Saul’ tanu a zi Mikhal in tawlet panin na en a, Kumpi David lamin a gualnuam-a a om a mu hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a lungsim sungah David a neu-et hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang hong tumpih uh a, David in ama adingin a lamsak puanbuk sungah koih uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in meihal biaknate le thunuama biaknate Pasian’ mai-ah pia uh hi.
David in meihal biaknate le thunuama a biaknate a piak a man khit ciangin amah in Topa’ min tawh mite thupha pia a,
Israel mi numei le pasal khempeuhte tungah anlum khat, sa bak khat le leenggahkeu bek khat ciat a hawm hi.
Tua tham loin amah in Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah na semin thu a ngen ding, lungdamna a ko ding le Israel Pasian, Topa a phat dingin Levi mite pawlkhat a seh hi.

Asaf a ukpi hi a, ama zomah Zekhariah ahi hi. Jeiel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Benaiah, Obededom le Jeiel, harp lasaknate le laiza lasaknate a tum dingte ahi uh hi. Asaf in daltuahte a tum ding hi a,
siampite Benaiah le Jahaziel-te in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah peengkulte a tum paisuak ding uh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin tua ni-in David in Asaf le a Levi mipihte in Topa tungah hih bangin lungdamkohna la a sa dingin a seh masa hi:
Topa’ tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min lo unla, ama septe khempeuh mite’ lakah kitheisak un!
Amah la sak un. Phatna la amah sak unla, a lamdang a septe khempeuh mite tungah gen un!
Ama min siangtho hangin nuamin diang unla, Topa a zong mite khempeuh lungdam ta uh hen!
Topa le ama hatna zong unla, ama ompihna zong den un!
A lamdang a nasepte phawk unla, a lamdang ama genkhiat a thukhennate phawk un,
no ama nasem Abraham’ suante, Jakob’ suante, ama teeltuamte aw!
Amah, eite’ Topa Pasian hi a, ama thupiaknate leitung khempeuh ading ahi hi.
Amah in a thuciamna phawk tawntung hi. Khang tulkhat-a dingin a thupiakna kammal,
Abraham tawh a thuciamna, Isaac tungah a khapna,
Jakob tungah thu ciamin, amah in a kipsak, Israel tungah tawntung thuciamna-in a kipsak,
“Nangma tungah Kanaan gam hong pia-in, gamhluahin na tanh dingin kong pia ding hi,” a cihte phawk tawntung hi.
Amaute a mi-in tawmin, gentaak loin peemta hi uh a,
minam khat pan nam khatah vak kawikawi-in, kumpi gam khat pan gamdang khatah a pai lai-un,
amaute kuamah nengniamsak lo hi. Amaute’ hangin amah in kumpite tai gawp a,
“Ka sathau nilhte lawng kei unla, ka kamsangte tungah siatna hih kei un!” ci hi.
Leitung mi khempeuh aw, Topa la sak un! A ni ni-in ama hotkhiatna thu gengen un.
Minam dangte lakah ama minthanna gen khia unla, a lamdang ama septe mi khempeuh lakah gen un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa lian mahmah a, nakpitakin phat ding ahi hi; pasian khempeuh sangin lamdang sak zawk ding ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh minam dangte’ pasian-te milim hi lel a, ahih hangin Topa ahihleh vantungte a bawlpa ahi hi.
Pahtawina le minliatna in amah umcih a, thahatna le lungdamna in amah kimkot hi.
Leitung mi khempeuh aw, Topa theitel unla, Topa’ minthanna le a thahatna theitel un!
Amah in a ngah ding a kilawm minthanna Topa’ tungah pia un. Biakna puak unla, ama mai-ah pai un! Biakna puan silhin Topa bia un.
Leitung mi khempeuh aw, ama mai-ah liing un; hi hi, leitung kip mahmah a, kilok ngei lo ding hi.
Vantung kipak henla, leitung lungdam tahen; minam khempeuhte lakah, “Topa mang hi!” amaute in ci ta uh hen.
Tuipi le a sunga om khempeuh awng uh henla, gamlak le a sunga om khempeuh lungdamin diang ta uh hen!
Tua ciangin gamlak singte in lungdamna tawh Topa’ mai-ah la sa ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh leitung thu khen dingin amah hong pai hi.
Amah hoih ahih manin dingTopa’ tungah lungdamna ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip a tawntungin a kho hi!

“Kote hong khah khia in, kote hong hon khia Pasian aw, minam dangte lak panin kote hong kaikhawm in. Na min siangtho tungah lungdam kong koh theih nading uh le, nangmah phatna-ah ka minthan nadingun kote hong hon in.

Israel Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah tahen, a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin!” zong ci lai un, a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, “Amen!” ci-in Topa a phat uh hi. Thuciamna Singkuang adingin Levi Mite Kiseh
Tua ahih ciangin David in nisima a kisam bangin Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah na a sem tawntung dingin Asaf le a Levi mipihte Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah nusia a,
Obededom le a behte sawmguk le giatte zong a nusia hi. Jeduthun’ tapa Obededom le Hosah-te pen kongpi cing dingte ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ thukham sungah a kigelh ama thupiak khempeuh bangin, zingsang le nitakin meihal biakna tau tungah Topa adingin meihal biaknate a pia tawntung dingin, Gibeon-a om mual dawna Topa’ biakbuk mai-ah siampi Zadok le a sanggam siampite a nusia hi.
Tuate’ banah amaute tawh Heman le Jeduthun zong om a, ama itna kip kho tawntung ahih manin Topa’ tungah lungdamna a ko dingin a kiteel, a minin a kilo khia midang omlai hi.
Heman le Jeduthun inla aw dingin peengkulte le daltuahte nei uh a, biakna la sak nadingin lasakna nate nei uh hi. Jeduthun’ tapate kulhkongpi cing dingin kiseh hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh a inn ciat uhah ciah uh a, David zong a innkuante thupha a pia dingin a inn-ah a ciah hi.
Tu-in David a inn-ah a ten ciangin amah in kamsang Nathan kiangah, “En in, taamtak inn hoih sungah kei ka teeng a, ahih hangin puanbuk nuai-ah Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang om lai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in David kiangah, “Pasian in nang hong ompih ahih manin na lungsimah a om khempeuh hih in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin tua zan mahin Nathan kiangah Topa’ thu hong tung a,
“Pai inla ka nasem pa David kiangah hih bangin gen in. ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nangmah in keima ten nadingin biakinn na lam kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te ka paipihtoh a kipan tuni dongin biakinn sungah ka teeng kei a, puanbuk khat pan puanbuk khat, omna khat pan omna khatah ka pai kawikawi hi.

Israel mi khempeuh tawh ka painasa mun khempeuh ah, keima mite tuu bangin a cing dingin ka sawl thukhente khat peuhpeuh tungah, “Bang hangin taamtak biakinn khat kei adingin hong lamsak lo na hi hiam?” ci-in kam khat beek ka gen hiam?’ ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka nasem pa David kiangah hih bangin na ci ding hi. ‘Vanglian Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Ka mi Israel-te tungah ulian ahi dingin lonona, tuu na zuihna panin nang kong la hi.
Na paina peuhpeuhah nang tawh kong omkhin a, na mai panin na galte khempeuh ka susia hi. Leitung miliante khat min bangin nang adingin min khat kong bawlsak ding hi.

Amau’ inn ciatah a ten theih nading le a kinawngkaisak nawn loh nadingin ka mi Israel-te adingin mun khat sehin amaute ka phut ding hi. Ka mi Israel-te tungah thukhente ka seh a kipanin a nidanga bangin mi ngongtatte in amaute beisak nawn lo ding uh hi. Tua ciangin keimah in na galte khempeuh ka nuaisiah ding hi. Tua tham loin Topa keimah in nang a lianin hong bawlin, suanlekhak na neihna ding thu nang tungah kong gen hi.
Na nuntakna bei-in na pate kiang na zuat ciangin nangma nungah na tapate khat ka khangsak dinga, ama kumpi gam ka kipsak ding hi.
Amah in kei adingin biakinn khat hong lamsak dinga, keimah in ama kumpi tokhom ka kipsak paisuak ding hi.
Kei pen ama pa ka hi dinga, amah pen keima tapa hi ding hi. Nangma hun ma-a sem Saul’ tung panin ka lakkhiat bangin nangma tung panin ka itna kip ka la khia kei dinga,
ka mite le ka kumpi gam a kem dingin amah ka koih dinga, ama kumpi tokhom kip paisuak ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Hih kammalte khempeuh tawh kizui le hih maangmuhna khempeuh tawh kizui-in Nathan in David kiangah a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi David tumin Topa’ mai-ah tu a, “Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in hih ciang dong nong tunpih nadingin kei in kua hi a, ka innkuanpihte bang ahi hiam?

Hih a beisa thu pen nangma mitah na neu khat ahi hi, Pasian aw. Nangmah in a hong tung ding hunpi khat sung tang ding na nasem pa’ suanlekhak tawh kisai thu zong na gen khin a, mailam a khang dingte thu kei nong lak khin hi, Topa Pasian!
Na nasem pa nong pahtawina-ah David in nang tungah bang gen ding nei nawn ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in na nasem pa na thei hi.
Topa aw, na nasem pa’ hang le nangma lungsim bangin hih na liante khempeuh na kitheihsakna-ah hih liatna khempeuh na hih hi.
Ka bilun ka zakna uh tawh kizui-in Topa aw, nangmah tawh a kibang kuamah om lo a, nang sim loh Pasian dang om lo hi.

Egypt panin na hotkhiat na mite’ mai-ah minam dangte hawl khiatna tawh nang adingin a lian a lauhuai min khat na bawlna, Pasian pai-in ama mi dingin a hotkhiat Israel-te tawh a kibang mi leitungah minam dang kua om ahi hiam?
Na mi Israel-te a tawntungin nangma mi ahi dingin na bawl hi. Tua ciangin Topa aw, nang pen amaute’ Pasian na suak hi.
“Tu-in Topa aw, na nasem pa le a suan a khakte tawh kisai-in na gensa thu a tawntungin kip henla, na gensa bangin hong hih in.
Tua ciangin, ‘Israel Pasian, Vanglian Topa pen Israel-te’ Pasian hi,’ ci-in nangma min a tawntungin kipin kiliansak dinga, na nasem pa David’ ukna nangma mai-ah kip tawntung ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh nang ka Pasian in keima suante kumpi-in nong bawlsakna ding na nasem pa tungah nong lak khinzo hi. Tua ahih ciangin na nasem pa in na mai-ah thu nget ding hanna lungsim hong nei hi.
Tu-in Topa aw, nang, Pasian na hi a, na nasem pa tungah hih na hoih na ciam khin hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nangma mai-ah a kizop tawntung theih nadingin na nasem pa’ suanlekhakte thupha na piak ding nang hong lungkim ta in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa aw, nangmah in thupha na piaksate a tawntungin thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thute khit ciangin David in Filistia mite zo-in nuaisiah a, Filistia mite’ khut sung panin Gath le a khuaneute a la hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Moab mite zo a, Moab mite David’ nasem suakin siah hong puak uh hi.
Zobah le Hamath gam kumpipa Hadadezer in Eufratis gun kuam gamte ngahkik nuamin hong kuan ahih manin David in amah do-in a zo hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama tung panin leeng galkap tulkhat, sakol tung tuang galkap tulsagih le khe galkap tul sawmnih la hi. Tua ciangin David in leengkai sakol galkap khempeuh a zagui attatsak a, ahih hangin leeng zakhat adingin a kicing a siit hi.
Zobah kumpi Hadadezer a huh dingin Damaskas a Syria mite hong pai ciangin David in Syria mite tul sawmnih le tulnih that hi.
Tua ciangin David in Syria gam Damaskas-ah khuacingte koih hi. Tua ciangin Syria mite David’ nasem suak uh a, siah a puak uh hi. David a paina peuhpeuhah Topa in gualzosak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Hadadezer’ nasemte in a puak kham kibawl lumte la-in Jerusalem-ah a ciahpih hi.
Tua ciangin Hadadezer’ khuapite Tibhath le Kun panin David in sumngo tampi tak la hi. Solomon in tuate tawh sumngo tuikuangpi le khuampite le sumngo umlebeelte a bawl hi.
David in Zobah kumpi Hadadezer’ galkap buppi a zawhna thu Hamath kumpi Toi in a zak ciangin,

Hadadezer simin a zawhna hangin a hopih ding le a lungdampih dingin Kumpi David kiangah a tapa Joram a sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hadadezer le Toi kido zel ngei hi. Amah in kham, ngun le sumngo tawh kibawl na namkim khempeuh puak hi.
Kumpi David in hihte zong, Edom, Moab, Ammon mite, Filistia mite le Amalek, minam khempeuh kiang panin a puakkhiat ngun le kham tawh Topa’ tungah a apkhawm hi.
Tua ciangin Zeruiah’ tapa Abishai in Ci Kuam-ah Edom mite tul sawm le tulgiat that hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Edom-ah khuacingte koih a, Edom mite khempeuh David’ nasem a suak uh hi. Topa in David a paina peuhpeuhah gualzosak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Israel mi khempeuh uk a, amah in a mite khempeuh tungah thuman le thutang a zang hi.
Zeruiah’ tapa Joab pen galkapte a uk hi a, Ahilud’ tapa Jehoshafat pen thuciamteh pa ahi hi.
Ahitub’ tapa Zadok le Abiathar’ tapa Ahimelek siampite hi a, Shavsha lai-at pa ahi hi.
Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah pen Khereth mite le Peleth mite tungah a uk hi a, David’ tapate pen kumpipa’ nasepna-ah uliante ahi uh hi.
Hih thu khit tawlkhat ciangin Ammon mite’ kumpipa Nahash si a, a tapa in ama tangin uk hi.

Tua ciangin David in, “Ama pa kei tungah thuman takin hong gamta ahih manin Nahash’ tapa Hanun’ tungah thuman takin ka gamta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in a pa’ huhau-in amah a hehnem dingin kamtaite a sawl hi. Tua ciangin David’ nasemte amah a hehnem dingin Ammon mite’ gam Hanun’ kiangah hong pai uh hi.

Ahih hangin Ammon mite’ uliante in Hanun’ kiangah, “David in nang kiangah hehnemte hong sawlna hangin na pa a pahtawi hi, ci-in ngaihsun na hi hiam? Gam sung a pheklek ding le a lumlet ding le gam sung a ensim dingin ama nasemte na kiangah hong pai hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Hanun in David’ nasemte manin a khamul uh metsak a, a kawng ciang uhah a puante uh atkhiatsakna tawh amaute daisakin a sawl khia hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute kihem uh hi.

Hih mite tawh kisai thu David kiangah a kigen ciangin amaute a dawntuah dingin mi a sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite nakpi takin maizum uh a, ciah ngam lo uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Na khamul uh a khankik mateng Jerikho-ah om unla, tua ciangin hong ciah un,” a ci hi.

Ammon mite in David’ muhdahin amau mah a kibawl tawmna uh a muh uh ciangin Hanun le Ammon mite in Mesopotamia, Arammaakah le Zobah panin leeng galkapte le sakol galkapte cial nadingin ngun talen tulkhat a puak uh hi.

Amaute in leeng galkap tul sawmthum le tulnih le Maakah gam kumpipa a galkap tawh cial uh a, amaute hong pai-in Medeba khua kiangah phual a sat uh hi. Tua ciangin a khuapite uh panin Ammon mite kikhawmin galsim dingin hong kuan uh hi.
David in tua thu a zak ciangin Joab le mi thahat galkap khempeuh a sawl hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon mite hong kuan khia-in khuapi lutna-ah galdo dingin hong pang uh a, a hong kuan kumpite in gamlakah panmun a la uh hi.
Gal in a nung le a mai panin a panna Joab in a theih ciangin Israel mi a kiteng khia mi pawlkhat teel a, Syria mite a do dingin pangsak hi.
A omlai a mite amah in a sanggampa Abishai’ ukin koih a, Ammon mite a do dingin amaute kipangsak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Syria mite ka lelhtuak leh nangmah in kei nong huh dinga, ahih hangin Ammon mite nang na lelhtuak leh keimah in nang kong huh ding hi.
Hang in; i mite ading le i Pasian’ khuapite adingin pasal tat ni;
Tua ahih ciangin Joab le amah tawh a om mite in a do dingin Syria mite kiang hong naih uh hi. Tua ciangin ama mai-ah Syria mite tai uh hi.
Syria mite a taina Ammon mite in a muh uh ciangin tua bangmahin amaute zong Joab’ sanggampa Abishai’ mai-ah tai uh a, khuapi sungah lut uh hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah Joab hong ciahkik hi.

Ahih hangin Syria mite in Israel-te a lelhlam uh a kitheih uh ciangin, amaute in kamtaite sawlin Eufratis gal khata om Syria galkapte sam uh a, Hadadezer’ galkapte a ukpa Shofak a makai-in koih uh hi.

David kiangah hih thu a kigen ciangin, amah in Israel khempeuh khawmin Jordan galkah a, amaute kiangah pai-in amaute a do dingin galkapte khawm hi. David in Syria mite a do dingin gal pangsak a, Syria mite tawh kido uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel-te’ mai-ah Syria mite tai uh hi. Tua ciangin David in Syria mite’ leeng hawl galkap mihing tulsagih le khe galkap tul sawmli that a, amau’ galkap a ukpa Shofak zong a that hi.
Tua khit ciangin Hadadezer’ nasemte in Israel-te a lelhlam uh a kitheih uh ciangin amaute in David tawh kilemna bawl uh a, ama khutnuai mi a suak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Syria mite in Ammon mite huh nuam nawn lo uh hi.

Khuakhal sungin galsimin kumpite kuan khia zel uh hi. Tua bang hunhoih khuakhal hong tun ciangin Joab in galkapte kuan khiatpihin Ammon mite’ gam su gawp a, hong pai-in Rabbah khua umcih hi. Ahih hangin Jerusalem-ah David om hi. Tua ciangin Joab in Rabbah khua vatin lumlet hi.

Tua ciangin David in amau’ kumpipa’ kumpi lukhu ama tung panin lakkhiatsak hi. Tua lukhu kham talen khat gikin a sungah suangmanpha khat a omna amah in thei hi. Tua hi a, David in tua lukhu ama lu tungah khu hi. Tua ciangin amah in tua khuapi van kinusiate tampi tak khat pai khiatpih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in tua sunga om mite pai khiatpihin singatnate le tuzumte le heite tawh na a sem dingin a koih hi. Tua bangin Ammon mite’ khuapite khempeuh ah David in hih hi. Tua ciangin David le mi khempeuh Jerusalem-ah a ciah uh hi.
Hih thute khit ciangin Gezer-ah Filistia mite tawh kidona hong om a, Hushah khuami Sibbekai in mithagolte’ suanlekhakte khat ahi Sippai a that hi. Tua bangin Filistia mite kinuaisiah hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mite tawh kidona omkik leuleu hi. Tua hi a, Jair’ tapa Elhanan in a teipi kung siamlawngpi cia a pha, Gath khuami Goliath’ sanggampa Lahmi a that hi.

Tua ciangin a khut langtuakah khutme guk a nei, a khe langtuakah zong kheme guk mah a nei, a vekpi-in sawmnih le li a nei, mi thalian khat a omna Gath-ah gal omkik hi. Tua mipa zong mithagolte’ sung pan a hong piang ahi hi.
Amah in Israel a to ciangin David’ sanggampa Shimea’ tapa Jonathan in amah that hi.
Hih mi thumte pen Gath-a mithagolte sung pan a hong piang ahi uh hi. David le a nasemte’ khutin amaute puk uh hi.
Satan in Israel mite gimsak nuam ahih manin Israel mi phazah a sim dingin David hanthawn hi.

Tua ahih ciangin David in Joab le galkap a ukte kiangah, “Pai un; Beersheba panin Dan ciang dong Israel mi phazah va sim unla, amaute a phazah ka theih nadingin kei kiangah thu hong zasak un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Joab in, “Topa in a mite a zah za khatin behlap tahen! Ka to kumpipa aw, amaute khempeuh ka topa’ nasemte hi lo ahi uh hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin ka topa in hih kisam sa na hi hiam? Bang hangin Israel tungah mawhna tun ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in Joab thuzawh hi. Tua ciangin Joab kihem khia-in Israel sung khempeuh ah pai a, tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah hong ciahkik hi.

Tua ciangin Joab in David kiangah mite a kigawm khit ciangin a phazah a pia hi. Israel khempeuh sungah gal kap thei ding mihing awn khat le sang khat om a, Judah sungah gal kap thei ding mi tul za le tul sawmsagih om hi.
Ahih hangin Joab in kumpipa’ thupiakna hoihsa het lo ahih manin a mi simna-ah Levi minam le Benjamin minamte hel lo hi.
Ahih hangin hih thu-ah Pasian lungkim lo a, amah in Israel-te vat gawp hi.

Tua ciangin David in Pasian kiangah, “Hih ka nasepna-ah nakpitakin ka khial hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang tungah kong thum hi; na nasem pa’ mawhna hong maisak in; bang hang hiam cih leh a haihuai mahmahin ka gamta kha khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in David’ thumu pa Gad tungah thu gen a,
“Pai inla David kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nangma tungah thu thum kong pia hi. Nang tungah kong hih theih nadingin tuate khat teel in, ci hi,’ ci-in gen in” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David kiangah Gad hong pai-in ama tungah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Na lak ding khat teel in:

Kialpi kum thum sung, ahih kei leh na galte in nang hong sim gawp laitakin na galte mai-ah kha thum sung galtaina, ahih kei leh gam sungah pulnatna le Topa’ vantungmi in Israel sung khempeuh ah suksiatna ni thum sung a piangsak Topa’ namsau,’ ci hi. Tu-in kei hong sawl pa kiangah ka ciahpih ding dawnna ding khentel in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in Gad kiangah, “Keimah in lungkhamna lianpi khat ka tuak hi. Ama hehpihna lian mahmah ahih manin Topa’ khut sungah hong puksak inla, mihing’ khut sungah hong puksak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Israel tungah pulnatna khat tungsak a, Israel mi tul sawmsagih puk hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in a susia dingin Jerusalem-ah vantungmi sawl hi. Ahih hangin amah in a suksiat ding laitakin Topa in mu a, tua thusia-ah amah kisik hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a susia vantungmi kiangah, “Pha zo hi; tu-in khawl ta in,” a ci hi. Jebus mi Ornan’ ancilna gei-ah Topa’ vantungmi a din laitak ahi hi.

Tua ciangin David khuadak to a, leitung le vantung kikalah Topa’ vantungmi dingin, a khut sungah a kidoksa namsau khat omin Jerusalem tungah a zan mu hi. Tua ciangin David le a upate puanhampi silhin maipuk uh hi.

Tua ciangin David in Pasian kiangah, “Mi phazah a sim dingin thu a piapa keimah hi lo ka hi hiam? Khialin a gitloh gamtat mahmah pa keimah ka hi hi. Ahih hangin hih mite in bang gamtat khialhna nei ahi uh hiam? Topa ka Pasian aw, kong thum hi, keimah le ka innkuan gim hong pia in. Ahih hangin na mite tungah gimna tungsak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David paito-in Jebus mi Ornan’ ancilna phualah Topa ading biakna tau khat a lamna ding a gen dingin Topa’ vantungmi in Gad sawl hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ min tawh a gen Gad’ kammal bangin David paito hi.
Ornan le a tapa lite in mangbuh a cilcil laitakin a khuadak uhleh Topa’ vantungmi mu uh a, a tapa lite lau-in a bu uh hi.
Ornan kiangah David hong tun ciangin, Ornan khuadak a, David mu-in ancilna panin hong pai khia a, a mai leilam ngatin David tungah zahtakna a bawl hi.

Tua ciangin David in Ornan kiangah, “Mite kiang panin gimna a ven theih nadingin Topa ading biakna tau khat ka lam theih nadingin na ancilna mun hong pia in. A man a cingin piak dingin hong pia in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ornan in David kiangah, “La in; ka to kumpipa in hoih na sak bangin hih in. Meihal biaknate-a zat dingin bawngtalte, a sing dingin ancilna singte le an tawh biak nadingin a mangbuhte kong pia hi. A vekpi-in kong pia hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Kumpi David in Ornan kiangah, “Hilo hi, a man a cing tawh kong lei ding hi. Topa adingin nangma a’ ka la kei dinga, keima sum bei loin meihal biaknate zong ka pia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Ornan’ tungah a mun lei nadingin kham shekel zaguk a gik a pia hi.

Tua ciangin David in tua lai-ah Topa adingin biakna tau khat lamin meihal biaknate le thunuama biaknate bawlin Topa’ tungah thu ngen a, tua ciangin amah in a thungetna a piakna-in a meihal biakna a hal dingin vantung panin meikuang a piasuk hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ thupiakna tawh vantungmi in a namsau a pai sungah a siatkik hi.
Tua hunin, Jebus mi Ornan’ ancilna phualah ama nget thu Topa in a piakna David in a muh ciangin amah in tua lai-ah a biakpiaknate a bawl hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Moses in gamlakah a bawl Topa’ biakbuk le meihal biakna tau pen tua hunin Gibeon mual dawnah omlai hi.
Ahih hangin amah in Topa’ vantungmi’ namsau kihta ahih manin Pasian tungah thu a dong dingin tua lai-ah David pai ngam lo hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Hih lai-ah Topa Pasian’ inn om dinga, hih lai-ah Israel mite’ meihal biakna tau om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Israel gam sunga om gamdang mite a kikaihkhop nadingun David in thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin amah in Pasian’ biakinn lam nadingin suangseeksate a bawl dingin suangseekte a koih hi.
David in kongpi kongkhak-a zat dingin siktukkilh le gak nadingin sik tampi koihin, teh zawh lohin sumngo tampi tak zong koih a,
taamtak singte sim zawh hi lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Sidon khuamite le Taia khuamite in David kiangah taamtak tampi tak puak uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh David in, “Ka tapa Solomon khangno-in pumpi tawh sinna om nai lo a, Topa ading a kilam biakinn pen gam khempeuh ah minthanna le pahtawina-ah a lian mahmah ding ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua biakinn dingin keimah ka kiging khol ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in a sih ma-in na tampi tak koih khol hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a tapa Solomon sam a, Israel Pasian, Topa adingin biakinn khat a lam ding a gen hi.
David in Solomon kiangah, “Ka ta aw, Topa ka Pasian’ min dingin biakinn khat lam ding ka lungsimah om hi.

Ahih hangin kei’ tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a, ‘Nangmah in gal lianpipi tampi simin mi tampi na that hi. Nangmah in keima mai leitungah sisan tua zahta luangsak na hih manin ka min dingin biakinn na lam kei ding hi.

En in, nangma sung panin tapa khat hong piang dinga, amah pen lungnopna a nei mi hi ding hi. Keimah in a kimkot a, a galte khempeuh panin ama tungah lungnopna ka pia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama min Solomon hi dinga, ama hun sungin Israel tungah lungnopna le daihna ka pia ding hi.
Amah in keima min dingin biakinn khat lam ding hi. Amah ka tapa hi-in, kei, ama pa ka hi dinga, Israel sungah ama kumpi tokhom ka kipsak paisuak ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tu-in ka ta aw, amah in nangma thu a gensa bangin Topa na Pasian’ biakinn na lamna-ah na tangtun theih nadingin Topa in nang hong ompih tahen.
Amah in Israel tungah nang hong uksak ciangin Topa na Pasian’ thukham na zuih theih nadingin Topa in ngaihsut pilna le thutelna nang tungah hong pia tahen.
Tua ciangin Israel-te adingin Topa in Moses a piak thukhamte le biakna ngeina kipte zuih ding na kidop nakleh na maavang ding hi. Thakhauh inla hang in. Lau kei inla lungkia kei in.

Nakpi taka hanciamna le gimna lianpi tawh Topa’ biakinn dingin kham talen tul zakhat, ngun talen awn khat le tehzawh lohin sumngo le sik ka koih khinzo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tam mahmah hi; sing le suang zong ka koih zo hi. Nangmah in hihte na behlap ding hi.
Nangmah in na a sem ding mi tampi na nei hi; suangseekte, leilesuang innlam siamte, khutsiamte le sim zawh lohin siamna nam khempeuh a nei,
kham, ngun, sumngo le sik sep a siamte na nei ding hi. Kithawi inla sem in! Topa in nang hong ompih tahen!” a ci hi.
Israel makaite khempeuh in zong a tapa Solomon a huhna ding David in thu pia a,

“Topa na Pasian uh note tawh hong om hi lo ahi hiam? Amah in na kiim khempeuh uhah lungnopna hong pia hi lo ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in gam sunga teeng mite keima khut sungah hong pia khin a, Topa le ama mite’ mai-ah gam sung khempeuh kinuaisiah hi.

Tu-in Topa na Pasian uh a zong dingin na ngaihsutna uh le na lungsim uh kipsak un. Topa’ min dingin a kilam biakinn sungah Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang le Pasian’ umlebeel siangthote a kipaipih theih nadingin kithawi unla Topa Pasian’ biakinn lam un,” a ci hi.
Tu-in David teekin kum tampi pha a, amah in Israel tungah kumpi-in a tapa Solomon a koih hi.
David in Israel makai khempeuh le siampite le Levi mite a khawm hi.
Levi mite kum sawmthum panin a tungsiah teeng kisim a, a vekpi-in pasal tul sawmthum le tulgiat pha hi.
David in, “Hihte sung panin tul sawmnih le tulli in Topa’ biakinn sungah nasep uk dinga, tulguk pen mangte le thukhente hi dinga,
tulli kongcingte le tulli in phatna dinga ka bawlsa lasaknate tawh Topa tungah phatna pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Levi mite a behbehin pawl thum suah a, tuate pen: Gershom pawl, Kohath pawl le Merari pawl ahi uh hi.
Gershom’ tapate: Ladan le Shimei ahi uh hi.
Ladan’ tapate: A ukpi Jehiel le Zetham le Joel, thum pha uh hi.
Shimei’ tapate: Shelomoth, Haziel le Haran, thum pha uh hi. Hihte pen Ladan’ beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Shimei’ tapate: Jahath, Zina, Jeush le Beriah ahi uh hi. Hih lite pen Shimei’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Jahath a ukpi hi-in, Zina a nihna ahi hi. Ahih hangin Jeush le Beriah-te in tapa tampi nei lo uh ahih manin innkuan khat kisuak sakin sim khatin kisim khawm uh hi.
Kohath’ tapate: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel, li pha uh hi.

Amram’ tapate: Aaron le Moses ahi uh hi. Amah le a tapate in Topa’ mai-ah paknamtui a hal tawntung ding le ama na semin ama min tawh thupha a piak tawntung theih nadingin a siangtho pen nate a ap dingin Aaron kituam koih hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mipa Moses’ tapate ahihleh Levi minamte lakah kisim hi.
Moses’ tapate: Gershom le Eliezer ahi uh hi.
Gershom’ tapate lakah Shebuel a ukpi ahi hi.
Eliezer’ tapa Rehabiah zong a ukpi ahi hi. Eliezer in tapa dang nei lo a, ahih hangin Rehabiah’ tapate tam mahmah hi.
Kohath’ tapa nihna Izhar’ tapate lakah Shelomoth a ukpi ahi hi.
Kohath’ tapa thumna Hebron’ tapate lakah: Jeriah a ukpi, Amariah a nihna, Jahaziel a thumna le Jekameam a lina ahi hi.
Kohath’ tapa lina Uzziel’ tapate lakah: Mikah a ukpi le Isshiah a nihna ahi hi.
Merari’ tapate: Mahli le Mushi ahi hi. Mahli’ tapate: Eleazar le Kish ahi hi.
Eleazar in tapa nei loin si a, tanu bek nei hi. Amau’ tanau, Kish tapate in amaute teenpih uh hi.
Mushi’ tapate: Mahli, Eder le Jeremoth, thum pha uh hi.
Hihte pen Topa’ biakinn nasepna-ah na a sem ding, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah, a milipin a minin a mi phazah zui-in a kiciamtehna bangin beh lutangte, a behbehin Levi suante ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh David in, “Israel Pasian, Topa in a mite tungah lungnopna piazo a, Jerusalem-ah amah om tawntung ta hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Levi mite in puanbuk hitaleh tua tawh kisai nasepna ding nate khat peuhpeuh hitaleh a puak ding uh kisam nawn lo hi,” a ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh David’ thupiakna a nunung pen tawh a kisim hihte pen kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah Levi mi a phazah ahi hi.

“Ahih hangin amaute’ nasep ding pen Topa’ biakinn nasepna-ah Aaron’ suante huhin, biakinn tualte le biakinn deite kemin, biakna na khempeuh a siangthosak ding le Pasian’ biakinn nasepna-ah hih ding khat peuhpeuh a sem ding uh ahi hi.
Ompihna Anlum, an tawh biak nadingin annel, silngo sawh loh anlum moh, a ki-em piakna, sathau tawh a kihel piakna le a tam tehna ahih kei leh a lian tehna nasep khempeuh zong a huh ding uh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amaute zingsang simin ding ding uh a, lungdamna ko-in Topa phatin, nitakin zong tua bangmahin hih ding uh a,
a mal zah a kisam bangin Sabbath nite, Khadet nite le pawi nite-in Topa tungah meihal biakna a kipiak peuhpeuh ciangin a tawntungin Topa’ mai-ah om ding uh hi.
Tua bangin amaute in kikhopna puanbuk le biakinn kemin, Topa’ biakinn nasepna-ah amau’ behte ahi Aaron’ suante huh ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Aaron’ suante a kisehkhennate hih bang ahi hi. Aaron’ tapate: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar ahi uh hi.
Ahih hangin a pa uh a sih ma-in Nadab le Abihu si-in ta nei lo uh ahih manin Eleazar le Ithamar-te siampi suak uh hi.
Eleazar’ suan Zadok le Ithamar’ suan Ahimelek’ huhna tawh David in amau’ nasepna-ah a kiseh bangin Aaron’ suante a koih hi.
Ithamar’ suante lak sangin Eleazar’ suante lakah ukpi tam om zaw ahih manin, amaute in Eleazar’ suante pawl sawm le guk suahin, Ithamar’ suante pawl giat suah uh hi.
Eleazar’ suante le Ithamar’ suante lakah biakinn uliante le Pasian’ uliante om tuak uh ahih manin amaute in a kibangin aisanna tawh amaute koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Levi mi Nethanel’ tapa ahi lai-at pa Shemaiah in kumpipa, uliante, siampi Zadok, Abiathar’ tapa Ahimelek, siampite le Levi mi beh lutangte’ omna-ah amaute ciamteh hi. Eleazar’ suante-a’ dingin khat kiteelin, tua ciangin Ithamar’ suante adingin khat kiteel a, kilaihsak niloh uh hi.
Aisanna a masa pen Jehoiarib tung, a nihna Jedaiah tung,
a thumna Harim tung, a lina Seorim tung,
a ngana Malkhijah tung, a gukna Mijamin tung,
a sagihna Hakkoz tung, a giatna Abijah tung,
a kuana Jeshua tung, a sawmna Shekaniah tung,
a sawm le khatna Eliashib tung, a sawm le nihna Jakim tung,
a sawm le thumna Huppah tung, a sawm le lina Jeshebeab tung,
a sawm le ngana Bilgah tung, a sawm le gukna Immer tung,
a sawm le sagihna Hezir tung, a sawm le giatna Happizzez tung,
a sawm le kuana Pethahiah tung, a sawmnihna Jehezkel tung,
a sawmnih le khatna Jakhin tung, a sawmnih le nihna Gamul tung,
a sawmnih le thumna Delaiah tung, a sawmnih le lina Maaziah tungah a tu hi.
Hihte in Israel Topa Pasian in amah a thupiak bangin a pupi uh Aaron in amaute-a’ dingin a kipsaksa ngeina bangin Topa’ biakinn sungah a pai dingin amau’ nasep uh ahi a kiseh nasep nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Levi suante a omlaite lakah: Aram’ suante sung panin Shubael’ suante Jehdeiah ahi hi.
Rehabiah’ suante sung panin Isshiah a ukpi ahi hi.
Izhar’ suante sung panin Shelomoth’ suante Jahath ahi hi.
Hebron’ suante lakah: Jeriah a ukpi, Amariah a nihna, Jahaziel a thumna, Jekameam a lina ahi hi.
Uzziel’ suante sung panin Mikah’ suante Shamir ahi hi.
Isshiah’ suante sung panin Zekhariah ahi hi. Mikah’ sanggampa pen Isshiah ahi hi.
Merari’ suante: Mahli, Mushi le Jaaziah ahi hi.
Merari’ suante Jaaziah sung panin Beno, Shoham, Zakkur le Ibri ahi hi.
Mahli in tapa nih, Eleazar le Kish nei hi. Eleazar in tapa nei lo a, Kish in Jerahmeel a kici tapa khat nei hi.
Mushi’ tapate: Mahli, Eder le Jerimoth ahi uh hi. Hihte pen a beh tawh kizui-in Levi’ suante ahi uh hi.

Hihte in zong a behte uh ahi Aaron’ suante mah bangin Kumpi David, Zadok, Ahimelek, siampite le Levi mi beh lutangte’ muhna-ah beh lutangte le a nau pasalte khat ciat in a kibangin aisanna tawh nasep tavuan a la uh hi.

David le nasepna ah a ukpite in zong laiza lasaknate, harp lasaknate le daltuahte tawh Pasian thu a gen dingin Asaf, Heman le Jeduthun-te’ tapate pawlkhat nasepna-a dingin koihtuam uh hi. Na a semte le amau’ nasepte:
Asaf’ tapate sung panin: Kumpipa’ makaihna nuai-ah Pasian’ thu a gen Asaf’ makaihna nuai-ah Asaf’ tapate Zakkur, Josef, Nethaniah le Asharelah ahi hi.

Jeduthun’ sung panin Jeduthun’ tapate: Lungdam kohna le Topa phatna-in laiza lasakna tawh thu a gen, a pa uh Jeduthun’ makaihna nuai-ah Gedaliah, Zeri, Jeshaiah, Shimei, Hashabiah le Mattithiah, guk pha uh hi.
Heman sung panin Heman’ tapate: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamtiezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir le Mahazioth ahi hi.
Hihte khempeuh pen Pasian thuciamna bangin amah a pahtawi dingin kumpipa’ thumu pa Heman’ tapate ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in Heman tungah tapa sawm le li le tanu thum pia hi.

Amaute khempeuh Pasian’ biakinn nasep nadingin Topa’ biakinn sungah daltuahte, harp lasaknate le laiza lasaknate tawh la lamsangah a pa uh ukna nuai-ah om uh hi. Asaf, Jeduthun le Heman-te pen kumpipa’ thupiakna nuai-ah om uh hi.
A Levi mipihte uh tawh Topa ading lasakna lamah sinna a nei a siam mi a vekpi-in zanih le sawmgiat le giat ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a neu a lian, sia le a sinte a kibangin, amaute in amau’ nasep ding uh ai a san uh hi.
Asaf’ behte adingin ai masa Josef tungah tu hi. A nihna Gedaliah, a sanggamte le a tapate, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A thumna Zakkur, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A lina Izri, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A ngana Nethaniah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A gukna Bukkiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sagihna Jesharelah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A giatna Jeshaiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A kuana Mattaniah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawmna Shimei, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawm le khatna Azarel, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawm le nihna Hashabiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawm le thumna Shubael, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawm le lina Mattithiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawm le ngana Jeremoth, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawm le gukna Hananiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawm le sagihna Joshbekashah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawm le giatna Hanani, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawm lekuana Mallothi, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawmnihna Eliathah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawmnih le khatna Hothir, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawmnih le nihna Giddalti, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawmnih le thumna Mahazioth, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
A sawmnih le lina Romamtiezer, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung a tu hi.
Kongcingte le a Ukte Kongcingte a kisehkhenna hih bang ahi hi: Korah behte, Asaf’ innkuan sung panin Kore’ tapa Meshelemiah ahi hi.
Meshelemiah’ tapate: Zekhariah a tacil, Jediael a nihna, Zebadiah a thumna, Jathniel a lina,
Elam a ngana, Jehohanan a gukna, Eliehoenai a sagihna ahi hi.
Obededom’ tapate: Shemaiah a tacil, Jehozabad a nihna, Joah a thumna, Sakar a lina, Nethanel a ngana,
Ammiel a gukna, Issakhar a sagihna, Peullethai a giatna ahi hi.
Ama tapa upa pen Shemaiah sung panin zong a beh sungah ukte ahi tapate a suak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen siamna lian a nei mite ahi uh hi.
Shemaiah’ tapate: Othni, ael, Obed le a sanggamte siamna a nei ahi Elzabad, Elihu le Shemakhiah ahi hi.
Hihte khempeuh pen Obededom’ tapate le amau’ tapate le a sanggamte uh tawh, nasep nadingin siamna a nei mi kician ahi uh hi. Obededom sung panin sawmguk le nih pha uh hi.
Meshelemiah in siamna a nei tapate le sanggamte, sawm le giat nei hi.
Merari innkuan sung panin Hosah’ tapate: Shimri a ukpi (amah tacil ahih loh hangin a pa in a ukpi-in amah bawl hi),
Hilkiah a nihna, Tebaliah a thumna, Zekhariah a lina ahi hi. Hosah’ tapate le a sanggamte khempeuh sawm le thum a pha uh hi.
Innkuan pasal lutangte pen kongcingte ahi uh hi. Amaute in a sanggamte uh tawh Topa’ biakinn sungah nasep nei uh hi.
Amaute in a neu a lian a kibangin a pate uh innkuankuanin amau’ kongpi cin ding ai san uh hi.
Nisuahna lama dingin ai, Shelemiah tungah tu hi. A tapa, a pil thulamlak pa Zekhariah adingin zong ai san uh a, leilu lama dingin ai pha hi.
Obededom adingin leitaw lamah hong suak a, a tapa tungah vankoihna inndei kipia hi.
Shuppim le Hosah adingin lampi a paitohna, Shallekheth kongpi san, nitumna lamah kia hi. Galvil le galvil kimaituah uh hi.
Vankoihna inndei kongah nih nihin a om mah bangin nisimin nisuahna lamah guk omin, nisim mahin leitaw lamah li om hi.
Tua ciangin nitumna lama om lampi inn-a dingin a lampi-ah li omin a inn-ah nih om hi.
Hihte pen Korah mite le Merari’ tapate lakah kongcingte a kisehkhenna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Levi mite sung panin Ahijah in Pasian’ biakinn vanmanpha koihnate le a ki-ap letsong koihnate uk hi.
Gershon-te beh sung panin Ladan pen innkuan tampi a piankhiatna mi khat hi a, Jehiel innkuante zong ama sung panin a piang ahi hi.
Jehiel’ tapa Zetham le a sanggampa Joel in Topa’ biakinn vanmanpha koihnate uk uh hi.
Amram mite, Izhar mite, Hebron mite le Uzziel mite sung panin:
Moses’ tapa Gershom-te beh sung panin Shebuel pen vanmanpha koihna a ukte lakah a ukpi ahi hi.
Gershom’ sanggam Eliezer’ suan Shelomith tawh zong beh kinai ahi hi. Eliezer’ sung panin a tapa Rehabiah, a tapa Jeshaiah, a tapa Joram, a tapa Zikri, a tapa Shelomith ahi hi.
Hih Shelomith le a sanggamte in, Kumpi David, beh lutangte le a tultul le a zaza-a uk uliante le galkap a ukte in a ap uh ahi, a ki-ap letsongte a kikoihna khempeuh uk uh hi.
Gal sungah a ngah uh van kinusiate sung panin Topa’ biakinn puah nadingin amaute in letsongte ap uh hi.
Thumu pa Samuel, Kish’ tapa Saul, Ner’ tapa Abner le Zeruiah’ tapa Joab in a apsate khempeuh zong, a ki-ap letsong khempeuh Shelomith le a sanggamte’ kepna sungah om hi.
Izhar mite sung panin Khenaniah le a tapate pen Israel adingin uliante le thukhente-in a pualam nasepna-ah kiseh hi.
Hebron mite sung panin Hashabiah le a sanggamte, siamna a nei mihing tulkhat le zasagih in Jordan nitumna lam Israel tungah Topa’ nasepna khempeuh le kumpipa’ nasepna-ah uk uh hi.
Hebron mite sung panin Jerijah a ukpi ahi hi. (David’ uk a kum sawmlina kumin kikantelna bawl uh a, Gilead gam sung Jazer-ah amaute sung panin siamna lian a nei mihing kimu hi.)

Kumpi David in Jerijah le a sanggamte, siamna a nei mihing tulnih le zasagih, a beh sungah lutang ahite pen Pasian tawh a kisai na khempeuh le kumpipa’ vaite-ah, Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte tungah a uk dingin a seh hi.

Tu-in Israel mite, beh lutangte, a tul le a za-a a ukte le khen khatah mi tul sawmnih le tulli a om, kum tawntung kha khat khit kha khat hong tungin a kuan khia a khente tawh kisai-in na khempeuh ah kumpipa’ na a sem a uliante:
A kha masa sungin Zabdiel’ tapa Jashobeam a khen masa a uk hi a, ama khen sungah mi tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
Amah pen Perez’ suanlekhak hi a, a kha masa sungin galkap a ukte khempeuh a ukpi ahi hi.
A kha nihna sungin Ahoh-te beh Dodai a khen a ukpi hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
A kha thumna sungin siampi Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah a ukpi hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
Hih pa pen mihing sawmthumte sungah a thahat, mihing sawmthumte a uk Benaiah hi a, ama tapa Ammizabad pen ama khen a ukpa ahi hi.
A kha lina sungin Joab sanggampa Asahel hi a, ama nungah amah a laih dingin a tapa Zebadiah om hi. Ama khen sungah mi tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
A kha ngana sungin Izrah-te beh Shamhuth hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
A kha gukna sungin Tekoa khuami Ikkesh’ tapa Ira hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
A kha sagihna sungin Efraim suante sung panin Pelon khuami Helez hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
A kha giatna sungin Jerah mi sung panin Hushah khuami Sibbekai hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
A kha kuana sungin Benjamin mi sung panin Anathoth khuami Abiezer hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
A kha sawmna sungin Zerah mi sung panin Netofah khuami Maharai hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
A kha sawm le khatna sungin Efraim suante sung panin Pirathon khuami Benaiah hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
A kha sawm le nihna sungin Othniel’ suante sung panin Netofah khuami Heldai hi a, ama khen sungah tul sawmnih le tulli om hi.
Israel minamte tungah a ukpite: Reuben mite adingin Zikri’ tapa Eliezer ahi hi. Simeon mite adingin Maakah’ tapa Shefatiah ahi hi.
Levi mite adingin Kemuel’ tapa Hashabiah ahi hi. Aaron mite adingin Zadok ahi hi.
Judah mite adingin David’ sanggamte’ sung panin Elihu ahi hi. Issakhar mite adingin Mikhael’ tapa Omri ahi hi.
Zebulun mite adingin Obadiah’ tapa Ishmaiah ahi hi. Naftali mite adingin Azriel’ tapa Jeremoth ahi hi.
Efraim mite adingin Azariah’ tapa Hoshea ahi hi. Manasseh minam a langte adingin Pedaiah’ tapa Joel ahi hi.
Gilead gam sunga Manasseh minam alangte adingin Zekhariah’ tapa Iddo ahi hi. Benjamin mite adingin Abner’ tapa Jaasiel ahi hi.
Dan mite adingin Jehoram’ tapa Azarel ahi hi. Hihte pen Israel minamte’ makaite ahi uh hi.
Israel mite vantung aksi zahin a tamin a bawlna ding Topa in thu ciam khin ahih manin David in kum sawmnih le a nuaisiah mite sim lo hi.

Zeruiah’ tapa Joab in sim ding kipan a, ahih hangin zo man lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu hangin Israel tungah Pasian’ hehna hong tung a, Kumpi David’ khang tangthu sungah tua a kisimte kikhum lo hi.

Kumpipa’ vanmanpha a ukte: Kumpipa’ vanmanpha koihnate-ah Adiel’ tapa Azmaveth ahi hi. Gam sunga vanmanpha koihnate, khuapi sungate, khuaneute le tausangte sunga omte tungah Uzziah’ tapa Jonathan ahi hi.
Lo khawh nasep a sem mite tungah Khelub’ tapa Ezri ahi hi.
Leenggui lote tungah Ramah khuami Shimei ahi hi. Leenggui lo panin a piang leenggahzu koihnate tungah Shifmoth khuami Zabdi ahi hi.
Shefelah gam sunga om oliv le theithek kungte tungah Gederah khuami Baalhanan ahi hi. Sathau koihnate tungah Joash ahi hi.
Sharon gam sungah a gamta ganhonte tungah Sharon khuami Shitrai ahi hi. Kuam sunga om ganhonte tungah Adlai’ tapa Shafat ahi hi.
Kalaohte tungah Ishmael mi Obil ahi hi. La a nute tungah Meronoth khuami Jehdeiah ahi hi. Tuuhonte tungah Hagri mi Jaziz ahi hi.
Hihte khempeuh pen Kumpi David’ neihsa a kemte ahi hi.
David’ pano Jonathan pen thu thei mi le lai thei mi ahih manin thu lamlak pa ahi hi. Amah le Hakmoni’ tapa Jehiel in kumpipa’ tapate cing uh hi.
Ahithofel pen kumpipa’ thu lamlak pa hi a, Arkhi mi Hushai pen kumpipa’ lawmpa ahi hi.
Ahithofel a sih ciangin Benaiah’ tapa Jehoiada le Abiathar in laih uh hi. Joab pen kumpipa’ galkapte a ukpa ahi hi.

David in Jerusalem-a Israel-te lakah zaneite, minamte sungah zaneite, kumpipa’ na a sem a khente sungah uliante, a tultul a a ukte, a zaza-a a ukte, neihsa khempeuh le kumpipa’ ganhingte le a tapate a kemte pen, kumpi inn-a zaneite, a thahat mite le gal a hang tawntungte khempeuh tawh a khawm hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi David a khe-in dingto-in, “Ka sanggamte le ka mite aw, ka thugen hong za un. Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang ading le i Pasian’ khengak nadingin tawlngakna biakinn khat lam ding ka lungsim sungah om a, a lamna ding ka kiging hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in kei kiangah, ‘Nang pen galhang khat hi-in sisan tampi luangsak na hih manin keima min dingin biakinn na lam thei kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi.

Ahi zongin Israel Topa Pasian in Israel tungah kumpi ahi tawntung dingin ka pa’ innkuan khempeuh panin kei hong teel hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in makai-in Judah teel a, tua ciangin Judah innkuan panin ka pa’ innkuan teel a, tua ciangin ka pa’ tate lak panin Israel khempeuh tungah kumpi-in kei hong bawl ding kei tungah amah lungkim hi.

Tua ciangin ka tapate khempeuh lak panin (bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kei tungah tapa tampi hong pia hi) Israel-te a ukin Topa’ kumpi tokhom tungah a tu dingin amah in ka tapa Solomon teel khin hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, ‘Ka biakinn le a inntualte a bawl ding pa pen na tapa Solomon ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka tapa dingin amah ka teel khin a, kei pen ama pa ka hi ding hi.
Amah in ka thupiaknate le ka biakna ngeina kipte tuni-a mah bangin zuih ding a ngaihsut paisuak nakleh ama kumpi gam ka kipsak tawntung ding hi,’ hong ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note in hih leitang hoih nei-in note’ khit na tate uh tungah gamh-in na nusiat tawntung theih nadingun Topa’ mai-ah kikhopna ahi Israel khempeuh’ muhna le i Pasian’ zakna-ah Topa na Pasian uh thupiaknate khempeuh zui-in zong un.

“Tu-in nang, ka tapa Solomon aw, na pa’ Pasian thei inla, na lungsim khempeuh le utna lungsim tawh ama na sem in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in lungsim sung zong a, ngimna le ngaihsutna khempeuh thei hi. Nangmah in amah na zon le nangmah in amah na mu ding hi. Ahih hangin amah na nusiat leh amah in nang hong paai khia paisuak ding hi.
Biakinn dingin inn khat a lam dingin Topa in nang hong teel khin ahih manin tu-in kingaihsun in; thahat inla sem in,” a ci hi.
