Tua ciangin David in a tapa Solomon tungah biakinn innliim, a innte, a vanmanpha koihnate, a dawl tungnungte, a dei sung nungte le hehpihna tokhom adingin inndei a geelna;
le Topa’ inn a tualte adingin a lungsim ah a ngaihsut khempeuh, a kimkot a inndeite khempeuh, Pasian’ biakinn sung van manpha koihnate le a ki-ap letsongte ading van manpha koihnate;
siampite le Levi mi a khente le Topa’ biakinn sungah nasepna khempeuh ading; Topa’ biakinn sungah nasepna ding umlebeel khempeuh ading,
nasepna-ah zat ding kham tawh kibawl umlebeel khempeuh a gihna, nasepna-ah zat dingin ngun tawh kibawl umlebeelte a gihna,
nasepna-ah meivakkhuam a kizat ciatna bangin kham meivakkhuamte le a meivakte a gihna, a meivakkhuam le meivakte a gihna zah ciat, meivakkhuam khat le a meivakte ngun a gihna,
Ompihna Anlum adingin sabuai kham a gihna ciat, ngun sabuaite adingin ngun a gihna,
le sikkeute, kuangte le haite adingin kham citak a gihna; kham haipite le a gihna ciat, ngun haipite le a gihna ciat;
a kisiangsaksa kham tawh kibawl paknamtui biakna tau ding le a gihna zah ding a geelna; a khate uh zakin Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a khuh kherub-te’ kham leeng ding a geelna zong a pia hi.
Nasep ding khempeuh geelsa bangin sep dingin hih thu tawh kizui-in Topa’ genna bangin lai-in gelhna tawh amah in hihte khempeuh a siangin a hih hi.

Tua ciangin David in a tapa Solomon kiangah, “Thakhauhin hang inla sem in. Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian, keima Pasian nangawn nang tawh hong om hi. Topa’ biakinn sung nasepna khempeuh a kizawh matengin amah in nang hong tamasak lo dinga, hong nusia lo ding hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ biakinn-ah nasep khempeuh a sem dingin siampite le Levi mi a khente om hi. Nasepna khat peuhpeuhah siamna a nei mite in nasepna khempeuh ah nang hong huh ding hi. Uliante le mi khempeuh zong nangma thupiakna bangbangin gamta ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi David in a kikhawm khempeuhte kiangah, “Pasian in amah bek a teelsa ka tapa Solomon pen khangno-in pumpi tawh sinna om nai lo a, nasep ding pen lian mahmah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih biakinn lianpi pen mihing ading hi lo a, Topa Pasian ading ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ka Pasian’ biakinn dingin ka hih theihzah ciang, phuh dingin onik suang, suangpak, mel tuamtuam a nei suang, suangkang le suangmanpha nam khempeuh tampi takte banah kham zatna ding nate-ah kham, ngun zatna ding nate-ah ngun, sumngo zatna ding nate-ah sumngo, sik zatna ding nate-ah sik le sing zatna ding nate-ah sing ka koih khinzo hi.
Tua tham loin, a siangtho biakinn adingin ka koihte khempeuh banah, ngun le kham keima-a’ mahmah zong om a, ka Pasian’ biakinn ka ngaihsutna hangin ka Pasian’ inn-ah ka piakte:
Kawm zut nadingin Ofir gam kham ahi kham talen tulthum le a kisiangsaksa ngun talen tulsagih,

le siamneelte in a hih ding nasepna khempeuh adingin kham zatna ding nate-ah kham le ngun zatna ding nate-ah ngun ahi hi. Kua teng utna lungsim tawh Topa’ tungah tuni-in a mahmah kipia-in ki-ap ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin beh lutangte in utthu-a piakna bawl uh a, minam makaite, a tul tul-a a ukte le a za za-a a ukte le kumpipa’ nasepna-ah a uk uliante in zong hih uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian’ biakinn nasep nadingin kham talen tulnga le kham darik tul sawm, ngun talen tul sawm, sumngo talen tul sawm le tulgiat le sik talen tul zakhat a pia uh hi.
Suangmanpha a nei peuhmah in Gershon mi Jehiel’ kepna sung, Topa’ biakinn sung vanmanpha koihna-ah a pia uh hi.

Tua ciangin hih mite in utna lungsim tawh pia uh ahih manin mite lungdam uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa’ tungah pia ziahziah uh a, kumpi David zong nakpitakin a lungdam hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a kikhawmte khempeuh’ omna-ah David in Topa phat hi. David in, “Nang, Topa, ka pu uh Israel Pasian aw, a tawntungin thupha ngah ta in.

Topa aw, liatna, vangliatna, minthanna, gualzawhna le min liatnate nangma a’ ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh vantung le leitungah a om khempeuh zong nangma a’ ahi hi. Topa aw, kumpi gam nangma a’ hi a, tuate khempeuh tungah nang a lutangin hong kisangsak hi.
Hauhna le minphatna nangma kiang pan hong pai a, nangmah in na khempeuh tungah na uk hi. Na khut sungah vangliatna le minthanna om a, liatsakna ding le thakhauhsakna ding na khut sungah om hi.
Tu-in nangma tungah ka nuam uh hi, kote’ Pasian aw, a minthang na min ka phat uh hi.

“Ahih hangin kote in hih bangin utna tawh kong piak nadingun kei kua hi a, ka mite bang ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh na khempeuh nang kiang pan hong pai hi a, nangma a’ mah nang tungah a hong pia ka hi uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pu ka pate khempeuh uh mah bangin kote pen nangma mai-ah khualmite le pemtate ka hi uh hi. Ka hunte uh leitungah niliim bang hi a, sih ding ka pelh thei kei uh hi.
Topa kote’ Pasian aw, na min siangtho pahtawi nadingin nang ading biakinn lam nadingin ka piaksa uh hih a tampite zong nangma khut sung panin hong pai hi a, a vekpi-in nangma a’ mah ahi hi.

Nangmah in lungsim entelin thumanna-ah na lungkimna ka thei hi, ka Pasian aw. Lungsim thumanna le citna tawh hih nate khempeuh kong pia khin a, tu-in nang tungah citna le lungdamna tawh a hong pia, hih lai-ah a om na mite ka mu zo hi.
Ka pute uh Abraham, Isaac le Israel Pasian, Topa aw, na mite’ lungsim sungah tua bang ngimnate le ngaihsutnate omsak tawntung inla, amaute’ lungsim nangma lamah kai in.

Amah in a lungsim khempeuh tawh na thupiaknate, na teci pannate le na thukhamte kemin a vekpi-in sem a, keimah in ka vaihawmsa biakinn lianpi amah in a lam theih nadingin ka tapa Solomon tungah utna lungsim guan in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in a kikhawmte khempeuh tungah, “Topa na Pasian uh phat un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a kikhawmte khempeuh in a pute a pate uh Pasian Topa phatin a lu uh kun uh a, Topa bia-in kumpipa tungah zahtakna a bawl uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Topa tungah biakpiakna bawl uh a, a zing ciangin Topa tungah meihal biakna bawngtal tulkhat, tuutal tulkhat le tuuno tulkhat, a leenggahzu tawh a biakna teng tawh le Israel khempeuh adingin biakpiakna tampi a pia uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in tua ni-in lungdamna lianpi tawh Topa’ mai-ah pawi khamin a om uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in David’ tapa Solomon kumpi-in a nihveina bawl uh a, amaute in Topa adingin amah kumpi-in sathau nilhin, siampi dingin Zadok sathau a nilh uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pa David tangin Topa’ phuhsa kumpi tokhom tungah kumpi-in Solomon a tu hi. Amah a dau pai a, Israel mi khempeuh in ama thu a mang uh hi.
Makaite khempeuh le a thahat mite le Kumpi David’ tapate khempeuh in zong Kumpi Solomon tungah a thuman ding uh thu ciam uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Israel mi khempeuh muhna-ah Solomon tungah minthanna lianpi pia a, Israel sungah ama ma-in kumpi khat peuhpeuh tungah a kipia ngei nai lo kumpi minliatna a guan hi.
Tua hi a, Jessi’ tapa David in Israel khempeuh tungah a uk hi.
Israel tungah ama uk hun kum sawmli sung hi a, amah in Hebron-ah kum sagih sung, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmthum le thum sung a uk hi.
Tua ciangin a khangham, a ni cing, hauhna le minthanna tawh a si hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Solomon in ama tangin uk hi.
Tu-in Kumpi David’ gamtatna a patna pan a tawpna dongin thumu pa Samuel’ Khang Tangthu sung, kamsang Nathan’ Khang Tangthu sung le thumu pa Gad’ Khang Tangthu sungah
ama ukna le ama vangliatnate khempeuh le ama tung le Israel tung, gam sung kumpi gamte khempeuh tungah a tung thute a kiciamtehna tawh kigelh khawm hi.
David’ tapa Solomon in ama kumpi gam kho takin lenkip hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa ama Pasian in ompih a, a lian mahmahin amah a bawl hi.
Solomon in Israel mi khempeuh tung, a tultul le a zaza-a a ukte tung, thukhente tung, Israel sunga makai khempeuh tung le beh lutangte tungah thu a gen hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon le amah tawh a om khempeuh, Gibeon-a a om mual dawna biakpiakna munah pai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ nasem Moses in gamlakah a bawlsa Pasian’ kikhopna buk tua lai-ah om hi.

(Ahih hangin David in Kiriathjearim panin ama adingin a bawlsak nasa munah Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang paipihto khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Jerusalem-ah ama adingin puanbuk khat lamsak khin hi.)
Tua tham loin Hur’ tapa Uri, a tapa Bezalel in a bawl sumngo biakna tau pen Topa’ biakbuk mai tua lai-ah om hi. Tua ciangin Solomon le a kikhawm mite in Topa thu dong uh hi.
Tua ciangin kikhopna bukah a om Topa’ mai-a sumngo biakna tau-ah Solomon paito-in tua tungah meihal biakna ganhing tulkhat a pia hi.
Tua zanin Solomon tungah Pasian kilangin ama kiangah, “Nang kong piak ding hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Pasian kiangah, “Nangmah in ka pa David tungah a lian le a kip itna na lak khin a, ama tangin kumpi-in keimah nong koih khin hi.
Topa Pasian aw, leitung leivui zahin a tam mite tungah kumpi-in kei hong koih khin na hih manin ka pa David tungah na thuciamna tu-in hong tungsak in.
Hih mite ka uk theih nadingin tu-in pilna le theihna hong pia in; bang hang hiam cih leh hih zahin a tam hih na mite kua in uk zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Pasian in Solomon dawngin, “Hih thu na lungsim sungah om a, nangmah in neihsate, hauhna, pahtawina, ahih kei leh nang hong mudahte’ nuntakna hong ngen loin, a tungah kumpi-in nang kong koihna ka mite na uk theih nadingin nang ading pilna le theihna hong ngen na hih manin,

pilna le theihna nangma tungah hong kipia hi. Nang’ ma-a kumpite kuamah in a neih ngei loh, nang’ khit-ate kuamah in zong tua bang a neih loh ding hauhnate, neihnate le pahtawina zong, nangma tungah kong pia thuah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gibeon-a om mual dawna biakpiakna mun, kikhopna buk mai panin Jerusalem-ah Solomon hong pai hi. Tua ciangin amah in Israel tungah a uk hi.
Solomon in leengte le sakol tung tuangte kaikhawm hi. Amah in leeng tulkhat le zali le sakol tung tuang mi tul sawm le tulnih nei a, leeng khuapite sung le Jerusalem-ah tuate a koih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Jerusalem-ah suang bangin ngun le kham olsak a, taamtak singte pen Shefelah theithek sing bangin tamsak hi.
Solomon in gamdang panin sakol a lakna munte pen Egypt le Kue pan hi a, kumpipa’ sumbawlte in a man ding pia-in Kue panin tuate ngah uh hi.

Amaute in Egypt panin leeng khat ciangin ngun shekel za guk-in la uh a, sakol khat ciangin za le sawmnga-in la uh hi. Tua bangmahin amaute in zuak khiatkik dingin Hit kumpite le Syria kumpite khempeuh tung panin zong sakol le leeng a la uh hi.
Tu-in Solomon in Topa’ min dingin biakinn khat le ama adingin kumpi inn khat lam ding sawm hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in van a pua ding mi tul sawmsagih le mual tung gamah suang a to ding mi tul sawmgiat le tuate a van dingin mi tulthum le zaguk a seh hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Taia kumpi Hiram kiangah thu puak a, “Tenna ding inn khat a lam nadingin ka pa David tungah taamtak sing na puak mah bangin kei tungah zong hong puak in.

En in, Israel-te adingin a tawntung ading a kikipsaksa bangin, ama mai-ah a namtui nate ahi paknamtui halna ding le Ompihna Anlum piak tawntungna ding le Sabbath nite, Khadet nite le Topa kote’ Pasian adingin a kisehsa pawi nite-in zing le nitakin meihal biaknate piak nadingin Topa ka Pasian’ minin biakinn khat lamin ama tungah a ap ding ka hi hi.
Kote’ Pasian pen pasian dang khempeuh sangin lian zaw ahih manin ka lam ding biakinn zong lian ding hi.

Ahih hangin vantung, a sang pen vantung nangawn in amah huam zo lo ahih manin ama adingin kua in biakinn lam zo ding ahi hiam? Ama mai-ah paknamtui halna ding cih sim loh ama adingin biakinn a lamsak dingin kei kua ka hi hiam?

Tua hi a, tu-in ka pa David in a sehsa, Judah le Jerusalem-ah kei tawh a om nasep siamte tawh a semkhawm dingin kham, ngun, sumngo le sik le a ausan, a dupsan, puandumte le nasepna-ah zong siamna a nei mi khat hong puak in.

Taamtak, taaksan le cingsing zong, Lebanon panin hong puak in; bang hang hiam cih leh na nasemte in Lebanon sing phuk dingzia a theihna ka thei hi. Tua ahih ciangin kei adingin sing tampi a sem dingin nangma nasemte pen keima nasemte tawh om ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka lam ding biakinn pen lianin lamdang ding hi.
Sing nasem sing a phukte adingin a kisuvui mangbuh beem tul sawmnih, mangbuhham beem tul sawmnih, leenggahzu tambong tul sawmli le sathau tambong tul sawmli kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Taia kumpipa Hiram in lai-in thuk-in Solomon kiangah khak a, “Topa in a mite it ahih manin amaute tungah kumpi-in nang hong koih hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a lai sungah genthuah lai a, “Topa adingin biakinn khat le ama adingin kumpi inn khat a lam ding, thutheihna le thutelna tawh a kidim mipil, David tungah a pia, van le lei a bawl Israel Topa Pasian in thupha ngah tahen.

Tu-in Dan minam numei khat’ tapa, thutelna tawh a kidim, siamna a nei, siapa Huram kong puak hi. Ama pa pen Taia khuami ahi hi. Amah in kham, ngun, sumngo, sik le sing le a ausan, a dum le a dupsan puante le saihadial puan le zepna nam khempeuh a sem ding le ka topa ahi na pa David’ mi khutsiamte tawh a semkhawm dingin ama tungah a kipia nasep khat peuhpeuh a sem dingin siamna a neisa ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka topa in a gensa mangbuh le mangbuhham, sathau le leenggahzute, na nasemte tungah hong puak in.

Tua ciangin na kisap sing peuhmah Lebanon panin kong phuk ding uh a, nangmah in Jerusalem-ah na puaktoh theih nadingin phongin tuipi tungah Joppa dong nang kiangah kong paipih ding uh hi,” zong ci lai hi.
Tua ciangin a pa David in mi phazah a sim mah bangin, Solomon in Israel gam sunga om gamdang mi phazah simna bawl a, mi tul zakhat le tul sawmnga le tulthum le zaguk pha hi.
Amah in van a pua dingin amaute tul sawmsagih, mual tung gamah suang a to dingin tul sawmgiat le mite’ nasep a van dingin tulthum le zaguk a seh hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Jerusalem sung Moriah Mual tung, a pa David’ tungah Topa a kilahna mun, David in a sehnasa mun ahi, Jebus mi Ornan’ ancilna phualah Topa’ biakinn lam ding kipan hi.
Amah in ama uk a kum lina a kha nihna sungin lam ding kipan hi.
Pasian’ biakinn lamna ding Solomon’ geelna hih bang ahi hi: A dung pi sawmkua hi a, a vai pi sawmthum ahi hi.
Inn mai-a innliim pen inn vai tawh kikimin pi sawmthum sau a, a sanna zong pi sawmthum mah ahi hi.
Amah in taaksan tawh innpi kawm dapin kham hoih tawh zut a, tua tungah nisuh le khainiang a bawl hi.
Amah in suangmanpha phutin a inn zem hi. A kham zatte Parvaim kham ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in a inn, a innsunte, a sangkilte, a kawmte le a kongkhakte kham tawh zut a, tua ciangin a kawmte tungah kherub-te a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah in siangtho pen mun bawl hi. A dung pen a vai tawh kizui-in pi sawmthum hi a, a vai zong pi sawmthum mah ahi hi. Amah in kham hoih talen zaguk tawh a zut hi.
A kilhnate a gihna kham shekel sawmnga ahi hi. Tua ciangin amah in a inn dawl tungnungte kham tawh a zut hi.
Amah in siangtho pen mun sungah sing kherub nih bawlin kham tawh tuate zut hi.
Tua kherub tegel’ kha a kizalin pi sawmthum ahi hi. A khat’ kha pen pi sagih le alang hi-in inn kawm ban a, tua ciangin alang khat pi sagih le alang in a kherub dang khat’ kha ban hi.
Tua mah bangin a kherub dang khat’ kha langkhat zong pi sagih le alang hi-in inn kawm langkhat ban a, pi sagih le alang mah a sau a kha langkhat pen a kherub masa’ kha tawh kizom hi.
Hih kherub-te’ khate in pi sawmthum huam hi. Kherub-te amau’ khe-in dingin innpi sunglam nga uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a dum, a ausan le a dupsan puante le saihadial puan tawh a dalna puan bawl a, tua tungah kherub-te a bawl hi.
Amah in inn mai sanah pi sawmnga le pi nih le alang a sang, a dawn tuakah pi sagih le alang a pha khuamluzepna a nei khuampi nih bawl hi.
Amah in ngawng a awhte bangin khainiangte bawlin khuampite dawnah khai hi. Tua ciangin amah in mang kawlsing zakhat bawlin khainiangte tungah koih hi.
Amah in tua khuamte, khat leitaw lam, a khat leilu lam, biakinn mai-ah phut hi. Amah in leitaw lama om pen Jakhin phuakin, leilu lama om pen Boaz a phuak hi.
Amah in sumngo biakna tau, a dung pi sawmthum, a vai pi sawmthum, a sang pi sawm le nga a pha khat bawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kisung tuikuangpi khat zong bawl hi. Tua pen a bem hi a, a gei khat pan a gei khat dong pi sawm le nga pha-in, pi sagih le alang sang a, a kimkot pi sawmli le nga a pha hi.
Tuikuangpi pualam kimkot pi sawmli le pi nga sungah umgah limte om hi. Tua um gahte gual nihin om a, tuikuangpi a kisunin kisungkhawm pah hi.

Bawngtal sawm le nihte tungah tua tuikuangpi kinga a, thum leilu lam nga a, thum nitumna lam nga-in, thum leitaw lam nga a, thum nisuahna lam nga hi. Tuate tungah a tuikuangpi kinga a, a nunglam uh a sunglamah om hi.
A sahna pen khutpeek mai cia ahi hi; a geivial pen unok tawh a kibang hai geivial bangin kibawl a, tua sungah tui tambong tulguk val ta hi.

Amah in kisilna ding tuikuang dang sawm zong bawl a, leitaw lamah nga, leilu lamah nga a koih hi. Amaute in meihal biakna-a a zatte uh hihte sungah silsiang ding uh a, tuikuangpi pen siampite’ kisilna ding ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kigelhsa bangin kham meivakkhuam sawm bawl a, biakinn sung leitaw lamah nga, leilu lamah nga a koih hi.
Amah in sabuai sawm zong bawl a, biakinn sung leitaw lampangah nga, leilu lampangah nga koih hi. Tua ciangin amah in kham kuang zakhat bawl hi.
Amah in siampite’ inntual le inntual lian le inntual kongkhakte bawl a, a kongkhakte sumngo tawh a zut hi.
Tua ciangin amah in inn khang nisuahna lam kiu-ah tuikuangpi koih hi.
Huram in beelte, kawbiate le kuangte zong bawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin Huram in Kumpi Solomon adingin Pasian’ biakinn a bawl nasep a zawhte:
Khuampi nihte, kuang-ukte le a khuampite lu dawnah a om khuamluzepna nihte, khuampite lu dawnah a om khuamluzepna, kuang-uk nihte a tuam dingin ngen bangin a kibawl nihte,
khuampite tungah a om khuamluzepna kuang-uk nihte a tuam dingin ngen banga kibawl khat adingin mang kawlsing gual nih ahi ngen banga kibawl nihte adingin mang kawlsing za lite,
tuikuang a kingaknate le tuate tungah a kikoih tuikuangte,
tuikuangpi khat le tua nuai-a a om bawngtal sawm le nihte,
Topa’ biakinn dingin Kumpi Solomon adingin siapa Huram in a kihal sumngo tawh a bawl beelte, kawbiate, sikkeukate le hihte adingin nazat khempeuh ahi hi.
Jordan zanglei sung Sukkoth le Zeredah kikal beel lei-ah kumpipa in hihte sungsak hi.
Solomon in hih nate tampi tak bawlsak a, sumngo a gikzah kithei zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in Pasian’ biakinn sunga na khempeuh a bawl sakte: Kham biakna tau, Ompihna Anlum adingin sabuaite,
a kigelhsa bangin biakinn sung nung mai-ah vak dingin kham citak meivakkhuamte le a meivakte;
kham hoih pen tawh a kibawl a paakte, a meivakte le a tehte;

kham citak tawh a kibawl a taitehte, kuangte, paknamtui adingin pakante le vutluahna ahi hi. Siangtho pen mun pai nading kongkhak sung nungte ading le biakinnpi sung kongkhakte adingin biakinn kongkhak bilte zong kham tawh a kibawl ahi hi.

Tua bangin TOPA' biakinn ding a hih nasep khempeuh kizo hi. Tua ciang in a pa David in a apsa nate Solomon in paipihin, Pasian' biakinn sung vanmanpha koihnate sungah a ngunte, a khamte, le umlebeel khempeu a seng hi.
Tua ciangin Zion a kici David khuapi sung panin TOPA' thuciamna Sinkuang a paipih to dingin Kumpi Solomonin Israel upate, minam lutang khempeuh, le Israel beh makaite, Jerusalem-ah kaikhawm hi.
Tua ciangin a kha sagihna-a pawi hun sungin kumpipa’ mai-ah Israel mi khempeuh kikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel upate khempeuh hong pai uh a, Levi mite in Thuciamna Singkuang la uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Thuciamna Singkuang le kikhopna buk le puanbuk sunga om a siangtho umlebeel khempeuh puato uh a, siampite le Levi mite in tuate puato uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon le ama mai-ah a kikhawm Israel-te khempeuh Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah om uh a, biakna-in tuu le bawngtal tampi tak pia uh ahih manin a phazah kisim zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin siampite in kherub-te’ kha nuai, siangtho pen mun sung, biakinn sung nung sung ama munah
Kherub-te in Thuciamna Singkuang tungah a khate uh zak uh ahih manin kherub-te pen Thuciamna Singkuang le a zawlte tungah khuhna khat a suak uh hi.
A zawlte sau ahih manin siangtho mun panin biakinn sung nung mai-ah a mongte kidawk a, ahih hangin a pualam panin kimu thei lo hi; tuni dongin tua lai-ah tuate om hi.
Egypt panin amaute hong pai khiat lai-in
Siangtho mun panin siampite hong pusuakin (bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ pawlte cihtuam om loin tua lai-a om siampite khempeuh amau mahmah kisiansuah uh hi.

Tua ciangin Levi mi lasate Asaf, Heman le Jeduthun, amau’ tapate le a behte, saihadial puan tawh kizemin, daltuahte, harp lasaknate le laiza lasaknate tawi-in peengkul tum siampite za le sawmnih tawh biakna tau nisuahna lamah ding khawm uh hi.
Aw kikhatin phatin “Topa’ tungah lungdam koh ding hoih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi,” ci-in
meii hangin siampite in na sem zo lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh
Tua ciangin Solomon in, “Khuamial sahpi sungah ten ding a teel Topa aw,
a tawntungin na tenna ding a lian biakinn khat hih lai-ah kong lamsak khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in en kawikawi a, Israel mi a kikhawmte khempeuh a din laitakin amaute khempeuh thupha a pia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Egypt gam panin ka mite ka pai khiatpih ni a kipanin keima min a om nadingin Israel minam khempeuh sungah biakinn khat lamna ding khuapi khat zong ka teel kei a, keima mi Israel tungah kumpi dingin mi khat zong ka teel kei hi. Ahih hangin tu-in ka min a om theih nadingin Jerusalem teelin ka mi Israel-te tungah a uk dingin David ka teel khinta hi,’ ci-in genin, ka pa David tungah a kam tawh a thuciamna a khut tawh a tungsak Israel Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah tahen.
“Tu-in Israel Pasian, Topa’ min dingin biakinn khat lam ding ka pa David’ lungsim sungah om hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in ka pa David tungah, ‘Na lungsimah keima min dingin biakinn khat lam ding na ngaihsun a, tua na ngaihsutna hoih mahmah hi.
Ahi zongin keima min dingin tua biakinn a lam ding pa nangmah hi loin, nangma sung pan hong piang ding na tapa hizaw ding hi,’ ci hi.

“Tu-in Topa in a bawlsa thuciamna tungsak khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ thuciam bangin ka pa David munah hong khangin Israel kumpi tokhomah kong tu a, Israel Pasian, Topa’ min dingin biakinn ka lam khin hi.
Amah in Israel mite tawh a bawl Topa’ thuciamna a kikoihna Thuciamna Singkuang tu-in tua lai-ah ka koih khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh’ omna Topa’ biakna tau mai-ah Solomon dingin a khut zan hi.

Solomon in a dung pi sagih le alang, a vai pi sagih le alang, a sang pi li le alang a pha sumngo tau khat bawlin inntualah a koih khin hi. Tua ciangin tua tungah amah ding hi. Tua ciangin Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh’ muhin amah khukdinin van lamah a khut zan hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon in thu ngen a, “Israel Pasian, Topa aw, vantungah ahi a, leitungah ahi zongin thuciamna lenin a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh nangma thu hong mang na nasemte tungah itna kip a lak, nang tawh a kibang Pasian dang om lo hi.
Ama tungah na gensa bangin na nasem ka pa David tungah a tungsak pa na hi hi. Na kam tawh thu na gen a, na khut tawh tuni-in na tungsak takpi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel Pasian, Topa aw, ama tungah thu ciamin, ‘Keima thu na hong man bangin na suan na khakte in ka thukham zui-in a gamtatna uhah a kidop nak-uhleh Israel kumpi tokhom tungah a tu dingin keima mai-ah mi khat beek na kitasam kei ding hi,’ na cihsa bangin na nasem ka pa David tawh na thuciamsa kipsak in.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel Pasian, Topa aw, na nasem pa David tungah na gensa na kammal kipsak in.
“Ahih hangin Pasian pen mite tawh leitungah hong teeng takpi ding ahi hiam? En in, vantung le a sang pen vantung in nang hong huam zo lo hi; hih keima lamsa biakinn in hong huam zo lo zaw kan ding!
Ahi zongin na nasem pa’ thungetna le hong thumna don in, Topa ka Pasian aw, na nasem pa na mai-ah hong kikona le a hong nget thungetna hong ngai in.
Na nasem pa in hih mun lamah hong thungetna na zak theih nadingin nangmah in na min koih nadingin na ciamsa mun hih biakinn lam sun le zanin hong en in.
Amaute in hih mun lam nga-in thu hong nget uh ciangin na nasem pa le na mi Israel-te’ hong thumnate nangmah in ngai in. Na tenna mun vantung panin hong za takpi inla, na zak ciangin hong maisak in.
“Mi khat a veengte tungah khialin kiciamna kiciamsak a, hong pai-in hih biakinn sung na biakna tau mai-ah a kiciamna hong kiciam leh,
vantung panin za-in gamta inla, na nasemte thu khenin, a mawh mi a gamtatna ama lu tung mahah tusakin thuk inla, a thuman mi a thumanna tawh kizui-in thaman piakna tawh langsak in.
“Na mi Israel-te nang tungah hong khialhna hangin a galte uh mai-ah guallelin, amaute hong kiheikikin na min hong phawkin hih biakinn sung nangma kiangah thu ngenin thumna hong bawl uh ciangin,
vantung panin nangmah in za inla, na mi Israel-te’ khialhna maisakin amaute le a pu a pate uh tungah na piak leitangah amaute paipihkik in.

“Amaute nangma tungah hong khialhna hangin vantung kikhak cipin guah a zuk loh hun, amaute na gimsak hun ciangin, amaute in hih mun lam nga-in thu ngen a, na min hong phawkin amau’ khialhna panin a kihei uh leh,
amaute a pai nading lampi hoih hilh inla, vantung panin za-in na nasem, na mi Israel-te’ khialhna maisak in. Tua ciangin na mite tungah gamh-in na piak leitang tungah guah zusak in.

“Gam sungah kialpi tungin, pulnatna ahi a, ankung natna ahi a, ankung zawngkhalna ahi a, kauphe ahi a, lung ahi zongin a om a, amau’ khuapi khat peuhpeuhah a galte un umcihin, bangbang gimna, bangbang natna hitaleh,

mi khatpeuh ahi a, na mi Israel-te khempeuh in ahi zongin amau’ natna le a dahna ciat uh thei-in hih biakinn lamah a khut uh hong zanin bangbang thungetna hitaleh bangbang thumna hitaleh hong bawl uhleh,

na tenna mun vantung panin za inla, maisakin, amau’ gamtatna khempeuh tawh kizui-in a lungsim uh na theih bangin amaute tungah pia ciat in (bang hang hiam cih leh nang, nang bek in mihing’ lungsim na thei hi).
Tua hileh ka pu ka pate uh tungah na piak leitang tungah a nuntak hun sung khempeuh uh amaute in nang hong zahtakin nangma thu hong zui ding uh hi.
“Tua mah bangin na mi Israel ahi lo gamdang mi khat a lian nangma min hang le nangma thahatna hangin a gamlapi gam panin hong pai-in, hih biakinn lam nga-in thu hong nget leh

na tenna mun vantung panin za inla, gamdang mipa in na tungah hong ngetna khempeuh tawh kizui-in hih in. Tua hileh nangma mi Israel-te mah bangin leitung mi khempeuh in na min thei-in nang hong zahtak ding uh a, keima lamsa hih biakinn pen nangma min tawh a kilo ahihna thei ding uh hi.

“A galte uh a do dingin na mite kuan khia-in, bangbang lamah amaute sawl hita lecin, nangmah in na teelsa hih khuapi, nangma tung le nangma min dingin ka lamsa hih biakinn lam nga-in amaute in thu hong nget uhleh,
amau’ hong thungetna le hong thumnate vantung panin za-in amau’ vai huh in.
“Amaute nang tungah hong khialin (a khial lo kua om ahi hiam?) amaute tungah nang heh a, galte tungah amaute pia-in, amaute a gamla gam ahi a, a nai-ah ahi zongin galmatin kipuakhia a,

ahi zongin galmatin a kipuakna gamah amaute in a lungsim sung uhah tua thu ngaihsunin kisikkik a, ‘Kote khialin lampialin ka gitloh tat uh hi,’ ci-in amaute galmatin a omna uh gam panin nang tungah hong thum a,

amaute galmatin a kitutna, galmatin a omna uh leitangah a ngaihsutna khempeuh uh le a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amaute kisikkikin, na teelsa khuapi le nangma min dingin ka lamsa biakinn, nangmah in amau’ pute pate tungah na piak amau’ leitang lam nga-in thu hong nget uh leh,
na tenna vantung panin amau’ thungetna le hong thumnate za inla, amau’ vai huhin nang tungah hong khial na mite maisak in.
“Ka Pasian aw, tu-in na mit hak inla, hih lai mun a thungetna na bil hong ngat in.
Tu-in ding in, Topa Pasian aw, na tawlngakna ding munah na vangliatna lim Thuciamna Singkuang tawh pai in. Topa Pasian aw, na siampite, thupha pia inla, na hoihna-ah na mi siangthote lungdam tahen.
Topa Pasian aw, na sathau nilh pa nial kei in. Na nasem pa David na itnasa hong phawk in,” a ci hi.
Solomon a thunget a tawp ciangin, vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin meihal biakna le biakpiaknate kaangtum a, tua ciangin Topa’ minthanna vang biakinn sung hong dim hi.
Topa’ minthanna vang biakinn dim ahih manin Topa’ biakinn sungah siampite lut thei lo uh hi.

Israel mite khempeuh in meikuang hong paisukin Topa’ minthanna vang biakinn tungah a om a muh uh ciangin suangphah tungah leilam maingatin kun uh a, Pasian bia-in Topa’ tungah lungdamna ko-in, “Topa’ tungah lungdam koh ding hoih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa le mi khempeuh in Topa’ mai-ah biakna pia uh hi.
Kumpi Solomon in biakna-in bawngtal tul sawmnih le tulnih le tuu tul zakhat le tul sawmnih pia hi. Tua bangin kumpipa le mi khempeuh in Pasian’ biakinn a ap uh hi.

Siampite amau panmun uhah ding uh hi. Levi mite zong, Kumpi David in Topa tungah lungdam koh nadingin a bawl Topa’ tungah lasakna ding lasaknate tawh ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi. David in amau’ nasepna tawh phatnate a bawl ciangin tua bangin hih uh hi. Amaute tawh a kigalsai-ah siampite in peengkulte tum uh a, Israel mi khempeuh zong a ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon in Topa’ biakinn mai-ah a om inntual laizang ap hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Solomon in a bawl sumngo biakna tau-ah meihal biakna le a thaute ta zo lo ahih manin tua lai munah amah in meihal biakna le thunuama biakna thaute a pia hi.
Tua hun laitakin Solomon le amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh mihon tampi in Hamath lutna panin Egypt lui ciang dongah ni sagih sung pawi a kham uh hi.
Tua ciangin a ni giat ni-in amaute in a thukhupna khat nei uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in biakinn apna ni sagih sung pawi kham uh a, tua pawi ni sagih sung kibawl hi.
A kha sagihna a ni thum ni-in, Topa in David le Solomon le ama mi Israel tungah a hoih a bawlna hangin amah in lungdamna le kipakna tawh a inn uhah mite a ciahsak hi.
Tua bangin Solomon in Topa’ biakinn le kumpi inn zo hi. Solomon in Topa’ biakinn le ama inn sungah hih dinga a geel khempeuh nuamtakin zo hi.
Tua ciangin zanin Solomon tungah Topa kilangin ama kiangah, “Na thungetna ka za khin a, keima-a’ dingin biakpiakna inn dingin hih mun ka teel khin hi.
Keimah in vantungte khakcipin guah a zuk loh ciang ahi a, gam sung a netum dingin kauphe thu ka piak ciang ahi a, ka mite lakah natna ka tunsak ciang ahi zongin,

keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau’ gitlohnate panin a kihei uhleh, keimah in vantung panin ka za dinga, amaute’ khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsakkik ding hi.
Tu-in ka mitte hakin hih lai munah a kingen thungetna ka bilte in ngai ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a tawntungin ka min a om theih nadingin keimah in hih biakinn teelin ka ap khin a, ka mit tawh enin ka lungsim a tawntungin tua lai-ah om ding hi.
Nang adingin ahihleh, na pa David a gamtat bangin keima mai-ah na gamtat a, nang kong sawl khempeuh bangin semin, ka thukhamte le ka biakna ngeina kipte na zuih leh,
na pa David tawh kiciamin, ‘Israel a uk dingin mi khat zong na kitasam kei ding hi,’ ka cih bangin na kumpi tokhom ka kipsak ding hi.
Ahih hangin note kihei-in, na mai uhah ka koihsa ka thukhamte le ka thupiaknate nusia a, pai-in pasian dangte’ na semin tuate na biak uhleh,

note’ tungah kong piaksa leitang panin note kong bot khia ding hi. Tua ciangin ka min dingin ka apsa hih biakinn ka muhna panin ka lawn khia dinga, mi khempeuh lakah paunak le gentehna ka suaksak ding hi.
“Tua ciangin a minthangsa hih biakinn a nawkkha khempeuh in lamdangsa-in, ‘Bang hangin hih bangin Topa in hih gam le hih biakinn bawl ahi hiam?’ ci ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, ‘Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt gam panin amaute a pai khiatpih a pu a pate uh Pasian ahi Topa amaute in nusia uh a, pasian dangte pom uh a, tuate bia-in a na sem uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in hih bang siatna khempeuh amaute tungah tungsak hi,’ ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Solomon in Topa’ biakinn le ama inn a lam khit kum sawmnih a cin ciangin,
Kumpi Hiram in ama tungah a piaksa khuapite Solomon in lampha-in tuate sungah Israel mite tengsak hi.
Tua ciangin Hamathzobah-ah Solomon pai-in tua gam a la hi.
Amah in sehnel gam sungah Tadmor khua satin Hamath gam sungah vankoihna khuapite khempeuh a lam hi.
Amah in khuapi kulh, kongpite le zawlte a nei Bethhoron Tungnung le Bethhoron Nuainung,

le Baalath le Solomon’ neih vankoihna khuapite khempeuh, a leengte ading khuapite khempeuh, a sakol tuangte ading khuapite le Solomon in Jerusalem, Lebanon sung le ama ukna gam sung khempeuh ah a lamnop khempeuh zong a lam hi.
Israel ahi lo Hit mite, Amor mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite sung panin a omlai,
Israel mite in a suksiat nai loh amau nungah a suanlekhakte uh tua gam sungah a omlaite, Solomon in aana tawh siah a pia dingin bawl a, tua bangin tuni dongin amaute om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mite ahihleh Solomon in ama na a sem dingin salin bawl lo hi. Amaute pen galkapte, ama nuai-ah uliante, a leengte a ukte le a sakol tung tuangte ahi uh hi.
Kumpi Solomon’ ulian, mite’ tungah aana a zang mihing zanih le sawmnga a om uh hi.

Solomon in David khuapi panin Faro’ tanu ama zi paipihin ama a’ dingin a lamsak inn-ah tunpih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a tunnasa munte a siangtho ahih manin Israel kumpi David’ inn sungah ka zi teeng lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Sabbath nite, Khadet nite le kum simin a kinei pawi thum - silngo sawh loh anlum pawi, nipikal pawi le biakbuk pawite adingin Moses’ thupiakna tawh kizui-in nisimin piakna nasep ding a kisam ahih mah bangin innliim mai-a a lam Topa’ biakna tau tungah Solomon in meihal biakna Topa tungah a pia hi.

A pa David’ biakna ngeina kip tawh kizui-in, nasep nadingin siampite a pawlpawlin a kikhennate le nisim nasepna-ah a kisam bangin siampite’ mai-ah Levi mite phatna la sak panmunte le kongpi tampite-a’ dingin kongcingte amau’ pawl kikhenna ciatah amah in seh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua bangin Pasian’ mipa David in thupia hi.
Thu khat peuhpeuh le vanmanpha koihnate tawh kisai-in kumpipa in siampite le Levi mite a thupiakna bang teekteekin amaute in a sem uh hi.
Tua bangin Topa’ biakinnpi a kiphuh ni a kipan a kizawh dongin Solomon’ nasep khempeuh kimansiang hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ biakinn kizo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Edom gam sung tuipi gei-a om Eziongeber le Eloth khuate-ah Solomon pai hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Hiram in teembawte le tuipi a thei a nasemte tawh ama nasemte sawl a, Solomon’ nasemte tawh Ofir-ah paikhawmin tua lai panin kham talen zali le sawmnga pua-in Kumpi Solomon kiang a tunpih uh hi.

Tu-in Sheba kumpinu in Solomon’ minthanna a zak ciangin thudotna haksate tawh a ze-et dingin Jerusalem-ah hong pai a, nungzui honpi le a namtui nate le kham tampi le suangmanphate a pua kalaohte hong keng hi. Solomon kiangah amah hong tun ciangin a lungsim a om khempeuh ama tungah gen hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in ama dotna khempeuh dawng hi. Solomon in ama tungah a gentel theih loh haksa lua a sak bangmah om lo hi.
Sheba kumpinu in Solomon’ pilna, a lamsa inn,
a sabuai-ah a an, a uliante’ omzia le a nasemte’ etna zia le a puansilhte, a anpiate le a puansilhte le Topa’ biakinn-ah a piak a meihal biaknate a muh khit ciangin a lungsim a bei hi.
Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka gam sung panin nangma thute le na pilna ka zak a kigen thute a man hi.
Ahih hangin kei hong pai-in ka mit in a muh matengin a kigen thute ka um kei hi. A taktakin, na pilna alang zong kei kiangah hong kigen lo ahi hi. Ka zaksa thute sangin na thupi zaw hi.
Na zite hampha mahmah hi. Na mai-ah ding tawntungin na pilna a za hih na nasemte hampha mahmah hi.

Na tungah lungkimin Topa na Pasian adingin kumpi-in a kumpi tokhom tungah nang hong tusak Topa na Pasian in thupha ngah tahen! Na Pasian in Israel mite itin a tawntungin amaute kipsak ding ahih manin, nangmah in thutang le thuman na sepkhiat theih nadingin amaute tungah kumpi-in nang hong koih hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa tungah kham talen zakhat le sawmnih le a namtui nate tampi tak le suangmanphate a pia hi. Sheba kumpinu in Kumpi Solomon tungah a piak tua banga a namtui nate zahin a hoih om ngei lo hi.
Tua tham loin Ofir panin kham hong pua Kumpi Hiram’ nasemte le Solomon’ nasemte in cingsing le suangmanphate hong pua uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Topa’ biakinn le kumpi inn-a cingsing kahlei ding le lasate-a’ dingin laiza lasaknate le harp lasaknate-in zong a bawl hi. Tua hun ma-in Judah gam sungah tua bang kimu ngei lo hi.

Tua ciangin kumpinu in amah a puakte a thuhna-in letsong a piakte banah, a deih khempeuh, a nget khempeuh, Sheba kumpinu tungah Solomon in a pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kihei-in a nasemte tawh ama gamah a ciahkik hi.
Tu-in kum khat sungin Solomon tungah a tung kham a gihna talen zaguk le sawmguk le guk hi a,
sumbawlte le sumbukte’ tutte a kisim lo ahi hi. Arabia kumpite khempeuh le gam sung a ukte in Solomon kiangah kham le ngun puak uh hi.
Kumpi Solomon in kham a kiseek lumpi zanih bawl hi; lum khat ciangin a kiseek kham shekel zaguk bei hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kiseek kham lum zathum bawl hi; lum khat ciangin kham shekel zathum bei hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in Lebanon Tulak Inn sungah tuate koih hi.
Kumpipa in saiha kibawl kumpi tokhom a lian khat zong bawl a, kham citak tawh zut hi.
Kumpi tokhom in cial guk le kham a kibawl khengakna khat nei-in, tuate kumpi tokhom tawh kimat a, a tutna pang tuakah ban ngaknate le a ban ngaknate pangah humpinelkai nih dinga,
kahlei cial guk mong ciatah khat ciat, humpinelkai sawm le nih ding hi. Kumpi gam khat peuhpeuhah tua tawh a kibang kibawl ngei lo hi.
Kumpi Solomon’ dawnna haite khempeuh kham hi a, Lebanon Tulak Inn sunga umlebeelte khempeuh zong kham citak ahi hi. Solomon’ hun lai-in ngun bangmahin kingaihsun lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpi Hiram’ nasemte tawh kumpipa’ teembawte, Tarshish-ah pai hi. Tarshish teembawte kum thum simin khatvei hong tungin kham, ngun, saiha, zawngmaw le utong hong puak zel hi.
Tua bangin kumpi Solomon in hauhna le pilna tawh leitung kumpi khempeuh khumkhelh hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama lungsim sungah a koihsak pilna a za dingin leitung kumpi khempeuh in Solomon’ omna hong zong uh hi.
Amaute khempeuh in a letsong ciat uh, ngun le kham tawh a kibawl nate, puante, myrrh paknamtuite, a namtui nate, sakolte le la-sakolte, a kum kumin tampi tak hong puak uh hi.
Solomon in sakolte le leengte adingin buk tulli le sakol tung tuang mi tul sawm le tulnih nei a, leeng khuapite sungah pawlkhat koih a, Jerusalem khua ama kiangah pawlkhat koih hi.
Amah in Eufratis panin Filistia gam ciang le Egypt gamgi ciang dong kumpi khempeuh a uk hi.
Kumpipa in Jerusalem-ah suang bangin ngun olsak a, Shefelah theithek sing bangin taamtak sing tamsak hi.
Solomon adingin Egypt le gam khempeuh panin sakolte kila hi.

Tu-in Solomon’ gamtatna a omlaite, a kipatna pan a tawp dong, Kamsang Nathan’ Tangthu sung le Shiloh Khua Mi Ahijah’ Thugen Kholhna sung le Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam thu tawh kisai-in Thumu pa Iddo’ Maangmuhna sungah kigelh hi.
Solomon in Jerusalem panin Israel khempeuh tungah kum sawmli sung uk hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon si a, a pa David khuapi sungah kivui hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Rehoboam in ama tangin a uk hi.
Amah kumpi a suaksak dingin Israel khempeuh Shekhem-ah pai ahih manin Shekhem-ah Rehoboam pai hi.
Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam in tua thu a zak ciangin (bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpi Solomon kiang panin a taina Egypt-ah amah omlai hi), Egypt panin Jeroboam hong ciahkik hi.
Amaute in mi sawlin amah samkik uh a, tua ciangin Jeroboam le Israel khempeuh hong pai-in Rehoboam kiangah,
“Na pa in hong gimbawlin vangik hong suan hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na pa’ nasep haksa le kote’ vangik hong zangsak inla, kote in nangma na kong sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Ni thum sung a hun hong pia unla, tua ciangin hong paikik un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in a pa Solomon a nuntak lai-a a mai-ah a ding khangham mite thu kuppih a, “Hih mite ka dawnna ding ngaihsutna hong bangci piak na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Hih mite tungah nang dik inla, amaute lungkimsakin amaute tungah kam hoih pau lecin, amaute nangma nasem hi tawntung ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin khanghamte in a piak ngaihsutna nusia-in, amah tawh a khangkhawm, ama mai-ah a ding khangnote thu a kuppih hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Kei kiangah, ‘Na pa in kote tungah hong suat vangik zangsak in,’ a hong ci hih mite i dawnna ding bang ngaihsutna hong pia na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah tawh a khangkhawm khangnote in ama kiangah, “Nangma kiangah, ‘Na pa in vangik hong suan hi; ahih hangin kote adingin hong zangsak in,’ hong ci hih mite kiangah hih bangin gen in, ‘Ka khutmeno pen ka pa’ kawng sangin lian zaw hi.

Tu-in ka pa in note tungah vangik hong suatna-ah keimah in na vangik uh ka behlap ding hi. Ka pa in ciang tawh note hong thuhilh hi; ahih hangin keimah in ciang lingnei tawh note kong thuhilh ding hi,’ ci in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in, “Kei kiangah ni thum ni-in hong paikik un,” a cih mah bangin Jeroboam le mi khempeuh a ni thum ni-in Rehoboam kiangah hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in amaute ngawh dawnin, khangham mite’ ngaihsutna nusia a,

“Ka pa in note vangik hong suan hi; ahih hangin keimah in kong behlap lai ding hi. Ka pa in ciang tawh note hong thuhilh hi; ahih hangin keimah in ciang lingnei tawh note kong thuhilh ding hi,” ci-in khangnote’ ngaihsut piakna bangin Kumpi Rehoboam in amaute kiangah a gen hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in hih mite’ thu ngai lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Shiloh mi Ahijah’ tungtawnin Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam tungah a thugente Topa in a tunsak theih nadingin Pasian in a piansak thu kiheina ahi hi.

Kumpipa in amaute’ thu a ngaih lohna Israel mi khempeuh in a muh uh ciangin mite in kumpipa dawngin, “David’ sungah kote in bang ngah nei ka hi uh hiam? Jessi’ tapa’ sungah gamhluah ka nei kei uh hi. Israel-te aw, na inn ciat uhah ciah un. Rehoboam in ama ading vaihawm tawm tahen,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel mi khempeuh a inn ciat uhah kihem uh hi.
Ahih hangin Judah khuapite-ah a teeng Israel mite tungah Rehoboam in a uk hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in aana tawh na a kisemsakte a uk nasep ukpa Hadoram Israel-te kiangah sawl a, Israel mite in suang tawh amah na denglum uh hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah a tai dingin Kumpi Rehoboam a leeng tungah a tuang dingin nawhtat hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin leilu lama om Israel-te in David innkuan lehdo uh hi.
Jerusalem-ah Rehoboam hong tun ciangin a kumpi gam a ngahkik nadingin Israel-te a sim dingin amah in Judah minam le Benjamin minam a kiteng khia galhang mihing tul zakhat le tul sawmgiat kaikhawm hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mi Shemaiah’ tungah Topa’ thu hong tung hi:
“Judah kumpi Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam le Judah le Benjamin sunga om Israel mi khempeuh tungah gen in,

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Note na kuanto kei ding uh a, na mipihte uh na sim kei ding uh hi. Mi khempeuh na inn uhah ciahkik un; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu pen keima kiang pan hong pai ahi hi,” ci-in gen in,’” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Topa’ thu ngai-in ciahkik uh a, Jeroboam a sim dingin kuan lo uh hi.
Jerusalem-ah Rehoboam teeng a, kihut nadingin Judah gam sungah khuapite a lam hi.
Amah in Bethlehem, Etam, Tekoa,
Bethzur, Soko, Adullam,
Gath, Mareshah, Zif,
Adoram, Lakhish, Azekah,
Zorah, Aijalon le Hebron, Judah le Benjamin gam sunga om kulh a nei khuapite a lam hi.
Amah in munmuanhuaite a muanhuai-in bawlpha-in tuate sungah a ukte le an, sathau le leenggahzu a koih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in khuapi khempeuh ah lum le tei koih a, a muanhuai mahmahin a bawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin Judah gam le Benjamin gam ama a’ a suak hi.
Tua ciangin Israel sungah a om siampite le Levi mite khempeuh in amau’ tenna mun khempeuh panin amah hong beel uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Jeroboam le a tapate in Topa’ siampi a sepna panun amaute hawl khia-in, mual dawna biakpiakna munte, dawi gilote le ama bawlsa bawngno milimte adingin ama siampi tuam teel ahih manin Levi mite in amau’ taang gam le amau’ neihsate nusia-in Judah le Jerusalem-ah hong pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel Topa Pasian zon ding a lungsim uhah a khentat khin mite in amau’ pute pate’ Pasian, Topa tungah biakna a pia dingin Israel minam khempeuh sung panin amau’ nung zui-in Jerusalem-ah hong pai uh hi.

Amaute in Judah kumpi gam thakhauhsak uh a, amaute in Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam lungmuangin kum thum sung koih uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh David le Solomon’ thu a zuih bangun kum thum sung ama thu a mang uh hi.
Rehoboam in Mahalath teenpih hi. Mahalath’ pa pen David’ tapa Jerimoth hi a, a nu pen Jessi’ tapa Eliab’ tanu Abihail ahi hi.
Tua nu in amah tawh tapate Jeush, Shemariah le Zaham nei hi.
Tua nu’ khit ciangin amah in Absalom’ tanu Maakah la a, amah tawh Abijah, Attai, Ziza le Shelomith nei hi.
Rehoboam in a zi dangte le a zineute khempeuh sangin Absalom’ tanu Maakah it zaw hi (amah in zi sawm le giat le zineu sawmguk la a, tapa sawmnih le giat le tanu sawmguk nei hi).
Tua ciangin Rehoboam in Maakah’ tapa Abijah, a sanggamte lakah a ulian penin a seh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpi-in amah koih sawm hi.
Amah pil gamtat a, Judah le Benjamin gam sung, kulhnei khuapite khempeuh ah a tapa pawlkhat a khen hi. Amah in amaute tungah na tampi pia a, amaute adingin zi zong a zonsak hi.
Rehoboam’ ukna kipin a thahat ciangin, amah a kipan amah tawh a om Israel mi khempeuh in Topa’ thukham nusia uh hi.

Topa tungah amaute citak lo uh ahih manin Rehoboam’ kum ngana kumin Jerusalem a sim dingin Egypt kumpipa Shishak, leeng galkap tul le zanih le sakol tung tuang galkap tul sawmguk tawh hong kuanto hi. Egypt panin amah tawh a hong kuan mite pen Libya mi, Sukkiim mi le Ethiopia mite hi a, a tamna sim zawh hi lo hi.
Amah in kulhnei khuapite la-in Jerusalem ciang dong hong tung hi.

Tua ciangin Shishak’ huhau-in Jerusalem-ah a kikhawm Rehoboam le Judah uliante kiangah kamsang Shemaiah hong pai-in amaute kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Note in kei nong nusia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Shishak’ khut sungah note kong pia khin hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah uliante le kumpipa kiniamkhiatin, “Topa thuman hi,” a ci uh hi.

Amaute a kiniamkhiatna thu Topa in a muh ciangin Shemaiah’ tungah Topa’ thu hong tung hi: “Amaute kiniamkhiat ahih manin ka susia kei ding hi. Amaute ka suaktasak liailiai tei dinga, Shishak’ khut tawh Jerusalem tungah ka hehna a cingin ka tungsak kei ding hi.
Ahi zongin amaute in keima nasepna le leitung kumpite’ nasepna a kilamdanna a theih nadingun amaute pen Shishak’ nasemte suak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem a simin Egypt kumpipa Shishak hong kuanto hi. Amah in Topa’ biakinn-a vanmanphate le kumpipa’ inn-a vanmanphate a kipan na khempeuh a la khia hi. Amah in Solomon’ bawlsa kham lumte zong la khia hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in tuate’ tangin sumngo lum bawl a, kumpipa’ kongcing ahi inncing a ukte’ khut sungah tuate a ap hi.
Topa’ biakinn-ah kumpipa a pai simin a cingte hong pai-in tuate keng uh a, tua ciangin cinna inndei sungah tuate koihkik uh hi.
Amah a kiniamkhiat ciangin siat cimitna a pian loh nadingin ama tung pan Topa’ hehna kihei khia hi. Tua tham loin Judah gam sungah thu paizia zong hong hoihsak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam a mahmah Jerusalem-ah kikipsakin a uk hi. Rehoboam in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le khat pha a, Israel minam khempeuh sung panin a min koih nadingin Topa in a teelkhiat khuapi Jerusalem-ah amah in kum sawm le kum sagih sung a uk hi. Ama nu’ min Naamah hi a, Ammon mi ahi hi.
Amah in Topa zon ding a lungsimah koih lo ahih manin a sia a gamta hi.
Tu-in Rehoboam’ gamtatnate, a kipatna pan a tawpna dong, Kamsang Shemaiah le Thumu pa Iddo’ Khang Tangthu sungah kigelh hi. Rehoboam le Jeroboam kikalah galkidona om tawntung hi.
Tua ciangin Rehoboam si a, David’ khuapi sungah kivui hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Abijah in ama tangin a uk hi.
Israel Kumpi Jeroboam’ uk kum sawm le kum giatna kumin Abijah in Judah tungah uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in Jerusalem-ah kum thum sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Mikaiah hi a, Gibeah khuami Uriel’ tanu ahi hi. Tu-in Abijah le Jeroboam kikalah galkidona om hi.
Galsim dingin Abijah kuan khia a, a kiteng khia mi tul zali a pha, a thahat galhang galkap hon a nei hi. Tua ciangin Jeroboam in Abijah a do dingin a kiteng khia galhang tul zagiat tawh a pang hi.
Tua ciangin Efraim mual tung gamah a om Zemaraim Mual tungah Abijah dingto-in, “Jeroboam le Israel mi khempeuh aw, ka thu ngai un!
Israel
Ahi zongin David’ tapa Solomon’ nasem pa, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam kipanin a topa lehdo hi.
Rehoboam khangno lai a, thu khentat thei nai loin, amaute a nial zawh nai loh hun laitakin mi ginalo honkhat Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam’ kiimah kikhawmin amah dem uh hi.
Note mi tampi na hihna uh le note’ pasian dingin Jeroboam in hong bawlsak kham bawngnote note tawh a om manin, David’ suante’ khut sungah a om
Note in Aaron’ suan,
“Ahih hangin kote ahihleh,
Amaute in
En un, kote’ lutangin kote tawh Pasian hong omkhawm a, note a do ding sapna peengkul a tum dingin a siampite a galkap peengkulte uh tawh hong om uh hi. Israel mite aw, na pu na pate uh Pasian,
A nunglam panin amaute a hih dingin a pangsim ding pawlkhat Jeroboam in kual paisak hi. Tua ahih ciangin Judah mite’ mai-ah ama galkapte om a, a pangsimte amau’ nungah om hi.
Judah mite a khuadak uh ciangin, amau’ mai le a nung uhah gal a omlam mu uh hi. Tua ciangin
Tua ciangin Judah mite in galdona aw kiko uh hi. Judah mite a kiko uh ciangin Abijah le Judah mite’ mai-ah Pasian in Jeroboam le Israel khempeuh zo hi.
Judah mite’ mai-ah Israel-te tai uh a, Pasian in amau’ khut sungah Israel-te a pia hi.
Abijah le a mite in Israel-te tampi tak that uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel mi a kiteng khia mihing tul zanga a kithatin tuk hi.
Judah mite in a pu a pate uh Pasian,
Tua ciangin Abijah in Jeroboam delh a, ama tung panin khuapite, Bethel a khuaneute tawh, Jeshanah a khuaneute tawh le Efron a khuaneute tawh a la hi.
Jeroboam in Abijah’ hun sungin ama vangliatna ngahkik lo hi. Tua ciangin
Ahih hangin Abijah a thahatna a khang hi. Amah in zi sawm le li la a, tapa sawmnih le nih le tanu sawm le guk a nei hi.
Abijah’ gamtatna a omlaite, ama ziate le a thugente,
Tua ciangin Abijah si a, David khuapi sungah kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Asa in uk hi. Asa hun sungin tua gamah kum sawm sung gal dai hi.
Tua ciangin Asa in ama Pasian,
Amah in gamdang biakna taute le mual dawna biakpiakna munte la khia-in, biakna songte supai-in Asherah milimte phuk a,
amau’ pute pate’ Pasian,
Amah in Judah khuapi khempeuh panin mual dawna biakpiakna munte le paknamtui biakna taute zong la khia hi. Tua ciangin ama khutnuai-ah kumpi gam sung gal dai hi.
Tua gamah gal dai ahih manin Judah gam sungah kulh a nei khuapite a lam hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Judah mite kiangah, “Hih khuapite lamin kulhpite le tausangte, kulhkongpite le zawlte tawh um ni. Eite in

Asa in Judah mite sung panin lumneu le teipi a tawi galkap tul za thum le Benjamin mite lum pua-in thal a keek tul zanih le tul sawmgiat nei hi. Hih mite khempeuh pen a thahat a galhang mite vive ahi uh hi.
Amaute a sim dingin Ethiopia mi Zerah, galkap awn khat le leeng galkap zathum tawh hong kuan khia a, Mareshah ciang dong hong tung hi.
Tua ciangin amah a dawntuah dingin Asa kuan khia a, Zefathah le Mareshah kuamah galdona ding panna a bawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin
Tua ahih ciangin
Asa le amah tawh a om mite in Gerar ciang dong amaute delh uh a, a hing kuamah a om nawn loh dongin Ethiopia mite puk uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh
Tua ciangin amaute in gan omna puanbukte vat uh a, tuu tampi le kalaohte pai khiatpih uh hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah a ciahkik uh hi.
Oded’ tapa Azariah’ tungah Pasian’ kha hong tung hi.
Tua ciangin Asa a dawntuah dingin amah pai-in ama kiangah, “Asa, le Judah mite le Benjamin mite aw, ka thu ngai un. Note amah tawh na om laiteng uh note tawh
Hun saupi sung Israel mite, Pasian man tawh om lo, thu a hilh siampi tawh om lo, thukham tawh om lo uh hi.
Ahih hangin a lungkham uh ciangin Israel Pasian,
Tua hun lai-in nasemin mite a zinsuk a zintohna uhah lungmuanna om lo a, gam khempeuh ah buaina om hi.
Pasian in lungkhamna nam khempeuh tawh buaisak ahih manin minam khat le minam khat, khuapi khat le khuapi khat kido-in amaute kitamkham uh hi.
Ahih hangin nang, hang in! Na nasepna thaman hong kipia ding ahih manin na khut zawsak kei in,” a ci hi.

Asa in Oded’ tapa Azariah’ thugenkholh, hih thute a zak ciangin amah a lungsim hong hangin, Judah gam khempeuh le Benjamin le Efraim mual tung gam panin a laksa khuapite panin a kihhuai milimte la khia a,
Tua ciangin amah in Judah le Benjamin mi khempeuh le Efraim, Manasseh le Simeon sung panin amaute kiangah a peemte zong a khawm hi; bang hang hiam cih leh
Asa’ uk kum sawm le kum ngana a kha thumna sungin Jerusalem-ah amaute kikhawm uh hi.
Tua ni-in amaute in galsung panin a ciahpih uh nate sung panin bawngtal zasagih le tuu tulsagih tawh
Tua ciangin a lungsim khempeuh uh le a nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh a pu a pate uh’ Pasian,
le Israel Pasian,
Amaute in awging pha, otna, peengkulte le sakite tawh

Tua ciangin Judah mi khempeuh tua kiciamna-ah lungdam uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh kiciamin deihna taktak tawh amah zong uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah mu uh a,
Ama nu Maakah in Asherah milim dingin a kihhuai milim khat a bawlna hangin kumpipa’ nu hihna za panin kumpi Asa in a nu a la khia hi. Asa in a nu’ milim phuksakin satnen a, Kidron lui-ah a hal hi.
Ahih hangin Israel gam sung panin mual dawna biakpiaknate kila khia lo hi. Ahi zongin ama hunsung tawntung Asa’ lungsim paubaang lo hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a pa’ apsa letsongte le ama apsa letsongte, ngun le kham le nazatte,
Asa’ uk kum sawmthum le nga ciang dong galkidona om nawn lo hi.

Asa’ uk a kum sawmthum le gukna kumin Judah a simin Israel kumpipa Baasha paito a, Judah kumpipa Asa kiang panin kuamah a pai khiat theih loh nading le ama kiangah kuamah a pai theih loh nadingin Ramah khua a phut hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Asa in Topa’ biakinn le kumpipa’ inn-a vanmanpha koihnate panin ngun le kham la-in, Damaskas-ah a teeng Syria kumpipa Benhadad kiangah tuate puakin,

“Ka pa le na pa a kipawl mah bangin kei le nang i kipawl hi. Tu-in ngun le kham kong puak hi. Kei kiang panin amah a nungkik theih nadingin pai inla Israel kumpipa Baasha tawh na kipawlna va sutat in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Benhadad in Kumpi Asa’ thu ngai-in Israel khuapite a sim dingin a galkap ukte sawl a, amaute in Ijon, Dan, Abelmaim le Naftali vankoihna khuapite a zo uh hi.
Baasha in tua thu a zak ciangin Ramah khua a lam khawl a, a nasep a tawpsak hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Asa in Judah mi khempeuh khawmin thu pia a, Baasha in lamna-a a zat Ramah suang le a singte amaute in pua khia uh a, tuate tawh Geba le Mizpah a lam uh hi.

Tua hun laitakin Judah kumpi Asa kiangah thumu pa Hanani hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in Syria kumpipa suangin, Topa na Pasian suang lo na hih manin, Syria kumpipa’ galkapte in nang hong suaktasak hi.
Ethiopia mite le Libya mite pen leeng tampi tak le sakol tung tuang tampi tak tawh a om galkap tampi hi lo ahi hiam? Ahi zongin Topa suang na hih manin amah in na khut sungah amaute hong pia hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ama lamah a lungsim a paubaang lo mite’ tangin ama vangliatna a lak dingin Topa’ mit in leitung khempeuh en kawikawi hi. Hih thu-ah na hai gamtat khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tu a kipan gal na do ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin thumu pa tungah Asa heh a, amah kol bulhin thong sungah a koih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu hangin ama tungah nakpitakin heh hi. Tua hun mahin Asa in mi pawlkhat zong gitlohna tawh a gimsak hi.
Asa’ gamtatnate, a patna pan a tawpna dong, Judah le Israel Kumpite’ Tangthu sungah kigelh hi.
Ama uk a kum sawmthum le kuana kumin Asa in a khe-ah natna nei a, a natna nasia mahmah hi. Ahi zongin ama nat hun nangawnah amah in Topa zong lo a, zato siamte’ huhna a zong hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Asa si a, ama uk a kum sawmli le khatna kumin a bei ahi hi.

David khuapi sungah a mahmah in a khuat han sungah amaute in a vui uh hi. Paknamtui bawl siamte in a bawl a namtui a nam tuamtuamte tawh a kidim hankuang sungah amah a sial uh hi. Tua ciangin amah zahtakna-in amaute in meiphual lian mahmah khat a cih uh hi.
Tua ciangin a tapa Jehoshafat in ama tangin uk a, Israel langpangin a mahmah kithakhauhsak hi.
Amah in Judah khuapi kulhneite khempeuh ah galkapte koih a, Judah gam sung le a pa Asa in a laksa Efraim khuapite sungah khuacingte a koih hi.
Amah in a pa’ gamtat masate zui ahih manin Jehoshafat tawh Topa om hi. Amah in Baal-te bia lo hi.
Israel-te’ gamtat bang hi loin ama pa’ Pasian zongin ama thupiakna a zui hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in ama khut sungah kumpi gam kipsak a, Judah mi khempeuh in Jehoshafat tungah siah puak uh hi. Amah hau mahmah a, minthang mahmah hi.
Topa’ na a sepna-ah hang mahmah a, Judah gam sung panin mual dawna biakpiaknate le Asherah milimte a la khia hi.
Ama uk a kum thumna kumin ama uliante Benhail, Obadiah, Zekhariah, Nethanel le Mikaiah, Judah khuapite-ah thuhilh dingin a sawl hi.

Amaute tawh Levi mi Shemaiah, Nethaniah, Zebadiah, Asahel, Shemiramoth, Jehonathan, Adonijah, Tobijah le Tobadonijah a paikhawmsak hi. Tua ciangin Levi mite tawh siampi Elishama le Jehoram zong a paisak hi.
Amaute in Topa’ thukham laibu kengin Judah gam sungah hilh uh hi. Judah khuapi khempeuh ah amaute pai kawikawi-in mite lakah a hilh uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam kimkotah a om kumpi gam khempeuh tungah Topa kihtakna om a, amaute in Jehoshafat do ngam nawn lo uh hi.

Filistia mite pawlkhat in Jehoshafat tungah letsongte le siah dingin ngun a puak uh hi. Tua ciangin Arab-te in zong ama tungah tuutal tulsagih le zasagih le keeltal tulsagih le zasagih mah a puak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat hong lian zaw semsem hi. Amah in Judah gam sungah munmuanhuaite le vankoihna khuapite lam a,
amah in Judah khuapite sungah van tampi a nei hi. Amah in a thahat a hang galkapte Jerusalem-ah a nei hi.
A beh ciat uh tawh kizui-in amaute a phazah hih bang ahi hi. Judah sung pan a tulin a ukte: Adnah a ukpa hi a, a thahat a galhang mi tul zathum tawh ahi hi.
Ama zomah a ukpa Jehohanan hi a, mi tul zanih le tul sawmgiat tawh ahi hi.
Ama zomah Topa’ nasep nadingin a kipia Zikri’ tapa Amasiah hi a, a thahat a galhang mi tul zanih tawh ahi hi.
Benjamin sung panin: A thahat a galhang Eliada hi a, thal le lum a tawi mi tul zanih tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin ama zomah Jehozabad hi a, galdo dingin hiam a tawi mi tul zakhat le tul sawmgiat tawh ahi hi.
Hihte pen kumpipa in Judah gam sung khempeuh ah kulh a nei khuapite-ah a koihte banah kumpipa’ na a semte ahi hi.
Jehoshafat hau-in hong minthan ciangin Ahab tawh numei-a kizopna a bawl hi.

Kum tawmkhat khit ciangin Samaria-a Ahab kiangah amah paisuk hi. Tua ciangin Ahab in amah le amah tawh a hong pai mite adingin tuu tampi le bawngtal tampi go a, Ramoth-gilead a sim dingin amah a zol hi.

Israel kumpipa Ahab in Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat kiangah, “Ramoth-gilead-ah kei tawh nong kuan ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Kei pen nangmah bang ka hi a, ka mite zong nangma mite mah bang ahi hi. Kote pen galsimna ah nang tawh kong kuan ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Topa thu dong masa ni,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in kamsangte mihing zali khawmin amaute kiangah, “Ramoth-gilead a sim dingin kuanto ding ka hi hiam, tua ahih kei leh thuak ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kuanto in; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jehoshafat in, “Eite in i dot theih ding Topa’ kamsang adang hih lai-ah om nawn lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Eite in Topa thu i dot theih nading Imlah’ tapa Mikaiah a kici mi khat omlai hi. Ahih hangin amah in kei tawh kisai a hoih thu gen ngei loin a sia bekbek gen tawntung ahih manin amah ka mudah hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in, “Tua bangin kumpipa in ci kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in ulian khat samin, “Imlah’ tapa Mikaiah manlang takin hong paipih in,” a ci hi.

Tu-in Israel kumpipa le Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat a kumpi tokhom tung uhah tu-in a puantualpi uh tawh kizem uh hi. Samaria kulhkongpi lutna munah amaute tu uh a, amaute’ mai-ah kamsangte khempeuh in thu a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Khenaanah’ tapa Zedekiah in sik kite bawl tawmin, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Amaute a siat matengin hihte tawh Syria mite na nawt ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kamsang khempeuh in zong tua bangmahin gen uh a, “Ramoth-gilead-ah kuanto inla, gualzo in. Topa in kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Mikaiah a sam dingin a pai kamtai pa in ama kiangah, “En in, thu kikhatin kamsangte’ thugen pen kumpipa adingin a hoihlam ahi hi. Nang zong amaute’ gen bangin gen inla, a hoih lamin gen in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Mikaiah in, “Topa a nungta ahih mah bangin, ka Pasian’ gen thu bek ka gen ding hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa kiangah amah hong tun ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Mikaiah aw, Ramoth-gilead-ah galsim dingin kuan ding ka hi hiam, tua ahih kei leh thuak ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Kuanto inla va gualzo ve! Na khut sungah amaute hong kipia ding hi ve’n,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Topa’ min tawh thudang gen loin thuman bek kei tungah nong genna ding bangzah vei hong thuhilh ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “A cing nei lo tuute bangin mualte tungah Israel mi khempeuh a kithehthang ka mu hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, ‘Hihte in to nei lo hi; nuamtakin a inn ciat uhah ciahsak un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Amah in kei tawh kisai a hoih gen loin a sia bek gen ding hi, ci-in nang kiangah hong gen hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Topa’ thugen za in: Topa a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, a taklam le a veilamah vantung mihon khempeuh a ding ka mu hi.
Tua laitakin Topa in, ‘Israel kumpipa Ahab kuanto-in Ramoth-gilead-ah a puk nadingin kua in amah zol ding ahi hiam?’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin khat in thu khat gen a, adang khat in thudang khat a gen hi.
Tua ciangin kha khat hong madawkin Topa’ mai-ah dinga, ‘Keimah in amah ka va zol ding hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, ‘Bang lam tawh zol ding na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.

Amah in, ‘Keimah pai khia-in ama kamsangte khempeuh’ kam sungah zuau thugen kha khat ka va hi ding hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Nangmah in amah na va zol ding hi. Pai inla tua bangin va hih in,’ a ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Topa in hih na kamsangte’ kam sungah zuauthu a gen kha khat koih khin ahihna thei in. Topa in nang na siatna ding gen khinzo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Khenaanah’ tapa Zedekiah a nai-ah hong pai-in Mikaiah a paang bengin, “Cik hun a kipan Topa’ kha in kei hong nusia-in, hih bang na gen nadingin nang tungah hong tung ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Nangmah a bu dingin inndei sung nungah na pai ni ciangin na thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in, “Mikaiah man unla, khuapi ukpa Amon le kumpipa’ tapa Joash kiangah paipihkik un.
Tua ciangin, ‘Hih bangin kumpipa in ci hi: Hih mipa thong sungah koih unla, lungnuam takin kong ciahkik mateng anletui tawmno bek tawh vak un, ci hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Lungnuam takin nong ciahkik leh kei tungtawnin Topa in thu a gen lo ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Mi khempeuh aw, tu-a ka thugen za un!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa le Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat, Ramoth-gilead-ah a kuanto uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Kei pen mel kiseelin gal sungah kong kuan dinga, ahih hangin nangmah in na puantualpite nong silh ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa a mel kiseel a, amaute gal sungah a kuan uh hi.
Tu-in Syria kumpipa in a leeng a ukte thu pia khin a, “A neu tawh ahi a, a lian tawh ahi zongin kido loin, Israel kumpipa bek tawh na kido ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Leeng galkap a ukte in Jehoshafat a muh uh ciangin, “Israel kumpipa hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah a hih dingin amaute in naih uh hi. Tua ciangin Jehoshafat kikokhia a, Topa in amah huh hi. Pasian in ama kiang panin amaute kai khia hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Israel kumpipa ahih lohna leeng galkap a ukte in a theih uh ciangin amah a delhna panin kilehheikik uh hi.

Ahih hangin mi khat in a thal mawklot a, Israel kumpipa a galdal thep le a awmdal kikal a kha hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a leenghawl pa kiangah, “Kei liam ka hih manin kileh inla, galphual panin hong pua khia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ni-in galkidona nasia mahmah a, nitak dong Syria mite maingatin a leeng sungah Israel kumpipa kingam hi. Tua hi a, nitum laitakin amah a si ta hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat lungmuang takin Jerusalem-a ama inn-ah ciahkik hi.

Ahih hangin amah a dawn dingin Hanani’ tapa, thumu pa Jehu hong pai khia a, Kumpi Jehoshafat kiangah, “Mi gilote huhin Topa a mudahte it ding na hi hiam? Hih thu hangin Topa’ hehna nang tungah hong tung zo hi.
Ahi zongin nang na hoihna pawlkhat om hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in gam sung panin Asherah milimte nusia-in Pasian zon ding na lungsimah na ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
Jerusalem-ah Jehoshafat teeng hi. Tua ciangin Beersheba panin Efraim mual tung gam ciang dong mite lakah zin kawikawi a, amau’ pute pate’ Pasian, Topa kiangah amaute tunpihkik hi.
Amah in gam sunga Judah khuapi kulhnei khempeuh a khuapi a khuapi-ah thukhen dingte seh a,
thukhente tungah, “Note in mi ading hi loin Topa adingin a khen na hih manun na hih dingte uh limtakin ngaihsun un; thukhenna na piak laitakun note kiangah amah hong om hi.
Tu-in note in Topa zahtak unla, na hihnate uhah kingaihsun un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa i Pasian in thuman hei khiatna, mi deidanna le sumgolh laknate deih lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua tham loin, Topa adingin thukhenna a pia ding le thuneite a khensak dingin Levi mite le siampite le Israel mi beh lutangte pawlkhat, Jehoshafat in Jerusalem-ah a seh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem-ah a phual ding uh nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute thuhilh a, “Topa zahtakna, cihtakna le na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh hih bangin na hih ding uh hi:

A khuapi uhah a teeng na sanggamte uh tung panin mi kithahna thu, thukham ahih kei leh thupiakna, upadi ahih kei leh biakna ngeina kipte tawh kisai-in thu khat peuhpeuh note tungah hong tun ciangin, amaute in Topa’ mai-ah mawhna a piansak loh nading le note le na sanggamte uh tungah hehna hong tun loh nadingin amaute na hilh ding uh hi. Tua bangin na gamta ding uh a, mawhna na piangsak kei ding uh hi.

En un, Topa’ thu tawh kisai thute khempeuh ah siampi lian Amariah note tungah om hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa tawh kisai khempeuh ah Judah mite a ukpa Ishmael’ tapa Zebadiah om hi. Tua ciangin Levi mite in note tungah ulian na hong sem ding uh hi. Hang takin gamta un; thuman mite tawh Topa hong om tahen!” a ci hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin Moab mite le Ammon mite le Meunim mite pawlkhat, Jehoshafat a sim dingin hong kuan uh hi.
Mi pawlkhat hong pai-in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Tuipi galkhat, Edom gam panin mihon tampi khat nangmah a sim dingin hong kuan uh hi. Amaute Hazazontamar (Engedi a kici)-ah om uh hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat lau a, a mahmah in Topa’ lamlahna ding zong a, Judah gam khempeuh ah an tan ding thu a zasak hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ tung pan huhna a ngen dingin Judah mite hong kikhawm uh hi. Judah khuapi khempeuh panin Topa thu a dong dingin amaute hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn huangsung, inntual thak mai, Judah le Jerusalem-te’ kikhopna sungah Jehoshafat dinga,

“Topa, ka pu ka pate uh Pasian aw, nang, vantungah Pasian hi lo na hi hiam? Minamte’ kumpi gam khempeuh tungah nang a uk hi lo na hi hiam? Na khut sungah vangliatna le thahatna om a, kuamah in nang hong nang zo lo hi.
Kote’ Pasian aw, hih gamah a teeng mite na mi Israel-te’ mai-ah hawl khia-in, na lawmpa Abraham’ suanlekhakte tungah a tawntung dingin pia hi lo na hi hiam?
Hih gamah amaute teengin, nangma min dingin hih lai-ah biakinn khat lam uh a,

‘Eite tungah siatna, namsau, thukhenna, ahih kei leh natna, ahih kei leh kialpi hong tun leh, hih biakinn sungah ama min om ahih manin hih biakinn mai-ah dingin i gimna hunah ama tungah i kiko dinga, amah in hong za-in hong hon ding hi,’ ci uh hi.
“Tu-in en in, Egypt gam panin Israel-te hong pai khiat lai-in na simsak loh, amaute in a suksiat loh uh Ammon mite le Moab mite le Seir Mual gam mite,
ka luah dingun kote tungah nong piaksa nangma neihsa panin kote a hong hawl khia dingin hong paina tawh amaute in kote hong lehthuk zawsop uh hi.

Kote’ Pasian aw, amaute tungah thu khen lo ding na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh kote a sim dingin a hong pai hih mihon tampite a do dingin thahatna ka nei kei uh hi. Ka cih nading uh ka thei kei uh a, nangmah bek kong mitsuan uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin Topa’ mai-ah Judah mi khempeuh a taneute, a zite le a naupangte uh tawh a ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin a kikhawmte’ lak, Levi mi Asaf’ suante sung pan Mattaniah, a tapa Jeiel, a tapa Benaiah, a tapa Zekhariah, a tapa Jahaziel tungah Topa’ kha hong tung hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Judah gam khempeuh le Jerusalem-a teng khempeuh le Kumpi Jehoshafat aw, ngai un. Topa in hih bangin note’ tungah hong gen hi: ‘Kihta kei unla, hih a tam mi honpi hangin lungkia kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh galdona pen note a’ hi loin Pasian-a’ ahi hi.
Zing ciangin amaute a do-in paisuk un. Ziz kahtohna lampi tawnin amaute hong kuanto ding uh a, Jeruel gamlak nisuahna lam kuam mongah amaute na mu ding uh hi.

Note in hih kidona-ah na do ding uh kisam lo hi. Judah gam mite le Jerusalem khuamite aw, na panmun uh la-in taang loin ding unla, note’ tangin Topa’ gualzawhna mu un,’ ci hi. Kihta kei unla, lungkia kei un. Zing ciangin amaute a do-in pai un. Topa in note hong ompih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in a maitang leilam ngatin kun a, Judah gam le Jerusalem-a a teeng mite khempeuh zong Topa’ mai-ah pukin Topa a bia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Levi mite sung pan Kohath mite le Korah mite, awging pha mahmah tawh Israel Pasian, Topa a phat dingin a dingto uh hi.

Tua ciangin zingsangin amaute tho baihin Tekoa gamlakah a pai khia uh hi. Amaute a pai khiat laitakin Jehoshafat dingin, “Judah gam le Jerusalem-a a teengte aw, ka thugen za un! Topa na Pasian uh um un; tua hileh note na kip ding uh hi. Ama kamsangte um un; tua hileh na maavang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in mite tawh thu kikupna a neih khit ciangin, galkapte mai-ah amaute a paikawmin, “Topa tungah lungdamna ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi,” ci-in biakna puan silhin Topa tungah la sa-in amah a phat dingte a seh hi.
Amaute inla sa-in phat ding a kipat uh ciangin, Judah mite a sim dingin a hong pai Ammon mite, Moab mite le Seir Mual gam mite a pangsim ding Topa in koih a, amaute kizo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ammon mite le Moab mite in Seir Mual a, a teengte a do dingin kipanin amaute susia mang uh a, Seir-a a teengte a beisak khit uh ciangin amaute khatlekhat kisusia uh hi.
Gamlak a galvilna tausangah Judah-te hong tun ciangin mihonpite’ omna lam en uh hi. Amaute pen leilakah a puk misi luanghawm vive na hi a, a suakta kuamah om lo hi.

Van kinusiate a tawm dingin Jehoshafat le a mite hong pai ciangin bawngte, vante, puante le na manphate tampi tak mu uh a, a puak zawh nawn loh ciang dong uh amau adingin a la uh hi. Van kinusiate tam mahmah ahih manin ni thum sung tawm uh hi.
A ni li ni-in Berakah Kuam-ah amaute kikhawm uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in tua lai-ah Topa phat uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin tua lai mun pen Berakah Kuam kici hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mi le Jerusalem mi khempeuh ciah uh a, Jehoshafat makai-in lungdamna tawh Jerusalem-ah a pai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a galte uh hangin Topa in amaute lungdamsak hi.
Amaute, harp lasaknate le laiza lasaknate tawh Jerusalem-a Topa’ biakinn-ah tung uh hi.
Topa in Israel-te’ galte a dosakna thu a zak uh ciangin kumpi gamte khempeuh in Topa a kihta uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jehoshafat’ ukna gam sung gamdai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a Pasian in ama kiimah galdaihna a pia hi.
Tua bangin Jehoshafat in Judah tungah uk hi. Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmthum le nga pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnih le nga sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Azubah hi a, Shilhi’ tanu ahi hi.
Amah in a pa Asa’ gamtat bangmahin Topa’ muhna-ah a man na sem hi.
Ahi zongin mual dawna biakpiaknate kila khia lo hi. Mite in a lungsim uhah a pu a pate uh’ Pasian ngaihsun nai lo uh hi.
Tu-in Jehoshafat’ gamtatna a omlaite, a patna pan a tawp dongin, Israel Kumpite’ Tangthu sunga a kiciamteh, Hanani’ Tapa Jehu’ Khang Tangthu sungah kigelh hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin Judah kumpi Jehoshafat in a gilo a a gamta Israel kumpipa Ahaziah tawh kipawlna a bawl hi.
Tarshish a pai ding teembawte bawlna-ah amah pawl a, amaute in Eziongebar-ah teembawte a bawl uh hi.

Tua ciangin Mareshah khuami Dodavahu’ tapa Eliezer in Jehoshafat langpangin thu genin, “Nangmah in Ahaziah tawh kipawlna bawl na hih manin Topa in na bawlsa uh nate susia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin teembawte kisia a Tarshish-ah pai thei lo hi.
Jehoshafat si a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Jehoram in ama tangin uk hi.
Jehoshafat’ tapa Jehoram’ sanggam pasalte: Azariah, Jehiel, Zekhariah, Azariah, Mikhael le Shefatiah ahi uh hi. Hihte khempeuh, Judah kumpi Jehoshafat’ tapate ahi hi.
A pa un amaute tungah letsong lianpite, ngun, kham le a manpha neihsate, Judah gam sunga kulhnei khuapite tawh a pia hi. Ahih hangin amah ta upa ahih manin Jehoram tungah kumpi gam a pia hi.
A pa’ kumpi tokhom tungah Jehoram kahin a kip ciangin namsau tawh a sanggam pasal khempeuh that a, Judah ulian pawlkhat zong a that hi.
Jehoram kumpi a suahin a kum sawmthum le nih pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum giat sung uk hi.
Amah in Ahab innkuan mah bangin Israel kumpi dangte’ gamtat a zui hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Ahab’ tanu ama zi ahi hi. Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Ahi zongin, David tawh a bawlsa a thuciamna, ama tung le a suante tungah ukna za a piak suakna ding a ciam khitna hangin Topa in David’ suante susia lo hi.
Ama hun sungin Judah ukna panin Edom lengkhia-in amau’ kumpi tuam a koih uh hi.
Tua ciangin ama nuai-a a ukte le a leengte khempeuh tawh Jehoram galkah a, zanin amah kipanin amah le a leeng ukte a umcih Edom mite a vat gawp hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin Judah ukna panin Edom mite leeng khia hi. Amah in a pu a pate’ Pasian, Topa nusia ahih manin tua hun laitakin Libnah zong ama ukna panin a leng khia hi.
Tua tham loin amah in Judah mual tung gamah mual dawna biakpiaknate bawl a, Jerusalem-a teeng mite citak loin omsak a, Judah mite lampialsak hi.

Tua ciangin kamsang Elijah tung panin ama kiangah laikhak khat hong tung a, “Na pu David’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Na pa Jehoshafat’ gamtat bang leh Judah kumpi Asa’ gamtat bangin gamta loin,

Israel kumpi dangte’ gamtat bangin gamta-in Ahab innkuan in cihtak lohna-ah Israel a paipih bangin Judah le Jerusalem-a teeng mite cihtak lohna-ah na paipih a, na pa’ innkuan sung panin nang sangin a hoih zaw na sanggam pasalte zong na that hi.
Tua ahih manin na mite, na tate, na zite le na neih khempeuh tungah Topa in gimna lianpi khat hong tungsak dinga,
na natna hangin a ni ni-in na gil a tolh khiat dongin, nang mahmah in gilnatna lianpi khat na nei ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Ethiopia mite kiangah a om Filistia mite le Arab mite, Jehoram tungah a heh nadingun tok lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Judah a simin amaute hong kuanto-in luh uh a, kumpipa’ inn-ah a om a muh uh na khempeuh le a tapate le a zite zong pua khia uh a, a tapa neu pen Jehoahaz sim loh a tapate a kinusia om lo hi.
Hih thute khempeuh khit ciangin Topa in a dam thei lo natna tawh a gil nasak hi.
A hun a cin, kum nih beina ciangin a natna hangin a gil tolh khia a, nakpitakin na sa-in a si hi. A pate adingin mei a cih uh bangin a mite in amah zahtakna-in mei cih lo uh hi.

Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmthum le nih a pha hi. Jerusalem-ah kum giat sung uk a, kuama dahpih lohin amah kihem khia hi. Amaute in David khuapi sungah amah vui uh a, ahih hangin kumpite’ han sungah kivui lo hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah a teengte in ama tangin a tapa neu pen Ahaziah kumpi-in koih uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Arab mite tawh giahphual ah hong pai mite in a tapa gol zawte khempeuh that khin uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Judah kumpi Jehoram’ tapa Ahaziah in uk hi.
Ahaziah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmli le nih pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum khat sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Athaliah hi a, Omri’ tanu ahi hi.
Ama nu in a sia-a a gamtatna ding lamlak ahih manin amah zong Ahab innkuan dangte’ gamtat bangin a gamta hi.
Ahab innkuan dangte mah bangin Topa’ muhna-ah a sia gamta hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a pa’ sih khit ciangin ama siatna dingah thu lamlakte pen Ahab’ innkuante ahi uh hi.
Amah in amaute’ thugen nangawn zui a, Ramoth-gilead-ah Syria kumpi Hazael tawh a kido dingin Israel kumpi Ahab’ tapa Joram tawh a kuan hi. Tua ciangin Syria mite in Joram liamsak uh a,

Syria kumpi Hazael a do laitakin gal sungah a ngah a liamnate Jezreel-ah a kidamsak dingin a kilehkik hi. Tua ciangin Jezreel-ah Ahab’ tapa Joram a ci na ahih manin amah a en dingin Judah kumpi Jehoram’ tapa Ahaziah a hawhsuk hi.

Ahih hangin Joram’ kiangah a hawhna tawh Ahaziah’ pukna a tunna ding Pasian’ sehsa ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah amah a hawh sungin Ahab innkuan a susia dingin Topa in sathau a nilhsa, Nimshi’ tapa Jehu tawh a kimu dingin Joram tawh pai khia hi.
Jehu in Ahab innkuan tungah Pasian’ thukhenna a sepkhiat laitakin Judah uliante le Ahaziah’ na a sem, Ahaziah’ sanggam pasalte’ tapate tuak a, amah in amaute a that hi.

Amah in Ahaziah zong a, Samaria-ah a buk laitakin amah kiman a, tua ciangin Jehu kiangah amah kipaipihin kithat hi. Amaute in amah vui uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Amah pen a lungsim khempeuh tawh Topa a zong Jehoshafat’ tupa ahi hi,” ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Ahaziah innkuante in kumpi gam a uk zo ding mi khat zong nei nawn lo uh hi.
Tu-in Ahaziah’ nu Athaliah in a tapa a sihna a theih ciangin amah kipanin Judah sung pan kumpi innkuan khempeuh thatsak hi.

Ahih hangin kumpipa’ tanu Jehosheba in Ahaziah’ tapa Joash la a, a kithat ding kumpipa’ tapate lak panin amah gukhia-in lupna senna inndei sungah amah le a cingnu a koih hi. Amah pen Ahaziah’ sanggamnu ahih manin Kumpi Jehoram’ tanu ahi, siampi Jehoiada’ zi Jehosheba in tua bangin Athaliah’ kiang panin amah seel a, tua nu in amah thatkha lo hi.
Tua bangin Athaliah in gam sung a uk laitakin Pasian’ biakinn sungah bu-in kum guk sung amaute tawh amah a om hi.

Ahih hangin a kum sagihna kumin Jehoiada amah kihanthawnin a za-a a ukte, Jehoram’ tapa Azariah le Jehohanan’ tapa Ishmael le Obed’ tapa Azariah le Adaiah’ tapa Maaseiah le Zikri’ tapa Elishafat-te tawh thukimna khat a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam sungah amaute pai kawikawi-in Judah khuapite khempeuh panin Levi mite le Israel mi beh lutangte khawmin Jerusalem-ah hong pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin a kikhawm khempeuh in Pasian’ biakinn sungah kumpipa tapa Joash tawh thuciamna khat bawl uh hi. Tua ciangin Jehoiada in amaute kiangah, “En un, kumpipa’ tapa! Topa in David suante tawh kisai-in a gen bangin amah uksak un.
Note in hih bangin na hih ding uh hi: Sabbath ni-in nasep a peng no siampite le Levi mite sung panin seh thum ah seh khat kulhkongpi cingte na hi ding uh a,
seh thum ah seh khat kumpipa’ inn-ah omin seh thum ah seh khat Khuabul Kulhkongpi-ah na om ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh Topa’ biakinn tual sungah na om ding uh hi.
Siampite le na a sem Levi mite sim loh, Topa’ biakinn sungah kuamah lutsak kei un. Amaute a siangtho ahih manin amaute lut thei ding uh a, ahih hangin mi khempeuh in Topa’ sawlna na mang ding uh hi.

Levi mite in a khut sung uhah a galhiam ciat uh tawh kumpipa cing ding uh a, biakinn sungah a lut peuhpeuh kithat ding hi. Hong tum ciang hitaleh a pusuah ciang hitaleh ah kumpipa tawh om un,” a ci hi.
