Siampi Jehoiada’ thupiak khempeuh bangin Levi mite le Judah mi khempeuh gamta uh hi. Amaute in amau’ mi ciat Sabbath ni-in na a sem ding mite tawh Sabbath ni-in nasep a peng ding mite hong paipih uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Jehoiada in nasep a peng ding siampite ciahsak lo hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada in Topa’ biakinn sungah a om, Kumpi David-a’ ahi ngei teipite le lum lian le lum neute, a ukte tungah a pia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mi khempeuh a galhiam ciat uh tawh kumpipa a cingin, biakinn leitaw lampang pan leilu lampang, biakna tau le inn kiimah a koih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa’ tapa pai khiatpihin ama lu tungah kumpi lukhu khusak a, kumpi za ngahna lai zong a pia hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kumpi-in amah taangko uh a, Jehoiada le a tapate in amah sathau nilhin, “Kumpipa khansau hen!” a ci uh hi.
Mite tai-in kumpipa a phatna uh gamlumna Athaliah in a zak ciangin mite’ omna Topa’ biakinn-ah a pai hi.

Amah a khuadak ciangin, biakinn lutna-a om a khuampi gei-ah kumpipa ading le a ukte le peengkul tumte kumpipa gei-ah a om le gam sung mi khempeuh lungdamin peengkulte a tum le lasate a lasakna nate uh tawh tua pawi makai-in a na om uh a mu hi. Tua ciangin Athaliah in a puante balkekin kiko a, “Sawmsimna! Sawmsimna!” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada in galkapte tungah a kikoih a ukte pai khiatpihin amaute tungah, “A gualin a cingte lak panin a pua-ah amah pai khiatpih un. Amah a panpih mi khat peuhpeuh namsau tawh kithat ding hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh siampipa in, “Topa’ biakinn sungah tua nu that kei un,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nu man uh a, kumpipa omna inn Sakol Kongpi vangah pai khiatpihin tua lai-ah amah a that uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ mi ahihna ding uh Jehoiada in amah le mi khempeuh le kumpipa kikalah thuciamna khat a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh Baal inn-ah pai-in a inn a lai khia uh hi. Amaute in a biakna taute le a milimte sukham uh a, biakna taute mai-ah Baal siampi Mattan a that uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jehoiada in David’ hih ngei bangin, Moses thukham sungah a kigelh bangin lungdamna le lasakna tawh, Topa’ tungah meihal biakna a pia ding, Topa’ biakinn a en dingin David in a vaihawmsa Levi siampite le Levi mite’ ukna nuai-ah Topa’ biakinn a vil galvilte a koih hi.
Lam khat peuhpeuhah a nin mi khat peuhpeuh hong lut loh nadingin Topa’ biakinn kulhkongpite-ah amah in kulhkongpi cingte a koih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in galkap ukte, mi liante, mi a ukte le gam sung mi khempeuh a paipih hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ biakinn panin kumpipa’ inn kulhkongpi tungnung tawnin kumpipa paipihsuk uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kumpi tokhom tungah kumpipa tusak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gam sung mi khempeuh lungdam uh hi. Namsau tawh Athaliah a kithah khit ciangin khuapi sung a nuam pah hi.
Joash in uk ding a kipatin kum sagih pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmli sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Zibiah hi a, Beersheba khuami ahi hi.
Siampi Jehoiada’ hunsung khempeuh Topa’ mitah Joash a manin gamta hi.
Jehoiada in ama adingin zi nih laksak a, amah in tapate le tanute a nei hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Joash in Topa’ biakinn a ngei batsakkik ding ngaihsun hi.

Amah in siampite le Levi mite khempeuh khawmin amaute kiangah, “Judah khuapite-ah pai unla, Pasian’ biakinn a kum kumin puah nadingin Israel khempeuh tung panin sum khawm un; hih thu na nawh hih ding uh thei un,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Levi mite kinawh lo uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in amau’ ukpi Jehoiada samin ama kiangah, “Topa’ nasem Moses in Topa’ ompihna puanbuk-a dingin Israel mihonte tung panin a khon mangmu bang hangin Judah le Jerusalem panin Levi mite khawmsak lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua a gilo numei Athaliah le a pawlte in Pasian’ biakinn luh uh a, Topa’ biakinn sunga om a ki-ap nate khempeuh zong Baal-te adingin zang uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in thu pia a, amaute in singkuang khat bawlin Topa’ biakinn kulhkongpi pualamah a koih uh hi.
Gamlakah a omlai-un Pasian’ nasem Moses in Israel mite a piaksak mangmu Topa adingin hong puak nadingun Judah le Jerusalem sung khempeuh ah thu zaksakna kibawl hi.
Tua ciangin ulian khempeuh le mi khempeuh lungdamin a mangmu uh hong sung uh a, a man khit mateng uh singkuang sungah khia uh hi.

Levi mite in kumpipa’ uliante kiangah a singkuang paipih uh a, a sungah sum tampi a omlam a muh peuhpeuh uh ciangin, kumpipa’ lai-at pa le siampi lianpen pa’ sawltak pa hong pai-in singkuang sunga sum teng bung khia-in la uh a, tua ciangin a omna ngei-ah a singkuang koihkik uh hi. Tua bangin a ni ni-in amaute in hih uh a, sum tampi a khawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa le Jehoiada in Topa’ biakinn nasep a ukte tungah tua sumte pia uh a, amaute in Topa’ biakinn a ngei a bangsakkik dingin leilesuang nasep a siamte le khutsiamte le Topa’ biakinn a puahkik dingin sik le sumngo nasep a siamte zong a cial uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua nasepna-ah a kisehte in na semin amau’ khut sungah puahkikna nasep in mai nawt a, amaute in a ngei bangin Topa’ biakinn bawlkikin kipsak uh hi.

Amaute in a zawh khit uh ciangin, kumpipa le Jehoiada kiangah sum a omlaite hong paipih uh a, amaute in tuate tawh Topa’ biakinn-ah nasepna ding le meihal biak nadingin nazatte le paknamtui adingin pakante le kham le ngun beelte a bawl uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Jehoiada’ nuntak sung khempeuh a tawntungin Topa’ biakinn sungah meihal biaknate a pia uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jehoiada teekin a hun kicing ta a, tua ciangin a si hi. A sihin kum za le kum sawmthum pha hi.
Amah in Israel sung le Pasian’ na le Pasian’ biakinn-ah nasep hoih sem ahih manin amaute in David khuapi sung kumpite’ lakah amah a vui uh hi.
Jehoiada a sih khit ciangin Judah uliante hong pai-in amau’ thu a zuih nadingin kumpipa tungah thu va gen uh a, kumpipa in zong amaute’ thu a ngai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a pu a pate uh Pasian, Topa’ biakinn nusia uh a, Asherah milimte le milim dangte’ na sem uh hi. Hih amau’ mawhna hangin Judah le Jerusalem tungah hehna hong tung hi.
Ahi zongin Topa’ lamah amaute a paipihkik dingin amah in amaute lakah kamsangte a puak hi. Hihte in amau’ langkhat ah teci pang a, ahih hangin amaute in don lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada’ tapa Zekhariah’ sungah Pasian’ kha hong lut hi. Tua ciangin amah dingin mite en sukin mite kiangah, “Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Bang hangin na mavan theih loh nadingun Topa’ thupiaknate palsat na hi uh hiam? Note in Topa nusia na hih manun amah in note hong nusia hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in amah sawmsim uh a, kumpipa’ thupiakna tawh amaute in Topa’ biakinn tualah suang tawh amah denglum uh hi.
Tua bangin kumpipa Joash in Zekhariah’ pa Jehoiada in ama tungah a lah dikna phawk nawn loin ama tapa thahsak mawk hi. Amah in a sih ding ciangin, “Topa in mu henla thuk tahen!” a ci hi.

Kum bei ciangin Joash a simin Syria galkapte hong kuanto hi. Judah le Jerusalem-ah amaute hong pai-in mite lak panin ulian khempeuh that uh a, a van ngahte khempeuh uh Damaskas kumpipa kiangah puak uh hi.

Syria galkapte mi tawmno hong pai hi napi-in, amaute in a pu a pate uh Pasian, Topa nusia uh ahih manin Topa in amaute’ khut sungah galkap tampi ahi mite a pia hi. Tua bangin amaute in Joash’ tungah thukhenna a pia uh hi.

Amah nakpi tak a liamsa-in nusia-in, ama kiang panin Syria mite a kihepkhiat khit uh ciangin, siampi Jehoiada’ tapa a thahna hangin a nasemte in amah sawmsim uh a, a lupna tungah amah that uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah si hi. David khuapi sungah amah vui uh a, ahih hangin amaute in kumpite’ hanah amah vui lo uh hi.
Amah a sawmsim mite pen Ammon numei Shimeath’ tapa Zabad le Moab numei Shimrith’ tapa Jehozabad ahi uh hi.
Ama tapate’ thute le amah a kigensiatna thute le Pasian’ biakinn a kilamkikna thute, Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Amaziah in ama tangin a uk hi.
Amaziah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnih le kua sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Jehoaddin hi a, Jerusalem khuami ahi hi.
Topa’ mitah a manin amah gamta a, ahi zongin a lungsim a paubaang lo hi zo nai sam lo hi.
Ama khut sungah kumpi vangliatna kiptakin a om khit phetin a pa ahi kumpipa a that a nasemte a that hi.
Ahih hangin Moses laibu sungah, “Tate’ hangin pate kithat lo dinga, pate’ hangin tate kithat lo ding hi,” ci-in Topa in a thupiakna thukham sungah a kigelh mah bangin amah in amau’ tate that lo hi.

Tua ciangin Amaziah in Judah mite khawm a, a tul-a ukte le a za-a ukte’ khutnuai-ah Judah mite le Benjamin mite a behbeh, a pawlpawlin a koih hi. Amah in kum sawmnih le a tungsiah a pha mite khawm a, galsim dingin a hoih, teipi le lum a zang thei, a kiteng khia mihing tul zathum a pha hi.
Amah in Israel sung panin ngun talen zakhat tawh a thahat galhang mi tul zakhat zong a cial hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mi khat ama kiangah hong pai-in, “Kumpipa aw, Israel mi ahi hih Efraim mite khempeuh, Topa in ompih lo ahih manin hih Israel galkapte nang tawh kuankhawmsak kei in.

Ahih hangin hih bang lama hihna tawh galdona-ah thahat dingin kingaihsun kha na hih leh, Pasian in galte’ mai-ah nang hong paai ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in huhna ding ahi a, paihna ding ahi zongin vangliatna nei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Amaziah in Pasian’ mipa kiangah, “Ahi ta zongin Israel galkapte tungah ka piaksa talen zakhat thu bang cih ding ihi hiam?” a ci hi. Pasian’ mipa in dawngin, “Topa in hih sangin nakpitakin a tam zaw hong pia thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Amaziah in Efraim panin hong pai galkapte, inn-ah a ciahkik dingin a pai khiasak hi. Tua ciangin Judah mite tungah amaute heh mahmah uh a, heh mahmahna tawh inn-ah a ciahkik uh hi.
Ahih hangin Amaziah kihanthawnin a mite pai khiatpih a, Ci Kuam-ah pai-in Seir gam mite mihing tul sawm a that hi.
Adang tul sawm hingmat uh a, keen sang dawn khatah amaute paipihin tua keen dawn panin amaute lawnsuk uh a, amaute khempeuh themlen hi.
Ahih hangin Amaziah in gal sungah amah tawh kuansak loin, inn-ah a sawlkik galkapte in Samaria panin Bethhoron dong Judah khuapite na sim uh a, tuate sungah mi tulthum thatin van tampi a la uh hi.
Seir gamah Edom mite a thahna panin Amaziah hong ciah ciangin amah in Seir gam mite’ pasian-te hong ciahpih a, ama pasian dingin tuate koih a, tuate bia-in tuate’ tungah biakna a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Amaziah tungah Topa hehin ama kiangah kamsang khat sawl a, tua pa in, “Bang hangin nangma khut panin ama mite a hon khia lo, mi pawlkhatte’ pasian-te beel na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in thu a gen laitakin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Kumpipa tungah ngaihsutna a pia dingin nang hong koih ka hi uh hiam? Khawl in! Bang hangin nang hong kithat ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kamsangpa khawl a, ahih hangin ama kiangah, “Hih bang gamta-in ka thugenna ngai lo na hih manin Pasian in nang hong suksiat ding a lungsim a khentatna ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah kumpi Amaziah in ngaihsutna a lak khit ciangin Israel kumpi, Jehu’ tapa Jehoahaz, a tapa Joash kiangah mi sawlin, “Hong pai in; khatlekhat kisi ni,” cisak hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpi Joash in Judah kumpi Amaziah kiangah thu puak a, “Lebanon-a thangling kung in Lebanon-a taamtak tungah thu puak a, ‘A zi dingin ka tapa’ tungah na tanu pia in,’ ci hi. Tua ciangin Lebanon gamsa khat hong pai-in thangling kung tuancil hi.

Nangmah in, ‘Edom mite ka vat khin hi,’ na ci a, na lungsim in nang hong kisatheisak hi. Tu-a na minthanna zah tawh inn-ah om in; bang hangin nangmah le Judah mite na pukkhawm nadingun buaina piangsak ding na hi hiam” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Amaziah in mang lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Edom pasian-te bia uh ahih manin, Pasian in amau’ galte’ khut sungah amaute a piak theih nadingin tua pen Pasian’ vaihawmna ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa Joash kuanto a, Judah-te’ gam Bethshemesh-ah amah le Judah kumpipa Amaziah khatlekhat gal sungah kisi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Judah mite zo a, mi khempeuh a inn uhah a tai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa Joash in Bethshemesh-ah Ahaziah’ tapa Joash, a tapa Amaziah ahi Judah kumpipa manin Jerusalem-ah paipih a, Efraim Kongpi panin a Kiu Kulhpi ciang dong pi zaguk sung Jerusalem kulh a phel khia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kham le ngun khempeuh le Pasian’ biakinn sungah a kimu umlebeel khempeuhte tawh Obededom mankhawm hi. Amah in kumpipa’ inn-a vanmanphate la-in luang khapna ding mite zong man a, tua ciangin Samaria-ah a ciahkik hi.
Israel kumpi, Jehoahaz’ tapa Joash a sih zawh Judah kumpi Joash’ tapa Amaziah kum sawm le kum nga sung hinglai hi.
Tu-in Amaziah’ nasep a omlaite, a patna panin a tawpna dong, Judah le Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.

Topa kiang panin amah a kihei khiat a kipanin amaute in amah sawmsimna khat Jerusalem-ah nei uh ahih ciangin Lakhish-ah amah tai hi. Ahih hangin amaute in Lakhish-ah amah nungdelhsak uh a, tua lai-ah amah that uh hi.
Tua ciangin sakolte tungah amah pua-in kiciahpih a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mi khempeuh in kum sawm le kum guk a pha Uzziah la-in a pa Amaziah’ tangin kumpi-in a koih uh hi.
Kumpi ahi ama pa a sih khit ciangin amah in Eloth khua la kikin Judah gam dingin a ngahkik hi.
Uzziah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm le kum guk pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnga le nih sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Jekoliah hi a, Jerusalem khuami ahi hi.
A pa Amaziah’ hihsa khempeuh bangin amah in Topa’ mitah a man sem hi.
Pasian zahtak ding ama tungah a hilh Zekhariah’ hun sungteng amah in Pasian zong hi. Amah in Topa a zon laiteng, Pasian in amah daupaisak hi.

Amah kuan khia-in Filistia mite va sim a, Gath khuapi kulh, Jabneh khuapi kulh le Ashdod khuapi kulh sucim hi. Tua ciangin amah in Ashdod gam sung le Filistia-te’ gam sung mun dangte-ah khuapite a lam hi.
Filistia mite, Gurbaal-ah a teeng Arab mite le Meunim mite a dona-ah Pasian in amah huh hi.
Ammon mite in Uzziah tungah siah puak uh a, amah a thahat mahmah suak ahih manin a minthanna in Egypt gam ciang dong nangawn zel hi.
Tua tham loin Uzziah in Jerusalem a Kiu Kongpi le a Kuam Kongpi le Kulh Keen sanah tausangte lam a, tuate kulh tawh a um hi.

Tua ciangin amah in gamlakah tausangte lam a, Shefelah le zanglei-ah ganhon tampi nei ahih manin tuikhuk tampi to a, lei nasep uuk ahih manin mual tung le lei hoihna gamte-ah lokhote le leenggui puahte a nei hi.

Tua tham loin Uzziah in kumpipa’ khutnuai-ah galkap ukte khat ahi Hananiah’ ukna nuai-ah, lai-at Jeiel le ulian Maaseiah in mi a khop lai-in a khen khenin a koih a mi phazah mah bangin, galsim dingin a hoih galkap tampi a nei hi.
A thahat galkapmaang a vekpi-in tulnih le zaguk ahi hi.
Amaute’ ukna nuai-ah galdona-ah kumpipa a huh dingin thahatna tawh gal a do thei ding galkap tul zanga om hi.
Uzziah in galkap khempeuh adingin lumte, teipite, sik lukhute, thalte, lot ding suangtangte a bawl hi.

Amah in thaltangte le suang liante lot nadingin tausang omna munte le a kiute-ah koih ding, mi a siamte in a bawltawm sette, Jerusalem-ah a bawl hi. Amah a thahat dong a lamdangpi khatin kihuh ahih manin ama minthanna in gamlapi a zel hi.

Ahih hangin amah a thahat ciangin a siat nadingin a kiphatsakna hong khang hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa a Pasian tungah amah khial a, paknamtui biakna tau tungah paknamtui hal dingin Topa’ biakinn sungah a lut hi.
Ahih hangin Topa’ siampi Azariah, a thahat mihing sawmgiat tawh ama nungah pai hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Kumpi Uzziah nialin ama kiangah, “Uzziah aw, Topa’ tungah paknamtui hal ding nangma hih ding hi lo hi. Paknamtui hal dingin a ki-ap, Aaron’ suan siampite’ hih ding ahi hi. Biakinn sung panin pai khia in; bang hang hiam cih leh na gamta khial a, hih bang hihna in Topa Pasian tung panin nang’ tungah pahtawina hong tun lo ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Uzziah a heh suak hi. Tu-in amah in paknamtui a hal dingin a khut sungah paknamtui beel tawi a, siampite tungah a hehna hangin paknamtui biakna tau gei Topa’ biakinn sung siampite’ muhin ama taltangah phaknatna hong suak khia hi.

Tua ciangin siampi lian Azariah le siampi khempeuh in amah a et uh ciangin a taltangah phaknatna na nei hi. Tua ciangin amaute in manlang takin amah sawn khia uh a, Topa in amah vat khin ahih manin a mahmah zong a pai khia dingin nawhtat hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a sih ni dong Kumpi Uzziah a phak hi a, amah miphak ahih manin inn tuam khatah a teeng hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ biakinn panin amah kipuaseh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Jotham in tua gam mite a uk hi.
Tu-in Uzziah’ gamtatna a omlaite, a patna panin a tawp dong, Amoz’ tapa kamsang Isaiah in gelh hi.
Uzziah si a, amaute in kumpite’ neihsa hanah vui loin a huang sungah a vui uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Amah a phak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Jotham in ama tangin a uk hi.
Jotham in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawm le kum guk sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Jerushah hi a, Zadok’ tanu ahi hi.
A pa Uzziah hihsa khempeuh bangin
Jotham in
Tua tham loin amah in Judah mual tung gamah khuapite le sing tamna mualte tungah munmuanhuaite le tausangte a lam hi.

Amah in Ammon kumpipa sim a, amaute a zo hi. Tua ciangin Ammon mite in tua kumin ama tungah ngun talen zakhat, mangbuh lawh tul sawm, le mangbuhham lawh tul sawm mah a puak uh hi. Ammon mite in ama tungah a kum nihna le a kum thumna kumin tua zah mah a puak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin
Tu-in Jotham’ gamtatna a omlaite le a galsimnate le a omziate,
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nga pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawm le kum guk sung uk hi.
Tua ciangin Jotham si a, David khuapi sungah amaute in amah a vui uh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Ahaz in ama tangin a uk hi.
Ahaz in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawm le kum guk sung uk hi. A pu David gamtat hoih bangin Topa’ mitah a man gamta lo a,
Israel kumpite’ khekhap zui zaw hi. Amah in a kisung milimte nangawn Baal-te adingin a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Hinnom’ tapa’ kuamah paknamtui hal a, Topa in Israel-te’ mai-ah a hawl khiat minamte in a zat uh a kihhuai gamtatnate mah bangin biakna-in a tapate a hal hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mual dawna biakpiaknate le mual neute le singniim nuai khempeuh ah biakna pia-in paknamtui a hal hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Syria kumpipa khut sungah amah pia a, amah in zo-in mi tampi salin Damaskas-ah a ciahpih hi. Israel kumpipa’ khut sungah zong amah kipia a, amah zo-in a mite tampi tak a that hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a pu a pate uh Pasian, Topa nusia uh ahih manin Remaliah’ tapa Pekah in nikhat thu-in amaute galhang mihing tul zakhat le tul sawmnih, Judah gam sungah a that hi.
Tua ciangin Efraim mi a thahat Zikri in Kumpi Ahaz’ tapa Maaseiah le kumpi inn a uk Azrikam le kumpipa zomah aana a nei Elkanah a that hi.
Israel mite in amau’ beh Judah mite lak panin numeite, tapate le tanute, mihing tul zanih salin a man uh hi. Amaute in amau’ kiang panin van tampi zong la-in tua vante Samaria-ah a ciahpih uh hi.

Ahih hangin Oded min nei Topa’ kamsang khat tua lai-ah om hi. Samaria-ah hong tung galkapte a dawn dingin amah pai khia-in amaute kiangah, “En un, Judah tungah na pu na pate uh Pasian Topa heh ahih manin note’ khut sungah amaute hong pia a, ahih hangin note in heh mahmahna tawh amaute na that uh a, tua in vantung dong ban hi.
Tu-in note in Judah mi le Jerusalem mi, numei le pasalte, na sal dingun nuaisiah na sawm uh hi. Topa na Pasian uh tungah nomau mahmah in khialhna nei hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Tu-in ka thugen hong za unla, na behte uh kiang panin na lak uh na galmatte uh puakkik un; bang hang hiam cih leh note tungah Topa’ hehna a lauhuai om hi,” a ci hi.
Efraim mi ukpite pawkhat, Johanan’ tapa Azariah, Meshillemoth’ tapa Berekhiah, Shallum’ tapa Jehizkiah le Hadlai’ tapa Amasa, galsung panin hong tungte’ langkhat ah pangin

amaute kiangah, “Tuhun a i khialhnate le i mawhna behlapin Topa’ tungah mawhna eite tungah behlap hong sawm na hih manun hih lai-ah galmatte nong tunpih kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh i mawhna lian khinzo a, Israel tungah a lauhuai hehna om hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin galhiam tawi mite in uliante le a kikhawm khempeuh’ mai-ah galmatte le a lak uh nate nusia uh hi.

Tua ciangin tua na a sem dingin mite dingin galmatte la uh a, amaute lakah guaktangin a omte, a vanlakte uh sung pan puante silhsak uh hi. Amaute puan silhsak uh a, khedap kaihte pia-in anletui vak uh a, sathau nilh uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute lakah a tha ginalote la tungah pua uh a, nisuh khuapi ahi Jerikho khua amau’ behte kiangah paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin Samaria-ah amaute ciahkik uh hi.
Tua hun laitakin Kumpi Ahaz in Assiria kumpipa kiangah huhna a ngen dingin mi a sawl hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Edom mite in Judah simkikin zo uh a, galmatin a mite pua khia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Filistia mite in Shefelah le Judah-te’ Negeb gam sung khuapite luh uh a, Bethshemesh, Aijalon, Gederoth, Soko a khuaneute tawh, Timnah a khuaneute tawh le Gimzo a khuaneute tawh la uh a, amaute tua munah teeng uh hi.
Judah Kumpi Ahaz pen Judah mite tungah kihihsakna tawh gamta-in Topa’ tungah citak lo ahih manin ama hangin Topa in Judah mite niamkoih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Ahaz’ ngetna zui-in Assiria kumpipa Tiglathpileser hong kuan hi. Ahi zongin amah thakhauhsak zaw loin gimsak zaw hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ahaz in Topa’ biakinn, kumpipa’ inn le uliante’ inn panin vanmanphate la-in Assiria kumpipa tungah siah pia a, ahih hangin hihte khempeuh a kimanna om lo hi.
Hih Kumpi Ahaz mah pen, a lungkham hunin Topa’ tungah citak lo zaw lai hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amah a zo Damaskas-te’ pasian-te tungah biakna pia-in, “Syria kumpite’ pasian-te in amaute huh ahih manin amaute in kei hong huh theih nadingun amau’ tungah biakna ka pia ding hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin tua pasian-te pen amah le a mipihte khempeuh’ siatna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Ahaz in Pasian’ biakinn-a umlebeelte khawmin satnen a, tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn kongkhakte a kalhcip hi. Tua ciangin ama adingin Jerusalem kiu khempeuh ah biakna tau a bawl hi.
Amah in pasian dangte tungah paknamtui hal nadingin Judah khuapi khempeuh ah mual dawna biakpiaknate bawl a, a pu a pate’ Pasian, Topa a heh nadingin a phin hi.
Tu-in ama gamtatna a omlaite le a omzia khempeuh, a patna panin a tawpna dong, Judah le Israel Kumpite’ Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Ahaz si a, amaute in Jerusalem khuapi sungah vui uh a, ahi zongin Judah kumpite tawh vuikhawm lo uh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Hezekiah in ama tangin a uk hi.
Hezekiah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnih le kua sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Abijah hi a, Zekhariah’ tanu ahi hi.
A pu David’ hihnasa khempeuh bangin Topa’ mitah a man gamta hi.
Ama uk a kum khatna, a kha masa sungin amah in Topa’ biakinn kongkhakte hongin tuate a puah hi.
Amah in siampite le Levi mite paipihin nisuahna lam mun awngah amaute khawmin
amaute kiangah, “Levi mite aw, ka thugen hong za un! Tuni-in nomau kisiansuah unla, na pu na pate uh Pasian, Topa’ biakinn siangthosakin a ninsak thei na khempeuh siangtho mun panin nawn khia un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh i pute i pate citak lo a, Topa i Pasian’ muhna-ah a sia gamta uh hi. Amaute in amah nusia-in, Topa i Pasian’ muhna-ah a sia gamta uh hi. Amaute in amah nusia-in, Topa’ tenna panin a mai uh hei khia uh a, a nung uh ngat uh hi.
Amaute in innliim kongkhakte zong khakin meivakte sumit uh a, siangtho munah paknamtui halna le meihal biaknate Israel Pasian tungah bawl lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah le Jerusalem tungah Topa’ hehna hong tung a, note’ mit mahmah tawh na muh uh mah bangin amah in amaute a cikzethuai, lamdangsakna le a dipkuathuai-in a bawl hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh en un, hih thu hangin namsau-in i pu i pate puk uh a, i tapate, i tanute le i zite galmatin om uh hi.
Tu-in a lauhuai a hehna eite tung pan a kiheikhiat theih nadingin Israel Pasian, Topa tawh thuciamna khat bawl ding ka lungsimah om hi.
Ka tate aw, Topa in ama omna-ah a ding ding, ama na a sem ding le ama nasemte hi-in ama tungah paknamtui a hal dingin note hong teel khin ahih manin tu-in mawk om kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Levi mite, Kohath’ beh sung panin Amasai’ tapa Mahath le Azariah’ tapa Joel; Merari’ beh sung panin Abdi’ tapa Kish le Jehallelel’ tapa Azariah;
Elizafan’ beh sung panin Shimri le Jeuel; Asaf’ beh sung panin Zekhariah le Mattaniah;
Heman’ beh sung panin Jehiel le Shimei; Jeduthun’ beh sung panin Shemaiah le Uzziel kipan uh hi.
Amaute in a sanggamte uh khawmin amau kisiansuah uh a, Topa’ genna tawh kumpipa’ thupiak bangin Topa’ biakinn a puahsiang dingin a tum uh hi.

A puahsiang dingin Topa’ biakinn sung tawngnungah a siampite lut uh a, Topa’ biakinn sunga a muh uh a nin khempeuh Topa’ biakinn tualah hong pai khiatpih uh hi. Tua ciangin Levi mite in la-in Kidron lui-ah pua khia uh hi.

Kha masa a ni masa ni-in amaute in siansuah ding kipan uh a, tua kha a ni giat ni-in Topa’ innlimah amaute hong pai uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in ni giat sung Topa’ biakinn siansuah uh a, a kha masa a ni sawm le guk ni-in zo uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa Hezekiah kiangah amaute tumin, “Topa’ biakinn khempeuh, meihal biakna tau le a nazatte khempeuh le Ompihna Anlum sabuai le a nazatte khempeuh ka puahsiang khin uh hi.
Kumpi Ahaz a cihtak loh laitakin ama uk sungin a paihkhiat nazat khempeuh a baihsa-in bawlin ka siansuah uh hi. Topa’ biakna tau mai-ah tu-in tuate om hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa Hezekiah tho baihin khuapi sung zaneite khawmin Topa’ biakinn-ah a paito uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in kumpi gam le biakinn le Judah adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in bawngtal sagih, tuutal sagih, tuuno sagih le keel sagih hong paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ biakna tau tungah tuate a pia dingin Aaron’ suan siampite a sawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a bawngtalte go uh a, siampite in a sisan la-in biakna tau tungah theh uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tuutalte go-in a sisan tawh biakna tau theh uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tuunote go-in a sisan tawh biakna tau theh uh hi.
Tua ciangin khialhna hanga biakna ding keeltal sagihte kumpipa le a kikhawmte kiangah hong kipaipih a, amaute in tuate tungah a khut uh nga hi;

tua ciangin Israel khempeuh adingin pumkhat suahna bawl nadingin siampite in go-in tuate’ sisan tawh biakna tau tungah khialhna hanga biakna a bawl uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel khempeuh adingin meihal biakna le khialhna hanga biakna a bawl ding uh kumpipa in thu pia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in David le kumpipa’ thumu pa Gad le kamsang Nathan’ thupiakna bangin Topa’ biakinn sungah daltuahte, harp lasaknate le laiza lasaknate tawh Levi mite a koih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua thupiakna pen kamsangte’ tungtawnin Topa’ kiang pan a hong pai ahi hi.
David’ lasaknate tawh Levi mite ding uh a, peengkulte tawh siampite ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin biakna tau tungah meihal biakna a kipiakna ding Hezekiah in thu a pia hi. Meihal biakna a kipat ciangin Topa’ tungah lasakna zong kipan a, Israel kumpi David’ lasaknate in peengkulte pawm hi.
A kikhawm khempeuh in Pasian bia-in, lasate in la sa uh a, peengkul tumte in peengkul tum uh hi. Meihal biakna a kiman mateng hihte khempeuh hih paisuak uh hi.
Biakpiakna a kiman ciangin kumpipa le amah tawh a om khempeuhte kunin Pasian a bia uh hi.

Tua ciangin David’ kammalte le thumu pa Asaf’ kammalte zangin Topa’ tungah phatna la a sak nadingun kumpipa Hezekiah le uliante in Levi mite thu a pia uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in lungdamna tawh phatna late sa uh a, tua ciangin amaute kunin Pasian a bia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in, “Tu-in Topa’ tungah nomau mah na ki-ap khin uh hi. A nai-ah hong pai unla Topa’ biakinn-ah biakpiaknate le lungdam piaknate hong paipih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a kikhawmte in biakpiaknate le lungdam piaknate hong paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin piaknopna lungsim a nei khempeuh in meihal biaknate hong paipih uh hi.
A kikhawmte in a hong paipih meihal biakna a phazah bawngtal sawmsagih, tuutal zakhat le tuuno zanih hi a, hihte khempeuh pen Topa’ tungah meihal biakna khat ahi hi.
A ki-ap biaknate bawngtal zaguk le tuu tulthum ahi hi.

Ahih hangin siampite a mi tawmlua uh ahih manin meihal biaknate khempeuh a vun hawk khin zo lo uh a, siampi dangte a kisiansuah ma sungteng, a sanggam uh Levi mite in nasep a kizawh mateng amaute huh uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kisiansuahna thu-ah siampite sangin Levi mite ngentel zaw uh hi.
Meihal biakna a tampite banah thunuama biakna thaute le meihal biakna adingin leenggahzu tawh biaknate om hi. Tua bangin Topa’ biakinn sungah nasepna ki-omsakkik hi.
Pasian in mite adingin a bawlsak thute hangin Hezekiah le mi khempeuh lungdam uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua thu thakhatin hong piangvat hi.

Israel Pasian, Topa’ Paisan Pawi a bawl dingin Jerusalem-a Topa’ biakinn-ah hong pai nadingun Hezekiah in Israel mi khempeuh le Judah mite kiangah mi sawl a, Efraim mite le Manasseh mite tungah zong laikhakte a gelh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa le a uliante le Jerusalem-a a kikhawm khempeuh in Paisan Pawi a kha nihna sungin bawl ding kikum khin uh hi.
Siampite mi a kicingzah ding amau kisiansuah nai lo uh a, mite zong Jerusalem-ah kikhawm nai lo uh ahih manin a hunin bawl thei lo uh hi.
Hih geelna pen kumpipa le a kikhawm khempeuh adingin hoih leh kilawm hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite hong pai-in Israel Pasian, Topa adingin Jerusalem-ah Paisan Pawi a bawl nadingun Beersheba panin Dan ciang dong Israel sung khempeuh ah taangkona khat a bawlna ding uh thukhensatna khat bawl uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh bawl dinga a kigen bangin amaute in a lianpi-in bawl ngei lo uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa le a uliante kiang pan a laikhakte tawh Israel khempeuh le Judah sungah laikhakte tawh pai uh a, kumpipa’ thupiakna: “Israel mite aw, Assiria kumpite’ khut sung panin a suakta, a omlai note’ lamah amah hong kiheikik theih nadingin Abraham, Isaac le Israel Pasian, Topa’ lamah kiheikik un.
Note in na theih uh bangin, amau’ pute pate’ Topa Pasian’ tungah a cihtak lohna uh hangin nakpitakin gim a piak na pute na pate uh le na sanggamte uh bang kei un.

Tu-in na pute na pate uh bangin lungkhauh kei unla, note kiang panin a lauhuai ama hehna a kiheikhiat theih nadingin Topa’ lamah kipia unla, amah in a tawntung dingin a sianthosaksa a biakinn-ah Topa na Pasian uh bia un.

Bang hang hiam na cih uhleh Topa’ lamah note na kilehkik uhleh, na sanggamte uh le na tate un amau a mante’ tung panin hehpihna ngahin hih gamah hong ciahkik ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian uh dikna le hehpihna a nei hi a, ama lamah na kiheikik nak-uhleh note kiang panin a maitang hei khia lo ding hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Efraim le Manasseh gam sung khuapi khat pan khuapi khat le Zebulun ciang dongah laitaite a pai uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in na nuihsanin zahpih uh a, na simmawh bawl uh hi.
Asher mi, Manasseh le Zebulun mi tawmkhat bek kiniamkhiatin Jerusalem-ah hong pai uh hi.
Topa’ thupiakna tawh kumpipa le uliante’ sawlna a sem dingin Judah mite tungah Pasian in lungsim kikhatna a guan hi.
Tua ciangin a kha nihna sungin silngo sawh loh anlum pawi a bawl dingin Jerusalem-ah mihon tampi tak hong pai uh hi.
Amaute nasem dingin kipanin Jerusalem-a biakna taute hem khia uh a, paknamtui halna ding biakna taute khempeuh amaute in la khia-in Kidron kuamah paai uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in a kha nihna a ni sawm le li ni-in Paisan Pawi tuuno go uh hi. Tua ciangin biakna vai-in a siangtho nai lo siampite le Levi mite nakpitakin maizum uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amau mah kisiansuahin Topa’ biakinn sungah meihal biaknate hong paipih uh hi.
Pasian’ mipa Moses’ thukham bangin amaute in amau’ panmun ngei hong la uh a, siampite in Levi mite’ khut tung panin a ngah uh sisan theh uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a kikhawm lakah amau mah a kisiansuah nai lo tampi om uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ tungah a siangtho-in a kibawl nadingun a nin khempeuh adingin Levi mite in Paisan Pawi tuuno a gawh ding uh kisam hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh mi tampi tak, Efraim, Manasseh, Issakhar le Zebulun sung pan, amau mah kisiansuah nai lo uh a, ahi zongin ngeina lopi-in amaute in Paisan Pawi ne uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Hezekiah in amaute adingin thu ngenin, “Ka pute ka pate uh’ Pasian a dik Topa aw,
biakinn sianthona ngeina om bangin lungsim tak tawh nang hong biate khempeuh’ mawhna maisak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Hezekiah’ thungetna pia-in mite’ mawhna maisak a, gimna ngahsak lo hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah a om Israel mite in lungdamna lianpi tawh ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum pawi a bawl uh hi. Tua ciangin Levi mite le siampite in a hatna khempeuh uh tawh Topa la sak uh a, a ni ni-in Topa phat uh hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Topa’ nasepna-ah a siamna hoih uh a lak Levi mite khempeuh tungah hanthotna thu a gen hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite in pawi an ni sagih sung ne uh a, thunuama biakna pia-in a pu a pate uh Pasian, Topa tungah lungdamna a ko uh hi.
Tua ciangin adang ni sagih sung mah tua pawi a bawlthuah lai ding uh a kikhawm khempeuh thukim uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in lungdamna tawh adang ni sagih sung mah bawlthuah uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah kumpipa Hezekiah in biakpiak nadingin a kikhawmte tungah bawngtal tulkhat le tuu tulsagih pia a, uliante in a kikhawmte tungah bawngtal tulkhat le tuu tul sawm pia uh hi. Siampite tampi tak amau mah kisiansuah uh hi.

Judah mi a kikhawm khempeuh le siampite le Levi mite le Israel panin a hong pai khia a kikhawm khempeuh le Israel gam panin a hong pai khia peemtate le Judah gam sungah a teeng peemtate, lungdam uh hi.
Israel kumpi David’ tapa Solomon hun a kipanin Jerusalem-ah hih bang om ngei lo ahih manin Jerusalem-ah lungdamna lianpi a om hi.
Tua ahih ciangin siampite le Levi mite dingin mite thupha pia uh a, amau’ awging kiza-in, amau’ thungetna in vantung a a siangtho ama tenna a banto hi.

Tu-in hihte khempeuh a man ciangin, tua lai-a a om Israel khempeuh Judah khuapite-ah pai-in biakna songte sat khamin Asherah milimte phukin, Judah le Benjamin sung le Efraim le Manasseh sunga mual dawna biakpiaknate le biakna taute a suksiat khit mateng uh phelkek uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh, a mi kimin amau’ inn omna a khuapi ciat uhah a ciah uh hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in siampite le Levi mite amau’ nasep ciat tawh kizui-in a khen a khenin seh a, siampite le Levi mite in meihal biaknate le thunuama biaknate pia-in, Topa’ biakinn sung phual tuamtuamte-ah na semin lungdamkohna le phatna a bawl ding uh ahi hi.

Kumpipa in ama neihsa sung panin a piakte pen meihal biakna ding ahi hi. Topa’ thukham sungah a kigelh mah bangin zing le nitak a meihal biaknate, Sabbath nite, Khadet nite le a kiseh pawite adingin meihal biaknate ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ thukham om bangin nasepna-ah siampite le Levi mite a kibuppiak theih nadingun amau’ ngah ding a kilawm nate, Jerusalem-a a teeng mite in amaute tungah a piak nadingun amah in a sawl hi.

Tua thupiakna a kitheihthang phetin Israel mite in anpalte, leenggahzu le lo-a piang khempeuh tampi tak hong pia uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in na khempeuh sung pan sawm-ah-khat ahi tampi tak hong paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah khuapite sungah a teeng Israel mite le Judah mite in zong bawng le tuu sawm-ah-khat le Topa a Pasian uh tungah a kipiasa a ki-ap nate hong paipih uh a, a lom a lomin a koih uh hi.
A kha thumna sungin amaute in tua a lomte cian ding kipan uh a, a kha sagihna sungin a mansiang uh hi.
Hezekiah le uliante hong pai-in a lomte a muh uh ciangin amaute in Topa le ama mi Israel-te thupha a pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in a lomte’ thu, siampite le Levi mite a dong hi.

Zadok’ suan ahi siampi lianpen pa Azariah in amah dawngin, “Amaute in amau’ piakte uh Topa’ biakinn sungah paipih ding hong kipat uh a kipan kote in an ka ne uh a, a kicing nei-in tampi vallai hi. Topa in ama mite thupha pia ahih manin hih na tampi a omlai i nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ biakinn sungah inndeite a bawlna ding uh Hezekiah in thu pia a, amaute in zong a deite a bawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a piaknate, sawm-ah-khat le a ki-ap nate cihtakna tawh hong paipih uh hi. Tuate a en ulian pen pa Levi mi Konaniah hi a, a sanggampa Shimei pen amah a huhpa ahi hi.

Kumpipa Hezekiah le Pasian’ biakinn ukpa Azariah’ sehna tawh Jehiel, Azaziah, Nahath, Asahel, Jerimoth, Jozabad, Eliel, Ismakhiah, Mahath le Benaiah-te in Konaniah le a sanggampa Shimei huhin a ukte ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin nisuahna lam kulhkongpi cing pa, Levi mi Imnah tapa Kore pen Topa ading le siangtho pen biak nadingin koihcing dingin a kipiate a sehkhen dingin, Topa’ tungah utthu-a piaknate a ukpa ahi hi.

Eden, Miniamin, Jeshua, Shemaiah, Amariah le Shekaniah-te in siampite’ khuapi sungah a moi a ham a kibangin a khen khenin, a ngah ding ciat a sanggamte uh tungah a hawm dingin cihtakna tawh amah huh uh hi.

Khangsimna-a amau’ kiciamtehna tawh kisai-in a kipia hi tuan loin, a khen khenin amau’ panmun tawh kizui-in nisimin nasepna-ah a kisam bangin Topa’ biakinn sungah a lut, kum thum le a tungsiah a pha pasal khempeuh tungah tanh kipia kim hi.
Siampite a beh zui-in nasep kipia hi. Levi mi kum sawmnih le a tungsiahte a khen khenin amau’ panmun tawh kizui-in nasep kipia hi.
Siampite a naupangte khempeuh, a zite, a tapate le a tanute uh tawh a mihon bupin kiciamteh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a siangtho-in a kikepna uhah amaute citak uh hi.

Amau’ khuapite-a’ ahi taang gam lote-ah a om Aaron’ suan siampite ading ahihleh, a kiciamteh siampite’ lak le Levi mite lakah pasal khempeuh tungah amau’ ngah ding ciat a hawm khia dingin a minin a kiseh mi, khuapi tampite sungah a om hi.
Tua bangin Hezekiah in Judah gam sung khempeuh ah hih hi. Amah in Topa a Pasian’ mai-ah a hoih le a manin gamta-in cihtakna tawh a sem hi.
Amah in Pasian’ biakinn sung nasepna le thukham le thupiaknate tawh kizui-in a hihna-ah ama Pasian zongin, a lungsim khempeuh tawh sem a, a maa a vang hi.
Hih thute khempeuh le citak a hih banga na a kisep khit ciangin Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib hong pai-in Judah simin kulhnei khuapite’ langkhat ah phual sat a, ama adingin lak a sawm hi.
Sennakherib hong pai-in Jerusalem sim ding a sawmna thu Hezekiah in a theih ciangin,
amah in a uliante le a mi thahatte tawh khuapi pualamah a luang khia tuinakte khakcip ding vaihawm a, amaute in amah a huh uh hi.
Mi tampi tak kikhawm uh a, gam sungah a luang tuinak le lui khempeuh khakcipin, “Bang hangin Assiria kumpite hong pai-in tui tampi mu ding ahi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Amah in lungsim khotakin sep ding kipan a, a cimsa kulh khempeuh ciangpha-in tua tungah tausangte koihto a, tua pualamah kulh dang khat a ciang hi. Amah in David khuapi sungah Millo a muanhuai-in a bawlpha hi. Amah in galhiamte le lumte zong tampi bawl hi.
Amah in mite a uk dingin galdona-ah a ukte koih a, khuapi kulhkongpi mun awnna ama kiangah amaute khawmin amaute tungah hanthotna tawh thu genin,
“Thakhauh unla hang un. Assiria kumpipa le amah tawh a om mihon khempeuh mai-ah lau kei unla, zong lungkia kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah tawh a omte sangin eite tawh a om pa lian zaw hi.

Amah in mihing thahatna nei a, ahih hangin eite hong huhin i gal hong dosak dingin Topa i Pasian in eite hong ompih hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite in Judah kumpipa Hezekiah’ kammalte a muang uh hi.
Hih thute khit ciangin a galkap khempeuh tawh Lakhish a umcih, Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib in Judah kumpipa Hezekiah le Jerusalem-ah a om Judah mi khempeuh kiang Jerusalem-ah a nasemte sawlin,
“Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Note in Jerusalem umcihna na nanna ding uh bang suang na hi uh hiam?

Hezekiah in note kiangah, “Assiria kumpipa’ khut panin Topa i Pasian in eite hong hon khia ding hi,” hong cih ciangin, note gilkial dangtakin a hong sisak dingin amah in note hong makai khial hi lo ahi hiam?

Hih Hezekiah mah in mual dawna a biakpiaknate le ama biakna taute la khia-in Judah le Jerusalem thu pia a, “Biakna tau khat mai-ah note in bia-in tua tungah na biakpiaknate uh na hal ding uh hi,” ci hi lo ahi hiam?
Keimah le ka pu ka pate in gamdang mi khempeuh tungah ka hihnasate uh thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua gam minamte’ pasian in keima khut sung panin a gam uh hon khia zo ahi uh hiam?
Na Pasian un keima khut sung panin note hong hotkhiat theih nadingin ka pu ka pate in a suksiat mang tua minamte’ pasian khempeuh lakah kua in a mite hon khia zo ngei ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note, Hezekiah’ khemsa-in ta kei unla, hih bangin kimakai khialsak kei un. Amah um kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh minam khatpeuh, kumpi gam khatpeuh’ pasian in keima khut pan ahi a, ka pu ka pate’ khut sung pan ahi zongin a mite hon khia zo ngei nai lo hi. Keima khut sung pan na Pasian un note hong hon khia zo lo zaw kan ding hi,’ ci un,” a cisak hi.
Tua ciangin ama nasemte in Topa Pasian le a nasem pa Hezekiah langpangin thu tam zaw gen lai uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Israel Pasian, Topa’ hehna ding le amah a langpanna-in laikhakte gelh a, “Ka khut sung panin a mite a hon khia zo lo gam sung minam dangte’ pasian-te mah bangin ka khut sung panin Hezekiah’ Pasian in a mite hon khia zo lo ding hi,” ci hi.
Amaute in khuapi a lak theih nadingin khuapi mite lau-in a liinglawnsak nadingun kulh tungah a om Jerusalem mite tungah Judah pau tawh nakpitakin kiko uh hi.
Amaute in, mite’ khut tawh a kibawl leitung mite’ pasian-te a gen bang lelun Jerusalem Pasian a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa Hezekiah le Amoz’ tapa, kamsang Isaiah in hih thu hangin thu ngenin vantung lamah kiko uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Assiria kumpipa’ giahphual ah a thahat galhang khempeuh le galkap a ukte le uliante a susia vantungmi khat a sawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama gamah maizumna tawh a ciahkik hi. Ama pasian’ inn sungah amah a tun ciangin ama tapate pawlkhat in namsau tawh amah satlum uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib’ khut le ama galte khempeuh panin Hezekiah le Jerusalem-a a teengte hon khia a, amah in mun khempeuh panin galdaihna amaute tungah a pia hi.
Tua ciangin mi tampi in Jerusalem khua Topa kiangah letsongte hong puakin, Judah kumpi Hezekiah kiangah na manphate hong puak uh a, tua hun a kipanin minam khempeuh’ muhna-ah amah kisangtawi hi.
Tua hun lai-in Hezekiah cina-in si dektak a, amah in Topa’ tungah thu ngen hi. Topa in a ngetna pia-in ama tungah lim khat a pia hi.

Ahih hangin a lungsim kiphasak ahih manin ama tungah phattuamna a kibawl zahin Topa’ tungah Hezekiah in lungdam ko nuam lo hi. Tua ahih manin amah le Judah le Jerusalem tungah Topa’ hehna hong tung hi.
Ahi zongin a nung ciangin Hezekiah a lungsim kiphatsakna thu-ah amah le Jerusalem-a teeng mite tawh kiniamkhiat uh ahih manin amaute’ tungah Topa’ hehna hong tung lo hi.
Hezekiah hau mahmahin a min thang mahmah hi. Amah in ngun, kham, suangmanphate, a namtui nate, lumte, a manpha umlebeel khempeuh adingin vanmanpha koihnate a bawl hi.
An, leenggahzu le sathau koihna ding vankoihnate zong a bawl hi. Ganhing nam khempeuh adingin ganbukte le tuubukte a bawl hi.
Amah in tua bangmahin a mahmah adingin khuapite le tuuhonte le ganhonte tampi a koih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama tungah neihsa tampi tak pia hi.
Hih Hezekiah mah in Gihon tui tungnungte khaktanin David khuapi nitumna lampangah luangsak hi. Hezekiah a nasepna khempeuh ah a maa vang hi.

Tua ahih ciangin gam sung omzia lim a kan dingin ama kiangah a kisawl Babylon uliante’ kamtaite tawh kisai-in, amah a ze-etna ding le ama lungsim sungah bang om hiam cih a vekpi-in a theih nadingin Pasian in ama thu-in amah a omsak hi.
Tu-in Hezekiah’ gamtatna a omlaite le ama nasep hoihte, Judah le Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sung le Amoz’ Tapa, Kamsang Isaiah’ Maangmuhna sungah kigelh hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah si a, amaute in David’ suante’ han paina mualpangah amah vui uh hi. Judah mi khempeuh le Jerusalem-a teengte in a sih lai-in amah zahtakna bawl uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tapa Manasseh in ama tangin a uk hi.
Manasseh in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm le kum nih pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnga le nga sung uk hi.
Topa in Israel minamte’ mai-ah a hawl khiat minamte’ zat a kihhuai gamtatnate mah bangin, Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a pa Hezekiah in a suksiatsa mual dawna biakpiaknate amah in lamkikin, Baal-te adingin biakna taute phut a, Asherah milimte bawlin vantung nate khempeuh bia a, tuate’ na sem hi.
Topa in, “Jerusalem-ah ka min om tawntung ding hi,” a cihna Topa’ biakinn sungah amah in biakna taute a lam hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ biakinn tual nihte sungah vantung nate khempeuh adingin biakna taute lam hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Hinnom’ tapa’ kuamah biakna-in a tapate hal a, aisanna le mailam thugen kholhna le khongkhaina zang a, vankah theite le aisante tawh na semkhawm hi. Amah in Topa’ muhna-ah siatna tampi bawl a, amah hehsak hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in David le a tapa Solomon tungah, “Amaute ka thupiak khempeuh, thukham khempeuh, ngeinate le Moses tungtawnin a kipia biakna ngeina kipte zuih ding a kidop nak-uhleh, Israel minam khempeuh sung panin ka teelkhiat hih biakinn sung le Jerusalem sungah ka min ka koih tawntung ding hi. Tua ciangin na pu na pate uh adingin ka sehsa gam panin Israel-te ka khin khia nawn kei ding hi,” a cih Pasian’ biakinn sungah amah in ama bawlsa milim koih hi.
Manasseh in Judah le Jerusalem-a teengte zol ahih manin, Israel mite’ mai-ah Topa in a suksiat minamte sangin amaute a sia tam zaw gamta uh hi.
Topa in Manasseh tung le ama mite tungah thu gen a, ahih hangin amaute in don lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Assiria kumpipa’ galkap ukte amau’ kiangah paipih a, amaute in sikkawite tawh Manasseh manin sumngo khau tawh khihin Babylon-ah a paipih uh hi.
Amah a lungkham ciangin Topa a Pasian kunh-in a pu a pate’ Pasian’ mai-ah nakpitakin a mahmah kiniamkhiat hi.

Amah in ama kiangah thu ngen a, tua ciangin Pasian in ama kutna saangin, a thumna a ngai hi. Amah in Jerusalem-ah amah paipihkikin a kumpi gam a piakik hi. Tua ciangin Topa pen Pasian ahihna Manasseh in a thei hi.

Tua khit ciangin amah in kuam sung, Gihon nitumna lam, David khuapi-ah, Ngasa Kongpi lutna lamah kulh pua nung khat ciang a, Ofel kiimah ciang suakin a sang mahmahin ciangto hi. Amah in Judah gam sunga kulhnei khuapi khempeuh ah zong galkap a ukte koih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ biakinn panin gamdang pasian-te le a milim la khia a, Topa’ biakinn mual tung le Jerusalem-a ama lamsa biakna tau khempeuh la khia-in, khuapi pualamah tuate paai hi.
Amah in Topa’ biakna tau zong koihkikin tua tungah thunuama biakna le lungdamkohna a pia hi. Tua ciangin amah in Israel Pasian, Topa’ na a sep nadingun Judah-te thu a pia hi.
Ahi zongin mite in mual dawna biakpiaknate ah biakna pia lai uh a, ahih hangin Topa amaute’ Pasian’ tung bek mahah a piak uh ahi hi.
Tu-in Manasseh’ gamtatna a omlaite le a Pasian’ tungah a thungetna le Israel Pasian, Topa’ min tawh ama tungah thu a gen thumute’ thugente, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu sungah om hi.

Tua ciangin ama thungetna le ama kutna Pasian in a sanna le ama khialhna le a cihtak lohna khempeuh le amah a kiniamkhiat ma-in mual dawna biakpiaknate bawlin Asherah-te le milim dangte a koihna munte thu, Thumute’ Khang Tangthu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Manasseh si a, amaute in a inn sungah vui uh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Amon in ama tangin a uk hi.
Amon in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nih pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum nih sung uk hi.
A pa Manasseh’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi. Amon in a pa Manasseh’ bawlsa milim khempeuh tungah biakna pia a, tuate’ na sem hi.
A pa Manasseh a kiniamkhiat bangin Topa’ mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat lo a, hih Amon in mawhna tam piangsak semsem hi.
Tua ciangin ama nasemte in amah sawmsimin ama inn sungah amah that uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua gam mite in Kumpi Amon a sawmsim khempeuh that leuleu uh hi. Tua ciangin tua gam mite in ama tangin a tapa Josiah kumpi-in a koih uh hi.
Josiah in uk ding a kipatin kum giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmthum le khat sung uk hi.
Topa’ mitah a man gamta a, a pu David’ khekhap zui-in themkhat zong lampial lo hi.

Ama uk a kum giatna sung, naupang ahi laipi mahin, amah in a pu David’ Pasian zon ding kipan hi. A kum sawm le kum nihna ciangin amah in Judah le Jerusalem panin mual dawna biaknate, Asherah milimte le a kiseek le a kisung milimte beisiangsak ding kipan hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Baal-te’ biakna taute ama muhna-ah supaisak hi. Tua ciangin amah in tuate tungah a om paknamtui biakna taute phuk a, Asherah milimte le a kiseek le a kisung milimte sukhamin gawivui a, tuate’ tungah biakna a pia mite’ han tungah tua a vuite a theh hi.
Amah in amau’ biakna taute tungah a siampite’ guhte zong hal a, Judah le Jerusalem a siangsak hi.
Tua ciangin Manasseh, Efraim le Simeon le Naftali khuapi ciang dong, mun awngte le a kiim a pamah,
amah in biakna taute sukhamin Asherah milimte le milim dangte satvui a, Israel gam sung khempeuh ah paknamtui biakna taute a satvui hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah a ciahkik hi.

Tu-in ama uk a kum sawm le kum giatna, gam sung le biakinn a siansak khit ciangin, Topa a Pasian’ biakinn a puah dingin amah in Azariah’ tapa Shafan le khuapi sung ukpa Maaseiah le thu ciamteh pa ahi, Joahaz’ tapa Joah a sawl hi.

Siampi lianpen pa Hilkiah kiangah amaute hong pai uh a, kongcingte ahi Levi mite in Manasseh le Efraim le Israel a omlaite khempeuh le Judah le Benjamin khempeuh le Jerusalem-a a teeng mite tung panin a khop uh ahi, Pasian’ biakinn-ah a hong kipaipih sumte a pia uh hi.
Amaute in Topa’ biakinn a vaan nasemte tungah tua sumte pia uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn-ah a sem nasemte in biakinn puahna ding le a ngei batsakkik nadingin pia uh hi.
Amaute in a kito suangte leina ding le Judah kumpite in a siatsak, tep nadingin singte le biakinn lam nadingin innkamte lei nadingin khutsiamte le innlamte tungah a sumte a pia uh hi.

Tua ciangin mite in cihtakna tawh na sem uh hi. Amaute tungah a en dingin Levi mi Merari-te beh sung pan Jahath le Obadiah le Kohath-te beh sung pan Zekhariah le Meshullam kikoih hi. Levi mi, lasakna nazatte-ah siamna a nei khempeuh,
vangik puate a uk le nasep namkim a sem khempeuh a makaih uh hi. Tua ciangin Levi mi pawlkhatte pen laigelhte le za neite le kulhkongpi cingte ahi hi.
Amaute in Topa’ biakinn-ah a kipaipih sumte a lakkhiat laitakun siampi Hilkiah in Moses tungtawnin a kipia thukham laibu a mu hi.
Tua ciangin Hilkiah in lai-at pa Shafan kiangah, “Topa’ biakinn sungah thukham laibu ka mu hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Hilkiah in Shafan tungah a laibu pia hi.
Shafan in kumpipa kiangah a laibu paipihin ama kiangah, “Na nasemte tungah a kipia khempeuh amaute in a sep san laitak uh ahi hi.
Topa’ biakinn sungah a kikoih sumte amaute in la khia-in nasep vaante le nasemte tungah pia uh hi,” ci-in gen thuah lai hi.
Tua ciangin lai-at pa Shafan in kumpipa kiangah, “Siampi Hilkiah in kei tungah laibu khat hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Shafan in kumpipa mai-ah tua laibu a sim hi.
Kumpipa in thukham kammalte a zak ciangin a puante balkek hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Hilkiah, Shafan’ tapa Ahikam, Mikah’ tapa Abdon, lai-at pa Shafan le kumpipa’ nasem pa Asaiah thu pia-in,

“Pai unla, a kimu laibu sunga kammalte tawh kisai-in keima ading le Israel le Judah-ah a omlai mite adingin Topa thu va dong un; bang hang hiam cih leh i pu i pate in hih laibu sungah a kigelh khempeuh bangin sep ding Topa’ kammal na zui lo uh ahih manin eite tungah Topa’ hehna lian hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Hilkiah le kumpipa in a sawl mite, Hasrah, a tapa Tokhath, a tapa Shallum, biakinn puante a kem pa’ zi ahi kamsangnu Huldah kiangah pai-in (tu-in tua nu Jerusalem sung a Veeng Nihna-ah teeng hi) tua thu tawh kisai ama kiangah va gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua nu in amaute kiangah, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Kei kiangah note a hong sawl pa kiangah gen un.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: En un, Judah kumpipa mai-ah a kisim laibu sunga kigelh samsiatnate khempeuh ahi siatna, hih mun le a tungah a teeng mi khempeuh tungah ka tungsak ding hi.
Amaute in amau’ gamtatna tawh kei hong hehsak theih nadingun amaute in kei hong nusia-in pasian dangte tungah paknamtui hal uh ahih manin hih mun tungah ka hehna kisungin dai lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin Topa thu a dong dingin note a hong sawl Judah kumpipa tungah hih bangin na gen ding uh hi. Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Na zaksa thute tawh kisai-in,

hih mun le a tunga teengte langpanna ama kammal na zak ciangin na lungsim kisikin Pasian’ mai-ah na kiniamkhiat a, keima mai-ah nang kiniamkhiatin na puante balkekin ka mai-ah kap na hih manin, kei zong nang kong za hi, Topa in ci hi.

Na pate kiang kong zuansak dinga, hih mun le a tunga teengte tungah ka tunsak ding siatna khempeuh na mit in mu lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kumpipa kiangah a thu puakkik uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in mi sawlin Judah le Jerusalem upa khempeuh kaikhawm hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa, Judah mite le Jerusalem-a a teeng mite, siampite le Levi mite le mi khempeuh a lian a neu tawh, Topa’ biakinn-ah paito uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ biakinn sungah a kimu thuciamna laibu sunga thute khempeuh amau’ zakin a sim hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa ama munah dingin, hih laibu sungah a kigelh thuciamna kammalte a sem dingin a lungsim khempeuh le a nuntakna khempeuh tawh Topa’ nung a zuihna ding le ama thupiaknate, ama tecipannate le a thukhamte a zuihna ding, Topa’ mai-ah thuciamna khat a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Jerusalem le Benjamin sunga a om mi khempeuh hih thu a zuisak hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-a teeng mite zong amau’ pute pate’ Pasian ahi Pasian’ thuciamna bangin a gamta uh hi.

Tua ciangin Josiah in Israel mite’ neihsa gam sung khempeuh panin a kihhuaite khempeuh la khia a, Israel sunga om mi khempeuh Topa amaute’ Pasian’ na a semsak hi. Ama nuntak sung khempeuh amau’ pute pate’ Pasian ahi Topa zuihna panin amaute kihei khia lo uh hi.
Josiah in Topa adingin Jerusalem-ah Paisan Pawi bawl hi. Amaute in a kha masa a ni sawm le li ni-in Paisan Pawi tuuno go uh hi.
Amah in siampite amau’ panmunte-ah seh a, Topa’ biakinn sunga nasepna-ah amaute hanthawn hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Israel khempeuh hilhin Topa’ tungah a siangtho Levi mite tungah, “Israel kumpipa, David’ tapa Solomon in a lam biakinn sungah Thuciamna Singkuang siangtho koih un. Na liangko tung uhah na puak ding uh kisam nawn lo hi. Tu-in Topa na Pasian uh le ama mi Israel-te’ na sem un.
Note a khenkhenin na beh uh tawh kizui-in kithawi unla, Israel kumpipa David’ lamlahna le a tapa Solomon’ lamlahna zui un.
Tua ciangin mi nautang na sanggamte uh beh kikhenna tawh kizui-in siangtho munah ding uh henla, Levi minam beh tuamtuamte sung pan kihelkim un.
Tua ciangin Paisan Pawi bawlna ganhing go-in nomau mah kisiansuah unla, Moses’ tungtawnin Topa’ thugen bangin na sanggamte uh adingin kithawi un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Josiah in tua lai-a a om mi khempeuhte adingin Paisan Pawi piakna-in a ganhon panin mi nautangte tungah tuunote le keelnote tul sawmthum ciang dong le bawngtal tulthum a pia hi. Hihte pen kumpipa’ neihsa sung pan a kipia ahi hi.

Tua ciangin ama uliante in zong utna lungsim tawh mite tung, siampite tung le Levi mite tungah a pia uh hi. Pasian’ biakinn-ah ulianpite ahi Hilkiah, Zekhariah le Jehiel-te in siampite tungah Paisan Pawi bawl nadingin tuuno le keelno tulnih le zaguk le bawngtal zathum a pia uh hi.
Levi mi ukpite Konaniah, Shemaiah le a sanggam Nethanel, Hashabiah, Jeiel le Jozabad-te in Paisan Pawi piak nadingin Levi mite tungah tuuno le keelno tulnga le bawngtal zanga a pia uh hi.
Nasepna ding a kithawi khit uh ciangin, siampite amau’ munah ding uh a, kumpipa’ thupiakna bangin Levi mite amau’ khen sungah om uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Paisan tuuno go uh a, Levi mite in a vun a hawk laitakun siampite in amau’ tung panin a ngah uh sisan a theh uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, Moses laibu sungah a kigelh bangin Topa’ tungah piak dingin mi nautang sungah a innkuan a pawlpawl tawh kizui-in a hawm theih nadingun meihal biaknate a tuamkoih uh hi. Tua bangin amaute in bawngtalte zong a hih uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in biakna ngeina kip tawh kizui-in Paisan tuuno sa mei-ah a hang uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in beel sung, beelpi sung le sikbeel daite sungah a siangtho piaknate huan uh a, mi nautang khempeuh kiangah tuate manlang takin a puak uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin amau ading le siampite adingin amau mah in a sa bawl uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Aaron’ suan siampite zankim ciang dong meihal biakna pia-in manlah uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Levi mite in amau ading le Aaron’ suan siampite adingin a sa bawl uh hi.

David’ thupiak bangin Asaf’ behte ahi lasate le Asaf le Heman le kumpipa’ thumu pa Jeduthun-te amau’ munah om uh hi. Kulhkongpi cingte a kulhkongpi ciatah om uh a, amau’ sanggam Levi mite in amau adingin sa bawlsak uh ahih manin amau’ nasepna pan amaute a pai khiat ding uh kisam lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Josiah’ thupiakna bangin Paisan Pawi bawlna ding le Topa’ biakna tau tungah meihal biaknate piak nadingin tua ni-in Topa’ nasepna ding khempeuh a kithawi uh hi.
Tua lai-ah a om Israel mite in tua hunin Paisan Pawi le Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi ni sagih sung a bawl uh hi.

Kamsang Samuel huna kipan Israel sungah tua bang Paisan Pawi kibawl ngei lo hi. Josiah le siampite le Levi mite le tua lai-ah a om Judah le Israel mi khempeuh le Jerusalem-a a teeng mite in a bawl Paisan Pawi tawh a kibang, Israel kumpite kuamah in bawl ngei lo hi.
Josiah’ uk a kum sawm le kum giatna kumin hih Paisan Pawi kibawl hi.
Hih thute khempeuh khit, Josiah in biakinn a bawl khit ciangin, Eufratis gun gei Karkhemish-ah galsim dingin Egypt kumpipa Neko hong kuanto a, amah a do dingin Josiah a kuan khia hi.

Ahih hangin Neko in ama kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Judah kumpipa aw, ei tegel khatlekhat i kihihna ding bang om ahi hiam? Tu-in nang a sim dingin hong kuan ka hi kei a, ka galte a sim dingin a hong kuan ka hi hi. Ka kinawhna ding Pasian in kei tungah thu hong pia khin hi. Kei tawh a omkhawm Pasian na nialna khawl in. Tua hikeileh nang hong susia ding hi,” cisak hi.

Ahi zongin ama kiang panin Josiah kihei khia nuam lo a, amah tawh a kido theih nadingin a mel kiseel hi. Amah in Neko’ kam pan a Pasian’ thugente ngai lo a, Megiddo zanglei-a gal kidona-ah va pawm hi.
Tua ciangin thaltawite in Kumpi Josiah kap hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, “Nakpi takin liam ka hih manin kei hong pai khiatpih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a nasemte in leeng sung panin amah la khia-in ama leeng nihna sungah amah pua-in Jerusalem-ah a paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin amah si a, a pate’ han sungah kivui hi. Judah gam le Jerusalem khuami khempeuh Josiah’ hangin kap uh hi.

Jeremiah in zong Josiah’ hangin kah la a phuak hi. Numei lasate le pasal lasate khempeuh in tuni dongin amau’ kahna-ah Josiah tamlawh uh hi. Amaute in Israel sungah hih thu biakna ngeina kipin a bawl uh hi. Kah la sungah tuate kikhum hi.
Tu-in Josiah’ gamtatna a omlaite le Topa’ thukham sungah a kigelh bangin a nasep hoihte,
le ama gamtatna, a masa le a nunungte, Israel le Judah Kumpite’ Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua gam mite in Josiah’ tapa Jehoahaz la-in Jerusalem-ah a pa’ tangin kumpi-in a koih uh hi.
Jehoahaz in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le thum pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kha thum sung uk hi.
Tua ciangin Egypt kumpipa in Jerusalem-ah amah zakiasak a, siah ngun talen zakhat le kham talen khat, tua gam kipiasak hi.

Tua ciangin Egypt kumpipa in Judah le Jerusalem tungah a ukin Jehoahaz’ sanggampa Eliakim koih a, ama min Jehoiakim-in kheelsak hi. Ahih hangin Neko in a sanggampa Jehoahaz la-in Egypt-ah a paipih hi.
Jehoiakim in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawm le kum khat sung uk hi. Topa a Pasian mai-ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar amah a simin hong kuanto a, Babylon-ah a paipih dingin amah kol bulh hi.
Nebukhadnezzar in Topa’ biakinn-a umlebeel pawlkhatte zong Babylon-ah pua-in Babylon-a a kumpi inn-ah tuate a koih hi.
Tu-in Jehoiakim’ gamtatna a omlaite le ama hih a kihhuaite le amah a hoih lohna a kimute, Israel le Judah Kumpite’ Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Jehoiakhin in ama tangin a uk hi.
Jehoiakhin in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm le kum giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kha thum le ni sawm sung uk hi. Topa’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Tua kum khuakhal sungin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar in mi sawlin Topa’ biakinn-a umlebeel manphate tawh amah Babylon-ah lasak a, Judah le Jerusalem tungah Jehoiakhin’ sanggampa Zedekiah kumpi-in a koih hi.
Zedekiah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih le khat pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawm le kum khat sung uk hi.
Topa a Pasian’ muhna-ah amah a sia gamta hi. Topa’ kammal a gensawn kamsang Jeremiah mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat lo hi.
Pasian tawh amah a kiciamsak kumpi Nebukhadnezzar zong amah in lehdo hi. Israel Pasian, Topa’ kiang zuankik nuam lo a, zong kisik nuam loin a lung khauhsak hi.
A makai siampite le mi khempeuh zong tua bangmahin citak lo mahmah uh a, minam dangte’ kihhuainate zui uh hi. Amah in Jerusalem-ah a siangtho-in a koih Topa’ biakinn amaute in ninsak uh hi.
A mite le ama tenna mun khasiat ahih manin amau’ pute pate’ Pasian, Topa in a kamtaite amaute kiangah sawl teitei hi.
Ahih hangin a mite tungah Topa a heh ciang dong, a hehna a kidamsak zawh nawn loh ciang dongin amaute in Pasian’ kamtaite zahpihin, a thute simmawhin, a kamsangte thusim lo niloh uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Khaldea mite’ kumpipa amaute’ langkhat ah paipih a, tua kumpipa in amau’ Pasian’ biakinn sung nangawnah namsau tawh a tangvalte uh that a, numei pasal, a moi a ham, a dam a na, kuamah khasiat lo hi. Pasian in a vekpi-in ama khut sungah a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn-a umlebeel khempeuh a lian a neu le Topa’ biakinn-a vanmanphate le kumpipa le a uliante’ vanmanphate khempeuh amah in Babylon-ah paipih hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Pasian’ biakinn halin Jerusalem khua susia uh a, a kumpi inn khempeuh mei tawh halin umlebeel a manpha khempeuh a susia uh hi.
Amah in namsau panin a suakta mite Babylon-ah salin la a, Persia kumpi in a uk hun mateng amah le a suanlekhakte’ nasem a suak uh hi.

Tua sungin Israel leitang in a sabbath-te a kicingin na tang hi. Kamsang Jeremiah tungtawnin Topa’ thugen a tun nadingin kum sawmsagih a cin nadingin leitang a kinusiat sung khempeuh leitang in sabbath tawlngakna a nei ahi hi.

Tu-in Persia kumpipa Sairas’ kum khatna kumin, Jeremiah’ kam pan a Topa’ thugen a tun theih nadingin, Topa in Persia kumpipa Sairas’ lungsim hanthawn a, amah in a kumpi gam sung khempeuh ah taangkona khat bawl a, lai-in zong a gelh hi. A lai gelhna-ah,

“Persia kumpipa Sairas in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Vantung Pasian, Topa in leitung kumpi gam khempeuh kei hong pia khin a, Judah gam sung Jerusalem khua-ah ama adingin biakinn khat ka lamsak ding hong sawl hi. Note lakah ama mi ahi khempeuh, Topa a Pasian uh in ompih tahen. Biakinn lam dingin Jerusalem-ah amaute paitosak un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Persia kumpi Sairas’ uk kum khatna kumin, Jeremiah tungtawnin Topa’ thugen a tun theih nadingin, ama gam sung khempeuh ah taangkona khat bawlin lai-in zong a gelh nadingin Persia kumpi Sairas’ lungsimah Topa in a suaksak hi. Amah in hih bangin a hih hi:

“Persia kumpi Sairas in hih bangin ci hi: Vantung Pasian, Topa in leitung kumpi gam khempeuh keima tungah hong pia khin a, Judah gam sung Jerusalem khua-ah ama adingin biakinn khat ka lamsak ding hong sawl hi.
Note lakah ama mi peuhmah a Pasian in ompih henla, Judah gam sung Jerusalem khua-ah paito henla, Israel Pasian, Topa’ biakinn lamkik hen. Amah pen Jerusalem-ah a om Pasian ahi hi.

Tua ciangin koilai mun koilai gam a om hitaleh Judah mi a omlai khempeuh, ama omna mun mite in Jerusalem-a om Pasian’ biakinn adingin utthu-a a piakte uh banah, ngun le kham, nate le ganhingte tawh zong huh ciat uh hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah le Benjamin sunga innkuan lutangte le siampite le Levi mite, Jerusalem khua-a om Topa’ biakinn a lamkik dingin a lungsim sung uhah Pasian in a suahsak mite khempeuh kithawi uh hi.
Tua ciangin a veeng a pamte in thatang tawh a huh uh banah ngun tawh kibawl umlebeel, kham, van tuamtuamte, ganhingte le letsong manphate tawh huh thuah lai uh hi.
Tua tham loin, Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem panin pua khia-in ama pasian-te’ biakinn sungah a koihsa ahi Topa’ biakinn-a om ngei umlebeelte zong kumpipa Sairas in pusuah hi.
Persia kumpi Sairas in hihte pusuahin sumkem pa Mithredath’ khut sungah ap hi. Tua pa in Judah ukpa Sheshbazzar adingin a malzah simin sazian bawlsak hi.
Tua nate a phazah: Kham kuang tulkhat, ngun kuang tulkhat, umlebeel a nam tuamtuam sawmnih le kua,
kham kuang-uk sawmthum, ngun kuang-uk a nam tuamtuam zali sawmkhat, le umlebeel adang tulkhat ahi hi.
Kham le ngun kibawl umlebeelte khempeuh a vekpi-in tulnga zali sawmguk kua pha hi. Tua hi a, Babylon panin salte a kiciahpihkik ciangin Sheshbazzar in tua nate khempeuh Jerusalem-ah a ciahpih hi.
Babylon kumpi Nebukhadnezzar in a zawhna gam panin Babylon-ah salin a lakte sung panin hih mite Jerusalem le Judah-ah a ciahkikte hi a, amau’ khua ciatah a ciah uh ahi hi.
Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Seraiah, Reelaiah, Mordekai, Bilshan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum le Baanah-te makai-in tua mite a ciahpih uh hi.
Parosh suante - tulnih zakhat sawmsagih le nih ahi hi.
Shefatiah suante - zathum sawmsagih le nih ahi hi.
Arah suante - zasagih sawmsagih le nga ahi hi.
Pahathmoab beh sung panin Jeshua le Joab suante - tulnih zagiat sawm le nih ahi hi.
Elam suante - tulkhat zanih sawmnga le li ahi hi.
Zattu suante - zakua sawmli le nga ahi hi.
Zakkai suante - zasagih sawmguk ahi hi.
Bani suante - zaguk sawmli le nih ahi hi.
Bebai suante - zaguk sawmnih le thum ahi hi.
Azgad suante - tulkhat zanih sawmnih le nih ahi hi.
Adonikam suante - zaguk sawmguk le guk ahi hi.
Bigvai suante - tulnih sawmnga le guk ahi hi.
Adin suante - zali sawmnga le li ahi hi.
Ater a kici Hezekiah suante - sawmkua le giat ahi hi.
Bezai suante - zathum sawmnih le thum ahi hi.
Jorah suante - zakhat sawmnih le nih ahi hi.
Hashum suante - zanih sawmnih le thum ahi hi.
Gibbar suante - sawmkua le nga ahi hi.
Bethlehem khuami - zakhat sawmnih le thum ahi hi.
Netofah khuami - sawmnga le guk ahi hi.
Anathoth khuami - zakhat sawmnih le giat ahi hi.
Bethazmaveth khuami - sawmli le nih ahi hi.
Kiriathjearim khua, Khefirah khua le Beeroth khuami - zasagih sawmli le thum ahi hi.
Ramah khua le Geba khuami - zaguk sawmnih le khat ahi hi.
Mikmash khuami - zakhat sawmnih le nih ahi hi.
Bethel khua le Ai khuami - zanih sawmnih le thum ahi hi.
Nebo khuami - sawmnga le nih ahi hi.
Magbish khuami - zakhat sawmnga le guk ahi hi.
Elam adang khat suante - tulkhat zanih sawmnga le li ahi hi.
Harim suante - zathum sawmnih ahi hi.
Lod khua, Hadid khua le Ono khuami - zasagih sawmnih le nga ahi hi.
Jerikho khuami - zathum sawmli le nga ahi hi.
Senaah gammi - tulthum zaguk sawmthum ahi uh hi.
Siampite sung panin: Jeshua-te beh panin Jedaiah suante - zakua sawmsagih le thum ahi hi.
Immer suante - tulkhat sawmnga le nih ahi hi.
Pashhur suante - tulkhat zanih sawmli le sagih ahi hi.
Harim suante - tulkhat sawm le sagih ahi uh hi.
Levi mite sung panin: Hodaviah-te beh panin Jeshua suante le Kadmiel suante - sawmsagih le li ahi hi.
Lasate sung panin Asaf’ suante - zakhat sawmnih le giat ahi hi.
Kongcingte nam sung panin Shallum suante, Ater suante, Talmon suante, Akkub suante, Hatita suante le Shobai suante, a vekpi-in - zakhat sawmthum le kua ahi hi.
Biakinn nasemte sung panin Ziha suante, Hasufa suante, Tabbaoth suante,
Keros suante, Siaha suante, Padon suante,
Lebanah suante, Hagabah suante, Akkub suante,
Hagab suante, Shamlai suante, Hanan suante,
Giddel suante, Gahar suante, Reaiah suante,
Rezin suante, Nekoda suante, Gazzam suante,
Uzza suante, Paseah suante, Besai suante,
Asnah suante, Meunim suante, Nefisim suante,
Bakbuk suante, Hakufa suante, Harhur suante,
Bazluth suante, Mehida suante, Harsha suante,
Barkos suante, Sisera suante, Temah suante,
Neziah suante le Hatifa suante ahi uh hi.
Solomon’ nasemte nam sung panin: Sotai suante, Hassofereth suante, Peruda suante,
Jaalah suante, Darkon suante, Giddel suante,
Shefatiah suante, Hattil suante, Pokherethhazzebaim suante le Ami suante ahi uh hi.
Biakinn nasemte khempeuh le Solomon’ nasemte’ suanlekhak khempeuh a vekpi-in zathum sawmkua le nih a pha uh hi.
Temelah, Teharsha, Kherub, Addan le Immer khuate panin a hong ciahkik, Israel mi hinapi-in amau’ behlephung a kan thei lo mite:
Delaiah suante, Tobiah suante le Nekoda suante, mi zaguk sawmnga le nih ahi uh hi.
Siampite sung panin zong: Habaiah suante, Hakkoz suante le Barzillai suante (amah in Gilead mi Barzillai tanute khat tenpihin tua min tawh a kilo pah) ahi uh hi.
Hih mite in khang kiciamtehna-ah amau’ min a zon uh hangin amau’ min na om lo ahih manin amaute a siang loin seh uh a, siampi nasep semsak thei lo uh hi.
Urim le Thummim aisanna tawh ai a san ding siampi khat a om mateng amaute in biakna an siang pente a nek loh nading uh gam ukpa in a gen hi.
Mi a vekpi - tul sawmli le tulnih le zathum sawmguk pha uh a,
amaute’ nasem numei le pasal mihing - tulsagih le zathum sawmthum le sagihte kisim lo hi. Amaute in lasa numei le pasal mihing zanih nei uh hi.
Amau’ sakolte - zasagih sawmthum le guk, amau’ la-sakol - zanih sawmli le nga,
amau’ kalaoh - zali sawmthum le nga, le a la uh - tulguk zasagih le sawmnih pha hi.
Amaute Jerusalem-a Topa’ biakinn a tun uh ciangin Pasian’ biakinn ama mun ngei-ah lamkik nadingin innkuan lutangte pawlkhat in Pasian’ biakinn adingin piakna bawl uh hi.
Amaute in a hih zawhna zah uh tawh kizui-in tua nasep nadingin vanmanpha koihna-ah kham darik tul sawmguk le tulkhat, ngun mina tulnga le siampi puan zakhat a pia uh hi.
Siampite, Levi mite le mi pawlkhatte Jerusalem le a kiim nai-ah teeng uh hi. Lasate, kongcingte, biakinn nasemte le Israel mi khempeuh amau’ khuapi ciatah a teeng uh hi.
A kha sagihna hong cin ciangin Israel mite amau’ khuapi ciatah teeng khin uh ahih manin, khekhat khai bangin Jerusalem-ah hong kituah diam uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jozadak’ tapa Jeshua le a siampipihte le Shealtiel’ tapa Zerubbabel le a behte hong kipan uh a, Pasian’ mi Moses thukham sungah a kigelh bangin meihal biaknate piak nadingin Israel Pasian biakna tau a bawl uh hi.
Amaute in tua gam a midang a teengte kihta uh ahih manin a mun lui mahah biakna tau phut pahin zing le nitak simin Topa’ tungah meihal biakna a pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a kikipsaksa bangin buk pawi bawl uh a, nisimin zat dingin a kisehsa zah bangin meihal biakna nisimin a pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin hihte banah a tawntung a meihal biakna, Khadet sima biakna le Topa’ pawi a kisehsa hun khempeuh le Topa’ tungah amau’ utthu tawh a pia mite khempeuh’ biaknate zong a pia uh hi.
Topa’ biakinnpi a bul a kiphuh nai loh hangin a kha sagihna a ni masa ni a kipanin amaute in Topa’ tungah meihal biaknate piak ding kipan uh hi.

Tua hi a, amaute in suangseekte le khutsiamte tungah sum pia uh a, Persia kumpi Sairas’ tung panin a thu ngahna bangun Lebanon mual tung gam panin tuipi gei Joppa khua-ah taamtak singte a hong puaksuk ding Sidon khuamite le Taia khuamite tungah zong annek tuidawn le sathau a pia uh hi.

Amaute, Jerusalem khua-a Pasian’ biakinn-ah a hong ciahkik uh a kum nihna, tua kum a kha nihna sungin Shealtiel’ tapa Zerubbabel le Jozadak’ tapa Jeshua, nasep kipan uh a, a Israel mipihte, siampite, Levi mite le salsuahna panin Jerusalem-ah a hong ciahkik mite khempeuh in zong a huh uh hi. Amaute in Levi mite kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah peuhmah Topa’ biakinn sungah biakna nasepte a vaan dingin a seh uh hi.
Jeshua a tapate le a behte tawh le Hodaviah-te beh Kadmiel le a tate in Henadad’ tapate le Levi mi a tapate uh le a behte uh tawh Pasian’ biakinn-ah nasemte tungah ukna tavuan a lakhawm uh hi.

Innlamte in Topa’ biakinn a bul a phuh uh ciangin, Israel kumpipa David in a geelkholhsa bangin Topa a phat dingin siampite in a puan uh silhin peengkul tawh, Asaf’ tapa Levi mite daltuah tawh a panmun ding uhah hong pang uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Topa phatna le lungdamkohna a kidawngin sa uh a, “Topa hoih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te hong itna kip tawntung hi,” a ci uh hi. Topa’ biakinn bulpi kiphut khin ahih manin mi khempeuh in nakpitakin Topa phat uh hi.

Midang tampi lungdamin a aw neih zahun a kiko uh hangin a biakinn masa a mu ngeisa siampite, Levi mite le innkuan lutang, midang tampite in hih biakinn bulpi a kiphuh a muh uh ciangin kapin a thum uh hi.
Mite nakpitakin kiko ahih manin lungdamna awging le kahna le thumna awgingte mite in khen thei lo uh hi. Gamlapi pek panin tua awgingte a kiza hi.
Salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik mite in Israel Pasian Topa adingin biakinn khat a lamna thu Judah le Benjamin mite’ galte in a zak uh ciangin

Zerubbabel, Jeshua le innkuan lutangte kiangah va pai-in amaute kiangah, “Biakinn lamna-ah ko zong hong kihelsak un; bang hang hiam cih leh note mah bangin ko zong na Pasian uh ka bia uh a, hih lai-ah kote hong koih Assiria kumpipa Esarhaddon’ hun lai a kipanin note’ Pasian’ tungah biakna ka pia uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Zerubbabel le Israel sunga innkuan lutang a omlaite in amaute kiangah, “Kote’ Pasian adingin ka lam uh biakinn pen note’ hong lunghihmawhpih ding hi lo hi. Persia kumpipa Sairas in kote hong thupiaksa bangin Israel Pasian, Topa adingin ko teng guak mah in ka lam ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua gam a teeng midangte in Judah mite lungkiasakin biakinn a lam zomlai ding uh a lausak uh hi.
Amau’ ngimna a tangtun theih loh nadingin amaute in a langpang dingin zum nasemte golhguk pia uh hi. Persia kumpipa Sairas’ hun a kipan kumpi Darias hun dong hih bangin hih ngitnget uh hi.
Ahasueras in uk ding hong kipat ciangin Judah gam le Jerusalem-a a teengte a khiatna thu tua gamah a na teengsate in lai-in a gelh uh hi.
Tua ciangin Persia kumpi Artakzaksis hun ciangin Mithredath, Tabeel le a lawmte uh thukimna tawh kumpipa tungah lai gelh uh a, a lai pen Aram lai-in kigelh a, Aram pau mahin kisim khia hi.
Menzipipa Rehum le lai-at pa Shimshai in Kumpi Artakzaksis tungah Jerusalem tawh kisai thu a nuai-a bangin gelh uh hi.
Menzipipa Rehum, lai-at Shimshai le a lawmte khempeuh, thukhente, mangpite, thuvaante, uliante, Erek khuami le Babylon khuami, Susa khua-a om Elam mite,
le a lian a minthang Ashurbanipal in hong pua khia-in Samaria khuapi-ah a hong tensak mite le Eufratis Gun langkhat a kizawhna gam sunga a om mite tung panin lai puak, a ci uh hi.
A lai sung thu hih a nuai-a bang ahi hi: “Artakzaksis Kumpipa tungah, Eufratis Gungal gam a om na nasemte in hopihna kam kong puak uh hi.

“Nangma kiang panin ko kiangah a hong pai Judah mite, tu-in Jerusalem-ah tung khin uh a, a gilo, mi lehdo thei ahi khuapi pen amaute in lamkikin, amaute in a khua bulpi vel khinin, kulhpi cian a kipat khitna thu thei in.
Amau’ khuapi kilam kikin kulhte kizo leh amaute in siah ahi a, mangmu ahi a, losap ahi zongin hong pia nawn lo ding uh a, a tawpna-ah kumpi hong sukkhak ding thu thei in.

Kote in kumpipa tawh thuciamna kip nei khin ka hih manun kumpipa’ minsiatna ka muh ding uh kilawm lo hi. Tua ahih manin nangma mai-a a semte’ thuciamtehna laibute a ki-etkik theih nadingin kumpipa tungah thu kong zasak uh hi. Thuciamtehna laibu sung en lecin hih khuapi pen a lehdo thei khuapi, kumpipa tung le a ukna gamte tungah siatna a piangsak, kumpi dona a khua sungah a om tawntungna thu na mu khia ding hi. Hih khuapi a kisukcipna zong hih thu hang mah ahi hi.
Hih khuapi kilam kikin a kulhte kizo khin leh Eufratis Gungal gam na uk nawn loh nading thu, nangma tungah kong thei kholsak uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in a lai uh hih bangin thuk hi: “Menzipipa Rehum, lai-at pa Shimshai le Samaria le Eufratis Gungal gam sunga om na lawmte khempeuh uh tungah hopihna lai kong khak hi.
“Keima tungah nong khak uh lai pen a kitel takin keima zakna-ah hong kisim khin hi.
Keimah in hih thu a kikanna ding thu ka pia a, tu-in kikantel khinta hi. Tanglai a kipanin hih khuapi pen kumpi langah pangin, hih khua sungah lehdona le kumpi dona a om ngitngetna thu kimukhia hi.
A vanglian kumpite in Jerusalem-ah uk ngei-in, Eufratis Gungal gambup tungah aana zang uh a, siah, mangmu le losapte tua kumpite tungah kipia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin hih mite a nasep uh a khawlna ding thu pia in. Keimah in thu kong piakkik mateng hih khuapi kilamkik lo ding hi.
Hih thu tawh kisai-in na sep ding don loin ommawk kei in. Tua hi kei leh kumpi tungah siatna le gimna hong khang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Menzipipa Rehum, lai-at Shimshai le amau’ lawmte’ zakna-ah Kumpi Artakzaksis tung panin a kingah lai a kisim ciangin, Jerusalem-ah amaute pai pahin Judah mite a nasep uh aana tawh a khawlsak uh hi.
Tua hun a kipanin Jerusalem-a om Pasian’ biakinn a kisepna a khawl hi. Persia kumpi Darias’ uk a kum nihna dong tua bangin a khawlcip phot hi.
Tu-in kamsangte Haggai le Iddo’ suan Zekhariah in Judah gam le Jerusalem-ah a om Judah mite hanthawnin, Israel Pasian’ min tawh thu a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Shealtiel’ tapa Zerubbabel le Jozadak’ tapa Jeshua, Jerusalem-a Pasian’ biakinn lamkik ding kipan pah uh a, Pasian’ kamsangte in amaute ompihin huh uh hi.

Tua laitakin Eufratis Gungal gam sungteng a uk sawn Tattenai, Shetharbozenai le amau’ lawmte hong paipahin amaute kiangah, “Note in hih biakinn lamkikin a nate na bawlna ding uh kua in thu hong pia ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Hih biakinn lam nasepna-ah a sem mite’ min zong amaute in dong uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in Judah upate huh ahih manin Darias kiangah a thu va tungin ama tung pan thu a kingahkik hun dong a nasep zopsuakna uh kikhaktan lo hi.
Eufratis Gungal gam a uk sawn Tattenai, Shetharbozenai le Eufratis Gungal gam sung thu a vaan ama lawmte in Kumpi Darias tungah lai khak uh hi.
Amaute in thuzaksakna lai hih bangin a gelh uh hi: “Kumpi Darias tungah thupha namcin hong tung tahen.

“Judah gam, a lian Pasian’ biakinn-ah ka va paina uh kong theisak uh hi. Tua biakinn pen suang lianpipite tawh kilamin a kawmte sing tawh kibawl hi. Hih biakinn limtakin kisemin amau’ makaihna tawh a nasep uh telh mahmah hi.
“Hih biakinn a kilamkikna ding le a nate a zawh nadingin kua in thu pia hiam, cih thu hih upate tungah ka dong uh hi.
Nangmah in a makai teng na theih nadingin amaute’ min zong ka dong uh hi.

“Amaute in hih bangin hong dawng uh hi: ‘Kote pen vantung le leitung Pasian’ nasemte ka hi uh a, kum tampi lai-in a kilamsa biakinn a lamkik ka hi uh a, a lian Israel kumpi khat in lamin a zawhsa ahi hi.

Ahi zongin ka pu ka pate un vantung Pasian hehsakkha uh ahih manin Babylon kumpipa, Khaldea mi Nebukhadnezzar’ khut sungah amaute pia hi. Tua kumpipa in hih biakinn susia a, a mite Babylon-ah ciahpih hi.
Ahi zongin Babylon kumpipa Sairas’ uk a kum khatna kumin hih Pasian’ biakinn a kilamkikna ding amah in thu pia hi.

Tua tham loin Jerusalem-a biakinn sung panin Nebukhadnezzar in la-in Babylon biakinn sunga a koih ahi Pasian’ biakinn sunga om ngeisa kham le ngun kibawl umlebeelte zong kumpi Sairas in Babylon biakinn panin la khia-in gam ukin a hong koih Sheshbazzar min nei pa tungah ap hi.
Kumpipa in ama tungah, “Hih umlebeelte paipih inla, Jerusalem-a biakinn-ah va koihkik in. Tua lai-a Pasian’ biakinn pen a mun ngei mahah lamkiksak in,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Sheshbazzar hong pai-in Jerusalem-a Pasian’ biakinn a bulpi hong phut hi. Tua hun a kipanin tu dong lamkik kisem suak a, ahi zongin kizo nai lo hi,’ ci uh hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin hoih na sak leh, Jerusalem-a hih Pasian’ biakinn a kilamkikna ding thu kumpipa Sairas in thu pia takpi hiam, pia taktak lo hiam cih a kitheih nadingin Babylon khua sunga om laibu koihna innte sung zongsak in. Tua khit ciangin kumpipa in na deihna hong zasakkik in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Darias in thu pia a, Babylon khua sunga lai manphate a kisenna innte sung kizong hi.
Ahi zongin Babylon khua sungah na om lo a, Media gam sung kumpi khuapi Ekbatana-ah laizial khat kimu a, tua sungah hih a nuai-a bangin a kiciamteh kimu hi:

“Kumpi Sairas’ kum khatna kumin Jerusalem khua-a Pasian’ biakinn tawh kisai-in kumpipa in thu pia hi: Biakna kipia-in meihal biakna a kipaipihna munah biakinn lamsakkik un. A sanna pi sawmkua, a vai pi sawmkua mah hi dinga,
a kawm pen suang thuap thum le sing thuap khat tawh a kibawl, thuap li hi ding hi. Hih sum beinate ahihleh kumpi sum panin kipia ding hi.
