Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem biakinn panin la khia-in Babylon-ah a hong tunpih Pasian’ biakinn sunga om kham le ngun tawh kibawl umlebeelte zong kipiakik ding hi. Tuate khempeuh Jerusalem biakinn-ah kipuakik dinga, Pasian’ biakinn sunga a omna munmun ciatah kikoihkik ding hi,” ci-in kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Darias in hih bangin thu a pia hi: “Tu-in Eufratis Gungal gam a uk Tattenai, Shetharbozenai le Eufratis Gungal gam sung a vaan na lawmte, tua mun panin na kihem khia ding uh hi.
Judah mi a ukpa le a upate in hih Pasian’ biakinn a lamkik theih nadingun na tuaci omsak ding uh hi. Ama mun ngei mahah a biakinn lamsakkik un.

Hih a kigen Pasian’ biakinn a kilamkik theih nadingin hih Judah upate adingin na hih dingte uh zong thu kong pia hi. Hih nasepna a mawk khawl loh nadingin, Eufratis Gungal gam sung panin a kingah siahte ahi kumpi sum sung panin beina khempeuh a cingin kipia ding hi.

Vantung Pasian’ tungah meihal biakna-in piak dingin a kisam khempeuh - bawngtalnote, tuutalte, ahih kei leh tuunote na pia ding uh a, Jerusalem-a siampite’ hong ngetna bangin mangbuh, ci, leenggahzu, ahih kei leh sathaute, kitasam loin nisimin amaute tungah piasak un.
Tua hileh amaute in vantung Pasian’ tungah a namtui biaknate pia-in kumpipa le a tapate’ nuntakna ding thu hong ngetsak thei ding uh hi.

Tua tham loin, mi khatpeuh in hih thupiakna a siatsak leh ama inn panin a innkam khat kidawhkhiat sakin tua tungah amah kihen cipin kisat gawp dinga, tua banah a inn zong a kisuksiatna ding thu kong pia thuah lai hi.

Hih ka thupiakna a siasak nuam, Jerusalem-a Pasian’ biakinn a susia nuam kumpi khatpeuh ahi a, mi khatpeuh ahi zongin a om leh, ama min omna dinga tua mun a bawl Pasian in tua mipa lawnthal tahen. Keimah Darias in thu kong pia hi. Ka thupiak bang teekteekin sep ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Darias in amaute tungah a thupiak bang teekteekin Eufratis Gungal gam sung a uksawn Tattenai, Shetharbozenai le a lawmte in sem uh hi.

Tua hi a, kamsang Haggai le Iddo’ suan Zekhariah’ thugenna hangin Judah upate in a biakinn lam uh zom suakin maavang uh hi. Israel Pasian’ sawlna le Persia kumpi Sairas le Darias le Artakzaksis-te’ thupiakna tawh amaute in a biakinn lam uh a zo uh hi.
Tua hi a, Kumpi Darias’ kum gukna, Adar kha a ni sawm le thum ni-in a biakinn kizo hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite le sal a suaksa a hong ciahkik mi khempeuh in lungdamna lianpi tawh Pasian’ biakinn apna a bawl uh hi.

Amaute in Pasian’ biakinn apna-in bawngtal zakhat, tuutal zanih le tuuno zali go uh a, mawhna hanga biak nadingin Israel-te khempeuh adingin a minam phazah tawh kizui-in keeltal sawm le nih a pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses laibu sungah a kigelh bangin Jerusalem-a Pasian’ nasep nadingin siampite amau’ panmun ngei-ah pangsak uh a, Levi mite amau’ nasepna ngei-ah a semsakkik uh hi.
A kha masa a ni sawm le li ni-in sal a suaksa a hong ciahkik mite in Paisan Pawi a bawl uh hi.

Siampite le Levi mite a vekpi-un kisiansuah khin uh a, a vekpi-un zeh siang khin uh hi. Tua hi a, amaute in sal suaksa a hong ciahkik khempeuh ading, a siampipihte uh le amau mahmah adingin Paisan tuuno a go uh hi.

Salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik Israel-te le Israel Pasian, Topa a bia dingin tua gam a midang a teengte le a nitna uh pan amau le amau a kihem khia tawm mite khempeuh in tua Paisan Pawi an a ne uh hi.

Tua hi a, amaute in lungdamna tawh ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum pawi a bawl uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ lungdamna ding a om theih nadingin Topa in Assiria kumpipa’ lungsim amau’ tungah a nuam dingin a bawlsak hi. Tua ahih manin Israel Pasian ahi Pasian’ biakinn a sepna uhah kumpipa in amaute a huh hi.
Hih thu teng khit ciangin Persia kumpi Artakzaksis uk hun sungin Ezra, a pa Seraiah, a pa Azariah, a pa Hikiah,
a pa Shalum, a pa Zadok, a pa Ahitub,
a pa Amariah, a pa Azariah, a pa Meraioth,
a pa Zerahiah, a pa Uzzi, a pa Bukki,
a pa Abishua, a pa Finehas, a pa Eleazar, a pa siampi lianpen pa Aaron:

hih Ezra pen Babylon panin hong tungto hi. Amah pen Israel Pasian, Topa in a piak Moses thukham a siam lai thei mi khat ahi hi. Topa ahi ama Pasian in ompih ahih manin ama nget khempeuh kumpipa in a pia hi.
Kumpi Artakzaksis in a uk a kum sagihna kumin Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, lasate, kongcingte le biakinn nasem pawlkhat zong, Jerusalem-ah Ezra tawh tungto uh hi.
Kumpipa’ uk kum sagih a cin kum, a kha ngana sungin Jerusalem tung uh hi.
A kha masa a ni khat ni-in Babylon pan a ding khia dingin Ezra in a ni sehkhol a, a kha ngana a ni khat ni-in Jerusalem a tung uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in amah ompih hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ezra in Topa’ thukham sinin zuih ding le Israel mite a hilh dingin amah kipia hi.
Kumpi Artakzaksis in siampi ahi, lai thei pa lah ahi, Israel-te adingin Topa’ thupiaknate le thukhamte a siam Ezra tungah a piak lai pen hih bang ahi hi:
“Kumpite’ kumpi ahi Artakzaksis kiang panin vantung Pasian’ thukham a siam, siampi hi-in lai thei pa lah ahi Ezra tungah:

“Ka lungsim khentatna hih bang ahi hi: Ka gam sunga om Israel mi khatpeuh ahi a, a siampite uh ahi a, Levi mite ahi zongin, Jerusalem-ah a ciahkik nuam khempeuh in nang hong zuih theih nadingun thu ka pia hi.
Nang tungah hong kipia ahi na Pasian’ thukham tawh kisai-in Judah le Jerusalem-ah thu bangci om hiam cih a va thei dingin kumpipa keimah le thu hong lamlak mihing sagihte in kong sawl uh hi.
Kumpipa le a thu lamlakte in Jerusalem-ah a teeng Israel Pasian tungah lungkim takin a piak ngun le khamte zong,
Babylon gamah na muh uh ngun le khamte le Jerusalem-a note’ Pasian’ biakinn dingin mite le siampite in lungkim takin a piak khiat zuazuate uh tawh a va puakkhawm ding na hi uh hi.

“Hih ka thupiakna tawh kizui-in hih sumte pen Jerusalem-a note’ Pasian’ biakinn-a biakna tau tungah piak dingin bawngtalte, tuutalte, tuunote le a an tawh biaknate le a leenggahzu tawh biakna dingte leina ding bekin na zang ding uh hi.
Tua banah ngun le kham a val a omlai leh, note’ Pasian’ deihna tawh kituakin hoih na sak bangun na lawmte tawh na zang thei ding uh hi.
Na Pasian’ biakinn-ah zat dingin hong kipia umlebeelte pen Jerusalem Pasian tungah na va pia ding hi.
Na Pasian’ biakinn adingin a kisam, na piak ding a phamawh a omkhak zenzen leh kumpipa sum sung panin na zang thei ding hi.

“Tua hi a, kumpipa keimah Artakzaksis in Eufratis Gungal gam sunga om kumpi vankemte khempeuh tungah hih bangin thu ka pia hi: Vantung Pasian’ thukham a siam lai a thei, siampi Ezra in note tung panin a kisapna hong nget ciangin,
ngun talen zakhat, mangbuh seu zakhat, leenggahzu tambong zanih, sathau tambong zanih ciang le ci a deih zahzah na pia ding uh hi.
Vantung Pasian in a deih peuhpeuh, vantung Pasian biakinn adingin limtakin hih un. Tua hikeileh kumpipa tapate le kumpi gam tungah amah hong heh kha ding hi.

Siampite, Levi mite, lasate, kongcingte, biakinn nasemte, ahih kei leh hih Pasian’ biakinn-a nasemte khat peuhpeuh tung panin siah ahi a, mangmu ahi a, losap ahi zongin lakna ding thu na neih lohna uh zong kong zasak uh hi, ka ci hi.

“Tua hi a, nang Ezra in nang tungah hong kipia na Pasian’ pilna tawh kizui-in Eufratis Gungal gam sunga mite thu a khen dingin na Pasian’ thukham a thei mite seh in. Nang le amaute in na Pasian’ thukham a thei lote na hilh ding uh hi.

Na Pasian’ thukham le kumpipa’ thukham a mang lo peuhmah, sihna ahi a, hawl khiatna ahi a, neihsa matna ahi a, thongkiatna ahi zongin, a ngah ding a kilawm thukhenna tawh khauhtakin gim kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ezra in, “Jerusalem-a om Topa’ biakinn tua bangin a minthangsak thuah dingin kumpipa lungsimah suak a, kumpipa le a thu lamlakte le a uliante kei tungah a thunuam dingin a bawl i pu i pate’ Pasian ahi Topa in thupha ngah tahen!” a ci hi. Tua hi a, Topa ka Pasian in kei hong ompihna thei ka hih manin ka lungsim hong hang a, kei hong zui dingin Israel makaite ka khawm hi.
Kumpi Artakzaksis’ uk hun sungin Babylon panin kei tawh hong ciahto khawm a behbehin a kiciamteh beh lutangte hih bang ahi hi:
Gershom: Finehas-te beh pan ahi hi. Daniel: Ithamar-te beh pan ahi hi. Hattush: David-te beh panin Shekaniah’ tapa ahi hi.
Zekhariah: Parosh-te beh sung pan hi a, amah tawh pasal zakhat le sawmnga kiciamteh hi.
Eliehoenai: Pahathmoab-te beh panin Zerahiah’ tapa hi a, pasal zanih tawh ahi hi.
Shekaniah: Zattu-te beh panin Jahaziel’ tapa hi a, pasal zathum tawh ahi hi.
Ebed: Adin-te beh panin Jonathan’ tapa hi a, pasal sawmnga tawh ahi hi.
Isaiah: Elam-te beh panin Athaliah’ tapa hi a, pasal sawmsagih tawh ahi hi.
Zebadiah: Shefatiah-te beh panin Mikhael’ tapa hi a, pasal sawmgiat tawh ahi hi.
Obadiah: Joab-te beh panin Jehiel’ tapa hi a, pasal zanih le sawm le giat tawh ahi hi.
Shelomith: Bani-te beh panin Josifiah’ tapa hi a, pasal za le sawmguk tawh ahi hi.
Zekhariah: Bebai-te beh panin Bebai’ tapa hi a, pasal sawmnih le giat tawh ahi hi.
Johanan: Azgad-te beh panin Hakkatan’ tapa hi a, pasal za le sawmkhat tawh ahi hi.
Elifelet, Jeiel le Shemaiah: A hong nungpai Adonikam-te beh zong hi uh a, pasal sawmguk tawh ahi uh hi.
Uthai le Zabbud: Bigvai-te beh pan hi uh a, pasal sawmsagih tawh ahi uh hi.
Ahava gam lamah a luang lui gei khatah amaute ka khawm a, tua lai-ah ni thum sung ka tam uh hi. Mite le siampite ka etphat ciangin Levi mite khat zong na om lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a lawmte lakah a makai, Eliezer, Ariel, Shemaiah, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zekhariah le Meshullam-te le thu ngaihsut siam Joiarib le Elnathan-te ka sam a,
Kasifia mun a a makai pa Iddo kiangah va pai-in, tua lai-a biakinn nasem amah le a behte in, eite’ Pasian’ biakinn-a na a sem ding mihing hong puak ding uh a ngen dingin ka sawl hi.
Tua hi a, hehpihna a nei eite’ Pasian in hong ompih ahih manin Levi mi Mahli-te beh sung panin thu ngaihsutsiam mi ahi Sherebiah, a tapate le a behte tawh pasal sawm le giat,
le Merari-te beh panin Isaiah, a behte le amau’ tapate mi sawm le nih le Hashabiah tawh,
Levi mite’ na a sem dingin David le a uliante in a tuamkoih ahi biakinn nasem zanih le sawmnih hong pia hi. Hih mite khempeuh amau’ min ciat tawh a kisam ahi hi.

Tua ciangin eite’ Pasian’ mai-ah kote kiniamkhiat thei-in, kote le ka naupangte uh le ka neihsa khempeuh uh nuamtakin ka khualzinna uhah ka pai theih nading uh Pasian’ tung pan ka nget theih nadingun Ahava lui-ah an tanna ding thu ka taangko hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa kiangah, “Ka Pasian un amah a zong mite khempeuh ompihin amau adingin a hoih na sem a, amah a nusiate khempeuh tungah amah heh hi,” ci-in gen khin ka hih manun lampi-ah kote hong kha dingin galkapte le sakol tung tuangte kumpipa kiangah ka nget ding ka mai a zum hi.
Tua hi a, kote in an ka tang uh hi. Nuamtakin khual ka zin theih nading uh i Pasian’ tungah ka ngen uh a, amah in ka thungetna uh hong pia hi.
Tua ciangin siampi liante sung panin mi sawm le nih - Sherebiah, Hashabiah le amau’ behte mi sawm ka tuamkoih hi.
Tua ciangin i Pasian’ biakinn nasep nadingin kumpipa le a thu lamlakte le a uliante le tua lai-a a om Israel mi khempeuh in a tuam khen ciat uh ngun le kham le umlebeelte, amaute tungah ka ap hi.
Amaute tungah ka apte: Ngun talen zaguk sawmnga, talen nih a gik ngun tawh a kibawl umlebeel zakhat, kham talen zakhat,
kham darik tulkhat man tawh a kibawl kuang-uk sawmnih, le kham zahin a manpha sumsan hoih tawh a kibawl beel nih ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Topa tungah note hong ki-ap hi. Umlebeelte zong biakna vante ahi hi. Ngun le khamte ahihleh na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi Topa tungah citna tawh a kipia na ahi hi.
Siampi liante, Levi mite le Israel mi beh lutangte’ muhin Jerusalem khua-ah Topa’ biakinn dei sungah na puak dong mateng uh vilin kem un,” ka ci hi.
Tua ahih manin siampite le Levi mite in Jerusalem-a i Pasian’ biakinn-ah puak dingin ngun, kham le umlebeelte a hong sang uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem a zuan dingin kha masa a ni sawm le nih ni-in Ahava lui panin ka ding khia uh hi. I Pasian in kote hong ompih ahih manin lamkalah galte le pansimna a tuamtuamte tawh hong kipelhsak hi.
Jerusalem khua ka tun uh ciangin ni thum sung ka tawlnga uh hi.

A ni li ni-in Uriah’ tapa siampi Meremoth’ tavuan lakna tawh i Pasian’ biakinn sungah ngun, kham le umlebeelte kiseng hi. Finehas’ tapa Eleazar in amah huh a, Levi mi Jeshua’ tapa Jozabad le Binnui’ tapa Noadiah in amau tegel huh uh hi.
Vante a ki-ap ciangin limtakin kivel a, a ki-ap na khempeuh ciaptehna lai khat kibawl hi.

Tua ciangin salsuahna panin inn hong zuankik mite in Israel-te khempeuh adingin Israel Pasian tungah meihal biakna-in bawngtal sawm le nih, tuutal sawmkua le guk, tuuno sawmsagih le nih le mawhna hanga biakna-in keeltal sawm le nih a pia uh hi. Hihte khempeuh pen Topa’ tungah meihal biakna ahi hi.

Amaute in Eufratis Gungal gam sungteng a kumpipa’ nuai-ah a uksawn a lian pente le uliante tungah kumpipa’ thupiaknate zong a va gen uh hi. Tua hi a, amaute in mite le Pasian’ biakinn lam nasep a huh uh hi.

Hih thute khempeuh a kisep khit ciangin keima kiangah makaite pawlkhat hong pai-in, “Hih gam a teeng gamdang mite’ nitna le Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Jebus mite, Ammon mite, Moab mite, Egypt mite le Amor’ mite’ gamtat a kihhuaite panin Israel mi, siampite le Levi mite nangawn zong, a siangtho-in tuam om lo uh hi.

Amaute le a tapate un hih gam a teeng minam dangte’ numeite teenpih uh a, tua thu hangin a siangtho minam pen tu-in gamdang mite tawh a kihel suak ta hi. Tua hi a, hih thu-ah makaite le thukhen uliante pen a khial masa ahi uh hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Hih thu ka zak ciangin dah mahmahin ka puante balkekin, ka sam le ka khamul botin, cih nading thei loin ka om hi.
Tua ciangin sal a suak hih mite’ cihtak lohna hangin Israel Pasian’ gim piak ding lau-in a liing mite khempeuh kei kiangah hong kikhawm uh a, nitak biakpiak hun dong cih nading thei loin ka om hi.
Tua hi a, nitak biakpiak hun ciangin khua phawkkikin ka puankekpi mah silh kawmin khukdinin Topa Pasian’ lamah ka khut zakin,
“Ka biak Pasian aw, ka mawhnate un ka lu dawn dong uh hong vuknelhin vantung dong banto ahih manin nangma lam kong et ding maizumin ka mai a san hi, ka Pasian aw.

Ka pu ka pate uh hun a kipanin tuhun dong mawhna lianpi ka nei uh hi. Tua thu hangin ka kumpite uh le ka siampite un gamdang kumpite’ khut sungah sihna, salsuahna, neihsa kisuhna le maizumna thuak uh a, tuhunin zong tua bangmah ka thuak uh hi.

Ahi zongin tu-in Topa ka Pasian un tomkha sung kote hong hehpih a, a suakta pawlkhat hong omsakin nangma mun siangtho-ah siksan ding mun nong pia hi. Nangmah in ka mit uh hong vaksakkikin ka salsuahna uhah ka nuntakna uh ka thakpat theih nading uh kalsuan cilna nong pia hi.

Kote pen sal ka hi takpi uh hi; ahi zongin ka salsuahna uhah ka Pasian un nong nusia kei a, kote’ Pasian’ biakinn puahkikin ka dinsakkik theih nading uh le Judah le Jerusalem-ah kidalna kulh ka neih theih nadingun kipat thakna na hong piak theih nadingin Persia kumpite ko tungah a thunuam dingin nong bawlsak hi.

“Kote’ Pasian aw, hih bang hi khin ahih ciangin kote in bang gen thei nawn ding ka hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh na nasem kamsangte tungtawnin kote thu hong pia-in, ‘Note va lutin na luah ding uh gam pen, tua gam a a na teng gamdang mite in ninsakin a kihhuai a gamtatnate uh tawh mong khat pan mong khat dongin a ninsa gam nin ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin na tanute uh amau’ tapate tawh kiteengsak kei unla, na tapate uh zi dingin amau’ tanute zong la kei un. Amaute’ phattuamna ding le a maavanna ding uh hanciam kei un. Tua bang hileh note thahatin tua gam a piangte nuamtakin na ne ding uh a, na tate un a luah tawntung dingun tua gam na piasawn thei ding uh hi,’ ci-in nong thupiaknate ka zui kei uh hi.

Tu-in kote’ gamtatsiate le a lian ka mawhnate uh hangin hih bang gimna lian ka thuak uh hi; ahi zongin nangmah in kote’ tuah dinga kilawmzah gimna hong tuaksak loin, tu-a banga a nungta lai-in nong omsak zaw hi.

Hih banga ka thuak khit uh ciangin kote in na thupiaknate mang lo kikin, a kihhuai-in a gamta mite tawh kiteengin kizomkik ding ka hi uh hiam? Tua bang hikik le-ung, a suakta, a nungta ka om nawn loh dongun kote’ tungah na hehna hong tungsak ding hi lo na hi hiam?

Israel Pasian, Topa aw, nang na thutang a, ahi zongin tuni-a a omlai ko teng nong suaktasak veve hi. Na muhna-ah kote a mawhpi mah hita le-ung hong hehpih in; bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna tawh nangma mai-ah kuamah om thei lo hi,” ci-in thu ka ngen hi.

Ezra in tu-a bangin thu ngenin mawhna pulakin khitui naptui tawh Pasian’ biakinn mai-ah kunin a om laitakin Israel mi numei, pasal, naupang, mi tampi tak ama kiimah hong kikhawmin amaute khempeuh zong nakpitakin a kap uh hi.

Tua ciangin Elam-te beh sung panin Jehiel’ tapa Shekaniah hong pau-in Ezra kiangah, “Hih gam a teeng gamdang numeite tenpihna tawh i Pasian tungah i khial hi. Ahi ta zongin Israel mite adingin lametna omlai hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, ka topa uh nangma ngaihsutna le i Pasian’ thupiakna a kihta mite’ ngaihsutna bangin hih i zite le a tate uh i makna ding thu i Pasian’ tungah kiciam ni. Tua ciangin thukham sunga om bangin gamta ni.
Kipan in; nangma nasep ding ahi hi; kote in kong huh ding uh hi. Hang inla sem in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ezra dingin, a kigensa bangin amaute a gamtat nadingun a kiciam dingin siampi makaite, Levi mite le Israel mi khempeuh sawl a, amaute zong a kiciam pah uh hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ biakinn panin Ezra pai khia-in Eliashib’ tapa Jehohanan’ omna inndei-ah pai-in tua lai-ah a giak hi. Salsuahna pan a hong ciahkik mite’ khialhna hangin dah ahih manin amah in anletui ne zo lo hi.
Tua ciangin Judah le Jerusalem sunga a om a hong ciahkik salte khempeuh Jerusalem-ah a hong kikhopna ding uh,
le ni thum sungin a hong tung lo a om leh uliante le upate’ hoihsakna bangin a neihsa khempeuh uh kimanin, salsuaksa mihonte panin a kihawlkhiat theih nading thu taangkona khat kibawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Judah le Benjamin mi khempeuh ni thum sungin Jerusalem-ah hong kikhawm uh a, tua pen a kha kuana a ni sawmnih ni ahi hi. Tua hi a, Pasian’ biakinn mai inntualah hih thu hangin mi khempeuh patau-in guah lakah liingin a tu uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Ezra dingto-in amaute kiangah, “Note in gamdang numeite zi-in la-in Israel mite’ mawhna na behlap uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi Topa’ tungah na mawhna uh pulak unla, ama deihna bangin gamta-in hih gam a teeng gamdang mite le gamdang mi ahi na zite uh tawh kikhenin tuam om un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a kikhawm mi khempeuh in dawngin kiko uh a, “Hi tahen, na gen bangin ka gamta ding uh hi.

Ahi zongin mi tampi hi hang a, guahzuk laitak zong ahi hi. Hih guah lakah ka omsuak zo kei ding uh hi. Tua tham loin hih thu-ah eite in mawhna lianpi hihkha ihih manin ni khat ni nih sungin hih nasep a kizo thei ding hi lo hi.

A kikhawm mihonpite’ tangin i makaite semsak inla, hih thu hangin eite’ tungah Pasian’ hehna a dam matengin, i khuapite sung khempeuh ah gamdang numei a teenpih mi khempeuh amau khua sung upate le thukhente ciat tawh a kiseh hunin i makaite kiangah va kilak uh hen,” a ci uh hi.
Asahel’ tapa Jonathan le Tikvah’ tapa Jahzeiah tegel bek in hih thu nial uh a, Meshullam le Levi mi Shabbethai bek in tua a nialte panpih uh hi.

Tua hi a, thukham omsa bangin, a hong ciahkik salsuakte a gamta uh hi. Siampi Ezra in amau’ beh ciat tangin beh lutang pawlkhat teng khia a, tuate khempeuh a minin a kilo khia ahi hi. A kha sawmna a ni khat ni-in hih mite a thukan ding uh kipan uh a,
a kha masa a ni khat ni-in gamdang numei a teenpih mite’ thu a kan uh a zo uh hi.
Siampite beh lak panin Jozadak’ tapa Jeshua le a sanggamte beh sung panin Maaseiah, Eliezer, Jarib le Gedaliah-te in gamdang numei a tenpihna kimu hi.
Amaute in a zite a mak ding uh kiciam uh a, amau’ mawhna hangin biakna-in tuuhon panin tuutal khat hong paipih uh hi.
Immer-te beh sung panin Hanani le Zebadiah ahi uh hi.
Harim-te beh sung panin Maaseiah, Elijah, Shemaiah, Jehiel le Uzziah ahi uh hi.
Pashhur-te beh sung panin Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethanel, Jozabad le Elasah ahi uh hi.
Levi mite sung panin Jozabad, Shimei, Kelaiah (Kelita a kici), Pethahiah, Judah le Eliezer ahi uh hi.
Lasate sung panin Eliashib ahi hi. Kongcingte sung panin Shallum, Telem le Uri ahi uh hi.
Israel mi adangte sung pan: Parosh-te beh panin Ramiah, Izziah, Malkhijah, Mijamin, Eleazar, Makhijah le Beinaiah ahi uh hi.
Elam-te beh panin Mattaniah, Zekhariah, Jehiel, Abdi, Jeremoth le Elijah ahi uh hi.
Zattu-te beh panin Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, Jeremoth, Zabad le Aziza ahi uh hi.
Bebai-te beh panin Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai le Athlai ahi uh hi.
Bani-te beh panin Meshullam, Maluk, Adaiah, Jashub, Sheal le Jeremoth ahi uh hi.
Pahathmoab-te beh panin Adna, Khelal, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattaniah, Bezalel, Binnui le Manasseh ahi uh hi.
Harim-te beh sung panin Eliezer, Isshijah, Malkhijah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
Benjamin, Maluk le Shemariah ahi uh hi.
Hashum-te beh sung panin Mattenai, Mattattah, Zabad, Elifelet, Jeremai, Manasseh le Shimei ahi uh hi.
Bani-te beh panin Maadai, Amram, Uel,
Benaiah, Bedeiah, Kheluhi,
Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,
Mattaniah, Mattenai le Jaasu ahi uh hi.
Binnui-te beh panin Shimei,
Shelemiah, Nathan, Adaiah,
Maknadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
Azarel, Shelemiah, Shemariah,
Shalum, Amariah le Josef ahi uh hi.
Nebo-te beh panin Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jaddai, Joel le Benaiah ahi uh hi.
Hih mite khempeuh in gamdang numei teenpih uh a, amaute in a zite uh a tate uh tawh a makhawm uh hi.
Hakaliah’ tapa Nehemiah’ thugen hih bang ahi hi. A kum sawmnihna Khislev kha sungin kumpi khuapi Susa-ah ka om laitakin,

ka sanggampa Hanani le midang pawlkhat Judah gam panin hong tung uh hi. Tua ciangin keimah in Jerusalem khua thu le sala matna panin a suakta ahi a omsuak Judah mite’ thu tawh kisai amaute kiangah ka dong hi.
Salsuahna panin a suakta, tua gam a omsuakte in haksatna lianpi le maizumna a ngahna uh le Jerusalem kulh kicimin kulhkongpite mei in a kattumna thu a hong gen uh hi.
Hih thu ka zak ciangin tusukin ka kap niloh a, ni tampi sung an tangin, vantung Pasian kiangah thu ka ngen hi.
Ka thungetna-ah, “Aw vantung Pasian, Topa, nang hong itin na thupiakna a zuite tungah thuciamna limtakin a zui, a lian a kihtakhuai Pasian aw,

Israel mi ahi na nasemte’ tangin sun le zanin kong thunget nilohna a ngai dingin na bil hong ngat inla, na mit hong hak in. Nangma tungah ko Israel mite ka khialhna uh, keimah le ka pu ka pate zong ka khialhna uh ahi ka mawhnate uh kong pulak uh hi.
Nangma tungah kong khialkhin uh a, na nasem pa Moses tungah na piak ahi thupiaknate, thukhamte le ngeina kipte ka zui kei uh hi.
Na nasem Moses tungah, ‘Na cihtak kei uhleh minam dangte lakah kong thehthang ding hi.

Ahi zongin kei kiangah hong ciahkikin ka thupiaknate zui-in na sep uhleh leimong dongah a kithehthangsa na mite uh kaikhawmin keima min om nadingin ka teelnasa munah amaute ka ciahpih ding hi,’ ci-a na thugen hong phawkkik in.
Topa aw, amaute pen na vangliatna le a thahat na khut tawh na hotkhiatsa na nasemte le nangma mite ahi uh hi.

Keima hong thungetna le nangma min a zahtak nuam na nasemte’ thungetna na bil hong ngat in. Tu-in kei tungah maavanna hong pia inla, kei tungah hih kumpipa hong migitna ding lungsim hong guan in,” ka ci hi. Tua hun laitakin kei pen kumpipa’ an a piapa ka hi hi.
Kumpi Artakzaksis’ kum sawmnihna Nisan kha sungin khatvei, a leenggahzu a baihsa-in a om khit ciangin la-in kumpipa ka pia a, ama mai-ah ka om laitakin ka mai a khing hi.
Amah in, “Cina lopi-in bang hangin na mai khing ahi hiam? Na dahna khat om hi ding hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin lau mahmahna tawh
kumpipa ka dawng a, “Kumpipa nungta tawntung in. Ka pute ka pate a kivuina khuapi sia gawp a, a kongpite kaangtum ahih ciangin maikhing loin bangci om theih ding ka hi hiam?” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Kei tungah bang hong ngen nuam na hi hiam?” hong ci hi. Kei zong ka lungsim tawngah vantung Pasian kiangah thu ka ngen a,

tua khit ciangin kumpipa dawngin, “Kumpipa na lung a kim a, dik na sak leh, ka puahphatkik theih nadingin Judah gam sung ka pute ka pate a kivuina khuapi-ah nong paisakna ding kong thum hi, topa,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in (kumpinu a gei-ah tukawmin), “Bang tanvei sawt dinga, cik ciangin hong ciahkik thei ding na hi hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in ka ngetna hong thukimpih a, kei zong ka ciahkik ding hun ka gen hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah, “Kumpipa na thukim leh, Judah gam ka tun dong amaute in hong paisuaksak theih nadingun Eufratis Gungal gam sung a uksawn mite ka piak ding laikhakte,

le biakinn hutna ding munmuanhuai kongpi ding, khuapi kulh ding le ka omna ding inn lam nadingin sing hong piak theih nadingin kumpipa’ tulak a kem Asaf’ tungah piak ding laikhak zong, kei tungah hong pia in,” ka ci hi. A dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompih ahih manin kumpipa in ka ngette hong pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Eufratis Gungal gam a uksawn mite kiang ka tung a, kumpipa’ laikhakte amaute tungah ka pia hi. Kumpipa in galkapmaangte le sakol galkapte kei hong khasak hi.
Ahi zongin Israel mite’ phattuamna ding a sem dingin mi khat a paina thu Horonaim khuami Sanballat le Ammon mi sal ahi Tobiah in a zak uh ciangin nakpitakin lungkim lo uh hi.
Jerusalem khua ka tun ciangin ni thum sung ka tawlnga hi.

Tua ciangin zanin vak khia-in mi tawmkhat ka tonpih hi. Ahi zongin Jerusalem adingin ka bawlsak ding ka Pasian in ka lungsimah hong suahsak thu kuama kiangah ka gen kei hi. Keima tuanna sim loh ganhing dang ka kizuisak kei hi.
Kuam Kongpi tawnin Gulpi Tuikhuk le Nin Kongpi lamah ka pai a, a kicimsa Jerusalem kulhpi le mei in a kattumsa a kongpite ka en hi.
Tua ciangin Tuinak Kongpi le Kumpipa’ Bual-ah ka paisuak hi. Ahi zongin ka tuanna ganhing a paisuak theih nading mun om lo hi.
Tua hi a, a zanpi mahin kuam lampi-ah pai-in khuapi kulh ka vel hi. Tua ciangin Kuam Kongpi mah tawnin khuapi sungah ka lutkik hi.

Tua hi a, khua sung upate in ka paina mun ahi a, ka sep ahi zongin thei lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih nasep tavuan a la ding Judah mite, siampite, uliante, khua sung upate le a dangte tungah ka gen nai kei hi.

Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “I lungkhamna thu na thei uh hi. Jerusalem a siasa-in omin, a kongpite mei in kaangtum hi. Hong pai un, zahkona i ngah nawn loh nadingin Jerusalem kulh ciangpha ni,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin a dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompihna le kumpipa in kei tungah hong gen thute zong amaute tungah ka gen hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tu-in nasep kipan pah ni,” hong ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin lawp mahmahna le ngimna hoih tawh nasep a kipan uh hi.

Ahi zongin Horonaim khuami Sanballat, Ammon mi sal ahi Tobiah le Arab gammi ahi Geshem in tua thu a zak uh ciangin, kote zahpihna le simmawhna tawh, “Hih na sep uh bang ahi hiam? Kumpipa lehpan na hi uh hiam?” hong ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute dawngin, “Vantung Pasian in ka maa uh hong telhsak dinga, ko ama nasemte in nasep a kipan ta ka hi uh hi; note in ahihleh Jerusalem tawh kisai-in thu na neih theih nadingun bangmah kimematna na nei kei uh hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin siampi lianpen pa Eliashib le a siampipihte in nasep kipanin Tuu Kongpi a bawl uh hi. Amaute in a khuamte le a zawlte bawlin a kongkhakte bulh uh hi. Amaute in Za Khat Tausang ciang banah Hananel Tausang dong sem uh a, tua ciangin Pasian’ tungah ap uh hi.
A zomah Jerikho khua mite in sem uh hi. Amaute’ zomah Imri’ tapa Zakkur in sem hi.
Tua ciangin Hassenaah’ tapate in Ngasa Kongpi bawl uh hi. Amaute in a zawlte khungin a kongkhakte a kalhna bulh uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Hakkoz’ tapa Uriah, a tapa Meremoth in ama khawk sung puah hi. Tua zomah Meshezabel’ tapa Berekhiah, a tapa Meshullam hi a, tua zomah Baana’ tapa Zadok in puah hi.
A zom kikah Tekoa khua mite in puah uh a, ahi zongin amau’ uliante in a tote uh sawl bangin sem nuam lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paseah’ tapa Joiada le Besodeiah’ tapa Meshullam in Jeshanah Kongpi puah uh a, a zawlte khungin a kongkhakte a kalhna bulh uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Gibeon le Mizpah khuami ahi, Gibeon mi Melatiah le Meronoth khuami Jadon in Eufratis Gungal gam a uksawn pa’ zum dong puah uh hi.
Tua zomah khamseek pa Harhaiah’ tapa Uzziel in puah a, a zomah paknamtui bawlpa Hananiah in puah hi. Amaute in Kulh Zai ciang dong a ngeina bangin Jerusalem bawlkik uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Jerusalem gam phelkhat a uk, Hur’ tapa aiah in puah hi.
A zomah Harumaf’ tapa Jedaiah in ama inn mai san teng puah hi. Tua ciangin a zomah Hashabneiah’ tapa Hattush in puah hi.
Harim’ tapa Malkhijah le Pahathmoab’ tapa Hasshub in Meikhuk Tausang a huam khawk dang khat sung puah uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Jerusalem gam a phelkhat a uk, Hallohesh’ tapa Shallum in a tanute tawh a puah uh hi.
Hanun le Zanoah khua-a teeng mite in Kuam Kongpi puah uh hi. Amaute in tua kongpi bawlpha-in a kongkhakte a kalhna bulh uh a, Nin Kongpi ciang dong pi tul le pi zanga sung kulh a puah uh hi.
Bethhakkherem gam a uk, Rekhab’ tapa Malkhijah in Nin Kongpi puah a, tua kongpi bawlpha-in a kongkhakte a kalhna a bulh hi.

Mizpah gam a uk, Kolhozeh’ tapa Shallum in Tuinak Kongpi puah a, tua kongpi bawlpha-in a kongkhakte a kalhna bulh hi. Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa’ huan gei-a kulh ciang a, David khuapi pan a hong paisuk kahlei ciang dong a sem hi.
Ama zomah Bethzur gam phelkhat a uk, Azbuk’ tapa Nehemiah in David’ han san ciang, a kibawl tawm bual le Galkap Inn ciang dong puah hi.
Ama zomah a puah Levi mite: Bani’ tapa Rehum hi a, ama zomah Keilah gam phelkhat a uk Hashabiah in ama gam tangin puah hi.
Ama zomah a puah a behte: Keilah gam phelkhat a uk, Henadad’ tapa Bavvai in puah hi.
A zomah Mizpah gam a uk, Jeshua’ tapa Ezer in a Kiu-a galvan koihna kahtohna san khawk khat puah hi.
Ama zomah Zabbai’ tapa Baruk in a Kiu panin siampi lianpen pa Eliashib’ inn kongkhak ciang dong khawk khat sung puah hi.
Ama zomah Hakkoz’ tapa Uriah, a tapa Meremoth in Eliashib’ inn kongkhak panin Eliashib’ innmong ciang dong khawk khat sung puah hi.
Ama zomah Jerusalem kiimnai-a om siampite in puah uh hi.
A zomah Benjamin le Hasshub in amau’ inn mai san puah uh hi. A zomah Ananiah’ tapa Maaseiah, a tapa Azariah in ama inn gei san teng puah hi.
Ama zomah Henadad’ tapa Binnui in Azariah’ inn panin a Kiu,
le kulh kiu ciang khawk khat sung puah hi. Uzai’ tapa Palal in a Kiu gal san teng le kumpipa’ inn panin hong dawk khia, zum cingte’ omna ahi tausang tungnung teng puah hi.
Ama zomah Parosh’ tapa Pedaiah in nisuahna lam manawhin Tui Kongpi gal san ciang le tausang dawk puah hi.
Ama zomah Tekoa khuamite in a lian tausang dawk panin Ofel mualbo kulh ciang, khawk dang khat sung puah uh hi.
Sakol Kongpi tung san teng ahihleh siampite in amau’ inn mai san ciat puah uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Immer’ tapa Zadok in ama inn mai san puah hi. Ama zomah Nisuahna Kongpi a cing, Shekaniah’ tapa Shemaiah in puah hi.
Ama zomah Shemaiah’ tapa Hananiah le Zalaf’ tapa gukna Hanun in khawk dang khat sung puah uh hi. Amau zomah Berekhiah’ tapa Meshullam in ama inndei mai san teng puah hi.
Ama zomah khamseek pa Malkhijah in Kikaihkhopna Kongpi mai sana om biakinn nasemte’ inn le sumbukte’ inn ciang le a kiu-a inndei tungnung ciang dong puah hi.
Tua ciangin khamseekte le sumbukte in a kiu-a inndei tungnung le Tuu Kongpi kikal a puah uh hi.
Sanballat in kote’ kulh cianna thu a zak ciangin lungkim loin heh mahmah a, ko Jew mite hong zahko hi.

Amah in a kikholhpihte le Samaria galkapte’ kiangah, “Hih Jew mi niangnuangte in bang hih ding a kipan ahi uh hiam? Hih mun a bawlpha dinga kingaihsun ahi uh hiam? Biakpiakna hangin a nasep uh ni khat sungin zo dingin kilamen ahi uh hiam? Amaute in a kaangtumsa ninbulomtang panin suangtum bawlkik thei ding ahi uh hiam?” ci hi.
Ama kiangah a om Ammon mi Tobiah in, “Amaute in bangbang ciang ta leh amau’ kulh cian tungah ngia khat kah leh kicim lel ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin keimah Nehemiah in thu ka ngen a, “Hong za in, kote’ Pasian aw; kote hong kisimmawh hi. Kote hong zahkona amau’ lu tungah lehtuksak inla, gamdang khatah sal suakin mi’ bawlsiatin amaute omsak in.
Amaute in a langtangin kulh ciangte’ mai-ah nang hong hehsak uh ahih manin amau’ mawhna maisak kei inla, na ciaptehna panin zong a mawhna uh sumit kei in,” ka ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kulh ka ciang uh a, nasep a kimciang bang kizo hi. Mite in utna lungsim tawh sem uh hi.
Ahi zongin Sanballat, Tobiah, Arab mite, Ammon mite le Ashdod mite in Jerusalem kulh cian nasep kizom suakin, kulh vang teng huk ding a kipat khitna thu a zak uh ciangin heh mahmah uh hi.
Tua hi a, Jerusalem hong simin buaina a piangsak dingin amaute kipawlin vaihawmna khat nei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka Pasian uh tungah thu ka ngen uh a, amaute a en dingin sun le zanin galvil ka koih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam mite in, “Nasemte a tha uh zaw ta a, ahi zong nin tampi omlai hi. Eima tha tawh kulh cian i zo ngei kei ding hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka galte un, “Amau’ phawk loh kalun amaute lakah pai-in i that dinga, a nasep uh i beisak ding hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Amaute lakah a teeng Jew mite khuapi sungah hong pai ciangin, ka galte uh a omna khempeuh ciat panun hong pai-in kote hong simna ding thu, sawmvei tak hong hilh khol uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kulh nunglam mun niam penna mun awng tengah a namsau uh, a teipi uh le a thal uh tawh, a innkuan kuanun ka mite ka pangsak hi.

Mite’ launa ka muh ciangin, uliante, mi ukte le mi khempeuh tungah, “Amaute kihta kei un. Na sanggamte, na tapate, na tanute, na zite uh le na inn na lote uh adingin hong dosak, a lian a kihtakhuai Topa phawk un,” ka ci hi.
Amau’ hong sawmna thu kote in ka phawkna uh le Pasian in amau’ geelna a suksiatna thu ka galte un thei uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka nasepna ciat uh kulh tungah ka vekpi-un ka kuankik uh hi.
Tua hun a kipanin ka khutnuai-a om mite kimkhat in na sem a, a kimkhat in a teipite, a lumte le a thalte uh tawi-in sik puan silhin ding uh a, uliante in kulh a ciang Judah mi khempeuh uk uh hi.
Kulh-a cian ding na a nawn mite in a khut langkhat uh tawh a van puak uh lenin a khut langkhat uhah galhiam tawi uh hi.
Kulh ciangte in na a sep kawmun a kawng ciat uhah a namsau uh kuah uh hi. Peengkul tum pa ahihleh keima kiangah om hi.
Tua ciangin mi liante, mi ukte le mi khempeuh tungah, “I nasepna lian a, zaipi tak huam hi; eite kulh tungah kikhenin khatlekhat i kigamla hi.
Peengkul kitum na zakna peuhpeuh panun ko kiangah hong kikhawm un. I Pasian in eite adingin hong dosak ding hi,” ka ci hi.
Tua hi a, nisimin khuavak a kipan nitak aksi suah dong, mi kimkhat in teipi tawi-in, mi kimkhat in na ka sem uh hi.
Tua hun mahin mite kiangah, “Zanin galvil, sunin nasemin hong om theih nadingun mi khempeuh na nasemte ciat uh tawh Jerusalem khua sungah hong giak un,” ka ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah a kipan ka behte, ka nasemte le kei hong cingte, a kuamah peuh puan suah man om loin, mi khempeuh in ka khut uhah galhiam ka tawi den uh hi.
Tu-in mi nautang numei le pasalte in a Jew mipihte uh tungah lungkim lohna kam hong gingsak uh hi.
Mi pawlkhatte in an lei nadingin a tanute uh le a tapate uh a piakna thu hong gen uh hi.
Pawlkhatte in kial tun huhau-in an lei nadingin a lote, a leenggah lote le a innte uh a piakna hong gen uh hi.
Pawlkhatte in kumpipa tungah siah piak dingin a lote uh le a leenggui lote uh khamin a piakna uh hong gen uh hi.

Amaute in, “Kote pen ka behte uh mah bangin cilesa kibang hi-in, ka naupangte uh zong amau’ naupangte mah bangin a hoih hinapi-in, ka tanute uh le ka tapate uh sal suak dingin ka phum uh hi. Ka tanute uh pawlkhat zong sal suakkhin a, ka lote uh le ka leenggui lote uh midangte a’ suakkhin ahih manin amaute tat nadingin ka hih zawh uh bangmah om lo hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Amaute’ kikona le hih thute ka zak ciangin ka heh mahmah hi.
Kei zong hih thu limtakin ka ngaihsun a, tua ciangin uliante le thukhente taii-in amaute kiangah, “No le no leiba manin salin na kila uh hi,” ka ci hi. Amaute nakpitakin taii-in,

“Minam dangte tungah sala kizuaksa i Jew mipihte ahi zo zahzahin i tanhkik hi. Tua hinapi-in note in na mipihte uh na zuak uh a, tu-in amaute i tatkik ding hi zel hi,” ka ci hi. Amaute pau loin om uh a, a gen ding mel uh thei lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, “Note’ gamtatna hoih lo hi. I gal ahi minam dangte’ zahkona i ngah loh nadingin i Pasian zahtakna tawh na gamtat ding uh kilawm hi.
Kei le ka behte le ka nasemte in zong an le sum leitawi-in ka pia khia uh hi. Leiba manin mi kilakna phiat ni.
Tuni mahmahin a lote, a oliv lote, a innte uh le a meetin na lak uh sum, an, leenggahzu le sathaute, amaute tungah piakik un,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hihte khempeuh ka piakik ding uh a, amaute tung panin bangmah ka kal nawn kei ding uh hi. Na gen bangin ka gamta ding uh hi,” hong ci uh hi. Tua ciangin siampite ka sam a, a ciamsa bangun a gamtat nadingun siampite’ mai-ah kiciamna ka bawlsak hi.

Tua ciangin kei zong ka puan singin, “Hih thuciamna a tungsak lo peuhmah a inn le a neihsa panin Pasian in sing khia tahen. Hih bangin kisingkhia henla, hawmsuak hen!” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin a kikhawmte khempeuh in, “Hi tahen,” ci uh a, Topa a phat uh hi. Tua hi a, a ciamsa bangun mite a gamta uh hi.

Tua tham loin, Judah gam a uk dingin hong kiseh hun a kipan, Kumpi Artakzaksis’ kum sawmnihna pan a kum sawmthum le nihna dong, kum sawm le kum nih sung, kei le ka behte in gam ukte’ ngah ngei ante ka ne kei uh hi.

Keima hun ma-in a ukte in mite tungah van gikpi suan uh a, amaute’ tung panin nisimin an le leenggahzu ngun shekel sawmli man a la uh hi. Amau’ nasemte nangawn mite tungah kiliansak lai uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian ka zahtakna hangin tua bangin kei ka gamta kei hi.
Hih kulh cianna-ah kei mahmah in zong ka sem a, kei adingin leitang bangmah ka la kei hi. Keima mite khempeuh nasem ding bekin tua lai-ah kisutuah uh hi.
Kiim le pama minam dangte’ kiang pan hong paite banah, nisimin ka sabuai-ah an a ne, thukhente le Jew mi a kihelin leengla za le sawmnga bang ka nei den hi.

Nisimin inn sung annektawm dinga kibawl bawngtal khat le tuu limci guk ahi hi. Tua mah bangin ak zong kibawl a, ni sawm simin leenggahzu a um tampipi-in kihih hi. Tua zahin bei taseleh gam ukte’ ngah theih ahi anletui ka kal kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mite genthei lua hi.
Pasian aw, hih mite adingin ka bawlna khempeuh kei adingin a hoih lamin hong phawk in.
Kongpite-ah kongkhak ka bulh nai loh uh hangin, kulh ka cian khitna uh le a vang khat zong a om nawn lohna thu, Sanballat, Tobiah, Arab mi Geshem le ka gal dangte khempeuh un a zak uh ciangin,
Sanballat le Geshem zong Ono zanglei sunga om Hakkofirim khua-ah pai-in amaute tawh thu a kikum dingin hong sam uh hi. Hih pen kei hong suksiat nopna uh ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kei zong amaute kiangah kamtaite ka sawl a, “Tu laitakin nasep thupi ka nei hi; kong pai thei kei ding hi. Kei hong pai leng, kong pai sung ka om loh kal teng nasep kitawlnga ding hi,” ka ci hi.
Amaute in tu-a bangmahin livei tak hong sam uh a, kei zong a livei mahin tu-a bangin ka dawngkik hi.
Tua bangmahin Sanballat in a ngaveina hong sam a, tua tungtangin a kamtai pa in laikhak khat hong pia hi.

A laikhak sungah, “Minam dangte lakah a kigen, Geshem in zong tu-a a kigen thu man hi, ci-a a gen thu in: Nang le Jew mite in kumpi lehdo ding na sawm uh a, tua thu hangin kulh na ciang uh hi. Tua banah nang mahmah zong kumpi na utna kigen lai hi.

Judah gam in kumpi khat nei ta hi, ci-in, nang kumpi na hihna thu Jerusalem-ah a taangko dingin kamsangte pawlkhat a koihin zong hong kigen hi. Kumpipa in hih thu za pelmawh ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin thakhatin hong pai inla, hih thu kikum ni,” ci-in kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, “Tu-a na gen bangin bangmah om lo hi. Tua bang thu pen nangma phuahtawm ahi hi,” ci-in ka thuk hi.
Kote in ka hanciamna uh khiamin nasep a kizawh loh nading deihna tawh amaute in kote hong lausak theih nading uh a hanciam uh ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka hahkat semsem zaw uh hi.

Mehetabel’ tapa Delaiah, a tapa Shemaiah a inn-ah omcip ahih manin ni khat ama kiangah ka pai leh amah in, “Pasian’ inn sung, siangtho munah kituahin biakinn kong kikhaknelh ni; bang hang hiam cih leh nang hong that dingin amaute hong pai uh a, zanin amaute in nang hong that ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Ahih hangin keimah in, “Kei bang mite tai ding ahi hiam? Kei bang mite a suahtak nadingin biakinn sungah bu ding ahi hiam? Ka pai peuhmah kei ding hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin a thusim ka phawkkhia hi. Pasian in tua bang thu a gen dingin amah a sawl hi lo a, Tobiah le Sanballat in tua bangin thugen dingin golhguk a na pia na hi a, ama thugenna pen keimah suksiat nopna ahi hi.
Ama thugen bangin gamta-in mawhna ka bawl theih nadingin keimah hong lausak nadingin a kicial ahi hi. Tua bangin zuikha leng kei hong minsia sakin hong simmawh ding uh hi.
Ka Pasian aw, amau’ sepnate’ hangin Tobiah le Sanballat thei inla, keimah lausak dingin a hanciam kamsangnu Noadiah le kamsang dang khempeuh zong thei in.
Elul kha ni sawmnih le nga ni-in kulh kizo a, ni sawmnga le nih sung hun bei hi.
Ka galte un hih thu za-in, ka kiim uha om minam dangte in a theih uh ciangin lamdangsa a, kote’ Pasian’ huhna tawh hih nasep kizo ahihna a phawk uh hi.
Hih hun sungteng khempeuh Jew uliante in Tobiah kiangah lai tampi khak uh a, Tobiah’ laikhakte zong amaute’ kiangah tung hi.
Tobiah pen Arah’ tapa Shekaniah’ makpa hi a, ama tapa Jehohanan in Berekhiah’ tapa Meshullam’ tanute khat teenpih ahih manin Judah gam sunga mi tampi amah tawh kipawl hi.
Amaute in ama hoihnate zong keima zak-ah hong gen uh a, keima sepna teng zong ama kiangah na puak uh hi. Tua hi a, Tobiah in zong ka lau theih nadingin kei tungah lai tampi hong khak hi.
Kulh kiciang khinin, kongkhakte ka bulh khin uh a, kongcingte, lasate le Levi mite a kiseh khit ciangin,
ka sanggampa Hanani le biakinn a uk Hananiah in a et dingin Jerusalem ka pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hananiah pen midang tampi sangin a citak zaw, Pasian a zahtak zaw khat ahi hi.

Tua hi a, amaute tungah, “Sun mateng Jerusalem kongpite hongsak kei un. Tua ciangin ni omlai mahin kongte khaksakin kalhsak un. Jerusalem khua sunga teengte lak panin khuacing dingte seh unla, pawlkhatte galvilna munah, pawlkhatte amau’ omna inn mai ciatah omsak un,” ka ci hi.
Khuapi lianin zai a, ahi zongin a sungah mi tawm bek om a, innte a kilam om nai lo hi.

Tua ciangin uliante, thukhente le mite a innkuan kuanun ciaptehna ding ka lungsim sungah Pasian in hong suaksak hi. Tua hi a, hong ciahkik masate’ khang ciaptehna laibu ka mu hi. Tua sungah a kigelh ka muhte:

Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in a zawhna gam panin salin a lak mite sung panin hih mite pen Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Mordekai, Bilshan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum le Baanah-te’ makaihna tawh Jerusalem le Judah gam sung amau khua ciatah a hong ciahkik ahi uh hi.
Parosh suante - mi tulnih zakhat sawmsagih le nih ahi hi.
Shefatiah suante - mi zathum sawmsagih le nih ahi hi.
Arah suante - mi zaguk sawmnga le nih ahi hi.
Pahathmoab-te beh sung panin Jeshua le Joab suante - mi tulnih zagiat le sawm le giat ahi hi.
Elam suante - mi tulkhat zanih sawmnga le li ahi hi.
Zattu suante - mi zagiat sawmli le nga ahi hi.
Zakkai suante - mi zasagih sawmguk ahi hi.
Binnui suante - mi zaguk sawmli le giat ahi hi.
Bebai suante - mi zaguk sawmnih le giat ahi hi.
Azgad suante - mi tulnih zathum sawmnih le nih ahi hi.
Adonikam suante - mi zaguk sawmguk le sagih ahi hi.
Bigvai suante - mi tulnih sawmguk le sagih ahi hi.
Adin suante - mi zaguk sawmnga le nga ahi hi.
Ater a kici Hezekiah’ suante - mi sawmkua le giat ahi hi.
Hashum suante - mi zathum sawmnih le giat ahi hi.
Bezai suante - mi zathum sawmnih le li ahi hi.
Harif suante - mi zakhat sawm le nih ahi hi.
Gibeon suante - mi sawmkua le nga ahi hi.
Bethlehem le Netofah khuami - zakhat sawmgiat le giat ahi hi.
Anathoth khuami - zakhat sawmnih le giat ahi hi.
Bethazmaveth khuami - sawmli le nih ahi hi.
Kiriathjearim, Khefirah le Beeroth khuami - zasagih sawmli le thum ahi hi.
Ramah le Geba khuami - zaguk sawmnih le khat ahi hi.
Mikmash khuami - zakhat sawmnih le nih ahi hi.
Bethel le Ai khuami - zakhat sawmnih le thum ahi hi.
Nebo adang khat khuami - sawmnga le nih ahi hi.
Elam adang khat suante - tulkhat zanih sawmnga le li ahi hi.
Harim khuami - zathum sawmnih ahi hi.
Jerikho khuami - zathum sawmli le nga ahi hi.
Lod, Hadid le Ono khuami - zasagih sawmnih le khat ahi hi.
Senaah khuami - tulthum zakua sawmthum ahi hi.
Siampite sung panin: Jeshua-te beh panin Jedaiah suante - zakua sawmsagih le thum ahi hi.
Immer suante - mi tulkhat sawmnga le nih ahi hi.
Pashhur suante - mi tulkhat zanih sawmli le sagih ahi hi.
Harim suante - mi tulkhat sawm le sagih ahi uh hi.
Levi mite sung panin: Hodevah-te beh panin Jeshua suante le Kadmiel suante - sawmsagih le li ahi hi.
Lasate sung panin Asaf suante - mi zakhat sawmli le giat ahi hi.
Kongcingte nam sung panin Shallum suante, Ater suante, Talmon suante, Akkub suante, Hatita suante le Shobai suante - mi zakhat sawmthum le giat ahi uh hi.
Biakinn nasemte sung panin a hong ciahkikte: Ziha suante, Hasufa suante, Tabbaoth suante,
Keros suante, Sia suante, Padon suante,
Lebana suante, Hagaba suante, Shamai suante,
Hanan suante, Giddel suante, Gahar suante,
Reaiah suante, Rezin suante, Nekoda suante,
Gazzam suante, Uzza suante, Paseah suante,
Besai suante, Meunim suante, Nefushesim suante,
Bakbuk suante, Hakufa suante, Harhur suante,
Bazlith suante, Mehida suante, Harsha suante,
Barkos suante, Sisera suante, Temah suante,
Neziah suante le Hatifa suante ahi uh hi.
Solomon’ nasemte’ suanlekhakte sung panin: Sotai suante, Sofereth suante, Perida suante,
Jaala suante, Darkon suante, Giddel suante,
Shefatiah suante, Hattil suante, Pokherethhazzebaim suante le Amon suante ahi uh hi.
Biakinn nasemte le Solomon’ nasemte’ suanlekhakte mi a vekpi-in zathum sawmkua le nih a pha uh hi.
Temelah, Telharsha, Kherub, Addan le Immer khuate panin a hong ciahkik, Israel mi hinapi-in amau’ behlephung a kan thei lo mite:
Delaiah suante, Tobiah suante le Nekoda suante, mi zaguk sawmli le nih ahi uh hi.
Siampite’ sung panin zong: Hobaiah suante, Hakkoz suante, Barzillai suante (amah in Gilead mi Barzillai’ tanute khat tenpihin tua min tawh a kilo pah) ahi uh hi.
Hih mite in khang ciaptehna sungah a kiciamteh mite lakah amau’ min a zon uh hangin mu lo uh ahih manin amaute a siang loin seh uh a, siampi nasep semsak thei lo uh hi.
Tua hi a, Urim le Thummim aisanna tawh ai san ding siampi khat a om matengin amaute in biakna an siangtho pente a nek loh nading uh gam ukpa in a gen hi.
Mi a vekpi-in tul sawmli tulnih zathum sawmguk pha a,
amaute’ nasem numei le pasal tulsagih zathum sawmthum le sagihte kisim lo lai hi. Tua banah amaute in lasa numei le pasal zanih sawmlinga nei uh hi.
Amau’ sakol zasagih sawmthum guk, a la-sakol uh zanih sawmli nga,
a kalaoh uh zali sawmthum nga le a late uh tulguk zasagih sawmnih a pha hi.
Beh lutang mi pawlkhat in nasep nadingin nate pia uh hi. Gam ukpa in vanmanpha koihna-ah kham darik tulkhat, kuang-uk sawmnga le siampi puan zanga sawmthum a pia hi.
Tua ciangin beh lutang pawlkhatte in vanmanpha koihna-ah kham darik tul sawmnih le ngun mina tulnih zanih a pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin midangte’ piakte pen kham darik tul sawmnih, ngun mina tulnih le siampi puan sawmguk le sagih ahi hi.
Tua ciangin siampite, Levi mite le mi pawlkhatte Jerusalem khua le a kiimah teeng uh hi; kongcingte, lasate, biakinn nasemte le Israel midangte amau’ khuapi ciatah a teeng uh hi.

Kha sagihna hong cin ciangin Israel mite amau’ khuapi ciatah teeng khin uh hi. Tua ciangin Tui Kongpi mai tualpi-ah mi khempeuh khekhat khai bangin hong kikhawmtuah diam hi. Tua ciangin Topa in Israel mite tungah a piak ahi Moses thukham laibu pen lai thei pa Ezra in hong paipih nadingin a gen uh hi.
Tua hi a, a kha sagihna a ni khat ni-in numei pasal le thu theitel thei ding a kikhawm khempeuh mai-ah siampi Ezra in thukham laibu hong paipih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Tui Kongpi mai-a om tualpi lam mai ngatin zingsang tung a kipan sun ciang dong, numei pasal le thu a tel thei ding mite’ zakin tua laibu sunga thute sim a, mi khempeuh in tua thukham laibu sunga thu kisimte limtakin a ngai uh hi.

Tua ciangin thugenna dinga sing tawh kibawl tau tungah lai thei pa Ezra dingto a, ama taklam pangah Mattithiah, Shema, Anaiah, Uriah, Hilkiah le Maaseiah ding uh a, a veilam pangah Pedaiah, Mishael, Malkhijah, Hashum, Hashbaddanah, Zekhariah le Meshullam a ding uh hi.
Mi khempeuh sangin a sang zaw munah amah om ahih manin mi khempeuh’ muh theih dingin Ezra in a laibu a hong hi. A laibu a hon ciangin mi khempeuh a ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ezra in a lian Pasian, Topa thupha pia a, mi khempeuh in a khut uh laamto-in, “Hi tahen. Hi tahen,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Tua ciangin a lu uh kunin leilam maingatin Topa a bia uh hi.

Mite amau’ omna san ciatah a om sungun mite in thukham a tel theih nadingun Levi mi Jeshua, Bani, Sherebiah, Jamin, Akkub, Shabbethai, Hodiah, Maaseiah, Kelita, Azariah, Jozabad, Hanan le Pelaiah-te in a khiatna a gen uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian’ thukham laibu sung panin a kitel takin sim uh a, a cihnopna a kitelin gen uh a, tua a kisim thute a tel nadingun a hilh uh hi.

Tua ciangin a gam ukpa Nehemiah, lai thei pa lah hi-in siampi lah ahi Ezra le mite a hilh Levi mite in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Tuni pen Topa note’ Pasian adingin biakna ni siangtho ahi hi; a kap a mau om kei un,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thukham kammalte a zak uh ciangin mi khempeuh kap uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu-in ciah un. Anlim tuilim ne-in thadim unla, a nei zo lote zong va kholh un; bang hang hiam cih leh i Topa adingin tuni pen biakna ni siangtho ni ahi hi; dah kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ hong piak lungdamna in note hong thahatsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Levi mite in mite gamdaisak a, “Daitakin om un; bang hang hiam cih leh tuni pen biakna ni siangtho ni ahi hi; dah kei un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh anne tuidawnin midangte a kholh ding le lungdam a om dingin a ciah uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tungah a kigen thute amaute in a theitel uh hi.
A ni nih ni-in thukham sin dingin siampite le Levi mite tawh beh lutang khempeuh lai thei pa Ezra kiangah hong kikhawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin, a kha sagihna pawi hun sungin sawlbuk sungah Israel mite a omna ding thu le amaute in a khuapi khempeuh uh le Jerusalem-ah taangko-in, “A kigensa bangin sawlbuk lam nadingin gamlakah pai unla oliv hiangte, gamlak oliv hiangte, mui sing hiangte le a teh tam singhiang dangte va sat un,” ci-in a gen ding uh, Moses tungtawnin Topa in a thupiakna pen thukham sungah a kigelh lam a mu uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite kuan khia-in tua singhiangte hong pua-in amau’ innkhumzang ciat le a inntual uh le Pasian’ biakinn tual, Tui Kongpi tual le Efraim Kongpi tualah sawlbuk a lam uh hi.

Tua hi a, salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik a kikhawm mite khempeuh in sawlbuk lamin tuate sungah om uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Nun’ tapa Joshua’ hun a kipanin tua ni dongin Israel mite in tua bangin hih ngei lo uh hi. Tua hi a, amaute lungdam mahmah uh hi.

Tua hi a, a kipat ni a kipan a bei ni dong Ezra in ni simin Pasian’ thukham laibu a sim khia hi. Amaute in ni sagih sung tua pawi kham uh a, a ngeina om bangin a ni giat ni-in pawi khupna thupi kikhopna khat a om hi.
Tua kha mah a ni sawmnih le li ni-in an tang dingin Israel mite kikhawm uh a, puanhampi silhin a lu tung uhah lei kibuak uh hi.
Tua hi a, gamdangmi khempeuh panin Israel mite tuam om uh a, amaute in dinsa-in amau’ khialhnate le a pu a pate uh mawhnate a pulak uh hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ omna mun ciat uhah dingin Topa amau’ Pasian’ thukham laibu nai thum sung sim uh a, adang nai thum sung amaute in mawhna pulakin Topa a Pasian uh zahtakna a bawl uh hi.
Levi mite’ kahlei tungah Jeshua, Bani, Kadmiel, Shebaniah, Bunni, Sherebiah, Bani le Khenani ding uh a, Topa amaute’ Pasian’ tungah nakpitakin kiko uh hi.

Tua ciangin Levi mi Jeshua, Kadmiel, Bani, Hashabneiah, Sherebiah, Hodiah, Shebaniah le Pethahiah-te in, “Ding un, Topa na Pasian uh phat unla, ‘A tawntung pan a tawntung dongin a minthang na min in thupha ngah a, thupha khempeuh le phatna dang khempeuh sangin a sang zaw hi.

Nang bek Topa na hi hi. Nangmah in a sang pen vantung le vana om khempeuh, leitung le a tunga om khempeuh le tuipi le a sunga om khempeuh na bawl hi. Nangmah in tuate khempeuh na omsak a, vantung mihonpi in nang hong bia uh hi.
Nang pen Abram teelin Khaldea gam Ur khuapi panin pai khiatpihin Abraham min a phuak Pasian, Topa na hi hi.

Nangma tungah amah a cihtakna na mu a, Kanaan mite gam, Hit mite gam, Amor mite gam, Perez mite gam le Girgash mite gam, amah le a suanlekhakte tungah piak dingin ama tungah thuciamna khat na bawl hi. Nang thuman na hih manin na thuciamna na tungsak hi.
“‘Nangmah in Egypt gam sunga ka pute ka pate uh’ gimna mu-in San Tuipi-ah hong kikona uh na za a,

amaute in ka pu ka pate uh kihihsakna tawh a hih gawpna thei na hih manin Faro le a nasemte le a gammi khempeuh langpangin lim le na lamdang na bawl hi. Tua hi a, tuni dongin a kip minphatna khat nangma a’ dingin na ngah hi.
Amaute’ mai-ah tuipi phelkham na hih manin tuipi laizang lei keu tungah amaute paisuak uh a, ahi zongin tuihual sunga suanglot bangin tui thukna sungah amau a delhte na lawn hi.
Sunin meii khuam khat tawh amaute lam na lak a, amau’ lampaina khua a vaksak dingin zanin mei khuam khat tawh lam na lak hi.
Sinai Mual tungah kumsukin, vantung panin amaute hopihin, amaute tungah a man thukhenna, thukham taktak, a hoih ngeinate le thupiaknate na pia a,
na nasem pa Moses tungtawnin amaute tungah na Sabbath siangtho na theisak a, thupiaknate, ngeinate le thukhamte na pia hi.

A gilkialna uh a vahsak dingin vantung panin an na pia a, a dangtakna uh a phasak dingin suangpi panin tui na phulsak a, amaute tungah piak dingin na kiciamsa gamah lutin a luah nadingun amaute na sawl hi.
“‘Ahi zongin kote’ pute pate kihisakin lungkhauh uh a, na thupiaknate mang lo uh hi.

Amaute in thu mang nuam lo uh a, amaute lakah na bawl na lamdangte ngaihsun kha lo uh hi. Amaute lungkhauh niloh uh a, a salsuahna uh Egypt-ah a paipihkik dingin makai khat seh uh hi. Ahi zongin nang pen mawhna a maisak nuam, dikin hehpihna a nei, lungduai-in itna kip a nei Pasian na hi a, amaute na nusia tuan kei hi.
Amaute in a kisung bawngno khat amau mah adingin bawlin, “Hih pen Egypt panin note a hong pai khiatpih na pasian uh ahi hi,” ci-in gendai mawhna lianpi a bawl uh ciangin zong,
nang in na hehpih mahmah manin amaute gamlakah na nusia kei hi. Sunin lam a lak meii khuam in amaute nusia lo a, zanin a pai nading uh lampi a vaksak dingin mei khuam in zong amaute nusia lo hi.
Amaute hoihtakin thu na hilh a, na manna an zong amaute kiang panin na lakik kei a, a dangtakna uh a phasak dingin tui na pia hi.
Kum sawmli tawntung gamlakah amaute na vak a, amaute in bangmah tangsapna nei lo uh hi. A puante uh zong sia lo a, a khe uh zong bawk beek lo hi.
Nangmah in amaute tungah kumpi gamte le mite na pia a, tuate pen galsung van ngah dingin na piak ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Heshbon kumpipa Sihon’ gam le Bashan kumpipa Og’ gam luah uh hi.
Nangmah in amau’ suanlekhakte vana aksi zahin sim zawh lohin na tamsak a, a pu a pate un a luah dingin na piak dingin na ciamsa gamah amaute na paipih hi.
A suan a khakte uh tua gamah lutin a lak uh ciangin, amau’ mai-ah tua gam a teeng Kanaan mite na nuaisiah a, a ut bang bangun a bawl dingun a kumpite le a mite amau’ khut sungah na pia hi.

Tua hi a, amaute in kulhnei khuapite le gam hoihte la uh a, na hoih tampi tawh a kidim innte, suang kikhuak tuibemte, leenggui lote, oliv lote le nek theih singgah kung tampi a luah uh hi. Amaute in tuate ne-in gilvahin thau uh a, nangma hoihna hangin nuamsa mahmah uh hi.

“‘Ahi zongin amaute in demnopna lungsim nei-in nang hong lehdo uh hi. Amaute in na thukham nungngat uh a, nangma lamah hong ciahkik nadingun amaute a hilh na kamsangte that uh a, amaute in gendai mawhna lianpi bawl uh hi.

Hih thu hangin a galte uh khut sungah amaute na ap a, a galte un amaute hih gawpgawp uh hi. Ahi zongin amau a kihih gawpgawp hun ciangin nang tungah hong ko uh a, nangmah in vantung panin na za a, na hehpihna lianpi tawh amau’ galte’ kiang panin amaute a hon khia ding hon khiate na puak hi.

Ahi zongin a tawldam khit uh ciangin nangma muhna-ah a sia gamta zel uh a, nangmah in amau’ galte’ khut sungah amaute na nusia a, a galte un amaute a uk gawp uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute in nang tungah huhna hong nget uh ciangin vantung panin amau’ ngetna za-in na hehpihna tawh amaute tam veipi na hon khia hi.

Tua hi a, na thukham lamah amaute hong kiheikikna ding limtakin na hilh a, ahi zongin amaute kihisakin na thupiaknate don lo uh hi. A zuite tungah nuntakna a pia thei ahi na ngeina kip tungah amaute khial uh hi. Lungkhauhin phengphi-in amaute kihei khia uh a, thu mang nuam lo uh hi.
Kum tampi sung lungduaina tawh amaute na thuak a, na kamsangte tungtawnin amaute na hilh hi. Ahi zongin amaute in ngai nuam lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin gamdang mite’ khut sungah amaute na pia hi.
Ahi ta zongin na hehpihna lian hangin amaute beisak loin, zong na nusia kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh dikna le hehpihna a nei na hi hi.

“‘Tua ahih ciangin tu-in a lian, a vanglian, a kihtakhuai, thuciamna kiptakin a len kote’ Pasian aw, Assiria kumpite’ hun a kipan tuni dongin ka kumpite uh, ka uliante uh, ka siampite uh, ka sanggamte uh, ka pu ka pate uh le ko mi khempeuh tungah hong tung gimnate hong neu ngaihsutsak kei in.
Kote tungah hong tungsa thu khempeuh ah nang a thutang na hi a, nang citakin a om na hi a, kote a khial gamtatkha ka hi uh hi.
Ka kumpite uh, ka uliante uh, ka siampite uh le ka pu ka pate un nangma thukham zui lo uh a, amaute tungah na piak ahi na thupiaknate le na hilh kholhnate zong don lo uh hi.

Amaute tungah na piak gamzai lei hoihah omin, amaute tungah na piak hauhna lianpi tawh nuamsa-in amau’ kumpite’ khutnuai-ah a om laitak nangawnun amaute in nangma na hong sem lo uh a, a gamtat hoih lote uh nusia lo uh hi.
Tu-in kote sal ka hi uh hi. Ka pu ka pate un a leitang pan a piangte ne-in a na hoih khempeuhte nuamtakin a ngah nadingun na piak gam hih lai munah kote sal ka hi ta uh hi.

Tu-in leitang tunga piang khempeuh pen kote’ mawhna hangin kote’ tungah nong koih kumpite tungah tung ta hi. Tua kumpite in kote tungah thu hong nei-in, ka ganhingte uh a ut utun hong hihsak uh a, kote lungkham mahmahin ka om uh hi,’ ci un,” a ci uh hi.
Hih thute khempeuh hangin a kip thuciamna khat bawlin lai-in ka gelh uh a, ka uliante uh, ka Levi mite uh le ka siampite un zong tua lai tungah a min uh a gelh uh hi.
Tua lai tungah a min a gelh masa mite a masa pen Hilkiah’ tapa, gam ukpa Nehemiah hi a, tua ciangin Zedekiah in zom hi. Tua ciangin
Seraiah, Azariah, Jeremiah,
Pashhur, Amariah, Makhijah,
Hattush, Shebaniah, Maluk,
Harim, Meremoth, Obadiah,
Daniel, Ginnethon, Baruk,
Meshullam, Abiah, Mijamin,
Maaziah, Bigai le Shemaiah in gelh uh hi.
Azaniah’ tapa Jeshua, Henadad-te beh Binnui, Kadmiel,
Shebaniah, Hodiah, Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,
Mika, Rehob, Hashabiah,
Zakkur, Sherebiah, Shebaniah,
Hodiah, Bani le Beninu ahi uh hi.
Parosh, Pahathmoab, Elam, Zattu, Bani,
Bunni, Azgad, Bebai,
Adonijah, Bigvai, Adin,
Ater, Hezekiah, Azzur,
Hodiah, Hashum, Bezai,
Harif, Anathoth, Nebai,
Magpiash, Meshullam, Hezir,
Meshezabel, Zadok, Jaddua,
Pelatiah, Hanan, Anaiah,
Hoshea, Hananiah, Hasshub,
Halohesh, Piha, Shobek,
Rehum, Hashabnah, Maaseiah,
Ahiah, Hanan, Anan,
Maluk, Harim le Baanah-te ahi uh hi.
A omlai Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, kongcingte, lasate, biakinn nasemte, a zite a tapate le a tanute, thu teltheihna a nei, Pasian’ thukham hangin gamdang mite panin a tuam om mi khempeuh in

a sanggam uh ahi amau’ makaite pawmin, Pasian’ nasem Moses in a piak Pasian’ thukham zui-in, eite’ Topa ahi Topa’ thupiakna khempeuh, ama ngeinate le ama thukhamte a zuihna ding uh kiciamna a bawl uh hi.
Gamdang mite tungah i tanute i kha kei dinga, i tapate’ zi dingin zong i la kei ding hi.

Hih mite in Sabbath ni-in van ahi a, an ahi zongin hong zuak leh Sabbath ni le ni siangtho khat peuhpeuh ni-in i lei kei ding hi. Kum sagihna-a an piangte nusia-in tua kumin leiba khempeuh i maisak ding hi.

Eite’ Pasian’ biakinn-ah nasepna ding ahi Ompihna Anlum, a manmanin an tawh biakna, a manmanin meihal biakna, Sabbath ni, Khadet ni, a kiseh pawite, biakna letsongte le Israel mite’ tangin a kibawlsak ahi kilemna bawl nadingin mawhna hanga biaknate le i Pasian’ biakinn-ah sep ding a kisam dangte khempeuh ah zat dingin kum simin shekel khat seh thum ah khat piak ding ka kiciam uh hi.

Tua ciangin thukham sunga a kigelh bangin a kiseh hunin a kumkumin Topa eite’ Pasian’ biakna tau tungah cih dingin beh a banbanin i Pasian’ biakinn sungah sing a kitut nadingin siampite, Levi mite le ko mi vekpite in sing pua ding sehna ai ka san uh hi.
I leitang panin a piang anpalte le singgah kungte panin a gah masa khempeuh a kumkumin Topa’ biakinn-ah puak ding ka kiciam uh hi.

Thukham sunga kigelh mah bangin i Pasian’ biakinn-ah a om, i Pasian’ biakinn sungah na a sem siampite kiangah zong tapa upa pente le bawngte’ tacilte le ganhonte’ tacilte le tuuhonte’ tacilte paipih ding,

le annel lom meek masak pen siampite tungah puak ding le gah nei sing khempeuh panin a gah masa, sathau le leenggahzu thakte khempeuh i Pasian’ biakinn sung vankoihna-ah puak ding le lokhawhna khuaneute khempeuh ah sawm-ah-khat a kaikhawmte pen Levi mite ahih manin leitang panin sawm-ah-khat khempeuh Levi mite kiangah puak ding ka kiciam uh hi.

Levi mite in sawm-ah-khat a khop uh ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite tawh hih khawm ding uh hi. Tua ciangin Levi mite in i Pasian’ biakinn sunga vankoihna a kilawm mun inndeite-ah sawm-ah-khat a ngah uh sung pan sawm-ah-khat puaksawn ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh biakinn umlebeelte a kikoihna inndeite le na a sem siampite, kongcingte le lasate a giahna inndeite-ah Israel mite le Levi mite in a kipia ante, leenggahzu le sathaute a paipih ding uh ahi hi. Eite’ Pasian’ biakinn kin loin i om kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah mi makaite teeng uh hi. Tua lo midang teng, amau’ lak pan mi sawm-ah-khat, khuapi siangtho Jerusalem-ah a teeng ding aisanna tawh kiteel uh a, a omlai mi sawmah kuate ahihleh khuapi dangte-ah om uh hi.
Tua hi a, sawl lohin, Jerusalem-ah amau’ thu-in a teeng tawm nuam khempeuhte mipi in pakta uh hi.

Hih a nuai-ate pen Jerusalem-a a teeng a uksawn ukpite ahi uh hi. Ahi zongin Judah khuapi dangte-ah Israel midangte, siampite, Levi mite, biakinn nasemte le Solomon’ nasemte’ suanlekhakte teeng uh a, amau’ neihsa, amau’ khuapi ciatah teeng uh hi.
Judah minam le Benjamin minam sung panin mi pawlkhat zong Jerusalem-ah teeng uh hi. Perez’ suan Mahalalel, a tapa Shefatiah, a tapa Amariah, a tapa Zekhariah, a tapa Uzziah, a tapa Athaiah’ suante,
le Shelah’ suan Zekhariah, a tapa Joiarib, a tapa Adaiah, a tapa Hazaiah, a tapa Kolhozeh, a tapa Baruk, a tapa Maaseiah’ suante ahi uh hi.
Jerusalem-ah a teeng Perez’ suante khempeuh galhang mi zali sawmguk le giat a pha uh hi.
Jeshaiah’ tapa Ithiel, a tapa Maaseiah, a tapa Kolaiah, a tapa Pedaiah, a tapa Joed, a tapa Meshullam, a tapa Sallu’ suante,
le a beh Gabbai le Sallai hi uh a, mi zakua sawmnih giat pha uh hi.
Zikri’ tapa Joel pen amau’ mapi hi a, Hassenuah’ tapa Judah pen khuapi uk a nihna pa ahi hi.
Pasian’ biakinn a uk Ahitub’ tapa Meraioth, a tapa Zadok, a tapa Meshullam, a tapa Hilkiah, a tapa Seraiah, a tapa Joiarib, a tapa Jedaiah le Jakhin,
le inn nasep a sem a behte hi uh a, mi zagiat sawmnih le nih pha uh hi. Tua ciangin Malkhijah’ tapa Pashhur, a tapa Zekhariah, a tapa Amzi, a tapa Pelaliah, a tapa Jehoram, a tapa Adaiah,
le beh lutang ahi a beh dangte hi a, mi zanih sawmlinih pha uh hi. Tua ciangin Immer’ tapa Meshillemoth, a tapa Ahzai, a tapa Azarel, a tapa Amashsai,
le a thahat a vanglian a behte hi a, mi zakhat sawmnih le giat pha uh a, Haggedolim’ tapa Zabdiel pen amau’ mapi ahi hi.
Bunni’ tapa Hashabiah, a tapa Azrikam, a tapa Hasshub, a tapa Shemaiah,
le Pasian’ biakinn pualam nasep a uk, Levi mite’ ukpite ahi Shabbethai, Zozabad,

le lungdam koh thungetna patkhiat ding a makai Asaf, a tapa Zabdi, a tapa Mika, a tapa Mattaniah le a sanggamte lakah a nihna ahi Bakbukiah le Jeduthun’ tapa Galal, a tapa Shammua, a tapa Abda’ suante beh ahi uh hi.
Khuapi siangtho sungah Levi mi a om khempeuh mi zanih sawmgiat le li a pha uh hi.
Akkub, Talmon le a behte hi uh a, mi zakhat sawmsagih nih pha uh hi.
A omlai Israel-te, siampite le Levi mite ahihleh Judah khuapi dangte-ah amau’ luah leitang ciatah teeng uh hi.
Ahi zongin biakinn nasemte ahihleh Ofel mualbo-ah teeng uh a, Ziha le Gishpa in amaute a uk uh hi.
Jerusalem-a Levi mite ukin Pasian’ biakinn nasepna a vaan pa pen Mika’ tapa Mattaniah, a tapa Hashabiah, a tapa Bani, a tapa Uzzi hi a, amah pen lasa Asaf suante sung pan ahi hi.
Tuate beh in kumpipa’ thupiakna tawh na sem uh a, tua lasate in nisimin na a sep ding uh kisam hi.
Tua ciangin Judah’ tapa Zerah, a tapa Meshezabel, a tapa Pethahiah pen mite tawh kisai zum thu khempeuh ah kumpipa’ zat pen ahi hi.
Khuaneute le a kiima lote tawh kisai-in: Mi pawlkhatte’ tenna pen Kiriatharba le a khuaneute, Dibon le a khuaneute, Jekabzeel le a khuaneute,
Jeshua, Moladah, Bethpelet,
Hazarshual, Beersheba le a khuaneute,
Ziklag, Mekonah le a khuaneute,
Enrimmon, Zorah, Jarmuth,
Zanoah, Adullam le a khuaneute, Lakhish le a lote le Azekah le a khuaneute ahi hi. Tua hi a, amaute pen Beersheba panin Hinnom Kuam dongah teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Geba, Mikmash, Aija, Bethel le a khuaneute,
Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah,
Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim,
Hadid, Zeboiim, Neballat,
Lod, Ono le Geharashim khuate-ah Benjamin mite teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam a Levi mite pawlkhat Benjamin gamah kigawm hi.
Shealtiel’ tapa Zerubbabel le Jeshua tawh a hong ciahkik siampite le Levi mite: Seraiah, Jeremiah, Ezra,
Amariah, Maluk, Hattush,
Shekaniah, Rehum, Meremoth,
Iddo, Ginnethoi, Abijah,
Mijamin, Maadiah, Bigah,
Shemaiah, Joiarib, Jedaiah,
Sallu, Amok, Hikiah le Jedaiah te ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Jeshua hun lai-in siampite le a sanggamte uh lakah a ukpite ahi uh hi.
Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah le Mattaniah hi a, Mattaniah in a sanggamte tawh lungdamkohna late a uk hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggamte uh Bakbukiah le Unno in amaute tawh kigal sai-in omin a dawng uh hi.
Tua hi a, Jeshua pen Joiakim’ pa, Joiakim pen Eliashib’ pa, Eliashib pen Joiada’ pa,
Joiada pen Jonathan’ pa, Jonathan pen Jaddua’ pa ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Joiakim hun lai-in beh lutang ahi siampite: Seraiah suante sung panin Meraiah, Jeremiah suante sung panin Hananiah,
Ezra suante sung panin Meshullam, Amariah suante sung panin Jehohanan,
Malukhi suante sung panin Jonathan, Shebaniah suante sung panin Josef,
Harim suante sung panin Adna, Meraioth suante sung panin Helkai,
Iddo suante sung panin Zekhariah, Ginnethon suante sung panin Meshullam,
Abijah suante sung panin Zikri, Miniamin suante sung panin, Moadiah suante sung panin Piltai,
Bilgah suante sung panin Shammua, Shemaiah suante sung panin Jehonathan,
Joiarib suante sung panin Mattenai, Jedaiah suante sung panin Uzzi,
Sallai suante sung panin Kallai, Amok suante sung panin Eber,
Hilkiah suante sung panin Hashabiah, Jedaiah suante sung panin Nethanel ahi uh hi.
Eliashib, Joiada, Johanan le Jaddua-te’ hun lai-a beh lutangte le siampite ahihleh Persia kumpipa Darias hun ciang dong Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kiciamteh hi.
Levi mite beh sung panin beh lutangte pen Eliashib’ tupa Johanan’ hun ciang dong Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.

Tua ciangin Levi mi ukpite: Hashabiah, Sherebiah, Jeshua, Binnui le Kadmiel hi uh a, Pasian’ mi David’ thupiakna bangin a banbanin phatna la a sa ding le lungdamna a ko dingin a sanggamte uh tawh na a sem ding uh ahi hi.
Mattaniah, Bakbukiah, Obadiah, Meshullam, Talmon le Akkub-te pen vankoihna kongpite a cing kongcingte ahi uh hi.
Hih pen Jozadak’ tapa Jeshua, a tapa Joiakim’ hun le gam ukpa Nehemiah le siampi hi-in lai thei pa zong ahi Ezra-te’ hun lai-a vaihawmna ahi hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in daltuahte, harp lasaknate le laiza lasaknate tawh lungdam ko-in la sa-in lungdamna tawh kulhpi apna a bawl dingin Jerusalem-ah hong pai theih nadingun Levi mite a omna khempeuh uhah a zong uh hi.
Tua hi a, Jerusalem kiim le Netofah mite’ khuaneute panin Levi mi lasate hong kikaikhawm uh hi.
Bethgilgal khua le Geba kiimnai le Bethazmaveth khua panin zong hong pai uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lasate pawl in Jerusalem kiimah amau adingin khuaneute sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampite le Levi mite amau mah kisiansuah tawm uh a, tua khit ciangin mite le kongpite le kulhpi a siansuah uh hi.
Tua ciangin khuapi kulhzangah Judah mi uliante ka paipih a, lampai kawmin lungdamna a ko dingin pawl lian nih ka seh hi. Kulhzang panin pawlkhatte taklam manawhin Nin Kongpi lamah a pai uh hi.
Tuate’ nungah Hoshaiah le Judah uliante kimkhat,
le Azariah, Ezra, Meshullam,
Judah, Benjamin, Shemaiah le Jeremiah,
le siampi pawlkhat: Asaf, a tapa Zakkur, a tapa Mikaiah, a tapa Mattaniah, a tapa Shemaiah, a tapa Jonathan, a tapa Zekhariah,
le ama behte Shemaiah, Azarel, Gilalai, Maai, Nethanel, Judah le Hanani-te, Pasian’ mi David’ lasakna nate tawh pai uh a, tuate lakah lai thei pa Ezra masa hi.
Tuinak Kongpi panin kulh kahtohna David khuapi kahlei-ah paito-in, David’ inn khengin nisuahna lam manawhin Tui Kongpi dongah pai uh hi.
Lungdamna a ko a pawldang khat pen veilam manawhin pai uh a, mi a kimkhat tawh amaute ka zui hi. Kulh tungah pai-in Meikhuk Tausang pan Kulh Zai-ah

tua panin Efraim Kongpi, tua ciangin Jeshanah Kongpi, tua ciangin Ngasa Kongpi, tua ciangin Hananel Tausang, tua ciangin Za Khat Tausang, tua ciangin Tuu Kongpi-ah pai uh a, tua ciangin Thong Kongpi-ah khawl uh hi.
Tua hi a, lungdamna a ko hih pawl nihte, Pasian’ biakinn hong tung uh a, uliante pawlkhat le kei ka omkhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Eliakim, Maaseiah, Miniamin, Mikaiah, Elioenai, Zekhariah le Hananiah-te a peengkulte uh tawh om uh a,
Maaseiah, Shemaiah, Eleazar, Uzzi, Jehohanan, Malkhijah, Elam le Ezer zong a om uh hi. Tua hi a, Jezrahiah makai-in lasate in la sa uh hi.

Pasian in nakpitakin amaute lungdamsak ahih manin amaute in tua ni-in biakpiakna lian tampi pia-in lungdam uh a, numei naupangte zong lungdam uh hi. Tua hi a, Jerusalem khua sunga lungdamna awging gamlapi pek pan nangawnin kiza hi.

Tua ciangin khuapite’ kiimah lo omte panin a golna le a neuna tawh kizui-in siampite le Levi mite adingin thukham sunga om bangin a kaihkhop ding uh a kipia nate, anpalte le sawm-ah-khatte a koihna ding uh vankoihna innte a uk dingin mi kiseh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh siampite le Levi mite’ nasepna hangin Judah mi khempeuh lungdam mahmah uh hi.
Tua hi a, David le a tapa Solomon’ thupiakna tawh kizui-in lasate le kongcingte mah bangin amaute in amau’ Pasian’ nasepte le siansuah nasep a sem uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh David’ hun lai-in lasate a ukpi le phatna le lungdamkohna a makai-in Asaf om hi.

Zerubbabel le Nehemiah’ hun lai-in Israel mite khempeuh in lasate le kongcingte adingin a nisim tanh uh pia uh a, amaute in Levi mite ading tuamkoih uh hi. Tua ciangin Levi mite in Aaron suante adingin tuamkoihsawn leuleu uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in mipi’ zakin Moses’ laibute sim uh a, Pasian’ mite’ kikhopna-ah Ammon mi le Moab mite a kihel ngei loh nading thu kiphawk khia hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in anletui tawh Israel mite na dawn lo uh a, amaute a samsia dingin Balaam cial zawsop uh hi. Ahi zongin i Pasian in tua samsiatna thupha-in hong heisak hi.
Mite in hih thukham a zak uh ciangin Israel mite lak panin gamdang suan peuhmah khen khia uh hi.
Ahi zongin tua hun ma-in, i Pasian’ biakinn sunga vankoihna inndeite a uk dingin a kiseh, Tobiah tawh a kimeltheih siampi Eliashib in,

Levi mite, lasate le kongcingte tungah piak dingin a kisawl an tawh biakna, paknamtui, umlebeelte, sawm-ah-khat a kipia an, leenggahzu le sathau le siampite adingin a kipia nate a koihna ngei uh inndei lianpi khat, Tobiah adingin bawlsak hi.

Babylon kumpipa Artakzaksis in a uk kum sawmthum le nihna kumin ama kiangah pai ka hih manin hih thu a pian laitakin Jerusalem-ah ka om kei hi. Tawlkhat khit ciangin kumpipa kiangah a khuan ka ngen a,
Jerusalem-ah ka ciahkik hi. Tua ciangin Tobiah adingin Pasian’ biakinn huang sungah inndei khat a vaihawmsakna thu, Eliashib’ gamtat hoih lohna ka phawkkhia hi.
Hih thu-ah lungkim het lo ka hih manin inndei sung panin Tobiah’ van teng ka lawn khia hi.
Tua ciangin tua inndei a siansakna ding uh le Pasian’ biakinn-a umlebeelte, an tawh biakna le paknamtui a koihkik nadingun thu ka pia hi.
Levi mite’ ngah dingte amau’ tungah kipia lo ahih manin Levi mite le lasate in a nasep ngeite uh nusia-in a lote uhah na a sepna uh zong ka phawkkhia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin uliante tungah ka lungkim kei a, “Bang hangin Pasian’ biakinn kinusiacip ahi hiam?” ka ci hi. Tua hi a, amaute kaikhawmkikin amau’ sepna ngei mun ciatah ka pangsakkik hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite khempeuh in an, leenggahzu le sathau sung pan sawm-ah-khat hong paipihin vankoihna innte-ah hong tun uh hi.

Tua ciangin tua vankoihna innte a kem dingin siampi Shelemiah, lai thei Zadok le Levi mi Pedaiah le amaute a huh dingin Mattaniah’ tapa Zakkur, a tapa Hanan ka seh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute mi muanhuai ahi uh hi. Amau’ nasep pen a sanggamte uh tungah amau’ tanh ciat uh a hawm khia ding uh ahi hi.
Ka Pasian aw, hih thu tawh kisai-in kei hong phawk inla, ka Pasian’ biakinn le a nasep nadingin ka sepsa gamtat hoihte maimangsak kei in.

Tua hun lai-in Judah gam sungah mite in Sabbath ni-in leenggah sukin, a khawhsate uh khawmin late tungah suanin, leenggah, thei le van namkim, Sabbath ni-in Jerusalem-ah hong puakna ka mu hi. Tua ni-in na a zuakna uh hangin ka lungkim lohna amaute tungah ka gen hi.
Jerusalem khua sunga teeng Taia khuamite in zong ngasa le van namkim hong paipihin Judah mite tung le Jerusalem khua sungah Sabbath ni-in zuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah uliante tungah lungkim loin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin hih bangin hoih lohna gamta-in Sabbath ni ninsak ngam na hi uh hiam?

Na pu na pate uh tu-a bang teekin a gamtat manin eite tung le hih khuapi tungah hih bang siatna khempeuh hong tung hi lo ahi hiam? Tua hinapi-in note in Sabbath ni nitsakna tawh Israel tungah hehna tam zaw na tungsak uh hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua hi a, Sabbath ni ding khuamial ciangin kongpite a kikhakna ding ka sawl a, Sabbath bei khit mateng a kihon loh nadingin thu ka pia hi. Tua ciangin, Sabbath ni-in khua sungah van hong kilutpih loh nadingin kongpite a cing dingin ka nasemte pawlkhat ka koih hi.
Tua ahih manin sumbukte le na nam tuamtuam a zuakte, khatvei nihvei khawng Jerusalem khua pualamah giak uh hi.

Ahi zongin amaute hilhkholin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin kulh gei-ah giak na hi uh hiam? Nong giahkik uhleh note tungah thu kong bawl ding hi,” ka ci hi. Tua hun a kipanin Sabbath ni-in amaute hong pai nawn lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin Sabbath ni a siangtho-in a omsak theih nadingun amaute kisiansuah tawmin kongpite hong cin nadingun Levi mite ka sawl hi. Ka Pasian aw, hih thu-ah zong hong phawk inla, na itna tawh kizui-in siatna panin kei hong pengsak in.
Tua hun lai mahin zong Judah mite in Ashdod numei, Ammon numei le Moab numeite a tenpihna,
le a tate uh kimkhat in Ashdod kampau a zatna le Judah kampau zang thei loin, amau pau ciat bek a zat theihna thu ka mu khia hi.

Amaute tai gawpin ka samsia a, pawlkhat satin a sam uh ka bawhsak gawp hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ min tawh amaute ka kiciamsak a, “Note in amau’ tapate’ zi dingin na tanute uh na pia kei ding uh a, na tapate uh zi ding ahi a, nomau’ zi dingin ahi zongin amaute’ tanu na la kei ding uh hi.

Israel kumpipa Solomon zong tua bang numeite’ hangin khial hi lo ahi hiam? Minam tampite lakah amah tawh a kibang kumpi khat zong om lo a, ama Pasian in amah itin, Israel khempeuh tungah kumpi-in amah koih hi; ahi ta zongin gamdang numeite in amah nangawn khialsak zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon aw, nangma gamtatnate hong zui-in, gamdang numeite tenpihna tawh hih siatna lian khempeuh gamta-in i Pasian tungah hong zuautat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ka cisak hi.
Siampi lianpen pa Eliashib’ tapa Jehoiada’ tapate khat pen Horonaim khuami Sanbalat’ makpa na hi hi. Tua ahih manin keima kiang panin amah ka hawl khia hi.
Ka Pasian aw, amaute in siampi nasepna le siampite le Levi mite’ thuciamna siasak uh ahih manin amaute thei ta in.
Tua bangin gamdang tawh a kizom nate khempeuh panin amaute ka siangsak a, siampite le Levi mite a nasep ngei mah uhah ka semsakkik hi.
Tua ciangin a kiseh hunin zat dingin cih ding sing tawh biakna le anpal tawh biakna ding ka vaihawmsak hi. Ka Pasian aw, a hoih lamin kei hong phawk in.
Hih lai-a kigelh thupiangte pen India gam panin Ethiopia gam dong, gamneu zakhat sawmnih le sagih a uk Ahasueras’ hun lai-a piang thu ahi hi.
Hih hun laitakin kumpi khua ahi Susa khuapi sunga kumpi tokhom tungah amah tu hi.

Ama uk a kum thumna kumin ama nuai-a a uliante khempeuh le a nasemte adingin pawi khat bawlsak hi. Ama khutnuai-a om Persia le Media galkapmaangte le ama nuai-a uliante le ama nuai-ah gam a uksawnte a om laitakin,
a kumpi gam hauhna le ama thupi ziazuana ni tampi sung, ni za le ni sawmgiat sung tak a lak hi.
Hih pawi hun a bei khit ciangin kumpi khua Susa khuapi sunga om milian mineu mi khempeuh adingin kumpipa in pawi khat a bawl hi. Tua pawi pen kumpi inn huang sungah kibawl a, ni sagih sung kibawl hi.

Tua huang sungah suangkang khuamte kiphut a, khau malneu le khau dupsan tawh ngun kualte-ah kikhihin a kikhai dalna puanpakte kikhungin, suangmanpha a san, a dum, a kang le a vom, a nam tuamtuamte kizangin a kizem suangphah kiphah tungah kham le ngun kibawl lupnate kikoih hi.
Kham hai nam tuamtuamte tawh zu kihawm a, kumpipa’ hauhna tawh kituakin deihdeihin zu kizang hi.
Tua lai-ah zu nekna zia pen kihah piak cih om lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in amau’ duh zahzah bek a neksakna ding uh kumpipa in a nuai-a a uliante thu pia hi.
Tua banah Kumpinu Vashti in zong numeite adingin Kumpipa Ahasueras’ inn sung mahah pawi khat a bawl hi.

A ni sagih ni, zunekna hangin a lung a nop ciangin kumpipa in ama na a sem innsungmaang sagihte Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar le Karkas-te sam a, mite le uliante mai-ah Kumpinu Vashti a melhoihna a lah theih nadingin a kumpi lukhu khusa-in ama kiangah a paipih nadingun a sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu a mel a hoih takpi mah ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Kumpinu Vashti in innsungmaangte’ thupuak kumpipa’ sapna a nial hi. Hih a nialna thu-ah kumpipa heh mahmah a, a hehna hangin a sin so hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in upadi siam a mipilte thu dong hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh upadi le biakna lam thu theite khempeuh thu dot pen kumpipa’ zat ngei khat ahi hi.

Ama gei nai pen ah a tu mite pen Persia le Media gam ulian sagihte ahi Karshena, Shethar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marsena le Memukan-te hi uh a, kumpipa kiangah a hawh thei, kumpi gam sungah ulian pente ahi uh hi.
“Inn sung mangte’ tungtawnin keimah kumpi Ahasueras’ thupiakna bangin Kumpinu Vashti gamta lo ahih manin Kumpinu Vashti tungah upadi tawh kizui-in bangci kihih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa le uliante’ zakin Memukan in dawng a, “Kumpinu Vashti khial hi; kumpipa tung bek hi loin Kumpipa Ahasueras’ ukna gam sung khempeuha om uliante le mi khempeuh tungah zong a khial ahi hi.

Kumpinu’ gamtatna thu numei dangte khempeuh in thei ding uh a, hih thu hangin numeite in a pasalte uh simmawh ding uh a, amaute in, ‘Kumpipa Ahasueras in ama kiangah a pai dingin Kumpinu Vashti thu pia napi-in pai lo hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
Hih banga kumpinu’ gamtatna thu a za Persia le Media gam numei liante in kumpipa nuai-a uliante tungah tuni mahmahin hih thu gen ding uh a, kisimmawhna le kizahtak lohna tampi piangsak ding hi.

Kumpipa in hoih na sak leh, kumpi thupiakna khat paisak inla, Kumpipa Ahasueras’ mai-ah Vashti a kilakkik nawn loh nadingin a kikhelkik ngei nawn lo ding Persia mite le Media mite’ upadi sungah gelhsak in. Tua ciangin amah sangin a kilawm zaw numei khat ama za luahsak in.
Tua banga kumpipa’ thupiakna thu kumpi gam sung khempeuh ah a kizak ciangin numei khempeuh in a neu a lian amau’ pasal ciat zahtak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa le uliante in hih ngaihsutna hoihsa uh a, Memukan’ gen bangin kumpipa a gamta hi.
