Pasal khempeuh pen ama inn sung ukpa ahihna ding le ama kampau a kizuih kim nadingin kumpipa’ ukna gam khempeuh ah amau’ lai ciat le mi khempeuh tungah amau’ pau ciatin laikhakte kigelh hi.
Hih thu teng a pian khit, Kumpipa Ahasueras’ hehna a dam ciangin, amah in Vashti phawkin, Vashti’ gamtatna le amah tawh kisai-in a thupiakna zong thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Kumpipa adingin a melhoih nungak khangnote zongsak in.

Kumpi khua ahi Susa khuapi-a numeite’ omna-ah a melhoih nungak khangno khempeuh hong paipih nadingun na ukna gam tuamtuam khempeuh ah uliante sawl in. Tua numeite pen numeite a uk, kumpipa’ innsungmaang Hegai’ kep dingin ki-ap hen. Tua ciangin tua numeite tungah paknamtui tuamtuam kiguan hen.
Tua sung panin kumpipa’ deih bel nungak pen Vashti’ tangin kumpinu suak hen,” a ci uh hi. Kumpipa in hih ngaihsutna hoihsa a, tua bangin a gamta hi.
Tu-in kumpi khua Susa khuapi sungah Benjamin minam Kish, a tapa Shimei, a tapa Jair, a tapa Mordekai a kici Jew mi khat om hi.
Amah pen, Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem panin Judah kumpipa Jekoniah tawh a lak galmatte lak a kihel khat ahi hi.

Amah in a innlak pate khat’ tanu, a min masa Hadassah, a nung ciangin Esther a kici, a khoi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a nu le a pa om nawn lo hi. Tua numei melhoihin a ngaihbaang mahmah khat hi a, a nu le a pa a sih ciangin Mordekai in ama tanu dingin a lak ahi hi.
Kumpipa’ thupiakna kithei kimin, Hegai’ kep dingin ap dingin kumpi khua Susa khuapi-ah numei tampi hong kipaipih ciangin, numeite a uk Hegai’ tungah ap dingin kumpipa’ inn-ah Esther zong kipaipih hi.

Amah in tua nungak hoihsa-in pakta mahmah ahih manin paknamtuite le a annek ding pia pah a, kumpipa’ inn sung panin a kiteel nasem numei sagih zong guan a, amah le a nasem numeite’ tungah numeite’ omna a hoih pen mun a pia pah hi.
Mordekai in kham ahih manin Esther in ama namlephung gen khia lo hi.
Esther bangci om a, ama tungah bang piang hiam cih a theih nadingin numeite’ omna inntual mai-ah nisimin Mordekai va pai zel hi.
Numeite a kigin hun a vekpi-in kha sawm le nih sung hi a, sathau le myrrh paknamtui tawh kha guk sung kipuahin, paknamtui tuamtuamte le kipuahna dangte tawh kha guk sung mah kipuah uh hi.
Kigin kholhna hun cing a, Kumpipa Ahasueras’ kiangah numeite a pai ciangin numeite’ omna panin kumpipa’ inn-ah a deih peuhpeuh uh kikengsak hi.

Nitakin kumpipa kiangah va pai a, a zingsang ciangin numeite’ omna a mun dang khatah kiciahsak a, kumpipa’ zineute a uk, kumpipa’ innsungmaang Shaashgaz in kem hi. Kumpipa in a deihkik kei leh kumpipa kiangah paikik nawn lo a, kumpipa in a deih leh a minin kisamkik hi.

Mordekai in ama tanu dingin a lak a innlak pa Abihail’ tanu Esther pen kumpipa kiangah a pai ding hun a tun ciangin, numeite a uk kumpipa’ inn sung mangpa Hegai’ gen teng lobuang kizepna ding puan dang bangmah ngenthuah lo hi. Tu-in Esther a mu mi peuhmah in hoihsa kim uh hi.
Ama uk a kum sagihna, kha sawmna ahi Tebeth kha sungin kumpi inn sung Kumpi Ahasueras’ kiangah Esther a kipaipih ciangin,
kumpipa in ama numei dangte khempeuh sangin it zaw a, a nungak dangte khempeuh sangin limbawl zaw hi. Tua hi a, kumpi lukhu amah khusakin Vashti’ tangin kumpinu a suaksak hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Esther pahtawina-in ama uliante le a nasem khempeuh adingin pawi lianpi khat a bawl hi. Amah in ama ukna gam khempeuh ah tua ni nasep khawlin zum a khakna ding uh zong thu zasak kim a, kumpipa min tawh a kilawm a kituak letsongte zong a hawm khia hi.
Tua hun sungin Mordekai in kumpi nasep a ngah hi.
Ama hilhna tawh kizui-in Esther in ama minam ahi a, a innkuan ahi zongin pulak lo hi. Mordekai’ kep sungin ama thu a man mah bangin tu-in zong Mordekai’ gen bangin gamta hi.
Ni khat, kumpi nasemin Mordekai a om hun sungin kongcing ahi kumpipa’ innsungmaangte Bigthana le Teresh heh uh a, Kumpipa Ahasueras thah ding a sawm uh hi.
Hih thu Mordekai in phawkin Kumpinu Esther kiangah ko a, Esther in Mordekai’ hong thupuak, ci-in kumpipa kiangah a gensawn hi.
A thu kikanin a manna a kitheih ciangin khuampite tungah tua mi nih tegel kikhailum hi. Hih thupiangte khempeuh kumpipa’ theihin Kumpi Gam Tangthu Laibu sungah kiciamteh hi.
Hih thute khit ciangin Kumpipa Ahasueras in Agag-te beh Hammedatha’ tapa Haman a za khangsak a, amah tawh a semkhawm ulian dangte khempeuh sangin a lian zaw-in a bawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpi huang sunga om kumpipa’ nasem khempeuh in Haman zahtak bawlin ama mai-ah kun uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua banga a hih ding uh kumpipa in thu pia hi. Ahih hangin Mordekai pen amah zahtakna limin a mai-ah kun lo hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa’ huang sunga om kumpipa’ nasemte in Mordekai kiangah, “Bang hangin kumpipa’ thupiak mang lo na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Nisimin amaute in Mordekai kiangah gengen uh a, ahih hangin amah in mang nuam lo hi. Jew mi ahihna thu amaute kiangah gen khin ahih manin tua banga ama nialna a kimang ding mah ahi hiam cih a theih nadingun Haman kiangah a thu ko uh hi.
Ama mai-ah Mordekai a kun lohna, amah a zahtakbawl lohna a theih ciangin Haman nak heh mahmah hi.
Amah in Mordekai’ mipihte a theih ciangin amah bek suktaak sa lo a, Ahasueras’ kumpi gam sung khempeuh ah a om Jew mi khempeuh, Mordekai le a minam buppi-in a suksiat theih nading lampi a zong hi.

Kumpi Ahasueras’ uk a kum sawm le kum nihna, a kha masa pen ahi Nisan kha a kipanin a ni ni, a kha kha-in Pur a kici aisanna tawh Haman’ muhin ai kisan a, a kha sawm le nihna Adar kha a ni sawm le thum ni-in ai a pha hi.

Tua ciangin Haman in Kumpipa Ahasueras’ kiangah, “Na ukna gam tuamtuam sunga om mite lakah a om kawikawi, amau a tuam om mi pawlkhat om hi. Amau’ ngeinate pen midangte a’ tawh kibang lo a, amaute in nangma thukhamte zui lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih mite na hici khahkhong ding kilawm lo hi.

Kumpipa in hoih na sak leh amaute a kisuksiatna ding thu pia-in lai-in gelh in. Tua hileh nangma sumkholna sungah koih dingin na khutnuai-a na uliante tungah ngun talen tul sawm ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in ama khut sung panin a minthuhna zungbuh suahin Jew mite’ gal, Agag-te beh Hammedatha’ tapa Haman’ tungah a pia hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Haman kiangah, “Na sum cihte nangmah kong piakik hi; na mi cihte zong nangma khut sungah kong pia hi; na ut bangbangin bawl in,” a ci hi.

A kha masa a ni sawm le thum ni-in kumpipa’ lai-atte khempeuh kisam a, Haman’ genna tawh kizui-in kumpipa’ nuai-ah gam tampi a uksawnte le gam khat a uksawnte le gam uksawnte’ khutnuai-ah a mi tuamtuamte lakah uliante tungah lai kipaisak hi. Gam khempeuh ah amau’ lai ciat, mi khempeuh tungah amau pau ciatin kigelh hi. Hih lai pen kumpipa Ahasueras’ min tawh kigelhin kumpipa’ minthuhna zungbuh tawh min kithuh hi.

Tua bangin kumpipa’ ukna gam khempeuh ah laitaite kipiasak a, Adar kha ahi a kha sawm le nihna a ni sawm le thum ni, ni khat sungin Jew mi a moi a ham, numei naupang, a vekpi-in susia-in, thatin, a beisakmangna ding uh le a neihsate uh a laksak nadingun thu kipia hi.
Tua a ni seh ni-in amaute a baihsa-in a om theih nadingun hih thupiakna lai pen gam khempeuh ah dal khat ciat kipuakin tua thu pen a gam sung mi khempeuh tungah a kizasak kim ding ahi hi.

Kumpipa’ thupiakna tawh laitaite kinawh sawl a, hih thupiakna pen kumpi khua Susa khuapi panin a kihawmkhia ahi hi. Kumpipa le Haman zu ne-in om hithiat uh a, ahi zongin Susa khuapi sung buai mahmah hi.
Mordekai in hih thupiang teng a theih ciangin a puan balkekin puanhampi silhin vut kibuak a, nakpitakin a kap kawmin khua sungah vak kawikawi hi.
Puanhampi silh kawmpi-in kongpi-ah kuamah kilutsak lo ahih manin kumpi inn kongpi panin a kimuhna mun ciangah pai hi.
Kumpipa’ thupiakna a tunna gam Jew mite’ omna khempeuh ah nakpi taka thumna le tauna, antanna, kahna le dip-humna om hi. Mi a tam zaw in puanhampi silhin vut lakah lum uh hi.

Esther’ nasem numeite le a innsungmaangte hong pai-in ama kiangah tua thu a gen ciangun kumpinu in lamdangsa mahmah hi. A puanhampi a laih nadingin amah in Mordekai ading puante khak a, ahih hangin Mordekai in tuate na sang lo hi.

Tua ciangin Esther in ama na a sem dingin a kiseh, kumpipa innsungmaangte lak panin Hathak a kici mipa samin hih thu pen bang hi a, bang a cihnopna ahi hiam, ci-in Mordekai tung panin thu a va kan dingin a sawl hi.
Kumpi inn kongpi mai-a om khuapi kongzing tualpi a om Mordekai kiangah Hathak va pai a,
Mordekai in ama tunga thupiangte khempeuh le Jew mite suk mang nadingin kumpipa’ sumkholna-ah Haman in piak dinga a sum ciamzah thute khempeuh ama kiangah na gen hi.

Amaute a kisuk mang nadingin Susa khua panin a kihawmkhia lai dal khat zong Mordekai in ama tungah pia a, amah in Esther tungah tua lai na pia-in a thu a na gentelna ding le, kumpipa kiangah Esther na pai-in ama mipihte adingin a na thumsak ding zong a sawl hi.
Hathak zong ciahin Mordekai’ thugen teng Esther kiangah va gen hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in Hathak mah sawlkikin Mordekai’ tungah thu zasak a,

“Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin sap lohpi-in mi khat peuhpeuh kumpipa’ omna inn sungah a va lut leh upadi khat bek om a, tua pen, thah ding ahi hi; kumpipa in ama lamah a kham kumpi ciangkhut a na zan leh tua mipa suakta bek ding ahihna thu kumpipa’ nasemte le ama ukna gam mi khempeuh in a theih ciat uh ahi hi. Tu-in kumpipa kiangah a pai dingin hong kisap loh zawh ni sawmthum bang pha ta hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hi a, Esther’ thugen teng Mordekai tungah kigen hi.
Tua ciangin Mordekai in Esther a dawnkikna thu a mahmah puasakkik a, “Kumpi inn sungah na omna hangin Jew mi khempeuh lak panin nang a suakta tuan dingin kingaihsun kei in.

Hih bang hunin bangmah hih loin na omcip leh, Jew mite’ suahtakna ding le noptuamna ding thu mundang khat pan hong piang veve dinga, nangmah le na innkuanpihte na si mang ding uh hi. Hih kumpi inn na tunna pen hih bang huna mah dinga a tung na hih mel zong kua in thei ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in Mordekai a dawnna lai amah puasak leuleu a,

“Pai-in Susa khua sunga om Jew mi khempeuh khawm inla, keimah ngaihsutna-in an na tang un. A sun a zan ci loin ni thum sung an ne lo, tui dawn loin na om un. Na tan uh mah bangin kei le ka nasem numeite in zong ka na tang ding uh hi. Tua khit ciangin ngeina ahih loh hangin kumpipa kiangah ka va pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Mordekai pai-in Esther’ sawl bang teekteekin a gamta hi.
A ni thum ni-in Esther in a kumpipuan silhin kumpipa’ inntual sung nungah dingin kumpi inn lam a nga hi. Kumpi inn sung a kumpi tokhom tungah kumpipa tu-in kongpi lam na nga hi.

Inntualah Kumpinu Esther dinga a om kumpipa in a muh ciangin Esther in kumpipa’ maipha ngah a, kumpipa in a khuta a tawi kumpi ciangkhut pen Esther’ lamah a zan hi. Tua ciangin Esther in hong naihin tua ciangkhut dawn va lawng hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Kumpinu Esther aw, bang thu ahi hiam? Kei tungah nong nget peuhpeuh, ka kumpi gam phelkhat ciang dong, nang tungah hong kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in, “Nong hehpih zawh leh, kumpipa a’ dinga kong bawlsak nitak an a ne dingin tuni-in Haman tawh hong pai un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Esther’ deih bangin i gamtat theih nadingin manlangin Haman va sam un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih manin Esther’ bawlsak nitak an a ne dingin kumpipa le Haman hong pai uh hi.
Amaute in zu a nek laitakun kumpipa in Esther’ kiangah, “Nong nget peuhpeuh hong kipia ding hi. Nong nget peuhpeuh ka kumpi gam phelkhat ciang dong nangawn hong kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Esther in dawngin, “Nang tung panin kong ngetnop kong thumnop thu in:

Topa aw, nong hehpih zawh a, na lung a kim a, kong nget thu nong piak zawh ding leh, no tegel adingin ka na bawl an a ne dingin zing ciangin kumpipa le Haman hong pai un. Zing ciangin nong cih bangin ka deihna kong gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lungdam kipakin tua ni-in Haman a ciah hi. Ahih hangin kongpi-a om Mordekai in amah zahtakna limin a mai-ah ding lo, kun lo-a om a muh ciangin Mordekai tungah nakpitakin a heh hi.
Ahi zongin Haman ki-ip tentanin inn-ah a ciah hi. Tua ciangin a lawmte le a zi Zeresh sam a,

ama hauhna teng, a tapa neih teng, kumpipa in amah a pahtak manin a za a khansakna teng le kumpipa’ nasemte le ulian dangte khempeuh sangin a lian zaw-in amah a koihna thute khempeuh amaute tungah genin a lak hi.

Tua ciangin Haman in, “Tua tengbek hi nai lo lai hi. Kumpinu Esther nangawn in ama bawlsa an kumpipa tawh a nekhawm dingin kei sim loh midang kuamah paisak lo hi. Zing ciangin zong kumpipa tawh kei hong samkhawm hi.
Ahi zongin kumpipa’ kongpi-a a tu Jew mi Mordekai ka muh laiteng hih thute khempeuh a mawkna suak zel hi,” ci lai hi.

Tua ciangin a zi Zeresh le a lawmte khempeuh in ama kiangah, “Pi sawmsagih le nga a sang khuam phutsak inla, tua tungah Mordekai a kikhailup nadingin zingciangin kumpipa kiangah gen in. Tua ciangin nitak an ne dingin lungnuam takin kumpipa tawh pai in,” a ci uh hi. Haman in hih ngaihsutna hoihsa a, a khuam a phutsak hi.
Tua zanin kumpipa ihmu thei lo a, nisim thupiang ciaptehna Khang Tangthu Laibu lasak a, ama zakin tua laibu kisim hi.
Tua banga a kisim ciangin, kongcingte sung panin innsungmaang Bigthana le Teresh in Kumpipa Ahasueras thah a sawmna thu pen Mordekai in a genna thu a kiciamtehna simkha uh hi.

Tua thu a zak ciangin kumpipa in, “Hih thu hangin Mordekai’ tungah pahtawina ahi a, minliatna ahi zongin bang kipia ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua lai-a a om kumpipa’ nasemte in Mordekai’ tungah bangmah a kipiak lohna thu a gen uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Hih kiimnai-ah kua om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua laitakin Mordekai thah nadingin a phuhsa khuam tungah Mordekai khailupna ding thu kumpipa kiangah a ngen dingin kumpi huang sungah Haman hong tum hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Hih lai-ah Haman om hi; inntualah ding hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Amah hong tumsak un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Haman hong tum a, kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa tungah bang kihih leh hoih na sa hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Haman in a lungsim sungah ngaihsun a, “Kumpipa in kei sangin a pahtawi nop zawk ding kua om zenzen ahi hiam?” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih manin Haman in kumpipa kiangah, “Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa adingin
kumpipa mahmah in a silh kumpi puante le kumpipa a tuanna sakol a lukhu tawh la sak in.

Tua ciangin kumpipa’ ulianpen khat tungah tua kumpi puante le sakol apsak in. Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa pen amah zemsak inla, tua ciangin khua sung kongzing lampi-ah sakol tungah a tuangsa-in na ulian penpa kaisak inla, ama mai-ah kiko sakin, ‘Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa tungah hih bangin kibawl ding hi,’ cisak in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Haman kiangah, “Na cihsa bangin manlangin kumpi puante le sakol la pah inla, kongpi-a om Jew mi Mordekai tungah hih thute khempeuh hih in. Na gensa khat beek siit kei in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Haman in kumpi puante le sakol la-in Mordekai zem a, khuapi sung kongzing lampi-ah amah tuangsakin, “Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa tungah hih bangin kibawl ding hi,” ci-in a taangko hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa’ kongpi-ah Mordekai ciahkik hi. Haman ahihleh kilukhuhsa-in a thum kawmin a inn-ah ciahpah vingveng hi.

Tua ciangin Haman in a zi Zeresh le a lawmte khempeuh tungah ama tunga thupiang teng a gen hi. Tua ciangin a zi Zeresh le a lawmte in ama kiangah, “Tu-a na lelhtak Mordekai pen Jew mi ahi hi; amah na zo kei dinga, amah in nang hong zo zaw ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua bangin Haman tawh amaute a kiho laitakin kumpipa’ innsungmaangte hong pai a, Esther’ bawlsa nitak an a ne dingin amah a pai khiatpih pah uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpinu Esther tawh an a ne dingin kumpipa le Haman va pai uh hi.

A ni nih ni, amaute in zu a nek laitakun kumpipa in Esther kiangah, “Kumpinu Esther aw, nong ngetnop bang ahi hiam? Nong nget khempeuh ka kumpi gam phelkhat dongin hong kipia ding hi,” cikik leuleu hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpinu Esther in dawngin, “Kumpipa in nong hehpihzawh a, kumpipa in hoih na sak leh, kong nget kong thumnop thu pen keimah le ka mipihte sihna tawh nong kipelhsakna ding ahi hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh kei le ka mite suksiat ding, thah ding, beisak mang dingin hong kizuak hi. Kote, numei pasal a kibangin sal dingin hong kizuak hileh bangmah ka pau kei ding hi; tua bang lel tawh kumpipa nawngkaisak taak lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpipa Ahasueras in Kumpinu Esther kiangah, “Hih banga gamtat ding a ngaihsun kua hi a, koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in, “Hong langpang ka gal pa! Hih migilo Haman!” a ci hi. Tua laitakin kumpipa le kumpinu’ mai-ah cih nading thei loin Haman a om hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa a hehsa-in annekna pan ding khia-in kumpi huan sungah a pai hi. Ahi zongin Haman ahihleh tua lai mahah omin Kumpinu Esther in a nuntakna a suahtaksakna ding a thum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa in amah thah dingin a ngaihsutna a lungsim a thei hi.

Kumpi huan panin a annekna mun uhah kumpipa hong paikik ciangin Esther’ tutna lamah Haman na awn phei-in a om mu a, kumpipa in, “Ka inn sung ka muhna nangawnah hih mipa in kumpinu hih ding ahi hiam?” ci hi. Kumpipa in tua thu a cih phetin amaute in Haman’ mai puan a khuh uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa’ na a sem innsungmaangte lakah Harbona in, “Nidangin kumpipa’ na hoihtakin a sem ngei Mordekai thah nadingin Haman mahmah in a phuhsak, pi sawmsagih le nga a sang khuam pen Haman’ inn-ah tumahin om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Tua tungah amah khailum un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Mordekai khailup nadingin a phuh khuam tungah Haman a khailum uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ hehna a dam hi.

Tua ni mahin Kumpipa Ahasueras in Jew mite’ gal ahi Haman’ neihsa khempeuh Kumpinu Esther tungah pia hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ omna-ah Mordekai hong tung hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah tawh a kinaina zia, kumpipa kiangah Esther in gen hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Haman’ tung panin a lakkiksa minthuhna zungbuh pen suah khia-in Mordekai a pia hi. Tua hi a, Haman’ neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin Esther in Mordekai a koih hi.
Kumpipa’ mai-ah Esther khatvei va paikikin khitui naptui tawh a khe mai-ah va puk a, Agag mi Haman’ vaihawm siatna lianpi le Jew mite a sawmna thu a kipelhkik theih nadingin va thum hi.
Kumpipa in Esther’ lamah a kham ciangkhut na zan a,

tua ciangin Esther thoto-in kumpipa mai-ah dingin, “Kei nong hehpihzawh a, hih ka ngaihsutna man na sak a, hoih na sak le, na ukna gam sung khempeuh ah a om Jew mite thahna ding a sawmna-in Agag-te beh Hammedatha’ tapa Haman in a laigelhte dawhkik nadingin lai khat gelhsak in.
Ka mipihte tungah hih siatna lianpi a tung ka muh ding bangci thuak zawh ding ka hi hiam? Ahih kei le ka innkuanpih tungah a tung hih siatna ka muh ding bangci thuak zawh ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpipa Ahasueras in Kumpinu Esther le Jew mi Mordekai tungah, “Haman in Jew mite thah hong sawm ahih manin sing tungah amah kikhailum khin a, Haman’ neihsa khempeuh Esther’ tungah kong pia khin hi.

Kumpipa’ min tawh kigelhin, kumpipa’ minthuhna tawh a kithuh khinsa lai pen kidokkik thei nawn lo ahih manin, tu-in Jew mite tawh kisai-in hoih dinga na up bangin kumpipa’ min tawh gelh inla, tua khit ciangin kumpipa’ minthuhna zungbuh tawh thuh in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a kha thumna ahi Sivan kha a ni sawm le thum ni-in kumpipa’ lai-atte kisam a, Mordekai’ gen bang teekteekin Jew mite tung le India panin Ethiopia dong gam zakhat le sawmnih le sagih a uk ahi gam tampi a ukte, gam khat a ukte le tua gam sunga uliante tungah lai kihawmkik a, amau’ lai ciat le amau’ pau ciatin kigelh a, Jew mite ading zong amau’ lai le amau’ pau mahin kigelh hi.
Tua lai pen Kumpipa Ahasueras’ minin kigelhin kumpipa’ min thuhna zungbuh mah tawh kithuh a, kumpi sakol bukah a kikhawi kumpipa’ sakolte tungah laitaite kituangsakin lai kihawmsak hi.

Kha sawm le nihna ahi Adar kha a ni sawm le thumna ni khat sungin Kumpi Ahasueras’ ukna gam sung khempeuh ah Jew mite in amau a sim ding mi ahih kei leh a gamte’ hihna ding panin khua khempeuh ah amau na kipawlin na kihu-in, tua banga amaute a hih dingte pen a numei a naupangin susia-in, thatin a beisak nading uh le a neihsate uh a laksak theih nadingun hih banga lai piakna tawh kumpipa in Jew mite tungah hih theih nading thu a pia hi.
Tua thupiakna lai pen gam khempeuh ah kihawmin mi khempeuh kitheisakin, amau’ galte a thukkikna ding ahi tua ni tawh kisai-in Jew mite a kigin kholh ding uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ sakolte tungah laitaite tuangin kumpipa’ thu-kin sawl mah bangin nawhtai uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpi khua Susa khuapi sungah zong tua thupiakna lai a kihawm hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi puan a san le a kang silhin, kham tawh kibawl kumpi lukhu lianpi khu-in, saihadial puanneel le puansan silhsa-in kumpipa’ omna panin Mordekai pai khia hi. Tua ciangin Susa khuapi sung mi khempeuh lungdamin awng uh hi.
Tua hi a, Jew mite in suahtakna, lungdamna le pahtawina ngah uh hi.

Kumpipa’ thupiakna a tunna gam le khua khempeuh ah Jew mite adingin lungdamna le kipahna, pawi bawlna le nasep khawlin zum khakna a om hi. Tua hi a, midangte in Jew mite kihta uh ahih manin tua gam a om mi tampi tak in Jew mi ka hi uh hi, a ci uh hi.

A kha sawm le nihna ahi Adar kha a ni sawm le thum ni-in kumpipa’ thupiakna bangin sepkhiatna ding hun hong tung hi. Jew mite’ galte in gualzo dinga a ki-up ni teek pen amau a mudah mite’ tungah Jew mite a gualzawh ni ding hong hizaw hi.

Tua ni-in amaute’ siatna ding a geelte a su gawp dingin Kumpipa Ahasueras’ ukna gam khempeuha amau’ khuapite sungah Jew mite kikhawm uh hi. Mi khempeuh in Jew mite kihta uh ahih manin kuamah in Jew mite nang ngam lo uh hi.
Mordekai kihta uh ahih manin gam tampi a ukte le gam khat a ukte le gam sunga ulian tuamtuamte le kumpi ulian khempeuh in Jew mite panpih uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpi inn sungah Mordekai ulianpi khat suak a, a vangliatna a khan semsem mah bangin gam khempeuh ah ama minthanna kizel hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jew mite in namsau tawh a galte uh tampi tak thatlum uh a, amau a mudahte a ut utun hih gawp uh hi.
Kumpi khua Susa khuapi sung mahmahah Jew mite in mi zanga thatin susia uh hi.

Tua hi a, amaute in Jew mite’ gal ahi Hammedatha’ tapa Haman’ tapa sawmte Parshandatha, Dalfon, Aspatha, Poratha, Adalia, Aridatha, Parmashta, Arisai, Aridai le Vaizatha-te zong a that uh hi. Ahi zongin amau’ neihsate suksak lo uh hi.
Kumpi khua Susa khuapi sunga a kithat zah tua ni mahmahin kumpipa kiangah kizasak hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Kumpinu Esther kiangah, “Kumpi khua Susa khuapi sungah Jew mite in mi zanga that uh a, Haman’ tapa sawmte zong that uh hi. Ka ukna gamdangte sungah zong bangzah that ding kithei lo hi. Tu-in bang deih lai na hi hiam? Nong nget peuhpeuh hong kipia lai ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Esther in, “Kumpipa in hoih na sak leh, tuni-a mah bangin zing ciangin zong Susa khuapi sunga om Jew mite tungah hih theihna thu pia inla, Haman’ tapa sawmte’ luanghawmte khuam tungah khaisak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin tua banga a hih nadingin kumpipa in a sawl hi. Susa khuapi sungah hih thu suakkhiasak a, khuam tungah Haman’ tapa sawmte kikhai hi.
Susa khuapi sunga om Jew mite Adar kha a ni sawm le li ni-in kikhawmkikin Susa khua sungah mi zathum that uh hi. Ahi zongin amau’ neihsate suksak lo uh hi.

Tua mah bangin kumpipa’ ukna gam tuamtuama om Jew mite zong amau’ kihut nadingin kikhawm uh hi. Amaute in zong amau a mudah mihing tul sawmsagih le tulnga thatin a galte uh tungah phu la uh hi. Ahih hangin a neihsate uh suksak lo uh hi.
Hih banga a hih pen Adar kha a ni sawm le thum ni hi a, a ni sawm le li ni-in tawlnga uh a, pawi bawlin lungdamin om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Susa khua sunga om Jew mite ahihleh a ni sawm le thum le sawm le li ni-in kikaikhawm uh a, a ni sawm le nga ni tawlnga uh a, pawi bawlin lungdamin om uh hi.
Hih thu hangin gam sung khuaneute-a teng Jew mite in Adar kha a ni sawm le li ni pawi bawlna le lungdam ni dingin tawlngak ni-in nei uh a, anlim nono kikholhna ni-in a zang uh hi.
Tua ciangin Mordekai in hih thupiangte khempeuh lai-in ciamteh a, a nai a gamla a om Kumpi Ahasueras’ ukna gam sung khempeuha om Jew mite tungah lai paisak hi.
A kumkumin Adar kha ni sawm le li ni le sawm le nga ni a tan nadingun thu a pia hi.

Tua nite pen Jew mite a galte uh tung panin a suahtak ni, dahna le thumnate lungdamna le lungnopna a suah kha ahi hi. Tua ahih manin amaute in pawi bawl ni le lungdam ni-in nei-in, anlim nono khatlekhat kikholh ni le mizawngte tungah letsong piak ni-in a zat dingun thu a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Mordekai’ laigelhna tawh kizui-in Jew mite in a patsa uh hih banga a hihnate uh a zom uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Jew mi khempeuh’ gal ahi, Hammedatha’ tapa, Agag-te beh Haman in Jew mite su gawpin a suksiat nadingin Pur kici ai sanin Jew mite suksiat ding sawm hi.

Ahih hangin kumpipa in hih thu a theih ciangin, Jew mite suk nadingin Haman in a geelsa thu hoih lo pen Haman’ lu tung mah a lehtukna ding le amah le a tapate khuam tungah a kikhaina ding lai-in gelhin thu a pia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Pur min tamin hih hun sungteng Purim ci-in min a phuak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin hih lai sunga a kigelh thute khempeuh le hih thute amau’ mit tawh mu-in a pumpi uh tawh a tuahna uh hangin,
Jew mite amau mahmah le a suan a khakte uh le amau a pawlpih khempeuh in lai sunga kigelh bangin a kiseh hunin kum simin hih ni nihte a pel loin a tan ding uh kipsak uh a,

a khangkhangin innkuan sim, gam sim, khuapi simah hih nite phawkin a kitanna ding le Jew mite lakah hih Purim nite a kitan ngitnget nading ahi a, a suanlekhakte un zong hih thu a mangngilh hetloh nading uh ahi zongin khotakin a len uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abihail’ tanu Kumpinu Esther in Purim thu tawh kisai hih laikhak nihna a kipsak nadingin Jew mi Mordekai tungah aana a kicingin a piakna lai-in a gelh hi.
Kumpi Ahasueras’ ukna gam za le sawmnih le sagih sungah a om Jew mite khempeuh tungah kilemna le nopna a omna ding deihsakna laite kikhak a,

Jew mi Mordekai in a gelhsa bangin a kisehsa tawh kizui-in hih Purim nite a tan nadingun thu kipia hi. Tua mah bangin amaute le a suanlekhakte uh adingin antanna ding le thumna bawlna ding ngeinate a gelh uh hi.
Kumpinu Esther’ thupiakna in hih Purim bawlna ding ngeinate kipsak a, lai thupite sungah hih thu kiciamteh hi.
Kumpipa Ahasueras in a ukna gam leitung le tuikulh tunga teengte tung panin siah kai hi.
Ama vangliatna le a sepnate khempeuh le Mordekai tungah a piak minphatnate, Media le Persia Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpipa Ahasueras’ zomah Mordekai a lian pen ahi hi. Mordekai in ama mite’ phattuamna ding le a suanlekhakte uh a khantohna ding hanciam ahih manin Jew mite lakah milian khat hi a, a gam mihonpite in a it kim uh hi.
Uz gamah Job kici min nei mi khat a om hi. Tua mipa a paubaang lo, a thutang, Pasian a zahtak mi khat hi a, amah in gamtat hoih lo peuhmah peel hi.
Amah in tapa sagih le tanu thum nei hi.
Amah in tuu tulsagih, kalaoh tulthum, bawngtal kap zanga, lapi zanga le nasem tampi tak a nei hi. Tua ahih manin nisuahna gam sungah Job a hau pen khat ahi hi.
Ama tapate in inn khat panin inn khatah a ban banin pawi bawlin pai kawikawi uh a, tua pawi a siim dingin a sanggam numei thumte uh zong a sam kawikawi uh hi.

Tua banga a pawi bawl uh gual khat a kikhit ciangin Job in a tapate samin amaute siansuah a, zingsangin tho baihin a ta phazah tawh kizui-in meihal biakna a pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Job in, “Ka tate khialin, a lungsim sung uhah Pasian samsia khathei ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Tu-a bangin Job in hih tawntung hi.
Ni khat ni-in Topa’ omna-ah vantung mite hong pai uh a, tuate lakah Satan zong hong kihel hi.
Topa in Satan kiangah, “Koi pan a hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Satan in Topa dawngin, “Leitung khempeuh a lu pan a taw dong vak kawikawi-in ka va phehlehna mun panin ka hong pai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “Ka nasem Job na phawkkha hiam? A paubaang lo, a thutang, Pasian zahtakin gamtat hoih lo a peel amah tawh a kibang midang leitungah na mu kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Satan in Topa dawngin, “Job in Pasian hong mawk zahtak ahi hiam?
Amah le a innkuan le a neihsate khempeuh na hutna-in a kimkotah daai khan hi lo na hi hiam? Ama hihna khempeuh ah thupha na pia a, genzawh lohin ama neihsa pung hi.
Ahi zongin na khut zanin ama neihsa khempeuh suksak lecin na maitang mahmahah nang hong samsia pah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “En in, ama neihsa khempeuh na khut sungah kong ap hi; ahi zongin amah taktak ahihleh na su kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ omna panin Satan a pai khia hi.
Ni khat, a tapate le a tanute in a u pen uh inn-ah an ne zu ne-in om uh hi.
Kamtai khat Job kiangah hong tungin, “Bawngtalte in lo kho-in, tuate gei-ah late gamta uh hi.
Tua laitakin Seba mite hong pai-in ganhingte hong sut a, namsau tawh gancingte thatkhin uh hi. Hih thu a hong zasak thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tungin, “Vantung panin keek hong kia a, tuute le tuucingte kha-in kaangtum uh hi. Hih thu nang kiangah a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.

Tua pa in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu-in, “Khaldea mite hon thum in kalaohte hong sut a, namsau tawh kalaoh tung tuangte khempeuh that hi. Hih thu nang kiangah a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu a, “Na tapate le na tanute a u pen uh inn-ah an ne zu ne-in om uh hi.
Tua laitakin sehnel gam panin huihpi pingpei hong nungin a inn mutpai-in na tate denglum hi. Nang kiangah hih thu a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu a zak ciangin Job dahlua-in a puan balkek a, a sam met khia-in leilakah bok sukin Pasian a bia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka nu sung panin guaktangin ka suak a, guaktang mahin ka ciahkik ding hi. Topa in hong pia a, Topa mah in hong lakik hi. Topa’ min kiphat tahen,” a ci hi.
Hih thu khempeuh ah Job khial lo a, Pasian zong mawhsak lo hi.
Ni khat ni-in Topa’ omna-ah vantung mite hong paikik uh a, Satan zong amaute lakah hong kihelin Topa’ omna mahah hong pai hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “Koi lai panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Satan in Topa dawngin, “Leitung khempeuh a lu pan a taw dong vak kawikawi-in ka va phehlehna mun panin kong pai hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “Ka nasem Job na phawk hiam? A paubaang lo, a thutang, Pasian zahtakin gamtat hoih lo a peel, amah tawh a kibang midang leitungah om lo hi. Thu om lopi-in amah susia dingin kei nong kam pausak a, ahi zongin ama hoihna bangmah hem tuan lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Satan in Topa dawngin, “Vun bek in vun mah lei zo bek, ci-in paunak a om mah bangin mi khat in ama nuntakna a hutna-in a neih khempeuh pia ngam ding hi.
Tu-in na khut zan inla, ama sa le a guh suksak lecin nangma maitang mahah pel loin nang hong samsia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “En in, na khut sungah amah kong ap hi; ahi zongin amah sisak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ omna panin Satan pai khia a, Job a khetul pan a luzang dongin a kihhuai meima a veisak hi.
Tua ciangin Job in beel kitam themkhat la-in tua tawh kikhuatin vut lakah a tu hi.
Tua ciangin a zi in, “Na upna khiam tuan lo ding na hi hiam? Pasian samsia inla sisuk mai in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in a zi kiangah, “Numei haite’ kampau bangin na pau hi. Pasian’ tung panin a hoih sang ihih ciangin siatna zong sang lo ding ihi hiam?” a ci hi. Hih thu khempeuh ah a kampau nangawnin Job khial lo hi.

Job’ lawmte thum, Teman khuami Elifaz, Shuah gammi Bildad le Naamah gammi Zofar-te in Job in a thuak gimna thu teng a zak uh ciangin a inn ciat panun amah a hehnem ding le a hanthawn dingin kituahin hong paikhawm uh hi.
Amaute in a gamla sim mun panin Job a muh tungun amah thei pah lo uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute a gingin kap khia uh a, a puan uh balkekin a lu tung uh a tukik dingin leivui lawnto uh hi.
Tua ciangin leilakah sun sagih le zan sagih sung amah tawh tukhawm uh a, ama thuakna a nasiat mahmah lamtak mu uh ahih manin kuamah in kam khat beek a paupih ngam kei uh hi.
Hih bang teng khit ciangin Job in thugen hong kipan a, mihingin a pian ni a samsia hi.
Tua ciangin Job in,
“Ka suah ni le ‘Pasal naungek khat kipaii hi,’ a kicih zan bei mang hen!
Tua ni khimzin ni suak hen! Vana Pasian in phawkin nei kei henla, tua ni-in khuavak taang kei hen.
Khuaniim, khuamial in khuhcip hen. Tua ni-in meiipi zing henla, tua ni awk in valhtum hen.
“Tua zan, khuamial sahpi in mancip hen! Kum khat sunga nidangte tawh kisim khawm kei henla, kha khat sunga nidangte lakah kiseh khawm kei hen.
Tua zanin ta piang kei henla, lungdam otna awging tua zanin ging nawnkei hen.
Phuisamna tawh awle a khiim thei, a mitphial tawh tuipi ganhing a hencip thei mite in tua zan samsia tahen.
Tua ni zingsang aksite mial hen. A vak ngei lo ding khuavak ngak niloh henla, zingsang phalvak mu ngeikei hen;
bang hang hiam cih leh kei hong kipaiina naugil na khakcip lo a, kei’ muhna panin lungkhamna hong hepkhiatsak lo hi.
“Bang hangin a sisa-in suak hoh lo a, bang hangin ka suah phetin si pah hoh lo ka hi hiam?
Bang hangin ka nu’ khuk tungah hong kitawi se a, ka nu’ nawi hong kiteepsak se ahi hiam?
Tua hi zenzen kei leh hanah nuamtakin ka lum hithiat khin ding hi. Sihna sungah ihmu-in ka tawlnga khin dinga,
inn hoih nono a lam kumpite le uliante,
ngun le kham tawh a kidim a hau a liante tawh nuamtakin hanah ka tawlnga khinta ding hi.
Bang hangin a hun cing lo-a suakte bang, khuavak a mu man loin a si naungekte bangin hong kiseelcip hoh lo ahi hiam?
Tua lai-ah migilote in hong sukha nawn lo dinga, a gim mite tawlnga hithiat ding hi.
Tua lai-ah galmat salte in nopna ngah dinga, nasem ukpa’ awging za nawn lo ding uh hi.
Tua lai munah milian mineu omkhawm a, silate nangawn a topa’ kiang pan suakta hi.
“Bang hangin lungkhamna a thuak mipa, a nuntakna haksa a sa mahmah mipa,
sih ding lunggulh ngeungau napi, a si thei lo, sum phum zon sangin sih ding a lim zon zaw,
han sung a tun ciangin a nuam mahmah, hankhuk a tun ciangin nuam lua-in a diang gawp mite, khuavak a mu dingin mi-in piang laizang ahi hiam?
Bang hangin mailam thu ding a thei lopi-in a mot om ding, a kimkotah Pasian in daai a khaknelh mipa, mi-in piang zenzen ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh khuisatna, ka annek suak a, ka tauna, luipi ging bang hi.
Ka kihtaktak thu ka tungah hong tung ta a, ka laulau thu, ka tuak ta hi.
Lungnopna, daitakin omna, ka nei kei hi. Lungkhamna in hong nawk niloh a, tawldam hun ka nei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Elifaz in Job Tai Tua ciangin Teman khuami Elifaz in thu hong gen a,
“Mi khatpeuh in thu hong genpih leh na heh ding hiam? Kua in a kam ip zo nawn ding ahi hiam?
Lunghiang mite na hanthotna, khut kha ban kha mite na thakhauhsakna,
a puk mite na thugenna tawh na kipsakna, khuk zaw mite na hatsak ngeite ngaihsun in.
Ahi zongin nang tungah tuate hong tung a, na thuakzo kei hi. Tuate in nang hong su a, na lungniam hi.
Na biakna in hong hehnem zo lo ahi hiam? A paubaang lo, na nuntakna in lametna hong pia zo lo ahi hiam?
Tu-in ngaihsun in: Midik kimlai kua sia ngei ahi hiam? A thutang mi a kisuksiatna koi-ah mu ngei na hi hiam?
Mawhna bawlin buaina a piangsak mi in a gamtatna bangin a gah a atna ka thei hi.
Pasian’ husanna tawh tua bang mite sia a, ama hehna in tua bang mite kaangtum hi.
Humpinelkai hawk bangin migilote’ hawkna dai ta a, Pasian in amaute’ ha suktansak khin ahih manin gamdai ta uh hi.
Annek ding a mu lo a thahat humpinelkai bangin amaute si mang khin uh a, a tate uh kithehthang hi.
“Tu-in kei kiangah thu khat hong tung khian a, ka bil in tua thu ginghiau a za hi.
Mi a ihsip hun zankim laitak, zan mangmat hun laitakin
launa le linna kei tungah hong tung a, ka pumpi linna in kei hong lausak hi.
Huih in ka mai hong mut a, ka khuasikmul hong suaksak hi.
A mel ka khen theih loh lim khat hong dinga, keima mai-ah mihing lim khat hong om a, tua ciangin aw un duadua khat ka za a,
‘Pasian’ mai-ah mi khatpeuh paubaang loin om zo ngei ding ahi hiam? Amah a Bawlpa’ mai-ah sitbaang loin om zo ngei ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in ama nasemte mahmah muang zo loin, ama sawltakte’ mawhna mu ahihleh,
inn umna kawmin buan a kizatna inn sunga a teeng mite, a inn bulpi leivui ahi,
zing kal nitak kalin, a kisusia thei sungah a omte, bangzah ta-in kuama don lohin si pakin,
amau’ liatna in taisan pak dinga, pilna ngah ngei loin si pak zaw ding hi lo ahi hiam?’ hong ci hi.
“Tu-in na thu ko in: Nang hong huh ding om ahi hiam? A siangthote kua pen’ lam zuan ding na hi hiam?
Mihai pa in a hehna sihlawh a, muhdahna in sihna piangsak hi.
Mihai pa in limtakin zung kha ngei napi, ama inn thakhatin a kizunglot ka mu ngei hi.
A tapate suahtaksak zawh ding hi nawn lo hi. Kulhkongpi gei-ah amaute kisu gawp a, amaute a hon khia ding kuamah om lo hi.
Midangte in a neihsate liahtumsak uh a, amah sangin a hat zaw pa in a um a beel sunga a omte nangawn laksak a, a neih a lam duhgawhin a deihgawh hi.
Leilak panin gimna hong piangtawm lo a, lei sung panin lungkhamna hong po khiatawm lo hi.
Mei-ek a to leen mah bangin mihingte in amau’ lungkhamna ding mah a piangsak uh hi.
“Nang hi leng, ka Pasian’ tungah ka thum dinga, ama tungah ka thu ka ap ding hi.
Amah in na liante le kuama phawk zawh loh thute sem a, genzawh lohin a lamdang na tampi a bawl hi.
Amah in guah zusak a, lo khempeuh tui a buak hi.
Amah in mi niamte sangkoih a, a dahte lungnuamsak hi.
Amah in migilote’ geelna suksiatsak ahih manin amaute in a ngimna uh tangtun thei lo uh hi.
Amah in migilote amau’ gitlohna mahah awksak a, ngian a zangte’ geelna zong a lumletsak hi.
Sunthapai-in khuamial sung kidenna a, suntangpi mahin zan bangin mial a zawt uh hi.
Ahi zongin amah in amau’ kiang panin pa nei lote hon khia a, mi thahatte kiang panin mi cimawhte a hon khia hi.
Tua ahih manin mizawngte in lametna neikik uh a, thuman lo mite ahihleh kihencip hi.
“Pasian in a taii mite mi nuamsa hizaw ahih manin, Vanglianpa’ taiina thupi san in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a liamsak hangin a liamna tunsak dinga, ama satna liamma damsak ding hi.
Lungkhamna gukvei dong na tuahna-ah amah in nang hong hon dinga, a sagihveina dingah siatna in nang hong su nawn lo ding hi.
Kialpi sungin sih nading pan nang hong hon khia dinga, gal sungah namsau panin nang hong suaktasak ding hi.
Gensiatna panin nang hong kihu dinga, siatna hong tun ciangin na lau kei ding hi.
Suksiat ding le puksih dingte na nuihsan lel dinga, leitung gamsate na kihta kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh na lo sungah suang om lo dinga, gamlak gamsate in hong su lo ding hi.
Na inn sungah lunghihmawhna ding om lo hi, ci-in na thei dinga, na inn kiim na et ciangin a kitasam bangmah om lo ding hi.
Na suan na khakte tampi tak pha ding hi, ci-in na thei dinga, na sunga piangte leitung lopa zah pha ding hi, ci-in na thei ding hi.
A hun ciangin ancilna phualah buhlom a tun mah bangin a teek sihin han na zuan ding hi.
Hih thute khempeuh ka kantel uh a, a thuman a na hi hi. Hih thute ka zaksa uh hi a, a manna na thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Job in A Lawmte Tai Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Ka lunggimna kitawikhai henla, ka haksatna khempeuh kitawiteh leh!
Tuipi sehnel khempeuh sangin gik zaw ding ahih manin ka kampaute guhin a kha hi.
Vanglianpa’ thaltangte in kei hong kha a, ka sungah a thal gu kidiah hi. Pasian in a kihtakhuai-in kei hong su hi.
Gam late in lopa a nek laitakin ham a, bawngtal in an a nek laitakin ham ahi hiam?
An lim lote, ci sawh loin kine thei a, aktui da kang in limna nei ahi hiam?
Ka kam in tuate ciam nuam lo a, tuate khempeuh a luaksuahhuai an tawh a kibang lel ahi hi.
“Ka ngetna ngah thei hi leng a, Pasian in ka deihna hong pia ding hileh
Pasian in kei hong sucip henla, a khut zanin kei hong that vet leh!
Tua hileh keima kihehnepna hi dinga, hih zahta ka thuakna-ah nuamin ka diang ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Siangtho Pa’ thu ka nial khat zong om lo hi.
Ka thuak lai nadingin bang hatna nei nawn a, lungduai a ka om nadingin lamet ding bang om nawn ahi hiam?
Ka thahatna suang bang hi a, ka pumpi in sumngo tha paii ahi hiam?
Kei le kei’ sung panin huhna bangci ngahtawm theih ding ka hi hiam? Kei hong kihuhna ding ka ngetna ding kuamah om lo hi.
“Pasian ka nusia a, ka nusia kei zongin, hih bang lungkham hunin lawm citak ka kisam hi.
No ka lawmte pen, lui tuikhang bang, a mangthang pak tui let bang,
nin a khalhnelh vuk le tuikhal bangin na zuautat uh hi.
Khua a lum ciangin tuate tui mangthang a, ni a sat ciangin a kaang hi.
Tua tui a zong dingin khualzin mite pai kawikawi a, gam sung tengah kawi pai-in a mangthang uh hi.
Tema khuami khualzinte in zong tua tui zong uh a, Sheba mite in zong tua tui muanin a nei uh hi.
Ahi zongin tua a lametna uhah cimawh uh hi. Tua tui zuan uh a, a om loh ciangin cih nading thei loin kam ka lel uh hi.
Tu-in zong kei adingin note tua bang lel na hi uh hi. Ka gimna teng nong mu uh a, na lau uh hi.
No kiangah, ‘Na khat peuhpeuh hong pia un, ka suahtak nadingin sum tawh hong huh un,
ka galte’ kiang panin hong hon khia un, kei a hong nengniamte’ khut sung panin hong tan khia un,’ hong ci ngei zenzen ka hi hiam?
“Hong hilh thei le-uhcin, pau loin ka ompah ding hi. Ka khialhna hong theitelsak dih un.
Lungsim takpi tawh thugennate heh loin kisang thei a, ahi zongin no hong taiina in bang phatuamsak ahi hiam?
Kamging mawkmawk lelte heh taak sa a, huih’ let mang cihmawh kamte thupi ngaihsut na hi uh hiam?
Mi cimawh khat suksiat gawp sawm a,na lawm khat uh hih gawp sawm na hi uh hiam?
Tu-in kong thum hi; kihei unla kei hong en un. Na maitang uhah zuau a gen dingin kilawm ka hi hiam?
Ngaihsun pha un, a kilawm lopi-in kei hong hih kei un. Ngaihsun pha un, ka hoihna teng a hong kize-et hi lel hi.
Ahi zongin zuaugen mahin nong ngaihsun lai veve uh a, a sia le a pha a khen thei loin nong seh lai veve uh hi.
Job in Pasian Seel “Leitungah mihing in nasep haksa nei a, ama hun pen nasem pa-a’ bang hi lo ahi hiam?
Sila nasemte in niliim lunggulhin nasem pa in a thaman a ngak tawh kibang hi lo ahi hiam?
A mawkna-in kha tampi sung ka om a, zanthapai-in lungkhamna bek keima tanh ahi hi.
Nitak ka lup ciangin, ‘Cik ciangin khua hong vakin zing ka tho tam,’ ka ci hi. Ahi zongin zan sau a, zingsang khuavak mateng ka kigawigawi hi.
Ka pumpi tung khempeuh ah than bekbek kidim a, ka vun tung khempeuh meima in tuamcip hi.
Ka hunte siamgante’ siam ciangtang sangin manlang zaw a, lametna om loin a mong tung pak hi.
“Pasian aw, ka nuntakna husan bang bek ahihna hong phawk in. Ka mit in hun nuam mukik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Kei hong mu ngei pa in kei hong mukik nawn lo dinga, na hong et laitak mahin ka mangthang ding hi.
Meiilum kaite bei-in a manthan bangin Leinuai a paisuk pa mangthang ding hi.
Ama inn ah hong ciahkik nawn lo dinga, ama omna ngei mun in amah thei nawn lo ding hi.
Tua ahih manin pau loin ka om kei ding hi. Ka lungkham manin kam ka pau dinga, ka gimluat manin ka phun ding hi.
“Kei a hong cing ding na koih nadingin kei, tuipi ganhing hong sa na hi hiam?
Lum leng nuam dinga, ihmu leng phatuam ding hi, ci leng lah,
a lauhuai mang nong mansak a, a lauhuai maangmuhna tawh nong lausak hi.
Tua ahih manin gui-awk ding ka ut zaw a, hih bang ka thuak sangin ka si nuam zaw hi.
Ka lungkham a, ka nungta nuam nawn kei hi. Ka nuntakna pen husan bang hi lel ahih manin hong hici omsak hoh in.
“Nang in hih zahin na thupi ngaihsut dingin na lungsimah na ngaihsut dingin
zingsang simin gim a pia dingin ama kiangah pai-in amah na ze-et themthum nadingin mihing bang hi lel ahi hiam?
Tomkha sung beek hong pelh lo dinga, ka hu beek hong sangsak man lo ding na hi hiam?
Mihingte a encik pa aw, a khial ka hih leh zong nangma tungah bang gamta khial ka hi hiam? Bang hangin kei hong ngim a, bang hangin nangma muitum suak zenzen ka hi hiam?
Bang hangin ka khialhna hong maisak lo a, ka mawhna hong maisak lo na hi hiam? Tu-in han sungah ka lum dinga, nong zonzon hangin ka na om nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Bildad in Pasian Thuman hi, Ci Tua ciangin Shuah gammi Bildad in dawng a,
“Tua bang thu bang tanvei gengen dinga, bang tanvei paupau ding na hi hiam?
Pasian in thutang a zang lo sa na hi hiam? Vanglianpa in thuman a zang lo sa na hi hiam?
Na tate ama tungah khial a, amau’ mawhnate amaute a tuaksak ahi hi.
A hun lai-in Pasian zong inla, Vanglianpa’ hehpihna ding thuum lecin,
nang dikin thutang kisa mahmah na hih leh pel loin amah in nang hong en dinga, na thumanna tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia ding hi.
Tua hileh, na zawn mahmah khit hangin a tawpna-ah na haukik ding hi.
“Khangluite’ thu kantel inla, pute pate’ tuahsa thute ngaihsun pha in.
Eite pen zan mah mi ihi a, bangmah i thei kei hi. Leitung a i nuntakna pen niliim bang lel ahi hi.
Amaute in nang hong hilhin, a thu hong genin, amau’ phawksa thute hong gen ding hi lo ahi hiam?
“Ciknawng om lohna-ah laiphai kung po thei ahi hiam? Tui om lohna-ah pumpeeng pung thei ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin tuate a pak kimlai a phuk hun nai lopi-in kungno dang khempeuh sangin keu masa zaw hi.
Pasian a mangngilhte tua bangmah ahi hi. Pasian a don lo mite’ lametna a bei ta ahi hi.
Ama kimuanna maimom khau bang hi lel a, ama ki-upna maimom bu bang hi lel hi.
A inn tungah kingam a, a inn hoi hi. A inn lencip a, ahi zongin kip zo lo hi.
“Amah pen nitaang sungah hoihtakin a khang kungno, a huan sungah a dawn hilhhelh kungno ahi hi.
Ahi zongin suangtum lakah a zung a kivial gawp, suangtawphah a phukha zung a suak hi.
Tua ciangin mi khatpeuh in a phung pan zungbawh a, ‘Cik mahin nang hong thei ngei peuhmah kei ing,’ ci-in a lawn khia hi.
Hih bang danin ama nuntakna bei a, lei sung panin kung dangte hong po khia hi.
“Theitel in; Pasian in cikmah hunin mawhbaang lo mite nil khia lo dinga, gamtatsia mite huh ngei lo ding hi.
Na mukah lungdam nuihna hong omsak dinga, na kam sungah lungdam a kikona hong omsak ding hi.
Nang hong mudahte in maizumna ngah ding uh a, migilote’ puanbuk mai mang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Job in Pasian A Dawn Theih lohna Tua ciangin Job in Pasian dawng a,
“Kuamah in Pasian a zawhzawh lohna a teltakin ka theita hi.
Mi khatpeuh Pasian tawh thu a kinial ding hileh tulkhat sungah khatvei nangawn dawng thei lo ding hi.
Amah pil mahmah a, vanglian mahmah hi. Kua in khauhtakin nial a, nial paisuak zo ahi hiam?
Pasian in mualte liingsak a, tawlngasak lo hi. Ama hehna tawh mualte a lumlet hi.
Amah in leitung lok gawp a, a khuampite kiliing hi.
Amah in ni a suak lo dingin thu pia a, aksite sincip hi.
Amah bek in vanpi zal a, tuipi tuihualte tuancil hi.
Amah pen vana a om Khawlei-uikai, Zawlzawng, Seguk le Khanglam aksite a bawlpa ahi hi.
Amah in kuama theih zawh loh na lian tampi bawl a, kuama sim zawh loh nalamdang tampi sem hi.
“Ka kiangah amah hong pai a, ke’n amah ka mu thei kei hi. Amah gam tangtang napi-in, amah ka theithei kei hi.
Amah in la khia nuam leh a khaktan zo ding kua om ahi hiam? Bang hih na hi hiam, kua’n ci thei ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in ama hehna dokkik het lo mah ding hi. Rahab’ pawlte nangawn a khenuai-ah kun uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah in bangci dawn theih dinga, amah ka nialna ding kammal bangci muh ding ka hi hiam?
Kei ka dik hangin amah ka dawng thei kei hi. Kei hong mawhsak pa tungah hong hehpih ding ka nget kul hi.
Thukhen zumah amah samin hong pai hita mah leh zong ka thumna hong ngai dingin ka um tuan kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh thu themno khat hangin nakpitakin kei hong hih a, thu om lopi-in gimna tampi hong thuaksak hi.
Ka hu nangawn hong sangsak man lo a, lungkhamna tawh kei hong kidimsak hi.
Thatanghat thu ding hileh, amah hat mahmah a, thutang kituh hi leng, kua in thukhen zumah amah sam zo ding ahi hiam?
Kei ka dik hangin keima kam mah siksanin kei hong man dinga, mawhbaang lo ka hih hangin keima kampau hong lehheisak ding hi.
Paubaanna ka neih loh hangin kei a thupi-in ka kingaihsun tuan het kei a, ka nuntakna ka kih hi.
Thu khat bek om hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a paubaang lote le a gilote susia khawm hi, ka ci hi.
Lauhuai lianpi hong tung pakin sihna a om ciangin mawhbaang lote’ thumna a nuihsan lel hi.
Migilote’ khut sungah leitung kipia a, amah in thukhen mangte’ mit a tuncipsak hi -amah hikeileh kua hi ding ahi hiam?
“Laitaite sangin ka hun nawhtai zaw a, beipak ahih manin nopna ngah kha lo hi.
Pumpeeng gunkuang bangin ka hun nawhpai a, muvanlai sa bawh bangin a nawhlen hi.
Ka dahnate kimangngilh bawlin kimaitaisak ding ci taleng zong,
a dikin nong seh loh ding lamtak thei khin ka hih manin ka thuak ding thute hangin kei ka lau mahmah hi.
Kei a mawhin hong kiseh veve ding ahihleh bang hangin a mawkna-in na sem ding ka hi hiam?
Satpiang tawh kei kisilin, vuttui tawh ka khut sawp taleng,
buannawng sungah kei nong hencip veve dinga, ka puan ninte in a kihhuai hong suaksak ding hi.
Amah ka dawn theih nadingin amah, kei bangin mi hi lo a, thukhen zumah thu kineihpih theih hi lo hi.
Ko tegel kikalah thu hong khen ding khat om thei henla, ko tegel tungah aana hong zang ding khat om thei hileh,
kei hong kisatna ciang hong paih khiatsak dinga, kei tungah lauhuaina lianpite hong om nawn lo ding hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin amah kihta hetloin ka pau ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei’ omzia ding bangin kei ka om loh lamtak teltakin ka kithei hi.
Ama Pianzia Hangin Job Thum “Ka nuntakna ka cimtak mahmah ta hi. Ka dahna thu ka ut utin ka gen dinga, ka lungkham manin ka paupau ding hi.
Pasian kiangah hih bangin ka ci ding hi: Kei hong mawhsak kei in. Kei nong langpanna thu hong gen in.
Na khut tawh na sepsate simmawh bawlin, migilote’ vai panpihin, hih bangin nong netniamna ah bang phattuamna ngah na hi hiam?
Mihing bang lelin gamta na hi hiam?
Na nuntak hun tan kote’ nuntak tan bang lelin ngaihsun na hi hiam?
Bang hangin ka mawhna hong sulzuihin, ka khialhna khempeuh hong kantel na hi hiam?
Ka mawh lohna na thei a, nang kiang panin kei hong hon ding a om lohna na theihsa mah ahi hi.
“Nangma khut tawh kei hong lomin na hong piangsak a, tu-in nangma khut mah in kei hong lehsuksiat hi.
Leivui pan a kei nong bawlna hong phawkkik in. Leivui mahin hong dengvuikik takpi ding na hi hiam?
Kei ka pian nadingin ka pa’ tungah tha na guan a, ka nu’ sungah kei nong khangsak hi.
Guh le thaguite tawh ka pumpi ding nong bawl a, sazang le vun tawh tua guhte nong tuamsak hi.
Kei, nuntakna hong pia-in, nong it tawntung a, nangma hong kepna hangin kei ka nungta hi.
Ahi zongin a beisa hun sung khempeuh ah kei ading thusim khat na neihna tu-in ka theita hi.
Ka khialhkhaknate hong ensim niloh na hih manin ka mawhnate hong maisak nuam lo na hi hi.
Ka khialh phetin gim nong pia pah a, ka gamtat hoih ciangin zong nong pakta tuan kei hi. Mindaina le maizumna tawh kei ka kidim hi.
Mavanna khatpeuh neisun leng zong, humpinelkai bangin ka siatna ding na zong a, kei’ gimtheih nadingin nalamdang tuamtuam nangawn na bawl liang hi.
Kei a hong langpang dingin teci na nei tawntung a, keima tungah na hehna hong khang semsem a, kei nong sukna ding thuthak na mu tawntung hi.
“Pasian aw, bang hangin ka nu’ sung panin kei hong piangsak peuhmah na hi hiam? Kuama hong muh ma-in a si hizaw hoh leng!
Ka nu’ sung pan hankhuk zuat pah ding pen mihing a pian loh zah mahin a hoih ahi hi.
Keima nuntakna bei dektak ta hi lo ahi hiam? Hong hici omsak hoh in! Ka hun neih laisun teng nuam takin hong zangsak in.
Kei a pai baihta ding ka hi a, a hong ciahkik ngei ding ka hi kei hi -khuamial, lungzinna gam,
khuavak nangawn khuamial ahihna gam, khuamial gam, lungzinna gam, lungkhamna gam, a zuan ta ding ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Zofar in Job Mawhna Nei-in Ngawh Tua ciangin Naamah gammi Zofar in dawng a,
“Kampau hih zahta hong kidawng lo ding sa a, kam tam pauna hangin thumanin hong kiseh dingin ngaihsun na hi hiam?
Job aw, na thugente hong dawng thei lo dingin hong ngaihsun na hi hiam? Na simmawh kampaute hong kidawng mawh dingin ngaihsun na hi hiam?
Nangma thugente a man na sa kha a, Pasian’ muhna-ah a siangtho dingin na kingaihsun kha hi.
Pasian in na thugente hong dawngkik leh ut mahmah ing!
Pilna nam tampi a omna thu, mihing’ theih zawh loh thuthuk, a omna thu hong gen ding hi. Na mawhna zahin Pasian in gim hong piak lohna thei in.
“Pasian’ thuthuk thei khinzo ding na hi hiam? Vanglianpa’ hih theihna thei khinzo ding na hi hiam?
Vantung sangin Pasian sang zaw a, ahi zongin tua vantung nangawn na ban zo kei hi. Pasian in leinuai thu thei a, ahi zongin nangmah in tua thu na thei kei hi.
Pasian’ liatna pen leitung sangin gol zaw a, tuipi sangin zai zaw hi.
Pasian in nang hong manin thu hong sit leh amah a khaktan ding kua om ahi hiam?
Pasian in mihoih lote thei takpi hi. Mawhna a muh ciangin thudon lo ding ahi hiam?
Gamlak a om late mihing suak ngei dinga, mihaite pil ngei ding ahi hiam?
“Job aw, na lungsim a hoihin bawl inla, Pasian’ lamah kihei in.
Khialhna na bawl khak leh paai khia inla, na inn sungah gitlohna omsak kei in.
Tua hileh kisuanna om loin na khuadak ngam dinga, na lung nuamin launa na nei kei ding hi.
Na lungkhamnate veng dinga, tuikhang pak bangin na phawk nawn kei ding hi.
Tua ciangin na nuntakna, sun sangin taang zaw dinga, nuntak lungzin pen hun, sun sangin taang zaw ding hi.
Lungnuam tak le lametna nei-in na om dinga, Pasian in nang hong hu-in, tawldamna hong pia ding hi.
Kuamah kihtak nei loin nuamtakin na om dinga, mi tampi in nangma maipha hong zong ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin migilote ahihleh cimawhin khuadak ding uh a, suahtakna ding lampi mu lo ding uh hi. Amau’ ngah ding ahihleh sihna bek ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Job in Pasian’ Vangliatna le Pasian’ Pilna Gen Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Note pen theihna kicing na kisa mah uh a, pilna a nei na kisa mah uh hi.
Ahi zongin note zah mahin kei zong thu ka thei a, midangte sangin na theih zawk uh bang om tuan ahi hiam?
Ka lawmte nangawn in tu-in kei hong nuihsan uh a, kei dikin paubaang lo napi hong nuihsan uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in ka thungetna a hong piak hun om hi.
Note in lungkhamna bangmah na nei kei uh a, kei na hong ciamnuih bawl gawpgawp uh hi. A puk dektak mipa na sat gawp uh hi.
Guta mite nuamtakin om hithiat uh a, Pasian a simmawhte nuamtakin nungta uh hi.
“Ahi zongin gamsate va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi. Vasate va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi.
Leitung ganhingte va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi. Tui sung ngasate zong va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi.
Pasian’ khut in amaute a bawlna thu a vekpi-un thei kim uh hi lo ahi hiam?
A piansaksate’ nuntakna Pasian mah in a uk ahi hi. Mihing khempeuhte’ nuntakna ama khut sungah om hi.
Leii in an a ciap mah bangin, bil in ngai thei hi lo ahi hiam?
“Khanghamte in pilna nei a, nuntak saute in thu theitel uh hi.
Pasian in pilna le vang nei a, amah thukipin thu a theitel hi.
Pasian in phelkek leh kuamah in lamkik zo lo a, Pasian in thongah mi koih leh kuamah in suaktasak zo lo hi.
Pasian in guah khaktan leh leitung keugaw a, tui a khah ciangin tui hong khang hi.
“Pasian thahatin gualzo tawntung a, mi khemte le khemna a thuakte Pasian’ ukna nuai-ah a om uh ahi hi.
Amah in mipilte’ pilna susia-in, makaite pen mihai bangin gamtasak hi.
Amah in kumpite zakiasak a, thongah a khia hi.
Siampite mihai suaksak a, mi vangliante lawnthal hi.
Amah in mi’ muante a pau thei loin bawl a, khanghamte’ pilna a paihkhiatsak hi.
Amah in mi vangliante mindaisak a, mi thupite’ kihihsakna a beisak hi.
Amah in khuamial sung panin thuthukte kal khia a, a kithei zo lo thute kitelsak hi.
Amah in minamte thahatsakin liansak a, ahi zongin amah in tuate zo gawpin susia hi.
Amah in minam makaite a pilna uh paihkhiatsak a, lampi om lohna gamlakah vakvaisak hi.
Khuamial lakah amaute in mialzawt uh a, zukham bangin amaute hoihoi uh hi.
Job in Ama Hoihna Gen “Na gen uh thu khempeuh ka muhsa vive hi a, ka bil-in ka zakzaksa, ka theih theihsa thu ahi hi.
Note’ theih khempeuh, Note khempeuh sangin ka neu zaw tuan het kei hi.
Ahi zongin note tawh kam a kinial hi loin, Pasian tawh a kinial ka hi hi. Pasian tawh hih ka thu ka kinial nuam hi.
Note in na haina uh zuauthu tawh na melh uh a, kuamah a damsak zo lo zato siam-a kinei mite tawh na kibang uh hi.
Pau hetloin om hi le-uhcin, mipil mah hong kisa zaw ding hi.
“Tu-in ka thugen hong ngai unla, ka gen laitakin limtak ngai un.
Pasian’ min dingin thuman lo genin, ama adingin zuauthu gensak ding na hi uh hiam?
Pasian angvan dinga, ama ading gensak ding na hi uh hiam?
Pasian in limtakin note hong entel leh note’ sungah hoihna mu ding ahi hiam? Mihingte na khem bangun Pasian a khem thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi. kingaihsun na hi uh hiam?
A simthamin angvanna na zat uhleh amah in note hong taii taktak ding hi.
Ama vangliatna in note hong lausak dinga, note tungah amah kihtakna hong tung ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Na thugente uh vutkhu bang hi lel a, na siksante uh leivui bang hi lel hi.
Pau kei unla, kei, thu hong gensak dih un; a piang peuhpeuh a piang hi mai hen.
“Ka nuntakna pia ngamin, ka nuntakna ka ap ngam hi.
Pasian in kei hong that mah taleh zong, phamawh ka sa kei hi. Ahi zongin ama mai-ah ka thu ka gen veve ding hi.
Pasian’ mai-ah migilote pai ngam lo uh ahih manin, ka hanna pen ka gualzawhna hi ding hi.
Ka thugente limtak ngai unla, ka lahtelnate na za un.
Ka thu a gen dingin a baihsa-in ka om a, thu ka zawh ding lamtak teltakin ka thei hi.
“Pasian aw, keimah hong mawhsak ding na hi hiam? Nong mawhsak leh pau hetloin a si dingin ka kiging hi.
Thu nih kong ngen hi, ka hong nget hong pia in. Tua ciangin nang tungah bangmah kong im kei ding hi.
Kei tungah gim hong pia nawn kei inla, hih bang launa hong thuaksak nawn kei in.
Pasian aw, hong hopih masa in, kong dawng ding hi. Kei, thu hong gensak inla, nangmah in hong dawng in.
Ka mawhna ka khialhna bangzah pha ahi hiam? Ka mawh ka khialhna teng hong theisak in.
“Bang hangin kei hong peel a, gal bangin hong ngaihsun na hi hiam?
Bang hangin keimah lausak ding hanciam na hi hiam? Kei, singteh bang lel hi lo ka hi hiam? Anvai themkhat galin do ding na hi hiam?
“Nangmah in kei tungah thusiapi nong zong a, ka neulai huna ka gamtatna nangawn tawh nong mawhsak hi.
Nangmah in ka khe sikkol nong bulh a, ka kalsuanna khempeuh le ka khekhap nangawn na entel hi.
Tua huhau-in singmuat bangin ka puk a, nget in a nek puan bangin ka zan gawp hi.
Nuntak Tom Thu Lung Ngaingai “Mihingte a nuntak hun tom mahmah a, lungkhamna tawh kidim hi.
Amaute paak bangin khangin keu pak uh a, niliim bangin pai hanhanin, mangthang uh hi.
Pasian aw, tua bang lel mi kei hong en a, thukhenna a thuak dingin na mai-ah hong sam na hi hiam?
Mihing banga a ninte sung panin a siang hong piang lo ding hi.
A nuntak tan ding kiseh khol a, a nuntak kha phazah ding kiciangtan khin hi. Nangmah in na ciangtan khin a, kikheel thei nawn lo hi.
Amah en loin tuaci omsak mai inla, a nuntak haksapi mah zomzomsak hoh in.
“A kiphuk khinsa singkung nangawn in lametna nei buang a, a bul sel kikin nungtakik thei hi.
Lei sungah a zungte teek a, a bulsum a si zongin,
guahtui ngahin, singkungno-in hong selkik hi.
Ahi zongin mi si a, amah mai mang pah hi. Amah a beina tungta a, koi-ah om nawn ahi hiam?
“Gun tuite le tuipi tuite a kan hun om thei ding hi.
Ahi zongin vanpi a omlai teng, misite thokik ngei lo dinga, a ihmutna panun khanglo ngei lo, gamtang ngei lo ding uh hi.

“Hih gimna tawh ka kipelh theih nadingin nong phawk loh nading mun misite’ gam sungah kei hong busak in. Mi a si khinsate hingkik thei lo ahih manin a hingin hong omsak peuh lecin tua lai-ah ka ut hi. Na hehna a dam ciangin hong phawkkik peuh lecin tua lai-ah ka ngak nuam hi.
Tua khit ciangin kei na hong sam dinga, ke’n kong dawng ding hi. Nangma bawlsa ahi keimah na hong lunggulh ding hi.
Tua hun ciangin ka kalsuanna khempeuh nong en dinga, ahi zongin ka khialhnate nong sulzuih nawn kei ding hi.
Ka khialhnate hong maisakin, nong paihkhiatsak dinga, ka mawhna khempeuh nong phiatkhiatsak ding hi. Tu-a bangin a piang thei hileh ka ut mahmah hi.
“Ahi zongin a taktakin, mualte a puk ding hun suangkeente nangawn a cip ding hun hong tung ding hi.
Tui in suangte nawtkhia-in, guahtui in lei a nawtkhiat bangin nangmah in mihingte’ lametna na beisak hi.
Nangmah in mi khat zo gawpin na hawl khia a, na sa mahmah ahih manin a si dingin a ha a li hi.
Amah a pahtawi dingin a tapate hong pai taleh zong amah gimlua ahih manin bangmah phawk zo nawn lo a, a tapate mindai taleh zong bangmah phawk zo nawn lo hi.
A pumpi sunga a natnate le a lungsim gimnate bek a phawk zo lai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Teman khuami Elifaz in Job dawng a,
“Job aw, mawk paupau kei in! Nang’ pau bangin mipilte pau ngei lo a,
bangmah-a kimang lo kampaute pau lo a, phattuamna om lo dingpi-in thu seel lo uh hi.
Ahi zongin nangmah in Pasian zahtakna na beisak a, ama mai-ah thugenna ding na khaktan hi.
Tu-in na mawhna thu na kam pan hong ging khia a, ngian zangin na kampau tawh na mawhna na seel hi.
Na mawhna thu kei’ hong gen kisam lo a, na pauna khempeuh in na mawhna hong langsakta hi.
“Mihing a a piang lakah a masa pen kisa na hi hiam? Pasian in mualte a bawl lai-in a piang khin kisa na hi hiam?
Pasian’ vaihawmnate a za simin kingaihsun na hiam? Nang bek in pilna khempeuh a nei-in kingaihsun na hi hiam?
Ko’ theih loh thu bang thei tuan na hi hiam? Ko’ muh loh thu bang mu tuan na hi hiam?
Na pa’ pianma a a piang puteek samkangte’ tung panin kote in ka pilnate uh a ngah ka hi uh hi.
“Pasian in nang hong hehnem hi; bang hangin nialnial na hi hiam? Kam khum kam nem tawh Pasian’ tangin nang tungah thu kong gen uh hi.
Ahih hangin na lung khauhin kote nong heh et hi.
Pasian’ tungah a heh na hi a, amah a simmawh na hi hi.
“Mihing a a piang peuhmah paubaang hetloin siangtho taktak zo ding ahi hiam? Pasian’ tungah a thuman zo kua om ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in a siangtho vantung mite nangawn muang lo ahihleh, ei mawhnei mite bang hangin hong muang mah ding ahi hiam?
Mihing in tui i dawn bangin siatna i dawndawn a, mihing pen siahuai-in bangmah i man kei hi.
“Job aw, ka thutheihte na ngai in.

Amaute tung bekah gam kipia ahih manin, amaute a pialkhiatpih ding gamdang mi tawh a kihel lo, a pu a pate un bangmah im loin thu a hilh suksuk uh mipilte’ thugente kong gen ding hi. Tua a gen uh thute in:
“Mi a nengniam migilo pa in a khan tawntungin lungkhamna thuak ding hi.
Launa ding awging a bilah za ngitnget dinga, lungmuangin a om laitakin gutate in buluh ding hi.
Lungzinna pan suahtak nading lametna om lo a, amah a that dingin mun khatah namsau in ngak khinkhian a,
amah a ne dingin musanete in a ngak uh hi. A mailam thu lungzinhuai ahihna thei hi.
A thahat kumpi khat bangin lungkhamna le lungzinna in amah a hih gawp dingin a ngak khikhe hi.
“Pasian langpangin a khuttum a lahsan, Vanglianpa a dem mipa in hih bang thute a thuak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in khauhtakin Pasian langpangin, a lum sahpi tawh a lehdo hi.
“A thatang muanhuai-in a pumpi a liat hangin
ama tenna khuapi sia-in, ama inn kinusia dinga, a sawt loin ninbulomtang suak ding hi.
Amah sauvei hau lo dinga, a neihsate kip lo ding hi. Ama liim nangawn mai mang dinga,
khuamial panin suakta lo ding hi. Amah pen a hiangte mei in a kattumsak, a paakte huih in a letkhiatsak, singkung tawh kibang ding hi.
Amah in gitlohna suanin nei ahih manin, gitlohna bek mah ngahkik ding hi.
A hun a tun ma-in amah bei dinga, singhiang bangin keu-in hingkik nawn lo ding hi.
A min ma-in a gahte a pulh leenggui bang dinga, a paakte a pulh mang khin oliv kung bang ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian a ngaihsun lote mi cimang suak a, sumgolh tawh a kilam innte mei in kaangtum hi.
Mihingte in siatna ding bek ngaihsunin sem uh a mi khem ding bekbek ngaihsun niloh uh hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian’ Bawlna hangin Job Phun Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Tua bang thute ka zaza khin a, no’ hehnepna pen gimna ding bek ahi hi.
Khawl hun nei loin gengen lai ding na hi uh hiam? Na gen ding uh omom lai ahi hiam?
Note le keimah a kikhek thei hi lehang, note’ gen khempeuh kei zong ka gen thei ding hi. Note ka lu hong peisanin thu tampi tak mah kong gen thei ding hi.
Ahi zongin keimah in note hong tua cih loin, thuhoih mahmah tawh note hong hehnemin, note hehnepna ding thu ka gen ding hi.
Thu gengen taleng ka natna nuamtuam lo a, pau kei taleng zong, phatuam tuan lo hi.
Pasian aw, kei nong paatsak ngingei a, ka innkuan khempeuh na sisak mang khin hi.
Kei na hong mancip a, keima gal na suak hi. Ka vun guak le ka guh guak bekin ka om a, keima mawhna a kilatna-in mite in a ngaihsun uh hi.
“Pasian in a hehna tawh hong balnen ngingei a, a ha hong gawisanin hong heh et hi.
Mite in kei hong zahko uh a, ka paang a beeng dingin hong kikhawmtuah uh hi.
Pasian in migilote’ khut sungah kei hong pia hi.
Kei nuamtakin a om kimlai, Pasian in ka gawlin hong manin, hong bal gawpin hong su gawp hi. Pasian in a muitum dingin kei hong suang a,
ka kimkot panin a thaltangte tawh hong kap hi. Tua thaltangte in kei hong kha-in hong liamsak a, tua bang nangawnah kei hong hehpih lo hi.
Amah in hong hehpih hetloin kei hong liamsak thuahthuah a, galkap a heh pa bangin kei hong hih gawp hi.
“Kei thumin puanhampi ka silh a, guallelin leivui lakah ka om hi.
Ka kahkahna-in ka mai khempeuh san gawp a, ka mitkhute bawk gawpin khua ka mu thei kei hi.
Ahi zongin ngongtatna themkhat zong ka zang kei a, Pasian tungah ka thungetna pen lungsim takpi tawh ahi hi.
“Leitung aw, a man loin kei hong kibawlna seelcip kei in! Thuman deihin ka kikona ka awging daicipsak kei in.
Kei adingin a ding ding, a hong panpih ding mi khat vantungah om hi.
Pasian in ka khitui luanna hong mu-in ka thungetna hong za leh ka ut hi.
Mi khat in a lawmpa ading a thumsak mah bangin mi khatpeuh in Pasian’ kiangah kei adingin hong thuumsak leh ka ut hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hun nai mahmah ta a, ka lehzuih nawn loh ding lampi zui-in a pai ka hita hi.
“Ka bei ding hun nai kuan ta a, hu ka sang zo nawn kei hi. Kei adingin hankhuk cih loh bangmah dang om nawn lo hi.
Ka heina khempeuh ah mite in hong zahko uh a, amau’ hong phinna in hong lungzingsak hi.
Pasian aw, kei hong hu in. Ka thugente hong panpih ding kuamah dang om lo hi.
Nangmah in amaute thuman a mu lo dingin bawl na hih manin amaute a gualzo-in na bawl kei ding hi.
Paunak-ah, sum ngahnop manin mi khat in a lawmte a heek leh, ama tate in tua gitlohna thaman thuak hi, kici hi.
Tu-in amaute in kei tungah hih paunak hong bulh uh a, mite in hih thu za-in kei hong cilphih uh hi.
Ka dahna hangin ka mit mial a, ka khut ka khete ciangkang bang ta hi.
Mihoihin a kineite in lamdang hong sa uh a, migiloin kei hong seh uh hi.
Mite’ zahtaka a kinei mite in amau’ ngaihsutna uh man mahmah sa semsem uh hi.
Ahi zongin amaute khempeuh hong pai-in ka mai-ah hong ding le-uh amaute’ lakah mipil khat zong ka mu kei ding hi.
“Ka hun beita hi. Ka geelna teng mai mang a, ka lametna teng beita hi.
Ka lawmte in, khuamial kimlai, sun khuavak, ci uh hi. Khuavak hong nai ta hi, ci-in gen uh a, ahi zongin khuamial sung mahah kei ka omlai veve hi.
Kei’ lamet ding misite’ gam bek omlai a, tua khuamial sungah lumin ka ihmu ding hi.
Hankhuk sung pen ka pa hi, ka ci dinga, kei hong ne thante pen ka nu le ka sanggam numeite, ka ci ding hi.
Kei’ lamet ding tua lai-ah bang om ahi hiam? Tua lai-ah ka lamet ding bang nong muhsak uh hiam?
Misite’ gam Leinuai-ah ka pai ciangin nopsakna in kei hong zui lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Bildad in Migilote’ Thuak dingte Gen Tua ciangin Shuah gammi Bildad in dawng a,
“Job aw, khawl hun nei thei lo ding na hi hiam? Hong khawl phot lecin, thu kong gen thei ding uh hi.
Bang hangin bawng bang lelin kote hong ngaihsun a, mihaipi-in kote hong seh na hi hiam?
Na hehna tawh nangmah a kigimsak bek na hi hi. Nangma hangin leitung kinusia dinga, mualte a kin khia dingin ngaihsun na hi hiam?
“Migilo pa’ meivak kisumit dinga, cikmah hunin kuangkik nawn lo ding hi.
Ama buk sungah a meivak mit dinga, ama inn sungah khua a mial ding hi.
A khe kip ngei a, ahi zongin tu-in a khe bai ta hi. Amah in a ngaihsut khialhna a puklawh hi.
Thangsiahna ngen sungah amah bungbu tuk a, gum sungah amah kia hi.
Thangah a khetulin awk a, thangkhau in amah gakcip hi.
Amah siahna-in leilakah khauzak kitung a, a pai nading lampi-ah thang kisiah hi.
Lauhuaina in amah pang a, a kalsuanna khempeuh a sulzuih hi.
A hauh ngei hangin tu-in gilkial ta a, siatna in a su dingin amah ngak gige hi.
A kihtakhuai natna in a pum khempeuh tuam a, a khut le a khete muatsak mang khinta hi.
Lungmuang takin a omna a inn panin amah kikai khia a, Sihna Kumpipa kiangah amah kitunpih hi.
Ahih hangin zatui tawh ama inn a kisiansuah khit ciangin tua inn-ah a ut peuhpeuh teng thei pah ding hi.
Lei sunga ama zungte keu-in, a tunga a hiangte a si ta hi.
Inn le gamah ama minthanna beita a, kuamah in amah phawkkha nawn lo hi.
A nungtate’ gam panin amah kihawl khia dinga, khuavakna mun panin khuamialna-ah kihawl khia ding hi.
Amah in suanlekhak nei lo a, ama tennasa munah ama gui a zom ding om lo hi.
Nisuahna pan nitumna dong ama thuakna a za peuhmah kigaihin a liing uh hi.
Migilote, Pasian a ngaihsun lote a thutawpna uh tu-a bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian in Hong Diksak ding ci-in Job in a Upna Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Bang tanvei thu genin hong gimsak ding na hi hiam?
Kei nong simmawh niloh a, tua banga na gamtatna-ah maizumna mel na nei thei kei hi.
A khial takpi hi taleng zong nang’ lainatna ding bang om ahi hiam?
Keimah sangin a hoih zaw-in nang na kingaihsun a, ka thuak gimnate pen keima mawhna hangin na ngaihsun hi.
Hih thu hong piangsak pa Pasian ahih lam mu thei lo na hi hiam? Kei hong mat nadingin amah in thang hong siah hi.
Keimah hong ngongbawlna ka nialnial hangin kuamah in hong don kei hi. Thuman ka deih hangin hong kipia kei hi.
Pasian in ka lampi khaktan a, ka paisuak zo kei hi. Amah in ka pai nading lampi khua mialcipsak hi.
Amah in ka hauhna khempeuh hong lakkhiatsak a, ka min hoih kimlai hong siasak hi.
Amah in ka pumpi khempeuh hong sat gawp hi. Ka nopsakna teng hong zunglot sakin, vul gawpin a si dingin kei a hong nusia hi.
Keima tungah Pasian’ hehna hong so gawp a, ama gal lian penin kei a hong ngaihsun hi.
Amah in keimah a sim dingin a galkapte hong sawl a, a galkapte in dum to-in ka buk hong umcih uh hi.
“Pasian in ka sanggamte hong taisansak a, kei hong theisate kiangah khualmi ka suak hi.
Ka behte le ka lawmte bei mang khinta uh hi.
Ka inn-ah a hong tung ngei keima zinte in hong mangngilh ta a, ka na a sem numeite in khualmi bangin hong bawl uh a, amaute’ mai-ah midangpi khat ka suak hi.
Ka nasemte khatpeuh ka sap ciangin hong dawng nuam lo uh a, hong huhna ding uh ka thum ciang nangawnin hong thudon lo uh hi.
Ka zi nangawn in ka gimnam thuak zo lo a, ka sanggamte mahmah in zong hong naih nuam lo uh hi.
Naupang melmawl nangawn in kei hong simmawh uh a, kei hong muh uh ciangin hong nuihsan uh hi.
Ka lawm it pente nangawn in kei hong muhdah et uh a, ka it pente nangawn in kei hong langbawl uh hi.
Ka guh tungah ka vun kol dihdiahin om a, a nungta liailiai bekin kei a om ka hi hi.
Hong hehpih un! Hong hehpih un! Keima lawmte hi lo na hi uh hiam? Pasian in kei hong satpai ta hi.
Pasian’ hong bawlsiat bangin bang hangin no zong kei hong bawlsia ding na hi uh hiam? Nong gimsakna uh kicing ta hoh hi lo ahi hiam?
“Ka thugente khempeuh mi khatpeuh in ciamteh henla, laibu khat sungah a khum hileh ut mahmah ing!
Tua ahih kei leh zong, ka thugente khempeuh sikkhu khat tawh suang tungah kikhen henla, a mang ngei nawn lo dingin a kigelh hileh ut ing!
“Ahi zongin a tawpna-ah kei hong panpih ding a nungta tawntung khat vantungah a omna thu ka thei hi.
Natna in ka vun a nektum khit hangin, hih ka pumpi mahmah tawh Pasian ka mu ding hi.
Keima mit teekteek tawh amah ka mu dinga, amah in kei hong khualmi et lo ding hi. “Ka lungsim hanna a bei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, ‘Amah bangci gimsak thei ding ihi hiam?’ na ci uh hi. Kei nong suktheih nadingun paulap khatpeuh na zong uh hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in namsau kihta un. Tua namsau in a mawhte tungah Pasian’ hehna hong sem ding hi. Tua ciangin thukhen ding khat a omlam na thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zofar in Migilote’ Tuah theih Thute Gen Tua ciangin Naamah gammi Zofar in dawng a,
“Job aw, ka heh nong suaksak a, ka ki-ip zo nawn kei hi.
Na thugente khempeuh kei nong simmawhna kampau vive hi a, ahi zongin kong dawnna ding ka thei hi.
Tanglai pek a kipan, leitung mi a om cil a kipanin,
migilote’ nopsak hun a tom mahmahna thu, Pasian a don lote’ lungdam hun a tom mahmahna thu thei lo na hi hiam?
Migilo pa lian mahmahin vantung a banto zongin, lian mahmahin a lutang in meii lak a banto zongin,
leivui them bangin mai mang veve lel ding hi. Amah a thei ngei mite in, ‘Amah koi-ah omta ahi hiam?’ ci-in lamdangsa ding uh hi.
Amah pen zan a mangmat bang, mumaang bangin mai mang dinga, cikmah hunin kimukik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Ama tenna ngei mun panin amah mai mang dinga,
mizawngte’ na a suhsakte, a tate in lohsak ding uh hi.
A pumpi moi suahin a thatang a hat mahmah hangin a sawt loin leivui a suakpak ding ahi hi.
“Ama kam sungah gitlohna lim sa mahmahin, namtui mahmah sa-in a leii tawh lop melmel a,
amah in muammuam nuamin sia khia nuam lo a, lim sa mahmahin a dangtawng denna-in a neih hangin,
a gil sung a tun ciangin a kha mahmah an suakin, gu a kha mahmahte zahin kha deidai hi.
Migilo pa in a guksa nate luakhiakik a, a gil sung nangawn panin Pasian in a lakkhiatsak hi.
Migilo pa’ nekte pen gu tawh kibang a, gul guneite’ tuk bangin amah a sisak hi.
Amah in bawngnawi le khuaizu gun tui bangin a luang mukha lo ding hi.
Amah in a nasep thamante nusia dinga, a hauhna khempeuh zangkha man lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mizawngte bawlsia-in don lo a, midangte’ inn lamsate sutin a tang hi.
“A huaihamna bei ngei lo a, a duh khempeuh siit nei lo hi.
Amah in a nek ciangin a khamval cih om ngei lo a, tu-in a hauhna khempeuh a bei mang khinta ahi hi.
A cihtheih pen hun laitakin lungkhamna lian pen a tuak hi.
Amah in a duhduh ne mai hen! Pasian in hehna tawh amah gim pia ngawn ding hi.
Amah in namsau pelhin a taina-ah sumngo thal in kaptuk ding hi.
Thaltang khat in ama pumpi paihlet a, a te-dildel thaltang mukah si taak keuhkeuh a, ama tungah a kihtakhuai hong tung hi.
A kholsa khempeuh kisusia a, mihing’ tawh loh meikuang in amah le a innkuan khempeuh a kaangtum hi.
Vantungte in hih mipa’ mawhna pholak uh a, leitung in ama langah teci a pang hi.
Pasian’ hehna hangin ama hauhna khempeuh a kisusia mang ding ahi hi.
“Migilote’ ngah dingin Pasian in a piak gimna migilote’ ngah pen tu-a bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Ka thugente limtakin hong ngai unla, ka thu nong ngaihna uh nong hehnepna uh hisak ni.
Thu ka gen theih nading hun hong pia unla, ka gen khit ciangin na ut uhleh hong zahpih un.
“Kei’ kitotpih pen mihing hi lo hi. Bang hangin lungtom lo ding ka hi hiam?
Kei hong en dih un. Lamdangsak taak hi lo ka hi hiam?
Keima tunga thupiang ka ngaihsut ciangin lamdangsa mahmahin lau-in ka liing hi.
“Bang hangin Pasian in migilote khantosak a, hausakin liansak ahi hiam?
A tate uh nuamtakin a khantohna, a u a nau, a suan a khakte uh a punna a mu ding dongin a nungta uh hi.
Pasian in amaute’ inn sungah lungkhamna tungsak lo a, amaute in lauhuaina thuakkha ngei lo uh hi.
A bawngte uh pung a, tatolh cih om ngei lo hi.
Tuuno bangin a naupangte uh tai khia-in kimawl uh a,
tamngai le harp lasakna aw tawh a kituakin a lam uh hi.
Amaute a nuntak sungin cithei mahmah uh a, gentheihna tuak se loin nuamtakin a si hiat uh hi.
“Migilote in Pasian nawlkhin uh a, Pasian in amau’ nuntak ding a deihsakte thei nuam lo uh hi.
Pasian’ na sep ding kisam sa se lo uh a, Pasian kiang a thunget phattuamna om kei, ci uh hi.
Amau’ thahatna hang bek tawh a gina kisa uh a, amau’ ngaihsutna le kei’ ngaihsutna kigamla hi.
“Migilo pa’ meivak kisukmitsak ngei ahi hiam? Amaute khat beek in lungkhamna tuak ngei ahi uh hiam? Pasian in hehna tawh migilote gim pia ngei ahi hiam?
Huih in a letkhiat buhkungte, le huihpi in a mutkhiat buhsi bangin amaute bawl ngei ahi hiam?
“Pasian in a pa’ khialhna hangin a ta gim pia hi, na ci uh hi. Tua bang hi lo! Pasian in a mawhte teek mah gim pia henla, amau’ mawhna hangin gim pia ahihna theisak hen.
Mawhneite amau’ mawhna hangin gimna thuaksak henla, Vanglianpa’ hehna theisak tahen.
Mi khat a nuntakna a bei khit ciangin, a naupangte’ nopsakna phawk thei nawn ahi hiam?
Mi khat in Pasian’ tungah thu hilh thei ding ahi hiam? Vanglianpa tungah thu khen thei ding ahi hiam?
“Mi pawlkhatte a cithei mahmahin si a, lungmuang tak le lungnuam takin om uh a,
annek tuidawn a kicingin a nei uh hi.
Mi pawlkhatte ahihleh nopsak cih theikha ngei loin lunggimin a si uh hi.
Ahi zongin a kibangin a vekpi-in si-in kivui a, than in amaute tuamcip hi.
“Na lungsim sung uhah na ngaihsutna uh, kei nong siatsak nopnate uh ka tel mahmah hi.
Siatna a gamta, mi lianpa’ inn, koi-ah omta ahi hiam, na ci uh hi.
“Khualzinzin mite tawh kiho ngei lo na hi uh hiam? Amaute’ thugente, thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Pasian hehin, mite gim a piak ciangin migilote peng tawntung zawsop hi.
Migilo pa a gamtatna bangin a thukkik ding, migilo pa mawhsakin a langpang ding kuamah om lo hi.
Migilo pa a kivui ciangin a hankhuk kicing a,
mi tul tampi in amah kha-in hoihtakin lei tawh kivuk hi.
“Tu-in note in a mawknapi tawh hehnep nong sawm uh hi. Na gen uh thu khempeuh zuauthu vive hi lel hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Teman khuami Elifaz in dawng a,
“Mipil pente i cih nangawn, ama ading cih lohbuang, Pasian adingin a kimanna om lo hi.
Na gamtat hoihna in Pasian’ phattuamna ding bangmah piangsak lo a, na hoihna in Pasian hoihsak tuan lo hi.
Nangmah in Pasian na zahtakna hangin amah in nang hong taii-in hong ze-et hi lo hi.
Na mawhna a tamna hang, na gitlohna a liatna hang hizaw hi.
Na sanggampa’ leiba tangin a silh ding sitsak loin a puan teng na laksak hi.
A dangtakte tui na pia nuam kei a, a gilkialte an na pia nuam kei hi.
Na vangliatna le na za liatna zangin, gam khempeuh na la khin hi.
Meigongte a huh nuam lo ciang bek hi loin, mi tagahte bawlsia-in a neihsa uh na sut hi.
Tua ahih manin na kimkotah thang hong kisiah a, thakhatthu-in launa in nang hong buaisak hi.
Khuavak kimlai khuamial hong suak vatin khua na mu thei kei a, tuikhang in nang hong tuumcip hi.
“Van a sang pen dawnah Pasian a om hi a, a sang mahmah a om aksite hong suk et lai hi.
Ahi zongin nangmah in, ‘Pasian in bang thei ding ahi hiam? Meii in Pasian tuamcip hi. Eite’ thu bangci-in khen thei ding ahi hiam?’ na ci hi.
Van khumzangah Pasian a paikawmin meii pailetin Pasian in hong musuk thei lo ding hi, ci-in na ngaihsun hi.
“Migilote’ gamtat ngeite mah gamtat ding ngaihsun na hi hiam?
Amau’ hun tung lopi-in tuikhang in amaute taai hi.
Hih mite pen Pasian a nial, Pasian in bangmah a cih thei lo dingin a ki-um mite ahi uh hi.
Tua hitaseleh amaute a daupaisak Pasian hi a, migilote’ ngaihsutna pen keima ngaihsutna tawh kigamla mahmah hi.
Migilote tungah gim kipia a muh uh ciangin mihoihte nuam a, paubaanna a nei lo mite in a nuihsan uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote’ neih khempeuh kisuksiatsak gawp a, a omlai sunte nangawn mei in a kaangtum hi.
“Job aw, tu-in Pasian tawh kilem inla, amah galbawl nawn kei in. Tua hileh amah in nang thupha hong pia ding hi.
Ama hong hilhnate zui inla, ama thute ciamteh in.
Lungsim tak tawh Vanglianpa lamah kihei inla, na inn sung pan gamtatsia beisak inla,
na kham neihte leivui bang lelin ngaihsunin, na Ofir khamte suang bang lelin ngaihsunin,
Vanglian Pasian pen na kham le na ngun hisak lecin,
Pasian muanin na nei tawntung dinga, na lungdamna bulpi amah ahih lam na thei ding hi.
Thu na nget ciangin na ngetna hong pia dinga, nangma thuciamnate na tungsak ding hi.
Na hih khempeuh na tangtun dinga, na maa hong vang ding hi.
Pasian in mi kiphasakte niamkhiat a, mi niamte a hon hi.
Nang a mawhbaang lo, a gamtat man na hih nakleh nang hong hon ding hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian’ Mai-ah Job in A Thu Gen Nuam Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Tu laitakin Pasian’ tungah a ka om thei kei a, thum loin ka om thei kei hi.
Amah ka zon dan ding thei-in, ama kiang ka tun nading zia a thei hi leng,
a mai-ah ka thu ka gen dinga, kei ka dikna thu a kicingin ka gen ding hi.
Ama hong gen ding thute le kei a hong dawnna ding thute ka thei nuam hi.
Pasian in a thaneih khempeuh tawhkeima langkhat ah hong pang ding ahi hiam? Hong langpan lo dinga, ka thugen hong ngai ding hi.
Kei a thuman ka hi a, Pasian kiangah ka gen ding hi. Kuama phel zawh nawn loh dingin kei’ dikna a gen khia ding hi.
“Ahi zongin Nisuahna lam ka zong a, Pasian ka mu kei hi. Nitumna lam ka zong a, amah ka mu thei tuan kei hi.
