Leilu lam ka zon hangin amah ka mu thei kei a, Leitaw lam ka zon hangin zong amah ka mu thei tuan kei hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in ka kalsuanna khempeuh thei a, kei hong ze-et leh ka sianthona a mu ding hi.
Ama hong lamlahna citakin ka zui cinten a, lam ka pial ngei kei hi.
Pasian’ thupiakna bangin ka gamta ngitnget a, keima utna zui loin ama deihna ka zui hi.
“Amah kikheel ngei lo a, kuamah in amah nial zo lo hi. Ama hih nopte kuamah in khaktan zo lo hi.
Tua ahih manin kei adingin a geelsate tungsak ding hi. Amah in hih bangin geelna tampi tak a nei ahi hi.
Tua hi a, ama omna-ah kei ka lau mahmah a, ka ngaihsut khak ciangin amah ka kihta hi.
Vanglian Pasian in ka lungsim hanna hong mangsak hi.
Khuamial in ka mit a mialsak hangin keima kihtak pen khuamial hi lo a, Pasian ahi hi.
Pasian in Gitlohnate A Thudon Lohna Hangin Job Phun “Pasian in bang hangin a thukhen ni ding seh lo a, ama nasemte thutang ahihna a lah ni ding seh lo ahi hiam?
“Mihingte in leitang zaipi a ngah theih nadingun gisuangte khinsim uh a, tuute gu-in amau’ tuuhonte tawh khawi khawm uh hi.
Mi tagahte’ la neihsunte guksak uh a, meigong numei in a leiba a loh khit dong a bawngtal a matsak uh hi.
Mizawngte’ ngah theih dingte khaktan uh a, mizawngte not khia ahih manun amaute lau-in a bucip uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin gamlak a om la bangin gam keu sungah a an ding uh zongtawm uh a, a tate uh an ding koimahah mu zo lo uh hi.
Midangte’ lo sungah anlak na sem uh a, migilote’ leenggui lo ah leenggah loin a om uh hi.
Zanin puan silhloin lum uh a, khuadampi lakah silh ding nei loin om uh hi.
Mual tung gam panin a hong zu guahtui in amaute kawtciimsak a, suangpi pang peuh beelin a toncip uh hi.
“Migilote in pa nei nawn lo naupangte sila-in nei uh a, mizawngte’ tate leiba tangin a la uh hi.
Tua mizawngte in puan silhloin na sem uh a, gilkialpi mahin anlak na a sem uh hi.
A thau ngah nadingin oliv gahte gawi-in leenggahzu ngah nadingin leenggahte cil napi-in, gilkial dangtakin ki-omsak hi.
Khuapi sungah a liam le a si kuante’ kikona kiza napi-in Pasian in amau’ thungetnate don lo hi.
“Sun khuavak a nial, tua khuavak thuzia a thei lo, khuavak lampi a pelh mi pawlkhat om hi.
A zawng a cimawhte a thatlum dingin khuavak ma-in mi that pa kuan khia a, zan khuamial hun sungin mite’ na a guksak hi.
Numei tunga a mawh mipa in khuamial ding ngakin om a, mite’ theih loh dingin ama mel a seel hi.
Gutate in sun sungin a ciamtehsa teng zanin a inn luh uh a, sun sung bu-in khuavak a peel uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh zan khuamial pen amaute khempeuh adingin zing khuavak bang hi a, zan khuamial lauhuai sung nuam a sa uh hi.
“Tua bang migilo peuhpeuh tuikhang in taai a, ama neih leitangte Pasian in samsia a, tua leenggui lote-ah nasemin kikuan nawn lo hi.
Nisat hun le khuakhal hunin vukkhalte a manthan bangin mihingte’ gam sung panin mawhnei mi a mangthang hi.
Amah kiphawkkha nawn lo a, ama nu nangawn in zong a mangngilh ta hi. Thante in amah netum a, amah mai mang ta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang mite, numei taciingte’ neihsa tawh a kivak uh hi a, meigongte’ phattuamna ding bangmah bawl lo uh hi.
Pasian in a thahatna tawh mi vangliante susia a, amah a gamtat ciangin migilo pa a si pah hi.
Pasian in a lungnuamin amah nungtasak a, ahi zongin Pasian in amah encik tawntung hi.
Migilo pa tomkha sung a liat hangin kiak bangin vulkik pah a, a kisattan ankung bangin a keu pah hi.
Hih thu kua in nial zo ding na hi uh hiam? Ka thugennate man lo hi, ci-in kei langah hong pangin ka thugente hong sel zo ding kua om na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Bildad in, “Pasian’ Muhna ah Mihing Dik zo Ngei lo ding,” Ci Tua ciangin Shuah gammi Bildad in dawng a,
“Pasian vanglian a, mi khempeuh in a zahtak ding ahi hi. Ama vantung kumpi gam, nuamtakin a omsak zo hi.
Ama na a sem vantung mite bangzah pha cih kua in sim zo ding ahi hiam? Pasian’ khuavak in a bat lohna koi lai mun om ahi hiam?
Pasian’ muhna-ah kua dik zo dinga, siangtho zo ding ahi hiam?
Ama mitah khapi nangawn taang sa zo lo lai a, aksite nangawn siang sa zo lo lai hi.
Tua ahihleh, lungno, ganhing no ahi lel mihing pen bangci ding ahi hiam? Mihing in Pasian’ muhna-ah bang man lel ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Job in Pasian’ Liatna Gen Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“A hehpihhuai kei nong huhna, a thazawngkhal kei nong hotna, hih bang ahi hiam?
Kei bang mihai tungah thu manpha nong gen a, pilna thu tampi nong pulak hi.
Tua bang thu a gen dingin kua in hong sawl a, kua’ lungsim hong pulak khia na hi hiam?
“Misite’ gam kiliing a, a sunga a teeng mite launa tawh a liing hi.
Pasian’ muhna-ah misite’ gam kilang sinsen a, a muh theih loh nadingin a liah bangmah om lo hi.
Pasian in mun awng tungah vanpi hong zal khia a, bangmah in a len lopi-in leitung a khai lingleng hi.
Amah in meii lom lakah tuite khol a, tua a gik mahmah tui meii a pua zosak hi.
Amah in kha a liah ding bawl a, meii tawh kha a khuh hi.
Amah in muh tawpna-ah git dinden a, khuavak le khuamial a khen hi.
Amah in vanpi a pua khuampite a taii ciangin tua khuampite lau-in a liing uh hi.
Ama thahatna tawh tuipi zo a, ama siamna tawh tui ganhing golpi Rahab thatlum hi.
A hu a san ciangin vantung teng siang pah a, ama khut in a tai khia gulpi thatlum hi.
Hihte pen ama vangliatna themkhat bek hi pan a, i zak thute pen a hemlam bek hi pan hi. Pasian a liatna taktak kua’n thei zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Job in Migilote’ Thuak ding Gen Tua ciangin Job in thu genkik a,
“Keima dikna a hong seelcipsak Pasian, ka lungsim a hong gimsak Vanglian Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin,
ka sungah nuntakna a omlai teng, Pasian’ hu, ka nakah ka diik laiteng,
ka muk tawh thusia peuhmah ka gen het kei dinga, ka kam tawh zuauthu peuhmah ka gen het kei ding hi, ci-in ka kiciam hi.
Note a thuman hi, kong ci ngei kei dinga, ka nuntak laiteng, kei a thuman hi’ng,
Kei thuman ka kisakna ka khia ngei kei ding hi. Ka lungsimah kisuanna om loin siang mahmah hi.
“Kei a hong langpan, kei a hong dote in migilo le thuman lote bangin gimna thuak ta uh hen.
Pasian in amaute’ nuntakna a laksak hun ciangin, migilote adingin lametna om nawn ahi hiam?
Lungkhamna a thuak uh ciangin Pasian in amau’ kikona awging ngai ding ahi hiam?
Pasian’ piak ding lungdamna a deih ding uh kilawm ahih manin, ama tungah thu a nget tawntung ding uh a kilawm ahi hi.
“Pasian’ vangliatna bangzahin lian mahmah cih hong gensak unla, Vanglian Pasian’ geelsa teng hong laktelsak dih un.
Ahi zongin tuate khempeuh na theih khitsa uh ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin mawk pau na hi uh hiam?
“Vanglian Pasian in migilote, mi ngongtatte, gim a piakzia hih bang ahi hi.
Tapa tampi a neih hangun, a vekpi-in gal sungah si mangkhin ding uh hi. A tate uh a tawntungin gilkial niloh ding uh hi.
A nungta laisunte zong pulnatna tawh si ding uh a, meigong numeite in misite kah zo nawn lo ding uh hi.
Migilote in kuama sim zawh loh ngun tampi tak nei ding uh a, genzawh lohin nikten puansilh ciang venvan ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin mihoih pawlkhat in tua puante silhin, thuman mi pawlkhat in tua ngunte tang lel ding uh hi.
Migilote’ lam innte kho lo a, maimom bu, ahih kei leh lo honna buk tawh kibang lel hi.
Amaute a hausa-in lum uh a, ahih hangin a khanlawh uh ciangin a hauhna teng uh na mai mang ta hi.
Lauhuaina in tuikhang pak bangin nawk gawp dinga, zan ciangin huihpi in amaute mut khia mang ding hi.
Nisuahna huihpi in amaute leen khia-in a inn panun gamlapi-ah leen khia ding hi.
Amaute a suahtak theih nading a hanciam tantan kimlai mah, hehpih ngaihsut hetloin leen khia mang ding hi.
Amaute a tai laitakun huih in nawk gawpin, a susia gawp dingin mut khia gawp ding hi.
Mihing in Pilna a Zonna “Ngun a kitawh khiatna a khuk om a, kham a kisiansakna a mun mah om hi.
Mihingte in lei sung panin sik to khia a, suang sung panin sumsan a huantui uh hi.
Mihingte in khuamial thuk pen sung zongin, lei sung a thukpi dong hahkatin zong uh a, khuamial thuktawng sung pan suang a to khia uh hi.
Mihingte’ tenna panin a gamlapi mun, kuamah a pai ngei lohna sungah lei sung sumte a to khia uh hi. Tua lai munah amau guak in na semsem uh a, lei thuk sungah khauhual tawh kiveisuk kiveito uh hi.
I annek dingte leitungah hong po khia a, ahi zongin leinuai thuk sung mei bangin a sa mahmah hi.
Lei sunga om suangte sungah sapfaia suangmanpha om a, a leivuite sungah kham a om hi.
Simbung in zong tua lampi thei ngei lo a, luimu zong tua lai-ah va leng ngei lo hi.
Humpinelkai ahi a, ganhing dangte ahi zongin cikmah hunin tua lai-ah va pai ngei lo uh hi.
“Mihingte in suang a sak pente to uh a, mualte’ bul lei sung panin a to khia uh hi.
Suangte a tawhvang uh ciangin suangmanphate a mu uh hi.
Amaute in tuinak kipatna dong lei sung to uh a, a kiphumcip nate hong suah khia uh hi.
Ahi zongin koi lai-ah pilna kimu ding ahi hiam? Koi lai-ah thutheihna nak om ahi hiam?
“Mihingte in a kimuhna ding a lampi thei lo uh a, mihingte’ gam sungah zong a lampi om lo hi.
A thuk mahmah tuipi liante in, ‘Ko’ sungah om lo hi,’ ci uh a, tuipite in, ‘Ko kiangah om lo hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Pilna pen kham tawh a kilei zo hi lo a, a man ding zah zong ngun tawh seh theih hi lo hi.
Ofir kham tawh pilna a kilei zo hi lo a, suangmanpha pen tawh zong a kilei zo hi tuan lo hi.
Pilna a manphatna kham le limlang tawh tehtheih hi lo a, kham hoih pen a kibawl nate tawh zong lei zawh hi lo hi.
Pilna a manphatna suangkhi le limlang tawh genteh theih hi lo a, pilna themkhat bek nangawn kep sangin manpha zaw lai hi.
Ethiopia gamah a piang topaz suangmanphate tawh tehtheih ding hi lo a, kham citak hoih pen tawh zong kiteh thei tuan lo hi.
“Tua ahihleh koi lai panin pilna hong piang ahi hiam? Thutheihna koi lai-ah om ahi hiam?
Nuntakna a nei sung pan a mu thei kuamah om lo a, a leeng thei vasate nangawn in mu thei lo uh hi.
Sihna le siatna nangawn in a thu hemzak bek ung, ci lai uh hi.
“Pasian bek in pilna lampi thei a, amah bek in a omna mun a thei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in leimong dong mu a, vantung nuai-ah a om na khempeuh a mu thei hi.
Pasian in huih a gik ding zah bawlin, tuipi a liatna ding zah a seh laitak,
guah zukna ding mun thu pia-in, khuaphialep in a zuih ding lampi bawlin a vaihawm laitak nangawnin,
amah in pilna mu-in a manphate entel a, amah in hoihsa ahih manin a kipsak hi.
“Tua ciangin amah in mihingte tungah thu genin, ‘Topa zahtakna, pilna hi a, siatna pelhna pen thutheihna hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Job in Nidanga a Nopsakna Phawkkik Tua ciangin Job in a thu genkik a,
“Ka nuntakna nidanga bang hikik henla, Pasian in kei hong et hun lai bang hong hikik leh ka ut hi.
Tua hun lai-in Pasian in kei hong ompih tawntung a, khuamial sungah ka pai laitakin khuavak hong pia hi.
Tua hun pen ka cihtheih hun laitak hi a, Pasian in ka innkuan a hong hut laitak hun ahi hi.
Tua hun lai-in Vanglian Pasian in kei hong ompih a, ka kimkotah ka tate a om uh hi.
Ka bawngte le ka keelte in nawi deih zahzah hong pia uh a, suang tam penna nangawnah ka oliv kungte hoih mahmah hi.
Khua sung upate a kikhop uh ciangin a kikhawm dingin kei ka pai ciangin
kei hong muh phetun khangnote in tutna hong awn uh a, kei hong zahtakna limun papite na ding uh hi.
Khua sung uliante a kiho na khawl pah uh a, a khut uh tawh a kam uh na hum uh hi.
Mi a thupi pente nangawn na gamdai pah uh a, kuamah pau loin na om uh hi.
“Ka thugen a za mi peuhmah in a hoih lamin na za uh a, a hong mu mi peuhmah in dik hong sa uh hi.
Mizawng ka theih peuhmah ka huh tawntung a, cih nading thei lo tagahte zong ka huh hi.
A lungkham a cimawhte in kei hong phat uh a, meigong numeite a lungnuamin ka omsak hi.
Thuman, puan bangin ka silh a, thuman in kei hong tuam hi. Thutang, puanpi-in ka silh a, thutang in kei hong tuam hi.
Mittaw mite adingin mittang ka hi a, khebai mite adingin khe ka hi hi.
Mizawngte adingin a pa uh ka hi a, lungkhamna a thuak, ka theih loh mite nangawn ka panpih tawntung hi.
Migilote’ gitlohna khempeuh ka susia gawp mang a, amau’ suk gawp mi khempeuh ka hon khia hi.
“Ka nuntak kum sehnel zahin a tam dingin ka ngaihsun a, lungnuam takin inn-ah a si dingin ka kilamen hi.
A zung in tui a ngah tawntung singkung tawh ka kibang a, daitui in a hiangte a nomsak singkung tawh ka kibang hi.
Mi khempeuh in kei hong phat tawntung uh a, ka tha a hat tawntung hi.
Mite in ka thugen ngai-in hong ngak dimdem uh a, kuamah pau hetloin limtakin hong ngai uh hi.
Thu ka gen khit ciangin a genthuah ding uh bangmah thei nawn lo uh a, ka thugente khempeuh hoihtakin na sang pah uh hi.
Lo khote in khuapi guah deih mahmahin a ngak bangin, ka thugente khempeuh hoihtakin na sang uh hi.
Itna tawh ka nuihsat ciangin amaute lungnuam mahmah uh a, ka mai a tai ciangin a maigumna uh a bei hi.
Amaute ukin a vai ding uh ka hawmsak a, kumpipa in a galkapte a makaih bangin ka makai a, a lungkham uh ciangin amaute ka hehnem hi.
A Lungkham Laitakin Job Thum “Ahi zongin tu-in, a pate uh kimanna a nei lo ka uite tawh tuu cing dingin a kuan dingin zong ka deih loh, kei sanga a khangno zawte in hong ciamnuih bawlta uh hi.
Amau’ hatna khempeuh tu-in bei khinta ahih manin, amau’ hatna kei adingin a kimanna om nawn lo hi.
Amaute zawng mahmahin gilkial uh ahih manin gamlak singzung keu peuh teep lel ding uh hi.
Amaute in singkungnote botin ne uh a, limna alna a nei lo poding zung nangawn a ne uh hi.
Gutate otkhai-in a kidelh khiat bangin mite lak panin amaute kihawl khia hi.
Amaute pen hawkguam sung, leihawm sung, luihawm le keenhawm sungah a ten uh a kul ahi hi.
Ganhing bangin gamlakah amaute ham uh a, sawlkawm nuai-ah kilomin a omkhawm uh hi.
Bangmahin a kimang lo hih bang misia honte, mite omna gam sung panin a kihawl khia hi.
Tu-in amaute in kei hong simmawh bawlin hong nuihsan uh a, amaute’ ciamnuihna bek ka suak khinta hi.
Amaute in kei hong kih uh a, kei tawh tehna-in amaute hoihlua kisa uh a, amaute in ka maitang nangawn cil hong phih vial uh hi.
Pasian in hong zawngkhalsak, hong cimawhsak ahih manin amaute in a ut utun kei hong bawlsia uh hi.
Amaute in hong sim gawpin, kei hong tai khiasak uh a, ka sih theih nadingin ka mai-ah na pang uh hi.
Ka suahtak theih nading lampi na khaktan uh a, kei suksiat ding hanciam uh a, amaute a kho ding kuamah om lo hi.
Kei ka bukna leihawmah amaute hong tuaksuk uh a, kei hong sucipsuk uh hi.
Launa tawh ka kidim a, ka cihtheihna khempeuh meii bangin a thengta hi.
“Tu-in a si ding ka hita a, ka gimna panin noptuam ngahna ding bangmah om nawn lo hi.
Zan thapai-in ka guh sung, ka tang sung khempeuh na a, a hong pet tawntung natna dai ngei peuhmah lo hi.
Pasian in ka puan ngawng pan kei hong manin ka puan tawh hong heekcip hi.
Buannawng ciim sungah kei hong lawn khia a, ninbulom bang lel ka hita hi.
“Pasian aw, nang kong sam a, na hong dawng ngei kei hi. Nang tungah thu kong ngen a, nong don het kei hi.
Kei tungah nong gilo mahmah a, nong hih theih zahin kei na hong bawlsia hi.
Huih lakah na hong lawn a, huih na hong leensak a, huihpi in hong lawnsuk hong lawnto hi.
Mi khempeuh adingin seh kholhin a kikoihsa sihna-ah a hong paipih na hihna ka thei hi.
Na hehpih ding a hong thum ding cih lohbuang, bangmah dang a hih thei nawn lo misia pa, bang hangin su gawp na hi hiam?
A lungkham mite tawh kei kap khawmin, a cimawh mite dahpih hi lo ka hi hiam?
Lungdamna le khuavakna ka lamet laitakin, lungkhamna le khuamialna hong tung zawsop hi.
Lunggimna le natna in kei hong su gawp a, gimna ka thuak ding cih loh bangmah dang om nawn lo hi.
Lungkham sinkhamin ka om a, mihon lakah dingin huhna ka ngen hi.
Kei pen gamkhing sunga a om ngia le vasa-kalaohte tawh kipawlin a kikhawl ka hita hi.
Ka vun vomin dulh khia a, ka pumtangin ka ci sa gawp hi.
Nidangin lungdamna la a kisa ka zakna munah tu-in thumna le kahna aw bek ka za ta hi.
“Lunggulhna tawh nungak khatpeuh ka et ngei loh nading, kiciamna ka bawlkhin hi.
Vanglian Pasian in eite bang hong cih a, mihingte’ gamtatna bangci thuhkik ahi hiam?
A man loin a gamtate tungah siatna le gimna a tungsak hi.
Pasian in ka gamtatna khempeuh thei a, ka kalsuanna khempeuh a hong mu hi.
“Ka gitloh gamtat ngei lohna, kuamah ka khem ngei het lohna, ka gamtat hoihna thute-ah ka kiciam ngam hi.
Pasian in tawikhaina manah hong tawikhai hen; ka paubaan het lohna hong mu ding hi.
Lampi man panin ka pial a, siatna lam ka zuih a, ka khut tungah mawhna a baan taak leh
ka khawhsa ante midangte’ nek suak henla, ka an neih khempeuh mai mang tahen.
“Ka veengte’ zi zawlmitin, a kong gei-ah ngakin ka buk taak leh
ka it ka zi in midangte’ an suksak henla, midangte’ ang-ah lum tahen.
(Tua bang mawhna pen a siahuai hi a, sihna a thuak ding ahi hi.
Ka neih khempeuh a kaangtum thei mei husia tawh a kibang ahi hi.
“Ka nasemte khat peuhpeuh kei tungah hong phun ciangin, ama thu ngai-in limtakin ka bawl hi.
Tuaci kei leng, Pasian’ mai mu ngam ding ka hi hiam? Keima thu a khen dingin Pasian hong pai ciangin bang gen mawk ding ka hi hiam?
Kei a hong piangsak Pasian mah in keima nasemte zong a piangsak ahi hi.
“Mizawngte ka huh ding ka mangngilh ngei kei a, meigong numeite ka guaksuaksak ngei kei hi.
Keimah in an ne napi-in, tagahte a gilkialin ka koihkhong ngei kei hi.
Ka khang tawntungin tua bangte ka en tawntung hi.
“Mi a cimawh, puan silh ding a lei zo lo, a zawng lua ka muh ciangin,
ka tuuhon panin ka ngah tuumul puan kibawl ka pia hi. Amah in zong a lungsim neih khempeuh tawh kei a hong phat hi.
“Zum thukhenna-ah zo-na ning cih ngaihsutna tawh tagah khatpeuh ka khem taak leh,
ka khutte buisum henla, ka liang bul panin kilong khia tahen.
Pasian’ gimpiak ding kihta ka hih manin, tua bang peuhmah ka gamta ngei kei ding hi.
“Leitung hauhna muan le suanin ka nei ngei kei a,
ka hauhna zong ka kisaktheihpih ngei kei hi.
A taang mahmah ni ahi a, a hoih mahmah kha ahi zongin, cikmahin ka bia ngei kei hi.
Tuate pahtawina le zahtakna limin ka khut lapna tawh cikmah hunin ka khial ngei het kei hi.
Tua bang mawhna in sihna a thuak ding hi a, tua bang mawhna pen Vanglian Pasian nialna ahi hi.
“Ka galte’n gim a thuak teh ka kipak ngei kei a, haksatna a tuah uh teh ka lungdam ngei kei hi.
A sih ding uh deihna tawh ka samsia ngei kei hi.
Zin le leengte limtakin ka do tawntungna thu ka na a hong sepsak mi khempeuh in a thei uh hi.
Khualzin mi khempeuh ka inn-ah ka tungsak tawntung a, kongzing lakah amaute ka lumsak ngei kei hi.
Midangte in a mawhnate uh pulak loin imcip uh a, ahih hangin keima mawhna cikmahin ka im ngei kei hi.
Midangte’ hong kampau ding kihtakin ka nei ngei kei hi. Amau’ hong simmawh ding ka kihtakna hangin pau loin ka om ngei kei a, ka bucip ngei kei hi.

“Ka thugente kuamah in na ngai lo ding ahi hiam? Ka gen thu khempeuh man hi, ci-in ka kiciam hi. Vanglian Pasian in kei hong dawng tahen. “Ka langte in kei hong mawhsakna thute ka tawi theih dingin lai sungah a kigelh hileh
tua mawhsaknate kisialhna tawh ka ngawngah ka ok dinga, mi khempeuh in a muh dingin ka sangsak ding hi.
Ka gamtatna khempeuh Pasian kiangah ka gen dinga, ama muhna-ah lungdamin kihihsakna tawh ka om ding hi.
“Ka khawh leitang ka guk ahih a, a nei taktak pa’ tung pan ka suh ahih a,
tua leitang a piang ante ka nek a, tua lo a khote a puksi-in ka omsak taak leh,
tua lo sungah mangbuh le mangbuh ham tangin kiak le ling po tahen,” a ci hi.
Job a mahmah dik kisa tawntung ahih manin hih mihing thumte in Job’ thugente dawn ding ngaihsun nawn lo uh hi.
Ahi zongin a thu a za, Ram minam, Buz-te beh, Barakhel’ tapa Elihu a heh hong suak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Job amah kidiksakin Pasian mawhsak zawsop hi.
Job’ lawm thumte tungah zong a heh suak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Job a dawnna ding uh thei lo uh ahih manin Pasian a khial tawh hong kibang hi.
Elihu ahihleh amaute lak panin a khangno pen ahih manin adangte a pau kim khit mateng bangmah pau loin a om hi.
Ahi zongin hih mihing thumte in Job a dawn theih loh a muh ciangin a hehna thuakzo nawn lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Buz-te beh Barakhel’ tapa Elihu in thu gen ding hong kipan a, “Kei a khangno lai hi-in, note a khangham na hih manun, ka ngaihsutna note lakah kong gen ngam kei hi.
No a khangham zawte in thu a gen ding kilawm hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Ahi zongin mihingte tungah a hong tung pilna pen Vanglian Pasian’ kha in a hong piak ahi hi.
Khanghamna in mi pilsak lo a, thuman zong theisak tuan lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in keima thugen dingte nong ngaih ding uh ka deih hi. Keima ngaihsutna hong gensak dih un.
“Thu na gengen laitakun lungduai takin kong ngaingai a, na thugen dingte uh na zonzon laitakun ka hong ngak hithiat hi.
Limtakin kong ngai a, na cihmawhna uh ka thei hi. Job’ thugente a man lohna na gentel thei kei uh hi.
Bang hangin pilna a nei-in kigen thei ding na hi uh hiam? Note in lel na hih manun Pasian in Job dawng ding hi.
Job in note tungah thu tampi hong gen a, kei tungah hong gen lo hi. Ahi zongin note’ dawn bangin ka dawng ngei kei ding hi.
“Job aw, hih mite in nang hong lel uh a, nang hong dawnna ding bangmah thei lo uh hi.
Amaute pau loin a om ciangun kei zong pau loin ngak lailai ding ka hi hiam? Amaute in a gen ding uh thei nawn loin ommawk uh hi.
Tu petpetin kei zong nang kong dawng dinga, keima ngaihsutnate ka hong pulak ding hi.
Thu a gen dingin kha in kei hong sawl a, tu taktak ciangin ka kam ka ki-ip zo nawn het kei hi.
Thugen theih nading hun a nei lo hi leng, leenggahzu thak a kithun leenggahzu um bangin ka puakkham ding hi.
Ka thuakzo nawnkei a, ka gen khia ta ding hi.
Hih ka thugenna-ah kuamah ka pawlpih kei dinga, kuamah phattuam ka nei kei ding hi.
Kuamah ka mawkphat thei kei hi. Tuaci mawkphat leng Pasian in kei hong su mang pak ding hi.
“Job aw, tu-in ka thugen khempeuh limtakin hong ngai in.
Ka lungsim sunga om thute a hong gen ding ka hi hi.
Ka gen khempeuh lungsim takpi tawh ka gen hi a, a man thu a gen ka hi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ kha in kei hong sawl a, Vanglianpa in kei tungah nuntakna hu hong pia hi.
“Na hong dawn theih leh limtakin hong dawng in. Na hong seelna ding limtakin kiging in.
Job aw, nang le kei, Pasian’ hong muhna-ah a kibang ihi a, i nih tuakin leivui pan a piang ihi hi.
Tua ahih manin kei nong kihtakna ding bangmah thu om lo a, nang ka hong zawhthawh bawl gawp nading zong bangmah thu om tuan lo hi.
“Keima zakin thu na gen khin a, na thugente ka za khin hi.
Nang in, ‘Kei ka mawh kei a, ka gamta khial kei hi. Ka paubaang kei a, mawhna ka sukha kei hi.
Pasian in kei hong sukna ding thu zongzong a, gal bangin kei hong bawl hi.
Amah in ka khe kolbulh a ka gamtatna khempeuh hong encik hi,’ na cihna ka za hi.
“Ahih hangin, Job aw, nangmah na khial zaw hi. Pasian pen mihing sangin lian zaw hi.
Pasian in mihingte’ phunna thudon ngei lo hi, ci-in thugenna tawh bang hangin Pasian mawhsak na hi hiam?
Pasian in a lam tuamtuamin thu hong gengen napi-in, ama thugente khempeuh kuamah in thudon lo hi.
Zanin mite a ihmut ciangin, mang le maangmuhna sungah Pasian in thu a gen hi.
Pasian in thu hong gen a, ama hilhkholhna hangin mite lau mahmah uh hi.
Mite in khialhna a bawl nawn lohna ding, mi kiphasakte a suahkhak loh nading, Pasian in a deihna hangin mite kiangah thu a gen hi.
Pasian in mihingte siatna thuaksak lo a, sih nading panin amaute a hon khia hi.
Pasian in cinatsakna tawh mihingte thuhilh a, a pumpi khempeuh natna tawh a kidimsak hi.
Cina pa in an ne zo lo a, an lim pen nangawn a kih tha a suak hi.
A ci a sa khempeuh kiam a, a guh guak bekin a om hi.
A beina ding a nai hita a, misi gam a zuan ding hita hi.
“Mihingte’ tavuan a phawksak, Pasian’ vantungmi tul tampite lak panin vantungmi khat amah a huh dingin hong pai khia ding hi.
Vantungmi in amah a hehpihna hangin, ‘Amah suaktasak in. Misite gamah paisak kei in. Amah tatkhiatna ding hih lai-ah om hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Tua ciangin ama pumpi khangnosuakkikin, a thahat pen hun laitak a bangkik ding hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama thungetna pia dinga, amah in lungdamna tawh Pasian bia dinga, Pasian in ama adingin thu a hoih lamin a heisakkik ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mihonpite’ zakna-ah, ‘Kei ka khial khin hi. A manin ka gamta kei a, ahi zongin Pasian in kei hong suaktasak hi.
Misite’ gam sung ka tunna ding panin amah in kei hong kem a, tu-in kei ka nungta lai hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Pasian in hih thute khempeuh mihingte tungah hong hihkik zelzel a,
sih nading panin honkhiakik zelin nuntak nuam a piakik hi.
“Job aw, ka thugente limtakin hong ngai in. Gamdai-in om inla, kei thu hong gensak in.
Ahi zongin gennop mahmah na neih leh hong gen in; bang hang hiam cih leh midik na hih ding ka hong deihsak hi.
Ahi zongin gennop velvel na neih khol kei leh keima thugen hong ngai in. Mipil na hih theih nading thu kong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elihu in,
“No a pilin a kinei mite aw, ka thugente ciamteh un. Thu thei a a kinei mite aw, ka thugente ngai un.
An na ciap uh ciangin a lim a lim lo na thei uh hi. Thu kigen na zak uh ciangin pil kampau le hai kampau na khen thei uh hi.
Thuman bang hiam cih teng khia ni. Thuhoih bang hiam cih mu khia ni.
Job in, ‘Kei ka dik hi. Pasian in kei a thumanin hong seh nuam lo hi.
Kei a thuman hinapi zuauthu genin hong seh hi. Kei a khial hi lo napi gim thuakin ka cimawh hi,’ a ci hi.
“Hih Job tawh a kibang mi na mu ngei uh hiam? Amah in Pasian zahtakna lim bangmah nei hetlo hi.
Amah in migilote tawh kikholh nuam sa mahmah a, mawhnei mite tawh a vak kawikawi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, ‘Pasian’ deihna i zuih hangin phattuamna bangmah om lo hi,’ ci hi.
“Ahi zongin thu ngaihsun thei a kinei note khempeuh in ka thugenna hong ngai un. Pasian a giloin gamta ngei dinga, Vanglianpa in a man loin sem ngei ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in a gamtatna tawh kizui-in mite tungah thaman pia a, a thuak dingun a kilawm bangin gim a pia hi.
A taktakin ci lehang, Pasian a man loin gamta ngei lo a, thutang kimlai a khialin heisak lo hi.
Pasian in ama vangliatna mi khatpeuh tung panin a ngah ahi hiam? Leitung khempeuh a uk dingin mi khatpeuh in amah a koih ahi hiam?
Pasian in ama ngaihsutna kheel henla, nuntakna hu a dokkik hileh
nuntakna a nei khempeuh si pah ding uh a, mihing khempeuh leivui suakkik ding uh hi.
“Job aw, mipil-a kinei na hih leh ka thugente hong ngai in.
Vanglianpa in thutang a deih lo dingin ngaihsun na hi hiam? Nang in a thuman Pasian mawhsak na hi hiam?
Kumpite le uliante bangmahin kimang loin a gitloh uh ciangin, amaute a mawhsak ngam pa Pasian bek ahi hi.
Pasian pen mi khempeuh a hong piangsak pa hi a, amah in uliante panpih tuan nei lo a, mizawngte sangin mihaute thupi ngaihsut zaw tuan lo hi.
Mihingte ahihleh zan khat thu-in sipak thei hi. Pasian in mite satpukin sisak thei a, nakpitakin hih kul loin mi thahat pente zong a that thei hi.
Pasian in mihingte’ gamtatna khempeuh hong encik a, i kalsuanna themno dongin hong mu khin hi.
Gamtatsia mite a buk theih nadingun a seelcip zo ding, khuamial khuazing koimahah om lo hi.
Pasian’ mai-ah mihingte in thukhenna a thuak ni ding, a kiseh hun omtuam lo hi.
Amah in a thu kan kul loin mi vangliante su gawp a, amaute’ tang dingin midangte a koih hi.
Amah in amaute’ gamtatnate a vekpi-in thei ahih manin zan khat thu-in amaute lumletin a susia gawp hi.
Pasian in mi khempeuh’ muhin mawhneite gim a pia hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ama thu mang nawn lo uh a, a thupiakte khempeuh don nawn lo uh hi.
Amaute in mizawngte kapsak gawp uh a, mizawngte’ huh ngetna awging Pasian in a za hi.
“Pasian in bangmah hih het kei taleh zong, kuamah in Pasian mawhsak thei lo ding hi. Amah in hong maingat hetkei taleh zong, kuamah in bangmah cih thei tuan lo ding hi.
Migilote hong uksak taleh zong, tua panin suahtakna ding kuamah in vaihawm zo lo ding hi.
“Job aw, Pasian’ tungah na khialhnate pulakin na khialh nawn loh nading thu ciam nai lo na hi hiam?
Pasian in na khialhnate a hong lahna ding ngenin, na gamtatsiat nawn loh nading ut nai na hi hiam?

Pasian nial na hih manin amah in nangma utna a bang hangin hong hihsak ding ahi hiam? Hih thu pen kei’ ngaihsut ding hi loin, nangma khensat ding ahi hi. Tu-in nangma ngaihsutna a kician takin hong gen in.
“Thu a ngaihsun theite in hih thu man hi, hong cihpih ding uh a, ka thugenna a za mipil peuhmahte in,
‘Thu a thei lopi-in Job in thu gen a, a thugen peuhmah a khiatna nei om lo hi.
Job’ thugente khempeuh ngaihsun le-uhcin, migilo bangin a kampauna na thei ding uh hi.
Amah a khialhna khawl nuam hetlo a, eite khempeuh’ mai-ah Pasian simmawhin zahpih bawl gawp hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elihu mah in,
“Job aw, Pasian’ muhna-ah ka paubaang kei hi, na cih ding kilawm lo hi.
Pasian kiangah, ka khialh hangin bang phamawh sa na hi hiam? Khialhna ka gamtat loh manin bangmah phattuamna ka ngah kei hi, na cih ding kilawm lo hi.
Nang le na lawmte tungah thu kong gen ding hi.
“Vantung ento dih un. Meiite bangzah takin sang omto ahi hiam?
Mawhna na gamtat manin, Pasian bangmah sukha lo hi. Tampi tak khial talecin zong amah sukha tuan ahi hiam?
Na thumanna hangin Pasian in phattuamna ngah ahi hiam? Pasian in nang kiang panin bangmah deih lo hi.
Na khialhna hangin na mipihte bek in thuak a, na gamtat hoihna hangin na mipihte bek in phattuamna ngah hi.
“Mite in gim a thuak ciangin tau uh a, amaute a hon khia dingin midang khatpeuh a sam uh hi.
Lungzin hun laitakin thahatna a pia, amaute a Piangsak Pasian’ lam nga lo uh hi.
Eite mipilin a hong bawl, ganhingte le vasate sangin a pil zaw-in a hong bawl Pasian’ lam nga lo uh hi.
Amaute migilo mi kihisakte ahih manun, huh ding a nget hangun Pasian in pia lo hi.
Ngetnget, gengen, a phattuamna bangmah om lo hi. Vanglian Pasian in na mu lo, na ngai lo hi.
“Job aw, nangmah in, ‘Pasian ka mu thei kei a, ahi zongin ka thu ama khut sungah om a, lungduai takin ka ngak niloh hi,’ na ci hi.
Pasian in kuamah gim pia lo a, khialhna zong thupi ngaihsut lo hi, ci-in na ngaihsun hi.
Tua banga kam na paupau a mawknapi hi a, na gen mel zong a thei het lo na hihna thu a hong kilangsak na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Elihu in a thugen zomlai a,
“Lungduai takin tawmkhat hong ngai lai in. Pasian’ tangin ka gen ding thu pawlkhat omlai hi.
Kei a hong Piangsak Pasian thuman hi, ci-in kong lah nadingin thu tampi tak kaikhawmin kong gen ding hi.
Ka thugente khempeuh a khial om hetlo a, na mai-ah thugenpa pen mipil khat ahi hi.
“Pasian a thahat mahmah hi napi-in, kuamah simmawh lo hi. Amah in a theih loh bangmah om lo hi.
Amah in mimawhte daupaisak lo a, a zawng gimna a thuakte tungah a manin a gamta hi.
Amah in thuman mite hu a, kumpi ukna za zong pia a, pahtawina lianpi a ngahsak tawntung hi.
Ahi zongin mite sikkol kibulh a, a gamtatnasate hangin gimna a thuak uhleh,
Pasian in amau’ mawhna le a kiphatsaknate uh a lak khia ahi hi.
A gamtatsiatna panun a khawl nadingun amau’ bil sungah thu a gengen hi.
Amaute in Pasian’ thu mangin ama na sem le-uh amaute nuamsa-in a khan uh a sau hi.
Ahi zongin ama thu mang kei le-uh, namsau tawh si ding uh a, misite’ gam zuan ding uh hi.
“Migilote a hehin nitum uh a, gimna a thuak ciang nangawnun ama huh ding ngen lo uh hi.
Amaute khansih uh a, a zumhuaipi-in a bei uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in gimna tawh mite thuhilh a, khua a phawk theih nadingun gimna a zang ahi hi.
Pasian in lungkhamna panin nang hong pai khiatpihin, lungnuam takin nang hong omsak a, na sabuai tungah anlim nono kilui venvan hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in na ngah dinga kilawm gimna a thuakta na hi hi.
Sumgolh’ khemsa-in gamta kei inla, leitung nate’ bawlin lam kipialsak kei in.
Huh ding na nget hangin a phattuamna om nawn lo a, na hauhna na liatna in hong huh thei nawn lo hi.
Mihingte a bei mang hun ding, zan khuamial hong tun hun ding lunggulh kei in.
Siatna lamah na kihei khak lohna ding limtakin kidawm in. Na siat khak loh nadingin gimna hong kithuaksak ahi hi.
“Pasian a vangliat mahmahna limtakin phawktel in. Pasian pen sia khempeuh lakah sia lian pen ahi hi.
Pasian’ gamtatzia ding kuamah in sawl thei lo a, Pasian gamtatsia hi, ci-in kuamah in zong mawhsak zo lo hi.
Pasian a nasepna hangin mi khempeuh in a phat tawntung mah bangin nang zong amah phat zaw in.
Mi khempeuh in Pasian’ sepsate mu uh a, theikim zo lo uh ahih manin lamdang a sa uh hi.
Pasian a liatna a kicingin i thei zo kei a, ama kum phazah zong i sim zo kei hi.
“Amah in tuipi panin tuite lato a, tua a lak tuite guahtui-in a bawl hi.
Amah in meii sung panin guah piangsak a, mihing khempeuh adingin guah a zusak hi.
Meiite a pai henhanna hitaleh, vanah van a ginna hitaleh kuamah in thei zo lo hi.
Amah in vantungah khua phiasak a, ahi zongin tuipi thuk sung a mialsak hi.
Amah in tu-a bangin mihingte hong vak a, annek ding tampi tak a hong pia ahi hi.
Amah in keek thu pia a, a kap nop penpen a kha dingin a sawl hi.
Amah a heh ciangin huihpi sam a, vanging pen ama hong pai nading a kitheihna ahi hi.
“Hih huihpi in ka dip hong kuasak a, ka dip vana khai hong bangsak hi.
Ama kam panin a hong ging khia hih vanging Pasian’ pauna awging, limtakin ngai in.
Amah in vanah khua phiasak a, leimong khat pan mong khat dong a taan hi.
Tua ciangin a vanglian vanging, ama awging hong kiza a, tua hun sungteng mahin khua a phiaphia hi.
Pasian’ sawlna tawh na lamdangpipi piang a, eite’ theih zawh loh thute a hong piang hi.
Amah in leitungah vuk a kia dingin sawl a, guah tampi tak a zusak hi.
Amah in mihingte a nasep uh khawlsak a, amah a gamtang ahihna a kilangsak hi.
Gamsate in a lupna ngei delh uh a, a kua sungah bucip uh hi.
Leitaw lam panin guahpi hong zu a, leilu lam panin huihpi hong nung hi.
Pasian’ husanna in tuite khalsak a, tui lianpite khalin sik bangin a sak hi.
Amah in meiipi nomsak a, meiipi in khua a phiasak hi.
Pasian’ deihna zui-in a kikhin kawikawi hi. Leitung mun khempeuh ah pai-in, Pasian’ sawl teng a sem uh hi.
Pasian in mihingte gim a piakna ding ahi a, pahtakna a lahna ding ahi zongin, leitungah tu-a bangin a piangsak hi.
“Job aw, tawlkhat khawlin ngai inla, Pasian’ bawlsa na lamdangte ngaihsun dih in.
Pasian in thu pia a, meii lak panin khua a phiatsak theihna na thei hiam?
Bangmah in a len lopi-in vantungah meii a omsak theihna, a lamdang hih ama siamna na thei hiam?
Leitaw lam huihpi nasia takin a nun laitakin na puan sungah khua-ul kai-in na om hi.
Limlang bangin a sak mahmah van peekpi ama hih bangin zal zo na hi hiam?
Pasian kiangah ka gen ding uh hong hilh in. A hawmpi-in ka om uh a, ka gen ding uh om lo hi.
Pasian tawh kiho theih nading ka ngen kei ding hi. Kei hong suksiat nadingin kei kipia ding ka hi hiam?
“Tawlkhat sung khuavak kimu vet lo a, guah le meii in a liah hi. Tua ciangin huih hong nungin tuate khempeuh a mutsiang hi.
Kham mel khuavak leilu lam pan hong taang a, Pasian’ minthanna pen zahtakna tawh kidimsak hi.
Pasian vanglian mahmah a, eite’ theih zawh hi lo hi. Amah thuman mahmah a, thutang takin na a sem hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khempeuh in amah a zahtakna, mipil a kisate amah in a don lohna, lamdangsak ding hi lo hi.” a ci hi.
Job in Thu a Theih loh lam Topa in Phawksak Tua ciangin huihpi lak panin Topa in Job tungah thu hong gen a,
“Kei’ pilna a nial dingin nang kua na hi hiam? Thu na theih lohlam a kilangsak na hi bek hi.
Kipasalsakin dingto inla, kong thudot dingte hong dawng in.
Leitung ka bawl laitakin nang om na hi hiam? Thei kisa na hih leh tua thu hong gen in.
Bangcia-in golsak ding cih kua in seh ahi hiam? Kua in a golna ding zah khau khai ahi hiam? Hihte khempeuh thei kisa na hi hiam?
Leitung a pua khuampite bang tungah kiphut ahi hiam? Kua in leitung a bulpi phut ahi hiam?
Tua ni-in zingsang aksite in la sa khawm uh a, Pasian’ tapate lungdamin a kiko uh hi.
“Lei sung panin tuipi hong suahkhiat laitakin, tua tuipi a khaktan ding kongpi kua in na khak ahi hiam?
Meii tawh tuipi a tuamcip pa, khuamial tawh a vialcip pa keimah ka hi hi.
Tuipi gamgi ding ciamteh sakin, ama huangsung ding bekah ka omsak hi.
Tuipi kiangah, ‘Hih ciang bek na pai dinga, hih banah na kin nawn kei ding hi. Na tuihualte hih ciang bek pai ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Job aw, nangmah in, ‘Tuni-in khua vak in, ’ ci-in na nuntak sung tawntung thu pia ngei na hi hiam?
Zing khuavak in leitung a mongin manin, a kawma bu migilote a sinkhiat ding, thu pia thei ngei na hi hiam?
Khuavak in mualleguamte kilangkhiasak a, puan a tonin a kikoih tawh a kibatna a kilangsak hi.
Migilote adingin sun khuavak taanglua a, siatna a gamtatna ding uh a khamcip hi.
“Tuipi sungtawng tuinakah pai ngei na hi hiam? Tuipi nuai lei tam tungah lam pai ngei na hi hiam?
Misite’ gam khuamial kongkhakpi, mi khatpeuh in nang hong lak ngei ahi hiam?
Leitung bangcia lian ding cih na thei hiam? Hih thute thei na hih leh hong dawng in.
“Leitung khuavak hong kipatkhiatna mun ahi a, leitung khuamial hong kipatna mun ahi zongin, thei na hi hiam?
Nangmah in amau’ omna mun ciang dong va thei a, tua ciang dongah va khakik ngei na hi hiam?
Na nuntakna sawtta a, leitung a pianin nang suakkhin na hih teh tua thute khempeuh thei mah ni teh!
“Vuk a kikoihna munah nang va lut ngei a, gial a kikhopna mun va mu ngei na hi hiam?
Tuate, lungkham huna ding, gal om hun cianga dingin ka koihcing ahi hi.
Leitung nitaang a hong suah khiatna mun ahi a, nisuahna huihpi hong kipatna mun ahi zongin, va tung ngei na hi hiam?
“Kua in guahzukna ding tui lampi bawlsak a, keek’ lampi ding sialsak ahi hiam?
Mihing om lohna mun leilakah, kua in guah zusak ahi hiam?
Lopate a po theih nadingin lei keu-in a sak bekbakte kua in tui buak ahi hiam?
Guah in pa nei ahi hiam? Daitui in pa nei ahi hiam?
Kua’ sung panin tuikhal hong piang khia a, kua’ sung panin vana vukte hong suak ahi hiam?
Tua tuite suang bangin sak a, tuipi tui teng khalcip hi.
“Vana om Seguk henkop thei a, Zawlzawng a kikhihna phel thei na hi hiam?
Ama hunhunin aksite lam lak thei a, Khawlei-uikai a pai nading lampi lak thei na hi hiam?
Vana om nate’ zuih ding ngeina bawlsak thei a, lei-a om nate’ zuih ding ngeina bawl thei na hi hiam?
“Vana om meiite in guah hong zuksak nading nangmah in sawl na hi hiam?
‘Khua phia in,’ ci-in thu pia lecin, ‘Nong sawl bangin phia ning,’ hong ci ding ahi hiam?
Nail gun a khan ding a thei gun vapite kua in hilh a, guahzuk ding a thei akluite, kua in hilh ahi hiam?
Leivuite khalcipin, leitang a sak ciangin, meiite thu pia-in vana tuibemte a hong dingin kua in pilna nei ahi hiam?
“Humpinelkai le a note leihawm sungah bu-in, a kua sung uhah lumin ngakin a om laitakun, a an ding uh zonsak thei a, a note’ gilkialna vahsak thei na hi hiam?
Va-akte a gilkialin leng kawikawi-in, a note in an duhin kei tungah hong nget ciangun, tua va-akte an a piapa kua ahi hiam?
“Sathakte a suah hun ding thei ngei na hi hiam? Sakhite a suah laitakin nau va dom ngei na hi hiam?
Tuate a ni ciamtehin, a suah hun ding uh thei na hi hiam?
A no suak dingin lei-ah a bawhsuk hun laitak thei na hi hiam?
A note gamlakah khangin, a nute kiang pan pai khia-in ciahkik nawn lo uh hi.
“Kua in gam-late tungah suahtakna pia ahi hiam? Kua in khahin a ut utin vaksak ahi hiam?
Amau’ om nadingin gamlak ka pia a, bangmah a po zawh lohna zanglei-ah ka tengsak hi.
Gamlumna mun khuapite tawh a kigamla-ah om uh a, kuamah in zualsak zo lo a, na semsak zo lo uh hi.
Mualte tungah an zongin vak kawikawi uh a, nektheih ding singkung lopa a hing peuhpeuh zuan kawikawi uh hi.
“Gambawngtal in nangma na hong sem ding ahi hiam? Na ganbukah gambawngtal hong giak nuam ding ahi hiam?
Nangmah in khauhual tawh khih zo dinga, na lo ah na lokhawhna leeng kaisak zo ding na hi hiam?
Nasem dingin a hat mahmah hangin, nangma na hong sepsak dingin lamen ngam na hi hiam?
Lo a na anpiangte hong kaihkhop sakin, na ancilna-ah an hong khawm dingin um na hi hiam?
“Vasa-kalaohte in a kha uh bangzah takin nawh zap thei ahi hiam! Ahi zongin gun vapi bangin vasa-kalaoh leng thei lo hi.
Vasa-kalaoh in leilakah a tui nusia a, a tuite a luumsak dingin leilak a ap hi.
Mi khatpeuh in a khe tawh a tuite a sikkhap khak ding, gamsa khatpeuh in a sikkhap khak ding, phawk khol lo hi.
A tuite ama a’ bangin ngaihsun khol lo a, ka gimnate a mawkna suakkha ding hi, ci-in lunghimawh lo hi.
Amah a hai-in a bawlpa ama tungah pilna a guan lopa keimah ka hi hi.
Ahi zongin a tai ciangin sakol sangin hat zaw hi.
“Job aw, sakolte a hatsak pa nang na hi hiam? Sakol zaangmul a posak pa nang na hi hiam?
Sakolte kauphe bangin diangsak thei-in, mite’ kihtak dingin phitsak thei na hi hiam?
Amaute in lawpna tawh a khe-un lei khuat uh a, a thaneih khempeuh uh tawh gal sungah a diang uh hi.
Amaute in launa mel bangmah thei lo uh a, namsau kihta-in nungkik cih zong om lo hi.
Amaute’ tungah a tuang mite’ galhiam, lum le teite a tee zalzal hi.
Lawp mahmahna tawh sakolte in mainawt uh a, peengkul a kitum ciangin omkhong thei lo uh hi.
Peengkul a kitum ciangin ham hathat uh a, gal mai a tun ma-un gal gimnam za uh a, galkapmaangte’ thupiakna awging a za uh hi.
“Simbung in a kha zalin leitaw lamah a leentheih nading nangma kiang panin hong sin ahi hiam?
Muvanlai in sang leenin mualtungah bu a tomna ding nang’ thupiakna hong ngak ahi hiam?
Suangpi dawnah bu bawl a, suangheeng kawmte phualpi-in nei hi.
Tua lai mun panin khuadak kawikawi a, manin a nek ding an a gal et hi.
Gan sihna kimkotah musanete kikhawm uh a, a note in sasi a dawn uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Job kiangah,
“Job aw, nangmah in Vanglian Pasian nong dem hi. Tu-in khawl ding na hiam, ahih kei leh keima thugen nong dawng ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Topa aw, ka haipau kha hi. Hong bangci dawn theih ding ka hi hiam? Tu a kipanin ka pau nawn kei ding hi.
Ka gen dinga kilawm zahval genkha ka hih manin, tu a kipanin ka pau nawn het kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Pasian’ Vangliatna a Kilatna
Tua ciangin huihpi sung panin Topa in Job tungah thu genkik a,
“Kipasalsakin dingto inla, ka thudotnate hong dawng in.
Kei a thutang loin hong seh a, nang thutang kisa-in kei hong mawhsak na hi hiam?
Kei zahin nang hat na hi hiam? Kei’ awging zahin nang a’ ging zo ding ahi hiam?
Na ngap nakleh na minthanna ding le na kihihsak theih nadingin tu-in hong kipan inla, minthanna le minliatna ngah ta in.
A kiphasak mite en inla, na hehna tawh amaute niamkhiat gawp in.
Mi kiphasakte en inla, amaute niamkhiat gawp in. Migilote khempeuh a omna mun munah tuancil in.
Amaute khempeuh lei sungah phumcip inla, misite’ gam sungah amaute khihcip in.
Tua bangin na hihzawh nakleh nang a hong phat masa pen pa, nang a gualzo pa na hihna thu a hong phawk masa pen pa ka hi ding hi.
“Tui-sakol ganhing golpi ngaihsun dih in. Amah le nang a piangsak pa keimah ka hi hi. Amah in bawngtal bangin lopa bek mah ne a,
ahi zongin ama pum sungah bangzah hatna om a, bangzahta-in a sazang khauh ahi hiam?
Ama mei, taamtak sing bangin khauhin tal po veva a, a khe-a a sazangte hat pha mahmah hi.
Ama guhte sumngo bangin khauh a, ama khete sikzawl bangin a khauh hi.
“Ganhing khempeuh lak pan a lamdang pen hi a, amah a Piangsak pa bek mah in amah a zozo ahi hi.
Gamsate omna mual tung panin ama an ding lopa kipuak hi.
Amah lingkung nuai-ah lum a, nawng sunga pumpeeng lakah a bu hi.
Lingkungte le lui gei-a gialhek kungte in ama ading niliim piangsak hi.
Amah in gun tuikhangte kihta het lo a, tuikhang in ama maitang a nawk gawp hangin nuamtakin om thei veve hi.
Kua in ama mit tawsakin man zo ding ahi hiam? Kua in a nakpheh-ah khau vawh zo ding ahi hiam?
“Ngasa siahna sikkawi tawh Awle man zo dinga, khauhual khat tawh a leii hen zo ding na hi hiam?
A nakpheh-ah khau vawh zo dinga, a khaguh-ah sikkawi bulh zo ding na hiam?
Amah in na khahna ding hong thum dinga, na hehpihna ding hong ngen ding ahi hiam?
Na sila ahi tawntung dingin nangma tungah thu hong ciam ding ahi hiam?
Na nasem numeite na mawlpih bangin mawlpih zo dinga, vasa khawi bangin bawl zo ding na hi hiam?
Ngasa bengte in lei dingin hong deek dinga, sa zuakte in zuak dingin a sa sem ding ahi hiam?
Ngasa khawhna teipi tawh a vun khawhlet zo dinga, teipi lingnei tawh a lutang khawhlet zo ding na hi hiam?
Khatvei sukhakhin lecin na hihkik nawn kei dinga, tua na sukkhakna thu na mangngilh nawn kei ding hi.
“Awle a mu mi peuhmah lau-in lei-ah a puk uh hi.
Awle a heh ciangin kihtakhuai mahmah a, ama omna mai-ah kuamah om ngam lo hi.
Leitung a om mihingte lakah Awle a suk manin a sihlawh lo kua om ahi hiam?
“Awle khete, a guh a taang, a thahatna ziate gen loin ka om thei kei hi.
Kua in ama puan tungnung hawkkhiatsak zo a, a sik puanpi sunlet zo ahi hiam?
A kihtakhuai a hate a kam sungah om ahih manin, kua in ama kam phensak ngam ahi hiam?
A nungzang sukah a lipte lum bangin kithuapsuk cinten a, suang bangin sakin kimatcip bikbek ciat hi.
Tua lipte khatlekhat kithuapcip bikbek ahih manin, khatlekhat kikalah huih nangawn thawl zo lo hi.
Tuate kinak mat lua ahih manin, bangmah in phel khia zo lo hi.
Amah a hetchiai ciangin mei-ek bangin taang zaizai a, a mittangte nisuak bangin a taang hi.
A kam panin mei kuang khia a, mei-ek leeng khia zaizai hi.
A nak panin meikhu suak a, selkeu khu tawh kibang hi.
Ama husanna in mei tawhkuang a, ama kam panin meikuang a suak khia hi.
A ngawng zong thakhauh mahmah ahih manin, a gim thei het lo thatang a nei ahi hi.
A vun tung khempeuh a nipna mun mahmah om lo a, sik peek bangin a sak kim hi.
A lungsim in suangtum bangin kihtak khat zong nei lo a, an gawina suang bangin sakin do lah nei lo hi.
Amah hong kithawi ciangin mi thahat pente nangawn lau a, kihta mahmah uh ahih manin cih nading thei loin a om uh hi.
Namsau tawh a kisut hangin bun zo vet lo a, teipi le thaltangte in zong bun zo tuan hetlo hi.
Ama adingin sikte, buhkung bangin nip a, sumngote nangawn sing muatsa bang lel hi.
Amah khua a phawksak zo ding, thaltang om lo a, suang tawh a kiden ciangin anvai them tu bang lel hi.
Ama adingin molhtum pen buhkung bang hi lel a, teipi tawh a kikhawh ciangin a nuihsan lel hi.
A khecinte, beelpei kitamte tawh kibang a, lam a pai ciangin leilak kuikek gawp hi.
Amah in tuipi tokin beel sunga tuiso bangsak zo a, sathau sa sunga tui tu bangin tuipi phuansak zaizai zo hi.
A painasa khempeuh ah tuihual om dandan a, tuipi phuansak pheuphau hi.
Amah tehpih theih ding leitungah bangmah om lo a, bangmah kihtak a nei het lo ganhing ahi hi.
Amah in a kihtakhuai ganhing a kihisak pente nangawn nuai-et lai a, amah pen gamsa khempeuh’ kumpi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Job A Kigentelna le Pasian in A Sanna Tua ciangin Job in Topa dawng a,
“Topa aw, vangliatna khempeuh na neihna, na hihnop khempeuh na hih theihna thu ka thei hi.
Kei bangmah a thei lo kimlai, ‘Bang hangin ka pilna hong dem ngam na hi hiam?’ na hong ci hi. Keimah in ka tel zawh loh thute, kei adingin a lamdanglua thu a gengen ka hi hi.
Thu na gen laitakin ka na ngaihna ding, na thugente kong dawn ding, na hong gen hi.
Nidangin mi’ gensawn bekin nang ka hong thei a, tu-in keima mit mahmah tawh nang ka hong mu ta hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka paunasate khempeuh hangin ka maizum mahmah a, tu-in vutlevai khu-in nakpitakin ka kisik hi,” a ci hi.

Topa in hih thute khempeuh Job tungah a gen khit ciangin, Teman khua mi Elifaz kiangah, “Ka nasem pa Job bangin, keima thu na gen ding uh a kilawm bangin gen lo na hih manun, nang le na lawm tegel tungah ka heh hi.

Tu-in bawngtal sagih le tuutal sagih la-in Job kiangah paipih unla, note adingin biakpiakna-in nei un. Job in note adingin thu hong ngetsak dinga, keimah in ama thungetna ka pia ding hi. Note’ haina zahin kong minsiasak kei ding hi. Note in Job’ gen bangin keima thu a manin na gen kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ sawl bangin Elifaz, Bildad le Zofar gamta uh a, Topa in Job’ thungetna a pia hi.
Job in a lawm thumte ading thu a ngetsak khit ciangin, Topa in Job cithei sakkik a, nidanga a neih ngeizah nihin neihsa lamsa a guan hi.

Tua ciangin Job’ sanggam pasalte, a sanggam numeite le a lawm ngeite a inn-ah hong hawh uh a, a inn-ah pawi bawlin lungdamin a omkhawm uh hi. Topa in ama tungah a tunsak gimnate hangin a khasiatpihnate uh genin a hanthawn uh hi. Amaute in sum le kham zungbuh khat ciat tawh va pha uh hi.
Tua tham loin Topa in Job’ nuntakna a masa lam sangin a nunung lamah thupha limpiak zaw hi. Job in tuu tul sawm le tulli, kalaoh tulguk, bawngtal kap tulkhat le la a pi tulkhat a nei hi.
Amah in tapa sagih le tanu thum neikik a,
a tanu upa pen Jemimah phuak a, a nihna Keziah phuak a, a tum pen Kerenhappuk a phuak hi.
Job’ tanute zahin a melhoih leitungah numei dang khat zong om lo a, a pa un a sanggam pasalte uh tawh a kibangin gamh a luahkhawmsak hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Job kum za le kum sawmli sung nungta lai a, a tute ciang bek hi loin a tu-sawnsawn ciang dong zong a mu hi.
Tua khit ciangin a khankhinin a teeksih ta hi.
Mi nuamsa i cihte penmigilote’ thu a zui lo mi,mimawhte’ gamtat bangina gamta lo mi,mi a thusim lote tawha kipawl lo mi ahi hi.
Ama nopsakna penTopa thu sung bek mah hi a,sun le zanin ama thua ngaihsunsun mi ahi hi.
Amah pen lui tuiluang gei-aa kisuan ama gah hunin gah a,a teh a vul ngei losingkung tawh kibang hi.Ama hihna khempeuh aha maa pai mahmah hi.
Migilote ahihleh tua bang hi lo uha, huih in a letkhiatanvai tawh kibang lel uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin migilote inthukhenna thuak zo lo ding uh a,mimawhte pen midikte’ pawlsungah kihel thei lo ding uh hi;
bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in midikte lam lakinhu tawntung a,migilote ahihleh sia mai mangding uh hi.
Bang thu hangin minam dangtesiatna dingahkithukhat sim uh a,mite in a mawkna dingpi-insawmsim uh ahi hiam?
Leitung kumpite le gam ukte inTopa le ama sathau nilh palangpangin vaihawm uh a,
“Amau’ hong henna khautesutat khia-in,amau’ khaute ei kiang paninpaai khia ni,” ci uh hi.
Vantunga a tupa inamaute na nuihsan a,tua Topa in amaute a zahko hi.
Tua ciangin hehna tawhamau kiangah thu gen dinga,hehluat mahmahna tawhamaute liing lawng sakin,
“Ka mual siangtho Zion tungahka kumpi ka tusak khin hi,” ci hi.
Topa’ thukhennatu-in kong gen ding hi:Amah in keima tungah,“Nang pen ka tapa na hi a,tuni-in na Pa ka suak hi.
Keima tungah hong ngen in;nangma luah dinginminamte ka bawl dinga,leimong donginna neihsa ka hisak ding hi.
Sik tawn khat tawhamaute na satkham dinga,beelseek pa in beel a denkhapbangin leilakah amautena dengzan ding hi,”hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpite aw,tu-in pil ta un;leitung gam a ukte aw,tu-in thu phawk ta un.
Launa tawh Topa’ na sem unla,linna tawh a khe nam un;tua hikeileh amah sinso-inlamkalah na sia mang ding uh hi;bang hang hiam cih lehamah heh pakpak hi.Amah a beel khempeuhmi nuamsate ahi hi.
Topa aw, ka galte tam mahmah a,mi tampi tak inkei hong langpan nainai uh hi.
Pasian in amah huh lo ding,mi tampi in hong ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa aw,nang pen ka kidalna lum,ka minthanna leka lu hong phong pa na hi hi.
Nakpi takin Topa ka galsap a,amah in a mual siangtho paninkei a hong dawng hi.
Lumin ka ihmu a,Topa in hong kem ahih maninka thokik hi.
Keimah a hong galbawlkeimah a hong umcihmi tul sawm tampiteka kihta kei hi.
Tho in, Topa!Kei hong hon in, ka Pasian!Bang hang hiam cih lehka galte khempeuh’ paangnangmah in na beeng gawp a,migilote’ ha na sutan hi.
Gualzawhna penTopa nangma hang ahi hi.Na mite tungahna thupha hong tung tahen!
A thuman ka Pasian aw,ka hong sap cianginhong dawng in.Gimna ka thuak cianginnopsakna nong pia hi.Kei hong hehpih inla,ka thungetna hong za in.
Mite aw, ka minphatna inbang tanvei dainathuak ding ahi hiam?Bang tanvei thumawkna deihinzuauthu zong ding na hi uh hiam?
Ahih hangin Topa inama adingin miphatea tuamkoihlam thei ta un.Ke’n ka sap cianginTopa in hong za hi.
