Amaute khempeuha thawhkik zawh loh nadingunka sunlet gawp a,ka khenuai-ah a puk uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehgaldo nadinginkeimah tha nong guan a,keimah a hong doteka nuai-ah na nengniam hi.
Ka galte na nungkiksak a,kei hong mudahte ka susia hi.
Huhna ding ngeninamaute kikoko uh a,ahih hangin a hon dingkuamah om lo hi.Amaute in Topa’ tungah ko uh a,ahih hangin amah in dawng lo hi.
Huihpi mai-ah leivui banginamaute ka satvui a,kongzing buante banginamaute ka lawn khia hi.
A lehdo mite kiang paninnangmah in keina hong hon khia a,minamte’ lutanginkei na hong bawl a,ka theih ngei loh mite inkeima na hong sem uh hi.
Ka thu a zak phetunamaute in hong mang pah uh a,gamdang mite inkei hong mai-et uh hi.
Gamdang mite lungkia uh a,a phualkip panuna liingsa-in hong pai khia uh hi.
Topa hing hi.Keima suangpi inthupha ngah henla,ka kihotkhiatna Pasian,
hong thuhkiksakin keima nuai-ahmite a hong zawhsak Pasian,
ka galte kiang paninkeimah a hong hon khia paminthangin vanglian tahen. Ka langte tungah keimahnong liansak a,mi ngongtatte kiang paninna hong hon khia hi.
Topa aw, hih thu hanginminam dangte lakahnang kong phat dinga,nangma min phatna laka sa ding hi.
Zawhna lianpiama kumpipa tungah pia a,a sathau nilh pa David lea suan a khakte tungaha tawntungin itna kip a lak hi.
Nate le Ama Thu-ah Pasian’ Minthanna
Vantung inPasian’ minthanna gen a,vanpi inama nasepna taangko hi.
Nisimin thu gengen a,zan simin theihtelna pulaklak hi.
Pauna le kammal om lo a,amau’ aw kiza lo hi.
Ahih hangin a aw uhleitung khempeuh ah kizel a,a kammal uhleimong dongah a tung hi.Amau’ sungah ni adingomna khat bawl khin a,
a inn sung pan a hong pusuakzi pi tangval tawh ahi zongin,lungtaii takin tai ding a kipanmi thahat khat tawhahi zongin a kibang hi.
Ama suahna van mong pan hi a,mong khat dongin pai a,ama satna panina kiliah thei bangmah om lo hi.
Topa’ thu kicing a,nuntakna a thaksuaksak hi.Topa’ teci panna hi takpi a,mi pil lote pilsak hi.
Topa’ thuhilhte man a,lungsim nuamsak hi.Topa’ thupiakna siang a,mitte vaksak hi.
Topa a kizahtakna siang a,kip tawntung hi.Topa’ ngeina kipte thuman a,a vekin kituakin man kim hi.
Kham sangin ahi zonginkham hoih pen sang ahi zongintuate deihhuai zaw a,khuaizu le khuailuzu taaktesangin zong khum zaw lai hi.
Tua tham loin tuate’ hangina nasem pa in thuphawknangah a,tuate zuihna-ahnoptuamna lian a om hi.
Ahih hangin kua in amakhialhnate mu khiathei tawm ahi hiam?Theih loh manin khialhna paninkei hong siangsak hi.
Mawh kaltangnate panin zongna nasem pa hong kem inla,tuate keima tungahhong uksak kei in!Tua ciangin kei ka kawkbaang keidinga, mawhna liante paninka siang ding hi.
Topa, ka belh suangpi lekeimah hong tan khia pa aw,ka kammal le ka lungsimngaihsutnate nangma muhna-aha sanhuai suaksak ta in!
Gualzawh nading Thungetna
Gimna na thuak cianginTopa in nang hong en henla,Jakob’ Pasian innangmah hong dal tahen!
Siangtho mun paninhuhna nang hong puak henla,Zion panin nang hong panpih tahen!
Na biakpiaknate khempeuhamah in hong phawk henla,na meihal biakpiaknahong sang tahen!
Na lungsim’ deihnaamah in hong pia henla,na geelna khempeuhhong tangtungsak tahen!
Na gualzawhna-ah eite lungdaminawngin, i Pasian’ min tawhi lante khai ni!
Topa in a sathau nilh paa huh ding tu-in ka thei ta a,ama vantung siangtho paninamah dawng dinga,a vangliatna tawhamah gualzosak ding hi.
Mi pawlkhat in leengte kisaktheihpih a,mi pawlkhat in sakolte kisaktheihpih hi.Ahih hangin eite in Topai Pasian’ min bek i kisaktheihpih hi.
Amaute kinawmsawminpuk gawp ding uh a,ahih hangin eite tho-ini dingtang ding hi.
Topa aw, kumpipa tungahgualzawhna pia inla,kong sap ciangun hong dawng in.
Gualzawh Manin Lungdam Kohna
Topa aw, na hatna hanginkumpipa lungdam a,na huhna hanginamah nak nuam mahmah hi.
Ama lungsim deihna tengnangmah in na pia khin a,ama hong ngettena khaktan kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehthupha hoihte tawhamah na dawntuah a,ama lu tungah khamsiang lukhu na khusak hi.
Nangma tung paninamah in nuntakna hong ngen a,ama tungah nuntak sau na pia hi.
Nangma huhna hanginama minthanna lian a,hoihna le minliatnaama tungah na pia hi.
Nangmah in a tawntunginthupha ngah pen dinginamah na bawl a,nangma ompihna hanginlungdamna tawhamah na kipaaksak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehkumpipa in Topa muang a,Sangpenpa’ itna kip hanginamah a kiliing kei ding hi.
Na khut in na galte khempeuhsu gawp dinga,na khut taklam in nang hongmudahte su gawp ding hi.
Na kilat cianginmeiphual kuang banginamaute na hih ding hi. Topa in hehna tawhamaute nawmvalh dinga,meikuang in amautekaangtum ding hi.
Leitung panin a suan a khakte,mi’ tate’ lak paninamau’ tate na susia ding hi.
Nangma langahsiatna ding vaihawmin,gitlohna a bawl uh hangintangtung lo ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute na taisak dinga,na thal tawh a maitang uhna ngim ding hi.
Topa aw, na hatna hanginnang hong kipahtawi tahen!Nangma vangliatna la sa-inkong phat ding uh hi.
Cimawhin Kikona le Phatna La
Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw,bang hanginkei hong nusia na hi hiam?Nong huhna dingka hong thumna paninbang hangin gamla omna hi hiam?
Ka Pasian aw, sunin kong kiko a,ahi zongin nong dawng kei hi.Zanin zong ka kiko a,ahi zongin lungsim nopnaka mu thei tuan kei hi.
Ahih hangin nang na siangtho a,Israel-te’ pahtawi-in na tu hi.
Ka pate unnangmah hong muang uh hi.Amaute in hong muang uh a,nangmah in amautena hon khia hi.
Nangma tungah amaute inhong ko uh a,amaute kihon hi.Nangmah hong muang uh a,guaksuak lo uh hi.
Ahih hangin kei penlungno khat bang lel ka hi a,mi ka bang kei hi.Mite’ ko gawpgawp,mite’ simmawh ka hi hi.
Hong mu mi khempeuh inkei hong zahko-in,hong mukpiksan uh a,a lu uh hong peisan hi.
“Topa’ tungahamah in ama thu ap hi.Amah kihonkhiasak un;amah deih ahih maninhon khia tahen!”hong cihsan uh hi.
Ahih hangin nang pen gil sung paninkei a hong suaksakpa na hi a,ka nu’ ang sungah a muanhuai-inkeimah na hong kem hi.
Ka suah tung a kipannangma tungah kong tung a,ka nu in hong paii lai a kipankeima Pasian na hi hi.
Haksatna nai ahih maninkei tawh kigamla om kei in;kei a hong huh dingkuamah dang om lo hi.
Bawngtal tampi tak inkei hong umcih uh a,Bashan gam bawngtal hatte inkei hong umcih uh hi.
Humpinelkai hawk,a sabawh nuam banginamaute in kei hong kamkatbeba uh hi.
Tui buakkhiat banginkei hong kibua khia a,ka guh ka taang khempeuhkilawi mangkhin hi.Ka lungtang khuainun bang a,ka awm sungah tuisuak hi.
Ka thahatna, leibeel phel banginkeu a, ka leii zong toncip ta hi.Nangmah in leivui sungahkei na hong koih hi.
Ka kiimah uite om a,siatna bawl mi honkhat inkei hong umcih uh hi.Ka khut ka khetehong sunlet zo uh hi.
Ka guh khempeuh kimu thei hi.Amaute in hong sal gega uh hi.
Amaute in ka puante hawm uh a,ka puan a hawm nadingunlai ai a san uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa aw,gamla om kei in.Keimah a hong huhpa aw,a huh dingin hong manlang in.
Namsau panin keimahhong hon inla, uite’ kiang paninka nuntakna hong hon in.
Humpinelkai kam paninkeimah hong hon inla,gamsialte’ ki panina cimawh keimah hong hon in.
Ka u ka naute tungahnangma min ka gen dinga,mihon kikhopna laizangahnangmah kong phat ding hi.
Topa a zahtak mi khempeuh aw,amah phat un.Jakob’ suan mi khempeuh aw,amah minthangsak un.Israel mi khempeuh aw,amah lamdang sa un.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamah in a thuak mi’ gimnasimmawh bawl lo a,zong kihbawl lo hi.Ama kiang pan a mai seel lo a,ama tungah a koh ciangin,amah in a za hi.
Mihonpite lakahnang kong phat nadingna piangsak a,nang a hong zahtakte’ mai-ahka thuciamna kong pia ding hi.
Gimna a thuakte inkham takin ne ding uh a,amah a zongte inTopa phat ding uh hi.A lungsim uhnuam tawntung tahen!
Leitung mi khempeuh in phawkinTopa’ lamah kihei ding uh a,minam khempeuh inama mai-ah bia ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehukna pen Topa a’ hi a,minamte tungah amah in a uk hi.
Hi hi, a kiphasak mi khempeuhama mai-ah kunsuk ding uh a,a si thei mihing khempeuhama mai-ah kun ding uh hi.
A hong khangkik mite inama na sem ding uh hi.Mite in a hong piang lai dingmite tungah Topa’ thugen ding uh a,
a suak nai lo mite tungahama sepsa, hotkhiatna thugen ding uh hi.
Topa pen Tuucin bangin Hong Cing pa
Topa pen tuucin banginhong cing hi a,kisapna teng kicing ta hi.
Lo nona-ah hong lumsak a,tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi.
Thahatna thakkei hong guan hi.A hong ciamsa mah bangin-ahlampi manah kei hong kha hi.
Topa aw,kei hong ompih na hih maninkhuamial thukpi ka nawk hanginka lau kei hi.Na molhtum le na ciangkhut inkei hong hu hi.
Keima galte’ muhna munahan nong lui hi.Thupi takin nong pahtawi a,keima hai zong dimlet ta hi.
Na hoihna le nong itna inka khantawnin a hong zuih dingtel takin-ah ka thei ta a,a tawntungin na inn sungahka om ding hi.
Minthang Kumpipa
Leitung le a tunga omte,leitung le a tunga teengteTopa-a’ ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamah in tuipite sungaha bul phut a,tui tungah a kipsak hi.
Topa’ mual tungahkuate kahto ding ahi hiam?Ama mun siangtho-ahkuate ding ding ahi hiam?
Gamtat siangtho lelungsim siangtho a nei,a man lo thu-ah a nuntakna pia loin,khemna tawha kiciam lo mite ahi hi.
Tua bang mite inTopa’ tung paninthupha ngah ding uh a,amaute a hon khiaPasian’ kiang panindiksakna ngah ding uh hi.
Tua bang mite pen, amah a zong,Jakob’ Pasian’ mai a zongminam ahi hi.
Minthang Kumpipahong tumtheih nadingin,kulh kongpite lian hon unla,tanglai kongkhakte gol hon un.
Minthang Kumpipa kua ahi hiam?Hatin a vanglian Topa,galhat Topa ahi hi.
Minthang Kumpipahong tumtheih nadingin,kulh kongpite lian hon unla,tanglai kongkhakte gol hon un.
Hih a minthang Kumpipakua ahi hiam?VanglianTopa,minthang Kumpipa ahi hi.
Lamlah ding, Hut ding le Mawh Maisak ding Ngetna
Topa aw, nangma tungahthu kong ngen hi.
Ka Pasian aw, nangmahkong muang hi.Hong zahhuaisak kei in.Keima tungah ka galtegualzo-in lungdamsak kei in.
Nangmah a hong ngaktekuamah zahhuaisak kei in.Thukhual loin a zuau theitezahhuaisak in.
Topa aw, na zia na tonga thei-in hong bawl inla,na lampite hong hilh in.
Na thuman sungahkei hong paipih inla,lam hong hilh in.Bang hang hiam cih lehkei a hong hon Pasian na hi a,nang kong muang tawntung hi.
Topa aw, tanglai pek a kipana omsa ahih manin,na hehpihna le na itna kiphong phawkkik in.
Topa aw, ka khangno lai-aka mawhna le ka khialhnateciamteh kei inla,na hoihna na ngaihsutna lena itna kip tawh kizui-inkei hong phawk in!
Topa hoihin thutang hi.Tua ahih maninmimawhte lam a hilh hi.
Amah in lungsim kiniamkhiattea manah paipihina zia a tong a hilh hi.
Ama thuciamna le a thupiaka zuite adingin Topa’ lampi penitna kip le cihtakna ahi hi.
Topa aw,ka mawhna lian ahih manin,nangma min phat nadinginkeima mawhna hong maisak in.
Topa a zahtak mi kua ahi hiam?Ama lampi zuih dingPasian’ hilhna a ngah mi ahi hi.
Amah nuamsa tawntung dinga,a tate in leitang nei ding uh hi.
Topa tawh kilawmtatna penamah a zahtakte ading hi a,a thuciamnaamau tungah kitheithangsak hi.
Topa’ lam ka en tawntung hi;bang hang hiam cih lehamah in ngenthang paninka khete hong sut khia ding hi.
Kei lamah nang hong kihei-in,kei hong hehpih in;bang hang hiam cih lehkei guakbek hi-ingimna ka thuak hi.
Ka lungsim natnate khempeuhhong damsak inla,ka gimnate khempeuh paninhong pai khiatpih in.
Ka gimna le ka thuaknatehong ngaihsun inla,ka mawhna khempeuhhong maisak in.
Ka galte bangzah takina tamna le kei hong muhdahluatnate hong ngaihsun in.
Kei hong cing inla,hong hon khia in.Nangmah hong bel ka hih maninkei hong maizumsak kei in.
Nang hong muang ka hih manin,kicinna le thutanna inkei hong kem tahen.
Pasian aw,amau’ haksatna khempeuh paninna mi Israel-te hon khia ta in.
Hoih Gamtatna Lahkhiat ding Kalhna
Topa aw, a hoihin gamta-inTopa hong muang ka hih manin,ka thutanna hong lak in.
Topa aw, hong ze-et inlahong sin in.Ka lungsim le ka ngaihsutnahong entel in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehna itna kip in lam hong lak a,nangma tungah citakinka gamta hi.
Mikhialte tawh tukhawm loin,thusim neite tawhka kipawl kei hi.
Siatna a bawl mite ka mudah a,migilote tawh ka tukhawm kei hi.
Topa aw, mawh baan lohnaka lahna-in ka khutte ka sil a,biakna pia-inna biakna tau kiim ah ka pai hi.
Lungdam kohna la a gingin sa-in,nangma nasep a lamdangteka gen kawm hi.
Topa aw, nangma inn-a ten ding lena minthang a omna munahom ding ka ut hi.
Mimawhte, mi that nuamte,siatna a bawl mite,le golhguk a la nuamte tawhkei hong susia khawm kei in.
Ahih hangin kei ka hihleh,ka hoih gamtat hi.Hong hehpih inla,kei hong hon khia in.
Leizang munah ka ding hi.Mihon tampi lakahTopa ka phat ding hi.
Topa, ka Khuavak le Hong Honpa
Topa, ka khuavak lehong honpa ahi hi.Kua kihta ding ka hi hiam?Topa, kei adinginmunmuanhuai ahi hi.Bang laupih ding ka hi hiam?
Hong langpangte le ka galte ahi,siatna bawlte in hong do a,kei nektum hong sawm ciangun,amaute kisukha-in puk ding uh hi.
Mi honkhat in keimahhong langpanginphual a sat uh hangin,ka lungsim lau lo ding hi.Keimah hong langpangingal hong kuan hangintua nangawnahka lungmuang ding hi.
Topa’ tung paninna khat ka ngen khin a,tua ngenin ka zon ding pen:Topa’ inn sungahka khan tawntungin om ding,Topa’ hoihna et ding leama biakinn sungahthu dot dingte ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehhaksat hun cianginamah in a buk sungahkei hong seel ding hi.A puanbuk khuhna nuai-ahkei hong seel dinga,a sangna suang tungahkei hong koih ding hi.
Tu-in ka kimkotah a omka galte tungah ka gualzo ding hi.Lungdamin kikona tawhama buk sungah biaknaka pia dinga, la ka sa ding hi.Topa tungahla ngaih ka sa ding hi.
Topa aw, ka otna aw hong za inla,kei hong hehpihin hong dawng in!
“Ka mai hong zong in,”na hong ci khinzo hi.Keimah in nangma tungah,“Topa aw, nangma maikong zong hi,” ka hong ci hi.
Kei kiang paninna maitang seel kei in. Hehpihna tawh na nasem pahong hawl khia kei in;kei hong nei pa na hi hi.Hong paai khia kei inla,hong nusia kei in,kei hong hon khia Pasian aw.
Bang hang hiam cih lehka nu le ka pa inhong nusiat hanginTopa in kei hong kem ding hi.
Topa aw, na lampi hong hilh inla,ka galte’ hangin lam phei-ahkei hong kha in.
Ka langte’ deihna banginkei hong nusia kei in;bang hang hiam cih lehteci man lote ka langahpang khin a,amaute in zuaugeninkei hong tawng niloh uh hi.
A hingte’ gam sungahTopa’ hoihna a mu dinginkei ka ki-um hi.
Topa muang in. Thakhauh inla,na lungsim hangsakin,Topa muang in.
Huh ding Ngetna
Topa aw,awngin nang kong sam hi.Ka belh suangpi aw,keima thu-ahhong bilngong kei in.Tua bangin kei tungahhong dai dide lecin,Leihawm sunga a paisukte tawha kibang ka suak ding hi.
Siangtho pen mun lamahka khutte hong laamto a,nangma kiangahhuhna kong nget mah banginkong thumna aw hong za in.
Amau’ lungsim sungahsiatna a om hinapia veengte tawh kilemna thua gen khem, siatna bawlte,migilote tawhkei hong la khia khawm kei in.
Amau’ sepna lea gamtat siatnate uh banginamaute thukkik in.Amau’ sepna tawh a kizui-inamaute tungah thuk inla,amau’ ngah ding a kilawmthaman pia in.
Amaute in Topa’ nasepnatethupi ngaihsut lo ahih manun,amah in amaute susia-ina donkik nawnkei ding hi.
Ka thumna aw hong za ahih maninTopa in thupha ngah tahen.
Topa, ka hatna le ka lum hi a,amah ka muang hi.Tua ahih manin kei hong kihuh a,lungdamin ka diang a,ka lasakna tawh ama tungahlungdamna ka ko hi.
Topa, ama mite’ hatna hi a,amah pen a sathau nilh pa’ bukna lea hon khia pa ahi hi.
Na mite hon inla,na luahte thupha pia in.Amau a cing pa hi inla,a tawntungin amaute huh in.
Huihpi Sungah Topa’ Awging
Topa-a’ ci un, van mite aw;minthanna le hatnaTopa-a’ ci un.
Ama minthannaTopa’ tungah pia unla,a siangtho kizepna tawhTopa bia un.
Topa’ awging tuipite tungah kiza hi.A minthang Pasian’ awging damdam a, tui tampite tungahTopa’ aw kiza hi.
Topa’ awging vanglian a,Topa’ awging,liatna tawh kidim hi.
Topa’ awging intaamtak singte kitansak a,Topa’ awging inLebanon mual taamtak singtea kuaitan hi.
Lebanon mual le Sirion mualtebawngno le gamsialno banginamah in a diangsak hi.
Topa’ awging inmeikuang taangkhiasak hi.
Topa’ awging in gamlak lok a,Topa in Kadesh gamlak lok hi.
Topa’ awging insingkungte heek gawp a,gammang tulak hawk khia-ina kolhsak hi.Ama biakinn sungaha vekpi-un awngin,“Pasian’ min thang tahen,”a ci uh hi.
Topa in tui thukpite uk a,a tawntung kumpi hihna tawhTopa a tu hi.
Topa in ama mite tungahthahatna pia tahen.Topa in ama mite tungahnopsakna thupha pia tahen.
Sihna pan Suahtaksak Manin Phatna
Topa aw, nangmah hong phatinka diang ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehkei nong laamto khin a,ka tungah ka galtena lungdamsak kei hi.
Topa ka Pasian aw,huhna a hong ngeninnang tungah kong awng a,kei na hong damsak khin hi.
Topa aw, Leinuai paninkei nong pai khiatpihto khin a,Leihawm sungaha pai khinsate lak paninkei nong nungta kiksak hi.
Ama mi siangthote aw,Topa tungah phatna la sa-inama tungah lungdamna ko un.
Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a,ama hong deihsakna penkhang tawntung ading ahi hi.Zan hun sungtengkahna omkha mah dinga,ahih hangin zing khuavak tawhnuamna hong tung hi.
Keimah in ahihleh,ka daupai laitakin,“Ka kiliing ngei kei ding hi,”ka ci kha hi.
Topa aw, nong deihsakna tawhmual kip banginkei nong phut khin hi.Ahi zongin tu-inna maitang na seel a,kei ka khasia hi.
Topa aw,nangma tungah kong kiko a,Topa tungah kong thum hi:
“Leihawm sungah paisukinka sihna-ahbang meetna om ahi hiam?Leivui innang hong phat ding ahi hiam?Na thumanna gen ding ahi hiam?
Topa aw,hong za inla, kei hong hehpih in.Topa aw, keimah huhpahong hi in,” ka ci hi.

Topa ka Pasian aw,nangma tungah lungdamnaka hong koh tawntung theih nading,ka lungsim innang hong phat theih nading,a dai om mawk loh nadinginka thumna le ka taunatelamna tawh nong heisak a,dahna lim ahi ka puanhampihong suahkhiat sakinnuamna na hong guan hi.
Cimawh Hunah Pasian Muanna
Topa aw, nang kong bel hi.Hong maizumsak ngei kei inla,na thumanna tawhkei hong hon khia in!
Na bil hong ngat inla,hong hon pak in!Ka belh ding suangpi hong hi inla,kei hong dal ding munkipmuanhuai hong hi in!
Nang pen ka suangpi leka munkip muanhuai na hi hi.Nangma min ngaihsutna tawhkei hong kha-in lam hong lak inla,
keima belh pa na hih maninhong kisiahna ngenthang paninkei hong la khia in.
Nangma khut sungahkeimah kong ki-ap hi.Topa, a thuman Pasian aw,keimah na hong hon ding hi.
Mawkna milima thupi ngaihsutte na mudah hi;ahih hangin keimah inTopa kong muang hi.
Na itna kip hanginlungdamin ka kipak ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehka thuakna mu khinin,ka kamsiatna-ahna hong don khin hi.
Galte’ khut sungahkei na hong pia kei a,mun tanzau-ahka khe na dingsak hi.
Topa aw, genthei ka hih maninkei hong hehpih in.Dahna hangin ka mit thuk a,ka lungsim le ka pumpi zonggim mahmah ta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehka nuntakna dahna vive hi a,ka hunte khuisatna vive ahi hi.Ka gentheihna hanginka tha kiam gawp ta a,ka guhte zong ngaam ta hi.
Ka veengte khempeuh’ nuihsatka suak a, ka veengte tungaha cikzethuai ka hi a,ka meltheih khempeuhte’gimneih mi ka suak hi.Konglakah hong mute inkei hong peelin hong taisan uh hi.
Misi banginkei hong kiphawk nawn lo a,beel kitam khat tawhka kibang lel ta hi.
Ka galte’ kihuauna ka za a,ka kiim ka pamah launa om hi.Kei hong langpanginamaute in vai hawmkhawm a,thah dingin kei hong sawm uh hi.
Ahih hanginnang kong muang hi, Topa aw.Keima Pasian na hi hi.
Keima nuntaknanangma khut sungah om hi.Keima galte lekei a hong bawlsiate’khut sung paninkei hong hon khia in!
Na nasem pa tungahna mai hong taangsak inla,na itna kip tawh kei hong hon in!
Topa aw, nangma tung paninhuhna hong ngen ka hih maninkei hong maizumsak kei in.Migilote maizumsak inla,amaute a pau ding thei loinLeinuai-ah paisak in.
Thumante’ langah pang a,kihihsak pau-in,kiphatsakna le simmawhna tawhpau-in zuauthu a gen mitea pau thei loin omsak in.
Nang hong zahtakte adinginna koihsa na hoihte,nang hong belte adinginmite’ muhna-ah na bawl,nangma hoihna kicing a,mi khempeuh in thei uh hi.
Mite’ sawmsimna paninna omna huam sungahamaute na seel a,kitotna mun paninna buk sungah a muanhuai-inamaute na kem hi.
Gal in khuapi a umcih banginkei hong ki-umcih hun lai-ina itna kip a lamdanginkei tungah hong lak ahih maninTopa in thupha ngah tahen.
Lauthawngna tawh,“Nangma muhna panina gamlapi-ah kei hong not khia hi,”ka ci khin hi.Ahih hangin nang tungahhuhna ka hong nget cianginkeima hong thumnatenangmah in na hong za hi.
Ama mi siangtho khempeuh aw,Topa phat un!Pasian in thuman mite kem a,ahih hangin a kiphatsak gamtattenakpitakin a thuk hi.
Topa a ngak mi khempeuh aw,na tha uh khauhsak unla,na lungsim uh hangsak ta un!
Mawh Maisakna hanga Thupha
Ama khialhna kimaisak a,ama mawhna a kiselcipsak mi,thupha ngah ahi hi.
Topa in mawhna a khuksak loh mi,a lungsim sungah khemnaa om lo mi, thupha ngah ahi hi.
Ka mawhna ka pulak loh ciangin,sunthapai ka tautauna hanginka pumpi a thaneem hi.
Sun le zan tawntunggim nong piakna ka thuak a,khuakhal nisa’ kat banginka thahatna a keucip hi.
Keima khialhnatenangma tungah kong pulak a,ka mawhna ka im kei hi.“Ka khialhnate khempeuhTopa’ tungah ka pulak ding hi,”ka ci hi.Tua ciangin ka mawhna ninnong maisak hi.
Tua ahih cianginnang hong kimuh theih lai-inmihoih khempeuh,nang tungah thu kingensak in.Tua hileh tuikhang inamaute ban lo ding hi.
Nang pen kei adinginka bukna mun na hi a,haksatna pan kei hong keminhotkhiatna kicing nong pia hi.
Na pai nading lampi lakinkong hilh dinga,ka mit tawh hong eninthu kong hilh ding hi.
A kamkaih tawh uk lohina phamawh, thutheihna a nei lo,sakol le la bang kei in.
Migilote in gimna tampi thuak uh a,Topa a muangte ahihlehitna kip in a hu hi.
Thumante aw,Topa tungahlungdamin kipak un.Lungsim man mi khempeuh aw,lungdamin awng un!
A Piangsak, A Kem, Pasian Phat Un
No thuman mite aw,Topa tungah lungdam un!Pahtawina pen thutangte tawhkilawm kituak hi.
Laia khausai lasakna tawhTopa phat unla,harp zang sawm khausailasakna tawh ama tungahla ngaih sa un.
Ama tungah la thak sa unla,a gingpha mahmahinhoihtakin khausai tum un.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa thutang a,ama hihna khempeuhthuman tawh a sem hi.
Amah in thuman le thutang deih a,leitungah Topa’ itna kipa kidim hi.
Topa’ kampauna tawhvantung piang a,a kam pan a husanna tawhvantung nate a piang hi.
Amah in tuipi tuitethawl khat sunga thun banginmun khatah gawm a,tuithukpite tuibeem-ah a koih hi.
Leitung khempeuh inTopa zahtak uh henla,leitunga teengte khempeuh,amah lamdangsakna tawhding ta uh hen!
Bang hang hiam cih lehamah pau a, leitung hong piang hi;amah in thu pia a,na khempeuh hong om hi.
Topa in minamte’ thungaihsutnaa mawkna suahin,mite’ geelna a khaktan hi.
Topa’ thungaihsutna kip ngitnget a,ama lungsim ngaihsutnakhang tawntungin a kip hi.
Topa, Pasian-a a nei minam,ama luah dingin teelnaa ngah minamte thupha ngah ahi hi.
Topa invantung panin hong ensuk a,mihing khempeuh a mu hi.
A tutna mun paninamah hong dak khia-in,leitung mite a en hi.
Amau’ lungsim a bawlpa inamaute’ gamtatnate en gige hi.
Kumpi khat a galkap tampite insuaktasak zo lo a,galkap hang pa ama hatna tawhkihon khia zo lo hi.
Sakol galkapte pen gualzawh nadingina mawkna lametna hi a,amau’ hatna tawh hon zo lo hi.
Amah a zahtakte,a itna kip lametna a neite,sihna panin hon khia-in,kialpi hun sungin amautea hinkep theih nadinginTopa in amaute en tawntung hi.
Topa i ngak hi;amah pen eite hong huhpa lei lum ahi hi.
Ama min siangthoeite in muang ihih maninama sungah i lungdam hi.
Topa aw,nang kong lamet uh mah banginkote’ tungahna itna kip hong omsak in.
Lungkhamna pan Hotkhiat Manin Phatna i
Topa ka phat tawntung dinga,amah phatna ka gengen ding hi.
Topa ka phat ding hi.Gimna thuakte zasak unla,lungdam uh hen.
Kei tawh Topa nak phat un,ama min pahtawi khawm ni!
Keimah in Topa ka zong a,amah in kei hong dawngin,ka launa khempeuh paninkei hong hon khia hi.
Amah en unla, maitai un;tua hileh na mai uhzum ngei lo ding hi.
Hih mi hehpihhuai pa kiko-in,Topa in amah za a,ama haksatna khempeuh paninamah a hon khia hi.
Amah a zahtakte’ kiimahTopa’ vantungmi ingiahphual sat a,amaute a hon khia hi.
Topa tawh kikhawl phot unla,ama hoihna thei un!Amah a beel mitemi lungdam ahi uh hi.
Ama mi siangthote aw,Topa zahtak un;bang hang hiam cih lehamah a zahtak mite inkitangsapna nei lo hi.
Humpinelkai khanglaite inkisapna le gilkialna thuak a,ahih hangin Topa a zongte inna hoih a kisap uh om lo hi.
Tate aw,hong pai unla hong ngai un;Topa zahtakna thukong hilh ding hi.
Nopna a neih theih nadinginnuntakna le khansaua deih kua ahi hiam?
Siatna ding panin na leii kem inla,zuaugenna panin na muk kem in.
Siatna panin kihem khia inla,a hoih bawl in.Kilemna ding hanciam inla,na phak mateng delh in.
Topa’ mit in thuman mite’ lam en a,amau’ kikona lamah a bil a ngat hi.
Siatna a bawl mite hih leitung panina kiphawkna a kisuktat nadinginTopa in amaute a langpang hi.
Huhna a ngen dinginthumante a kiko cianginTopa in za a,a haksatna khempeuh panunamaute a hon khia hi.
Lungsim kitamzante kiangahTopa hong om a,lungsim zan gawpte a hon hi.
Thuman mi’ thuaknaa tam mahmah hangintuate khempeuh paninTopa in amah a hon hi.
Amah in thuman mipa kem a,a guh khat zong kitan lo hi.
Siatna in migilote that dinga,thuman a mudah mitegim kipia ding hi.
Topa in ama nasemte hon khia a,amah a beel mi khat beekgim kipia lo ding hi.
Galte kiang pan Hot ding Ngetna
Topa aw, kei hong langpangtelangpang inla,kei hong dote do in.
Lum lian le lum neu la inla,keimah hong huh in!
Teipi le teitangzang dok inla,kei hong delhte’ lam ngat in!Keima tungah,“Nang a hong honpa ka hi,”hong ci in.
Kei hong sawmtemaizumin mindaisak ta in!Keima siatna ding a bawltenungkiksakin sisak in!
Topa’ vantungmi’ hawlna tawhhuih letkhiat ansite tawhamaute kibangsak in.
Topa’ vantungmi’ delhna-aha taina lampi uh mialin nalsak in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in thu om lopi-ina ngenthang uh tawhkei hong siah uh a,thu om lopi-in gum to-inkei hong siah uh hi.
A phawk loh kalunamaute’ tungah siatna tungsak in!Amau’ ngenthang mahahamaute mah awksak inla,a kisia mang khin dinginamaute puksak in.
Tua ciangin Topa tungahka lungdam mahmah dinga,ama hotkhiatna-ahnuamin ka diang ding hi.
Ka lungsim khempeuh tawh,“Topa aw, ama adingina hatluate kiang panina thahat lo mi a hon khia,a bawlsiate’ kiang paninmizawngte a hon khia,nang tawh a kibangkua om ahi hiam?” ka ci ding hi.
Mi a el tecite hong kipan uh a,ka theih loh thutekei hong dong uh hi.
Amaute in ka hoihnatesiatna tawh hong thuk uh a,ka khawngai mahmah hi.
Ahih hangin kei ka hihleh,amaute a cinat uh ciangin,puanhampi silhin an tanginkei ka kigimtawmsak hi.
Ka lawm, ka sanggampa hangina dah bangin ka dah hi.A nu’ hanga a kap mi banginkapin ka vak kawikawi a,kunin ka kidikdik hi.
Ahih hangin kei ka tukna-ahamaute nuamin kikhawm uh a,kei simmawh dinginkikaikhawm uh hi.Ka theih ngei hetlohkhebaite nangawn intawlnga hetloinkei hong gensia niloh uh hi.
Zahtakna mel nei hetloinkei hong zahko niloh uh a,a ha uh hong gawisan uh hi.
Topa aw, bang tanveihong enkhong ding na hi hiam?Amau’ hong suk gawpna paninkeimah hong hon khia inla,humpinelkaite kiang paninkei hong hon in.
Tua cianginmihon kikhopna lian sungahnangma tungahlungdamna kong ko dinga,mihonpite lak paninnang kong phat ding hi.
A man lopi a ka gal a hitekei tungah lungdamsak kei inla,thu om lopi a kei hong mudahte,mitheek kipiasak kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in kilemna thugen lo uh a,daitakin a om mite langpangin,khemna thu ngaihsun uh hi.
Amaute inkei hong kamkat beba uh a,amaute in, “Ha, Ha!Mu khin hang ei!” ci uh hi.
Topa aw, na mu khin hi;dai ommawk ke’n!Topa aw, kei kiang paningamla om ke’n!
Ka Topa, ka Pasian aw,ka thu hong thei inla,kei adingin nangmahhong kisosuah tawm in!
Ka Topa, ka Pasian aw,na thumanna tawh a kituakinkeima thutanna hong langsak inla,keima gimna-ahamaute lungdamsak ke’n!
Amau le amau tungah,“Ha, i tuptup tung ei!”kicisak kei in.“Amah nawmvalhtum khin hang,”amaute cisak kei in.
Kei’ kamsiatna-ah a lungdamtemaizumsak inla,zahhuai gawpsak in!Kei tungah a hong kiliansaktemaizumna le mindaina thuaksak in!
Kei thutang ka hihnalahkhiat ding a deihtelungdamin awngin,kipaaksak inla,“A nasem pa’ hoihna-aha lungkim Topa lian hi,”cicisak in.
Tua cianginna thumanna le nangmah phatnasunthapai-in ka gengen ding hi.
Mihing’ Gitlohna le Pasian’ Itna
Mawhna inmigilo pa’ lungsim tawngahthu gen a,amah in Pasian zahtaknanei hetlo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehama mawhna kidawk khia lo a,muhdahna thuak lo ahih maninamah kimawkphat tawm hi.
Ama kammalte pensiatna le khemna vive hi a,pil gamtatna le hoih gamtatnabei khinta hi.
A lupna tungah luminsiat gamtat ding a ngaihsun hi.Hoih lohna lamahamah kibulhtawm a,amah in siatna nolh lo hi.
Topa aw,na itna kip in vantung ban a,na cihtakna invanpi dong banto hi.
Na thumanna penPasian’ mualte tawh kibang a,na thukhennate pentuipi thuk tawh kibang hi.Mihing le ganhing na hon hi,Topa aw.
Pasian aw,na itna kip manpha mahmah hi.Mihing tatena kha liimah bu uh hi.
Na inn sunga na tampite tawhamaute nuamsa uh a,na hoihna gun paninamaute na dawnsak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehnuntakna tuinaknangmah tawh om a,na khuavak sungahkote in khuavak ka mu uh hi.
Nang hong theite tungahna itna kip hong zom inla,lungsim thutangte tungahna hotkhiatna hong zom in!
A kihisak mitekei hong sukhasak kei inla,migilote, hong hawl khiasak kei in.
Hua lai-ah siatna bawltea cimawhin kun uh a,amaute kisuncip sukin,tho zo nawn lo uh hi.
Topa in Amah a Muangte Kem: Migilote Sia ding
Migilote’ hanginkilungsosak kei inla,a man loin a gamta miteen dingin ngaihsun kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehlopa banginamaute vulpak ding uh a,lokung hingte banginkeutum ding uh hi.
Topa muang inla, gamtat hoih in.Gam nuamah teeng inla,thumanin om in.
Topa sungah lungkim in;amah inna deihna hong pia ding hi.
Topa tungah na vai teng ap in.Amah muang in;amah in hong sem ding hi.
Amah in nangma diknakhuavak bangin,nangma thumannanitaang banginhong langsak ding hi.
Topa’ mai-ah khawl dide inla,lungduai takin ngak in.A hihna a daupai pa tung lesiatna a bawlpa tungahkilungso tawmsak ke’n!
Hehna panin kikham inla,sinsona nusia in.Nangmah kilungso tawmsak ke’n;tua in siatna bekaha hong paipih hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehmigilote kipuaseh dinga,ahih hangin Topa a ngakte inleitung luah ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin tawlkhat sunginmigilo pa om nawn lo dinga,ama omna munna lim zon mahmah hangintua lai-ah amah na om lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin lungnemte inleitung luahin, genzawh lohinamaute nuamsa ding uh hi.
Migilo in thuman pa sawm a,a ha a gawisan hi.
Ahih hangin Topa inmigilo pa’ hun a tungta ahih lammu ahih maninamah a nuihsan lel hi.
Mizawngte lemi cimawhte a suniam ding,a thutangte a that dinginmigilote in namsau dokin,a thal uh a keek hi.
A namsau uhamau’ lungtang mahah tumin,a thalte uh kitan ding hi.
Migilote’ hauhna sanginthuman mite intawmno khat bek a neihnahoih zaw lai hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehmigilote’ thahatnakipaih khiatsak dinga,ahih hangin Topa inmihoihte a huh hi.
Topa in a paubaang lote kem a,amau’ gamh kipden ding hi.
Siatna hun cianginamaute kimaizumsak lo a,kial hun ciangin tampi nei uh hi.
Ahih hangin migilote kisia hi.Topa’ galte penlono etlawm tawh kibang a,amaute mangthang pak uh hi.Meikhu banginmangthang uh hi.
Migilo in leitawi la a,lohkik zo nawn lo hi.Thuman mi ahihlehcingh-in mi a pia hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’ thupha piakte inleitung luah ding uh a,ahih hangin a samsiattekipuaseh ding hi.
Topa in mi a lam pai nading lak a,ama lungkim bangin a gamta paamah in a kipsak hi.
Amah a puk hangin lutuk lo ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in ama khut len hi.
Thuman mi a kinusiacip,a suanlekhakte ngen tawmina kivak, ka neu lai a kipanintu-a ka teek hun ciang dongka mu ngei nai kei hi.
Amah in mi citpiak ngitngetin,mi tungah leitawi pia khia a,a suanlekhakte zongthupha ngah mi a suak hi.
Siatna panin kikem inla,gamtat hoih in;tua hileh na khantawnin,na kip paisuak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in thutang deih a,ama mi siangthote nusia lo ding hi.Thuman mitekikemcing den dinga,ahi zongin migilo’ suanlekhaktekipuaseh ding hi.
Thuman mi in leitung luah dinga,tua leitang tungahteeng paisuak ding hi.
Thuman mi’ kam in pilna gen a,a leii in thutang gen hi.
A lungsim sungahama Pasian’ thukham om a,a gamtatna khempeuh ahlampial hetlo hi.
Migilo in thuman mi encik a,thah dingin a zong hi.
Topa in migilo pa’ khut sungahamah nusia lo dinga,thusit dingin a kipaipih cianginmawhna thuaksak lo ding hi.
Topa ngak inla, ama lampi zui in.Leitang a luah dinginnang hong liansak dinga,migilote’ siatnanangmah in na en ding hi.
Lebanon taamtak sing bangina sang pha mahmahmigilo kiphasak khatkeimah in ka mu hi.
Ama kiangah ka paikik a,amah na om nawn lo hi.Amah ka zonzon hanginkimu zo nawn lo hi.
Paubaang lo mi ciamteh inla,thutang mi en in;bang hang hiam cih lehgal a phuang lo mi adinginnopna a om hi.
Ahih hangin thupalsattekisusia mang khin dinga,migilote’ suanlekhaktekipuaseh ding hi.
Topa in thuman mite hon khia a,amah pen haksat hun cianginamaute’ bukna ahi hi.
Amaute in Topa beel ahih maninamah in amaute huhin hon khia a,migilote’ kiang paninamaute honin suaktasak hi.
Gimna a Thuak, a Kisik mipa’ Thungetna
Topa aw, a hehsa-inkei hong taii kei inla,lungsosa inkei hong thuhilh kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehnangma thaltangteka sungah hong tum khin a,ka tungah na khuttumhong tu khinta hi.
Nangma hehna hanginkei ka ci na a,ka mawhna hanginka pumtangin ka na hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehka mawhnate inka lu dong hong tuum zo a,keima puak dingin a gikluavangik tawh kibang hi.
Ka haina hanginka liamnate nai-in uih a,
keimah hong kikunsak a,hong kibokcipsak hi.Sunthapai-in kapinka vak kawikawi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehka ci sa mahmah a,nakpitakin ka ci na hi.
Kei hong kinengcip gawpinka thahatna bei mang khin a,ka lungsim gimna hanginthumin ka tautau hi.
Topa aw,ka deihna khempeuh na thei a,ka khuisatnate na za hi.
Ka lungtang kisat a,ka tha in lel hi.Ka mit in zongkhua mu thei nawn lo hi.
Ka gim thuakna-ah ka lawmte leka kithuahpihtekidang koih uh a,keima behte nangawnkei kiang pan gamla om uh hi.
Kei a hong that nuamte ina thang uh zak a,kei’ natna ding a zongte insiatna ding thu bek gen uh a,sunthapai-in khemna bekbekngaihsutin nei uh hi.
Ahih hangin kei pen bilngongka bang a, khua ka za kei hi.A kam a ka thei lo,a pau thei lo mi ka bang hi.
Bil khua za lo,tawnna kam a za thei lomi khat tawh kei ka kibang takpi hi.
Ahih hangin Topa aw,nangmah kong muang hi.Topa ka Pasian aw,a hong dawng ding panangmah na hi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh,“Ka khe a taal cianginkei tunga hong kihisakte,keima gim thuakna-ahlungdamsak kei in,”cih bek kong thum hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehpuk dingin ka kithawi a,ka gimna kam tuan lo hi.
Ka thuman lohna ka pulak a,ka mawhna hangin ka dah hi.
A thuman lopi-inka gal a hite thahat a,kei a hong mudah khialtetam mahmah uh hi.
A hoih gamta ka hih maninka hoihna pensiatna tawh a hong thukteka langpangte ahi hi.
Topa aw, kei hong nusia kei in.Ka Pasian aw,ka kiang pan gamla om ke’n!
Topa, kei hong honpa aw,keimah a hong huh dinginhong manlang in.
Nuntakna Kician lo, A Mawkna Ahihna
“Ka leii tawhka khialh loh nadinginka gamtatna ka kikem dinga,ka omna-ah migilote a omlai tengka kam ka kham ding hi,” ka ci hi.
Pau loin ka dai om a,ka dai omna a mawkna suak a,ka thuakna khang semsem hi.
Ka sungah ka lung so a,ka lungngaih cianginka lung so semsem hi.Tua ciangin ka pau khia a,
“Topa aw,ka mong le ka hun a kisehzahhong theisak inla,ka nuntakna a beipak hun dinghong theisak in!” ka ci hi.
Ka nuntakna hunkhutme tan bang bekin na bawl a,ka nuntakna hun nangma muhna-ahbangmah gentham lo hi.Mihing khempeuh,husan bang bek hi takpi hi.
Niliim banginmihing pai kawikawi takpi hi.A mawkna-inamau lungkham takpi uh a,kua’ ngah ding cih thei lopi-inmite in na a khol uh hi.
Tu-in Topa aw, ke’n,bang ngaklai ding ka hi hiam?Keima lametnanangma sung bekah om hi.
Ka thupalsatna khempeuh paninkei hong hon khia inla,mite’ nuihsatinkei hong bawl kei in.
Hih bangin a hong bawlnangmah na hih maninpau loin ka om a,ka kam ka ka kei hi.
Nong vuakna maka tung panin la khia in.Na hong vuakna hanginka tha beita hi.
Mi khat a mawhna hangintai-in na sat ciangin,nget in a nektum banginama na manpha na beisak hi.Mihing khempeuhhusan khat bang bek hi takpi hi.
Topa aw,ka thungetna hong ngai inla,ka kikona hong za in.Ka khitui luanna hong thudon in.Bang hang hiam cih lehka pu ka pate khempeuh banginkei zong na zin, na peemta ka hi hi.
Ka manthan hun matenginka lungnop theih nadinginkei hong en in!
Topa lameninka ngak ngiungeu a,amah kei lam hong nga-inka kikona aw hong za hi.
Dahna dum sung, buannawng paninkei hong kai khia-insuangpi tungah ka khete nga a,ka khesikna muna muanhuaisak hi.
Eima Pasian phatna la thakkeimah hong hilh hi.Mi tampite in hih thu mu-inamah zahtak ding uh a,amaute khempeuh inTopa muang ding uh hi.
Topa a muang a,mi kiphasakte lamah a kihei lo,pasian man lote lamaha pial khia lo mi thupha ngah ahi hi.
Topa ka Pasian aw,na sep a lamdangte leko adingin na ngaihsutnatetampi tak na phasak a,kuamah dang tawhtehtheih na hi kei hi.Tuate pulakin gen ding hi leng,gen khit zawh ding hi lo hi.
Gan gawh biakna lekhawhsa tawh biaknana deih kei a,khua ka zak theih nadingbil na hong guan hi.Meihal biakna le mawhmaina dingbiakna zong na kulsak kei hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, “En in,laibu sungah keima thua kigelh khinsa banginka hong pai hi.
Nangma deih bang hihna-ahnuam ka sa hi, ka Pasian aw.Nangma thukhamka lung sungah om hi,” ka ci hi.
Hotkhiatna hangin lungdam thumihonpi lakah ka gen ding hi.Topa aw, lungdam thugenka khawl ngei kei ding hi.
Nangma hotkhiatna thu ka im kei a,na thumanna le na hotkhiatnaka gen khin hi.Na itna kip le na thumannamihonpi tungah ka im kei hi.
Topa aw, na hehpihnakei kiang panin humcip kei inla,na itna kip le na thumannakei a hong kem tawntung dinghisak ta in.

Bang hang hiam cih leha malin sim zawh loh dingsiatna tampite in kei hong umcih a,khua a hong musak thei lozah dong dinginka mawhna thamanka thuak khinta hi.Amaute ka sam mal sangintam zaw uh a, ka lung in a lel ta hi.
Topa aw,keimah hong hon khia nuam in.Topa aw, hong huh meng in.
Kei a hong that nuamtezahhuaisak inla, maisiasak in.Keima siatna ding a deihtenungkiksak inla minsiasak in.
Keima tungah, “Ha ha!”hong ci vialtezahhuaina tawh maikhingsak in.
Ahih hanginnang a hong zongte khempeuhnangma hangin nuamin kipak henla,na hotkhiat ding a deihte in,“Topa lian hi!”ci ngitnget ta uh hen.
Kei ka hihleh zawngin ka cimawh a,ahih hangin Topa inkei hong mangngilh lo hi.Nang pen kei hong huhpa lehong hon khia pa na hi hi.Zekai kei in, ka Pasian aw.
Cidamna ding Ngetna
Mi genthei a khualtethupha ngah ahi hi.Topa in haksatna hunahamaute hon khia ding hi.
Topa inamaute hu-in hingsak dinga,leitungah amautethupha ngah mi kici ding hi.Amau’ galte’ khut sungahamaute pia lo ding hi.
A ci uh a nat cianginTopa in amaute kem dinga,a cinatna khempeuh uhdamsakkik ding hi.
Ke’n ahihleh, “Topa aw,kei hong hehpih inla,kei hong damsak in;bang hang hiam cih lehnang tungah kong khial zo hi,”ka ci hi.
Ka galte in elna tawhkeima thu gen uh a,“Cik ciangin amah a si tam,cik ciangin a min a mang tam,”ci uh hi.
Keimah a en dinginmi hong pai ciangin,kam mawkna a pau uh hi.A lungsim uhahsiatna kaikhawm uh a,a pai khiat uh ciangina genthang uh hi.
Kei hong mudah khempeuh inkeima thu kihuauhuau uh a,kei adingina sia thei pen dinga geelgeel uh hi.
Amaute in, “Amahnak gim mahmah hi.A lupna panin thokik zo nawn loding hi,” ci uh hi.
Ka muan, ka lawm it pa,keima an a ne pa nangawn ina khetul tawhkei hong peek vial hi.
Ahih hangin, Topa aw,amaute na thukkik theih nadinginkei hong hehpih inla,hong damsak in.
Ka galte inkeimah hong zo lo dinga,keima tungah nong lungkimnaka thei ding hi.
Keima hoihna hanginna hong huh dinga,nangma omna-ahnong omsak tawntung ding hi.
Israel Pasian,Topa in khang tawntunginthupha ngah tahen.
BU NIHNASala om hun le Lungkham hunin Pasian Lunggulhna
Sakhi in tuiluang sialsiala lunggulh banginnang ka hong lunggulh hi,ka Pasian aw.
A nungta Pasian kong deih hi.Cik ciangin kei hong pai-inPasian’ maitanghong mu thei ding ka hi hiam?
Mite in keima tungah,“Na Pasian koi-ah om ahi hiam?”hong cihcih sungteng,sun le zaninka khitui an-in ka ne hi.
Ka lungsim sung ka suah khia a,pawi bawl mihon khatkipakin otna le nuamna la tawhPasian’ inn-ah ka makaihna,mihonpi tawh ka painaka phawkkik hi.
Bang hangin kha kunkun a,lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam?Pasian’ sungah lametna nei ning;bang hang hiam cih lehkei a hong huh ka Pasianka phatkik ngawn ding hi.
Ka lungsim tamkham ahih maninJordan le Hermon gam,Mizar mual tung paninnang ka hong phawk hi.
Nangma tuizeu gingtekhatlekhat kidawng uh a,dahna tuihualte inkei a hong tuum hi.
Topa in sun tawntungina itna kip hong lak a,zan hun cianginnuntakna a hong piaPasian’ tungah thungetna la ka sa hi.
“Bang hanginkei hong mangngilh na hi hiam?Galte in hong sukcip maninbang hangin kapinkidikdik ka hi hiam?”ci-in ka Pasian,kei a hong huhpa’ tungah ka gen hi.
Ka langte in kei tungah,“Na Pasian koi-ah om ahi hiam?”hong cihcih sungteng,ka sungah meima nai tawm banginhong tum ngangngang hi.
Bang hangin kha kunkun a,lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam?Pasian’ sungah lametna nei ning;bang hang hiam cih lehkei a hong huh ka Pasianka phatkik ngawn ding hi.
Biakinn-ah Ciahkik ding Lamenin Thungetna
Pasian aw,ka dikna hong langsak inla,migilote tawh ka thu-ahkei hong panpih in.Mi khemte le thutang lotekiang panin kei hong hon khia in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehka hong belh Pasian na hi hi.Bang hanginkei hong nil khia na hi hiam?Galte’ sukcip maninbang hangin kapinkidikdik ka hi hiam?
Na khuavak le na thumanhong sawl khia inla,na mual siangtho, na omna-ahkei hong paipih sakin,hong khasak in.
Tua ciangin na biakna tau-ah ahi a,ka lung a hong damsakPasian kiangahahi zongin ka pai dinga,laiza khausai lasakna tawhnang kong phat ding hi,aw Pasian, ka Pasian aw.
Bang hangin kha kunkun a,lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam?Pasian sungah lametna nei ning;bang hang hiam cih lehkei a hong huh ka Pasianka phatkik ngawn ding hi.
Lungkham Hunin Nidanga Hotkhiatna Phawk
Pasian aw, ka pu ka pate uha khan lai-a na hihnasate,amaute in kote tungahhong gen uh a,kote in ka bil uh tawhka za khin uh hi.
Nangmah in minam dangtena hawl khia mang a,ahih hangin amau’ munahka pu ka pate uh na tengsak hi.Midangte na su gawp a,ahih hanginamaute na suaktasak hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute innamsau tawh leitang ngah lo uh a,amau’ khut in amaute’ tungahgualzawhna pia lo hi.Na khut taklam le na baan,na hehpihna maipha hizaw hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute tungahnang na lungkim hi.
Nang pen Jakob adingingualzawhna a sehkhol,keima Kumpipa lekeima Pasian na hi hi.
Nangma huhna tawhka galte uh ka sawnpai uh a,ko a hong do mitena min suangin ka tuancil uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cihka thalpi suanin ka nei kei a,ka namsau in zongkei hong hon zo lo hi.
Ahih hangin nangmah inka galte’ kiang panunkote na hong hon a,ko a hong mudahtena zahhuai gawpsak khin hi.
Pasian’ hanginkote ka angtang ngitnget uh a,nangma tungahka lungdam tawntung ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin nangmah inkote hong nusia-in,nong minsiasak khin a,ka galkap hon uh tawhna hong kuankhawm kei hi.
Galte kiang paninkote nong nungkiksak a,ka galte un ka neihsa teng uhbuluah khin uh hi.
Tuu gawh ding banginkote na hong bawl a,minam dangte lakahnong thehthang khin hi.
Na mite a man tawmno khatinna hong zuak a,a man ding na sang nget kei hi.
Ka veengte uh’ zahko,ka kiim uha omte’ nuihsat lehthusim lohinkote na hong bawl khin hi.
Minam dangte lakaha sia lama gentehna,mite lakah ciamnuih-a neihinkote na hong bawl khin hi.
Keimah a hong ko mi lekeimah a hong minsiasakmite’ kampauna ahi a,galte le langte inhong bawlna hang ahi zongin,sunthapai-in ka zahhuai den a,maizumna tawh ka kidim hi.
Na thuciamna-ah khial lo napi,nang hong mangngilh lo napi,hih thute khempeuhko tungah hong tung khin hi.
Ngiate’ omna-ahkote hong balnen gawpin,khuamialpi sungahnong paihdak ding zahin,ka lungsim uh kihei nai lo a,ka kalsuan uh lampial nai lo hi.
Ka Pasian uh mangngilh khininpasian dang tungah ka khutte uha khakkhin hi le ung,
Pasian in hih thumu khia lo ding ahi hiam?Bang hang hiam cih leh amah inlungsim thusim a thei hi.
Nangma hangin sunthapai-inkote hong kithat a,gan gote’ tuu gawh ding banginkote hong kikoih hi.
Topa aw,bang hangin ihmu na hi hiam?Nangmah hong tho tawm in!
Bang hanginna maitang seel na hi hiam?Bang hangin ka thuakna uh lehong kisukcipnatemangngilh na hi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih lehleilakah ka puk uh a,leivui lakah guallelin ka lum uh hi.
Tho to in,kote a hong huh dinginhong pai in!Na itna kip hanginkote hong hon khia in!
Kumpi Mopina Pawi La
Thubul hoih khat tawhka lungsim hong dimletin,kumpipa la ka phuah a,ka leii pen lai thei pa’ laikung tawhhong kibang hi.
Mihingte lakahnangmah na hoih pen a,thugen na siam a,na kam khum zungzung hi.Tua ahih manin Pasian in nangthupha hong pia tawntung hi.
Vanglian kumpipa aw,na minthanna le na liatna tawhna namsau kuah in.
Thumanna a omna ding lethuman a hu dinginna minliatna tawhgualzo-in hong pusuak inla,dipkuathuai hihnatena taklam khut nangmahkihilhsak in.
Kumpipa’ galte’ lungtangahna thaltang hiamte lut a,mite na nuai-ah puk uh hi.
Na kumpi tokhom siangthokip tawntung hi.Na kumpi ciangkhutthumanna ciangkhut hi a,
thuman deihingitlohna na mudah hi.Tua ahih ciangin Pasian ahi,nangma Pasian inna khangualte tungah a kikhai to-inlungdamna sathaunang hong nilh zo a,
na puantualpite myrrh paknamtui,aloes paknamtui,le thalsing namtuite a nam hi.Saiha tawh kibawl innpite paninkhausai lasaknate innang hong lungdamsak a,
kumpite’ tanute,numei uliante lakah om a,na taklamahOfir gam khamte tawh kizeminkumpinu a ding hi.
Tanu aw, ngai dih in;ngaihsun inla,na bil hong ngat in.Na mite le na behte mangngilh in.
Na melhoihna hanginkumpipa in hong deih ding hi.Na topa ahih cianginama mai-ah kun in.
Mi hau pen ahi Taia mite inna manpha namkim letsong tawhnang hong maivil ding uh hi.
Kumpi tanu a inndei sungahkham puantualpi tawh kizem a,mel tuamtuam a neipuantualpite silh a,mihon kigual deudaute lakaha kithuahpih nungakte leamah a khate tawhkumpipa kiangah kipaipih hi.
Kumpipa’ inn-ah a tun ciangunlungdamna le nuamna tawhamaute kitumpih hi.
Na pate’ tang dingna tapate hong hi dinga,nangmah in leitung khempeuh ahamaute, ulian na suaksak ding hi.
Keimah in khang tawntunginna min ka kiphawksak ding hi.Tua ahih ciangin mite innang hong phat den ding uh hi.
Pasian, Ama Mite’ Belh
Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a,haksat hunina hong huh pahpah pa ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin,leitung kikhinin,mualte tuipi sunga kidenna zongin,a tuite ging zuazua-inphuan zuazua a,hih ginna hanginmual liante a liing zongin,i lau kei ding hi.
Sangpenpa’ tenna khua siangtho,Pasian’ khuapi, a lungdamsakgun khat a om hi.
Ama laizangah Pasian om a,amah a kiliing kei ding hi.Pasian in phalvak tunginamah huh ding hi.
Minamte lungkham uh a,kumpi gamte kiliing hi.Ama aw ging khiasak a,leitung kicim gawp hi.
Vanglian Topaeite tawh hong omkhawm a,Jakob Pasian eima belh ahi hi.
Hong pai unla,Topa’ sepna hong mu un.Leitung khempeuhgamkhing a suahsak khitnahong en un.
Amah inleimong dongah gal beisak hi.Amah in thalpi kuaitaninteipi susia a,leengte mei tawh a haltum hi.
“Om hithiat unla,Pasian ka hihna thei un.Minamte lakahkeimah hong kisangsak a,leitung khempeuh ahka min hong kithangsak hi,”a ci hi.
Vanglian Topa,eite tawh hong omkhawm a,Jakob’ Pasian, eima belh ahi hi.
Pasian, Kumpi Ahihna ah Minamkimte’ Lungdamna
Mi khempeuh aw,na khut uh beeng un!Lungdamna la nakpi-in sa-inPasian phat un.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa, a Sangpenpa, dipkuathuai a,leitung khempeuh a ukkumpi lian khat ahi hi.
Mi khempeuh eima nuai-ah,minamte i khenuai-ahamah in hong zawhsak hi.
Ama it Israel-te’ angtanpiheima luah ding leitangamah in hong teelsak hi.
Awging tawh Pasian paito a,peengkul aw tawh Topa paito hi.
Pasian tungah phatna la sa un,phatna la sa un!I Kumpipa tungahphatna la sa un, phatna la sa un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian penleitung khempeuhte’ kumpi ahi hi.La sakna tawh amah phat un!
Pasian in minamte uk a,a tokhom siangtho tungahPasian tu hi.
Uliante le Abraham’ Pasian’ mitekipawl khawm uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehleitung mite’ lumte khempeuhPasian-a’ suak khinta a,amah a sangpi-in kithangsak hi.
Zion a Hoihna le a Muanhuaina
Topa lian a,i Pasian’ khuapi sungahnakpitakin phat ding ahi hi.
Kumpi lianpa’ khuapi,leilu lama a omama mual siangthohoihin a sang mahmahZion mual penleitung khempeuh’lungdamna ahi hi.
A muanhuai tua mualahamah a hu taktakpa ahihnaPasian in a lakkhin hi.
Ahi zongin, kumpite kikaikhawmin,a sim dinginhong kuankhawm uh hi.
Amaute in Zion a muh phetunlamdangsa mahmah uh a,dipkua vatin tai uh hi.
Numei nausuak na a sa banginamaute liing gawp uh hi.
Nisuahna huihpi tawhTarshish kici teembaw liantenang na susia hi.
Ka zaksa bangun Vanglian Topa’khuapi, i Pasian’ khuapi,Pasian in a phuhkip ngitngetnaka mu khin uh hi.
Pasian aw, na biakinn sungahnangma itna kipka ngaihsun uh hi.
Pasian aw, na min inleimong dong a zelh bangin,nangmah hong kiphatna in zonga zel hi.Na taklam khutgualzawhna tawh a kidim hi.
Zion Mual lungdamsak in.Na thukhenna hanginJudah mite lungdamsak in.

Hih pen eima Pasian hi a,a tawntungin eima Pasian hi,ci-in khangkikte tungahna gen theih nadingunZion kiimvelin pai-in,a tausang phazah sim unla,a kulh phungmaia hoih mahmahte ngaihsunin,a phualpi muanhuaiteva nawk kim un.Amah pen a tawntunginlam hong lak ding pa ahi hi.
Hauhna in Sihna Pengsak lo
Hih thu za un,mi khempeuh aw!Ngai un, leitunga a teeng khempeuh,
milian mineu,mihau mizawngte aw!
Ka kam in pilna thu gen dinga,ka lungsim ngaihsutnakitelsiang ding hi.
Paunak thu theihhak khatka ngaihsun dinga,laiza lasakna tawha khiatna ka gentel ding hi.
Haksat hun, hong bawlsiate’gitlohna in hong nencip cianginbang hangin lau ding ka hi hiam?
Mite in a hauhna uh muangin,tampi a neihna uha kisaktheihpih hangun,
amah le amaha kitankhia tawm zo taktak,a nuntakna man ding Pasian’ tungaha pia zo mi kuamah om lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a nuntaknatatna ding a man tam mahmah a,Leihawmpi mu ngei lo zah dinga hing tawntung dinginkitankhia zo ngei lo hi.
Amah in a pilte nangawna si mu dinga, a haite le a tei lotea kibangin sia-in,amau’ neihsa khempeuhmidangte’ tungah nusiat uh hi.
Amaute in leitangteamau’ min a puaksak uh hanginhankhuk pen khang tawntungamau’ omna hi ngitnget ding hi.
Ama hauhna-ahmi kipsuak thei lo a,a si thei ganhingte tawha kibang lel ahi hi.
Hih pen a kihai muante’ ngah hi a,amau’ ngahsa tawha lungkimte’ thumong ahi hi.
Tua bangin amauteLeinuai-a dingin kiseh hi.Sihna penamau a cing pa hi ding hi.Hankhuk sungah amautetuaksuksuak ding uh a,a mel uh sia dinga,Leinuai, amau’ inn hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian inLeinuai’ vangliatna paninkei hong hon khia ding hi;bang hang hiam cih lehamah in kei hong sang ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh a hauh ciang ahi a,a innkuan minthannaa khan ciang ahi zonginlau-in lunghihmawh dinginngaihsun tuan kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih leha sih cianginbangmah keng lo dinga,a minthanna inamah zuisuk lo ding hi.
A hin lai-in amaha lungdamin kingaihsunin,mi khat in ama adingna a lim sep cianginphatna a ngah hangin,
khuavak a mu nawn lo dingina si khinsaa pu a pate kiang mahahamah pai veve ding hi.
Ama hauhna inmi hing paisuaksak thei lo a,a si thei ganhingte tawha kibang lel ahi hi.
Pasian in Biakpiakna Sangin Gamtatna tawh Thu Khen zaw
Vanglian, Topa Pasianhong pau khia a,nisuahna le nitumna kikalleitung mi khempeuh a khawm hi.
Hoih kicinna Zion paninPasian hong taang khia hi.
Eite’ Pasian hong pai a,amah dai ommawk lo hi.Ama mai-ah mei husia om a,a kimkotah huihpi om hi.
A mite tungahthu a khen theih nadingintunglam vantung le leitung a sam hi.
“Biakpiakna tawh,kei tungah thuciamna a bawlte,ka mi citakteka kiangahhong khawm un,” a ci hi.
Vantung in ama thumanna gen hi;bang hang hiam cih lehPasian mahmah thukhen pa ahi hi.
“Ka mite aw, ngai un;thu kong gen ding hi.Israel-te aw, note’ langkhat ahteci ka pang ding hi.Kei pen Pasian ka hi a,nomau’ Pasian ka hi hi.
Na biakpiakna uhahnote kong mawhsak kei hi.Na meihal biaknate uhka mai-ah om ngitnget hi.
Ahi zongin na inn pan uhabawngtal hitalehna ganbuk pan uha keeltal hitalehka hong sang kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehgamlak ganhingte khempeuh,mual tul tampite tunga a omganhingte keima-a’ ahi hi.
Huih lak vasate khempeuhkeimah in ka thei a,gamlak a gamta khempeuhkeima-a’ ahi hi.
“Ka gil kial taleh zongnote kiang paninan kong ngen kei ding hi;bang hang hiam cih lehleitung le a sunga om khempeuhkeima-a’ ahi hi.
Bawngtalte’ sa ne dinga,keelte’ sisan dawn dingka hi hiam?
Lungdam biakpiaknaPasian tungah pia unla,Sangpenpa tungahna thuciamnate uh bawl un.
Haksat hun cianginkeima tungah hong ko un.Note kong hon khia dinga,note in keima minnong thangsak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin migilote tungahPasian in thu gen a,“Ka thukhamte lawhna dingka thuciamnana muk uh tawh genna dingthu nei na hi uh hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih lehhilh ding na ut kei uh a,ka thute na nunglam uhahna paai uh hi.
Guta khat mu le-uhcinama lawm na hi pah uh a,a paktat mite tawhna kikhawl uh hi.
“Na kam uh, siatna na uksak uh a,na leii un khemna a khangsak hi.
Na sanggamte uh langpanginthu na gen uh a,amaute’ mawhna na zong uh hi.
Hihte khempeuhna gamta khin uh a,bangmah ka pau kei hi.Kei pen no tawh a kibanginnong ngaihsunkha uh hi.Ahih hangin tu-innote ka hong taii a, na mawhna uhna mai uhah ka koih hi.
“Tua ahih cianginPasian a mangngilh mite aw,hih thu ciamteh un.Tua hikeilehnote kong bal gawp ding hi.Note hong hon khia dingkuamah om lo hi.
Biakpiak nadingin lungdam piaknahong paipih mi inkei a hong pahtawi ahi hi.Ka thu a mang mite khempeuhka hon khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Mawhmaina ding Ngetna a
Pasian aw,nangma itna kip om banginkei hong hehpih inla,na hehpihna lian om banginka thu palsatnatehong phiatkhiatsak in.
Ka khialhna paninhong silsiang kiuhkeuh inla,ka mawhna paninkei hong siangsak in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehka thupalsatnate ka thei a,ka mawhnate khempeuhka phawk ngitnget hi.
Nangma tungah khialin,nangma muhna-aha sia ka gamta khin hi.Tua ahih cianginna thugenna-ah nang na thutang a,thu na hong khenna-ahpauna ding bangmah om lo hi.
A khialsa mahin kei ka suak a,ka nu in a gil sungahhong paii tung a kipana mawh sa ka hi hi.
Nang in nuntakna sungahthumanna na deih hi.Tua ahih cianginka lungsim tawngahciimna hong hilh in.
Puknah tawh hong nul in;kei ka siang ding hi.Hong sil in;vuk sangin ka ngo zaw ding hi.
Lungdamna le kipahnakei tungah hong pia inla,na hong suk gawp mipahong lungdamsak in.
Ka mawhna khempeuhna mai panin seel inla,ka khialhna khempeuhhong phiatkhiatsak in.
Pasian aw, keima sungahlungsim siangthohong piangsak inla,a thak a man ngaihsutnaka sungah hong guan in.
Nangma omna paninkei hong paai khia kei inla,keima kiang paninna kha siangtho la khia kei in.
Nong hotkhiatna hanginhong lungdamsakkik inla,utna lungsim tawhkeimah hong huh ta in.
Tua ciangin thupalsattena zia na tong ka hilh dinga,nangma lamah mimawhtehong kiheikik ding uh hi.
Kei a hong hon Pasian aw,sih nading paninkei hong hon khia in.Nong hotkhiatna thulungdam takin ka sa ding hi.
Topa aw, ka pau theih nadinginkei hong huh in;nangmah kong phat ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehganhing tawhbiakna na deih kei hi.Meihal biaknahong pia hita leng zong,na lungdam kei ding hi.
Pasian’ san theih biakna penlungsim ki ahi hi.Pasian aw, a kitamzan,a kisik lungsimna simmawh kei ding hi.
Na lungkimna pha tawhZion tungah a pha bawl inla,Jerusalem kulhpite ciangkik ta in.
Tua ciangin biakpiakna man,meihal biakna lemeihal biakpiakna bupahna lungkim dinga,na biakna tau tungahbawngtalte hong kipia ding hi.
Gilo a Kisialhna Kitaia
Mi thahatpa aw, bang hanginmiphate suksiatna-ahkisial na hi hiam?Sunthapai-in,suksiatna na ngaihsunsun hi.
Zuau nasem pa aw, na leiia hiam pha mahmahmulkiatna tem tawh kibang hi.
Hoihna sangin siatna na deih zaw a,thuman genna sanginzuauna na deih zaw hi.
Mi a khem thei pa aw,a siasak thei kammal khempeuhdeih belin na nei hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in nanghong susia paisuak ding hi.Amah in nang hong bawhinna buk sung paninhong kai khia dinga,a hingte’ leitang paninhong zunglot ding hi.
Thuman mite in nang hong mu-in,lau mahmah ding uh a,nang hong nuihsanin,
“Pasian a beel lo,ama hauhnate a muang,ama hauhna a beel pa en un,”hong ci ding uh hi.

Zion-ah Pasian’ Liatna
Judah gam sungahPasian kithei a,Israel gam sungahama min lian hi.
Zion khua sungahama tenna mun kibawl hi.
Amah in tua lai-ah thaltangte,lum, namsau le galhiamtea kuaitan hi.
A om ngitnget mual liante sanginna min thang zaw a, na lian zaw hi.
A thahatte’ neihsa nate kisut khia a,amaute ihmucip suak uh hi.
Jakob’ Pasian aw,nangma thuhilhna hanginsakol le a tung tuang pakhawlcip uh hi.
Ahih hangin nangna kihtakhuai mahmah hi.Na heh khit phot cianginnangma mai-ahkua ding ngam nawn dingahi hiam?
Vantung panin thukhennana gen khia hi.Gimna a thuak leitung mikhempeuh a hon dinginthukhen dingin Pasiana kipat ciangin leitunglau mahmahin tang hetloina om khikhe hi.
Mihingte’ hehna innang hong kiphatna dingpiangsak dinga, na hehna panina suakta mite innangmah pahtawina pawia bawl ding uh hi.

Topa na Pasian’ tungahna thuciamnate uh pia unla,tuate khempeuh zui un.Leitung kumpite sangina kihtakhuai zaw,uliante’ lungsim a niamkhiat,zahtak ding ahipa’ tungah,ama kiimah a om mi khempeuhte inletsong puak ta uh hen!
Lungkham Ciangin Kihehnepna
Pasian’ tungaha gingin ka kiko khia a,a hong zaktheih nadingina gingin ka kiko hi.
Ka lungkham huninkeimah in Topa ka zong hi.Zanin thu ngeningim hetloin ka khut ka zan a,ahi zongin hehnepnaka ngah kei hi.
Keimah in Pasian ka ngaihsun a,ka tautau hi.Lung ka geelgeel a,ka gim mahmah hi.
A ihmu lo dinginkei na hong bawl a,lungkham lua-inka pau thei kei hi.
Hun luite ka ngaihsun a,sawtpek lai-a kumte ka phawk hi.
Zanthapai-in ka lungsimahka kihoho a, lung geelgeelinthu ka kan ciangin:
“Topa in hong nial paisuakin,kei tungahmaipha hong piakik lo ding hiam?
Ama itna kip bei paisuakin,ama thuciamtemai mang suak ding hiam?
Pasian in hehpihna a neih dingmangngilh khinta ahi hiam?Ama hehna in hehpihnatevukcip khin ahi hiam?” ka ci hi.
Tua bang ahihleh,“Sangpenpa’ hat nawn lohna penka khakham veina ahi hi,” ka ci hi.
Topa’ sepnateka lungsimah ka phawk dinga,hun lui lai-a nangma na lamdangteka ciamteh ding hi.
Nangma nasepna khempeuhka lung ngaingai dinga,nangma sep na lianteka ngaihsunsun ding hi.
Pasian aw, nangma lampisiangtho hi.Eima Pasian tawh kibanginbang pasian lian ahi hiam?
Nang pen na lamdangte a bawl,minam dangte’ lakahna vangliatnaa lang khiasak khin Pasian na hi hi.
Nangmah in na vangliatna tawhJakob le Josef’ suante,na mite na hon khia hi.
Tui in nang hong muh cianginPasian aw,tuite in nang hong muh ciangina lau uh hi.Tui thukpi zong a liing hi.
Meiipite in tui sung khia-in,vante ging damdam a,nangma thaltangtemun citengah a leeng uh hi.
Na vanging lianpipingpei sungah omin,khuaphialepte in leitung taan a,leitang liing gawpina kising damdam hi.
Nangma lamlianpi tuipi tung hi a,nangma lamneute zongluiliante’ tung mah ahi hi.Ahi zonginna khekhapte kimu lo hi.
Nangmah inMoses le Aaron’ khut tawhnangma mitetuuhon bangin na makaih hi.
Mite Thumang lo Napi-in Pasian in Lamlak
Ka mite aw,keima hilhna ngai unla,ka kam tawh ka thugentena bil uh hong ngat un.
Note tungah thugentehna zanginka kam ka-in thukong gen ding hi.I pu i pate in hong gensa,eite in i zaksa le i theihsa,tanglai-a thuthukteka hong gen khia ding hi.
Hih thute, i tate tungaheite in im loin,a hong piang lai dingkhang thakte tungah,Topa’ minthang nasepna,ama vangliatna,ama sepsa na lamdangtei gen ding hi.

Amaute pen Pasian tungaha lungsim thuman lo,lungsim kip a nei lo khangmi,lungsim khauhin a lehdo khangmi,amau’ pulepate tawh kibang loin,amaute in Pasian sungahamau’ lametna koihin,Pasian’ nasepnatemangngilh loin,ama thupiakte zui-in,a suak nai lo naupangte,a hong piangkikkhang thakte in a thu thei-in,amaute ding khia-inamau’ tuletate tungaha thu a gen theih nadingin,amah in, i pate in a tatea hilhsawn dinga a sawl ahi,Israel sungah thukham khat koihin,Jakob sungahtecipanna khat a koih hi.
Thal a tawi Efraim mite,galkido ni-in nungkik uh hi.
Amaute inPasian’ thuciamna zui lo uh a,ama thukham bangingamta nuam lo uh hi.
Ama bawlsa le amaute tungahnalamdang a lahsateamaute in mangngilh uh hi.
Egypt gam sung Zoan munah,a pu a pate uh’ muhna-ahamah in nalamdang a bawl hi.
Amah in tuipi kikhensakinamaute kantansak a,tuite a lompi-in a omsak hi.
Sun hunin amah inamaute meiipi khat tawh kha a,zan tawntung,meikuang taang khat tawhamaute a kha hi.
Amah in gam sungahsuangpite kitamsak a,tuithukpi sung panina piang khia banginamaute’ tungahtui dawn ding tampi a pia hi.
Amah in suangpi sung paninluitui luangkhiasak a,guntui luang bangintuite a luangsak hi.
Ahi zongin ama tungahamaute khial lailai uh a,Sehnel gam sungahSangpen pa a lehpan uh hi.
Amaute in amau’ duh mahmahan a kalhna uh tawhamaute in a lungsim sung uhahPasian a ze-et uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian gensia uh a,“Pasian in gamlakahan pia thei ding ahi hiam?
Amah in suangpi sat a,tui lengkhia-intuite dimlet takpi ahi hiam?Amah in ama mite,an ahi a, sameh ahi zongina pia thei takpi ahi hiam?”a ci uh hi.
Topa in tua thu a zak cianginhehna tawh kidimin,meikuang tawh Jakob su gawp a,Israel tungah a heh semsem hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in Pasian um lo uh a,a hon khia zo dingin muang lo uh hi.
Ahi zongin amah in,tunga om vantungte thu pia-in,vantung kongte hong a,
nek dingin amau tungahmanna an zusakin,amaute tungah vantung an a pia hi.
Mihingte invantung mite’ an ne uh a,amah in amaute tungahan tampi a puak hi.
Amah in vantungahnisuahna huih nungsakin,ama vangliatna tawhleitaw lam huih pai khiatpih a,
amah in amaute tungahleivui zah-a tam sa zusak a,tuipi sehnel zah-a tamvasate a khiatsuk hi.
Amau’ giahphual laizang,amau’ omna kiim khempeuh ahtuate a kiasak hi.
Amau’ duh pen pia ahih manin,amaute in ne-in gilvah uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute ina duh pen uh a kham ma,amau’ kam sungahan a om laipi mahin,
amaute’ tungahPasian’ hehna tungkikinamah in amaute lakaha hat pen teng thatin,Israel-te’ muanlesuan tenga vatlum hi.
Hih na lamdangte khempeuha omkhin hinapi-inamaute khial lai veve uh a,ama na lamdangte’ hanginamaute in um tuan lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah inamau’ hunte husan khat banginmaimangsak a, amau’ nuntakna,launa lianpi tawh a beisak hi.
Amaute pawlkhata thah khit ciangin a omlai mitein amah zong pan uh hi.Amaute kisikin,lungsim taktak tawhPasian a zong uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian pen,amaute a hon khia,Sangpen Pasian,amaute a hupaahihna a phawk uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute ina kampi bek uh tawhamah phatkhem uh a,a leii uh tawhama tungah zuaugen uh hi.
Amaute’ lungsimama lamah kip lo uh a,ama thuciamna-ahamaute thuman lo uh hi.
Ahi zongin amah inhehpihna lungsim nei ahih maninamau’ khialhnate maisakin,amaute susia lo hi.Amah in a hehna ip zelzel a,a hehna khempeuhphong khia lo hi.
Amah in,amaute pen mihing hi lel a,a hong paikik nawn lohuihnung bang ahihna uha phawk hi.
Amaute in gamlakahamah lehdo zelzel uh a,sehnel gam sungahamah dahsak uh hi.
Amaute in amah ze-et kikkik uh a,Israel-te’ Siangtho Pasiana phin uh hi.
Galte’ kiang panin amah inamaute a hotkhiat ni hitaleh,Egypt gamah ama limtea bawl hun lai hitaleh,Zoan gamah a bawla na lamdangte hitaleh,ama vangliatna hitaleh,amaute in ngaihsutin nei lo uh hi.
Amaute in a luituite uha dawn theih loh nadinginamau’ guntuiteamah in sisan a suaksak hi.
Amaute a pet thei cippi honte,amaute’ lote a susia uiphukteamau’ lakah a sawl hi.
Amau’ lo ante tangngol pia a,amau’ sepna gahtekauphe a pia hi.
A leengguite uhgial tawh deng gawp a,a theithekte uhvukkhal tawh susia hi.
A ganhingte uh gial tawhdenglum a, a gan khawite uhkeek tawh a denglum hi.
Amaute’ tungaha lauhuai ama sinsona,hehna, thangpaihna, gimna,le a susia thei van mi honkhata khah hi.
Amah in a sinsona ip loin,kuamah hinkhawi lo a,pulnatna tawh amaute a sisak hi.
Ham’ suante’ inn sungaha ta upa pen teng,Egypt gam sung tacil khempeuhamah in a vatmai hi.
Tua ciangin amah intua bangin ama mitegamlakah pai khiatpihin,ganhing honpi banginamaute a paipih hi.
Amah in a muanhuaina munahamaute paipih ahih maninamaute lau lo uh hi.Ahih hangin tuipi inamau’ galte tuumcip hi.
A khut taklam tawhama ngahsa mual ahi,a gam siangtho-ahamaute a paipih hi.
Amau’ mai paninmidangte hawl khia-in,amaute’ luah ding neihsahawmsak a,Israel minamte amau’ buk sungaha tengsak hi.
Ahi zongin amaute inSangpen Pasian ze-etin lehdo uh a,ama thupiakna zui loin,
a pu a pate uh mah banginkiheikhia-in a zuau gamtat uh hi.Thal ginalo banginamaute a kihuiheek uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in a munsangte uh tawhamah a sinso nadinginphinphin uh a,amau’ milim bawlte tawhama hazatna dinga piangsak uh hi.
Pasian in a zak cianginheh pha mahmah a,amah in Israel-tea nial siangtho hi.
Mihingte’ lakahama omna puanbuk ahi,Shiloh khua-aama omna biakinn nusia a,
ama vangliatna,galte’ tungah ap a,ama minthanna,galte’ khutah a pia hi.
Amah in ama mitenamsau tawh sisak a,ama luahte tungaha hehna a nga hi.
Mei in a tangvalte kaang lum a,a nungakte’ pasal dingkuamah om nawn lo hi.
Amau’ siampite,namsau in puksak a,amau’ zite ina pasalte kah zo lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa penzukhamin a awng mi thahatpa,a ihmu tho bangin a khanglo hi.
Amah in a langpangte zo a,a maizum tawntung dinginamaute a koih hi.
Amah in Josef’ suante nial a,Efraim minamte teel lo hi.
Ahih hangin ama it Zion Mual,Judah minam a teel hi.
A kip den dingina phuhsa leitang bang leh,a vantung inn banginama biakinn a lam hi.
Amah in ama mi Jakob,ama luah Israel a cing dingin,no a nei tuupite a cinna,tuubukte panin la-in,ama nasem David a teel hi.
Amah in lungsim thutang tawhamaute hoihtakin cingin,a siam mahmah a khut tawhamaute lam a lak hi.
Biakinn Kininsak: Pasian’ Huh ding Ngetna
Pasian aw, na luah gam sungahdawibiate hong pai uh hi.Amaute in na biakinn siangthoninsak gawp uh a,Jerusalem khuapisiasak gawp khin uh hi.
Amaute in,na nasemte’ luanghawmtehuihlak vasate pia uh a,na mi siangthote’ sateleilak ganhingte a pia uh hi.
Amaute in Jerusalem kimkotahtui buakkhiat banginamaute’ sisan bua khia uh a,amaute a vui dingkuamah om lo hi.
Kote pen ka veengte uh’ zahko,ka kiim uha omte ina hong ko a hong nuihsatka suak khinta uh hi.
Topa aw,bang tanvei hi ding ahi hiam?Heh paisuak ding na hi hiam?Nangma hazat hehnameikuang banginkuang paisuak ding ahi hiam?
Nangmah a hong thei lominamte tung le,nangma tungah thu a hong ngen lokumpi gamte tungah heh gawp in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in ka mite uhthat mang khin uh a,ka gam sung khempeuh uhsusia gawp khin uh hi.
Ka pu ka pate uh mawhna hanginko a suanlekhaktehong lang ngaihsut kei inla,hong kiniamkoih ahih maninkote a huh dingin na hehpihnahong paisak mengmeng in.
Kote a hong hon khia Pasian aw,nangma min a than nadinginkote hong huhin,nangma min hanginkote hong khahkhia-in,ka mawhnate uh hong maisak ta in.
“Amaute’ Pasiankoi-ah om ahi hiam?”minam dangte in a cih dingkilawm ding ahi hiam?Na nasemte’ sisan luang khiaa phulakna pen,minam dangte’ lak,komau’ muhna-ah kitheisak in.
Thongkiate’ tauna ngai inla,thah dingin a kisehtena vangliatna tawh kizui-insuaktasak in.
Amaute innang hong zahkona mah tawhka veengte uh’ ang sungaha zah sagihin thuk in, Topa!
Tua ciangin nangma mi,nangma gam sung tuu kote innangma tungah lungdamnakong lak ngitnget ding uh a,a khang khangin nangmah phatnateka gengen ding uh hi.
Israel-te A Ngei A Batsakkik ding Ngetna
Tuuhon bangin Josef a paipih,Israel Tuucingpa aw, ngai in!Kherub tungah a tupa aw,
Efraim, Benjamin leManasseh’ mai-ah taang khia in!Na tha saan inla,kote a hon khia dinginhong pai ta in.
Ka ngei uh hong bangsakkik in,Pasian aw.Kote khempeuhhong kihotkhiat theih nadinginna maitang hong taangsak in.
Vanglian Topa Pasian aw,na mite’ thungetna-ah bang tanveisinso niloh ding na hi hiam?
Nangmah in a an dingunamaute tungah khitui na pia a,amaute’ dawn dinginkhitui tampi na pia hi.
Nangmah in,ka veengte uh’ thusim lohinkote na hong bawl a,ka galte un hong thusim loinhong nuihsan uh hi.
Ka ngei uh hong bangsakkik in,Vanglian Pasian aw.Kote khempeuhhong kihotkhiat theih nadinginna maitang hong taangsak in.
Nangmah in Egypt paninleenggui khat na la a,minam dangte hawl khia-in,tua leenggui na suan hi.
Nangmah in tua leenggui adinginleitang na hahsiang a,amah in zungthuk kha-ingam sung a dim hi.
Ama liim in mual liantehoihtakin liimsun a,a hiang in taamtak sing liantehoihtakin khuh a,
tuipi lamah a hiangte zamin,a dawnngekte inGunpi lam a zuan hi.
Tua ahih ciangin,lampi-ah a pai mi khempeuh ina gah a lawh theih nadingin,bang hangin nangmah ina daigawl suvang na hi hiam?
Gamlak a om ngal in susia gawp a,zangsung sa khempeuh inkivakna-in nei uh hi.
Hong kiheikik in,Vanglian Pasian aw.Vantung paninhong ensukin hong mu in.Na khut taklam in a suansa,hih leenggui hong don in.
Amaute in mei tawh halinsattan gawp uh hi.Amaute heh et inla, susia gawp in.
Ahih hangin nangma adinginna hatsak mi’ tapa,na taklama om mipa tungahna thahatna guan in.
Tua ciangin nang kiang paninka kiheikik nawn kei ding uh hi.Kote hong nungtasak in,nang kong phat ding uh hi.
Ka ngei uh hong bangsakkik in,Vanglian Topa Pasian aw.Kote khempeuhhong kihotkhiat theih nadinginna maitang hong taangsak in.
Pasian’ Hoihna le Ama Mite A Lunggulhna
Eite’ thahatna Pasian’ tungahnakpitakin la sa unla,Jakob Pasian’ tungahlungdamin awng un.
La khat phuangin, khuangno tumin,a ngaih laiza khausai lasaknale harp khausai lasaknalimtakin tum un.
Khadet, khalik,i pawi ni-in peengkul tum un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh,tua bang hih ding penIsrael-te adingin thukham hi a,Jakob Pasian’ biakna ngeinaa kip khat ahi hi.
Egypt gamah a pai lai-unIsrael mite’ tungah thupiakna-inamah in a neih ahi hi. Ka theih ngei loh kampau khathih bangin ka za hi:
“Na liangko uha om na vangikte uhka hong lakkhiatsak a,na khut uha vangikteka hong khiasak hi.
Na cihmawh uh cianginkei na hong sam uh a,keimah innote ka hong hon khia hi.A kilang lo vanging sung paninnote kong dawng a,Meribah tui phualte-ahnote ka hong ze-et hi.
Ka mite aw,note kong thuhilh laitakinlimtakin hong ngai un.Israel-te aw,keima thua hong ngai hi hoh le-uh cin!
Note’ lakahpasian dang om lo dinga,pasian dang khat’ mai-ahna kun kei ding uh hi.
Egypt gam paninnote a hong la khia,Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.Na kam uh a golin ka un,keimah in kong dimsak ding hi.
“Ahih hangin ka mite inkeima thu hong ngai lo uh a,Israel-te in keima thuthemkha zong zui lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangina ut bangun a gamta dinginamau’ lungsim khauhna banginka gamtasak hi.
Ka mite in ka thu hong ngai-in,keima deih bangin Israel a gamta hileh!
Amau’ galte khempeuhka zawhsak pak dinga,amau’ galte langpanginka khut ka liik ding hi.
Kei a hong mudahteka mai-ah hong kun ding uh a,amaute’ gimthuaknakip paisuak ding hi.
Mangbuh hoih pen tawhnote ka hong vak dinga,suangpi pan a khuaizu tawhnote kong gilvahsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Thutang loin Thukhente Kitai
Thu vaihawm kikhopna sungahPasian in ama panmun hong len a,amah in pasian-te’ lakahthu a khen hi.
“Note in bang tanveia man loin thu khenin,migilote tungah angvannazang ding na hi uh hiam?
A ginalo mite lepa a nei lo mite tungah thuman unla,a thuakte le a cimawhte’ thua manin khen un.
A ginalo mite lea cimawh mite hon unla,migilote’ khut sung paninamaute hon khia un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in thutheihna ahi a,thutelna ahi zongin bangmah nei lo uh a,khuamial sungah gamta uh ahih maninleitung bulpite khempeuha kiliing gawp hi.
Ke’n kong cih in-ah, “Note khempeuh,Sangpenpa’ tate, pasian-te na hi uh hi.
Ahi zongin mite bangin si-in,kumpi khat peuhpeuh banginna kia ding uh hi,” kong ci hi.
Pasian aw, tho in;leitung mite thu khen in.Bang hang hiam cih lehminam khempeuh nangma a’ ahi hi.
Pasian in Israel-te’ Galte A Suksiat ding Ngetna
Pasian aw, dai dide-in om kei in.Lungnuamin, tang loinommawk kei in, Pasian aw.
Bang hang hiam cih lehna galte in gamlumna piangsak uh a,nang hong mudahtekiphasak mahmah uh hi.
Amaute in khem siamna tawhna mite thangsiah uh a,amaute in na it mitelangpangin thu kikum uh hi.
Amaute in, “Hong pai un,minam khat hihna paninamaute beisak ni.Israel min peuhmahkiphawksak nawn kei ni!” ci uh hi.
Amaute in siatna ding geelinkithukhat uh a,nangmah hong langpanginthuciamna a bawl uh hi.
Edom mite le Ishmael mite,Moab le Hagri mite,
Gebal, Ammon le Amalek mite,Filistia le Taia khua mite tawhthuciam a bawl uh hi.
Assiria mite in zongamaute pawlpih uh a,amaute pen Lot’ suanlekhakte adinginpawl muanhuaite ahi uh hi.
Endor munah a kizo gawp,leilakah a luang uh a muat gawp,Midian mite’ tungah na bawl bang leh,Kishon gun-a Sisera leJabin-te’ tungah na bawl banginamaute tungah bawl in.
“Pasian’ gam hoihteeima tan dingin la ni,”a ci Oreb le Zeeb-te banginamau’ miliante bawl inla,Zeba le Zalmunna-te banginamau a ukte khempeuh bawl in.
Ka Pasian aw, amaute penpingpei sunga ninnen,huih mai-a ansi leeng bangsak ta in.
Mei in gamlak a haltum bang,mualliante a kuansak bangin
na khuapi huihpi tawhamaute delh inla,na huihpi tawh amaute lausak gawp in.
16na min hong zontheih nadinginamaute khempeuhmaizumna tawh kidimsak in.
Amaute maizumin lungkia densak inla,a mindai-in siasak in.
18leitung khempeuh aha Sangpenpa na hihnaamaute theisak in.
Pasian’ Inn Lunggulhna
Vanglian Topa aw,nangma tenna munbangzah takinetlawm ahi hiam?
Ke’n ka lunggulh mahmah hi.Topa’ huangsung ka lunggulh mahmah a,ka lungsim le ka pumpia nungta Pasian’ tungahlungdam mahmahin la a sa hi.
Vanglian Topa,ka kumpi le ka Pasian aw,na biakna tau-ah,kawlgit nangawn in a inn ding mu a,phialphiah in a om nading,a note a koihna ding bu a mu hi.
Nangma inn sungah teengin,nangmah phatna a sa ngitnget mitethupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
Nangma tung panin thahatna ngahinZion zuatna lampi a tawn nuam mitethupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
Amaute in Kuamkeu munkantanin a pai laitakuntua kuam penciktui tampi tawh kidim a,guahzu masate in zong tua mun penbualtuite tawh a kidimsak hi.
Amaute a paikawmuna tha uh hat semsem a,pasian-te’ PasianZion-ah mu ding uh hi.
Vanglian Topa Pasian aw,ka thungetna hong za inla,ka thungetna hong ngai in,Jakob Pasian!
Pasian aw, kote a hong hu ding pahong etsak inla,na sathau nilh pa hong kem in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehmun dangah ni tulkhat om sanginnangma huang sungahni khat om hoih zaw hi.Gitlohna inn sungah ka ten sanginka Pasian’ inn kongcing paka hi nuam zaw hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa Pasian pen eite a hong hupaa minthang i kumpi hi a,maipha le pahtawinaa hong piapa ahi hi.Thumanin a gamta mite tungahTopa in na hoih bangmah siit lo hi.
Vanglian Topa aw,nangmah a hong muang mite,thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
Pasian in Israel-te A Hehpih ding Ngetna
Topa aw,nangma leitang na hehpih a,Jakob’ nopsaknatea ngeina na bangsakkik hi.
Na mite’ mawhna na maisak a,amau’ khialhna khempeuh na maisak hi.
Na hehna khempeuh na damsak a,na sinsona na daisak hi.
Kote hong hon khia Pasian aw,kote ka ngei uh hong bangsakkik inla,kote tunga na lungkim lohnahong beisak ta in.
Kote’ tungahheh paisuak ding na hi hiam?Khang tawntunginheh paisuak ding na hi hiam?
Kote in nangmahkong phat theih nadingunko na mite hong nungtasakkik lo dingna hi hiam?
Topa aw, kote tungahna itna kip hong lak inla,hong huhin hong hon in.
Topa Pasian’ thugen dinghong zasak dih un.Bang hang hiam cih lehama lamah lungsim takpi tawha kihei ama mi siangtho,ama mite’ tungahkilemna thu a gen ding hi.

David tawh Pasian’ Thuciamna a
Topa aw, na itna kipla-in ka sa tawntung dinga,nangma thutaknaka gen tawntung ding hi.

Vanglian Topa Pasian aw,na khempeuh ah na thutak a,nangmah bangin a vangliankua om ahi hiam, Topa aw.

“Ama tate in ka thukhamte nusia-in,ka biakna ngeina kip om bangina gamtat kei uh a,amaute in ka ngeina siasakinka thupiak a zuih kei uhleh,amaute’ thupalsatna hanginciang tawh gim ka pia dinga,amau’ mawhnate hanginsatna tawh gim ka pia ding hi.

Thukkik ding Ngetna
A thukkik Pasian,a thukkik Pasian,Topa aw,na hehna hong lak khia in.

Hong pai un, Topa phat ni.Eite a hong hu,a hong hon khia pa tungahlungdamna la sa ni.

Phatna La(1Khang 16:23-33)
Leitung mi khempeuh aw,Topa tungahla thak khat sa un.Topa tungah la sa un.
Topa tungah la sa unla,ama min phat un.Ni khat khit ni khatama hong hotkhiatna thugen tawntung un.
Ama minthannaminamte lakah gen unla,ama nalamdang septemi khempeuh lakah pulak un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa lian a,nakpitakin phat ding ahi hi;pasian dangte khempeuh sanginamah zahtak zawk ding ahi hi.
