Pahtawina le liatnate ama mai-ah om a,hatna le hoihnateama omna mun siangtho-ah om hi.
Mi namkimte aw, Topa inminthanna le hatna nei hi,ci-in mang un.Topa in nei hi,ci-in mang un.
Ama min in a ngah dingina kilawm minthannaTopa’ tungah pia unla,biakpiakna hong kenginama huang sungah hong pai un.
Puan siangtho silhin Topa bia un.Leitung mi khempeuh aw,ama mai-ah liing un.
Minam khempeuh lakahthu gen kawikawi unla,“Topa in uk hi.Leitung kikipsak a, kiliing ngei lo ding hi.Amah in mihingte’ thua manin khen ding hi,” ci un.
Vantung mite kipak henla,leitung mite lungdam hen.Tuipi le a sunga om khempeuhawng ta uh hen.

Lo le a sunga om khempeuhnuamin diang uh hen.Gamlak a sing om khempeuh inTopa’ mai-ah lungdamin la sa hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamah hong pai ta hi.Leitung mite’ thua khen dingin hong pai ta hi.Amah in thumanna tawh leitung ukinmite’ thu ahi bangin khen ding hi.
Topa’ Ukna le A Vangliatna
1Leitung lungdam henla,tuikulh neu tampite zonglungdam ta uh hen.
Meiipite le khuamial sahpiteama kiimah om a,thumanna le thutannateama tokhom bulpi ahi hi.
Ama mai-ah mei pai a,ama kiima om a galte a kaangtum hi.
Ama khuaphialepte in leitung taangsak a,leitung in mu-in a liing hi.
5leitung mi khempeuh’ Topa’ mai-ahmual liante khuainun bangina tuisuak uh hi.
Vantungte in ama thumanna gen khia uh a,mi khempeuh inama minthanna mu uh hi.
Bangmah a man lomilimte a kisaktheihpih,milim a bia mi khempeuhtemaizumin kikoih a,ama mai-ahpasian khempeuh kun uh hi.
Pasian aw, Zion in za-in nuam a,na thukhennate hanginJudah khuapite lungdam uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa aw,leitung khempeuh a ukpa na hi a,pasian dang khempeuh sanginnakpitakin na lian zaw hi.
10amah in a mi siangthote’ nuntaknasiatna ding pan a kem hi.Amah in migilote’ khut sung paninamaute a hon khia hi.
Thuman mite’ tungahkhuavak hong taang a,lungsim thutang mite tungahlungdamna hong tung hi.
Thuman mite aw,lungdam unla,ama min siangtho phat un.
Pasian’ Thumanna Phat ding
Amah in na lamdangtebawl ahih maninAma khut taklam leama khut siangthote inamah gualzosak hi.
2kitheisak khinzo a,amah in minamte’ muhna-ahama thumanna langsak khin hi.
Amah thutakin,it tawntungna nei ahih maninIsrael-te tungah a thuciamnaa tungsak hi.Leitung mi khempeuh ineite’ Pasian’ gualzawhna mu khinta uh hi.
Leitung mi khempeuh aw,lungdamin awng khia unla,phatna la sa un.
Laia lasakna tawhlaiza lasakna lela ngaih tawh phat un.
Peengkulte le saki aw tawhlungdamna gingsak un.
Tuipi le a sunga omte khempeuh aw,awng unla,leitung le a tunga teng khempeuhte aw,la sa un.
Gunte aw, na khut uh beeng un.Mualte aw, Topa’ mai-ah lungdaminla sa un.Bang hang hiam cih lehleitung a uk dingin amah hong pai ta a,thumanna tawh leitung mite’ thuahi ding bangin hong khen ding hi.
Siangtho Pasian Phatna
Topa in uk hi.Mihonte liing hen.Kherub-te tungah amah tu hi.Leitung liing tahen.
Zion khuapi-ah Topa lian a,amah in leitung mi khempeuh uk hi.
A lian a kihtakhuai ama minmi khempeuh in phat ta uh hen.Amah siangtho hi.
Thutang a deih, Vanglian Kumpipa aw,nangmah in thuman na phut khin a,Israel-te sungah thutang le thumanna sem khia hi.
I Topa Pasian phat unla,ama khengakna munah bia un.Amah siangtho hi.
Moses le Aaron ama siampi hi uh a,amah a biate lakahSamuel zong a kihel hi.Topa’ tungah amaute kiko uh a,amah in amaute a dawng hi.
Amah in meii khuampi sung panamaute tungah thu gen a,ama teci pannate leamah in amaute tungaha thukham piakteamaute in a zui uh hi.
Kote’ Topa Pasian aw,nang in amaute na dawng hi.Amau’ mawhna hangingim na piak tei hanginamau’ mawhnatea maisak nuam Pasian na hihnaamaute’ tungah na kilangsak hi.
I Topa Pasian phat unla,ama mual siangtho-ah bia un;bang hang hiam cih lehi Topa Pasian a siangtho hi.
Lungdamna tawh Topa’ Na Sem Un
Gam khempeuh aw,gingsak un.
Lungdamna tawh Topa’ na sem un.Ama omna-ahla sa kawmin hong pai un.
3Eite hong bawlpa amah hi a,eite ama a’ ihi hi.Eite ama mi ihi a,ama gankhahna sunga om a tuute ihi hi.
Lungdam kohna tawhama kongpi-ah lut unla,amah phatna tawhama huang sungah tum un.Ama tungah lungdam ko unla,ama min phat un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa hoih hi.Ama itna kipin kho tawntung a,ama thumannaa khang khangin kip hi.
Kumpipa’ Kamciamna
Keima la pen thumanna lethutanna la ahi hi.Nang ka hong sak ding hi;
Paubaanna a om lo thu bekka kin ding hi.Cik ciangin kei kiangahhong pai ding na hi hiam? Lungsim hoihna tawhka inn sungah ka gamta ding hi.
A sia na peuhmah ka deih kei ding hi.Lamkhial mite’ nasepna ka mudah a,tuate tawh ka kisukha kei ding hi.
Lungsim kawina ka deih hetkei a,siatna, ngaihsutin zongka neikha kei ding hi.
A veengte a gensia sim miteka susia dinga,kiphatsakna, kihihsakna lungsima nei mi ka thuak kei ding hi.
Leitungah a thuman mitekei tawh a om theih nadinginmaipha ka pia dinga,paubaanna om loin a gamta mi inkeima na hong sem ding hi.
Khemna a zang mi peuhmahkeima inn-ah teeng lo dinga,zuauthu a gen mi peuhmahkeima omna-ah om thei nawn lo ding hi.
Zingsang siminleitunga migilote khempeuhka susia dinga,siatna bawlte khempeuhka khen khia ding hi.
Lungkham Cianga Thungetna
Topa aw, ka thungetnahong za inla,ka thumna hong ngai in.
Ka cihmawh huninkei kiang panin bu kei in.Keima lam hong nga inla,kong sap ciangin hong dawng pah in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehka nuntakna, meikhu bangin bei mang a,ka pumpi meikuang bangin a sa hi.
Lungkham luatna hanginlopa bangin ka keutum a,an nangawn ka ne zo kei hi.
A gingin ka tautauna hanginka guh guakin ka om hi.
Gamlak a om musane lemun kolhna-ah a omsimbu tawh ka kibang hi.
Ihmu thei loin ka om a,innkhum dawna vasa khat guaka om tawh ka kibang hi.
Sun nilohin ka galte inkei hong zahko uh a,kei hong simmawhte insamsiatna-in ka min a zang uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehvut bek ka annek hita a,na thangpaihna le na hehna hanginka tuidawnte khitui tawh kihel hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehnang in kei hong domto napi-inlei nong denna hi.
Keima nuntakna pen nitak lama a omniliim tawh kibang lel a,lopa bangin ka vul gawp hi.
Ahih hangin Topa aw,nang na kip ngitnget a,khang tawntunginnang hong kiphawkna kip hi.
Nangmah tho-inZion khua na hehpih ding hi.Amah na angvan hun ding hita a,a kiciangtansa hun hong tung khin hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh na nasemte intua khua suangtumte it uh a,a leivuite nangawn pammaih sa uh hi.
Minamte in Topa hong zahtakin,leitung kumpi khempeuh inna minthanna hong zahtak ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in Zion khua lam dinga,ama minthanna hong kilang ding hi.
Amah in mi cimawhte’ thungetna kinin,amau’ thumna simmawh lo ding hi.
A suak nai lo mite inTopa a phat theih nadingina hong tung lai ding khang mite adinginhih thu kiciamteh hen:

Mihingte, kumpi gamte,Topa a bia dingina kikaihkhop uh ciangin,mite in Zion khua sungah Topa’ min,Jerusalem khua sungahamah phatna a pulak theih nadingun,thongkiate’ taunate a za ding lea si dingin a kisehte a khah khia dingina sangna ama siangtho mun paninamah in hong ensukin,vantung panin Topa inleitung hong en hi.
Amah in kei a khangtung kimlaika thahatna hong suktat sakin,ka hunte hong khiapsak hi.
Keimah in,“Khang tawntungin a kip ka Pasian aw,hong khansihsak kei in,” ka ci hi.
Tanglai hunin nangmah inleitung bulpi na koih a,vantungte zongnangma khut tawh na bawlsa ahi hi.
Amaute sia ding uh a,ahih hangin nang na kip ding hi.Puan bangin amautepaatkhia ding uh hi.Nangmah in amautepuan bangin na khek a,amaute a mai mang uh hi.
Ahi zongin nang na kibang ngitnget a,na nuntak hun in mong nei lo hi.
Na nasemte’ tatelungmuangin om ding uh a,amau’ suanlekhaktena mai-ah kip ding uh hi.
Pasian’ Itna Phatna
Topa ka phat dinga,ka lungsim khempeuh tawhama min siangtho ka phat ding hi.
Topa ka phat dinga,ama migitna ka mangngilh kei ding hi.
Amah in ka mawhna khempeuhhong maisak a,ka natna khempeuh hong damsak hi.
Hankhuk tung ding kimlaihong suaktasak a,itna le hehpihna tampi hong pia hi.
Muvanlai banginka tha a hat theih nadinginthupha namkim hong pia hi.
Topa in a kinengniamte adinginthuman thutangin thu a khen hi.
Amah in ama geelna Moses tungah gen a,ama nasepnate Israel mite a musak hi.
Topa dikin hehpihna tawh kidim a,heh hakin, a lian mahmahitna kip tawh a kidim hi.
Amah in a tawntunginhong taii ngitnget lo dinga,amah heh paisuak lo ding hi.
Amah in eite’ khialhna tawh a kituakineite tungah hong bawl lo a,eite’ mawhna tawh a kituakinhong thukkik lo hi.
Vantung penleitung panin a san mah banginamah a zahtakte’ tungahama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi.
Nisuahna pennitumna panin a gamlat mah bangini mawhna hangin gimnateeite’ kiang panin gamlapi-ah a nil khia hi.
Pa in tate a hehpih banginTopa in amah a zahtakte hong hehpih hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ineite’ pianna hong thei a,eite pen leivui ihihna a phawk hi.
Eite ihih leh i nuntakna penlopa tawh kibang a,lolai-ah a po paakte bangin a palh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehhuih in amah semin bei mang a,tua mun in amah thei nawn lo hi.

Ahih hangin Topa’ itna kip penamah a zahtak mite tungaha tawntung pan a tawntung donginkip ngitnget a,ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-ina thupiak banginsep ding a phawk mite tungaha khang khangin a kip tawntung hi.
Topa in vantungahama tokhom phutkhin a,amah in mun khempeuh a uk hi.
Ama thugen a ngai,ama thu bangin a sem no a thahat,no ama vantung mite aw,Topa phat un.
Ama deih bangin a gamta ama nasem,ama mihon khempeuhte aw,Topa phat un.
Ama ukna sunga a om ama bawlsate aw,Topa phat un.Ke’n, Topa ka phat ding hi.
Piansakna-ah Pasian Phatna
Topa ka phat ding hi.Topa ka Pasian aw,nang na lian mahmah hi.Minthanna le liatnanang na silh hi.
Puanza tawh tuam banginkhuavak tawh na kituam a,vantungte penpuanbuk bangin na zal hi.
Vana om tui tungah na inn na lam a,na leeng dingin meiipite na bawl a,huih khate tungah nang na tuang hi.
Na kamtai dingin huihte na bawl a,mei le meikuangtena nasemte na hisak hi.
Leitung a liing ngei lo dinginama bulpi tungah na phut hi.
Nangmah in puan tawh tuam banginleitung pen tui thukpi tawh na tuam a,tuate in mualte tuumcip hi.
Na thuhilhna hangintua tuite tai khia uh a,na thupiakna awging a zak uh cianginkikhawhkhia uh hi.
Mual tung le guam sungahtua tuite luang uh a,amau adingin na sehsa munaha tung uh hi.
Tua tuite in leitunga tuamkik loh nadinginamaute’ kantan loh dinggamgi khat na phut hi.
Kuamte sung paninciktui na phul khiasak a,mualte kikalah a luang uh hi.
Gamlak ganhingte’ dawn dingtui na pia a,gamlak sakolte in a dangtakna uhtua tui-ah a phasak uh hi.
Tua tui kiangah huihlak vasate om uh a,singhiangte lakahamaute ham zaizai uh hi.
A sangna mun na omna paninmite tungah guah na zusak a,nangma thupha tawhleitung a kidim hi.
Nangmah in ganhingte adingin lopa,mihing in leilak paninan a ngah theih nadingina khawh ding ankungte,
mihing lungsima nuamsak ding leenggahzu,mihing maitang a zolsak ding sathau,mihing lungsim a hatsak dingan na piangsak hi.
Topa in a suan,Lebanon muala om taamtak singte,tua ama singkungte inguahtui tampi a ngah hi.
Tua singte tungahvasate in bu bawl uh a,taksing kungte lakahgun vapite in bu a tom uh hi.
Mual sangte pen sathakte ading hi a,suangtumte pensakhite’ belh ding ahi hi.
Hun ciamteh nadingin khapi na bawl a,ni in zong a tum ding hun a thei hi.
Nangmah in khuamial na bawl a,gamlak ganhing khempeuha vak khiat hun pen zan hunsung ahi hi.
Humpinelkai khanglaite inamau’ nek ding sa a ngah nadingunnakpitakin hawk uh a,amau’ an dingPasian’ tung pan a ngah uh hi.
Ni a suah cianginamaute kihem khia uh a,a kua sung uhah a lum hithiat uh hi.
Mite pen nasem dingin kuan khia uh a,nitak mateng na sem uh hi.
Topa aw, na sepsa natetam mahmah hi.Nangmah in ciimna tawhtuate khempeuh na bawl a,na piansak ganhingte tawhleitung a kidim hi.
Hua lai-ah, ganhing a lian a neu,sim zawh lohin a tam,a vak muamua-na,lianin a zai mahmah tuipi om hi.
Hua tuipi tungah teembawte legualnop nadingin na bawlAwle a pai hi.
A hun ciangin an na piak ding ngakinhihte khempeuh innangmah hong en uh hi.
Na piak ciangin amaute in ne uh a,an na pia a, amaute lungkim uh hi.
Na maitang na seel cianginamaute khasia uh hi.Amau’ husanna na lakkhiat cianginamaute si-in amau’ pianna leivui-aha ciahkik uh hi.
Na hu na sankhiat cianginamaute a kipiangsak hi a,nangmah in leitung na bawlthak hi.
Leitung a et ciangintua leitung kiliingin,mualte a lawn ciangintua mualte meikhu a suak,ama nasepna-ah Topa lungdam henla,Topa’ minthanna kip tawntung tahen.
Ka nuntak laitengTopa tungah la ka sa dinga,ka hin laitengka Pasian phatna la ka sasa ding hi.
Topa in hong lungdamsak ahih maninka lasaknate in zongamah lungdamsak tahen.
Leitung panin mawhnei mitebei mang henla,migilote om nawn kei hen. Ke’n, Topa ka phat ding hi.Topa ka phat ding hi.
Israel-te adingin Pasian’ Sep Na Lamdangte(1Khang 16:7-22)
Topa tungah lungdamna ko-in,ama min phat unla,ama sepnate khempeuhmite lakah kitheisak un.
Ama tungah la sa un.Ama tungah phatna la sa unla,a lamdang a septe khempeuhgen ciat ta un.
Ama min siangtho hangin lungdam unla,Topa a zong mite lungdam tahen.
Topa le ama huh dingzon belin nei unla,a tawntunginama maipha zong niloh un.
No ama nasem, Abraham’ suanlekhak,Jakob’ tate, ama teel mite aw,ama sepsa a lamdang nate,ama nalamdang lahte,a genkhiat a thukhennatephawk ciat ta un!
Amah pen Topa, eite’ Pasian hi a,ama thupiaknate leitung khempeuh ina zuih ding ahi hi.

“Na luah dingin Kanaan gamkong pia ding hi,”ci-in Abraham tawh thuciam a bawlsa,Isaac tungah a thuciamsa,Jakob tungah thupiakna a kipsak,Israel tungah tawntung thuciamna,ama thupiaksa kammal,ama thuciamna penkhang tulkhat donginamah in phawk ngitnget hi.
Amaute tawm mahmahin,bangmah gentham lo uh a, khualmi hi-in,
minam khat panin minam dang khatah,gam khat pan gam khataha vak kawikawi laitakun,
amah in amautekuamah nengniamsak lo hi.Amaute’ hanginamah in kumpite thuhilhin,
“Ka sathau nilhte sukha kei un;ka kamsangte tungahsiatna bawl kei un,” ci hi.
Amah in leitungah kialpi tungsakin,nektheih an khempeuha siatsak ciangin,
amah in, Josef a kici,sila-a a kizuak mi khat,amaute’ mai-ah a sawl hi.
Ama khete pen kolte in nasak a,ama ngawng pensikkol sungah kikoih hi.
Ama thugente a tun matenginTopa in amah ze-et hi.
Amah a khah khia dinginkumpipa in mi paisak a,mihingte a ukpa inamah a khah khia hi.
Josef in kumpipa’ ulianteama ut bangin lamlakin,a upate pen pilna hilhsak a,ama inn sung topaama neihsa khempeuha ukpa-in a koih hi.
Tua ciangin Egypt gamah Israel va pai a,Ham’ gam sungahpeemta-in Jakob va om hi.
Topa in ama mite pungsak mahmah a,a galte sangin amaute hatsak zaw hi.
Ama mite mudahin, ama nasemtesiamna tawh a khem dinginamaute’ lungsim amah in kiheisak hi.
Amah in, ama nasem Moses leama teelsa Aaron a sawl hi.
Amaute in ama limte amaute’ lakahna lamdangteHam’ gam sungah a bawl uh hi.
Amah in khuamial sawl a,leitung khim a zingsak hi.Ahih hangin Egypt mite inama thu a langpang uh hi.
Amah in amau’ tuite sisan suaksak a,a ngasate uh a sisak hi.
Amau’ leitang tung lea kumpipa’ inn sung nangawnuiphukte tawh a kidim hi.
Amah kampau a,thohonpi le thokangtegam sung dimin hong om hi.
Amah in a guah dingun gialpi,amau’ gam sung khempeuha taangsak khuaphialep,amaute a pia hi.
Amah in amau’ leengguite lea theikungte uh vattansak a,amau’ gam sung sing khempeuha kuaihtansak hi.
Amah kampau a,kauphete le tangngolte,sim zawh lohin hong pai uh a,
gam sunga kung khempeuh,amau’ leitang panin a gah khempeuha nektumsak mang hi.
Amau’ sung pan a piang masaEgypt tacil khempeuh a satlum hi.
Tua ciangin amah inngun le kham tawh Israel-tepai khiatpih a,amaute a vekpi-incidamin thahat kim uh hi.
Amaute a pai khiat ciangunEgypt mite lungdam mahmah uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute kihta uh hi.
Amaute a liah dinginamah in meiipi kaisak a,zanin khua muh nadinginmei a omsak hi.
Amaute in ngen a,vantung panin anlum tampi a pia hi.
Amah in suangpi hong a,tui a phul khia hi.Guntui banginsehnel gamah tui a luang hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leha siangtho ama thuciamna leama nasem Abraham a phawk hi.
Tua ahih cianginama mite lungdamna tawh,ama teel mite lasakna tawha pai khiatpih hi.
Amaute in ama ngeina kipte zui-in,ama thukhamte a neih theih nadingun,amah in amaute tungahminam dangte’ leitang pia a,midangte’ nasepna gahte zongamaute a ngahsak hi.Topa phat un.
BU NGANAMihingte a Hot Manin Lungdamkohna
“Topa tungahlungdam ko un;bang hang hiam cih lehamah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung!”
Tu-a teng mah, nisuahna le nitumna,leilu lam le leitaw lam,leitung pan a ama kaihkhop,galte’ khut sung panina hong hotkhiat mite inci kikkik ta uh hen.
Pawlkhatte gamlakah gammang uh a,a tenna ding uh khuapi tunna lampimu zo lo uh hi.
Gilkial dangtakinamaute sibup uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute ina lungkhamna uhah Topa ko uh a,amau’ cihmawhna paninamah in a hon khia hi.
Amau’ tenna ding khuapia tun matengunamah in lampi manahamaute a paipih hi.
Ama itna kip le mihing tate tungaha lamdang ama sepnate hanginamaute in Topa’ tungahlungdamna ko ta uh hen.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamah in a gilkial a dangtakte phasak a,bangmah a nei lote tungahna hoih tampi a pia hi.
Pawlkhatte, khuamial sung,a zing sungah tu uh a,sikkol kibulhin gimna thuakinthong kia uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in Pasian’ thu sel uh a,Sangpenpa’ thugente a nial uh hi.
Nasep haksa tawhamaute’ lungsim niamsak hi.Amaute puk uh a,a huh ding kuamah om lo hi.
Tua ciangin amaute ina lungkhamna uhah Topa ko uh a,amau’ cihmawhna paninamah in a hon khia hi.
Amah in khuamial sung lea zing sung panin amaute la khia a,amau a kihennate a botsat hi.
Ama itna kip le mihing tate tungaha lamdang a nasepnate hanginamaute in Topa tungahlungdamna ko ta uh hen.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah insumngo kongkhakte sukhaminsikzawlte tum nih a suah hi.
Pawlkhatteamau’ khialhna hangin a ci uh na a,a mawhna hangun gimna a thuak uh hi.
Amaute in an peuhmah kih uh a,sihna kongpi tawh amaute kinai ta uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute ina lungkhamna uhah Topa ko uh a,amau’ cihmawhna paninamah in a hon khia hi.
Amah in thu vaikhakin amaute damsak a,siatna ding panin amaute a hon khia hi.
Ama itna kip le mihing tate tungaha lamdang a nasepnate hanginamaute in Topa tungahlungdamna ko ta uh hen.
Lungdam koh piaknate pia-inama nasepnate lungdam la tawhamaute gensak un.
Pawlkhatte, teembaw tawhtuipi-ah pai uh a, tui liante tungahsumbawl na a sem uh hi.
Amaute intuithuk tungah Topa’ gamtatnaa lamdang a septe a mu uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamah in thu pia a,tuipi hualte a piangsakhuihpi a nungsak hi.
Amaute, vanah kilawnto-in,a thukna-ah kiasuk uh hi.A lauhuai siatna sungahamau’ lungsim hanna a bei hi.
Amaute zukham banginhoisuk hoito uh a,a cih nading mel uh thei nawn lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute ina lungkhamna uhah Topa ko uh a,amau’ cihmawhna paninamah in a hon khia hi.
Amah in huihpi daisak a,tuipi hualte a bei hi.
Tua ciangin, tua tuihualte a khawl maninamaute a lungdam uh hi.Amah in amaute’ utna khua-aha paipih hi.
Ama itna kip le mihing tate tungaha lamdang a sepnate hanginamaute in Topa tungahlungdamna ko ta uh hen.
Amaute in mihon kikhopna sungahamah pahtawi-in,upate’ kikhopna sungahamah phat ta uh hen.
Amah in, a tunga a teengmihingte’ gitlohna hangingunte sehnel gam suaksakinciktuite leikeu suaksak a,an tampi a pianna leitang penci-lei a suaksak hi.
Amah in sehnel gam penbualtuite suaksak a,leitang keu pen ciktui a suaksak hi.
Amah in tua munah gilkialte tengsak a,a tenna ding uh khuapiamaute in a sat uh hi.
Amaute in lo ah an tuhinleenggui suan uh a,a gah tampi tak a ngah uh hi.

Topa phat un.I Pasian’ inn huangsung,Topa’ innsunga a ding,Topa’ nasemte aw,Topa phat un; ama min phat un.

Pasian in Na Khempeuh Thei, Mun Khempeuh ah Om
Topa aw, nangmah inkei na hong entel a,nong thei khin hi.

Amah in vanpite meiipi tawh tuamin,leitung adingin gun bawl a,mualte tungah lopa a posak hi.
Amah in ganhingte lea ham va-aknote an a vak hi.
Ama lungkimna leamah in nuam a saknate pensakol thahatna legalhangte’ hang hi lo hi.
Amah a zahtak mite leama itna kip a muangte tungahTopa a lungkim hi.
Jerusalem khuapi aw, Topa phat in.Zion aw, nangma Pasian phat in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah inna kulhkongpi zawlte tosak a,nangma mite thupha hong piaksak hi.
Amah in na gam sungah kilemna bawl a,mangbuh hoih pente tawhnang hong gilvahsak hi.
Amah in thu hong pia a,ama thu manlanginleitung hong tungsuk hi.
Amah in tuumul banginvukkhal hong pia a,vut bangin vukpak hong thehthang hi.
Amah in suangtum bangintuikhalte hong lawn khia hi.Tua a votnakua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?
Amah in thu pia-in tuate tuisuak hi.Amah in a huih nungsak a,tuite a luang hi.
Amah in Jakob tungah ama thu gen a,Israel tungah ama ngeina kipte leama biakna ngeina kipte a gen hi.
Amah in tua bangin minam dangkhat peuhpeuh tungah bawl ngei lo hi.Amaute inamah biakna ngeina kipte thei lo uh hi.Topa phat un.
A Kipiangsak Khempeuh in Topa Phat ding
Topa phat un.Vantung panin Topa phat unla,a sangna panin amah phat un.
Ama vantungmi khempeuh aw,amah phat un.Ama mihonte khempeuh aw,amah phat un.
Ni le kha aw, amah phat un.A taang aksi khempeuh aw,amah phat un.
Van sangpen te le vantung a om tuite aw,amah phat un.
Topa’ minamaute phatsak un.Bang hang hiam cih lehamah in thu pia a, amaute a piang hi.
Amaute a tawntung a om dinginamah in kipsak a,a palsat loh ding uh thupiaknaamah in a bawl hi.
Leitung panin Topa phat un,no gulpi liante le tuipi thuk khempeuh,
mei le gial, tuikhal le vuk,ama thupiakna a mang huihpi!
Amah phat un,no mual liante le mual neute khempeuh,gah a nei singkungte letaamtak singkung khempeuh!
Gamsate le innsate khempeuh,a bokvak ganhingte lea leeng vasate khempeuh!
No leitung kumpite lemihing khempeuh,leitung uliante lethukhente khempeuh!
Nungakte le tangvalte,teeksiate le naupangte aw,amah phat un.
Topa’ min phat un.Bang hang hiam cih lehamah bek a minlian hi a,ama minthanna penleitung le vantung sanginsang zaw lai hi.
Amah in ama mite thahatsak a,ama mi siangthote khempeuh,ama mai-ah a om Israel-te khempeuh inamah phat uh hi.Topa phat un.
Israel in Topa Phat Hen
1A thuman mite’ kikhopna sungahamah phatna sa un.
Amah a Bawlpa tungahIsrael lungdam henla,amau’ Kumpipa’ tungahZion mite kipak tahen.
Lamna tawh amah phat unla,khuang le laiza lasakna tawhama tungah la ngaih sa un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ama mite tungahminiamte gualzo sakin a pahtawi hi.
A gualzawhna uhahthuman mite lungdamin diang uh henla,ama mai-ah khukdininnuamna la sa uh hen.

Minam dangte tungahphu la-in gim a pia ding,a kumpite uh sikkhau tawh henina miliante uh sikkol a bulh ding,a kigelhsa thukhenna banginamaute tungah a sem khia dinginlangnih a hiam namsau a tawi kawmunPasian phatin awng ta uh hen.Hih penPasian’ mite’ gualzawhna ahi hi.
Topa Phat Un
Topa phat un.Ama biakinn sungahPasian phat unla,ama vangliatna munvantungah amah phat un.
A vanglian ama sepnate hanginamah phat unla,a liat mahmahna tawh kituakinamah phat un.
Peengkul aw tawh amah phat unla,githa lasakna leharp lasakna tawh amah phat un.
Khuang le lamna tawhamah phat unla,khausai lasaknate letamngai tawh amah phat un.
Daltuahte tawh amah phat unla,nakpitakin a gingdaltuahte tawh amah phat un.
Husang thei khempeuh inTopa phat un.Topa phat un.
David’ tapa, Israel kumpi Solomon’ paunakte:
Mite in pilna le thuhoihtea phawk theih nading,khiatna thuk a nei kammaltea theih theih nading.
A hoihin a pil gamtat theih nading,thuman, thutang, a kilawmina gamtat theih nading.
Thu thei nai lote in a theih nading,khangnote inpilna le thu ngaihsut theihnaa ngahna ding.
Mi ciimsate ciimsak semsemin,mi pilsate pilsak semsemin,
paunakte le thugentehnatehoihtakin thei-in,mipilte’ kampau lea thugente uh a theih nading ahi hi.Hanthotna le Hilhkholhna
Topa zahtakna in pilna kipatna hi a,mihaite in pilna le thuhilhnadon lo uh hi.
Ka ta aw, na pa’ hong thuhilhnahoihtakin zui inla,na nu’ hong thugente ngai in.
Tua thuhilhnate inna gamtat hong hoihsak dinga,kizepna lukhu le kizepna khi banginhong etlawmsak ding hi.
Ka ta aw, mihoih lote innang hong zol ciangin,amau’ zolna zui kei in.
Amaute in, “Hong pai in,mi khatpeuh va that ni!Mi ommuang khat va muansuam ni!
I muh tungin a cidam,a hing kimlai hinapi,i suk khit ciangin a sisa hi ding!
Na a manpha a namkimin i sut dinga,tua bang nate i inn dimin i nei ding hi.
Kote tawh hong kipawl lecin,i ngah khempeuhi hawm ding hi,”hong cih uh hangin ut kei in.
Ka ta aw,tua bang mite tawh kikhawl kei inla,amaute kiang panin kihem khia in.
Amaute a sia-in gamta nuam vanvan uh a,mi thah ding lamsanghaksa sa het lo uh hi.
I matnop vasate’ muhtangpi-in,i siahna ngenthang zaak leenga mawkna ahi hi.
Ahi zongin mite inamau’ awkna ding mah thang siah uh a,kuamah dang awk loin,amau mah hai awk uh hi.
Zawhthawh thu tawhmi’ na a sutte in sihlawh tawntung zaw a,hih bangin a gamtate intua bangmah tuak ngitnget hi.Pilna’ Hong Thumna
Ngai in! Kongzing lampi levan kizuakna phualpi-ahpilna hong kiko hi.
Khuapi kulhkongpi tual lemi a kikhopna mun khempeuh ahnakpitakin hong awng khia a,
“Mihaite aw, bang tanveihai omom nuam na hi uh hiam?Bang tanvei pilna thudon loinom ding na hi uh hiam?Pilna ngaihsutinnei ngei lo ding na hi uh hiam?
Kong thuhilhna hong ngai un;ka ngaihsutna kong gen dinga,ka theihna kong zasak ding hi.
Keimah in note hong samsam napi-innong ngai nuam kei uh a,ka khut hong vanvan napi-inkuamah in nong thudon kei uh hi.
Ka thugente khempeuhhong thudon loin,kong tainate khempeuhhong mang nuam lo na hih manun,
lungkhamna na tuah uh cianginkong nuihsan lel dinga,launa na tuah uh cianginkong thusim kei ding hi.
Lungkhamna inhuihpi’ nawk banginnote hong nawk gawpin,pingpei’ pei banginnote hong pei gawpin,lungkhamna le sinkhamnana tuah uh ciangin kong don kei ding hi.
Tua bang hun cianginkei nong sam ding uh a,ahi zongin kong dawng kei ding hi.Limtakin kei nong zong ding uh a,ahi zongin koimahahnong mu kei ding uh hi.
Note in pilna na deih kei uh a,Topa na zahtak nuam kei uh hi.
Ka thugente na deih kei uh a,kong thuhilhnangai nuam lo na hih manun,
na gamtatna bangun na thuak ding uh a,nomau’ gamtatna mah innote hong gimsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh thu thei lote inpilna a don loh manun sihlawh uh a,mihaite in lunghihmawhnaa neih loh manun siatlawh uh hi.
Ahi zongin ka thugenna a ngaite inlungnopna ngah ding uh a,launa nei loin nuamtakinom hithiat ding uh hi,”a ci hi.
Ka ta aw, kong hilhte thei inla,kong gente mangngilh kei in.
Pilna thute limtakin ngai inla,na theihtel zawh nadingin hanciam in.
Thu theih nading hanciam takpi inla,thu muhna ding hahkat takpi in.
Ngun, ahih kei leh a kiseelsum manpha zon bangin,hahkatin pilna zong in.
Tua hileh,Topa zahtakna thu na thei dinga,Pasian na theitel ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehpilna a piapa pen Topa hi a,amah pen pilna le siamnaa hilh pa ahi hi.
Pasian in thuman mite pilna guan a,midikte a hu hi.
Amah in thutang mite cing a,amah a itte a kem hi.
Tua hileh thuman le thutanga hoih le a kilawm na thei ding hi.
Tua ciangin mipil na suak dinga,na pilna hangin nuam na sa ding hi.
Na thungaihsut theihna lena thutelna in nangmah hong hu-in,
a sia-in na gamtatkhak dinghong kem dinga,kampauna tawhbuaina a piangsak thei mi,
nuntakna manin a nungta lo,mawhna khuamial sungah a gamta,
a sia-in gamtat ding nuam a sa,a sia-a gamtatna-aha lungkim mahmah,
mi lungsim kawi,muan theih loh ding mite paninnang hong kem ding hi.
A pasal tungah citak loina pasal a nusia,Pasian’ mai-aha kiciamna a mangngilh,kam khum mahmah tawhnangmah zol ding a hanciam,numei paktatte paninhong cing ding hi.
Tua nu’ inn-ah pai lecinsihna lampi a zui na hi a,misite gam a zuan na hi hi.
Tua bang numei tawhmawhna a bawl mite innuntak nuam neikik ngei lo uh hi.
Tua ahih maninmihoihte’ gamtat bangin na gamta dinga,thuman mite’ gamtatna na zui ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehmi thuman, miginate,hih i leitungah teengin om ding uh a,
ahi zongin Pasian in leitung paninmigilote lawn khia-in,singkung zungbawh banginmawhneite bot khia ding hi.
Ka ta aw, kong thuhilhtemangngilh kei inla,kong thugente phawk tawntung in.
Kong thuhilhte inna khan hong sausak dinga,hong daupaisak ding hi.
Thumanna le cihtaknakhahsuah ngei kei inla,na ngawngah tuate okin,na lungtang tungah gelh in.
Tua hileh, Pasian’ mai le mite’ mai-ahmaipha ngahin na maa vang ding hi.
Na lungsim khempeuh tawhTopa muang inla,nang’ theihna suang kei in.
Na hihna khempeuh ah amah phawk in.Tua hileh lampi manamah in hong lak ding hi.
Nangmah a pilinkingaihsun tawm kei inla,Topa zahtakin a sia peel in.
Tua hileh nang adingindamna zatui tawh kibang dinga,na meimate hong damsakinna natnate hong daisak ding hi.
Na neihsa le na anpalte tawhTopa zahtak in.
Tua hileh na ansaltean tawh kidim dinga,beel dimletinleenggahzu na nei ding hi.
Ka ta aw, Topa’ thuhilhnalimtakin ngai-in,hong tainate thudon in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehpa in a pahtak a tapaa thuhilh banginTopa in a it mite a thuhilh hi.
Pilna nei-in thu a thei mipa,a lungdam mi ahi hi.
Pilna nei leeng ngun sangin hoih zaw a,kham sangin zong manpha zaw hi.
A manpha pensuangmanpha nangawn sanginpilna manpha zaw lai a,mihingte’ deih theih na lakahtehpih theih ding om lo hi.
Pilna in khan hong sausak a,hauhna le pahtawina zonghong piathuah lai hi.
Pilna in nuntakna hong nuamsak a,lungmuang takin hong omsak den hi.
Pilna a nei mitea lungdam mi hi a,pilna a nei mitenuntakna singkung tawh kibang uh hi.
Topa in pilna tawh leitung bawl a,a theihtelna tawh vantung a bawl hi.
Ama pilna in guntuite luangsak a,meiite in leitungah guah zusak hi.
Ka ta aw,pilna le thu ngaihsut theihnalen tawntung inla,cikmah cianginkhahsuah ngei kei in.
Tuate pen nang adinginnuntakna hi dinga,na hoih nadingin kizepna hi ding hi.
Tua hileh lungmuang takinna nungta dinga,pukna ding thu bangmah om lo ding hi.
Launa om loinnuamtakin na lum dinga,zan tawntung lungmuang takinna ihmu thei ding hi.
Migilote tungah huihpi banginsiatna a tun ciangin,nang na lunghihmawhna dingbangmah om lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in a muanhuai-innang hong kem dinga,siatna hong tuaksak lo ding hi.
Na hihzawh ding ahih naklehmidangte’ kitangsapna huh tawntung in.
Na vaihawmsak theih pah dingthute ahih nakleh,zing ciangin hong paikik in,ci-in a hun sotto kei in.
Nangmah hong muanginnangma nai-ah a hong teeng na veengpa,gim a ngahna dingbangmah vaihawm kei in.
Nangma tungah siatnabangmah a hong bawl lo,mi khatpeuh tawhthu om lopi-in kimawk tot kei in.
A ngongtat thei mite engkha kei inla,amau’ gamtat bangin gamtakha kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in a sia-in a gamtate mudah a,thuman mite beka pawlpih dingin a la hi.
Topa in migilote’ inn sung samsia a,thuman mite’ inn sung thupha a pia hi.
Amah in mi kihisaktebangmahin sim lo a,a kiniamkhiatte tungahmaipha a pia hi.
Mipilte in minphatna lepahtawina ngah ding uh a,mihaite in maizumna lemindaina ngah ding uh hi.
Tate aw, na pa uh’hong hilhnate ngai unla,thu na teltheih nadingunlimtakin ngaihsun un.
Bang hang hiam cih lehkong hilh thute thuhoih ahi hi.Kong hilhte khempeuhlimtakin ciamteh un.
Kei zong tapa khat neihsun ka hi a,naupangno khat ka hih lai-in
ka pa in thu hong hilh a,“Ka thugente ciamteh inla,mangngilh kei in.Kong gen bangin gamta in;tua hileh na nungta ding hi.
Pilna le thu ngaihsut theihnana neihna ding hahkat in.Kong gen thute mangngilh kei inla,hoihtakin ngaihsun in.
Pilna nusia kei in; tua hileh siatna paninnang hong hu ding hi.Pilna deih in; tua hileh lungmuang takinna om nadingin hong kem ding hi.
Pilna na ngahna dinga thupi masa pen hi a,na neih khempeuhna beilawh zongin na zon ding ahi hi.
Pilna deih in; mi lianin hong bawl ding hi.Limtakin pom in;pahtawina hong ngahsak ding hi.
Pilna in pahtawina le minthannanangma tungah hong tungsak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Ka ta aw, ka thugente limtakin zui in.Tua hileh na khansau ding hi.
Na pil nading lampi kong hilh zo a,na gamtat zia ding kong gen zo hi.
Hoihtakin gamta lecinnang hong nawngkaisak zo dingbangmah om lo dinga,na tai hangin zongna pukkha kei ding hi.
Hong kihilhnate lencip inla,khahsuah kei in.Na nuntak nading ahih maninlimtakin zui in.
Migilote tawh kikhawl kei inla,amau’ gamtatnate zui kei in.
Amau’ gamtat bangingamta peuhmah ke’n!Gitlohna peel in!Paisan inla, na maban sem in.
Migilote in a sia khatpeuha sep mateng uh lum thei lo uh a,mi khatpeuh a suk zawh mateng uhihmu thei lo uh hi.
Gitloh gamtatna,annek bangin nuamsa uh a,ngongtatna, tui dawn bangina ngaihsun uh hi.
Ahi zongin thuman mite’ zuihlampi ahihlehsun dong a taang pha semsemzingsang khuavak tung tawh kibang hi.
Migilote’ lampi ahihlehzan khuamial bangin mial a,amaute a tuksak,a suihkhakte nangawn mu thei lo uh hi.
Ka ta aw, ka thugente don inla,ka kammalte ngai in.
Na kiang panin pai khiasak kei inla,na lungsimah ciamteh in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehtua thu a zuite innuntakna le cidamna-in a nei uh hi.
Na lungsim ngaihsutnatenuntakna nak hi a,na neihsa a manpha pen banginna kep ding ahi hi.
A man lo thu gen ngei kei inla,zuauthu le a kiza khial thei dingkammalte zang het kei in.
Kisuanna nei hetloin om liuliau inla,maizumin kuncip kei in.
Na khatpeuh na sepna thu theitel in.Tua hileh na nasep peuhpeuhmaavang ding hi.
Siatna peelin a manin gamta inla,thuman lampi paninthemcik zong pialkha kei in.
Bawl loh ding HilhkholhnaKa ta aw,ka pilna le ka thumuhnate,limtakin ngai-in hong za in.
Tua hileh a kilawminna gamtatzia ding na thei dinga,na kampaunate inna pil lamtak hong kilangsak ding hi.
Numei paktatte’ kampaukhuaizu bangin khum mahmahina thugente uh a neel dakdak hangin,
a tawpna-ahlungkhamna le natna sim lohnangma tungahbangmah dang hong guan lo hi.
Amah in sihna gamahnang hong paipih dinga,ama tot lampi pensihna mun tunna lampi ahi hi.
Nuntakna lampi-ah amah om lo a,nang na phawk loh hanginamah lam pialin a vakvai ahi hi.
Tate aw, tu-in ka thugentelimtakin hong ngai unla,ka thugente mangngilh kei un.
Tua bang numei tawh kinehkha kei unla,a inn gei nangawnah paikha kei un.
Tua bang na hih kei uhlehna min hoihna teng uhmidang tungah tung dinga,hehpihna a nei lo mite’ khutlum tawh na khansih ding uh hi.
Khualmite in na neihsa teng uh la dinga,na sepsa khempeuh uhmidangte in ngah ding uh hi.
Na sih kuan uh cianginthumin na tau ding uh a,gawngin na guhguak bekunna om ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin, “Bang hanginthu thei hoh lo a,hong kihilhnamang hoh lo ka hi hiam?
Kei hong hilh siate’ thuka mang nuam kei a,amau’ hong hilhnate ka don keikha hi.
Tua ahih manin tu-in ka cimawh vat a,mi’ mai-ah ka min a sia hi,”na ci ciat ding uh hi.
Na zi’ tungah citak inla,amah bek itin nei in.
Pasal dang tawh va vakzau-inkongzing lakah va mawhkha ding hi.
Na zi pen nangma ading bek hi a,midangte tawhna neihkhawm ding hi lo hi.
Tua ahih cianginna zi tawh lungkim inla,na teenpih numei tawh lungdam in.
A it-huai a ngaihbaanginngaihsun tawntung inla,ama ngaihbaanna tawh lungdamin,ama hong itna tawh lungkim in.
Ka ta aw, bang hanginnumei dang lunggulh dinga,numei dangte’ ngaihbaannaiplah ding na hi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian inna gamtatna khempeuh hong mu a,na paina khempeuh ahnang hong en kawikawi hi.
Migilo pa’ mawhna thangzak bang hi a,ama mawhna thang sung mahahamah a awk hi.
Ama pumpi ki-uk zo lo ahih maninamah in sihlawh a,ama hailuatna inhankhuk sung a tun hi.
Ka ta aw, na lawmte khatpeuh insum leitawi a lak ciangina loh zawh kei lehama tangin a lohsak dinginkam na ciamkha hiam?
Na kampauna hangin nang hong kimanin,na thuciamna hangin na awkkha hiam?
Ka ta aw, tua bang na hih khak leh,tua mipa’ khut sungah a om na hi hi.Na suahtak theih nadinginmanlangin a kiangah pai inla,hong khah nadinginama kiangah thum in.
Ihmumu kei inla,om mawkmawk kei in.
Sabeng pa’ kiang panin a suahtak nadinginsakhi a tai bangin,thangah a awk vasa a kitom banginna suahtak nadingin hanciam in.
Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai inla,amau’ nuntakzia va en in.
Amaute in a uk ding le a makai dingkuamah nei lo napi-in,
khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh,tuk hun sungin kaikhawm khol uh hi.
Thadahpa aw, bang tanvei lumlum dinga,cik ciangin tho khia ding na hi hiam?
Tawmkhat sung mengme lai ning,na cih kikalin
zawnna le cihmawhna inmigilo gutate banginnang hong su gawp pak ding hi.
Miginalo pa, a gilo pa,thuzuau genin vak kawikawi a,
nang hong khemnop manina mitheek hong pia-in,a khe tawh hong su-ina khut tawh hong khoih hi.
A lungsimah thusia bekbekngaihsun niloh a,a omna peuhah buaina a piangsak hi.
Tua ahih manin theih kholh lohinama tungah lungkhamna tung dinga,bawlkikzawh nawn loh donginsiatna ngah ding hi.
Topa in a muhdah,a khahkhong ngei loh ding,thu guk, tua zah bek hi lo,thu sagih tak om a, tuate pen
kihihsakna,zuauthu genna,mawhnei lo mi thahna,
thusia bawl ding ngaihsutna,gamtatsiat ding a manlangte,
zuauthu gen teci man lote,le kitotna a piangsakteahi hi.Nulepa Mawhna Bawl loh ding Hilhkholhna
Ka ta aw,na pa’ hong gen bangin gamta inla,na nu’ hong thuhilhnatemangngilh kei in.
Amau’ hong thugentephawk tawntung inla,na lungsimah ciamteh niloh in.
Tua thute in na paina peuhahlam hong lak dinga,zanin na ihmut kalinnang hong cing dinga,sunin na hah sunginna gamtatna ding hong hilh ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehthukham le a hilhnate pena taang mahmah khuavak bang hi a,khalna le hilhnate pennuntakna ding lampi hi a,
mi’ zi tawhna mawh loh nadingin nang hong kemin,kam khum zangin a hong zolnumei ginalote kiang paninnang hong hu ding hi.
Amau’ melhoihna iplahkha kei inla,amau’ hong zawlmitnakhenglahkha kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh anlum khat tawhnumei paktat khat kingah zo a,ahi zongin numei tawh mawhna innuntakna bup siasak hi.
Na ang sungah meikuang pom lecinna puan kaang loin om ding ahi hiam?
Mei-am tungtawnin pai lecinna khe kaang loin om ding ahi hiam?
Tua mah bangin mi’ zi tawh a mawhte ingimna thuak ding uh a,tua bang a gamta peuhmah ingimna thuak ding uh hi.
A gilkial a cimawh mi khat inna a guk ciangin,midangte in mawhsak lua lo napi,
amah kiman leh a zah sagihin kilohsak a,a neih khempeuh a piak kul hi.
Ahi zongin numei tawh a mawhte penthu ngaihsun thei lo mi hi a,amau le amaua kisusiatawm ahi uh hi.
Mawhna a bawl mi insat gawpna thuak dinga,a min sia-in mindai paisuak ding hi.
A numei’ pasal a heh zawk theih nadingthudang om nawn lo a,a heh thukna-ahkhawl hun cih nei thei lo hi.
Amah in sumlepai sang nuam vet lo a,letsong tampi piakna ina hehna damsak zo lo hi.
Ka ta aw, ka thugente ciamteh inla,kong sawl thute khempeuhmangngilh ngei kei in.
Kong gen bangin gamta lecinna nungta ding hi.Kong thuhilhte,na mitnauta bangin hoihtakin kem in.
Kong hilhnate kem tawntung inla,na lungtang tungah gelh in.
Pilna na sanggamnu dingin nei inla,thumuhna na lawm it pen dingin nei in.
Tua hileh midangte’ zi tungahna khialhkhak loh nading,kam khum tawh a hong zolnumei ginalote tawhna khialhkhak loh nadinginhong hu ding hi.
Khatvei, ka omna inn-ah,ka tawlet panin ka khuadak a,
bangmah a phawk nai lotangval honkhat lakah,tangval thu thei lo khat,ka lim muhkha hi.
Lamdungah amah a vak laitakin,tua bang numei paktat a omnainn gei khatah va paikha a,
tua hun pen nitak nitum khit zawh,khuamui hun laitak ahi hi.
Tua numei innumei paktatte’ puansilh ngeitea silh kawmin ngimna khat tawhtua tangval na dawntuah hi.
Tua numei pen maizumna mel thei loina hang mahmah hi a,lamdung tengah vak tawntung hi.
Mihon omna van zuakna phual,lamdung citeng, kongkiu khatpeuhahmi ngakin om niloh hi.
Tua numei in tangvalpathakhatin kawi-in tawp a,na maitai bawl mahmahinama kiangah,
“Tuni-in biakpiakna ka bawl a,nek ding sa tampi ka nei hi.
Ka nekpih dingin nang ka hong zong a,tu-in kong mu petmah hi.
Ka lupna tungah a nop mahmah dingin,Egypt gam puan hoih penteka phah zo hi.
Myrrh paknamtui, aloes paknamtui,le sinnamon paknamtui tawh,ka lupna tung a namtui dinginka bawl khinta hi.
Hong pai in; zanthapai-in ki-itna bawlin,ang kikawmin lungnuam ni.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pasalkhual gamlapi-ah zin a,tu laitakin inn-ah om lo hi.
Amah in sum tampi keng a,nipikal nih bang matenghong tung lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin kam khumkam neel tawh amah zol a,tangvalpa in tua zolna a mang kha hi.
Tua ahih manin a kigo ding bawngtal ina sih nading mun a zuat bangin,sakhi in a awkna dingthang zuanin a dian laklak bangin,
thaltang in ama lungtanga khakna ding munah amah va pai hi.Vasa in a sih nading thang antaha bawh bangin va bawh a,a lauhuai sunga tun lamtak thei lo hi.
Ka tate aw, kei’ lam hong nga unla,ka thugente hong ngai un.
Tua bang numeite’ zolna mang kei unla,tua bangte tawh khialkha kei un.
Tua bang numei inmi tampi tak siasakin,sim zawh loh dingmi tampi’ sihna a piangsak hi.
Tua bang numei zuihna pensihna gam zuatna hi a,sih baihna ding lampi zuatna ahi hi.
Ngai un! Pilna in hong sam a,thungaihsut theihnahong kiko hi lo ahi hiam?
Lamdung mual tung tengah,lamka citeng mun khempeuh ah dinga,
khuapi lutna lampi gei-ah,mi omna kongpi tualah hong kiko a,
“Mi khempeuh tungah ka hong thum a,leitunga om mi khempeuhkong sam hi.
Ngaihsut kicing nai lote aw,na lungsim uh khanghamsak un.Mihaite aw, thu ngaihsun un.
Ngai un, thu manpha kong gen ding hi;ka gen khempeuh thuman vive ahi hi.
Ka thugente a man bekbek hi a,zuauthu ka deih kei hi.
Ka gen khempeuh ahi vive hi a,zuauthu, thukawi om hetlo hi.
Thungaihsun theite adingintelnop mahmah a,thu mu theite adinginsiang mahmah hi.
Ngun sangin kong thuhilhnatedeih zaw unla,kham hoih pen sanginthutheihna deih zaw un.
“Suangmanpha sanginpilna ahi keimah ka hoih zaw a,kei tawh na hong tehpih theih ding uha manpha dang om lo hi.
Pilna ahi keimah inthuthuk muh theihna ka nei a,thu a telin theihna lea kilawm ngaihsut theihna ka nei hi.
Topa zahtakna penthusia muhdahna hi a,kiphatsakna le kihihsakna,gamtatsia le thuzuau ka mudah hi.
Thu geelin ka sem khia a,thu theihtelna nei-in, kei ka thahat hi.
Kumpite in a gammite a ukna ding,mi ukte in ngeina mana zat theih nadinginkeimah in ka huh hi.
Leitung a om mi ukte khempeuh inkeima huhna bek tawh uk zo uh a,milian mi thupite inkeima huhna bek tawh vaihawm zo uh hi.
Kei hong itte ka it a,kei hong zong peuhmahte inhong mu uh hi.
Piakkhiat theih dinghauhna le minphatna,daupaina le ma tutsak zawhnaa kicingin ka nei hi.
Keima kiang panin na ngahte uhngun hoih pen sangin hoih zaw a,kham hoih pen sangin zonghoih zaw lai hi.
Thuman lampi ka zui a,thutang lampi ka tawn hi.
Kei hong itte ka hausak a,a inn dimin neihlelam ka pia hi.
“Topa in kei hong piangsak masa pen a,tangtawnga ama sep lak pana masa pen ka hi hi.
Tangtawng pek lai-in kei hong bawl a,leitung a om ma-inhong bawl masak pen ka hi hi.
Tuipite a om ma-in kei ka suakkhin a,kei’ suah hunin lui tuite om nai lo hi.
Mual liante a kibawl ma-inkei ka suakkhin a,mual neute a kibawl mapekinkei ka om khinta hi.
Leitung khempeuh a bawl ma,lei themkhat bek nangawna bawl mapekin kei ka om khinta hi.
Amah in vantung bawlintuipi kimkotahvanpi mong ding a bawl laitak,
amah in vantungah meiite kipsakintuipi tuinakte a bawl laitak,
tuipi tuite in ama cihna bana khengin a luan loh nadingthu a piak laitak ka om a,leitung bulpi a phuh laitakkei ka om hi.
Na geel siampa banginamah tawh kikhawlinkeimah pennisimin ama lungdamna ka hi a,ama kiang a om nuamsa-in,
leitungah ka lungdam a,mihingte lakah nuam ka sa hi.
“Tate aw, tu-inka thugen hong ngai unla,kong gente zui le-uhcinlungdamna na ngah ding uh hi.
Hong kihilhnate zui-in pilna ngah unla,thudon loin ommawk kei un.
Ka thugenna a ngai,nisimin ka kong gei-ah omin,ka inn-ah a ngak mipa inlungdamna ngah ding hi.
Kei hong mu mi in nuntakna a mu hi a,Topa’ mai-ah maipha ngah ahi hi.
Ahi zongin kei hong mu lo mi,a mahmah a kisusia hi a,kei hong mudah peuhmah,a si nuam ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Pilna in a inn lam a,a innkhuampi sagih a phut hi.
Amah in pawi bawl dinginsa go-in leenggahzu khaih a,annekna ding sabuai a bawl hi.
Khua sung munsang khempeuh paninmi a sam dingina nasem numeite sawl a,
“Thu thei lote aw, hong pai un,”ci-in samsak a,mihaite kiangah,
“Hong pai unla, ka an huansa ne-in,ka bawlsa leenggahzu hong dawn un.
Thu thei lote taisanin khansau unla,pilna lampi zui un,” cisak hi.
Mihaite thuhilh lecinhong maizumsak dinga,migilote thuhilh lecinhong su gawp ding hi.
Mihaite thuhilh kei in;hong mudah ding uh hi.Mipilte thuhilh in;hong it ding uh hi.
Mipilte thuhilh lecinpil semsemna-in nei dinga,thuman mite thuhilh lecina thutheihna uh khang semsem ding hi.
Siangtho Pa theihna penthumuhna ahi hi.
Pilna in na khang hong khan dinga,na nuntakna hong sausak ding hi.
Pil lecin nangma phattuamna ding hi a,pilna don kei lecinnangma supna ding ahi hi.
Haina pen a kamtam,zumna mel a thei lo numei tawh kibang a,
ama kong gei-ah ahi a,a sang pen munah ahi zongin amah tu a,
ama kiang a nawkkha,amau’ nasep beka phawk kimlai mite kiangah,
“Thu thei lote aw, hong pai un,”ci-in samin, mihaite kiangah,
“Tui dawnsim, khumdiak a,an neksim, limdiak hi,” ci hi.
Tua lai-ah a paite a sihna thutua lai-ah a lutsatesihna gam thuk sungah a om khitna thu,a khemzawh mite inphawkkha lo uh hi.
Hihte pen Solomon’ paunakte ahi hi:Ta pil in a pa lungdamsak a,ta hai in a nu dahsak hi.
Thuman loin ngahna-ahphattuamna om lo a,thumanna insih nading pan hong hon hi.
Topa in mihoihte a gilkialin koih lo a,migilote a duh uh nesak lo hi.
Thadahna in zawnna hi a,thanuamna in hauhna hi.
A hunin an a lapa mipil hi a,anlak hunin a ihmu pa inmaizumna a ngah hi.
Mihoihte in thupha ngah a,migilote in thusia bekbek gen hi.
Mihoihte kiphawkphawk a,migilote kimangngilh pah hi.
Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a,a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
Thuman mite lungnuamin om hithiat a,thuman lote kiman hi.
Khialhna kimuhmawh bawlna inbuaina piangsak a,hang takin hilh ngamna innopna piangsak hi.
Mihoihte’ kampaute pennuntakna tuinak bang a,migilote in thusia bekbek gen uh hi.
Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a,itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
Thungaihsun theite’ kam sungahpilna om a,mihaite’ nungzangahciangduai kinga hi.
Mipilte in a pilna uh behlapin,mihaite a pau cianginthusia tawh kizom pahpah hi.
Hauhna in mihaute hu a,zawnna in mizawngte siasak hi.
Mihoihte’ thaman nuntakna hi a,migilote’ thaman siatna ahi hi.
Kihilhna mannanuntak lampi zuihna hi a,hilhna man nop lohnalampi lauhuai zuihna ahi hi.
Mi a mudahte bek in zuauthu gen a,mi a gensiate mihai ahi hi.
Kam tam paute tampi khial a,pau ip theite mipil hi.
Mihoihte’ thugente nguntang bang a,migilote’ ngaihsutnate inbangmah man lo hi.
Mihoihte’ thugente inmi tampi nuamtuamsak a,mihaite in a hai sihpih uh hi.
Topa’ thupha in mite hausak a,dahna le gimna tawhpiakhawm lo hi.
Mihaite ingamtatsiat ding nuamsa uh a,thungaihsun theite inpil gamtatna nuamsa uh hi.
Migilote tungah a kihtaktak uh tung a,mihoihte in a deihdeih uh ngah uh hi.
Huihpi a nun cianginmigilote leen mang a,thuman mite lungmuanginom tawntung uh hi.
Leenggahtui thuk in ha kimsak a,meikhu in mit a siipsak bangin,mi thadah in a cial pa a nasak hi.
Topa zahtakna in khan sausak a,migilote khansih hi.
Mihoihte’ lametna lungdamna hi a,migilote’ lametna a hawmpi ahi hi.
Topa in midikte hu a,migilote a susia hi.
Midikte lungmuang takinom tawntung ding uh a,migilote in omna ding munngah zo lo ding uh hi.
Midikte in pilna thu gen uh a,thu hoih lo a gente’ leiiki-attan ding hi.
Midikte in a gen ding uh thuhoih thei a,migilote in thusia bekbek gengen uh hi.
Tawikhaina man lo a zangteTopa in mudah a,tawikhaina man a zangte tungahTopa lungkim hi.
Mi kiphasakte in minsiatnangahpak ding ahih manina hoihbekin om ding hoih zaw tham hi.
Midikte thumanin gamta uh a,migilote amau’ hoih lohna in susia hi.
Hauhna in sih nading paninhong hu thei lo a,thumanna inna sih ding hong hu thei hi.
Thumanna in midikte’ nuntaknaa nuam zaw-in piangsak a,migilote in amau’ gitlohna mahpuklawh uh hi.
Thumanna in midikte hon khia a,thuman lo mite inamau’ huaihamna mah awkpih uh hi.
Migilote a sih ciangina lametna teng uh tawh bei khawm a,hauhna suanna a mawkna a suak hi.
Lungkhamna a tuah loh nadingunmidikte kihu a,migilote tungahlungkhamna tung zaw hi.
Pasian a ngaihsun lo mite’ thugenna hanginmite in siatna thuak a,midikte’ pilna hanginmite in hotkhiatna ngah uh hi.
Midikte a tuahphat cianginkhua sungah lungdamna om a,migilote a sih ciangin zongkhua sungah lungdamin kikona a om hi.
Thuman mite’ omna hanginkhuapi a lian suak a,migilote’ kampauna hanginkhuapi a sia suak hi.
Simmawhna tawhmidang hopihna pen haina hi a,mipilte pau loin om dide hi.
Mi a gensiasiate tungahthusim kigen ngam lo a,a muanhuai mite’ tung bekahthusim kigen ngam hi.
Thulamlak ding a nei lomihingte kipuk uh a,thulamlak tampi neihna penlungmuanna ahi hi.
Midang khat’ leiba lohsak dingna kiciam leh na kisik ding hi.Tua bang thu-ah kihel kei lecinnang adingin hoih zaw hi.
A dik numei kizahtak a,a dik lo numei mindai hi.A thadah mi in sum nei ngei lo a,a hahkat mi in sum hau hi.
Migi lecin nang adingina hoih a bawl na hi a,gilo lecin nang mahmaha kigimsak na hi bek hi.
Migilote ina man nei taktak bangmah ngah lo a,thumanin a gamtate inpeel loin thaman hoih a ngah hi.
Thumanin gamtat dinga hanciamte nungta dinga,a sia-in a gamta teiteite si ding uh hi.
Topa in lungsim gilote mudah a,a manin a gamtate tungah a lungkim hi.
Migilote ingim a thuak hamtang nading,midikte gimna tawh a kipelhna dingteltakin thei in.
Thu a ngaihsun thei lonumei melhoih penvokpi muk a om kham nakbah tawhkibang lel hi.
Mihoihte’ deihnathuhoih tawh kizom tawntung a,migilote’ deihna a tun cianginmi khempeuh a heh hi.
Mi pawlkhat in sum zang ziahziah napi-inhau semsem uh a,mi pawlkhat cil mahmah napi,zawng semsem hi.
A cingh mite hau semsem dinga,midang a huhte inhuhna mah ngahkik ding hi.
An man khan ding ngakna-ina zuak nuam lote kisamsia a,leinop hunin a zuakpahte kiphat hi.
Thuhoih a hanciamte in pahtakna ngah a,siatna a hanciamte insiatna mah ngah hi.
Tuk lai-a singteh tam banginmidikte’ hauhna khang dinga,phalbi lai-a singteh pulh banginhauhna a suangte kiam ding uh hi.
A innkuan sung a ukkhial mitehawmsuak dinga,a haite pen mipilte’ silasuak tawntung ding hi.
Midikte a khansau a,migilote khansih hi.
Mihoihte hih leitungahthaman kipia ahihlehmigilo le mawhneitegimna kipia zaw kan ding hi.
Pilna a deihte,kithuhilh ding ut uh a,kitai ding ut lohna penhaina ahi hi.
Mihoihte in Topa’ maipha ngah a,siatna a gamtate amah in a mawhsak hi.
Gitlohna in lungmuanna piangsak lo a,thuman mite lungmuang takin om uh hi.
Zi hoih pena pasal’ minthanna le lungdamna hi a,a pasal a maizumsak zi pena pasal adingin a dam thei loguhnatna tawh kibang hi.
Thuman mite ina kilawm a kituakin hong bawl a,migilote bek in hong khem nuam hi.
Migilote’ thugentemi thahnopna bekbek hi a,midikte’ thugente inlauhuaina sunga om mite a hon khia hi.
Migilote in sihna tuakin cimang a,thuman mite nungta-in khang kizom hi.
Mipilte kiphatin kipahtawi a,mihaite kineu-et hi.
Nektawm ding nei lopi-inmilian bangin omna sanginnuntakna ding na seminmi mawkmawk hihna hoih zaw hi.
Midikte in a gannote hoihtakin don a,migilote in a gannote bawlsia hi.
Nakpi takin lo khote in an hau a,man nei lopi-in hun beisakna inhaina ahi hi.
Migilote’ belh munmuanhuai penleikhal bangin kitamzan a,mihoihte’ zung kip tawntung hi.
Migilote in a zuaugenna uh awkpih a,thuman mite buaina tawh kipelh hi.
Mite in kam hoih pauna hanginthaman ngah uh a,a sepna bangun zongthaman ngah uh hi.
Mihaite pen amau mahthuman kisa tawntung a,mipilte inmi’ thugenna ngai nuam uh hi.
Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a,mipilte in a hehna uh ip zo hi.
Thuman mite in thu taktak mah gen uh a,zuau tecite in khemna thu bek gen uh hi.
Ngaihsun lo-a kampauna intem hiam bangin mi liamsak thei a,mipilte’ kampauna intua bang liamna damsak thei hi.
Thuman genna kip tawntung a,thuzuau genna tomno sung bekkimang hi.
Thusia ngaihsunte lungkham uh a,thuhoih vaihawmte lungdam uh hi.
Thuman mite tungah thusia tung lo a,migilote lungkhamna tawh kidim hi.
Topa in zuaugen mite mudah a,mi citakte tungah a lungdam hi.
Mipilte in a theihna uh im khinkhian a,mihaite in a haina uh pholaklak hi.
Mi thanuamte vanglian a,mi thadahte sila suak hi.
Lunghihmawhna inlungkhamna piangsak a,kampau hoih in mi lungdamsak hi.
Midikte in a gamtatna uh tel et a,migilote a gamtatna un lam pialsak hi.
Thadahte a tup tung ngei lo a,a thanuamte in a deih ngah hi.
Mi thumante’ gamtatna innuntakna piangsak a,mihaite’ gamtatna insihna piangsak hi.
Ta pil in a pa’ hilhna mang a,a kihisak mi ina khial min pua nuam lo hi.
Mihoihte ina kam siamna bangun thaman sang a,mizuaute pensiattat ding bek ut uh hi.
Pau a ki-ip zo mi in a nuntakna a hu hi a,a mawk paupau mi penamah a kisiasak tawm ahi hi.
Thadah mi in a deih ngah zo lo a,nasep hahkat mi ina deih khempeuh ngah zo hi.
Thuman mi in zuauthu deih lo a,a gilo mi in gensiatna lemindaina ding bek a pau hi.
Thumanna in midikte hu a,gitlohna pen mawhneite’ pukna ahi hi.
Mi pawlkhatte,zawng napi-in kihausak uh a,mi pawlkhatte,hau napi-in kizawngsak uh hi.
Mihau pa’ sum hauhna ina nuntakna tan khia zo a,mizawng pa in a kitatna dingbangmah nei lo hi.
Thuman mitekhuavak bangin taang lela a,migilotemeivak bangin mitpak hi.
Hilh ding ut lo, kihihsakna inkitotna bek piangsak thei a,hong kithuhilh ding utna pena hoih zaw ahi hi.
Ol takin hauhpaknaoltak mahin kiamkik pah a,haksapi-in hauhtohnakhangto semsem hi.
Lamet tun lohna in lungsim cinasak a,deihna tangtunna pen lungdamna ahi hi.
Thu kihilh ding ut lohna pensiat ding utna hi a,thu kihilhna zuihna penlungnopna ahi hi.
Mipilte’ thuhilhna pennuntakna tuinak bang hi a,sihna thang tawh kipelhna ahi hi.
Thungaihsut theihna maipha ngahna hi a,zuautatna in lungkhamna bek piangsak hi.
Thungaihsun theite pilna tawh gamta a,mihaite in a haina taangko hi.
Kamtai ginalo in mi lungkhamsak a,a citak thupuak pa inmi lungdamsakkik hi.
Thukihilhna a zui lo mi inzawnna le mindaina ngah a,thukihilhna a zui mi inminphatna le pahtawina a ngah hi.
Deihna ngahna in lungsim nuamsak a,siat gamtatna paninmihaite pial khia nuam lo hi.
Mipil tawh kikhawl lecin na pil dinga,mihai tawh kikhawl lecingimna na thuak ding hi.
Tuahsiatna inmawhneite sulzuih kawikawi a,midikte tuahpha kawikawi hi.
Midikte ina tu a tate’ luah ding gamh nei uh a,mawhneite’ neihsate ahihlehmidikte ading hi lel hi.
Lo thak paninmizawngte’ khamkhop dingan piangkha dinga,ahi zongin thuman lohna hangintua nangawn mai mang thei ding hi.
A ta a tai nuam lote a ta mudah hi a,a ta a itte in limtakin thuhilhin a tai hi.
Thuman mi ina kham ding nei-in gilvah a,a gilo mi innektawm ding nei loin a gil a kial hi.
Numei pilte ininn sung nuntakna khangsak a,numei haite ininn sung susia hi.
Thumanin a gamta mite inTopa zahtak uh a,a sia-in a gamta mite inTopa simmawh uh hi.
Mihaite a pau cianginsiatna thuaklawh uh a,mipilte’ pauna insiatna ding pan pengsak hi.
Bawngtal om kei lehlo panin an tawm bek kila a,bawngtal tha tawh an a kihau ahi hi.
A citak teci inthuman bekbek gen tawntung a,a ginalo teci inzuau bekbek gen tawntung hi.
Mi a simmawh theite inpilna a zon uh hangin ngah zo lo uh a,thungaihsun theite inolno takin ngah thei uh hi.
Mihaite tawh kikhawl kei in;amau’ kiang panpilna na ngah kei ding hi.
Thungaihsun theitea pilna in lampi man musak a,mihaite a haina in lam khialsak hi.
Mihaite in a khialh hangunphamawh sa lo uh a,mipilte a khialh ciangunmawhmaisak ding deih uh hi.
Lungdamna le lungkhamnaeimah bek in i theih hi a,midang kuamah inhong phawkpih kha lo hi.
Migilote’ inn kisusia dinga,thuman mite’ innkipin gina semsem ding hi.
Mihingte in thuman lampi hi,ci-in a ngaihsutte pensihna lampi hikha thei hi.
Nuihna pen cihmawh seelna zong hithei a,kigualnop sakna a ven ciangindahna hong kilangkik hi.
Misia in siatna thaman ngah a,mipha in phatna thaman ngah hi.
Mihaite in a thuzak peuh um pahpah a,mipilte in a gamtatna dingngaihsun cian hi.
Mipilte kidawmin siatna panin kihem a,mihaite in thu ngaihsun masa loingamta pahpah hi.
A lungtom mite hai gamtat a,mipilte lungduai hi.
Mihaite in haina bek mah ngah a,mipilte in pilna mah ngah thuah hi.
Migilote in mihoihte mai-et uh a,maipha a piak ding uh a thum uh hi.
Kuamah in mizawngte ngai lo a,mihaute in lawm tampi nei hi.
Mizawngte a simmawhte a khial hi a,mizawngte tungah a cinghtea lungdam hi.
Na a hoih a semtemite in muangin zahtak a,a sia gamtatna penkhialhna lianpi ahi hi.
Gimpi-a nasepna pen hauhna hi a,kam bek pau-in tutmawkna penzawnna ahi hi.
Pilna pen mipilte’ minthanna lukhu hi a,haina pen mihaite’ kizepna bulpi ahi hi.
Thutak a gen teci in nuntakna hu zo a,zuauthu a gen teci in mi lehhek hi.
Topa a zahtak mi in lungmuanna nei a,a tate’ belh theih ding mi kician ahi hi.
Topa zahtakna pennuntakna tuinak tawh kibang a,sihna thang tawh hong kipelhsak hi.
Mi tampi a uk kumpipa minthang a,a uk ding mi om kei leha mawkna ahi hi.
A lungduaite mipil hi a,lungtomna pen haina kilatna ahi hi.
Lungnopna in pumpi cidamsak a,hazatna pen guh a muatsak natna ahi hi.
Mizawngte bawlsiatna pena piangsak Pasian simmawhna hi a,mizawngte tungah citna penPasian zahtakna ahi hi.
Migilo pa ama tatsiatna in puksak a,mihoih pa ama hoihtatna in hu hi.

Mi thadahte a inn-ah lumlum a,“Pua pial lehanghumpi’n hong hih kha’n teh,” ci uh hi.
Numei tungah mawhna penthangzak bang hi a,tua thangah a awkte tungahTopa a heh hi.
Naupangte a hai gamtat a ngeina hi a,deihtakin pangbetna inmihoih suaksak thei hi.
Hauhnop maninmihaute letsong pia leeng kizawnlawh a,hauhnop manin mizawngte’ neihsalaksak lehang zongkihauhlawh tuan lo hi.Thupiakte le Hilhkholhna Sawmthumte
Na bil uh hong ngatinmipilte’ thugen ngai unla,kong hilh pilna thutena lungsim uhah lutsak un.
Na lungsim uhah ciinginzang thei le-uhcin,na lung uh dam tawntung ding hi.
Tua hileh Topa muanin na nei ding uh a,tuni-in note’ phattuamna dingkam a pau ka suak ding hi.
Thuhilhna le pilna thu nam sawmthumhih lai-ah note adingin ka gelh a,
thuman a kan dinginnote hong sawlte’ tungahthuman bang hiam cihna genkik theih nadingunthuman na theih nading uhka deihna ahi hi.-1-
Bangmah hong cih zo lo dingcihna hangin nuamtak sa-inmizawngte’ neihsamawk suh kei unla,zumah khia-in mawk bawlsiat kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa inamaute panpih dinga,amau a bawlsiate tungahphu a laksak ding hi.-2-
A hehbaih mite tawh kipawl kei unla,a lungtom mite tawh kikhawl kei un.
Amau’ hoih lohnatena zuihkhak loh nadingunna kidop kei uhlehnote in zongna awklawh kha ding uh hi.-3-
Midangte’ leiba lohsak dinginkamciamin leiba tavuan lakha kei un.
A leiba lohsak zo kei le-uhcinna lupna nangawn uhhong kidawhkhiatsak ding hi.-4-
Na pu na pate’ phuhsa gisuangcikmah hunin khin kei un.-5-
A nasepna-ah a siam mahmah mina theikha uh hiam?Amah in mi mawkmawkte’ nasem lo dinga, kumpite’ na sem ding hi.
Miliante tawhan nekhawm dinginna tut uh cianginna tutpih pa limtakin en un.
An a ngaklah thei mina hih khak uhleh zonglimtakin kidawm un.
Hong thangsiahnahi khathei ding ahih manintua anlimtelunggulh pah lua kei un.-7-
Hauhnop man bekinsum’ sila suak kei unla,a man loin gamtakha kei un.
Na ngahsa uh sumtemitphiat kalin bei mang thei a,muvanlai banginthakhatin leeng mang thei hi.-8-
A cil tentan mite’ an neksak kei unla,a anlimte uh duhgawhkha kei un.
“Ne ne un,” hong cih hangina cih takpi hi lo hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehna dangtawng a hong sunsamzang nekkhak tawh kibang ding hi.
Na neksa teng uhna luakhiakik ding uh a,na kamsiam ngah teeng uhmai mang ta ding hi.-9-
Mihaite pil hopih kei un;amaute in a manphatnaphawk thei lo uh hi.-10-
Tanglai gisuang khin kei unla,tagahte’ leitang va keek kei un.
Amaute a pawlpih pa pen Topa hi a,note’ langkhat ah amaute panpih ding hi.-11-
Hong kihilhnate zui unla,pilna thu hong kigente ngai un.-12-
Naupangte sat ding lunghiang kei un;satna hangin si lo ding hi.
Ciangduai tawh sat le-uhcinnuntaklawh zaw ding uh hi.-13-
Ka ta aw, mipil suak lecinka lungdam mahmah ding hi.
Thuman na gen cianginka nuam mahmah ding hi.-14-
Mawhnei mite engkha kei inla,Topa zahtakna zom paisuak in.
Tua bang hi lecin lametna om a,cithei-in na khansau ding hi.-15-
Ka ta aw, ka thu ngai inla,mipil suak in;lampi man zuih dingngaihsutpi-in nei in.
Zu nenete tawh kikhawl kei inla,a uisante tawh kithuahkha kei in.
Zu nenete lea uisante zawng ding uh a,a ne beka nitumte inpuansia bek silh zo ding hi.-16-
Nangma pianna na pa’ thu ngai inla,na nu a teek cianginsimmawh bawl kei in.
Thuman, pilna, siamna,thungaihsut theihna lei in;zuak khiat dingintuate pammaih lua hi.
Ta hoih a nei pa a lung dam dinga,ta pil a nei paa ta’ tungah lungkim ding hi.
Na nu le na paa kipak nadingin gamta inla,na pianna nu lungdamsak in.-17-
Ka ta aw, ka thugente ciamteh inla,keima gamtat bangin nang zong gamta in.
Numei paktatte penkiat theih nading gum tawh kibang a,numei ginalote pentangciak theihnahawkguam tawh kibang hi.
Gutate bangin nang hong buksim a,mi tampi tak siasak uh hi.-18-
Kuate in gal nei a,kuate in dahna thuak hiam?Thu om lopi-in kuate liam a,thu om lopi-in kuate a mit san gega hiam?
Zu ne-a a tut khotezu a nenete ahi hi.
Hai sungah a phuan seuhseuhgawl sungah a tumsuk hithit theileenggahzu san et-in nei kei in.
A tawpna-ah gulpi banginnang hong tu dinga,gul gunei in a tuk na bang ding hi.
Na mitah na lam dangdanghong suak dinga,hoihtakin na pau thei nawn kei ding hi.
Tuipi tungah a lum tawh na kibang dinga,a suk awn a to awnteembaw dawna tuang tawhna kibang ding hi.
“Hong vuak hangun ka liam kei a,hong sat hangun ka phawk kei hi.Ka pilvang cianginzu ka nekik ding hi,” na ci ding hi.
Migilote eng kei inla,amaute tawh kikhawl kei in.
Amaute in tatsiat ding bek ngaihsun uh a,thusia bekbek genin nei uh hi.-20-
Pilna tawh inn kilam a,ngaihsut siamna tawh inn kip hi.
Thungaihsut theihna inn sungaha hoih a manpha nate a dimtakin om hi.-21-
Thahatna sangin pilna hoih zaw a,thakhauhna sanginthutheihna hoih zaw hi.
Geel siamna tawh galte kizo a,ngaihsut siamna tawhgualzawhna kingah hi.-22-
Pil kampauna penmihaite’ theih zawh dinginthuk lua mahmah a,mihaite in mihon lakahthu gen ngam lo uh hi.-23-
Thusia lamsang a deih mitethusia bawl mi kici hi.
Mihaite’ vaihawmna inkhialhna bek piangsak lel a,mi a simmawh theitemidangte in mudah uh hi.-24-
Haksatna na tuah cianginna lung a kiat leh a ginalo mi na hi hi.-25-
Thah dinga a kikai khia mipahon khia inla,sih nading mun a zuan mipalehkaihkik in.
Ke’n theikha kei ing, na cihnop hanginlungsim a thei Pasian in theitel veve hi;nang hong encik Pasian inhong teltheihna phawk in.Mi khempeuh a gamtatna bangina thukkik ding hi.-26-
Ka ta aw,khuaizu khum ahih manin ne in.I kam ah khuailuzu khum mahmah hi.
Pilna pen i nuntakna-ahkhuaizu tawh kibang a,pilna nei lecin mai lamah lametna om a,na khan hong sausak ding hi.-27-
Migilote’ gamtat banginthuman mite’ omna su gawp kei inla,amau’ tenna inn luh gawp kei in.
Mihoihte sagihvei dong a puk hangintho kikkik thei a,migilote ahihlehtuahsiatna thuakin kithallot hi.-28-
Na galte in gimna a ngah cianginlungdam kei inla,a puk ciangin kipak kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in hong thei-innang tungah lungkim lo dinga,na galte tungah heh nawn loingim pia lo kha ding hi.-29-
Migilote’ hanginlung nuammawh kei inla,amaute eng kei in.
Amaute in mai lamahlamet ding bangmah nei lo a,amaute’ meivak kisukmitsak ding hi.-30-
Ka ta aw, Topa le kumpipazahtak khawm inla,amau a langpangte tawhkipawlkha kei in.
Tua bang mite thakhatthu-inkisu gawp thei ding hi.Pasian le kumpipa’piansak theih ding gimnakuamah in gen khol thei lo hi.Mipilte’ Thugen Dangte
Mipil dangte in zong hih bangin thu gen uh hi:Mi lang muhin thukhenna hoih lo hi.
Mimawh kimlai a diksak thukhen paleitunga mi khempeuh inmudahin phuisam ding hi.
A mawh mi gim a pia thukhen pa ahihlehthupha kipia-in daupai ding hi.
A mantakin dawnkikna penlawm taktak hihna lim ahi hi.
Na nuntakna ding zong masa inla,na an nek ding a kicin ciang bekinna inn ding lamin zi le ta nei pan in.
Thu kician om lopi-inna veengpa’ langkhat ah teci pang kei inla,amau’ siat nadingin zuauthu gen kei in.
Kei tungah hong bawl banginkei zong ka bawl dinga,ama hong hihna banginka thuk ding hi, cikha kei in.
Mi thadahpa’ lo gei-ah ka va pai a,mihai pa’ leenggui lo ka va nawkkha hi.
Limtakin ka et ciangina lo ciing bupah kiak dim a,a leitang khempeuh lopa in khuhcip a,a umna a phungcian suangtekicim khin hi.
Tua bang ka muh cianginthu ka lung ngaingai a,thu manpha khat ka mu khia hi.
Tawmvei ihmutna, tawmvei lusukna,tawmvei sung na sep lohna,khutzepin ommawkna hangin
i tungah zawnna hong tung a,cihmawhna in hong khuhcip hi.
Etkakna le Theihhuai ThuteJudah kumpi Hezekiah’ lai-atte in a tei khiat uh Solomon’ paunak dangte:
Pasian in thu a ip manin a min thang a,kumpite in thu a genkhiat maninminthang uh hi.
Vantung sang lua-inleisung a thuk luat mah banginkumpipa’ ngaihsutna thuk lua-inkithei zo lo hi.
Ngun a ek teng pai khia lehangsikseekpa in na hoihpi piangsak thei hi.
Kumpipa kiang panmigilote nil khia lehangthumanin ama ukna kip thei bek hi.
Kumpipa mai-ah na om cianginmilian kineih kei inla,miliante’ tutna ding munahtukha kei in.
Uliante a awn dinginhua lai-ah va tusuk in, hong kicih sanginhih lai-ah hong tuto in,hong kicih ding hoih zaw hi.
Thu khatpeuh na theih cianginthukhen zum tun pah kei in.Na veengpa in nang’ khialhnahong laktelkik lehnang bang lawh nawn dingna hi hiam?
Na thuneihpih na veengpa bek mah tawhthu kiseel inla,mi khat’ thusimmidang’ tungah genthang kei in.
Tua hikeileh amah hehinnang hong maizumsak dinga,na minsiatna bei ngei nawn lo ding hi.
A kilawm huninkammal khat paukhiatna penngun pek tunga kham pek khata kisuang tawh kibang hi.
Hilhna a sang thei mipa adingina pil thuhilhpa penkizepna kham bilbah tawh kibang hi.
Amah a sawlte tungaha citak kamtai pa penanlak huna tuivot tawh kibang a,a tote’ lungsim thaksuaksak hi.
Bangmah a piak lohpi a kisialhpih pa penguah a zusak tuan lo meiipi lehuihpi nung tawh kibang lel hi.
Lungduai a zolzolna tawhgam ukte kizo thei a,kam nemin pauna tawhaana neite kizo thei hi.
Khuaizu na nek ciangina hoihkhop bek zah ne in.Tua hikeilehkhamlua-in na lua ding hi.
Na veengte’ inn-ah hawh mun lua kei in.Hong cimtakin hong mudah kha ding hi.
A lawmte’ langkhat ahteci man lo a pang mi penmolhtum, namsau, ahih kei lehthal hiam tawh kibang hi.
Haksat hunin a zuautat mimuanin neihkhakna penhana, ahih kei lehkhebai tawh kibang hi.
A dah a lungkham mipa kiangahlasakna penkhuadam laitakinpuan suahkhiat tawh kibang a,meima ci-al nuh tawh kibang hi.
Na galte a gil a kial leh an pia inla,a dang a taak leh tui pia in.
Tua hileh amau’ maizum nadingina bawl na hi a,Topa in nang tungahthaman hong pia ding hi.
Leilu lam huih in guah a zuksak bangingensiatna in hehna piangsak hi.
Phun bek a thei zi tawhinn sungah tenkhop sangininnkhumzang kiu khatahtangten hoih zaw tham hi.
A dangtak mipa intuivot lim a sak bangingamlapi-a om lawmte’ kiang paninthuzak nuam kisa hi.
Mihoih khat in mihoih lote’ gamtatnaa zuihkhak cianginhawktui nin, ahih kei lehtui uih tawh kibang hi.
Khuaizu a tam luanek ding a hoih loh banginphat ding deihluatna a hoih lo ahi hi.
Ama lungsim a ki-uk zo lo mipa pendalna kulhpi a nei lokhuapi tawh kibang hi.
Tuk laitak a vuk kia leanlak huna guahzu banginmihaite adinginpahtawina a kilawmna om lo hi.
Thu om lopi a hong kisamsiatna penbangmah a hong cih thei lo,khawlna mun mel a nei lo,a leengsuk a leengtophialphiah tawh kibang lel hi.
Sakolte sat ding kisam a,late kamkaih kisam a,mihaite zong sat ding a kisam ahi hi.
Mihaite’ thudotna dawngdawng lecinnang zong amau mah bangina hai na hi hi.
Mihaite a pilina kingaihsut khak loh nadinginamau’ haina tawh kizui-indawng zaw in.
Mihai khat kamtai-in a zang pa penama khe mah a sattantawm,siatna a zong pa ahi hi.
Khebai pa’ khe a kimanna om loina kikhai mawk banginmihaite adingin paunak inbangmah man nei lo hi.
Saili kuangah sailungtang khihcip lehangphattuamna a om loh banginmihaite pahtawina zonga mawkna ahi hi.
Mihaite inpaunak thuhilhnate a paukhiat cianginzukham pa in a khut a ling oma khei dingin a kipan tawh kibang lel hi.
Mihai a tuahkhak peuhtha cial a a nei pa pena tuahkhak peuh a ban kapthal tawipa tawh kibang hi.
Ui in a luak a zuatkik banginmihaite zong a haitat ngei bangintakik zel hi.
A pil lo kimlai a pil a kisapa sanginmihaite adinginlametna om zaw lai hi.
Thadahpa in,“Lampi-ah humpinelkai om!Kongzingah humpinelkai om!”ci-in lumlum hi.
Kongkhak pen kawmhek tungaha kiheihei lel banginmi thadahpaa lupna tungah kiheihei hi.
Thadahpa in a khutinankuang sawksuk a,a kam ah a baktohkik ding nangawngim zungzung kisa hi.
A kilawmin thu a dawng theimihing sagih sanginmi thadahpa a ngaihsutna-ahpil kisa zaw hi.
Eite tawh a kisai lokitotna sunga kiphumna penui ommuang khat a bil-ini kaihsak tawh kibang hi.
A veengte a khem khit cianginka ciamnuihna hi, a ci pa pen
sih theihna gu a baang thaltang tawha kap pa tawh kibang hi.
Sing om kei leh mei mit a,gensiatna om kei leh kitotna bei hi.
Meihol in mei-am ding piangsak a,sing in mei kuangsak a,migilo in kitotna piangsak hi.
Gensiatna pen a lim mahmahan tawh a kibang hi a,mihingte’ sungtawng pekahtumsuk pahpah hi.
Tungtham beka kam khum pauna pencimbeng kizut leibeel tawh kibang hi.
A simtat mi ina kampi bek tawh thuhoih gen a,a lungsimah zuauthu bek om hi.
A lungsimah a deihhuai lothu sagih tak om ahih maninkam khum takin a pau maninumkha kei in.
Ama hoih lohna a ip nop hanginmi khempeuh inama gitlohna thei veve hi.
Mi siahna-in gum a toteamau’ gum tawhna sung mahahlehkiat zawsop uh a,mi a dengkha dingin suang a khukteamau’ suang khuk mah inamau mah lehden kha zaw hi.
Zuaugenna inmidik kimlai a mawh bangsak a,tungtham beka thugenna insiatna bek piangsak hi.
Zing ciang hun adingkima-sialh kei in.Tuhun le tua hun kikalaha piang ding thu bangmah na thei kei hi.
Midangte in hong phat lohbuangnangmah kiphattawm kei in.Khual mite in hong phat lohbuangnangma kamin kiphattawm kei in.
Suangtum le sehnel gik mahmah a,ahi zongin mihaite’ piansaklungkhamna gik zaw lai hi.
Hehna le sinsona siahuai a,ahi zongin hazatna siahuai zaw lai hi.
Itna i seel bawl sangina langtangin taina hoih zaw hi.
I lawmte in hong liamsak hangini hoihna dinga hong deihsakna hizaw hi.I galte in hong ngawng kawina penhong lehbawlna ahi hi.
A gilvah mipa inkhuaizu nangawn duh nawn lo a,a gilkial mipa ina kha an nangawn limsa hi.
Inn panin gamlapi-ah a zin khia mipaa bu panin a leeng khiavasa tawh kibang hi.
Sathau namtui le paknamtui inlung nuamsak a,lawmte’ limbawlna in tha hatsak hi.
Na lawmte daangkoih kei inla,na pa’ lawmte dong nangawnlawm bawl in.Na lungkham cianginna sanggampa va ko kei in.A gamla-ah a om i sanggampa sangina nai-ah a om i veengpa kimang zaw hi.
Ka ta aw, pil in;tua hileh ka lungdam dinga,kei hong mawhsak nuamte inbangmah hong cih thei lo ding hi.
Mipilte in a lauhuai thumu thei-in pelh uh a,mi mawkmawkte inphusuakin thuak uh hi.
Mi khat in gamdang mi khat’ leibaa lohsak dingin kam a ciam leha ciam bangin ama neihsakilaksak takpi ding hi.
Mi khat in a kituak lopi-inmidang khat limbawl lualiang lehamah in a sia laminna ngaihsun zaw hi.
Phun bekbek a thei zi pentheu hun mel a nei loguahciin tawh kibang hi.
Tua bang numeite kikho thei lo a,a kikham thei lo huihnung lei khutin sathau i tawi nop tawhkibang hi.
Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a,mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
Theikung a cing pa in a theigah ne a,a tapa a kem pa in pahtakna ngah hi.
Tui sung en leengeima maitang i muh bangini lungsim en leengeima pianzia kilang hi.
Mihingte’ lungsim penmisite’ gam tawh kibang a,tamlua cih hun nei thei lo hi.
Ngun le khamte meikhukah kize-et a,mihing ahihleh phatna tawh kize-et hi.
Mihai khat a sih dek donginna satsat hangina hai ngei mahin hai veve lai ding hi.
Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei inla,na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehneihsa kip tawntung lo a,hauhna pen a khangkhanginkizom suak lo hi.
Lopate ki-at mang khin a,ahi zongin a no hong selkik hi.Mualtungah a po lopa hing khempeuhki-atin inn-ah kipua a,
tuute in na puan ding hong guan a,na keeltal mantelo ciing khat man tawh kikim hi.
Na keelnawite ahihlehna innkuan annek ding,le na nasem numeite’ nuntak nadingin kicing ding hi.

Gam sung mite a hoih loh ciangina banbaningam uk kumpi tampi nei uh a,ahi zongin mipil thungaihsun theite ingam sung thahatsakin kipsak uh hi.
Mizawngte a bawlsia aana a nei mipa penlo-a ante a susia gawpguahzu tawh kibang hi.
Thukham a zui lo mite inmigilote pakta uh a,thukham a zui mite ahihlehmigilote tawh kilem lo uh hi.
Mi siahuaite inthutang cihmel thei lo uh a,Topa a biate in ahihleha kicingin a thei uh hi.
Hau napi-in lungsim kawi mi hihna sanginzawng napi-inpaubaan neih lohna hoih zaw hi.
Thuhilhna a mang mite ta pil hi a,lawm gilo tawh a kikhawl mi ina pa mindaisak hi.
A meet a pung lakna tawh a hau mipa penmizawngte a hehpih mipa adinginsum a zonsak hi lel hi.
Mi khat in thukham a zuihnop kei lehama thungetna nangawnPasian in zakthadahhuai sa hi.
A diktat mi khatsiatsak ding a hanciam pa penama tawhsa gum sung mahahkia ding hi.A dik mipa in gamh hoih luah dinga,migilo pa in bangmah luah lo ding hi.
Mihau pa pen amah pil kisa a,ahi zongin a zawng mipil pa ina hau pa’ haina phawkkhia veve hi.
Mihoihte in vangliatna a ngah cianginmi khempeuh lungdam uh a,migilote a liat cianginadangte in gimna thuak uh hi.
A khialhna a im mite a dau pai lo dinga,a mawhna pulakin a kikheel mite inhehpihna ngah ding uh hi.
Topa a zahtak tawntungte penmi nuamsa hi a,a lungkhauh mite inlungkhamna tuak ding uh hi.
Mizawngte a uk migilo pa penhumpinelkai gilkial levompi halungvei tawh kibang hi.
Ngaihsut siamna a nei lo gam ukpaa gilo kumpi hi dinga,thuman tawh ngah ding beka deih mipa in sauveipi uk ding hi.
Mi thatin a khial pa inama hankhuk ding a to ahi hi.Ama hankhuk tawh kho kei in.
Thumanin a gamta mitelungmuangin om ding uh a,a zuautat mite ahihlehpuk ding uh hi.
Nakpi takin lo a khopa hau mahmah a,bangmahin a kimang tum lona a sempa zawng mahmah hi.
A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah dinga,a hau baih nuam mipa ingim tuak pelmawh ding hi.
Mi langbawlna hoih lo a,ahi zongin letsong neucik khat hanginthukhente gamta khial thei zel hi.
A huaiham mi ina hauh nadingin huai mengmeng a,a tawpna-aha zawn ding lamtak phawkkha lo hi.
Mi khat tai-in thuhilh lecintungthama phatna sangina tawpna-ah lungdam zaw ding hi.
A nu a pa’ neihsa laksakin,“Khialhna hi kei,”a ci pa pen guta mah hi veve hi.
A huaiham mi in kitotna piangsak a,Topa a muang mite mihau hi ding hi.
Ei le ei kimuanna haina hi a,mipilte’ hilhna zuihna penlungmuanna ahi hi.
Mizawng a huhte cimawh ngei lo dinga,huhna a pia nuam lote insamsiatna ngah ding hi.
Migilote a liat cianginmidangte bucip uh a,amaute a zakiat cianginmidikte in ukkik ding hi.
Kihilh napi-ina mang nuam lotebawlphat zawh nawn loh donginkisia ding uh hi.
Midikte in gam a uk ciangingammite lungdam uh a,migilote in a uk ciangina gammite thum uh hi.
Pilna a deih mi in a pa lungdamsak a,numei paktat tawh a kikhawl mi ina neihsa teng lawn mang hi.
Thumanin a gamta kumpi ina gam kipsak a,sum bek a ngaihsun kumpi ina gam siasak hi.
A man lopi-in mi khat mawkphatna pena awk nadingin thangsiahna ahi hi.
Migilote amau mawhna sungah awkcip a,midikte ahihlehsuakta-in lungdam uh hi.
Midikte inmi cimawhte ading thu khual uh a,migilote intua bang thukhualna thei lo uh hi.
Thu a khual lote inkhua sungah buaina lianpi piangsak a,mipilte in tua buaina daisak thei hi.
Mipil khat inmihai khat tawh zumah thu nei lehmipil pa tungah hehin zahko a,phattuamna piang tuan lo hi.
Mi a that nuamte ina thuman mi mudah a,midikte in a thuman mi hu uh hi.
Mihai pa a hehna banginkam pau-in gamta gawp a,mipil pa ahihlehki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
Kumpipa in zuauthu saangin na sem leha nuai-a ulian khempeuh zongzuaugenin nitum ding uh hi.
Mizawng pa le mi bawlsia paa kibatna uh khat om hi.Topa in a nih tuakun mittang guan hi.
Kumpipa in mizawngte’ thua manin khensak leha ukna kip tawntung ding hi.
Ciangduai le tai-na in pilna guan a,a kikhahkhong ta ina nu maizumsak hi.
Migilote ulian suak lehsiatna khang semsem a,ahi zongin midikte inamau’ mit mahmah tawha gilo uliante’ zakiatnamu ding uh hi.
Na ta thuhilhin tai lecinama hangin na kipak dinga,na lung hong kimsak ding hi.
Pasian’ lamlahna a kizuih lohna gamahgam sung mite phengtat gawp uh hi.Pasian’ thukhama zui mite ahihleh a lungdam uh hi.
Kama hilh lel tawh silate pil zo lo a,a theih hangun hong mang tuan lo hi.
Thu ngaihsun loina pheng paupau mipa sanginmihai pa adinginlametna om zaw lai hi.
Sila khat a neu tung a kipanlimtakin na khoi hangina tawpna-ahnang hong hehsak veve ding hi.
A heh pahpahte in kitotna piangsak a,a heh baihte khial thei tawntung hi.
A kiphasakte inniamkhiatna thuak dinga,a kiniamkhiatte inpahtawina ngah ding hi.
Guktakna sungah a kipawl mipaama adingin thusia zongpa ahi hi.A guktakna pulak lehamah gim kipia dinga,gen khia kei leh lahPasian in samsia veve ding hi.
Midangte kihtakna inhong lunghimawhsak a,Topa muanna inhong lungmuangsak hi.
Mi khempeuh ingam ukte’ maipha ngah dinghanciam ciat uh a,ahi zongin Topa’ kiang pan bekinthutang kingah hi.
Midikte in migilote mudah uh a,migilote in midikte mudah uh hi.
Agur’ Muhna ZiaJakeh’ tapa Agur’ thugente: Amah in,“Pasian aw, ka lunggim a,ka cih nading ka thei kei hi.
Ka hai lua a, mihing ka sun kei hi.Mihing banginngaihsut siamna ka nei kei hi.
Pilna thu ka thei kei a,Pasian’ thu ka theih om lo hi.

Vantungah kua kahto a,leitungahkua hong kumsukkik ahi hiam?Kua in a khut sungah huihte lomcip a,puan tawh tuite tuncip ahi hiam?Kua in leitung bulpitephut kip ahi hiam?Tua bang mi na theih ngei leha tapa’ min bang ahi hiam?
“Pasian in a thugen khempeuha manna laktel a,amah a belte adinginkidalna lum ahi hi.
Ama gen lohpi behlapsak kei in;na tua cih lehamah in nang hong tai-inzuau thugen na hihnahong kilang ding hi,” a ci hi.Paunak Dangte
Pasian aw, thu nih kong ngen hi.Ka sih ma-in tuate hong pia in.
Zuauna le khemnaka zat loh nadingin hong huh inla,a haulua lo, a zawnglua loinhong bawl inla,ka khamkhop zah lian bekan hong pia in.
Haulua leng nang hong nialin,“Topa i cih kua ahi hiam?”kong ci kha dinga,zawnglua leuleu leng mi’ na guksakinka Pasian’ minkong daisak khazel ding hi.
Sila khat a topa kiangahgensia kei in;amah in nang hong gensia-ingimna na thuakkha ding hi.
A pate samsia-in a min a daisak,a nute a phat lo mi pawlkhat om hi.
Amaute a nin mahmah hinapi-inamau’ muhna-ah siang a kisa mahmah mi pawlkhat om hi.
Mihoih pha mahmahin a kingaihsun,a kiliansak mahmah mi pawlkhat om hi.
A ha uh namsau tawh a kibanggam sung mizawngte a netum,mi cimawhte a liaktummi pawlkhat om hi.
Vot in tanu nih nei a,khat in, “Hong pia in,” ci a,a khat in zong, “Hong pia in,”mah ci veve hi.“Pha zo ta,” a ci ngei lo nam thumom a, eh! li hi zaw:
Han khuk, taciing numei,tui a deih tawntung lei keu,le a kisumit zo lo meikuang.
A pa a simmawh mipa,a nu’ thu a mang nuam lo mipa,va-ak in a mittang khelkhiat sakinmusanete in a sa ne ding uh hi.
Ka theih zawh hetloh a lamdang mahmahthu thum om a, eh! li hi zaw:
Vanah musane a leen theihna zia,suangpi tungah gul a pai theihna zia,tuipi tungah teembaw a pai theihna zia,le nungak tangval a kingaihna zia.
A citak lo zi hih bangin gamta hi:Midang tawh khialintua ciangin kisilsiang a,“Khialhna bangmah gamta kei ing,”ci khem hi.
Leitung mi khempeuh ina thuak zawh loh thu thum,eh! thu li om a,
sila khat kumpi a suah ciang,mihai khat in a duh bangbanga nek zawh ciang,
a muhthadahhuai numei khat inpasal a neih ciang,nasem numeino in a tonu’ zaa suan ciang.
A neu mahmah ganhing nam lileitungah om a,ahi zongin a pil penpente ahi hi.
Miksite:A hat het lo ganhing hinapi-inkhuakhal sungin a nek ding uhkhol zo uh hi.
Ngalvangte:A thahat lo ganhing hinapi-insuang lakah a kua ding bawl uh hi.
Kauphete:Kumpi nei lo napi-in a kituak diamdiaminhontat thei uh hi.
Innhikte: Khut sunga tawi zawhganhing hilel napi-inkumpi inn sungah teeng zo uh hi.
A gamtatna i et ciangina thupi suak mahmah thum,eh! li om hi.
Humpinelkai:Ganhing lak pan a hat pen kuamah a kihta lo.
Aklui:A kihisak pai kuankuan.Keeltal:A kihisak pai gangan.Kumpipa:A mite’ mai-ah a pai lanlan.
Kiphasakin na hai pau ngei a,thusia bawl dingna ngaihsut ngei khak lehlimtakin thu ngaihsun pha in.
Bawngnawi toktok lehangthawhbat hong suak a,mi khat’ nak tupsak lehangsi hong luang a,mi phin lehangkitotna hong piang hi.
Kumpipa tungah Ngaihsut PiaknaKumpipa Lemuel, a nu in a thuhilhna:
Kong it mahmah ka ta aw,thu ngenngenin kong neihka tapa na hi hi.Nangma tungah bang tenghong gen ding ka hi hiam?
Na thatang tengnumei tungah beisak kei inla,na sum khempeuhnumei tungah zang kei in.Numei in kumpipa siasak thei hi.
Lemuel aw, ka thugen hong ngai in.Kumpite in zu nek huai lo a,mi ukte in khamtheihzu a duh dinghi lo hi.
Zu ne le-uh,thukham mangngilh uh a,thukham hei-in mizawngtegim pia khathei uh hi.
A si dekdekte, khamtheihzu pia inla,a lungkham mahmahte,leenggahzu pia in.
Amaute nesak lecina zawnna uh mangngilhin,a lungkhamna uhphawk nawn lo ding uh hi.
Thu a gen thei lo mite adinginthu gensak inla,a huh ding a om lo mite panpih in.
Amau ading thu geninthu a tangin khen inla,a zawng a cimawh miteamau adingin a kilawmhamphatna ngahsak in.Zi Hoih Pahtawina
