Zi hoih pen suangmanpha sanginmanpha zaw pek a,ahi zongin zi hoih ngah dinghaksa mahmah hi.
A pasal in muang mahmah a,a inn sung uhahannek kitasam ngei lo uh hi.
Amah in a khan tawntungina pasal tungah thupha bawl a,a pasal tungah thusia tun ngei lo hi.
Amah in samul le khau zonginthanuam takin na sem hi.
Amah in sumbukte’ van puateembaw bangingamlapi panin an hong ciahpih hi.
Phalvak tungin zingtho a,annek ding teng limtakin bawlina nasem numeite’ sep ding tenga vaihawmsak hi.
Amah in leitang hoih penpen zong a,a thalawhsa sum tawha leenggui lo ding a lei hi.
A nik singtenin a puanban zial a,thalawp takin na a sem hi.
Amah in a nasepte a manphatna thei a,zankim zankhang donginnakpitakin na a sem hi.
Amah in khau kheekina puan ding gantawm hi.
A zawng mite tungahamah cingh mahmah a,a cimawh mite tungah huhna a pia hi.
A innkuan buppipuanlum guan zo ahih maninphalbi tun ding lunghimawh lo hi.
Amah in a puan ding khuitawm a,saihadial puansan vive a silh zo hi.
Thukhen upate lakaha pasal a tut cianginmite’ lakaha kitheikim mi khat ahi hi.
Amah in puan khui-inkawnggakte zong bawl a,sumbukte tungah tuate a zuak hi.
Amah a tha hatin zong kizahtak a,mailam hun ading a lung patau lo hi.
Amah in a pilna tawh thu gen a,kam khum takin pau hiathiat hi.
Amah in a innkuansungkisapna teng sem a,a tawntungin manlah den hi.
A tate in amah it mahmah uh a,a pasal in zong pakta mahmah a,
“Zi hoih tampi a om tei hanginnang kan-a hoih kuamah om kei,”ci-in a phat hi.
Ngaihbaanna pen zuaupi hithei a,melhoihna zong mai mang thei hi.Ahi zongin Topa a zahtak numeia phattaak ahi hi.
A sepna khempeuh hanginamah phat un.Mi khempeuh ina zahtak dingin a kilawm ahi hi.
Jerusalem khua sungah kumpi a sem, David’ tapa, Thugen Siampa’ thugente:
Thugen Siampa in hih bangin ci hi:A mawknapi, a mawknapi,na khempeuh a mawknapi.
Gimpi-a nisa thuakin nasepna-ahmihing in bang noptuam ngah ahi hiam?
Khang khat bei-inkhang khat hong tung a,ahi zongin leitung kibangbang niloh hi.
Ni hong suakin ni tum a,a suakkik dingin tum zel hi.
Leitaw lamah huih nunginleilu lamah nung leuleu a,a zuih ngeina teng mah zui-innungnung niloh hi.
Lui khempeuh tuipi-ah luangsuk a,ahi zongin tuipi dim nai lo hi.Tuipi tuite a khu-in leengintuinakah guahin zu a,a nak panin hong luangsukkik zel hi.
Na khempeuh lunggimhuai a,kuama genzawh ding hi lo hi.Mit in a muh cim thei lo a,bil in a zak cim thei lo hi.
A omsa mah bangin hong piangkik dinga,a kisemsa bangin hong kisemkik ding hi.Leitungah a thak na khat beek om lo hi.
Hih pen a thak ahi hi,a kici thei ding khat beek om lo hi.Eite’ khan ma-in a omsa vive ahi hi.
A beisa nate kiphawkkha nawn lo a,hong tung lai ding thute zonga khangkikte in phawk nawn lo ding hi.
Thugen Siampa kei pen Jerusalem khua-ah Israel kumpipa ka hi ngei hi.
Hih leitungah a kisem na khempeuh entelin a thu kan ding ka ngaihsun hi. Pasian in tua bang nasep ei tungah hong guat pen a nuam het lo nasep khat ahi hi.
Leitungah a kisem khempeuh ka mu khin a, tuate khempeuh a mawknapi na hi a, huihpi nung tawh kibang lel hi.
A kawisate kimamsak thei lo a,a om lopi a omin kiseh thei lo hi.
“Pilna sangpi ka nei a, keima mai-ah Jerusalem a uk dangte khempeuh sangin ka pil zaw hi. Pilna le theihna a kici khempeuh ka thei loh om lo hi,” ka ci hi.
Pilna le haina, theihna le mawlna, a kilamdanna ka zong hi. Ahi zongin tua bang ka hahkatna zong a mawknapi ahih lam ka phawk hi.
Pil semsem lehang kilunghimawh semsem a, tam thei semsem lehang hong gimsak semsem zawsop hi.
Lungdamna zongin nuam ka sak bang bangin om ning, ci-in ka ngaihsun leuleu hi. Tua zong a mawknapi ahihna ka phawk zel hi.
Nuihna pen haina ahihna, nopna pen bangmahin a kiman lohna ka mu khia hi.
Mihingte in leitungah tomno a nuntak sungin bangci om leh hoih ding ahi hiam, cih ka muh theih nadingin pilna ka deihna mah tawh, zunekna tawh ka lung nuamsakin, ka utut sep ding ka hanciam hi.
Na lian tampi tak mah ka sem zo hi. Keima adingin inn tampi tak ka lam a, leenggui lo tampi tak mah ka nei hi.
Huan bawlin singno cinna lo zong ka nei a, ka huan sungah nektheih namkim kidim hi.
Tua singnote tui piak nadingin tuikhukpi zong ka bawl hi.
Ka inn-ah a suak silate banah, sila a nu a pa-in tampi tak ka neithuah hi. Tuuhonte le bawnghonte zong tampi tak ka nei a, Jerusalem-a om ngei dangte khempeuh sangin ka hau zaw hi.
Ka zawhsa kumpite’ sumkholna panin keima adingin ngun le kham zong ka la hi. Ka lungnop nadingin la a sa ding lasiam numei le pasal tampi ka nei a, ka deih zahzah zong ka nei zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keima hun ma-in Jerusalem-ah a om ngei mite khempeuh sangin ka lian zaw a, ka pilna zong bei tuan lo hi.
Ka deih khempeuh ka nei a, ka ut bangbangin omin ka gamta hi. Ka sepna khempeuh ah nuam ka sa hi; tua nopsakna pen ka nasepna hangin ka phattuamna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin ka sepsa na khempeuh, tua bangin haksapi a ka sepnate ka ngaihsutkik ciangin, na khempeuh a mawknapi ahihna le leitungah bangmah phattuamna a om lohna ka phawk hi.
A hi-in ci lehang, kumpi khat in ama ma-a kumpipa’ hihsa teng mah a hih thei bek ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin pilna, haina, mawkna i cih bang ahi hiam, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Tua banga ka ngaihsut ciangin, khuavak in khuamial a zawh bangin, pilna pen haina zawhna ahih lam ka mu hi.
Mipilte in a pai nading mun mu thei a, mihaite in a pai nading mun mu thei lo hi. Ahi zongin a pil le a hai in a kibang khat a tuah tuak ding ka thei hi.

Tua ciangin, “Mihaite tungah a piang ding thute kei’ tungah zong hong piang ding ahih manin, ka pil mahmah manin bang phattuamna ngah ka hi hiam?” ka ci a, “Bangmah ngah kei ing, themkhat zong ngah kei ing,” ci-in ka kidawng hi.
Mihaite a kiphawkphawk loh mah bangin, mipilte zong kiphawkphawk tuan lo a, mailam hunah i vekpi-in hong kimangngilh lel ding ahi hi. A pil a hai-in, i vekpi-in i si ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih leitunga sepna khempeuh in lungkhamna cih loh hong piak theih dang bangmah om lo ahih manin, hih leitunga hinna pen kei adingin a kimanna bangmah om lo hi. A mawknapi, huih hawmguak bang bek hi lel hi.
Keimah a hong laih ding pa tungah ka neih ka lam khempeuh ka nusiat ding thei ka hih manin, nakpitakin sem-a ka gimpih nate pen kei adingin a phattuamna om lo hi.
Kei hong laih pa pil taleh hai taleh, ka pilna ka siamna khempeuh zanga ka sepsa nate luahin a ukpa hi ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin hih leitungah nakpitakin na ka sepna ka kisik hi.
Pilna, siamna, theihna siit loin na kisem a, themkhat zong a gimpih het lo mi khat adingin nusiat ding hi zenzen hi. Hih thu a man het lo, a mawknapi taktak ahi hi.
Mi khat in hih leitungah lunghimawhin thatang sanin na a sepna-ah bang phattuamna ngah ahi hiam?
Sepna bawlna khempeuh ah lungkhamna le sinkhamna bekbek hi a, zan nangawnin a ihmut mawhpih hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak ahi hi.
Mihing khat in a nasepna thamanin an ne tui dawnin nuamsa-in a om sangin a hoih zaw bangmah dang om lo hi. Ahi zongin tua nangawn zong, Pasian’ hang ahihna ka phawk hi.
Pasian kihel loin kua in an ne-in nuamsa thei ding ahi hiam?

Pasian in amah a lungdamsakte tungah pilna, theihna le lungdamna pia a, ahi zongin a hehpihhuai mimawhte ahihleh a sep bek sisakin, amau’ thalawhsa khempeuh amah a lungdamsakte tungah a piaksak hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak, huihpi nungdelh bang bek ahi hi.
Na Khempeuh in Hun Nei CiatHih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian hun dinga a sehsa hunin a piansak ahi hi.
Suah hun om a, sih hun om hi.Suan hun om a,bawhkhiat hun om hi.
Gawh hun om a, khoi hun om hi.Phel hun om a, lam hun om hi.
Kah hun om a, nuih hun om hi.Dah hun om a, laam hun om hi.
Lupkhawm hun om a,tuamlup hun om hi.Kikawi hun om a,kikhah hun om hi.
Zon’ hun om a, mansuah hun om hi.Kep hun om a,paihkhiat hun om hi.
Balkek hun om a, phop hun om hi.Daih hun om a, pau hun om hi.
It hun om a, muhdah hun om hi.Kido hun om a, kilem hun om hi.
Na a sem mipa in a sepsa khempeuh thamanin bang ngah ahi hiam?
Pasian in eite’ manlahpih dingin hong piak nasep ka thei hi.
Amah in na khempeuh amau’ hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing a theih zawh nading hong guan lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mihingte in a nuntak laiteng a siam tawpun gamta-in lungdamin a om ding a thupi pen ahihna ka phawk hi.
Eite khempeuh in an ne tui dawnin i sepna thaman tawh lungdamin i om ding kilawm a, tua pen Pasian’ hong piak letsong ahi hi.
Pasian’ sep khempeuh a kip tawntung ding ahihna ka thei hi. I behlap theih ding om lo a, i paihkhiat ding zong om lo hi. Amah i zahtak theih nadingin Pasian in tua bang ding mahin a bawl ahi hi.

A piang khat peuhpeuh pen a piang ngeisa mah na hi a, a piang lai ding khat peuhpeuh zong a piang ngeisa mah na hi lel hi. Pasian in ama hunhunin a piang ngeisa mah piangsakkik zelzel hi.Leitungah Thuman lohna
Tua tham loin, hih leitungah gitlohna in thuman thutang a suan khiatna zong ka mu hi.
Pasian in sepna bawlna le na khempeuh ama hun ding sehkhol khin ahih manin, midikte le migilote thu khen ding hi.
Mihingte pen ganhing bang lel ahihna uh a lahtel nadingin Pasian in mihingte ze-et hi, ci-in ka lungsimah ka ngaihsun hi.

A tawpna-ah ci lehang, mihingte le ganhingte in a tuah ding uh kibang a, ganhing mah bangin mihing zong a si ahi hi. Mihing le ganhing in a kibangin nuntakna hu nei a, mihing le ganhing nuntakna a kimanna bangmah om lo ahih manin, mihing pen ganhing sangin a hoihzawkna bangmah om tuan lo hi.
A nih tuakun mun khatah tung khawm ding uh a, leivui panin a piang uh ahih mah bangin leivui mah suakkik ding uh hi.
Mihingte’ kha vanah kahto-in ganhingte’ kha lei-ah lutsuk hi, cih a thei zong kuamah om lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mihingte in a sep thaman uh ne-in nuamsa-in a om ding uh a hoih pen ahihna ka phawk hi. Tua lo a hih theih ding uh bangmah dang om lo hi. I sih khit ciangin bang piang ding cihtheih theihna bangmah om lo hi.

Tua ciangin leitungah thuman loin a kigamtatnate khempeuh ka ngaihsunkik leuleu hi. Nenniamna a thuak mite kap uh a, ahi zongin kuamah in amaute hehnem lo uh hi. A nengniam mite thahat lua uh ahih manin kuamah in thuk ngam lo hi.
A hinglai mite sangin a si khinsa mite hampha zaw ka sa hi.
Mihing a hong piang nai lo, hih leitung gitlohna teng a mu nai lote hampha zaw lai sawnsawn uh hi.
Mi khatlekhat, hauhnop mana kidemna hangin nakpi taka na kisem ahihna ka mu hi. Hih zong a mawknapi hi a, huihpi nungdelh mah tawh kibang bek hi.
Mihaite in na sem loina khut zepin om uh a,a tawpna-ah gilkialinsihlawh uh hi.
Nakpi takin na sem a,a mawknapi ahi ding,khut nih dim sanginlungsim nuaminkhut khat dim neihna hoih zaw hi.
Nuntakna sungah a mawknapi ahi thudang khat ka mu leuleu hi.

Mi khat in tapa ahi a, sanggam ahi zongin nei lo napi-in, a tawntungin na semin a neihsa tawh lungkim hun nei thei lo hi. Kua adingin gimpi-in na sem a, a ututin ta hoh lo ahi hiam? Hih zong a mawknapi mah, a dahhuai nuntakna khat ahi hi.
Mi khat sangin mi nih hoih zaw hi; amau’ sepna thaman a tam zaw ngah uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh khat cimawh leh a khat in huh a, mi khat guak pen cimawh zenzen leh a huh ding om lo ahih manin a dahhuai pha mahmah ahi hi.
Khua a dam ciangin mi nih lumkhawm leh khua lum hi; khat guak bangci khualum theih ding ahi hiam?
Mi khat bek hileh zawhnop kisa a, nih pha leh kizo zo lo hi. Zang thum a kiheek khauhual bawhsat hak hi.
Mi’ thugen a sang thei nawn lo, teek leh hai a thuah kumpipa sangin zawng napi-in a pil tangval khat hoih zaw hi.
Mi khat pen thong panin suakta-in kumpi suak thei a, zawng napi-in ama gam sungah kumpi suak thei hi.
Hih leitungah mi khempeuh’ thu ka ngaihsun a, tua mite lak panin kumpipa’ za a luah ding khangno mi khat a omlam ka phawk hi.
Kumpipa’ uk ding mite sim zawh lohin tam a, ahi zongin amah a sih ciangin ama nasepna hangin a lungdam khat beek om lo hi. Hih pen a mawkna taktak, huihpi nungdelh bang bek ahi hi.

Thu Mawk Ciampak A HaihuainaBiakinn-ah na pai ciangin limtakin kingaihsun in. A man le a man lo a khen thei lo mihaite’ biakpiaknate tawh a kibang piakna sangin thu ngai dingin biakinn-a paina hoih zaw hi.
Thu ngaihsun masa-in pau inla, Pasian’ tungah thu mawk ciampak kei in. Vantungah Pasian om a, leitungah nang om na hih manin na pau ding a kilawm zahval pau kei in.
Lunghimawh semsem lecin na mang sia semsem dinga, tam pau semsem lecin na haina kilang semsem ding hi.
Pasian’ tungah thu na ciam ciangin manlangin tungsak pah in. Amah in mihaite diksa lo hi. Na thuciamna bangin tungsak in.
Na thuciamna bangin na tunsak kei ding le thu ciam vet kei zaw in.

Khialkha ing, ci-in Pasian’ siampipa’ mai-ah na gen ding kisam kha ding ahih manin na kampauna hangin khialkha kei in. Tua bangin gamta khial lecin nangma tungah Pasian heh dinga, na sepsa khempeuh hong suksiatsak ding hi.
Mang tam man leeng a mawkna mah tam a, kam tam pau leeng zong a kituak mahin a mawkna thu mah kibehlap hi; bangbang ahi zongin Pasian zahtak lai veve in.Nuntakna A Mawkna
Kumpite in mizawngte gim ngahsakin, thuman thutangin na a kisep kei leh lamdang sa kei in. Uliante pen amau’ tunga uliante in en uh a, tuate’ tungah a ensawn a lian zaw khat omlai hi.
Gam khat peuhpeuh in lo khawhna lamsang a lunghimawh kumpi khat kisam hi.
Sum deihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na nei ngei kei ding hi. Na hauhnop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi ahi hi.
Hau semsem lecin na vak ding mi tam semsem a, a hau zaw hi’ng, ci-a na theih bek cih sim loh bangmah phattuamna na ngah kei hi.
Na a sem mipa pen a nek ding nei taleh nei ta kei leh lungnuam takin ihmu thei a, a haute ahihleh lungnuam takin ihmu thei lo uh hi.
A hoih het lo na khat hih leitungah ka mu hi: Mite amau’ lunggim nadingin hau uh hi.
Na a sep khialh manun a neihsa teng uh suplawh uh a, a tu a tate’ luah ding bangmah om nawn lo hi.
I nute’ sung panin bangmah nei loin guaktangin i suah mah bangin guaktang mahin i ciahkik hi. I sepsate i ciahpihkik theih bangmah om lo hi.
A dahhuai mahmah thu in: I suah hun lai-a mah bang teekteekin i ciahkik ding hi. A mawknapi ding a i sepna-ah bang phattuamna ngah ihi hiam?
I nuntak sungteng lungzinna, dahna, lunghihmawhna, natna satna le hehna bek tawh hun bei lel hi.
Keimah in ka phawkkhiat thu in: Pasian in tomkha nuntak hih leitungah hong piak sungin, i sep thaman ne-in dawnin i om ding a hoih pen ahi hi. Hih pen mihingte’ thumong ahi hi.
Pasian in mi khat neihlelam guanin, a hauhna nuamtakin a neksak leh, amah lungdamin a sepna thaman ne-in a om ding hi. Tua nopsakna pen Pasian’ kiang pan ahi hi.
Pasian in lungdamin omsak ahih manin a nuntak tomlam phawkin nei kha lo ding hi.
Hih leitunga mihingte tungah a man hetloin hong kibawlna ka phawk hi.

Pasian in mi khatpeuh tungah neihlelam, hauhna le pahtawina pia-in, a deih khempeuh neisak napi-in, tua nate nuamtakin zangsak loin, midang khat in nopsaklawh laizang hi. Hih pen a mawknapi, a thuman het lo khat ahi hi.

Mi khat in ta zakhat nei-in kum saupi zong nungta thei kha ding hi. Bangzahin sauveipi a nungta ahi zongin leitungah nopsakna ngah loin, limtak a vuina a ngah kei leh, a sisa-a suak naungek hoih zaw lai hi.
A sisa-a suak naungek a kimanna om lo hi. Khuamial sungah suakin, khuamial sung mahah mangthangin kiphawk nawn lo hi.
Sun khuavak mukha loin, nuntakna bangci hiam, cih a theihkhak loh hangin tawlngakna a ngah hi buang hi.
Nuntakna-ah nopsakna a ngah lo mipa kum tulnih a hing zongin, a tawpna-ah a sisa-a suak naungek mah tawh a tunna mun kibang lel hi.
Mihingte’ nasepna pen a nektawm ding bek a ngaihsutna hi lo napi-in, a khamkhop ngah zo tuan lo hi.
Tua ahih manin mihai pa sangin mipil pa a hamphat zawkna bang om tuan ahi hiam? Mihai pa in nuntak nading zia a theih hangin bang phatuam tuan ahi hiam?
Na dangdang deihthuah ngitngetna sangin i neihsa teng tawh lungkimna hoih zaw hi. Hih zong a mawknapi, huihpi nungdelh mah tawh a kibang bek ahi hi.
A piang thu khempeuh, a tuaci mahin tangtawnga kisehsa hi a, mi khat in amah sangin a thahat zaw mi khat a nial zawh lohna thu i vekpi-in i thei hi.
Sauvei kinial lehang a mawkna hi semsem a, a phattuamna om lo hi.
Niliim bangin a pai hanhan, a mawknapi hih nuntak tom sungah mihing ading a hoih pen kua in thei ding ahi hiam? Ama sih khit ciangin leitungah bang piang ding cih kua in gen thei ahi hiam?
Pilna A ThupinaA manpha paknamtui sanginminpha hoih zaw a,i suah ni sangini sih ni hoih zaw hi.
Pawisimna sangin sigalnahoih zaw hi.Sih ding bek a ngak ahihnamihing khempeuh ina phawk ding uh kilawm hi.
Nuihna sangin dahna hoih zaw hi;na mai hong gumsak zahinna thu theihna hongkhangsak hi.
Mipilte dahna lakah omtual a,mihaite nopna lakah omtual hi.
Mihaite in pahtawina la hong sak sanginmipilte’ hong taina hoih zaw hi.
Mihaite’ nuihna penmeikuang sunga selkeu kikhula puak zaizai tawh kibang a,khiatna nei lo, a mawknapi ahi hi.
Mipil khat in midangte a khem cianginmihai bangin a gamta ahi hi.Sumgolh lakna ina lapa’ gamtat hoihna siasak hi.
Thu khatpeuh a kipatna sangina tawpna hoih zaw a,kiphatsakna sanginlungduaina hoih zaw hi.
Heh pahpah kei in;hehna a haihuai ahi hi.
“Bang hangin nidang lai-inhih sangin hoih zaw tham ahi hiam?” ci-in dong kei in.Tua bangte pil thudotna hi lo hi.
Pilna pen hauhna zahin hoih a,mihingte adinginphattuamna ahi hi.
Sum in hong lungmuansak banginpilna in zong honglungmuangsak hi.Pilna a manphatna,a pilte a nuntaksak theihna ahi hi.
Pasian’ sepsate ngaihsun dih in.Pasian in a kawi-a a bawlsatekua in mamsakkik thei ahi hiam?
Nopna na ngah laitakin lungdam in;haksatna na tuah cianginhih thu ngaihsun in:Lungdamna le lungkhamnahong piapa pen Pasian hi a,mai lamah bang piang ding cihkuamah in thei lo hi.
Ka nuntakna a mawknapi hi a,ahi zongin ka nuntak sunginthu khempeuh ka thei hi.Mi khat hoih napi-in si a,mi khat siahuai napi-ina khansau hi.
Tua ahih cianginhoihlua kei inla, lah sia lua kei in.Bang hangin nang kisiasaktawm ding na hi hiam?
Gilo lua, hau lua kei in. Bang hanginkhansih laizang ding na hi hiam?
A nih tuakin lenkip in.Pasian na zahtak naklehkhat peuhpeuh na zuihna-ahna maa vang ding hi.
Khuapi a uk mihing sawm sanginpilna in mi khat hatsak zaw hi.
A manin a gamta, a khial ngei het lo,leitungah mi khat zongom hetlo hi.
Mi’ gen khempeuh thudon kei in.Na nasem pa’ hong samsiatnana zakha ding hi.
Nang zong midang na samsiat zelzelnateltakin na kithei hi.Pilna Zonna
Hihte khempeuh ka pilna tawh ka ze-et a,pil ding ka hahkat hanginkei’ batzawh ding hi lo hi.
Mihing nuntaknakua in thei khia zo ding ahi hiam?Eite adingin thuk lua a,telhak lua hi.
Keimah in pilna siamnaka theih nading,pilna mu-in thupiangtea hang ka theih nadinginnakpitakin hanciaminka lungsim ka pia a,haina a hoih lohna lea haihuaina ka thei khia hi.

Sihna sanginnumei a siahuai zawkna ka thei khia hi.Ama hong piak itna inthang bangin hong tepcip a,ama hong kawina khut insikkhau bangin hong hencip hi.Pasian’ deihna bangina gamtate in tua bang numei pelh thei a,ahi zongin a mawh nuamtea thangah a awk uh hi.
Thugen siampa in hih bangin ci hi:Thu ka kan ciangin,a banbanin thu ka phawkkhia hi.
A thudang ka zonzon hanginbangmah ka mu zo nawnkei hi.Pasal tulkhat sung pankhat bang bek a pil a omkhak theihna,ahi zongin numei lakaha pil cih bang a om lohnakeimah in ka phawkkhia hi.
Keima theih khiat thu in:Pasian in eite a thuman dinginhong bawl hinapi-in,eite in paulap tuamtuam zongin,i kikai-awksak hi.
Mipilte bek inna a khiatna taktaktheithei uh hi.Pilna in mipilte maitaisak a,a hehmai a beisak hi.Kumpipa’ Thu Mang In
Kumpipa’ hong sawl bangingamta inla,Pasian’ tungah thu mawkciampak kei in.
Kumpipa in a ut peuhpeuhhih thei ahih maninama kiang panin pai khia in;ama lungkim lohna hih teitei kei in.
Kumpipa aana neihna tawhgamta hi.Ama gen bangin gamta in;kuamah in amah nial zo lo hi.
Ama thu a mangte inhaksatna tuakkha lo ding hi.Mipilte in a gamtatna zia lea hun hoih thei uh hi.Pasian’ Sepnazia Theihzawh Hilo
Na khatpeuh i hih ding ciangina kilawm hun,le a ngeina man om a,ahi zongin eite inbangmah i thei kei hi.
A hong piang ding thu i thei kei a,a hong gen thei zongkuamah om lo hi.
A sih ding a pelh thei,a sih ding hun a phiat theikuamah om lo hi.Gal a om ciangin gallauna a pelh thei,siatna sungah a lut ciangina peng thei kuamah om lo hi.
Leitung a gamtatnateka ngaihsut cianginhih thute ka mu khia hi.Mi khat in midang tungahvangliatna nei-in,a uk sung mitea gimsak gawp hun a om hi.
Migilote si-in kivui a,a siat gamtatnakhua sunga om mite mah inhan panin a ciah ciangunamah a phat veve-na uh ka mu hi.
A mawhte gim kipia pahpah loahih maninmihingte in khialh dinghaksa sa lo uh hi.
Mawhnei khat in zavei dongsiatna bawl napi-in a khansau veve hi.Ahi zongin “Pasian a zahtakte adinginthu khempeuh nuam ding hi.
Migilote adinginthu nuam lo dinga,amaute in Pasian zahtak lo uh ahihmanin a nuntak hun uhniliim bangin beipak dinga,khansih ding uh hi,” kici hi.

Ahi zongin hih thugennaa mawknapi ahi hi.Leitung a thupiangte ngaihsun dih in:Khat veivei midikte inmigilote’ gimthuak ding tengthuak zawsop a,migilote in midikte’ thamanngah ding tengngah zawsop uh hi.Hih thu pen a haivai,a mawkna taktak ahi hi.

Tua ahih cianginmihing in hih leitungahnuam a sak theih dingadang om lo ahih maninan ne tui dawnin nuamsa-ina om ding bek ahi hi.Pasian in hih leitungahnuntak a piak sungtenga sep thaman a ngah theih dinghih bek om hi.
Pil ding hahkatin,leitunga thupiangte ka theih cianginsun le zaninihmu lo liangin i om hangin,
Pasian’ nasepnai theih zawh lohna ka phawk hi.Mihingte in bangzahini hahkat hangin kithei khia zo lo hi.Mipilte in thei a kisak hangunbangmah thei lo uh hi.

Nuntakna A Kikim lohnaNakpi takinsauveipi ngaihsunin ka phawk thu in:Mipilte le midikte’ gamtatnaa vekpi-in Pasian in uk a,Pasian’ itna hang hizaw hiam,a muhdahna hang hizaw hiamkuamah in thei lo hi.Amau’ mailam thu khempeuha mawkna ahi hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehmi khempeuh a thumong kibang a,midikte le migilote,mihoihte le misiate,mi siangte le mi ninte,biakna piate le a pia lote,a thutawpna uha vekpi-in kibang lel hi.Mawhnei pa sanginmihoih pa hampha zaw tuan lo a,thuciamna a bawl lopa sangina bawl pa hampha zaw tuan lo hi.

Mi khempeuh’ thumongkibang kim a,hih pen leitunga thupiang lakaha man het lo khat ahi hi.Mihingte a nuntak laitenggitlohna le a mawkna thu tawha lungsim uh kidim a,theih kholh lohinmihingte sipak uh hi.
Ahi zongin a hing laite adinglametna om thei a,a sisa humpinelkai sangina hinglai ui hoih zaw hi.
A hing laite in a si dingahih lam uh thei a,a sisate in bangmahthei nawn lo uh hi.A sisate inthaman bangmah nei nawn lo uh a,amaute kiphawkkha nawn lo hi.
Amau adingin itna, muhdahna,hanciamna cihte om nawn lo a,leitunga om nate khat beektheikhakik nawn lo ding uh hi.
An ne-in lungdam inla,zu ne-in lungnuam in.Na gamtatna peuhpeuhPasian in hoih a sa hi.
Na puante siangsakinpaaksak tawntung inla,na sam gumsak ngei kei in.
Pasian in hih leitungah nang a hong piak,tomkha sung na nuntak laiteng,na it na zi tawha nuam theithei-in om in.Leitung lungkhamna sungah na lawhtak,tua bek mah hi kha ding hi.
Na mai-ah sep ding a om khempeuh,na tha neihzah tawh sem in.Bang hang hiam cih lehna zuat ding sihna gam sungahnasepna le thungaihsutna,pilna le theihna cihte om lo hi.

Hih leitungahka phawk dang thu khat in:A taihat mite intai kidemna-ah zo tawntung lo a,galhang thahatte ingal zo tawntung lo hi.A pilte in an a kham ngah tawntung lo a,a pilte hau tawntung lo hi.Hih theih siamna a neitemilian suak tawntung lo hi.Mi khempeuh tungahkamsiatna vive tung hi.
Mihing in ama hun ding thei ngei lo hi.Thangah a awk vasate lengen-ah a awk ngasate tawhi kibang hi.Lamet loh hun laitak keekinhunsia sungah mihingte i tung hi.Thahatna Sangin Pilna Hoih zaw
Thudang khat zong ka mu khia hi:Hih leitungah pilna a hoihnagentehna a hoih khat om hi.
Mi tawmno bek a omna khua khat om a,a vanglian kumpi khat intua khua a sim hi.Amah in tua khua umcihina khua sung luh gawp dingina ngaihsun hi.
Tua khua sungaha zawng mipil khat om a,ama pilna tawh tua khua a hu zo hi.Ahi zongin kuamah intua mizawng pa phawkkha lo hi.
Thahatna sangin pilna hoih zaw ka ci hi;ahi zongin kuamah inmizawngte a pil dingin ngaihsun lo a,mizawngte’ thugenkuamah in thudonin nei lo hi.
Mihai hon lakah gam ukpa inthu a gen lualua sanginmipil pa in damtakina gen hiathiat ngaihhuai zaw hi.
Galhiamte sangin pilna hoih zaw a,ahi zongin khialhna khat ina hoih tampi susia thei hi.
Haina ThamanA sisa thote inpaknamtui bung sungah a ompaknamtui uihsak thei a,haitatna themno khat inpilna lian pen susia thei hi.
Mipilte a manin a gamtat dinga ngeina hi a,mihaite a sia-in a gamtat dinga ngeina ahi hi.
Mihaite lampi-ah a paikawm nangawninhai tat uh a,a haina uh mi khempeuh theisak uh hi.
Nang tungah gam ukpa a heh lehna nasep za taisan pah kei in.Dai tak-a om hithiatna inkhialhna lianpi maisak thei hi.
Hih leitungah a thuman logam ukte’ piansak ka muhte:
Mihaite, zalianpi kipia a,mihaute kiniamkoih suk hi.
Sakol tungah silate tuang a,miliante, sila bangin a khe-un pai uh hi.
Gum a tote gum sung mahah kia dinga,mi’ phung a phelsakte gul in tu ding hi.
Suang a to khiatesuang mah in liamsak dinga,sing a ektesing ehna mahah liam ding hi.
I hei mawlnapi-in i tat kei lehnakpitakin sat kul a,ngaihsut masak ding pilhuai zaw hi.
Gul khimthei napi i khim kei leha kimanna om tuan lo hi;gul in hong tu veve ding hi.
Mipilte’ kampauna inpahtawina ngahsak a,mihaite’ kampauna inamau mah siasak hi.
Thugen a kipat ciangunbangtum lo teng tawhkipan pah malam uh a,gitloh vai teng tawha thugen a khum lel uh hi.
Mihaite in thu gengenin ciakciak uh hi.Mailam a thupiang dingkuamah in thei lo a,a sih khit-a thupiang dinga hong gen thei om lo hi.
A inn zuatna ding lampia thei lo mihai luate bek,a inn lam zonna-in gim ding uh hi.
A kumpipa mi’ cih bangbangingamta lel a,zankhuavak-in zune makai a a nei,gam khat peuhpeuh inlungkhamna thuak hi.
A kumpipa inlungsim khentatna nei thei a,a makaite in annek tuidawn a hun thei a,amau ki-uk thei-inzu a kham lo makai a nei,gam khat peuhpeuha hampha gam ahi hi.
Thadah lua-in a inn vang nangawna hu nuam lo mipa, a inn keh dinga,a inn nangawn in puklawh ding hi.
An in lung damsak a,zu in lung nuamsak hi.Sum in ahihlehna khempeuh a kicingsak hi.
Na lungsim nangawnahkumpipa gensia kei in.Kuama zak lohna munna lupna tung nangawnahmihaute samsia kei in.Thopi in na thugen tengna puakkha ding hi.
Mipilte’ GamtatziaSumbawl nadinginna sumte zang in.Ni khat ni peuh teha meet na ngah ding hi.
Na sumbuk vante mun sagih-ah ahi a,mun giat-ah ahi zonginkhen kawikawi in.Hih leitungah bang thusiahong piang ding cih na thei khol kei hi.
Meii sungah tui a tamluat cianginleitungah guahin hong zusuk a,singkung khatpeuh a puk ciangina pukna san sanah om paisuak hi.
Huih le guah ngakinkhuahun hoih dong a ngak mi inkhaici tuh ngei lo dinga,an zong la ngei lo ding hi.
Nupi gai khat sungah nuntakna thakbangci kipat hiam, ci-inna theih zawh loh mah banginna khempeuh a bawlPasian’ nasepnana thei zo ngei kei ding hi.
Zingsang a kipan khaici tuh inla,nitak dong mateng khawl kei in.A vekpi-in a po kim ding ahi a,a khat sia-in,a khat a po ding ahi zonginna theih kholh bangmah om lo hi.
Khuavak hoih mahmah a,i mit in nitaang a muh cianginnuam mahmah hi.
Mi khat sauveipi a nuntak lea nuntak sung nuamtakin om tahen.Sauveipi tak a hing zongina sih khit hun a sauvei zawknaphawk tahen.Mailamah a lamethuaibangmah a om kei hi.Khangnote Tungah Thuhilhna

Khangnote aw,na khangnona uh nuamsa unla,na khangno lai-un lungdam un.Na hihnop peuhpeuh uh hih unla,na ut bangbangun gamta un.Ahi zongin na gamtatna uh tawh kizui-inPasian in thu hong khen dingphawk gige un.
Note kilunggimsak kei unla,na pumpi uh gentheisak kei un.Bang hang hiam cih lehna khangno hunsung uh sauvei lo ding hi.
Na lungkham hun dinga hong tun ma,“Nuntak nuamsa kei ing,” na cih ma hun,na khangno lai-innang hong Piangsak pa phawk in.
Lungkham hun i cih in:Nang adingin nitaang, khataang,aksi taangte a dialh hun,meiipi kai a then nawn loh hun,
na muan na suan a thahat na khut,na baan, na khete, a thaneem hun,an hai nadinginna hatang tawmlua ta-inna mit maangin,limtakinkhua na muh theih nawn loh hun,
khua sung gamlumnatena bil in za thei nawn loin,ansukna gingtena zak theih phat nawn loh hun,la kisate za thei nawn loinvasa ham nangawn inhong phawn zawh nawn loh hun,

keen sangte-ah pai ngam nawn loin,lam pai ding a haksat hun,na samte hong kangin,na khangno thahatna beita-inna tha a kiam hun ding ahi hi.Eite in a tawntung inn dinga zuan ding ihi a,khua sung lampi-ahkahna awging kiza ding hi.
I ngun meivak khaina a khau kitatin,i kham meivak kia-in kitam dinga,i tuikhaina khau kitatin,i tuikhaina beel kitam ding hi.
I pumpi, lei suakkik dinga,i nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ kiangahi kha ciahkik ta ding hi.
Thugen Siampa in,“A kimanna a om lo, a mawknapi,na khempeuh a mawknapi ahi hi,”a ci hi.Mihing’ Tavuan Bulpi
Thugen Siampa, mipil ahih banah,amah in ama theih tengmite tungah a hilh hi.Amah in paunakte limtakin sin a,a man ahihna thu hoihtakin entel hi.
Thugen Siampa ina zaknophuai kammal khawm a,ama gelh kammaltea man taktak ahi hi.
Mipilte’ thugente pentuucingte in tuu hawlna-in a zatciangkhut hiam tawh kibang hi.Tua thute pen eite khempeuhtuucin bangin a hong CingPasian’ piak ahi hi.
Ka ta aw, na phawk dingthudang khat omlai hi.Lai gelhin a bu-a bawlna inbei hun nei thei lo a,lai tam sin luatna inpumpi gimsak hi.
Hih thute khempeuh banahgen ding thu khat bek om hi.Mihing hong kipiansaknaa thu bulpi pen in:Pasian zahtakna lea thupiakte manna ahi hi.
A pha hitaleh a sia hitaleha simthamin i hih simte nangawni hihna khempeuh ahPasian in thu hong khen ding hi.
Solomon’ la ngaih pente: Dawng KhatnaNungak
Na muk tawh nong tawp a,na hong itna leenggahzu sanginkhum zaw hi.
Na omna khempeuhnam vuauvuau a,na min kizaza a,nungak khempeuh innang hong ngai hi.
Hong kai inla zawltai ni.Ka kumpi hong hi inla,na inn-ah hong ciahpih in.Nang tawh om leeng i lung dam hi;leenggahzu ne-in nuamsa ni.Nang kong ngaihkhaktuahpha ing.
Jerusalem nungakte aw,ka vom hangin ngaihbaang ing.Savun puanbuk banginang hiuhiau ing a,Solomon’ puankhaite tawhkei ka kibang hi.
Ka vom manin hong en neu kei un.Nisa ka thuakna hang ahi hi.Ka ute in kei hong gawtbawl uh a,lo hong kuansaksak uh a,ka pumpi ka don man kei hi.
Ngaihno aw, hong gen dih in.Koi lai-ah na tuu cing dinga,sunin koi lai-ahkhawl ding na hi hiam?Bang hangin tuucing dangte lakahnang hong zong kawikawimasa se ding ka hi hiam?Tangval
Nungak khempeuh lakaha ngaihbaang pen nungak aw,a mun thei lo na hi hiam?Tuuhonte zui-inna keelte hong khah inla,tuucingpa’ puanbuk gei-ahhong cing in.
Ngaihno aw, Faro’ sakoltal insakolpite a delh banginnang hong kidelh hi.
Na biang tuakah a kaisukna samphekte ngaihbaang a,suangmanpha banginna liangko tungah kinga hi.
Nangma adingin khamkhainiang bawlinna kizepna ding zong ngun tawhbawl ni.Nungak
Ka kumpipa a lupna tungah a om laitakinka paknamtui hong kizel hi.
Ka ang-ah ka ngaihno hong lup laitakinmyrrh paknamtui banginnamtui viauviau hi.
Ka ngaihno penEngedi gam leenggui lo aha palh lihlehpak hoihte tawh kibang hi.Tangval
Ngaihno aw, na mel hoih a,na mit zong ngaihbaang hi.Nungak
Ngaihno ngingei aw,na etlawm a, na ngaihhuai hi.
I lupna mun lopa tung hi dinga,taamtak kungte i inn khuam hi-in,taaksan hiangtei inn tungdap hi ding hi.
Kei penSharon gam sunga a omgamlak pak,mualkuam sunga a omunok pak bang ka hi lel hi.Tangval
Tua bang hi lo a,ka ngaihno pennumei khempeuh lak paninling lak a a om unok pak tawh kibang hi.Nungak
Ka ngaihno tangval dang tawhteh lehanggamlak singkung lak a a omepel kung tawh kibang hi.Ama liimah ka tu nuam a,a gahte lim ka sa hi.
Annekna phualah hong paipih inla,itna mai tawh hong en in.
Lungzuang, duangvul ka hih maninleenggahkeu tawh hong vak inla,epel gah tawhhong thadimsak in.
A veilam baan hong khamsak a,a taklam khutin kei hong kawi hi.
Jerusalem nungakte aw,ko’ kingaihnanong suknawi loh nadingunsakhi le sanang tawhkei tungah hong kiciam un.Dawng NihnaNungak
Ka ngaihno’ awging ka za hi.Mual tung tawnin hong tai a,mualte kantaninkei hong zuan hi.
Ka ngaihno sanang tawh kibang a,sakhitalno tawh zong a kibang hi.Ka inn pualam uhah dinga,tawlet-ah hong dak zialinkawmvang paninhong en giau hi.
Ka ngaihno inka kiangah thu hong gen a,Tangval“Hong pai in, ngaihno aw,hong zui in, itluat aw.
Phalbi veng ta a,guah zu nawn lo hi.
Gam sung tengahpaakte palh a, la sak hun tung ta hi.Gam sung tengahvakhu hamte kiza ta hi.
Theite zong min ta a,leenggah pak gim namtui zong kiza ta hi.Hong pai in, ngaihno aw,hong zui in, itluat aw.
Suangheeng kawma vasa banginnang na bu niloh hi.A ngaihbaang na maihong musak inla,a lungzuanhuai na awginghong zasak in.
“I leengguite pak ta ahih maninngiano hon in a suksiat ma-intua ngiano honte man ni,” hong ci hi.Nungak
Ka ngaihno keima a’ hi;kei zong ama a’ hi’ng.Amah in unok paakte lakaha tuu cing a,
nitak huih vot matengnitak nitum mateng a cing hi.Sanang banginmual tunga sakhitalno banginitluat aw, hong paikik in.
Zan sialin ka lup kawmin,ka ngaihno ka lung ngaingai a,amah ka zon hanginka mu zo kei hi.
Tho-in khua sung tengah ka vak a,kongzing kawm tengahka pai kawikawi a,ka ngaihno ka zong a,ka zonzon hanginka mu zo kei hi.
Khua sung cingina pai kawikawite ka tuak a,“Ka ngaihno na mu uh hiam?”ci-in ka dong hi.
Khua sung cingte tawhka kikhen khit phetinka ngaihno tawh ka kimu hi.Amah kawi-in ka lencip a,ka pianna ka nu’ inndei sung,ka nu’ inn dongka tunpih mateng ka khah kei hi.
Jerusalem nungakte aw,ko’ kingaihna nong suknawi loh nadingunsakhi le sanang tawhkei tungah hong kiciam un.Dawng ThumnaNungak
Myrrh paknamtui lesaledi pak namtui a kihel tawh a kibang,sumbuk a paknamtui om khempeuha kihal khin a khu tawh a kibang,gamlak a hong khuto henhanbang ahi hiam?
En un, Solomonkumpi luai-in hong kizawng!Israel gam sunga om galkap hoih pengalkap sawmguk in amah cing hi.
A vekpi-innamsau zat a siam vive hi a,galdo a siam vive hi khin uh hi.A vekpi-in namsau kuah kim uh a,mi’ hihkhak ding a cing uh hi.
Sing hoih pen tawh a kibawl luai-inKumpi Solomon hong kizawng hi.
A luai khuamte, ngun tawh kizut a,a tungahkham tawh a kizem puan a kilam hi.A tut nadingin puansan kibawl a,a sungah savun kidap hi.
Jerusalem nungakte aw,hong pai unla,Kumpi Solomon en dih ve un.A zi neih ni, a lungdam ni-a,a nu in amah a khuksakKumpi lukhu hong khu hi.
TangvalItluat aw, na ngaihbaang a,na lu khuhna puan vang panina ngaihbaangna mit hong tee kelkel hi.Gilead mual tungakeelhon diang leklek banginna samphekte phe velvel hi.
Na ha pak singsengte zonga mul a kimet khin phet,a kisawpsiangtuute tawh kibang hi.Na ha khat zong tok lo a,a vekpi-in kituak dimdiam hi.
Na mukte puansan tawh kibang a,na kampau ngaihnop-huai hi.Na lu khuhna puan sung paninna kho hong san lihleh hi.
Na ngawng pengalhangte’ zat lum tangzangtulkhat a kikhai zeizainaDavid’ tausang tawh kibang hi.
Na nawiteunok pak lakah a ta khawm helhelsanang nih tawh ahi a,a ta khawm hialhialsakhi peeng tawh ahi zongin akibang hi.
Zingsang huih vot a nun mateng,zingsang khuavak hong tun mateng,myrrh paknamtui a omnamualtungah omsuakin,saledi paknamtui lakahka bual ding hi.
Ngaihno aw, na ngaihbaang mahmah a,kawkbaanna ding na nei kei hi.
Ka lawm ngaih aw,Lebanon Mual-ah hong pai inla,Lebanon Mual paninkei hong zui in.Humpinelkaite le kamkeitea tenna,Amana Mual dawn paninhong taisuk inla,Senir Mual leHermon Mual paninhong paisuk in.
Itluat ka lawm ngaih aw,na mit hah in ka lung hong kuai a,na khi awh in ka lungsimhong zo hi.
Itluat ka lawm ngaih aw,nang tawh kingaihnuam mahmah hi.Na itnaleenggahzu sangin khum zaw a,na paknamtuipaknamtui dang khempeuh sanginnamtui zaw hi.
Lawm aw, na muk,khuaizu bangin khum a,na leii,bawngnawi le khuaizu bang hi.Na puanteLebanon Mual tungapaknamtui namkim a nam hi.
Ka lawmnu, ka naunu,a ki-umcip huan hi a,a kinei tuam tuinak ahi hi.
Tua huan sungahsingkungte hoihtakin khang a,mang kawlsing cinnahuan tawh kibang hi.Singgah limci pente tua lai-ah gah a,henna leh nard sing namtuitetua lai-ah a po hi.
Nard sing le saffron sing,thalsing le sinnamon kung,a namtui a gah namkim kung po a,myrrh le aloes,a namtui namkim om hi.
Lebanon Mual tung panintui hong luangsuk a,ciktui luangte, luitui luangte,tua huan sungah a tungsuk hi.Nungak
Saklam huih aw, hong nungsuk inla,khanglam huih aw,hong nungto in.Ka huan sungteng hongnamtuisak un.Ka ngaihno,ka huanah hong paisak unla,a gah limci pentehong nesak un.

TangvalItluat ka lawmnu aw,ka huansung hong tung zo ing.Ka paknamtuite ka kaikhawm hi.Ka khuaizu le ka khuailuzuka ne a,ka leenggahzu leka bawngnawite ka dawn hi.NungakteNungak le tangval aw,na lungkim piikpeek dongunne-in dawnin nuamsa un.Dawng LinaNungak
Ka lup hangin ka lungsim ihmu lo a,ka ngaihno inka kong hong kiuh ka za hi.TangvalItluat ngaihno ka lungtup aw,kei hong tumsak in.Ka lu tungah daingo kia a,meii zun in ka sam kawtsak hi.Nungak
Ka puante suah khinzo ing.Ka puante silhkik ding ka hi hiam?Ka khete sil khinzo ing;ninsakkik ding ka hi hiam?
Ka ngaihno inkongkhak hong len khin napihong taisankik hi.
Ka ngaihno tumsak dinginka kithawi a,ka khuttemyrrh paknamtui tawh ka zut a,ka khutmete myrrh paknamtuika nuh a,kong a hong dingina honna ka len hi.
Ka ngaihno a lutsak dinginkong ka hon a,amah na tai khia khinta hi.Amah a taikhiat manin ka dah lua a,amah ka zon hangin ka mu kei a,amah ka sap hangin hong dawng lo hi.
Khua sung a cing mite tawhka kituak a,kei hong satin hong liamsak uh a,kulhzang a a kileh den khuacingte inka puantungsilh hawk khia uh hi.
Kong thum hi,Jerusalem nungakte aw,ka ngaihno na muh uhlehlungzuangin ka sih dekna na gensak un.Nungakte
Nungak lak a a hoih pen aw,na ngaihno a bangci hiam,hong gen dih in.Tua bangin kong gen liang ding uhbangzahtakin lamdang ahi hiam?Nungak
Ka ngaihno a melhoih a, a thahat hi.Mi tul sawm lakahtehpih ding dang om lo hi.
A sam sau-in kil thiuhtheuh a,a sam hoihin vom dikdek a,kham sangin zongdeihhuai zaw hi.
A mittangte ahihlehtuisiang phuan lakaha kisil siang kiuhkeuh,luitui luang gei-a a omvahuite tawh kibang hi.
A biangte penpaknamtui a dimin a kithunthawl san kiuhkeuh tawha kibang hi.A mukte pen myrrh paknamtui tawha kidim unok pak tawh kibang hi.
A khutte etlawmin hi linlian a,suangmanpha a kiphutzungbuhte a bulh hi.A pumpi pensuangmanpha a kiphut dimdiamsaiha pak tawh kibang hi.
A khete pen kham citaka kiphuh dimdiamnasuangngo khuamte tawhkibang a,ama duang pen Lebanon mual sang,taamtak kung hoih banginthupi suak mahmah hi.
A kampaute khum zungzung a,a vekin, deih loh dingkhat zong om lo hi.Ka ngaihno, hih bang teng hi,Jerusalem nungakte aw.
NungakteNungak lak a hoih pen nu aw,na ngaihno, koi-ah pai hiam?Na ngaihno koi lam pai hiam?Amah hong zonpih nung.Nungak
Ka ngaihno, paknamtui kung a pona,a huan sungah pai hi.A huan sungah a tuu cing a,unok paakte a lo hi.
Ka ngaihno kei a’ hi a,kei zong ama a’ hi’ng.Amah in unok pak lakaha tuute gamtasak hi.Dawng NganaTangval
Ngaihno aw, Jerusalem khuapi banginna etlawm mahmah a,Tirzah khuapi bangin na hoih mahmah a,vantung aksi banginna deihhuai hi.
Keima lam hong nga kei in.Na mai in hong leng lua hi.Gilead mual tungakeelhon diang leklek banginna samphekte phe velvel hi.
Na hate zong, a kisil khin phettuuhon bangin pak singseng hi.A tok khat zong om lo a,a vekpi-in kituak dimdiam hi.
Na lu khuhna puan sung paninna kho hong san lihleh hi.
Kumpi-zi sawmguk,kumpi zineu sawmgiat,sim zawh lohinnungak tampi om kha dinga,
ahi zongin khat bek ka ngai a,amah pen vahui bangin it-huai hi.Amah pen a nu’ tanu neihsun hi a,a nu’ ta it pen khat ahi hi.
Zing khuavak tawh a kibanghih nungak kua ahi hiam?Amah melhoih mahmah a,nitaang, khataang, a bang hi.
Kuam sunga om singkungnotea en ding,leengguite a pak nai hiama en ding,mang kawlsing a pak nai hiama en dingin singno huanah ka paisuk hi.
Galdo dingin a kipansakol hawlpa a lin banginnang kong ngaihna hanginka liingliing hi.Nungakte
Hong ciahkik in,hong ciahkik in,Shulam numei aw.Nang kong muh theih nadingunhong ciahkik in, hong ciahkik in.NungakShulam nungak,khanglui lai-a a lamte banginbang hanginhong mu nuam na hi uh hiam?
TangvalKumpi mel a puaa ngaihbaang nungak aw,na khete lena khedap kilawm mahmah!Na phei le na tanzumtesing suih siamte’ suih bang hiuhiau!
Na kalkawm penleenggahzu lim tawh a kilawi lohai bangin uk kiukeu hi.Na kawng pen unok pak tawha ki-um buhlom hen tawhkibang hi.
Na nawite pena takhawm helhel sakhi peeng,a omkhawm hialhialsanang nih tawh kibang hi.
Na ngawng,saiha tausang tawh kibang hi.Na mitte penHeshbon khuapi kulh gei-a omtuilite tawh kibang hi.Na nak penDamaskas khuapi lam a ngaLebanon tausang banginhoih hiuhiau hi.
Na lutang penKarmel Mual bangin kitawito a,na samphekte san hiuhiau a,a etlawmna inkumpipa’ mit la vangvang hi.
Itluat aw na ngaihbaang a,na mel kong muhnuam zungzung hi.
Tuum kung bangin na etlawm a,na nawite pen,nisuh gaha bawk pha mahmah tawh a kibang hi.
Tuum kung tungah kahto-ina gah ka lo ding hi.Na nawite kei adinginleenggah bawk tawh kibang a,na gimnamepel min bangin namtui hi.
Na kam, leenggahzu banginkhum zungzung hi.NungakKa ngaihno tungahleenggahzu khum luang henla,a muk a ha tawk kim hen.
Ka ngaihno a’ ka hi a,amah in kei hong deih hi.
Ngaihno aw, gamlakah pai khia-inleenggui lo ah va giak ni.
Zingsangin tho baihinleengguite a sel nai hiam,leengguite a pak nai hiam,mang kawlsing kungte a pak nai hiam, i en ding hi.Tua lai munah kong itna letsongkong pia ding hi.
Tua lai-ah zawl-ai kunga namtui gim na za dinga,singgah lim namcini kong gei-ah a om hi.Ngaihno aw, a gah a lui le a thaknang adinginna duhduh kong koihsak hi.
Ka nu’ sung pan a piangka sanggampa hi lecinkei ka ut hi.Tua hileh,lamkalah hong tuak taleng zongkong tawptawp dinga,kuamah in phamawh sa lo ding hi.
Keima pianna ka nu’ inndei sungahnang kong paipih dinga,tua lai-ah nong kawi ding hi.Tua lai-ah leenggahzu lim,mang kawlsing tui,kong tulh ding hi.
A veilam khut hong khamsak a,a taklam khutin hong kawi hi.
Jerusalem nungakte aw,ko’ kingaihnanong suknawi loh nadingunkei tungah hong kiciam un.Dawng GuknaNungakte
Gamlak panin a lawmpa tawhkhut kilensa-ina hong pai khia kua ahi hiam?NungakNangmah na pianna mun,na nu in hong neihna mun,epel kung nuai paninnang kong phong hi.
Kei sim loh kuamah ngai kei inla,kei sim loh kuamah kawi kei in.Itna zong sihna zahin thahat a,ngaihna zong sihna zahin khauh hi.Itna, mei bangin kuang khia a,meikuang lian pen a suak hi.
Tui tampi nangawn tawhkisumit zo lo a,tui sungah i phumcip hanginmit zo tuan lo hi.Mi khat ina neihsa sum khempeuh tawhitna a lei dingin hong kithawi lehkinuihsan lel ding hi.Nungak’ Sanggamte
Sanggam numeino khat ka nei uh a,a nawite neu mahmah hi.Tangval khat in hong hel zenzen lehka sanggamnu uhbangci huh ding ka hi uh hiam?
Amah khua umna kulh hileh,ngun kibawl tausang tawhka hu ding uh a,amah kulhkongpi hileh,taamtak singpekte tawh ka dal ding uh hi.Nungak
Kei, khuakulh ka hi a,ka nawite, a tausang ahi hi.Limtakin kei hong kihutnaka ngaihno in thei ding hi.Tangval
Baalhamon a kici munahSolomon inleenggui lo khat a nei hi.Amah in tua lo a kho dinginlosapte sawl a,a lo-a piangte’ man dinginlosapte khat inngun dangka tulkhat ciata piak ding uh ahi hi.
Keimah in keima aituamleenggui lo khat ka nei hi.Solomon aw, na ngun dangkatulkhat la inla, lokhote’ tungahamau’ tanh ding a zah nih pia in.
Huan sunga om ka ngaihno aw,ka lawmte inhong ngai dide ahih maninnangma aw zong,hong gingsak dih in.Nungak
Ka ngaihno aw, sanang bangin,paknamtui kung a pona munmual tunga om sakhitalno banginkei kiangah hong pai in.
Judah gam kumpi ahi Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz le Hezekiah-te’ hun lai-in Amoz’ tapa Isaiah in Judah gam le Jerusalem khua tawh kisai a maangmuhnate:
Vantungte aw, na za un;leitung aw, na ngai in;bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in thu hong gen khinzo a,“Ka pattahsa ka tate inkei hong lehdo uh hi.
Bawng in amah a nei pa thei a,la in zong a topa’ an piakna munthei buang hi.Ahih hangin Israel in bangmah thei lo a,keima mite in theithei lo uh hi,” a ci hi.

Ah, a khial minam,mawhna in a nencip mite,siatna a bawlte’ suanlekhakte,a gamtatsia tapate!Amaute in Topa nusia khin uh a,amaute in Israel-te’ Siangtho Pasiansimmawh khin uh hi.Amaute inlam khial khin taktak uh hi.
Bang hangin notehong kisat theih nadinginlehdo teitei na hi uh hiam?Israel aw, na lutang khempeuhliamma dim a,na lungsim le na ngaihsutnagim mahmah hi.
Khenuai a kipan luzang dong nangawnina cidamna mun om lo a,sanim gawpnate, meimapite,le siluang liammate a om hi.Tuate pen a nai kisal lo,kitun lo, sathau tawh zong kinomsak lo hi.
Na gam uh khing a,na khuapite uh mei tawh kihal hi.Na muh tangpi mahun gamdang mite inna gam uh hong laksakinna khempeuh susia gawp hi.
Jerusalem khuapi bek omlai a,leenggui lo-a buk,tangmai lo sunga om hampheng banginkuama don lohin kinusia a,a ki-umcip khuapi bangin kinusia hi.
Vanglian Topa in eite tawmno khata nungta-in hong siit hikeileh,eite pen Sodom khua bang khininGomorrah khua i bang khinta ding hi. Kisik Takpi ding Kutna
Sodom a uk mangte aw,Topa’ thu na za un!No Gomorrah mite aw,i Pasian’ hihna na ngai un!

Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Note’ biakpiakna a tampite penkei’ tungah bang hi leltak ahi hiam?Tuutalte le ganhing thaute’ sathau tawhmeihal biaknate ka kham ta hi.Bawngtalte, tuunote lekeelte’ si tawh kei ka lungkim kei hi.
Kei’ mai-ah a kilaak dinginna hong pai uh cianginhih bangin ka huangsungna tuatcil gawpna uhkua’n hong deih ding ahi hiam?
Bangmahin a kimang lo piaknatehong paipih nawn kei un.Paknamtui halna ka kih hi.Khadet ni, Sabbath ni lethupi takin na kikhopnate uhmawhna tawh kidim ahih maninke’n ka thuakzo kei hi.
Note’ Khadet nite lena pawite uh ka mudah hi.Tuate pen kei adinginvangikpi khat suakkhin a,tuate khempeuhka puakna-in ka gim hi.
“Thungenin na khutte uhnong zaak uh cianginnote kong en kei dinga,thu tampi na nget uh hanginke’n ka ngai tuan kei ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehsisan tawh note’ khut kidim hi.
Note kisil tawm unla,a siangtho-in kibawl un.Keima muhna-ahna gamtat siatnate uh pai khia-in,siatna na bawlte uh khawl un.
Gamtat hoih ding kisin un.Thumanin gamta unla,kinetniamna kheel un.Pa nei lote hu unla,meigong numei panpih un,” ci hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Tu-in hong pai unla,thu kikumkhawm ni.Na mawhnate uh puansan a bat hanginvuk bangin hong ngo ding hi.Na mawhnate uh si bangin a san hangintuumul bangin hong kang ding hi.
Note in utna lungsim nei-inthu na man nak-uhlehlei pan a piang a gah hoihtena ne ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note in kei hong nialinna hong lehdo uhlehnamsau in note hong vatmai ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa inhih thu gen khinzo hi,” a ci hi.Jerusalem tungah Thukhenna le Hotkhiatna
A thutak, thutang tawha kidim ngeisa khuapi,bangci-a a paktat numei tawhkibang ta ahi hiam?Ama sungah thumanna om ngei napi-intu-in mi thatte bek a om ta hi.
Jerusalem khuapi aw,nguntang na bang ngei a,tu-in ahihleh ngun-ek na suakta hi.Leenggahzu limci na bang ngei a,tu-in ahihlehtui mawkmawk na bangta hi.
Na uliante, mi lehdote hi a,gutate tawh a kikhawlte ahi hi.Mi khempeuh insumgolh le letsong a deih uh hi.Amaute in pa nei lote panpih lo uh a,meigongnu’ thu amaute in sang lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, Topa, Vanglian Topa,Israel-te’ Vanglian Pasian inhih bangin ci hi:“Ah, ka lang ahi note’ tungahka hehna kong khah khia dinga,ka gal ahi note tungahkeimah in kong thuk ding hi.
Note tungah na kong sem dinga,meikhukah haltui banginna saam-ek teng uh tui khiasakin,na kihelpih na nin khempeuh uhka la khia ding hi.
A masa-a bangin na thukhente,a kipat cil-a bangin na upateka koihkik ding hi.Tua khit ciangin nang penthuman khuapi, thutak khuapi,hong kici ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa thutang ahih maninJerusalem khuapi hon khia dinga,a sungah a teeng a kisik mi khempeuh zonga hon khia ding hi.
Ahih hangin a lehdo mite lea khial mite kisusia khawminTopa a nusiate penkibeisak mang ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehtawsaw kungte na biakna hangunnote na maizum ding uh a,biakna huan na bawlna hangunzahhuai-in na mai uh san ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note pena teh a vul tawsaw kung letui a ngah lo huan tawhna kibang ding uh hi.
A thahat mipa penpatlom tawh kibang dinga,ama nasepna pen mei-ek suak ding hi.Kuamah in phelh zo loinamau tegel kaangtum khawm ding uh hi.
Judah gam le Jerusalem tawh kisai thu Amoz’ tapa Isaiah’ muhna hih bang ahi hi:
Nidang cianginTopa’ inn a omna mual penmual liante lakaha sang penin kikipsak dinga,mual neute tungah kisangsak ding hi.Tua lai-ah minam khempeuhpai muamua ding uh a,

mi tampite hong pai-in,“Hong pai un, amah in ama zialetongtehong hilh theih nading leama lampite i zuih theih nadinginJakob’ Pasian’ inn,Topa’ mualah paito ni,”a ci ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa inZion panin thu hong gen dinga,Jerusalem khua paninTopa’ thuhilhnahong pai khia ding hi.

Amah in minamtekhatlekhat kikalah thu khenin,mi tampite’ thu khensak ding hi.Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu,a teipite uh singhiang heuhnatemkawi-in a seek ding uh hi.Minam khat le minam khatkido nawn lo ding uh a,galdo dinginkithawi nawn lo ding uh hi.A Kiphasakte’ tungah Topa’ Thukhenna
Jakob’ suanlekhakte aw,hong pai un;Topa’ khuavak sungah gamta ni.
Amaute pen nisuahna lam gam a omkhongkhaite le Filistia mite banginaisante tawh kidim uh a,gamdang mite’ ngeina zui uh ahih maninJakob suanlekhak,na mite nang na nial hi.
Amau’ gamahngun le kham kidim a,amau’ sumte inbei hun cih nei lo hi.Amau’ gam pen sakolte tawhkidim a,amau’ leengte inbei hun cih nei lo hi.
Amau’ gam sung milimte tawhkidim a,amau’ khut tawh a bawlsate uhamaute in a bia uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite kiniamkhiat sukin,mite a niamin kikoih suk hi.Amaute’ mawhna maisak kei in.
Topa kihtakna lea lian ama minthanna paninsuanghawm sungah lut unla,leihawm sungah bu un.
Mite’ kiliatsakna penkiniam koih dinga,mihingte’ kiphatsakna penkiniamkhiat ding hi.Tua ni ciangin Topa beka lianin kikoih ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian Topa ina kiphasak le a kiliansak khempeuh,a kisangsak le a sangte khempeuh;
a sang, a kilaamto,Lebanon mual taamtak kung khempeuh,Bashan mual tawsaw kung khempeuh;
a lian mual sang khempeuh lea sang mualneu khempeuh;
tausang khempeuh lea muanhuai kulhte khempeuh;
Tarshish teembaw khempeuh leteembaw hoih khempeuha niamkoih hun ding ni khat a nei hi.
Mite’ kiliatsakna kiniamkhiat dinga,mite’ kiphatsaknaa niamin kikoihsuk ding hi.Tua ni ciangin Topa beka lianin kikoih ding hi.
Milimte khempeuhmangthang khin ding hi.
Leitung a liingsak gawp dinginTopa a kipat cianginamah kihtakna lea lian ama minthanna paninsuanghawm sung le leihawm sungahmite bu ding uh hi.

Amah penleitung a liingsak gawp dingina hong kipat hun cianginTopa kihtakna lea lian ama minthanna vang paninsuanghawmpite sung lekeenhawmte sungaha buk theih nadingunamau’ bawltawm ngun le kham milimte,buite le bakte a paih ding uh hi.
Mihingte muanin nei nawn kei un.Amaute leltakbanga simtham ding ahi hiam?
Judah le Jerusalem tungah Topa’ ThukhennaTopa, Vanglian Topa inJerusalem khua le Judah gam paninnuntakna le luhinna,nuntakna an khempeuh lenuntakna tui khempeuh;
mi vanglian pa le galkap pa,thukhen pa le kamsang pa,aisan pa le upa pa,
mi sawmnga a ukpa le zalian a nei pa,thu lamlak pa le mitphial siampa,le bum siamte a la khia hi.
Amaute’ ulian dinginnaupangte ka bawl dinga,naungekte in amaute uk ding uh hi.
Mite khatlekhat,mi khempeuh in a lawmte ciat,mi khempeuh in a veengte ciat,hih gawp ding uh hi.Khangnote pen uhamte tungah,mi ginalote pen miliante tungahkiphasak ding uh hi.
Mi khat in ama pa inn sungaha sanggampa lenin,“Nang in puan na nei hi;nang, kote’ makai pa nong hi dinga,hih a sialomtangte pennangma khut sung hi ding hi,”a cih ciangin amah in,
“Bangmah hih zo kei ning.Ka inn sungah an le puan om lo hi.Mite a makai-in nong bawl kei ding hi,” ci-in a gen khia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute khempeuh leamau’ gamtatnate in Topa langpanginamah dem uh ahih maninJerusalem khua kipukinJudah gam kia hi.

Amau’ maiput in amau’ langah teci pang hi.Sodom bangin amautea langtangin gamta uh a,amaute in im lo uh hi.Amaute in gimna ngah tahen!Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in amau’ tung mahahsiatna kitun uh hi.
Amaute tungah thu hoih ding hi,ci-in thuman mite kiangahhih thu gen un.Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute inamau’ gamtat hoih thamanngah ding uh hi.
Migilo in gimna ngah tahen!Midang tungah a gitloh gamtatna tawhkizui-in ama tungahkithukkik ding ahih maninama tungah thu sia ding hi.
Keima mite ahihlehnaupangte in bawlsia uh a,numeite in zong uk uh hi.Ka mite aw, na makaite unnote lam hong lakkhial a,note’ lampi zuih pen hong siasak hi.
Topa in thupang dinginama panmun hong la a,ama mite’ thua khen dingin a ding hi.
Topa pen upate leama mite’ uliante tawhthukhen dingin kipan a,“Leenggui lo a netumte, note na hi uh a,mizawngte’ na a kisuttenote’ inn sungah om hi.
Ka mite sucipinmizawngte na gawina uhbang na cihnopna uh a hiam?”Vanglian Topa Pasian in ci hi.Jerusalem Numeite tungah Thukhenna
Topa in hih bangin ci hi:Jerusalem numeite kiphasakinngawng doksa-in lam pai uh a,kiphatsakna tawha mit uh hei pampaminhi tuihtuihin lam pai uh a,a khe uh gingsak sualsual ahih ciangun
Topa inJerusalem numeite’ lutang meima sakinTopa in amau’ lutang kolhsak ding hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in khebuh hoihte, lutuam le khade lim tawh a kibang kizepnate;
bilbah tualte, taaute le mai sitnate;
lukhute, banbulhte, kawngtente, paknamtui bungte le a kivom aite;
min gelhna zungbuhte le nakbuhte;
pawipuante, puanza neute, puanpite le khutkhai ipte;
puanza neu vang siseihte, saihadial puansungsilhte, dialkhipte le kikhuhna puante la khia ding hi.
Paknamtui tangin uihna,kawnggak tangin khauhualpi,limtak a kizem sam tangin lu kolhna,puan hoih tangin puanhampi,melhoihna tangin maizumna hunhong tung ding hi.
Na mite, namsau tawh si ding uh a,a vanglian na mite,gal sungah kisia ding uh hi.
Khuapi kongpi tau-in thum ding hi.Khuapi, gamkhing suak dinga,a guaktang a om nupileilakah a tucip tawh kibang ding hi.

Tua ni ciangin nupi sagih in papi khat neikhawm ding uh a, “Kote in komau’ an ciat ne-in, komau’ puan ciat mah ka silh ding uh hi. Kote pen, nangma zi cih min bek hong puasak in; ka minsiatna teng uh hong hum in,” ci ding uh hi.Jerusalem’ Mailam Minthanna
Tua ni ciangin

Topa in thukhenna le meihalna tawh Zion mite’ mawhna teng siangsakin, Jerusalem khua sung panin mi thahna teng a beisak ciangin Zion-ah a omlai mi, Jerusalem-ah khang tawntungin a om dingin a kiciamtehsa mite khempeuh, a siangtho kici ding hi.
Tua ciangin Zion Mual tung, tua lai-a kikhawm mi khempeuh tungah, sunin meii sungah, zanin meikuang khu tawh
Tua minthanna vang pen sun ciangin nisa a liah ding le huihpi guahpi panin bukna le belhna zong hi ding hi.
Leenggui ThugentehnaKa lawm it pa’ tangina leenggui lo a itna la ke’n hong sa ning:Ka lawm it pa in leitang a hoih mahmahnamual tung khatahleenggui lo khat a nei hi.

Amah in lei to-in a suangte pai khia a,leenggui hoihte a suan hi.A laizangah tausang khat lam a,tua lo sungah leenggahsuknakhuk khat a to hi.Amah in leenggah hoiha hong gah ding lamen a,ahih hangin gam leenggahhong gah mawk hi.
Tu-in, Jerusalem khua-aha teengte le Judah mite aw,kei le ka leenggui lo kikalahthu nong khenna ding uhkong thum hi.
Ka leenggui lo adingin ka hih nai lohka hih ding a kilawmbang omlai ahi hiam?Leenggah hoih gah ding ka lamet laitakinbang hangin gam leenggahhong gah mawk ahi hiam?
Tu-in, ka leenggui lo tungahka hih ding thunote tungah kong gen ding hi.A daai ka la khia dinga, kine mang ding hi.A gawl ka susia dinga, kituancil ding hi.
Lokhulin ka bawl ding hi.Kipuah loin, kikho lo dinga,tua lo sungah lingkung lelingte a khang ding hi.Ama tungah meiite in zongguah a zuksak loh nadinginthu ka pia ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehVanglian Topa’ leenggui lo penIsrael mite hi a,Judah mite penlungdamna tawh a suan kungte ahi hi.Amah in thutang lamen a,ahih hangin sisan luanna om hi.Thumanna lamen a,ahih hangin kahna om hi.Migilote tunga Kizasak Gimnate
Leitang tungah amau guaka teeng ding dong zahinmidangte adinginmun khempeuh a bei matengininn khatlekhat, lo khatlekhat gawmina la thuah tawntung mite ingimna ngah tahen.
Vanglian Topa in ka zakna-ahhih bangin kiciam a,“A mantakin inn tampi takhawmsuak dinga,a lian a hoih innte-aha teeng om lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehleenggah lo eka sawm inphelpi khat dim bek gah dinga,khaici beem khat inan seu khat bek piangsak ding hi,” ci hi.
Zingsang tungin tho-in,khamtheihzu delhin,leenggahzu in amautea satsak pialpual matenginnitakin a tutkho mite ingimna ngah tahen!
Amaute in a pawi sung uhahlaiza lasakna le harp lasakna,khuang, tamngai le leenggahzu,tampi a nei uh hi.Ahih hangin amaute inTopa’ sepnate don lo uh a,a khut tawh a bawlte zong mu lo uh hi.
Tua hi a, thu theih lohna hanginka mite sal suak uh hi.A miliante uh gilkialin si dek uh a,a mihonte uh dangtakin keu uh hi.
Tua ahih cianginLeinuai in a duhna khangsakinbangmah tawh a kiteh thei lo zahina kam ka beba a,Jerusalem’ hoihna teng,a mipite, a mihonte,ama sunga a lungdam mite,a nawmvalh hi.
Mi khempeuh a niamin kikoih suk hi.A kiphasak mite kiniamkhiat suk hi.
Ahih hangin thutang sepna tawhVanglian Topa ina liatna hong kilangsak a,a Siangtho Pasian ina mite a thukhenna tawhama sianthona hong kilangsak hi.
Tua ciangin tuunote inamau’ tatna gamlak mun bangintua khua sungah lopa ne ding uh a,a thau ganhingte le keelnotea siasa khuapi sungah gamta ding uh hi.

Amaute in, “I muh theih nadinginamah manlang sakin,ama nasep khawlsak ni.Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa’ deihnai theih theih nadinginnaisakin tungsak ni!”ci-in ganhing kaih banginkhauzen tawh mawhna kai-in,khauhualpi tawhkhialhna kai uh ahih maningimna ngah ta uh hen.
A phate sia ci-in, a siate pha ci a,khuavak dingin khuamial koihin,khuamial dingin khuavak koih a,a khum dingin a kha koihin,a kha dingin a khum a koihte ingimna ngah tahen.
Amau’ mitah pil kisa a, amau’ muhna-ahsiam a kisate in gimna ngah tahen!
Leenggahzu tampi a dawnte,khamtheih zunek a hatte,
mimawhte sumgolh tawh khah a,midikte a mawhsakte ingimna ngah tahen!

Tua ahih ciangin mei inbuhkung keute kaangtum a,meikuang sungahlopa keute a kattum banginamaute’ zung pen muat gawp dinga,amaute’ pakpalhteleivui bangin vanah leengto ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in Vanglian Topa’ thu nialinIsrael-te’ Siangtho Pa’ thua simmawh uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ hehnaama mite tungah hong khangin,a khut zanin amaute vat gawp a,mualte a kiliing hi.Amaute’ luanghawmtekongzing lampite-ah nin bangin a om hi.Hih bang teng hangin zong a hehnadam zo nai loin ama khut kizanlai hi.
Amah in a gamlapi-a om minam khata sapna-in lim khat lak a,leimong paninhong pai nadingin a sam hi.Manlang takintua mite hong pai pah hi.
Tua a hong pai mite kuamah gim lo uh a,kuamah tuk lo uh hi.Kuamah lusu lo a,kuamah ihmu lo uh hi.Dialkaih khat zong kol lo a,khedap khau khat zong kitat lo hi.
Amau’ thaltangte hiam a,a thal khempeuh uh a kikeeksa ahi hi.Amau’ sakolte’ khecintemeisuang bangin sak a,a leengpeite uhpingpei bangin manlang hi.
Amaute’ kikona penhumpinelkai hawk bang a,humpinelkai khanglaite banginamaute a hawk uh hi.Amaute humhamina sa nek ding uh man uh a,amaute in pua khia-inkuamah in hon khia zo lo hi.
Tua ni ciangin amaute intuipi ging bangin Israel ngik ding uh hi.Mi khatpeuh in hih gam sung en lehkhuamial le lungzinna bek om a,meiite in khua a mialsak hi.
Kumpi Uzziah a sih kumin, a sang mahmah, a lian kumpi tokhom tungah Topa a tu ka mu hi. Ama kumpi puanpi pen biakinn sungteng a dim hi.
Ama kiimah serafim van mite a ding uh hi. Tuate in kha guk ciat nei uh hi; nih tawh a mai liahin, nih tawh a khe tuamin, nih tawh a leeng uh hi.
Amaute khatlekhat kisamin:“Vanglian Topa,siangtho, siangtho, siangtho;leitung khempeuhama minthanna tawh kidim,”ci-in awng uh hi.
Tua kikona aw in biakinn kongkhak khuam bulpite kiliingsak a, inn sungteng meikhu tawh a kidim hi.

Tua ciangin keimah in, “Gim ngah pa hi ta ing! Bang hang hiam cih leh a mawknapi ka hi hi; ka kama ka thugen khempeuh a mawkna vive hi a, a thugen khempeuh uh mawhna le nitna ahi mite lakah ka teengkha hi. Vanglian Topa, Kumpipa ka mukha khinta hi,” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin serafim van mite khat, biakna tau panin taiteh tawh a teh mei-am khat a khutah tawi-in keima kiangah hong leeng hi.
Amah in ka muk hong bi a, “En in, hih in na muk sukha zo hi; na mawhna beita a, na khialhna kimaisak zo hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin, “Kua sawl dinga, eite adingin kua va pai ding ahi hiam?” Topa’ cihna aw ka za hi. Tua ciangin ke’n, “Hih lai-ah kei om ing! Kei hong sawl in,” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in,“Pai inla, hih mite tungah,‘Zaza napi tel lo;mumu napi thei lo,’ va ci in.

Amaute in a mit uh tawha muh loh nading,a bil uh tawh a zak loh nading,a lungsim uh tawhthu a theihtel loh nading,amaute kihei-indamna a ngah loh nadingunhih mite’ lungsim mawlsak inla,amau’ bil uh ngongsak inla,a mit uh va sisak in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in,“Topa aw, bang tanveisawt ding ahi hiam?” ka ci hi.Amah in, “Khuapi-ah a teengkuamah om loin hawm suakin,innte-ah kuamah om loin,leitang pen gamkhing suak kiuhkeuhin,
Topa in gamlapi-ah mite khiin khia-in,leitungah a kinusiamun tampi a om dong, hi ding hi.

Mi sawm ah khat banga omlai tei hangin,taak kung le tawsaw kungtea kiphuk khit ciangina bulsum a omlaitemei tawh a kihalkik banginamaute zong kisusia ding hi,”hong ci hi.(A bulsum pen Pasian’ mite a kipatthakna ding lahna lim ahi hi.)

Uzziah’ tapa Jotham, Jotham’ tapa Ahaz ahi Judah kumpipa’ hun laitakin, Syria kumpipa Rezin le Remaliah’ tapa Pekah ahi Israel kumpipa, Jerusalem khuapi a sim dingin kuanto uh a, ahih hangin amaute in zo zo lo uh hi.
“Syria-te pen Efraim mite tawh kikop,” ci-in David’ innkuante tungah a kigen ciangin, huih in gamlak a singte a mut bangin amah le a mihingte’ lungsim kiliing hi.
Topa in Isaiah tungah, “Ahaz tawh kimu dingin Puansawppa’ nasepna phual zuatna lampi kiangah a om, bual tungnung tuilakna mongah nang le na tapa Shearjashub pai-in
ama tungah, ‘Kidawm inla, om khinkhian in. Lau kei in. Syria kumpipa Rezin le Remaliah’ tapa’ hehna pen, sing tumbang nih a khute tawh kibang lel ahih manin na lung gimsak kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Syria kumpi a kipan Remaliah’ tapa le Efraim mite in nang hong sawm uh a,
“Judah gam a sim dingin pai-in va su gawp ni; eima adingin va zo ni; tua gamah kumpi dingin Tabeel’ tapa va koih ni,” ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi:‘Tua thu pen kip lo dinga,hong tung lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehSyria’ lutang, Damaskas khuapi hi a,Damaskas’ lutang, Rezin ahi hi.(Kum sawmguk le kum nga sunginminam ahi zo nawn lo zah donginEfraim kitamzan gawp ding hi.)
Efraim’ lutang, Samaria hi a,Samaria’ lutang, Remaliah’ tapa ahi hi.Hih thu upna kho na neih kei leh,nang na kip kei ding hi,’va ci in,” ci-in a gen hi.Immanuel Thu Isaiah’ Genna
Topa in Ahaz kiangah thu genkik a,
“Topa na Pasian kiang panin lim khat ngen inla, a thuk Leinuai pan ahi a, a sang vantung panin ahi zongin ngen in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Ahaz in, “Ka ngen kei ding hi; Topa ka ze-et kei ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in, “David’ innkuan aw, ngai un! Mite na lunggim sakna uh kicing sa lo a, ka Pasian zong lunggimsak lai na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin Topa mahmah in note tungah lim khat hong pia ding hi. En un, nungak khat gai-in tapa khat nei dinga, ama min Immanuel kici ding hi.
Amah in a hoih lote nialin a hoihte a teel theih hun ciangin bawngnawi thaukhal le khuaizu ne ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh naupang in a hoih lote nialin a hoihte a teel theih hun ma-in na kihtak uh kumpi nihte’ gam kinusiacip ding hi.
Efraim mite pen Judah mite’ kiang panin a pai khiat hun a kipan nidangin a piang ngei lo thu, Assiria kumpipa pen nang le na mite le na pate’ inn-ah Topa in hong tungsak ding hi.
“Tua ni ciangin Egypt luite’ nakah a om Egypt mite, thopi hon bangin hong pai nading le Assiria mite, a gam panun khuaipi hon bangin hong pai nadingun Topa in sam ding hi.
Tuate khempeuh hong pai-in, keenhawmte sung, suangpi heengte sung, lingkung kawmte le ganhing tatna mun khempeuh ah dim ding uh hi.
“Tua ni ciangin Topa in Gun gal khat panin a kikawm temta ahi Assiria kumpipa tawh sam le khemul mettol dinga, khamul zong met khia ding hi.
“Tua ni ciangin mi khat in bawngla khat le tuu nih bang bek suahtak zo dinga,
ahi zongin tuate in nawi tampi a piakna hangin amah in bawngnawi thaukhal ne zo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gam sungah a omlai mi khempeuh in bawngnawi thaukhal le khuaizu ne ding uh hi.
“Tua ni ciangin nguntang tulkhat a man leenggui tulkhat a omna mun khempeuh pen lingkungte le lingte’ omna suak ding hi.
Gam khempeuh lingkungte le lingte tawh kidim ding ahih manin, thal le thaltangte tawh tua munah mihingte gam vak ding uh hi.
Lingkungte le lingte na kihtakna hangin tupeek tawh a kikho ngei mual neute-ah na pai ngam kei ding hi. Tua munte pen bawng khahna le tuute’ gamtatna mun suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah, “Suangpek lianpi khat la inla, tua tungah mihingte’ theihkim lai tawh, ‘Mahershalahashbaz,’ ci-in gelh in,” hong ci hi.
Hih thu a thei dingin a muanhuai teci, siampi ahi Uriah le Jeberekhiah’ tapa Zekhariah ka nei hi, hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin ka zi tawh ka lumkhawm a, amah gai-in tapa khat hong nei hi. Tua ciangin Topa in ka tungah, “Ama min pen Mahershalahashbaz, ci-in phuak in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh naungek in, ‘Nu aw, pa aw,’ a cihtheih ma-in Damaskas khua’ hauhna le Samaria khua sunga a om a kisut vante, Assiria kumpipa in la-in masuan ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong genkik leuleu a,
“Hih mite in damtakin a luang didi Shiloah tuite nial uh a, Rezin le Remaliah’ tapa’ mai-ah launa tawh liingliang uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Assiria kumpipa le ama galkap honpite, a tam mahmah a piau dimletin a khang Gunpi tui bangin amaute a sim dingin hong luangsak ding hi.
Judah gam dong hong nawtsuk dinga, dimletin paisuakin, ngawng ciang dong tum ding hi,” hong ci hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in eite hong ompih a, a kizal ama khate in i gam hong hu ding hi.
No minam dangte aw,thei unla, lungkham un.Gamlapi-ah a omgamte khempeuh aw, ngai un.Kigalging un; ahih hangin lungkiatnana thuak veve ding uh hi.
Note kikhawminthu na vaihawm uh hangina mawkna suak dinga,thu khat peuhpeuhna gen uh hangin kip lo ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehkote tawh Pasian hong omkhawm hi.Topa Na Zahtak pa Hisak In
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama vangliatna tawh kei tungah thu hong gen a, hih mite’ lampi ka zuih loh nadingin hong hilh khol a,
“Hih mite’ vaihawmna pawlpih kei un. Amau’ kihtakte kihta kei unla, lau kei un.
Ahih hangin Vanglian Topa pen a siangtho-in na ngaihsun ding uh hi. Amah pen note’ zahtak pa le note’ kihtak pa na hisak ding uh hi.

Amah pen, a lamdang mahmahin a siangtho’ luatna hangin mite’ puk theih nading suangtum tawh kibang hi. Judah le Israel kumpi gammite le Jerusalem khua-a a teeng mite a awkna ding thangzak tawh kibang ding hi.
Mi tampi tak tuk ding uh hi. Amaute tukin kitamzan gawp ding uh a, amaute awkin kiman ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Ka nungzuite aw, Pasian in kei tungah hong piak hih thute, limtakin kemin koihcing un.
Jakob’ innkuante’ kiang panin a maitang a seel Topa ngakin amah ka muang ding hi.
En un, Topa in kei hong piak ka tate le keima pumpi pen Zion Mual tungah a teeng Vanglian Topa’ tung panin Israel mite’ sungah lim le kihilna ka hi uh hi.

Amaute in note kiangah, “Phun suausuau-in a pau mualmual vankah theite le aisan theite kiangah thu dong un. Mite in amau’ pasian-te thu dongin, mihingte’ thu pen misite dot ding mah hi lo ahi hiam?” hong ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin note in, “Topa in note hong hilh thute ngai un. Aisante’ thu ngai kei un. Amaute’ hong gen thute a kimanna om lo hi,” ci-in dawng un.
Mite pen gam sungah vak kawikawi-in, nakpitakin lungkhamin gilkial ding uh hi. A gil uh a kial ciangin amaute lungham gawp ding uh a, a kumpipa uh le a Pasian uh hamsiatin vandak ding uh hi.
Amaute in leilak a etsuk hangun, lungkhamna le khuamialna, lungzing a gimna bek om hi. Khuamial ngeungau sungah amaute kihawl khia ding hi.

Zebulun minamte le Naftali minamte’ tenna gamte in mindaina thuak ngei uh a, ahi zongin mai lamah pahtawina ngahkik ding uh hi. Mediterranean tuipi a kipanin nisuahna lam Jordan gun gal, minam dangte’ tenna Galilee gam sung minthangkik ding hi.
Khuamial sunga a pai mite inkhuavak lianpi mu khinta a,khuamial thukna gam sungaha teeng mite tungahkhuavak taang khinzo hi.
Nangmah in amaute na pungsak a,a lungdamna uh na khangsak hi.Anlak hun ciangin lungdamna lemite in vankisutte a hawm cianguna lungdam bangunnangma mai-ah amaute lungdam uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehMidian-te a kizawh ni-a banginnangmah inamau’ vangik puakna hakkol leamaute a kisatna ciangkhutna kuaihtansak a,nangma mi a bawlsia minamtena zo gawp hi.
Galkap hangte’ khedap khempeuh lesi a baang puan khempeuhmei-in kicih ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leheite adingin naungek khat hong suak a,eite’ tungah tapa khat hong kipia hi.Amah pen eite hong ukpa hi dinga,ama min pen“Lamdang Thulak pa,Vanglian Pasian,Tawntung Pa,Nopsakna Kumpi,”kici ding hi.

Tuhun a kipanin a tawntunginDavid kumpi tokhom tung leama gam sungahthutang le thuman phutin,a lian semsem ama ukna lenopsakna in mong nei lo ding hi.Vanglian Topa’ deih luatna inhih thu hong tungsak ding hi.Israel’ tungah Topa’ Hehna
Topa in Jakob tungah thu khat khah a,Israel tungah thu hong tung ding hi.

“Leiseekte kicim khin hi;ahih hangin suangseek tawh i lam ding hi.Theithek singte kisia khin hi;ahih hangin taamtak sing tawhi khek ding hi,”ci-a kiphasakinlungsim kihisak Efraim mite leSamaria gam sunga teengmi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in amaute do-ina langpang ding bawl a,amau’ galte a hanthawn hi.
Ama mai-a om Syria mite lea nunga om Filistia mite inkam ka-in Israel netum uh hi.Hih thute khempeuh hanginama hehna dam zo nai lo a,ama khut kizanlai hi.
Amaute a satpa’ lamahIsrael mite kihei lo a,Vanglian Topa zong lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa inIsrael sung panin a makaite lea mihonte, a lu panin a mei donginni khat thu-in a vatmai hi.
Upa pa lea zahtakhuai mipa pen a lutang hi a,zuauthu a hilh kamsangpa pena mei ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehhih minam a makaihte in lam khialsak a,amau’ makaih mite insiatna ngah uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amau’ tangvalte tungahTopa lungdam lo a,pa nei lote lea meigong numeite uh tungahhehpihna nei lo hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehmi khempeuh penPasian’ thu a khual om loinsiatna a bawl vive hi a,kam khempeuh inhaina thu a gen uh hi.Hih thute khempeuh hanginama hehna dam zo nai lo a,ama khut kizanlai hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehgitlohna mei bangin kuang a,lingkungte le lingte kaangtumsak hi.Gamlak lopa phate kuangsak a,meikhu lomtanginvan lamah kizialto uh hi.
Vanglian Topa’ hehna hanginmeikuang bangin gam sung kaang a,mite pen mei a kicihsing tawh kibang uh hi.Kuamah in a sanggampa nangawnzah tuan lo hi.
Amaute in a taklama omte ne uh a,ahih hangin a gil uh kiallai veve hi.A veilama omte ne uh a,ahih hangin kham nai lo uh hi.Mite in amau’ veengte’ sane ciat uh hi.
Manasseh in Efraim,Efraim in Manasseh ne-in,tua tegel inJudah langpang khawm uh hi.Hih thute khempeuh hanginama hehna dam zo nai lo a,ama khut kizanlai hi.

A cimawhte’ thutang kimlaihei khiatsakin,keima mite sungaha zawngte’ thuman sutkhia-in,meigong numeite’ neihsaamau ading a suah theih nading lepa nei lote’ neihsa amau’ nek dingina bawl theih nadinguna man lo thukhensatna pia a,nenniamna thu a gelhte ingimna ngah ta uh hen!
Gimpiak ni hun, gamlapi paninhuihpi hong nun cianginnote in bangcih ding na hi uh hiam?Huhna ngenin kua kiangah tai dinga,na neihsa uh koi lai-ahkoih ding na hi uh hiam?
Thongkiate’ lakahtonbucipin om ding lea kithat mite lakahsih ding bek a om hi.Hih thute khempeuh hanginama hehna dam zo nai lo a,ama khut kizanlai hi.Topa in Assiria-te A Zatna
Assiria-te penka hehna mite gimpiak nadinginmolhtum le ciangkhutinka zat ahi hi.
Keima thu a ngaihsun lo minam lekei a hong hehsak mite’ neihsasutin laksakin,amaute pen konglak buannawng bangina tuancil dinginamaute sawlin thu ka pia hi.
Ahih hangin a kumpipa intua bang bek sawm lo a,a lungsim in zongtua bang bek ngaihsun lo hi.Ama lungsim sungahminam tampi suksiat nopna thu om hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in,“Ka galkapmaangte,kumpi vive hikhin hi lo ahi hiam?
Kalno khuapi penKarkhemish khuapi tawhkibang hi lo ahi hiam?Hamath khuapi pen Arpad khuapi tawhkibang hi lo ahi hiam?Samaria khuapi penDamaskas khuapi tawhkibang hi lo ahi hiam?
Jerusalem le Samaria milimte sanginmilim lian zaw a nei milim kumpi gamteka khut in ban khin ahih ciangin
Samaria le a milimte tungahka bawl banginJerusalem le a milimte tungahbawl lo ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi.
Topa in Zion Mual le Jerusalem khua-ahama nasep ding teng a zawh khit cianginAssiria kumpipa kiphasakina kisialhna le a kiphatsakna hangingim a pia ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in,“Keimah in thu theihtelnanei ka hih maninkeima thahatna lekeima pilna tawh ka hih khin hi.Mihingte’ gamgite la khia-inamau’ sumte ka sut khin a,keimah in bawngtal bangina gammite ka su gawp hi.
Vasa bumek banginmihingte’ hauhna ka la ziau hi.A kinusia vasa tuite mite in a lak banginleitung khempeuh ka la khin hi.A kha a zap, a kam a ka,a ham khat beek om lo hi,” a ci hi.

Amah a likto pa pen molhtumina zang ding bangkeek,sing ahi lo mipa pen ciangkhut bangina likto ding bang keekin,phuk nadingin amah a zang pa tungah,hei, kihisak thei ding ahi hiam?Singat tem zong amah a zang pa tungahkiliansak thei ding ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin Topa, Vanglian Topa inama mi thaute lakahnatna lianpi tungsak dinga,tua natna pen amaute sungahmei bangin kuang niloh ding hi.
Israel-te’ khuavak pen mei suakin,Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa penmeikuang suak ding hi.Ni khat sungin ama lingkungte le lingtekaangin beitum ding hi.
Gah tampi a piangsak ama leitang leama gamlak a minthanna pennuntakna le pumpi dong takinTopa in susia dinga,mi cina khat a si tawh kibang ding hi.
A omlai gamlak singkungtetawm mahmah ta a,naupang khat nangawn inkhat khatin sim khin thei hi.Israel A Omlaite
Tua ni a kipan Israel a omlaite, Jakob innkuan a suakta laite in amau a su gawp pa suang nawn loin, Topa ahi, Israel Siangtho Pa pen thuman tawh suanin nei ding uh hi.
Jakob innkuan a omlaite a vanglian Pasian kiangah ciahkik ding hi.
Na mi Israel-te, tuipi sehnel zah a phak hangin amaute tawmkhat bek hong ciahkik ding hi. Amaute’ thuak dingin a kilawm bangin thu a kikhen ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa, Vanglian Topa in a thukhennasa bangin leitung khempeuh ah beisiangna a bawl ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa, Vanglian Topa in thu gen a, “Zion-ah a teeng ka mihingte aw, Egypt mite’ hih bangin amaute in molhtum tawh hong satin a ciangkhut uh hong liik ciangin Assiria mite kihta kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a sawt loin note tungah ka thangpaihna bei dinga, ka hehna amaute’ tung tu-in, amaute sia ding uh hi.
Vanglian Topa in Oreb suangpi-ah Midian mite a suk gawp bangin, amah in amaute tungah gimpiakna zang dinga, Egypt mite a thuaksak bangin Assiria mite thuaksak ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin na liangko panun ama vangikpi kin khia dinga, ama hakkol pen na ngawng panun bei ding hi,” a ci hi.Assiria Mite’ Nawkna
Rimmon gam pan galte hong kipaninAiath khua hong tung uh a,Migron khua kantanin hong pai uh a,Mikmash khua-aha van uh hong seng uh hi.
Amaute in mual ciang kantaninGeba khua-ah zan khat giak uh hi.Rama khuamite lau-in liing uh a,Saul’ tenna Gibeah khuamite a tai uh hi.
Gallim khuamite aw,nakpitakin kiko un!Laisah khuamite aw ngai un!Anathoth khuamite aw, amah dawng un!
Madmenah khuamite tai khia a,Gebim khua-a a teeng mitea suakta dingin a tai uh hi.
Tuni mahmahin Nob khua-ahgalte tungin khawl uh a,Zion Mual ahi Jerusalem khuapia khuttum uh sinsan uh hi.
En un, Topa, Vanglian Topa ina kihtakhuai vangliatna tawhsinghiangte heuh ding hi.A kung sangte kiphuk dinga,a kisangsakte a niamin kikoih ding hi.
Amah in tulak singtehei tawh phuk dinga,Lebanon mual a singkung liante tawhpukkhawm ding hi.
Jessi’ Suan’ Ukna ManJessi’ phung sung panina sel khat hong khang khia dinga,a zungte panina no khat hong khang ding hi.
Topa’ kha in ama tungahama mite a ukna dingpilna, thutheihna le siamna pia ding hi.Amah in Topa’ deihna thei-inTopa zahtak ding hi.
Amah in Topa’ nasep nuamsa ding hi.Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawhthu khen lo dinga,kam lengsawn bek zakna tawhthu khentat lo ding hi.
Thumanna tawh mizawngte’ thu khenin,lungsim nem mite’ thuahi bangin khensak ding hi.Ama kam panin a thupiakna tawhleitung mite gim kipia dinga,a muk panin a thugenna tawhmigilote si ding uh hi.
Amah in thuman le thutak tawhama mite uk ding hi.
Keivom pentuuno tawh omkhawm dinga,kamkei gialbem penkeelno tawh lumkhawm ding hi.Bawngno le humpinelkai leganhing thaute omkhawm ding uh a,naupangno khat nangawn intuate hawl zo ding hi.
Bawngpi le vompi inan nekhawm ding uh a,amau’ note lumkhawm ding uh hi.Humpinelkai in bawngtal mah banginbuhkung ne ding hi.
Nawine naungek,gul gilo’ kua vangah kimawl dinga,nawine nawn lo naupang ingul gunei’ bu a sawk hangina gul in tu lo ding hi.
Ka mual siangtho buppi tungahamaute khatlekhatkiliamsak lo ding uh a,kisusia lo ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehtuite in tuipi omna a tuamcip mah banginleitungah Topa’ thu theihnakidim ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Jessi’ zung pen mihingte’ tungah lim khat hi ding hi. Minamte in amah zong ding uh a, ama omna mun minthang mahmah ding hi.A Suakta Laite Gualzo-in A Ciahkikna
Tua ni ciangin Topa in Assiria gam, Egypt gam, Pathros gam, Ethiopia gam, Elam gam, Shinar gam, Hamath gam le tuipi gei-a gamte panin ama mi a omlaite a ngahkik nadingin a vangliatna zangkik ding hi.
Amah in minamte adinginlim khat koih dinga,Israel mi a kihawl khiate kaikhawmin,leitung kiu li paninJudah mi a kikhenthangtekaikhawm ding hi.
Efraim in hazatna lungsima neihnate bei dinga,Judah mi a galbawlte kisusia ding hi.Efraim in Judah haza nawn lo dinga,Judah in zong Efraim galbawl lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin amaute innitumna lama om Filistia mitesimkhawm ding uh a,nisuahna lama om miteluhkhawm ding uh hi.Amaute in Edom mite leMoab mite zo gawp ding uh a,Ammon mite inamau’ thu mang ding uh hi.
Topa in ama huihsa nungsakinNail gunpi le Eufratis gunpi tuitekangsak dinga,mi khempeuh in nuamtakina kantan zawh dinglui neu sagih bek sitlai ding hi.
Egypt gam paninIsrael-te hong paitoh cianginamau adingin lam lianpi khata om mah bangin,ama mi a omlaite adinginAssiria gam panin zonglam lianpi khat om ding hi.
Lungdam Kohna LaNi khat ni ciangin mite in,“Topa aw,kei tungah na heh hanginna hehna damta a,kei hong hehnem na hih maninnang tungah lungdamna kong ko ding hi.

En in, Pasian penkei a hong hon khia pa ahi hi.Amah ka muang dinga,ka lau kei ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian inthahatna le vangliatna hong pia a,amah pen kei a hong hon khia pa ahi hi,”a cih hun uh hong tung ding hi.
Tui siangtho in a dangtaktea lungdamsak mah bangin,Pasian’ hotkhiatna ina mite lungdamsak ding hi.
Ni khat ni ciangin mite in,“Topa’ tungah lungdam ko unla,ama hong huh ding ngen un.Minam khempeuh lakahama septe kitheisak unla,ama min kiliansak hi, ci-in gen un.
Amah in minthang takinsem khin ahih maninleitung khempeuh ahhih thu kitheisak un.
Zion-a teeng mite aw, nomau’ lakahIsrael-te’ Siangtho Palianin om ahih maninlungdamin awng unla,lungdamin la sa un,”a cih hun uh hong tung ding hi.
Babylon tawh kisai ThuAmoz’ tapa Isaiah in Babylon siatna ding tawh kisai a thumuhnate:
Mualkolh tungah lim khat lakto unla,galkapte tungah nakpitakin kiko un.Miliante’ kongpi-ah amaute va pai-ina sim nadingun amaute khut vaan un.
Keimah in ka tuamkoihsa mitethu pia khinin,ka hehna thu a sem khia dinginkiphatsakna tawh a lungdamka mi thahatte ka sam khin hi.
Ngai un, mihonpi lungdam banginmualtungte ah gamlumna!Ngai un, minamte’ kumpi gamtekikhawmin a gamlumna!Vanglian Topa in galdo dinginmihon khat kaikhawm hi.
Leitung buppi a susia dinginTopa le ama hehna galhiamtegamlapi van mong paninhong pai hi.
Topa’ ni hong naita ahih maninnakpitakin kap un.Vanglianpa’ kiang paninsuksiatna hong tung ta ding hi.
Tua ahih cianginkhut khempeuh zaw-in,mi khempeuh’ lungsim tuisuak dinga,amaute lungkia ding uh hi.
Amaute in gim mahmahna lenat velvalna thuak ding uh a,numei nausuak ding banginna sa ding uh hi.Amaute khatlekhatlamdang sakna tawh ki-en ding uh a,a maitangte un gimna mel pua ding hi.
En un, leitung gamkhing suaksakin,leitung mawhneite a susia dinginhehna le sinsona tawhnasia takin Topa’ ni hong tung ding hi.
