Bang hang hiam cih lehvantung aksite leamau’ aksi honpite inkhuavak pia khia lo ding hi.Ni a suahtung a kipan mial dinga,kha in zong khuavaktaangkhiasak lo ding hi.
Leitung mite a tatsiatna hangungim ka pia dinga,migilote a mawhna hangungim ka thuaksak ding hi.Mi kihisakte’ kiphatsakna beisiang sakin,a kisatheite’ kiliatsaknaka niamkhiat ding hi.
Mihingte penkham hoihte sangin a hoih zaw,minam pen Ofir gam khamte sangina hoih zaw-in ka bawl ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka sinso ni-inVanglian Topa ka hehna hanginvantung lausakin ka liingsak dinga,ama omna paninleitung kisingkhia ding hi.
A kidelh sanang lea cing om lo tuu banginmi khempeuhamau’ mite’ lam ciatah kihei-in,amau’ gam ciatah tai ding uh hi.
A kimu mi peuhmah kithat dinga,a kiman mi peuhmahnamsau tawh si ding hi.
Amau’ muhna mahah a naungekte uhleilak kiden gawpna ding hi.Amaute’ inn kiluhin,a zite uh kibuansak ding hi.
En un, ngun le khamte tawha lungkim lo Media mite penamaute a sim dingin ka hanthawn hi.
Amau’ thalte in tangvalte that ding hi.Amaute in gil sung pan a piangnaungekte hehpih lo ding uh hi.Amaute’ mit innaupangte khasiat lo ding hi.
Khaldea mite’ hoihna, a kiphatsakpih,kumpi gam a minthang belBabylon khuapi penPasian in Sodom le Gomorraha siatsak lai hun bang ding hi.

Khang tawntungin tua lai-ahkuamah teeng lo dinga,tua lai-ahkuamah om ngei nawn lo ding hi.Arabia mite kuamah intua lai-ah a puanbuk lam lo dinga,tuucingte kuamah intua lai-ah a tuute lumsak lo ding hi.
Tua munah gamsate lum ding uh a,tua mun a innte pena hawk ganhingte tawh kidim ding hi.Tua munah vasa-kalaoh golpite teengin,tua munah keeldawite laam ding uh hi.
Mihaute’ inn sungah ngiate,kumpi inn nuam sungah se-altea ham ding uh hi.Babylon khuapia siat ding hun hong naita a,a ni sawt nawn lo ding hi.
Topa in Jakob hehpihin Israel teelkik dinga, amaute pen a gam uhah koihkik ding hi. Khual mite in amaute pawlin Jakob innkuan bel ding uh hi.

Israel mite in amaute manin amau’ gamah ciahpih ding uh a, Topa’ gam sungah amaute pen sila numei sila pasal dingin nei ding uh hi. Amaute a man ngei mite pen tu-in amaute in lehmat ding uh a, amaute a nengniam ngei mite tungah tu-in ukna nei ding uh hi.
A haksa nasep hong kisepsakna, gimna le lungkhamna panin Topa in note tungah tawldamna hong piak ciangin,
Babylon kumpipa tungah hih zahkona kam na zang ding uh a,“Kumpi gilo pa pukta a, amah inkuamah nengniam zo nawn lo ding!
Tawlnga loin mihingte satna-in a kizang,hehna tawh minamte ukinnakpitakin a bawlsia,migilote’ ciangkhut legam ukte’ kumpi ciangkhut,Topa in kuaitan khinta hi.
Leitung khempeuh tawlnga-ingamdai takin omta uh a,amaute in la sa-in kiko uh hi.
Taksing kungte na tungah lungdamin,Lebanon mual taamtak singkungte in,‘Nang hong kiniam koih khit a kipaninkote a phuk dinginkuamah hong pai nawn kei,’ ci uh hi.

“Nang na paisuk ciangina hong dawntuah dinginLeinuai-a misite kihanthawn a,nangmah a hong hopih dinginleitungah a lian ngei misi uliantekipusuaksak hi.A minamte’ kumpite khempeuhamau’ kumpi tokhom paninhong ding uh hi.
Amaute in nang hong hopihin,‘Nang zong kote mah banginna thahat kei hi.Kote mah na bangta hi,’hong ci ding uh hi.
Nangma harp lasakna awte,nangma liatna khempeuhLeinuai-ah kipaipih suk hi.Thante pen nangma delhphah hi a,thante pen nangma silh ahi hi.
“Nang Khuavak’ ta, Zingsol,Babylon kumpipa aw,vantung paninnang bangci kiat na hi hiam?Minamte a niam koihpa ahi nangmahleilak dongah hong bangcikiphukpai ahi hiam?
Nang in na lungsim sungah,‘Vantungah ka kahto ding hi.A sangna mun, Pasian’ aksite’ tung pekahka kumpi tokhom ka koih dinga,leilu lam pekakikhopna mualtungah ka tu ding hi.
Meiite’ tung pekah ka kahto dinga,Sang Pen pa banginka kibawl ding hi,’ na ci hi.
Ahih hangin nang penLeinuai thuk pennaLeihawm sungahhong kikoih suk ding hi.
“Nangmah hong mu mite innang hong en gega-in,nangma thu lungngai dedu ding uh a,‘Hih mipa pen leitung a liingsak pa,kumpi gamte a lok gawp pa,
leitung pen sehnel gam suaksakin,khuapite a susiapa,thong sungah a kikhum miteinn-ah a ciahsak lopahih pa hi lo ahi hiam?’hong ci ding uh hi.
“Minam dangte’ kumpite khempeuhamau hankhuk sung ciat uhaha minthangin lum uh hi.
Ahih hangin nang pennamsau tawh a kithat misi a uihte,Suanghawmpi sunga a paisukte,khe tawh a kisikcipsi luanghawmte bangin,na hankhuk pualamahhong kilawn khia hi.
Nangmah in na gam susia-in,nangma mihingte that khin na hih manin,nang pen amaute tawhhong kivui khawm lo ding hi.Siatna a bawlpa’ suanlekhakte’ minkilo ngei nawn kei tahen!
Amaute khangto loinleitung a neih loh nading leleitung maitang tengkhuapite tawh a kidimsak loh nadinginamau’ pate’ mawhna hangina tate’ kithahna ding piang tahen,”na ci ding uh hi.
Vanglian Topa in, “Amaute’ langkhat ah ka pang dinga, Babylon min le a omlai mite’ tate le suanlekhakte ka susia ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Saphulipte’ om nadingin tua khuapi bawlin, bualtui ka suaksak dinga, siatna munphiah tawh ka phiat khia siang ding hi,” Vanglian Topa in ci hi.Assiria Kisusia ding
Vanglian Topa kiciam khin a,“Ka geelsa bangin piang dinga,ka ngimnasa bangin kip ding hi.
Keimah in ka gam sungahAssiria mite ka susia dinga,ka mual tungah ka sikcip ding hi.Ka mite’ tung panin Assiria-te’ hakkolamaute’ liangko paninAssiria-te’ vangikkia khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih ngimna pen leitung buppi adingina kingim ahi hi.Hih ka khut pen minam khempeuhgimpiak nadingin a kizan ahi hi.
Vanglian Topa in ngim khin ahih maninkua in phiat zo ding ahi hiam?Ama khut kizan khin ahih maninkua in kaitonkik zo ding ahi hiam?
Kumpi Ahaz a sih kumin thu hong tung a,

“Filistia mi khempeuh aw,note hong kisatna ciangkhuta kitan manin lungdam kei un.Bang hang hiam cih lehsingbul panin a sel a om bangin,gulpi a sih khit ciangina siahuai zaw gul gunei hong om dinga,tuate pen a leng thei gulpihong hi ding uh hi.

Mizawngte in keima gankhahna sungahan ne ding uh a,a cimawhte lungnuam takinlum hithiat ding uh hi.Ahih hangin no Filistia mite,kialpi tawh kong that dinga,a suaktakha a omlaitekeimah in ka that ding hi.

“Filistia khuapi kongpite aw,nakpitakin kap un;khuapite aw, kiko un.Filistia mi khempeuh aw, lau-in liing un!Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lam paningalkap honte’ hong painaleivui khu hong kitung a,tua galkaptea meidawi khat beek om lo hi,” hong ci hi.
Filistia mite in a hong sawl kamtaitemi khatpeuh inbangci dawn ding ahi hiam?“Topa in Zion kipsak khin a,gimna a thuak ama mite intua sungah bukna mu uh hi,”ci-in a dawng ding uh hi.
Moab tawh kisai ThuMoab gam tawh kisai thu:Zan khat thu-inAr khua kisiasak ahih maninMoab gam a bei hi.Zan khat thu-inKir khua kisiasak ahih maninMoab gam a beita ahi hi.
A sangna munte-ah a kap dinginDibon khuamite paito uh hi.Nebo le Medeba khuate’ hanginMoab mite nakpitakin kap uh hi.Dahna limin lu khempeuh kimettol a,khamul khempeuh zong kimetmai hi.
Kongzing lakah amaute inpuanhampi silh uh hi.Innkhumzang lekongzing lampi kituahnate-ahmi khempeuh nakpi-in kapinkhitui tawh a kawt uh hi.
Heshbon khua le Elealeh khua kiko uh a,amau’ kahna awgingJahaz khua dongah kiza hi.Tua ahih ciangin Moab mi galhiam tawitelau-in nakpitakin kiko uh a,amaute a liing uh hi.

Moab gam adingin ka lungsim kiko hi.A galtai ama mite Zoar khua leEglathshelishiah khuate-aha tai uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh Luhith lampi-ahamaute a kapsa-in paito uh hi.Horonaim khua zuatna lampi-ahamaute in siatna a thuakna uh hanginnakpi-in kiko uh hi.
Nimrim luite kang hi.Lopa keu-in a selthak om lo a,lopa hing om nawn lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute ina ngahsa uh le a kholsa uhna tampite pua-inGialhek Lui-ah a paipih uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehMoab gam kiim khempeuh ahkahna aw a ging hi.Kahna in Eglaim khua ban a,kahna in Beerelim khua zong a ban hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehDibon luituite sisan tawh kidim hi.Ahi zongin Dibon khua ina thuak ding a nasia zaw omlai a,Moab gam panin a suakta mi legam sungah a omlai mite khempeuhkithat gawp ding hi.
Moab mite inJerusalem-a om gam ukpa tungahsehnel gam Sela khua panintuunote a puak uh hi.
A bu a kipaih khiatsak ciangina cih nading thei loina leng kawikawi vasate banginArnon guntui ngahmunahMoab mite om uh hi.

Amaute in Judah mite kiangah,“Kote tungah thuhoih hong lak unla,thutangin hong gamta un.Sunkim laitak a singliim banginkote hong liah un.A kihawl khia kote hong seel unla,galtai kote hong heek kei un.

A kihawl khia ko Moab mitenote lakah hong tengsak unla,kote hong susiate’ kiang paninkote’ belh hong hi un.A nengniam pa om nawn loinsiatna hun beita a,a khe tawh a sik mipagam sung panin a manthan ciangin,
itna kip tawhkumpi tokhom khat kiphut dinga,thuman sep ding a manlang,thutang zongin thu a khen mipa penDavid’ buk sunga om tua tokhom tungahthuman tawh tu ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite in,“Moab’ kiphatsakna thu i za khinta hi.Amah kiphasak mahmah hi.A kiliatsakna, a kiphatsakna,a kihihsakna,ama kisialhnate khempeuha mawkna ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a thuakna uh hanginMoab mite kap henla,mi khempeuh zongMoab mite’ hangin kap ta uh hen.Nakpi takin gimna a thuak laitakunKirhareseth khua-ah a anlim nekte uha phawkkhak uh cianginkhasia-in a kap uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leha hiang zaai-in tuipi kantan a,Jazer khua banin sehnel gam dongaha zaam ama hiangte,minam dangte’ tote in sattan ahih maninHeshbon lo laite le Sibmah leengguitevul ta uh hi.

Tua ahih cianginJazer khua mite a kah banginSibmah leengguite’ hanginkei ka kap hi.Heshbon le Elealeh khuamite aw,ka khitui tawh note kong kawtsak hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh galkidona innote’ singgah le ante hong ban zo hi.

An tampi a pian ngeina lolai-ahlungdamna le nuamna om nawn lo hi.Leenggui lote-ah lasakna om lo a,lungdam a kikona om nawn lo hi.Leenggah cilna-ah kuamah inleengtui suk nawn lo a,leenggah lawh cianga kikona awkidaisak ta hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moab gam hanginlaiza lasakna banginka lungsim kisat gaihgaih a,Kirhareseth khuapi hanginkei mahmah zong ka kisat gaihgaih hi.
Moab a mahmah hong kilaakin, a sangna munah lungkhamin hong pai a, ama siangtho munah thu a nget ciangin bangmah ngah lo ding hi.
Hih bang thu pen Topa in a beisa hun lai-in Moab tawh kisai-in a gensa thu ahi hi.

Ahih hangin tu-in Topa in, “Nasem dingin a kicial kum hunte sung bangin, kum thum sungin, ama mihon tampite om taseleh Moab’ minthanna in simmawhna thuak dinga, a suakta lai mite pen tawm mahmahin, thaneem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Damaskas tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi:En un, Damaskas pen khuapi hi nawn loinninbulomtang suak ding hi.
Ama khuapite kinusiacip paisuak ding hi.Tuuhonte’ omna mun suak dinga,tua tuuhonte lum hithiatinbangmah in lausak lo ding hi.
Efraim gam panin kulhpi bei-in,Damaskas khua paninkumpi gam mangthang ding hi.Syria mi a suakta laite penIsrael mite mah banginmindai ding uh hi,Vanglian Topa in ci hi.Israel tungah Thukhenna
Tua ni ciangin Jakob’ liatna bei dinga,ama hauhna khempeuhmangthang ding hi.

An a la mi inankung ding laite kaikhawminante a kilak khit cianginleitang a hawm guakina om tawh kibang dinga,mi khat in Refaim Kuam sungahansang a kaihkhop khit cianginlolai a hawm guakina om tawh zong kibang ding hi.
Oliv kung a kisin khit ciangina hiang sang pen dawnahpum nih pum thumsingkung hiang dawnah pum li pum ngaa omlai tawh kibang lel ding hi,Israel-te’ Topa Pasian in ci hi.
Tua ni ciangin mite in amaute a Bawlpa pi ngaihsut ding uh a, amaute’ mit in Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa en ding uh hi.
Amaute in amau khut tawh a bawlsa uh biakna taute don lo ding uh a, amau’ bawlsa Asherah milimte hitaleh paknamtui halna biakna taute hitaleh muanin nei nawn lo ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin amau’ khuapi muanhuaite pen Hiv mite le Amor mite in Israel mite’ hangin a nusiat uh munte tawh kibang dinga, gamkhing a suak ding hi.
Nomau hong hon khia Pasiannote in mangngilhin,nomau’ belh Suangpiphawk lo na hih manunnote in biakna huan bawlinkung hoihte suan a,kung namdangte tawh pehin,
tuate na suan ni mahunthakhatin khang a,na tuh ni uha zing ciang mahin a hong pak hanginnote in a gah na lokha kei ding uh hi.Gimna le lungkhamnahong tun ni-in tuate mai mang ding hi.
Ah, mi tampite’ kikona, tuipi ging bang!Ah, minamte’ otna, tui lianpi ging bang!

Tui lianpi a ging banginminamte awng uh hi.Ahih hangin amah inamaute tai dinga,gamlapi pekahamaute tai khia ding uh hi.Mual tung a huih mai-ahansi leeng bang lehhuihpi mai-a pingpei banginleeng khia mang ding uh hi.
En un, nitakin hong lausak a,zingsang ma-in amaute beita!Hih bang thute pen eite hong susia-ineite a hong luh gawpte ina thuak ding uh ahi hi.

Ah, Ethiopia gunte’ galkhat,puankhai gunkuangpi a omnagamte inNail gun tawnin tui tungahlaisah tawh a kibawlgunkuangpite tungah tuangintaangmi hong sawl uh hi.No a zaptel makaite aw,amau’ gam gunpi in a phelkhap,a vanglian a gualzo minam,a nai a gamla-ah a kikihta mi,a tun sang mi,a cineel minamte kiangah va pai un.
Leitung a teeng mi khempeuh,leitunga om mi khempeuh aw,mualte tungah lim khathong kilah ciangin en un!Peengkul hong kimut cianginngai un!
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in kei tungah,“Nitaang sunga nisa silsel,anlak nisat hun sunga meii zun bangin,ka omna panin daitakinka en ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehleenggah lawh hun ma deuh,leenggui a pak khit,leenggah a puamcin laitakin,amah in singhiang heuhna temkawi tawha selte at khia dinga,a zaam zeizai a hiangteheuh khia ding hi.
Tuate khempeuh mual tunga omvasate’ nek ding leleitunga ganhingte’ nek dinginkinusia ding hi.Khuakhal ciangin vasate in ne dinga,phalbi ciangin leitunga ganhingte inne ding uh hi.

Tua hun ciangin, amau’ gamgunpi in a phelkhap,a vanglian a gualzo minam,a nai a gamla-ah a kikihta mi,a tun sang mi, a cineel mite kiang paninVanglian Topa’ min omna Zion mual,Vanglian Topa’ tungahletsong hong kipuak ding hi.
Egypt tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi:A manlang mahmah meii tungahTopa tuangin Egypt gamah a pai hi.Ama mai-ah Egypt gam milimtelau-in liing ding uh a,Egypt mite’ hanna beita ding hi.
Egypt mite amau le amauka kitawngsak ding hi.Mi kim in ama veengte ciat do dinga,khua khatlekhat kido-in,mi khatlekhat kumpi za kituh ding hi.
Egypt mite’ lungsim hawmsuak dinga,amau’ geelnate ka siasak ding hi.Amaute in milimte, vankah theite leaisan theite tungah thu dong ding uh hi.
A thuakhak topa’ khut sungahEgypt mite ka pia dinga,a kihtakhuai mahmah a gilo kumpipa inamaute uk ding hi,Topa, Vanglian Topa in ci hi.
Nail guntuite keu dinga,guntui kangcipin keu ding hi.
Lei zui-a tui kilate uihin,Egypt gam a om Nail gun hiangte kiaminkeucip dinga,pumpeeng kung le phai kungtemuat ding hi.
Nail gun gei, Nail gun kiang kolh dinga,Nail gun kiangah a kituh khempeuhkeucipin huih in leen khia-inom nawn lo ding hi.
Nail gun sungahngasiahna sikkawi a khia ngei,ngasa bengte thumin tau ding uh a,tui tungah ngen a pai ngei mitethaneem ding uh hi.
Anthul khau ciingin na a semte lepatpuan a gante lungkham ding uh hi.
Gam sung makaite kisusiacip dinga,a kicial nasemte dah ding uh hi.
Zoan uliante hai cihtakin hai uh a,Faro’ mipil thu lamlakte inthu haihuai gen uh hi.Nang in Faro’ tungah,“Mipil pa’ tapa ka hi hi;tanglai kumpite’ tapa ka hi hi,”bangci-in ci thei ding na hi hiam?
Tua ahih kei leh Egypt kumpipa Faro aw,na mipilte koi-ah om ahi uh hiam?Vanglian Topa in Egypt gamgimpiak ding a ngimna thu,na mipilte in nangma tungahhong gen thei kha ding hi.
Zoan uliante mihai suak khin uh a,Memfis uliante zong hai khin uh hi.Minamte a makai dinga kineite ina mite uh lam khialhpih khin hi.
Topa in amaute’ lungsimkitukalhsak khinzo hi.Zukham pa ama luak lakah a puk banginEgypt gam mite’ hihna khempeuhkhialin hoi mang khin hi.
A hau a zawng, a lian a neu,mi khat beek in Egypt adingina hihsak theih ding bangmah om lo hi.
Tua ni ciangin Egypt mite, numei bang ding uh a, Vanglian Topa in amaute a khut a sinsanna hangin lau-in liing ding uh hi.
Judah gam pen Egypt mite’ kihtak hong suak ding hi. Vanglian Topa in amaute gimpiak ding a ngimna hangin, hih thu a kigenna mi khempeuh lau ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin Egypt gam sungah khuapi nga in Kanaan mite’ kampau zangin Vanglian Topa’ tungah thuman ding thu ciam ding uh hi. Hih khuapi khat pen, “Ni Khuapi,” kici ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Egypt gamah Topa ading biakna tau khat, a gamgi-ah Topa ading khuapi khat om ding hi.

Tua pen Vanglian Topa adingin Egypt gam sungah lim le teci hi ding hi. A nengniam mite’ bawlsiatna hangin Topa tungah amaute a kiko ciangin, amah in amaute kiangah honpa khat sawl dinga, amaute hu-in khah khia ding hi.

Topa in Egypt mite tungah a mahmah kitheisak ding hi. Tua ni ciangin Egypt mite in Topa thei-in biakpiakna le meihal biakna tawh bia ding uh a, amaute in Topa’ tungah thuciamna bawlin, tua thuciamnate sem ding uh hi.
Topa in Egypt mite sat dinga, ahi zongin damsakkik ding hi. Topa’ lamah amaute kiheikik ding uh a, amah in amaute’ thumna donin amaute a damsak ding hi.
Tua ciangin Egypt gam panin Assiria gamah lam lianpi khat pai-in, Assiria mite Egypt gamah hong pai dinga, Egypt mite Assiria gam sungah pai-in, Egypt mite in Assiria mite tawh biakhawm ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin Israel, Egypt le Assiria, hih thumte pen leitung khempeuh adingin thupha hi ding uh a,
Vanglian Topa in, “Ka mihingte ahi Egypt, ka khut tawh ka bawlsa ahi Assiria le keima luah ahi Israel mite in thupha ngah tahen,” ci-in thupha a piakte hi ding uh hi.
Assiria kumpipa Sargon in a sawl galkapmaang lian penpa, Filistia khuapi Ashdod-ah pai-in, tua khua va sim hi.

Tua hun ma kum thum laitakin Topa in Amoz’ tapa Isaiah tungtawnin thu genin, “Na puanhampi suah inla, na khe panin na khedapte suah in,” a ci hi. Amah zong tua mah bangin gamta-in, tangguak le kheguak tawh lam a pai hi.
Ashdod khua a kilak khit ciangin Topa in, “Egypt le Ethiopia langkhat ah lim le siahil dingin ka nasem pa Isaiah tangguak le kheguak tawh kum thum sung lam a pai mah bangin,
Assiria kumpipa in, Egypt gam mite’ maizumna ahi, a moi a hamin, tangguak kheguakin, tawbo dawksa-in, Egypt mite galin manin, Ethiopia mite salin manin pai khiatpih ding hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ lametna Ethiopia le amau’ kisialhpih Egypt’ hangin amaute lungkia-in a cih nading uh thei lo ding uh hi.

Tua ni ciangin hih tuipi gei-a teeng mite in, ‘En un, eite’ lametna, Assiria kumpipa’ kiang panin eite hong hon khia dingin i belh mite’ tungah hih bang piang khinta hi. Eite bangci suahtak ding ihi hiam?’ ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Babylon gam tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi:Leitaw lam paninpingpei hong kipat mah bangin,a lauhuai gam paninsiatna hong pai hi.

A kihtakhuai maangmuhna khatkei tungah hong kigen hi.A sut zo mipa in sut a,a susia zo mipa in susia hi.Elam galkapte aw, kuanto un.Media galkapte aw, umcih un.Babylon’ piansak khuisatnate khempeuhPasian in beisak ta hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka kawng na a,nausuak numei inna a sak bangin na ka sa hi.Khua a za thei lo zah dongina kuncipin ka om a,khua a mu thei lo zah donginlungkia-in ka om hi.
Ka lung vai a,launa in hong sidaangsak hi.Keima lunggulh zan khuamial penkeima linna a suak hi.
Amaute in sabuai phahin,sualpuante phah uh a,an ne-in tui dawn uh hi.Uliante aw, tho un;lum, sathau nuh un!
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in kei tungah:“Pai in; galvil khat koih inla,ama muh bangbang gensak in.
Amah in a kopkopinsakol tung tuang mite,la tunga a tuangte,kalaoh tunga a tuangte a muh cianginlimtak, phatakinencik hen,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin a mu pa kiko a,“Topa aw, tausang tungahsun tawntung ka dinga,ka vilna munah zan khuavak ka om hi.
En in, sakol tung tuangtea kopkopin hong pai!” a ci hi.Adang khat in,“Babylon cim hi, cim hi.A milim pasian-te khempeuhleilak dongah amah in suksiatsak hi,”ci-in a dawng hi.
A kicilsa, a kiseepsa keima mite aw,Israel-te’ Pasian,Vanglian Topa’ tung paninka zaksa thu tengnote tungah kong gen hi.Edom Gam tawh kisai Thu
Edom gam tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi:Seir mual tung paninkhat in kei hong sam a,“Galvil pa aw, tuzan bangci hiam?Galvil pa aw, tuzan bangci hiam?”hong ci hi.
Galvil pa keimah in,“Zing ni hong suak a,zan khua zong hong mial hi.Thukan nuam na hih lehhong paikik inlahong kan in,” ka ci hi.Arabia Gam tawh kisai Thu
Arabia gam tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi:Dedan mi khualzin honte aw,Arabia gamlakah na giak ding uh hi.
Tema gam a teeng mite aw,a dangtakte tui puak unla,galtaite an tawh dawn un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute,namsau, a kidoksa namsau,a kikeek thal le gal in a phutna panina hong tai uh ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in keima tungah, “Thacial kum hunte mah bangin kum khat sungin Kedar mite’ minthanna khempeuh bei ding hi.
Kedar mi thaltawi siam a omlaite tawm ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa, Israel Pasian in hih thu gen khinzo hi,” hong ci hi.

Maangmuhna Kuam tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi:Kikona tawh a kidim, a gamlum khuapi,lungdamin a diang khua aw,note khempeuh,innkhumzangah na kah toh uhbang na cihnopna uh ahi hiam? A kithat nangma mite pennamsau tawh a kithat hi lo a,galsung a si hi lo uh hi.
Note hong uk mite tai uh a,thal zat kul loin amaute kiman hi.Gamlapi-ah na tai uh hanginhong kimu note khempeuhhong kiman hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah in,“Kei hong en kei unla,khitui tampi luanginhong kapkapsak un.Ka mi tampi a sihna hanginkeimah hehnep dinghong hanciam kei un,” ka ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehVanglian Topa Pasian inMaangmuhna Kuam sungahbuaina le tuatcil gawpna,kitawhzauna, kulhte suksiat gawpna lemualte tungah kikona hong tungsak hi.
Sakol leengte le sakol tung tuangte tawhElam galkapte in thallawng pua uh a,Kir galkapte ina lumte uh a baihsa-in nei uh hi.
Nomau’ teel Judah kuamtesakol leeng tawh kidim a,sakol tung tuangte inJerusalem kulhkongpite-ah a pang uh hi.
Judah a kihutna teng khempeuhkicim khinta hi.Tua ni ciangin Tulak Inn sunga kikoih galhiamte na suang dinga,
David khuapi mun tampi tak a siatna mu-in, bual nuainung tuite na cingkik a,
nangmah in Jerusalem innte a phazah simin, kulhpi siate puah nadingin innte na phel hi.
Nangmah in, bual lui pan a tuite khol nadingin kulhpi nih kikalah tuibempi khat na bawl hi. Ahih hangin nangmah in, tua na a na bawlpa phawk loin, sawtpekin a na geel pa na don kei hi.
Tua ni ciangin Vanglian Topa Pasian inkahna le thumna, sam mettolna lepuanhampi silhnaa zang dingin thu hong pia hi.
Ahih hangin note inlungdamna le kipahna,bawngtalte le tuute gawhna,sa nekna le leenggahzu neknana nei zawsop uh a,“Zing ciangin si ding ihih cianginnene-in dawndawn ni,”na ci zawsop uh hi.
Vanglian Topa inkeima tungah thu hong gen a,“Na sih matengun hih mawhnahong kimaisak het lo ding hi,”Vanglian Topa Pasian in hong ci hi.Eliakim in Shebna Laih ding
Tua ahih ciangin Vanglian Topa Pasian in, “Hong pai in. Inn sung na teng a uk, neihsa kem pa Shebna kiangah pai inla ama tungah hih bangin gen in:
Hih lai-ah nangma ading hankhuk a to, a sangna munah hankhuk a bawl, na omna ding suang a khuak mipa aw, nang in hih lai-ah bang hih a, vui ding kua nei na hi hiam?
En in, nang mi that pa aw, Topa in nang hong lawn khia gawp ding hi. Amah in nakpitakin nang hong lenin,
hong pingpei dinga, lei tanzau munah bawlung bangin hong lawn ding hi. Na topa’ inn sunga dingin maizumna ahi nang pen tua munah si-in, na kisaktheihpih na sakol leengte lakah na tuk ding hi.
Na nasepna phual panin nang kong nawt khia dinga, na omna panin nang hong kilawn khia suk ding hi.
“Tua ni ciangin Hikiah’ tapa ahi ka nasem pa Eliakim ka sam dinga,
nangma puantualpi amah silhsakin, nangma kawnggak tawh amah ka gak dinga, nangma ukna ama tungah ka pia ding hi. Amah pen Jerusalem khua-a teeng mite le Judah mite tungah pa hi ding hi.
David’ suanlekhakte’ khutnuai-ah aana neihna tawhtang, ama tungah ka pia ding hi. Amah in hongin, kuamah in khak zo lo ding hi. Amah in khakin, kuamah in hong zo lo ding hi.
Amah pen a kician mun khatah vankhaina bangin ka khenkip dinga, ama beh sungah pahtawi ngahna phungpi a suak ding hi.
“Ahi zongin a beh a phung, a suan a khakte khempeuh ama adingin van gikpi hi dinga, umlebeel, kuanglekeute, hai a kipan thawl dongin van khaina-ah a kikhai bangin ama tungah kibom ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin mun hoihna a a kikhen vankhai in lel ding hi. Topa in gen khin ahih ciangin, amah pen kitanin kia dinga, ama tunga vangik kikhai teng kisia ding hi,” Vanglian Topa in hong ci hi.
Taia khua tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi:Tarshish teembaw hawlte aw,Taia khua kisia a,inn le khawlmunteom nawn lo ahih manin kap un!Saipras gam panin amaute inhih thu hong za uh hi.
Tuipi gei-a teeng mite aw, thumin tau un.Sidon sumbukte aw,na sawltakte un tuipi kantanintui lianpite tungah om uh hi.
Egypt gam a piang antelei-in na zuak uh a,minam khempeuh tawhsum bawlin na kizom uh hi.

Sidon aw, maizum in;bang hang hiam cih lehtuipi in thu gen khin hi.Tua tuipi muanhuai in,“Keimah in naupaii-inna ka sa ngei kei a,nau ka nei ngei kei hi.Ta numei ka khoi ngei kei a,ta pasal zongka khansuah ngei kei hi,” ci hi.
Egypt gamah hih thu a kizak ciangin,Taia tawh kisai thu hanginamaute in na sa ding uh hi.
Tuipi gei-a teeng mite aw,Tarshish khua-ah tai-in kap un!
Tanglai pekin a piang,gamlapi pek panin a kiphut hih khuapinomau’ lungdampihkhuapi mah ahi hiam?
Kumpi khuapi ahi,ama sumbukte ulian ahi,ama sumbawlteleitungah a kipahtawite ahi,Taia khuapi hih bang a pianna dingkua’ vaihawm ahi hiam?
A Vanglian Topa’ vaihawm ahi hi.Miliante’ kiphatsaknatea beisakna ding lea kipahtawi uliantea niamkhiat nadingin a bawl ahi hi.
Tarshish mite aw,tu-in kuan khia-in lo kho un.Na sumbawlna teng uhmai mang khinta hi.
Topa in tuipi tungah a khut zan a,kumpi gamte lumlet gawp hi.Sumbawlna phualpite a kisuksiatna dingTopa in thu piazo hi.
Amah in, “Sidon khuapi aw,na lungdamna teng bei khinta hi.Na mite in nenniamna thuak uh a,Saipras tuikulh-ah a va tai uh hangin,tua lai nangawnah lungnopna hunnei lo ding uh hi,” ci hi.

Taia khuapi, gamsate’ phualpi a suaksakte pen Assiria mite hi lo a, Babylon mite ahi hi. Babylon mite in khuapi luhna ding panmun bawl uh a, Taia khuapi kulhte susia-in, khuapi sung khempeuh a sia a suaksak uh hi.
Tarshish teembaw hawlte aw,na muan uh khuapi kisia ta ahih maninthumin kap un.

Tua a siat hun a kipanin kumpi khat nuntak hunsung tan ahi, kum sawmsagih sung Taia khuapi kimangngilh ding hi. Kum sawmsagih a cin ciangin, paktat numei la sunga mah bangin Taia khuapi tungah piang ding hi. Tua la sungah,
“Kuama phawk loh numei paktat aw,harp lasakna khat la inla,khuapi kimkotah pai in!Nangmah hong kiphawk theih nadinginla ngaih phuak inla,la tampi sa in,” ci hi.
Kum sawmsagih a cin ciangin Taia khuapi-ah Topa hawh dinga, Taia khuapi in ama sep ngei sem kikin, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh tawh kizomin sumbawlna sem ding hi.
Ama sumbuk vante le ama sepna panin a ngah nate pen Topa’ tungah kipia ding hi. Ahih hangin tuate kikholcip mawk loin, Topa a bia mite’ an ding le puan hoih nono leina-in kizang ding hi.
En un, Topa inleitung hawmsuak sakingamkhing suaksak dinga,amah in lei maitang huiheek gawpin,a tunga a teeng mitethehthang gawp ding hi.
Mi khempeuhte’ thuaknakibang kim ding hi.Siampite le mi mawkmawktesilate le a tote,van leite le van zuakte,sumneite le leibate, a hau a zawng,a thuakna uh kiban ding hi.
Leitung kihawmsuak sakinkisiacip ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in hih thu gen khinzo hi.
Leitung vulin keugaw a,leitung buppi thaneemin vul gawp hi.Vantung le leitunga nih tuakin vulkhawm hi.
Ama tunga a teengte inleitung ninsak uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in thukhamte khialinngeina kipte palsat uh a,tawntung thuciamna peel uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa inleitung samsiatin susia a,a tunga a teeng mite inamau’ mawhna hangun a thuak uh hi.Tua ahih ciangin leitungaha teeng mite tawm semsem hi.
Leengguite keutuminleenggahzu tawm semsem a,a lungdam mi khempeuhkhuisa ta uh hi.
Lungdamna khuang gingte dai-inlungdam a gamlumnate om nawn lo a,lungdam a laiza tawh lasaknatea dai ta hi.
Zu phungah lungdam a lasaknaom nawn lo a,zu khempeuh kisia-in kha gawp ta hi.
Khuapi hawmsuak pen kisiacip ta a,kuamah a tum theih loh nadingininn khempeuh kikhakcip hi.
Leenggahzu a duh manunkongzingah mite kiko uh hi.Lungdamna khempeuhmangthang khinta a,leitung kipahna teng kibeisak ta hi.
Khuapi sungah gamkhinna bek om a,kongpite kisat khaminkisia mang khinta hi.
Hih bangmahinleitungah a om mi khempeuh tungaha hong tung ding ahi hi.Oliv kung a kisin khit ciang,leenggah kilo khinina sangte a kikaihkhop khit ciangina kinusia lo hawmte tawhkibang ding hi.
A suaktasun mite inlungdamin la sa ding uh hi.Nitumna lama om mite inTopa a liat mahmahna thu gen ding uh hi.
Nisuahna lama om mite inTopa phat ding uh hi.Tuipi dunga teeng mite inTopa, Israel-te’ Pasian phat ding uh hi.

Leimong a gamla pek pan nangawnina thuman Israel minamtea kiphatna la i za ding hi. Ahih hangin keimah in,“Ka lungkham hi; ka lungkham hi.Gimna ngah hi ta ing!Bang hang hiam cih lehmi khemte in khemkhem lai-insia semsem uh a,khemzawh thu mahciamciam lai uh hi,” ka ci hi.
Leitung a a teeng mite aw,note adingin launa,gum le thangzakte om hi.
Lauhuaina panin a tai mipagum sungah kia dinga,gum sung panin a taikhiat cianginthangzak sungah awk ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehvan panin guahpi hong bua sukinleitung bulpite kiliing ding hi.
Leitung khangkhaminkilok gawp dinga, kiphelkham ding hi.
Leitung pumpizukham bangin hoi dinga,huihpi’ mut gawp buk banginawn ding hi.Ama mawhnate in nengcip gawp dinga,amah pukinthokik zo ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Topa invantung a om mihonpite leleitung kumpite gim pia ding hi.
Dum sunga om thongkiate banginamaute khempeuhkikaikhawm ding hi.Thong sungahamaute kikhaknelh dinga,ni tampi khit cianginamaute gim kipia pan ding hi.
Tua ciangin khapi mial dinga,ni taang nawn lo ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehVanglian Topa inZion Mual tung leJerusalem khua sungah uk dinga,ama upate’ mai-ahama minthanna vang kilangsak ding hi.
Topa aw, nang penkeima Pasian na hi hi.Nangmah kong liansak dinga,nangma min ka phat ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leha lamdang nate na sem khin a,tanglai peka na geelnatea kip a kho takpi ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehnang in khuapi ninbulomtang na suah a,a muanhuai khuapi a sia na suaksak hi.Mi kiphasakte’ kumpi inn penkhua bang nawn lo a,cikmah hunin kilamkik nawn lo ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi thahatte innangma min hong thangsak dinga,thukhual lo minamte’ khuapite innang hong zahtak ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh nang penmizawngte adingin munmuanhuai,a cimawh mite adingina lungkhamna uhah munmuanhuai,huihpi panin bukna lenisa panin niliim na hi hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehthukhual lo mite’ hihna penhuihpi inkulh a nawk gawp tawh kibang a,
mun keuna-ahnisa mahmah tawh kibang hi.Nang in mi kiphasakte’ gamlumnana daisak hi.Meii liim in nisa a votsak banginthukhual lo mite’ lasaknakitawpsak ta hi.
Vanglian Topa in hih mual tungah mi khempeuh adingin anlim nekna pawi, a ciil mahmah leenggahzu nekna pawi, guhngek tawh a kidim an nekna, a siangtho leenggahzu ciil nekna pawi bawl ding hi.
Amah in mi khempeuh’ khuk dahna puan le minam khempeuh’ silh dahna puante, hih mual tungah susia ding hi.
Amah in sihna beisak mang dinga, maitang khempeuh panin khitui nul ding hi. Leitung khempeuh panin ama mite a kizahkona la khia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih thu gen khinzo hi.

Tua ni ciangin, “En un, amah pen eima Pasian ahi hi. Eite a hong hon dingin amah i ngak hi. Amah pen eima Topa ahi hi. Amah i ngak hi. Amah in eite hong hon khia ahih manin lungdamin kipak ni,” kici ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih Zion Mual hu dinga, ahi zongin Moab mite ahihleh ninkholna dum sungah buhkungte a kisikcip bangin kisikcip gawp ding hi.
Tuipeek pa in tui peek dingin a khutte a van bangin amaute in a khut uh vanvan ding uh a, ahih hangin a khut uh a van simin a kiphatsaknate uh a khut uh tawh bengtumsuk ding uh hi.
Amah in Moab mite’ kulh muanhuaite suksiat sakin leilak denna dinga, leivui suak khin mang ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Judah gam sungahhih la kisa ding hi:Khuapi muanhuai khat i nei a,Topa mahmah in i kulhte lei panmun kipte hong hutsak hi.
Upna-ah a kip thuman minamtea lut theih nadinginkulhkongpite hong ta un.
Topa aw, nang hong muang a,nangma tungah a lungsim khempeuha koih mipa lungnopna kicing pia ta in.
Topa Pasian in eite khempeuhhong hu tawntung ahih maninTopa muang tawntung un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ina kiphasak mite niamkhiat suk hi.Amau’ tenna khuapi muanhuaisuksiatsak a, a kulhpite denkhap sakinleivui a suah hi.
A zawng a cimawh a kinengniam mite intu-in tua khua tuancil uh hi.
Midik pa’ lampi tamkim a,nangmah in midik pa’ lampi na neelsak hi.
Topa aw, nangma deihna kong zui uh a,nang kong ngak uh hi.Nang penkote’ deih kicinna na hi hi.

Ka lungsim khempeuh tawhzanin nang kong deih a,zingsang khuavak cianginlungsim tak tawh nang kong zong hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung lea mite tungah thu na khen cianginleitunga a teeng mite inthuman i cih bang hiam,cih a phawk ding uh hi.

Migilote tungah nangmah na migit hangina manin gamtat ding theithei tuan lo uh a,lungsim thutang mite’ gam sungahamaute in khialhna bawl lai veve uh hi.Amaute in Topa’ minliatnahong phawk nuam lo uh hi.
Topa aw, amaute gim na piak ding lamtakna galte in thei lo uh hi.Amaute maizumna thuaksak inla,amaute adingin na geelsa gimnateamaute thuaksak in.Na mite na itna thuna galte tungah kilangsak in.
Topa aw, kote tungahmaavanna hong pia in.Kote’ matut zawhna khempeuhnangmah in na hong sepsakna hangahi hi.
Topa, kote’ Pasian aw,nang ahi lo to dangte inko tungah hong uk hangin,nangmah bek mah kote’ Topa na hi hi.
Amaute si a, hingkik lo ding uh hi.Amaute mangthang ta uh a,omkik nawn lo ding uh hi.Tua bang a piantheih nadinginnangmah in amaute tungahsiatna na tungsak a,amaute a kiphawkna khempeuhna beisak hi.
Ahih hangin nangmah inko minam nong khangsak hi.Topa aw, nangmah inko minam nong khangsak a,gamgi khempeuhna hong keeksak khin hi.Hih thu hanginnangma min a thang hi.
Topa aw, ka cihmawh uh cianginnang kong zong uh a,nangma hong taina penkote nong gimpiakna ahi hi.
Topa aw, nangma hangin kote pennaupaii numei a hun a nai cianginna sa-in kiheek a,a kap tawh ka kibang uh hi.
Kote in naupaii-in ka kiheekheek uh a,huih bek a hing khia tawhka kibang uh hi.Kote in ka gam uh adingbangmah ka suakkhiasak kei uh a,leitungah a teeng ding mikuamah ka hing khia kei uh hi.

Nangma mi a sisate hingkik ding uh a,amau’ pumpi thokik ding hi.Han sungah a lum mite aw,tho-in lungdamin la sa un!Bang hang hiam cih lehzing daitui in leitung a nosakkik banginsawtpi-a a sisa miteTopa in hingkiksak ding hi.
Ka mite aw, hong pai-inna inn sung uhah tum unla,na kongte uh khak un.Hehna a dam matengintawlkhat sung bu un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh en un,amau’ mawhna hanginleitungah a teeng mite gim a pia dinginama omna panin Topa hong pai khia a,leitung in ama tunga a kithat mitelak khia dinga,a kithat ama mitesincip nawn lo ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Topa in a sak mahmah, a lian mahmah, a to mahmah namsau tawh, a tai khia gulpi ahi awle, a kikualvial gulpi ahi awle gim pia dinga, amah in tuipi sunga om tua gulpi a that ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin,“A deihhuai leenggah lo thu la-in sa un!
Keimah,Topa, tua lo a hong pa ka hi a,a hunhunin tui ka buak hi.Khatpeuh in a suksiat loh nadinginsun le zanin ka hong ding hi.
Leenggui lo tungah ka heh nawn kei hi.Ling le lingkungte hong om lehkeimah kuan khia-intuate ka haltum ding hi.
Tua ahih kei leh keima hutna sungahamaute hong om henla,amaute in kei tawh kilemna hong bawlinkeimah tawhamaute hong kilem ta uh hen,”Topa in ci ding hi.
Hong tung ding hunahJakob in zung kha dinga,Israel palhin dawn khia dinga,leitung khempeuha gah tawh kidimsak ding hi.
Pasian in Israel-te’ galtea vat gawp banginIsrael-te vat gawp ahi hiam?Tua ahih kei leh amau a thattea kithah bangin Israel-te kithat ahi hiam?
A kithukkim dinginamaute sal suahsakna tawh gim a pia hi.Nisuahna huihpi in a mutkhiat banginamaute a khin khia hi.

Israel in suang tawh a kibawlbiakna tau khempeuhsuangkang satvui a batsak cianginAsherah milimte lepaknamtui taute a dinglai om nawn lo hi.Hih thu hanginJakob’ mawhna kimaisakina mawhna kilakkhiatsak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leha muanhuai khuapi pengamlak bangin amah guakin omin,mi’ tenna mun penkitaisanin kinusia hi.Tua lai-ah bawngno gamta-in lum a,singhiangte a kheuh hi.

A hiangte a keu ciangin kitan hi.Nupite hong pai-in mei-in cih uh hi.Hih mite in khentel theihnanei lo ahih cianginamaute a bawlpa inamaute hehpih lo dinga,amaute a piangsak pa inamaute tungah maipha lak lo ding hi.
Israel mite aw, tua ni ciangin Eufratis gunpi panin Egypt luipi dongin Topa in thu hong khen dinga, note khat khatin hong kikaikhawm ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin peengkul lianpi khat kitum dinga, Assiria gam sunga a mangthang mite le Egypt gam sunga a kihawl khia mite hong pai-in Jerusalem mual siangtho tungah Topa hong bia ding uh hi.

Israel Kumpi gam insiatna a thuak ding hita hi.Zu a kham, a gam makaite’ lu tungah a ompak tawh a kibawl Kumpi lukhu bangina minthanna mai mang ta hi.A lutang uh paknamtui kinuh napi-inzukhamin tuk mangkhin uh hi.
En un, a vang a lian,a hat mahmah mi khat Topa in nei hi.A susia huihpi gialpi,tuikhang le a thahat huihpi banginamah in leilak den gawpna ding hi.
Israel zukham makaite ina kiphatsakpih kumpi lukhu penkhenuai-ah kituancil ding hi.
Tua a kiphasakzukham makaite’ minthanna pentuk tun ma-in a omtheipal min tawh kibang dinga,mi khat in tua theigah a muh cianginlo in a nekpah banginmai mang lel ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Vanglian Topa penama mi a omlaite adinginminthanna kumpi lukhu lehoihna lukhu hi ding hi.
Thukhenin a tupa tungahthutang lungsim guan dinga,khuapikulh hong luh galtea not khia ding mite tungahhanna lungsim guan ding hi.Zak kholhsakna le Kamciamna

Hih mite zong leenggahzu tawh hoi-inkhamtheihzu tawh awn uh hi.Siampite le kamsangte nangawnzukhamin hoi uh hi.Kamsangte in zu kham lua uh ahih maninPasian’ muhsak maangmuhnatetheithei lo uh a,siampite in zongzu kham lua uh ahih manina thukhen dingte uh khen thei lo uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehsabuai tung khempeuha luak uh tawh kidim a,a nit lohna mun om lo hi.
Amaute in kei hong phunsan uh a,“Amah in kua tungah hilh a,kua tungah thugen-a kinei ahi hiam?Angsung panin a kila khia,nawi tawh a kikhen tungnaungekte a hilha kinei ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih lehmal khat khit mal khat,gual khat khit gual khat,thu khat khit thu khat,cih bang hilel hi,” hong ci uh hi.
A mantakin, note inka thugen na ngaih kei uhlehTopa in a pau na theih loh uhgamdang mite,note tungah thu hong hilhsak ding hi.
Topa in note tungah tawlngakna lelungnopna hong pia napi-in,note in ama thu na ngai kei uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in note tungah,mal khat khit mal khat,gual khat khit gual khat,thu khat khit thu khat,cih bangin hong hilh ding ahi hi.Tua ciangin na kalsuanna khempeuh uhahna puk ding uh a,note liamin, thangah awkin,salin hong kipaipih ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem khua sungahhih mite a uk, a kiphasak no uliante aw,Topa’ thu za un!

“Eite in sihna tawhthuciamna khat i bawl khin a,Leinuai tawhthukimna khat i nei zo hi.A tuumcip ding tuiciin hong tun ciangineite hong ban lo ding hi;bang hang hiam cih leh zuauthu i bel a,zuauna-ah i bu hi,” na ci uh hi.

Tua ahih cianginTopa Pasian in,“En un, keimah in Zion sungahbulpi ding khat,suang, a kize-etsa suang,a manpha innkiu suang,bulpi muanhuai khat ka koih hi.Tua suang tungah, ‘Hih a um mi inlungkhamna tuak lo ding hi,’ci-in kigelh hi.
Keimah in thutang penkhaukhai bangin ka bawl dinga,thuman pen khaukhai sikbawk banginka bawl ding hi.Gial in na zuau buk uh deng khia dinga,tui in na bukna mun uh susia ding hi,”ci hi.
Tua ciangin sihna tawhna thuciamna uh kiphiat dinga,Leinuai tawh na thukimna uhkip lo ding hi.A tuumcip ding tuiciin ina hong nawk cianginnote hong su gawp ding hi.

Hong nawk sialin note hong ban ding hi;bang hang hiam cih lehzingsang khat khit zingsang khat,sun le zaninhong nawk tawntung ding hi.Topa’ tung panin na zak uh thutea banbanin launa lianpi vive hi ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh puanbuk sungahkhe khuan nadingin lupna tom lua a,silh dingin puanza neu lua hi,a cih tawh na kibang ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leha lamdang ama bawlte a bawl ding lea lamdang ama nasep a sem dinginPerazim Mual tungah a sep banginTopa in hong sem dinga,Gibeon kuama a heh banginamah hong heh ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in,note hong kikhihnaa to mahmahinkibawl kha ding ahih maninthusim loin om kei un.Bang hang hiam cih leh mihonpite’ TopaPasian’ tung paningambuppi-ah siatna dingthukhenna ka za khin hi.
Na bil uh hong ngat unla,ka aw hong za un.Ngai unla, ka thugenna hong za un.
Lokho pa in khaici tuhna dinga lo kho niloh ahi hiam?Amah in lei kalkhamingit niloh ahi hiam?
Amah in lei a zalhtam khit cianginmasala tang vawhin,kummin tang tuh a,mangbuhte a gualgualin tuhin,mangbuhham a omna ding sanah tuh a,mangbuhhamte a nawl hui-ahtuh hi lo ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih lehamah a manin kihilh a,ama Pasian in amah hilh hi.
Masalate buhcilna tawh kicil lo a,kummin tangte tungahbuhcilna pei kihual lo hi.Ahih hangin masalateciangkang tawh kisat khia a,kumminte molhtum tawh kisat hi.
Mi khatpeuh in antang cilvui ahi hiam?Hi lo hi; amah incil paisuak ngitnget lo hi.A sakol tawh buhcilna peia kihualsak cianginamah in kitamvuisak lo hi.
Hih zong Vanglian Topa’ kiang pana hong pai thu ahi hi.Amah pen thu lamlahna-ahlamdang mahmah a,pilna-ah lian mahmah hi.
Pasian’ biakna tau,Jerusalem khuapi,David in a sat khuapi,a sia ding hita hi.Kumte, a banbanin paipaisak unla,pawite zong a ngeina banginkot paipaisak un.
Ahih hangin keimah in“Pasian biakna tau,” a kici tungahgimna ka tungsak ding hi.Thumna le tauna om dinga,tua khuapi pen biakna halnabiakna tau suak ding hi.
Na kimkotah hong umcihintausangpite tawh kong um dinga,nangmah umcih nadingdum ka bawl ding hi.

Tua ciangin leithuk sung paninnang na pau dinga,a niamna mun leisung paninnangma kammal hong ging ding hi.Nangma aw pen leisung paninsikha’ aw bangin hong ging dinga,na thugenna pen leisung paninhong phun suausuau ding hi.
Ahih hangin nangma gal honpiteleivuineel leeng bang ding uh a,thukhual lo mihonpiteansi leeng bang ding uh hi.Tua ciangin tomkha sunginthakhat thu-in,
Vanglian Topa in vanging, zinliing,a ging lianpi, pingpei le huihpi le,a kaangtum thei meikuang tawhnang hong hon ding hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian biakna taua do minam honpite khempeuh,tua khuapi le a kulhpi simina lungkhamsakte khempeuh,zan a mangmat tawh kibanginmai mang ding uh hi.

A gilkial mipa in a mangin an ne a,a khanlawh ciangin a gil a vah tuan lo,a dangtak mipa in a mangin tui dawn a,a dangtak pha tuan loina gim mahmahin a khanlawh mah banginJerusalem khuapia do mi khempeuh zongtuaci ding uh hi.Israel’ Mittawtna le Simtatna
Lamdang kisasak unlalamdang a sa hi un!Kimittawsak unla a mittaw hi un!Leenggahzu a dawn lopi-ina zukham hi unla,khamtheihzu a ne lopi-inhoi un!
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in note’ sungahihmut nopna lungsim hong guan a,amau’ mit ahi kamsangte mitsi sakinamau’ lutang ahithu mu theite khuhcip hi.

Hih maangmuhnate khempeuh pen note adingin ahihleh a kimatcip laibu sunga thu om tawh a kibang a suak hi. Mite in lai a sim thei pa khat tungah, “Hih lai sim dih in,” a cih ciangin amah in, “Kimatcip ahih manin ka sim thei kei hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in lai a sim thei lopa kiangah, “Hih lai sim dih in,” a cih uh ciangin amah in, “Ka sim thei kei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in,“Amaute’ lungsimkei tawh kigamla napi-inhih mite in a kam uh tawhkei kiangah hong pai uh a,a muk uh tawh kei hong pahtawi-in,amaute in kei hong kihtakna penmihingte’ thupiaka zuihna uh ahi lel hi.
Tua ahih ciangin en un,hih mite tungah a tumdang lea lamdang ahi a lamdang nateka bawlkik ding hi.Amau’ mipilte’ pilnakisia dinga,amau’ thu-mu-theite’thu muhtel theihna kiseel ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa’ kiang paninamau’ thuvaihawmna a seelcip,khuamial sungah a gamta,“Kua in hong mu ding hiam?Kua in hong thei ding hiam?”a cite in gimna ngah tahen.

Note in na khempeuha lehlamin na koih uh hi.Beelseek pa pentungman bangin kingaihsun dinga,a kibawlsa na in a bawlpa tungah,“Amah in kei hong bawl lo hi,”ci ding ahi hiam?A kipiangsak na in a piangsak pa tungah,“Amah in theihna nei kei,”ci ding ahi hiam?Israel A Kihotkhiatna
Lebanon mual pensingno lo hoih suakin,singno lo hoih pentulak a suahna dinghun tomno sung bek hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua ni ciangin bilngongte inlaibu sunga thute za dinga,lungzinna le khuamialna sung paninmittawte’ mit in mu ding uh hi.
Mi’ nopnehte in Topa’ sungahlungdamna thak ngah ding uh a,Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa’ sungahmizawngte lungdam ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehkampauna tawha khialh nadingun mite bawlin,kongpi sungah mi a thuhilhpathang siahin,a thuman mipa penzuauthu tawh a hei khia,thukhual lo mite a mawkna suakin,mi a thusim lo mite bei-in,siatna hih ding a sawm mite khempeuhkisusia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Abraham a hon khia Topa in Jakob innkuan tawh kisai thu a genin-ah:“Jakob maizum nawn lo dinga,a mai khing nawn lo ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehkeima khut tawh ka bawlsaamau’ tate a muh uh ciangin amaute inkeima min hong phat ding uh hi.Amaute in Jakob’ Siangtho Pa,a siangtho ahihna phawk ding uh a,Israel Pasian zahtakinkihta ding uh hi.
Lungzingin a khial mite inthu theitel ta ding uh a,a phunphun mite in thuhilhnangai ta ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Topa in, “Kei’ ngimna hi lopi-inthu vaihawmna a sem khia,kei’ lungsim lopi-inkipawlna dang a bawl manunkhialhna a bawl thuahthuah;keimah thu hong dong lopi-inFaro’ hutna sung a beel ding leEgypt’ liahna a zong dinginEgypt gamah paisuk dingin a kuan khia,a lehdo mite in gimna ngah tahen.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro’ hutna penna maizumna uh hi dinga,Egypt liahna sungah na bukna uhnomau’ zahhuaina hi ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ ulianteZoan khua-ah va tung uh a,amau’ tangmite in Hanes khuaa va phak uh hangin,
amaute tungah phattuamna a pia thei lo,maizumna le mindaina cih loh buanghuhna le phattuamnabangmah a pia thei loEgypt mite’ hanginJudah mi khempeuh inmaizumna ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Negeb gam a om ganhingte tawh kisai thu hih bangin gen hi:Amaute in humpinelkai nu lehumpinelkai pa,gul gunei le a leeng thei gulpi a omna,lungkhamna le gimna gam nawkin,amau’ hauhnate la nungzangahamau’ sumte kalaoh tungah suanin,amaute tungah phattuamnabangmah a pia thei lo mite tungaha puak uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt’ huhnabangmah man loin a hawmpi ahi hi.Tua ahih manin,“Taang loin a tu hithiat Egypt,”ci-in min ka phuah hi.
Tu-in pai inla,hong tung lai ding hunte-ahteci ahi ngitnget dinginamaute’ mai-ahsuangpek tungah gelh inla,laibu khat sungah at in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute pen a lehdo mite,a zuauthei tapate,Topa’ thuhilhnaa ngai nuam lo mite ahi uh hi.
Amaute in thu mu theite tungah,“Mu kei un,” ci uh a,kamsangte tungah,“Kote’ tungah thuman hong gen kei un.Kote tungah thuzol bek hong gen unla,thutak ahi lote hong gen un.
Lampi nusia-in, lamzin panin pial unla,Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa’ thuhong zasak kei un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa in,“Note in hih thu simmawhin,zawhthawhna le khemna suangin,tuate muang na hih manun,
hih mawhna pen note adinginkulh sangpi khat khangkham a,lawtkhia-in a cim dektak,theih kholh lohin a cim vat tawhkibang ding hi.
Tua cipna pen iplah ding om nawn loina kidengkham beelseek pa’ beel themtemeikhuka om meilakna ding ahi zongin,tuikhuka om tui dipna ding ahi zongina om nawn het lo tawhkibang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehIsrael-te’ Siangtho Pa,Topa Pasian in, “Kiheikikna lekhawlna bek tawh note insuahtakna na ngah ding uh hi.Daitakin omna le muanna pennomau’ thahatna hi ding hi,” a ci hi.Ahih hangin notena tuaci kei uh a,
“Hilo! Sakol tung tuanginmanlang takin i tai ding hi,”ci na hih uh cianginnote na tai khia ding uh hi.“Sakol zaptel tungah i tuang ding hi,”ci na hih uh cianginnote hong delh mite zongzaptel ding hi.

Mual sang dawna om dial khuam ahi a,mual tunga limlahna tawha kibangin ahi zongin,note hong kinusiat dong matengin,mi khat’ tawnna tawh mi tulkhat tai-in,mihing nga’ tawnna tawh note khempeuhna tai mang ding uh hi.A Mite tungah Pasian’ Hehpihna Kamciam

Tua ahih ciangin note hong hehpih nuamin Topa in hong ngak a, note tungah hehpihna hong lah ding amah kipakta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa pen a thutang Pasian hi a, amah a muangte khempeuh thupha ngah ahi hi.
Jerusalem khua sunga a teeng, Zion sunga om mite aw, note na kap nawn kei ding uh hi. Note’ kahna aw hangin Topa in hong hehpih taktak dinga, amah in a zak ciangin note hong dawng ding hi.
Topa in note tungah cihmawhna le gimna hong tunsak hangin a mahmah in note hong hilh dinga, note in amah na mu ding uh hi.
Taklamah na kihei ciang uh ahi a, veilamah na kihei ciang uh ahi zongin, “Hih pen lampi hi, hih tawn un,” cihna aw, na nunglam panun na bil un a za ding hi.

Tua ciangin note in ngun tawh a kizut na milimte uh le kham a kiluan, a kisung na milimte uh na ninsak ding uh hi. Nin bangin tuate na thehthang ding uh a, tuate tungah, “Bei mang ta un!” na ci ding uh hi.
Khaici na tuh nadingun amah in guah hong zusak dinga, lei panin a piang an hoih tampi tak hong pia ding hi. Tua ni ciangin gankhahna, mun zaina-ah na ganhingte un lopa ne ding uh hi.
Lo a kho bawngtalte le late in kawbia le tu-ka tawh a kitoksa an al ne ding uh hi.
Na galte uh’ tausangte pukin mi tampi a sih ni-in, mual sang le mual neute tung khempeuh ah luitui luang ding hi.

Tua tham loin, Topa in ama mite’ liamma tuamin ama satna meimate a damsak ni ciangin, khataang pen nitaang bang dinga, nitaang pen ni sagih sunga taangzah bangin a zah sagihin a taang ding hi.Assiria tungah Topa’ Thukhenna
En un, Topa’ vangliatna lea minthanna vang,gamlapi panin kimu thei hi.Meikuang le meikhu inama hehna hong kilangsak a,ama kampaunate,mei bangin a kuang hi.
Na khempeuh a tai tuikhang banginama mai-ah huihpi nungsak a,minam dangte nawtin su gawp a,amau’ gitloh vaihawmnatea suksiatsak hi.

Ahi zongin no Pasian’ mite in ahihleh biakna pawi a kikham ni zan a bangin la na sa ding uh hi. Israel-te a hu Topa’ biakinn-ah a pai dingin tamngai aw ginna zui-in a kuan khiate bangin na lungdam ding uh hi.
Topa in heh mahmahna le a kaangtum thei meikuang sung panin vanging, huihpi le gialpi tawh, ama liatna minthanna aw kizasakin, ama khut a vik sukna kimusak ding hi.
Amah in a ciangkhut tawh a sat ciangin, Assiria mite in Topa’ aw kihta mahmah ding uh hi.
Topa in amaute gim pia-in ciang tawh a satna a gingte tawh kituakin khuang le laiza lasaknate tumin na gingsak ding uh hi. Amah in a khut vikin amaute a do ding hi.

Assiria kumpipa a kihalna ding mei phualpi mun, sawtpekin kibawl khinzo hi. Kumpipa adingin a baihsa-in kikoih a, a mi halna pen lianin kisangsak a, sing a sangpi-in vum venvan hi. Topa in kaat kuang hu sang khia dinga, tua mei phualpi tawhkuang ding hi.

Egypt gamahhuhna ngen dingin paisuk a,sakol suanin nei-inleengte a tam manin muang a,sakol tung tuangtea hat mahmah manin muang napi-inIsrael-te’ Siangtho Pa a suang lo,Topa thu a dong lote ingimna ngah tahen!
Ahih hangin amah pilin gimna tungsak a,thu a gensate dokkik loin,siatna a bawl mite lemawhna nasep a seppihtegim a pia hi.
Egypt mite mihing hi a, Pasian hi lo hi.Amau’ sakolte sa hi a, kha hi lo hi.Topa in a khut a zan ciangina huhpa pukin,huhna a ngah pa tuk dinga,amaute khempeuhsiakhawm ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa inkeima tungah hih bangin hong ci hi:Humpinelkai ahi a,humpinelkai khanglai a hat mahmah inahi zongina sa nek ding a ngik ciangintua humpi a do dingintuucing honpi khat kikaikhawmin,amaute’ otna hangin lau tuan hetloin,amaute’ gamlumna hangina sin a dawi tuan loh mah banginVanglian Topa zong Zion Mual tungahgaldo dingin kuansuk ding hi.
A bu a hongin, a kot lamlam vasate banginVanglian Topa in Jerusalem dal ding hi.Amah in dalin khah khia dinga,amah susia loin suaktasak ding hi.
Israel mite aw, nakpitakin na do pa uh’ lamah kiheikik un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a kuamah peuh in no adingin na bawlsa uh, mawhna ahi na ngun milimte uh na paihkhiat hun uh hong tung ding hi.

“Assiria pen mihing’ namsau ahi lo,namsau khat tawh puk dinga,mihing’ namsau ahi lo,namsau khat in susia ding hi.Namsau panin tai ding uh a,a tangvalte uh zawhthawh thu tawhnasem dingin kikoih ding hi.
Amau’ belh a kumpipa uha launa hangin tai dinga,buaina hangin a uliante ina dialkhai uh taisan ding uh hi,”ama meikuang Zion-ah a om,ama meikhuk Jerusalem khua-ah a omTopa in ci hi.
En un, ni khat ni cianginthuman takin kumpi khat inhong uk dinga,uliante in thutang tawhhong uk ding uh hi.
Amaute pen huihpi panin belhna,guahpi panin bukna bang ding uh hi.Sehnel gam sungah a luangtui bang ding uh a,nisa gam sungah a omsuangpi liim bang ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ mit inmi cimawhte’ kisapna mu ding uh a,amau’ bil inmi cimawhte’ thugen ngai ding uh hi.
Amaute lungtominhi phangphang nawn lo ding uh a,deihsakna lungsim tawha kitel takin thu gen hiathiat ding uh hi.
Mihaite penmi thupi kici nawn lo dinga,mi ginalote penmi zahtakhuai kici nawn lo ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehmihai in haina thu gen a,a hoihin gamtat loh ding,Topa’ thu a hoih lopi-in gen ding,a gilkialte’ an duhna a phat loh nading lea dangtakte in tui dawn dinga neih theih loh nadingin,ama lungsim inmawhna bawl ding a sawm hi.
Mi ginalo’ ginat lohna siahuai mahmah hi.Zuauna kam tawhmizawngte a siasak ding lemi cimawhte’ thua thuman ciang nangawnina siasak dinginamah in gitloh nasepna a bawl hi.
Ahih hangin mipi lungsim a nei mi inna a hoihte geel a,thuhoih nate-ah a pang hi.Jerusalem Numeite tungah Thu Kizasak khol
Nuamtakin a om hithiat numeite aw,tho unla, ka aw za un.Nomau’ tumtakin a lungkim tanute aw,ka thugenna na ngai un.
Nomau’ tumtakina lungkim numeite aw,kum khat val zek khit cianginna liing lawng ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehleenggah kum hong sia dinga,singgah lawhna hunhong tung lo ding hi.
Nuamtakin a om hithiatnumeite aw, liing un.Nomau tumtakina lungkimte aw, liing lawng un.Na puan uh hawk khia-inna tangguakun om unlana kawng uhah puanhampi teng un.
A hoih mahmah lote letampi a gah leengguite a siatna,keima mite’ leitangahling le lingkungte a pona,lungdamna khuapi sungahlungdamna a omna inntea siatna hangindahin na dip uh hum un.
Kumpi innte kinusia-in,mi tampi a omnakumpi khuapi kilawi ding hi.Mual le tausangte zongkisia gawp dinga,late le tuuhonte ingamtatna munin nei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian inama kha hong puak ding hi.Leitang siate lei hoih suakkik dinga,lo-a ante hoih mahmahintulak bang ding hi.
Tua ciangin gam sung mun khempeuh ahthutang om dinga,thu a manin kisem ding hi.
Tua ciangin thumanna hanginnopna om dinga,thumanna hangin daihna lelungmuan tawntungna om ding hi.
Ka mihingte pen kilem takin a tenna,lungmuang takin a omna,daitakin a tawlngakna munahom ding uh hi.
(Tua ciangin tulak kolhsiang dinga,a khuapi pen cimzan ding hi.)
Tui tampi a omna-ah khai tuh a,bawngtal le latea ut utna-ah a tasak note penmi nuamsa na hi uh hi.

Hong kisusia nai lo,mi a susiapa aw,tu-in gimna a ngah dingna hita hi.Kuamah in hong khem nai loh,mi khem pa aw,tu-in gimna a ngah ding na hita hi.Na suksiat nawn loh cianginnang hong kisusia dinga,na khem nawn loh cianginnang hong kikhem ding hi.
Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in;nang kong muang uh hi.A tawntungin kote hong hu inla,lungkham hunin hong hon khia in.
Nangma vanging hangin mite tai uh a,nangma thawhtohna hanginminamte kithehthang hi.
Tangngol in na a khop banginamau van kinusiate kaikhawm a,kauphe honpi banginvan tawmin mite phe zaizai hi.
A sangna munah teeng ahih maninTopa kipahtawi hi.Amah in thutang le thuman tawhJerusalem dimsak ding hi.
Amah pen nangma hunte a kipna,hotkhiatna a kicinna,pilna le theihna hi ding hi.Topa kihtakna penama sumgum hi ding hi.
En un, galhangtehuhna ngenin kiko uh a,kilemna ding palai semtenakpitakin kap uh hi.
Lam lianpite gambulak suak a,kuamah khualzininpai ngam nawn lo uh hi.Thuciamnate kipeksatin,thukimnasate kipalsat a,khatlekhat kizahtakna om nawn lo hi.
Leitang kinusiacipin om mawk hi.Lebanon muala tulak singte vul gawp a,Sharon gam lei hoih pensehnel gam bang ta hi.Bashan le Karmel muala singtehtepulh mang khinta hi.
Topa in minam dangte kiangah,“Tu-in ka gamtang dinga,ka vangliatna ka lak ding hi.Tu-in kei hong kipahtawita ding hi.
Na geelnate uh a kimanna om lo a,na nasepnate uh a mawkna ahi hi.No le no a kisusia na hi uh hi.
Leikang ngah nadinginsuangkang a kihal banginna vui suak ding uh a,meikhuk sunga a kihaltum lingkungtena bang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Gamlapi-a a om mite aw,ka sepna thu za un.A nai-a a om mite aw,ka vangliatna thei un.

Zion-a a om mawhnei mite lau uh a,Pasian’ thu a ngaihsun lo mitelau-in liingcip uh hi.Amaute in, “Pasian’ thukhenna pena kuang tawntung mei tawh kibang hi.Tua bang meikuang kua inthuakzo ding ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.
Thumanin gamta-inthutang na gen uhlehna suakta ding uh hi.Na vangliatna uhmizawngte khemna-in zang kei unla,sumgolh deih kei un.Mi thah ding le siatna gamtat dinga vaihawmte tawh kipawl kei un.
Tua hileh na tangtung ding uh a,kulh muanhuai mahmahsungah a om banginlungnuam takin na om ding uh hi.Annek tuidawnna kitasam kei ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin a thupi mahmahkumpipa na mu ding uh a,a zai mahmah a gam zongna en ding uh hi.
Nidangin na kihtak uhgamdangmi siahdongte,siahkhawmte, thukan mite,na phawk nawn kei ding uh hi.
Na theih theih loh uh,a kitel lo kampau a zang,na tel theih lohun a pau bualbual,mi kihisaktena mu nawn kei ding uh hi.
Pawite i bawlna khuapi Zion en un!Daitakin a kiteenna mun,a khetphimte kidok khia ngei loina khaute a tat ngei lo,a kikhin thei het lo puanbuk a bang,Jerusalem khuapi, na mu ding uh hi.

Tua khua sungah Topa inama minthanna vanghong langsak dinga,a zai gunte lea zai lui geite-ah i teeng ding hi.Tua tuite tungahei hong do ding gal gunkuanghong kihot nawn lo dinga,gal teembaw zonghong pai nawn lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa pen eite’ thukhen,Topa pen eite hong ukpa,Topa pen eite’ kumpi ahi hi.Amah in eite hong hon khia ding hi.
Gal teembaw khaute kol a,ama omna ding mun sanahgunkuang puan khuam lenkip zo lo a,gunkuang puan kizal thei lo hi.Tua ciangin galte’ neihsatekihawmkeek dinga,khebaite nangawn invan ngah ding uh hi.
I gamah a teeng mite kuamah in,“Ka ci na hi,” ci nawn lo ding uh a,mawhna khempeuh kimaisak ding hi.
Minam khempeuhte aw,thu za dingin hong pai un.Mihingte aw, hong ngai un!Leitang le a tungaha om khempeuhte aw, ngai un.Leitung buppi le a tung panina hong pai mi khempeuh in ngai un.
Bang hang hiam cih lehminam khempeuh tungahTopa lunghamin,amaute khempeuh tungahheh mahmah a,a si mang dingin amaute koihin,thah dingin a pia khinta hi.
A kithat amau’ mite kilawn khia dinga,a siluang hawmte uih semsem ding hi.Amau’ sisan inmual khempeuh sansak ding hi.
Vantunga a om khempeuhmuat mang dinga,laidal bangin vantungte kizial ding hi.Leenggui panin a tehte pulhin,theikung panin a tehte a pulh banginaksi hon khempeuh pulh ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka namsau invantungah a sep ding khempeuha zawh khit ciangin,en un, a sia mang dinga ka sehsaEdom mite tungah thu a khen dinginhong kumsuk ding hi.

Topa in namsau khat nei hi.Sisan tawh kidim dinga,biakpiakna tuuno si le keel si,tuutalte’ kal thau tawha kizolsak bang ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in Bozrah khua-ahhih biakpiakna nei dinga,Edom gamah hih bang tampithahna omsak ding hi.
Gamsial talteamaute tawh tukkhawm dinga,bawngtalno gehsate lebawngtal hatte tukkhawm ding hi.Amau’ gam pensisan tawh kidiah dinga,amau’ leitang pensathau in nipsak ding hi.
Topa in Zion a hotkhiat ding,a galte a thuksak ding hun khat a nei hi.
Luitui khempeuh kultaltui suak dinga,leitang pen kaat suak ding hi.Gam sung khempeuh pena kuang kultaltui a suak ding hi.
Sun le zanin mit lo dinga,vantung lamaha khu kahto ngitnget ding hi.Khang khat pan khang khat,a hawmguakin om dinga,kuamah innawk ngei nawn het lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin mu le sakuh ingam sungteng luah ding uh a,keising le va-akte om ding uh hi.Tua gam pen gamsimtham suakin,hawmsuak ding hi.
Kumpi om lo Gam, ci-inamaute in min phuak ding uh a,a ulian khempeuhtea mawkna hi ding uh hi.
Kumpi inn liante sungahlingkung po dinga,kulh a nei khua sungahlaho le thangling kungte a po ding hi.Ngiate’ an zonna mun suakin,vasa-kalaohte’ omna mun hi ding hi.
Sangak le ngiate kikhawl ding uh a,keeldawi in a lawmte sam ding hi.Dawi zong hong tuaksukinama omna ding mun a zong ding hi.
Tua munah keising in bu tomin,tua lai-ah tui-in keuh dinga,ama liimah a note huai ding hi.Musite zong kikhawm tuahina nupa ciat un om ding uh hi.

Topa’ laibu sung paninzong unla hih thu sim un.Hih ganhingte khempeuhkhat beek zong mangthang lo dinga,lawm sam khat zong om lo ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in thu pia khinzo a,a mahmah in amaute kaikhawm ding hi.
Amah in amaute adinginleitang hawmsak dinga,amau’ tanh ding ciat a pia ding hi.Amaute in tua gamnei tawntung ding uh a,khang khat pan khang khat donginteeng paisuak ding uh hi.
Gamlak le lei keuna gamlungdam dinga,sehnel gam lungdaminpalh khia ding hi.Unok pak bangin

tampi takin palh khia dinga,lungnopna le lasakna tawhlungdam ding hi.Lebanon mual a minthanna,Karmel mual le Sharon muala minliatnatua leitang in ngah ding hi.Mi khempeuh in Topa’ minthanna,i Pasian’ liatna mu ding uh hi.
A zaw khutte khauhsak unla,a no khukte kipsak un.
Lungsim patau-in,a lauthawng mite kiangah,“Thakhauh un, lau kei un!En un, na galte uh tungahphu hong laksak dinginPasian hong pai dinga,amah in notehong hon khia ding hi,” ci un.
Tua ciangin mittawte’ mit kihong dinga,bilngongte’ bil kihong ding hi.
Tua ciangin khebai mipadiangin lam dinga,a pau thei lo mipa inlungdamin la sa ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh gamlakahtui hong phul khia dinga,sehnel gam sungahluitui hong luang ding hi.
A sa mahmah sehneltebualtui hong suak dinga,a keugaw leitang penciktui tawh hong kidim ding hi.Ngiate’ omna ngei leitang pennawngpi suakin,lopa, pumpeeng le mau,a po ding hi.
Tua lai-ah lam lianpi khat om dinga,Lampi Siangtho kici ding hi.A siang lo mite intua tung tawn ngei lo dinga,mihaite in tua lam a zui mitekhialsak nawn lo ding hi.
Tua lai-ah humpinelkai om lo dinga,sasialne ganhing khat peuhpeuhhong pai lo ding hi.Tua lai-ah ganhing lauhuaitekimu lo ding hi.tua lampi tawnin hong ciah ding uh hi.
lungdam tawntungna mai pua-inla sa kawmin Jerusalem-ahhong tung ding uh hi.Amaute in lungdamna lekipakna ngah ding uh a,dahna le khuisatnaom nawn lo ding hi.
Kumpi Hezekiah in a uk zawh kum sawmli le ngana kumin Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib in Judah gam sunga khuapi muanhuai khempeuh simin a la hi.

Lakhish khua panin Assiria kumpipa in Jerusalem khua-a kumpi Hezekiah a lut ding a gen dingin ama nuai-a ulian khat le galkap honpi a sawl hi. Puansawppa’ nasepna phual zuatna lampi-a bual tungnung tui lampi gei-ah a ulianpa a khawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah tawh a kimu dingin Hilkiah’ tapa ahi kumpi inn sung a saipa Eliakim le lai-at pa Shebna le Asaf’ tapa ahi thuciamteh pa Joah hong pai khia uh hi.
Tua ciangin a ulianpa in amaute kiangah a genna panin, “Hezekiah kiangah, ‘Kumpi lian ahi Assiria kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi: Hih na lungmuanna uhah bang siksan na hi uh hiam?
Kampau lel pen galdo nadingin vaihawmna le vangin ngaihsun na hi uh hiam? Kei nong lehdo nadingun kua suang na hi uh hiam?
En un, ama tunga a kingam mipa’ khut a sun ding, a kikuaitansa pumpeeng ciangkhut tawh a kibang Egypt na suang uh hi. Amah a muang khempeuhte’ tungah Egypt kumpipa Faro, tua pumpeeng bang hi lel hi.

Ahih hangin note in, “Topa ka Pasian uh ka suang uh hi,” a ci-a kinei na hih uhleh ama mun sangte le biakna taute Hezekiah in la khia-in, Judah le Jerusalem tungah, “Hih biakna tau mai-ah na bia ding uh hi,” ci hi lo ahi hiam?
Tu-in hong pai unla, ka topa Assiria kumpipa tawh kiciamna khat bawl un. A tungah a tuang ding mi na ngah zawh nak-uhleh sakol tulnih kong pia ding hi.
Egypt mite’ leengte le sakol galkapte muanna tawh ka topa’ nasemte lak panin a neu pen khat ahi galkapmaang khat bek nangawn bangci-in not zo ding na hi uh hiam?
Tua tham loin, hih gam a susia dingin Topa’ thu loin hong pai ka hi hiam? Topa in kei kiangah, “Paito-in hih gam sim inla, susia in,” hong ci hi,’ ci-in gen un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Eliakim, Shebna le Joah in a ulianpa kiangah, “Kote in thei ngawn ka hih manun na nasemte tungah Aram pau tawh hong gen hoh in. Kulh tunga om mite’ zakna-ah Judah pau tawh thu nong gen loh nadingin kong thum hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin a ulianpa in, “Hih thute na topa uh le note’ tung bekah gen dinga, amau’ ek mah ne-in amau’ zun mah dawnin note tawh a siakhawm ding kulh tunga a tu mite tungah a gen lo dingin ka topa in hong sawl sa na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a ulianpa dingto-in, Judah pau-in nakpitakin kiko a, “Assiria kumpi, kumpi lianpa’ thu za un!
Kumpipa in, ‘Amah in note hong hon khia thei lo ding ahih manin Hezekiah’ khemsa-in om kei un.
“Topa in eite hong hon khia taktak dinga, hih khuapi pen Assiria kumpipa khut sungah kipia lo ding hi,” ci-in Hezekiah in hong genna tawh na Topa uh muangkha kei un.

Hezekiah’ thu ngai kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh Assiria kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi: Kei tawh kilemna hong bawl unla kei kiangah hong pai un. Tua hileh kei hong pai-in, note’ gam tawh a kibang gam khat, an le leenggahzu gamah kong koih matengin note khempeuh in nomau’ leenggah ciat, nomau’ theigah ciat, na tuikhuk panun nomau tui ciat na ne ding uh hi.

Hezekiah in, “Topa in eite hong hon khia ding hi,” ci-in lam hong khialsak kha ding ahih ciangin kidawm un. Assiria kumpipa’ khut sung panin minam dangte’ pasian khatpeuh in ama gam hon khia zo ngei ahi hiam?
Hamath gam le Arpad gam pasian-te koi-ah om ahi hiam? Sefarvaim gam pasian-te koi-ah om ahi hiam? Amaute in ka khut sung panin Samaria hon khia zo ahi hiam?
Topa in ka khut sung panin Jerusalem khua a hotkhiat nadingin, hih gamte khempeuh’ pasian lakah kua in ka khut sung panin a gam uh hon khia zo ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in, “Dawng kei un,” ci-in thu pia khol ahih manin amaute daitakin om uh a, kam khat beek dawng lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Hilkiah’ tapa ahi kumpi inn sung a sai Eliakim, lai-at Shebna le Asaf’ tapa ahi thuciamteh pa Joah in a puan uh balkekin Hezekiah kiangah pai uh a, a ulianpa’ thugen teng a va gen uh hi.
Kumpi Hezekiah in a zak ciangin dahin ama puante balkek a, Topa’ inn sungah a pai hi.
Tua ciangin amah in inn sung saipa Eliakim, lai-at pa Shebna le siampi khangham teng dahna limin puanhampi silh kawmin Amoz’ tapa kamsangpa Isaiah kiangah a sawl hi.
Amaute in Isaiah kiangah, “Hezekiah in, ‘Tuni pen lungkham ni, tai ngah ni, mindai ni ahi hi. Naungek a suah hun tung napi-in a hing khia zo lo nupi tawh i kibang hi.

A nungta Pasian a zahko dingin ama topa, Assiria kumpipa in a sawl a ulianpa’ thugente, Topa na Pasian in za henla, tua bang thu a gente gim pia tahen. Tua ahih ciangin a omlai i mite adingin thu ngen in,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Kumpi Hezekiah’ nasemte Isaiah kiangah a tun uh ciangin
Isaiah in amaute tungah, “Na topa uh kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Assiria kumpipa’ nasemte in keimah a hong simmawhna na zaksa uh thute hangin lau kei un.
En un, amah in kam lengsawn khat za-in ama gamah a ciahkikna ding lungsim ka guan dinga, ama gam sungah namsau tawh amah ka tuksak ding hi,’ ci-in gen un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a ulianpa ciahkik a, Assiria kumpipa in Libnah khua a simna-ah a va pai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa in Lakhish khua a nusiat khitna thu za zo ahih manin tua lai a va zuan pah ahi hi.

Tu-in, Ethiopia kumpi Tirhakah in Assiria gam a sim dingin Egypt galkap honpi tawh a hong kuanna thu Assiria mite in a za uh hi. Hih thu a zak ciangin Assiria kumpipa in Hezekiah kiangah kamtaite sawl a,
“Judah kumpi Hezekiah kiangah hih bangin gen un: ‘Assiria kumpipa’ khut sungah Jerusalem kipia lo ding hi, ci-a thu hong ciam na suan Pasian’ khemsa-in om kei in.
En in, Assiria kumpite in gam khempeuh ah a bawlna, a suksiat mang khitna na za zo hi. Nang hong kisuaktasak tuan ding ahi hiam?
Ka pu ka pate un a suksiat minamte, Gozan minam, Haran minam, Rezef minamte le Telassar khua-a om Eden mite pen amau’ pasian-te in hon khia zo ahi hiam?
Hamath kumpipa, Arpad kumpipa, Sefarvaim khuapi kumpipa, Hena kumpipa ahih kei leh Ivvah kumpipate koi-ah om ahi hiam?’ va ci un,” ci-in a gen hi.
Hezekiah in kamtaite tung panin a lai puak uh sangin, a lai a sim hi. Topa’ inn-ah Hezekiah paito-in, Topa’ mai-ah a lai a zal hi.
Hezekiah in Topa’ tungah thu ngenin,
“Vanglian Topa, Israel-te’ Pasian, Kherub-te tunga a tupa aw, nangmah bek, leitung kumpi gam khempeuhte’ Pasian na hi hi. Nangmah in vantung le leitung na bawl khin hi.Ref
Topa aw, na bil hong ngat inla hong za in. Topa aw, na mit hak inla hong mu in. Sennakherib in a nungta Pasian a zahkona, hong khak hih thute khempeuh za in.
Topa aw, Assiria kumpite in mi khempeuh le a gam khempeuh susia mang khin taktak a,
amaute’ pasian-te pen meikhuk sungah paihsak khin hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen pasian hi loin mite’ khut tawh a kibawl sing le suangte ahi uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tuate kisusia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa kote’ Pasian aw, nang bek Topa na hihna thu leitung kumpi gam khempeuh in a theih nadingin, tu-in ama khut sung panin kote hong hon khia in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Amoz’ tapa Isaiah in Hezekiah tungah thu puak a, “Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nang in Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib tawh kisai thu, kei kiangah thu hong ngen khin na hih ciangin,
amah tawh kisai-in Topa’ thugen hih bang ahi hi:‘Sennakherib aw,Jerusalem mite innang hong simmawhinhong zahko uh hi.Jerusalem mite in na nungaha lu hong peisan lel uh hi.
Nang in kua zahko-inkua a simmawh na hi hiam?Nang in kua’ tungahna aw sangsakin kiphasak na hi hiam?Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa,kei’ tungah a hong tuaci na hi hi.

Nangmah inna nasem pa zangin Topa na zahko a,Lebanon mual dong pek,mual sangte tungahka leeng tampite tawhka pai khin hi.Taamtak sing a sang pente,taksing hoih pente ka phuk khin hi.A sang pen mun,tulak a thukpenna munah ka pai khin hi.
Tuikhuk to-in tui ka dawn a,Egypt luituite khempeuhka galkapte’ khenuai tawhka keusak hi, na ci hi.

“‘Sawt pek a kipanka ngaihsutsa ahih lamtakza ngei nai lo na hi hiam?Nang in khuapi muanhuaitesusia gawpinninbulomtang na suahsakna ding,a sunga teeng mite a thahatna uh bei-in,lungkia-in a ommawkna ding,amaute pen lolai-a omkungnote le lopa ngeekte,innkhum zangah a po,a khan khit ma-in a keutumlopate tawh a kibatna ding,tu-in ka tunsak ding thute pentanglai pek paninka ngaihsutsa thu ahi hi.
“‘Na omna mun,na vaksuk na vaktohna lekeima tungah na hehna ka thei hi.
Keima tungah nang hehin,na kiphatsakna thukeima tungaha thu hong tung ahih manin,na nakah sikkawi bulhin,na kam ah kamkaih hong bulhin,nong kuanna lampi lam mahahnang kong ciahkiksak ding hi,’ ci hi.

“Nang Hezekiah adingin hih in lim hong hi ding hi: Tu kumin anli pote na ne ding uh a, a kum nihna ciangin tua bangmahin a pote na ne leuleu ding uh hi. A kum thumna ciangin khai tuhin an na la ding uh a, leenggui suanin a gah na ne ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin, Judah minam sung panin a suaktalai mite in singkung bangin zung khasukkikin, gah na gahtokik ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a omlaite, Jerusalem pan ahi zongin a suakta teng, Zion Mual panin ahi zongin pai khia ding uh hi. Vanglian Topa’ deihluatna in hih thu hong tungsak ding hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin Assiria kumpipa tawh kisai-in Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Hih khuapi sungah amah hong pai lo dinga, thaltang zong lawn lo ding hi. Lum tawh hong pai lo dinga, galsimna ding panmun zong hong bawl lo ding hi.
Hong kuanna lampi mahah amah ciahkik dinga, hih khuapi sungah hong pai lo ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah le ka nasem pa David ka khualna-in hih khuapi a suahtak nadingin ka hu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi kuan khia-in Assiria mite’ giahphual ah mihing tul za le tul sawmgiat le tulnga a that hi. Zingsangin mite a thawh ciangin hihte khempeuh misi luang bekbek na hi hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib tai khia a, a inn-ah ciahin Nineveh khua-ah a teeng hi.
Amah in ama pasian Nisrok inn-ah bia-in a om laitakin, ama tate Adrammelek le Sharezer in namsau tawh amah that uh a, Ararat gamah a tai uh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Esarhaddon in ama tangin a uk hi.

Tua hun laitakin Hezekiah a ci na-in si dektak hi. Amoz’ tapa, kamsang Isaiah ama kiangah hong pai-in, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Na inn sung thu ding vaihawm in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang na damkik zo kei dinga, na si ding hi, hong ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah kawm lam nga-in Topa’ tungah thu ngen a,
“Topa aw, ka lungsim khempeuh le thuman tak tawh nangma mai-ah gamta-in, nangma muhna-ah a hoih nate ka sepna thu, tu-in nong phawk nadingin kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Hezekiah nakpitakin a kap hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a,

“Pai inla Hezekiah kiangah gen in. Topa, na pa David’ Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Na thungetna ka za khin a, na khitui ka mu khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin na nuntakna kum sawm le kum nga kong piak beh ding hi.
Assiria kumpipa’ khut sung panin nang le khuapi kong hon khia dinga, hih khuapi ka hu ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah, “Theigah la sak inla, na damkik nadingin na meimate nuhsak in,” a ci hi.
Hezekiah in, “Topa’ inn-ah ka paitoh zawhna ding a kitheih nadingin bang lim om ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Isaiah in, “Amah in hong ciamsa thu Topa in hong bawl nadingin, hih pen Topa’ tung panin nangma adingin lim ahi hi:
En in, Ahaz kumpipa’ ni-nai tungah nitum kuana liim pen kal sawm ka nungkiksak ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a tum khinsa ni pen ni-nai tungah kal sawm a nungkik hi.
Judah kumpipa Hezekiah a ci na-in, a natna panin a damkik khit ciangin la phuakin a gelh lai in:
Ka hat saan laitakin a si ding ka hita a,ka hun omlai khempeuhLeinuai-ah a om dinginhong kiseh hita hi, ka ci hi.
A hingte’ gam sungahTopa ka mu nawn kei dinga,leitunga a teeng mite’ lakahmihing ka en nawn kei ding hi, ka ci hi.

Tuucingpa’ puanbuk banginka omna inn kibot khia-inkei kiang panin kila khia hi.Siamgante in a hial banginka nuntakna kihial khin a,amah in siambu paninkei hong at khia hi.Sun le zan tawntunggimna hong kithuaksak a,
zingsang donghuhna ngenin ka kiko hi.Humpinelkai banginamah in ka guh khempeuhhong kuaihtansak a,sun le zan tawntunggimna hong kithuaksak hi.
Phialphiah ahi a,gun vapi bangin ahi zonginka hamham a,vakhu bangin ka tautau hi.Vantung lam kong etetna-inka mitte a gim hi.Topa aw, kei hong kinengniam hi;keima lungmuanna hong hi ta in!
Ahih hangin keimah inbang gen thei ding ka hi hiam?Bang hang hiam cih lehamah in kei tungah hong gen khin a,a mahmah in hih thu hong bawl hi.Ka lung gim lua a,ka ihmu thei kei hi.
Topa aw, nang adinginkong nungta dinga,nang ading bekbekinkong nungta ding hi.Ka ci hong damsakkik inla,hong nungtasak in!
Gimna lianpi ka thuakna penkeima lungnopna hong suak ding hi.Lauhuaina khempeuh paninkei nong hon khia a,ka mawhna khempeuhna hong maisak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehLeinuai-ah a om mite innangma tungahlungdamna hong ko thei lo a,a sisa mite innang hong phat thei lo uh hi.Gum sunga a paisukte innangma thumannahong muang thei lo uh hi.
Tuni-in keima hong gamtat bangina hing mite bek in nang tungahlungdamna hong ko thei hi.Pate in tate tungahnangma thumanna gensawn uh hi.
Topa in kei hong hon dinga,Topa’ inn sungahi nuntak sung tawntungkhausai lasakna i tum ding hi.
Tua hun laitakin Baladan’ tapa, Babylon kumpi ahi Merodak-baladan in Hezekiah a ci na-in a damkikna thu za ahih manin ama kiangah laikhak le letsong tawh tangmite a sawl hi.

Hezekiah in amaute limtakin zin na do hi. Amah in ama dangka inn, ngun, kham, paknamtui, sathau manpha, a galvan koihna inn khempeuh le a vankoihna sunga a kimu theite khempeuh amaute a na lak hi. Ama inn sung hitaleh, ama gam sunga om khempeuh hitaleh Hezekiah in amaute a lah loh bangmah om lo hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Hezekiah kiangah kamsang Isaiah hong pai-in, “Hih mite in bang hong gen ahi uh hiam? Koi lai panin nang kiangah hong pai ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Hezekiah in, “Amaute, a gamlapi, Babylon gam panin kei kiangah a hong pai uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Amaute in na inn sungah bang teng mu ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Hezekiah in, “Amaute in ka innsunga a om khempeuh a vekin mu khin uh hi. Ka vankoihna innte sunga nate amau ka lah loh om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah, “Vanglian Topa’ thu ngai in:
En in, na innsunga a omte khempeuh le na pu na pate in tuni donga a kholsate, Babylon-ah a kipuak ding ni hong tung ding hi; bangmah kinusia lo ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Nang’ sung panin a suak, nangma tapate kimkhat kipaikhiatpih dinga, Babylon kumpipa’ inn sungah innsungmaang nasep kisemsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Isaiah kiangah, “Nong gensa Topa’ thu a hoih ahi hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Kei’ nuntak hun sungin nopna le lungmuanna om buang ding hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
Ka mite hehnem un,hehnem un, na Pasian un ci hi.
Dam takin Jerusalem mite hopih un.Amau’ gimna hun beita a,amau’ mawhna kimaisakin,amau’ khialhnate hanginTopa in a kicingin gim pia khinzo ta hi,ci-in amau tungah gen un.
Awging khat in,“Gamlakah Topa’ lampi sial unla,sehnel gam sungah i Pasian adinglam lianpi khat a tangin bawl un.
Kuam khempeuh kivuk dim dinga,mual liante le mual neutekitotam ding hi.A tamkim lo munte kitamkimsak dinga,suanghum omna muntekizalhtam ding hi.
Topa’ kam in gen khin ahih manin,Topa’ minthanna vanghong kilang dinga,mi khempeuh inmukhawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Awging khat in, “Kiko in!” hong ci hi.Tua ciangin keimah in,“Bang thu kiko ding ka hi hiam?”ka ci hi.“Mi khempeuh, lopa bang hi a,ama hoihnate khempeuhgamlakah a om pak tawh kibang lel hi.
Topa’ hu in a mut cianginlopa vulin, pak a pulh hi.Mihingte lopa bang lel hi taktak hi.
Lopa vul a, pak a pulh hi.Ahih hangin Pasian’ thukho tawntung ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Jerusalem aw,mual sang dawnah kahto-inlungdamna thu kiko in.Zion aw, nakpitakin awng inla,lungdamna thu taangko in.Nakpi takin kiko inla, lau kei in.Judah gam khuapite tungah,“Na Pasian uh hong pai ta hi,”ci-in gen ta un.
Topa Pasian hong pai a,vangliatna tawh hong uk ding hi.Ama sep thamante hong pua a,a gualzawhna thamante hong masuan hi.
Amah in tuucingpa banginama tuuhonte an vak dinga,ama tuuhonte kaikhawmina ang sungah pua dinga,no ngek lai a neitedam takin a paipih ding hi.Israel-te’ Pasian Tehpih ding Om lo
Kua in ama khutkuak sungah tuite tehin,ama khap tawh vantung teh a,leitung leivui khempeuhlawh khat sungah guangin,pongkhaina tawh mual liante khai a,tawitehna tawhmual neute teh ahi hiam?
Kua in Topa’ sep ding teng gen a,thu lamlak pa banginkua in amah hilh ahi hiam?
Thu a kicingin a muh nadinginamah in kua dong ngei a,kua in amah lampi man hilhin,ama tungah thutheihna hilh a,thu theihtelna lampi lak ahi hiam?
En un, minamte penphelkhai khat panin tuimal themkhata taak khia tawh kibang a,tawitehna tungah a omleivui nengbaang bangin kingaihsun lel hi.Amah in tuikulhte penleivui them bangin tawmto lel hi.
I Topa biak nadinginLebanon sing kicing lo dinga,a ganhingte zongmeihal biak nadingin kicing lo ding hi.
Minam khempeuhte,ama mai-ah bangmah tham hi lo a,amaute pen bangmah a om lo le,a hawmguak sangin a tawm zaw-inamah in a ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian penkua tawh tehkak dinga,amah pen bang lim tawhkibang ci ding na hi uh hiam?
Milim tawh tehtheih ding hi lo hi.Milim a bawlpa in sungin,khamseek pa khat intua milim kham tawh zut a,tua milim adinginngun khainiangte a sunsak hi.
Ngun le kham a nei zo lo mipa inbiakna-in a zat dingina muat lo ding sing teel a,a taang thei lo milim khatama adingin a bawlsak dinginkhutsiam mi khat a zong hi.
Note in thei nai lo a,za nai lo na hi uh hiam?A kipat cil-in note tungahhong kigen khin hi lo ahi hiam?Leitung a pian a kipanthei khinta hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Leitung a a teeng mitekauphe tawh kibang lel hi.Leitung kimkot tungah a tupa,vantungte puan bangin zalin,a sungah a om theih nadinginpuanbuk bangin a zal pa,
uliante a mawkna suaksakin,leitung ukte penbangmah lo a suaksakpa amah ahi hi.
Amaute pena gina-in kisuan lo a, a gina-in kivawh lo a,amau’ kungte in a gina-inlei sungah zung kha lo uh a,amah in a mut ciangin amaute vul a,huihpi in ham banginamaute a lenkhiatpih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kei kua tawhhong genteh ding na hi uh hiam,Siangtho Pa in ci hi.

A sangna lam ento unla mu un.Kua in hihte piangsak ahi hiam?Amau’ honpite khat khatin piangsakin,a lian ama thahatna tawhamaute khempeuha minun a sampa ahi hi.Vangliatna-ah thahat ahih maninkhat beek pelhem lo hi.
