“Topa’ kiang panin keima lampi kiliah a,keima Pasian in ka lungkhamnahong thudon lo hi,”Jakob aw, bang hangin ci a,Israel aw, bang hangintuaci pau na hi hiam?
Thei nai lo a, za nai lo na hi hiam?Topa pen tawntung Pasian hi a,leitung mong khempeuh donga Piangsak pa ahi hi.Amah gim lo a, zong tawl lo hi.Ama thu theihtelna kigen zo lo hi.
Amah in a gim mi tungahvangliatna pia a,thahatna a nei lo mia thahatna khangsak hi.
Khangnote nangawn gimin tawl dinga,khanglai mite a tha uh bei ding hi.
Ahih hangin Topa a muang mitea tha uh dimkik dinga,muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in,amaute tai napi-un tawl lo ding uh a,amaute lam pai napi-ungim lo ding uh hi.
Tuipi gei-a om gamte aw,gamdai takin ka thu ngai un.Na mite uh a tha uh dimsak unla,amaute a nai-ah hong paisak un.Amaute in thugen theih nadinghun ngah ding uh hi.Thukhen zumah kei tawh kisi nu’ng.

A paina peuhah a gualzo,nisuahna panin a hong pai mipakua in hanthawn ahi hiam?Amah in ama khut sungah minam dangtepia khin ahih maninamah in kumpite tuancil hi.Amah in a namsau tawhamaute leivui bangin bawl a,ama thal tawhbuhkung leeng a bangsak hi.
Amah in amaute nawhdelh lua kisa-in,a khe in lei nangawn sik kha lo liang a,nuamtakin a paisuak hi.
A kipat cil a kipanina khangkhangin mite a sam,hih nasep semin a bawl kua ahi hiam?Keimah Topa in,a masa le a nunung ka hi a,kei pen Topa ka hi hi.
Tuipi gei-a om gamte inmu khinin a lau uh hi.Leimong dongin mite lau-in liing uh a,amaute in hong nai-in hong pai uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in a veengte ciat huh a,a sanggamte ciat kiangah,“Lau kei un,” a ci hi.

Khutsiam pa in khamseek pa hanthawnin,sek tawh milim a neel puah pa insekpi tawh a sat pa hanthawn a,sumtui a luanna uh,“Hoih hi,” a ci uh hi.A liing thei nawn lo dinginamaute in tua milimsiktukkilh tawh a khenkip uh hi.
Ahih hangin nang ka nasem pa Israel,ka lawm Abraham’ suanlekhak,ka hong teelsa Jakob aw,
leimong panin kong lakkhiat,leimong kiu a gamla pen mun paninka hong sapkhiat,“Nang pen ka nasem pa na hi a,nangmah kong teel khinzo a,nangmah kong nil khia kei hi,”ka hong cih pa aw,
nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in.Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in.Nang hong thakhauhsakinkong huh dinga,nang hong huhinka hong hon khia ding hi.
Nangma tungah a heh mite khempeuhmaizumna kithuaksakinkikoihkhong ding hi.Nangmah hong dem mitea mawkna suakinsiatna thuak ding uh hi.
Nangmah hong langpangte na zon hanginamaute na mu nawn kei ding hi.Nangmah hong dote penbangmah hi het lo ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehkeimah Topa na Pasian inna khut taklam ka len hi.“Lau kei in, nangmah kong huh ding hi,”nang tungah a hong ci pakeimah ka hi hi.
Lungno bang ahi lel Jakob,no Israel mite aw, lau kei un!Note kong huh ding hi, Topa in ci hi.Note hong honpa penIsrael-te’ Siangtho Pa ahi hi.
Note pen, a thak, a hiam,ha a nei buhcilna banginkong bawl ding hi.Note in mual liante cilinna suvui ding uh a,mual neute penansi bangin na gawizan ding uh hi.
Amaute na haih ding uh a,huih in amaute mut khia dinga,huihpi in amaute thehthang ding hi.Tua ciangin Topa’ hanginna lungdam ding uh a,Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa’ hanginna minthang ding uh hi.
Keima mite in tui duhin, tui zongin,a dang uh a taak cianginamau’ hong thungetna ka pia dinga,Israel-te’ Pasian keimah inamaute ka nusia kei ding hi.
Bangmah a om lohnaa sangna munte paningunte ka luangsak dinga,kuamte’ laizangahtuikhukte ka omsak ding hi.Sehnel gam penbualtui ka suaksak dinga,lei keuna mun penciktui ka suaksak ding hi.
Gamlakah taamtak sing,singkha sing, mui sing le oliv kungteka posak ding hi.Sehnel gam sungah taaksan sing,hiangpa sing le tak singka suan khawm ding hi.
Topa’ khut in hih nate bawl a,Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa inhih nate piangsak hi,ci-in mite in mu-in a theih nading,a thu ngaihsunina tel theih nading uh ahi hi.Topa in Pasian Man lote A Tona
Na thu uh sung un, Topa in ci hi.Na lahtel nop teng uh gen un,Jakob’ Kumpipa in ci hi.

Amaute in a thu uh hong paipih uh henla,a piang ding thu hong gen uh hen.Eite in i ngaihsut theih nading,a hong piang ding thu i theih nadingina beisa huna om nate bang teng hiamhong gen ta uh hen.Tua ahih kei leh zong,a hong piang ding thueite tungah hong gen ta uh hen.

Note pen pasian-te na hihna uhka theih nadinguntu khit ciangin a hong piang ding thutekote tungah hong gen un.Kote lungkia-in ka lau nadingunphatna ahi a, siatna ahi zonginkhat peuhpeuh hong bawl dih un.
A taktakin note bangmah na hi kei uh a,na nasepnate uh a mawkna ahi hi.Note a hong teelpa a etsathuai ahi hi.

Leilu lam gam paninmi khat ka hanthawn a,amah hong kuan khin hi.Nisuahna lam panin amah inka min hong lo ding hi.Beelseek pa in buan a cil bang,sum sunga a kisu gawp bangin,amah in gam uktetuancil gawp ding hi.

Eite in i theih nadingina kipat cil a kipan kua in hong gen khia a,“Amah man hi,” i cihtheih nadingina hun ma-in kua in gen ahi hiam?Kuamah in gen khia lo,kuamah in pulak lo a,kuamah in no’ thu za lo hi.
Topa ahi keimah inZion tungah hih thu ka pulak masa a,Jerusalem tungahlungdamna thu ka gen hi.
Ahih hangintua mun ka et ciangin kuamah om lo hi.Thu ka dot ciangin a hong dawng dingthulamlak amaute lakah om lo hi.
Amaute khempeuh zuaupi vive hi a,amau’ nasepnate a mawkna ahi hi.A kisung amau’ milimte penhuih hawmpi bang ahi uh hi.
Topa’ NasempaKeimah in ka huh, ka teel,ka lungkimna ka nasem pa en un.Ka kha tawh amah ka kidimsak a,amah in minam khempeuh tungahthuman tungsak ding hi.
Amah kiko loin,a aw zong sangsak lo dinga,kongzing lakah zongthu gen zakzak lo ding hi.
Amah in a zawngkhal mitedop bawl dinga,a cimawh mite tungah migi ding hi.Amah in thumanna tawhmi khempeuh tungah thutang thu sem khia ding hi.
Amah in leitungah thutang thua phuh khit matengin lungsi lo,lungkia lo ding hi.Tuipi gei-a om gamte inama thu ngak uh hi.

Vantungte piangsakin a zal,leitung phahin, a tung panina hong pai khia nate a piangsak,leitungah a om mite tungahhusanna pia-in,leitungah a paite khempeuhhusanna a guan Topa Pasian inhih bangin ci hi:

“Kei pen Topa ka hi a,thumanna tawh nangmah hong samin,ka khut tawh hong leninnang ka hong kem hi.Mittawte a vaksak ding,leinuai thong sung paninthongkiate a la khia ding,thong sung a mialna munaha tu mite a la khia ding,mite tungah thuciamna ahi ding,minam dangte tungahkhuavak ahi dinginnang ka hong koih khin hi.
“Kei pen Topa ka hi a,Topa pen keima min ahi hi.Pasian dang’ tungahkeima-a’ tawh a kibang minthannaka pia kei a,a kisui milimte zongkeimah hong kiphatnate pawlka ngahsak kei hi.
En un, hun beisa-a nate inhong khengta a,tu-in a thak nate kong gen hi.Tuate a hong pian khiat ma-innote tungah a thuteka hong gen khol hi,” a ci hi.Topa’ Hotkhiatna Lianpi Phatna
Topa’ tungah la thak sa unla,leimong panin amah phatna sa un!Tuipi le a sunga omte,tuipi gei-a om gamte lea tunga teeng mite aw, la sa un.
Sehnel gam le a khuapite,Kedar mite’ tenna khuaneutea aw uh sangkhaisak un.Sela gam a teeng mitelungdamna tawh la sasak unla,mual dawn panin amaute awngsak un.
Topa’ minthanna gensak unla,tuipi gei-a gamte-ahamah phatna gensak un.
Mi thahatpa bangin Topa kuan khia a,gal a do mipa banginama hehna sosak hi.Amah kiko-in nakpitakin awng khia a,ama hatna a galte tungah a lak hi.

Pasian in hih bangin ci hi:“Sauveipi sung bangmah hih loin ka om a,keimah le keimah kikhamcipinka om hithiat hi.Tu-in ahihleh numei nausuak ding banginka kikokhia dinga,ka kam ka-in ka tungnak ding hi.
Mual liante le mual neuteka susia dinga,a po khempeuh ka keusak ding hi.Gunte pen tuikulh ka suaksak dinga,bualtuite ka kangsak ding hi.

“Amau’ theih loh lampi-ahmittawte ka paipih dinga,amau’ theih ngei lohsul zuihpihin ka kha ding hi.Amau’ mai-ah khuamial penkhuavak suaksakin,a phokna muntea tamin ka bawl ding hi.Hihte pen keima hih ding nate hi a,tuate sem loin ka nusia kei ding hi.
A kisui milimte muangin,a kisung milimte kiangah,‘Note, komau’ pasian-te na hi uh hi,’a ci mite kinolh dinga,maizum mahmahin ki-omsak ding hi.Israel in Khalna tawh Phattuam Ngah lo
“Bilngongte aw, za un.Mittawte aw,na muh theih nadingun en un!
Ka nasem pa bangin kua a mit taw a,keima sawl ka kamtai pa banginkua a bil ngong ahi hiam?Keima thuciampih pa banginkua a mit taw a,Topa’ nasem pa banginkua a mit taw ahi hiam?
Israel in na tampi mu a,ahih hangin tuate encian lo hi.Ama bilte vang a, ahih hangin amah inkhua za lo hi,” a ci hi.
Topa pena hon khia nuam mahmah Pasian hi a,ama thuhilhnate limtakina kizuih ding a deih hi.

Ahih hanginama mite pen a kiluh, a kisut mite hi a,leihawm sungahamaute khempeuh kikhiasuk a,thonginn sungah kiseel hi.Amaute pen a hon ding a om lo,nek dingin a kiman ganhingsuak khin mang uh a,kuamah in, “Hong piakik in,”a cih loh vankinusiate a suak khinta uh hi.
Note lakah khat peuhpeuh inhih thu na ngai ding uh hiam?Tu a kipanin limtakinna ngai ding uh hiam?

Kua in a sut gawppa tungah Jakob pia a,a luh gawpte tungah Israel pia ahi hiam?Topa mahmah ina piak hi lo ahi hiam?Ama tungah eite i khial hi.Ama hong deih bangin i nungta kei a,ama hong thuhilhnate i mang kei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah inama hehna so leh galkidonateeite tungah hong tungsak hi.Israel mi khempeuh lakahama hehna mei bangin hong kuang a,ahih hangin eite inbangmah i thei kei hi.Tua bang i thuakna hangineite in bangmah i phawk thei tuan kei hi.

Ahih hangin Jakob aw,nangmah hong piangsak pa,Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa,Topa in tu-in hih bang ci hi:“Hong hon khia khin ka hih maninlau kei in.Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a,nang pen kei-a’ na hi hi.
Tuite na kantan cianginnang kong ompih dinga,gunte na kantan ciangintui in hong tuum lo ding hi.Mei kantanin na pai cianginna kaang kei dinga,meikuangte innang hong kaangtum lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehkei pen Topa na Pasian,Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa,nangmah hong honpa ka hi hi.Nangmah tat nadingin Egypt ka pia a,nangmah khek nadinginEthiopia le Seba ka pia hi.
Nang pen keima mitah manpha-in,pahtakhuai-in,nangmah hong it ka hih maninnangma tangin mite ka pia a,na nuntakna khek nadinginmihingte ka pia hi.
Nang hong ompih ka hih maninlau kei in. “Nisuahna lam paninna suanlekhakte kong paipih dinga,nitumna lam paninna mite kong kaikhawm ding hi.

Keimah in leilu lam kiangah,‘Pia khia in,’leitaw lam kiangah,‘Len nawn kei in;keima piansak ka bawlsa,keima minthan nadingin ka piansak,keima min tawh a kilote khempeuh ahi,ka tapate a gamlapi panin,ka tanute leimong paninhong paipih un,’ ka ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Mit nei napi-in a mit a tawte,bil nei napi-in a bil a ngongte,hong pai khiatpih un.

Minamte khempeuhkikaikhawmsak unla,mihingte kikhawmsak un.Amaute’ lak paninkua in hih thu hong gen khia thei-in,a beisa huna natekua in laktel thei ahi hiam?Amau’ dikna a langsak dingina tecite uh hong paipihsak unla,amaute a thu zasakin,man mah hi, cisak un.

“Note pen keima teci na hi uh hi,”Topa in ci a,“Kei pen Amah ka hihna thu,nangmah in thei-inkeimah nong upna ding,nong theihtel nadinginkong teelsa ka nasem pa na hi hi.Kei’ ma-in pasian om lo a,kei’ khitah zong kuamah om lo ding hi.
“Kei, keimah pen Topa ka hi a,kei sim loh honpa dang om lo hi.
Note lakah pasian dang a om ma-inhon khia-in, pulakin, ka gen khol hi.Tua ahih ciangin note penkeima teci na hi uh hi,”Topa in ci hi.
“Kei pen Pasian ka hi a,a kipat cil a kipanin zong kei penAmah ka hi hi.Keima khut sung panina la khia zo kuamah om lo hi.Keima sepnate, a kua inhong khaktan zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa,note a hong hon Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Note’ hangin Babylon-ah galkapte puakin,khua kongpi sikzawl khempeuhka kuaitan dinga,Khaldea mite’ kikona pentauna awging ka suaksak ding hi.
Kei pen Topa, note’ Siangtho Pa,Israel a Piangsak pa,note’ Kumpi ka hi hi,” ci hi.

Tuipi sungah lampi bawlin,tui lianpi sungah pai nading sul bawl a,leeng le sakolte, galkapte le galhangteEgypt gam pan pai khiatpihin,a tho thei nawn lo dinginamaute a lumcipsak,amaute penmeivak khau kisumit bangina mitsak Topa in hih bangin ci hi:
“Masa lama nate ciamteh kei unla,a beisa hun nate ngaihsun kei un.
Tu-in a thak na khat ka bawl a,tu-in hong piang khia hi.Note in thei lo na hi uh hiam?Gamlakah lam lianpi khat ka bawl dinga,sehnel gam sungahgunte ka luangsak ding hi.

Gamsate, ngiate le vasa-kalaohte inkei hong pahtawi ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehkeima adingin ka piansak mite inkeimah hong phatnaa genkhiat theih nadingun,keima teel mite’ dawn dingingamlakah tui pia-in,sehnel gam sungah gun ka luangsak hi.
“Ahih hangin Jakob aw,ka min nong lo kei hi.Israel aw, kei nong cimtak hi.
Meihal biak nadinginkei kiangah na tuu nong paipih kei a,biakpiakna tawhkei nong pahtawi kei hi.Piakna tawhnang kong vangiksak nai kei a,paknamtui piakna tawhkong gimsak nai kei hi.

Kei adingin paknamtuinong leisak nai kei a,nangmah in biakna sa a thaute tawhnong taisak nai kei hi.Ahih hangin nang in na khialhna tawhkei tungah vangik nong suan khin a,na mawhna tawhkei nong gimsak khin hi.
Na thupalsatnatehong paihkhiatsak pa pen keimah ka hi a,kei ka hih maninna khialhnate ka ciamteh kei ding hi.
“Thuman na hihna hong laktel inla,thu kikum khawm ni.Na dikna a kilat nadinginna thu hong sung khia in.
Na pu na pa masate uh na khial uh a,na makaite uh zongkei tungah hong khial uh hi.
Na uliante un ka biakinnmindaisak uh ahih maninIsrael tungah siatna ka tungsak a,Jakob ka mindaisak hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in, “Ka nasem pa Jakob aw,ka teelsa Israel aw, tu-in za in.
Nangmah a hong bawl,gil sung panin nang a hong piangsak,nang a hong huh dingTopa in hih bangin ci hi:Ka nasem pa Jakob aw,ka teelsa Israel aw, lau kei in.
“Bang hang hiam cih leha dangtak leitang tungahtui ka sung dinga,lei keu tungahluitui ka luangsak ding hi.Na suanlekhakte tungahka kha ka sung dinga,na tu na tate tungahka thupha ka pia ding hi.
Amaute pentui sung panin a po khia,luitui luang gei-ah a om,gialhek kungte bangin po khia ding uh hi.
“Khat in, ‘Kei pen Topa ka hi hi,’ ci-in,adang khat in Jakob min tawhama min lo dinga,adang khat leuleu in,‘Topa-a’, ci-in ama khut tungah gelhin,Israel min tawh a mahmahkinophuah ding hi,” ci hi.
Topa, Israel Kumpipa le amah Tan pa,Vanglian Topa in hih bangin gen a,“Kei pen a masa pen lea nunung pen ka hi hi.Kei sim loh pasian dang om lo hi.
Kua pen kei tawh kibang ahi hiam?Amah gensakin pulaksak unla,keima mai-ah gensak un.A hong tung ding nate thutanglai pek paninkua in thangko ahi hiam?Hong tung ding nate thuamaute gensak dih un.

Lau kei unla, kihta kei un.Tanglai pek paninnote kiangah hong geninhong pulak khin hi lo ka hi hiam?Note khempeuhkeima teci na hi uh hi.Kei sim loh pasian dang om ahi hiam?Suangpi dang om lo hi.Khat beek ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.Milim Biak A Haihuaina
Milim a bawl mite khempeuh a mawkna hi a, amau’ deih milimte in phattuamna piangsak lo hi. Milim a biate in khua mu thei loin, thu theithei lo a, amaute in maizumna a thuak uh hi.
Bangmahin a kimang lo pasian kua in bawl a, milim kua in sung ahi hiam?

Milim a bia mite khempeuh in maizumna ngah ding uh hi. Milim a bawl khutsiamte pen mi hilel uh hi. Amaute khempeuh kikhawm sakin dingsak un. Amaute nakpitakin kilausak dinga, a vekpi-un maizumin kikoih khawm ding hi.
Sikseekpa in seekin hol tawh na sem hi. Amah in sek tawh seekin a thahat a khut tawh a sat hi. Amah a gil kialin a tha zaw a, dangtakin a gim hi.

Sing nasep khutsiampa in khau khungin laikung tawh a ciamteh hi. Amah in singnawtna tawh nawt a, laikung tawh a kualin a ciamteh hi. Amah in, inn sungah a teeng ding mihing melhoih lim khat bangin mihing limin a bawl hi.

Amah in taamtak singkungte a phuk hi. Tua ahih kei leh sesing kung khat ahi a, tawsaw kung khat ahi zongin teng khia a, gamlak singte lakah khangsakin golsak hi. Amah in taamtak kung khat suan a, guah in khangsak hi.

Tua ciangin tua kung pen mi khat adingin mei sing a suak hi. Amah in tua sing kimkhat la-in khua lum nadingin mei-in cih a, amah in mei tawhin moh a em hi. Amah in pasian khat zong bawlin bia a, amah in milim khat bawlin tua milim mai-ah a kun hi.
Amah in a sing kimkhat meikhukah cih hi. Adang kimkhat tawh an ne a, amah in sa hangin a gil vah hi. Amah in mei awi-in, “Ah, ka khua lumta, mei mu khin ing,” ci hi.
Amah in a vallai teng, ama milim pasian khatin a bawl hi. Tua milim mai-ah kunin a bia hi. Amah in tua milim tungah thu ngen a, “Nang pen keima pasian na hih ciangin kei hong hon khia in,” ci hi.

Amaute in bangmah thei lo a, amaute in bangmah khentel thei lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in bangmah a muh theih loh nadingun amah in a mit uh humsakin, bangmah a theih loh nadingun a lungsim uh khaksak hi.

A kimkhat meikhukah cihin, a aam tungah moh zong ka em a, sa hangin ka ne khinzo hi. A omlai teng a kihhuai-in bawl buang ding ka hi hiam? Sing bek khat mai-ah kun buang ding ka hi hiam, a ci ding, thu a ngaihsun, theihna le thumuhna a nei khat beek om lo hi.

Amah pen vut a nete tawh kibang lel hi. A lungsim haina in amah lam pialpih khin a, amah le amah kihon khia thei loin, “Ka khut sungah ka tawi milim pen a zumhuai hi lo ahi hiam?” cih zong phawk thei lo hi.Topa, Israel A Honpa
Jakob aw, hih thu phawk in.Israel aw, ka nasem pa na hi hi.Nang kong bawl a,nang pen keima nasem na hi hi.Israel aw, nangkong mangngilh kei ding hi.
Na thupalsatnate meiipi banginna khialhnate meii lum banginka phiat khia khinzo hi.Hong hon khia khin ka hih maninkei kiangah hong ciahkik in.

Vantungte aw, Topa intua thu sem khin ahih manin la sa un.Lei thuknate aw, awng un.Mualte aw, la sa-in awng khia un.Tulak le a sunga omsing khempeuh aw, awng un.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in Jakob hon khia khin a,Israel sungahamah kiminthangsak ding hi.
Gil sung paninnangmah a hong piangsak,nangmah hong Honpa,Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Keimah in na khempeuh bawlin,keimah guak in vantungte zalin,kuama seppih lohin leitung ka zal hi.
Zuau thugente’hilhkholhna limte a siasak pa,aisante pen mihai a suaksak pa,mipilte lehheikikin,amau’ thutheihte haina a suaksak pa;
a nasem pa’ thu kipsakin,a kamtaite’ thugente a sem pa,‘Jerusalem khua-ah mi teengin,Judah khuapite kilamkik dinga,a kisia khuateka lamkik ding hi,’ a ci pa;
tui thukpi kiangah,‘Keu in;na gunte ka keusak ding hi,’ a ci pa;
‘Sairas kumpipa pen ka tuucingpa hi a,ka deihna teng tungsak ding hi,’ a ci pa;‘Jerusalem kilamkik dinga,’biakinn pen,‘Na bulpi kiphutkik ding hi,’a ci Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

Kulhkongpi sungaha lut theih nadinginama mai-ahkongkhakte a honsak ding,kumpite’ vangliatnatea lakkhiatsak ding,ama mai-ah minam dangtea zawhsak dingin,a taklam khutin a let,a sathau nilh pa Sairas tungahTopa in hih bangin ci hi:

“Nangma min tawhnang a hong sampa penIsrael Pasian, Topa,keimah ka hihna thu na theih nadingin,nangma mai-ah kei pai-inmualte zalhmai-in,sumngo kongkhakte satzanina sikzawlte ka sattan dinga,a mialna mun sunga om sum kikoihte,mun simthama sum kiseelte,nangma tungah kong pia ding hi.
Ka nasem pa Jakob, ka teelsa Israelka ngaihsutna-innang pen na minin kong sam a,nong theih loh hanginmin thak kong phuak hi.

“Kei pen Topa ka hi hi.Kuamah dang om lo a, keimah sim lohPasian dang om lo hi.Nisuahna lam pan hitaleh,nitumna lam pan hitaleh,kei sim loh adang a om lohna thumite in a theih nadingin,nong theih loh hangina kisam thahatna nang ka hong guan hi.Kei pen Topa ka hi a,adang kuamah om lo hi.
Keimah in khuavak lekhuamial piangsakin,a pha nate lea sia nate ka piangsak a,hih nate khempeuh a bawlpa,keimah Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa, A Piangsak pa

Vantungte aw,tunglam panin thuman zusak unla,vantungte in thumanna buasuk ta un.Hotkhiatna a po khiat theih nadinginleitang kihongsak unla,thumanna zong po khia tosak un.Keimah Topa inhih thu ka bawl khinzo hi.

Amah a Bawlpa tawh a kido mipa,beelseek pa tawh a kilehdo leibeel ingimna ngah tahen!Tungman in amah a sek pa kiangah,“Nang in bang bawl na hi hiam,na na bawl in khutlet nei lo hi,” ci-ina thu sel ngam ahi hiam?
A pa kiangah, “Nangmah inkua piangsak na hi hiam?”a ci pa hitaleh,a nu kiangah, “Nang in nausuak dinginkua gimpih na hi hiam?”a ci pa in gimna ngah tahen!
Amah a Bawlpa, Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa,Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Nang in keima tate’ thu hong dongin,ka khut tawh ka bawlsa tawh kisaite-ahthu hong pia ding na hi hiam?
Keimah in leitung ka bawl a,tua tungah mi ka piangsak hi.Keima khut in vantungte zal a,keimah invantung na honpite khempeuhthu ka pia hi.

Thu a manin a sem dinginamah khua ka phawksak a,keimah in ama lampi khempeuhka mamsak ding hi.Amah in nasep thaman ahi a,letsong ahi zongin ngaihsun loinkeima khuapi lam dinga,salin a om ka mite a khah khia ding hi,”Vanglian Topa in ci hi.

Topa in Israel tungah,“Egypt’ hauhna leEthiopia sumbuk vante lea tun a sang Seba mitenangma kiangah hong pai-innangma a’ hong hi ding uh a,amaute in nang hong zui ding uh hi.Amaute sikkhau kibulhsa-inhong pai ding uh a,nangma kiangah hong kun ding uh hi.Amaute in nangma kiangahthumna hong bawl ding uh a,‘Nangmah bek tawh Pasian omkhawm a,kuamah dang om loin, amah sim lohpasian dang om lo hi,’hong ci ding uh hi.
A taktakin, Israel-te’ Pasian, Honpa pen,a mahmah a bucip Pasian ahi hi.
Milim a bawl mite khempeuh inmaizumna thuakincih nading thei loin om ding uh hi.
Ahih hanginTopa in Israel-te hon khia hi.A tawntungin gualzo ding uh a,cikmah hunin maizumnathuak ngei lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Vantungte a piangsak pa(amah Pasian!)Leitung piangsakin a bawl pa(a kipsak pa;a awngthawl dingin bawl loin,ten nadingin leitung a piangsak pa!)Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Kei pen Topa ka hi a,kuamah dang om lo hi.

Keimah in mun simtham,khuamialna gam sungah thu ka gen kei hi.Jakob suanlekhakte tungah,‘A awngthawl mun sungahkei hong zong un,’ ka ci kei hi.Keimah Topa inthuman ka gen a,a man nate ka pulak hi.Babylon Milimte le Topa
“Minamte sung panin a suaktalai note aw,nomau kikaikhawminhong pai unla, hong nai un!Sing milim a pua kawikawi mite intheihna nei lo uh a,a hon khia thei lo pasian tungahthu ngenngen uh hi.

Na thu uh sung unla, hong gen un.Na thu uh kikum khawm un!Hih thu sawtpekin kua in gen ahi hiam?Tanglai-in kua in pulak ahi hiam?Keimah Topa hi lo ka hi hiam?Thuman Pasian le Honpa ahi,kei sim loh pasian dang om lo a,kei sim loh kuamah dang om lo hi.
“Leitung mi khempeuhte aw,kei lamah hong kihei unlahotkhiatna ngah un!Bang hang hiam cih lehkei pen Pasian ka hi a,kuamah dang om lo hi.

Kei mahmah ka kiciam khin a,a kikhelkik ngei nawn lo dingthukip hih bang ahi hi:‘Keima mai-ah mi khempeuhhong khukdin dinga,keima tungah thuman dinghong kiciam ding hi,’ cihna,kei’ kamsung paninthumanna tawh pusuakkhia khinzo hi.
Topa’ hang bekin gualzawhna lethahatna kingah hi, hong kici ding hi.Kei hong mudahte khempeuhmindai-in maizum ding uh hi.
Israel suanlekhakte khempeuh,Topa’ hangin gualzo-in a kisial ding uh hi.
“Bel pasian puksukin,Nebo pasian kunsuk a,tua milimte penganhing le bawngte tungah kipua hi.Note’ puak hih nate pena gim mahmah ganhingte tungaha kisuan vangik banginnote tungah hong gik hi.
Amaute kunin,amaute puksuk khawm uh a,amaute in vangik pengsak thei lo uh a,amaute mahmah zonggalte’ matna sungah tung uh hi.
“Na suah a kipan kong tawi,gil sung pan a kong puak,Jakob innkuan, Israel innkuana suakta laite khempeuh aw,keima thu hong ngai un.
Na teek dongun kei pen Amah ka hi a,na sam uh a kan’ hun donginnote kong kem ding hi.Ka hong bawlkhin a, ka hong don ding hi.Keimah in hong tawi-inka hong hon khia ding hi.
“Note in kei, kua tawh hong kibangsakinkua tawh hong kikimsak dinga,ka kibatpih dingin a kua tawhhong enteh ding na hi uh hiam?
Sumbawm panin khamte uang zatintawitehna tawh ngunte a teh khiate inkham seekpa cial uh a,amah in tua nate penpasian-in a seeksak hi.Tua ciangin amaute kunintua milim a bia uh hi.

Amaute in tua pasian pena liangko tung uhah ngato-in pua uh a,ama omna ding munah a koih uh hi.Tua a koihna-ah a milim om niloh hi.Ama omna panin kin khia thei lo hi.Mi khatpeuh in amah samlehamah in dawng thei lo a,ama lungkhamna panin zonga hon khia thei kei hi.
“Thu a palsat mite aw,hih thu phawkin ngaihsun unla,lungngai pha un.
Hun lui thute phawk un;bang hang hiam cih lehkei pen Pasian ka hi a, adang om lo hi.Kei pen Pasian ka hi a,kei tawh a kibang adang om lo hi.
A kipat cil-ina tawpna ding thu ka pulak a,tanglai pek panina piang nai lo nate genin,‘Ka thugen kip dinga,ka ngimna khempeuhka tungsak ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Nisuahna gam paninsasialne vasa khat samin,keima thu a sem khia dingingamlapi panin mi khat ka sam hi.Thu ka gen khin a, ka tungsak ding hi.Ka geel khin a, ka sem ding hi.
“Suahtakna ding haksa mahmah ding hi,a ci lungsim khauh mite aw,ka thu ngai un:
Suahtakna ding hunka hong tungsak ta a, gamla nawn lo hi.Ka hong hotkhiat ding hunzekai nawn lo ding hi.Keima minthanna ahi Israel adinginJerusalem ka hon khia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Nungak a bang Babylon aw,hong paisuk inla, leivui lakah tu in.Nungak a bang Khaldea aw,tokhom om lohna leilakah hong tusuk in!Bang hang hiam cih lehnang pen a moi milmel, a ngeek dikdek,hong kici nawn lo ding hi.
An gawina suangte hei inla, an gawi in.Na kikhuhna puan la khia inla,na nik na puan suahin gunte kantan in.
Na seelsim teng kilang dinga,na zumhuaina teng kimu ding hi.Keimah in kong thukkik dinga,kuamah ka zah kei ding hi.
Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa ineite hong suaktasak a,ama min pen Vanglian Topa ahi hi.
Babylon aw, gamdai takin tu inla,khuamialna sungah pai in;bang hang hiam cih leh nang penkumpi gamte’ tonu,hong kici nawn lo ding hi.
Ka mite tungah ka heh a,ka luah gamh ka ninsak hi.Nangma khut sungah amaute kong pia a,nangmah inamaute na hehpih bawl kei hi.A khangham mite nangawnna ngong bawl mahmah hi.
Nangmah in, “Tonuka hi tawntung ding hi,” ci na hih maninhih thute na lungsimah koih loin,a thumongte zong na phawkkha kei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, a nuam bek a ut,lungmuang takin a tu hithiat,na lungsimah, “Keimah hi’ng,kei sim loh midang om kei;meigongin om ngei kei ning,ta-khuai cih zong sin kei ning,”a ci khuapi aw, hih thu za in:
Aisan siamnate le mibum siamnavang lianpi na neih hanginta khuaisuahna le meigonna,hih thu nihte thakhat thu-inni khat sungin a kicing takinnangma tungah hong tung veve ding hi.
Na gitlohna-ah nang na lungmuang a,“Kuamah inkei hong mu kei hi,” na ci hi.Na pilna le na theihnate inlam hong pialsak a,na lungsim sungah, “Keimah hi’ng,kei sim loh midang om kei,” na ci hi.

Ahih hangin nangmah inna beisak theih loh lungkhamnana tungah hong tung dinga,nangmah in maisakna na ngah theih lohgimna nang tungah hong tung ding hi.A thu na theih hetloh siatnana tungah hong tungvat ding hi.
Na neulai a kipan na sep na mibumna lena aisannate ah kiptakin om in.Phattuamna na ngah kha dinga,mite na lausak zo kha ding hi.
Nang tungah a hong kilakthu tampite hangin na gim hi.Vantungte a sehin khenin,aksite en a, khadet siminnang tunga thupiang dinga hong gen khol mitetu-in dingsak inla,nangmah kihonsak in.
En in, amaute penbuhkung tawh kibang uh a,mei in amaute kaangtum hi.Meikuang’ vangliatna paninamau le amau kihontawm thei lo uh hi.Hih pen khua lumna ding mei-am hi lo a,awi ding mei zong hi lo hi.
Nang tawh na a semkhawm,na neu lai a kipan nang tawhna a semkhawmte tungahhih thute hong tung ding hi.Amaute penamau’ tum ciatah zauvak uh a,nang a hong hon ding kuamah om lo hi.
Israel min tawh a kilo,Judah sung panin a piang khia,Topa’ min tawh thu ciam napi-in,thuman thutak tawhIsrael Pasian a pulak loJakob innkuan aw, hih thu ngai un.
Note tua bang hinapi-in,khuapi siangtho sungaha teeng mite ihi a,Israel Pasian i muang hi.Ama min pen Vanglian Topa ahi hi,ci-in kisaktheihna-inna nei zaw lai uh hi.
A masa lama nate thu tanglai-in ka gen a,keima kam panin tuate ging khia-inka kitheithangsak hi.Tua ciangin thakhat thu-inkeimah in ka sem a, a hong piang hi.
Note pen paupeenginna ngawng uh sik thagui bang hi a,na thatang uh sumngo bangin a saknathei khin ka hih manin,

note in, “Ka milim un hihte bawl a,a kisui ka milim uh lea kisung ka milim un thu pia hi,”na cihtheih loh nadingun tanglai a kipaninnote tungah hih thute kong gen a,tuate hong pian ma-innote tungah kong zasak khol hi.
Ka gensa thu khempeuhhong tungta ahih manin,na gennate a man hi,na hong cih ding uh hita hi.Tu a kipanin na a thakte,na theih ngei loh uhhong tung ding a ki-im natekong gen ding hi.
Hihte pen tuhunin a piangsak ka hi a,a beisa hunah hih bang piang nai lo hi.A piang khinsa thu hileh,ka theihsa uh thu hi, na ci kha ding uh hi.
Note pen muantheih ding na hihlohna uh,na suah tung uh a kipanmi lehdo thei na hihna uhka hong thei hi.Tua ahih manin hih thutena za ngei kei uh a,zong na thei ngei kei uh hi.
Note khempeuhkong suksiat khak loh nadinginka min ka ngaihsutna tawhka hehna diahin,keimah hong kiphatna ka ngaihsutna-innote tungah ka ki-ip hi.
Meikhuk sungahngun a kisiansak bangingimna meikhuk sungahnote kong ze-et hi.Ahi zongin notebangmahin a kimang lo na hihna uhhong kimu khin hi.

Keimah ka kikhualna,keimah ka kingaihsutna-inhih bangin kong hih hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehka min a siat ding kilawm ahi hiam?Midang khat tungahkeima minthanna ka pia kei ding hi.Topa in Israel-te Hon khia ding
Jakob aw, ka thu ngai in.Kong sap Israel-te aw,ka thu hong ngai un!Kei pen amah ka hi a,kei pen a masa hi-in,kei pen a nunung zong ka hi hi.
Ka khut in leitung bulpi koih a,ka khut taklam in vantungte zal hi.Amaute ka sap cianginamaute omkhawm pah uh hi.

Note khempeuhhong kikhawm unla hong za un!Amaute sung panin kua inhih ka sep ding nategen khol thei ahi hiam?Ka teelsa mipa in Babylon tungahkeima ngimna sem dinga,Khaldea mite’ langkhat ahkei ka pang ding hi.
Kei, keimah in thu genin amah ka sam a,kei in amah ka panpih a,amah a dau pai ding hi.

Kei kiangah hong nai unla,hih thu hong za un.A kipat cil a kipanina simthamin thu ka gen ngei kei a,tua thu a pian a kipaninkei ka om hi.(Tu-in Topa Pasian in kei tungaha vangliatna hong pia a,kei hong sawl hi.)
Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa,nangmah hong hon Topa in:Phattuamna na ngah nadinginnang a hong hilh,na zuih ding a kilawm lampi-aha hong paipih Topa na Pasian ka hi hi.
Ka thupiakna a ngai hi hoh leteh!Nangma nopsakna gunpi bang dinga,na thumanna, tuihualte tawhkibang ding hi.
Na tu le na tate sehnel zah pha dinga,na suanlekhaktesehnel vui zah pha ding hi.Keima mai-ah amaute’ minkiphiatkhia lo dinga,kisusia ngei lo ding hi, a ci hi.
Babylon panin pai khia-inKhaldea gam panin tai inla,lungdamna tawh hih thu genintaangko inla, leimong dongin puak in.“Topa in ama nasemJakob hon khia khinzo!”ci-in gen kawikawi in.
Amah in sehnel gam kantaninamaute a paipih ciangina dang uh taak lo hi.Suangpi panin amau adinginamah in tui a luangsak hi.Amah in suangpi khangkhamsak a,tui a phul khia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin migilote adinginnopna om lo hi, Topa in ci hi.
Tuipi gei-a om gamte aw,ka thu ngai un.Gamlapi-a om mihingte aw,ka thu ngai un.Ka suah ma-inTopa in kei hong teel a,ka nu sungah ka om lai-inamah in keima min hong pulak khin hi.
Amah in ka thugente,namsau hiam bangsak a,ama khut tawh keimah hong hu hi.Amah in a kinawtngilthaltang bangin kei hong bawl a,a hiamsa-in zat pah dingina thallawng sungah kei hong koih hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, “Nang penkeimah hong kiminthansakna dingka nasem pa Israel na hi hi,”a hong ci hi.

Ahih hangin keimah in, “Na ka sem a,ahi zongin a kimanna om lo hi.Ka thatang khempeuh ka beisak a,ahi zongin bangmah ka tangtun kei hi.Ahi zongin Topa ina manin na hong sem ding,ci-in ka muang a,ka sep thaman hong pia ding hi,ci-in ka um hi,” ka ci hi.

Ama kiangah Jakob kipaipihkikin,ama kiangah Israel-tea kikaihkhop theih nadinginTopa’ mai-ah kei hong kipahtawi a,Pasian pen keima thahatna suakin,ama nasem dingin ka nu sung paninkeimah a hong piangsak Topa intu-in thu hong gen hi.

Amah in, “Jakob minamtea laamto ding lea suaktalai Israel mitea ngei uh a bangsakkik dinginkeima nasem na hihna pena baih lua mahmah nasep ahi hi.Keima hotkhiatna inleimong dong a phak theih nadinginminam dangte tungah khuavak ahi dinginnang kong pia ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Israel a honpa leama Siangtho Pa ahi Topa innakpitakin simmawhna a thuak,minamte in a muhdah,gam ukte’ nasem pa tungah:“Nangmah a hong teelIsrael-te’ Siangtho Pa,a thuman Topa’ hanginmite na hotkhiatna thukumpite in a muh uh cianginzahtakna tawh na mai-ahhong ding ding uh a,na mai-ah uliantehong kun ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.Jerusalem Phuhkik ding Ciam

Topa in ama mite kiangah,“Note hotkhiat ding huna hong tun cianginmaipha kong pia dinga,huhna nong ngetna uhkong pia ding hi.Note hong kemin ka hong hu dinga,note’ tungtawnin mi khempeuh tawhthuciamna ka bawl ding hi.A kinusia na gam sung uhahnote kong teengsakkik ding hi.

Thongkia mite tungah,‘Hong pai khia un,’ ci-in,khuamial sunga om mite tungah,‘Hong pusuak un,’ ka ci ding hi.Amaute pen lam tawntung ah an a ne,mual pawn a sang munte khempeuh ahnuamtakin a gamta tuute tawhkibang ding uh hi.
Amaute gilkial loin, dangtak lo ding uh a,huihsa le nisa inamaute sukha lo ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute a hehpih pa inamaute lamkaih dinga,ciktui kiangah amaute paipih ding hi.
“Keimah in ka mite adinginmual liante kantaninlampi ka ziksak dinga,ka lam lianpite-ahphung ka ciang ding hi.
Ka mite a gamlapi paninhong pai ding uh a,leilu lam gam lenitumna lam gamte paninamaute hong pai-in,pawlkhatte, leitaw lam Siene gam paninhong ciah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Vantungte aw, lungdamin la sa un.Leitung aw, lungdamin diang in.Mual liante aw,lungdamin la sa-in awng khia un!Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in ama mite hehnem ta a,gimna a thuak ama mitehehpih ta ding hi.
Ahih hangin Jerusalem mite in,“Topa in eite hong nusia khin a,hong mangngilh khinta hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in,“Ama sung panin a suak a tapaa hehpih lo ding zahin nupi khat inama nawi a teep naungekmangngilh thei ding ahi hiam?Hihte nangawn inmangngilh kha thei dinga,ahi zongin keimah inkong mangngilh kei ding hi.
Jerusalem aw,ka khutpeek sungahnang kong gelh khinzo a,nang ka hong mangngilh ngei kei ding hi.
“Nang a hong lam mite innang a hong susiate nuaisiah khinta uh a,nang hong siasaktenang kiang panin tai khia khinta uh hi.

Na kimkotah khuadakto inla mu in.Na mi khempeuh hong kikhawm uh a,nangma kiangahamaute hong ciah uh hi.Kei pen a nungta Topaka hih mah bangin,na mite khempeuh hanginnang na kisial dinga,mothak in kizepna-in a zat banginamaute khempeuh na zang ding hi.
“A kisia, a kinusia khinsanangma munte lea kisusia nangma gam pennangma tungah a teeng mite adingintu-in kawcik lua ta dinga,nang hong valhtum mite,gamlapi-ah om ding uh hi.
Na kikhen hun uh, salin a om sunguna suak mite in nangma kiangah,‘Kote adingin mun kawcik lua hi;ka omna ding uh mun hong bawlsak in,’hong ci ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin na lungsimah,‘Kua in keima adinginhih mite hong hinkhiatsak ahi hiam?Kei hong kinusia-in tang-awlin ka om a,salin hong kikoihinhong kipaikhiatpih hi.Hihte kua in hong khoisak ahi hiam?Keimah guakin hong kinusia hi.Tua ahih manin koi lai paninhihte hong piang ahi hiam?’na ci ding hi,” a ci hi.

Topa Pasian in, “En in, minamte tungahka khut ka laamto dinga,mite tungah ka lim ka lakto ding hi.Amaute in a angsung uhahna tapate tawi-in hong paipih ding uh a,a liangko tung uhahna tate hong pua ding uh hi.

Kumpite pen nang hong kemna pate hong hi dinga,kumpinute pen nang hong khoina nute hong hi ding hi.Amaute in a maitang uh leilak ngatinnang kiangah hong kun ding uh a,na khe-a leivui baangtea liak ding uh hi.Tua ciangin kei penTopa ka hihna na hong thei ding hi.Kei hong muangtemaizum lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
A thahatpa’ kiang paninnate kila khia zo dinga,thukhauh pa’ mat mitekihon khia zo ding ahi hiam?
Topa in,“A thahatpa’ mat salte kila khia dinga,a thukhauh pa’ na kila khia ding hi.Nang hong dem mitekeimah in ka dem dinga,na tate ka hon khia ding hi.

Nang hong nengniam mite penamau’ satak mah ka nesak dinga,zukham bangin amau’ si maha kham ding uh hi.Tua ciangin kei penJakob’ Vanglian Pa,nang hong Tan khiapa,nang hong Hon Topa ka hihnami khempeuh inhong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Topa in, “Amah ka ciahsakna,na nu a kimakna laikoi-ah om ahi hiam?Tua ahih kei leh nang kong zuaknaka leibatnate koi pan ahi hiam?Nomau mawhna hanginnote hong kizuak a,nomau khialhna hanginna nu uh kipaikhiasak hi.

“Kong pai ciangin bang hanginmi khat zong om lo ahi hiam?Kong sap ciangin bang hanginhong dawng dingkhat zong om lo ahi hiam?Hong hon zo lo zah dinginka khut hat lo lua ahi hiam?Tua ahih kei leh zongnote khahkhiatna dingvangliatna nei lo ka hi hiam?Keima taina tawh tuipi ka keusak a,gunte pen sehnel gam ka suaksak hi.Tui om loh manina ngasate dangtakin si-in a uih gawp hi.
Vantungte khuamial ka silhsak a,amau’ kituam nadinginpuanhampi ka bawl hi,” a ci hi.Pasian’ Nasempa’ Thumanna
A lunggim miteka thahatsak theih nadinginTopa Pasian inka gen ding thu hong hilh khin hi.Ama hong hilhnate a ngai dinginzingsang simin lawpna hong guan hi.
Topa Pasian inthu theihtelna hong guan hi.Amah ka lehdo kei a,zong ka nungngat kei hi.
Hong satte, ka nung ka dawh a,ka khamul-in a hong kai mite,ka paang ka dawh hi.Maizumna le cilphihna paninka maitang ka hei kei hi.
Topa Pasian in kei hong huh hi.Tua ahih ciangincih nading thei loin ka om kei hi.Tua ahih manin ka thuak tentan a,hong maizumsak lo ding hi,ci-in ka thei hi.

Ka thumanna a langsak Pasiana nai-ah hong om hi.Keima langkhat ahkua hong pang zo ding ahi hiam?Thukhen zumah kikhia nu’ng.Thukhen zumah kua inhong khia nuam ahi hiam?Kei hong langpang dinginhong kuan tahen.
Topa Pasian in kei hong huh hi.Kua in kei mawh hi,ci-in gen thei ding ahi hiam?Amaute khempeuh puan banginpaatkhia ding uh a,nget in amaute netum ding hi.
Topa kihta a,a nasem pa’ thu a mangte khempeuhkhuamial sungah na pai hangunTopa muang unla, Pasian suanin nei un.
Midang suksiat ding a sawm mite aw,note’ vaihawm siatna mah innote hong susia ding hi.Topa’ khut tung paningimna thuakin na lumsuk ding uh hi.
Topa in, “Hotkhiat ding a ut,Topa a zongte aw, ngai un.Note hong ki-eu khiatna suangpi,note hong kitawhkhiatna khuk en un.
Na pa uh Abraham lenote’ pianna Sarah ngaihsun dih un.Bang hang hiam cih lehkhat bek ahih laitakinamah ka sam khia a,amah thupha pia-intampi ka phasak hi.

“Tu-in Zion ka hehnem ding hi.A kisia ama munte khempeuhpuahpha-in,ama gamlakte Eden huansungka bangsak dinga,ama sehnel gamteTopa’ huan ka bangsak ding hi.Ama sungah lungdamna le kipahna,lungdamkohna lelasakna awging om ding hi.
“Ka mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai un.Minamte tungah thu ka hilh a,keima thukham inamaute tungah khuavak tun ding hi.

Manlangin hong pai-inamaute ka hon khia ding hi.Ka gualzawh ding hun hong naita hi.Keimah in minamte ka uk ding hi.Tuipi gei-a gamte inkei hong muang uh a,amaute in keima hotkhiat dinghong ngak uh hi.

Dakto-in vantungte en unla,leitung zong ensuk un.Bang hang hiam cih lehmeikhu bangin vantungte mangthang hi.Puan bangin leitung paatkhia dinga,ama tunga teengte penthokang bangin si ding uh hi.Ahih hangin keima hotkhiatnakip tawntung dinga,keima khahkhiatna bei ngei lo ding hi.
“Thuman a thei, na lungsim sung uhahkeima thu a vom mite aw,ka thu ngai un.Mihingte’ kosiatna kihta kei unla,amaute’ hong simmawhna hanginlungkia kei un.

Bang hang hiam cih lehnget in puan a nektum banginamaute bei mang dinga,lungno in samul puan a pehtum banginamaute mai mang ding uh hi.Ahih hangin keima khahkhiatnaom tawntung dinga,khang tawntunginka hotkhiatna kip ding hi,” a ci hi.
Khanglo in, khanglo in;thakhauh in, Topa aw.Khang sawtpi, hun lui lai-a banginna vangliatna zangin hong huh in.Rahab a satzan gawp pa, gulpi a sunpa,nangmah hi lo na hi hiam?
Tuipi, tuithukpite a keusak,a kihon khia mite’ kantan dingintuithukpite lampi-in a bawlpanangmah hi lo na hi hiam?
Topa’ mi a kithehthangtehong ciahkik dinga,lasakna tawh Zion-ahhong pai ding uh hi.A tawntungin amaute lungdam ding uh a,amaute inlungdamna le kipakna ngahin,dahna le khuisatnanei nawn lo ding uh hi.
Topa in, “Kei, keimah pennote hong hehnem pa ka hi hi.Lopa sangin sauvei a nungta zaw tuan lo,mihing lellelte, bang hanginkihta na hi uh hiam?

Vantungte zalin, lei bulpite a koih,note a hong bawl Topahong mangngilh khintana hi uh hiam?Note susia dingin a kithawi,no a hong nengniamte’ hehna,bang hangin kihta-inlau tawntung na hi uh hiam?Amaute’ hehna in notehong susia zo het lo ding hi.
Thong sunga kikhum mitekikhah baih ding hi.Amaute sauveipi nungta ding uh a,annek tuidawn kitasam lo ding uh hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih lehkei pen tuipi tok gawpintuihualte a hawksak Topa,note’ Pasian ka hi hi.Keima min pen Vanglian Topa ahi hi.
Vantungte zalin lei bulpi ka phut a,Zion kiangah,‘Nang pen keima mi na hi hi.Nang tungah thu kong hilh khin a,ka khut tawh nang ka hong hu hi,’ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
Topa’ khut sung paninama gimpiakna hai a dawn khin,hoina haipi a tawdat dongina dawn khin Jerusalem aw,nangmah kisosuah tawm in.Nangmah kihanthawn tawm inla,dingtangto in.
Na mite khempeuh sung paninnang a hong makaih dingkuamah om lo a,na khoisa tapate khempeuh lak paninna khut a hong len dingkuamah om lo hi.
Nang tungah siatna le maimanna,kialpi le namsau,hih thu nih hong tung zo hi.Kua in nang hong dahpih dingahi hiam?Kua in nang hong hehnem dingahi hiam?
Na mite gim khin a,ngenthang sungah a awk sanang banginlam kiu khempeuh ahamaute lum uh hi.Topa’ hehna, na Pasian’ tainaamaute in a thuak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gimna a thuak,zu ne lopi-in zukham a bang note inhih thu za un.
Ama mite adingin a thumsak Topa,Topa ahi note’ Pasian in hih bangin ci hi:“En un, note’ khut sung paninhoina hai ka la khia khin a,ka hehna haipina dawn nawn kei ding uh hi.

Note kiangah, ‘Na tung uhahkong pai theih nadingunkunsuk un,’ a hong ci,no a hong bawlsiate’ khut sungahtua haipi ka koih ding hi.Note in na nungzang uhleilak bangin bawlin,amaute’ pai nadinginkongzing lampi banginna bawl khin uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zion aw, khanglo in;khanglo inla na tha khauhsak in.Khuapi siangtho Jerusalem aw,na puan hoihte silh in.Bang hang hiam cih lehdawibia mite le a nin mitenang sungah hong pai nawn lo ding hi.
A kimancip Jerusalem mite aw,leivui panin kisingkhia unla dingto un.A kiman Zion mite aw, na ngawng panunhong kihenna khaute sut khia un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in, “Man nei loin note hong kizuak a, sum pia loin note hong kitankhia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Egypt gamah peemta dingin ka mite a masa-in pai uh a, tua banah thu om lopi-in Assiria in amaute nengniam uh hi.
Tu-in Babylon-ah tua bangmahin amaute tungah piang leuleu hi. Thu om lopi-in salin om uh hi. Amau a ukte, kihihsakna tawh awng uh a, sunthapai-in keima min kisimmawh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka mite in keima min hong thei ding uh a, thu a gen pa pen keimah ka hihna tua ni ciangin amaute in hong thei ding uh hi. Keimah, hih lai-ah ka om hi,” a ci hi.
Thuhoih hong puak,kilemna thu a genzak,thuhoih thupha a hong puak,hotkhiatna thu a genzak,Zion tungah, “Na Pasian in uk hi,”ci-in mualte kantaninthu hong gen kamtai pabangzahin hoih ahi hiam?
Ngai un, na galvilte un a aw uh sangsak a,amaute in lungdamin la sa khawm uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehZion-ah Topa hong paikiknaamaute in maitang kituahina mu uh hi.
A kisia Jerusalem munte aw,la sa-in kiko khawm un.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in ama mite hehnemta a,Jerusalem hon khia khinta hi.
Topa in minam khempeuh mai-aha vangliatna siangtho zanginama mite hon khia hi.Leitung mi khempeuh ini Pasian’ hotkhiatna mu ding uh hi.
Kihem un, kihem un.Babylon panin pai khia unla,a nin nate lawng kei un.Topa’ beellekuang a puate aw,khua sung panin pai khia unla,nomau kisiansuah tawm un.
Note’ mai-ah Topa pai dinga,Israel Pasian pen note’ nungahhong cing pa hi ding ahih maninnote galtai-in pai khia loin,a kinawhsa-inna pai khia kei ding uh hi.Topa’ Nasempa’ Thuakna
Topa in, “En un;ka nasem pa a dau pai-in,amah a lianin kikoihin kilaamto dinga,sang mahmah ding hi.
Mi tampite in amah lamdang sa uh hi.Mihing a bang nawn lo zah donginnakpitakin a mai sia a,mihing a sun nawn lo zah dongina mel a sia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah inminam tampite dipkuasak dinga,ama hangin kumpite ina kam uh cih ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tungaha kigen ngei lo nate mu ding uh a,amaute in a zak ngei loh uh natetheitel ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mite in, “I zak thukua in um thei ding ahi hiam?Hih bang thu-ah Topa’ vangliatna khutkua in bangci muh theih ding ahi hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh amah penkungno khat ahi a,lei keu sungah a omsingzung khat bangin ahi zonginama mai-ah khangto lel hi.Eite’ et dingin amah inlim le deihhuaina mel bangmah nei lo a,eite’ deih dingin hoihna nei lo hi.
Amah pen mite in simmawhin nusia a,gimna le natna a thuak ahi hi.Mite in en nuam loina mai uh a humsan uh mipa banginamah kisimmawh a,eite in amah i thusim kei hi.
“Amah in eite’ natna teng thuakin,eite’ gimna teng pua khin taktak hi.Ahi zongin eite in amah penama mawhna hangin Pasian in a gimsak,gimna a thuak bangin i ngaihsun hi.
Ahih hangineite’ khialhna hangin amah kiliamsak a,eite’ mawhna hangin amah kisatnim hi.Ama gim thuakna hangin nopna i ngah a,ama liamna hangin damna i ngah hi.
Eite khempeuh intuu bangin lam i khial khin a,eite khempeuheimau san ciatah i pai khin hi.Topa in eite khempeuh’ mawhnateama tungah a suan hi.
“Amah kinengniamingimna a kithuaksak hanginamah kam khat beek pau lo hi.Sa gote kiangah a kipaipih tuuno lea mulmette mai-ah a kipaipihtuu a ham loh mah banginamah kam khat beek pau lo hi.
Nenniamna le thukhenna tawhamah kipaikhiatpih hi.A hingte’ gam panin amah kikhen khia-in,ama mite’ khialhna hanginamah in gimna thuak hi,ci-in ama khang mitekua in thei ahi hiam?
Amah in mawhna bawl lo,zuaugen ngei lo napi-in,amaute in migilote tawh sihna a kibang,mihaute tawh hankhuk a kibanga bawlsak uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin amah a kisatnim ding penTopa’ deihna ahi hi.Amah in natna thuaksak hi.Mawhna hanginama pumpi a kipiak cianginamah in a suanlekhakte mu dinga,ama khan a sau ding hi.Topa’ deihnaama khut sungah pung ding hi.
Amah in a gimna thamanmu-in a lungdam ding hi.A mawk thuak ahih lohna thei-ina thuman ka nasem pa inmi tampi tak a dik suaksak dinga,amah inamaute’ mawhnate pua ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah penmiliante tawh nate ka hawmsak dinga,amah in mihatte tawhnate a hawm ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh amah insihna dongin a nuntakna pia khia a,khialhna a nei mite tawha kisim khawm hi.Ahih hangin amah inmi tampi’ mawhna pua a,khialhna a neite adingina thumsak hi.

Ta a nei lo, a ciing mi aw,lungdamin la sa in.Nausuak natna a thuak ngei lo mi aw,la sa khia inla, a gingin kiko in!Bang hang hiam cih leha kinusia numei’ tate pena kiteenpih numeite’ tate sangintam zaw ding hi,Topa in ci hi.
Na bukmun khan inla,na tenna puanbukte kizalsak in.Cil bawl kei in.Na khaute sausak inla,na khetphimte khenkip in.
Bang hang hiam cih lehtaklam le veilamah nangmah kizelin,na suanlekhakte inminam dangte’ leitang luah ding uh a,a kinusia khuapitemi tawh dimsak ding uh hi.

Lau kei in,maizumna na thuak kei ding hi.Cihna ding thei loin om kei in;maizumin nang hong kikoih lo ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh na khangno lai-inna zulhtatna le na meigonna hanginhong kikonatena phawkkha nawn kei ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehnangmah hong Bawlpa pennang adingin na pasal bang hi dinga,ama min pen Vanglian Topa ahi hi.Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa pennang hong hon khia pa hi a,amah pen leitung buppi’ Pasiana kici hi.
Khangno lai-a zineih a kima,kinusia-in a dah mahmah zia kisamkik banginTopa in nang hong samkik hi,na Pasian in ci hi.
Tomno sung nang kong nusia pak a,ahih hangin hehpihna lianpi tawhnang kong lakik ding hi.
Hehluatna hangin tomno sungnang kiang panin ka maitang ka seel a,ahih hangin tawntung itna tawhnang kong hehpihkik ding hi,nangmah a hong hon khia Topa in ci hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh hih penkei adinginNoah’ hun mah tawh a kibang hi.Noah tuite leitungah hong pai nawn lo ding,ci-in ka kiciam mah banginnang tungah heh nawn loinnang a hong tai nawn lo dinginka kiciam hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehmual liante kihemin,mual neute a kikhin zonginnang kiang panin ka itna kippai khia ngei lo dinga,na nopsakna dingka thuciamna kin lo ding hi,nang a hong hehpih Topa in ci hi.Jerusalem Khua Thak
“Gimna a thuak, huihpi’ nawk gawp,hehnepna a ngah lo khuapi aw,en in, na suangte,suangvui hoih tawh ka ciang dinga,na bulpitesuangmanpha tawh ka hih ding hi.
Na khumdawnte suangmanpha tawh,na kulhkongpite suangsan tawh,na kulh khempeuha manpha suang tawh ka bawl ding hi.
“Topa in na tapate khempeuhhoihtakin hilh dinga,na tapate daupai mahmah ding uh hi.
Thuman le thutang innang hong thahatsak ding hi.Nenniamna tawh na kigamla dinga,nang na lau kei ding hi.Kihtakna tawh na kigamla dinga,nangma nai-ah tuate hong pai lo ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh innote tawh kidona a piansak lehtua pen keima kiang pan hi lo hi.Note tawh kidona a piangsak peuhmahnote’ hangin puk ding uh hi.
“En un, pum zapinama kizatna ding ciatin a seek dinginhiam a bawl sikseekpaka piangsak khin hi.A susia dingin a susia gawp thei pa zongka piangsak khin hi.

Nangmah do nadingina kibawl hiam peuhmahmaavang lo dinga,thukhenna sungahna langah a pang mi khempeuhna nial gawp zo ding hi.Hih thu penTopa’ nasemte’ gamhluah lekeima kiang panin amaute’ diknaa kilahna ahi hi,Topa in ci hi,” a ci hi.
A dangtak mi peuhmahtui phualah hong pai un.An nei lote aw, hong pai unla hong ne un!Hong pai un; a man dingbangmah piak kul loinleenggahzu le bawngnawina duh zahzah uh hong ne un.

An ahi lo nate lei nadinginbang hangin na sum uh zang a,hong gilvahsak thei lo nate ngah nadinginbang hangin na sem na hi uh hiam?Keima thu limtakin ngai-ina limci an ne unla,anlimte ah nuamsa-in om un.
Ka mite aw, ka thu ngai unla,kei kiangah hong pai un.Na nuntak theih nadinguna thu hong za un.David ka it mah banginkeima itna kip, tawntung thuciamnanote tawh ka bawl ding hi.
David pen mite tungah teci ding,mite a makai ding lea ukpa dingin ka koih hi.

Tu-in note in na theih ngei loh uhminam dangte na sam ding uh a,amah in notehong minthangsak zo ahih manin,Topa note’ Pasian,Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa’ hanginnote hong thei lo minamtenote kiangah hong tai ding uh hi.
A kimuh thei hun lai-in Topa zong unlaamah a nai om lai-in thu ngen un.
Migilo in ama gitlohna nusia henla,thuman lo mi inama ngaihsutna nusia hen.Amah in a hehpih theih nadinginTopa eite’ Pasian’ kiangahamah paisak un.Bang hang hiam cih leha mawhna maisiangsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehkeima ngaihsutnatenomau’ ngaihsutna bang hi lo a,keima paiziate nomau’ paizia bang hi lo hi,Topa in ci hi.
Vantung pen leitung sangina san zawk mah bangin,keima paiziate zong,nomau paizia sangin sang zaw a,ka ngaihsutnate zong,nomau ngaihsutna sangina sang zaw ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung paninguahtui le vuk hong pai-in,amaute ciahkik loin leitung kawtsakin,kungnote mengin selkhiasak a,khai vawhpa khaici pia-ina ne pa tungah an a piak mah bangin,
keima kam panin a pai khiaka thu zong tua mah bang ding hi.A hawmpi-in kei kiangahhong tungkik lo dinga,keima ngimnasa bangin tangtung sakin,amah ka sawlna thu tangtun ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehBabylon panin lungdamna tawhna pai khia ding uh a,nopsakna tawhhong kipaikhiatpih ding hi.Note mai-a mual liante lemual neute in la sa-in awng ding uh a,gam sunga sing khempeuh ina khut uh beeng ding uh hi.
Ling tangin tak kung hong po dinga,lingkung tangin mui kung hong po ding hi.Tua pen Topa’ nasepnaphawk tawntungna,a kila khia ngei lo ding, a tawntungin a omlim khat hi ding hi, a ci hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“A sawt loinnote ka hong hon khia dinga,hong khah khia ding ka hih maninthutang thumanin gamta un.
Hih banga a gamta mite,hih thu a lenkip mihingte,Sabbath tangin a siasak lote,siatna bawlna ding paninhoihtakin a kikemte,thupha ngah mi ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Topa pawlin a beel gamdang mipa in,“Topa in ama mite kiang paninkei hong khen khia taktak ding hi,”ci kei hen. A kiget mipa in, “En un,kei pen Pasian’ mite lakaha kihel thei ding ka hi kei hi,”ci kei hen.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in hih bangin ci hi:“Keima Sabbath nite tangin,kei hong lungdamsak thei nate teel a,ka thuciamna a lenkipa kiget mite tungah
ka inn sung le ka huang sungahtanu le tapate sangin a hoih zawphawkna le min ka pia dinga,a mang ngei nawn lo dinga kip tawntung minamaute tungah ka pia ding hi.
“Ama na a sem ding, Topa’ min a it ding,ama nasem a suak dingin Topa pawlinamah a beel gamdang mite,Sabbath ni tangin a siasak lo,ka thuciamna hoihtakina lenkip mi peuhmah,

ka mual siangtho-ah paipihinkeima thungetna inn sungahka lungdamsak dinga,amaute’ meihal biakna lea biakpiaknate uhka biakna tau tungah kisang ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh ka inn penmi khempeuh adinginthungetna inn kici ding hi.
Israel a kikhenthangtea kaikhawm Topa Pasian in,a kikaikhawmsa mite banahmidangte keima kiangahka kaikhawm lai ding hi, ci hi,”a ci hi.Israel-te’ Milim Biak Mawhsakna
Lo sungah a om ganhing khempeuhte,gamlakah a om ganhing khempeuhte aw,a netum dingin hong pai un.

Amau’ galvilte a mit uh taw a,amaute khempeuh inbangmah thei lo uh hi.Amaute khempeuh ui ham thei loinncing tawh kibang uh a,amaute in tawng thei lo uh hi.Mot paupau, lumlum,lu susu in om ding bek nuam a sa uh hi.
Uite in nakpitakin duh uh a,kham hun cih nei ngei lo uh hi.Tuucingte in zong thutheihna nei lo uh hi.Amaute khempeuhamau tum ciatin gamta uh a,a vekpi-un amau’ phattuamna ding beka zong ciat uh hi.
Amaute in, “Hong pai un,leenggahzu nene ni;khamtheihzu dawndawn ni.Zing ciangin zong tuni sanginnuam zaw lai ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Thuman mipa si a,kuamah in tua thungaihsutin nei nawn lo hi.Kuamah in a theih loh kalinthutak mite si uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehtuahsiatna paninthuman mipa kila khia a,nopsakna sungah amah tum hi.
Thutangin a gamta mite ina sihna uhah nopna ngahin tawlnga uh hi.
No, aisan numeite’ tapate,numei tawh a mawh mite lenumei pangtatte’ tuletate aw,hih lai-ah hong pai un.

Note in kua mawlpihgawpgawp na hi uh hiam?Kua’ tungah na kam uh ka beba-inna leii uh phen na hi uh hiam?Tawsaw kung laksingkung hing khempeuh nuai-ahpasian biakna-in nulepa mawhna a bawl,kuamsung, suanghawm sungahna tate uh a that note penkhialhna tate, zuauna’ tuletatehi lo na hi uh hiam?
Kuam sunga om suangmaite na la uh a,tua suangmaite na bia uh hi.Tuate tungah tui tawh biakpiakna sungin,an tawh biakpiakna na paipih uh hi.Hih thute’ hanginkei lungdam ding ka hi hiam?
A lian a sang mual tungahnulepa mawhna na bawl uh a,tua munah biakna pia dinginna paito uh hi.

Kongkhak le kongkhakmung nungahnangmah in na milimte na suang hi.Nangmah in kei hong nusia-inna puante na suah a,nang hong luppih dingin na cial mite tawhna lupna zai deda tungah kahto-in,tua lai-ah na hukna tengna kamsak hi.
Molek pasian kiangah a pai dinginsathau tawh khual na zin a,na paknamtuite tawhna siam tawpin na kipuah hi.Nang in gamlapi-ah na tangmite na sawl a,Leinuai dong nangawnah na paisak hi.
A gamla na khualzinna hanginnang na gim mahmah a,ahih hangin nangmah in,“Lametna om kei,” na ci kei hi.
Nang zuautatinkei na hong phawk kei hi.Kei na hong ngaihsut loh nadinga piangsak zah dinginhih pasian-tebang hi leltak ahi hiam?Sauveipi sung pau loinka om hithiat maninkei hong zahtak lo na hi hiam?
Nangma gamtatnaa manin na ngaihsunkha hi.Ahih hangin na gamtatnateka pholak dinga,na milimte innang hong huh zo lo ding hi.

Nang cimawhin na kiko cianginna milim kaihkhopte kihonsak in!Huih in amaute mut khia-in,husanna in amaute seem khia ding hi.Ahih hangin kei hong beel mi inleitang ngah dinga,ka mual siangtho a luah ding hi.Pasian’ Huhna le Damsakna
“Zik un, zik un, lampi bawl un;ka mite’ lampi a dongkhak thei dingna khempeuh la khia un,”kici ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a sang, a lian,a nungta tawntung Pa,ama min Siangtho ahipa inhih bangin ci hi:“Kei pen a sangna mun lea siangtho munah ka om a,a kiniamkhiat mite’ lungsim lea kisik mite’ lungsima thakhauhsakkik dinginkisikna le kiniamkhiatna lungsima neite tawh zong kei ka omkhawm hi.
Ka mite tungah nuntakna ka pia hi.Amaute ka mawhsak paisuak kei dinga,amaute tungahka heh tawntung kei ding hi.
Amau’ huaiham-mawhna hanginka heh mahmah a,ka hehna lungsim tawhamaute gim pia-in ka nusia hi.Ahih hanginamaute a lungsim uh khauhin,a gamtat ngei bangungamta lai veve uh hi.
“Amau’ mawh gamtatnatea vekin ka mu khin a,ahih hangin amauteka damsak ding hi.Amaute makaihin ka hehnem dinga,a dah a kapte hehneminka lungdamsak ding hi.
Nopsakna, nopsakna,a gamla le a naimi khempeuh tungah om tahen.Keimah in amaute ka damsak ding hi,Topa in ci hi.
Ahih hangin migilote pena kilok tui tawh kibang uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehtuipi khawlcip thei lo a,a tuite in buan le ninte laamto uh hi.
Migilote adingin nopsakna om lo hi,”ka Pasian in a ci hi.Re
Na aw siit hetloinnakpitakin kiko inla,peengkul aw bangingingsak in.Ka mihingte tungahamau’ khialhnate gen inla,Jakob innkuan tungahamau’ mawhnate gen in.

Amaute pen, thumanin a gamta,amau’ Pasian’ biakna ngeina kiptea nusia lo minam bang keekinnisimin amaute in kei hong zong uh a,keima lampi a thei nuam uh hi.Amaute in keima kiang paninthukhenna man hong ngen uh a,Pasian’ kiang hong nai nuam uh hi.

“Kote in an tang napi-in bang hanginkote hong phawk lo na hi hiam?Kote kiniamkhiatin om napi-inbang hangin kotehong thei kha lo na hi hiam?”hong ci uh hi.Note in an na tan uh cianginnomau’ deihna na zong uh a,na nasemte uh na nengniam uh hi.
Note in a kitawng ding,a kilaii ding, gitloh gamtatin,khuttum tawh a kitum ding bekinan na tang uh hi.Hih bang lelin antanna tawhna thungetna uhhong kingai ding ahi hiam?

Maugua kun bangin na lu uh kunsukin,puanhampi le vut tungah lumin,nomau na kigimsak tawmnate uhkei’ deih antanna nam sa na hi uh hiam?Hih bang hihna pen antanna man leTopa’ santheih pawl hi,ci ding na hi uh hiam?
Kei’ deih antanna hih bang pawl ahi hi:Gitlohna khaute phelin,hakkol savun khaute phel a,a kinengniam mite khahkhia-inthuman lohna hakkol khempeuhsuktan ding ahi hi.
Na an uh a gilkialte tawh nekhawm unla,inn nei lo a zawngtena inn sung uhah paipihin,tangguakin a om mite puan silhsakin,na mipihte uh kiang paninbu lo ding hi lo na hi uh hiam?

Tua ciangin ka maipha penphalvaktung hong bang dinga,note’ tungah hong taang khia ding hi.Manlang takin na liammate uhhong dam ding hi.Note hong ompih tawntunginnote kong hon dinga,na nung na mai uhahka hong dal ding hi.
Tua ciangin nong thungetna uhkong pia dinga,nong sap uh cianginkong dawng ding hi.Mi bawlsiatnate khawlin,mi simmawhna lekam gilo na paunate uhna khawl uh a,
gilkial mite an pia-in,kisapna a nei mite tungaha kisapnate na piak uhlehna kimkot uha khuamial penkhuavak hong suak dinga,na lungzinna uhnitaang hong bang ding hi.
Tua ciangin notelam kong lak tawntung dinga,na hoihte tawhkong lungkimsak ding hi.A cidam a thahatinkong omsak ding hi.Tui tampi a ngah tawntung huan,a kang ngei lo ciktui tawhna kibang ding uh hi.

Tanglai-in a kisia na munte uhna lamkik ding uh a,khang tampi sung a kisia bulpitena dingtosakkik ding uh hi.Note pen a sia a puahkik,ten nadingin mun siatea ngei a bangsakkiktehong kici ding hi.Sabbath Tanna

Note in Sabbath siangtho sakin,keima ni siangtho ni-inna nasepna panun khawlinSabbath ni pen deihhuai sa-in,Topa’ ni siangtho penpahtawihuai na cih uh a,note in pahtawi-innote’ deih bang zui loin,note’ ut bang hi loinmotpau loin na om uhleh,

keimah biakna hanginlungdamna na ngah ding uh a,leitung khempeuh ahpahtawina kong ngahsak ding hi.Na pu uh Jakob tungah ka piak leitangluahin nuam na sa ding uh hi.Topa ahi keimah inhih thu ka gen khin hi, a ci hi.
A hon khia zo lo dinginTopa zawngkhal lo a,khua a za thei lo dingina bil ngong lo hi.
Ahih hangin note’ mawhnate innote le na Pasian uh kikhennahong piangsak a,amah in note’ awhong zak theih loh nadinginna khialhnate un ama maitang liah hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehna khutte uh mi thahna sisan tawh nin a,na khutmete uh mawhna tawh a nin hi.Na mukte un zuauthu gen a,na leiite un gitlohna thu a gen hi.
Kuamah in thutang tawhthu na nei kei uh a,thuman tak tawh thukhen zumahna pai kei uh hi.Note in bangmah lopisuanin nei-in zuauthu na gen uh a,siatna ding thu ngaihsuninbuaina na piangsak uh hi.
Na ngaihsutnate uhgul gunei tui bangin gu a nei hi a,na vaihawmnate uhmaimom khau puan tawh kibang lel hi.Gul gunei tui khat sukham lehangadang khat hong tui zel hi.
Na maimom khau puante uhkizang thei lo dinga,kuamah in silh lo ding uh hi.Na vaihawmnate uhtua maimom khau puan bangina mawkna suak lel ding hi.
Siatna bekbek na geelgeel uh a,na sepkhiat ding uhna ngaklah mahmah uh hi.Mawhnei lo mite thah dinghaksa na sa kei uh hi.Na paina khempeuh uhahsiatna vive om kawikawi hi.
Note’ omna peuhahkuamah lungmuang thei lo a,note’ sepna khempeuh ahthuman khat beek om lo hi.Na lungsim uh kawi mahmah a,hong zuikha mite inthunuam mu ngei lo uh hi.
Tua ahih cianginei a hong gimsakte kiang paninPasian in a hong hotkhiat lohnaa hang i thei hi.Eite in a nuam ding i lamen a,ahi zongin lungzinna bekbek i tuak hi.
Mittaw bangin kawm i zawt a,mit nei lote bangin i mai hi.Suntang laipi mahinkhuamial lak bangin i tuk a,a hat mite lakah misi tawh i kibang hi.
Eite khempeuhvompi bangin i humham a,vakhu bangin i thumthum hi.Eite in thutang i zong a,ahi zongin khat zong i mu kei hi.Hong hotkhiat ding i ngen a,ahi zongin bangmah hong piang lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma tungahkote’ thupalsatna tampi tak pha a,ka mawhnate unkote’ langah teci hong pang hi.Kote’ thupalsatnate,ka mawhnate uh ka thei uh hi.
Nangmah hong lehdo-innang kong nial uh a,na thu kong zui kei uh hi.Midangte nengniaminnang kong lehdo uh hi.Ka ngaihsutnate uh khial a,ka thugente uh zuauthu vive ahi hi.
Thutang kihawl khia a,thuman in hong naih thei lo hi.Mihonpite’ kikhopna munahthuman kizang lo a, thutang tum thei lo hi.
Thuman om lo lua ahih maninsiatna a pelh mipa penmihai-in kingaihsun zawsop hi. Topa in hih thu mu a,thutang om lo ahih maninamah lungkim lo hi.
Amah in nenniamna a thuakte a huh dingmi khat beek a om lohna a mu hi.Tua ahih cianginamaute a hon khia ding lea gualzawh nadinginama vangliatna a zang ding hi.

Amah in thumanna penawmdal lum bangin silh dinga,gualzawhna pensik lukhu bangin khu ding hi.Na khempeuh a manin bawlkik nopna,gimna a piangsakte gim pia-inthukkik nopna lungsimpuan bangin a silh ding hi.
Amau’ gamtatna banginamah in thukkik dinga,amah a langpangte gim pia ding hi.Ama galte a thukkik ding hi.A gamla pekah a omtuipi gei-a gamte zonga thukkik ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nisuahna lenitumna kikalah a ommi khempeuh in amah zahtakin,a vangliatna kihta ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh huihpi nung bang,tuipi khang banginamah hong pai ding hi.
Topa in ama mite tungah,“Note a hong hu dinginJerusalem-ah kong pai dinga,mawhna panin a kihei khia mi peuhmahka hong hon khia ding hi.

“Note tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl hi: Keima vangliatna tawh keima thukhamte le ka thuhilhnate note tungah kong pia khin a, tu a kipanin a tawntungin note in tua thute zui-in na suanlekhakte uh na hilh ding uh a, a khang khangin na maimangsak kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jerusalem khuapi aw,tho-in sun nitaang bang in!Topa’ minthanna innangmah hong taan zo hi.
Minam dangtekhuamial in tuamcip dinga,ahi zongin nangma tungahTopa’ khuavak hong taang ding hi.Ama minthanna innang hong ompih ding hi.
Nangma khuavak sungahminam dangte hong pai ding uh a,nangma taan khiatna sungahkumpite hong pai ding uh hi.
Na kimkotah khuadak inla mu in.Na mite kikaikhawminnang kiangah a ciah dinginhong pai uh hi.Na tapate gamlapi paninhong ciah ding uh a,na tanute naungek banginhong kipua ding hi.

Tua ciangin nangmah in mu-inna maitai dinga,na lungsim liingin na lungdam ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehtuipi tawnin nangma kiangahvan hong kipuak dinga,minamte’ hauhna khempeuhnangma kiangah hong tung ding hi.

Midian mite le Efah mite’ kalaoh note,kalaoh honpite innang hong tuam ding uh a,Sheba gam sunga om khempeuhhong pai ding uh hi.Amaute in kham le paknamtuihong paipih ding uh a,Topa phatna a taangko ding uh hi.

Kedar gam tuuhonte khempeuhnang kiangah hong kipua dinga,Nebaioth mite’ tuutaltenangma deih nana-ah kizang ding hi.Ka biakna tau tungah piak dingintuate hong kipaipih dinga,keimah in a minthang ka biakinnka minthangsak semsem ding hi.
Meiipi leeng banginhong pai henhan hih teembawte,vakhute a bukah a leeng bangina hong leeng henhante kuate ahi hiam?

Hih teembawte pen tuipi gei le tuikulh-aha om teembawte hi a,Tarshish teembaw lianpite inhong makaih hi.Topa in nangmah a minthang mahmahinhong bawlkhin ahih maningamlapi panin tua teembawte innangma mite hong puak uh a,a ngun a khamte uh tawhhong puakkhawm uh hi.Topa, na Pasian, Israel-te’ Siangtho Paa pahtawina-in a hong puak uh ahi hi.

Gamdang mite inna kulhte ciangkik ding uh a,amau’ kumpite innangma na hong sem ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehka hehna tawh nang kong vat gawp khin a,ahih hangin tu-in keima maipha tawhnang tungahhehpihna kong nei khin hi.
Kigual deudau-in a hong paina uhaha kumpite uh hong makai-in,mite in minamte’ hauhnana kiang hong tuttheih nadinginna kulhkongpite kihong tawntung dinga,a sun a zanin kikhak ngei lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehnangma na hong sem lo minam lekumpi gam bei mang dinga,tua minamtekisia-mai mang ding hi.
Keima biakinn muna mel a hoihsak dinginLebanon mual minthanna ahitaaksan sing, hiangpa sing le taksingtena kiangah hong tung dinga,keima khengakna munka minthangsak ding hi.

Nang hong nengniamte’ tatena mai-ah a kunsa-in hong pai ding uh a,nang hong simmawh mi khempeuhna khe mai-ah hong bok ding uh hi.Amaute in nang pen Topa’ khuapi,Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa’ Zion,hong ci ding uh hi.
Hong kinusia, hong kimudah,kuama hong nawk loh nang pena tawntungin lianin,khang khat pan khang khatlungdamna ahi dinginkong bawl ding hi.

Nupi khat in a ta nawi pia-inlimtakin a kep bangin,minamte le kumpite innang hong vakin hong kem ding uh hi.Tua ciangin kei pen Topa,nangmah a hong Honpa,nangmah a hong Tankhiapa,Jakob’ Vanglian Pa ka hihnana thei ding hi.

Sumngo tangin kham kong puak dinga,sik tangin ngun kong paipih ding hi.Sing tangin sumngo,suang tangin sik kong puak ding hi.Nuam na sak nadinginna mang liante uh bawlinna nasem ukte uh thuman thutang tawhna ka semsak ding hi.
Na gam sungah ngongtatna thukiza nawn lo dinga,na gam sungah siatmaina lesuksiatna om nawn lo ding hi.Nangmah in na kulhte pen Hotkhiatna,na kulhkongpite pen Phatna,na ci ding hi.
Sun hunin ni pennangma khuavak hi lo dinga,zan hunin kha penna khuavak hi nawn lo ding hi.Topa pen a tawntungnangma khuavak hi dinga,na Pasian pen na minthanna hi ding hi.
Na ni tum nawn lo dinga,na kha zong tumkik nawn lo ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa pennangma khuavak hi tawntung dinga,na thumna hunte beita ding hi.
Na mihingte khempeuhthuman ding uh hi.Keima min a than nadinginkeima suansa kung,ka khut tawh ka sepsa gam penamaute in nei paisuak ding uh hi.
A ngek pen mipa minam khat suak dinga,a neu pente milianpi suak ding hi.Kei pen Topa ka hi hi.A hun a tun cianginkeimah in thakhatinhih thu ka tungsak ding hi.

Gimna a thuak mite tungahthuhoih a puak dinginTopa in kei hong teelinhong sawl ahih maninkeima sungahTopa Pasian’ kha hong om hi.Lungsim kitamzante a damsak ding,salin a kimante tungahsuahtakna thu a gen ding,a kikhum mite adinginthong kong a hong ding,
Topa in a mite hon khia-in,a galte a guallelhsak ding huna tunna thu a gen ding,a thum mi khempeuh a hehnem ding,

amaute pen a thuman mite kici-in,amah a kiminthansak theih nadinginTopa in a mite kem hi,a kicihtheih nadinginZion-ah a om a dah mitea lungdamna ding,a lungkham mite inphatna la a saktheih nading,a lunggim mite inPasian a phattheih nadinginamah in kei hong sawl zo hi.
Amaute in tanglai-a a siasate,lamphakik ding uh a,a kisia-maisate ding kiksak ding uh hi.Amaute in khang tampi sunga kisia-maisa khuapitepuahkik ding uh hi.
Gamdang mite inna tuuhonte uh hong kepsak dinga,khualmite pen note’ lo kho leleenggui puahte hi ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin note penTopa’ siampite hong kici dinga,mihingte in note pen i Pasian’ nasemte,ci-in hong gen ding uh hi.Minamte’ hauhna tengnote in na ne ding uh a,amau’ hauhna teng note inna kisaktheihpih ding uh hi.

Note’ maizumna tanginnopsakna a zah nihin na ngah ding uh a,note’ mindaina tangin no’ ngahna sungahna lungdam ding uh hi.Tua ahih ciangin na gam sung uhaha zah nih na luah ding uh hi.Note-a’ pentawntung lungdamna hi ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehkeimah Topa in thutang deihin,mi’ nate suhna lekhialhna ka mudah hi.Amaute tungah amau’ thamanthuman takin ka pia dinga,tawntung thuciamnaamaute tawh ka bawl ding hi.
Amau’ suanlekhakte penminamte lakah kithei dinga,amau’ tuletate penmite laizangah kithei ding hi.Amaute pen Topa in thupha a piak mite hi,ci-in a mu mi khempeuhte inthei-in sang ding uh hi.

Topa’ hanginnakpitakin ka lungdam dinga,ka Pasian’ hanginkipakin ka diang ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehzipi pa puanhoih tawh kizemin,mothak nu a suangmanphate tawha kizep mah banginamah in hotkhiatna puankei hong silhsakin,thumanna puanpi tawhkei hong tuam khin hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehleitung in a dawn meengsakin,huan in a kituhte a posak mah banginTopa Pasian inminam khempeuh mai-ahthumanna le phatna a po khiasak hi.

Zion a kihotkhiatna thukhuavak bangina taankhiat mateng,ama gualzawhna thumeivak kuang bangina taankhiat matengin,Zion ka ngaihsutna-ingamdai takin ka om mawk kei dinga,Jerusalem ka ngaihsutna-inka khawl mawk kei ding hi.
Minamte in na gualzawhna mu ding uh a,kumpi khempeuh inna minthanna mu ding uh hi.Topa in nang a hong phuahmin thak tawh nang hong kisam ding hi.
Nang pen Topa adinginhotkhiatna lukhu,na Pasian adinginkumpi lukhu tawh na kibang ding hi.

Nang pen a kinusia,hong kici nawn lo dinga,na leitang pen Gamkhing,kici nawn lo ding hi.Nang pen ama tungah ka lungkimna om,hong kici dinga,na leitang pen a Kiteenpih,kici ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehnang tungah Topa lungkim a,na leitang pena kiteenpih zi tawh kibang ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tangval innungak khat a teenpih mah banginnang hong lam pa innang hong teenpih dinga,zipi pa mothak nu tungaha lungdam mah banginnang tungah na Pasianlungdam ding hi.

Jerusalem aw, na kulhte tungahgalvilte ka koih khin a,sun tawntung le zan tawntunginamaute gamdai ngei lo ding uh hi.Amaute in a thuciamnaTopa phawksak ding uh a,amah in Jerusalem kipsakinleitung mite’ phat dingina bawlkik matenginamaute khawl lo ding uh hi.
Topa in limtakinthuciamna bawl khinzo a,a vangliatna tawh tungsak ding hi.“Na galte’ an dingin na anteka piakik nawn kei dinga,nangma sepsa leenggahzugamdang mite in dawn nawn lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin an a kholte in ne-inTopa na phat ding uh a,a kaikhawmte inkeima biakinn huang sungaha dawn ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Jerusalem mite aw,kulhkongpite panin pai khia unlaa hong ciahkik na mipihte uh adinginlam bawl khol un.Lam zik un; lam lianpi zikinsuangtumte pai khia unla,mite’ muh dingin lim khat khaito un.
Leimong dongah Topa taangko khin hi.Jerusalem mite tungah,“En un, no hong hon khia pa hong pai hi.Ama sep thaman a mite hong pua a,a gualzawhna thamana mite hong masuan hi,” ci un.
Amaute pen A Siangtho Mi,Topa’ Hotkhiatte kici dinga,nang pen A kizong khia,a kinusia lo khuapi, hong kici ding hi.

Edom gam, Bozrah khua paninpuan ausan silhin a hong pai,a puansilhna-ah minthanna mel nei-in,ama thahatna tawha hong pai pa kua ahi hiam?A hon khia zo dingin hatna a nei,gualzawhna thu a zasak dingina hong pai pa penTopa ahi keimah ka hi hi.
Bang hangin na puan san a,na puansilhte, leenggah cilna-ahleenggah a cil pa’ puan tawhkibang ahi hiam?

Mite lak paninkuamah in kei hong huh lo a,keimah guak in leenggah cil banginminam dangte ka cil hi.Sinsona tawh amaute ka cil a,hehna tawh amaute ka tuancil hi.Ka puan tungahamaute’ si hong kitheh gawp a,ka puan khempeuh tungahsisan hong baang khin hi.
Ka mite ka hotkhiat ding hunta ka sa a,a galte uh gimpiak ding a hun hita hi,ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Hong huh ding mi ka zong a,ahi zongin kuamah om lo hi.Kei a hong huh dinga om loh ciangin lamdang ka sa hi.Ahi zongin ka hehna inhong thahatsak a,kei mahmah thahatna tawhka gualzo hi.
Ka sinsona tawh minam dangte cilin,ka hehna hanginamaute zukham ka bangsak a,amaute’ sisanleilakah ka thehthang hi.Israel’ tungah Topa’ Hoihna

Topa’ itna kip, Topa phatnate,Topa in eite tungaha hong piak khempeuh tawh a kizui leh,ama hehpihna le a lianpiama itna kip tawh a kizui-inamaute tunga a piak,Israel innkuan tungahama hoihna lianpite ka gengen ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in,“Amaute pen keima mi taktak hi a,amaute inkei hong khem lo ding hi,” a ci hi.Tua ahih manin a lungkhamna panunamaute a hon khia hi.
Vantung mite’ hotkhiat hi loin,Topa mahmah in amaute hon khia hi.A itna le a hehpihna tawhamaute hon khia a,amah in a beisa hun khempeuh ahamaute hoihtakin a kem hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in lehdo uh a,ama kha siangtho a dahsak uh hi.Tua ahih ciangin amah penamaute’ gal suak a,a mahmah in amaute a do hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in hun lui lai,ama nasem Moses’ hun a phawk uh hi.Ama mi a makaite hon khia-in,tuipi sung panin a pai khiatpih Topakoi-ah omta ahi hiam?Amaute’ tungahama kha a piapa,
Moses tungtawnina vangliatna zangin na lianpipi a sempa,ama mite’ mai-ah tuite khenkhamin,a minthan tawntung nadinginhih bang nate a sempa,tu-in koi-ah omta ahi hiam, ci uh hi.
Topa in tuithuk kantaninamaute a paipih cianginleilak a sakol pai banginkip mahmah uh a, amaute puk lo uh hi.
Lonona kuamsunga zuan suk bawngte banginTopa in amaute tawldamna a pia hi.Tua bangin Topa ina mite lamlak ahih maninama min thang tawntung hi.Hehpihna le Huhna Ngetna
A siangtho, a minthang,nangma omna vantung paninhong ensuk inla hong mu in.Nangma deihsakna le na vangliatnakoi-ah omta ahi hiam?Na lungsim’ deihna lenangma hehpihnakote adingin maimangta hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh,Abraham in kote hong huh loin,Israel in kote hong phawk loh hanginnang pen kote’ Pa na hi hi.Topa aw, nang pen kote’ Pa na hi a,nangmah in tanglai pek pankote a hong hon khia pa na hi hi.
Topa aw, kote in nangkong kihtak loh theih nadingunbang hangin na lampi paninkote hong pialsakinka lungsim uh khauhsak na hi hiam?Nangma nasemte, nangma luah minamtena ngaihsutna-in hong kiheikik in.
Nangma mi siangthote intawlkhat sung bek na biakinn nei a,ko hong langpangte intua na biakinn pen tuancil gawp khinta hi.
Kote pen nangmah incikmahin na uk ngei loh mite,nangma mi ahi ngei lo mite tawha kibang ka suakkhin uh hi.

Nangma langte tungahna min na theihsakna ding lenangma omna-ahminamte lau-in a lin nadinginmei in selkeu kuangsakinmei in tui a sosak banginnangma mai-ah mualte a lin nadinginbang hangin na vangliatna tawhvantung balkekinhong paisuk lo na hi hiam?
Kote’ lamet lohpi-in nang hong pai-ina lauhuai nate na bawl ngei a,na mai-ah mualte a liing hi.
Amah a ngakte adingin na a sempa’ thutanglai pek panin kuamah in thei ngei lo,kuama bil in za ngei lo a,kuama mit innang sim loh Pasian dang mu ngei lo uh hi.

Thuman nasep lungdam takin a semte,nangma deih bangin a nungtate,nangmah in na limbawl hi.Kote tungah nang na heh a,ahi zongin kote ka khial lai veve uh hi.Tanglai pek a kipaninka mawh ngitnget uh hi.A tua bangpi mahinkote hong kihon ding ahi hiam?
Kote khempeuhmawhnei mi ka hi khin uh a,ka gamtat hoih khempeuh uh zongpuannin tawh kibang lai veve hi.Kote khempeuhsingteh bangin ka vul uh a,ka mawhna hangunhuih letkhiat nahthel keu ka bang uh hi.
Tua ahih cianginnangmah a hong pom dingin a hanciam tawm,nangma min a lo kuamah om lo hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh kote kiang paninnang in na maitang na seel a,mawhna khut sungahkote na hong pia hi.
Ahi zongin Topa aw,nang pen kote’ Pa na hi hi.Kote pen tungman bang hi-in,nang pen beelseek pa bang na hi a,kote khempeuhnangma bawl mite ka hi uh hi.
Topa aw, nakpitakin sinso kei inla,mawhna ciamtehteh kei in.Kote khempeuh nangma mi ka hihna uhhong ngaihsun in.
Nangma khuapi siangthotegamlak suak khinta a,Zion zong gamlakpi suak a,Jerusalem khua gamkhing a suak hi.
Kote’ inn a siangtho le a hoihte,ka pate un nangmah hong phatna muntemei in kaang khin a,kote’ mun nuam khempeuha sia suak khinta hi.
Topa aw, hih thute-ahnangmah ki-ipcip niloh ding na hi hiam?Nang daitakin om dide-innakpitakin kotehong gimsak ding na hi hiam?

Keima mite’ thungetnaa pia dingina baihsa-in kei om napi-in,amaute in hong ngen lo uh hi.Amaute’ muh dingin kei om napi-in,amaute in hong zong beek lo uh hi.Minamte tungah, “Hih lai-ah om ing,hih lai-ah om ing,” ci-ina dawng pah dingin kiging napi-in,amaute in kei tungahthu hong ngen lo uh hi.
A hoih loin gamta-in,amau’ deih bang a zui teitei mite,
ka maitangah a tawntunginkei hong hehsak denin,biakna huan sungah biakpiakna bawlindawibiakna tau tungahpaknamtui a hal mite,
han sungah tu-in, mun simthamah zaninmisite thu a dong mite,voksa ne-in amau’ beel sungahdawibiakna sa mehtui a koih mite,

“Note kiang panin kotehong kituamkoih ahih maninkihem khia unla,ko kiangah hong pai kei un,”ci-in midangte tungah a gen mite -hih bang mite khempeuh a sang dingina beisa hun sungahka kiging tawntung hi.Hih bang miteka thuakzo nawn kei hi.Amaute tungah ka hehna pena mit ngei lo meikuang tawh kibang hi.

Tu-in amaute gimpiak dingka khentat khin a,amaute’ thuak dingtelai sungah kiciamteh khin hi.Amau’ mawhnateka mawk koih kei dinga,amau’ mawhna lea pu a pate uh mawhnateka thukkik ding hi.Amaute in mual liante tungahpaknamtui halin,mual neute tungahhong simmawh uh ahih maninamau’ gamtatna tawh kizui-inka thuk ding hi, ci hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Leenggahzu pen leenggah bom paninkingah a, mite in, ‘Tuatekimang thei ding ahih cianginsusia kei un,’ a cih mah bangunkei zong a minam bupun susia loin,keima na hong semteka suaktasak ding hi.
Jakob sung paninJudah minamte thupha ka pia dinga,amau’ suanlekhakte inmual tung gam a luah ding uh hi.Keima na hong sem, keima teel mite,tua gamah teeng ding uh hi.
Amaute in kei hong bia ding uh a,Sharon gam pen amau’ tuuhongamtatna mun suaksak ding uh a,Akhor Kuam penamau’ bawng honte’ lupna muna suaksak ding uh hi.
“Ahih hangin kei a hong nusia,ka mual siangtho a mangngilh,Gad pasian adingin sabuai phahin,Meni pasian adingin zu helsahai sungah a dim note pen,

namsau tawh a si dinginka hong seh dinga,hong that dingte’ mai-ahna ngawng uh na dawh ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh kong sap cianginnote in nong dawng kei uh a,thu ka gen ciangin nong ngai kei uh hi.Keima thu man loh ding mahna ut zaw uh a, a sia na gamta uh hi.

Tua ahih manin Topa Pasian inhih bangin ci hi:En un, ka nasemte in ne ding uh a,ahih hangin note na gilkial ding uh hi.Ka nasemte in dawn ding uh a,ahih hangin note na dangtak ding uh hi.Ka nasemte lungdam ding uh a,ahih hangin note na maizum ding uh hi.
Ka nasemte inlungdamin la sa ding uh a,note in lungsim na sa-in kiko-in,lungsim gimna hangin na tau ding uh hi.
Keima teel mite insamsiatna-in na min uh zang ding uh a,Topa Pasian in note hong that ding hi.Ahih hangin ama nasemte penmin dang a phuah ding hi.

Leitungahthupha a kipiak ding a ngen pa inthuman Pasian min tawhthupha a kipiak ding ngen dinga,leitungah thuciamna a lapa inthuman Pasian min tawh a ciam ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh a beisa hunahaksatnate khempeuhkimangngilh khinta a,tuate bei mang khinta hi.Van Thak le Lei Thak
“Tu-in vantung thakte leleitung thak ka piangsak hi.A beisa thute kiciamteh nawn lo dinga,kiphawkkha nawn lo ding hi.
Keima piansaksa sungahlungdamin kipakin om tawntung un.Bang hang hiam cih lehJerusalem khuapilungdamna khua-in bawlin,a mitea lungnuam dingin ka bawl hi.
Jerusalem’ hangin ka lungdam dinga,ka mite’ hangin ka kipak ding hi.Tua khua sungah kahna aw lecimawhin kikona aw om nawn lo ding hi.
Naupangte a ngeksih om lo dinga,sauveipipi kinungta ding hi.Kum za bek a nungtatea khansihin kingaihsun dinga,kum za cing loin a site,keima gimpiakna lim hi ding hi.
Amaute in inn lam ding uh a,a sungah teeng ding uh hi.Amaute in leenggui lo bawl ding uh a,a gah ne ding uh hi.

Amaute in inn lam ding uh a,tua inn-ah midang teng,cih om nawn lo ding hi.Amaute in leenggui suaninadang khat in ne, cih om lo ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehkeima mite’ nuntak hun pensingkung khat nuntak tan bangsawt dinga,keima teel mite inamau’ khut tawh a sepsa natelungdamin nesuak ding uh hi.

Amaute in a mawk nadinginna sem lo ding uh a,lungkham nadinginta nei lo ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute pen Topa’ thupha piak,suanlekhakte hi ding uh a,amau’ tate amaute tawhnungta khawm ding uh hi.
Amaute in hong sap ma-inke’n ka dawng dinga,amaute in thu a gen laitakinke’n ka za ding hi.

Keivom le tuuno inan nekhawm ding uh a,humpinelkai in bawngtal banginbuhkung ne ding hi.Leivui pen gulpi’ an hita dinga,mite hong tu nawn lo ding hi.Keima mual siangtho tung tengahamaute kiliamsak lo ding uh a,kisusia lo ding uh hi,Topa in ci hi,” a ci hi.
