Topa’ Thukhenna le Zion’ Mailam DaupainaTopa in hih bangin ci hi:Vantung penkeima tokhom hi a,leitung penkeima khengakna ahi hi.Kei adingin koi lai-ah inn lam dinga,keima tawlngakna ding munkoi lai ahi hiam?
Hih nate khempeuhkeima bawlsa ahih maninhih nate khempeuh keima-a’ ahi hi,Topa in ci hi.Ahih hangin kiniamkhiatin,lungsim a kitamzan mipa,keima thu-ah lau-in a liing kelkel pa,keima deih mipa ahi hi.

Biakna-in bawngtal a gopa inmihing zong that hi.Biakpiakna-in tuuno a gopa inui ngawng zong at hi.An tawh biakpiakna a bawlpa invok si zong pia hi.Paknamtui tawhphawkna biakpiakna a bawlpa inmilim zong bia-in thupha a pia hi.Hih mite amau ut bang ciatin gamta uh a,amau’ kihhuai gamtatna uhahnuam a sa uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute tungahgimna ka tungsak dinga,amau’ kihtak thute mahamau’ tungah ka tungsak ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sap cianginkuamah in hong dawng lo uh a,thu ka gen cianginkuamah in hong ngai lo uh hi.Keima thu man loh ding mah ut zaw uh a,a sia-in gamta uh hi, a ci hi.

Ama thu-ah lau-in a liing mite aw,Topa’ thu za un:Keima tungahnote nong cihtakna hangunna mipihte uh pawlkhat innote hong mudahinhong hawl khia ding uh a,zahpihna tawh note hong hopihin,“Lungdamin na om ding uhhong deihsak ka hih manun,Topa in ama liatna hong lak henla,note hong hon khia tahen,”hong ci vial ding uh hi.Hih banga hong paute penmindaina a thuak ding mite ahi uh hi.
Ngai un, khuapi sunga gamlumna!Biakinn sunga awging!Topa in a galte gim a piaknahuging ahi hi.
Ka khuapi siangtho pennausuak natna a thuak ma-innau a suak nupi tawh kibang a,nausuak gimna a tun ma-inamah in tapa khat a nei hi.

A tuaci bangkua’n za ngei na hi uh hiam?A tuaci bangkua’n mu ngei na hi uh hiam?Ni khat thu-ingam khat piang ngei ahi hiam?Tomnokhat sunginminam khat piang khia ngei ahi hiam?Bang hang hiam cih lehZion in nausuak gimna a thuak phetina minamte suak khia pah hi.
Nausuah hun tungsak napi-insuaksak lo ding ka hi hiam,Topa in ci hi.Nau a suakkhiasak keimah innaugil khakcip ding ka hi hiam,na Pasian in ci hi.

Naungek in a nu’ nawi teepinnuam a sak mah bangin,Jerusalem in nuam a sakna ahnuam na sakkhawm theih nadingunamah a it khempeuhte aw,Jerusalem tawh lungdam unla,ama hangin kipak un.Ama hanginkapin a thum khempeuhte aw,ama lungdamna ahamah tawh lungdam khawm un, a ci hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi:Tu-in gunpi bangin nopsakna letuilet khia bangin minamte’ hauhnaama tungah ka tungsak ding hi.Note pen a nu’ nawi teepin,a ang-ah kipua a,a khuk tungah a diangnaungek na bang ding uh hi.
A nu in a ta a hehnep banginnote kong hehnem dinga,note in Jerusalem khua sungahhehnepna na ngah ding uh hi.

Hih thu a hong piang na muh uh cianginna lungdam ding uh hi.Note hong thahatsakinhong cidamsak ding hi.Tua cianginka thu hong mangte ka huhna,ka galte tungah ka hehna ka lahna thuna thei ding uh hi, ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehheh mahmahna tawhama sinsona lemeikuang tawh gim a pia dinginmeikuang sungah Topa hong pai dinga,huihpi bangina leengte hong pai ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in mei tawh thukhenna sem dinga,a mawh mi khempeuh tungaha namsau tawh thu khen dinga,Topa in a thah mitetam mahmah ding hi.
Biakna huan sungah a pai dingin amaute kisiansuahin a kisiangthosak, a laizang a om pen a zuite, voksa le kihhuaina le zusa a nete bei mang khawm ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ nasepnate le amau’ ngaihsutnate ka thei a, minam khempeuh a khawm dingin ka hong pai hi. Amaute hong pai-in ka minthanna mu ding uh a,

amaute’ lakah lim khat ka khai ding hi. Amau’ sung panin, minamte tung, Tarshish mite tung, Put mi le Lud mite tung, Meshek mite tung, Tubal mi le Javan mite tung, ka min hoihna a za ngei lo, ka minthanna a mu ngei lo tuipi gei-a om gam mite tungah a suakta lai mite ka sawl ding hi. Amaute in minamte lakah ka minthanna genthang ding uh hi.

Israel mite in beel siangtho sungah an tawh amau biakpiakna tawi-in Topa’ biakinn-ah hong paipih uh mah bangin amaute in minam khempeuh lak panin Topa’ tungah piak dingin na sanggamte khempeuh uh, sakolte, leengte, taalte le late, kalaoh hatte tungah hong pua-in ka mual siangtho Jerusalem-ah hong paipih ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi.
Amaute kimkhat zong, siampite le Levi mite a suak dingin ka la ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Ka bawl ding vantung thak leleitung thak pen ahihlehkeima mai-ah kip ding hi.Tua mah bangin na suan na khakte uh lena min uh kip ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Khadet khat pan Khadet khat,keimah bia dingin Jerusalem-ahmi khempeuh hong pai ding uh hi,Topa in ci hi.

Amaute a ciah uh ciangin kei hong lehdo mite’ luanghawmte en ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau a ne thante si ngei loin, amau a kihalna mei mit ngei lo dinga, amaute pen mi khempeuh’ kih hi ding hi, a ci hi.
Jeremiah A Kisapna le A KisawlnaBenjamin gam Anathoth khua-a siampi khat ahi Hilkiah’ tapa Jeremiah’ thugente hih bang ahi hi.
Amon’ tapa Josiah, Judah gamah kumpi a suah zawh kum sawm le kum thum a cin kumin ‘Topa in Jeremiah a hopih hi.

Josiah’ tapa Jehoiakim kumpi a suah ciangin Topa in Jeremiah a hopih leuleu hi. Tua khit ciangin Josiah’ tapa Zedekiah kumpi a suah zawh kum sawm le kum khat a phak kum, a kha ngana, Jerusalem khua mite sal tang dingin a kipuakkhiat dong tam veipi a hopihpih hi.
Topa in kei hong hopih a,
“Gil sungah kong bawl ma-innang kong thei khinzo hi.Na suah ma-innang kong teel khia khinzo a,minam dangte tungah kamsangdingin kong koih khinzo hi,”hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in,“Ah, Topa Pasian aw,kei thugen ka siam kei a,naupang khat ka hi lel hi,” ka ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in,“‘Naupang khat ka hi lel hi,’ ci kei in;bang hang hiam cih lehkong puakna khempeuhte kiangahna pai dinga,kong sawl peuhpeuh na gen ding hi.
Amaute kihta kei in;bang hang hiam cih lehnangmah a hong hu dinginka hong ompih hi,Topa in kong ci hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa ina khut tawh hong zam phei-inka muk hong lawnsakinhong hopih hi.“En in, ka thute na kam sungahkong koih khinzo hi.

Gam khempeuh lekumpi khempeuhte’ tungaha bot khia ding lea phel khia dingin ahi zongin,a susia ding lea lawn khia dingin ahi zongin,a lam ding lea phut dingin ahi zongin,tuni-in za,nang kong piazo hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei tungah, “Jeremiah aw, bang mu na hi hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Kei zong, “Ngak, a kici almond singhiang khat ka mu hi,” ci-in ka dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Na man hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka thugente ka tangtunsak nadingin kei zong ka ngak hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in a nihveina hong hopih leuleu a, “Bang na mu hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Kei zong, “Beel a so khat ka mu a, leilu lam panin hong awnsuk hi,” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Leilu lam panin hih gammi khempeuhte’ tungah siatna hong sosuk ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lamah a om gam khempeuh keimah in ka sam a, amaute hong pai-in Jerusalem khua kongpite-ah ahi zongin, khua kimkota kulh kiimte-ah ahi zongin, Judah gam khuapi khempeuh kiimte-ah ahi zongin a kumpi tokhomte uh hong phut ciat ding uh hi.
Ka mite in kei hong taisan uh ahih manin a mawhna uh hangin amau’ tungah thu ka khen ding hi; pasian dangte tungah meihal biakna pia uh a, a khut uh tawh a bawlsa uh milimte a bia uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Jeremiah aw, kithawi in. Pai inla kong sawl khempeuh amaute kiangah va gen in. Amaute kihta kei in; na kihtak leh amau’ mai-ah kong lausak zaw lai ding hi.

En in, hih gambup langah a ding ding, Judah kumpite, uliante, siampite le hih gammi khempeuh langah a pang dingin tuni-in nang, khuapi muanhuai khat bang ahi zongin, sikkhuampi khat bangin ahi zongin, sumngo kulhpi khat bangin ahi zongin kong bawl hi.
Amaute in nang’ langkhat ah hong do ding uh hi. Ahih hangin a hong zo kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih in-ah, nangmah a hong hu dingin ka hong ompih ding hi,” a hong ci hi.
Topa in a Tawtolh Israel Mite ZolTopa in kei hong hopih a,
“Pai inla,Jerusalem khuamite’ zak dinginva taangko in.Topa in kong cih in-ah:Na khangno lai-a nong kipiakna,na mothak lai-a nong itna,a kikho nai lo gamlakahkei’ nung nong zuih lai hunka phawk hi.
Israel mite penTopa adingin a tuam om hi a,ama anlakna ah a anpalte ahi uh hi.Amaute a ne peuhpeuh a mawh suak uh a,gimna a thuak uh hi,Topa in hong ci hi, ci-in va gen in,”hong ci hi.
Jakob suan leIsrael innkuan khempeuhte aw,Topa’ kammal ngai dih un.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Na pute na pate uh kei kiang paningamlapi-ah pai khia-in,bangmahin a kimang lo milim peuh bia-in,amau mahmah zongbangmahin a kimang loa suah khit nadingunkei tungah bang mawhnahong mu uh ahi hiam?

Amaute in, ‘Egypt gam panineite hong pai khiatpihinsehnel lak le dum lak,lei keu lak lea lauhuai khuamial bekbak lak,kuama pai ngei lohna mun,kuama ten lohna gamlakaha hong makaih Topakoi-ah om ahi hiam?’ci beek lo uh hi.
Singgah le a hoih natena nek theih nadingunan tamna munah kong tunpih hi.Ahih hangin no nong pai uh cianginka gam na ninsak uh a,ka neihsa leitanga kihhuai mun na suaksak tazen uh hi.

Siampite in, ‘Topa koi-ah om ahihiam?’ ci-in dong lo uh hi.Thukham a theite nangawn inkei hong thei lo uh hi.Kei tungah kumpi uliantehong khial khin uh a,kamsangte in Baal min tawh thugenin kimanna a nei lo milimtea bia uh hi.
“Tua ahih maninTopa in kong cih in-ah,note kong mawhsak lai dinga,na tate uh’ tate zong ka mawhsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nitumna lamahSaipras tuikulh mong dongkantan unla va en dih un.Nisuahna lamah Kedar gamah mi sawl unlalimtakin kan dih un;tua bang thua piang ngei peuhmah hiam, en dih un.
Gam khat peuhpeuh inpasian ahi taktak beek loa pasian-te uh nangawna khek ngei peuhmah uh hiam?Ahih hangin ka mite ina minthanna uh ahi keimah,bangmahin a kimang lona peuh tawh hong khek tazen uh hi.
Tua thu phawk unla lau un;vantungte aw,dah mahmah unla liing un,Topa in kong ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehka mite in mawhna nam niha bawl zo uh hi.Nuntakna ciktui ahi keimaha hong taisan zo uh hi.Tuikhuk totawm uh a,a tuikhuk tawh uh keu-in,tui a vung thei kei hi.
“Israel sal ahi hiam?Sila namte hi zenzen ahi hiam?Hilo ahihleh bang hangina galte in luh gawp zo ahi hiam?
Humpinelkai bangin a galte inamah hawksan uh a,nakpitakin a hawk gawp uh hi.A gam uh gam simtham a suah uh a,a khuapite uh cimin kuamah teeng lo hi.
Tham loin, Memfis leTahpanhes mite in zonga luguh a suktapsak zo uh hi.
Israel aw, Topa na Pasian inlampi-ah hong makaih laitakinamah na nusiat manin nang tungahhih bang teng hong tung hi lo ahi hiam?

Tu-in Egypt gamah nang na pai maninbang phattuamnangah ding na hi hiam?Nail gun tuia va dawn lel ding na hi hiam?Assiria gamah na pai maninbang phattuamna ngah ding na hi hiam?Eufratis gun tuia va dawn lel ding na hi hiam?

Na gitlohna mah innangmah hong thuhilh dinga,kei na hong up nawn lohna innangmah hong mawhsak ding hi.Topa na Pasian nong nusia a,keimah nong kihtak nawn loh ciangin,nuam hetloin kha velval hi,cih thu thei inla mu in,Vanglian Topa Pasian in ka hong ci hi.

“Sawtpek lai a kipaninka hakkol kuaitaninka ukna nong nial a,hong kihenna khau sutatin,‘Na na ka sem kei ding hi,’na hong ci hi.Numei paktatte na bang uh a,mual sang tung teng lesing liim nuai tengahmilim na bia kawikawi uh hi.
A kiteelteel leenggui ci hoihte banginnang kong suankik zo a,ahih hangin nang kisiakikinbang hangin leenggah gui a hoih lotena suakkik na hi hiam?
Vuttui tawh kisilinsatpiang tampi na zang zonginna mawhna nin ka mu lai veve hi,Topa Pasian in kong ci hi.

Bangci bangin nangmah in,‘Kei ka nin kei hi.Baal pasian-te’ nung ka zui kei hi,’bang hangin ci thei ding na hi hiam?Mualkuam zangah a omna lampi totte ento inla,na hihsate mu dih in.A suktai a totai kawikawikalaoh huk na bang tazen hi.
Gamlak nuam a sa,lano hukte na bang tazen hi.A huk laitakin kua inkham zo ding ahi hiam?Amah a hih nuam peuhpeuh inhaksa loin,a ut hunhunin a ngah lel ding uh hi.
Na khe guakin lam pai kei inla,na dang taaksak kei in,kong cih hangin, nangmah in,‘Bang phamawh ahi hiam?Gamdang pasian-te ka it a,amau’ nung ka zui ding hi,’ na ci hi.
“Guta khatpeuha kimat ciangin a zum bangin,Israel mite, a kumpite,a uliante, a siampite,le a kamsangte uh zonga maizum ding uh hi.

Amaute in singtawng khat kiangah,‘Nang pen ka pasian na hi hi,’ ci uh a,suangtum khat kiangah,‘Ka pianna ka nu na hi hi,’peuh a ci uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in kei hong nungngatinhong maingat lo uh hi.Ahih hangin haksatna a tuah uh ciangin,‘Tho inla hong hon in,’ hong ci uh hi.

“Note-a’ dinga na bawl uhna pasian-te uh koi-ah om ahi hiam?Haksatna na tuah uh ciangina hong hon thei ahihleh kihonsak ta un;bang hang hiam cih leh Judah gam aw,na khuapi zahzah uhpasian na nei tazen uh hi.
Kei na hong mawhsakna uhbang thu teng tawh ahi hiam?Na vekpi-un kei nong langpan khin uh hi,Topa in kong ci hi.
Na tate uh thuhilhin ka sat hangina mawkna suak zo ta hi.Amaute kibawlpha tuan lo uh hi.Humpinelkai hawk banginna namsaute un na kamsangte uha that khinzo uh hi.

No Israel mite aw,Topa’ kammal limtakin ngai dih un.Israel-te adingin gamlak tawhkibang ngei ka hi hiam?A mial mahmah gam tawhkibang ngei ka hi hiam?Tua ahihleh bang hangin ka mite in,‘Ko ka suakta uh hi; nang kiangahkong pai nawn kei ding uh hi,’ci uh ahi hiam?
Nungak khat in a kizepnatemangngilh thei ahi hiam?A kipi mothak in a mothak puantemangngilh thei ahi hiam?Ahih hangin ka mite insim zawh loh ni tampi sunga hong mangngilh uh hi.
Na lawm ngaih dingna zon siam mahmah a,numei gilote nangawna zia na hilh thei zen hi.
Mawhnei lo mizawngte’ sisanna puan tungah baang hi.Amaute in na innhong luhngei beek lo uh hi. “Tua bang teng hinapi-in
nang in, ‘Kei ka mawh kei hi,kei tungahPasian heh nawn lo hi,’ na ci hi.En in, ‘Kei ka mawh kei hi,’na cih manin nang tungahthu kong khen ding hi.
Bang hangin na lungsimkheel ziauziau na hi hiam?Assiria in nanghong maizumsak ngei banginEgypt-te in zong nanghong maizumsak ding uh hi.
Nangmah zong tua gam paninmaizumna tawhna lu tungah vut khusa-innong pai khia ding hi;bang hang hiam cih lehkeimah Topa inna muan mite ka nial zo hi;amaute’ hangin na gualzo ngei kei ding hi.

“Mi khat in a zi ma henla,tua nu in zong amah nusia-in,midang khat’ zi va suak leh,a pasal masa in tua nulakik thei ding ahi hiam?Tua gam teng a ninsak khinsuak ding hi lo ahi hiam?Nang pen numei paktat suakinmi tampi tak tawh kingai khinzo napi-in,tu-in kei kianghong zuankik ding na hi hiam,Topa in kong ci hi.

Khuadak inla mualsang dawnte en dih in.Hong kilup khoppih lohna munkoi laitakah om ahi hiam?Arab mite in a suam dingungamlakah mi a ngak uh banginlam gei-ah tu-inna luppih ding mi na ngak hi.Na paktatna le na gitlohna tawhhih gam na ninsak zo hi.
Tua hang mahin guahtuikikangsak a,guah nunung hong zu lo hi.Ahi zongin numei paktatte tawha kibang hinapi-inna maizum thei kei lailai hi.
“Tumahin kei nong sam a, ‘Ka pa aw,ka neulai pek pan ka lawm na hi hi

nang keima tungahheh tawntung ding na hi hiam?A tawp donginlungham den ding na hi hiam?’na hong ci hi.En in, tua bang na cih hangin,siatna na hih theih khempeuhna hih khinzo hi,” a ci hi.Israel le Judah A Kisikkik Kul
Kumpi Josiah in a uk laitakin Topa in kei hong hopih a, “A zulhzau Israel, mualsang tung khempeuh ah pai-in singliim nuai khempeuh ah numei paktat bangin a om kawikawina na mu khinzo hiam?
Hih teng a hih khit ciangin kei kiangah hong kilehkik ngawn ding hi, ci-in ka up hangin amah hong kilehkik tuan lo hi. Tua bangin a gamtatna pen numei ginalo a sanggamnu Judah in zong a mu hi.

A zulhzau Israel, midang tawh a khialhna hangin kimakna lai pia-in, ka hawl khiat zong amah in a mu hi. Ahih hangin numei ginalo Judah lau tuan loin, amah zong numei paktat khat mah a va suak veve hi.
Tua bang hih ding amah in baih ngaihsut lel ahih manin suangtum le singtawng peuh bia-in khial a, gam a ninsak hi.
Hih bang teng hinapi a sanggamnu, numei ginalo Judah, a lungsim takpi tawh hong kilehkik loin, a kilehkik hong kineihkhem bek hi, Topa in kong ci hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei hong hopih a, “A zulhzau Israel, numei ginalo Judah sangin a mawhna tam zaw hi.

Pai inla leilu lam Israel gamah hih bangin va taangko in:‘Hong kilehkik in,a zulhzau Israel aw,Topa in kong ci hi.Hehna tawh nang kong en kei ding hi;bang hang hiam cih leha hehpih thei pa ka hi hi,Topa in kong ci hi.Ka heh tawntung kei ding hi.
Na mawhnana phawk ding bek kisam hi.Topa na Pasian na langpanna,singliim nuai khempeuh ahgamdang pasian-te tawhna khialh kawikawina leka thu nong man lohnate pulak in,Topa in kong ci hi.

Hong kilehkik un,a zulhzau ka tate aw,Topa in kong ci hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh note penkeima mite na hi uh a,khuapi khat panin mi khat,beh khat sung panin nihcih bangin hong la-in,Zion khua-ahka hong puak ding hi.
“‘Ka thu a hong mang makaite kong pia dinga, amaute in pilna le siamna tawh note hong uk ding uh hi.

Tua hun ciangin gam sungah note pungin na tam uh ciangin Topa in kong cih in-ah, mite in, “Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang,” ci-in genin a nei nawn kei ding uh hi. Amaute in ngaihsun kha lo ding uh a, phawkkha loin, zong a goih beek kei ding uh hi. Tham loin zong a bawlkik nawn kei ding uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin Jerusalem khua pen Topa’ kumpi tokhom kici dinga, Jerusalem khua Topa’ omna-ah gam khempeuh hong kikhawmin, amaute in amau’ mawhnopna lungsim uh a zui tentan nawn kei ding uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin Judah mite in Israel mite hong pawlpih ding uh a, leilu lam gam salsuahna panin na pu na pate uh’ luah dingin ka piaksa gamah a paikhawm ding uh hi.
“‘Israel aw, ka tapa banginnang hong bawlin,gam khempeuh lakah a hoih pengam nopci mahmah khatnang hong pia ning,ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Ahih hangin a thuman lo zi ina pasal a nusiat banginIsrael mite aw, Topa in kong cih in-ah,no zong kei tungah nong thuman kei uh hi,’ci-in va taangko in,” hong ci hi.
Mual tung paninawging khat hong kiza a,Israel mite’ kahna letauna awging ahi hi.Lam a pialna hang uh leTopa a Pasian uha mangngilhna hang uh ahi hi.
Topa in, “Hong kilehkik un,a zulhzau ka tate aw,na zulhzauna uhkong damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.Amaute in zong, “En in,nang kiang kong pai uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa kote’ Pasian na hi hi.
Mualtungte le mualsangte’ tungahgamlum lialuanate zuaupi taktak hi a,Israel mite hotkhiatna dingTopa eite’ Pasian’ kiang bekahom takpi hi.
“Ahih hangin i neu lai a kipan a zumhuai Baal pasian i biakna hangin i pu i pate’ biakna ahi tuulebawngte, a tapate le a tanute khempeuh uh i sum khinzo hi.

Tua ahih manin maizumin lum ni. I minsiatna silh ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh i neulai a kipan tuni ciang dong eite le i pu i pate pen Topa i Pasian’ tungah i mawh khinzo hi. Topa i Pasian’ thu i mang kei khinzo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Topa in, “Israel mite aw,na kilehkik nop uhlehkei kiangah hong kilehkik un.Na kihhuainate uh kei kiang panna paihkhiat uh a,na tai kawikawi kei uh a,
‘Topa a nuntak bangin,’ ci-in,thuman tak, kiptak, thutang takinthu na ciam nak-uhlehgam khempeuh inthupha ka piak ding hong ngen ding uh a,kei’ sungah amautea lungdam ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Judah gammite le Jerusalem khuamite tungah Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Na lote uh kal unla,ling lakah khai vawh kei un.

Judah mite le Jerusalem khuamite aw,Topa’ thu zui unla,lungsim takpi tawh zui un.Na tuacih kei uhlehna bawl uh mawhnate hanginka hehna mei banginhong kuang khia dinga, a phelh zokuamah om lo ding hi,” a ci hi.Judah Gam Kila ding
Judah gamah va gen unla,Jerusalem khua-ah va taangko un.Gam sung khempeuh ahpeengkul mutin awng unla,va gen un.Hong kikhawm unla khuapi muanhuaite sungah va bu ni,va ci un.
Zion paina lampi kihilh unla,na suahtak nadingun tai un; zekai kei un.Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lam paninsiatna lianpi ka hong puaksuk hi.

Humpinelkai khata bukna sawlkawm paninhong kuan khia zo a,gamte a susia ding pahong pai khia zo hi.Na gam uh a kisiasak ding lena khuapite uhahkuamah a ten loh nadingin a susia dinginama omna panin hong kuan khia khinzo hi.
Tua ahih maninpuanhampi silhin tau-in kap un.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’ hehna lauhuaipieite’ kiang panin kihei khia nai lo hi.
Topa in, “Tua ni ciangin kumpipa le kumpi uliante lungkia ding uh a, siampite lau mahmahin, kamsangte dipkua ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin keimah in, “Ah, Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in hih mite le Jerusalem khuamite khem cih takin na khem khinzo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau kiangah, ‘Nopna hong om ding hi,’ ci napi-in, amau a sunlum dingin namsau khat a om gige hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua hun ciangin hih mite le Jerusalem khua mite kiangah, “A sa mahmah huih, sehnel gam a sang mun panin ka mite tungah hong nung dinga, tua huih pen anvaite a zapsiang dingin a nung huih bang hi lo hi.
Ka sawl huih pen tua bang dingin hat lua ding hi. Tu-in Topa in amaute tungah thu khenin a gen hi,” kici ding hi.
En un, meii bangin i gal pahong pai a,a sakol leengte pingpei tawhkibang a,a sakolte muvanlai sanginmanlang zaw hi.Gimna i thuak ding hi;bang hang hiam cih lehgal lel ding ihi ta hi.
Jerusalem khua aw,nang hong kihotkhiat nadinginna lungsim sung paningitlohna sawp khia in.Na sungah gitlohna lungsimbang tanvei kemcip ding na hi hiam?
Ngai un; Dan gam paninaw khat hong ging a,Efraim Mual paninkisiatna ding thu hong kitaangko hi.
Minamte kiangah va gen unla,Jerusalem kiangah va taangko un.“Gamlapi panin mite hong pai uh a,Judah gam khuapite langpanginhong kiko uh hi.
Judah gam inkei hong langpan ahih maninlohongte bangin a galte in a kimkotaha pang dimdiam uh hi,Topa in kong ci hi.
Na lungsim le na gamtatnate’ hanginnang’ tungah hih thu hong tung hi.Hih pen nangma gitlohna hang hi a,na lungtang pailetinhong sun hi,” a ci hi.
Aw, ka lungtang, ka lungtang!Na ka sa mahmah hi.Ka lungtang kisai vanvan a,ka om hithiat thei kei hi;bang hang hiam cih lehpeengkul mutna aw,gal kisimna aw ka za hi.
Siatna khat khit cianginadang khat hong tung a,gam sung khempeuh kisia khinta hi.Thakhat thu-inka bukte hong kisuksiatsak a,ka puankhaite kikek gawp hi.
Bang tanvei galkisimnamu lai ding ka hi hiam?Bang tanvei peengkul awza lai ding ka hi hiam?
Topa in, “Ka mite hai uh a,kei hong thei lo uh hi.Naupang haite bang uh a,bangmah thei lo uh hi.A sia bawl ding lamsangsiam bek uh hi.A hoih bangmah bawl thei lo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Leitung ka et leh limlemel nei lo a,vantungah zong khuavak om lo hi.
Mualte ka et lehkiliing damdam uh a,mual neute kileh kawikawi uh hi.
Ka khuadak lehmi khat beek ka mu kei a,vana vasate zonga leeng mang khin uh hi.
Ka et leh, logam leihoih tengsehnel gam suakkhin a,Topa’ mai, a hehna lianpi mai-ah,khuapi khempeuh kisia khin uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in,“Gam buppi, gamlak suak dinga,ahih hanginka susia sam kei ding hi.
Tua thu hangin leitung kap dinga,vantung mial ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehka gensa, ka khensatsa hi a,ka kisik loh bangin ka lungsim zongka kheelkik kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Sakol tunga tuangte lethal tawite’ aw a kizak cianginmi khempeuh galtai mang uh a,gamlakah tai-insuang lakah a kahto uh hi.Khuapi khempeuh kinusia khin a,kuamah teeng nawn lo hi.

Jerusalem khuapi aw,a siacip ding na hita hi.Puansan silhin kham tawhna kizep liatluat hangin,na mitte zemin na golsak hangin,a mawkna-in a kizem na hita hi.Na lawm ngaihte innang hong nusia ta uh a,tu-in hong that nuam ta uh hi.

Nau a suak ding numeia kiko bang khat ka za a,tacil a suak numei’tauna tawh kibang hi.Zion’ tanu husam liangina kikona aw na hi a,a khut tegel zakin,“Gimna ka thuak ding hi.Kei hong that ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Jerusalem le Judah’ MawhnateJerusalem khua sungahkileh kawikawi un.Khuadak unla en dih un!A thuman gamtat lehthuman a zong mi khat beekna mu uh hiam, zong dih un.Na muh uhleh tua khua’ mawhnaka maisak ding hi.
“Topa a nuntak bangin,”ci-in a kiciam uh hangina zuaupi uh ahi hi.

Topa aw, nangmah inthuman en gige hi lo na hi hiam?Nangmah in amaute na sat hangina awlmawh tuan kei uh hi.Na suk gawp hanginna thuhilhna a ngai tuan kei uh hi.Amaute’ maitangsuangtum sangin sak zaw a,a kisik nuam kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in,“Hih mite mihai hi a, a hehpihhuai ahi hi.Topa’ lampi thei lo uh a,amau’ Pasian’ deihna a thei kei uh hi.

Miliante kiangah pai-inka va kiho ding uh hi.Amaute in Topa’ lampi thei uh a,amau’ Pasian’ deihna thei uh hi,”ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.Ahih hangin a vekpi-unka uk ding nial khin uh a,ka hakkol kuaitaninka henna khaute sutat khinzo uh hi.

Tua ahih manin tulak paninhumpinelkai in amaute that dinga,sehnel gam panin keivom inamaute a pet gawp ding hi.Kamkei in a khuapite uhlimtakin vil gige a,a pusuakkhia peuhpeuhbalzan gawp ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute’ mawhna tamlua a,hong taisan mun lua uh hi.

“Na mawhnate uhhong koici maisak thei ding ka hi hiam?Na tate un kei hong nusia zo uh a,pasian ahi lopite peuh tawhkiciam zo uh hi.Amaute a gilvah dong uhan ka vak khit cianginamaute in angkawmin,numei paktatte’ inn-ah a hon om uh hi.
Sakol gilvah a lante bangina inn veengte’ zite uh nehina tau huthut uh hi.
Hih thute hangin amautegim pia lo ding ka hi hiam?Topa in ka genin-ah,hici bang minam tungahthukkik lo ding ka hi hiam?
A gualin a kisuana leenggah huan sungahpai inla, suksiatsak in;ahi zonginsukmai mangsak sam kei in.A hiangte heuhkhiatsak in;bang hang hiam cih lehtua a hiangte Topa a’ hi lo hi.
Israel minamte le Judah minamte,Topa in ka cih in-ah, kei’ tungahhong thuman nawn het lo uh hi.
“Amaute in Topa hong nial uh a,‘Amah in bangmah hih lo ding hi.Eite tungah siatna hong tung lo dinga,gal ahi zongin kial ahi zongini thuak kei ding hi.
Kamsangte lah huih bang hi lel uh a,a sung uhah thu teeng lo hi.Amau’ gen bangun amau mah ina thuak ding uh hi,’ ci uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa,Vanglian Pasian in hong hopih a,“Amaute, tu-a banginkampau uh ahih maninna kam sungah mei banginka kuansak ka thute insing tawh kibang hih minamtekaangtum gawp ding hi.

“En un, Israel minamte aw,Topa in kong cih in-ah, gamlapi paninnote a hong sim dingin gam khatkong kuansak ding hi.Tua gam pen tanglai pekin a om khinsa,a hat mahmah,amaute’ pau na theih loh uhgam khat ahi hi.
Thal tawh a kap uh tehkaplum lianlian uh a,a vekpi-un galhang kim uh hi.

Amaute in lo-a na ante uh lena an huante uh hong gaihsak ding uh a,na tapate uh le na tanute uhhong thahsak ding uh hi.Na tuuhon, na bawnghonte uhhong gaihsak ding uh a,na leenggah, na theigahte uhhong nek mangsak ding uh hi.Na muan mahmah uhkulhpi tawh a ki-umna khuapite uh namsau tawhhong suksiatsak ding uh hi.
“Ahih hangin tua bang hun ciang nangawnin, Topa in kong cih in-ah, note kong sumai mang khin sam kei ding hi.

Na mipihte un, ‘Bang hangin Topa i Pasian in hih bangin ei’ tungah hong bawl ahi hiam?’ a cih uh ciangin nangmah in, ‘Topa nusia-in na gam sung uhah gamdang pasian-te’ na na sep uh bangin, note’ gam ahi lo gam dangah, gamdang mite’ na na sem ding uh hi,’ na ci ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Jakob’ suante’ tungah gen in.Judah mite’ tungah hih bangin ci in:
“Ngai un, ngaihsutna a nei lo mihaite aw, mit nei napi-in a mu lote,bil nei napi-in a za lo mite aw,

kei hong kihta lo na hi uh hiam,Topa in kong ci hi.Keima mai-ah liing lo na hi uh hiam?Tuipi gei-a om sehnelte keima koih hi a,tui ka dalsak tawntung hi.Tuihualte ina lawhlawh hangin zo zo lo uh a,a gin zuazua uh hanginkantan zo tuan lo uh hi.
Ahih hangin hih mitea lungsim uh khauhinkei hong langpan zen uh hi.Hong kiheisan uh a,hong paisan uh hi.
A lungsim sung uhah,‘A huna guah hong zusak a,tukguah, khalguah hong pia a,anlak hun ding a hong sehsak den Topa i Pasian zahtak ni,’a ci kei uh hi.
Na khialhnate unhih na hoihte khaktan a,na mawhnate uh hangintuate na taanlawh uh hi.
“Ka mite’ lakah migilote kihel uh a,vasa thangsiah banginmite thangsiahin a man uh hi.
Bawm sung diminvasa a kikhum banginkhemna tawh a ngah uhvante tawh a inn uh a dim hi.Tua ahih manin amaute lianinhau mahmah uh a,thau-in a mai uh a zol hi.
Gitlohna lamaha hun bek a theithei kei uh hi.Tagah mite’ phattuamna ding khual lointhu a man lopi-in khen uh a,mizawngte’ tungah thuman lo uh hi.
“Hih thute hangin amautegim pia lo ding ka hi hiam,Topa in ka ci hi.Hih bang minam’ tungahthukkik lo ding ka hi hiam, ka ci hi.
A dipkuathuai, a patauhhuai thu khatgam sungah a piang khinzo hi.

Kamsangte in thuman gen lo uh a,siampite in zongamau’ ut bangun a uk uh hi.Ka mite in phamawh sa lo sawnsawn uh hi.A tawpna hun hong tun cianginbang cih ding uh ahi hiam,Topa in ci hi,ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.

Jerusalem le Judah A SiatnaBenjamin’ suante aw,na suahtak nadingun tai un.Jerusalem khua taisan un.Tekoa khua-ah peengkul tum unla,Bethlehem khua-ahtheihsakna meikhu khusak un.Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lam paningimna leh siatna lianpia hong pai ding hi.
A melhoih, a ngeek dikdekZion tanu ka susia ding hi.
Kumpite, a galkapte uh tawhama kiang hong tung ding uh a,a kimkotah giahphual satina deih peuhpeuh uh a la ding uh hi.
Amaute in, “Jerusalem khuaa sim dingin kisa un.Tho un, sun ciangini sim ding hi,” a ci ding uh hi.Ahih hangin amau mah in,“Citciat aw, zekai lua hang!Ni tum dektakta a,i liimte sau keei ta hi.
Kithawi un, zan ciangin i sim dinga,a kumpi innte uh i susia ding hi,”a ci ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehVanglian Topa in,“A singte phuksak unla,Jerusalem khua sim nadinginphungin ciang un.Hih khuapi gim piak kul hi;bang hang hiam cih lehkinetniamna bekbek tawha kidim hi.
Tuikhuk panin tuiphula tawlngak loh bangin,Jerusalem khua paninsiatna tawlnga lo hi.Khua sungah ngongtatna lesuksiatna ka za ngitnget a,cinatna le liamna bekbek ka mu hi.
Jerusalem khuapi aw, kidawm in.Na kidop kei lehnang kong taisan dinga,kuama ten lohna gam simthamna suakkha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Vanglian Topa in kei hong hopih a,“Leenggah lo aha sangte a kilawh khit banginIsrael mi a omlai suntenglo siang vet in,” hong ci hi.
Keimah in ka dawngkik a,“Amaute in a zak theih dingunkua kiangah va gen ding ka hi hiam?En in, a bil uh bing a,khua za thei lo uh hi.Topa’ thu simmawh uh a,lungdamna-in la lo uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa aw,kei zong ka heh mahmah a,ka thuakzo nawn kei hi,” ka ci hi.Tua ciangin Topain kei hong hopih a,“Kei’ tang dinga na hehnakongzing lak a naupangte tungahbua khia inla,tangvalte’ kikhopna-ah zong bua khia in.Papite le nupite zongkila khia dinga,piteek puteekte zongkipaikhiatpih ding hi.
A innte uh midangte inluah ding uh a,a lote le a zite uh a taan ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in kong cih in-ah,hih mite’ langkhat ahka khut zanin gim ka pia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leha neu pen pan a lian pen dongin,thuman lopi tawh sum zongina huaiham uh hi.Kamsangte a kipansiampite dongin thuman lo khin uh hi.
Amaute in ka mite’ thuaknatethupi simsak lo uh a,hoihna om keei lopi,‘Hoih hi, hoih hi,’ ci mawkmawk uh hi.

Hih a kihhuai nate a sep uh ciangina maizum beek uh hiam?Maizum beek lo uh a,kisuangthei beek lo uh hi.Tua ahih manin a site’ lak mahahamaute zong si ding uh a,gim ka piak ni ciangina kilawn khia ding uh hi,”Topa in hong ci hi.
Topa in mite tungah,“Lam kabomah ding unla khuadak un.Lam hoih ahi lampi luitedong unla tawn un.Tua hilehna tawldam ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Ahih hangin amaute in,“Ka tawn kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Topa in,“Peengkul tumna awging a ngai dingin‘Galvil ding mi ka koih hi,’kong ci hi,” a ci hi.Ahih hangin amaute in,“Ka ngai kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa in,“Gamdangte aw, ngai un.Mite aw, amau’ tungahbang tung ding hiam cih thei un.
Leitung aw, ngai in!En un, hih mite tungaha thuak ding mahuna kilawm siatna ka tungsak ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehka thu hong ngai lo uh a,ka thukhamte a nial uh hi.
Bang deihna tawh Sheba gam paninpaknamtuite hong pai a,gamlapi panin sing namtuitehong tung ahi hiam?Na meihal biaknate uh ka sang thei kei a,nong biaknate uh deihhuai ka sa kei hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih in-ah:En un, hih mite a puk nadingina mai uhah suangtum ka koih dinga,pate le tate, inn veengte le lawmtepukin a si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in, “En un,leilu lam gam panin mi hong pai uh a,leimong gamla pen panin galsim dingingam lian khat hong kithawithawi hi.
Thal le teipi tawi uh a,gilo mahmah uh a,hehpihna lungsim nei loina husa uh tuipi ging tawh kibang hi.Jerusalem aw,sakol tungah amaute tuangin,nangmah a hong sim dingina kithawi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua thu i za a,bangmah i cih thei kei hi.Lungkhamna in hong lencip a,nupi nausuak ding bangin na i sa hi.
Gamlakah pai khia kei unla,lampi-ah zong pai dah un.Bang hang hiam cih lehi galte in namsau tawi uh a,i kimkot khempeuh a lauhuai hi.
Topa in, “Ka mite’ tanu aw,puanhampi silh inla,vut lakah kikhuk in.Tapa khat neihsun a si banginkap vangvang in.Bang hang hiam cih leha hong susia ding pathakhatin hong tung ding hi.
Jeremiah aw,ka mite a ze-et dingin nang kong koih hi.Ze-et inla, a om dan uh thei in.
A vekpi-unkei hong langpan tentan uh a,zuauthu a gen kawikawi uh hi.Sumngo le sik banginkhauh mahmah uh a,a vekpi-un a siat gamtat khin uh hi.
Nakpi takin pum a kizap hangina ekte tui thei lo a, luang khia thei lo hi.Pum a kizapzap hangina mawkna a suak hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehmigilote omlai veve hi.
Amaute, a kideih lo ngun-ek kici ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in,‘Amaute ka deih kei hi,’” hong ci hi.
Nuntak Zia leh Gamtatnate Kipuah UnTopa in Jeremiah kiangah hih bangin thu gen hi:
“Topa’ biakinn kongkhakpi kiangah ding inla, hih thuteng va taangko in: Topa a bia dingin kongkhak sunga hong tum Judah mite aw, Topa’ kammal ngai dih un.
Vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin hong ci hi. Na nuntak zia uh le na gamtatnate uh kipuah un. Tua hileh hih munah kong tengsak bek ding hi.
‘A muanhuai sungah i om hi. Hih pen Topa’ biakinn ahi hi, Topa’ biakinn ahi hi, Topa’ biakinn ahi hi,’ a kicici zuauthute um kei un.
“Bang hang hiam na cih uhleh na nuntak zia uh le na gamtatnate uh na kipuah uh a, khatlekhat kikalah thuman le thutakin na vaihawm uh a,
namdang mite, pa nei lote le meigongte na nuaisiah kei uh a, hih munah mawhnei lo mite that nawn loin, note’ gimna ding mah ahi pasian dang peuh na biak nawn kei uhleh,
tanglai-a na pu na pate un a neih tawntung dingun ka piak hih gam sungah ka hong tengsak ding hi.
“En un, phattuamna a om het lo zuauthu na um ta zen uh hi.
Note in na gu-in, tual thatin, ang kawmin, ahi lopi kiciamin, Baal kiangah meihal biakna pia-in, na theih ngei loh uh pasian dangte delhin,
tua ciangin ka min tawh a kilo hih biakinn sung ka mai-ah hong pai-in hong dingin, ‘Hong kihon khia zo hi,’ na cih khit uh ciangin hih a muhthadahhuai nate khempeuh va hihkik zel ding na hi uh hiam?
Ka min tawh a kilo hih biakinn no’ ngaihsutna-ah misuam mi buluhte’ bukna mun bangin ngaihsun na hi uh hiam? Keimah in note’ hih khempeuh kong mu khin hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Ka min ka tensak masakna Shiloh khua-a biakinn-ah va pai unla ka mi Israel-te’ gitlohna hangin ka nasepna va en dih un.
Tu-in zong hih nate khempeuh na hih uh a, kong gengen hangin hong ngai tuan loin kong sapsap hangin hong dawng lo na hih manun Topa in kong cih in-ah,
ka min tawh a kilo, note in na muan uh hih Jerusalem biakinn le note le na pu na pate uh’ kiangah kong piak hih mun pen Shiloh-a biakinn tungah ka hih bangin ka hih ding hi.
Efraim’ suanlekhak ahi leilu lama na behte khempeuh uh ka paihkhiat bangin note zong ka muhna panin kong pai khia ding hi.Milim Biakna Hanga Pasian’ Hehna
“Jeremiah aw, hih mite adingin thu ngetsak kei in. Amau adingin kapin kei’ tungah hong thumsak kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nong thumna kong ngai kei ding hi.
Judah gam khuapite sung le Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah bang hih uh cih mu lo na hi hiam?

Naupangte in sing tomin, a pate un mei tawh uh a, nupite in a nusian uh vantung kumpinu ading moh bawlna ding annel meek uh a, kei hong hehsak nadingun, pasian dangte’ dawn dingin leenggahzu tawh biakna a pia tazen uh hi.
Topa in kong cih in-ah, tua hangin gimna a thuak, kei hi zenzen ka hi hiam? Hilo hi. Amau’ zum nadingin amau mah in a thuak uh hizaw hi lo ahi hiam?

Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih in-ah: En in, ka hehna le ka thangpaihna hih munah ka bua dinga, mihingte’ tung le ganhingte’ tung, lo lai-a singkungte le leilak a singgahte tungah ka sung ding hi. Ka hehna mei bangin kuang dinga, kisumit lo ding hi.Judah Mite’ Langpanna Hangin Gimpiakna
“Vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin kong ci hi: Mei tawh haltum ding na meihal biaknate uh hal nawn loin, sa nektheih biakpiaknate tawh kibangin ne vet un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt gam panin na pute na pate uh ka lakkhiat lai-in ka hopih kei a, meihal biakna pia ding le biakpiakna a bawl dingin thu ka pia kei hi.

Ahih hangin, ‘Ka thu hong mang un; tua hileh note’ Pasian ka hi dinga, note pen ka mite na hi ding uh hi. Note adingin a hoih zawk nadingin na khempeuh ah kong thupiak bang na zui un,’ ci-in thu ka pia zaw hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in ka thu hong mang lo uh a, a bil uh hong ngat lo uh hi. Amau’ gitlohna lungsim uh zui-in amau’ thuthu-in a om zaw uh a, mainawt loin a nungkin zaw uh hi.
Na pu na pate uh Egypt gam panin a hong pai khiat ni uh a kipan tuni ciang dong, ni khat khit ni khat, ka nasemte ahi kamsangte ka sawl tawntung a,
ahih hangin amau in ka kamsangte’ thu ngai loin, a bil uh hong ngat lo uh a, a lungsim uh a khauhsak uh hi. A pute a pate uh sangin a sia zaw uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin Jeremiah aw, hih thute amau kiangah na va gen dinga, ahih hangin amau in a hong ngai kei ding uh hi. Amaute na sap hangin a hong dawng kei ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in amaute kiangah, ‘Hih gam pen, Topa amaute’ Pasian’ thu a mang lo gam hi a, thuhilhna sang loin, thuman om nawn lo a, thuman genin zong a nei nawn kei uh hi,’ na ci ding hi.
“Jerusalem mite aw,na lu uh mettol un.Na sam uh paai mang unla,mualtungah va kap un.Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa inhih a gilo khang mite ka nial zo a,ka taisan khinzo hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh, Topa in kong cih in-ah, Judah mite in hoih ka sak loh nate a hih khinzo uh hi. Ka min tawh a kilo ka biakinn a nitsak nadingun a kihhuai milimte a koih uh hi.
Hinnom Kuam-ah a tapate a tanute uh mei sungah a hallupna ding uh Tofeth a kici biakna tau khat a bawl uh hi. Tua pen kei’ sawl lah hi loin, zong ka ngaihsunkha ngei beek kei hi.

Tua ahih manin en un, Topa in kong cih in-ah, tua mun pen Tofeth ahi zongin Hinnom Kuam ahi zongin a kicih nawn loh hun hong tung ding hi. Kithahna Kuam a kici zaw ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Tofeth munah mun awng a om nawn lo zah dongin misite a kivui ding hi.
Misi luangte huihlak a leeng vasate le leitungah a om ganhingte’ an a suak ding uh a, tuate a delh mang ding kuamah om lo ding hi.

Tua ciangin Judah gam khuapite le Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah gualnopna le lungdamna awte le zinei thakte le mothakte’ awte ka gingsak nawn kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua mun kinusia ding hi.
“Tua hun ciangin, Topa in kong cih in-ah, Judah gam kumpite’ guhte, uliante’ guhte, siampite’ guhte, kamsangte’ guhte le Jerusalem khuamite’ guhte a han sung uh panin kila khia ding hi.

Amaute in a it uh, a na a sepsak uh, a delh uh, a zon uh le a biak uh ahi ni le kha le vana om nate khempeuh mai-ah a kipho khia ding hi. Tua guhte kikhawm nawn lo dinga, kiphum nawn lo ding hi. Leilak a ek kinusia bang ahi lel ding hi.
Hih a gilo minamte’ lakah a omlai sunteng in ka hawl khiatna munah nuntak ding sangin sih ding a teel zaw ding uh hi, Vanglian Topa in kong ci hi.Mawhna le Thukhenna
“Jeremiah aw,Topa in hih bangin gen hi,ci-in amaute kiangah va gen in.Mi khat a puk cianginthokik buang hi lo ahi hiam?Mi khat in lam a khialh cianginhong kilehkik buang hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua ahihleh bang hanginhih mite lam khialinhong kilehkik nawn lo ahi uh hiam?Zuau pasian milimte lenkip uh a,hong kilehkik nuam lo uh hi.
Amau’ thugente ka ngaihsak a,kuamah in thuman gen lo uh hi.A gitlohna uh panin kuamah kisik lo a,‘Bang hih ka hi hiam?’ ci lel uh hi.Sakol galsim ding a tai banginamau’ tum ciatin a pai uh hi.
Gun vapite nangawn ina lal hun ding thei uh a,sumkuangte, phialphiahte,le gun vapite zonga hun ciangin hong tung zel uh hi.Ahih hangin ka mite inTopa’ ngeina kipte a thei kei uh hi.
Bangci bangin note in,‘Ko ka pil uh a,Topa’ thukham ka nei uh hi,’ci thei ding na hi uh hiam?En un, thuman lo lai theite intua thukham zuauthu a suah uh hi.
Na mipilte uh maizum ding uh a,lungmangin a cih nadinga thei kei ding uh hi.En un, amaute inTopa’ thu nial uh hi.Bang pilna nei nawn ahi uh hiam?

Tua ahih manin a zite uhmidangte ka piaksak dinga,a lote uh zongmidangte ka luahsak ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leha neu pen pan a lian pen donginthuman lopi tawh sum zongina huaiham uh hi.Kamsangte a kipansiampite dongin thuman lo khin uh hi.
Amaute in ka mite’ thuaknatethupi simsak lo uh a,hoihna a om keei lopi,‘Hoih hi, hoih hi,’ ci mawkmawk uh hi.

Hih a kihhuai nate a sep uh ciangina maizum beek uh hiam?Maizum beek lo uh a,kisuangthei beek lo uh hi.Tua ahih manina site lak mahah amau zong si ding uh a,gim ka piak ni ciangina kilawn khia ding uh hi,Topa in kong ci hi.
“Topa in kong cih in-ah,amaute ka susia khin dinga,a lote uhah leenggaha om nawn kei ding hi.Thei in zonggah a nei nawn kei ding hi.A tehte nangawn keu dinga,amaute ka piaksa nate a bei ding uh hi.

“Tua ciangin mite in,‘Bang hangin tutu lai ihi hiam?Kikaikhawm unlakhuapi muanhuaite va beel ni;tua lai-ah va si ni.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’ tungah i mawh maninTopa i Pasian ineite a si dingin hong seh khinzo a,i dawn dingin gu tui hong pia khinzo hi.
Nopna i zong a, nopna i ngah kei hi.Cidamna i lamen a, siatna bek i ngah hi.
Leilu lam Dan khua pek paningalte’ sakol nakging kiza hi.A sakol hatte’ hamna awging ingamlelei liingsak hi.Amaute in i gam le a sunga om teng,hong susia khin ding uh hi,’a ci ding uh hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih lehen un, note lakah gul kong khah ding hi.A kikhim zo logul guneite kong khah dinga,note hong tu ding hi,” Topa in a ci hi.Judah le Jerusalem ading Kahna
Ka dahna dam thei lo a,ka lungsim na mahmah hi.

Ngai un,gam sung mun khempeuh ahka mite’ tanute kap uh a,“Zion khua-ahTopa om nawn lo ahi hiam?A kumpipa uhom nawn lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.Topa in dawngkik a, “Bang hanginmilim bawltawmte lea gamdang milimte uh tawhkei hong hehsak ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Mite in, “An kila khinzo a,khuakhal hun zong beita napi-in,eite hong kihon nai lolailai hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ka mite’ thuakna hanginka lungsim kisia a,lungkham lua-in ka kap hi.
Gilead-ah zatui om lo ahi hiam?Zato siam om lo ahi hiam?Bang hangin ka mitedam thei lo ahi uh hiam?
Ka lutang tuikhuk hong hithei henla,ka mitte khitui nak hong hithei lehka mite’ kithahlupna hangina sun a zanin ka kapkap ding hi.
Sehnel gamlakah khawl nadingbukno khat nei thei-inka mite nusia-ina taisan thei hi leng ka ut hi.A vekpi-un angkawm hat hi khin uh a,thuman lo kim uh hi.
A leii uh thalpeu bangin zang uh a,zuauthu bekbek a lawn khiakhia uh hi.Gam sungah thuman om loinzuauthu bekbek a dim hi.Siatna lam manawh tektek uh a,kei hong thei lo uh hi,Topa in a ci hi.
Mi khempeuh a inn veengte uhkidawm uh henla,a sanggamte uh muang kei uh hen.Bang hang hiam cih lehsanggamte khem hat ciat uh a,inn veengte khempeuh zonggensiat hat ciat uh hi.
Mi khempeuh ina veengte uh khem ciat uh a,thuman gen kuamah om lo hi.A leii uh zuauthu gen dingin kisinsak uh a,mawhna a bawl manun tawllua uh a,kisik zo nawn lo uh hi.
Siatna khat khit siatna khat,a banbanin gamta uh a,zuau zong a phuakphuak uh hi.Kei hong thei nuam lo uh hi,Topa in a ci hi.
Tua ahih maninVanglian Topa in a cih in-ah,“En un, amaute a siantho nadingunsuangtui-in ka ze-et ding hi.Tua lo ka mitebangcih nawn ding ka hi hiam?
A leii uh thaltang lauhuai bang a,zuauthu a gen uh hi.A kam uh tawha inn veengte kiangah a aw-zol uh hangin,a sih nading uh a lungsim sung uhaha ngaihsun veve mawk uh hi.
Hih thute hangingim pia lo ding ka hi hiam,Topa in kong ci hi.Hih bang minam khat tungahka phu la lo ding ka hi hiam?

“Mualte adingin kapin tau unla,gamlak lonona munte adinginthumin tau un.Bang hang hiam cih lehtuate keu gawp a, kuamah pai nawn lo hi.Bawng ham zong kiza nawn lo a,vana leeng vasate le gamsatea taimangta uh hi.

“Jerusalem khuapininkholna ka bangsak dinga,se-alte’ tenna mun ka suaksak ding hi.Judah gam khuapitegamlak ka suaksak dinga,kuamah teeng nawn lo ding hi,”a ci hi.Kisiatna ding le Salsuahna ding tawh Tawnna

Tua ciangin keimah in, “Hih thu a theitel ding mipil kua om ahi hiam? Hih thu a gentel theih nadingin Topa in kua tungah hilhtel na hi hiam? Kuamah in hih gam a kantan nawn loh nadingin bang hangin kisia-in gamlak tawh kibang ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi.
Topa in, “Amaute in a mai uha ka lah ka thukham nusia uh a, ka thu hong mang loin ka cih bangin ta lo uh a,
amau’ lungsim deihna zui tentanin a pu a pate uh hilhna bangin Baal nung a zuih man uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin Vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih in-ah: En in, hih mite gamsai-in ka vak dinga, gutui ka dawnsak ding hi.
Amaute le a pute a pate’ theih ngei lohna gam dangah ka kithehthangsak dinga, a sih khit dong uh namsau ka nungdelhsak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ahih maninVanglian Topa in a cih in-ah,“Ngaihsun unla,numei kapte a hong pai dinginva sam unla,a kah siam tata vaikhak un,” a ci hi.
Mite in, “Va kinawhsak unla,i khitui a luan theih nading,i mitkhu a kawt theih nadingineite hong kah uh hen,” a ci uh hi.
Zion khua panin a kiza kahna awging in,“I kisia khinzo a,i zumhuai mahmah khinzo hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in i inntehong suksiatsak uh ahih manini gam i nusia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, “No numeite aw,Topa’ kammal ngai dih un.A kam pan a hong ging khia thuna bil uhah lutsak un.Na tanute uh a kah dan ding hilh unla,na inn veengte ciat uh kah la hilh un.
Bang hang hiam cih lehtawlet vang panin sihna hong lut a,kumpipa’ inn sungah zongsihna hong lut hi.Kongzing a naupangte vat mang a,sumbuk a tangvalte vatlum hi.
Gamlak a ki-tha ek banginmisi luang kipaithang dinga,buhlom atsa kinusia banginkuamah in a khawm kei ding hi,ci-in a gen dingin Topa inkei hong sawl hi,” ka ci hi.Pasian Theihna, Mite’ Minthanna
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Mipilte in a pilna uh kisaktheihpih kei uh henla, mi hatte in a hatna uh kisaktheihpih kei uh hen. Mihaute in zong a hauhna uh kisaktheihpih kei uh hen.
A kisatheite in, keimah, leitungah migitna, thuman le thutang a zang ka hihna le tuate sungah nuam a sapa ka hihna thu hong theihna uhah kisathei uh hen. Topa in hih thu kong gen khin hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in, “Vun ki-at hinapi-in vun ki-at mite’ gamtat bangin a gamta lote gimpiak hun hong tung ding hi.

Egypt mite, Judah mite, Edom mite, Ammon mite, Moab mite le a sam uh a mettom sehnel gam a omte khempeuh zong gim ka pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih gamte khempeuh in a vun uh at lo uh a, Israel mi khempeuh zong a lungsim sung uhah vun at lohpi ahi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian Taktak lote le Pasian TaktakIsrael mite aw,note hong hopihnaTopa’ kammal ngai dih un.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Gamdangte’ omdanciing kei unla,vantung a lim lamdangtelunghihmawhna-inngaihsun kei un.Bang hang hiam cih lehgamdang mite in tuatea lunghihmawhpih uh hi.
Hih mite’ ngeinate a kimanna om lo hi.Gamlakah sing khat kiphuk a,khutsiampa in a hei tawhmilimin a bawl hi.
Mite in tua penkham le ngun tawh zem uh a,a kilakkhiat theih loh nadinginsik tawh a kilh uh hi.

A milimte uh, tangmai huanahvasate’ lau nadingin a kikhaimilimte tawh kibangin pau thei lo uh a,lam pai thei lo uh ahih maninpuak a kul hi.Tuate kihta kei un;siatna bawl thei lo uh a,phatna zong bangmah bawl thei louh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa aw, nang tawh a kibangkuamah om lo hi.Nang na lian a,na min vanglian mahmah hi.

Gam khempeuhte’ Kumpipa aw,nang a hong kihta lo dingkua om ahi hiam?Nang, kihtak ding mah na hi hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehleitung mipil khempeuhte leamau’ gam sung khempeuh lakahnang tawh a kibang kuamah om lo hi.
A mipilte uh mihai mimawl ahi uh hi.Sing milim in amaute bangci-inhilh thei mah ding ahi hiam?
Tarshish khua paninngun seksa va la uh a,Ufaz khua panin kham va la uh hi.Khutsiamte le kham seekte inmilimin bawl uh a,siamgat siamte’ gat ahi,puan engdup lepuan sandup tawh a zem uh hi.
Ahih hanginTopa pen Pasian man hi a,amah pen a nungta Pasian letawntung kumpipa ahi hi.A heh ciangin lei kiliing a,gamte in a hehna nang zo lo hi.
Amaute’ tungah, “Vantungte le leitung a bawl lo pasian-te, leitung mun khempeuh panin a mangthang ding uh hi,” ci-in na gen ding hi.
Pasian in ama vangliatna tawhleitung bawl a,ama pilna tawh leitung piangsakin,ama siamna tawh vantung a zal hi.
Amah a pau cianginvantungah tuite ging hunhun a,leimong panin tuikhu a suaksak hi.Guahzuk nadingin khua phiasak a,huihkua panin huih a nungsak hi.
Mi khempeuh hai-in pilna nei lo khin uh a,kham seekte khempeuh ina milimte uh a maizumlawh uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih leha milimte uh zuau hi lel a,nak thei lo uh hi.
Kimanna a nei lo, a haihuaipi hi a,gim a kipiak ni ciangina kisia ding uh hi.
Jakob’ Pasian tua bang hi lo a,amah pen na khempeuha piangsak pa ahi hi.Ama mi dingin Israel mite teel a,ama min, Vanglian Topa ahi hi.Judah Gam A Kinusiatna
Galte’ umcih a thuak mite aw,na puanlom uh zial un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in,“En un, tu-in hih gam sungaha teeng mite ka lawn khia dinga,a theih nadingun a tung uhahlungkhamna ka tungsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ka thuakna hangin ka gim a,ka liamna nasia mahmah hi.Ahih hangin, “Hih gimnaka thuak ding mah hi,” ka ci hi.

Ka puanbuk hong kisuksiatsak a,a kikanna khau khempeuhkitat mangkhin hi.Ka tate in hong taisan uh a,tu-in om nawn lo uh hi.Ka puanbuk a hong lamsak ding lehka kongkhak puantea hong khaisak dingkuamah om nawn lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehmakaite hai khin uh a,Topa’ deihna dong lo uh hi.Tua thu hangin amautemapai lo uh a,a mite uh kithehthang mang hi.
Ngai dih un, thu khat kigen hi.Judah khuapitegamlak a suaksak ding lese-alte’ khua a suaksak dinginleilu lam gam panin buaina lianpi khat hong pai hi.
Topa aw, mihing’ omdanama uk theih ahih lohna ka theita a,ama kalsuanna dingama geeltheih hi lo hi.
Topa aw, a hoihbek takin,hehlua loin kei hong hilh in.Hong hehlua lecin kei ka si ding hi.
Nangmah a hong thei lo gamte tung lenangma min a hong lo ngei lo mite tungahna hehna sungsuk in.Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute inJakob’ suanlekhakte that mang khininamau’ tenna a susia khin uh hi.
A Kipalsat ThuciamnaTopa in kei hong hopih a,
“Hih thuciamna thute ngai inla, Judah mite le Jerusalem khuamite kiangah va gen in.
Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih in-ah, hih thuciamna a mang lo mi peuhmah in hamsiatna thuak tahen, ci-in va gen in.

Tua pen na pute na pate uh, sik haltuina meikhuk tawh a kibang Egypt gam pan a ka lakkhiat ni-a ka thuciamna ahi hi. Tua ni-in, ka thu hong ngai-in kong thupiakna bangin na sep uhleh, note ka mi na hi ding uh a, kei pen note’ Pasian hi-in,

tua bang na hih uhleh na pute na pate uh tungah ka ciamsa, tu-a na neih uh bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gam kong pia ding hi, ci-in thu ka pia hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin keimah in, “Hi tahen, Topa aw,” ci-in ka dawngkik hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah, “Hih thuciamna thute ngai-in a sep nadingun Judah gam khuapite le Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah va taangko in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt gam panin ka lakkhiat pan a kipan tuni ciang dong ka thu hong mang un, ci-in na pute na pate uh tungah tam veipi nakpitakin ka hilh ngitnget hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in ka thu hong mang loin a bil uh hong ngat lo uh a, a gitlohna lungsim uh a zui tentan uh hi. Hih thuciamna a zuih ding uh thu ka piak hangin hong nial veve uh ahih manin tua sunga thute a vekpi-in ka tungsak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in hong hopih leuleu a, “Judah minamte le Jerusalem khuamite in kei hong langpang uh hi.

Ka thu a ngai nuam lo a pu a pate uh’ mawhna lamah kilehhei khinzo uh a, pasian dangte’ na a sem dingin a zui khinzo uh hi. Israel mite le Judah mite in a pu a pate uh tawh ka bawlsa uh thuciamna a palsat khinzo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in kong cih in-ah, en un, a pelh theih loh uh gimna amau’ tungah ka tungsak dinga, kei kiangah a hong kap liang uh zongin ka dawng nawn kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin Judah mite le Jerusalem khuamite in meihal biakna tawh a biak uh a pasian-te uh’ kiangah pai-in a va thum ding uh hi. Ahih hangin hih gimna hong tun ciangin a hon khia thei tuan kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, Judah aw, na khua om zahzah uh pasian na nei uh a, Jerusalem khua kongzing om zahzah mah, meihal biakna tawh Baal biakna ding a zumhuai biakna taute na bawl tazen uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin Jeremiah aw, hih mite ading thu ngetsak kei inla, amau’ tangin thumsak kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in gim ngahin hong sap uh ciangin ka ngai kei ding hi.

Ka itte in siatna a bawl khit uh ciangin ka biakinn sungah bang thu nei thei nawn ding ahi uh hiam? Nong kamkhapte uh le na biakpiakna sate un na kisiatna ding uh hong kipelhsak thei ding ahi hiam? Tua ciangin note na lungdam thei ding uh hiam?
Nidang lai-in Topa in note, a hing dikdek a gahpha oliv kung tawh kong genteh ngei hi. Ahih hangin kong hal dinga, na hiangte uh kangtumin ging huhu ding hi.

Israel mite le Judah mite in meihalna tawh Baal bia-in hong hehsak uh a, hih bang siatna bawl uh ahih manin, amaute a phut keimah Vanglian Topa in amaute’ tungah siatna a tunna ding thu ka piazo hi,” hong ci hi.Jeremiah A Kisawmna
Ka galte in kei a hong sawmna uhTopa in nong hilh cianginke’n ka thei pan hi.

A kigo dingin a kipaipihmawhna a nei lo tuuno bang ka hi hi.Amaute in, “Singkunga gahphat hun laitakin phuktan ni.Ama min a kiphawk nawn loh nadinginamah thatlum ni,” ci-in a gen uh a,kei hong sawmna uh ahih lamka thei kei kha hi.
Ahih hangin thu a mantakin khenin,mihingte’ lungsim le a ngaihsutna uha entel a Vanglian Topa aw,amaute na thuhkikna kei hong musak in.Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma tungahka thu kong ap khin hi.
Tua ahih manin kei hong that nuamin, “Topa’ min tawh thu hilh kei in. Na hilh leh kote’ khutlumin na si ding hi,” a hong ci Anathoth khuamite tawh kisai-in
Vanglian Topa in, “En un, amaute gim ka pia ding hi. A tangvalte uh namsau-in si ding uh a, a tapate le a tanute uh kialin a puksi ding uh hi.
Anathoth khuamite tungah siatna tungsakin gim ka piak hun ciangin a suakta kuamah a om nawn kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Jeremiah A Lungkim lohna le Topa’ DawnkiknaTopa aw,nang tawh thu i kiseel cianginnang a tawntunginna man den hi.Ahih hangin thu khatka hong dong nuam lai hi.Bang hangin migilote daupai uh a,mikhem hatte gualzo sese ahi uh hiam?
Nangmah in amaute na suan a,amaute in zong zung kha-in,khangin, gah hong gah uh hi.A kam uh tawh hong phat khem uh a,a lungsim uh nang tawh kigamla hi.

Ahih hangin Topa aw,nangmah in kei nong thei hi.Ka gamtatnate nong mu a,nang ka hong itna thu na hong thei hi.Amaute pen gawh dingina kikoih tuu bangin kai khia inla,a kigawh ni hun dinga tun mateng tuamkoih in.

Ka gam sung bang tanveikeucip ding ahi hiam?Mun khempeuh ah lopatebang tanvei vulcip ding ahi hiam?A teng mite’ gitlohna hangingamsate le vasatea mangthang khin uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in, “I gamtatnatePasian in hong mu kei ngawn,”a ci uh hi.

Topa in, “Jeremiah aw,mite tawh tai kidem a,nangmah hong gimsak zo uh ahihleh,sakol bangci demzawh ding na hiam?A nopna munah tuk lailai na hih lehJordan gun gei sing kawm lakahbangcih ding na hi hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh na sanggamte lena innkuanpihte nangawn innang hong zuak uh a,nang a hong do dingmihonpi a kaikhawm uh hi.Kam khum tawhnang a hong zol uh hanginum kei in,” ci-in hong dawngkik hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in,“Ka inn ka nusia khin a,ka luahsa mite ka pai mangta hi.Ka it mahmah ka mite,a galte uh’ khut sungah ka piata hi.
Ka luah dingin ka teelsa mite ingamlak a humpinelkai banginkei’ langkhat ah panginhong hawksan uh ahih maninamaute ka mudah hi.
Ka mite pen, sasialne vasa gial khat,sasialne vasa dangte in a kimkot panina tuk huan nainai uh tawha kibang uh hi.Gamsate aw, hong kikhawm unla,pawi hong siim un.
Tuucing dang tampi inka leenggah lo hong suksiatsak uh a,kei a’ teng hong tuatcilsak uh hi.A hoih mahmah ka leenggah lopawnlak, gamlak, a suaksak uh hi.
Pawn lak hong suahsak uh a,dahin ka kap hi.Gam sung khempeuh a kisiat khithangin kuamah inphamawh sa lo sawnsawn uh hi.
Sehnel gam mualsang panina susia dingte hong pai zo uh hi.Gammong khat paningammong khat dongaha lungmuang kuamah om lo hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ namsau inmi khempeuh a vattuk hi.
Amaute in mangbuh tuh uh a,ahi zongin kiak bek a ngah uh hi.Nasep a hahkat mahmah hangunbangmah a ngah kei uh hi.A kihtakhuai Topa’ hehna hanginanlak hun ciangin a maizum ding uh hi,”a ci hi.

Ka mi Israel-te’ luah dingin ka piak gamh a susia nuam a gilo a veengte tawh kisai-in Topa in ka cih in-ah, “En un, a gam uh panin amaute ka bot khia dinga, amau’ khut sung panin Judah mite ka suaktasak ding hi.
Ahih hangin amaute ka lakkhiat khit ciangin ka hehpihkik dinga, amau’ luah ding amau’ gam ciatciat uhah ka koihkik ding hi.

Tua ciangin, ka mite’ omdan hoihtakin a sin uh a, Baal min tawh a kiciam dingin ka mite a sinsak mah bangun, ‘Topa a nuntak mah bangin,’ ci-in keima min tawh kiciam ding a sin uhleh ka mite lakah kiptakin a om ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin gam khat peuhpeuh in ka thu hong ngaih kei leh tua gam bot khia-in ka susia ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Dialkaih Ngot tawh ThuhilhnaTopa in kei tungah, “Pai inla patpuan dialkaih khat na lei khit ciangin kawtsak loin teeng in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong Topa’ hong gen mah bangin dialkaih khat lei-in ka teeng hi.
Topa in a nih veina hong hopih a,
“Na kawngah na teen, na dialkaih lei la in. Tho inla Eufratis gun-ah pai in. Tua lai-ah suanghawm sungah va seel in,” hong ci leuleu hi.
Kei zong pai-in Topa’ hong sawlna bangin Eufratis gun gei-ah ka seel hi.
Tua zawh ni tampi khit ciangin Topa in kei kiangah, “Eufratis gun-ah va pai inla, na seel dingin ka hong sawl na dialkaih va lakik in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong Eufratis gun-ah pai-in dialkaih ka seelna mun khuat kikin ka la hi. Dialkaih na ngot gawp khin a, zattheih ding hi nawn lo hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei hong hopih a,
“Topa in kong cih in-ah, hih bangmahin Judah mite’ kisaktheihna le Jerusalem khuate’ ki-uatsaknate ka susia ding hi.

Ka thu hong ngai nuam loin amau’ ngaihsutna bang bekin a pai tentan nuam, pasian dangte’ na a sem ding le a bia dingin a nung a zui hih migilote pen zattheih ding ahi nawn lo, hih dialkaih bang ahi ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh dialkaih, mite’ kawng tungah a belh cinten mah bangin Israel mi khempeuh le Judah mi khempeuh kei’ tungah a hong belh cinten dingin ka bawl hi. Tua hileh amaute ka mi hi ding uh a, ka minthanna, ka hoihna le ka vangliatna ding ahi ding uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in ka thu hong mang lo uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi,” hong ci hi.Leenggahzu tawh A Kidim Beelte tawh Thuhilhna

Topa Pasian in kei kiangah, “Jeremiah aw, amau’ kiangah, ‘Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a hong genin-ah, “Zu beel khempeuh leenggahzu tawh a kidim ding hi,” hong ci hi,’ va ci in. Amaute in nang kiangah, ‘Beel khempeuh leenggahzu tawh kidim ding cih kote in thei lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong cikik ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin nangmah in amaute kiangah, ‘Topa in hong cih in-ah: En un, David’ tokhom tungah a tu kumpite, siampite, kamsangte le Jerusalem khua-a a teeng mi khempeuh a kipan gam sungah a om mi khempeuh zu tawh kidim sakin ka khamsak ding hi.
Pate le tate a kipan amaute khatlekhat ka kiphusak dinga, Topa in kong cih in-ah, hehpih lo, lainat lo, it loin ka sisak ding hi, ci hi,’ va ci in,” hong ci hi.Kisikkik Lohna Hangin Tawnna
Ngai-in na bil uh ngat un;kisathei kei un.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa in thu a gen zo hi.
Topa in khua mialsak a,khuamialna mualtungah na tuk ma un,na lamet uh khuavak penkhuamial bikbek a suah ma-in,Topa na Pasian uh pahtawi un.
Ahih hangin ka thu nong ngaih keiuhleh na kisaktheihna uh hanginka kapsim dinga,khitui luanginnakpitakin ka kidik ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’ tuuhonte sal dingin kikai khia zo hi.
Topa in kei kiangah,“Kumpipa le a nu kiangah,‘Na kumpi tokhomte tung panunhong tuaksuk un.Bang hang hiam cih lehna kumpi lukhute uhna lu tung uh paninkia khinzo hi,’ va ci in.
Negeb gam a omkhua kongpite lah kikhak a,kuamah lut thei nawn lo hi.Judah mite zong salin kikai a,a vekun sal suak khin uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Jerusalem khua aw, khuadak inla,leilu lam panin a hong paiteen dih in.Nangmah a hong kipia a hoihmahmah na tuuhonte koi-ah om ahi hiam?
Nangma lawm dinginna bawl mite teekteek innang hong uk ni cianginbang na ci ding hiam?Numei nausuakte inna a sak velval uh banginnang zong na na sa ding hi.
Bang hangin hih thutekei tungah hong tung ahi hiam,ci-in na ngaihsut leh na mawhnaa liatluatna hang ahi hi.Tua thu hanginna nik hong kihawk gawp a,a hong kibuan gawp ahi hi.
Ethiopia mivomte ina vun uh khek thei a,kamkei in a gial khek thei ahi hiam?A khek theih uhleh siatna bawl dinga zongsang khin note in zonga hoih na bawl thei ding uh hi.
Sehnel gam panin a hong nung huihin buhvai a mut banginnote kong thehthang ding hi.
Hih pen nangma ngah dinginka hong sehsak ahi hi,Topa in kong ci hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehkei na hong mangngilh a,pasian zuau peuh na um hi.
Kei mahmah inna nik kong hawksak dinga,kong maizumsak ding hi.

Na kihhuainate, na angkawmna,na hukna le gamlak mualtungahnumei paktat bangin milim pasianpeuh na biak kawikawinateka mu zo hi.Jerusalem aw, gimna ngah ta in.Na siantho nadingin bangtanvei sawt ding ahi hiam, a ci hi.
Guah Zuk lohna ThuGuah zu loin khua keuna tawh kisai-in Topa in Jerusalem kiangah hih bangin a gen hi:
“Judah gam kap a,a khuapite mai mang dekdek hi.A mite in puan vom khu-inleilakah bok uh a,Jerusalem khua-a ommite’ kahna aw ging hi.
Uliante in a nasemte uhtuitawi dingin sawl uh a,tuikhuk a zuat uhleh tui na om lo hi.A beel hawm uh tawh hong kilehkik uh a,lungkhamin cih nading thei loina lu uh puan a khuh uh hi.
Lokhote lungmang uh a,a lu uh puan a khuh uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehguah zu lo ahih manin lei a keu gawp hi.
Lopa om lo lua ahih maninsazuk in gamlakah a no a nusia liang hi.
Gam sakolte,bangmah om lohna mualtungahse-alte bangin a nak huhu uh hi.Lopa om lo ahih manina hak zo kei uh hi.

Ka mite in kei tungah,‘Topa aw, ka mawhna uhkote’ langkhat ah hong pang ahi ta zonginnangma min hangin kote hong hehpih in.Kote in tam veipinang kong nungngat uh a,nangma tungahka hong khial khinzo uh hi.
Israel mite’ lamet pa aw,haksat hun cianginko a hong hon khia pa na hi hi.Bang hangin ka gam sung uhahkhualmi bangin nang ominkhualzin zan khat bek a taam banginhong om na hi hiam?

Bang hangin mi lungkia gawp bangin omin,a hon khia thei lo galkap pa banginom na hi hiam?Ahih hangin Topa aw,kote’ laizangah nang na om a,nangma minin kote hong kisam hi.Kote hong nusia kei in,’hong ci uh hi,” hong ci hi.

Hih mite tawh kisai-in Topa in thu gen a,“Kei kiang panin amautevak khia kawikawi nuam uh a,a kideek kei uh hi.Tua ahih manin Topa keimah inamaute ka sang kei a,a khialhnate uh phawkin,a mawhnate uh hangingim ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in kei kiangah, “Hih mite in thupha a ngah nadingin thu hong ngen nawn kei in.

An a tan uh hangin amau’ thumna ka ngai kei dinga, meihal biakna le an tawh biaknate hong piak uh hangin ka sang kei ding hi. Amaute namsau tawh ahi zongin, kial tawh ahi zongin, pulnatna tawh ahi zongin ka sisak zaw ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin keimah in, “Ah, Topa Pasian aw, en dih in. Kamsangte in amaute kiangah, ‘Note in namsau ahi zongin, kial ahi zongin na mukha ngei kei ding uh a, hih munah Pasian in lungnopna kip hong pia ding hi,’ a ci uh hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in, “Tua kamsangte in kei’ min suangin zuauthu hong gen uh hi. Amaute ka sawl kei a, thu ka pia kei a, zong ka hopih kei hi. Note kiangah hong gen uh thute a man lo maangmuhna, bangmahin a kimang lo aisanna le amau’ ngaihsuttawm thute ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ka sawl lohpi, ‘Hih gam sungah namsau ahi zongin, kial ahi zongin hong tung lo ding hi,’ ci-in keima min suangin thu a gen kamsangte tawh kisai-in Topa in ka cih in-ah, namsau le kial tawh hih kamsangte a si khin ding uh hi.

A hilh uh mite in zong kial le namsau thuakin amaute a kipan a zite uh, a tapate uh le a tanute uh Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah kipaithang dinga, kuamah in a vui kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gitlohna amau’ tung mahah ka buaksuk ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,“Jeremiah aw, amaute kiangah,‘Sun le zaninka khitui luangluang henla,kang ngei kei tahen.Bang hang hiam cih leh keima mitein nakpitakin liamna thuak uh a,nakpitakin a kisat uh hi.

Lolai-ah pai khia leng,namsau tawh a kithatmi bekbek ka mu a,khuapi sungah lut leng,kialin a puksite bekbek ka mu hi.Kamsangte le siampite inkoi-ah pai ding cih thei lopi-ingam sungah an ngenina vak kawikawi uh hi,’ci-in va gen in,” hong ci hi.

Topa aw, nangmah in Judah gamnialsiang khinzo na hi hiam?Zion khua kihhuai sa na hi hiam?Bang hangin kote liamna hong thuaksak a,hong damsak nawn lo na hi hiam?Lungnopna ka lamen uh a,hoihna bangmah a hong tung kei hi.Damna ding hun ka lamen uh a,lauhuaina bekbek ka mu uh hi.
Topa aw, ka gitlohna uh leka pute ka pate uh gitlohnateka hong pulak uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma tungahka hong mawh khin uh hi.
Nangma min na khualna-inkote hong nolh kei inla,a vanglian na tokhommindaisak kei ta in.Kote tawh nong thuciamnahong phawk inla, hong ciampel kei ta in.

Gamdang pasian zuaute’ lakahguah a zusak thei om ahi hiam?Tua ahih kei leh zongvantungmi in ama thu-inguah zu tawmsak thei ahi hiam?Tua bang a hih theinang bek hi lo na hi hiam?Topa kote’ Pasian aw, nangmah intuate khempeuh hih na hih maninnangma sungahlametna kong nei uh hi.

Judah Mite tungah Topa’ HehnaTua ciangin Topa in kei hong hopih a, “Moses le Samuel nangawn ka mai-ah hong dingin hong thum uh zongin hih mite ka hehpih tuan kei ding hi. Ka muhna panin hawl khia unla, pai khiasak un.

Amaute in, ‘Koi-ah pai ding ka hi uh hiam?’ ci-in hong dot uhleh hih bangin genkik in:‘Topa in, “Pulnatna tawh a si dingtepul-in si ding uh a,namsau tawh a si dingtenamsau-in si ding uh hi.Kial tawh a puksi dingtekialin si ding uh a,sala kikai dingte zongsalin kikai ding uh hi,”a ci hi,’ va ci in.

“Amaute’ sih nadingin gimna nam li ka tungsak ding hi. A kithahna ding uh namsau, a keizan gawp dingin ui, a valhtum ding le a susia gawp dingin huihlak a vasate le leilak a ganhingte ka koih ding hi.
Judah kumpi Hezekiah’ tapa Manasseh in Jerusalem khua-ah hih bangin a bawl thu leitung gam khempeuhte in mu-in a lau ding uh hi.
“Kua in nang hong hehpih ding ahi hiam?Jerusalem aw, kua in nanghong kah ding ahi hiam?Kua, hong lambaangin,damlenat kitheihsakna-inhong hawh ding ahi hiam?
Nangmah in kei nong taisan zo hi,Topa in kong ci hi.Kei nong nungngat niloh hi.Tua ahih manin ka khut zaninnang kong susia hi.Ka hehnaka ki-ip zo nawn kei hi.

Na gam sung khua kongpite-ahhuihpi’ mut banginnote kong mut mang ding hi.Na tate uh ka beisak dinga,ka mite ka susia ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh na gitlohna uh lena omdan hoih lo panunna kiheikik kei uh hi.

Tuipi a sehnel omzah sanginnupi meigong ka tamsak zaw ding hi.Na tangvalte uha khan laitakin ka that dinga,a nute uh ka lunggimsak ding hi.Note’ tungah thakhat thu-inlungkhamna le launaka hong tungsak ding hi.

Ta sagih a nei nupikhakham vei-in a sibup hi.Sunkim lai hinapiama adingin khuamial bang a,maizumna le mindaina a thuak hi.No a nungta laite na galte un namsau tawha hong satlup dingun kong pia ding hi,Topa in kong ci hi,” a hong ci hi.

Gimna ka thuak hi; ka nu aw, gam sung khempeuh a mite tawh a kitawng a kiseel dingin kei nong suaksak hi. Ka sumte kuamah lah leitawisak loin kuama-a’ lah leitawi la lo napi, a vekpi-un kei hong hamsiat teitei uh hi.
Topa aw, amaute’ hoih nadingin nang tungah kong thumsak kei a, gimna le haksatna hun ciangin ka galte adingin nang’ tungah kong ngetsak kei leh tua amau’ hong hamsiatnate kei’ tungah hong tung tahen!
Mi khat in sik kuaitan zo lo ding ahihleh leilu lama sik le sumngo kihel khawm kuaitan zo zaw ding ahi hiam?
Topa in, “Na gam sungteng a na bawl uh mawhna khempeuhte’ hangin na neih na lam uh le na sum na paite uh man ngah loin na galte uh ka tuahsak mang ding hi.
Na theih ngei loh uh gam khatah na galte uh’ na ka hong semsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hehna mei bangin kitawhkuang a, a mit nawn kei ding hi,” a hong ci hi.Topa in Jeremiah A Ompihna Gen

Tua ciangin keimah in:Topa aw, nang na thei hi.Hong phawk inla hong veh in.Kei a hong bawlsiate tungahphu hong laksak in.Ka galte tungah na lungduaina hanginkei’ sih nading piangsak kei in.Nangma hangin minsiatnaa thuak ka hihlam hong thei in.
Na thute in kei hong kem a,an bangin ka ne hi.Na thute kei adinginkipahna le lungdamna ahi hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehnangma minin kei hong kilo hi,aw, Topa, Vanglian Pasian aw.
Mi gualnuam mawkmawkte tawhka kikhawl kei a,zong ka lungdam khawm kei hi.Nangma thu kong manna hanginkei tangkai ka hih manina hehin ka omden hi.
Bang hangin ka natna dai thei lo a,ka liamna dam thei lo a,dam nuam het lo ahi hiam?Tui a kang lui tawh kibangin lungkiatnahong thuaksak ding na hi hiam, ka ci hi.

Tua ahih manin Topa in,“Na hong kilehkik lehkong koihna ngei-ah kong koihkik dinga,ka na na semkik ding hi.Thu manpha lo gen lointhu manpha bek na gen leh,ka kamsang dingin ka hong zang ding hi.Nang kiangah amaute hong pai ding uh a,nang na hih leh amau’ kiangahna pai kei ding hi.

Hih mite tungah sumngo a kibawlkhuakulhpi kong bangsak dinga,amaute in a hong sim uh hangina hong zo kei ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih leha hong hon khia ding lea hong suaktasak dinginnang ka hong ompih hi,Topa in ka hong ci hi.
Migilote’ khut sung paninnang kong suaktasak dinga,mi lauhuaite’ khut sung paninnang kong hon khia ding hi,” a hong ci hi.
Mite’ Tungah Topa’ ThukhennaTopa in kei hong hopih a,
“Hih bang munah zi nei kei inla, tanu tapa zong nei kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mun a suak tanu tapate le a nute uh tawh kisai-in Topa in ka cih in-ah:

Natna lian tawh si ding uh a, kuamah in kah loin kuamah in zong a vui kei ding uh hi. Leilak a ek ki-tha a bang lel ding uh hi. Namsau le kial tawh a si ding uh a, a luanghawmte uh huihlaka a leeng vasate le leilaka ganhingte in a ne ding uh hi.

“Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih in-ah, mi’ kahna inn sungah lut kei unla, thumin kuamah va kah se kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh lungnopna, itna lianpi le ka hehpihna hih mite kiang panin ka la khia khinzo hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Hih gamah miliante le mineute si ding uh a, kivui loin, amau’ hangin kuamah kap loin, kuamah in a pumpi uh kuiliam loin a sam uh zong a met kei ding uh hi.
Misi hangin a kapte hehnep nadingin kuamah in anletui a lui kei ding uh a, a nu ahih kei leh a pa a site nangawn kuamah in a hehnem kei ding hi.
Pawi kibawlna inn-ah na pai kei ding uh a, amaute tawh a ne a dawnkhawm dingin na tu kei ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin kong ci hi: En un, hih mun panin note’ muh teekteekin, note’ theih hunsung mahin gualnopna, lungdamna awte le zinei thakte, pasalnei thakte’ awte ka gingsak nawn kei ding hi.

“Hih thuteng hih mite tungah na gen ciangin amaute in, ‘Bang hangin Topa in hih gimna lianpi eite tungah hong tungsak ahi hiam? I khialhna bang ahi hiam? Topa i Pasian’ tungah bang mawhna bawl ihi hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in amaute kiangah, ‘Topa in, “Na pu na pate un kei hong taisan khin uh a, kei hong nusia-in ka thukham a zui kei uh hi.
Note, na pu na pate sangun na siahuai zaw uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh en un, note’ utna bang ciat na zui tentan uh a, ka thu nong ngai nuam kei uh hi.

Tua ahih manin hih gam panin note le na pu na pate un na theih ngei loh uh gamah kong not khia ding hi. Tua lai-ah sun le zanin pasian dangte’ na na sem niloh ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note kong angvan nawn kei ding hi,” ci hi,’ na ci ding hi.
“Tua ahih manin, en un, Topa in kong cih in-ah, kuamah in, ‘Egypt gam panin Israel mite a hong la khia Topa a nuntak bangin,’ ci-in kei’ minin a kiciam nawn loh hun hong tung ding hi.

Amaute in, ‘Leilu lam gam le eite hong hawl khiatna gam khempeuh panin Israel mite a hong kaikhawm Topa a nuntak bangin,’ a ci zaw ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pu a pate uh ka piaksa, amau’ neihsa gamah amaute ka paipih ding hi.

“En un, Topa in kong cih in-ah, ngabeng tampi ka khah dinga, amaute ka mansak ding hi. Tua khit ciangin sabeng tampi ka khah dinga, amaute in mual tung khempeuh le suanghawmte lakah amaute a beng ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a omdan khempeuh uh ka mitin ka mu a, kei’ kiang panin a kiseel bangmah om lo hi. A khialhna khempeuh uh zong ka mu hi.

Amaute’ khialhna le a mawhnate uh a zah nihin ka thuk ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a muhthadahhuai siluang hawmte tawh a kibang milimte tawh ka gam a ninsak uh a, kihhuaina tawh ka gamh a dimsak uh hi,” hong ci hi.

Aw Topa, ka hatna le ka kulhpi,lungkham hun cianginka bukna pa aw,leimong panin gamdang mitenangma kiangahhong pai ding uh a,“Ka pu ka pate un zuauthu lebangmahin a kimang lo milimtelongal bangmah dang a luah kei ding uh hi.
Mi in ama pasian dingbawltawm thei ahi hiam?Tuate pasian hi lo hi,”hong ci ding uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin amaute ka hilh ding hi. Tutung peuhmahin Topa ka hihna thu a hong theih nadingun ka vangliatna le ka hatna ka theisak ding hi,” ci-in Topa in a gen hi.

Judah Mite’ Lungtang Tungah Mawhna KigelhTopa in a genna-ah, “Judah mite’ mawhna sik laikung khat tawh kigelh hi. Suangmanpha mukzum tawh amaute’ lungtang peek tung le biakna tau kite tungah khuakin ki-at hi.
A tate un singniim nuai khempeuh le mualsangte’ tunga a biakna taute uh le a nusian uh Asherah milimte phawk veve uh a,
zanglei-a om mualte tungah zong tua mawhna a kilang hi. Na gam sung khempeuh uhah na bawl uh mawhnate hangin na neih na lam uh le na sum na paite uh, na galte uh ka tuahmangsak ding hi.

Note kong piak na gam uh zong na taan ding uh a, na theih ngei loh uh gam khatah na galte uh’ na ka hong semsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hehna kitawhkuang a, a mit nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in kong cih in-ah:“Mi bek muangin mi’ hatna bek suang a,Topa tawh a lungsim a kilehngat mi inhamsiatna a ngah ahi hi.
Amah pen sehnel gamaha po sawlbawk bang hi a,khangin a bawk a pha zo kei ding hi.Kuama ten lohna ci gam,keugaw gamah amah a teeng ding hi.
“Topa muanginamah a beel mi in thupha a ngah ahi hi.
Amah, gun gei-a a kisuansingkung bang hi a,lui gei-ah a zung a kha hi.A tehte hing den ahih maninnisa kihta lo hi.Tatsat loin gah den ahih maninguah zuk loh kum ciangin zonglungkham tuan lo hi.
“Na khempeuh lakahlungsim a khem hat pen hi a,a kisia pha mahmah ahi hi.Kua in lungsim thei zo dingahi hiam?
Keimah Topa inmi khempeuh’ nuntakzia lea gamtatna tawh kizui-in a pia khia dinginngaihsutna ka entel a,lungsim ka sittel hi,” a ci hi.
Thuman lopi tawh a hau mi penama tui lopi a keuhsak dingina opsim vasa tawh kibang hi.A khan lai-in a neihsa tengtaan dinga,a tawpna-ah mihaipi a suak ding hi.
I biakinnpi pena kipat cil-in mualtungah a oma minthang mahmahkumpi tokhom tawh kibang hi.

Aw Topa, Israel mite’ lamet pa aw,nang a hong taisan mitea zahhuai ding uh hi.Nang a hong lehngatsan miteleivui lak a min gelh bangina mangthang uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehnuntakna ciktui ahi Topaa hong taisan zo uh hi.
Topa aw, hong damsak lecinka natna teng bei dinga,hong hon khia lecinkei ka suakta ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh nang penka hong phatpa na hi hi.
En in, amaute in, “Topa’ hong tawnnatekoi lai takah om ahi hiam?Tu-in hong tungta hen!” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute tungahgimna na tunsak ding kong ngen kei a,siatna ni hong tun dingka deihsak lohlam zong na hong thei hi.Ka kam panina ging khia thu khempeuh na thei khin hi.
Kei hong lausak kei in.Gimna hong tun cianginkong belh pa na hi hi.

Kei hong bawlsiatena zahhuaisak inla,ahih hangin kei hongzahhuaisak kei in.Amaute lung-amsak inla,ahih hangin kei hong lung-amsak kei in.Amaute tungah siatna ni tungsak inla, a zah nihin susia in!Sabbath Ni Sianthosak Kul
Topa in kei kiangah, “Va pai inla, Judah gam kumpite’ lutna le pusuahna Mite’ Kongpi le Jerusalem khua kongpite khempeuh ah va ding inla, hih bangin va gen in:
‘Hih kongpi sunga hong lut no Judah gam kumpite, Judah mi khempeuh le Jerusalem khuami khempeuhte aw, Topa’ kammal ngai un.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Na nuntak nop lai uhleh kidawm unla, Sabbath ni-in van pua kei un. Jerusalem khua kongpite-ah bangmah hong lutpih kei un.
Sabbath ni-in na inn uhah bangmah sem kei un. Na pu na pate uh ka thupiak mah bangin Sabbath ni siangthosak un.
Ahih hangin na pu na pate un ka thu hong ngai lo uh a, a bil uh hong ngat lo uh hi. Ka thu hong mang lo uh a, ka hilhna a theih loh nadingun a lungsim uh a khauhsak uh hi.
“‘Ahih hangin Topa in kong cih in-ah, note in ka thu nong ngaih uh a, Sabbath ni-in hih khua kongpite-ah bangmah hong lutpih loin, Sabbath ni siangthosakin, na na sep kei uhleh,

na kumpite uh le na uliante un David’ neih bang kumpi vangliatna a nei ding uh hi. Amaute in Judah mite le Jerusalem khuamite tawh sakol leeng le sakolte tungah tuangin hih khua kongpite-ah hong lut ding uh a, hih khuapi-ah zong mi teeng tawntung ding hi.

Mite in Judah gam khuapite le Jerusalem khua kiim panin ahi zongin, Benjamin gam, Shefelah zanglei gam, mual tung gam le leitaw lam Negeb gamte panin ahi zongin meihal biakna le biakpiaknate, an tawh biakna, paknamtui le lungdam biakpiaknate, Topa’ biakinn-ah hong pia ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin ka thu nong ngaih kei uh a, Sabbath ni siangthosak loin, Jerusalem khua kongpite-ah van pua-in nong lutpih uhleh, tua kongpite ka hal ding hi. A mei in Jerusalem khua kumpi innte lawhin kaangtum dinga, a mei a kiphelh zo kei ding hi,’ va ci in,” hong ci hi.
Beelseek pa’ Beelseekna tawh ThuhilhnaTopa in kei hong hopih a,
“Tho in. Beelseek pa’ inn-ah paisuk inla, tua lai-ah ka thute kong hilh ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong beelseek pa’ inn-ah ka paisuk leh beel a sek laitak ka va tuakkha hi.
Buan tawh a bawl a beel ama khut sungah kisia ahih manin beelseek pa in hoih a sak bangin beel dang khatin a sek pha hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah,

“Israel mite aw, Topa in kong cih in-ah, hih beelseek pa’ hih bangin note zong hong hih thei lo ding ka hi hiam? En un, beelseek pa’ khutsunga buan tawh kibangin, Israel mite aw, kei’ khut sungah note na om uh hi.
Minam khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin, gam khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin bot khia-in, khenkhamin, ka suksiatna ding thu, hun khat peuhpeuh lai-in ka gen khinzo ahi zongin
tua ka gensa minam le gam a siatna panin a kiheikik leh, ama tungah siatna tunsak dingin ka sehsa pen ka kisikkik dinga, ka tungsak nawn kei ding hi.
Minam khat peuhpeuh ahi a, gam khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin lam ding le phut dingin hun khat peuhpeuh lai-in ka gen khinzo ahi zongin,
amah in ka thu hong ngai loin, hoih ka sak lohte a bawl teitei leh, ama tungah hoihna bawl ding ka sehsa pen ka kisikkik dinga, ka bawl nawn kei ding hi.

Tua ahih manin tu-in, Judah mite le Jerusalem khuamite’ kiangah Topa in a cih in-ah, ‘En un, note’ siatna ding ka geel a, note’ langkhat ah ngimna khat ka nei hi. Na vekpi-un na siatna uh pan kilehkik unla, na omdan uh le na nasepnate uh bawlpha un,’ va ci in.
Amaute in, ‘Tua bang gen kul lo hi. Ko’ ngimna bangin ka gamta ding uh a, mi khempeuh ama lungsim sia’ deihna bangin a gamta ding uh hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih in-ah:Minam dangte’ lakahhih bang thu a kiza ngei hiam,dong dih un.Keima mituam Israel ina mulkimhuai mahmahna khat a hih zo hi.
Lebanon mual tungvuk in susia ngei ahi hiam?Mual tung panin a hong luanga vot kilkel luite kang ngei ahi hiam?
Ahih hangin ka mite inkei hong mangngilh khin uh a,milim pasian-te kiangahpaknamtui a hal uh hi.Amau’ tot ding lampi-ahtuk uh ahih manina tot ngei uh lampi lui zui nawn loin,lampi lopi a tawn uh hi.
Amaute’ gam pena mulkimhuai le simmawhna tawha kiphitsan den ding gama suaksak uh hi.Tua gam a kantan khempeuhmulkim mahmah uh a,lamdangsa-in a lu uh a pei uh hi.

Nisuahna lam huih innin a mut mang bangina galte uh mai-ahamaute ka thehthang ding hi.Haksatna a tuah ni-unamaute ka nungngat dinga,ka maingat kei ding hi,” hong ci hi.Mite’ Sawmna le Jeremiah’ Thungetna

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hong pai un, Jeremiah sawm ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh eite a hong hilh dingin siampite ahi zongin, i dot ding mipilte ahi zongin, Pasian’ thu a hong gen dingin kamsangte ahi zongin i nei hi. Hong pai un, amah mawhsakin ama thu peuhmah mal khat zong i mang kei ding hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Hong en in, Topa aw,keima hong thugennate leka galte in keima thu a gennatehong ngai in.
