Hoihna pen siatna tawha kituak ding mah ahi hiam?Keimah hong siahna-ingum a to uh hi.Nangma mai-ah kong dinga,amau ading thuhoih kong gen hi.Na hehna amaute tungahna tunsak loh nadinginka hong ngetnate hong phawk in.

Tua ahih manin a tate uhkial tawh puksisak inla,amaute namsau-in sisak in.A zite uh ta neisak kei inla,meigong suaksak in.A pasalte uh pulnatna tawh sisak inla,a tangvalte uh gal sungahnamsau tawh kithatlumsak in.
Amau a thatlum ding galkaptethakhat thu-in paisak inla,amau’ innte panin kahna aw kizasak in!Bang hang hiam cih lehka kiat nadingin gum to uh a,ka khete a awk nadinginthang a hong siah uh hi.

Ahih hangin Topa aw,amaute in thah dingin keia hong sawmna uh nangna thei hi.Amau’ khialhnate na maisak kei inla,nangma muhna paninamau’ mawhnatephiatmangsak kei in.Nangma mai-ah amauteguallelsak inla,na heh ni mahin hih ek in.
Beel Kitam tawh ThuhilhnaTopa in hong hopih a, “Beelseek pa kiangah pai inla, leibeel khat va lei in. Mite’ lakah upa pawlkhat le siampi upa pawlkhat tonpih inla,
nisuahna lam kongpi gei, Hinnom kuam-ah pai-in, kong gen thute tua lai-ah va taangko in.

Nangmah in, ‘Judah kumpite le Jerusalem khuamite aw, Topa’ kammal ngai un. Vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong cih in-ah: En un, hih munah kong tunsak ding siatna lianlua ahih manin a za mi khempeuhte’ bil sungah ging den ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite in kei hong taisan khinzo uh a, amaute a kipanin a pu a pate uh le Judah kumpite’ theih ngei loh pasian dangte’ kiangah paknamtui halin, hih mun a ninsak uh hi. Hih mun pen mawhna nei lo mite thahna sisan tawh dimsak uh a,
ka thupiak ahi lo, ka ngaihsutkhak beek zong ahi lo, a tate uh meihal biakna tawh Baal biak nadingin Baal biakna tau sangte a lam khinzo uh hi.
Tua ahih manin, en un, Topa in kong cih in-ah, hih mun pen Tofeth ahi zongin Hinnom Kuam ahi zongin a kicih nawn loh hun hong tung ding hi. Kithahna Kuam a kici zaw ding hi.

Hih munah Judah mite le Jerusalem mite’ ngimna ka tangtungsak kei dinga, a galte uh’ namsau le a that nuamte’ khutlumin amaute ka sisak ding hi. Amau’ luanghawmte huihlaka leeng vasate le leilak ganhingte’ an dingin ka pia ding hi.
Hih khuapi a mulkimhuai le a simmawhhuai ka suaksak dinga, a kantan mi khempeuh in khuapi siatna hangin lamdangsa-in zahpihin a phitsan ding uh hi.
A galte uh le a that nuam mite in, amaute sim ding uh a, nek ding om lo lua ahih manin a tapate le a tanute uh’ sa ka nesak dinga, mi khempeuh in a veengte’ sa a ne ding uh hi,’ va ci in.
“Tua ciangin na tonpihte’ muhin na beel sukham inla,

amaute kiangah, Vanglian Topa in a cih in-ah, hih beelseek pa’ beel kisukham a, a kibawlphatkik theih nawn loh bangmahin hih mite le hih khuapi ka sukham ding hi. Mun dangah si vuina ding mun om nawn lo ding ahih manin Tofeth nangawnah a kivui ding uh hi.
Topa in kong cih in-ah, hih mun le hih mun a teeng mite tungah tu-a bangin ka hih dinga, hih khuapi Tofeth ka bangsak ding hi.

Jerusalem khua-a innte le Judah kumpite’ innte a kipan, innkhum zangah vantung a aksite khempeuh tungah paknamtui hal biakna a kipiakna innte le pasian dangte tungah dawn ding biakna a kibuakna innte khempeuh a vekin Tofeth mun bangin a nin a suak ding hi, ci hi, va ci in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in thu gen dinga hong sawlna Tofeth panin ka ciahkik a, Topa’ biakinn sungah dingin mi khempeuh kiangah thu ka gen a,

“Vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a cih in-ah: En un, hih khuapi le a kiima khuaneute tungah ka gensa siatna khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a lungsim uh khauhsak uh a, ka thute a ngai nuam kei uh hi, ci hi,” ka ci hi.
Pashhur Tungah Siatna TungJeremiah in a gen hih thute, Immer’ tapa, Topa’ biakinn ukpa ahi siampi Pashhur in a za hi.
Tua ciangin Pashhur in kamsang Jeremiah sat a, Benjamin Kongpi saknung gei, Topa’ biakinn sungah kol a bulh hi.
A zing ciangin Pashhur in a kolbulhna panin Jeremiah a khah khit ciangin Jeremiah in, “Topa in nang, Pashhur ci-in hong sam nawn lo a, ‘Mun Khempeuh ah Launa,’ ci-in hong samta hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hong cih in-ah, ‘En in, keimah in nang le na lawmte’ lau nadingin nang kong bawl ding hi. Babylon kumpipa’ khut sungah Judah gam khempeuh ka pia ding hi. Amah in sal dingin amaute Babylon khua-ah paipih dinga, namsau tawh a thatlum ding hi.

Tua tham loin khuapi sunga hauhna khempeuh, a nasepsa uh khempeuh, a neih a lam a thupi teng khempeuh uh le Judah kumpite’ sumlepai khempeuhte a galte’ khut sungah ka pia dinga, amaute in sutin, manin, Babylon khua-ah a paipih ding uh hi.

Pashhur aw, nang le na inn sung uha omte khempeuh sal dingin Babylon khua-ah na pai ding uh a, tua lai munah nang na si ding hi. Nang a kipan a man lopi a na thuhilh a ngai na lawmte khempeuh hong kivui ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Jeremiah’ Tamlawhna
Topa aw, kei nong khem a,khemna ka thuak takpi hi.Kei sangin nang na hat zaw a,keimah nong zo hi.Nisimin mite’ nuihsat lel ka suak a,mi khempeuh in kei hong zahko uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehthu ka gen simin,“Ngongtatna le kisiatna!”ci-in ka kiko den hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’ kammal ka gen khiatna hanginnisimin simmawhna lezahpihna ka thuaklawh hi.

Keimah in, “Ama thu ka gen kei dinga, ama min ka lo kei ding hi,”ci mah leng zong,ama thu ka lungsim sungahmei bangin hong kuang a,ka guh ka tang sungahkikhumcip ahih maninka ki-ipipna-in ka gimlua a,gen loin ka om thei kei hi.

Mite’ kihuau simna thu tampika za a,mun khempeuh lauhuai hi.Ka lawm itte khempeuh inka cihmawh ding hong ngak gige uh a,“A mawhna pulak ni! A mawhna pulak ni!Amah i khem zo kha ding hi.Tua hileh i zo kha dinga,tua ciangin i thukkik ding hi,”hong ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Topa pena kihtakhuai galhang pa banginkei tawh hong omkhawm gige hi.Tua ahih maninkei hong bawlsiate tuk ding uh a,kei hong zo lo ding uh hi.A tawntung a a mindaina uhkimangngilh ngei lo ding hi.
A thuman mite a entel,lungsim le ngaihsutna a muVanglian Topa aw,amaute na thukkikna kei hong musak in.Bang hang hiam cih lehnangma khut sungahka thu kong ap khin hi.
Topa’ tungah la sa unla,Topa phat un!Migilote’ khut sung panin amahin mi cimawhte a hon khia hi.
Keima suah ni in gimna thuak tahen!Ka nu in kei a hong suahsak ni inthupha ngah kei tahen!
Ka pa kiangah, “Tapa khat na nei hi,”ci-in va ko-in a lungdamsak pa ingimna thuak tahen.
Topa in hehpih loina lumlet khuapite tawhtua pa kibang tahen.Zingsangin kahna aw za henla,sun ciangin patauhna aw za tahen.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah inka nu’ gil sungah kei hong that lo hi.Hong that hileh ka nu’ gil sungka han suakpah ding hi.
Gimna le dahna a mu ding lenisima maizum den dinginbang hangin a gil sung paninsuak khia sese ka hi hiam?
Jerusalem A Siat ding KigenkholZedekiah kumpipa in Malkhiah’ tapa Pashhur le Maaseiah’ tapa Zefaniah-te, Jeremiah kiangah sawl a,

“Kote adingin Topa’ kiangah thu hong dotsak in. Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in a sim dingin hong umcih hi. Topa in a na lamdangte khat kei’ tungah hong zang leh amah kilehkiksak thei kha ding hi,” ci-in a dongsak hi.
Tua ciangin Jeremiah in dawngkik a,

“Zedekiah kiangah hih bangin na genkik un, ‘Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a genin-ah: En un, khuakulhpi pualamah a hong umcih Babylon kumpipa le Khaldea mite na dona uh ahi, na khut sung uha na kep na galhiamte uh bangmahin a kimang lo ka suaksak dinga, amaute khempeuh hih khuapi laizangah kong paipih ding hi.
Kei mahmah in hehna le thangpaihna lianpi tawh ka khut zanin, a hat mahmah ka khut tawh note kong do ding hi.
Hih khuapi sungah a teengte a mi a sa ci loin ka thatlum dinga, pulnatna tawh a bei khin ding uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin, Topa in kong cih in-ah, Judah kumpipa Zedekiah le a nasemte le pulnatna, namsau le kialin a si lo a nungta laiteng pen, amau’ galte le amaute a that nuam Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ khut sungah ka pia ding hi. Amah in amaute namsau tawh that dinga, hehpih loin, zong a maap kei dinga, itna lungsim a nei kei ding hi,’ va ci un,” a ci hi.
Topa in Jeremiah hopih a, “Jeremiah aw, hih mite kiangah, ‘Topa in a cih in-ah: En un, na mai uhah nuntakna lampi le sihna lampi ka khung hi.

Hih khuapi sunga om mi peuhmah namsau tawh ahi a, kial tawh ahi a, pulnatna tawh ahi zongin a si ding uh hi. Ahi zongin pusuak khia-in note a hong sim Khaldea mite kiangah a lut peuhmah suakta liailiai ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih in-ah, hih khuapi hoihna ding hi lo, a siat nadingin ka lungsim ka khensat khinzo hi. Babylon kumpipa’ khut sungah ka pia dinga, amah in mei tawh a hal ding hi,’ na ci ding hi.Judah Kumpite Tungah Thupiang dingte Genkholhna

“Judah kumpite’ innkuan tungah hih bangin va gen in: David’ suante aw, Topa’ kammal ngai dih un. Topa in a cih in-ah:Zingsang simin mantakin thu khen unla,mi bawlsia pa’ khut sung pana bawlsiat pa hon khia un.Tua bang na hih kei uhlehsiatna na bawlnate hangunmei bangin ka hehna hong kuang dinga,kuamah in a phelh zo kei ding hi.

Mualkuam zang pan kilaamto a,zanglei lak a suangtum bangina sangto Jerusalem aw,Topa in kong cih in-ah,na langkhat ah ka pang ding hi.Nangmah in,‘Kua in kei hong simsuk dinga,ka omna-ah kua hong lut ding ahi hiam?’ na ci hi.
Na gamtatna tawh kizui-ingimna kong pia ding hi,Topa in kong ci hi.Tulaka sing hoihte tawh a kilamna kumpi innte uh mei tawh kihal dinga,a kimkot khempeuhka kaangtumsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in kei hong hopih a, “Judah kumpipa’ inn-ah va paisuk inla, hih bangin va gen in.
David tokhom tungah a tu Judah kumpipa aw, nang le na nasemte a kipan hih kongpi-ah a hong lut na gammite khempeuh in Topa’ kammal ngai dih un.

Topa in a cih in-ah, thumanin diktat unla, a bawlsiate’ khut sung panin bawlsiatna a thuak mite hon khia un. Minam dangte, pa nei lote le meigongte simmawhbawl kha loin amau’ tungah ngongtat kei unla, hih munah zong mawhna nei lo mite that kei un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh note in hih thute na zuih takpi uhleh David’ suante kumpi suak tawntung ding uh a, amaute a kipan a nasemte uh le a mite uh sakol leeng le sakol tungah tuangin hih inn kongpite-ah hong lut ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note in hih thute na zuih kei uhleh keimah Topa in kong genin-ah, hih inn gamlak a suaksak dingin ka kiciam hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah kumpi inn tawh kisai-in Topa in kong cih in-ah:Nang pen Gilead gam ahi a,Lebanon mual bangin ahi zonginna hoih mahmah hi.Ahih hangin nangsehnel gam kong suaksak dinga,kuamah a ten lohna khuakong suaksak ding hi.
Nang’ langkhat ah a hong susiading mi ka kithawisak dinga,a hei uh hong keng ding uh hi.Amaute in na sidar khuamhoih pente hong phuksakinmei-ah hong khulsak ding uh hi.
“Tua ciangin minam dang tampi in hih khuapi kantan ding uh a, a innsak a innkhangte’ kiangah, ‘Bang hangin hih khuapi lian hici bawl ahi hiam,’ ci-in khatlekhat a kidong ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘A Pasian uh Topa’ thuciamna taisan uh a, pasian dang peuh bia-in a na a sepsak man uh ahi hi,’ ci-in a kidawngkik ding uh hi, va ci in,” hong ci hi.
Judah mite aw,misi pa Josiah kah kei unla,khasiat kei un.A kipaikhiatpih Shallum hanginnakpitakin kap zaw un.Bang hang hiam cih leha pianna gam a mu dinginamah hong kilehkik nawn lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah kumpipa Josiah’ za a luah a tapa, hih mun panin a pai khia pa Shallum thu tawh kisai-in Topa in, “Amah hong kilehkik nawn lo dinga,
salin a kikaihna munah a si ding hi. Hih gam a mukik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Thuman lopi-in inn lam a,zuauthu tawh inndei tungnung a lam mi,ama na a mawkna-ina inn veengte a semsak mi,thaman a pia lo mi ingimna thuak tahen.
“Inndei tungnung zapi a awnginn gol khat ka lam ding hi,”ci-in tawlet vangte bawl a,taamtak singpeek tawh thuap sawm a,za san a zut mi in gimna thuak tahen.
Taamtak sing tawh inn na lam maninkumpi kisa na hi hiam?Na pa in an ne tui dawn a,thumanna le diktatna tawhna a sep manina maa pai hi lo ahi hiam?
Amah in mizawngte le mi cimawhtethuman tawh thu khen a,na khempeuh a hoiha suak pah hi.Tu-a banga hihna pen kei nong theihna uhhi lo ahi hiam, Topa in kong ci hi.
Ahih hangin note inthuman lo tawh ngahna ding ahi zongin,mimawh lote’ sisanluanna ding ahi zongin,mi nuaisiahna lengongtatna ding ahi zongin,na mitte uh le na lungsim uhna zang uh hi.

Tua ahih manin Judah kumpipa Josiah’ tapa Jehoiakim thu tawh kisai-in Topa in hih bangin kong ci hi:“Amaute in, ‘Sanggampa aw,’‘Sanggamnu aw,’ ci-ina sih ciangun a kikah bangunamah a sih ciangin a kah kei ding uh a,‘Topa aw, kumpipa aw,’ci-in zong a kah kei ding uh hi.
La si a kiphum bang lelinamah kivui dinga,Jerusalem kongpi pualamahkikai talin kipaai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jerusalem khua mite aw,Lebanon Mual tungahkahto-in awng unla,Bashan gamah va kiko un.Abarim mualtungah va kiko un;bang hang hiam cih lehna pawlte un gal lel khin hi.
Na daupai laitakun kong hopih hanginna hong ngai nuam kei uh hi.Na neu tung uh a kipannong tuacih ngitnget uh a,keima thu nong mang ngei kei uh hi.
Na makaite uh huih inhong mut mangsak dinga,na pawlte uh salin kiman ding uh hi.Tua ciangin na gitlohna uh hanginmaizumin na lung-am ding uh hi.
Lebanon gam panin a kilataamtak inn sungahnuamtakin na teeng uh hi.Ahih hangin gimna hong tun cianginbangzah takin na tau ding uh hiam?Numei nausuak dingte tawhna kibang ding uh hi.
Topa in Jehoiakim tapa Judah kumpipa Jehoiakhin tungah, “Kei a nungta Pasian ka hih mah bangin, nangmah in ka taklam khutah a om ka letmatthuhna tawh a kibang na hih hangin nang kong la khia dinga,
na kihtak, nang hong that nuamte’ khut sungah kong pia ding hi. Babylon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar le Khaldea mite’ khut sungah nang kong pia ding hi.
Nangmah le nang hong paii na nu, na suahna mun uh ahi lo gam dangah kong lawn khia dinga, tua laitakah na si ding uh hi.
Na ciahkik nopna gam uhah na ciahkik thei nawn kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jehoiakhin, kuama deih loh a kipaai mangbeel kitam tawh kibang ta ahi hiam?Bang hangin amah le a tate kilawn khia a,a theih loh uh gamah kipaai mang ahi hiam?
Aw ka gam, ka gam aw,Topa’ kammal ngai dih ve’n!
Topa in hih bangin ci hi:“Hih pa, ta nei lopa,a khan tawntungina gualzo ngei lopa, ci-in ciamteh un.Ama suanlekhakte khat beek inDavid’ tokhom luah lo dinga,Judah gam a uk kei ding hi,”a ci hi.
